I_PRP ._. The_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP


1._DT Diana_NNP and_CC Virbius_NNP

WHO_WP does_VBZ not_RB know_VB Turner_NNP '_'' s_VBZ picture_NN of_IN the_DT Golden_NNP Bough_NNP ?_. The_DT scene_NN ,_,
suffused_VBN with_IN the_DT golden_JJ glow_NN of_IN imagination_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT divine_JJ
mind_NN of_IN Turner_NNP steeped_VBN and_CC transfigured_VBN even_RB the_DT fairest_NN natural_NN
landscape_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT dream-like_JJ vision_NN of_IN the_DT little_JJ woodland_NN lake_NN of_IN
Nemi_NNP --_: "_`` Diana_NNP '_'' s_VBZ Mirror_NNP ,"_CC as_IN it_PRP was_VBD called_VBN by_IN the_DT ancients_NNS ._. No_NN one_NN
who_WP has_VBZ seen_VBN that_IN calm_JJ water_NN ,_, lapped_VBD in_IN a_DT green_JJ hollow_NN of_IN the_DT Alban_NNP
hills_NNS ,_, can_MD ever_RB forget_VB it_PRP ._. The_DT two_CD characteristic_JJ Italian_JJ villages_NNS
which_WDT slumber_NN on_IN its_PRP$ banks_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT equally_RB Italian_JJ palace_NN whose_WP$
terraced_VBN gardens_NNS descend_VBP steeply_NN to_TO the_DT lake_NN ,_, hardly_RB break_VB the_DT
stillness_NN and_CC even_RB the_DT solitariness_NN of_IN the_DT scene_NN ._. Diana_NNP herself_PRP
might_MD still_RB linger_VB by_IN this_DT lonely_JJ shore_NN ,_, still_RB haunt_VBP these_DT woodlands_NNS
wild_JJ ._.

In_IN antiquity_NN this_DT sylvan_JJ landscape_NN was_VBD the_DT scene_NN of_IN a_DT strange_JJ and_CC
recurring_VBG tragedy_NN ._. On_IN the_DT northern_JJ shore_NN of_IN the_DT lake_NN ,_, right_RB under_IN
the_DT precipitous_JJ cliffs_NNS on_IN which_WDT the_DT modern_JJ village_NN of_IN Nemi_NNP is_VBZ
perched_VBN ,_, stood_VBD the_DT sacred_JJ grove_NN and_CC sanctuary_NN of_IN Diana_NNP Nemorensis_NNP ,_,
or_CC Diana_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ._. The_DT lake_NN and_CC the_DT grove_NN were_VBD sometimes_RB known_VBN as_IN
the_DT lake_NN and_CC grove_NN of_IN Aricia_NNP ._. But_CC the_DT town_NN of_IN Aricia_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT modern_JJ La_NNP
Riccia_NNP )_-RRB- was_VBD situated_VBN about_IN three_CD miles_NNS off_RB ,_, at_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN the_DT Alban_NNP
Mount_NNP ,_, and_CC separated_VBN by_IN a_DT steep_JJ descent_NN from_IN the_DT lake_NN ,_, which_WDT lies_VBZ in_IN
a_DT small_JJ crater-like_JJ hollow_NN on_IN the_DT mountain_NN side_NN ._. In_IN this_DT sacred_JJ
grove_NN there_EX grew_VBD a_DT certain_JJ tree_NN round_NN which_WDT at_IN any_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN ,_,
and_CC probably_RB far_RB into_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, a_DT grim_JJ figure_NN might_MD be_VB seen_VBN to_TO
prowl_NN ._. In_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN he_PRP carried_VBD a_DT drawn_VBN sword_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP kept_VBD peering_VBG
warily_RB about_IN him_PRP as_IN if_IN at_IN every_DT instant_NN he_PRP expected_VBD to_TO be_VB set_VBN upon_IN
by_IN an_DT enemy_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD a_DT priest_NN and_CC a_DT murderer_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT man_NN for_IN whom_WP he_PRP
looked_VBD was_VBD sooner_RBR or_CC later_RBR to_TO murder_VB him_PRP and_CC hold_VB the_DT priesthood_NN in_IN
his_PRP$ stead_NN ._. Such_PDT was_VBD the_DT rule_NN of_IN the_DT sanctuary_NN ._. A_DT candidate_NN for_IN the_DT
priesthood_NN could_MD only_RB succeed_VB to_TO office_NN by_IN slaying_VBG the_DT priest_NN ,_, and_CC
having_VBG slain_VBD him_PRP ,_, he_PRP retained_VBD office_NN till_IN he_PRP was_VBD himself_PRP slain_VBN by_IN a_DT
stronger_JJR or_CC a_DT craftier_NN ._.

The_DT post_NN which_WDT he_PRP held_VBD by_IN this_DT precarious_JJ tenure_NN carried_VBD with_IN it_PRP the_DT
title_NN of_IN king_NN ;_: but_CC surely_RB no_DT crowned_JJ head_NN ever_RB lay_VBD uneasier_JJ ,_, or_CC was_VBD
visited_VBN by_IN more_JJR evil_JJ dreams_NNS ,_, than_IN his_PRP$ ._. For_IN year_NN in_IN ,_, year_NN out_RP ,_, in_IN
summer_NN and_CC winter_NN ,_, in_IN fair_JJ weather_NN and_CC in_IN foul_JJ ,_, he_PRP had_VBD to_TO keep_VB his_PRP$
lonely_JJ watch_NN ,_, and_CC whenever_WRB he_PRP snatched_VBD a_DT troubled_JJ slumber_NN it_PRP was_VBD at_IN
the_DT peril_NN of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ._. The_DT least_JJS relaxation_NN of_IN his_PRP$ vigilance_NN ,_, the_DT
smallest_JJS abatement_NN of_IN his_PRP$ strength_NN of_IN limb_NN or_CC skill_NN of_IN fence_NN ,_, put_VBN
him_PRP in_IN jeopardy_NN ;_: grey_JJ hairs_NNS might_MD seal_VB his_PRP$ death-warrant_NN ._. To_TO gentle_JJ
and_CC pious_JJ pilgrims_NNS at_IN the_DT shrine_NN the_DT sight_NN of_IN him_PRP might_MD well_RB seem_VB to_TO
darken_RB the_DT fair_JJ landscape_NN ,_, as_IN when_WRB a_DT cloud_NN suddenly_RB blots_VBD the_DT sun_NN on_IN
a_DT bright_JJ day_NN ._. The_DT dreamy_JJ blue_JJ of_IN Italian_NNP skies_NNS ,_, the_DT dappled_JJ shade_NN of_IN

ourselves_PRP the_DT scene_NN as_IN it_PRP may_MD have_VB been_VBN witnessed_VBN by_IN a_DT belated_VBN

falling_VBG thick_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT winds_NNS seem_VBP to_TO sing_VB the_DT dirge_NN of_IN the_DT dying_VBG

the_DT withered_VBN leaves_NNS under_IN foot_NN ,_, the_DT lapping_NN of_IN the_DT cold_JJ water_NN on_IN the_DT
shore_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT foreground_NN ,_, pacing_VBG to_TO and_CC fro_IN ,_, now_RB in_IN twilight_NN and_CC
now_RB in_IN gloom_NN ,_, a_DT dark_JJ figure_NN with_IN a_DT glitter_NN of_IN steel_NN at_IN the_DT shoulder_NN

at_IN him_PRP through_IN the_DT matted_JJ boughs_NNS ._.

The_DT strange_JJ rule_NN of_IN this_DT priesthood_NN has_VBZ no_DT parallel_RB in_IN classical_JJ
antiquity_NN ,_, and_CC cannot_MD be_VB explained_VBN from_IN it_PRP ._. To_TO find_VB an_DT explanation_NN
we_PRP must_MD go_VB farther_RB afield_VBN ._. No_DT one_NN will_MD probably_RB deny_VB that_IN such_JJ a_DT
custom_NN savours_NNS of_IN a_DT barbarous_JJ age_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, surviving_VBG into_IN imperial_JJ

can_MD show_VB that_IN a_DT barbarous_JJ custom_NN ,_, like_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT priesthood_NN of_IN

inference_NN ,_, in_IN default_NN of_IN direct_JJ evidence_NN as_IN to_TO how_WRB the_DT priesthood_NN
did_VBD actually_RB arise_VB ,_, can_MD never_RB amount_VB to_TO demonstration_NN ._. But_CC it_PRP will_MD

this_DT book_NN is_VBZ ,_, by_IN meeting_VBG these_DT conditions_NNS ,_, to_TO offer_VB a_DT fairly_RB
probable_JJ explanation_NN of_IN the_DT priesthood_NN of_IN Nemi_NNP ._.

I_PRP begin_VBP by_IN setting_VBG forth_RB the_DT few_JJ facts_NNS and_CC legends_NNS which_WDT have_VBP come_VBN
down_RB to_TO us_PRP on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._. According_VBG to_TO one_CD story_NN the_DT worship_NN of_IN
Diana_NNP at_IN Nemi_NNP was_VBD instituted_VBN by_IN Orestes_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, after_IN killing_VBG Thoas_NNP ,_,
King_NNP of_IN the_DT Tauric_NNP Chersonese_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT Crimea_NNP ),_NNP fled_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ sister_NN to_TO
Italy_NNP ,_, bringing_VBG with_IN him_PRP the_DT image_NN of_IN the_DT Tauric_NNP Diana_NNP hidden_VBN in_IN a_DT
faggot_NN of_IN sticks_NNS ._. After_IN his_PRP$ death_NN his_PRP$ bones_NNS were_VBD transported_VBN from_IN
Aricia_NNP to_TO Rome_NNP and_CC buried_VBN in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT temple_NN of_IN Saturn_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT
Capitoline_NN slope_NN ,_, beside_IN the_DT temple_NN of_IN Concord_NNP ._. The_DT bloody_JJ ritual_NN
which_WDT legend_NN ascribed_VBN to_TO the_DT Tauric_NNP Diana_NNP is_VBZ familiar_JJ to_TO classical_JJ

At_IN any_DT rate_NN it_PRP testifies_VBZ to_TO a_DT belief_NN that_IN the_DT grove_NN had_VBD been_VBN from_IN
early_JJ times_NNS a_DT common_JJ place_NN of_IN worship_NN for_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT oldest_JJS cities_NNS
of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB for_IN the_DT whole_JJ Latin_NNP confederacy_NN ._.



2._DT Artemis_NNP and_CC Hippolytus_NNP

I_PRP HAVE_VBP said_VBD that_IN the_DT Arician_NN legends_NNS of_IN Orestes_NNP and_CC Hippolytus_NNP ,_,
though_RB worthless_JJ as_IN history_NN ,_, have_VBP a_DT certain_JJ value_NN in_IN so_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP
may_MD help_VB us_PRP to_TO understand_VB the_DT worship_NN at_IN Nemi_NNP better_RB by_IN comparing_VBG it_PRP
with_IN the_DT ritual_NN and_CC myths_NNS of_IN other_JJ sanctuaries_NNS ._. We_PRP must_MD ask_VB
ourselves_PRP ,_, Why_WRB did_VBD the_DT author_NN of_IN these_DT legends_NNS pitch_NN upon_IN Orestes_NNS
and_CC Hippolytus_NNP in_IN order_NN to_TO explain_VB Virbius_NNP and_CC the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ?_.
In_IN regard_NN to_TO Orestes_NNP ,_, the_DT answer_NN is_VBZ obvious_JJ ._. He_PRP and_CC the_DT image_NN of_IN the_DT
Tauric_NNP Diana_NNP ,_, which_WDT could_MD only_RB be_VB appeased_VBN with_IN human_JJ blood_NN ,_, were_VBD
dragged_VBD in_IN to_TO render_VB intelligible_JJ the_DT murderous_JJ rule_NN of_IN succession_NN
to_TO the_DT Arician_NN priesthood_NN ._. In_IN regard_NN to_TO Hippolytus_NNP the_DT case_NN is_VBZ not_RB
so_RB plain_JJ ._. The_DT manner_NN of_IN his_PRP$ death_NN suggests_VBZ readily_RB enough_RB a_DT reason_NN
for_IN the_DT exclusion_NN of_IN horses_NNS from_IN the_DT grove_NN ;_: but_CC this_DT by_IN itself_PRP seems_VBZ
hardly_RB enough_JJ to_TO account_VB for_IN the_DT identification_NN ._. We_PRP must_MD try_VB to_TO
probe_NN deeper_RBR by_IN examining_VBG the_DT worship_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT legend_NN or_CC myth_NN
of_IN Hippolytus_NNP ._.

He_PRP had_VBD a_DT famous_JJ sanctuary_NN at_IN his_PRP$ ancestral_JJ home_NN of_IN Troezen_NNP ,_, situated_VBN
on_IN that_DT beautiful_JJ ,_, almost_RB landlocked_VBD bay_NN ,_, where_WRB groves_NNS of_IN oranges_NNS
and_CC lemons_NNS ,_, with_IN tall_JJ cypresses_NNS soaring_VBG like_IN dark_JJ spires_NNS above_IN the_DT
garden_NN of_IN Hesperides_NNP ,_, now_RB clothe_, the_DT strip_NN of_IN fertile_JJ shore_NN at_IN the_DT
foot_NN of_IN the_DT rugged_JJ mountains_NNS ._. Across_IN the_DT blue_JJ water_NN of_IN the_DT tranquil_NN
bay_NN ,_, which_WDT it_PRP shelters_NNS from_IN the_DT open_JJ sea_NN ,_, rises_VBZ Poseidon_NNP '_POS s_PRP sacred_JJ
island_NN ,_, its_PRP$ peaks_NNS veiled_VBN in_IN the_DT sombre_JJ green_NN of_IN the_DT pines_NNS ._. On_IN this_DT
fair_JJ coast_NN Hippolytus_NNP was_VBD worshipped_VBN ._. Within_IN his_PRP$ sanctuary_NN stood_VBD a_DT
temple_NN with_IN an_DT ancient_JJ image_NN ._. His_PRP$ service_NN was_VBD performed_VBN by_IN a_DT priest_NN
who_WP held_VBD office_NN for_IN life_NN ;_: every_DT year_NN a_DT sacrificial_JJ festival_NN was_VBD held_VBN
in_IN his_PRP$ honour_NN ;_: and_CC his_PRP$ untimely_JJ fate_NN was_VBD yearly_JJ mourned_NN ,_, with_IN
weeping_VBG and_CC doleful_JJ chants_NNS ,_, by_IN unwedded_JJ maids_NNS ._. Youths_NNS and_CC maidens_NNS
dedicated_VBN locks_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ hair_NN in_IN his_PRP$ temple_NN before_IN marriage_NN ._. His_PRP$
grave_NN existed_VBD at_IN Troezen_NNP ,_, though_IN the_DT people_NNS would_MD not_RB show_VB it_PRP ._. It_PRP
has_VBZ been_VBN suggested_VBN ,_, with_IN great_JJ plausibility_NN ,_, that_IN in_IN the_DT handsome_JJ
Hippolytus_NNP ,_, beloved_NN of_IN Artemis_NNP ,_, cut_VBD off_RP in_IN his_PRP$ youthful_JJ prime_JJ ,_, and_CC
yearly_JJ mourned_NN by_IN damsels_NNS ,_, we_PRP have_VBP one_CD of_IN those_DT mortal_JJ lovers_NNS of_IN a_DT
goddess_NN who_WP appear_VBP so_RB often_RB in_IN ancient_JJ religion_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN whom_WP Adonis_NNP
is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS familiar_JJ type_NN ._. The_DT rivalry_NN of_IN Artemis_NNP and_CC Phaedra_NNP for_IN
the_DT affection_NN of_IN Hippolytus_NNP reproduces_VBZ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBN ,_, under_IN different_JJ
names_NNS ,_, the_DT rivalry_NN of_IN Aphrodite_NNP and_CC Proserpine_NNP for_IN the_DT love_NN of_IN
Adonis_NNP ,_, for_IN Phaedra_NNP is_VBZ merely_RB a_DT double_JJ of_IN Aphrodite_NNP ._. The_DT theory_NN
probably_RB does_VBZ no_DT injustice_NN either_CC to_TO Hippolytus_NNP or_CC to_TO Artemis_NNP ._. For_IN
Artemis_NNP was_VBD originally_RB a_DT great_JJ goddess_NN of_IN fertility_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT
principles_NNS of_IN early_JJ religion_NN ,_, she_PRP who_WP fertilises_VBZ nature_NN must_MD herself_PRP
be_VB fertile_JJ ,_, and_CC to_TO be_VB that_IN she_PRP must_MD necessarily_RB have_VB a_DT male_JJ consort_NN ._.
On_IN this_DT view_NN ,_, Hippolytus_NNP was_VBD the_DT consort_NN of_IN Artemis_NNP at_IN Troezen_NNP ,_, and_CC
the_DT shorn_NN tresses_NNS offered_VBD to_TO him_PRP by_IN the_DT Troezenian_NNP youths_NNS and_CC
maidens_NNS before_IN marriage_NN were_VBD designed_VBN to_TO strengthen_VB his_PRP$ union_NN with_IN
the_DT goddess_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB to_TO promote_VB the_DT fruitfulness_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, of_IN
cattle_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN mankind_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ some_DT confirmation_NN of_IN this_DT view_NN that_WDT
within_IN the_DT precinct_NN of_IN Hippolytus_NNP at_IN Troezen_NNP there_EX were_VBD worshipped_VBN
two_CD female_JJ powers_NNS named_VBN Damia_NNP and_CC Auxesia_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ connexion_NN with_IN the_DT
fertility_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN is_VBZ unquestionable_JJ ._. When_WRB Epidaurus_NNP suffered_VBN
from_IN a_DT dearth_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS ,_, in_IN obedience_NN to_TO an_DT oracle_NN ,_, carved_VBN images_NNS
of_IN Damia_NNP and_CC Auxesia_NNP out_IN of_IN sacred_JJ olive_JJ wood_NN ,_, and_CC no_RB sooner_RB had_VBD
they_PRP done_VBD so_RB and_CC set_VBD them_PRP up_RP than_IN the_DT earth_NN bore_VBD fruit_NN again_RB ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, at_IN Troezen_NNP itself_PRP ,_, and_CC apparently_RB within_IN the_DT precinct_NN of_IN
Hippolytus_NNP ,_, a_DT curious_JJ festival_NN of_IN stone-throwing_NN was_VBD held_VBN in_IN honour_NN
of_IN these_DT maidens_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT Troezenians_NNPS called_VBD them_PRP ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ easy_JJ to_TO
show_NN that_IN similar_JJ customs_NNS have_VBP been_VBN practised_VBN in_IN many_JJ lands_NNS for_IN the_DT
express_JJ purpose_NN of_IN ensuring_VBG good_JJ crops_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT story_NN of_IN the_DT tragic_NN
death_NN of_IN the_DT youthful_JJ Hippolytus_NNP we_PRP may_MD discern_VB an_DT analogy_NN with_IN
similar_JJ tales_NNS of_IN other_JJ fair_JJ but_CC mortal_JJ youths_NNS who_WP paid_VBD with_IN their_PRP$
lives_NNS for_IN the_DT brief_JJ rapture_NN of_IN the_DT love_NN of_IN an_DT immortal_JJ goddess_NN ._.
These_DT hapless_JJ lovers_NNS were_VBD probably_RB not_RB always_RB mere_JJ myths_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT
legends_NNS which_WDT traced_VBD their_PRP$ spilt_NN blood_NN in_IN the_DT purple_JJ bloom_NN of_IN the_DT

the_DT rose_NN were_VBD no_DT idle_JJ poetic_JJ emblems_NNS of_IN youth_NN and_CC beauty_NN fleeting_JJ as_IN
the_DT summer_NN flowers_NNS ._. Such_JJ fables_NNS contain_VBP a_DT deeper_JJR philosophy_NN of_IN the_DT
relation_NN of_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN man_NN to_TO the_DT life_NN of_IN nature_NN --_: a_DT sad_JJ philosophy_NN
which_WDT gave_VBD birth_NN to_TO a_DT tragic_JJ practice_NN ._. What_WP that_IN philosophy_NN and_CC that_IN
practice_NN were_VBD ,_, we_PRP shall_MD learn_VB later_JJ on_IN ._.



3._. Recapitulation_NNP

WE_NNP can_MD now_RB perhaps_RB understand_VB why_WRB the_DT ancients_NNS identified_VBN
Hippolytus_NNP ,_, the_DT consort_NN of_IN Artemis_NNP ,_, with_IN Virbius_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, according_VBG to_TO
Servius_NNP ,_, stood_VBD to_TO Diana_NNP as_IN Adonis_NNP to_TO Venus_NNP ,_, or_CC Attis_NNP to_TO the_DT Mother_NN
of_IN the_DT Gods_NNP ._. For_IN Diana_NNP ,_, like_IN Artemis_NNP ,_, was_VBD a_DT goddess_NN of_IN fertility_NN in_IN
general_JJ ,_, and_CC of_IN childbirth_NN in_IN particular_JJ ._. As_IN such_JJ she_PRP ,_, like_IN her_PRP$
Greek_NNP counterpart_NN ,_, needed_VBD a_DT male_JJ partner_NN ._. That_DT partner_NN ,_, if_IN Servius_NNP
is_VBZ right_JJ ,_, was_VBD Virbius_NNP ._. In_IN his_PRP$ character_NN of_IN the_DT founder_NN of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ
grove_NN and_CC first_JJ king_NN of_IN Nemi_NNP ,_, Virbius_NNP is_VBZ clearly_RB the_DT mythical_JJ
predecessor_NN or_CC archetype_NN of_IN the_DT line_NN of_IN priests_NNS who_WP served_VBD Diana_NNP
under_IN the_DT title_NN of_IN Kings_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ,_, and_CC who_WP came_VBD ,_, like_IN him_PRP ,_, one_CD
after_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, to_TO a_DT violent_JJ end_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ natural_JJ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, to_TO
conjecture_NN that_IN they_PRP stood_VBD to_TO the_DT goddess_NN of_IN the_DT grove_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ
relation_NN in_IN which_WDT Virbius_NNP stood_VBD to_TO her_PRP ;_: in_IN short_JJ ,_, that_IN the_DT mortal_NN
King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP had_VBD for_IN his_PRP$ queen_NN the_DT woodland_NN Diana_NNP herself_PRP ._. If_IN
the_DT sacred_JJ tree_NN which_WDT he_PRP guarded_VBN with_IN his_PRP$ life_NN was_VBD supposed_VBN ,_, as_RB
seems_VBZ probable_JJ ,_, to_TO be_VB her_PRP$ special_JJ embodiment_NN ,_, her_PRP$ priest_NN may_MD not_RB
only_RB have_VBP worshipped_VBN it_PRP as_IN his_PRP$ goddess_NN but_CC embraced_VBD it_PRP as_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ at_IN least_JJS nothing_NN absurd_JJ in_IN the_DT supposition_NN ,_, since_IN even_RB in_IN
the_DT time_NN of_IN Pliny_NNP a_DT noble_JJ Roman_NNP used_VBD thus_RB to_TO treat_VB a_DT beautiful_JJ
beech-tree_NN in_IN another_DT sacred_JJ grove_NN of_IN Diana_NNP on_IN the_DT Alban_NNP hills_NNS ._. He_PRP
embraced_VBD it_PRP ,_, he_PRP kissed_VBD it_PRP ,_, he_PRP lay_VBD under_IN its_PRP$ shadow_NN ,_, he_PRP poured_VBD wine_NN
on_IN its_PRP$ trunk_NN ._. Apparently_RB he_PRP took_VBD the_DT tree_NN for_IN the_DT goddess_NN ._. The_DT
custom_NN of_IN physically_RB marrying_VBG men_NNS and_CC women_NNS to_TO trees_NNS is_VBZ still_RB
practised_VBN in_IN India_NNP and_CC other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT East_NNP ._. Why_WRB should_MD it_PRP not_RB
have_VBP obtained_VBN in_IN ancient_JJ Latium_NN ?_.

Reviewing_VBG the_DT evidence_NN as_IN a_DT whole_JJ ,_, we_PRP may_MD conclude_VB that_IN the_DT worship_NN
of_IN Diana_NNP in_IN her_PRP$ sacred_JJ grove_NN at_IN Nemi_NNP was_VBD of_IN great_JJ importance_NN and_CC
immemorial_JJ antiquity_NN ;_: that_IN she_PRP was_VBD revered_VBN as_IN the_DT goddess_NN of_IN
woodlands_NNS and_CC of_IN wild_JJ creatures_NNS ,_, probably_RB also_RB of_IN domestic_JJ cattle_NNS
and_CC of_IN the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN ;_: that_IN she_PRP was_VBD believed_VBN to_TO bless_VB men_NNS
and_CC women_NNS with_IN offspring_NN and_CC to_TO aid_VB mothers_NNS in_IN childbed_NN ;_: that_IN her_PRP$
holy_JJ fire_NN ,_, tended_VBN by_IN chaste_NN virgins_NNS ,_, burned_VBN perpetually_RB in_IN a_DT round_NN
temple_NN within_IN the_DT precinct_JJ ;_: that_IN associated_VBN with_IN her_PRP was_VBD a_DT
water-nymph_NN Egeria_NNP who_WP discharged_VBD one_CD of_IN Diana_NNP '_'' s_VBZ own_JJ functions_NNS by_IN
succouring_VBG women_NNS in_IN travail_NN ,_, and_CC who_WP was_VBD popularly_RB supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB
mated_VBN with_IN an_DT old_JJ Roman_NNP king_NN in_IN the_DT sacred_JJ grove_NN ;_: further_JJ ,_, that_IN
Diana_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP herself_PRP had_VBD a_DT male_JJ companion_NN Virbius_NNP by_IN name_NN ,_, who_WP
was_VBD to_TO her_PRP$ what_WP Adonis_NNP was_VBD to_TO Venus_NNP ,_, or_CC Attis_NNP to_TO Cybele_NNP ;_: and_CC ,_,
lastly_RB ,_, that_IN this_DT mythical_JJ Virbius_NNP was_VBD represented_VBN in_IN historical_JJ
times_NNS by_IN a_DT line_NN of_IN priests_NNS known_VBN as_IN Kings_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ,_, who_WP regularly_RB
perished_VBN by_IN the_DT swords_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ successors_NNS ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ lives_NNS were_VBD in_IN
a_DT manner_NN bound_VBN up_RP with_IN a_DT certain_JJ tree_NN in_IN the_DT grove_NN ,_, because_IN so_RB long_RB
as_IN that_IN tree_NN was_VBD uninjured_JJ they_PRP were_VBD safe_JJ from_IN attack_NN ._.

Clearly_RB these_DT conclusions_NNS do_VBP not_RB of_IN themselves_PRP suffice_NN to_TO explain_VB
the_DT peculiar_JJ rule_NN of_IN succession_NN to_TO the_DT priesthood_NN ._. But_CC perhaps_RB the_DT
survey_NN of_IN a_DT wider_JJR field_NN may_MD lead_VB us_PRP to_TO think_VB that_IN they_PRP contain_VBP in_IN
germ_NN the_DT solution_NN of_IN the_DT problem_NN ._. To_TO that_DT wider_JJR survey_NN we_PRP must_MD now_RB
address_VB ourselves_PRP ._. It_PRP will_MD be_VB long_JJ and_CC laborious_JJ ,_, but_CC may_MD possess_VB
something_NN of_IN the_DT interest_NN and_CC charm_NN of_IN a_DT voyage_NN of_IN discovery_NN ,_, in_IN
which_WDT we_PRP shall_MD visit_VB many_JJ strange_JJ foreign_JJ lands_NNS ,_, with_IN strange_JJ
foreign_JJ peoples_NNS ,_, and_CC still_RB stranger_NN customs_NNS ._. The_DT wind_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT
shrouds_NNS :_: we_PRP shake_VBP out_RP our_PRP$ sails_NNS to_TO it_PRP ,_, and_CC leave_VB the_DT coast_NN of_IN Italy_NNP
behind_IN us_PRP for_IN a_DT time_NN ._.




II_NNP ._. Priestly_RB Kings_.

THE_DT questions_NNS which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP set_VBN ourselves_PRP to_TO answer_NN are_VBP mainly_RB two_CD :_:
first_JJ ,_, why_WRB had_VBD Diana_NNP '_'' s_VBZ priest_NN at_IN Nemi_NNP ,_, the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ,_, to_TO slay_VB
his_PRP$ predecessor_NN ?_. second_JJ ,_, why_WRB before_RB doing_VBG so_RB had_VBD he_PRP to_TO pluck_VB the_DT
branch_NN of_IN a_DT certain_JJ tree_NN which_WDT the_DT public_JJ opinion_NN of_IN the_DT ancients_NNS
identified_VBN with_IN Virgil_NNP '_POS s_PRP Golden_NNP Bough_NNP ?_.

The_DT first_JJ point_NN on_IN which_WDT we_PRP fasten_RB is_VBZ the_DT priest_NN '_POS s_PRP title_NN ._. Why_WRB was_VBD he_PRP
called_VBN the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ?_. Why_WRB was_VBD his_PRP$ office_NN spoken_VBN of_IN as_IN a_DT
kingdom_NN ?_.

The_DT union_NN of_IN a_DT royal_JJ title_NN with_IN priestly_JJ duties_NNS was_VBD common_JJ in_IN
ancient_JJ Italy_NNP and_CC Greece_NNP ._. At_IN Rome_NNP and_CC in_IN other_JJ cities_NNS of_IN Latium_NNP
there_EX was_VBD a_DT priest_NN called_VBD the_DT Sacrificial_NNP King_NNP or_CC King_NNP of_IN the_DT Sacred_NNP
Rites_NNS ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN bore_VBD the_DT title_NN of_IN Queen_NNP of_IN the_DT Sacred_NNP Rites_NNPS ._. In_IN
republican_JJ Athens_NNP the_DT second_JJ annual_JJ magistrate_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN was_VBD
called_VBN the_DT King_NNP ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN the_DT Queen_NNP ;_: the_DT functions_NNS of_IN both_DT were_VBD
religious_JJ ._. Many_JJ other_JJ Greek_NNP democracies_NNS had_VBD titular_JJ kings_NNS ,_, whose_WP$
duties_NNS ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP are_VBP known_VBN ,_, seem_VBP to_TO have_VB been_VBN priestly_RB ,_, and_CC to_TO
have_VB centered_VBN round_RB the_DT Common_JJ Hearth_NNP of_IN the_DT state_NN ._. Some_DT Greek_NNP
states_NNS had_VBD several_JJ of_IN these_DT titular_JJ kings_NNS ,_, who_WP held_VBD office_NN
simultaneously_RB ._. At_IN Rome_NNP the_DT tradition_NN was_VBD that_IN the_DT Sacrificial_NNP King_NNP
had_VBD been_VBN appointed_VBN after_IN the_DT abolition_NN of_IN the_DT monarchy_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO
offer_NN the_DT sacrifices_NNS which_WDT before_RB had_VBD been_VBN offered_VBN by_IN the_DT kings_NNS ._. A_NN
similar_JJ view_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT priestly_JJ kings_NNS appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB
prevailed_VBD in_IN Greece_NNP ._. In_IN itself_PRP the_DT opinion_NN is_VBZ not_RB improbable_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP
is_VBZ borne_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT example_NN of_IN Sparta_NNP ,_, almost_RB the_DT only_JJ purely_RB Greek_NNP
state_NN which_WDT retained_VBD the_DT kingly_JJ form_NN of_IN government_NN in_IN historical_JJ
times_NNS ._. For_IN in_IN Sparta_NNP all_DT state_NN sacrifices_NNS were_VBD offered_VBN by_IN the_DT kings_NNS
as_IN descendants_NNS of_IN the_DT god_NN ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT two_CD Spartan_NNP kings_NNS held_VBD the_DT
priesthood_NN of_IN Zeus_NNP Lacedaemon_NNP ,_, the_DT other_JJ the_DT priesthood_NN of_IN Heavenly_RB
Zeus_NNP ._.

This_DT combination_NN of_IN priestly_JJ functions_NNS with_IN royal_JJ authority_NN is_VBZ
familiar_JJ to_TO every_DT one_CD ._. Asia_NNP Minor_NNP ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, was_VBD the_DT seat_NN of_IN
various_JJ great_JJ religious_JJ capitals_NNS peopled_VBN by_IN thousands_NNS of_IN sacred_JJ
slaves_NNS ,_, and_CC ruled_VBD by_IN pontiffs_NNS who_WP wielded_VBD at_IN once_RB temporal_JJ and_CC
spiritual_JJ authority_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT popes_NNS of_IN mediaeval_JJ Rome_NNP ._. Such_PDT
priest-ridden_JJ cities_NNS were_VBD Zela_NNP and_CC Pessinus_NNP ._. Teutonic_NNP kings_NNS ,_, again_RB ,_,
in_IN the_DT old_JJ heathen_NN days_NNS seem_VBP to_TO have_VB stood_VBN in_IN the_DT position_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO
have_VBP exercised_VBN the_DT powers_NNS ,_, of_IN high_JJ priests_NNS ._. The_DT Emperors_NNP of_IN China_NNP
offered_VBN public_JJ sacrifices_NNS ,_, the_DT details_NNS of_IN which_WDT were_VBD regulated_VBN by_IN
the_DT ritual_NN books_NNS ._. The_DT King_NNP of_IN Madagascar_NNP was_VBD high-priest_JJS of_IN the_DT
realm_NN ._. At_IN the_DT great_JJ festival_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ year_NN ,_, when_WRB a_DT bullock_NN was_VBD
sacrificed_VBN for_IN the_DT good_JJ of_IN the_DT kingdom_NN ,_, the_DT king_NN stood_VBD over_IN the_DT
sacrifice_VB to_TO offer_VB prayer_NN and_CC thanksgiving_NN ,_, while_IN his_PRP$ attendants_NNS
slaughtered_VBN the_DT animal_NN ._. In_IN the_DT monarchical_JJ states_NNS which_WDT still_RB
maintain_VB their_PRP$ independence_NN among_IN the_DT Gallas_NNP of_IN Eastern_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, the_DT
king_NN sacrifices_NNS on_IN the_DT mountain_NN tops_NNS and_CC regulates_VBZ the_DT immolation_NN of_IN
human_JJ victims_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT dim_JJ light_NN of_IN tradition_NN reveals_VBZ a_DT similar_JJ
union_NN of_IN temporal_JJ and_CC spiritual_JJ power_NN ,_, of_IN royal_JJ and_CC priestly_RB duties_NNS ,_,
in_IN the_DT kings_NNS of_IN that_DT delightful_JJ region_NN of_IN Central_NNP America_NNP whose_WP$
ancient_JJ capital_NN ,_, now_RB buried_VBN under_IN the_DT rank_NN growth_NN of_IN the_DT tropical_NN
forest_NN ,_, is_VBZ marked_VBN by_IN the_DT stately_NN and_CC mysterious_JJ ruins_NNS of_IN Palenque_NNP ._.

When_WRB we_PRP have_VBP said_VBD that_IN the_DT ancient_JJ kings_NNS were_VBD commonly_RB priests_NNS also_RB ,_,
we_PRP are_VBP far_RB from_IN having_VBG exhausted_VBN the_DT religious_JJ aspect_NN of_IN their_PRP$
office_NN ._. In_IN those_DT days_NNS the_DT divinity_NN that_IN hedges_NNS a_DT king_NN was_VBD no_DT empty_JJ
form_NN of_IN speech_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT expression_NN of_IN a_DT sober_JJ belief_NN ._. Kings_NNP were_VBD
revered_VBN ,_, in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS not_RB merely_RB as_IN priests_NNS ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, as_IN
intercessors_NNS between_IN man_NN and_CC god_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN themselves_PRP gods_NNS ,_, able_JJ to_TO
bestow_RB upon_IN their_PRP$ subjects_NNS and_CC worshippers_NNS those_DT blessings_NNS which_WDT are_VBP
commonly_RB supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB beyond_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN mortals_NNS ,_, and_CC are_VBP sought_VBN ,_,
if_IN at_IN all_DT ,_, only_RB by_IN prayer_NN and_CC sacrifice_VB offered_VBN to_TO superhuman_NN and_CC
invisible_JJ beings_NNS ._. Thus_RB kings_NNS are_VBP often_RB expected_VBN to_TO give_VB rain_NN and_CC
sunshine_NN in_IN due_JJ season_NN ,_, to_TO make_VB the_DT crops_NNS grow_VBP ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ._. Strange_JJ
as_IN this_DT expectation_NN appears_VBZ to_TO us_PRP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB of_IN a_DT piece_NN with_IN early_JJ
modes_NNS of_IN thought_NN ._. A_DT savage_JJ hardly_RB conceives_NNS the_DT distinction_NN commonly_RB
drawn_VBN by_IN more_JJR advanced_JJ peoples_NNS between_IN the_DT natural_NN and_CC the_DT
supernatural_JJ ._. To_TO him_PRP the_DT world_NN is_VBZ to_TO a_DT great_JJ extent_NN worked_VBN by_IN
supernatural_JJ agents_NNS ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, by_IN personal_JJ beings_NNS acting_VBG on_IN impulses_NNS
and_CC motives_NNS like_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, liable_JJ like_IN him_PRP to_TO be_VB moved_VBN by_IN appeals_NNS to_TO
their_PRP$ pity_NN ,_, their_PRP$ hopes_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ fears_NNS ._. In_IN a_DT world_NN so_RB conceived_VBD he_PRP
sees_VBZ no_DT limit_NN to_TO his_PRP$ power_NN of_IN influencing_VBG the_DT course_NN of_IN nature_NN to_TO
his_PRP$ own_JJ advantage_NN ._. Prayers_NNS ,_, promises_NNS ,_, or_CC threats_NNS may_MD secure_VB him_PRP fine_JJ
weather_NN and_CC an_DT abundant_JJ crop_NN from_IN the_DT gods_NNS ;_: and_CC if_IN a_DT god_NN should_MD
happen_VB ,_, as_IN he_PRP sometimes_RB believes_VBZ ,_, to_TO become_VB incarnate_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ
person_NN ,_, then_RB he_PRP need_MD appeal_VB to_TO no_DT higher_JJR being_NN ;_: he_PRP ,_, the_DT savage_JJ ,_,
possesses_NNS in_IN himself_PRP all_RB the_DT powers_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO further_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ
well-being_NN and_CC that_IN of_IN his_PRP$ fellow-men_NNS ._.

This_DT is_VBZ one_CD way_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT idea_NN of_IN a_DT man-god_NN is_VBZ reached_VBN ._. But_CC there_EX
is_VBZ another_DT ._. Along_IN with_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN as_IN pervaded_VBN by_IN
spiritual_JJ forces_NNS ,_, savage_JJ man_NN has_VBZ a_DT different_JJ ,_, and_CC probably_RB still_RB
older_JJR ,_, conception_NN in_IN which_WDT we_PRP may_MD detect_VB a_DT germ_NN of_IN the_DT modern_JJ notion_NN
of_IN natural_JJ law_NN or_CC the_DT view_NN of_IN nature_NN as_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN events_NNS occurring_VBG
in_IN an_DT invariable_JJ order_NN without_IN the_DT intervention_NN of_IN personal_JJ agency_NN ._.
The_DT germ_NN of_IN which_WDT I_PRP speak_VBP is_VBZ involved_VBN in_IN that_DT sympathetic_JJ magic_NN ,_, as_IN
it_PRP may_MD be_VB called_VBN ,_, which_WDT plays_VBZ a_DT large_JJ part_NN in_IN most_JJS systems_NNS of_IN
superstition_NN ._. In_IN early_JJ society_NN the_DT king_NN is_VBZ frequently_RB a_DT magician_NN as_IN
well_RB as_IN a_DT priest_NN ;_: indeed_RB he_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB often_RB attained_VBN to_TO power_NN
by_IN virtue_NN of_IN his_PRP$ supposed_VBN proficiency_NN in_IN the_DT black_JJ or_CC white_JJ art_NN ._.
Hence_RB in_IN order_NN to_TO understand_VB the_DT evolution_NN of_IN the_DT kingship_NN and_CC the_DT
sacred_JJ character_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT office_NN has_VBZ commonly_RB been_VBN invested_VBN in_IN
the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN savage_JJ or_CC barbarous_JJ peoples_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ essential_JJ to_TO have_VB
some_DT acquaintance_NN with_IN the_DT principles_NNS of_IN magic_NN and_CC to_TO form_VB some_DT
conception_NN of_IN the_DT extraordinary_JJ hold_NN which_WDT that_WDT ancient_JJ system_NN of_IN
superstition_NN has_VBZ had_VBN on_IN the_DT human_JJ mind_NN in_IN all_DT ages_NNS and_CC all_PDT
countries_NNS ._. Accordingly_RB I_PRP propose_VBP to_TO consider_VB the_DT subject_NN in_IN some_DT
detail_NN ._.



III_NNP ._. Sympathetic_NNP Magic_NNP


1._DT The_DT Principles_NNS of_IN Magic_NNP

IF_IN we_PRP analyse_VBD the_DT principles_NNS of_IN thought_NN on_IN which_WDT magic_NN is_VBZ based_VBN ,_,
they_PRP will_MD probably_RB be_VB found_VBN to_TO resolve_VB themselves_PRP into_IN two_CD :_: first_RB ,_,
that_DT like_IN produces_VBZ like_IN ,_, or_CC that_IN an_DT effect_NN resembles_VBZ its_PRP$ cause_NN ;_:
and_CC ,_, second_JJ ,_, that_IN things_NNS which_WDT have_VBP once_RB been_VBN in_IN contact_NN with_IN each_DT
other_JJ continue_VBP to_TO act_VB on_IN each_DT other_JJ at_IN a_DT distance_NN after_IN the_DT
physical_JJ contact_NN has_VBZ been_VBN severed_VBN ._. The_DT former_JJ principle_NN may_MD be_VB
called_VBN the_DT Law_NNP of_IN Similarity_NNP ,_, the_DT latter_JJ the_DT Law_NN of_IN Contact_NN or_CC
Contagion_NN ._. From_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN these_DT principles_NNS ,_, namely_RB the_DT Law_NN of_IN
Similarity_NNP ,_, the_DT magician_NN infers_VBZ that_IN he_PRP can_MD produce_VB any_DT effect_NN he_PRP
desires_VBZ merely_RB by_IN imitating_VBG it_PRP :_: from_IN the_DT second_JJ he_PRP infers_VBZ that_IN
whatever_WDT he_PRP does_VBZ to_TO a_DT material_NN object_NN will_MD affect_VB equally_RB the_DT
person_NN with_IN whom_WP the_DT object_NN was_VBD once_RB in_IN contact_NN ,_, whether_IN it_PRP formed_VBD
part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN or_CC not_RB ._. Charms_NNS based_VBN on_IN the_DT Law_NN of_IN Similarity_NNP may_MD
be_VB called_VBN Homoeopathic_NNP or_CC Imitative_NNP Magic_NNP ._. Charms_NNS based_VBN on_IN the_DT Law_NN
of_IN Contact_NN or_CC Contagion_NN may_MD be_VB called_VBN Contagious_NNP Magic_NNP ._. To_TO denote_VB
the_DT first_JJ of_IN these_DT branches_NNS of_IN magic_JJ the_DT term_NN Homoeopathic_NNP is_VBZ
perhaps_RB preferable_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT alternative_JJ term_NN Imitative_JJ or_CC Mimetic_JJ
suggests_VBZ ,_, if_IN it_PRP does_VBZ not_RB imply_VB ,_, a_DT conscious_JJ agent_NN who_WP imitates_VBZ ,_,
thereby_RB limiting_VBG the_DT scope_NN of_IN magic_NN too_RB narrowly_RB ._. For_IN the_DT same_JJ
principles_NNS which_WDT the_DT magician_NN applies_VBZ in_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN his_PRP$ art_NN
are_VBP implicitly_RB believed_VBN by_IN him_PRP to_TO regulate_VB the_DT operations_NNS of_IN
inanimate_JJ nature_NN ;_: in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, he_PRP tacitly_RB assumes_VBZ that_IN the_DT Laws_NNP
of_IN Similarity_NNP and_CC Contact_NNP are_VBP of_IN universal_JJ application_NN and_CC are_VBP not_RB
limited_JJ to_TO human_JJ actions_NNS ._. In_IN short_JJ ,_, magic_NN is_VBZ a_DT spurious_JJ system_NN of_IN
natural_JJ law_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN a_DT fallacious_JJ guide_NN of_IN conduct_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT false_JJ
science_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN an_DT abortive_JJ art_NN ._. Regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT system_NN of_IN natural_JJ
law_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, as_IN a_DT statement_NN of_IN the_DT rules_NNS which_WDT determine_VBP the_DT
sequence_NN of_IN events_NNS throughout_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB called_VBN
Theoretical_NNP Magic_NNP :_: regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT set_NN of_IN precepts_NNS which_WDT human_NN beings_NNS
observe_VB in_IN order_NN to_TO compass_NN their_PRP$ ends_NNS ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB called_VBN Practical_NNP
Magic_NNP ._. At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB borne_VBN in_IN mind_NN that_IN the_DT
primitive_JJ magician_NN knows_VBZ magic_JJ only_RB on_IN its_PRP$ practical_JJ side_NN ;_: he_PRP never_RB
analyses_NNS the_DT mental_JJ processes_NNS on_IN which_WDT his_PRP$ practice_NN is_VBZ based_VBN ,_, never_RB
reflects_VBZ on_IN the_DT abstract_JJ principles_NNS involved_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ actions_NNS ._. With_IN
him_PRP ,_, as_IN with_IN the_DT vast_JJ majority_NN of_IN men_NNS ,_, logic_NN is_VBZ implicit_JJ ,_, not_RB
explicit_JJ :_: he_PRP reasons_VBZ just_RB as_IN he_PRP digests_VBZ his_PRP$ food_NN in_IN complete_JJ
ignorance_NN of_IN the_DT intellectual_JJ and_CC physiological_JJ processes_NNS which_WDT are_VBP
essential_JJ to_TO the_DT one_CD operation_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT other_JJ ._. In_IN short_JJ ,_, to_TO him_PRP
magic_NN is_VBZ always_RB an_DT art_NN ,_, never_RB a_DT science_NN ;_: the_DT very_JJ idea_NN of_IN science_NN
is_VBZ lacking_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ undeveloped_JJ mind_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ for_IN the_DT philosophic_JJ
student_NN to_TO trace_VB the_DT train_NN of_IN thought_NN which_WDT underlies_VBZ the_DT
magician_NN '_POS s_VBZ practice_NN ;_: to_TO draw_VB out_RP the_DT few_JJ simple_JJ threads_NNS of_IN
which_WDT the_DT tangled_JJ skein_NN is_VBZ composed_VBN ;_: to_TO disengage_VB the_DT abstract_JJ
principles_NNS from_IN their_PRP$ concrete_NN applications_NNS ;_: in_IN short_JJ ,_, to_TO discern_VB
the_DT spurious_JJ science_NN behind_IN the_DT bastard_NN art_NN ._.

If_IN my_PRP$ analysis_NN of_IN the_DT magician_NN '_POS s_PRP logic_NN is_VBZ correct_JJ ,_, its_PRP$ two_CD great_JJ
principles_NNS turn_VB out_RP to_TO be_VB merely_RB two_CD different_JJ misapplications_NNS of_IN
the_DT association_NN of_IN ideas_NNS ._. Homoeopathic_NNP magic_NN is_VBZ founded_VBN on_IN the_DT
association_NN of_IN ideas_NNS by_IN similarity_NN :_: contagious_JJ magic_NN is_VBZ founded_VBN on_IN
the_DT association_NN of_IN ideas_NNS by_IN contiguity_NN ._. Homoeopathic_'' magic_NN commits_NNS
the_DT mistake_NN of_IN assuming_VBG that_IN things_NNS which_WDT resemble_VBP each_DT other_JJ are_VBP
the_DT same_JJ :_: contagious_JJ magic_NN commits_VBZ the_DT mistake_NN of_IN assuming_VBG that_IN
things_NNS which_WDT have_VBP once_RB been_VBN in_IN contact_NN with_IN each_DT other_JJ are_VBP always_RB in_IN
contact_NN ._. But_CC in_IN practice_NN the_DT two_CD branches_NNS are_VBP often_RB combined_VBN ;_: or_CC ,_, to_TO
be_VB more_RBR exact_JJ ,_, while_IN homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ magic_NN may_MD be_VB
practised_VBN by_IN itself_PRP ,_, contagious_VBG magic_NN will_MD generally_RB be_VB found_VBN to_TO
involve_VB an_DT application_NN of_IN the_DT homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ principle_NN ._.
Thus_RB generally_RB stated_VBN the_DT two_CD things_NNS may_MD be_VB a_DT little_JJ difficult_JJ to_TO
grasp_VBP ,_, but_CC they_PRP will_MD readily_RB become_VB intelligible_JJ when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP
illustrated_VBN by_IN particular_JJ examples_NNS ._. Both_DT trains_NNS of_IN thought_NN are_VBP in_IN
fact_NN extremely_RB simple_JJ and_CC elementary_JJ ._. It_PRP could_MD hardly_RB be_VB otherwise_RB ,_,
since_IN they_PRP are_VBP familiar_JJ in_IN the_DT concrete_NN ,_, though_IN certainly_RB not_RB in_IN the_DT
abstract_JJ ,_, to_TO the_DT crude_NN intelligence_NN not_RB only_RB of_IN the_DT savage_JJ ,_, but_CC of_IN
ignorant_JJ and_CC dull-witted_JJ people_NNS everywhere_RB ._. Both_DT branches_NNS of_IN magic_JJ ,_,
the_DT homoeopathic_JJ and_CC the_DT contagious_JJ ,_, may_MD conveniently_RB be_VB
comprehended_VBN under_IN the_DT general_JJ name_NN of_IN Sympathetic_NNP Magic_NNP ,_, since_IN both_DT
assume_VB that_IN things_NNS act_VBP on_IN each_DT other_JJ at_IN a_DT distance_NN through_IN a_DT secret_NN
sympathy_NN ,_, the_DT impulse_NN being_VBG transmitted_VBN from_IN one_CD to_TO the_DT other_JJ by_IN
means_NNS of_IN what_WP we_PRP may_MD conceive_VB as_IN a_DT kind_NN of_IN invisible_JJ ether_NN ,_, not_RB
unlike_IN that_IN which_WDT is_VBZ postulated_VBN by_IN modern_JJ science_NN for_IN a_DT precisely_RB
similar_JJ purpose_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, to_TO explain_VB how_WRB things_NNS can_MD physically_RB affect_VB
each_DT other_JJ through_IN a_DT space_NN which_WDT appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB empty_JJ ._.

It_PRP may_MD be_VB convenient_JJ to_TO tabulate_VB as_IN follows_VBZ the_DT branches_NNS of_IN
magic_JJ according_VBG to_TO the_DT laws_NNS of_IN thought_NN which_WDT underlie_VBD them_PRP :_:

I_PRP will_MD now_RB illustrate_VB these_DT two_CD great_JJ branches_NNS of_IN sympathetic_JJ
magic_JJ by_IN examples_NNS ,_, beginning_VBG with_IN homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN ._.



2._DT Homoeopathic_NNP or_CC Imitative_NNP Magic_NNP

PERHAPS_NNS the_DT most_RBS familiar_JJ application_NN of_IN the_DT principle_NN that_IN like_IN
produces_VBZ like_IN is_VBZ the_DT attempt_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN by_IN many_JJ peoples_NNS in_IN
many_JJ ages_NNS to_TO injure_VB or_CC destroy_VB an_DT enemy_NN by_IN injuring_NN or_CC destroying_VBG an_DT
image_NN of_IN him_PRP ,_, in_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN ,_, just_RB as_IN the_DT image_NN suffers_NNS ,_, so_RB does_VBZ
the_DT man_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN when_WRB it_PRP perishes_VBZ he_PRP must_MD die_VB ._. A_DT few_JJ instances_NNS out_IN
of_IN many_JJ may_MD be_VB given_VBN to_TO prove_VB at_IN once_RB the_DT wide_JJ diffusion_NN of_IN the_DT
practice_NN over_IN the_DT world_NN and_CC its_PRP$ remarkable_JJ persistence_NN through_IN the_DT
ages_NNS ._. For_IN thousands_NNS of_IN years_NNS ago_IN it_PRP was_VBD known_VBN to_TO the_DT sorcerers_NNS of_IN
ancient_JJ India_NNP ,_, Babylon_NNP ,_, and_CC Egypt_NNP ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN of_IN Greece_NNP and_CC Rome_NNP ,_,
and_CC at_IN this_DT day_NN it_PRP is_VBZ still_RB resorted_VBN to_TO by_IN cunning_JJ and_CC malignant_JJ
savages_NNS in_IN Australia_NNP ,_, Africa_NNP ,_, and_CC Scotland_NNP ._. Thus_RB the_DT North_NNP American_NNP
Indians_NNPS ,_, we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN ,_, believe_VBP that_IN by_IN drawing_VBG the_DT figure_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN
in_IN sand_NN ,_, ashes_NNS ,_, or_CC clay_NN ,_, or_CC by_IN considering_VBG any_DT object_NN as_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ,_,
and_CC then_RB pricking_VBG it_PRP with_IN a_DT sharp_JJ stick_NN or_CC doing_VBG it_PRP any_DT other_JJ
injury_NN ,_, they_PRP inflict_VB a_DT corresponding_JJ injury_NN on_IN the_DT person_NN
represented_VBN ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, when_WRB an_DT Ojebway_NNP Indian_NNP desires_VBZ to_TO work_VB
evil_NN on_IN any_DT one_CD ,_, he_PRP makes_VBZ a_DT little_JJ wooden_JJ image_NN of_IN his_PRP$ enemy_NN and_CC
runs_VBZ a_DT needle_NN into_IN its_PRP$ head_NN or_CC heart_NN ,_, or_CC he_PRP shoots_VBZ an_DT arrow_NN into_IN it_PRP ,_,
believing_VBG that_IN wherever_WRB the_DT needle_NN pierces_NNS or_CC the_DT arrow_NN strikes_VBZ the_DT
image_NN ,_, his_PRP$ foe_NN will_MD the_DT same_JJ instant_NN be_VB seized_VBN with_IN a_DT sharp_JJ pain_NN in_IN
the_DT corresponding_JJ part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ;_: but_CC if_IN he_PRP intends_VBZ to_TO kill_VB the_DT
person_NN outright_RB ,_, he_PRP burns_VBZ or_CC buries_VBZ the_DT puppet_NN ,_, uttering_VBG certain_JJ
magic_JJ words_NNS as_IN he_PRP does_VBZ so_RB ._. The_DT Peruvian_JJ Indians_NNPS moulded_VBD images_NNS of_IN
fat_JJ mixed_JJ with_IN grain_NN to_TO imitate_VB the_DT persons_NNS whom_WP they_PRP disliked_VBD or_CC
feared_VBN ,_, and_CC then_RB burned_VBD the_DT effigy_NN on_IN the_DT road_NN where_WRB the_DT intended_VBN
victim_NN was_VBD to_TO pass_VB ._. This_DT they_PRP called_VBD burning_VBG his_PRP$ soul_NN ._.

A_DT Malay_NNP charm_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN is_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ ._. Take_VB parings_NNS of_IN nails_NNS ,_,
hair_NN ,_, eyebrows_NNS ,_, spittle_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB of_IN your_PRP$ intended_VBN victim_NN ,_,
enough_RB to_TO represent_VB every_DT part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ person_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB make_VB them_PRP up_IN
into_IN his_PRP$ likeness_NN with_IN wax_NN from_IN a_DT deserted_JJ bees_NNS '_POS comb_NN ._. Scorch_NN the_DT
figure_NN slowly_RB by_IN holding_VBG it_PRP over_IN a_DT lamp_NN every_DT night_NN for_IN seven_CD
nights_NNS ,_, and_CC say_VBP :_:


"_`` It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB wax_NN that_IN I_PRP am_VBP scorching_NN ,_,
It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT liver_NN ,_, heart_NN ,_, and_CC spleen_JJ of_IN So-and_NNP -_: so_RB that_IN I_PRP scorch_VBP ."_.


After_IN the_DT seventh_JJ time_NN burn_VB the_DT figure_NN ,_, and_CC your_PRP$ victim_NN will_MD die_VB ._.
This_DT charm_NN obviously_RB combines_VBZ the_DT principles_NNS of_IN homoeopathic_JJ and_CC
contagious_JJ magic_NN ;_: since_IN the_DT image_NN which_WDT is_VBZ made_VBN in_IN the_DT likeness_NN of_IN
an_DT enemy_NN contains_VBZ things_NNS which_WDT once_RB were_VBD in_IN contact_NN with_IN him_PRP ,_,
namely_RB ,_, his_PRP$ nails_NNS ,_, hair_NN ,_, and_CC spittle_NN ._. Another_DT form_NN of_IN the_DT Malay_NNP
charm_NN ,_, which_WDT resembles_VBZ the_DT Ojebway_NN practice_NN still_RB more_RBR closely_RB ,_, is_VBZ
to_TO make_VB a_DT corpse_NN of_IN wax_NN from_IN an_DT empty_JJ bees_NNS '_POS comb_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT length_NN
of_IN a_DT footstep_NN ;_: then_RB pierce_VBG the_DT eye_NN of_IN the_DT image_NN ,_, and_CC your_PRP$ enemy_NN is_VBZ
blind_JJ ;_: pierce_NN the_DT stomach_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ sick_JJ ;_: pierce_NN the_DT head_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$
head_NN aches_VBZ ;_: pierce_NN the_DT breast_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ breast_NN will_MD suffer_VB ._. If_IN you_PRP
would_MD kill_VB him_PRP outright_RB ,_, transfix_VBG the_DT image_NN from_IN the_DT head_NN downwards_RB ;_:
enshroud_JJ it_PRP as_IN you_PRP would_MD a_DT corpse_NN ;_: pray_NN over_IN it_PRP as_IN if_IN you_PRP were_VBD
praying_VBG over_IN the_DT dead_JJ ;_: then_RB bury_VBP it_PRP in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN a_DT path_NN where_WRB
your_PRP$ victim_NN will_MD be_VB sure_JJ to_TO step_VB over_IN it_PRP ._. In_IN order_NN that_IN his_PRP$ blood_NN
may_MD not_RB be_VB on_IN your_PRP$ head_NN ,_, you_PRP should_MD say_VB :_:


"_`` It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB I_PRP who_WP am_VBP burying_VBG him_PRP ,_,
It_PRP is_VBZ Gabriel_NNP who_WP is_VBZ burying_VBG him_PRP ."_.


Thus_RB the_DT guilt_NN of_IN the_DT murder_NN will_MD be_VB laid_VBN on_IN the_DT shoulders_NNS of_IN the_DT
archangel_NN Gabriel_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ a_DT great_JJ deal_NN better_JJR able_JJ to_TO bear_VB it_PRP than_IN
you_PRP are_VBP ._.

If_IN homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ magic_NN ,_, working_VBG by_IN means_NNS of_IN images_NNS ,_, has_VBZ
commonly_RB been_VBN practised_VBN for_IN the_DT spiteful_JJ purpose_NN of_IN putting_VBG
obnoxious_JJ people_NNS out_IN of_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ also_RB ,_, though_IN far_RB more_RBR
rarely_RB ,_, been_VBN employed_VBN with_IN the_DT benevolent_JJ intention_NN of_IN helping_VBG
others_NNS into_IN it_PRP ._. In_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN used_VBN to_TO facilitate_VB
childbirth_NN and_CC to_TO procure_VB offspring_NN for_IN barren_JJ women_NNS ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT
Bataks_NNP of_IN Sumatra_NNP a_DT barren_JJ woman_NN ,_, who_WP would_MD become_VB a_DT mother_NN ,_, will_MD
make_VB a_DT wooden_JJ image_NN of_IN a_DT child_NN and_CC hold_VB it_PRP in_IN her_PRP$ lap_NN ,_, believing_VBG
that_IN this_DT will_MD lead_VB to_TO the_DT fulfilment_NN of_IN her_PRP$ wish_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Babar_NNP
Archipelago_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT woman_NN desires_VBZ to_TO have_VB a_DT child_NN ,_, she_PRP invites_VBZ a_DT man_NN
who_WP is_VBZ himself_PRP the_DT father_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ family_NN to_TO pray_VB on_IN her_PRP$ behalf_NN to_TO
Upulero_NNP ,_, the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN ._. A_DT doll_NN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN red_JJ cotton_NN ,_, which_WDT
the_DT woman_NN clasps_NNS in_IN her_PRP$ arms_NNS ,_, as_IN if_IN she_PRP would_MD suckle_VB it_PRP ._. Then_RB the_DT
father_NN of_IN many_JJ children_NNS takes_VBZ a_DT fowl_NN and_CC holds_VBZ it_PRP by_IN the_DT legs_NNS to_TO the_DT
woman_NN '_POS s_PRP head_NN ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_`` O_UH Upulero_NNP ,_, make_VBP use_NN of_IN the_DT fowl_NN ;_: let_VB fall_NN ,_,
let_VB descend_VB a_DT child_NN ,_, I_PRP beseech_VBP you_PRP ,_, I_PRP entreat_VBP you_PRP ,_, let_VB a_DT child_NN fall_NN
and_CC descend_NN into_IN my_PRP$ hands_NNS and_CC on_IN my_PRP$ lap_NN ."_, Then_RB he_PRP asks_VBZ the_DT woman_NN ,_,
"_`` Has_VBZ the_DT child_NN come_VBN ?"_RB and_CC she_PRP answers_NNS ,_, "_`` Yes_UH ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ sucking_VBG already_RB ."_.
After_IN that_IN the_DT man_NN holds_VBZ the_DT fowl_NN on_IN the_DT husband_NN '_POS s_PRP head_NN ,_, and_CC mumbles_NNS
some_DT form_NN of_IN words_NNS ._. Lastly_RB ,_, the_DT bird_NN is_VBZ killed_VBN and_CC laid_VBN ,_, together_RB

Among_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Dyaks_NNP of_IN Borneo_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT woman_NN is_VBZ in_IN hard_JJ labour_NN ,_,

The_DT same_JJ principle_NN of_IN make-believe_NN ,_, so_RB dear_JJ to_TO children_NNS ,_, has_VBZ led_VBN

Another_DT beneficent_JJ use_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN is_VBZ to_TO heal_VB or_CC prevent_VB

giving_VBG a_DT final_JJ bloom_NN to_TO his_PRP$ complexion_NN ,_, he_PRP took_VBD some_DT hairs_NNS of_IN a_DT red_JJ
bull_NN ,_, wrapt_VBD them_PRP in_IN gold_JJ leaf_NN ,_, and_CC glued_VBN them_PRP to_TO the_DT patient_NN '_POS s_PRP skin_NN ._.
The_DT ancients_NNS held_VBD that_IN if_IN a_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN jaundice_NN looked_VBN

stone-curlew_JJ that_IN when_WRB they_PRP had_VBD one_CD of_IN these_DT birds_NNS for_IN sale_NN they_PRP

jaundiced_JJ man_NN saw_VBD it_PRP ,_, the_DT disease_NN left_VBD him_PRP and_CC slew_NN the_DT bird_NN ._. He_PRP

its_PRP$ hue_NN resembled_VBD that_IN of_IN a_DT jaundiced_JJ skin_NN ._.

One_CD of_IN the_DT great_JJ merits_NNS of_IN homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN is_VBZ that_IN it_PRP enables_VBZ the_DT
cure_NN to_TO be_VB performed_VBN on_IN the_DT person_NN of_IN the_DT doctor_NN instead_RB of_IN on_IN that_WDT
of_IN his_PRP$ victim_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ thus_RB relieved_VBN of_IN all_DT trouble_NN and_CC inconvenience_NN ,_,
while_IN he_PRP sees_VBZ his_PRP$ medical_JJ man_NN writhe_NN in_IN anguish_NN before_IN him_PRP ._. For_IN
example_NN ,_, the_DT peasants_NNS of_IN Perche_NNP ,_, in_IN France_NNP ,_, labour_NN under_IN the_DT

patient_NN '_POS s_PRP stomach_NN becoming_VBG unhooked_NNP ,_, as_IN they_PRP call_VBP it_PRP ,_, and_CC so_RB falling_VBG
down_RB ._. Accordingly_RB ,_, a_DT practitioner_NN is_VBZ called_VBN in_IN to_TO restore_VB the_DT organ_NN
to_TO its_PRP$ proper_JJ place_NN ._. After_IN hearing_VBG the_DT symptoms_NNS he_PRP at_IN once_RB throws_VBZ

while_IN the_DT patient_NN experiences_VBZ a_DT corresponding_JJ relief_NN ._. Fee_'' five_CD
francs_NNS ._. In_IN like_JJ manner_NN a_DT Dyak_NNP medicine-man_NN ,_, who_WP has_VBZ been_VBN fetched_VBN in_IN
a_DT case_NN of_IN illness_NN ,_, will_MD lie_VB down_RB and_CC pretend_VB to_TO be_VB dead_JJ ._. He_PRP is_VBZ
accordingly_RB treated_VBN like_IN a_DT corpse_NN ,_, is_VBZ bound_VBN up_RP in_IN mats_NNS ,_, taken_VBN out_IN of_IN
the_DT house_NN ,_, and_CC deposited_VBD on_IN the_DT ground_NN ._. After_IN about_IN an_DT hour_NN the_DT

too_RB ._. A_DT cure_NN for_IN a_DT tumour_NN ,_, based_VBN on_IN the_DT principle_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ
magic_NN ,_, is_VBZ prescribed_VBN by_IN Marcellus_NNP of_IN Bordeaux_NNP ,_, court_NN physician_NN to_TO

follows_VBZ ._. Take_VB a_DT root_NN of_IN vervain_RB ,_, cut_VBD it_PRP across_IN ,_, and_CC hang_VB one_NN end_NN of_IN
it_PRP round_VBP the_DT patient_NN '_POS s_PRP neck_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ in_IN the_DT smoke_NN of_IN the_DT fire_NN ._.
As_IN the_DT vervain_NN dries_NNS up_RB in_IN the_DT smoke_NN ,_, so_RB the_DT tumour_NN will_MD also_RB dry_VB up_RB
and_CC disappear_VBP ._. If_IN the_DT patient_NN should_MD afterwards_RB prove_VB ungrateful_JJ to_TO
the_DT good_JJ physician_NN ,_, the_DT man_NN of_IN skill_NN can_MD avenge_VB himself_PRP very_RB easily_RB

moisture_NN once_RB more_RBR ,_, the_DT tumour_NN will_MD return_VB ._. The_DT same_JJ sapient_JJ writer_NN
recommends_VBZ you_PRP ,_, if_IN you_PRP are_VBP troubled_VBN with_IN pimples_NNS ,_, to_TO watch_VB for_IN a_DT
falling_VBG star_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB instantly_RB ,_, while_IN the_DT star_NN is_VBZ still_RB shooting_VBG
from_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, to_TO wipe_VB the_DT pimples_NNS with_IN a_DT cloth_NN or_CC anything_NN that_WDT

them_PRP with_IN your_PRP$ bare_JJ hand_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT pimples_NNS will_MD be_VB transferred_VBN to_TO it_PRP ._.

Further_RB ,_, homoeopathic_JJ and_CC in_IN general_JJ sympathetic_JJ magic_NN plays_VBZ a_DT great_JJ
part_NN in_IN the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN by_IN the_DT rude_JJ hunter_NN or_CC fisherman_NN to_TO secure_VB
an_DT abundant_JJ supply_NN of_IN food_NN ._. On_IN the_DT principle_NN that_WP like_IN produces_VBZ
like_IN ,_, many_JJ things_NNS are_VBP done_VBN by_IN him_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ friends_NNS in_IN deliberate_JJ
imitation_NN of_IN the_DT result_NN which_WDT he_PRP seeks_VBZ to_TO attain_VB ;_: and_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ
hand_NN ,_, many_JJ things_NNS are_VBP scrupulously_RB avoided_VBN because_IN they_PRP bear_VBP some_DT
more_RBR or_CC less_RBR fanciful_JJ resemblance_NN to_TO others_NNS which_WDT would_MD really_RB be_VB
disastrous_JJ ._.

Nowhere_RB is_VBZ the_DT theory_NN of_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN more_RBR systematically_RB
carried_VBD into_IN practice_NN for_IN the_DT maintenance_NN of_IN the_DT food_NN supply_NN than_IN in_IN
the_DT barren_JJ regions_NNS of_IN Central_NNP Australia_NNP ._. Here_RB the_DT tribes_NNS are_VBP divided_VBN
into_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN totem_NN clans_NNS ,_, each_DT of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ charged_VBN with_IN the_DT duty_NN
of_IN multiplying_VBG their_PRP$ totem_NN for_IN the_DT good_JJ of_IN the_DT community_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN
magical_JJ ceremonies_NNS ._. Most_JJS of_IN the_DT totems_NNS are_VBP edible_JJ animals_NNS and_CC
plants_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT general_JJ result_NN supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB accomplished_VBN by_IN these_DT
ceremonies_NNS is_VBZ that_IN of_IN supplying_VBG the_DT tribe_NN with_IN food_NN and_CC other_JJ
necessaries_NNS ._. Often_RB the_DT rites_NNS consist_VBP of_IN an_DT imitation_NN of_IN the_DT effect_NN
which_WDT the_DT people_NNS desire_NN to_TO produce_VB ;_: in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ magic_NN is_VBZ
homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT Warramunga_NNP the_DT headman_NN of_IN
the_DT white_JJ cockatoo_NN totem_NN seeks_VBZ to_TO multiply_VB white_JJ cockatoos_NNS by_IN
holding_VBG an_DT effigy_NN of_IN the_DT bird_NN and_CC mimicking_VBG its_PRP$ harsh_JJ cry_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT
Arunta_NNP the_DT men_NNS of_IN the_DT witchetty_JJ grub_NN totem_NN perform_VBP ceremonies_NNS for_IN
multiplying_VBG the_DT grub_NN which_WDT the_DT other_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT tribe_NN use_NN as_IN
food_NN ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT ceremonies_NNS is_VBZ a_DT pantomime_NN representing_VBG the_DT
fully-developed_JJ insect_NN in_IN the_DT act_NN of_IN emerging_VBG from_IN the_DT chrysalis_NN ._. A_DT
long_JJ narrow_JJ structure_NN of_IN branches_NNS is_VBZ set_VBN up_RP to_TO imitate_VB the_DT chrysalis_NN
case_NN of_IN the_DT grub_NN ._. In_IN this_DT structure_NN a_DT number_NN of_IN men_NNS ,_, who_WP have_VBP the_DT
grub_NN for_IN their_PRP$ totem_NN ,_, sit_VB and_CC sing_VB of_IN the_DT creature_NN in_IN its_PRP$ various_JJ
stages_NNS ._. Then_RB they_PRP shuffle_VB out_IN of_IN it_PRP in_IN a_DT squatting_VBG posture_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN
they_PRP do_VBP so_RB they_PRP sing_VBP of_IN the_DT insect_NN emerging_VBG from_IN the_DT chrysalis_NNS ._. This_DT
is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO multiply_VB the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN the_DT grubs_NNS ._. Again_RB ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO
multiply_RB emus_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP an_DT important_JJ article_NN of_IN food_NN ,_, the_DT men_NNS of_IN

the_DT fat_JJ and_CC the_DT eggs_NNS ._. Round_NN this_DT painting_NN the_DT men_NNS sit_VB and_CC sing_VB ._.
Afterwards_RB performers_NNS ,_, wearing_VBG head-dresses_NNS to_TO represent_VB the_DT long_JJ

The_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN British_NNP Columbia_NNP live_VBP largely_RB upon_IN the_DT fish_NN which_WDT
abound_RB in_IN their_PRP$ seas_NNS and_CC rivers_NNS ._. If_IN the_DT fish_NN do_VB not_RB come_VB in_IN due_JJ
season_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Indians_NNPS are_VBP hungry_JJ ,_, a_DT Nootka_NNP wizard_NN will_MD make_VB an_DT

charm_NN dugong_NN and_CC turtle_NN to_TO their_PRP$ destruction_NN ._. The_DT Toradjas_NNP of_IN

island_NN of_IN Nias_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT wild_JJ pig_NN has_VBZ fallen_VBN into_IN the_DT pit_NN prepared_VBD for_IN
it_PRP ,_, the_DT animal_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN out_RP and_CC its_PRP$ back_NN is_VBZ rubbed_VBN with_IN nine_CD fallen_VBN

The_DT western_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN British_JJ New_NNP Guinea_NNP employ_VBP a_DT charm_NN to_TO aid_VB the_DT

it_PRP seems_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN the_DT sharp-pointed_JJ stick_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT bait_NN is_VBZ

to_TO choose_VB between_IN swallowing_VBG a_DT bone_NN and_CC losing_VBG the_DT crocodile_NN ._.

This_DT last_JJ rule_NN is_VBZ an_DT instance_NN of_IN the_DT things_NNS which_WDT the_DT hunter_NN
abstains_NNS from_IN doing_VBG lest_IN ,_, on_IN the_DT principle_NN that_WP like_IN produces_VBZ like_JJ ,_,
they_PRP should_MD spoil_VB his_PRP$ luck_NN ._. For_IN it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB observed_VBN that_IN the_DT system_NN
of_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN is_VBZ not_RB merely_RB composed_VBN of_IN positive_JJ precepts_NNS ;_: it_PRP
comprises_VBZ a_DT very_RB large_JJ number_NN of_IN negative_JJ precepts_NNS ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_,
prohibitions_NNS ._. It_PRP tells_VBZ you_PRP not_RB merely_RB what_WP to_TO do_VB ,_, but_CC also_RB what_WP to_TO
leave_VB undone_NN ._. The_DT positive_JJ precepts_NNS are_VBP charms_NNS :_: the_DT negative_JJ
precepts_NNS are_VBP taboos_NNS ._. In_IN fact_NN the_DT whole_JJ doctrine_NN of_IN taboo_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN all_PDT
events_NNS a_DT large_JJ part_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, would_MD seem_VB to_TO be_VB only_RB a_DT special_JJ
application_NN of_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN ,_, with_IN its_PRP$ two_CD great_JJ laws_NNS of_IN
similarity_NN and_CC contact_NN ._. Though_IN these_DT laws_NNS are_VBP certainly_RB not_RB
formulated_VBN in_IN so_RB many_JJ words_NNS nor_CC even_RB conceived_VBN in_IN the_DT abstract_JJ by_IN
the_DT savage_JJ ,_, they_PRP are_VBP nevertheless_RB implicitly_RB believed_VBN by_IN him_PRP to_TO
regulate_VB the_DT course_NN of_IN nature_NN quite_RB independently_RB of_IN human_NN will_MD ._. He_PRP
thinks_VBZ that_IN if_IN he_PRP acts_VBZ in_IN a_DT certain_JJ way_NN ,_, certain_JJ consequences_NNS will_MD
inevitably_RB follow_VB in_IN virtue_NN of_IN one_CD or_CC other_JJ of_IN these_DT laws_NNS ;_: and_CC if_IN
the_DT consequences_NNS of_IN a_DT particular_JJ act_NN appear_VBP to_TO him_PRP likely_JJ to_TO prove_VB

that_DT way_NN lest_IN he_PRP should_MD incur_VB them_PRP ._. In_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, he_PRP abstains_VBZ from_IN
doing_VBG that_IN which_WDT ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN his_PRP$ mistaken_JJ notions_NNS of_IN cause_NN
and_CC effect_NN ,_, he_PRP falsely_RB believes_VBZ would_MD injure_VB him_PRP ;_: in_IN short_JJ ,_, he_PRP
subjects_NNS himself_PRP to_TO a_DT taboo_NN ._. Thus_RB taboo_NN is_VBZ so_RB far_RB a_DT negative_JJ
application_NN of_IN practical_JJ magic_NN ._. Positive_JJ magic_NN or_CC sorcery_NN says_VBZ ,_, "_'' Do_VB
this_DT in_IN order_NN that_IN so_RB and_CC so_RB may_MD happen_VB ."_RB Negative_JJ magic_NN or_CC taboo_NN
says_VBZ ,_, "_`` Do_VB not_RB do_VB this_DT ,_, lest_IN so_RB and_CC so_RB should_MD happen_VB ."_IN The_DT aim_NN of_IN
positive_JJ magic_NN or_CC sorcery_NN is_VBZ to_TO produce_VB a_DT desired_VBN event_NN ;_: the_DT aim_NN of_IN
negative_JJ magic_NN or_CC taboo_NN is_VBZ to_TO avoid_VB an_DT undesirable_JJ one_CD ._. But_CC both_PDT
consequences_NNS ,_, the_DT desirable_JJ and_CC the_DT undesirable_JJ ,_, are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB
brought_VBN about_RB in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT laws_NNS of_IN similarity_NN and_CC contact_NN ._.
And_CC just_RB as_IN the_DT desired_VBN consequence_NN is_VBZ not_RB really_RB effected_VBN by_IN the_DT
observance_NN of_IN a_DT magical_JJ ceremony_NN ,_, so_RB the_DT dreaded_VBN consequence_NN does_VBZ
not_RB really_RB result_VB from_IN the_DT violation_NN of_IN a_DT taboo_NN ._. If_IN the_DT supposed_VBN
evil_NN necessarily_RB followed_VBD a_DT breach_NN of_IN taboo_NN ,_, the_DT taboo_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB
a_DT taboo_NN but_CC a_DT precept_NN of_IN morality_NN or_CC common_JJ sense_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB a_DT taboo_NN
to_TO say_VB ,_, "_`` Do_VB not_RB put_VB your_PRP$ hand_NN in_IN the_DT fire_NN ";_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT rule_NN of_IN common_JJ
sense_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT forbidden_VBN action_NN entails_VBZ a_DT real_JJ ,_, not_RB an_DT imaginary_NN
evil_NN ._. In_IN short_JJ ,_, those_DT negative_JJ precepts_NNS which_WDT we_PRP call_VBP taboo_NN are_VBP just_RB
as_IN vain_JJ and_CC futile_JJ as_IN those_DT positive_JJ precepts_NNS which_WDT we_PRP call_VBP sorcery_NN ._.
The_DT two_CD things_NNS are_VBP merely_RB opposite_JJ sides_NNS or_CC poles_NNS of_IN one_CD great_JJ

I_PRP have_VBP made_VBN these_DT remarks_NNS on_IN taboo_NN and_CC its_PRP$ relations_NNS to_TO magic_NN
because_IN I_PRP am_VBP about_RB to_TO give_VB some_DT instances_NNS of_IN taboos_NN observed_VBN by_IN
hunters_NNS ,_, fishermen_NNS ,_, and_CC others_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP wished_VBD to_TO show_VB that_IN they_PRP fall_VBP
under_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN Sympathetic_NNP Magic_NNP ,_, being_VBG only_RB particular_JJ
applications_NNS of_IN that_DT general_JJ theory_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, among_IN the_DT Esquimaux_NNP boys_NNS
are_VBP forbidden_VBN to_TO play_VB cat_NN '_'' s_PRP cradle_NN ,_, because_IN if_IN they_PRP did_VBD so_RB their_PRP$
fingers_NNS might_MD in_RB later_RB life_NN become_VB entangled_JJ in_IN the_DT harpoon-line_NN ._.
Here_RB the_DT taboo_NN is_VBZ obviously_RB an_DT application_NN of_IN the_DT law_NN of_IN similarity_NN ,_,
which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT basis_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN :_: as_IN the_DT child_NN '_POS s_VBZ fingers_NNS are_VBP
entangled_VBN by_IN the_DT string_NN in_IN playing_VBG cat_NN '_'' s_PRP cradle_NN ,_, so_IN they_PRP will_MD be_VB
entangled_VBN by_IN the_DT harpoonline_NN when_WRB he_PRP is_VBZ a_DT man_NN and_CC hunts_NNS whales_NNS ._.
Again_RB ,_, among_IN the_DT Huzuls_NNP of_IN the_DT Carpathian_NNP Mountains_NNPS the_DT wife_NN of_IN a_DT
hunter_NN may_MD not_RB spin_VB while_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN is_VBZ eating_VBG ,_, or_CC the_DT game_NN will_MD
turn_NN and_CC wind_NN like_IN the_DT spindle_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT hunter_NN will_MD be_VB unable_JJ to_TO hit_VB
it_PRP ._. Here_RB again_RB the_DT taboo_NN is_VBZ clearly_RB derived_VBN from_IN the_DT law_NN of_IN
similarity_NN ._. So_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, in_IN most_JJS parts_NNS of_IN ancient_JJ Italy_NNP women_NNS were_VBD
forbidden_VBN by_IN law_NN to_TO spin_VB on_IN the_DT highroads_NNS as_IN they_PRP walked_VBD ,_, or_CC even_RB to_TO
carry_VB their_PRP$ spindles_NNS openly_RB ,_, because_IN any_DT such_JJ action_NN was_VBD believed_VBN to_TO
injure_NN the_DT crops_NNS ._. Probably_RB the_DT notion_NN was_VBD that_IN the_DT twirling_VBG of_IN the_DT
spindle_NN would_MD twirl_RB the_DT corn-stalks_NNS and_CC prevent_VB them_PRP from_IN growing_VBG
straight_JJ ._. So_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, among_IN the_DT Ainos_NNS of_IN Saghalien_NNP a_DT pregnant_JJ woman_NN may_MD
not_RB spin_VB nor_CC twist_VB ropes_NNS for_IN two_CD months_NNS before_IN her_PRP$ delivery_NN ,_, because_IN
they_PRP think_VBP that_IN if_IN she_PRP did_VBD so_RB the_DT child_NN '_POS s_PRP guts_NNS might_MD be_VB entangled_VBN
like_IN the_DT thread_NN ._. For_IN a_DT like_JJ reason_NN in_IN Bilaspore_NNP ,_, a_DT district_NN of_IN
India_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT chief_JJ men_NNS of_IN a_DT village_NN meet_VBP in_IN council_NN ,_, no_DT one_CD
present_NN should_MD twirl_RB a_DT spindle_NN ;_: for_IN they_PRP think_VBP that_IN if_IN such_JJ a_DT thing_NN
were_VBD to_TO happen_VB ,_, the_DT discussion_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT spindle_NN ,_, would_MD move_VB in_IN a_DT
circle_NN and_CC never_RB be_VB wound_VBN up_RP ._. In_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT East_NNP Indian_NNP islands_VBZ any_RB
one_NN who_WP comes_VBZ to_TO the_DT house_NN of_IN a_DT hunter_NN must_MD walk_VB straight_RB in_IN ;_: he_PRP may_MD
not_RB loiter_NN at_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, for_IN were_VBD he_PRP to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, the_DT game_NN would_MD in_RP like_IN
manner_NN stop_NN in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT hunter_NN '_'' s_PRP snares_NNS and_CC then_RB turn_VB back_RB ,_,
instead_RB of_IN being_VBG caught_VBN in_IN the_DT trap_NN ._. For_IN a_DT similar_JJ reason_NN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT
rule_NN with_IN the_DT Toradjas_NNP of_IN Central_NNP Celebes_NNP that_IN no_DT one_NN may_MD stand_VB or_CC
loiter_NN on_IN the_DT ladder_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT pregnant_JJ woman_NN ,_, for_IN
such_JJ delay_NN would_MD retard_VB the_DT birth_NN of_IN the_DT child_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS
of_IN Sumatra_NNP the_DT woman_NN herself_PRP in_IN these_DT circumstances_NNS is_VBZ forbidden_VBN to_TO
stand_NN at_IN the_DT door_NN or_CC on_IN the_DT top_JJ rung_NN of_IN the_DT house-ladder_NN under_IN pain_NN
of_IN suffering_VBG hard_JJ labour_NN for_IN her_PRP$ imprudence_NN in_IN neglecting_VBG so_RB
elementary_JJ a_DT precaution_NN ._. Malays_NNPS engaged_VBD in_IN the_DT search_NN for_IN camphor_NN
eat_VB their_PRP$ food_NN dry_JJ and_CC take_VB care_VB not_RB to_TO pound_VB their_PRP$ salt_NN fine_NN ._. The_DT
reason_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT camphor_NN occurs_VBZ in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN small_JJ grains_NNS
deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT cracks_NNS of_IN the_DT trunk_NN of_IN the_DT camphor_NN tree_NN ._.
Accordingly_RB it_PRP seems_VBZ plain_JJ to_TO the_DT Malay_NNP that_IN if_IN ,_, while_IN seeking_VBG for_IN
camphor_NN ,_, he_PRP were_VBD to_TO eat_VB his_PRP$ salt_NN finely_JJ ground_NN ,_, the_DT camphor_NN would_MD be_VB
found_VBD also_RB in_IN fine_JJ grains_NNS ;_: whereas_IN by_IN eating_VBG his_PRP$ salt_NN coarse_JJ he_PRP
ensures_NNS that_IN the_DT grains_NNS of_IN the_DT camphor_NN will_MD also_RB be_VB large_JJ ._. Camphor_NNP
hunters_NNS in_IN Borneo_JJ use_NN the_DT leathery_NN sheath_NN of_IN the_DT leaf-stalk_NN of_IN the_DT
Penang_NNP palm_NN as_IN a_DT plate_NN for_IN food_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT
expedition_NN they_PRP will_MD never_RB wash_VB the_DT plate_NN ,_, for_IN fear_NN that_IN the_DT camphor_NN
might_MD dissolve_VB and_CC disappear_VB from_IN the_DT crevices_NNS of_IN the_DT tree_NN ._.
Apparently_RB they_PRP think_VBP that_IN to_TO wash_VB their_PRP$ plates_NNS would_MD be_VB to_TO wash_VB out_IN
the_DT camphor_NN crystals_NNS from_IN the_DT trees_NNS in_IN which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP imbedded_VBN ._. The_DT
chief_JJ product_NN of_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Laos_NNP ,_, a_DT province_NN of_IN Siam_NNP ,_, is_VBZ lac_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT resinous_JJ gum_NN exuded_VBN by_IN a_DT red_JJ insect_NN on_IN the_DT young_JJ branches_NNS
of_IN trees_NNS ,_, to_TO which_WDT the_DT little_JJ creatures_NNS have_VBP to_TO be_VB attached_VBN by_IN hand_NN ._.
All_DT who_WP engage_VBP in_IN the_DT business_NN of_IN gathering_VBG the_DT gum_NN abstain_RB from_IN
washing_VBG themselves_PRP and_CC especially_RB from_IN cleansing_VBG their_PRP$ heads_NNS ,_, lest_IN
by_IN removing_VBG the_DT parasites_NNS from_IN their_PRP$ hair_NN they_PRP should_MD detach_VB the_DT
other_JJ insects_NNS from_IN the_DT boughs_NNS ._. Again_RB ,_, a_DT Blackfoot_NNP Indian_NNP who_WP has_VBZ set_VBN
a_DT trap_NN for_IN eagles_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ watching_VBG it_PRP ,_, would_MD not_RB eat_VB rosebuds_NNS on_IN any_DT
account_NN ;_: for_IN he_PRP argues_VBZ that_IN if_IN he_PRP did_VBD so_RB ,_, and_CC an_DT eagle_NN alighted_VBN near_IN
the_DT trap_NN ,_, the_DT rosebuds_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ stomach_NN would_MD make_VB the_DT bird_NN itch_NN ,_,

Among_IN the_DT taboos_NN observed_VBN by_IN savages_NNS none_NN perhaps_RB are_VBP more_RBR numerous_JJ

"_`` as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ feared_VBN that_IN this_DT animal_NN ,_, from_IN its_PRP$ propensity_NN of_IN coiling_VBG up_IN

The_DT reader_NN may_MD have_VB observed_VBN that_IN in_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ examples_NNS

Elephant-hunters_NNS in_IN East_NNP Africa_NNP believe_VBP that_IN ,_, if_IN their_PRP$ wives_NNS prove_VB

and_CC she_PRP must_MD lie_VB on_IN her_PRP$ face_NN in_IN bed_NN ._. The_DT Moxos_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN Bolivia_NNP

The_DT Huichol_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN Mexico_NNP treat_NN as_IN a_DT demi-god_NN a_DT species_NN of_IN

does_VBZ not_RB grow_VB in_IN their_PRP$ country_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ to_TO be_VB fetched_VBN every_DT year_NN by_IN
men_NNS who_WP make_VBP a_DT journey_NN of_IN forty-three_CD days_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
Meanwhile_RB the_DT wives_NNS at_IN home_NN contribute_VBP to_TO the_DT safety_NN of_IN their_PRP$ absent_JJ
husbands_NNS by_IN never_RB walking_VBG fast_RB ,_, much_RB less_JJR running_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT men_NNS are_VBP

from_IN the_DT sacred_JJ mission_NN ._. With_IN this_DT intention_NN they_PRP subject_NN themselves_PRP
to_TO severe_JJ restrictions_NNS like_IN those_DT imposed_VBN upon_IN their_PRP$ husbands_NNS ._.
During_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT time_NN which_WDT elapses_VBZ till_IN the_DT festival_NN of_IN the_DT

holy_JJ plant_NN grows_VBZ ._. They_PRP also_RB fast_RB much_RB ,_, eat_VBP no_DT salt_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP bound_VBN to_TO
strict_JJ continence_NN ._. Any_DT one_NN who_WP breaks_VBZ this_DT law_NN is_VBZ punished_VBN with_IN

one_CD ,_, for_IN if_IN they_PRP did_VBD so_IN the_DT men_NNS would_MD not_RB find_VB a_DT single_JJ cactus_NN ._. So_RB
to_TO refresh_VB their_PRP$ memories_NNS each_DT one_CD prepares_VBZ a_DT string_NN with_IN as_RB many_JJ

deliver_VB the_DT rosary_NN of_IN their_PRP$ sins_NNS to_TO the_DT leader_NN ,_, who_WP burns_VBZ it_PRP in_IN the_DT

Many_JJ of_IN the_DT indigenous_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN Sarawak_NNP are_VBP firmly_RB persuaded_VBN that_IN

not_RB turn_VB their_PRP$ heads_NNS to_TO the_DT left_NN or_CC to_TO the_DT right_NN or_CC make_VB any_DT other_JJ

to_TO have_VB reached_VBN their_PRP$ destination_NN ,_, the_DT strictness_NN of_IN these_DT rules_NNS is_VBZ

involved_VBN in_IN sharp_JJ ,_, stinging_VBG trouble_NN ._.

Where_WRB beliefs_NNS like_IN these_DT prevail_VB as_IN to_TO the_DT sympathetic_JJ connexion_NN

anxious_JJ relations_NNS left_VBN behind_IN a_DT desire_NN to_TO turn_VB the_DT sympathetic_JJ bond_NN

any_DT moment_NN be_VB fighting_VBG and_CC dying_VBG far_RB away_RB ._. Hence_RB ,_, to_TO secure_VB an_DT end_NN
so_RB natural_JJ and_CC laudable_JJ ,_, friends_NNS at_IN home_NN are_VBP apt_JJ to_TO resort_VB to_TO

we_PRP consider_VBP their_PRP$ object_NN or_CC the_DT means_NNS adopted_VBD to_TO effect_VB it_PRP ._. Thus_RB in_IN
some_DT districts_NNS of_IN Borneo_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT Dyak_NNP is_VBZ out_IN head-hunting_NN ,_, his_PRP$ wife_NN
or_CC ,_, if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ unmarried_JJ ,_, his_PRP$ sister_NN must_MD wear_VB a_DT sword_NN day_NN and_CC night_NN
in_IN order_NN that_IN he_PRP may_MD always_RB be_VB thinking_VBG of_IN his_PRP$ weapons_NNS ;_: and_CC she_PRP may_MD
not_RB sleep_VB during_IN the_DT day_NN nor_CC go_VB to_TO bed_NN before_IN two_CD in_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_,
lest_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN or_CC brother_NN should_MD thereby_RB be_VB surprised_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ sleep_NN
by_IN an_DT enemy_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Sea_NNP Dyaks_NNP of_IN Banting_NNP in_IN Sarawak_NNP the_DT women_NNS

telepathy_NN ._. Amongst_IN them_PRP are_VBP the_DT following_VBG ._. The_DT women_NNS must_MD wake_VB very_RB
early_RB in_IN the_DT morning_NN and_CC open_VB the_DT windows_NNS as_RB soon_RB as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ light_JJ ;_:

may_MD not_RB oil_NN their_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT men_NNS will_MD slip_VB ._. The_DT women_NNS may_MD neither_CC
sleep_NN nor_CC doze_NN by_IN day_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT men_NNS will_MD be_VB drowsy_VBG on_IN the_DT march_NN ._. The_DT
women_NNS must_MD cook_VB and_CC scatter_JJ popcorn_NN on_IN the_DT verandah_NN every_DT morning_NN ;_:
so_RB will_MD the_DT men_NNS be_VB agile_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ movements_NNS ._. The_DT rooms_NNS must_MD be_VB kept_VBN
very_RB tidy_JJ ,_, all_DT boxes_NNS being_VBG placed_VBN near_IN the_DT walls_NNS ;_: for_IN if_IN any_DT one_CD

the_DT mercy_NN of_IN the_DT foe_NN ._. At_IN every_DT meal_NN a_DT little_JJ rice_NN must_MD be_VB left_VBN in_IN

something_NN to_TO eat_VB and_CC need_VB never_RB go_VB hungry_JJ ._. On_IN no_DT account_NN may_MD the_DT
women_NNS sit_VB at_IN the_DT loom_NN till_IN their_PRP$ legs_NNS grow_VBP cramped_VBN ,_, otherwise_RB their_PRP$
husbands_NNS will_MD likewise_RB be_VB stiff_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ joints_NNS and_CC unable_JJ to_TO rise_VB

husbands_NNS '_POS joints_NNS supple_VBP the_DT women_NNS often_RB vary_VBP their_PRP$ labours_NNS at_IN the_DT

way_NN through_IN the_DT tall_JJ grass_NN or_CC jungle_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT women_NNS may_MD not_RB sew_VB

In_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Timor_NNP ,_, while_IN war_NN is_VBZ being_VBG waged_VBN ,_, the_DT high-priest_JJS

according_VBG as_IN they_PRP are_VBP discharged_VBN from_IN the_DT guns_NNS of_IN friends_NNS or_CC foes_NNS ._.

An_DT old_JJ historian_NN of_IN Madagascar_NNP informs_VBZ us_PRP that_IN "_`` while_IN the_DT men_NNS are_VBP at_IN

happened_VBN ,_, their_PRP$ husband_NN would_MD be_VB either_RB killed_VBN or_CC wounded_VBN ._. They_PRP

themselves_PRP no_DT rest_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT custom_NN they_PRP observe_VBP very_RB religiously_RB ."_.

Among_IN the_DT Tshi-speaking_JJ peoples_NNS of_IN the_DT Gold_NNP Coast_NNP the_DT wives_NNS of_IN men_NNS

Among_IN the_DT Thompson_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN British_NNP Columbia_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT men_NNS were_VBD on_IN
the_DT war-path_NN ,_, the_DT women_NNS performed_VBD dances_NNS at_IN frequent_JJ intervals_NNS ._.
These_DT dances_NNS were_VBD believed_VBN to_TO ensure_VB the_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT expedition_NN ._.
The_DT dancers_NNS flourished_VBD their_PRP$ knives_NNS ,_, threw_VBD long_JJ sharp-pointed_JJ sticks_NNS

husbands_NNS would_MD not_RB grow_VB tired_VBN ._. Among_IN the_DT Haida_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN the_DT Queen_NNP

This_DT was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO help_VB their_PRP$ husbands_NNS to_TO go_VB and_CC do_VB likewise_RB ._. If_IN a_DT

Among_IN the_DT many_JJ beneficent_JJ uses_NNS to_TO which_WDT a_DT mistaken_VBN ingenuity_NN has_VBZ
applied_VBD the_DT principle_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ magic_NN ,_, is_VBZ that_IN of_IN
causing_VBG trees_NNS and_CC plants_NNS to_TO bear_VB fruit_NN in_IN due_JJ season_NN ._. In_IN Th_DT �_NN ringen_NN
the_DT man_NN who_WP sows_VBZ flax_NN carries_VBZ the_DT seed_NN in_IN a_DT long_JJ bag_NN which_WDT reaches_VBZ
from_IN his_PRP$ shoulders_NNS to_TO his_PRP$ knees_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP walks_VBZ with_IN long_JJ strides_NNS ,_, so_RB
that_IN the_DT bag_NN sways_VBD to_TO and_CC fro_IN on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN this_DT
will_MD cause_VB the_DT flax_NN to_TO wave_VB in_IN the_DT wind_NN ._. In_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN Sumatra_NNP

their_PRP$ back_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT rice_NN may_MD grow_VB luxuriantly_RB and_CC have_VB

full_JJ growth_NN ,_, and_CC fibres_NNS shooting_VBG forth_RB from_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT green_JJ ear_NN
