might_MD be_VB correspondingly_RB large_JJ and_CC flat_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT people_NNS might_MD
have_VBP abundance_NN ."_RP In_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP dancing_NN or_CC leaping_VBG high_JJ in_IN
the_DT air_NN are_VBP approved_VBN homoeopathic_JJ modes_NNS of_IN making_VBG the_DT crops_NNS grow_VBP
high_JJ ._. Thus_RB in_IN Franche-Comt_NNP �_, they_PRP say_VBP that_IN you_PRP should_MD dance_VB at_IN the_DT
Carnival_NNP in_IN order_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT hemp_NN grow_VB tall_JJ ._.

The_DT notion_NN that_IN a_DT person_NN can_MD influence_VB a_DT plant_NN homoeopathically_RB by_IN
his_PRP$ act_NN or_CC condition_NN comes_VBZ out_RP clearly_RB in_IN a_DT remark_NN made_VBN by_IN a_DT Malay_NNP
woman_NN ._. Being_VBG asked_VBD why_WRB she_PRP stripped_VBD the_DT upper_JJ part_NN of_IN her_PRP$ body_NN naked_JJ
in_IN reaping_VBG the_DT rice_NN ,_, she_PRP explained_VBD that_IN she_PRP did_VBD it_PRP to_TO make_VB the_DT
rice-husks_NNS thinner_JJR ,_, as_IN she_PRP was_VBD tired_VBN of_IN pounding_VBG thick-husked_JJ rice_NN ._.
Clearly_RB ,_, she_PRP thought_VBD that_IN the_DT less_JJR clothing_NN she_PRP wore_VBD the_DT less_JJR husk_NN
there_EX would_MD be_VB on_IN the_DT rice_NN ._. The_DT magic_JJ virtue_NN of_IN a_DT pregnant_JJ woman_NN to_TO
communicate_VB fertility_NN is_VBZ known_VBN to_TO Bavarian_NNP and_CC Austrian_JJ peasants_NNS ,_,
who_WP think_VBP that_IN if_IN you_PRP give_VBP the_DT first_JJ fruit_NN of_IN a_DT tree_NN to_TO a_DT woman_NN with_IN
child_NN to_TO eat_VB ,_, the_DT tree_NN will_MD bring_VB forth_RB abundantly_RB next_JJ year_NN ._. On_IN the_DT
other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT Baganda_NNP believe_VBP that_IN a_DT barren_JJ wife_NN infects_VBZ her_PRP$
husband_NN '_POS s_VBZ garden_NN with_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ sterility_NN and_CC prevents_VBZ the_DT trees_NNS from_IN
bearing_VBG fruit_NN ;_: hence_RB a_DT childless_JJ woman_NN is_VBZ generally_RB divorced_VBN ._. The_DT
Greeks_NNS and_CC Romans_NNS sacrificed_JJ pregnant_JJ victims_NNS to_TO the_DT goddesses_NNS of_IN
the_DT corn_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, doubtless_RB in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT earth_NN might_MD
teem_NN and_CC the_DT corn_NN swell_NN in_IN the_DT ear_NN ._. When_WRB a_DT Catholic_NNP priest_NN
remonstrated_VBN with_IN the_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN the_DT Orinoco_NNP on_IN allowing_VBG their_PRP$ women_NNS
to_TO sow_VB the_DT fields_NNS in_IN the_DT blazing_VBG sun_NN ,_, with_IN infants_NNS at_IN their_PRP$ breasts_NNS ,_,
the_DT men_NNS answered_VBD ,_, "_`` Father_NNP ,_, you_PRP don_VBP '_'' t_TO understand_VB these_DT things_NNS ,_, and_CC
that_DT is_VBZ why_WRB they_PRP vex_VBD you_PRP ._. You_PRP know_VBP that_IN women_NNS are_VBP accustomed_VBN to_TO bear_VB
children_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN we_PRP men_NNS are_VBP not_RB ._. When_WRB the_DT women_NNS sow_VBP ,_, the_DT stalk_NN of_IN
the_DT maize_NN bears_VBZ two_CD or_CC three_CD ears_NNS ,_, the_DT root_NN of_IN the_DT yucca_NN yields_NNS two_CD
or_CC three_CD basketfuls_NNS ,_, and_CC everything_NN multiplies_NNS in_IN proportion_NN ._. Now_RB
why_WRB is_VBZ that_DT ?_. Simply_RB because_IN the_DT women_NNS know_VBP how_WRB to_TO bring_VB forth_RB ,_, and_CC
know_VB how_WRB to_TO make_VB the_DT seed_NN which_WDT they_PRP sow_VBP bring_VB forth_RB also_RB ._. Let_VB them_PRP
sow_NN ,_, then_RB ;_: we_PRP men_NNS don_VBP '_POS t_NN know_VBP as_IN much_JJ about_IN it_PRP as_IN they_PRP do_VBP ."_.

Thus_RB on_IN the_DT theory_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN a_DT person_NN can_MD influence_VB
vegetation_NN either_CC for_IN good_JJ or_CC for_IN evil_JJ according_VBG to_TO the_DT good_JJ or_CC the_DT
bad_JJ character_NN of_IN his_PRP$ acts_NNS or_CC states_NNS :_: for_IN example_NN ,_, a_DT fruitful_JJ woman_NN
makes_VBZ plants_NNS fruitful_JJ ,_, a_DT barren_JJ woman_NN makes_VBZ them_PRP barren_JJ ._. Hence_RB this_DT
belief_NN in_IN the_DT noxious_JJ and_CC infectious_JJ nature_NN of_IN certain_JJ personal_JJ
qualities_NNS or_CC accidents_NNS has_VBZ given_VBN rise_NN to_TO a_DT number_NN of_IN prohibitions_NNS or_CC
rules_NNS of_IN avoidance_NN :_: people_NNS abstain_VBP from_IN doing_VBG certain_JJ things_NNS lest_IN
they_PRP should_MD homoeopathically_RB infect_VB the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN with_IN
their_PRP$ own_JJ undesirable_JJ state_NN or_CC condition_NN ._. All_DT such_JJ customs_NNS of_IN
abstention_NN or_CC rules_NNS of_IN avoidance_NN are_VBP examples_NNS of_IN negative_JJ magic_NN or_CC
taboo_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, arguing_VBG from_IN what_WP may_MD be_VB called_VBN the_DT
infectiousness_NN of_IN personal_JJ acts_NNS or_CC states_NNS ,_, the_DT Galelareese_NNP say_VBP that_IN
you_PRP ought_MD not_RB to_TO shoot_VB with_IN a_DT bow_NN and_CC arrows_NNS under_IN a_DT fruit-tree_NN ,_, or_CC
the_DT tree_NN will_MD cast_VB its_PRP$ fruit_NN even_RB as_IN the_DT arrows_NNS fall_VBP to_TO the_DT ground_NN ;_:
and_CC that_IN when_WRB you_PRP are_VBP eating_VBG water-melon_NN you_PRP ought_MD not_RB to_TO mix_VB the_DT
pips_NNS which_WDT you_PRP spit_VB out_IN of_IN your_PRP$ mouth_NN with_IN the_DT pips_NNS which_WDT you_PRP have_VBP
put_VB aside_RB to_TO serve_VB as_IN seed_NN ;_: for_IN if_IN you_PRP do_VBP ,_, though_IN the_DT pips_NNS you_PRP spat_VBD
out_RB may_MD certainly_RB spring_VB up_RP and_CC blossom_NN ,_, yet_RB the_DT blossoms_NNS will_MD keep_VB
falling_VBG off_RB just_RB as_IN the_DT pips_NNS fell_VBD from_IN your_PRP$ mouth_NN ,_, and_CC thus_RB these_DT
pips_NNS will_MD never_RB bear_VB fruit_NN ._. Precisely_RB the_DT same_JJ train_NN of_IN thought_NN
leads_VBZ the_DT Bavarian_NNP peasant_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN if_IN he_PRP allows_VBZ the_DT graft_NN of_IN
a_DT fruit-tree_JJ to_TO fall_VB on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, the_DT tree_NN that_IN springs_NNS from_IN that_WDT
graft_NN will_MD let_VB its_PRP$ fruit_NN fall_NN untimely_RB ._. When_WRB the_DT Chams_NNP of_IN
Cochinchina_NNP are_VBP sowing_VBG their_PRP$ dry_JJ rice_NN fields_NNS and_CC desire_NN that_IN no_NN
shower_NN should_MD fall_VB ,_, they_PRP eat_VBP their_PRP$ rice_NN dry_VB in_IN order_NN to_TO prevent_VB rain_NN
from_IN spoiling_VBG the_DT crop_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ cases_NNS a_DT person_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO influence_VB vegetation_NN
homoeopathically_RB ._. He_PRP infects_VBZ trees_NNS or_CC plants_NNS with_IN qualities_NNS or_CC
accidents_NNS ,_, good_JJ or_CC bad_JJ ,_, resembling_VBG and_CC derived_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ._. But_CC on_IN
the_DT principle_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN the_DT influence_NN is_VBZ mutual_JJ :_: the_DT
plant_NN can_MD infect_VB the_DT man_NN just_RB as_RB much_JJ as_IN the_DT man_NN can_MD infect_VB the_DT
plant_NN ._. In_IN magic_JJ ,_, as_IN I_PRP believe_VBP in_IN physics_NNS ,_, action_NN and_CC reaction_NN are_VBP
equal_JJ and_CC opposite_JJ ._. The_DT Cherokee_NNP Indians_NNPS are_VBP adepts_NNS in_IN practical_JJ
botany_NN of_IN the_DT homoeopathic_JJ sort_NN ._. Thus_RB wiry_JJ roots_NNS of_IN the_DT catgut_NN plant_NN
are_VBP so_RB tough_JJ that_IN they_PRP can_MD almost_RB stop_VB a_DT plowshare_NN in_IN the_DT furrow_NN ._.
Hence_RB Cherokee_NNP women_NNS wash_VBP their_PRP$ heads_NNS with_IN a_DT decoction_NN of_IN the_DT roots_NNS
to_TO make_VB the_DT hair_NN strong_JJ ,_, and_CC Cherokee_NNP ball-players_NNS wash_VBP themselves_PRP
with_IN it_PRP to_TO toughen_VB their_PRP$ muscles_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT Galelareese_NNP belief_NN that_IN if_IN
you_PRP eat_VBP a_DT fruit_NN which_WDT has_VBZ fallen_VBN to_TO the_DT ground_NN ,_, you_PRP will_MD yourself_PRP
contract_NN a_DT disposition_NN to_TO stumble_VB and_CC fall_VB ;_: and_CC that_IN if_IN you_PRP partake_VBP
of_IN something_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN forgotten_VBN (_-LRB- such_JJ as_IN a_DT sweet_JJ potato_NN left_VBN
in_IN the_DT pot_NN or_CC a_DT banana_NN in_IN the_DT fire_NN ),_IN you_PRP will_MD become_VB forgetful_JJ ._. The_DT
Galelareese_NNP are_VBP also_RB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN if_IN a_DT woman_NN were_VBD to_TO consume_VB two_CD
bananas_NNS growing_VBG from_IN a_DT single_JJ head_NN she_PRP would_MD give_VB birth_NN to_TO twins_NNS ._.
The_DT Guarani_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN South_NNP America_NNP thought_VBD that_IN a_DT woman_NN would_MD
become_VB a_DT mother_NN of_IN twins_NNS if_IN she_PRP ate_VBD a_DT double_JJ grain_NN of_IN millet_NN ._. In_IN
Vedic_NNP times_NNS a_DT curious_JJ application_NN of_IN this_DT principle_NN supplied_VBD a_DT charm_NN
by_IN which_WDT a_DT banished_VBN prince_NN might_MD be_VB restored_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ kingdom_NN ._. He_PRP had_VBD

out_IN of_IN the_DT stump_NN of_IN a_DT tree_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN cut_VBN down_RP ._. The_DT recuperative_JJ

through_IN the_DT fire_NN to_TO the_DT food_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB to_TO the_DT prince_NN ,_, who_WP ate_VBD the_DT food_NN
which_WDT was_VBD cooked_VBN on_IN the_DT fire_NN which_WDT was_VBD fed_VBN with_IN the_DT wood_NN which_WDT grew_VBD
out_IN of_IN the_DT tree_NN ._. The_DT Sudanese_NNP think_VBP that_IN if_IN a_DT house_NN is_VBZ built_VBN of_IN the_DT
wood_NN of_IN thorny_NN trees_NNS ,_, the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS who_WP dwell_VBP in_IN that_DT house_NN
will_MD likewise_RB be_VB thorny_JJ and_CC full_JJ of_IN trouble_NN ._.

There_EX is_VBZ a_DT fruitful_JJ branch_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN which_WDT works_VBZ by_IN
means_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ;_: for_IN just_RB as_IN the_DT dead_NN can_MD neither_RB see_VB nor_CC hear_VB nor_CC
speak_VB ,_, so_RB you_PRP may_MD on_IN homoeopathic_JJ principles_NNS render_VB people_NNS blind_JJ ,_,

is_VBZ tainted_VBN by_IN the_DT infection_NN of_IN death_NN ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT Galelareese_NNP ,_,
when_WRB a_DT young_JJ man_NN goes_VBZ a-wooing_VBG at_IN night_NN ,_, he_PRP takes_VBZ a_DT little_JJ earth_NN
from_IN a_DT grave_NN and_CC strews_NNS it_PRP on_IN the_DT roof_NN of_IN his_PRP$ sweetheart_NN '_'' s_PRP house_NN
just_RB above_IN the_DT place_NN where_WRB her_PRP$ parents_NNS sleep_VBP ._. This_DT ,_, he_PRP fancies_VBZ ,_, will_MD
prevent_VB them_PRP from_IN waking_VBG while_IN he_PRP converses_VBZ with_IN his_PRP$ beloved_NN ,_, since_IN
the_DT earth_NN from_IN the_DT grave_NN will_MD make_VB them_PRP sleep_VB as_RB sound_JJ as_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._.
Burglars_NNPS in_IN all_DT ages_NNS and_CC many_JJ lands_NNS have_VBP been_VBN patrons_NNS of_IN this_DT
species_NNS of_IN magic_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ very_RB useful_JJ to_TO them_PRP in_IN the_DT exercise_NN of_IN
their_PRP$ profession_NN ._. Thus_RB a_DT South_NNP Slavonian_NNP housebreaker_NN sometimes_RB

saying_VBG ,_, with_IN pungent_JJ sarcasm_NN ,_, "_`` As_IN this_DT bone_NN may_MD waken_VB ,_, so_RB may_MD these_DT
people_NNS waken_VBN ";_RB after_IN that_DT not_RB a_DT soul_NN in_IN the_DT house_NN can_MD keep_VB his_PRP$ or_CC
her_PRP$ eyes_NNS open_JJ ._. Similarly_RB ,_, in_IN Java_NNP the_DT burglar_NN takes_VBZ earth_NN from_IN a_DT

throws_VBZ the_DT inmates_NNS into_IN a_DT deep_JJ sleep_NN ._. With_IN the_DT same_JJ intention_NN a_DT
Hindoo_NNP will_MD strew_VB ashes_NNS from_IN a_DT pyre_NN at_IN the_DT door_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ;_:
Indians_NNPS of_IN Peru_NNP scatter_NN the_DT dust_NN of_IN dead_JJ men_NNS '_POS s_PRP bones_NNS ;_: and_CC Ruthenian_NNP

it_PRP ,_, and_CC having_VBG kindled_VBD the_DT tallow_JJ ,_, march_VB thrice_NN round_NN the_DT house_NN with_IN
this_DT candle_NN burning_NN ,_, which_WDT causes_VBZ the_DT inmates_NNS to_TO sleep_VB a_DT death-like_JJ
sleep_NN ._. Or_CC the_DT Ruthenian_NNP will_MD make_VB a_DT flute_NN out_IN of_IN a_DT human_JJ leg-bone_NN
and_CC play_NN upon_IN it_PRP ;_: whereupon_IN all_DT persons_NNS within_IN hearing_NN are_VBP overcome_VBN
with_IN drowsiness_NN ._. The_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN Mexico_NNP employed_VBD for_IN this_DT maleficent_NN

her_PRP$ first_JJ child_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT arm_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB stolen_VBN ._. With_IN it_PRP they_PRP beat_VBD the_DT
ground_NN before_IN they_PRP entered_VBD the_DT house_NN which_WDT they_PRP designed_VBD to_TO plunder_VB ;_:
this_DT caused_VBD every_DT one_NN in_IN the_DT house_NN to_TO lose_VB all_DT power_NN of_IN speech_NN and_CC
motion_NN ;_: they_PRP were_VBD as_IN dead_JJ ,_, hearing_NN and_CC seeing_VBG everything_NN ,_, but_CC
perfectly_RB powerless_JJ ;_: some_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, however_RB ,_, really_RB slept_VBD and_CC even_RB
snored_VBN ._. In_IN Europe_NNP similar_JJ properties_NNS were_VBD ascribed_VBN to_TO the_DT Hand_NNP of_IN

presented_VBN ;_: they_PRP could_MD not_RB stir_VB a_DT finger_NN any_DT more_JJR than_IN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD
dead_JJ ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT dead_JJ man_NN '_'' s_PRP hand_NN is_VBZ itself_PRP the_DT candle_NN ,_, or_CC rather_RB
bunch_NN of_IN candles_NNS ,_, all_DT its_PRP$ withered_VBN fingers_NNS being_VBG set_VBN on_IN fire_NN ;_: but_CC
should_MD any_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT household_NN be_VB awake_JJ ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT fingers_NNS will_MD
not_RB kindle_NN ._. Such_DT nefarious_JJ lights_NNS can_MD only_RB be_VB extinguished_VBN with_IN

of_IN the_DT finger_NN of_IN a_DT new-born_JJ or_CC ,_, still_RB better_JJR ,_, unborn_JJ child_NN ;_:
sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN needful_NN that_IN the_DT thief_NN should_MD have_VB one_CD such_JJ

little_JJ somebody_NN in_IN the_DT house_NN will_MD wake_VB and_CC catch_VB him_PRP ._. Once_RB these_DT
tapers_NNS begin_VB to_TO burn_VB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ nothing_NN but_CC milk_NN that_WDT will_MD put_VB them_PRP
out_IN ._. In_IN the_DT seventeenth_JJ century_NN robbers_NNS used_VBN to_TO murder_NN pregnant_JJ
women_NNS in_IN order_NN thus_RB to_TO extract_VB candles_NNS from_IN their_PRP$ wombs_NNS ._. An_DT ancient_JJ

the_DT coins_NNS were_VBD laid_VBN ._.

Further_RB ,_, animals_NNS are_VBP often_RB conceived_VBN to_TO possess_VB qualities_NNS of_IN
properties_NNS which_WDT might_MD be_VB useful_JJ to_TO man_NN ,_, and_CC homoeopathic_JJ or_CC
imitative_JJ magic_NN seeks_VBZ to_TO communicate_VB these_DT properties_NNS to_TO human_NN
beings_NNS in_IN various_JJ ways_NNS ._. Thus_RB some_DT Bechuanas_NNS wear_VBP a_DT ferret_JJ as_IN a_DT
charm_NN ,_, because_RB ,_, being_VBG very_RB tenacious_JJ of_IN life_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD make_VB them_PRP
difficult_JJ to_TO kill_VB ._. Others_NNS wear_VBP a_DT certain_JJ insect_NN ,_, mutilated_VBN ,_, but_CC
living_VBG ,_, for_IN a_DT similar_JJ purpose_NN ._. Yet_RB other_JJ Bechuana_NNP warriors_NNS wear_VBP the_DT

on_IN their_PRP$ mantle_JJ ,_, because_IN a_DT frog_NN is_VBZ slippery_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT ox_NN ,_, having_VBG no_NN
horns_NNS ,_, is_VBZ hard_JJ to_TO catch_VB ;_: so_RB the_DT man_NN who_WP is_VBZ provided_VBN with_IN these_DT
charms_NNS believes_VBZ that_IN he_PRP will_MD be_VB as_RB hard_JJ to_TO hold_VB as_IN the_DT ox_NN and_CC the_DT
frog_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, it_PRP seems_VBZ plain_JJ that_IN a_DT South_JJ African_JJ warrior_NN who_WP twists_NNS
tufts_NNS of_IN rat_NN '_POS s_PRP hair_NN among_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ curly_JJ black_JJ locks_NNS will_MD have_VB just_RB
as_IN many_JJ chances_NNS of_IN avoiding_VBG the_DT enemy_NN '_POS s_VBZ spear_NN as_IN the_DT nimble_JJ rat_NN has_VBZ
of_IN avoiding_VBG things_NNS thrown_VBN at_IN it_PRP ;_: hence_RB in_IN these_DT regions_NNS rats_NNS '_'' hair_NN
is_VBZ in_IN great_JJ demand_NN when_WRB war_NN is_VBZ expected_VBN ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT ancient_JJ books_NNS of_IN
India_NNP prescribes_VBZ that_IN when_WRB a_DT sacrifice_NN is_VBZ offered_VBN for_IN victory_NN ,_, the_DT
earth_NN out_IN of_IN which_WDT the_DT altar_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB made_VBN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN from_IN a_DT
place_NN where_WRB a_DT boar_NN has_VBZ been_VBN wallowing_VBG ,_, since_IN the_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT
boar_NN will_MD be_VB in_IN that_DT earth_NN ._. When_WRB you_PRP are_VBP playing_VBG the_DT one-stringed_JJ
lute_NN ,_, and_CC your_PRP$ fingers_NNS are_VBP stiff_JJ ,_, the_DT thing_NN to_TO do_VB is_VBZ to_TO catch_VB some_DT
long-legged_JJ field_NN spiders_NNS and_CC roast_NN them_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB rub_VB your_PRP$ fingers_NNS
with_IN the_DT ashes_NNS ;_: that_DT will_MD make_VB your_PRP$ fingers_NNS as_IN lithe_JJ and_CC nimble_JJ as_IN
the_DT spiders_NNS '_POS legs_NNS --_: at_IN least_JJS so_RB think_VB the_DT Galelareese_NNP ._. To_TO bring_VB back_RB
a_DT runaway_JJ slave_NN an_DT Arab_NNP will_MD trace_VB a_DT magic_JJ circle_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_,
stick_NN a_DT nail_NN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC attach_VB a_DT beetle_NN by_IN a_DT thread_NN to_TO
the_DT nail_NN ,_, taking_VBG care_NN that_IN the_DT sex_NN of_IN the_DT beetle_NN is_VBZ that_IN of_IN the_DT
fugitive_JJ ._. As_IN the_DT beetle_NN crawls_VBZ round_RB and_CC round_RB ,_, it_PRP will_MD coil_VB the_DT
thread_NN about_IN the_DT nail_NN ,_, thus_RB shortening_VBG its_PRP$ tether_JJ and_CC drawing_VBG nearer_IN
to_TO the_DT centre_NN at_IN every_DT circuit_NN ._. So_RB by_IN virtue_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN
the_DT runaway_JJ slave_NN will_MD be_VB drawn_VBN back_RB to_TO his_PRP$ master_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT western_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN British_JJ New_NNP Guinea_NNP ,_, a_DT man_NN who_WP has_VBZ killed_VBN
a_DT snake_NN will_MD burn_VB it_PRP and_CC smear_VB his_PRP$ legs_NNS with_IN the_DT ashes_NNS when_WRB he_PRP goes_VBZ
into_IN the_DT forest_NN ;_: for_IN no_DT snake_NN will_MD bite_VB him_PRP for_IN some_DT days_NNS
afterwards_RB ._. If_IN a_DT South_NNP Slavonian_NNP has_VBZ a_DT mind_NN to_TO pilfer_VB and_CC steal_VB at_IN
market_NN ,_, he_PRP has_VBZ nothing_NN to_TO do_VB but_CC to_TO burn_VB a_DT blind_JJ cat_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB throw_VB
a_DT pinch_NN of_IN its_PRP$ ashes_NNS over_IN the_DT person_NN with_IN whom_WP he_PRP is_VBZ higgling_JJ ;_: after_IN
that_IN he_PRP can_MD take_VB what_WP he_PRP likes_VBZ from_IN the_DT booth_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT owner_NN will_MD
not_RB be_VB a_DT bit_NN the_DT wiser_JJR ,_, having_VBG become_VBN as_RB blind_JJ as_IN the_DT deceased_JJ cat_NN
with_IN whose_WP$ ashes_NNS he_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN sprinkled_VBN ._. The_DT thief_NN may_MD even_RB ask_VB
boldly_RB ,_, "_`` Did_VBD I_PRP pay_VB for_IN it_PRP ?"_, and_CC the_DT deluded_JJ huckster_NN will_MD reply_VB ,_,
"_`` Why_WRB ,_, certainly_RB ."_RB Equally_RB simple_JJ and_CC effectual_JJ is_VBZ the_DT expedient_NN
adopted_VBN by_IN natives_NNS of_IN Central_NNP Australia_NNP who_WP desire_VBP to_TO cultivate_VB
their_PRP$ beards_NNS ._. They_PRP prick_NN the_DT chin_NN all_DT over_IN with_IN a_DT pointed_JJ bone_NN ,_, and_CC
then_RB stroke_NN it_PRP carefully_RB with_IN a_DT magic_NN stick_NN or_CC stone_NN ,_, which_WDT
represents_VBZ a_DT kind_NN of_IN rat_NN that_WDT has_VBZ very_RB long_JJ whiskers_NNS ._. The_DT virtue_NN of_IN
these_DT whiskers_NNS naturally_RB passes_VBZ into_IN the_DT representative_NN stick_NN or_CC
stone_NN ,_, and_CC thence_RB by_IN an_DT easy_JJ transition_NN to_TO the_DT chin_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_,
consequently_RB ,_, is_VBZ soon_RB adorned_VBN with_IN a_DT rich_JJ growth_NN of_IN beard_NN ._. The_DT
ancient_JJ Greeks_NNS thought_VBD that_IN to_TO eat_VB the_DT flesh_NN of_IN the_DT wakeful_JJ
nightingale_NN would_MD prevent_VB a_DT man_NN from_IN sleeping_NN ;_: that_IN to_TO smear_VB the_DT
eyes_NNS of_IN a_DT blear-sighted_JJ person_NN with_IN the_DT gall_NN of_IN an_DT eagle_NN would_MD give_VB
him_PRP the_DT eagle_NN '_'' s_PRP vision_NN ;_: and_CC that_IN a_DT raven_NN '_POS s_PRP eggs_NNS would_MD restore_VB the_DT

shade_NN too_RB powerful_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN applying_VBG it_PRP you_PRP might_MD get_VB more_RBR than_IN you_PRP
bargained_VBN for_IN ._.

The_DT Huichol_NNP Indians_NNPS admire_VBP the_DT beautiful_JJ markings_NNS on_IN the_DT backs_NNS of_IN
serpents_NNS ._. Hence_RB when_WRB a_DT Huichol_NNP woman_NN is_VBZ about_IN to_TO weave_VB or_CC embroider_VB ,_,

On_IN the_DT principle_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN ,_, inanimate_JJ things_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN

(_-LRB- kadj_NN �_NN wo_MD )._RP On_IN Fridays_NNS they_PRP turn_VBP these_DT "_`` old_JJ men_NNS "_`` upside_RB down_RB and_CC

The_DT ancients_NNS set_VBD great_JJ store_NN on_IN the_DT magical_JJ qualities_NNS of_IN precious_JJ

Dwellers_NNS by_IN the_DT sea_NN cannot_MD fail_VB to_TO be_VB impressed_VBN by_IN the_DT sight_NN of_IN its_PRP$

properly_RB born_VBN till_IN flood_NN ."_VBZ The_DT belief_NN that_IN most_JJS deaths_NNS happen_VBP at_IN ebb_VBG

the_DT turning_NN o_IN '_'' the_DT tide_NN ."_VBZ We_PRP meet_VBP the_DT belief_NN again_RB on_IN the_DT Pacific_NNP

depart_NN ."_NNP At_IN Port_NNP Stephens_NNP ,_, in_IN New_NNP South_NNP Wales_NNP ,_, the_DT natives_NNS always_RB

water_NN should_MD bear_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT departed_VBN to_TO some_DT distant_JJ country_NN ._.

To_TO ensure_VB a_DT long_JJ life_NN the_DT Chinese_NNPS have_VBP recourse_NN to_TO certain_JJ
complicated_VBN charms_NNS ,_, which_WDT concentrate_VBP in_IN themselves_PRP the_DT magical_JJ

transmit_NN these_DT happy_JJ influences_NNS are_VBP no_DT other_JJ than_IN grave-clothes_NNS ._.
These_DT are_VBP provided_VBN by_IN many_JJ Chinese_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ lifetime_NN ,_, and_CC most_RBS
people_NNS have_VBP them_PRP cut_VBN out_RP and_CC sewn_VBN by_IN an_DT unmarried_JJ girl_NN or_CC a_DT very_RB
young_JJ woman_NN ,_, wisely_RB calculating_VBG that_DT ,_, since_IN such_JJ a_DT person_NN is_VBZ likely_JJ
to_TO live_VB a_DT great_JJ many_JJ years_NNS to_TO come_VB ,_, a_DT part_NN of_IN her_PRP$ capacity_NN to_TO live_VB
long_RB must_MD surely_RB pass_VB into_IN the_DT clothes_NNS ,_, and_CC thus_RB stave_VB off_RP for_IN many_JJ
years_NNS the_DT time_NN when_WRB they_PRP shall_MD be_VB put_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ proper_JJ use_NN ._. Further_RB ,_,
the_DT garments_NNS are_VBP made_VBN by_IN preference_NN in_IN a_DT year_NN which_WDT has_VBZ an_DT
intercalary_JJ month_NN ;_: for_IN to_TO the_DT Chinese_JJ mind_NN it_PRP seems_VBZ plain_JJ that_IN
grave-clothes_NNS made_VBD in_IN a_DT year_NN which_WDT is_VBZ unusually_RB long_RB will_MD possess_VB
the_DT capacity_NN of_IN prolonging_VBG life_NN in_IN an_DT unusually_RB high_JJ degree_NN ._. Amongst_NN
the_DT clothes_NNS there_RB is_VBZ one_CD robe_NN in_IN particular_JJ on_IN which_WDT special_JJ pains_NNS
have_VBP been_VBN lavished_VBN to_TO imbue_VB it_PRP with_IN this_DT priceless_JJ quality_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT

"_`` longevity_RB "_`` embroidered_VBD all_DT over_IN it_PRP in_IN thread_NN of_IN gold_NN ._. To_TO present_VB an_DT

"_`` longevity_NN garments_NNS ,"_, is_VBZ esteemed_VBN by_IN the_DT Chinese_NNPS an_DT act_NN of_IN filial_NN

prolong_VBG the_DT life_NN of_IN its_PRP$ owner_NN ,_, he_PRP often_RB wears_VBZ it_PRP ,_, especially_RB on_IN
festive_JJ occasions_NNS ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO allow_VB the_DT influence_NN of_IN longevity_NN ,_,
created_VBN by_IN the_DT many_JJ golden_JJ letters_NNS with_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ bespangled_VBN ,_, to_TO
work_VB their_PRP$ full_JJ effect_NN upon_IN his_PRP$ person_NN ._. On_IN his_PRP$ birthday_NN ,_, above_IN all_DT ,_,
he_PRP hardly_RB ever_RB fails_VBZ to_TO don_VB it_PRP ,_, for_IN in_IN China_NNP common_JJ sense_NN bids_NNS a_DT man_NN

Attired_VBN in_IN the_DT gorgeous_JJ pall_NN ,_, and_CC absorbing_VBG its_PRP$ blessed_JJ influence_NN at_IN

which_WDT prompted_VBD the_DT children_NNS to_TO bestow_VB so_RB beautiful_JJ and_CC useful_JJ a_DT
present_NN on_IN the_DT author_NN of_IN their_PRP$ being_NN ._.

Another_DT application_NN of_IN the_DT maxim_NN that_DT like_IN produces_VBZ like_IN is_VBZ seen_VBN in_IN
the_DT Chinese_JJ belief_NN that_IN the_DT fortunes_NNS of_IN a_DT town_NN are_VBP deeply_RB affected_VBN
by_IN its_PRP$ shape_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP must_MD vary_VB according_VBG to_TO the_DT character_NN of_IN
the_DT thing_NN which_WDT that_WDT shape_VBP most_JJS nearly_RB resembles_VBZ ._. Thus_RB it_PRP is_VBZ related_VBN
that_DT long_RB ago_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Tsuen-cheu_NNP -_: fu_NN ,_, the_DT outlines_NNS of_IN which_WDT are_VBP
like_IN those_DT of_IN a_DT carp_NN ,_, frequently_RB fell_VBD a_DT prey_NN to_TO the_DT depredations_NNS of_IN
the_DT neighbouring_VBG city_NN of_IN Yung-chun_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ shaped_VBN like_IN a_DT

plan_NN of_IN erecting_JJ two_CD tall_JJ pagodas_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ midst_NN ._. These_DT pagodas_NNS ,_,
which_WDT still_RB tower_NN above_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Tsuen-cheu_NNP -_: fu_NN ,_, have_VBP ever_RB since_IN

the_DT imaginary_NN net_NN before_IN it_PRP could_MD descend_VB and_CC entangle_VB in_IN its_PRP$ meshes_NNS
the_DT imaginary_NN carp_NN ._. Some_DT forty_CD years_NNS ago_IN the_DT wise_JJ men_NNS of_IN Shanghai_NNP
were_VBD much_RB exercised_VBN to_TO discover_VB the_DT cause_NN of_IN a_DT local_JJ rebellion_NN ._. On_IN
careful_JJ enquiry_NN they_PRP ascertained_VBD that_IN the_DT rebellion_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO the_DT
shape_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ new_JJ temple_NN which_WDT had_VBD most_RBS unfortunately_RB been_VBN built_VBN
in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT tortoise_NN ,_, an_DT animal_NN of_IN the_DT very_RB worst_JJS character_NN ._.
The_DT difficulty_NN was_VBD serious_JJ ,_, the_DT danger_NN was_VBD pressing_VBG ;_: for_IN to_TO pull_VB
down_IN the_DT temple_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN impious_JJ ,_, and_CC to_TO let_VB it_PRP stand_VB as_IN it_PRP
was_VBD would_MD be_VB to_TO court_VB a_DT succession_NN of_IN similar_JJ or_CC worse_JJR disasters_NNS ._.
However_RB ,_, the_DT genius_NN of_IN the_DT local_JJ professors_NNS of_IN geomancy_NN ,_, rising_VBG to_TO
the_DT occasion_NN ,_, triumphantly_RB surmounted_VBD the_DT difficulty_NN and_CC obviated_VBN
the_DT danger_NN ._. By_IN filling_VBG up_RP two_CD wells_NNS ,_, which_WDT represented_VBD the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN
the_DT tortoise_NN ,_, they_PRP at_IN once_RB blinded_VBN that_IN disreputable_JJ animal_NN and_CC
rendered_VBD him_PRP incapable_JJ of_IN doing_VBG further_JJ mischief_NN ._.

Sometimes_RB homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ magic_NN is_VBZ called_VBN in_IN to_TO annul_VB an_DT
evil_JJ omen_NNS by_IN accomplishing_VBG it_PRP in_IN mimicry_NN ._. The_DT effect_NN is_VBZ to_TO
circumvent_NN destiny_NN by_IN substituting_VBG a_DT mock_JJ calamity_NN for_IN a_DT real_JJ one_CD ._.
In_IN Madagascar_NNP this_DT mode_NN of_IN cheating_VBG the_DT fates_NNS is_VBZ reduced_VBN to_TO a_DT
regular_JJ system_NN ._. Here_RB every_DT man_NN '_POS s_VBZ fortune_NN is_VBZ determined_VBN by_IN the_DT day_NN or_CC
hour_NN of_IN his_PRP$ birth_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN that_DT happens_VBZ to_TO be_VB an_DT unlucky_JJ one_CD his_PRP$ fate_NN
is_VBZ sealed_VBN ,_, unless_IN the_DT mischief_NN can_MD be_VB extracted_VBN ,_, as_IN the_DT phrase_NN goes_VBZ ,_,
by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT substitute_NN ._. The_DT ways_NNS of_IN extracting_VBG the_DT mischief_NN are_VBP
various_JJ ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, if_IN a_DT man_NN is_VBZ born_VBN on_IN the_DT first_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT
second_JJ month_NN (_-LRB- February_NNP ),_, his_PRP$ house_NN will_MD be_VB burnt_VBN down_RB when_WRB he_PRP comes_VBZ
of_IN age_NN ._. To_TO take_VB time_NN by_IN the_DT forelock_NN and_CC avoid_VB this_DT catastrophe_NN ,_, the_DT
friends_NNS of_IN the_DT infant_NN will_MD set_VB up_RP a_DT shed_VBN in_IN a_DT field_NN or_CC in_IN the_DT
cattle-fold_VB and_CC burn_VB it_PRP ._. If_IN the_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB really_RB effective_JJ ,_,
the_DT child_NN and_CC his_PRP$ mother_NN should_MD be_VB placed_VBN in_IN the_DT shed_VBN and_CC only_RB
plucked_VBD ,_, like_IN brands_NNS ,_, from_IN the_DT burning_NN hut_NN before_IN it_PRP is_VBZ too_RB late_JJ ._.
Again_RB ,_, dripping_VBG November_NNP is_VBZ the_DT month_NN of_IN tears_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP who_WP is_VBZ born_VBN
in_IN it_PRP is_VBZ born_VBN to_TO sorrow_NN ._. But_CC in_IN order_NN to_TO disperse_VB the_DT clouds_NNS that_WDT
thus_RB gather_VB over_RP his_PRP$ future_NN ,_, he_PRP has_VBZ nothing_NN to_TO do_VB but_CC to_TO take_VB the_DT
lid_NN off_IN a_DT boiling_NN pot_NN and_CC wave_NN it_PRP about_RB ._. The_DT drops_NNS that_WDT fall_VBP from_IN it_PRP
will_MD accomplish_VB his_PRP$ destiny_NN and_CC so_RB prevent_VB the_DT tears_NNS from_IN trickling_VBG
from_IN his_PRP$ eyes_NNS ._. Again_RB ,_, if_IN fate_NN has_VBZ decreed_VBN that_IN a_DT young_JJ girl_NN ,_, still_RB
unwed_JJ ,_, should_MD see_VB her_PRP$ children_NNS ,_, still_RB unborn_JJ ,_, descend_VB before_IN her_PRP$
with_IN sorrow_NN to_TO the_DT grave_NN ,_, she_PRP can_MD avert_VB the_DT calamity_NN as_IN follows_VBZ ._. She_PRP
kills_VBZ a_DT grasshopper_NN ,_, wraps_VBZ it_PRP in_IN a_DT rag_NN to_TO represent_VB a_DT shroud_JJ ,_, and_CC
mourns_NNS over_IN it_PRP like_IN Rachel_NNP weeping_VBG for_IN her_PRP$ children_NNS and_CC refusing_VBG to_TO
be_VB comforted_VBN ._. Moreover_RB ,_, she_PRP takes_VBZ a_DT dozen_NN or_CC more_JJR other_JJ
grasshoppers_NNS ,_, and_CC having_VBG removed_VBN some_DT of_IN their_PRP$ superfluous_JJ legs_NNS and_CC
wings_NNS she_PRP lays_VBZ them_PRP about_IN their_PRP$ dead_JJ and_CC shrouded_JJ fellow_NN ._. The_DT buzz_NN
of_IN the_DT tortured_JJ insects_NNS and_CC the_DT agitated_JJ motions_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ mutilated_VBN
limbs_NNS represent_VBP the_DT shrieks_NNS and_CC contortions_NNS of_IN the_DT mourners_NNS at_IN a_DT
funeral_NN ._. After_IN burying_VBG the_DT deceased_JJ grasshopper_NN she_PRP leaves_VBZ the_DT rest_NN
to_TO continue_VB their_PRP$ mourning_VBG till_IN death_NN releases_NNS them_PRP from_IN their_PRP$ pain_NN ;_:
and_CC having_VBG bound_VBN up_RP her_PRP$ dishevelled_JJ hair_NN she_PRP retires_VBZ from_IN the_DT grave_NN
with_IN the_DT step_NN and_CC carriage_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN plunged_VBD in_IN grief_NN ._. Thenceforth_''
she_PRP looks_VBZ cheerfully_RB forward_RB to_TO seeing_VBG her_PRP$ children_NNS survive_VBP her_PRP ;_: for_IN
it_PRP cannot_MD be_VB that_IN she_PRP should_MD mourn_VB and_CC bury_VB them_PRP twice_RB over_RB ._. Once_RB
more_RBR ,_, if_IN fortune_NN has_VBZ frowned_VBD on_IN a_DT man_NN at_IN his_PRP$ birth_NN and_CC penury_NN has_VBZ
marked_VBD him_PRP for_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, he_PRP can_MD easily_RB erase_VB the_DT mark_NN in_IN question_NN by_IN
purchasing_VBG a_DT couple_NN of_IN cheap_JJ pearls_NNS ,_, price_NN three_CD halfpence_NN ,_, and_CC
burying_VBG them_PRP ._. For_IN who_WP but_CC the_DT rich_JJ of_IN this_DT world_NN can_MD thus_RB afford_VB to_TO
fling_VBG pearls_NNS away_RB ?_.



3._. Contagious_NNP Magic_NNP

THUS_RB far_RB we_PRP have_VBP been_VBN considering_VBG chiefly_RB that_IN branch_NN of_IN sympathetic_JJ
magic_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB called_VBN homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ ._. Its_PRP$ leading_VBG
principle_NN ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, is_VBZ that_DT like_IN produces_VBZ like_IN ,_, or_CC ,_, in_IN other_JJ
words_NNS ,_, that_IN an_DT effect_NN resembles_VBZ its_PRP$ cause_NN ._. The_DT other_JJ great_JJ branch_NN of_IN
sympathetic_JJ magic_NN ,_, which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP called_VBN Contagious_NNP Magic_NNP ,_, proceeds_NNS
upon_IN the_DT notion_NN that_IN things_NNS which_WDT have_VBP once_RB been_VBN conjoined_VBN must_MD
remain_VB ever_RB afterwards_RB ,_, even_RB when_WRB quite_RB dissevered_VBN from_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_,
in_IN such_JJ a_DT sympathetic_JJ relation_NN that_IN whatever_WDT is_VBZ done_VBN to_TO the_DT one_NN must_MD
similarly_RB affect_VB the_DT other_JJ ._. Thus_RB the_DT logical_JJ basis_NN of_IN Contagious_NNP
Magic_NNP ,_, like_IN that_DT of_IN Homoeopathic_NNP Magic_NNP ,_, is_VBZ a_DT mistaken_JJ association_NN of_IN
ideas_NNS ;_: its_PRP$ physical_JJ basis_NN ,_, if_IN we_PRP may_MD speak_VB of_IN such_JJ a_DT thing_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT
physical_JJ basis_NN of_IN Homoeopathic_NNP Magic_NNP ,_, is_VBZ a_DT material_NN medium_NN of_IN some_DT
sort_NN which_WDT ,_, like_IN the_DT ether_NN of_IN modern_JJ physics_NNS ,_, is_VBZ assumed_VBN to_TO unite_VB
distant_JJ objects_NNS and_CC to_TO convey_VB impressions_NNS from_IN one_CD to_TO the_DT other_JJ ._. The_DT
most_RBS familiar_JJ example_NN of_IN Contagious_NNP Magic_NNP is_VBZ the_DT magical_JJ sympathy_NN
which_WDT is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO exist_VB between_IN a_DT man_NN and_CC any_DT severed_VBN portion_NN of_IN
his_PRP$ person_NN ,_, as_IN his_PRP$ hair_NN or_CC nails_NNS ;_: so_RB that_IN whoever_WP gets_VBZ possession_NN of_IN
human_JJ hair_NN or_CC nails_NNS may_MD work_VB his_PRP$ will_NN ,_, at_IN any_DT distance_NN ,_, upon_IN the_DT
person_NN from_IN whom_WP they_PRP were_VBD cut_VBN ._. This_DT superstition_NN is_VBZ world-wide_JJ ;_:
instances_NNS of_IN it_PRP in_IN regard_NN to_TO hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS will_MD be_VB noticed_VBN later_RB on_IN
in_IN this_DT work_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT Australian_JJ tribes_NNS it_PRP was_VBD a_DT common_JJ practice_NN to_TO knock_VB out_IN
one_CD or_CC more_JJR of_IN a_DT boy_NN '_'' s_PRP front_JJ teeth_NNS at_IN those_DT ceremonies_NNS of_IN initiation_NN
to_TO which_WDT every_DT male_NN member_NN had_VBD to_TO submit_VB before_IN he_PRP could_MD enjoy_VB the_DT
rights_NNS and_CC privileges_NNS of_IN a_DT full-grown_JJ man_NN ._. The_DT reason_NN of_IN the_DT
practice_NN is_VBZ obscure_JJ ;_: all_PDT that_DT concerns_NNS us_PRP here_RB is_VBZ the_DT belief_NN that_IN a_DT
sympathetic_JJ relation_NN continued_VBD to_TO exist_VB between_IN the_DT lad_NN and_CC his_PRP$
teeth_NNS after_IN the_DT latter_NN had_VBD been_VBN extracted_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ gums_NNS ._. Thus_RB among_IN
some_DT of_IN the_DT tribes_NNS about_IN the_DT river_NN Darling_NNP ,_, in_IN New_NNP South_NNP Wales_NNP ,_, the_DT
extracted_VBN tooth_NN was_VBD placed_VBN under_IN the_DT bark_NN of_IN a_DT tree_NN near_IN a_DT river_NN or_CC
water-hole_NN ;_: if_IN the_DT bark_NN grew_VBD over_IN the_DT tooth_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN the_DT tooth_NN fell_VBD
into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, all_DT was_VBD well_RB ;_: but_CC if_IN it_PRP were_VBD exposed_VBN and_CC the_DT ants_NNS
ran_VBD over_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT natives_NNS believed_VBD that_IN the_DT boy_NN would_MD suffer_VB from_IN a_DT
disease_NN of_IN the_DT mouth_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Murring_NNP and_CC other_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN New_NNP
South_NNP Wales_NNP the_DT extracted_VBN tooth_NN was_VBD at_IN first_RB taken_VBN care_NN of_IN by_IN an_DT old_JJ
man_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB passed_VBD from_IN one_CD headman_NN to_TO another_DT ,_, until_IN it_PRP had_VBD gone_VBN
all_DT round_RB the_DT community_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP came_VBD back_RB to_TO the_DT lad_NN '_POS s_VBZ father_NN ,_, and_CC
finally_RB to_TO the_DT lad_NN himself_PRP ._. But_CC however_RB it_PRP was_VBD thus_RB conveyed_VBN from_IN
hand_NN to_TO hand_NN ,_, it_PRP might_MD on_IN no_DT account_NN be_VB placed_VBN in_IN a_DT bag_NN containing_VBG
magical_JJ substances_NNS ,_, for_IN to_TO do_VB so_RB would_MD ,_, they_PRP believed_VBD ,_, put_VBD the_DT owner_NN
of_IN the_DT tooth_NN in_IN great_JJ danger_NN ._. The_DT late_JJ Dr_NNP ._. Howitt_NNP once_RB acted_VBD as_IN
custodian_NN of_IN the_DT teeth_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN extracted_VBN from_IN some_DT novices_NNS at_IN
a_DT ceremony_NN of_IN initiation_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT old_JJ men_NNS earnestly_RB besought_VBD him_PRP not_RB
to_TO carry_VB them_PRP in_IN a_DT bag_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP knew_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD some_DT quartz_NN
crystals_NNS ._. They_PRP declared_VBD that_IN if_IN he_PRP did_VBD so_RB the_DT magic_NN of_IN the_DT crystals_NNS
would_MD pass_VB into_IN the_DT teeth_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB injure_IN the_DT boys_NNS ._. Nearly_RB a_DT year_NN
after_IN Dr_NNP ._. Howitt_NNP '_'' s_VBZ return_NN from_IN the_DT ceremony_NN he_PRP was_VBD visited_VBN by_IN one_CD of_IN
the_DT principal_JJ men_NNS of_IN the_DT Murring_NNP tribe_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD travelled_VBN some_DT two_CD
hundred_CD and_CC fifty_CD miles_NNS from_IN his_PRP$ home_NN to_TO fetch_VB back_RP the_DT teeth_NNS ._. This_DT
man_NN explained_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN sent_VBN for_IN them_PRP because_IN one_NN of_IN the_DT boys_NNS
had_VBD fallen_VBN into_IN ill_JJ health_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD believed_VBN that_IN the_DT teeth_NNS had_VBD
received_VBD some_DT injury_NN which_WDT had_VBD affected_VBN him_PRP ._. He_PRP was_VBD assured_VBN that_IN the_DT
teeth_NNS had_VBD been_VBN kept_VBN in_IN a_DT box_NN apart_RB from_IN any_DT substances_NNS ,_, like_IN quartz_NN
crystals_NNS ,_, which_WDT could_MD influence_VB them_PRP ;_: and_CC he_PRP returned_VBD home_NN bearing_VBG
the_DT teeth_NNS with_IN him_PRP carefully_RB wrapt_VBD up_RB and_CC concealed_VBD ._.

The_DT Basutos_NNS are_VBP careful_JJ to_TO conceal_VB their_PRP$ extracted_VBN teeth_NNS ,_, lest_IN these_DT
should_MD fall_VB into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN certain_JJ mythical_JJ beings_NNS who_WP haunt_VBP
graves_NNS ,_, and_CC who_WP could_MD harm_VB the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT tooth_NN by_IN working_VBG magic_NN
on_IN it_PRP ._. In_IN Sussex_NNP some_DT fifty_CD years_NNS ago_IN a_DT maid-servant_NN remonstrated_VBN
strongly_RB against_IN the_DT throwing_VBG away_RB of_IN children_NNS '_'' s_PRP cast_VBD teeth_NNS ,_,
affirming_VBG that_DT should_MD they_PRP be_VB found_VBN and_CC gnawed_VBN by_IN any_DT animal_NN ,_, the_DT
child_NN '_POS s_VBZ new_JJ tooth_NN would_MD be_VB ,_, for_IN all_PDT the_DT world_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT teeth_NNS of_IN the_DT
animal_NN that_WDT had_VBD bitten_VBN the_DT old_JJ one_NN ._. In_IN proof_NN of_IN this_DT she_PRP named_VBD old_JJ
Master_NNP Simmons_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD a_DT very_RB large_JJ pig_NN '_'' s_PRP tooth_NN in_IN his_PRP$ upper_JJ jaw_NN ,_, a_DT
personal_JJ defect_NN that_IN he_PRP always_RB averred_VBD was_VBD caused_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, who_WP
threw_VBD away_RB one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ cast_NN teeth_RP by_IN accident_NN into_IN the_DT hog_NN '_POS s_PRP trough_NN ._.
A_DT similar_JJ belief_NN has_VBZ led_VBN to_TO practices_NNS intended_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT principles_NNS of_IN
homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN ,_, to_TO replace_VB old_JJ teeth_NNS by_IN new_JJ and_CC better_JJR ones_NNS ._.
Thus_RB in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN it_PRP is_VBZ customary_JJ to_TO put_VB extracted_VBN
teeth_NNS in_IN some_DT place_NN where_WRB they_PRP will_MD be_VB found_VBN by_IN a_DT mouse_NN or_CC a_DT rat_NN ,_, in_IN
the_DT hope_NN that_IN ,_, through_IN the_DT sympathy_NN which_WDT continues_VBZ to_TO subsist_VB
between_IN them_PRP and_CC their_PRP$ former_JJ owner_NN ,_, his_PRP$ other_JJ teeth_NNS may_MD acquire_VB the_DT
same_JJ firmness_NN and_CC excellence_NN as_IN the_DT teeth_NNS of_IN these_DT rodents_NNS ._. For_IN
example_NN ,_, in_IN Germany_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO be_VB an_DT almost_RB universal_JJ maxim_NN among_IN
the_DT people_NNS that_IN when_WRB you_PRP have_VBP had_VBD a_DT tooth_NN taken_VBN out_IN you_PRP should_MD
insert_NN it_PRP in_IN a_DT mouse_NN '_'' s_VBZ hole_NN ._. To_TO do_VB so_RB with_IN a_DT child_NN '_POS s_PRP milk-tooth_.
which_WDT has_VBZ fallen_VBN out_RP will_MD prevent_VB the_DT child_NN from_IN having_VBG toothache_NN ._.
Or_CC you_PRP should_MD go_VB behind_IN the_DT stove_NN and_CC throw_VB your_PRP$ tooth_NN backwards_NNS
over_IN your_PRP$ head_NN ,_, saying_VBG "_`` Mouse_NNP ,_, give_VB me_PRP your_PRP$ iron_NN tooth_NN ;_: I_PRP will_MD give_VB
you_PRP my_PRP$ bone_NN tooth_NN ."_NN After_IN that_DT your_PRP$ other_JJ teeth_NNS will_MD remain_VB good_JJ ._.
Far_RB away_RB from_IN Europe_NNP ,_, at_IN Raratonga_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Pacific_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT child_NN '_POS s_PRP
tooth_NN was_VBD extracted_VBN ,_, the_DT following_VBG prayer_NN used_VBN to_TO be_VB recited_VBN :_:


"_`` Big_JJ rat_NN !_. little_JJ rat_NN !_.
Here_RB is_VBZ my_PRP$ old_JJ tooth_NN ._.
Pray_NNP give_VBP me_PRP a_DT new_JJ one_CD ."_NN


Then_RB the_DT tooth_NN was_VBD thrown_VBN on_IN the_DT thatch_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, because_IN rats_NNS
make_VB their_PRP$ nests_NNS in_IN the_DT decayed_JJ thatch_NN ._. The_DT reason_NN assigned_VBN for_IN
invoking_VBG the_DT rats_NNS on_IN these_DT occasions_NNS was_VBD that_IN rats_NNS '_POS teeth_NNS were_VBD the_DT
strongest_JJS known_VBN to_TO the_DT natives_NNS ._.

Other_JJ parts_NNS which_WDT are_VBP commonly_RB believed_VBN to_TO remain_VB in_IN a_DT sympathetic_JJ

are_VBP the_DT navel-string_NN and_CC the_DT afterbirth_NN ,_, including_VBG the_DT placenta_NN ._. So_RB
intimate_JJ ,_, indeed_RB ,_, is_VBZ the_DT union_NN conceived_VBD to_TO be_VB ,_, that_IN the_DT fortunes_NNS of_IN
the_DT individual_NN for_IN good_JJ or_CC evil_JJ throughout_IN life_NN are_VBP often_RB supposed_VBN
to_TO be_VB bound_VBN up_RP with_IN one_CD or_CC other_JJ of_IN these_DT portions_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ person_NN ,_, so_RB

will_MD suffer_VB accordingly_RB ._. Thus_RB certain_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN Western_NNP Australia_NNP

marks_NNS the_DT spot_NN by_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN twigs_NNS which_WDT she_PRP sticks_VBZ in_IN the_DT ground_NN
in_IN a_DT circle_NN ,_, tying_VBG their_PRP$ tops_NNS together_RB so_RB that_IN the_DT structure_NN

is_VBZ the_DT soul_NN ,_, they_PRP say_VBP ,_, which_WDT begets_VBZ children_NNS ._.

The_DT Baganda_NNP believe_VBP that_IN every_DT person_NN is_VBZ born_VBN with_IN a_DT double_JJ ,_, and_CC
this_DT double_JJ they_PRP identify_VBP with_IN the_DT afterbirth_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP regard_VBP as_IN
a_DT second_JJ child_NN ._. The_DT mother_NN buries_NNS the_DT afterbirth_NN at_IN the_DT root_NN of_IN a_DT

Even_RB in_IN Europe_NNP many_JJ people_NNS still_RB believe_VBP that_IN a_DT person_NN '_POS s_VBZ destiny_NN is_VBZ

Thus_RB in_IN Rhenish_NNP Bavaria_NNP the_DT navel-string_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN for_IN a_DT while_NN wrapt_NN

Thus_RB in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN the_DT navel-string_NN ,_, or_CC more_RBR commonly_RB

necessarily_RB the_DT only_JJ one_CD )_-RRB- for_IN the_DT theory_NN and_CC practice_NN of_IN the_DT
external_JJ soul_NN ._. The_DT consideration_NN of_IN that_DT subject_NN is_VBZ reserved_VBN for_IN a_DT
later_RB part_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN ._.

A_DT curious_JJ application_NN of_IN the_DT doctrine_NN of_IN contagious_JJ magic_NN is_VBZ the_DT
relation_NN commonly_RB believed_VBD to_TO exist_VB between_IN a_DT wounded_JJ man_NN and_CC the_DT

the_DT agent_NN must_MD correspondingly_RB affect_VB the_DT patient_NN either_RB for_IN good_JJ or_CC
evil_JJ ._. Thus_RB Pliny_NNP tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN if_IN you_PRP have_VBP wounded_VBN a_DT man_NN and_CC are_VBP
sorry_JJ for_IN it_PRP ,_, you_PRP have_VBP only_RB to_TO spit_VB on_IN the_DT hand_NN that_WDT gave_VBD the_DT wound_NN ,_,
and_CC the_DT pain_NN of_IN the_DT sufferer_NN will_MD be_VB instantly_RB alleviated_VBN ._. In_IN

wounded_VBN him_PRP ,_, they_PRP keep_VBP it_PRP in_IN a_DT damp_JJ place_NN or_CC in_IN cool_JJ leaves_NNS ,_, for_IN
then_RB the_DT inflammation_NN will_MD be_VB trifling_JJ and_CC will_MD soon_RB subside_VB ._.
Meantime_RB the_DT enemy_NN who_WP shot_VBD the_DT arrow_NN is_VBZ hard_JJ at_IN work_NN to_TO aggravate_VB

friends_NNS drink_VBP hot_JJ and_CC burning_VBG juices_NNS and_CC chew_VBP irritating_VBG leaves_NNS ,_, for_IN
this_DT will_MD clearly_RB inflame_VB and_CC irritate_VB the_DT wound_NN ._. Further_RB ,_, they_PRP keep_VBP
the_DT bow_NN near_IN the_DT fire_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT wound_NN which_WDT it_PRP has_VBZ inflicted_VBN hot_JJ ;_:
and_CC for_IN the_DT same_JJ reason_NN they_PRP put_VBD the_DT arrow-head_NN ,_, if_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN
recovered_VBD ,_, into_IN the_DT fire_NN ._. Moreover_RB ,_, they_PRP are_VBP careful_JJ to_TO keep_VB the_DT
bow-string_NN taut_JJ and_CC to_TO twang_IN it_PRP occasionally_RB ,_, for_IN this_DT will_MD cause_VB
the_DT wounded_JJ man_NN to_TO suffer_VB from_IN tension_NN of_IN the_DT nerves_NNS and_CC spasms_NNS of_IN
tetanus_NN ._. "_`` It_PRP is_VBZ constantly_RB received_VBN and_CC avouched_VBN ,"_, says_VBZ Bacon_NNP ,_, "_'' that_WDT
the_DT anointing_NN of_IN the_DT weapon_NN that_IN maketh_VBZ the_DT wound_NN will_MD heal_VB the_DT
wound_NN itself_PRP ._. In_IN this_DT experiment_NN ,_, upon_IN the_DT relation_NN of_IN men_NNS of_IN credit_NN
(_-LRB- though_IN myself_PRP ,_, as_RB yet_RB ,_, am_VBP not_RB fully_RB inclined_VBN to_TO believe_VB it_PRP ),_IN you_PRP
shall_MD note_VB the_DT points_NNS following_VBG :_: first_JJ ,_, the_DT ointment_NN wherewith_IN this_DT
is_VBZ done_VBN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN divers_NNS ingredients_NNS ,_, whereof_IN the_DT strangest_JJS and_CC
hardest_JJS to_TO come_VB by_IN are_VBP the_DT moss_NN upon_IN the_DT skull_NN of_IN a_DT dead_JJ man_NN
unburied_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT fats_NNS of_IN a_DT boar_NN and_CC a_DT bear_NN killed_VBN in_IN the_DT act_NN of_IN
generation_NN ."_VBZ The_DT precious_JJ ointment_NN compounded_VBN out_IN of_IN these_DT and_CC other_JJ
ingredients_NNS was_VBD applied_VBN ,_, as_IN the_DT philosopher_NN explains_VBZ ,_, not_RB to_TO the_DT
wound_NN but_CC to_TO the_DT weapon_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN even_RB though_IN the_DT injured_JJ man_NN was_VBD at_IN
a_DT great_JJ distance_NN and_CC knew_VBD nothing_NN about_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT experiment_NN ,_, he_PRP tells_VBZ
us_PRP ,_, had_VBD been_VBN tried_VBN of_IN wiping_VBG the_DT ointment_NN off_IN the_DT weapon_NN without_IN the_DT
knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN hurt_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT result_NN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD presently_RB
in_IN a_DT great_JJ rage_NN of_IN pain_NN until_IN the_DT weapon_NN was_VBD anointed_VBN again_RB ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, "_`` it_PRP is_VBZ affirmed_VBN that_IN if_IN you_PRP cannot_MD get_VB the_DT weapon_NN ,_, yet_RB if_IN
you_PRP put_VBD an_DT instrument_NN of_IN iron_NN or_CC wood_NN resembling_VBG the_DT weapon_NN into_IN the_DT
wound_NN ,_, whereby_WRB it_PRP bleedeth_VBP ,_, the_DT anointing_NN of_IN that_DT instrument_NN will_MD
serve_VB and_CC work_VB the_DT effect_NN ."_IN Remedies_NNS of_IN the_DT sort_NN which_WDT Bacon_NNP deemed_VBN
worthy_JJ of_IN his_PRP$ attention_NN are_VBP still_RB in_IN vogue_NN in_IN the_DT eastern_JJ counties_NNS

or_CC a_DT scythe_NN he_PRP always_RB takes_VBZ care_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT weapon_NN bright_JJ ,_, and_CC oils_NNS
it_PRP to_TO prevent_VB the_DT wound_NN from_IN festering_VBG ._. If_IN he_PRP runs_VBZ a_DT thorn_NN or_CC ,_, as_IN he_PRP

bush_NN well_RB after_IN I_PRP pulled_VBD it_PRP out_RP ."_RB If_IN a_DT horse_NN wounds_NNS its_PRP$ foot_NN by_IN

grease_NN on_IN the_DT axe_NN dries_NNS ,_, your_PRP$ wound_NN heals_NNS ._. Similarly_RB in_IN the_DT Harz_NNP

again_RB ,_, in_IN Bavaria_NNP ,_, recommend_VBP you_PRP to_TO smear_VB the_DT axe_NN or_CC whatever_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ
with_IN blood_NN and_CC put_VBD it_PRP under_IN the_DT eaves_NNS ._.

The_DT train_NN of_IN reasoning_NN which_WDT thus_RB commends_VBZ itself_PRP to_TO English_NNP and_CC
German_JJ rustics_NNS ,_, in_IN common_JJ with_IN the_DT savages_NNS of_IN Melanesia_NNP and_CC America_NNP ,_,
is_VBZ carried_VBD a_DT step_NN further_RB by_IN the_DT aborigines_NNS of_IN Central_NNP Australia_NNP ,_,
who_WP conceive_VB that_IN under_IN certain_JJ circumstances_NNS the_DT near_JJ relations_NNS of_IN
a_DT wounded_JJ man_NN must_MD grease_NN themselves_PRP ,_, restrict_VB their_PRP$ diet_NN ,_, and_CC
regulate_VB their_PRP$ behaviour_NN in_IN other_JJ ways_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO ensure_VB his_PRP$
recovery_NN ._. Thus_RB when_WRB a_DT lad_NN has_VBZ been_VBN circumcised_VBN and_CC the_DT wound_NN is_VBZ not_RB
yet_RB healed_VBN ,_, his_PRP$ mother_NN may_MD not_RB eat_VB opossum_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT certain_JJ kind_NN of_IN
lizard_NN ,_, or_CC carpet_NN snake_NN ,_, or_CC any_DT kind_NN of_IN fat_JJ ,_, for_IN otherwise_RB she_PRP would_MD
retard_NN the_DT healing_NN of_IN the_DT boy_NN '_'' s_PRP wound_VBD ._. Every_DT day_NN she_PRP greases_VBZ her_PRP$
digging-sticks_NNS and_CC never_RB lets_VBZ them_PRP out_IN of_IN her_PRP$ sight_NN ;_: at_IN night_NN she_PRP
sleeps_NNS with_IN them_PRP close_RB to_TO her_PRP$ head_NN ._. No_DT one_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO touch_VB them_PRP ._.
Every_DT day_NN also_RB she_PRP rubs_VBZ her_PRP$ body_NN all_DT over_IN with_IN grease_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN some_DT
way_NN this_DT is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO help_VB her_PRP$ son_NN '_POS s_VBZ recovery_NN ._. Another_DT refinement_NN
of_IN the_DT same_JJ principle_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT ingenuity_NN of_IN the_DT German_JJ peasant_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN when_WRB one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ pigs_NNS or_CC sheep_NN breaks_VBZ its_PRP$ leg_NN ,_, a_DT
farmer_NN of_IN Rhenish_NNP Bavaria_NNP or_CC Hesse_NNP will_MD bind_NN up_IN the_DT leg_NN of_IN a_DT chair_NN
with_IN bandages_NNS and_CC splints_NNS in_IN due_JJ form_NN ._. For_IN some_DT days_NNS thereafter_RB no_RB
one_CD may_MD sit_VB on_IN that_DT chair_NN ,_, move_NN it_PRP ,_, or_CC knock_VB up_RP against_IN it_PRP ;_: for_IN to_TO
do_VBP so_RB would_MD pain_NN the_DT injured_JJ pig_NN or_CC sheep_NN and_CC hinder_VB the_DT cure_NN ._. In_IN
this_DT last_JJ case_NN it_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN we_PRP have_VBP passed_VBN wholly_RB out_IN of_IN the_DT
region_NN of_IN contagious_VBG magic_JJ and_CC into_IN the_DT region_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ or_CC
imitative_JJ magic_NN ;_: the_DT chair-leg_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ treated_VBN instead_RB of_IN the_DT
beast_NN '_POS s_PRP leg_NN ,_, in_IN no_DT sense_NN belongs_VBZ to_TO the_DT animal_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT application_NN
of_IN bandages_NNS to_TO it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT mere_JJ simulation_NN of_IN the_DT treatment_NN which_WDT a_DT more_RBR
rational_JJ surgery_NN would_MD bestow_RB on_IN the_DT real_JJ patient_NN ._.

The_DT sympathetic_JJ connexion_NN supposed_VBD to_TO exist_VB between_IN a_DT man_NN and_CC the_DT
weapon_NN which_WDT has_VBZ wounded_VBN him_PRP is_VBZ probably_RB founded_VBN on_IN the_DT notion_NN that_IN
the_DT blood_NN on_IN the_DT weapon_NN continues_VBZ to_TO feel_VB with_IN the_DT blood_NN in_IN his_PRP$
body_NN ._. For_IN a_DT like_JJ reason_NN the_DT Papuans_NNP of_IN Tumleo_NNP ,_, an_DT island_NN off_IN New_NNP
Guinea_NNP ,_, are_VBP careful_JJ to_TO throw_VB into_IN the_DT sea_NN the_DT bloody_JJ bandages_NNS with_IN
which_WDT their_PRP$ wounds_NNS have_VBP been_VBN dressed_VBN ,_, for_IN they_PRP fear_VBP that_IN if_IN these_DT
rags_NNS fell_VBD into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN an_DT enemy_NN he_PRP might_MD injure_VB them_PRP magically_RB
thereby_RB ._. Once_RB when_WRB a_DT man_NN with_IN a_DT wound_NN in_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN ,_, which_WDT bled_VBD
constantly_RB ,_, came_VBD to_TO the_DT missionaries_NNS to_TO be_VB treated_VBN ,_, his_PRP$ faithful_NN
wife_NN took_VBD great_JJ pains_NNS to_TO collect_VB all_PDT the_DT blood_NN and_CC cast_VBD it_PRP into_IN the_DT
sea_NN ._. Strained_VBN and_CC unnatural_JJ as_IN this_DT idea_NN may_MD seem_VB to_TO us_PRP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ
perhaps_RB less_RBR so_RB than_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN magic_JJ sympathy_NN is_VBZ maintained_VBN
between_IN a_DT person_NN and_CC his_PRP$ clothes_NNS ,_, so_RB that_IN whatever_WDT is_VBZ done_VBN to_TO the_DT
clothes_NNS will_MD be_VB felt_VBN by_IN the_DT man_NN himself_PRP ,_, even_RB though_IN he_PRP may_MD be_VB far_RB
away_RB at_IN the_DT time_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Wotjobaluk_NNP tribe_NN of_IN Victoria_NNP a_DT wizard_NN would_MD
sometimes_RB get_VBP hold_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN '_POS s_PRP opossum_JJ rug_NN and_CC roast_NN it_PRP slowly_RB in_IN the_DT
fire_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP did_VBD so_RB the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT rug_NN would_MD fall_VB sick_JJ ._. If_IN the_DT
wizard_NN consented_VBD to_TO undo_VB the_DT charm_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD give_VB the_DT rug_NN back_RB to_TO
the_DT sick_JJ man_NN '_'' s_PRP friends_NNS ,_, bidding_VBG them_PRP put_VBD it_PRP in_IN water_NN ,_, "_'' so_RB as_IN to_TO wash_VB
the_DT fire_NN out_IN ."_NN When_WRB that_DT happened_VBD ,_, the_DT sufferer_NN would_MD feel_VB a_DT
refreshing_VBG coolness_NN and_CC probably_RB recover_VB ._. In_IN Tanna_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT New_NNP
Hebrides_NNP ,_, a_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD a_DT grudge_NN at_IN another_DT and_CC desired_VBD his_PRP$ death_NN
would_MD try_VB to_TO get_VB possession_NN of_IN a_DT cloth_NN which_WDT had_VBD touched_VBN the_DT sweat_NN
of_IN his_PRP$ enemy_NN '_'' s_PRP body_NN ._. If_IN he_PRP succeeded_VBD ,_, he_PRP rubbed_VBD the_DT cloth_NN carefully_RB
over_IN with_IN the_DT leaves_NNS and_CC twigs_NNS of_IN a_DT certain_JJ tree_NN ,_, rolled_VBN and_CC bound_VBN
cloth_NN ,_, twigs_NNS ,_, and_CC leaves_VBZ into_IN a_DT long_JJ sausage-shaped_JJ bundle_NN ,_, and_CC
burned_VBN it_PRP slowly_RB in_IN the_DT fire_NN ._. As_IN the_DT bundle_NN was_VBD consumed_VBN ,_, the_DT victim_NN
fell_VBD ill_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD reduced_VBN to_TO ashes_NNS ,_, he_PRP died_VBD ._. In_IN this_DT last_JJ
form_NN of_IN enchantment_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT magical_JJ sympathy_NN may_MD be_VB supposed_VBN
to_TO exist_VB not_RB so_RB much_RB between_IN the_DT man_NN and_CC the_DT cloth_NN as_IN between_IN the_DT
man_NN and_CC the_DT sweat_NN which_WDT issued_VBD from_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ._. But_CC in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS of_IN
the_DT same_JJ sort_NN it_PRP seems_VBZ that_IN the_DT garment_NN by_IN itself_PRP is_VBZ enough_RB to_TO give_VB
the_DT sorcerer_NN a_DT hold_NN upon_IN his_PRP$ victim_NN ._. The_DT witch_NN in_IN Theocritus_NNP ,_, while_IN
she_PRP melted_VBD an_DT image_NN or_CC lump_NN of_IN wax_NN in_IN order_NN that_IN her_PRP$ faithless_JJ lover_NN
might_MD melt_VB with_IN love_NN of_IN her_PRP ,_, did_VBD not_RB forget_VB to_TO throw_VB into_IN the_DT fire_NN a_DT
shred_VBN of_IN his_PRP$ cloak_NN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD dropped_VBN in_IN her_PRP$ house_NN ._. In_IN Prussia_NNP
they_PRP say_VBP that_IN if_IN you_PRP cannot_MD catch_VB a_DT thief_NN ,_, the_DT next_JJ best_JJS thing_NN you_PRP
can_MD do_VB is_VBZ to_TO get_VB hold_NN of_IN a_DT garment_NN which_WDT he_PRP may_MD have_VB shed_VBN in_IN his_PRP$
flight_NN ;_: for_IN if_IN you_PRP beat_VBP it_PRP soundly_RB ,_, the_DT thief_NN will_MD fall_VB sick_JJ ._. This_DT
belief_NN is_VBZ firmly_RB rooted_VBN in_IN the_DT popular_JJ mind_NN ._. Some_DT eighty_CD or_CC ninety_CD
years_NNS ago_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Berend_NNP ,_, a_DT man_NN was_VBD detected_VBN trying_VBG
to_TO steal_VB honey_NN ,_, and_CC fled_VBD ,_, leaving_VBG his_PRP$ coat_NN behind_IN him_PRP ._. When_WRB he_PRP heard_VBD
that_IN the_DT enraged_JJ owner_NN of_IN the_DT honey_NN was_VBD mauling_VBG his_PRP$ lost_JJ coat_NN ,_, he_PRP
was_VBD so_RB alarmed_VBN that_IN he_PRP took_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ bed_NN and_CC died_VBD ._.

Again_RB ,_, magic_NN may_MD be_VB wrought_VBN on_IN a_DT man_NN sympathetically_RB ,_, not_RB only_RB
through_IN his_PRP$ clothes_NNS and_CC severed_VBD parts_NNS of_IN himself_PRP ,_, but_CC also_RB through_IN
the_DT impressions_NNS left_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ body_NN in_IN sand_NN or_CC earth_NN ._. In_IN particular_JJ ,_, it_PRP
is_VBZ a_DT world-wide_JJ superstition_NN that_IN by_IN injuring_VBG footprints_NNS you_PRP injure_VBP
the_DT feet_NNS that_WDT made_VBD them_PRP ._. Thus_RB the_DT natives_NNS of_IN South-eastern_NNP Australia_NNP
think_VB that_IN they_PRP can_MD lame_VB a_DT man_NN by_IN placing_VBG sharp_JJ pieces_NNS of_IN quartz_NN ,_,
glass_NN ,_, bone_NN ,_, or_CC charcoal_NN in_IN his_PRP$ footprints_NNS ._. Rheumatic_NN pains_NNS are_VBP
often_RB attributed_VBN by_IN them_PRP to_TO this_DT cause_NN ._. Seeing_VBG a_DT Tatungolung_NNP man_NN
very_RB lame_JJ ,_, Mr_NNP ._. Howitt_NNP asked_VBD him_PRP what_WP was_VBD the_DT matter_NN ._. He_PRP said_VBD ,_, "_'' some_DT
fellow_NN has_VBZ put_VBN bottle_NN in_IN my_PRP$ foot_NN ."_IN He_PRP was_VBD suffering_VBG from_IN
rheumatism_NN ,_, but_CC believed_VBD that_IN an_DT enemy_NN had_VBD found_VBN his_PRP$ foot-track_NN and_CC
had_VBD buried_VBN it_PRP in_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN broken_JJ bottle_NN ,_, the_DT magical_JJ influence_NN of_IN
which_WDT had_VBD entered_VBN his_PRP$ foot_NN ._.

Similar_JJ practices_NNS prevail_VBP in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ._. Thus_RB in_IN
Mecklenburg_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN that_IN if_IN you_PRP drive_VBP a_DT nail_NN into_IN a_DT man_NN '_POS s_PRP
footprint_NN he_PRP will_MD fall_VB lame_NN ;_: sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ required_VBN that_IN the_DT nail_NN
should_MD be_VB taken_VBN from_IN a_DT coffin_NN ._. A_DT like_JJ mode_NN of_IN injuring_VBG an_DT enemy_NN is_VBZ
resorted_VBN to_TO in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN France_NNP ._. It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN there_EX was_VBD an_DT
old_JJ woman_NN who_WP used_VBD to_TO frequent_JJ Stow_NNP in_IN Suffolk_NNP ,_, and_CC she_PRP was_VBD a_DT witch_NN ._.
If_IN ,_, while_IN she_PRP walked_VBD ,_, any_DT one_NN went_VBD after_IN her_PRP and_CC stuck_VBD a_DT nail_NN or_CC a_DT
knife_NN into_IN her_PRP$ footprint_NN in_IN the_DT dust_NN ,_, the_DT dame_NN could_MD not_RB stir_VB a_DT step_NN
till_IN it_PRP was_VBD withdrawn_VBN ._. Among_IN the_DT South_NNP Slavs_NNP a_DT girl_NN will_MD dig_VB up_RP the_DT
earth_NN from_IN the_DT footprints_NNS of_IN the_DT man_NN she_PRP loves_VBZ and_CC put_VBD it_PRP in_IN a_DT
flower-pot_NN ._. Then_RB she_PRP plants_NNS in_IN the_DT pot_NN a_DT marigold_NN ,_, a_DT flower_NN that_WDT is_VBZ
thought_VBD to_TO be_VB fadeless_RB ._. And_CC as_IN its_PRP$ golden_JJ blossom_NN grows_VBZ and_CC blooms_VBG
and_CC never_RB fades_NNS ,_, so_RB shall_MD her_PRP sweetheart_NN '_'' s_PRP love_VBP grow_VB and_CC bloom_VB ,_, and_CC
never_RB ,_, never_RB fade_VBN ._. Thus_RB the_DT love-spell_JJ acts_NNS on_IN the_DT man_NN through_IN the_DT
earth_NN he_PRP trod_VBD on_IN ._. An_DT old_JJ Danish_JJ mode_NN of_IN concluding_VBG a_DT treaty_NN was_VBD
based_VBN on_IN the_DT same_JJ idea_NN of_IN the_DT sympathetic_JJ connexion_NN between_IN a_DT man_NN
and_CC his_PRP$ footprints_NNS :_: the_DT covenanting_NN parties_NNS sprinkled_VBD each_DT other_JJ '_POS s_PRP
footprints_NNS with_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ blood_NN ,_, thus_RB giving_VBG a_DT pledge_NN of_IN fidelity_NN ._.
In_IN ancient_JJ Greece_NNP superstitions_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN seem_VBP to_TO have_VB been_VBN
current_JJ ,_, for_IN it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN that_IN if_IN a_DT horse_NN stepped_VBD on_IN the_DT track_NN of_IN
a_DT wolf_NN he_PRP was_VBD seized_VBN with_IN numbness_NN ;_: and_CC a_DT maxim_NN ascribed_VBN to_TO
Pythagoras_NNS forbade_IN people_NNS to_TO pierce_VB a_DT man_NN '_POS s_VBZ footprints_NNS with_IN a_DT nail_NN
or_CC a_DT knife_NN ._.

The_DT same_JJ superstition_NN is_VBZ turned_VBN to_TO account_VB by_IN hunters_NNS in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS
of_IN the_DT world_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN running_VBG down_IN the_DT game_NN ._. Thus_RB a_DT German_JJ
huntsman_NN will_MD stick_VB a_DT nail_NN taken_VBN from_IN a_DT coffin_NN into_IN the_DT fresh_JJ spoor_NN
of_IN the_DT quarry_NN ,_, believing_VBG that_IN this_DT will_MD hinder_VB the_DT animal_NN from_IN
escaping_VBG ._. The_DT aborigines_NNS of_IN Victoria_NNP put_VBD hot_JJ embers_NNS in_IN the_DT tracks_NNS of_IN
the_DT animals_NNS they_PRP were_VBD pursuing_VBG ._. Hottentot_NNP hunters_NNS throw_VBP into_IN the_DT air_NN
a_DT handful_NN of_IN sand_NN taken_VBN from_IN the_DT footprints_NNS of_IN the_DT game_NN ,_, believing_VBG
that_IN this_DT will_MD bring_VB the_DT animal_NN down_RB ._. Thompson_NNP Indians_NNPS used_VBD to_TO lay_VB
charms_NNS on_IN the_DT tracks_NNS of_IN wounded_JJ deer_NNS ;_: after_IN that_IN they_PRP deemed_VBD it_PRP
superfluous_JJ to_TO pursue_VB the_DT animal_NN any_DT further_JJ that_DT day_NN ,_, for_IN being_VBG
thus_RB charmed_VBD it_PRP could_MD not_RB travel_VB far_RB and_CC would_MD soon_RB die_VB ._. Similarly_RB ,_,
Ojebway_NN Indians_NNPS placed_VBD "_`` medicine_NN "_'' on_IN the_DT track_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ deer_NN or_CC
bear_NN they_PRP met_VBD with_IN ,_, supposing_VBG that_IN this_DT would_MD soon_RB bring_VB the_DT animal_NN
into_IN sight_NN ,_, even_RB if_IN it_PRP were_VBD two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS '_POS journey_NN off_RB ;_: for_IN this_DT
charm_NN had_VBD power_NN to_TO compress_VB a_DT journey_NN of_IN several_JJ days_NNS into_IN a_DT few_JJ
hours_NNS ._. Ewe_NN hunters_NNS of_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP stab_NN the_DT footprints_NNS of_IN game_NN with_IN a_DT
sharp-pointed_JJ stick_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO maim_VB the_DT quarry_NN and_CC allow_VB them_PRP to_TO
come_VB up_RP with_IN it_PRP ._.

But_CC though_IN the_DT footprint_NN is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS obvious_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB the_DT only_RB
impression_NN made_VBN by_IN the_DT body_NN through_IN which_WDT magic_NN may_MD be_VB wrought_VBN on_IN a_DT
man_NN ._. The_DT aborigines_NNS of_IN South-eastern_JJ Australia_NNP believe_VBP that_IN a_DT man_NN
may_MD be_VB injured_VBN by_IN burying_VBG sharp_JJ fragments_NNS of_IN quartz_NN ,_, glass_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB
forth_RB in_IN the_DT mark_NN made_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ reclining_JJ body_NN ;_: the_DT magical_JJ virtue_NN of_IN
these_DT sharp_JJ things_NNS enters_VBZ his_PRP$ body_NN and_CC causes_VBZ those_DT acute_JJ pains_NNS
which_WDT the_DT ignorant_JJ European_JJ puts_NNS down_IN to_TO rheumatism_NN ._. We_PRP can_MD now_RB
understand_VB why_WRB it_PRP was_VBD a_DT maxim_NN with_IN the_DT Pythagoreans_NNS that_IN in_IN rising_VBG
from_IN bed_NN you_PRP should_MD smooth_VB away_RP the_DT impression_NN left_VBN by_IN your_PRP$ body_NN on_IN
the_DT bed-clothes_NNS ._. The_DT rule_NN was_VBD simply_RB an_DT old_JJ precaution_NN against_IN
magic_NN ,_, forming_VBG part_NN of_IN a_DT whole_JJ code_NN of_IN superstitious_JJ maxims_NNS which_WDT
antiquity_NN fathered_VBD on_IN Pythagoras_NNP ,_, though_IN doubtless_RB they_PRP were_VBD
familiar_JJ to_TO the_DT barbarous_JJ forefathers_NNS of_IN the_DT Greeks_NNS long_RB before_IN the_DT
time_NN of_IN that_DT philosopher_NN ._.



4._DT The_DT Magician_NNP '_POS s_PRP Progress_NN

WE_NNP have_VBP now_RB concluded_VBN our_PRP$ examination_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ principles_NNS of_IN
sympathetic_JJ magic_NN ._. The_DT examples_NNS by_IN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP illustrated_VBN them_PRP
have_VBP been_VBN drawn_VBN for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN from_IN what_WP may_MD be_VB called_VBN private_JJ
magic_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ from_IN magical_JJ rites_NNS and_CC incantations_NNS practised_VBD for_IN the_DT
benefit_NN or_CC the_DT injury_NN of_IN individuals_NNS ._. But_CC in_IN savage_JJ society_NN there_RB is_VBZ
commonly_RB to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN addition_NN what_WP we_PRP may_MD call_VB public_JJ magic_NN ,_, that_WDT
is_VBZ ,_, sorcery_NN practised_VBD for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ community_NN ._.
Wherever_IN ceremonies_NNS of_IN this_DT sort_NN are_VBP observed_VBN for_IN the_DT common_JJ good_NN ,_,
it_PRP is_VBZ obvious_JJ that_IN the_DT magician_NN ceases_NNS to_TO be_VB merely_RB a_DT private_JJ
practitioner_NN and_CC becomes_VBZ to_TO some_DT extent_NN a_DT public_JJ functionary_NN ._. The_DT
development_NN of_IN such_JJ a_DT class_NN of_IN functionaries_NNS is_VBZ of_IN great_JJ importance_NN
for_IN the_DT political_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT religious_JJ evolution_NN of_IN society_NN ._. For_IN
when_WRB the_DT welfare_NN of_IN the_DT tribe_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO depend_VB on_IN the_DT
performance_NN of_IN these_DT magical_JJ rites_NNS ,_, the_DT magician_NN rises_VBZ into_IN a_DT
position_NN of_IN much_JJ influence_NN and_CC repute_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD readily_RB acquire_VB the_DT
rank_NN and_CC authority_NN of_IN a_DT chief_JJ or_CC king_NN ._. The_DT profession_NN accordingly_RB
draws_VBZ into_IN its_PRP$ ranks_NNS some_DT of_IN the_DT ablest_JJS and_CC most_RBS ambitious_JJ men_NNS of_IN
the_DT tribe_NN ,_, because_IN it_PRP holds_VBZ out_RB to_TO them_PRP a_DT prospect_NN of_IN honour_NN ,_,
wealth_NN ,_, and_CC power_NN such_JJ as_IN hardly_RB any_DT other_JJ career_NN could_MD offer_VB ._. The_DT
acuter_NN minds_NNS perceive_VBP how_WRB easy_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO dupe_VB their_PRP$ weaker_JJR brother_NN
and_CC to_TO play_VB on_IN his_PRP$ superstition_NN for_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ advantage_NN ._. Not_RB that_IN
the_DT sorcerer_NN is_VBZ always_RB a_DT knave_NN and_CC impostor_NN ;_: he_PRP is_VBZ often_RB sincerely_RB
convinced_VBN that_IN he_PRP really_RB possesses_VBZ those_DT wonderful_JJ powers_NNS which_WDT the_DT
credulity_NN of_IN his_PRP$ fellows_NNS ascribes_NNS to_TO him_PRP ._. But_CC the_DT more_RBR sagacious_JJ he_PRP
is_VBZ ,_, the_DT more_RBR likely_JJ he_PRP is_VBZ to_TO see_VB through_IN the_DT fallacies_NNS which_WDT impose_VBP
on_IN duller_NN wits_NNS ._. Thus_RB the_DT ablest_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT profession_NN must_MD tend_VB
to_TO be_VB more_RBR or_CC less_RBR conscious_JJ deceivers_NNS ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ just_RB these_DT men_NNS who_WP
in_IN virtue_NN of_IN their_PRP$ superior_JJ ability_NN will_MD generally_RB come_VB to_TO the_DT top_NN
and_CC win_VB for_IN themselves_PRP positions_NNS of_IN the_DT highest_JJS dignity_NN and_CC the_DT most_RBS
commanding_JJ authority_NN ._. The_DT pitfalls_NNS which_WDT beset_JJ the_DT path_NN of_IN the_DT
professional_JJ sorcerer_NN are_VBP many_JJ ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT rule_NN only_RB the_DT man_NN of_IN
coolest_JJ head_NN and_CC sharpest_NN wit_NN will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO steer_VB his_PRP$ way_NN through_IN
them_PRP safely_RB ._. For_IN it_PRP must_MD always_RB be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN every_DT single_JJ
profession_NN and_CC claim_NN put_VBD forward_RB by_IN the_DT magician_NN as_IN such_JJ is_VBZ false_JJ ;_:
not_RB one_CD of_IN them_PRP can_MD be_VB maintained_VBN without_IN deception_NN ,_, conscious_JJ or_CC
unconscious_JJ ._. Accordingly_RB the_DT sorcerer_NN who_WP sincerely_RB believes_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$
own_JJ extravagant_JJ pretensions_NNS is_VBZ in_IN far_RB greater_JJR peril_NN and_CC is_VBZ much_RB more_RBR
likely_JJ to_TO be_VB cut_VBN short_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ career_NN than_IN the_DT deliberate_JJ impostor_NN ._.
The_DT honest_JJ wizard_NN always_RB expects_VBZ that_IN his_PRP$ charms_NNS and_CC incantations_NNS
will_MD produce_VB their_PRP$ supposed_JJ effect_NN ;_: and_CC when_WRB they_PRP fail_VBP ,_, not_RB only_RB
really_RB ,_, as_IN they_PRP always_RB do_VBP ,_, but_CC conspicuously_RB and_CC disastrously_RB ,_, as_IN
they_PRP often_RB do_VBP ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ taken_VBN aback_RB :_: he_PRP is_VBZ not_RB ,_, like_IN his_PRP$ knavish_NN
colleague_NN ,_, ready_JJ with_IN a_DT plausible_JJ excuse_NN to_TO account_VB for_IN the_DT failure_NN ,_,
and_CC before_IN he_PRP can_MD find_VB one_CD he_PRP may_MD be_VB knocked_VBN on_IN the_DT head_NN by_IN his_PRP$
disappointed_JJ and_CC angry_JJ employers_NNS ._.

The_DT general_JJ result_NN is_VBZ that_IN at_IN this_DT stage_NN of_IN social_JJ evolution_NN the_DT
supreme_JJ power_NN tends_VBZ to_TO fall_VB into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN men_NNS of_IN the_DT keenest_JJS
intelligence_NN and_CC the_DT most_RBS unscrupulous_JJ character_NN ._. If_IN we_PRP could_MD
balance_NN the_DT harm_NN they_PRP do_VBP by_IN their_PRP$ knavery_NN against_IN the_DT benefits_NNS they_PRP
confer_NN by_IN their_PRP$ superior_JJ sagacity_NN ,_, it_PRP might_MD well_RB be_VB found_VBN that_IN the_DT
good_JJ greatly_RB outweighed_JJ the_DT evil_NN ._. For_IN more_JJR mischief_NN has_VBZ probably_RB
been_VBN wrought_VBN in_IN the_DT world_NN by_IN honest_JJ fools_NNS in_IN high_JJ places_NNS than_IN by_IN
intelligent_JJ rascals_NNS ._. Once_RB your_PRP$ shrewd_JJ rogue_NN has_VBZ attained_VBN the_DT height_NN
of_IN his_PRP$ ambition_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ no_RB longer_RB any_DT selfish_JJ end_NN to_TO further_RBR ,_, he_PRP

beneficent_NN in_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, whether_IN the_DT power_NN they_PRP aimed_VBD at_IN and_CC won_VBN

Thus_RB ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT public_JJ profession_NN of_IN magic_JJ affected_VBN the_DT

affairs_NNS in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT ablest_JJ man_NN :_: it_PRP shifted_VBD the_DT balance_NN of_IN
power_NN from_IN the_DT many_JJ to_TO the_DT one_CD :_: it_PRP substituted_VBD a_DT monarchy_NN for_IN a_DT
democracy_NN ,_, or_CC rather_RB for_IN an_DT oligarchy_NN of_IN old_JJ men_NNS ;_: for_IN in_IN general_JJ the_DT
savage_JJ community_NN is_VBZ ruled_VBN ,_, not_RB by_IN the_DT whole_JJ body_NN of_IN adult_NN males_NNS ,_, but_CC

condition_NN of_IN the_DT emergence_NN of_IN mankind_NN from_IN savagery_JJ ._. No_DT human_NN being_VBG
is_VBZ so_RB hide-bound_JJ by_IN custom_NN and_CC tradition_NN as_IN your_PRP$ democratic_JJ savage_JJ ;_:
in_IN no_DT state_NN of_IN society_NN consequently_RB is_VBZ progress_NN so_RB slow_JJ and_CC
difficult_JJ ._. The_DT old_JJ notion_NN that_IN the_DT savage_JJ is_VBZ the_DT freest_NN of_IN mankind_NN
is_VBZ the_DT reverse_NN of_IN the_DT truth_NN ._. He_PRP is_VBZ a_DT slave_NN ,_, not_RB indeed_RB to_TO a_DT visible_JJ

haunt_VB his_PRP$ steps_NNS from_IN birth_NN to_TO death_NN ,_, and_CC rule_VB him_PRP with_IN a_DT rod_NN of_IN

dullest_JJS ,_, who_WP necessarily_RB sets_VBZ the_DT standard_NN ,_, since_IN he_PRP cannot_MD rise_VB ,_,

uniform_NN dead_JJ level_NN ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ humanly_RB possible_JJ to_TO reduce_VB the_DT

capacity_NN and_CC temper_NN ,_, to_TO a_DT false_JJ superficial_JJ appearance_NN of_IN equality_NN ._.
From_IN this_DT low_JJ and_CC stagnant_JJ condition_NN of_IN affairs_NNS ,_, which_WDT demagogues_VBG
and_CC dreamers_NNS in_IN later_JJ times_NNS have_VBP lauded_VBN as_IN the_DT ideal_JJ state_NN ,_, the_DT
Golden_NNP Age_NNP ,_, of_IN humanity_NN ,_, everything_NN that_WDT helps_VBZ to_TO raise_VB society_NN by_IN

authority_NN to_TO men_NNS '_POS s_PRP natural_JJ abilities_NNS ,_, deserves_VBZ to_TO be_VB welcomed_VBN by_IN all_PDT
who_WP have_VBP the_DT real_JJ good_NN of_IN their_PRP$ fellows_NNS at_IN heart_NN ._. Once_RB these_DT
elevating_JJ influences_NNS have_VBP begun_VBN to_TO operate_VB --_: and_CC they_PRP cannot_MD be_VB for_IN
ever_RB suppressed_VBN --_: the_DT progress_NN of_IN civilisation_NN becomes_VBZ comparatively_RB
rapid_JJ ._. The_DT rise_NN of_IN one_CD man_NN to_TO supreme_JJ power_NN enables_VBZ him_PRP to_TO carry_VB

Intellectual_NNP progress_NN ,_, which_WDT reveals_VBZ itself_PRP in_IN the_DT growth_NN of_IN art_NN and_CC

an_DT immense_JJ impulse_NN from_IN conquest_NN and_CC empire_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ no_DT mere_JJ accident_NN
that_IN the_DT most_RBS vehement_JJ outbursts_NNS of_IN activity_NN of_IN the_DT human_JJ mind_NN have_VBP

have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN under_IN despotic_JJ and_CC theocratic_JJ governments_NNS ,_, like_IN those_DT
of_IN Egypt_NNP ,_, Babylon_NNP ,_, and_CC Peru_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT supreme_JJ ruler_NN claimed_VBD and_CC

So_RB far_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT public_JJ profession_NN of_IN magic_NN has_VBZ been_VBN one_CD of_IN

has_VBZ contributed_VBN to_TO emancipate_VB mankind_NN from_IN the_DT thraldom_NN of_IN tradition_NN

outlook_NN on_IN the_DT world_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ no_DT small_JJ service_NN rendered_VBN to_TO humanity_NN ._.
And_CC when_WRB we_PRP remember_VBP further_JJ that_IN in_IN another_DT direction_NN magic_NN has_VBZ
paved_VBD the_DT way_NN for_IN science_NN ,_, we_PRP are_VBP forced_VBN to_TO admit_VB that_IN if_IN the_DT black_JJ
