that_IN if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT child_NN of_IN error_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ yet_RB been_VBN the_DT mother_NN of_IN
freedom_NN and_CC truth_NN ._.




IV_NNP ._. Magic_NNP and_CC Religion_NNP

THE_DT examples_NNS collected_VBD in_IN the_DT last_JJ chapter_NN may_MD suffice_VB to_TO illustrate_VB
the_DT general_JJ principles_NNS of_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN in_IN its_PRP$ two_CD branches_NNS ,_, to_TO
which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP given_VBN the_DT names_NNS of_IN Homoeopathic_NNP and_CC Contagious_NNP
respectively_RB ._. In_IN some_DT cases_NNS of_IN magic_NN which_WDT have_VBP come_VBN before_IN us_PRP we_VBP
have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN the_DT operation_NN of_IN spirits_NNS is_VBZ assumed_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN an_DT
attempt_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO win_VB their_PRP$ favour_NN by_IN prayer_NN and_CC sacrifice_VB ._. But_CC
these_DT cases_NNS are_VBP on_IN the_DT whole_JJ exceptional_JJ ;_: they_PRP exhibit_VBP magic_JJ tinged_VBN
and_CC alloyed_VBN with_IN religion_NN ._. Wherever_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN occurs_VBZ in_IN its_PRP$
pure_JJ unadulterated_JJ form_NN ,_, it_PRP assumes_VBZ that_IN in_IN nature_NN one_CD event_NN follows_VBZ
another_DT necessarily_RB and_CC invariably_RB without_IN the_DT intervention_NN of_IN any_DT
spiritual_JJ or_CC personal_JJ agency_NN ._. Thus_RB its_PRP$ fundamental_JJ conception_NN is_VBZ
identical_JJ with_IN that_DT of_IN modern_JJ science_NN ;_: underlying_VBG the_DT whole_JJ system_NN
is_VBZ a_DT faith_NN ,_, implicit_JJ but_CC real_JJ and_CC firm_JJ ,_, in_IN the_DT order_NN and_CC uniformity_NN
of_IN nature_NN ._. The_DT magician_NN does_VBZ not_RB doubt_VB that_IN the_DT same_JJ causes_NNS will_MD
always_RB produce_VBP the_DT same_JJ effects_NNS ,_, that_IN the_DT performance_NN of_IN the_DT proper_JJ
ceremony_NN ,_, accompanied_VBN by_IN the_DT appropriate_JJ spell_NN ,_, will_MD inevitably_RB be_VB
attended_VBN by_IN the_DT desired_VBN result_NN ,_, unless_IN ,_, indeed_RB ,_, his_PRP$ incantations_NNS
should_MD chance_VB to_TO be_VB thwarted_VBN and_CC foiled_VBN by_IN the_DT more_RBR potent_JJ charms_NNS of_IN
another_DT sorcerer_NN ._. He_PRP supplicates_VBZ no_DT higher_JJR power_NN :_: he_PRP sues_VBZ the_DT favour_NN
of_IN no_DT fickle_NN and_CC wayward_VBD being_VBG :_: he_PRP abases_VBZ himself_PRP before_IN no_DT awful_JJ
deity_NN ._. Yet_CC his_PRP$ power_NN ,_, great_JJ as_IN he_PRP believes_VBZ it_PRP to_TO be_VB ,_, is_VBZ by_IN no_DT means_NNS
arbitrary_JJ and_CC unlimited_JJ ._. He_PRP can_MD wield_VB it_PRP only_RB so_RB long_JJ as_IN he_PRP strictly_RB
conforms_NNS to_TO the_DT rules_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ art_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO what_WP may_MD be_VB called_VBN the_DT laws_NNS
of_IN nature_NN as_IN conceived_VBN by_IN him_PRP ._. To_TO neglect_VB these_DT rules_NNS ,_, to_TO break_VB
these_DT laws_NNS in_IN the_DT smallest_JJS particular_JJ ,_, is_VBZ to_TO incur_VB failure_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD
even_RB expose_VB the_DT unskilful_JJ practitioner_NN himself_PRP to_TO the_DT utmost_NN peril_NN ._.
If_IN he_PRP claims_VBZ a_DT sovereignty_NN over_IN nature_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT constitutional_JJ
sovereignty_NN rigorously_RB limited_VBD in_IN its_PRP$ scope_NN and_CC exercised_VBN in_IN exact_JJ
conformity_NN with_IN ancient_JJ usage_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT analogy_NN between_IN the_DT magical_JJ
and_CC the_DT scientific_JJ conceptions_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN is_VBZ close_RB ._. In_IN both_DT of_IN
them_PRP the_DT succession_NN of_IN events_NNS is_VBZ assumed_VBN to_TO be_VB perfectly_RB regular_JJ and_CC
certain_JJ ,_, being_VBG determined_VBN by_IN immutable_JJ laws_NNS ,_, the_DT operation_NN of_IN which_WDT
can_MD be_VB foreseen_VBN and_CC calculated_VBN precisely_RB ;_: the_DT elements_NNS of_IN caprice_NN ,_,
of_IN chance_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN accident_NN are_VBP banished_VBN from_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN nature_NN ._.
Both_DT of_IN them_PRP open_VB up_RP a_DT seemingly_RB boundless_JJ vista_NN of_IN possibilities_NNS to_TO
him_PRP who_WP knows_VBZ the_DT causes_NNS of_IN things_NNS and_CC can_MD touch_VB the_DT secret_JJ springs_NNS
that_WDT set_VBD in_IN motion_NN the_DT vast_JJ and_CC intricate_JJ mechanism_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
Hence_RB the_DT strong_JJ attraction_NN which_WDT magic_NN and_CC science_NN alike_RB have_VBP
exercised_VBN on_IN the_DT human_JJ mind_NN ;_: hence_RB the_DT powerful_JJ stimulus_NN that_IN both_DT
have_VBP given_VBN to_TO the_DT pursuit_NN of_IN knowledge_NN ._. They_PRP lure_NN the_DT weary_JJ
enquirer_NN ,_, the_DT footsore_NN seeker_NN ,_, on_IN through_IN the_DT wilderness_NN of_IN
disappointment_NN in_IN the_DT present_NN by_IN their_PRP$ endless_JJ promises_NNS of_IN the_DT
future_NN :_: they_PRP take_VBP him_PRP up_RP to_TO the_DT top_NN of_IN an_DT exceeding_VBG high_JJ mountain_NN
and_CC show_VB him_PRP ,_, beyond_IN the_DT dark_JJ clouds_NNS and_CC rolling_VBG mists_NNS at_IN his_PRP$ feet_NNS ,_,
a_DT vision_NN of_IN the_DT celestial_JJ city_NN ,_, far_RB off_RB ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB ,_, but_CC radiant_NN with_IN
unearthly_JJ splendour_NN ,_, bathed_VBN in_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN dreams_NNS ._.

The_DT fatal_JJ flaw_NN of_IN magic_NN lies_VBZ not_RB in_IN its_PRP$ general_JJ assumption_NN of_IN a_DT
sequence_NN of_IN events_NNS determined_VBN by_IN law_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN its_PRP$ total_JJ misconception_NN
of_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT particular_JJ laws_NNS which_WDT govern_VBP that_DT sequence_NN ._. If_IN
we_PRP analyse_NN the_DT various_JJ cases_NNS of_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN
passed_VBN in_IN review_NN in_IN the_DT preceding_VBG pages_NNS ,_, and_CC which_WDT may_MD be_VB taken_VBN as_IN
fair_JJ samples_NNS of_IN the_DT bulk_NN ,_, we_PRP shall_MD find_VB ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP already_RB
indicated_VBN ,_, that_IN they_PRP are_VBP all_DT mistaken_VBN applications_NNS of_IN one_CD or_CC other_JJ
of_IN two_CD great_JJ fundamental_JJ laws_NNS of_IN thought_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, the_DT association_NN of_IN
ideas_NNS by_IN similarity_NN and_CC the_DT association_NN of_IN ideas_NNS by_IN contiguity_NN in_IN
space_NN or_CC time_NN ._. A_DT mistaken_JJ association_NN of_IN similar_JJ ideas_NNS produces_VBZ
homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ magic_NN :_: a_DT mistaken_JJ association_NN of_IN
contiguous_JJ ideas_NNS produces_VBZ contagious_JJ magic_NN ._. The_DT principles_NNS of_IN
association_NN are_VBP excellent_JJ in_IN themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC indeed_RB absolutely_RB
essential_JJ to_TO the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT human_JJ mind_NN ._. Legitimately_'' applied_VBN
they_PRP yield_VBP science_NN ;_: illegitimately_RB applied_VBN they_PRP yield_VBP magic_NN ,_, the_DT
bastard_NN sister_NN of_IN science_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ therefore_RB a_DT truism_NN ,_, almost_RB a_DT
tautology_NN ,_, to_TO say_VB that_IN all_DT magic_NN is_VBZ necessarily_RB false_JJ and_CC barren_JJ ;_:
for_IN were_VBD it_PRP ever_RB to_TO become_VB true_JJ and_CC fruitful_JJ ,_, it_PRP would_MD no_RB longer_RB be_VB
magic_NN but_CC science_NN ._. From_IN the_DT earliest_JJS times_NNS man_NN has_VBZ been_VBN engaged_VBN in_IN a_DT
search_NN for_IN general_JJ rules_NNS whereby_WRB to_TO turn_VB the_DT order_NN of_IN natural_JJ
phenomena_NNS to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ advantage_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT long_JJ search_NN he_PRP has_VBZ
scraped_VBN together_RB a_DT great_JJ hoard_NN of_IN such_JJ maxims_NNS ,_, some_DT of_IN them_PRP golden_JJ
and_CC some_DT of_IN them_PRP mere_JJ dross_NN ._. The_DT true_JJ or_CC golden_JJ rules_NNS constitute_VBP the_DT
body_NN of_IN applied_JJ science_NN which_WDT we_PRP call_VB the_DT arts_NNS ;_: the_DT false_JJ are_VBP magic_JJ ._.

If_IN magic_NN is_VBZ thus_RB next_JJ of_IN kin_NN to_TO science_NN ,_, we_PRP have_VBP still_RB to_TO enquire_VB
how_WRB it_PRP stands_VBZ related_VBN to_TO religion_NN ._. But_CC the_DT view_NN we_PRP take_VBP of_IN that_WDT
relation_NN will_MD necessarily_RB be_VB coloured_VBN by_IN the_DT idea_NN which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP
formed_VBN of_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN religion_NN itself_PRP ;_: hence_RB a_DT writer_NN may_MD
reasonably_RB be_VB expected_VBN to_TO define_VB his_PRP$ conception_NN of_IN religion_NN before_IN
he_PRP proceeds_VBZ to_TO investigate_VB its_PRP$ relation_NN to_TO magic_NN ._. There_EX is_VBZ probably_RB
no_DT subject_NN in_IN the_DT world_NN about_IN which_WDT opinions_NNS differ_VBP so_RB much_RB as_IN the_DT
nature_NN of_IN religion_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO frame_VB a_DT definition_NN of_IN it_PRP which_WDT would_MD
satisfy_VB every_DT one_NN must_MD obviously_RB be_VB impossible_JJ ._. All_PDT that_IN a_DT writer_NN
can_MD do_VB is_VBZ ,_, first_RB ,_, to_TO say_VB clearly_RB what_WP he_PRP means_VBZ by_IN religion_NN ,_, and_CC
afterwards_RB to_TO employ_VB the_DT word_NN consistently_RB in_IN that_DT sense_NN throughout_IN
his_PRP$ work_NN ._. By_IN religion_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, I_PRP understand_VBP a_DT propitiation_NN or_CC
conciliation_NN of_IN powers_NNS superior_JJ to_TO man_NN which_WDT are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO direct_VB
and_CC control_VBP the_DT course_NN of_IN nature_NN and_CC of_IN human_JJ life_NN ._. Thus_RB defined_VBN ,_,
religion_NN consists_VBZ of_IN two_CD elements_NNS ,_, a_DT theoretical_JJ and_CC a_DT practical_JJ ,_,
namely_RB ,_, a_DT belief_NN in_IN powers_NNS higher_JJR than_IN man_NN and_CC an_DT attempt_NN to_TO
propitiate_NN or_CC please_VB them_PRP ._. Of_IN the_DT two_CD ,_, belief_NN clearly_RB comes_VBZ first_RB ,_,
since_IN we_PRP must_MD believe_VB in_IN the_DT existence_NN of_IN a_DT divine_JJ being_NN before_IN we_PRP
can_MD attempt_VB to_TO please_VB him_PRP ._. But_CC unless_IN the_DT belief_NN leads_VBZ to_TO a_DT
corresponding_JJ practice_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB a_DT religion_NN but_CC merely_RB a_DT theology_NN ;_:

where_WRB gypsies_NNS lodge_NN of_IN nights_NNS ,_, and_CC where_WRB toads_NNS squat_VB under_IN the_DT

Thus_RB cut_VBD adrift_NN from_IN his_PRP$ ancient_JJ moorings_NNS and_CC left_VBD to_TO toss_VB on_IN a_DT

quiet_JJ haven_NN after_IN a_DT tempestuous_JJ voyage_NN ,_, in_IN a_DT new_JJ system_NN of_IN faith_NN and_CC

The_DT reader_NN may_MD well_RB be_VB tempted_VBN to_TO ask_VB ,_, How_WRB was_VBD it_PRP that_IN intelligent_JJ

V_NNP ._. The_DT Magical_NNP Control_NNP of_IN the_DT Weather_NN



1._VBZ The_DT Public_NNP Magician_NNP

THE_DT READER_NNP may_MD remember_VB that_IN we_PRP were_VBD led_VBN to_TO plunge_VB into_IN the_DT
labyrinth_NN of_IN magic_NN by_IN a_DT consideration_NN of_IN two_CD different_JJ types_NNS of_IN
man-god_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ the_DT clue_NN which_WDT has_VBZ guided_VBN our_PRP$ devious_JJ steps_NNS through_IN
the_DT maze_NN ,_, and_CC brought_VBD us_PRP out_RP at_IN last_JJ on_IN higher_JJR ground_NN ,_, whence_NN ,_,
resting_VBG a_DT little_JJ by_IN the_DT way_NN ,_, we_PRP can_MD look_VB back_RB over_IN the_DT path_NN we_PRP have_VBP
already_RB traversed_VBN and_CC forward_RB to_TO the_DT longer_JJR and_CC steeper_JJR road_NN we_PRP have_VBP
still_RB to_TO climb_VB ._.

As_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ discussion_NN ,_, the_DT two_CD types_NNS of_IN human_NN gods_NNS
may_MD conveniently_RB be_VB distinguished_VBN as_IN the_DT religious_JJ and_CC the_DT magical_JJ
man-god_NN respectively_RB ._. In_IN the_DT former_JJ ,_, a_DT being_NN of_IN an_DT order_NN different_JJ
from_IN and_CC superior_JJ to_TO man_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO become_VB incarnate_JJ ,_, for_IN a_DT
longer_RB or_CC a_DT shorter_JJR time_NN ,_, in_IN a_DT human_JJ body_NN ,_, manifesting_VBG his_PRP$
super-human_JJ power_NN and_CC knowledge_NN by_IN miracles_NNS wrought_VBD and_CC prophecies_NNS
uttered_VBD through_IN the_DT medium_NN of_IN the_DT fleshly_JJ tabernacle_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ
deigned_VBN to_TO take_VB up_RP his_PRP$ abode_NN ._. This_DT may_MD also_RB appropriately_RB be_VB called_VBN
the_DT inspired_JJ or_CC incarnate_JJ type_NN of_IN man-god_NN ._. In_IN it_PRP the_DT human_JJ body_NN is_VBZ
merely_RB a_DT frail_JJ earthly_JJ vessel_NN filled_VBN with_IN a_DT divine_JJ and_CC immortal_JJ
spirit_NN ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, a_DT man-god_NN of_IN the_DT magical_JJ sort_NN is_VBZ nothing_NN
but_CC a_DT man_NN who_WP possesses_VBZ in_IN an_DT unusually_RB high_JJ degree_NN powers_NNS which_WDT
most_JJS of_IN his_PRP$ fellows_NNS arrogate_VBP to_TO themselves_PRP on_IN a_DT smaller_JJR scale_NN ;_: for_IN
in_IN rude_JJ society_NN there_RB is_VBZ hardly_RB a_DT person_NN who_WP does_VBZ not_RB dabble_VB in_IN
magic_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, whereas_IN a_DT man-god_NN of_IN the_DT former_JJ or_CC inspired_JJ type_NN
derives_VBZ his_PRP$ divinity_NN from_IN a_DT deity_NN who_WP has_VBZ stooped_VBN to_TO hide_VB his_PRP$
heavenly_RB radiance_NN behind_IN a_DT dull_JJ mask_NN of_IN earthly_JJ mould_NN ,_, a_DT man-god_NN of_IN
the_DT latter_JJ type_NN draws_VBZ his_PRP$ extraordinary_JJ power_NN from_IN a_DT certain_JJ
physical_JJ sympathy_NN with_IN nature_NN ._. He_PRP is_VBZ not_RB merely_RB the_DT receptacle_NN of_IN a_DT
divine_JJ spirit_NN ._. His_PRP$ whole_JJ being_NN ,_, body_NN and_CC soul_NN ,_, is_VBZ so_RB delicately_RB
attuned_VBN to_TO the_DT harmony_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN that_IN a_DT touch_NN of_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN or_CC a_DT
turn_NN of_IN his_PRP$ head_NN may_MD send_VB a_DT thrill_NN vibrating_VBG through_IN the_DT universal_JJ
framework_NN of_IN things_NNS ;_: and_CC conversely_RB his_PRP$ divine_JJ organism_NN is_VBZ acutely_RB
sensitive_JJ to_TO such_DT slight_JJ changes_NNS of_IN environment_NN as_RB would_MD leave_VB
ordinary_JJ mortals_NNS wholly_RB unaffected_JJ ._. But_CC the_DT line_NN between_IN these_DT two_CD
types_NNS of_IN man-god_NN ,_, however_RB sharply_RB we_PRP may_MD draw_VB it_PRP in_IN theory_NN ,_, is_VBZ
seldom_RB to_TO be_VB traced_VBN with_IN precision_NN in_IN practice_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN what_WP follows_VBZ
I_PRP shall_MD not_RB insist_VB on_IN it_PRP ._.

We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN in_IN practice_NN the_DT magic_JJ art_NN may_MD be_VB employed_VBN for_IN the_DT
benefit_NN either_DT of_IN individuals_NNS or_CC of_IN the_DT whole_JJ community_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN
according_VBG as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ directed_VBN to_TO one_CD or_CC other_JJ of_IN these_DT two_CD objects_NNS it_PRP
may_MD be_VB called_VBN private_JJ or_CC public_JJ magic_NN ._. Further_RB ,_, I_PRP pointed_VBD out_RP that_IN
the_DT public_JJ magician_NN occupies_VBZ a_DT position_NN of_IN great_JJ influence_NN ,_, from_IN
which_WDT ,_, if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ a_DT prudent_JJ and_CC able_JJ man_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD advance_VB step_VB by_IN step_NN
to_TO the_DT rank_NN of_IN a_DT chief_JJ or_CC king_NN ._. Thus_RB an_DT examination_NN of_IN public_NN magic_NN
conduces_VBZ to_TO an_DT understanding_NN of_IN the_DT early_JJ kingship_NN ,_, since_IN in_RB savage_JJ
and_CC barbarous_JJ society_NN many_JJ chiefs_NNS and_CC kings_NNS appear_VBP to_TO owe_VB their_PRP$
authority_NN in_IN great_JJ measure_NN to_TO their_PRP$ reputation_NN as_IN magicians_NNS ._.

Among_IN the_DT objects_NNS of_IN public_JJ utility_NN which_WDT magic_NN may_MD be_VB employed_VBN to_TO
secure_JJ ,_, the_DT most_JJS essential_JJ is_VBZ an_DT adequate_JJ supply_NN of_IN food_NN ._. The_DT
examples_NNS cited_VBD in_IN preceding_VBG pages_NNS prove_VBP that_IN the_DT purveyors_NNS of_IN
food_NN --_: the_DT hunter_NN ,_, the_DT fisher_NN ,_, the_DT farmer_NN --_: all_DT resort_NN to_TO magical_JJ
practices_NNS in_IN the_DT pursuit_NN of_IN their_PRP$ various_JJ callings_NNS ;_: but_CC they_PRP do_VBP so_RB
as_IN private_JJ individuals_NNS for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN themselves_PRP and_CC their_PRP$
families_NNS ,_, rather_RB than_IN as_IN public_JJ functionaries_NNS acting_VBG in_IN the_DT interest_NN
of_IN the_DT whole_JJ people_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ otherwise_RB when_WRB the_DT rites_NNS are_VBP performed_VBN ,_,
not_RB by_IN the_DT hunters_NNS ,_, the_DT fishers_NNS ,_, the_DT farmers_NNS themselves_PRP ,_, but_CC by_IN
professional_JJ magicians_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ behalf_NN ._. In_IN primitive_JJ society_NN ,_, where_WRB
uniformity_NN of_IN occupation_NN is_VBZ the_DT rule_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT distribution_NN of_IN the_DT
community_NN into_IN various_JJ classes_NNS of_IN workers_NNS has_VBZ hardly_RB begun_VBN ,_, every_DT
man_NN is_VBZ more_RBR or_CC less_RBR his_PRP$ own_JJ magician_NN ;_: he_PRP practises_VBZ charms_NNS and_CC
incantations_NNS for_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ good_JJ and_CC the_DT injury_NN of_IN his_PRP$ enemies_NNS ._. But_CC a_DT
great_JJ step_NN in_IN advance_NN has_VBZ been_VBN taken_VBN when_WRB a_DT special_JJ class_NN of_IN
magicians_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN instituted_VBN ;_: when_WRB ,_, in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, a_DT number_NN of_IN men_NNS
have_VBP been_VBN set_VBN apart_RB for_IN the_DT express_JJ purpose_NN of_IN benefiting_VBG the_DT whole_NN
community_NN by_IN their_PRP$ skill_NN ,_, whether_IN that_DT skill_NN be_VB directed_VBN to_TO the_DT
healing_NN of_IN diseases_NNS ,_, the_DT forecasting_NN of_IN the_DT future_NN ,_, the_DT regulation_NN
of_IN the_DT weather_NN ,_, or_CC any_DT other_JJ object_NN of_IN general_JJ utility_NN ._. The_DT
impotence_NN of_IN the_DT means_NNS adopted_VBN by_IN most_JJS of_IN these_DT practitioners_NNS to_TO
accomplish_VB their_PRP$ ends_NNS ought_MD not_RB to_TO blind_JJ us_PRP to_TO the_DT immense_NN
importance_NN of_IN the_DT institution_NN itself_PRP ._. Here_RB is_VBZ a_DT body_NN of_IN men_NNS
relieved_VBN ,_, at_IN least_JJS in_IN the_DT higher_JJR stages_NNS of_IN savagery_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT need_NN
of_IN earning_VBG their_PRP$ livelihood_NN by_IN hard_JJ manual_NN toil_NN ,_, and_CC allowed_VBD ,_, nay_RB ,_,
expected_VBN and_CC encouraged_VBN ,_, to_TO prosecute_VB researches_NNS into_IN the_DT secret_NN
ways_NNS of_IN nature_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD at_IN once_IN their_PRP$ duty_NN and_CC their_PRP$ interest_NN to_TO know_VB
more_RBR than_IN their_PRP$ fellows_NNS ,_, to_TO acquaint_VB themselves_PRP with_IN everything_NN that_WDT
could_MD aid_VB man_NN in_IN his_PRP$ arduous_JJ struggle_NN with_IN nature_NN ,_, everything_NN that_WDT
could_MD mitigate_VB his_PRP$ sufferings_NNS and_CC prolong_VB his_PRP$ life_NN ._. The_DT properties_NNS
of_IN drugs_NNS and_CC minerals_NNS ,_, the_DT causes_NNS of_IN rain_NN and_CC drought_NN ,_, of_IN thunder_NN
and_CC lightning_NN ,_, the_DT changes_NNS of_IN the_DT seasons_NNS ,_, the_DT phases_NNS of_IN the_DT moon_NN ,_,
the_DT daily_JJ and_CC yearly_JJ journeys_NNS of_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, the_DT motions_NNS of_IN the_DT stars_NNS ,_,
the_DT mystery_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT mystery_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, all_PDT these_DT things_NNS must_MD
have_VB excited_VBN the_DT wonder_NN of_IN these_DT early_JJ philosophers_NNS ,_, and_CC stimulated_VBN
them_PRP to_TO find_VB solutions_NNS of_IN problems_NNS that_WDT were_VBD doubtless_RB often_RB thrust_VBN
on_IN their_PRP$ attention_NN in_IN the_DT most_RBS practical_JJ form_NN by_IN the_DT importunate_JJ
demands_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ clients_NNS ,_, who_WP expected_VBD them_PRP not_RB merely_RB to_TO understand_VB
but_CC to_TO regulate_VB the_DT great_JJ processes_NNS of_IN nature_NN for_IN the_DT good_JJ of_IN man_NN ._.
That_IN their_PRP$ first_JJ shots_NNS fell_VBD very_RB far_RB wide_JJ of_IN the_DT mark_NN could_MD hardly_RB
be_VB helped_VBN ._. The_DT slow_JJ ,_, the_DT never-ending_NN approach_NN to_TO truth_NN consists_VBZ in_IN
perpetually_RB forming_VBG and_CC testing_VBG hypotheses_NNS ,_, accepting_VBG those_DT which_WDT at_IN
the_DT time_NN seem_VB to_TO fit_VB the_DT facts_NNS and_CC rejecting_VBG the_DT others_NNS ._. The_DT views_NNS
of_IN natural_JJ causation_NN embraced_VBN by_IN the_DT savage_JJ magician_NN no_DT doubt_NN appear_VB
to_TO us_PRP manifestly_RB false_JJ and_CC absurd_JJ ;_: yet_RB in_IN their_PRP$ day_NN they_PRP were_VBD
legitimate_JJ hypotheses_NNS ,_, though_IN they_PRP have_VBP not_RB stood_VBN the_DT test_NN of_IN
experience_NN ._. Ridicule_NNP and_CC blame_NN are_VBP the_DT just_RB meed_VBN ,_, not_RB of_IN those_DT who_WP
devised_VBN these_DT crude_JJ theories_NNS ,_, but_CC of_IN those_DT who_WP obstinately_RB adhered_VBN
to_TO them_PRP after_IN better_RB had_VBD been_VBN propounded_VBN ._. Certainly_RB no_DT men_NNS ever_RB had_VBN
stronger_JJR incentives_NNS in_IN the_DT pursuit_NN of_IN truth_NN than_IN these_DT savage_JJ
sorcerers_NNS ._. To_TO maintain_VB at_IN least_JJS a_DT show_NN of_IN knowledge_NN was_VBD absolutely_RB
necessary_JJ ;_: a_DT single_JJ mistake_NN detected_VBN might_MD cost_VB them_PRP their_PRP$ life_NN ._.
This_DT no_DT doubt_NN led_VBD them_PRP to_TO practise_VB imposture_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN
concealing_VBG their_PRP$ ignorance_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP also_RB supplied_VBD them_PRP with_IN the_DT most_RBS
powerful_JJ motive_NN for_IN substituting_VBG a_DT real_JJ for_IN a_DT sham_NN knowledge_NN ,_, since_RB ,_,
if_IN you_PRP would_MD appear_VB to_TO know_VB anything_NN ,_, by_IN far_RB the_DT best_JJS way_NN is_VBZ
actually_RB to_TO know_VB it_PRP ._. Thus_RB ,_, however_RB justly_RB we_PRP may_MD reject_VB the_DT
extravagant_JJ pretensions_NNS of_IN magicians_NNS and_CC condemn_VB the_DT deceptions_NNS
which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP practised_VBN on_IN mankind_NN ,_, the_DT original_JJ institution_NN of_IN
this_DT class_NN of_IN men_NNS has_VBZ ,_, take_VB it_PRP all_DT in_IN all_DT ,_, been_VBN productive_JJ of_IN
incalculable_JJ good_JJ to_TO humanity_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD the_DT direct_JJ predecessors_NNS ,_,
not_RB merely_RB of_IN our_PRP$ physicians_NNS and_CC surgeons_NNS ,_, but_CC of_IN our_PRP$ investigators_NNS
and_CC discoverers_NNS in_IN every_DT branch_NN of_IN natural_JJ science_NN ._. They_PRP began_VBD the_DT
work_NN which_WDT has_VBZ since_RB been_VBN carried_VBN to_TO such_JJ glorious_JJ and_CC beneficent_JJ
issues_NNS by_IN their_PRP$ successors_NNS in_IN after_IN ages_NNS ;_: and_CC if_IN the_DT beginning_NN was_VBD
poor_JJ and_CC feeble_JJ ,_, this_DT is_VBZ to_TO be_VB imputed_VBN to_TO the_DT inevitable_JJ
difficulties_NNS which_WDT beset_JJ the_DT path_NN of_IN knowledge_NN rather_RB than_IN to_TO the_DT
natural_JJ incapacity_NN or_CC wilful_JJ fraud_NN of_IN the_DT men_NNS themselves_PRP ._.



2._DT The_DT Magical_NNP Control_NNP of_IN Rain_NNP

OF_IN THE_DT THINGS_NNS which_WDT the_DT public_JJ magician_NN sets_VBZ himself_PRP to_TO do_VB for_IN the_DT
good_JJ of_IN the_DT tribe_NN ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT chief_NN is_VBZ to_TO control_VB the_DT weather_NN and_CC
especially_RB to_TO ensure_VB an_DT adequate_JJ fall_NN of_IN rain_NN ._. Water_NN is_VBZ an_DT essential_JJ
of_IN life_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN most_RBS countries_NNS the_DT supply_NN of_IN it_PRP depends_VBZ upon_IN
showers_NNS ._. Without_IN rain_NN vegetation_NN withers_NNS ,_, animals_NNS and_CC men_NNS languish_NN
and_CC die_VBP ._. Hence_RB in_IN savage_JJ communities_NNS the_DT rain-maker_NN is_VBZ a_DT very_RB
important_JJ personage_NN ;_: and_CC often_RB a_DT special_JJ class_NN of_IN magicians_NNS exists_VBZ
for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN regulating_VBG the_DT heavenly_JJ water-supply_NN ._. The_DT methods_NNS
by_IN which_WDT they_PRP attempt_VBP to_TO discharge_VB the_DT duties_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ office_NN are_VBP
commonly_RB ,_, though_IN not_RB always_RB ,_, based_VBN on_IN the_DT principle_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ
or_CC imitative_JJ magic_NN ._. If_IN they_PRP wish_VBP to_TO make_VB rain_NN they_PRP simulate_VBP it_PRP by_IN
sprinkling_NN water_NN or_CC mimicking_VBG clouds_NNS :_: if_IN their_PRP$ object_NN is_VBZ to_TO stop_VB
rain_NN and_CC cause_NN drought_NN ,_, they_PRP avoid_VBP water_NN and_CC resort_NN to_TO warmth_NN and_CC
fire_NN for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN drying_VBG up_RP the_DT too_RB abundant_JJ moisture_NN ._. Such_PDT
attempts_NNS are_VBP by_IN no_DT means_NNS confined_VBN ,_, as_IN the_DT cultivated_JJ reader_NN might_MD
imagine_VB ,_, to_TO the_DT naked_JJ inhabitants_NNS of_IN those_DT sultry_JJ lands_NNS like_IN Central_NN
Australia_NNP and_CC some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Eastern_NNP and_CC Southern_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, where_WRB often_RB
for_IN months_NNS together_RB the_DT pitiless_JJ sun_NN beats_VBZ down_RP out_IN of_IN a_DT blue_JJ and_CC
cloudless_JJ sky_NN on_IN the_DT parched_VBN and_CC gaping_VBG earth_NN ._. They_PRP are_VBP ,_, or_CC used_VBN to_TO
be_VB ,_, common_JJ enough_RB among_IN outwardly_RB civilised_JJ folk_NN in_IN the_DT moister_NN
climate_NN of_IN Europe_NNP ._. I_PRP will_MD now_RB illustrate_VB them_PRP by_IN instances_NNS drawn_VBN
from_IN the_DT practice_NN both_DT of_IN public_JJ and_CC private_JJ magic_NN ._.

Thus_RB ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, in_IN a_DT village_NN near_IN Dorpat_NNP ,_, in_IN Russia_NNP ,_, when_WRB rain_NN
was_VBD much_RB wanted_VBN ,_, three_CD men_NNS used_VBD to_TO climb_VB up_RP the_DT fir-trees_NNS of_IN an_DT old_JJ
sacred_JJ grove_NN ._. One_CD of_IN them_PRP drummed_VBN with_IN a_DT hammer_NN on_IN a_DT kettle_NN or_CC small_JJ
cask_NN to_TO imitate_VB thunder_NN ;_: the_DT second_JJ knocked_VBD two_CD fire-brands_NNS together_RB
and_CC made_VBD the_DT sparks_NNS fly_VBP ,_, to_TO imitate_VB lightning_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT third_JJ ,_, who_WP
was_VBD called_VBN "_`` the_DT rain-maker_NN ,"_NN had_VBD a_DT bunch_NN of_IN twigs_NNS with_IN which_WDT he_PRP
sprinkled_VBD water_NN from_IN a_DT vessel_NN on_IN all_DT sides_NNS ._. To_TO put_VB an_DT end_NN to_TO drought_NN
and_CC bring_VBP down_RP rain_NN ,_, women_NNS and_CC girls_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Ploska_NNP are_VBP
wont_NN to_TO go_VB naked_JJ by_IN night_NN to_TO the_DT boundaries_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC there_EX
pour_VBP water_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ._. In_IN Halmahera_NNP ,_, or_CC Gilolo_NNP ,_, a_DT large_JJ island_NN to_TO
the_DT west_NN of_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP ,_, a_DT wizard_NN makes_VBZ rain_NN by_IN dipping_VBG a_DT branch_NN of_IN a_DT
particular_JJ kind_NN of_IN tree_NN in_IN water_NN and_CC then_RB scattering_VBG the_DT moisture_NN
from_IN the_DT dripping_VBG bough_NN over_IN the_DT ground_NN ._. In_IN New_NNP Britain_NNP the_DT
rain-maker_NN wraps_VBZ some_DT leaves_NNS of_IN a_DT red_JJ and_CC green_JJ striped_JJ creeper_NN in_IN a_DT
banana-leaf_NN ,_, moistens_VBZ the_DT bundle_NN with_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC buries_NNS it_PRP in_IN the_DT
ground_NN ;_: then_RB he_PRP imitates_VBZ with_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN the_DT plashing_NN of_IN rain_NN ._.
Amongst_IN the_DT Omaha_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN North_NNP America_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT corn_NN is_VBZ
withering_IN for_IN want_NN of_IN rain_NN ,_, the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ Buffalo_NNP
Society_NNP fill_VBP a_DT large_JJ vessel_NN with_IN water_NN and_CC dance_VB four_CD times_NNS round_RB
it_PRP ._. One_CD of_IN them_PRP drinks_VBZ some_DT of_IN the_DT water_NN and_CC spirts_NNS it_PRP into_IN the_DT air_NN ,_,
making_VBG a_DT fine_JJ spray_NN in_IN imitation_NN of_IN a_DT mist_NN or_CC drizzling_NN rain_NN ._. Then_RB
he_PRP upsets_VBZ the_DT vessel_NN ,_, spilling_VBG the_DT water_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ;_: whereupon_WRB
the_DT dancers_NNS fall_VBP down_RB and_CC drink_VB up_RP the_DT water_NN ,_, getting_VBG mud_NN all_DT over_IN
their_PRP$ faces_NNS ._. Lastly_RB ,_, they_PRP squirt_VBP the_DT water_NN into_IN the_DT air_NN ,_, making_VBG a_DT
fine_JJ mist_NN ._. This_DT saves_VBZ the_DT corn_NN ._. In_IN spring-time_NN the_DT Natchez_NNP of_IN North_NNP
America_NNP used_VBD to_TO club_NN together_RB to_TO purchase_VB favourable_JJ weather_NN for_IN
their_PRP$ crops_NNS from_IN the_DT wizards_NNS ._. If_IN rain_NN was_VBD needed_VBN ,_, the_DT wizards_NNS fasted_VBN
and_CC danced_VBD with_IN pipes_NNS full_JJ of_IN water_NN in_IN their_PRP$ mouths_NNS ._. The_DT pipes_NNS were_VBD
perforated_VBN like_IN the_DT nozzle_NN of_IN a_DT watering-can_JJ ,_, and_CC through_IN the_DT holes_NNS
the_DT rain-maker_NN blew_VBD the_DT water_NN towards_IN that_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT sky_NN where_WRB the_DT
clouds_NNS hung_VBD heaviest_JJS ._. But_CC if_IN fine_JJ weather_NN was_VBD wanted_VBN ,_, he_PRP mounted_VBD the_DT
roof_NN of_IN his_PRP$ hut_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN extended_JJ arms_NNS ,_, blowing_VBG with_IN all_DT his_PRP$ might_NN ,_,
he_PRP beckoned_VBD to_TO the_DT clouds_NNS to_TO pass_VB by_IN ._. When_WRB the_DT rains_NNS do_VBP not_RB come_VB in_IN
due_JJ season_NN the_DT people_NNS of_IN Central_NNP Angoniland_NNP repair_NN to_TO what_WP is_VBZ called_VBN
the_DT rain-temple_NN ._. Here_RB they_PRP clear_VBP away_RB the_DT grass_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT leader_NN
pours_NNS beer_NN into_IN a_DT pot_NN which_WDT is_VBZ buried_VBN in_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, while_IN he_PRP says_VBZ ,_,
"_`` Master_NNP Chauta_NNP ,_, you_PRP have_VBP hardened_VBN your_PRP$ heart_NN towards_IN us_PRP ,_, what_WP
would_MD you_PRP have_VB us_PRP do_VB ?_. We_PRP must_MD perish_VB indeed_RB ._. Give_VB your_PRP$ children_NNS the_DT
rains_NNS ,_, there_EX is_VBZ the_DT beer_NN we_PRP have_VBP given_VBN you_PRP ."_RB Then_RB they_PRP all_DT partake_NN
of_IN the_DT beer_NN that_WDT is_VBZ left_VBN over_RP ,_, even_RB the_DT children_NNS being_VBG made_VBN to_TO sip_VB
it_PRP ._. Next_IN they_PRP take_VBP branches_NNS of_IN trees_NNS and_CC dance_NN and_CC sing_VBP for_IN rain_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP return_VBP to_TO the_DT village_NN they_PRP find_VBP a_DT vessel_NN of_IN water_NN set_VBN at_IN
the_DT doorway_NN by_IN an_DT old_JJ woman_NN ;_: so_RB they_PRP dip_VB their_PRP$ branches_NNS in_IN it_PRP and_CC
wave_NN them_PRP aloft_RB ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO scatter_VB the_DT drops_NNS ._. After_IN that_IN the_DT rain_NN is_VBZ
sure_JJ to_TO come_VB driving_VBG up_RP in_IN heavy_JJ clouds_NNS ._. In_IN these_DT practices_NNS we_PRP see_VBP a_DT
combination_NN of_IN religion_NN with_IN magic_NN ;_: for_IN while_IN the_DT scattering_NN of_IN the_DT
water-drops_NNS by_IN means_NNS of_IN branches_NNS is_VBZ a_DT purely_RB magical_JJ ceremony_NN ,_, the_DT
prayer_NN for_IN rain_NN and_CC the_DT offering_NN of_IN beer_NN are_VBP purely_RB religious_JJ rites_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT Mara_NNP tribe_NN of_IN Northern_NNP Australia_NNP the_DT rain-maker_NN goes_VBZ to_TO a_DT
pool_NN and_CC sings_NNS over_IN it_PRP his_PRP$ magic_JJ song_NN ._. Then_RB he_PRP takes_VBZ some_DT of_IN the_DT
water_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, drinks_NNS it_PRP ,_, and_CC spits_VBD it_PRP out_RP in_IN various_JJ
directions_NNS ._. After_IN that_WDT he_PRP throws_VBZ water_NN all_DT over_IN himself_PRP ,_, scatters_NNS it_PRP
about_RB ,_, and_CC returns_NNS quietly_RB to_TO the_DT camp_NN ._. Rain_NNP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO follow_VB ._.
The_DT Arab_JJ historian_NN Makrizi_NNP describes_VBZ a_DT method_NN of_IN stopping_VBG rain_NN which_WDT
is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN resorted_VBN to_TO by_IN a_DT tribe_NN of_IN nomads_NNS called_VBN Alqamar_NNP
in_IN Hadramaut_NNP ._. They_PRP cut_VBD a_DT branch_NN from_IN a_DT certain_JJ tree_NN in_IN the_DT desert_NN ,_,
set_VBN it_PRP on_IN fire_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB sprinkled_VBD the_DT burning_VBG brand_NN with_IN water_NN ._.
After_IN that_IN the_DT vehemence_NN of_IN the_DT rain_NN abated_VBD ,_, just_RB as_IN the_DT water_NN
vanished_VBN when_WRB it_PRP fell_VBD on_IN the_DT glowing_VBG brand_NN ._. Some_DT of_IN the_DT Eastern_NNP
Angamis_NNP of_IN Manipur_NNP are_VBP said_VBN to_TO perform_VB a_DT some-what_NN similar_JJ ceremony_NN
for_IN the_DT opposite_JJ purpose_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, to_TO produce_VB rain_NN ._. The_DT
head_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN puts_VBZ a_DT burning_VBG brand_NN on_IN the_DT grave_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP
has_VBZ died_VBN of_IN burns_NNS ,_, and_CC quenches_VBZ the_DT brand_NN with_IN water_NN ,_, while_IN he_PRP prays_RB
that_DT rain_NN may_MD fall_VB ._. Here_RB the_DT putting_VBG out_RP the_DT fire_NN with_IN water_NN ,_, which_WDT
is_VBZ an_DT imitation_NN of_IN rain_NN ,_, is_VBZ reinforced_VBN by_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ
man_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, having_VBG been_VBN burnt_VBG to_TO death_NN ,_, will_MD naturally_RB be_VB anxious_JJ for_IN
the_DT descent_NN of_IN rain_NN to_TO cool_VB his_PRP$ scorched_JJ body_NN and_CC assuage_VB his_PRP$ pangs_NNS ._.

Other_JJ people_NNS besides_IN the_DT Arabs_NNPS have_VBP used_VBN fire_NN as_IN a_DT means_NN of_IN stopping_VBG
rain_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT Sulka_NNP of_IN New_NNP Britain_NNP heat_NN stones_NNS red_JJ hot_JJ in_IN the_DT fire_NN
and_CC then_RB put_VBD them_PRP out_RP in_IN the_DT rain_NN ,_, or_CC they_PRP throw_VBP hot_JJ ashes_NNS in_IN the_DT
air_NN ._. They_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT rain_NN will_MD soon_RB cease_VB to_TO fall_VB ,_, for_IN it_PRP does_VBZ
not_RB like_IN to_TO be_VB burned_VBN by_IN the_DT hot_JJ stones_NNS or_CC ashes_NNS ._. The_DT Telugus_NNP send_VBP a_DT
little_JJ girl_NN out_IN naked_JJ into_IN the_DT rain_NN with_IN a_DT burning_VBG piece_NN of_IN wood_NN in_IN
her_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ to_TO show_VB to_TO the_DT rain_NN ._. That_DT is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO
stop_VB the_DT downpour_NN ._. At_IN Port_NNP Stevens_NNP in_IN New_NNP South_NNP Wales_NNP the_DT
medicine-men_NNS used_VBN to_TO drive_VB away_RB rain_VB by_IN throwing_VBG fire-sticks_NNS into_IN
the_DT air_NN ,_, while_IN at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN they_PRP puffed_VBD and_CC shouted_VBD ._. Any_DT man_NN of_IN
the_DT Anula_NNP tribe_NN in_IN Northern_NNP Australia_NNP can_MD stop_VB rain_NN by_IN simply_RB
warming_VBG a_DT green_JJ stick_NN in_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB striking_VBG it_PRP against_IN the_DT
wind_NN ._.

In_IN time_NN of_IN severe_JJ drought_NN the_DT Dieri_NNP of_IN Central_NNP Australia_NNP ,_, loudly_RB
lamenting_VBG the_DT impoverished_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN and_CC their_PRP$ own_JJ
half-starved_JJ condition_NN ,_, call_NN upon_IN the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ remote_NN
predecessors_NNS ,_, whom_WP they_PRP call_VBP Mura-muras_NNP ,_, to_TO grant_VB them_PRP power_NN to_TO make_VB
a_DT heavy_JJ rain-fall_NN ._. For_IN they_PRP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT clouds_NNS are_VBP bodies_NNS in_IN
which_WDT rain_NN is_VBZ generated_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ceremonies_NNS or_CC those_DT of_IN
neighbouring_VBG tribes_NNS ,_, through_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN the_DT Mura-muras_NNP ._. The_DT
way_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP set_VBP about_IN drawing_VBG rain_NN from_IN the_DT clouds_NNS is_VBZ this_DT ._. A_DT
hole_NN is_VBZ dug_VBN about_IN twelve_CD feet_NNS long_JJ and_CC eight_CD or_CC ten_CD broad_JJ ,_, and_CC over_IN
this_DT hole_NN a_DT conical_JJ hut_NN of_IN logs_NNS and_CC branches_NNS is_VBZ made_VBN ._. Two_CD wizards_NNS ,_,
supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB received_VBN a_DT special_JJ inspiration_NN from_IN the_DT Mura-muras_NNP ,_,
are_VBP bled_VBN by_IN an_DT old_JJ and_CC influential_JJ man_NN with_IN a_DT sharp_JJ flint_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT
blood_NN ,_, drawn_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ arms_NNS below_IN the_DT elbow_NN ,_, is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO flow_VB on_IN the_DT
other_JJ men_NNS of_IN the_DT tribe_NN ,_, who_WP sit_VBP huddled_VBN together_RB in_IN the_DT hut_NN ._. At_IN the_DT
same_JJ time_NN the_DT two_CD bleeding_VBG men_NNS throw_VBP handfuls_NNS of_IN down_IN about_RB ,_, some_DT of_IN
which_WDT adheres_VBZ to_TO the_DT blood-stained_JJ bodies_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ comrades_NNS ,_, while_IN
the_DT rest_NN floats_VBZ in_IN the_DT air_NN ._. The_DT blood_NN is_VBZ thought_VBN to_TO represent_VB the_DT
rain_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT down_RP the_DT clouds_NNS ._. During_IN the_DT ceremony_NN two_CD large_JJ stones_NNS
are_VBP placed_VBN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT hut_NN ;_: they_PRP stand_VBP for_IN gathering_VBG clouds_NNS
and_CC presage_NN rain_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT wizards_NNS who_WP were_VBD bled_VBN carry_NN away_RB the_DT two_CD
stones_NNS for_IN about_IN ten_CD or_CC fifteen_CD miles_NNS ,_, and_CC place_NN them_PRP as_RB high_JJ as_IN
they_PRP can_MD in_IN the_DT tallest_NN tree_NN ._. Meanwhile_RB the_DT other_JJ men_NNS gather_VBP gypsum_NN ,_,
pound_NN it_PRP fine_JJ ,_, and_CC throw_VB it_PRP into_IN a_DT water-hole_JJ ._. This_DT the_DT Mura-muras_NNP
see_VB ,_, and_CC at_IN once_RB they_PRP cause_VBP clouds_NNS to_TO appear_VB in_IN the_DT sky_NN ._. Lastly_RB ,_, the_DT
men_NNS ,_, young_JJ and_CC old_JJ ,_, surround_VB the_DT hut_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, stooping_VBG down_RB ,_, butt_NN at_IN it_PRP
with_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS ,_, like_IN so_RB many_JJ rams_NNS ._. Thus_RB they_PRP force_VBP their_PRP$ way_NN
through_IN it_PRP and_CC reappear_VB on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN ,_, repeating_VBG the_DT process_NN
till_IN the_DT hut_NN is_VBZ wrecked_JJ ._. In_IN doing_VBG this_DT they_PRP are_VBP forbidden_VBN to_TO use_VB
their_PRP$ hands_NNS or_CC arms_NNS ;_: but_CC when_WRB the_DT heavy_JJ logs_NNS alone_RB remain_VBP ,_, they_PRP are_VBP
allowed_VBN to_TO pull_VB them_PRP out_RP with_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ._. "_'' The_DT piercing_NN of_IN the_DT hut_NN
with_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS symbolises_NNS the_DT piercing_NN of_IN the_DT clouds_NNS ;_: the_DT fall_NN of_IN
the_DT hut_NN ,_, the_DT fall_NN of_IN the_DT rain_NN ."_NN Obviously_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, the_DT act_NN of_IN placing_VBG
high_JJ up_IN in_IN trees_NNS the_DT two_CD stones_NNS ,_, which_WDT stand_VBP for_IN clouds_NNS ,_, is_VBZ a_DT way_NN of_IN
making_VBG the_DT real_JJ clouds_NNS to_TO mount_VB up_RP in_IN the_DT sky_NN ._. The_DT Dieri_NNP also_RB

always_RB keeps_VBZ a_DT small_JJ stock_NN of_IN foreskins_NNS ready_JJ for_IN use_NN ._. They_PRP are_VBP

day_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP felt_VBD their_PRP$ wounds_NNS stiff_JJ and_CC sore_JJ ._. In_IN Java_NNP ,_, when_WRB rain_NN

blood_NN gushed_VBD out_RP ,_, may_MD have_VB acted_VBN on_IN the_DT same_JJ principle_NN ._.

There_EX is_VBZ a_DT widespread_JJ belief_NN that_IN twin_JJ children_NNS possess_VBP magical_JJ
powers_NNS over_IN nature_NN ,_, especially_RB over_IN rain_NN and_CC the_DT weather_NN ._. This_DT

meaning_NN of_IN these_DT restrictions_NNS is_VBZ generally_RB obscure_JJ ._. Thus_RB the_DT

the_DT twins_NNS ."_VBP Further_RB ,_, they_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT wishes_NNS of_IN twins_NNS are_VBP always_RB
fulfilled_VBN ;_: hence_RB twins_NNS are_VBP feared_VBN ,_, because_IN they_PRP can_MD harm_VB the_DT man_NN
they_PRP hate_VBP ._. They_PRP can_MD also_RB call_VB the_DT salmon_NN and_CC the_DT olachen_NN or_CC
candle-fish_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB they_PRP are_VBP known_VBN by_IN a_DT name_NN which_WDT means_VBZ "_`` making_VBG
plentiful_JJ ."_NN In_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Kwakiutl_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN British_NNPS

their_PRP$ childhood_NN they_PRP can_MD summon_VB any_DT wind_NN by_IN motions_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_,

The_DT same_JJ power_NN of_IN influencing_VBG the_DT weather_NN is_VBZ attributed_VBN to_TO twins_NNS by_IN

Some_DT of_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ facts_NNS strongly_RB support_VB an_DT interpretation_NN which_WDT

It_PRP is_VBZ interesting_JJ to_TO observe_VB that_IN where_WRB an_DT opposite_JJ result_NN is_VBZ
desired_VBN ,_, primitive_JJ logic_NN enjoins_VBZ the_DT weather-doctor_NN to_TO observe_VB

where_WRB the_DT rich_JJ vegetation_NN attests_VBZ the_DT abundance_NN of_IN the_DT rainfall_NN ,_,

to_TO a_DT weather-doctor_NN and_CC asks_VBZ him_PRP to_TO "_`` prop_VB up_RP the_DT clouds_NNS that_WDT may_MD be_VB
lowering_VBG ."_NN If_IN the_DT doctor_NN consents_NNS to_TO exert_VB his_PRP$ professional_JJ powers_NNS ,_,

he_PRP touch_VB water_NN ._. The_DT host_NN ,_, on_IN his_PRP$ side_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ servants_NNS ,_, both_DT male_NN

Grandmother_NNP Sroekoel_NNP "_'' (_-LRB- the_DT name_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB taken_VBN at_IN random_JJ ;_: others_NNS
are_VBP sometimes_RB used_VBN ),_JJ "_`` return_VB to_TO your_PRP$ country_NN ._. Akkemat_NN is_VBZ your_PRP$
country_NN ._. Put_VB down_RP your_PRP$ water-cask_NN ,_, close_VB it_PRP properly_RB ,_, that_IN not_RB a_DT

upwards_RB ,_, burning_VBG incense_NN the_DT while_NN ._. So_RB among_IN the_DT Toradjas_NNP the_DT

his_PRP$ professional_JJ duties_NNS ._. He_PRP does_VBZ not_RB bathe_VB ,_, he_PRP eats_VBZ with_IN unwashed_JJ
hands_NNS ,_, he_PRP drinks_VBZ nothing_NN but_CC palm_NN wine_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP has_VBZ to_TO cross_VB a_DT
stream_NN he_PRP is_VBZ careful_JJ not_RB to_TO step_VB in_IN the_DT water_NN ._. Having_VBG thus_RB prepared_VBN
himself_PRP for_IN his_PRP$ task_NN he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT small_JJ hut_NN built_VBN for_IN himself_PRP outside_IN of_IN
the_DT village_NN in_IN a_DT rice-field_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN this_DT hut_NN he_PRP keeps_VBZ up_RP a_DT little_JJ
fire_NN ,_, which_WDT on_IN no_DT account_NN may_MD be_VB suffered_VBN to_TO go_VB out_RP ._. In_IN the_DT fire_NN he_PRP
burns_NNS various_JJ kinds_NNS of_IN wood_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO possess_VB the_DT
property_NN of_IN driving_VBG off_RP rain_NN ;_: and_CC he_PRP puffs_VBZ in_IN the_DT direction_NN from_IN
which_WDT the_DT rain_NN threatens_VBZ to_TO come_VB ,_, holding_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN a_DT packet_NN of_IN
leaves_NNS and_CC bark_NN which_WDT derive_VBP a_DT similar_JJ cloud-compelling_JJ virtue_NN ,_, not_RB
from_IN their_PRP$ chemical_NN composition_NN ,_, but_CC from_IN their_PRP$ names_NNS ,_, which_WDT happen_VBP
to_TO signify_VB something_NN dry_JJ or_CC volatile_JJ ._. If_IN clouds_NNS should_MD appear_VB in_IN the_DT
sky_NN while_IN he_PRP is_VBZ at_IN work_NN ,_, he_PRP takes_VBZ lime_NN in_IN the_DT hollow_NN of_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN and_CC
blows_NNS it_PRP towards_IN them_PRP ._. The_DT lime_NN ,_, being_VBG so_RB very_RB dry_JJ ,_, is_VBZ obviously_RB
well_RB adapted_VBN to_TO disperse_VB the_DT damp_JJ clouds_NNS ._. Should_NNP rain_NN afterwards_RB be_VB
wanted_VBD ,_, he_PRP has_VBZ only_RB to_TO pour_VB water_NN on_IN his_PRP$ fire_NN ,_, and_CC immediately_RB the_DT
rain_NN will_MD descend_VB in_IN sheets_NNS ._.

The_DT reader_NN will_MD observe_VB how_WRB exactly_RB the_DT Javanese_JJ and_CC Toradja_NNP
observances_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP intended_VBN to_TO prevent_VB rain_NN ,_, form_VB the_DT antithesis_NN
of_IN the_DT Indian_NNP observances_NNS ,_, which_WDT aim_VBP at_IN producing_VBG it_PRP ._. The_DT Indian_NNP
sage_NN is_VBZ commanded_VBN to_TO touch_VB water_NN thrice_NN a_DT day_NN regularly_RB as_RB well_RB as_IN
on_IN various_JJ special_JJ occasions_NNS ;_: the_DT Javanese_JJ and_CC Toradja_NNP wizards_NNS may_MD
not_RB touch_VB it_PRP at_IN all_DT ._. The_DT Indian_NNP lives_VBZ out_RP in_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB
when_WRB it_PRP rains_VBZ he_PRP may_MD not_RB take_VB shelter_NN ;_: the_DT Javanese_JJ and_CC the_DT Toradja_NNP
sit_VB in_IN a_DT house_NN or_CC a_DT hut_NN ._. The_DT one_CD signifies_VBZ his_PRP$ sympathy_NN with_IN water_NN
by_IN receiving_VBG the_DT rain_NN on_IN his_PRP$ person_NN and_CC speaking_NN of_IN it_PRP respectfully_RB ;_:
the_DT others_NNS light_NN a_DT lamp_NN or_CC a_DT fire_NN and_CC do_VBP their_PRP$ best_JJS to_TO drive_VB the_DT
rain_NN away_RB ._. Yet_CC the_DT principle_NN on_IN which_WDT all_DT three_CD act_NN is_VBZ the_DT same_JJ ;_:
each_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, by_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN childish_JJ make-believe_NN ,_, identifies_VBZ himself_PRP
with_IN the_DT phenomenon_NN which_WDT he_PRP desires_VBZ to_TO produce_VB ._. It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT old_JJ
fallacy_NN that_IN the_DT effect_NN resembles_VBZ its_PRP$ cause_NN :_: if_IN you_PRP would_MD make_VB wet_JJ
weather_NN ,_, you_PRP must_MD be_VB wet_JJ ;_: if_IN you_PRP would_MD make_VB dry_JJ weather_NN ,_, you_PRP must_MD be_VB
dry_JJ ._.

In_IN South-eastern_NNP Europe_NNP at_IN the_DT present_JJ day_NN ceremonies_NNS are_VBP

same_JJ general_JJ train_NN of_IN thought_NN as_IN the_DT preceding_VBG ,_, but_CC even_RB in_IN their_PRP$

by_IN the_DT Baronga_NNP of_IN Delagoa_NNP Bay_NNP ._. Among_IN the_DT Greeks_NNP of_IN Thessaly_NNP and_CC

to_TO send_VB a_DT procession_NN of_IN children_NNS round_VBP to_TO all_PDT the_DT wells_NNS and_CC springs_NNS
of_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN ._. At_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT procession_NN walks_VBZ a_DT girl_NN
adorned_VBN with_IN flowers_NNS ,_, whom_WP her_PRP companions_NNS drench_NN with_IN water_NN at_IN
every_DT halting-place_NN ,_, while_IN they_PRP sing_VBP an_DT invocation_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT the_DT
following_VBG is_VBZ part_NN :_:


"_`` Perperia_NNPS all_DT fresh_JJ bedewed_NN ,_,
Freshen_NNP all_DT the_DT neighbourhood_NN ;_:
By_IN the_DT woods_NNS ,_, on_IN the_DT highway_NN ,_,
As_IN thou_DT goest_NN ,_, to_TO God_NNP now_RB pray_VB :_:
O_UH my_PRP$ God_NNP ,_, upon_IN the_DT plain_NN ,_,
Send_NNP thou_VBD us_PRP a_DT still_RB ,_, small_JJ rain_NN ;_:
That_IN the_DT fields_NNS may_MD fruitful_JJ be_VB ,_,
And_CC vines_NNS in_IN blossom_NN we_PRP may_MD see_VB ;_:
That_IN the_DT grain_NN be_VB full_JJ and_CC sound_JJ ,_,
And_CC wealthy_JJ grow_VBP the_DT folks_NNS around_IN ."_NNS


In_IN time_NN of_IN drought_NN the_DT Serbians_NNPS strip_VBP a_DT girl_NN to_TO her_PRP$ skin_NN and_CC clothe_NNS
her_PRP from_IN head_NN to_TO foot_NN in_IN grass_NN ,_, herbs_NNS ,_, and_CC flowers_NNS ,_, even_RB her_PRP$ face_NN

of_IN water_NN over_IN her_PRP ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT songs_NNS they_PRP sing_VBP runs_NNS thus_RB :_:


"_`` We_PRP go_VBP through_IN the_DT village_NN ;_:
The_DT clouds_NNS go_VB in_IN the_DT sky_NN ;_:
We_PRP go_VBP faster_RBR ,_,
Faster_NN go_VB the_DT clouds_NNS ;_:
They_PRP have_VBP overtaken_VBN us_PRP ,_,
And_CC wetted_VBD the_DT corn_NN and_CC the_DT vine_NN ."_.


At_IN Poona_NNP in_IN India_NNP ,_, when_WRB rain_NN is_VBZ needed_VBN ,_, the_DT boys_NNS dress_VBP up_RP one_CD of_IN
their_PRP$ number_NN in_IN nothing_NN but_CC leaves_NNS and_CC call_VB him_PRP King_NNP of_IN Rain_NNP ._. Then_RB
they_PRP go_VBP round_RB to_TO every_DT house_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT house-holder_NN
or_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN sprinkles_VBZ the_DT Rain_NNP King_NNP with_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC gives_VBZ the_DT party_NN
food_NN of_IN various_JJ kinds_NNS ._. When_WRB they_PRP have_VBP thus_RB visited_VBN all_PDT the_DT houses_NNS ,_,
they_PRP strip_VBP the_DT Rain_NNP King_NNP of_IN his_PRP$ leafy_JJ robes_NNS and_CC feast_NN upon_IN what_WP they_PRP
have_VBP gathered_VBN ._.

Bathing_NN is_VBZ practised_VBN as_IN a_DT rain-charm_NN in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Southern_NNP and_CC

his_PRP$ parishioners_NNS ._. Sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT women_NNS who_WP ,_, without_IN stripping_VBG
off_IN their_PRP$ clothes_NNS ,_, bathe_VB in_IN crowds_NNS on_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN St_NNP ._. John_NNP the_DT
Baptist_NNP ,_, while_IN they_PRP dip_VB in_IN the_DT water_NN a_DT figure_NN made_VBN of_IN branches_NNS ,_,
grass_NN ,_, and_CC herbs_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO represent_VB the_DT saint_NN ._. In_IN
Kursk_NNP ,_, a_DT province_NN of_IN Southern_JJ Russia_NNP ,_, when_WRB rain_NN is_VBZ much_RB wanted_VBN ,_, the_DT
women_NNS seize_VBP a_DT passing_VBG stranger_NN and_CC throw_VB him_PRP into_IN the_DT river_NN ,_, or_CC

stranger_NN is_VBZ often_RB taken_VBN for_IN a_DT deity_NN or_CC the_DT personification_NN of_IN some_DT
natural_JJ power_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ recorded_VBN in_IN official_JJ documents_NNS that_WDT during_IN a_DT

the_DT women_NNS and_CC compelled_VBD them_PRP to_TO bathe_VB ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN rain_NN might_MD
fall_NN ._. An_DT Armenian_JJ rain-charm_NN is_VBZ to_TO throw_VB the_DT wife_NN of_IN a_DT priest_NN into_IN
the_DT water_NN and_CC drench_VB her_PRP ._. The_DT Arabs_NNPS of_IN North_NNP Africa_NNP fling_VBG a_DT holy_JJ
man_NN ,_, willy-nilly_JJ ,_, into_IN a_DT spring_NN as_IN a_DT remedy_NN for_IN drought_NN ._. In_IN

villagers_NNS ,_, especially_RB the_DT young_JJ folk_NN ,_, go_VBP to_TO a_DT neighbouring_NN brook_NN and_CC
splash_NN each_DT other_JJ with_IN water_NN ,_, shouting_VBG noisily_RB ,_, or_CC squirt_NN water_NN on_IN
one_CD another_DT through_IN bamboo_NN tubes_NNS ._. Sometimes_RB they_PRP imitate_VBP the_DT plump_NN
of_IN rain_NN by_IN smacking_VBG the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN with_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, or_CC by_IN
placing_VBG an_DT inverted_JJ gourd_NN on_IN it_PRP and_CC drumming_VBG on_IN the_DT gourd_NN with_IN their_PRP$
fingers_NNS ._.

Women_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO make_VB rain_NN by_IN ploughing_NN ,_,
or_CC pretending_VBG to_TO plough_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT Pshaws_NNP and_CC Chewsurs_NNP of_IN the_DT
Caucasus_NNP have_VBP a_DT ceremony_NN called_VBN "_`` ploughing_VBG the_DT rain_NN ,"_, which_WDT they_PRP
observe_VB in_IN time_NN of_IN drought_NN ._. Girls_NNS yoke_VBD themselves_PRP to_TO a_DT plough_NN and_CC
drag_VB it_PRP into_IN a_DT river_NN ,_, wading_VBG in_IN the_DT water_NN up_IN to_TO their_PRP$ girdles_NNS ._. In_IN
the_DT same_JJ circumstances_NNS Armenian_JJ girls_NNS and_CC women_NNS do_VBP the_DT same_JJ ._. The_DT
oldest_JJS woman_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT priest_NN '_POS s_PRP wife_NN ,_, wears_VBZ the_DT priest_NN '_POS s_PRP dress_NN ,_, while_IN
the_DT others_NNS ,_, dressed_VBN as_IN men_NNS ,_, drag_VBP the_DT plough_NN through_IN the_DT water_NN
against_IN the_DT stream_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Caucasian_NNP province_NN of_IN Georgia_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT
drought_NN has_VBZ lasted_VBN long_RB ,_, marriageable_JJ girls_NNS are_VBP yoked_VBN in_IN couples_NNS

thus_RB harnessed_VBD they_PRP wade_VBD through_IN rivers_NNS ,_, puddles_NNS ,_, and_CC marshes_NNS ,_,
praying_VBG ,_, screaming_VBG ,_, weeping_VBG ,_, and_CC laughing_VBG ._. In_IN a_DT district_NN of_IN
Transylvania_NNP when_WRB the_DT ground_NN is_VBZ parched_VBN with_IN drought_NN ,_, some_DT girls_NNS
strip_NN themselves_PRP naked_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, led_VBN by_IN an_DT older_JJR woman_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ also_RB

brook_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP set_VBD it_PRP afloat_RB ._. Next_IN they_PRP sit_VB on_IN the_DT harrow_NN and_CC
keep_VB a_DT tiny_JJ flame_NN burning_VBG on_IN each_DT corner_NN of_IN it_PRP for_IN an_DT hour_NN ._. Then_RB
they_PRP leave_VBP the_DT harrow_NN in_IN the_DT water_NN and_CC go_VB home_NN ._. A_DT similar_JJ rain-charm_NN
is_VBZ resorted_VBN to_TO in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ;_: naked_JJ women_NNS drag_VBP a_DT plough_NN
across_IN a_DT field_NN by_IN night_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT men_NNS keep_VBP carefully_RB out_IN of_IN the_DT
way_NN ,_, for_IN their_PRP$ presence_NN would_MD break_VB the_DT spell_NN ._.

Sometimes_RB the_DT rain-charm_NN operates_VBZ through_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._. Thus_RB in_IN New_NNP
Caledonia_NNP the_DT rain-makers_NNS blackened_VBN themselves_PRP all_DT over_IN ,_, dug_VBN up_RP a_DT
dead_JJ body_NN ,_, took_VBD the_DT bones_NNS to_TO a_DT cave_NN ,_, jointed_VBD them_PRP ,_, and_CC hung_VBD the_DT
skeleton_NN over_IN some_DT taro_NN leaves_NNS ._. Water_NN was_VBD poured_VBN over_IN the_DT skeleton_NN
to_TO run_VB down_RP on_IN the_DT leaves_NNS ._. They_PRP believed_VBD that_IN the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT
deceased_JJ took_VBD up_RP the_DT water_NN ,_, converted_VBD it_PRP into_IN rain_NN ,_, and_CC showered_VBD it_PRP
down_RB again_RB ._. In_IN Russia_NNP ,_, if_IN common_JJ report_NN may_MD be_VB believed_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB
long_RB since_IN the_DT peasants_NNS of_IN any_DT district_NN that_WDT chanced_VBD to_TO be_VB afflicted_VBN
with_IN drought_NN used_VBN to_TO dig_VB up_RP the_DT corpse_NN of_IN some_DT one_NN who_WP had_VBD drunk_VBN
himself_PRP to_TO death_NN and_CC sink_VB it_PRP in_IN the_DT nearest_JJS swamp_NN or_CC lake_NN ,_, fully_RB
persuaded_VBN that_IN this_DT would_MD ensure_VB the_DT fall_NN of_IN the_DT needed_JJ rain_NN ._. In_IN
1868_CD the_DT prospect_NN of_IN a_DT bad_JJ harvest_NN ,_, caused_VBN by_IN a_DT prolonged_JJ drought_NN ,_,
induced_NN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN a_DT village_NN in_IN the_DT Tarashchansk_NNP district_NN to_TO
dig_VB up_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN a_DT Raskolnik_NNP ,_, or_CC Dissenter_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD died_VBN in_IN the_DT
preceding_VBG December_NNP ._. Some_DT of_IN the_DT party_NN beat_VBD the_DT corpse_NN ,_, or_CC what_WP was_VBD
left_VBN of_IN it_PRP ,_, about_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, exclaiming_VBG ,_, "_'' Give_VB us_PRP rain_VB !"_RB while_IN others_NNS
poured_VBD water_NN on_IN it_PRP through_IN a_DT sieve_NN ._. Here_RB the_DT pouring_VBG of_IN water_NN
through_IN a_DT sieve_NN seems_VBZ plainly_RB an_DT imitation_NN of_IN a_DT shower_NN ,_, and_CC reminds_VBZ
us_PRP of_IN the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT Strepsiades_NNP in_IN Aristophanes_NNP imagined_VBD that_IN
rain_NN was_VBD made_VBN by_IN Zeus_NNP ._. Sometimes_RB ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO procure_VB rain_NN ,_, the_DT
Toradjas_NNP make_VBP an_DT appeal_NN to_TO the_DT pity_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._. Thus_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT
village_NN of_IN Kalingooa_NNP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ the_DT grave_NN of_IN a_DT famous_JJ chief_NN ,_, the_DT
grandfather_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ ruler_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT land_NN suffers_NNS from_IN
unseasonable_JJ drought_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS go_VBP to_TO this_DT grave_NN ,_, pour_VBP water_NN on_IN it_PRP ,_,
and_CC say_VBP ,_, "_`` O_UH grandfather_NN ,_, have_VBP pity_NN on_IN us_PRP ;_: if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ your_PRP$ will_NN that_WDT
this_DT year_NN we_PRP should_MD eat_VB ,_, then_RB give_VB rain_NN ."_NN After_IN that_IN they_PRP hang_VBP a_DT
bamboo_NN full_JJ of_IN water_NN over_IN the_DT grave_NN ;_: there_EX is_VBZ a_DT small_JJ hole_NN in_IN the_DT
lower_JJR end_NN of_IN the_DT bamboo_NN ,_, so_RB that_IN the_DT water_NN drips_NNS from_IN it_PRP
continually_RB ._. The_DT bamboo_NN is_VBZ always_RB refilled_VBN with_IN water_NN until_IN rain_NN
drenches_NNS the_DT ground_NN ._. Here_RB ,_, as_IN in_IN New_NNP Caledonia_NNP ,_, we_PRP find_VBP religion_NN
blent_JJ with_IN magic_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT prayer_NN to_TO the_DT dead_JJ chief_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ purely_RB
religious_JJ ,_, is_VBZ eked_VBN out_RP with_IN a_DT magical_JJ imitation_NN of_IN rain_NN at_IN his_PRP$
grave_NN ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN the_DT Baronga_NNP of_IN Delagoa_NNP Bay_NNP drench_NN the_DT tombs_NNS
of_IN their_PRP$ ancestors_NNS ,_, especially_RB the_DT tombs_NNS of_IN twins_NNS ,_, as_IN a_DT raincharm_NN ._.
Among_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Indian_NNP tribes_NNS in_IN the_DT region_NN of_IN the_DT Orinoco_NNP it_PRP was_VBD
customary_JJ for_IN the_DT relations_NNS of_IN a_DT deceased_JJ person_NN to_TO disinter_VB his_PRP$
bones_NNS a_DT year_NN after_IN burial_NN ,_, burn_VBP them_PRP ,_, and_CC scatter_NN the_DT ashes_NNS to_TO the_DT
winds_NNS ,_, because_IN they_PRP believed_VBD that_IN the_DT ashes_NNS were_VBD changed_VBN into_IN rain_NN ,_,
which_WDT the_DT dead_JJ man_NN sent_VBD in_IN return_NN for_IN his_PRP$ obsequies_NNS ._. The_DT Chinese_NNPS are_VBP
convinced_VBN that_IN when_WRB human_JJ bodies_NNS remain_VB unburied_JJ ,_, the_DT souls_NNS of_IN their_PRP$
late_JJ owners_NNS feel_VBP the_DT discomfort_NN of_IN rain_NN ,_, just_RB as_IN living_VBG men_NNS would_MD do_VB
if_IN they_PRP were_VBD exposed_VBN without_IN shelter_NN to_TO the_DT inclemency_NN of_IN the_DT
weather_NN ._. These_DT wretched_JJ souls_NNS ,_, therefore_RB ,_, do_VBP all_DT in_IN their_PRP$ power_NN to_TO
prevent_VBP the_DT rain_NN from_IN falling_VBG ,_, and_CC often_RB their_PRP$ efforts_NNS are_VBP only_RB too_RB
successful_JJ ._. Then_RB drought_NN ensues_VBZ ,_, the_DT most_JJS dreaded_VBN of_IN all_DT calamities_NNS
in_IN China_NNP ,_, because_IN bad_JJ harvests_NNS ,_, dearth_NN ,_, and_CC famine_NN follow_VBP in_IN its_PRP$
train_NN ._. Hence_RB it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT common_JJ practice_NN of_IN the_DT Chinese_NNPS
authorities_NNS in_IN time_NN of_IN drought_NN to_TO inter_VB the_DT dry_JJ bones_NNS of_IN the_DT
unburied_JJ dead_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN putting_VBG an_DT end_NN to_TO the_DT scourge_NN and_CC
conjuring_VBG down_IN the_DT rain_NN ._.

Animals_NNS ,_, again_RB ,_, often_RB play_VBP an_DT important_JJ part_NN in_IN these_DT
weather-charms_NNS ._. The_DT Anula_NNP tribe_NN of_IN Northern_NNP Australia_NNP associate_VB the_DT
dollar-bird_NN with_IN rain_NN ,_, and_CC call_VB it_PRP the_DT rain-bird_NN ._. A_DT man_NN who_WP has_VBZ the_DT
bird_NN for_IN his_PRP$ totem_NN can_MD make_VB rain_NN at_IN a_DT certain_JJ pool_NN ._. He_PRP catches_VBZ a_DT
snake_NN ,_, puts_VBZ it_PRP alive_JJ into_IN the_DT pool_NN ,_, and_CC after_IN holding_VBG it_PRP under_IN water_NN
for_IN a_DT time_NN takes_VBZ it_PRP out_RP ,_, kills_VBZ it_PRP ,_, and_CC lays_VBD it_PRP down_RP by_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN
the_DT creek_NN ._. Then_RB he_PRP makes_VBZ an_DT arched_JJ bundle_NN of_IN grass_NN stalks_NNS in_IN
imitation_NN of_IN a_DT rainbow_NN ,_, and_CC sets_VBZ it_PRP up_RP over_IN the_DT snake_NN ._. After_IN that_WDT
all_DT he_PRP does_VBZ is_VBZ to_TO sing_VB over_RP the_DT snake_NN and_CC the_DT mimic_JJ rainbow_NN ;_: sooner_RB
or_CC later_RB the_DT rain_NN will_MD fall_VB ._. They_PRP explain_VBP this_DT procedure_NN by_IN saying_VBG
that_DT long_RB ago_RB the_DT dollar-bird_NN had_VBD as_IN a_DT mate_NN at_IN this_DT spot_NN a_DT snake_NN ,_,
who_WP lived_VBD in_IN the_DT pool_NN and_CC used_VBD to_TO make_VB rain_NN by_IN spitting_VBG up_RP into_IN the_DT
sky_NN till_IN a_DT rainbow_NN and_CC clouds_NNS appeared_VBD and_CC rain_NN fell_VBD ._. A_DT common_JJ way_NN
of_IN making_VBG rain_NN in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Java_NNP is_VBZ to_TO bathe_VB a_DT cat_NN or_CC two_CD cats_NNS ,_,
a_DT male_NN and_CC a_DT female_NN ;_: sometimes_RB the_DT animals_NNS are_VBP carried_VBN in_IN procession_NN
with_IN music_NN ._. Even_RB in_IN Batavia_NNP you_PRP may_MD from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN see_VB children_NNS
going_VBG about_RB with_IN a_DT cat_NN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ;_: when_WRB they_PRP have_VBP ducked_VBN it_PRP in_IN
a_DT pool_NN ,_, they_PRP let_VBP it_PRP go_VB ._.

Among_IN the_DT Wambugwe_NNP of_IN East_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT sorcerer_NN desires_VBZ to_TO make_VB
rain_NN ,_, he_PRP takes_VBZ a_DT black_JJ sheep_NN and_CC a_DT black_JJ calf_NN in_IN bright_JJ sunshine_NN ,_,

people_NNS live_VBP together_RB ._. Then_RB he_PRP slits_VBZ the_DT stomachs_NNS of_IN the_DT animals_NNS and_CC
scatters_NNS their_PRP$ contents_NNS in_IN all_DT directions_NNS ._. After_IN that_WDT he_PRP pours_VBZ water_NN
and_CC medicine_NN into_IN a_DT vessel_NN ;_: if_IN the_DT charm_NN has_VBZ succeeded_VBN ,_, the_DT water_NN

a_DT black_JJ ox_NN ._. In_IN a_DT district_NN of_IN Sumatra_NNP ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO procure_VB rain_NN ,_, all_PDT

The_DT intimate_JJ association_NN of_IN frogs_NNS and_CC toads_NNS with_IN water_NN has_VBZ earned_VBN

"_`` Send_NNP soon_RB ,_, O_UH frog_NN ,_, the_DT jewel_NN of_IN water_NN !_.
And_CC ripen_VB the_DT wheat_NN and_CC millet_NN in_IN the_DT field_NN ."_.


The_DT Kapus_NNP or_CC Reddis_NNP are_VBP a_DT large_JJ caste_NN of_IN cultivators_NNS and_CC landowners_NNS

Sometimes_RB ,_, when_WRB a_DT drought_NN has_VBZ lasted_VBN a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, people_NNS drop_VBP the_DT

at_IN the_DT main_JJ ._. In_IN a_DT Japanese_JJ village_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT guardian_NN divinity_NN had_VBD

The_DT Chinese_NNPS are_VBP adepts_NNS in_IN the_DT art_NN of_IN taking_VBG the_DT kingdom_NN of_IN heaven_NN by_IN

The_DT reader_NN may_MD smile_VB at_IN the_DT meteorology_NN of_IN the_DT Far_NNP East_NNP ;_: but_CC
precisely_RB similar_JJ modes_NNS of_IN procuring_VBG rain_NN have_VBP been_VBN resorted_VBN to_TO in_IN

had_VBD lasted_VBN six_CD months_NNS ._. Every_DT day_NN the_DT sun_NN rose_VBD and_CC set_VBD in_IN a_DT sky_NN of_IN

approved_VBN methods_NNS of_IN procuring_VBG rain_NN had_VBD been_VBN tried_VBN without_IN effect_NN ._.

churches_NNS ._. Palm_NNP branches_NNS ,_, blessed_JJ on_IN Palm_NNP Sunday_NNP ,_, had_VBD been_VBN hung_VBN on_IN
the_DT trees_NNS ._. At_IN Solaparuta_NNP ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN a_DT very_RB old_JJ custom_NN ,_, the_DT

At_IN Nicosia_NNP the_DT inhabitants_NNS ,_, bare-headed_JJ and_CC bare-foot_JJ ,_, carried_VBD the_DT

would_MD not_RB help_VB ._. Masses_NNP ,_, vespers_NNS ,_, concerts_NNS ,_, illuminations_NNS ,_,
fire-works_NNS --_: nothing_NN could_MD move_VB him_PRP ._. At_IN last_JJ the_DT peasants_NNS began_VBD to_TO
lose_VB patience_NN ._. Most_JJS of_IN the_DT saints_NNS were_VBD banished_VBN ._. At_IN Palermo_NNP they_PRP

himself_PRP ,_, and_CC they_PRP swore_VBD to_TO leave_VB him_PRP there_RB in_IN the_DT sun_NN till_IN rain_NN
fell_VBD ._. Other_JJ saints_NNS were_VBD turned_VBN ,_, like_IN naughty_JJ children_NNS ,_, with_IN their_PRP$

Sometimes_RB an_DT appeal_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO the_DT pity_NN of_IN the_DT gods_NNS ._. When_WRB their_PRP$ corn_NN
is_VBZ being_VBG burnt_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, the_DT Zulus_NNP look_NN out_IN for_IN a_DT "_`` heaven_NN

wailing_VBG a_DT funeral_NN wail_NN ."_NN In_IN Zululand_NNP women_NNS sometimes_RB bury_VBP their_PRP$

"_`` the_DT lord_NN above_IN "_`` and_CC ask_VB him_PRP to_TO send_VB rain_NN ._. If_IN it_PRP comes_VBZ they_PRP declare_VBP
that_IN "_`` Usondo_NNP rains_VBZ ."_RP In_IN times_NNS of_IN drought_NN the_DT Guanches_NNPS of_IN Teneriffe_NNP

of_IN the_DT god_NN ._. In_IN Kumaon_NNP a_DT way_NN of_IN stopping_VBG rain_NN is_VBZ to_TO pour_VB hot_JJ oil_NN in_IN
the_DT left_JJ ear_NN of_IN a_DT dog_NN ._. The_DT animal_NN howls_VBZ with_IN pain_NN ,_, his_PRP$ howls_NNS are_VBP

you_PRP again_RB ,_, but_CC there_RB shall_MD you_PRP die_VB ."_RB Also_RB they_PRP string_NN some_DT

will_MD not_RB take_VB you_PRP back_RB to_TO the_DT water_NN ."_NN Then_RB the_DT snails_NNS go_VB and_CC weep_VB ,_,
and_CC the_DT gods_NNS take_VBP pity_NN and_CC send_VB rain_NN ._. However_RB ,_, the_DT foregoing_NN
ceremonies_NNS are_VBP religious_JJ rather_RB than_IN magical_JJ ,_, since_IN they_PRP involve_VBP an_DT
appeal_NN to_TO the_DT compassion_NN of_IN higher_JJR powers_NNS ._.

Stones_NNS are_VBP often_RB supposed_VBN to_TO possess_VB the_DT property_NN of_IN bringing_VBG on_IN
rain_NN ,_, provided_VBD they_PRP be_VB dipped_VBN in_IN water_NN or_CC sprinkled_VBD with_IN it_PRP ,_, or_CC
treated_VBN in_IN some_DT other_JJ appropriate_JJ manner_NN ._. In_IN a_DT Samoan_NNP village_NN a_DT
certain_JJ stone_NN was_VBD carefully_RB housed_VBN as_IN the_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT
rain-making_JJ god_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN time_NN of_IN drought_NN his_PRP$ priests_NNS carried_VBD the_DT
stone_NN in_IN procession_NN and_CC dipped_VBD it_PRP in_IN a_DT stream_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Ta-ta_NNP -_: thi_NN
tribe_NN of_IN New_NNP South_NNP Wales_NNP ,_, the_DT rain-maker_NN breaks_VBZ off_RP a_DT piece_NN of_IN
quartz-crystal_JJ and_CC spits_NNS it_PRP towards_IN the_DT sky_NN ;_: the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT crystal_NN
he_PRP wraps_VBZ in_IN emu_VBG feathers_NNS ,_, soaks_NNS both_CC crystal_NN and_CC feathers_NNS in_IN water_NN ,_,
and_CC carefully_RB hides_NNS them_PRP ._. In_IN the_DT Keramin_NNP tribe_NN of_IN New_NNP South_NNP Wales_NNP
the_DT wizard_NN retires_VBZ to_TO the_DT bed_NN of_IN a_DT creek_NN ,_, drops_VBZ water_NN on_IN a_DT round_NN
flat_JJ stone_NN ,_, then_RB covers_VBZ up_RB and_CC conceals_VBZ it_PRP ._. Among_IN some_DT tribes_NNS of_IN
North-western_NNP Australia_NNP the_DT rain-maker_NN repairs_NNS to_TO a_DT piece_NN of_IN ground_NN
which_WDT is_VBZ set_VBN apart_RB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN rain-making_NN ._. There_EX he_PRP builds_VBZ a_DT
heap_NN of_IN stones_NNS or_CC sand_NN ,_, places_NNS on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN it_PRP his_PRP$ magic_JJ stone_NN ,_, and_CC
walks_VBZ or_CC dances_VBZ round_IN the_DT pile_NN chanting_VBG his_PRP$ incantations_NNS for_IN hours_NNS ,_,
till_IN sheer_JJ exhaustion_NN obliges_NNS him_PRP to_TO desist_VB ,_, when_WRB his_PRP$ place_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN
by_IN his_PRP$ assistant_NN ._. Water_NN is_VBZ sprinkled_VBN on_IN the_DT stone_NN and_CC huge_JJ fires_NNS are_VBP
kindled_VBN ._. No_DT layman_NN may_MD approach_VB the_DT sacred_JJ spot_NN while_IN the_DT mystic_JJ
ceremony_NN is_VBZ being_VBG performed_VBN ._. When_WRB the_DT Sulka_NNP of_IN New_NNP Britain_NNP wish_NN to_TO
procure_JJ rain_NN they_PRP blacken_JJ stones_NNS with_IN the_DT ashes_NNS of_IN certain_JJ fruits_NNS
and_CC set_VBD them_PRP out_RP ,_, along_IN with_IN certain_JJ other_JJ plants_NNS and_CC buds_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT
sun_NN ._. Then_RB a_DT handful_NN of_IN twigs_NNS is_VBZ dipped_VBN in_IN water_NN and_CC weighted_VBN with_IN
stones_NNS ,_, while_IN a_DT spell_NN is_VBZ chanted_VBN ._. After_IN that_DT rain_NN should_MD follow_VB ._. In_IN
Manipur_NNP ,_, on_IN a_DT lofty_JJ hill_NN to_TO the_DT east_JJ of_IN the_DT capital_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT
stone_NN which_WDT the_DT popular_JJ imagination_NN likens_VBZ to_TO an_DT umbrella_NN ._. When_WRB rain_NN
is_VBZ wanted_VBN ,_, the_DT rajah_NN fetches_NNS water_NN from_IN a_DT spring_NN below_IN and_CC sprinkles_NNS
it_PRP on_IN the_DT stone_NN ._. At_IN Sagami_NNP in_IN Japan_NNP there_EX is_VBZ a_DT stone_NN which_WDT draws_VBZ
down_IN rain_NN whenever_WRB water_NN is_VBZ poured_VBN on_IN it_PRP ._. When_WRB the_DT Wakondyo_NNP ,_, a_DT tribe_NN
of_IN Central_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, desire_NN rain_NN ,_, they_PRP send_VBP to_TO the_DT Wawamba_NNP ,_, who_WP dwell_VBP
at_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN snowy_JJ mountains_NNS ,_, and_CC are_VBP the_DT happy_JJ possessors_NNS of_IN a_DT
"_`` rain-stone_NN ."_'' In_IN consideration_NN of_IN a_DT proper_JJ payment_NN ,_, the_DT Wawamba_NNP wash_NN
the_DT precious_JJ stone_NN ,_, anoint_IN it_PRP with_IN oil_NN ,_, and_CC put_VBD it_PRP in_IN a_DT pot_NN full_JJ of_IN
water_NN ._. After_IN that_IN the_DT rain_NN cannot_MD fail_VB to_TO come_VB ._. In_IN the_DT arid_NN wastes_NNS
of_IN Arizona_NNP and_CC New_NNP Mexico_NNP the_DT Apaches_NNPS sought_VBD to_TO make_VB rain_NN by_IN

would_MD soon_RB gather_VB ,_, and_CC that_IN rain_NN would_MD begin_VB to_TO fall_VB ._.

But_CC customs_NNS of_IN this_DT sort_NN are_VBP not_RB confined_VBN to_TO the_DT wilds_NNS of_IN Africa_NNP and_CC
Asia_NNP or_CC the_DT torrid_JJ deserts_NNS of_IN Australia_NNP and_CC the_DT New_NNP World_NNP ._. They_PRP have_VBP
been_VBN practised_VBN in_IN the_DT cool_JJ air_NN and_CC under_IN the_DT grey_JJ skies_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT fountain_NN called_VBN Barenton_NNP ,_, of_IN romantic_JJ fame_NN ,_, in_IN those_DT
"_`` wild_JJ woods_NNS of_IN Broceliande_NNP ,"_, where_WRB ,_, if_IN legend_NN be_VB true_JJ ,_, the_DT wizard_NN

the_DT Breton_NNP peasants_NNS used_VBD to_TO resort_VB when_WRB they_PRP needed_VBD rain_NN ._. They_PRP
caught_VBN some_DT of_IN the_DT water_NN in_IN a_DT tankard_NN and_CC threw_VBD it_PRP on_IN a_DT slab_NN near_IN
the_DT spring_NN ._. On_IN Snowdon_NNP there_EX is_VBZ a_DT lonely_JJ tarn_NN called_VBD Dulyn_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT

that_IN you_PRP do_VBP not_RB get_VB rain_NN before_IN night_NN ,_, even_RB when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ hot_JJ weather_NN ."_.
In_IN these_DT cases_NNS it_PRP appears_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN ,_, as_IN in_IN Samoa_NNP ,_, the_DT stone_NN is_VBZ
regarded_VBN as_IN more_RBR or_CC less_RBR divine_JJ ._. This_DT appears_VBZ from_IN the_DT custom_NN

procure_JJ rain_NN ,_, for_IN this_DT is_VBZ plainly_RB a_DT Christian_NNP substitute_NN for_IN the_DT old_JJ

the_DT old_JJ priory_NN of_IN Commagny_NNP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT spring_NN of_IN St_NNP ._. Gervais_NNP ,_,
whither_NN the_DT inhabitants_NNS go_VBP in_IN procession_NN to_TO obtain_VB rain_NN or_CC fine_NN

drought_NN they_PRP throw_VBP into_IN the_DT basin_NN of_IN the_DT fountain_NN an_DT ancient_JJ stone_NN
image_NN of_IN the_DT saint_NN that_IN stands_NNS in_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN niche_NN from_IN which_WDT the_DT
fountain_NN flows_NNS ._. At_IN Collobri_NNP �_NNP res_NNS and_CC Carpentras_NNS a_DT similar_JJ practice_NN
was_VBD observed_VBN with_IN the_DT images_NNS of_IN St_NNP ._. Pons_NNP and_CC St_NNP ._. Gens_NNP respectively_RB ._.
In_IN several_JJ villages_NNS of_IN Navarre_NNP prayers_NNS for_IN rain_NN used_VBN to_TO be_VB offered_VBN
to_TO St_NNP ._. Peter_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN way_NN of_IN enforcing_VBG them_PRP the_DT villagers_NNS carried_VBD the_DT

was_VBD sure_JJ to_TO fall_VB within_IN twenty-four_CD hours_NNS ._. Catholic_NNP countries_NNS do_VBP not_RB

however_RB it_PRP may_MD be_VB disguised_VBN under_IN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN a_DT punishment_NN or_CC
a_DT threat_NN ._.

Like_IN other_JJ peoples_NNS ,_, the_DT Greeks_NNP and_CC Romans_NNP sought_VBD to_TO obtain_VB rain_NN by_IN
magic_NN ,_, when_WRB prayers_NNS and_CC processions_NNS had_VBD proved_VBN ineffectual_JJ ._. For_IN

spring_NN on_IN Mount_NNP Lycaeus_NNP ._. Thus_RB troubled_VBN ,_, the_DT water_NN sent_VBD up_RP a_DT misty_NN
cloud_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT rain_NN soon_RB fell_VBD upon_IN the_DT land_NN ._. A_DT similar_JJ mode_NN of_IN
making_VBG rain_NN is_VBZ still_RB practised_JJ ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, in_IN Halmahera_NNP near_IN
New_NNP Guinea_NNP ._. The_DT people_NNS of_IN Crannon_NNP in_IN Thessaly_NNP had_VBD a_DT bronze_NN chariot_NN
which_WDT they_PRP kept_VBD in_IN a_DT temple_NN ._. When_WRB they_PRP desired_VBD a_DT shower_NN they_PRP shook_VBD
the_DT chariot_NN and_CC the_DT shower_NN fell_VBD ._. Probably_RB the_DT rattling_NN of_IN the_DT
chariot_NN was_VBD meant_VBN to_TO imitate_VB thunder_NN ;_: we_PRP have_VBP already_RB seen_VBN that_IN mock_JJ
thunder_NN and_CC lightning_NN form_NN part_NN of_IN a_DT rain-charm_NN in_IN Russia_NNP and_CC Japan_NNP ._.
The_DT legendary_JJ Salmoneus_NNP ,_, King_NNP of_IN Elis_NNP ,_, made_VBD mock_JJ thunder_NN by_IN dragging_VBG
bronze_JJ kettles_NNS behind_IN his_PRP$ chariot_NN ,_, or_CC by_IN driving_VBG over_IN a_DT bronze_NN
bridge_NN ,_, while_IN he_PRP hurled_VBD blazing_VBG torches_NNS in_IN imitation_NN of_IN lightning_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD his_PRP$ impious_JJ wish_NN to_TO mimic_VB the_DT thundering_VBG car_NN of_IN Zeus_NNP as_IN it_PRP
rolled_VBN across_IN the_DT vault_NN of_IN heaven_NN ._. Indeed_RB he_PRP declared_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD
actually_RB Zeus_NNP ,_, and_CC caused_VBD sacrifices_NNS to_TO be_VB offered_VBN to_TO himself_PRP as_IN
such_JJ ._. Near_IN a_DT temple_NN of_IN Mars_NNP ,_, outside_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN Rome_NNP ,_, there_EX was_VBD
