drought_NN the_DT stone_NN was_VBD dragged_VBN into_IN Rome_NNP ,_, and_CC this_DT was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO
bring_VB down_RP rain_NN immediately_RB ._.



3._DT The_DT Magical_NNP Control_NNP of_IN the_DT Sun_NNP

AS_IN THE_DT MAGICIAN_NNP thinks_VBZ he_PRP can_MD make_VB rain_NN ,_, so_IN he_PRP fancies_VBZ he_PRP can_MD cause_VB
the_DT sun_NN to_TO shine_VB ,_, and_CC can_MD hasten_VB or_CC stay_VB its_PRP$ going_VBG down_RP ._. At_IN an_DT
eclipse_VB the_DT Ojebways_NNS used_VBN to_TO imagine_VB that_IN the_DT sun_NN was_VBD being_VBG
extinguished_JJ ._. So_IN they_PRP shot_VBD fire-tipped_VBN arrows_NNS in_IN the_DT air_NN ,_, hoping_VBG
thus_RB to_TO rekindle_VB his_PRP$ expiring_VBG light_NN ._. The_DT Sencis_NNP of_IN Peru_NNP also_RB shot_NN
burning_VBG arrows_NNS at_IN the_DT sun_NN during_IN an_DT eclipse_NN ,_, but_CC apparently_RB they_PRP did_VBD
this_DT not_RB so_RB much_JJ to_TO relight_VB his_PRP$ lamp_NN as_IN to_TO drive_VB away_RB a_DT savage_JJ beast_NN
with_IN which_WDT they_PRP supposed_VBD him_PRP to_TO be_VB struggling_VBG ._. Conversely_NNP during_IN an_DT
eclipse_NN of_IN the_DT moon_NN some_DT tribes_NNS of_IN the_DT Orinoco_NNP used_VBD to_TO bury_VB lighted_VBN
brands_NNS in_IN the_DT ground_NN ;_: because_IN ,_, said_VBD they_PRP ,_, if_IN the_DT moon_NN were_VBD to_TO be_VB
extinguished_JJ ,_, all_DT fire_NN on_IN earth_NN would_MD be_VB extinguished_VBN with_IN her_PRP ,_,
except_IN such_JJ as_IN was_VBD hidden_VBN from_IN her_PRP$ sight_NN ._. During_IN an_DT eclipse_NN of_IN the_DT
sun_NN the_DT Kamtchatkans_NNPS were_VBD wont_JJ to_TO bring_VB out_RP fire_NN from_IN their_PRP$ huts_NNS and_CC
pray_VB the_DT great_JJ luminary_JJ to_TO shine_VB as_RB before_RB ._. But_CC the_DT prayer_NN addressed_VBN
to_TO the_DT sun_NN shows_VBZ that_IN this_DT ceremony_NN was_VBD religious_JJ rather_RB than_IN
magical_JJ ._. Purely_NNP magical_JJ ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, was_VBD the_DT ceremony_NN
observed_VBN on_IN similar_JJ occasions_NNS by_IN the_DT Chilcotin_NNP Indians_NNPS ._. Men_NNP and_CC
women_NNS tucked_VBD up_RP their_PRP$ robes_NNS ,_, as_IN they_PRP do_VBP in_IN travelling_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB
leaning_VBG on_IN staves_NNS ,_, as_IN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD heavy_JJ laden_JJ ,_, they_PRP continued_VBD to_TO
walk_NN in_IN a_DT circle_NN till_IN the_DT eclipse_NN was_VBD over_IN ._. Apparently_RB they_PRP thought_VBD
thus_RB to_TO support_VB the_DT failing_VBG steps_NNS of_IN the_DT sun_NN as_IN he_PRP trod_VBD his_PRP$ weary_JJ
round_NN in_IN the_DT sky_NN ._. Similarly_RB in_IN ancient_JJ Egypt_NNP the_DT king_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT
representative_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, walked_VBD solemnly_RB round_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN a_DT
temple_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO ensure_VB that_IN the_DT sun_NN should_MD perform_VB his_PRP$ daily_JJ
journey_NN round_RB the_DT sky_NN without_IN the_DT interruption_NN of_IN an_DT eclipse_NN or_CC
other_JJ mishap_NN ._. And_CC after_IN the_DT autumnal_NN equinox_NN the_DT ancient_JJ Egyptians_NNS
held_VBN a_DT festival_NN called_VBN "_`` the_DT nativity_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN '_POS s_PRP walking-stick_NN ,"_CC
because_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT luminary_JJ declined_VBD daily_RB in_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ light_NN
and_CC heat_NN diminished_VBN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO need_VB a_DT staff_NN on_IN which_WDT to_TO
lean_JJ ._. In_IN New_NNP Caledonia_NNP when_WRB a_DT wizard_NN desires_VBZ to_TO make_VB sunshine_NN ,_, he_PRP
takes_VBZ some_DT plants_NNS and_CC corals_NNS to_TO the_DT burial-ground_NN ,_, and_CC fashions_NNS them_PRP
into_IN a_DT bundle_NN ,_, adding_VBG two_CD locks_NNS of_IN hair_NN cut_VBN from_IN a_DT living_VBG child_NN of_IN
his_PRP$ family_NN ,_, also_RB two_CD teeth_NNS or_CC an_DT entire_JJ jawbone_NN from_IN the_DT skeleton_NN of_IN
an_DT ancestor_NN ._. He_PRP then_RB climbs_VBZ a_DT mountain_NN whose_WP$ top_NN catches_VBZ the_DT first_JJ
rays_NNS of_IN the_DT morning_NN sun_NN ._. Here_RB he_PRP deposits_VBZ three_CD sorts_NNS of_IN plants_NNS on_IN a_DT
flat_JJ stone_NN ,_, places_VBZ a_DT branch_NN of_IN dry_JJ coral_JJ beside_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC hangs_VBZ the_DT
bundle_NN of_IN charms_NNS over_IN the_DT stone_NN ._. Next_JJ morning_NN he_PRP returns_VBZ to_TO the_DT spot_NN
and_CC sets_VBZ fire_NN to_TO the_DT bundle_NN at_IN the_DT moment_NN when_WRB the_DT sun_NN rises_VBZ from_IN
the_DT sea_NN ._. As_IN the_DT smoke_NN curls_VBD up_RB ,_, he_PRP rubs_VBZ the_DT stone_NN with_IN the_DT dry_JJ
coral_JJ ,_, invokes_VBZ his_PRP$ ancestors_NNS and_CC says_VBZ :_: "_`` Sun_NNP !_. I_PRP do_VBP this_DT that_IN you_PRP may_MD
be_VB burning_VBG hot_JJ ,_, and_CC eat_VB up_RP all_DT the_DT clouds_NNS in_IN the_DT sky_NN ."_IN The_DT same_JJ
ceremony_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN at_IN sunset_NN ._. The_DT New_NNP Caledonians_NNPS also_RB make_VBP a_DT
drought_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT disc-shaped_JJ stone_NN with_IN a_DT hole_NN in_IN it_PRP ._. At_IN the_DT
moment_NN when_WRB the_DT sun_NN rises_VBZ ,_, the_DT wizard_NN holds_VBZ the_DT stone_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN
and_CC passes_VBZ a_DT burning_VBG brand_NN repeatedly_RB into_IN the_DT hole_NN ,_, while_IN he_PRP says_VBZ :_:
"_`` I_PRP kindle_VBP the_DT sun_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN he_PRP may_MD eat_VB up_RP the_DT clouds_NNS and_CC dry_JJ up_RB
our_PRP$ land_NN ,_, so_RB that_IN it_PRP may_MD produce_VB nothing_NN ."_IN The_DT Banks_NNS Islanders_NNS make_VBP
sunshine_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT mock_JJ sun_NN ._. They_PRP take_VBP a_DT very_RB round_JJ stone_NN ,_,
called_VBN a_DT vat_NN loa_NN or_CC sunstone_NN ,_, wind_NN red_JJ braid_NN about_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC stick_NN
it_PRP with_IN owls_NNS '_POS feathers_NNS to_TO represent_VB rays_NNS ,_, singing_VBG the_DT proper_JJ spell_NN
in_IN a_DT low_JJ voice_NN ._. Then_RB they_PRP hang_VBP it_PRP on_IN some_DT high_JJ tree_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN a_DT
banyan_NN or_CC a_DT casuarina_NN ,_, in_IN a_DT sacred_JJ place_NN ._.

The_DT offering_NN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Brahman_NNP in_IN the_DT morning_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO
produce_VB the_DT sun_NN ,_, and_CC we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN "_`` assuredly_VB it_PRP would_MD not_RB rise_VB ,_,
were_VBD he_PRP not_RB to_TO make_VB that_DT offering_NN ."_VBD The_DT ancient_JJ Mexicans_NNS conceived_VBN
the_DT sun_NN as_IN the_DT source_NN of_IN all_DT vital_JJ force_NN ;_: hence_RB they_PRP named_VBD him_PRP
Ipalnemohuani_NNP ,_, "_'' He_PRP by_IN whom_WP men_NNS live_VB ."_RB But_CC if_IN he_PRP bestowed_VBD life_NN on_IN the_DT
world_NN ,_, he_PRP needed_VBD also_RB to_TO receive_VB life_NN from_IN it_PRP ._. And_CC as_IN the_DT heart_NN is_VBZ
the_DT seat_NN and_CC symbol_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, bleeding_VBG hearts_NNS of_IN men_NNS and_CC animals_NNS were_VBD
presented_VBN to_TO the_DT sun_NN to_TO maintain_VB him_PRP in_IN vigour_NN and_CC enable_VB him_PRP to_TO run_VB
his_PRP$ course_NN across_IN the_DT sky_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT Mexican_JJ sacrifices_NNS to_TO the_DT sun_NN
were_VBD magical_JJ rather_RB than_IN religious_JJ ,_, being_VBG designed_VBN ,_, not_RB so_RB much_JJ to_TO
please_VB and_CC propitiate_VB him_PRP ,_, as_IN physically_RB to_TO renew_VB his_PRP$ energies_NNS of_IN
heat_NN ,_, light_NN ,_, and_CC motion_NN ._. The_DT constant_JJ demand_NN for_IN human_JJ victims_NNS to_TO
feed_VB the_DT solar_JJ fire_NN was_VBD met_VBN by_IN waging_VBG war_NN every_DT year_NN on_IN the_DT
neighbouring_VBG tribes_NNS and_CC bringing_VBG back_RB troops_NNS of_IN captives_NNS to_TO be_VB
sacrificed_VBN on_IN the_DT altar_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT ceaseless_JJ wars_NNS of_IN the_DT Mexicans_NNPS and_CC
their_PRP$ cruel_JJ system_NN of_IN human_JJ sacrifices_NNS ,_, the_DT most_RBS monstrous_JJ on_IN
record_NN ,_, sprang_VBD in_IN great_JJ measure_NN from_IN a_DT mistaken_VBN theory_NN of_IN the_DT solar_JJ
system_NN ._. No_DT more_RBR striking_JJ illustration_NN could_MD be_VB given_VBN of_IN the_DT
disastrous_JJ consequences_NNS that_WDT may_MD flow_VB in_IN practice_NN from_IN a_DT purely_RB
speculative_JJ error_NN ._. The_DT ancient_JJ Greeks_NNS believed_VBD that_IN the_DT sun_NN drove_VBD in_IN
a_DT chariot_NN across_IN the_DT sky_NN ;_: hence_RB the_DT Rhodians_NNPS ,_, who_WP worshipped_VBD the_DT sun_NN
as_IN their_PRP$ chief_NN deity_NN ,_, annually_RB dedicated_VBN a_DT chariot_NN and_CC four_CD horses_NNS
to_TO him_PRP ,_, and_CC flung_VBD them_PRP into_IN the_DT sea_NN for_IN his_PRP$ use_NN ._. Doubtless_RB they_PRP
thought_VBD that_IN after_IN a_DT year_NN '_POS s_PRP work_VB his_PRP$ old_JJ horses_NNS and_CC chariot_NN would_MD be_VB
worn_VBN out_RB ._. From_IN a_DT like_JJ motive_NN ,_, probably_RB ,_, the_DT idolatrous_JJ kings_NNS of_IN
Judah_NNP dedicated_VBD chariots_NNS and_CC horses_NNS to_TO the_DT sun_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Spartans_NNP ,_,
Persians_NNPS ,_, and_CC Massagetae_NNP sacrificed_VBD horses_NNS to_TO him_PRP ._. The_DT Spartans_NNPS
performed_VBD the_DT sacrifice_NN on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN Mount_NNP Taygetus_NNP ,_, the_DT beautiful_JJ
range_NN behind_IN which_WDT they_PRP saw_VBD the_DT great_JJ luminary_JJ set_VBN every_DT night_NN ._. It_PRP
was_VBD as_IN natural_JJ for_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT valley_NN of_IN Sparta_NNP to_TO do_VB
this_DT as_IN it_PRP was_VBD for_IN the_DT islanders_NNS of_IN Rhodes_NNP to_TO throw_VB the_DT chariot_NN and_CC
horses_NNS into_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, into_IN which_WDT the_DT sun_NN seemed_VBD to_TO them_PRP to_TO sink_VB at_IN
evening_NN ._. For_IN thus_RB ,_, whether_IN on_IN the_DT mountain_NN or_CC in_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, the_DT fresh_JJ
horses_NNS stood_VBD ready_JJ for_IN the_DT weary_JJ god_NN where_WRB they_PRP would_MD be_VB most_RBS
welcome_JJ ,_, at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN his_PRP$ day_NN '_'' s_PRP journey_NN ._.

As_IN some_DT people_NNS think_VBP they_PRP can_MD light_VB up_RP the_DT sun_NN or_CC speed_VB him_PRP on_IN his_PRP$
way_NN ,_, so_IN others_NNS fancy_JJ they_PRP can_MD retard_VB or_CC stop_VB him_PRP ._. In_IN a_DT pass_NN of_IN the_DT
Peruvian_JJ Andes_NNS stand_VBP two_CD ruined_JJ towers_NNS on_IN opposite_JJ hills_NNS ._. Iron_NNP hooks_NNS
are_VBP clamped_VBN into_IN their_PRP$ walls_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN stretching_VBG a_DT net_NN
from_IN one_CD tower_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ ._. The_DT net_NN is_VBZ intended_VBN to_TO catch_VB the_DT sun_NN ._.
Stories_NNS of_IN men_NNS who_WP have_VBP caught_VBN the_DT sun_NN in_IN a_DT noose_NN are_VBP widely_RB spread_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT sun_NN is_VBZ going_VBG southward_RB in_IN the_DT autumn_NN ,_, and_CC sinking_VBG lower_JJR and_CC
lower_JJR in_IN the_DT Arctic_NNP sky_NN ,_, the_DT Esquimaux_NNP of_IN Iglulik_NNP play_VBP the_DT game_NN of_IN
cat_NN '_POS s_PRP cradle_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO catch_VB him_PRP in_IN the_DT meshes_NNS of_IN the_DT string_NN and_CC
so_RB prevent_VB his_PRP$ disappearance_NN ._. On_IN the_DT contrary_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT sun_NN is_VBZ
moving_VBG northward_RB in_IN the_DT spring_NN ,_, they_PRP play_VBP the_DT game_NN of_IN cup-and_JJ -_: ball_NN
to_TO hasten_VB his_PRP$ return_NN ._. When_WRB an_DT Australian_JJ blackfellow_JJ wishes_NNS to_TO stay_VB
the_DT sun_NN from_IN going_VBG down_RP till_IN he_PRP gets_VBZ home_NN ,_, he_PRP puts_VBZ a_DT sod_NN in_IN the_DT fork_NN
of_IN a_DT tree_NN ,_, exactly_RB facing_VBG the_DT setting_VBG sun_NN ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, to_TO
make_VB it_PRP go_VB down_RB faster_RBR ,_, the_DT Australians_NNPS throw_VBP sand_NN into_IN the_DT air_NN and_CC
blow_NN with_IN their_PRP$ mouths_NNS towards_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, perhaps_RB to_TO waft_VB the_DT
lingering_VBG orb_NN westward_RB and_CC bury_VB it_PRP under_IN the_DT sands_NNS into_IN which_WDT it_PRP
appears_VBZ to_TO sink_VB at_IN night_NN ._.

As_IN some_DT people_NNS imagine_VBP they_PRP can_MD hasten_VB the_DT sun_NN ,_, so_RB others_NNS fancy_JJ they_PRP
can_MD jog_VB the_DT tardy_JJ moon_NN ._. The_DT natives_NNS of_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP reckon_VBP months_NNS by_IN
the_DT moon_NN ,_, and_CC some_DT of_IN them_PRP have_VBP been_VBN known_VBN to_TO throw_VB stones_NNS and_CC
spears_NNS at_IN the_DT moon_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO accelerate_VB its_PRP$ progress_NN and_CC so_RB to_TO
hasten_VB the_DT return_NN of_IN their_PRP$ friends_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD away_RB from_IN home_NN for_IN
twelve_CD months_NNS working_VBG on_IN a_DT tobacco_NN plantation_NN ._. The_DT Malays_NNPS think_VBP that_IN
a_DT bright_JJ glow_NN at_IN sunset_NN may_MD throw_VB a_DT weak_JJ person_NN into_IN a_DT fever_NN ._. Hence_RB
they_PRP attempt_VBP to_TO extinguish_VB the_DT glow_NN by_IN spitting_VBG out_RP water_NN and_CC
throwing_VBG ashes_NNS at_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT Shuswap_NNP Indians_NNPS believe_VBP that_IN they_PRP can_MD
bring_VB on_RP cold_JJ weather_NN by_IN burning_VBG the_DT wood_NN of_IN a_DT tree_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN
struck_VBN by_IN lightning_NN ._. The_DT belief_NN may_MD be_VB based_VBN on_IN the_DT observation_NN that_WDT
in_IN their_PRP$ country_NN cold_NN follows_VBZ a_DT thunder-storm_NN ._. Hence_RB in_IN spring_NN ,_, when_WRB
these_DT Indians_NNPS are_VBP travelling_VBG over_IN the_DT snow_NN on_IN high_JJ ground_NN ,_, they_PRP burn_VBP
splinters_NNS of_IN such_JJ wood_NN in_IN the_DT fire_NN in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT crust_NN of_IN the_DT
snow_NN may_MD not_RB melt_VB ._.



4._DT The_DT Magical_NNP Control_NNP of_IN the_DT Wind_NNP

ONCE_RB more_RBR ,_, the_DT savage_JJ thinks_VBZ he_PRP can_MD make_VB the_DT wind_NN to_TO blow_VB or_CC to_TO be_VB
still_RB ._. When_WRB the_DT day_NN is_VBZ hot_JJ and_CC a_DT Yakut_NNP has_VBZ a_DT long_JJ way_NN to_TO go_VB ,_, he_PRP
takes_VBZ a_DT stone_NN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ chanced_VBN to_TO find_VB in_IN an_DT animal_NN or_CC fish_NN ,_,
winds_NNS a_DT horse-hair_NN several_JJ times_NNS round_VBP it_PRP ,_, and_CC ties_NNS it_PRP to_TO a_DT stick_NN ._.
He_PRP then_RB waves_NNS the_DT stick_NN about_RB ,_, uttering_VBG a_DT spell_NN ._. Soon_RB a_DT cool_JJ breeze_NN
begins_VBZ to_TO blow_VB ._. In_IN order_NN to_TO procure_VB a_DT cool_JJ wind_NN for_IN nine_CD days_NNS the_DT
stone_NN should_MD first_RB be_VB dipped_VBN in_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN a_DT bird_NN or_CC beast_NN and_CC
then_RB presented_VBD to_TO the_DT sun_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT sorcerer_NN makes_VBZ three_CD turns_NNS
contrary_NN to_TO the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT luminary_JJ ._. If_IN a_DT Hottentot_NNP desires_VBZ the_DT
wind_NN to_TO drop_VB ,_, he_PRP takes_VBZ one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ fattest_NN skins_NNS and_CC hangs_VBZ it_PRP on_IN the_DT
end_NN of_IN a_DT pole_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN by_IN blowing_VBG the_DT skin_NN down_IN the_DT wind_NN
will_MD lose_VB all_DT its_PRP$ force_NN and_CC must_MD itself_PRP fall_VB ._. Fuegian_JJ wizards_NNS throw_VBP
shells_NNS against_IN the_DT wind_NN to_TO make_VB it_PRP drop_VB ._. The_DT natives_NNS of_IN the_DT island_NN
of_IN Bibili_NNP ,_, off_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP ,_, are_VBP reputed_VBN to_TO make_VB wind_NN by_IN blowing_VBG with_IN
their_PRP$ mouths_NNS ._. In_IN stormy_JJ weather_NN the_DT Bogadjim_NNP people_NNS say_VBP ,_, "_`` The_DT Bibili_NNP
folk_NN are_VBP at_IN it_PRP again_RB ,_, blowing_VBG away_RB ."_IN Another_DT way_NN of_IN making_VBG wind_NN
which_WDT is_VBZ practised_VBN in_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP is_VBZ to_TO strike_VB a_DT "_`` wind-stone_NN "_'' lightly_RB
with_IN a_DT stick_NN ;_: to_TO strike_VB it_PRP hard_RB would_MD bring_VB on_RP a_DT hurricane_NN ._. So_RB in_IN
Scotland_NNP witches_NNS used_VBD to_TO raise_VB the_DT wind_NN by_IN dipping_VBG a_DT rag_NN in_IN water_NN
and_CC beating_VBG it_PRP thrice_NN on_IN a_DT stone_NN ,_, saying_VBG :_:


"_`` I_PRP knok_VBP this_DT rag_NN upone_IN this_DT stane_NN
To_TO raise_VB the_DT wind_NN in_IN the_DT divellis_NN name_NN ,_,
It_PRP sall_MD not_RB lye_VB till_IN I_PRP please_VBP againe_RB ."_VB


In_IN Greenland_NNP a_DT woman_NN in_IN child-bed_JJ and_CC for_IN some_DT time_NN after_IN delivery_NN
is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO possess_VB the_DT power_NN of_IN laying_VBG a_DT storm_NN ._. She_PRP has_VBZ only_RB to_TO
go_VB out_IN of_IN doors_NNS ,_, fill_VB her_PRP$ mouth_NN with_IN air_NN ,_, and_CC coming_VBG back_RB into_IN the_DT
house_NN blow_VB it_PRP out_RP again_RB ._. In_IN antiquity_NN there_RB was_VBD a_DT family_NN at_IN Corinth_NNP
which_WDT enjoyed_VBD the_DT reputation_NN of_IN being_VBG able_JJ to_TO still_RB the_DT raging_NN wind_NN ;_:
but_CC we_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB in_IN what_WP manner_NN its_PRP$ members_NNS exercised_VBD a_DT useful_JJ
function_NN ,_, which_WDT probably_RB earned_VBD for_IN them_PRP a_DT more_RBR solid_JJ recompense_NN
than_IN mere_JJ repute_NN among_IN the_DT seafaring_VBG population_NN of_IN the_DT isthmus_NN ._. Even_RB
in_IN Christian_NNP times_NNS ,_, under_IN the_DT reign_NN of_IN Constantine_NNP ,_, a_DT certain_JJ
Sopater_NN suffered_VBD death_NN at_IN Constantinople_NNP on_IN a_DT charge_NN of_IN binding_VBG the_DT
winds_NNS by_IN magic_JJ ,_, because_IN it_PRP happened_VBD that_IN the_DT corn-ships_NNS of_IN Egypt_NNP and_CC
Syria_NNP were_VBD detained_VBN afar_RB off_RB by_IN calms_NNS or_CC head-winds_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT rage_NN and_CC
disappointment_NN of_IN the_DT hungry_JJ Byzantine_NNP rabble_NN ._. Finnish_JJ wizards_NNS used_VBN
to_TO sell_VB wind_NN to_TO storm-stayed_JJ mariners_NNS ._. The_DT wind_NN was_VBD enclosed_VBN in_IN
three_CD knots_NNS ;_: if_IN they_PRP undid_VBD the_DT first_JJ knot_NN ,_, a_DT moderate_JJ wind_NN sprang_VBD
up_RB ;_: if_IN the_DT second_JJ ,_, it_PRP blew_VBD half_NN a_DT gale_NN ;_: if_IN the_DT third_JJ ,_, a_DT hurricane_NN ._.
Indeed_RB the_DT Esthonians_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ country_NN is_VBZ divided_VBN from_IN Finland_NNP only_RB by_IN
an_DT arm_NN of_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, still_RB believe_VB in_IN the_DT magical_JJ powers_NNS of_IN their_PRP$
northern_JJ neighbours_NNS ._. The_DT bitter_JJ winds_NNS that_IN blow_NN in_IN spring_NN from_IN the_DT
north_RB and_CC north-east_RB ,_, bringing_VBG ague_NN and_CC rheumatic_JJ inflammations_NNS in_IN
their_PRP$ train_NN ,_, are_VBP set_VBN down_RP by_IN the_DT simple_JJ Esthonian_JJ peasantry_NN to_TO the_DT
machinations_NNS of_IN the_DT Finnish_JJ wizards_NNS and_CC witches_NNS ._. In_IN particular_JJ they_PRP
regard_NN with_IN special_JJ dread_JJ three_CD days_NNS in_IN spring_NN to_TO which_WDT they_PRP give_VBP
the_DT name_NN of_IN Days_NNS of_IN the_DT Cross_NNP ;_: one_CD of_IN them_PRP falls_VBZ on_IN the_DT Eve_NNP of_IN
Ascension_NNP Day_NNP ._. The_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Fellin_NNP fear_NN to_TO go_VB
out_RB on_IN these_DT days_NNS lest_IN the_DT cruel_JJ winds_NNS from_IN Lappland_NNP should_MD smite_VB
them_PRP dead_JJ ._. A_DT popular_JJ Esthonian_JJ song_NN runs_VBZ :_:


Wind_NNP of_IN the_DT Cross_NNP !_. rushing_VBG and_CC mighty_RB !_.
Heavy_NNP the_DT blow_NN of_IN thy_JJ wings_NNS sweeping_VBG past_NN !_.
Wild_JJ wailing_VBG wind_NN of_IN misfortune_NN and_CC sorrow_NN ,_,
Wizards_NNS of_IN Finland_NNP ride_NN by_IN on_IN the_DT blast_NN ._.


It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBN ,_, too_RB ,_, that_IN sailors_NNS ,_, beating_VBG up_IN against_IN the_DT wind_NN in_IN the_DT
Gulf_NNP of_IN Finland_NNP ,_, sometimes_RB see_VB a_DT strange_JJ sail_NN heave_NN in_IN sight_NN astern_NN
and_CC overhaul_NN them_PRP hand_NN over_IN hand_NN ._. On_IN she_PRP comes_VBZ with_IN a_DT cloud_NN of_IN
canvas_NN --_: all_DT her_PRP$ studding-sails_NNS out_RP --_: right_RB in_IN the_DT teeth_NNS of_IN the_DT wind_NN ,_,
forging_VBG her_PRP$ way_NN through_IN the_DT foaming_NN billows_NNS ,_, dashing_VBG back_RB the_DT spray_NN
in_IN sheets_NNS from_IN her_PRP$ cutwater_NN ,_, every_DT sail_NN swollen_VBN to_TO bursting_VBG ,_, every_DT
rope_NN strained_VBD to_TO cracking_VBG ._. Then_RB the_DT sailors_NNS know_VBP that_IN she_PRP hails_VBZ from_IN
Finland_NNP ._.

The_DT art_NN of_IN tying_VBG up_IN the_DT wind_NN in_IN three_CD knots_NNS ,_, so_RB that_IN the_DT more_JJR knots_NNS
are_VBP loosed_VBN the_DT stronger_JJR will_MD blow_VB the_DT wind_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN attributed_VBN to_TO
wizards_NNS in_IN Lappland_NNP and_CC to_TO witches_NNS in_IN Shetland_NNP ,_, Lewis_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Isle_NNP
of_IN Man_NNP ._. Shetland_NNP seamen_NNS still_RB buy_VBP winds_NNS in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN knotted_VBN
handkerchiefs_NNS or_CC threads_NNS from_IN old_JJ women_NNS who_WP claim_VBP to_TO rule_VB the_DT
storms_NNS ._. There_EX are_VBP said_VBD to_TO be_VB ancient_JJ crones_NNS in_IN Lerwick_NNP now_RB who_WP live_VBP
by_IN selling_VBG wind_NN ._. Ulysses_NNPS received_VBD the_DT winds_NNS in_IN a_DT leathern_NN bag_NN from_IN
Aeolus_RB ,_, King_NNP of_IN the_DT Winds_NNP ._. The_DT Motumotu_NNP in_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP think_VBP that_IN
storms_NNS are_VBP sent_VBN by_IN an_DT Oiabu_NNP sorcerer_NN ;_: for_IN each_DT wind_NN he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT bamboo_NN
which_WDT he_PRP opens_VBZ at_IN pleasure_NN ._. On_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN Mount_NNP Agu_NNP in_IN Togo_NNP ,_, a_DT
district_NN of_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, resides_VBZ a_DT fetish_JJ called_VBN Bagba_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ
supposed_VBN to_TO control_VB the_DT wind_NN and_CC the_DT rain_NN ._. His_PRP$ priest_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO
keep_VB the_DT winds_NNS shut_VBN up_RP in_IN great_JJ pots_NNS ._.

Often_RB the_DT stormy_JJ wind_NN is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN an_DT evil_JJ being_NN who_WP may_MD be_VB
intimidated_VBN ,_, driven_VBN away_RB ,_, or_CC killed_VBN ._. When_WRB storms_NNS and_CC bad_JJ weather_NN
have_VB lasted_VBD long_RB and_CC food_NN is_VBZ scarce_JJ with_IN the_DT Central_NNP Esquimaux_NNP ,_, they_PRP
endeavour_NN to_TO conjure_VB the_DT tempest_NN by_IN making_VBG a_DT long_JJ whip_NN of_IN seaweed_NN ,_,
armed_VBN with_IN which_WDT they_PRP go_VBP down_RB to_TO the_DT beach_NN and_CC strike_VB out_RP in_IN the_DT
direction_NN of_IN the_DT wind_NN ,_, crying_VBG "_`` Taba_NNP (_-LRB- it_PRP is_VBZ enough_RB )!"_JJ Once_RB when_WRB
north-westerly_JJ winds_NNS had_VBD kept_VBN the_DT ice_NN long_RB on_IN the_DT coast_NN and_CC food_NN was_VBD
becoming_VBG scarce_JJ ,_, the_DT Esquimaux_NNP performed_VBD a_DT ceremony_NN to_TO make_VB a_DT calm_NN ._.
A_DT fire_NN was_VBD kindled_VBN on_IN the_DT shore_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT men_NNS gathered_VBD round_IN it_PRP and_CC
chanted_VBN ._. An_DT old_JJ man_NN then_RB stepped_VBD up_RB to_TO the_DT fire_NN and_CC in_IN a_DT coaxing_NN
voice_NN invited_VBD the_DT demon_NN of_IN the_DT wind_NN to_TO come_VB under_IN the_DT fire_NN and_CC warm_JJ
himself_PRP ._. When_WRB he_PRP was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB arrived_VBN ,_, a_DT vessel_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, to_TO
which_WDT each_DT man_NN present_NN had_VBD contributed_VBN ,_, was_VBD thrown_VBN on_IN the_DT flames_NNS by_IN
an_DT old_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC immediately_RB a_DT flight_NN of_IN arrows_NNS sped_VBD towards_IN the_DT spot_NN
where_WRB the_DT fire_NN had_VBD been_VBN ._. They_PRP thought_VBD that_IN the_DT demon_NN would_MD not_RB stay_VB
where_WRB he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN so_RB badly_RB treated_VBN ._. To_TO complete_VB the_DT effect_NN ,_, guns_NNS
were_VBD discharged_VBN in_IN various_JJ directions_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT captain_NN of_IN a_DT European_JJ
vessel_NN was_VBD invited_VBN to_TO fire_VB on_IN the_DT wind_NN with_IN cannon_NN ._. On_IN the_DT
twenty-first_JJ of_IN February_NNP 1883_CD a_DT similar_JJ ceremony_NN was_VBD performed_VBN by_IN
the_DT Esquimaux_NNP of_IN Point_NNP Barrow_NNP ,_, Alaska_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT intention_NN of_IN killing_VBG
the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT wind_NN ._. Women_NNS drove_VBD the_DT demon_NN from_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS with_IN
clubs_NNS and_CC knives_NNS ,_, with_IN which_WDT they_PRP made_VBD passes_NNS in_IN the_DT air_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT
men_NNS ,_, gathering_VBG round_RB a_DT fire_NN ,_, shot_VBD him_PRP with_IN their_PRP$ rifles_NNS and_CC crushed_VBN
him_PRP under_IN a_DT heavy_JJ stone_NN the_DT moment_NN that_IN steam_NN rose_VBD in_IN a_DT cloud_NN from_IN
the_DT smouldering_NN embers_NNS ,_, on_IN which_WDT a_DT tub_NN of_IN water_NN had_VBD just_RB been_VBN
thrown_VBN ._.

The_DT Lengua_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN the_DT Gran_NNP Chaco_NNP ascribe_IN the_DT rush_NN of_IN a_DT
whirl-wind_NN to_TO the_DT passage_NN of_IN a_DT spirit_NN and_CC they_PRP fling_VBZ sticks_NNS at_IN it_PRP to_TO
frighten_VB it_PRP away_RB ._. When_WRB the_DT wind_NN blows_VBZ down_IN their_PRP$ huts_NNS ,_, the_DT Payaguas_NNP
of_IN South_NNP America_NNP snatch_VB up_RP firebrands_NNS and_CC run_VB against_IN the_DT wind_NN ,_,
menacing_VBG it_PRP with_IN the_DT blazing_VBG brands_NNS ,_, while_IN others_NNS beat_VBD the_DT air_NN with_IN
their_PRP$ fists_NNS to_TO frighten_VB the_DT storm_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT Guaycurus_NNP are_VBP threatened_VBN
by_IN a_DT severe_JJ storm_NN ,_, the_DT men_NNS go_VBP out_IN armed_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT women_NNS and_CC children_NNS
scream_VB their_PRP$ loudest_JJS to_TO intimidate_VB the_DT demon_NN ._. During_IN a_DT tempest_NN the_DT
inhabitants_NNS of_IN a_DT Batak_NNP village_NN in_IN Sumatra_NNP have_VBP been_VBN seen_VBN to_TO rush_VB
from_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS armed_VBN with_IN sword_NN and_CC lance_NN ._. The_DT rajah_NN placed_VBN
himself_PRP at_IN their_PRP$ head_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN shouts_NNS and_CC yells_NNS they_PRP hewed_VBD and_CC
hacked_VBN at_IN the_DT invisible_JJ foe_NN ._. An_DT old_JJ woman_NN was_VBD observed_VBN to_TO be_VB
specially_RB active_JJ in_IN the_DT defence_NN of_IN her_PRP$ house_NN ,_, slashing_VBG the_DT air_NN right_NN
and_CC left_VBD with_IN a_DT long_JJ sabre_NN ._. In_IN a_DT violent_JJ thunderstorm_NN ,_, the_DT peals_NNS
sounding_VBG very_RB near_JJ ,_, the_DT Kayans_NNP of_IN Borneo_NNP have_VBP been_VBN seen_VBN to_TO draw_VB
their_PRP$ swords_NNS threateningly_RB half_DT out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ scabbards_NNS ,_, as_IN if_IN to_TO
frighten_VB away_RB the_DT demons_NNS of_IN the_DT storm_NN ._. In_IN Australia_NNP the_DT huge_JJ columns_NNS
of_IN red_JJ sand_NN that_IN move_NN rapidly_RB across_IN a_DT desert_NN tract_NN are_VBP thought_VBN by_IN
the_DT natives_NNS to_TO be_VB spirits_NNS passing_VBG along_RP ._. Once_IN an_DT athletic_JJ young_JJ
black_JJ ran_VBD after_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT moving_VBG columns_NNS to_TO kill_VB it_PRP with_IN
boomerangs_NNS ._. He_PRP was_VBD away_RB two_CD or_CC three_CD hours_NNS ,_, and_CC came_VBD back_RB very_RB
weary_JJ ,_, saying_VBG he_PRP had_VBD killed_VBN Koochee_PRP (_-LRB- the_DT demon_NN ),_, but_CC that_DT Koochee_NNP
had_VBD growled_VBN at_IN him_PRP and_CC he_PRP must_MD die_VB ._. Of_IN the_DT Bedouins_NNP of_IN Eastern_NNP
Africa_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN "_`` no_DT whirl-wind_JJ ever_RB sweeps_NNS across_IN the_DT path_NN
without_IN being_VBG pursued_VBN by_IN a_DT dozen_NN savages_NNS with_IN drawn_JJ creeses_NNS ,_, who_WP
stab_NN into_IN the_DT centre_NN of_IN the_DT dusty_JJ column_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO drive_VB away_RB the_DT
evil_JJ spirit_NN that_WDT is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO be_VB riding_VBG on_IN the_DT blast_NN ."_.

In_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN these_DT examples_NNS a_DT story_NN told_VBN by_IN Herodotus_NNP ,_, which_WDT his_PRP$
modern_JJ critics_NNS have_VBP treated_VBN as_IN a_DT fable_JJ ,_, is_VBZ perfectly_RB credible_JJ ._. He_PRP
says_VBZ ,_, without_IN however_RB vouching_VBG for_IN the_DT truth_NN of_IN the_DT tale_NN ,_, that_IN once_RB
in_IN the_DT land_NN of_IN the_DT Psylli_NNP ,_, the_DT modern_JJ Tripoli_NNP ,_, the_DT wind_NN blowing_VBG from_IN
the_DT Sahara_NNP had_VBD dried_VBN up_RP all_DT the_DT water-tanks_NNS ._. So_IN the_DT people_NNS took_VBD
counsel_NN and_CC marched_VBD in_IN a_DT body_NN to_TO make_VB war_NN on_IN the_DT south_JJ wind_NN ._. But_CC
when_WRB they_PRP entered_VBD the_DT desert_NN the_DT simoon_NN swept_VBD down_RB on_IN them_PRP and_CC
buried_VBN them_PRP to_TO a_DT man_NN ._. The_DT story_NN may_MD well_RB have_VB been_VBN told_VBN by_IN one_CD who_WP
watched_VBD them_PRP disappearing_NN ,_, in_IN battle_NN array_NN ,_, with_IN drums_NNS and_CC cymbals_NNS
beating_VBG ,_, into_IN the_DT red_JJ cloud_NN of_IN whirling_VBG sand_NN ._.




VI_NNP ._. Magicians_NNPS as_IN Kings_NNP

THE_DT FOREGOING_JJ evidence_NN may_MD satisfy_VB us_PRP that_IN in_IN many_JJ lands_NNS and_CC many_JJ
races_NNS magic_NN has_VBZ claimed_VBN to_TO control_VB the_DT great_JJ forces_NNS of_IN nature_NN for_IN
the_DT good_JJ of_IN man_NN ._. If_IN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN so_RB ,_, the_DT practitioners_NNS of_IN the_DT art_NN
must_MD necessarily_RB be_VB personages_NNS of_IN importance_NN and_CC influence_NN in_IN any_DT
society_NN which_WDT puts_VBZ faith_NN in_IN their_PRP$ extravagant_JJ pretensions_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP
would_MD be_VB no_DT matter_NN for_IN surprise_NN if_IN ,_, by_IN virtue_NN of_IN the_DT reputation_NN
which_WDT they_PRP enjoy_VBP and_CC of_IN the_DT awe_NN which_WDT they_PRP inspire_VBP ,_, some_DT of_IN them_PRP
should_MD attain_VB to_TO the_DT highest_JJS position_NN of_IN authority_NN over_IN their_PRP$
credulous_JJ fellows_NNS ._. In_IN point_NN of_IN fact_NN magicians_NNS appear_VBP to_TO have_VB often_RB
developed_VBN into_IN chiefs_NNS and_CC kings_NNS ._.

Let_VB us_PRP begin_VB by_IN looking_VBG at_IN the_DT lowest_JJS race_NN of_IN men_NNS as_IN to_TO whom_WP we_PRP
possess_VB comparatively_RB full_JJ and_CC accurate_JJ information_NN ,_, the_DT aborigines_NNS
of_IN Australia_NNP ._. These_DT savages_NNS are_VBP ruled_VBN neither_RB by_IN chiefs_NNS nor_CC kings_NNS ._.
So_RB far_RB as_IN their_PRP$ tribes_NNS can_MD be_VB said_VBN to_TO have_VB a_DT political_JJ constitution_NN ,_,
it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT democracy_NN or_CC rather_RB an_DT oligarchy_NN of_IN old_JJ and_CC influential_JJ men_NNS ,_,
who_WP meet_VBP in_IN council_NN and_CC decide_VB on_IN all_DT measures_NNS of_IN importance_NN to_TO the_DT
practical_JJ exclusion_NN of_IN the_DT younger_JJR men_NNS ._. Their_PRP$ deliberative_JJ assembly_NN
answers_NNS to_TO the_DT senate_NN of_IN later_JJ times_NNS :_: if_IN we_PRP had_VBD to_TO coin_NN a_DT word_NN for_IN
such_JJ a_DT government_NN of_IN elders_NNS we_PRP might_MD call_VB it_PRP a_DT gerontocracy_NN ._. The_DT
elders_NNS who_WP in_IN aboriginal_JJ Australia_NNP thus_RB meet_VB and_CC direct_VB the_DT affairs_NNS
of_IN their_PRP$ tribe_NN appear_VB to_TO be_VB for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN the_DT headmen_NNS of_IN their_PRP$
respective_JJ totem_JJ clans_NNS ._. Now_RB in_IN Central_NNP Australia_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT desert_NN
nature_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN and_CC the_DT almost_RB complete_JJ isolation_NN from_IN foreign_JJ
influences_NNS have_VBP retarded_VBN progress_NN and_CC preserved_VBD the_DT natives_NNS on_IN the_DT
whole_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ most_RBS primitive_JJ state_NN ,_, the_DT headmen_NNS of_IN the_DT various_JJ
totem_NN clans_NNS are_VBP charged_VBN with_IN the_DT important_JJ task_NN of_IN performing_VBG
magical_JJ ceremonies_NNS for_IN the_DT multiplication_NN of_IN the_DT totems_NNS ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT
great_JJ majority_NN of_IN the_DT totems_NNS are_VBP edible_JJ animals_NNS or_CC plants_NNS ,_, it_PRP
follows_VBZ that_IN these_DT men_NNS are_VBP commonly_RB expected_VBN to_TO provide_VB the_DT people_NNS
with_IN food_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN magic_NN ._. Others_NNS have_VBP to_TO make_VB the_DT rain_NN to_TO fall_VB or_CC
to_TO render_VB other_JJ services_NNS to_TO the_DT community_NN ._. In_IN short_JJ ,_, among_IN the_DT
tribes_NNS of_IN Central_NNP Australia_NNP the_DT headmen_NNS are_VBP public_JJ magicians_NNS ._.
Further_RB ,_, their_PRP$ most_RBS important_JJ function_NN is_VBZ to_TO take_VB charge_NN of_IN the_DT
sacred_JJ storehouse_NN ,_, usually_RB a_DT cleft_NN in_IN the_DT rocks_NNS or_CC a_DT hole_NN in_IN the_DT
ground_NN ,_, where_WRB are_VBP kept_VBN the_DT holy_JJ stones_NNS and_CC sticks_NNS (_-LRB- churinga_NN )_-RRB- with_IN
which_WDT the_DT souls_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT people_NNS ,_, both_DT living_NN and_CC dead_JJ ,_, are_VBP
apparently_RB supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB in_IN a_DT manner_NN bound_VBN up_RP ._. Thus_RB while_IN the_DT
headmen_NNS have_VBP certainly_RB to_TO perform_VB what_WP we_PRP should_MD call_VB civil_JJ duties_NNS ,_,
such_JJ as_IN to_TO inflict_VB punishment_NN for_IN breaches_NNS of_IN tribal_JJ custom_NN ,_, their_PRP$
principal_JJ functions_NNS are_VBP sacred_JJ or_CC magical_JJ ._.

When_WRB we_PRP pass_VBP from_IN Australia_NNP to_TO New_NNP Guinea_NNP we_PRP find_VBP that_DT ,_, though_IN the_DT
natives_NNS stand_VBP at_IN a_DT far_RB higher_JJR level_NN of_IN culture_NN than_IN the_DT Australian_JJ
aborigines_NNS ,_, the_DT constitution_NN of_IN society_NN among_IN them_PRP is_VBZ still_RB
essentially_RB democratic_JJ or_CC oligarchic_JJ ,_, and_CC chieftainship_NN exists_VBZ only_RB
in_IN embryo_NN ._. Thus_RB Sir_NNP William_NNP MacGregor_NNP tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN in_IN British_NNP New_NNP
Guinea_NNP no_DT one_NN has_VBZ ever_RB arisen_VBN wise_JJ enough_JJ ,_, bold_JJ enough_JJ ,_, and_CC strong_JJ
enough_RB to_TO become_VB the_DT despot_NN even_RB of_IN a_DT single_JJ district_NN ._. "_'' The_DT nearest_JJS
approach_NN to_TO this_DT has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT very_RB distant_JJ one_NN of_IN some_DT person_NN
becoming_VBG a_DT renowned_JJ wizard_NN ;_: but_CC that_DT has_VBZ only_RB resulted_VBN in_IN levying_VBG a_DT
certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN blackmail_NN ."_.

According_VBG to_TO a_DT native_JJ account_NN ,_, the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN Melanesian_NNP
chiefs_NNS lies_VBZ entirely_RB in_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN they_PRP have_VBP communication_NN with_IN
mighty_JJ ghosts_NNS ,_, and_CC wield_VBD that_IN supernatural_JJ power_NN whereby_WRB they_PRP can_MD
bring_VB the_DT influence_NN of_IN the_DT ghosts_NNS to_TO bear_VB ._. If_IN a_DT chief_NN imposed_VBN a_DT
fine_JJ ,_, it_PRP was_VBD paid_VBN because_IN the_DT people_NNS universally_RB dreaded_VBD his_PRP$ ghostly_JJ
power_NN ,_, and_CC firmly_RB believed_VBD that_IN he_PRP could_MD inflict_VB calamity_NN and_CC
sickness_JJR upon_IN such_JJ as_IN resisted_VBD him_PRP ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN any_DT considerable_JJ
number_NN of_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS began_VBD to_TO disbelieve_VB in_IN his_PRP$ influence_NN with_IN the_DT
ghosts_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ power_NN to_TO levy_VB fines_NNS was_VBD shaken_VBN ._. Again_RB ,_, Dr_NNP ._. George_NNP Brown_NNP
tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN in_IN New_NNP Britain_NNP "_`` a_DT ruling_NN chief_NN was_VBD always_RB supposed_VBN to_TO
exercise_NN priestly_RB functions_VBZ ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, he_PRP professed_VBD to_TO be_VB in_IN constant_JJ
communication_NN with_IN the_DT tebarans_NNS (_-LRB- spirits_NNS ),_NN and_CC through_IN their_PRP$
influence_NN he_PRP was_VBD enabled_VBN to_TO bring_VB rain_NN or_CC sunshine_NN ,_, fair_JJ winds_NNS or_CC
foul_JJ ones_NNS ,_, sickness_NN or_CC health_NN ,_, success_NN or_CC disaster_NN in_IN war_NN ,_, and_CC
generally_RB to_TO procure_VB any_DT blessing_NN or_CC curse_NN for_IN which_WDT the_DT applicant_NN
was_VBD willing_JJ to_TO pay_VB a_DT sufficient_JJ price_NN ."_NN

Still_RB rising_VBG in_IN the_DT scale_NN of_IN culture_NN we_PRP come_VBP to_TO Africa_NNP ,_, where_WRB both_DT
the_DT chieftainship_NN and_CC the_DT kingship_NN are_VBP fully_RB developed_VBN ;_: and_CC here_RB the_DT

especially_RB out_IN of_IN the_DT rain-maker_NN ,_, is_VBZ comparatively_RB plentiful_JJ ._. Thus_RB
among_IN the_DT Wambugwe_NNP ,_, a_DT Bantu_NNP people_NNS of_IN East_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, the_DT original_JJ form_NN
of_IN government_NN was_VBD a_DT family_NN republic_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT enormous_JJ power_NN of_IN the_DT
sorcerers_NNS ,_, transmitted_VBN by_IN inheritance_NN ,_, soon_RB raised_VBD them_PRP to_TO the_DT rank_NN
of_IN petty_JJ lords_NNS or_CC chiefs_NNS ._. Of_IN the_DT three_CD chiefs_NNS living_VBG in_IN the_DT country_NN
in_IN 1894_CD two_CD were_VBD much_RB dreaded_VBN as_IN magicians_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT wealth_NN of_IN cattle_NNS
they_PRP possessed_VBD came_VBD to_TO them_PRP almost_RB wholly_RB in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN presents_NNS
bestowed_VBN for_IN their_PRP$ services_NNS in_IN that_DT capacity_NN ._. Their_PRP$ principal_JJ art_NN
was_VBD that_IN of_IN rain-making_NN ._. The_DT chiefs_NNS of_IN the_DT Wataturu_NNP ,_, another_DT people_NNS
of_IN East_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, are_VBP said_VBN to_TO be_VB nothing_NN but_CC sorcerers_NNS destitute_NN of_IN
any_DT direct_JJ political_JJ influence_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, among_IN the_DT Wagogo_NN of_IN East_NNP
Africa_NNP the_DT main_JJ power_NN of_IN the_DT chiefs_NNS ,_, we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN ,_, is_VBZ derived_VBN from_IN
their_PRP$ art_NN of_IN rain-making_NN ._. If_IN a_DT chief_NN cannot_MD make_VB rain_NN himself_PRP ,_, he_PRP
must_MD procure_VB it_PRP from_IN some_DT one_NN who_WP can_MD ._.

Again_RB ,_, among_IN the_DT tribes_NNS of_IN the_DT Upper_NNP Nile_NNP the_DT medicine-men_NNS are_VBP
generally_RB the_DT chiefs_NNS ._. Their_PRP$ authority_NN rests_VBZ above_IN all_DT upon_IN their_PRP$
supposed_VBN power_NN of_IN making_VBG rain_NN ,_, for_IN "_`` rain_NN is_VBZ the_DT one_CD thing_NN which_WDT
matters_NNS to_TO the_DT people_NNS in_IN those_DT districts_NNS ,_, as_IN if_IN it_PRP does_VBZ not_RB come_VB
down_RB at_IN the_DT right_JJ time_NN it_PRP means_VBZ untold_JJ hardships_NNS for_IN the_DT community_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ therefore_RB small_JJ wonder_NN that_IN men_NNS more_RBR cunning_JJ than_IN their_PRP$
fellows_NNS should_MD arrogate_VB to_TO themselves_PRP the_DT power_NN of_IN producing_VBG it_PRP ,_, or_CC
that_IN having_VBG gained_VBN such_JJ a_DT reputation_NN ,_, they_PRP should_MD trade_VB on_IN the_DT
credulity_NN of_IN their_PRP$ simpler_JJR neighbours_NNS ."_CC Hence_RB "_`` most_JJS of_IN the_DT chiefs_NNS of_IN
these_DT tribes_NNS are_VBP rain-makers_NNS ,_, and_CC enjoy_VB a_DT popularity_NN in_IN proportion_NN
to_TO their_PRP$ powers_NNS to_TO give_VB rain_NN to_TO their_PRP$ people_NNS at_IN the_DT proper_JJ season_NN ._. ._.
._. ._. Rain-making_NN chiefs_NNS always_RB build_VBP their_PRP$ villages_NNS on_IN the_DT slopes_NNS of_IN
a_DT fairly_RB high_JJ hill_NN ,_, as_IN they_PRP no_DT doubt_NN know_VB that_IN the_DT hills_NNS attract_VBP the_DT
clouds_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP are_VBP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, fairly_RB safe_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ weather_NN
forecasts_NNS ."_VBP Each_DT of_IN these_DT rain-makers_NNS has_VBZ a_DT number_NN of_IN rain-stones_NNS ,_,
such_JJ as_IN rock-crystal_JJ ,_, aventurine_JJ ,_, and_CC amethyst_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP keeps_VBZ in_IN a_DT
pot_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP wishes_VBZ to_TO produce_VB rain_NN he_PRP plunges_VBZ the_DT stones_NNS in_IN water_NN ,_,
and_CC taking_VBG in_RP his_PRP$ hand_NN a_DT peeled_VBD cane_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ split_VBN at_IN the_DT top_NN ,_, he_PRP
beckons_NNS with_IN it_PRP to_TO the_DT clouds_NNS to_TO come_VB or_CC waves_NNS them_PRP away_RB in_IN the_DT way_NN
they_PRP should_MD go_VB ,_, muttering_VBG an_DT incantation_NN the_DT while_NN ._. Or_CC he_PRP pours_VBZ
water_NN and_CC the_DT entrails_NNS of_IN a_DT sheep_NN or_CC goat_NN into_IN a_DT hollow_NN in_IN a_DT stone_NN
and_CC then_RB sprinkles_VBZ the_DT water_NN towards_IN the_DT sky_NN ._. Though_IN the_DT chief_NN
acquires_VBZ wealth_NN by_IN the_DT exercise_NN of_IN his_PRP$ supposed_VBN magical_JJ powers_NNS ,_, he_PRP
often_RB ,_, perhaps_RB generally_RB ,_, comes_VBZ to_TO a_DT violent_JJ end_NN ;_: for_IN in_IN time_NN of_IN
drought_NN the_DT angry_JJ people_NNS assemble_NN and_CC kill_VB him_PRP ,_, believing_VBG that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ
he_PRP who_WP prevents_VBZ the_DT rain_NN from_IN falling_VBG ._. Yet_CC the_DT office_NN is_VBZ usually_RB
hereditary_RB and_CC passes_VBZ from_IN father_NN to_TO son_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT tribes_NNS which_WDT
cherish_JJ these_DT beliefs_NNS and_CC observe_VB these_DT customs_NNS are_VBP the_DT Latuka_NNP ,_,
Bari_NNP ,_, Laluba_NNP ,_, and_CC Lokoiya_NNP ._.

In_IN Central_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, again_RB ,_, the_DT Lendu_NNP tribe_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT west_NN of_IN Lake_NNP
Albert_NNP ,_, firmly_RB believe_VBP that_IN certain_JJ people_NNS possess_VBP the_DT power_NN of_IN
making_VBG rain_NN ._. Among_IN them_PRP the_DT rain-maker_NN either_CC is_VBZ a_DT chief_NN or_CC almost_RB
invariably_RB becomes_VBZ one_CD ._. The_DT Banyoro_NNP also_RB have_VBP a_DT great_JJ respect_NN for_IN
the_DT dispensers_NNS of_IN rain_NN ,_, whom_WP they_PRP load_VB with_IN a_DT profusion_NN of_IN gifts_NNS ._.
The_DT great_JJ dispenser_NN ,_, he_PRP who_WP has_VBZ absolute_JJ and_CC uncontrollable_JJ power_NN
over_IN the_DT rain_NN ,_, is_VBZ the_DT king_NN ;_: but_CC he_PRP can_MD depute_VB his_PRP$ power_NN to_TO other_JJ
persons_NNS ,_, so_RB that_IN the_DT benefit_NN may_MD be_VB distributed_VBN and_CC the_DT heavenly_NN
water_NN laid_VBD on_IN over_IN the_DT various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT kingdom_NN ._.

In_IN Western_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN Eastern_NNP and_CC Central_NNP Africa_NNP we_PRP meet_VBP with_IN the_DT
same_JJ union_NN of_IN chiefly_RB with_IN magical_JJ functions_NNS ._. Thus_RB in_IN the_DT Fan_NNP tribe_NN
the_DT strict_JJ distinction_NN between_IN chief_NN and_CC medicine-man_NN does_VBZ not_RB
exist_VB ._. The_DT chief_NN is_VBZ also_RB a_DT medicine-man_NN and_CC a_DT smith_NN to_TO boot_VB ;_: for_IN the_DT
Fans_NNS esteem_VBP the_DT smith_NN '_'' s_PRP craft_NN sacred_JJ ,_, and_CC none_NN but_CC chiefs_NNS may_MD meddle_VB
with_IN it_PRP ._.

As_IN to_TO the_DT relation_NN between_IN the_DT offices_NNS of_IN chief_JJ and_CC rain-maker_NN in_IN
South_NNP Africa_NNP a_DT well-informed_JJ writer_NN observes_VBZ :_: "_`` In_IN very_RB old_JJ days_NNS the_DT
chief_NN was_VBD the_DT great_JJ Rain-maker_NN of_IN the_DT tribe_NN ._. Some_DT chiefs_NNS allowed_VBD no_RB
one_CD else_RB to_TO compete_VB with_IN them_PRP ,_, lest_IN a_DT successful_JJ Rain-maker_NN should_MD
be_VB chosen_VBN as_IN chief_NN ._. There_EX was_VBD also_RB another_DT reason_NN :_: the_DT Rain-maker_NN
was_VBD sure_JJ to_TO become_VB a_DT rich_JJ man_NN if_IN he_PRP gained_VBD a_DT great_JJ reputation_NN ,_, and_CC
it_PRP would_MD manifestly_RB never_RB do_VBP for_IN the_DT chief_NN to_TO allow_VB any_DT one_NN to_TO be_VB
too_RB rich_JJ ._. The_DT Rain-maker_NNP exerts_VBZ tremendous_JJ control_NN over_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_,
and_CC so_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB most_RBS important_JJ to_TO keep_VB this_DT function_NN connected_VBN
with_IN royalty_NN ._. Tradition_NN always_RB places_VBZ the_DT power_NN of_IN making_VBG rain_NN as_IN
the_DT fundamental_JJ glory_NN of_IN ancient_JJ chiefs_NNS and_CC heroes_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ
probable_JJ that_IN it_PRP may_MD have_VB been_VBN the_DT origin_NN of_IN chieftainship_NN ._. The_DT man_NN
who_WP made_VBD the_DT rain_NN would_MD naturally_RB become_VB the_DT chief_NN ._. In_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN
Chaka_NNP [_VBD the_DT famous_JJ Zulu_NNP despot_NN ]_NN used_VBN to_TO declare_VB that_IN he_PRP was_VBD the_DT only_RB
diviner_NN in_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, for_IN if_IN he_PRP allowed_VBD rivals_NNS his_PRP$ life_NN would_MD be_VB
insecure_JJ ."_NN Similarly_RB speaking_VBG of_IN the_DT South_JJ African_JJ tribes_NNS in_IN
general_JJ ,_, Dr_NNP ._. Moffat_NNP says_VBZ that_IN "_`` the_DT rain-maker_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT estimation_NN
of_IN the_DT people_NNS no_DT mean_JJ personage_NN ,_, possessing_VBG an_DT influence_NN over_IN the_DT
minds_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS superior_JJ even_RB to_TO that_DT of_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ
likewise_RB compelled_VBN to_TO yield_VB to_TO the_DT dictates_NNS of_IN this_DT arch-official_JJ ."_NN

The_DT foregoing_JJ evidence_NN renders_NNS it_PRP probable_JJ that_IN in_IN Africa_NNP the_DT king_NN
has_VBZ often_RB been_VBN developed_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT public_JJ magician_NN ,_, and_CC especially_RB
out_IN of_IN the_DT rain-maker_NN ._. The_DT unbounded_JJ fear_NN which_WDT the_DT magician_NN
inspires_NNS and_CC the_DT wealth_NN which_WDT he_PRP amasses_VBZ in_IN the_DT exercise_NN of_IN his_PRP$
profession_NN may_MD both_PDT be_VB supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB contributed_VBN to_TO his_PRP$
promotion_NN ._. But_CC if_IN the_DT career_NN of_IN a_DT magician_NN and_CC especially_RB of_IN a_DT
rain-maker_NN offers_VBZ great_JJ rewards_NNS to_TO the_DT successful_JJ practitioner_NN of_IN
the_DT art_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ beset_VBN with_IN many_JJ pitfalls_NNS into_IN which_WDT the_DT unskilful_JJ or_CC
unlucky_JJ artist_NN may_MD fall_VB ._. The_DT position_NN of_IN the_DT public_JJ sorcerer_NN is_VBZ
indeed_RB a_DT very_RB precarious_JJ one_CD ;_: for_IN where_WRB the_DT people_NNS firmly_RB believe_VBP
that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ it_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ power_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT rain_NN to_TO fall_VB ,_, the_DT sun_NN to_TO
shine_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN to_TO grow_VB ,_, they_PRP naturally_RB impute_VB
drought_NN and_CC dearth_NN to_TO his_PRP$ culpable_JJ negligence_NN or_CC wilful_JJ obstinacy_NN ,_,
and_CC they_PRP punish_VB him_PRP accordingly_RB ._. Hence_RB in_IN Africa_NNP the_DT chief_NN who_WP fails_VBZ
to_TO procure_VB rain_NN is_VBZ often_RB exiled_VBN or_CC killed_VBN ._. Thus_RB ,_, in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN
West_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, when_WRB prayers_NNS and_CC offerings_NNS presented_VBN to_TO the_DT king_NN have_VBP
failed_VBD to_TO procure_VB rain_NN ,_, his_PRP$ subjects_NNS bind_VBP him_PRP with_IN ropes_NNS and_CC take_VB
him_PRP by_IN force_NN to_TO the_DT grave_NN of_IN his_PRP$ forefathers_NNS that_IN he_PRP may_MD obtain_VB from_IN
them_PRP the_DT needed_JJ rain_NN ._. The_DT Banjars_NNP in_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP ascribe_VBP to_TO their_PRP$
king_NN the_DT power_NN of_IN causing_VBG rain_NN or_CC fine_JJ weather_NN ._. So_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT
weather_NN is_VBZ fine_JJ they_PRP load_VB him_PRP with_IN presents_NNS of_IN grain_NN and_CC cattle_NNS ._. But_CC
if_IN long_JJ drought_NN or_CC rain_NN threatens_VBZ to_TO spoil_VB the_DT crops_NNS ,_, they_PRP insult_VB
and_CC beat_VBD him_PRP till_IN the_DT weather_NN changes_NNS ._. When_WRB the_DT harvest_NN fails_VBZ or_CC the_DT
surf_NN on_IN the_DT coast_NN is_VBZ too_RB heavy_JJ to_TO allow_VB of_IN fishing_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS of_IN
Loango_NN accuse_VB their_PRP$ king_NN of_IN a_DT "_`` bad_JJ heart_NN "_'' and_CC depose_VBD him_PRP ._. On_IN the_DT
Grain_NN Coast_NNP the_DT high_JJ priest_NN or_CC fetish_JJ king_NN ,_, who_WP bears_VBZ the_DT title_NN of_IN
Bodio_NNP ,_, is_VBZ responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT community_NN ,_, the_DT fertility_NN
of_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT abundance_NN of_IN fish_NN in_IN the_DT sea_NN and_CC rivers_NNS ;_: and_CC
if_IN the_DT country_NN suffers_VBZ in_IN any_DT of_IN these_DT respects_NNS the_DT Bodio_NNP is_VBZ deposed_VBN
from_IN his_PRP$ office_NN ._. In_IN Ussukuma_NNP ,_, a_DT great_JJ district_NN on_IN the_DT southern_JJ bank_NN
of_IN the_DT Victoria_NNP Nyanza_NNP ,_, "_`` the_DT rain_NN and_CC locust_JJ question_NN is_VBZ part_NN and_CC
parcel_NN of_IN the_DT Sultan_NNP '_POS s_PRP government_NN ._. He_PRP ,_, too_RB ,_, must_MD know_VB how_WRB to_TO make_VB
rain_NN and_CC drive_NN away_RB the_DT locusts_NNS ._. If_IN he_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ medicine-men_NNS are_VBP
unable_JJ to_TO accomplish_VB this_DT ,_, his_PRP$ whole_JJ existence_NN is_VBZ at_IN stake_NN in_IN times_NNS
of_IN distress_NN ._. On_IN a_DT certain_JJ occasion_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT rain_NN so_RB greatly_RB desired_VBN
by_IN the_DT people_NNS did_VBD not_RB come_VBN ,_, the_DT Sultan_NNP was_VBD simply_RB driven_VBN out_IN (_-LRB- in_IN
Ututwa_NNP ,_, near_IN Nassa_NNP )._, The_DT people_NNS ,_, in_IN fact_NN ,_, hold_VB that_DT rulers_NNS must_MD have_VB

The_DT belief_NN that_IN kings_NNS possess_VBP magical_JJ or_CC supernatural_JJ powers_NNS by_IN

misshaped_VBN offspring_NN is_VBZ born_VBN ."_RP In_IN Homeric_NNP Greece_NNP kings_NNS and_CC chiefs_NNS

and_CC their_PRP$ chariots_NNS sacred_JJ ;_: and_CC it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN that_IN the_DT reign_NN of_IN a_DT

Perhaps_RB the_DT last_JJ relic_NN of_IN such_JJ superstitions_NNS which_WDT lingered_VBD about_IN

patient_NN ,_, he_PRP said_VBD to_TO him_PRP ,_, "_`` God_NNP give_VB you_PRP better_JJR health_NN and_CC more_RBR
sense_NN ."_IN However_RB ,_, the_DT practice_NN was_VBD continued_VBN ,_, as_RB might_MD have_VB been_VBN

On_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, we_PRP seem_VBP to_TO be_VB justified_VBN in_IN inferring_NN that_IN in_IN
many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN the_DT king_NN is_VBZ the_DT lineal_JJ successor_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ
magician_NN or_CC medicine-man_JJ ._. When_WRB once_RB a_DT special_JJ class_NN of_IN sorcerers_NNS has_VBZ
been_VBN segregated_VBN from_IN the_DT community_NN and_CC entrusted_VBN by_IN it_PRP with_IN the_DT
discharge_NN of_IN duties_NNS on_IN which_WDT the_DT public_JJ safety_NN and_CC welfare_NN are_VBP

strict_JJ sense_NN of_IN the_DT word_NN ,_, will_MD form_VB the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT following_VBG

VII_NNP ._. Incarnate_NNP Human_NNP Gods_.

THE_DT INSTANCES_NNS which_WDT in_IN the_DT preceding_VBG chapters_NNS I_PRP have_VBP drawn_VBN from_IN the_DT
beliefs_NNS and_CC practices_NNS of_IN rude_JJ peoples_NNS all_DT over_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, may_MD

a_DT society_NN where_WRB every_DT man_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB endowed_VBN more_RBR or_CC less_RBR

The_DT notion_NN of_IN a_DT man-god_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN a_DT human_JJ being_NN endowed_VBN with_IN divine_JJ or_CC

With_IN these_DT explanations_NNS and_CC cautions_NNS I_PRP will_MD now_RB adduce_VB some_DT examples_NNS

in_IN men_NNS of_IN the_DT humblest_JJ rank_NN ._. In_IN India_NNP ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, one_CD human_JJ god_NN
started_VBN in_IN life_NN as_IN a_DT cotton-bleacher_NN and_CC another_DT as_IN the_DT son_NN of_IN a_DT

deity_NN in_IN human_JJ form_NN ._. Such_JJ incarnate_JJ gods_NNS are_VBP common_JJ in_IN rude_JJ society_NN ._.
The_DT incarnation_NN may_MD be_VB temporary_JJ or_CC permanent_JJ ._. In_IN the_DT former_JJ case_NN ,_,
the_DT incarnation_NN --_: commonly_RB known_VBN as_IN inspiration_NN or_CC
possession_NN --_: reveals_VBZ itself_PRP in_IN supernatural_JJ knowledge_NN rather_RB than_IN in_IN
supernatural_JJ power_NN ._. In_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, its_PRP$ usual_JJ manifestations_NNS are_VBP
divination_NN and_CC prophecy_NN rather_RB than_IN miracles_NNS ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_,
when_WRB the_DT incarnation_NN is_VBZ not_RB merely_RB temporary_JJ ,_, when_WRB the_DT divine_JJ spirit_NN
has_VBZ permanently_RB taken_VBN up_RP its_PRP$ abode_NN in_IN a_DT human_JJ body_NN ,_, the_DT god-man_NN is_VBZ
usually_RB expected_VBN to_TO vindicate_VB his_PRP$ character_NN by_IN working_VBG miracles_NNS ._.
Only_RB we_PRP have_VBP to_TO remember_VB that_IN by_IN men_NNS at_IN this_DT stage_NN of_IN thought_NN

conceiving_VBG the_DT existence_NN of_IN natural_JJ law_NN ,_, primitive_JJ man_NN cannot_.
conceive_VB a_DT breach_NN of_IN it_PRP ._. A_DT miracle_NN is_VBZ to_TO him_PRP merely_RB an_DT unusually_RB

The_DT belief_NN in_IN temporary_JJ incarnation_NN or_CC inspiration_NN is_VBZ world-wide_JJ ._.
Certain_JJ persons_NNS are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB possessed_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN by_IN a_DT
spirit_NN or_CC deity_NN ;_: while_IN the_DT possession_NN lasts_VBZ ,_, their_PRP$ own_JJ personality_NN
lies_VBZ in_IN abeyance_NN ,_, the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT spirit_NN is_VBZ revealed_VBN by_IN
convulsive_JJ shiverings_NNS and_CC shakings_NNS of_IN the_DT man_NN '_POS s_VBZ whole_JJ body_NN ,_, by_IN wild_JJ
gestures_NNS and_CC excited_JJ looks_NNS ,_, all_DT of_IN which_WDT are_VBP referred_VBN ,_, not_RB to_TO the_DT
man_NN himself_PRP ,_, but_CC to_TO the_DT spirit_NN which_WDT has_VBZ entered_VBN into_IN him_PRP ;_: and_CC in_IN
this_DT abnormal_JJ state_NN all_DT his_PRP$ utterances_NNS are_VBP accepted_VBN as_IN the_DT voice_NN of_IN
the_DT god_NN or_CC spirit_NN dwelling_NN in_IN him_PRP and_CC speaking_VBG through_IN him_PRP ._. Thus_RB ,_,
for_IN example_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT Sandwich_NNP Islands_NNP ,_, the_DT king_NN ,_, personating_VBG the_DT god_NN ,_,
uttered_VBD the_DT responses_NNS of_IN the_DT oracle_NN from_IN his_PRP$ concealment_NN in_IN a_DT frame_NN

"_`` frequently_RB entered_VBN the_DT priest_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, inflated_VBD as_IN it_PRP were_VBD with_IN the_DT
divinity_NN ,_, ceased_VBD to_TO act_VB or_CC speak_VB as_IN a_DT voluntary_JJ agent_NN ,_, but_CC moved_VBD and_CC
spoke_VBD as_IN entirely_RB under_IN supernatural_JJ influence_NN ._. In_IN this_DT respect_NN
there_EX was_VBD a_DT striking_JJ resemblance_NN between_IN the_DT rude_JJ oracles_NNS of_IN the_DT
Polynesians_NNS ,_, and_CC those_DT of_IN the_DT celebrated_JJ nations_NNS of_IN ancient_JJ Greece_NNP ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT god_NN was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB entered_VBN the_DT priest_NN ,_, the_DT
latter_NN became_VBD violently_RB agitated_VBN ,_, and_CC worked_VBD himself_PRP up_RP to_TO the_DT
highest_JJS pitch_NN of_IN apparent_JJ frenzy_NN ,_, the_DT muscles_NNS of_IN the_DT limbs_NNS seemed_VBN

features_NNS distorted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT eyes_NNS wild_JJ and_CC strained_JJ ._. In_IN this_DT state_NN he_PRP
often_RB rolled_VBD on_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, foaming_VBG at_IN the_DT mouth_NN ,_, as_IN if_IN labouring_NN

the_DT will_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ._. The_DT priests_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD attending_VBG ,_, and_CC versed_VBN in_IN
the_DT mysteries_NNS ,_, received_VBN ,_, and_CC reported_VBD to_TO the_DT people_NNS ,_, the_DT
declarations_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN thus_RB received_VBN ._. When_WRB the_DT priest_NN had_VBD
uttered_VBD the_DT response_NN of_IN the_DT oracle_NN ,_, the_DT violent_JJ paroxysm_NN gradually_RB
subsided_VBN ,_, and_CC comparative_JJ composure_NN ensued_VBD ._. The_DT god_NN did_VBD not_RB ,_,
however_RB ,_, always_RB leave_VB him_PRP as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT communication_NN had_VBD been_VBN
made_VBN ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT same_JJ taura_NN ,_, or_CC priest_NN ,_, continued_VBN for_IN two_CD or_CC
three_CD days_NNS possessed_VBN by_IN the_DT spirit_NN or_CC deity_NN ;_: a_DT piece_NN of_IN a_DT native_JJ
cloth_NN ,_, of_IN a_DT peculiar_JJ kind_NN ,_, worn_VBN round_RB one_CD arm_NN ,_, was_VBD an_DT indication_NN of_IN
inspiration_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN the_DT indwelling_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN with_IN the_DT individual_NN who_WP
wore_VBD it_PRP ._. The_DT acts_NNS of_IN the_DT man_NN during_IN this_DT period_NN were_VBD considered_VBN as_IN
those_DT of_IN the_DT god_NN ,_, and_CC hence_RB the_DT greatest_JJS attention_NN was_VBD paid_VBN to_TO his_PRP$
expressions_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT whole_NN of_IN his_PRP$ deportment_NN ._. ._. ._. ._. When_WRB uruhia_NN
(_-LRB- under_IN the_DT inspiration_NN of_IN the_DT spirit_NN ),_IN the_DT priest_NN was_VBD always_RB
considered_VBN as_RB sacred_JJ as_IN the_DT god_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD called_VBN ,_, during_IN this_DT period_NN ,_,
atua_NN ,_, god_NN ,_, though_IN at_IN other_JJ times_NNS only_RB denominated_VBD taura_NN or_CC
priest_NN ."_POS

But_CC examples_NNS of_IN such_JJ temporary_JJ inspiration_NN are_VBP so_RB common_JJ in_IN every_DT

principle_NN ._. It_PRP may_MD be_VB well_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO refer_VB to_TO two_CD particular_JJ modes_NNS
of_IN producing_VBG temporary_JJ inspiration_NN ,_, because_IN they_PRP are_VBP perhaps_RB less_RBR

or_CC divined_VBN ._. At_IN Aegira_NNP in_IN Achaia_NNP the_DT priestess_NN of_IN Earth_NNP drank_VBD the_DT

The_DT ancient_JJ Germans_NNPS believed_VBD that_IN there_EX was_VBD something_NN holy_JJ in_IN women_NNS ,_,

he_PRP does_VBZ not_RB wish_VB it_PRP to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, or_CC is_VBZ too_RB hot_JJ ,_, he_PRP shoots_VBZ arrows_NNS at_IN the_DT
sky_NN for_IN not_RB obeying_VBG him_PRP ."_IN The_DT Mashona_NNP of_IN Southern_NNP Africa_NNP informed_VBD
their_PRP$ bishop_NN that_IN they_PRP had_VBD once_RB had_VBD a_DT god_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN the_DT Matabeles_NNP

in_IN some_DT villages_NNS of_IN keeping_VBG a_DT man_NN they_PRP called_VBD their_PRP$ god_NN ._. He_PRP seemed_VBD

was_VBD one_CD at_IN a_DT village_NN belonging_VBG to_TO a_DT chief_NN Magondi_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT old_JJ days_NNS ._.
We_PRP were_VBD asked_VBN not_RB to_TO fire_VB off_RP any_DT guns_NNS near_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, or_CC we_PRP
should_MD frighten_VB him_PRP away_RB ."_'' This_DT Mashona_NNP god_NN was_VBD formerly_RB bound_VBN to_TO
render_NN an_DT annual_JJ tribute_NN to_TO the_DT king_NN of_IN the_DT Matabele_NNP in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN

the_DT deity_NN discharging_VBG the_DT latter_JJ part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duty_NN in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT
royal_JJ hut_NN ._. For_IN three_CD mortal_JJ hours_NNS ,_, without_IN a_DT break_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT banging_NN
of_IN a_DT tambourine_NN ,_, the_DT click_NN of_IN castanettes_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT drone_NN of_IN a_DT

A_DT peculiarly_JJ bloodthirsty_NN monarch_NN of_IN Burma_NNP ,_, by_IN name_NN Badonsachen_NNP ,_,

A_DT Hindoo_NNP sect_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ many_JJ representatives_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC Central_NNP

Christianity_NNP itself_PRP has_VBZ not_RB uniformly_RB escaped_VBD the_DT taint_NN of_IN these_DT

surpassing_VBG that_IN of_IN its_PRP$ great_JJ Founder_NN ._. In_IN the_DT second_JJ century_NN Montanus_.
the_DT Phrygian_JJ claimed_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT incarnate_JJ Trinity_NNP ,_, uniting_NN in_IN his_PRP$
single_JJ person_NN God_NNP the_DT Father_NNP ,_, God_NNP the_DT Son_NN ,_, and_CC God_NNP the_DT Holy_NNP Ghost_NNP ._.

records_NNS that_IN this_DT was_VBD done_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ fellow-Christians_NNS at_IN Carthage_NNP in_IN
the_DT second_JJ century_NN ;_: the_DT disciples_NNS of_IN St_NNP ._. Columba_NNP worshipped_VBD him_PRP as_IN
an_DT embodiment_NN of_IN Christ_NNP ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT eighth_JJ century_NN Elipandus_NNP of_IN
Toledo_NNP spoke_VBD of_IN Christ_NNP as_IN "_`` a_DT god_NN among_IN gods_NNS ,"_IN meaning_NN that_IN all_PDT
believers_NNS were_VBD gods_NNS just_RB as_RB truly_RB as_IN Jesus_NNP himself_PRP ._. The_DT adoration_NN of_IN
each_DT other_JJ was_VBD customary_JJ among_IN the_DT Albigenses_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ noticed_VBN
hundreds_NNS of_IN times_NNS in_IN the_DT records_NNS of_IN the_DT Inquisition_NNP at_IN Toulouse_NNP in_IN
the_DT early_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT fourteenth_JJ century_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT thirteenth_JJ century_NN there_RB arose_VBD a_DT sect_NN called_VBD the_DT Brethren_NNP and_CC
Sisters_NNS of_IN the_DT Free_NNP Spirit_NNP ,_, who_WP held_VBD that_IN by_IN long_JJ and_CC assiduous_JJ
contemplation_NN any_DT man_NN might_MD be_VB united_VBN to_TO the_DT deity_NN in_IN an_DT ineffable_JJ

that_WDT was_VBD known_VBN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ was_VBD summed_VBN up_RP in_IN him_PRP ."_.

destined_VBN to_TO exercise_VB a_DT most_RBS far-reaching_JJ influence_NN on_IN the_DT political_JJ ,_,
religious_JJ ,_, and_CC intellectual_JJ evolution_NN of_IN mankind_NN ._. Social_NNP progress_NN ,_,

functions_NNS ,_, or_CC ,_, in_IN simpler_JJR language_NN ,_, a_DT division_NN of_IN labour_NN ._. The_DT work_NN
which_WDT in_IN primitive_JJ society_NN is_VBZ done_VBN by_IN all_DT alike_RB and_CC by_IN all_DT equally_RB

and_CC the_DT process_NN of_IN differentiation_NN continues_VBZ ,_, the_DT order_NN of_IN
medicine-men_NNS is_VBZ itself_PRP subdivided_VBN into_IN such_JJ classes_NNS as_IN the_DT healers_NNS
of_IN disease_NN ,_, the_DT makers_NNS of_IN rain_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ;_: while_IN the_DT most_RBS

and_CC gradually_RB develops_VBZ into_IN a_DT sacred_JJ king_NN ,_, his_PRP$ old_JJ magical_JJ functions_NNS

VIII_NNP ._. Departmental_NNP Kings_NNP of_IN Nature_NN

THE_DT PRECEDING_NN investigation_NN has_VBZ proved_VBN that_IN the_DT same_JJ union_NN of_IN sacred_JJ
functions_NNS with_IN a_DT royal_JJ title_NN which_WDT meets_VBZ us_PRP in_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP
at_IN Nemi_NNP ,_, the_DT Sacrificial_NNP King_NNP at_IN Rome_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT magistrate_NN called_VBD the_DT
King_NNP at_IN Athens_NNP ,_, occurs_VBZ frequently_RB outside_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN classical_JJ
antiquity_NN and_CC is_VBZ a_DT common_JJ feature_NN of_IN societies_NNS at_IN all_DT stages_NNS from_IN
barbarism_NN to_TO civilisation_NN ._. Further_RB ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN the_DT royal_JJ priest_NN
is_VBZ often_RB a_DT king_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB in_IN name_NN but_CC in_IN fact_NN ,_, swaying_VBG the_DT sceptre_NN

the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT titular_JJ and_CC priestly_RB kings_NNS in_IN the_DT republics_NNS of_IN
ancient_JJ Greece_NNP and_CC Italy_NNP ._. At_IN least_JJS by_IN showing_VBG that_IN the_DT combination_NN
of_IN spiritual_JJ and_CC temporal_JJ power_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT Graeco-Italian_NNP tradition_NN
preserved_VBN the_DT memory_NN ,_, has_VBZ actually_RB existed_VBN in_IN many_JJ places_NNS ,_, we_PRP have_VBP

the_DT tradition_NN ._. Therefore_RB we_PRP may_MD now_RB fairly_RB ask_VB ,_, May_MD not_RB the_DT King_NNP of_IN
the_DT Wood_NNP have_VBP had_VBN an_DT origin_NN like_IN that_WDT which_WDT a_DT probable_JJ tradition_NN
assigns_NNS to_TO the_DT Sacrificial_NNP King_NNP of_IN Rome_NNP and_CC the_DT titular_JJ King_NNP of_IN
Athens_NNP ?_. In_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, may_MD not_RB his_PRP$ predecessors_NNS in_IN office_NN have_VBP been_VBN

his_PRP$ predecessors_NNS had_VBD been_VBN kings_NNS in_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ sense_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD

was_VBD three_CD miles_NNS off_RB from_IN his_PRP$ forest_NN sanctuary_NN by_IN the_DT lake_NN shore_NN ._. If_IN
he_PRP reigned_VBD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD not_RB in_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT greenwood_NN ._. Again_RB his_PRP$

ever_RB been_VBN a_DT king_NN in_IN the_DT common_JJ sense_NN of_IN the_DT word_NN ._. More_RBR likely_JJ he_PRP was_VBD

may_MD call_VB departmental_JJ kings_NNS of_IN nature_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ of_IN persons_NNS supposed_VBN

departmental_JJ kings_NNS are_VBP not_RB wanting_VBG ._.

On_IN a_DT hill_NN at_IN Bomma_NNP near_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT Congo_NNP dwells_VBZ Namvulu_NNP Vumu_NNP ,_,
King_NNP of_IN the_DT Rain_NNP and_CC Storm_NNP ._. Of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT tribes_NNS on_IN the_DT Upper_NNP Nile_NNP
we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN they_PRP have_VBP no_DT kings_NNS in_IN the_DT common_JJ sense_NN ;_: the_DT only_RB
persons_NNS whom_WP they_PRP acknowledge_VBP as_IN such_JJ are_VBP the_DT Kings_NNP of_IN the_DT Rain_NNP ,_,
Mata_NNP Kodou_NNP ,_, who_WP are_VBP credited_VBN with_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN giving_VBG rain_NN at_IN the_DT
proper_JJ time_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, the_DT rainy_JJ season_NN ._. Before_IN the_DT rains_NNS begin_VBP to_TO
fall_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN March_NNP the_DT country_NN is_VBZ a_DT parched_VBN and_CC arid_JJ desert_NN ;_:
and_CC the_DT cattle_NNS ,_, which_WDT form_VBP the_DT people_NNS '_POS s_PRP chief_JJ wealth_NN ,_, perish_NN for_IN
lack_NN of_IN grass_NN ._. So_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT end_NN of_IN March_NNP draws_VBZ on_IN ,_, each_DT householder_NN
betakes_NNS himself_PRP to_TO the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Rain_NNP and_CC offers_VBZ him_PRP a_DT cow_NN that_IN he_PRP
may_MD make_VB the_DT blessed_JJ waters_NNS of_IN heaven_NN to_TO drip_VB on_IN the_DT brown_JJ and_CC
withered_VBN pastures_NNS ._. If_IN no_DT shower_NN falls_VBZ ,_, the_DT people_NNS assemble_NN and_CC
demand_NN that_IN the_DT king_NN shall_MD give_VB them_PRP rain_NN ;_: and_CC if_IN the_DT sky_NN still_RB
continues_VBZ cloudless_RB ,_, they_PRP rip_VB up_RP his_PRP$ belly_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN
to_TO keep_VB the_DT storms_NNS ._. Amongst_IN the_DT Bari_NNP tribe_NN one_CD of_IN these_DT Rain_NNP Kings_NNPS
made_VBN rain_NN by_IN sprinkling_NN water_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN out_IN of_IN a_DT handbell_NN ._.

Among_IN tribes_NNS on_IN the_DT outskirts_NNS of_IN Abyssinia_NNP a_DT similar_JJ office_NN exists_VBZ
and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN thus_RB described_VBN by_IN an_DT observer_NN :_: "_`` The_DT priesthood_NN of_IN the_DT

he_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO make_VB rain_NN ._. This_DT office_NN formerly_RB existed_VBN
among_IN the_DT Algeds_NNP and_CC appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB still_RB common_JJ to_TO the_DT Nuba_NNP negroes_NNS ._.
The_DT Alfai_NNP of_IN the_DT Barea_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ also_RB consulted_VBN by_IN the_DT northern_JJ
Kunama_NNP ,_, lives_VBZ near_IN Tembadere_NNP on_IN a_DT mountain_NN alone_RB with_IN his_PRP$ family_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS bring_VBP him_PRP tribute_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN clothes_NNS and_CC fruits_NNS ,_, and_CC
cultivate_JJ for_IN him_PRP a_DT large_JJ field_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ._. He_PRP is_VBZ a_DT kind_NN of_IN king_NN ,_,
and_CC his_PRP$ office_NN passes_NNS by_IN inheritance_NN to_TO his_PRP$ brother_NN or_CC sister_NN '_'' s_PRP son_NN ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO conjure_VB down_IN rain_NN and_CC to_TO drive_VB away_RB the_DT locusts_NNS ._.
But_CC if_IN he_PRP disappoints_VBZ the_DT people_NNS '_POS s_PRP expectation_NN and_CC a_DT great_JJ drought_NN
arises_VBZ in_IN the_DT land_NN ,_, the_DT Alfai_NNP is_VBZ stoned_VBN to_TO death_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ nearest_JJS
relations_NNS are_VBP obliged_VBN to_TO cast_VB the_DT first_JJ stone_NN at_IN him_PRP ._. When_WRB we_PRP passed_VBD
through_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, the_DT office_NN of_IN Alfai_NNP was_VBD still_RB held_VBN by_IN an_DT old_JJ

and_CC that_IN he_PRP had_VBD renounced_VBN his_PRP$ office_NN ."_.

In_IN the_DT backwoods_NNS of_IN Cambodia_NNP live_VBP two_CD mysterious_JJ sovereigns_NNS known_VBN as_IN
the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Fire_NNP and_CC the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Water_NNP ._. Their_PRP$ fame_NN is_VBZ spread_VBN
all_DT over_IN the_DT south_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ Indo-Chinese_JJ peninsula_NN ;_: but_CC only_RB a_DT

their_PRP$ very_JJ existence_NN might_MD have_VB passed_VBN for_IN a_DT fable_JJ ,_, were_VBD it_PRP not_RB that_IN
till_IN lately_RB communications_NNS were_VBD regularly_RB maintained_VBN between_IN them_PRP
and_CC the_DT King_NNP of_IN Cambodia_NNP ,_, who_WP year_NN by_IN year_NN exchanged_VBD presents_NNS with_IN
them_PRP ._. Their_PRP$ royal_JJ functions_NNS are_VBP of_IN a_DT purely_RB mystic_JJ or_CC spiritual_JJ
order_NN ;_: they_PRP have_VBP no_DT political_JJ authority_NN ;_: they_PRP are_VBP simple_JJ peasants_NNS ,_,
living_VBG by_IN the_DT sweat_NN of_IN their_PRP$ brow_NN and_CC the_DT offerings_NNS of_IN the_DT faithful_NN ._.
According_VBG to_TO one_CD account_NN they_PRP live_VBP in_IN absolute_JJ solitude_NN ,_, never_RB
meeting_VBG each_DT other_JJ and_CC never_RB seeing_VBG a_DT human_JJ face_NN ._. They_PRP inhabit_VBP
successively_RB seven_CD towers_NNS perched_VBN upon_IN seven_CD mountains_NNS ,_, and_CC every_DT

cast_NN within_IN their_PRP$ reach_VBP what_WP is_VBZ needful_JJ for_IN their_PRP$ subsistence_NN ._. The_DT
kingship_NN lasts_VBZ seven_CD years_NNS ,_, the_DT time_NN necessary_JJ to_TO inhabit_VB all_PDT the_DT
towers_NNS successively_RB ;_: but_CC many_JJ die_VBP before_IN their_PRP$ time_NN is_VBZ out_RB ._. The_DT
offices_NNS are_VBP hereditary_RB in_IN one_CD or_CC (_-LRB- according_VBG to_TO others_NNS )_-RRB- two_CD royal_JJ
families_NNS ,_, who_WP enjoy_VBP high_JJ consideration_NN ,_, have_VBP revenues_NNS assigned_VBN to_TO
them_PRP ,_, and_CC are_VBP exempt_JJ from_IN the_DT necessity_NN of_IN tilling_VBG the_DT ground_NN ._. But_CC
naturally_RB the_DT dignity_NN is_VBZ not_RB coveted_VBN ,_, and_CC when_WRB a_DT vacancy_NN occurs_VBZ ,_, all_PDT
eligible_JJ men_NNS (_-LRB- they_PRP must_MD be_VB strong_JJ and_CC have_JJ children_NNS )_-RRB- flee_NN and_CC hide_VB
themselves_PRP ._. Another_DT account_NN ,_, admitting_VBG the_DT reluctance_NN of_IN the_DT
hereditary_JJ candidates_NNS to_TO accept_VB the_DT crown_NN ,_, does_VBZ not_RB countenance_VB the_DT
report_NN of_IN their_PRP$ hermit-like_JJ seclusion_NN in_IN the_DT seven_CD towers_NNS ._. For_IN it_PRP
represents_VBZ the_DT people_NNS as_IN prostrating_VBG themselves_PRP before_IN the_DT mystic_JJ
kings_NNS whenever_WRB they_PRP appear_VBP in_IN public_JJ ,_, it_PRP being_VBG thought_VBN that_IN a_DT
terrible_JJ hurricane_NN would_MD burst_VB over_IN the_DT country_NN if_IN this_DT mark_NN of_IN

read_VBN in_IN the_DT sequel_NN ,_, the_DT Kings_NNP of_IN Fire_NNP and_CC Water_NNP are_VBP not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO
die_VB a_DT natural_JJ death_NN ,_, for_IN that_DT would_MD lower_VB their_PRP$ reputation_NN ._.
Accordingly_RB when_WRB one_CD of_IN them_PRP is_VBZ seriously_RB ill_JJ ,_, the_DT elders_NNS hold_VBP a_DT

back_RB when_WRB she_PRP goes_VBZ to_TO weep_VB on_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN '_POS s_VBZ grave_JJ ._.

We_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN the_DT Fire_NNP King_NNP ,_, the_DT more_RBR important_JJ of_IN the_DT two_CD ,_, whose_WP$
supernatural_JJ powers_NNS have_VBP never_RB been_VBN questioned_VBN ,_, officiates_NNS at_IN
marriages_NNS ,_, festivals_NNS ,_, and_CC sacrifices_NNS in_IN honour_NN of_IN the_DT Yan_NN or_CC
spirit_NN ._. On_IN these_DT occasions_NNS a_DT special_JJ place_NN is_VBZ set_VBN apart_RB for_IN him_PRP ;_: and_CC
the_DT path_NN by_IN which_WDT he_PRP approaches_VBZ is_VBZ spread_VBN with_IN white_JJ cotton_NN cloths_NNS ._.
A_DT reason_NN for_IN confining_VBG the_DT royal_JJ dignity_NN to_TO the_DT same_JJ family_NN is_VBZ that_IN
this_DT family_NN is_VBZ in_IN possession_NN of_IN certain_JJ famous_JJ talismans_NNS which_WDT would_MD

These_DT talismans_NNS are_VBP three_CD :_: the_DT fruit_NN of_IN a_DT creeper_NN called_VBN Cui_NNP ,_,
gathered_VBN ages_NNS ago_RB at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ deluge_NN ,_, but_CC still_RB fresh_JJ
and_CC green_JJ ;_: a_DT rattan_NN ,_, also_RB very_RB old_JJ but_CC bearing_VBG flowers_NNS that_WDT never_RB
fade_NN ;_: and_CC lastly_RB ,_, a_DT sword_NN containing_VBG a_DT Yan_NN or_CC spirit_NN ,_, who_WP guards_NNS
it_PRP constantly_RB and_CC works_VBZ miracles_NNS with_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT spirit_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO be_VB
that_IN of_IN a_DT slave_NN ,_, whose_WP$ blood_NN chanced_VBD to_TO fall_VB upon_IN the_DT blade_NN while_IN it_PRP
was_VBD being_VBG forged_VBN ,_, and_CC who_WP died_VBD a_DT voluntary_JJ death_NN to_TO expiate_VB his_PRP$
involuntary_JJ offence_NN ._. By_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT two_CD former_JJ talismans_NNS the_DT Water_NN
King_NNP can_MD raise_VB a_DT flood_NN that_WDT would_MD drown_VB the_DT whole_JJ earth_NN ._. If_IN the_DT Fire_NN
King_NNP draws_VBZ the_DT magic_NN sword_VBD a_DT few_JJ inches_NNS from_IN its_PRP$ sheath_NN ,_, the_DT sun_NN is_VBZ
hidden_VBN and_CC men_NNS and_CC beasts_NNS fall_VBP into_IN a_DT profound_JJ sleep_NN ;_: were_VBD he_PRP to_TO
draw_VB it_PRP quite_RB out_RB of_IN the_DT scabbard_NN ,_, the_DT world_NN would_MD come_VB to_TO an_DT end_NN ._.
To_TO this_DT wondrous_JJ brand_NN sacrifices_NNS of_IN buffaloes_NNS ,_, pigs_NNS ,_, fowls_NNS ,_, and_CC
ducks_NNS are_VBP offered_VBN for_IN rain_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ kept_VBN swathed_VBN in_IN cotton_NN and_CC silk_NN ;_:
and_CC amongst_IN the_DT annual_JJ presents_NNS sent_VBN by_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN Cambodia_NNP were_VBD
rich_JJ stuffs_NNS to_TO wrap_VB the_DT sacred_JJ sword_NN ._.

Contrary_NNP to_TO the_DT common_JJ usage_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ to_TO bury_VB the_DT
dead_JJ ,_, the_DT bodies_NNS of_IN both_DT these_DT mystic_JJ monarchs_NNS are_VBP burnt_JJ ,_, but_CC their_PRP$
nails_NNS and_CC some_DT of_IN their_PRP$ teeth_NNS and_CC bones_NNS are_VBP religiously_RB preserved_VBN as_IN
amulets_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ while_IN the_DT corpse_NN is_VBZ being_VBG consumed_VBN on_IN the_DT pyre_NN that_WDT
the_DT kinsmen_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ magician_NN flee_NN to_TO the_DT forest_NN and_CC hide_NN
themselves_PRP ,_, for_IN fear_NN of_IN being_VBG elevated_VBN to_TO the_DT invidious_JJ dignity_NN
which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ just_RB vacated_VBN ._. The_DT people_NNS go_VBP and_CC search_NN for_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC
the_DT first_RB whose_WP$ lurking_VBG place_NN they_PRP discover_VBP is_VBZ made_VBN King_NNP of_IN Fire_NNP or_CC
Water_NN ._.

These_DT ,_, then_RB ,_, are_VBP examples_NNS of_IN what_WP I_PRP have_VBP called_VBN departmental_JJ kings_NNS
of_IN nature_NN ._. But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT far_JJ cry_NN to_TO Italy_NNP from_IN the_DT forests_NNS of_IN Cambodia_NNP
and_CC the_DT sources_NNS of_IN the_DT Nile_NNP ._. And_CC though_IN Kings_NNP of_IN Rain_NNP ,_, Water_NNP ,_, and_CC
Fire_NNP have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN ,_, we_PRP have_VBP still_RB to_TO discover_VB a_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP
to_TO match_VB the_DT Arician_JJ priest_NN who_WP bore_VBD that_DT title_NN ._. Perhaps_RB we_PRP shall_MD
find_VB him_PRP nearer_IN home_NN ._.



IX_NNP ._. The_DT Worship_NNP of_IN Trees_NNS



1._. Tree-spirits_.

IN_IN THE_DT RELIGIOUS_NNS history_NN of_IN the_DT Aryan_NNP race_NN in_IN Europe_NNP the_DT worship_NN of_IN
trees_NNS has_VBZ played_VBN an_DT important_JJ part_NN ._. Nothing_NN could_MD be_VB more_JJR natural_NN ._.
For_IN at_IN the_DT dawn_NN of_IN history_NN Europe_NNP was_VBD covered_VBN with_IN immense_JJ primaeval_NN
forests_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT scattered_JJ clearings_NNS must_MD have_VB appeared_VBN like_IN
islets_NNS in_IN an_DT ocean_NN of_IN green_JJ ._. Down_IN to_TO the_DT first_JJ century_NN before_IN our_PRP$
era_NN the_DT Hercynian_JJ forest_NN stretched_VBD eastward_RB from_IN the_DT Rhine_NNP for_IN a_DT
distance_NN at_IN once_RB vast_JJ and_CC unknown_JJ ;_: Germans_NNS whom_WP Caesar_NNP questioned_VBD
had_VBD travelled_VBN for_IN two_CD months_NNS through_IN it_PRP without_IN reaching_VBG the_DT end_NN ._.
Four_CD centuries_NNS later_RB it_PRP was_VBD visited_VBN by_IN the_DT Emperor_NNP Julian_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT
solitude_NN ,_, the_DT gloom_NN ,_, the_DT silence_NN of_IN the_DT forest_NN appear_VBP to_TO have_VB made_VBN a_DT
deep_JJ impression_NN on_IN his_PRP$ sensitive_JJ nature_NN ._. He_PRP declared_VBD that_IN he_PRP knew_VBD
nothing_NN like_IN it_PRP in_IN the_DT Roman_NNP empire_NN ._. In_IN our_PRP$ own_JJ country_NN the_DT wealds_NNS
of_IN Kent_NNP ,_, Surrey_NNP ,_, and_CC Sussex_NNP are_VBP remnants_NNS of_IN the_DT great_JJ forest_NN of_IN
Anderida_NNP ,_, which_WDT once_RB clothed_VBD the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT south-eastern_JJ portion_NN
of_IN the_DT island_NN ._. Westward_IN it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB stretched_VBN till_IN it_PRP joined_VBD
another_DT forest_NN that_WDT extended_VBD from_IN Hampshire_NNP to_TO Devon_NNP ._. In_IN the_DT reign_NN
of_IN Henry_NNP II_NNP ._. the_DT citizens_NNS of_IN London_NNP still_RB hunted_VBD the_DT wild_JJ bull_NN and_CC
the_DT boar_NN in_IN the_DT woods_NNS of_IN Hampstead_NNP ._. Even_RB under_IN the_DT later_RBR
Plantagenets_NNS the_DT royal_JJ forests_NNS were_VBD sixty-eight_JJ in_IN number_NN ._. In_IN the_DT
forest_NN of_IN Arden_JJ it_PRP was_VBD said_VBD that_DT down_RB to_TO modern_JJ times_NNS a_DT squirrel_NN
might_MD leap_VB from_IN tree_NN to_TO tree_NN for_IN nearly_RB the_DT whole_JJ length_NN of_IN
Warwickshire_NNP ._. The_DT excavation_NN of_IN ancient_JJ pile-villages_NNS in_IN the_DT valley_NN
of_IN the_DT Po_NNP has_VBZ shown_VBN that_DT long_JJ before_IN the_DT rise_NN and_CC probably_RB the_DT
foundation_NN of_IN Rome_NNP the_DT north_NN of_IN Italy_NNP was_VBD covered_VBN with_IN dense_JJ woods_NNS
of_IN elms_NNS ,_, chestnuts_NNS ,_, and_CC especially_RB of_IN oaks_NNS ._. Archaeology_NNP is_VBZ here_RB
confirmed_VBN by_IN history_NN ;_: for_IN classical_JJ writers_NNS contain_VBP many_JJ references_NNS
to_TO Italian_JJ forests_NNS which_WDT have_VBP now_RB disappeared_VBN ._. As_IN late_JJ as_IN the_DT fourth_JJ
century_NN before_RB our_PRP$ era_NN Rome_NNP was_VBD divided_VBN from_IN central_JJ Etruria_NNP by_IN the_DT
dreaded_VBN Ciminian_JJ forest_NN ,_, which_WDT Livy_NNP compares_VBZ to_TO the_DT woods_NNS of_IN
Germany_NNP ._. No_DT merchant_NN ,_, if_IN we_PRP may_MD trust_VB the_DT Roman_NNP historian_NN ,_, had_VBD ever_RB
penetrated_VBD its_PRP$ pathless_JJ solitudes_NNS ;_: and_CC it_PRP was_VBD deemed_VBN a_DT most_RBS daring_JJ
feat_NN when_WRB a_DT Roman_NNP general_JJ ,_, after_IN sending_VBG two_CD scouts_NNS to_TO explore_VB its_PRP$
intricacies_NNS ,_, led_VBD his_PRP$ army_NN into_IN the_DT forest_NN and_CC ,_, making_VBG his_PRP$ way_NN to_TO a_DT
ridge_NN of_IN the_DT wooded_JJ mountains_NNS ,_, looked_VBD down_RB on_IN the_DT rich_JJ Etrurian_NN
fields_NNS spread_VBD out_RP below_IN ._. In_IN Greece_NNP beautiful_JJ woods_NNS of_IN pine_NN ,_, oak_NN ,_, and_CC

epoch_NN may_MD have_VB spanned_VBN the_DT Greek_NNP peninsula_NN from_IN sea_NN to_TO sea_NN ._.

From_IN an_DT examination_NN of_IN the_DT Teutonic_JJ words_NNS for_IN "_`` temple_NN "_`` Grimm_NNP has_VBZ
made_VBN it_PRP probable_JJ that_IN amongst_IN the_DT Germans_NNPS the_DT oldest_JJS sanctuaries_NNS
were_VBD natural_JJ woods_NNS ._. However_RB that_DT may_MD be_VB ,_, tree-worship_NN is_VBZ well_RB
attested_VBN for_IN all_DT the_DT great_JJ European_JJ families_NNS of_IN the_DT Aryan_NNP stock_NN ._.
Amongst_IN the_DT Celts_NNS the_DT oak-worship_NN of_IN the_DT Druids_NNP is_VBZ familiar_JJ to_TO every_DT
one_CD ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ old_JJ word_NN for_IN sanctuary_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB identical_JJ in_IN
origin_NN and_CC meaning_NN with_IN the_DT Latin_NNP nemus_NN ,_, a_DT grove_NN or_CC woodland_NN

common_JJ among_IN the_DT ancient_JJ Germans_NNPS ,_, and_CC tree-worship_NN is_VBZ hardly_RB extinct_JJ
amongst_IN their_PRP$ descendants_NNS at_IN the_DT present_JJ day_NN ._. How_WRB serious_JJ that_WDT
worship_NN was_VBD in_IN former_JJ times_NNS may_MD be_VB gathered_VBN from_IN the_DT ferocious_JJ
penalty_NN appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT old_JJ German_JJ laws_NNS for_IN such_JJ as_IN dared_VBN to_TO peel_VB
the_DT bark_NN of_IN a_DT standing_NN tree_NN ._. The_DT culprit_NN '_'' s_PRP navel_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB cut_VBN out_IN
and_CC nailed_VBN to_TO the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT tree_NN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD peeled_VBN ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD
to_TO be_VB driven_VBN round_RB and_CC round_RB the_DT tree_NN till_IN all_DT his_PRP$ guts_NNS were_VBD wound_VBN
about_IN its_PRP$ trunk_NN ._. The_DT intention_NN of_IN the_DT punishment_NN clearly_RB was_VBD to_TO
replace_VB the_DT dead_JJ bark_NN by_IN a_DT living_NN substitute_NN taken_VBN from_IN the_DT culprit_NN ;_:
it_PRP was_VBD a_DT life_NN for_IN a_DT life_NN ,_, the_DT life_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN for_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN a_DT tree_NN ._.
At_IN Upsala_NNP ,_, the_DT old_JJ religious_JJ capital_NN of_IN Sweden_NNP ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT sacred_JJ
grove_NN in_IN which_WDT every_DT tree_NN was_VBD regarded_VBN as_IN divine_JJ ._. The_DT heathen_NN Slavs_NNP
worshipped_VBN trees_NNS and_CC groves_NNS ._. The_DT Lithuanians_NNPS were_VBD not_RB converted_VBN to_TO
Christianity_NNP till_IN towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT fourteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, and_CC
amongst_NN them_PRP at_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN their_PRP$ conversion_NN the_DT worship_NN of_IN trees_NNS
was_VBD prominent_JJ ._. Some_DT of_IN them_PRP revered_VBD remarkable_JJ oaks_NNS and_CC other_JJ great_JJ
shady_JJ trees_NNS ,_, from_IN which_WDT they_PRP received_VBD oracular_JJ responses_NNS ._. Some_DT
maintained_VBN holy_JJ groves_NNS about_IN their_PRP$ villages_NNS or_CC houses_NNS ,_, where_WRB even_RB to_TO
break_VB a_DT twig_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN a_DT sin_NN ._. They_PRP thought_VBD that_IN he_PRP who_WP cut_VBD a_DT
bough_JJ in_IN such_JJ a_DT grove_NN either_CC died_VBD suddenly_RB or_CC was_VBD crippled_VBN in_IN one_CD of_IN
his_PRP$ limbs_NNS ._. Proofs_NNS of_IN the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN tree-worship_NN in_IN ancient_JJ

Cos_NNP ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD forbidden_VBN to_TO cut_VB down_RP the_DT cypress-trees_NNS

echoed_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT street_NN ,_, and_CC soon_RB a_DT crowd_NN might_MD be_VB seen_VBN

(_-LRB- says_VBZ Plutarch_NN )_-RRB- they_PRP were_VBD hastening_VBG to_TO put_VB out_RP a_DT fire_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT tribes_NNS of_IN the_DT Finnish-Ugrian_JJ stock_NN in_IN Europe_NNP the_DT heathen_NN
worship_NN was_VBD performed_VBN for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN in_IN sacred_JJ groves_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD
