former_JJ times_NNS the_DT skins_NNS of_IN the_DT sacrificial_JJ victims_NNS were_VBD hung_VBN ._. The_DT

was_VBD the_DT sacred_JJ tree_NN ,_, beside_IN which_WDT everything_NN else_RB sank_VBD into_IN
insignificance_NN ._. Before_IN it_PRP the_DT worshippers_NNS assembled_VBN and_CC the_DT priest_NN
offered_VBN his_PRP$ prayers_NNS ,_, at_IN its_PRP$ roots_NNS the_DT victim_NN was_VBD sacrificed_JJ ,_, and_CC its_PRP$

But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO examine_VB in_IN some_DT detail_NN the_DT notions_NNS on_IN which_WDT
the_DT worship_NN of_IN trees_NNS and_CC plants_NNS is_VBZ based_VBN ._. To_TO the_DT savage_JJ the_DT world_NN in_IN
general_JJ is_VBZ animate_NN ,_, and_CC trees_NNS and_CC plants_NNS are_VBP no_DT exception_NN to_TO the_DT
rule_NN ._. He_PRP thinks_VBZ that_IN they_PRP have_VBP souls_NNS like_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, and_CC he_PRP treats_VBZ
them_PRP accordingly_RB ._. "_'' They_PRP say_VBP ,"_NN writes_VBZ the_DT ancient_JJ vegetarian_NN

superstition_NN did_VBD not_RB stop_VB at_IN animals_NNS but_CC extended_VBD even_RB to_TO plants_NNS ._.
For_IN why_WRB should_MD the_DT slaughter_NN of_IN an_DT ox_NN or_CC a_DT sheep_NN be_VB a_DT greater_JJR wrong_NN
than_IN the_DT felling_NN of_IN a_DT fir_NN or_CC an_DT oak_NN ,_, seeing_VBG that_IN a_DT soul_NN is_VBZ implanted_VBN
in_IN these_DT trees_NNS also_RB ?"_VBP Similarly_RB ,_, the_DT Hidatsa_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN North_NNP

speak_VB more_RBR properly_RB ,_, its_PRP$ shade_NN ._. To_TO these_DT shades_NNS some_DT consideration_NN
or_CC respect_NN is_VBZ due_JJ ,_, but_CC not_RB equally_RB to_TO all_DT ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT shade_NN of_IN
the_DT cottonwood_NN ,_, the_DT greatest_JJS tree_NN in_IN the_DT valley_NN of_IN the_DT Upper_NNP
Missouri_NNP ,_, is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO possess_VB an_DT intelligence_NN which_WDT ,_, if_IN properly_RB
approached_VBN ,_, may_MD help_VB the_DT Indians_NNPS in_IN certain_JJ undertakings_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT
shades_NNS of_IN shrubs_NNS and_CC grasses_NNS are_VBP of_IN little_JJ account_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT

banks_NNS and_CC sweeps_NNS some_DT tall_JJ tree_NN into_IN its_PRP$ current_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN
the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT tree_NN cries_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT roots_NNS still_RB cling_VBP to_TO the_DT
land_NN and_CC until_IN the_DT trunk_NN falls_VBZ with_IN a_DT splash_NN into_IN the_DT stream_NN ._.
Formerly_RB the_DT Indians_NNPS considered_VBD it_PRP wrong_JJ to_TO fell_JJ one_CD of_IN these_DT
giants_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB large_JJ logs_NNS were_VBD needed_VBN they_PRP made_VBD use_NN only_RB of_IN trees_NNS
which_WDT had_VBD fallen_VBN of_IN themselves_PRP ._. Till_NNP lately_RB some_DT of_IN the_DT more_RBR
credulous_JJ old_JJ men_NNS declared_VBD that_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT misfortunes_NNS of_IN their_PRP$
people_NNS were_VBD caused_VBN by_IN this_DT modern_JJ disregard_NN for_IN the_DT rights_NNS of_IN the_DT
living_VBG cottonwood_NN ._. The_DT Iroquois_NNP believed_VBD that_IN each_DT species_NNS of_IN tree_NN ,_,
shrub_NN ,_, plant_NN ,_, and_CC herb_NN had_VBD its_PRP$ own_JJ spirit_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO these_DT spirits_NNS it_PRP
was_VBD their_PRP$ custom_NN to_TO return_VB thanks_NNS ._. The_DT Wanika_NNP of_IN Eastern_NNP Africa_NNP
fancy_JJ that_IN every_DT tree_NN ,_, and_CC especially_RB every_DT coco-nut_NN tree_NN ,_, has_VBZ its_PRP$
spirit_NN ;_: "_`` the_DT destruction_NN of_IN a_DT cocoa-nut_NN tree_NN is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN
equivalent_JJ to_TO matricide_VB ,_, because_IN that_IN tree_NN gives_VBZ them_PRP life_NN and_CC
nourishment_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT mother_NN does_VBZ her_PRP$ child_NN ."_IN Siamese_NNP monks_NNS ,_, believing_VBG
that_IN there_EX are_VBP souls_NNS everywhere_RB ,_, and_CC that_IN to_TO destroy_VB anything_NN
whatever_WDT is_VBZ forcibly_RB to_TO dispossess_VB a_DT soul_NN ,_, will_MD not_RB break_VB a_DT branch_NN
of_IN a_DT tree_NN ,_, "_'' as_IN they_PRP will_MD not_RB break_VB the_DT arm_NN of_IN an_DT innocent_JJ person_NN ."_.
These_DT monks_NNS ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, are_VBP Buddhists_NNS ._. But_CC Buddhist_NNP animism_NN is_VBZ not_RB a_DT
philosophical_JJ theory_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ simply_RB a_DT common_JJ savage_JJ dogma_NN
incorporated_VBN in_IN the_DT system_NN of_IN an_DT historical_JJ religion_NN ._. To_TO suppose_VB ,_,
with_IN Benfey_NNP and_CC others_NNS ,_, that_IN the_DT theories_NNS of_IN animism_NN and_CC
transmigration_NN current_JJ among_IN rude_JJ peoples_NNS of_IN Asia_NNP are_VBP derived_VBN from_IN
Buddhism_NNP ,_, is_VBZ to_TO reverse_VB the_DT facts_NNS ._.

Sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB particular_JJ sorts_NNS of_IN trees_NNS that_WDT are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO
be_VB tenanted_VBN by_IN spirits_NNS ._. At_IN Grbalj_NNP in_IN Dalmatia_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN among_IN
great_JJ beeches_NNS ,_, oaks_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ trees_NNS there_EX are_VBP some_DT that_WDT are_VBP endowed_VBN
with_IN shades_NNS or_CC souls_NNS ,_, and_CC whoever_WP fells_VBZ one_CD of_IN them_PRP must_MD die_VB on_IN the_DT
spot_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS live_VB an_DT invalid_JJ for_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN his_PRP$ days_NNS ._. If_IN a_DT
woodman_NN fears_VBZ that_IN a_DT tree_NN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ felled_VBN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN this_DT sort_NN ,_,
he_PRP must_MD cut_VB off_RP the_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT live_JJ hen_NN on_IN the_DT stump_NN of_IN the_DT tree_NN with_IN
the_DT very_RB same_JJ axe_NN with_IN which_WDT he_PRP cut_VBD down_RP the_DT tree_NN ._. This_DT will_MD protect_VB
him_PRP from_IN all_DT harm_NN ,_, even_RB if_IN the_DT tree_NN be_VB one_CD of_IN the_DT animated_JJ kind_NN ._. The_DT
silk-cotton_NN trees_NNS ,_, which_WDT rear_VB their_PRP$ enormous_JJ trunks_NNS to_TO a_DT stupendous_JJ
height_NN ,_, far_RB out-topping_JJ all_PDT the_DT other_JJ trees_NNS of_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, are_VBP
regarded_VBN with_IN reverence_NN throughout_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, from_IN the_DT Senegal_NNP to_TO
the_DT Niger_NNP ,_, and_CC are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT abode_NN of_IN a_DT god_NN or_CC spirit_NN ._.
Among_IN the_DT Ewespeaking_JJ peoples_NNS of_IN the_DT Slave_NNP Coast_NNP the_DT indwelling_NN god_NN
of_IN this_DT giant_NN of_IN the_DT forest_NN goes_VBZ by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Huntin_NNP ._. Trees_NNS in_IN
which_WDT he_PRP specially_RB dwells_VBZ --_: for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB every_DT silk-cotton_NN tree_NN that_WDT
he_PRP thus_RB honours_VBZ --_: are_VBP surrounded_VBN by_IN a_DT girdle_NN of_IN palm-leaves_NNS ;_: and_CC
sacrifices_NNS of_IN fowls_NNS ,_, and_CC occasionally_RB of_IN human_JJ beings_NNS ,_, are_VBP fastened_VBN
to_TO the_DT trunk_NN or_CC laid_VBN against_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN the_DT tree_NN ._. A_DT tree_NN
distinguished_VBN by_IN a_DT girdle_NN of_IN palm-leaves_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB cut_VBN down_RP or_CC
injured_VBN in_IN any_DT way_NN ;_: and_CC even_RB silk-cotton_JJ trees_NNS which_WDT are_VBP not_RB
supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB animated_VBN by_IN Huntin_NNP may_MD not_RB be_VB felled_VBN unless_IN the_DT
woodman_NN first_RB offers_VBZ a_DT sacrifice_NN of_IN fowls_NNS and_CC palm-oil_NN to_TO purge_VB
himself_PRP of_IN the_DT proposed_VBN sacrilege_NN ._. To_TO omit_VB the_DT sacrifice_NN is_VBZ an_DT
offence_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB punished_VBN with_IN death_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Kangra_NNP mountains_NNS
of_IN the_DT Punjaub_NNP a_DT girl_NN used_VBN to_TO be_VB annually_RB sacrificed_VBN to_TO an_DT old_JJ
cedar-tree_NN ,_, the_DT families_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN taking_VBG it_PRP in_IN turn_NN to_TO supply_VB
the_DT victim_NN ._. The_DT tree_NN was_VBD cut_VBN down_RP not_RB very_RB many_JJ years_NNS ago_RB ._.

If_IN trees_NNS are_VBP animate_JJ ,_, they_PRP are_VBP necessarily_RB sensitive_JJ and_CC the_DT cutting_VBG
of_IN them_PRP down_IN becomes_VBZ a_DT delicate_JJ surgical_JJ operation_NN ,_, which_WDT must_MD be_VB
performed_VBN with_IN as_RB tender_JJ a_DT regard_NN as_IN possible_JJ for_IN the_DT feelings_NNS of_IN

times_NNS ."_IN The_DT Ojebways_NNS "_`` very_RB seldom_RB cut_VBN down_RP green_NN or_CC living_NN trees_NNS ,_,

The_DT conception_NN of_IN trees_NNS and_CC plants_NNS as_IN animated_VBN beings_NNS naturally_RB
results_NNS in_IN treating_VBG them_PRP as_IN male_JJ and_CC female_JJ ,_, who_WP can_MD be_VB married_VBN to_TO
each_DT other_JJ in_IN a_DT real_JJ ,_, and_CC not_RB merely_RB a_DT figurative_JJ or_CC poetical_JJ ,_, sense_NN

animals_NNS have_VBP their_PRP$ sexes_NNS and_CC reproduce_VB their_PRP$ kind_NN by_IN the_DT union_NN of_IN

sex_NN of_IN trees_NNS ,_, etc_FW .,_. and_CC have_VBP distinct_JJ names_NNS for_IN the_DT male_JJ and_CC female_JJ
of_IN some_DT trees_NNS ."_VBP The_DT ancients_NNS knew_VBD the_DT difference_NN between_IN the_DT male_NN

The_DT fertilisation_NN took_VBD place_NN in_IN spring_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT heathen_NN of_IN Harran_NNP

In_IN the_DT Moluccas_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT clove-trees_NNS are_VBP in_IN blossom_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP

Sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_NN which_WDT are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO animate_VB

In_IN most_JJS ,_, if_IN not_RB all_DT ,_, of_IN these_DT cases_NNS the_DT spirit_NN is_VBZ viewed_VBN as_IN

which_WDT can_MD quit_VB it_PRP and_CC return_VB to_TO it_PRP at_IN pleasure_NN ._. The_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN

propitiate_VB the_DT wood-spirits_NNS people_NNS bring_VBP offerings_NNS of_IN food_NN ,_, fowls_NNS ,_,

The_DT people_NNS of_IN Nias_NNP think_VBP that_IN ,_, when_WRB a_DT tree_NN dies_VBZ ,_, its_PRP$ liberated_VBN

children_NNS in_IN a_DT house_NN by_IN perching_VBG on_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT posts_NNS that_IN support_NN it_PRP ._.
Further_RB ,_, they_PRP are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN certain_JJ trees_NNS are_VBP at_IN all_DT times_NNS
inhabited_VBN by_IN roving_VBG demons_NNS who_WP ,_, if_IN the_DT trees_NNS were_VBD damaged_VBN ,_, would_MD be_VB
set_VBN free_JJ to_TO go_VB about_RB on_IN errands_NNS of_IN mischief_NN ._. Hence_RB the_DT people_NNS
respect_NN these_DT trees_NNS ,_, and_CC are_VBP careful_JJ not_RB to_TO cut_VB them_PRP down_RB ._.

Not_RB a_DT few_JJ ceremonies_NNS observed_VBD at_IN cutting_VBG down_RP haunted_VBN trees_NNS are_VBP
based_VBN on_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN the_DT spirits_NNS have_VBP it_PRP in_IN their_PRP$ power_NN to_TO quit_VB
the_DT trees_NNS at_IN pleasure_NN or_CC in_IN case_NN of_IN need_NN ._. Thus_RB when_WRB the_DT Pelew_NNP
Islanders_NNS are_VBP felling_VBG a_DT tree_NN ,_, they_PRP conjure_VBP the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT tree_NN to_TO
leave_VB it_PRP and_CC settle_VB on_IN another_DT ._. The_DT wily_JJ negro_NN of_IN the_DT Slave_NNP Coast_NNP ,_,
who_WP wishes_VBZ to_TO fell_VBD an_DT ashorin_NN tree_NN ,_, but_CC knows_VBZ that_IN he_PRP cannot_MD do_VB it_PRP

on_IN the_DT ground_NN as_IN a_DT bait_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT unsuspecting_JJ spirit_NN has_VBZ
quitted_VBD the_DT tree_NN to_TO partake_VB of_IN this_DT dainty_NN ,_, hastens_VBZ to_TO cut_VB down_RP its_PRP$
late_JJ abode_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT Toboongkoos_NNP of_IN Celebes_NNP are_VBP about_IN to_TO clear_VB a_DT

Thus_RB when_WRB a_DT man_NN is_VBZ cutting_VBG a_DT road_NN through_IN a_DT forest_NN and_CC has_VBZ to_TO fell_VBD a_DT

or_CC I_PRP shall_MD be_VB hanged_VBN ."_.

Even_RB when_WRB a_DT tree_NN has_VBZ been_VBN felled_VBN ,_, sawn_VBN into_IN planks_NNS ,_, and_CC used_VBD to_TO
build_VB a_DT house_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ that_IN the_DT woodland_NN spirit_NN may_MD still_RB be_VB
lurking_VBG in_IN the_DT timber_NN ,_, and_CC accordingly_RB some_DT people_NNS seek_VBP to_TO
propitiate_JJ him_PRP before_IN or_CC after_IN they_PRP occupy_VBP the_DT new_JJ house_NN ._. Hence_RB ,_,
when_WRB a_DT new_JJ dwelling_NN is_VBZ ready_JJ the_DT Toradjas_NNP of_IN Celebes_NNP kill_VB a_DT goat_NN ,_, a_DT

sides_NNS ._. The_DT ruder_NNP Tonapoo_NNP in_IN such_JJ a_DT case_NN sacrifice_VB a_DT human_JJ being_NN on_IN

will_MD do_VB the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN no_DT harm_NN ._. For_IN a_DT like_JJ reason_NN people_NNS
in_IN Celebes_NNP and_CC the_DT Moluccas_NNP are_VBP much_JJ afraid_JJ of_IN planting_VBG a_DT post_NN

indignity_NN and_CC visit_VB the_DT inmates_NNS with_IN sickness_NN ._. The_DT Kayans_NNP of_IN Borneo_NNP
are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN tree-spirits_NNS stand_VBP very_RB stiffly_RB on_IN the_DT point_NN of_IN

killing_NN of_IN bears_NNS ,_, tiger-cats_NNS ,_, and_CC serpents_NNS ._.



2._DT Beneficent_NNP Powers_NNP of_IN Tree-Spirits_PRP$

WHEN_WRB a_DT tree_NN comes_VBZ to_TO be_VB viewed_VBN ,_, no_RB longer_RB as_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT
tree-spirit_NN ,_, but_CC simply_RB as_IN its_PRP$ abode_NN which_WDT it_PRP can_MD quit_VB at_IN pleasure_NN ,_,
an_DT important_JJ advance_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN in_IN religious_JJ thought_NN ._. Animism_NN is_VBZ
passing_VBG into_IN polytheism_NN ._. In_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, instead_RB of_IN regarding_VBG each_DT
tree_NN as_IN a_DT living_NN and_CC conscious_JJ being_NN ,_, man_NN now_RB sees_VBZ in_IN it_PRP merely_RB a_DT
lifeless_JJ ,_, inert_JJ mass_NN ,_, tenanted_VBD for_IN a_DT longer_JJR or_CC shorter_JJR time_NN by_IN a_DT
supernatural_JJ being_NN who_WP ,_, as_IN he_PRP can_MD pass_VB freely_RB from_IN tree_NN to_TO tree_NN ,_,
thereby_RB enjoys_VBZ a_DT certain_JJ right_NN of_IN possession_NN or_CC lordship_NN over_IN the_DT
trees_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, ceasing_VBG to_TO be_VB a_DT tree-soul_NN ,_, becomes_VBZ a_DT forest_NN god_NN ._. As_RB soon_RB
as_IN the_DT tree-spirit_NN is_VBZ thus_RB in_IN a_DT measure_NN disengaged_VBN from_IN each_DT
particular_JJ tree_NN ,_, he_PRP begins_VBZ to_TO change_VB his_PRP$ shape_NN and_CC assume_VB the_DT body_NN
of_IN a_DT man_NN ,_, in_IN virtue_NN of_IN a_DT general_JJ tendency_NN of_IN early_JJ thought_NN to_TO clothe_VB
all_DT abstract_JJ spiritual_JJ beings_NNS in_IN concrete_JJ human_JJ form_NN ._. Hence_RB in_IN
classical_JJ art_NN the_DT sylvan_NN deities_NNS are_VBP depicted_VBN in_IN human_JJ shape_NN ,_, their_PRP$
woodland_JJ character_NN being_VBG denoted_VBN by_IN a_DT branch_NN or_CC some_DT equally_RB obvious_JJ
symbol_NN ._. But_CC this_DT change_NN of_IN shape_NN does_VBZ not_RB affect_VB the_DT essential_JJ
character_NN of_IN the_DT tree-spirit_NN ._. The_DT powers_NNS which_WDT he_PRP exercised_VBD as_IN a_DT
tree-soul_NN incorporate_NN in_IN a_DT tree_NN ,_, he_PRP still_RB continues_VBZ to_TO wield_VB as_IN a_DT
god_NN of_IN trees_NNS ._. This_DT I_PRP shall_MD now_RB attempt_VB to_TO prove_VB in_IN detail_NN ._. I_PRP shall_MD
show_NN ,_, first_JJ ,_, that_IN trees_NNS considered_VBN as_IN animate_JJ beings_NNS are_VBP credited_VBN
with_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN making_VBG the_DT rain_NN to_TO fall_VB ,_, the_DT sun_NN to_TO shine_VB ,_, flocks_NNS
and_CC herds_NNS to_TO multiply_VB ,_, and_CC women_NNS to_TO bring_VB forth_RB easily_RB ;_: and_CC ,_, second_JJ ,_,
that_IN the_DT very_RB same_JJ powers_NNS are_VBP attributed_VBN to_TO tree-gods_NNS conceived_VBN as_IN
anthropomorphic_JJ beings_NNS or_CC as_IN actually_RB incarnate_VBN in_IN living_VBG men_NNS ._.

First_RB ,_, then_RB ,_, trees_NNS or_CC tree-spirits_NNS are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO give_VB rain_NN and_CC
sunshine_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT missionary_JJ Jerome_NNP of_IN Prague_NNP was_VBD persuading_VBG the_DT
heathen_NN Lithuanians_NNS to_TO fell_VBD their_PRP$ sacred_JJ groves_NNS ,_, a_DT multitude_NN of_IN
women_NNS besought_VBD the_DT Prince_NNP of_IN Lithuania_NNP to_TO stop_VB him_PRP ,_, saying_VBG that_IN with_IN
the_DT woods_NNS he_PRP was_VBD destroying_VBG the_DT house_NN of_IN god_NN from_IN which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD
been_VBN wont_JJ to_TO get_VB rain_NN and_CC sunshine_NN ._. The_DT Mundaris_NNP in_IN Assam_NNP think_VBP that_IN
if_IN a_DT tree_NN in_IN the_DT sacred_JJ grove_NN is_VBZ felled_VBN the_DT sylvan_NN gods_NNS evince_IN their_PRP$
displeasure_NN by_IN withholding_DT rain_NN ._. In_IN order_NN to_TO procure_VB rain_NN the_DT
inhabitants_NNS of_IN Monyo_NNP ,_, a_DT village_NN in_IN the_DT Sagaing_NNP district_NN of_IN Upper_NNP

the_DT haunt_NN of_IN the_DT spirit_NN (_-LRB- nat_NN )_-RRB- who_WP controls_VBZ the_DT rain_NN ._. Then_RB they_PRP
offered_VBN bread_NN ,_, coco-nuts_NNS ,_, plantains_NNS ,_, and_CC fowls_VBZ to_TO the_DT guardian_NN
spirit_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT spirit_NN who_WP gives_VBZ rain_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP
prayed_VBN ,_, "_'' O_UH Lord_NNP nat_NN have_VBP pity_NN on_IN us_PRP poor_JJ mortals_NNS ,_, and_CC stay_VB not_RB the_DT
rain_NN ._. Inasmuch_'' as_IN our_PRP$ offering_NN is_VBZ given_VBN ungrudgingly_RB ,_, let_VB the_DT rain_NN
fall_VB day_NN and_CC night_NN ."_IN Afterwards_RB libations_NNS were_VBD made_VBN in_IN honour_NN of_IN the_DT
spirit_NN of_IN the_DT tamarind-tree_JJ ;_: and_CC still_RB later_RB three_CD elderly_JJ women_NNS ,_,
dressed_VBN in_IN fine_JJ clothes_NNS and_CC wearing_VBG necklaces_NNS and_CC earrings_NNS ,_, sang_VBD the_DT
Rain_NNP Song_NNP ._.

Again_RB ,_, tree-spirits_NNS make_VBP the_DT crops_NNS to_TO grow_VB ._. Amongst_IN the_DT Mundaris_NNP
every_DT village_NN has_VBZ its_PRP$ sacred_JJ grove_NN ,_, and_CC "_`` the_DT grove_NN deities_NNS are_VBP held_VBN
responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT crops_NNS ,_, and_CC are_VBP especially_RB honoured_VBN at_IN all_PDT the_DT
great_JJ agricultural_JJ festivals_NNS ."_IN The_DT negroes_NNS of_IN the_DT Gold_NNP Coast_NNP are_VBP in_IN
the_DT habit_NN of_IN sacrificing_VBG at_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN certain_JJ tall_JJ trees_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP
think_VB that_IN if_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT were_VBD felled_VBN all_PDT the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN
would_MD perish_VB ._. The_DT Gallas_NNP dance_NN in_IN couples_NNS round_JJ sacred_JJ trees_NNS ,_,
praying_VBG for_IN a_DT good_JJ harvest_NN ._. Every_DT couple_NN consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT man_NN and_CC
woman_NN ,_, who_WP are_VBP linked_VBN together_RB by_IN a_DT stick_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT each_DT holds_VBZ one_CD
end_NN ._. Under_IN their_PRP$ arms_NNS they_PRP carry_VBP green_JJ corn_NN or_CC grass_NN ._. Swedish_JJ
peasants_NNS stick_VBP a_DT leafy_JJ branch_NN in_IN each_DT furrow_NN of_IN their_PRP$ corn-fields_NNS ,_,
believing_VBG that_IN this_DT will_MD ensure_VB an_DT abundant_JJ crop_NN ._. The_DT same_JJ idea_NN
comes_VBZ out_RP in_IN the_DT German_JJ and_CC French_JJ custom_NN of_IN the_DT Harvest-May_NNP ._. This_DT
is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ branch_NN or_CC a_DT whole_JJ tree_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ decked_VBN with_IN ears_NNS of_IN

general_JJ ,_, whose_WP$ vivifying_JJ and_CC fructifying_JJ influence_NN is_VBZ thus_RB brought_VBN
to_TO bear_VB upon_IN the_DT corn_NN in_IN particular_JJ ._. Hence_RB in_IN Swabia_NNP the_DT Harvest-May_NNP
is_VBZ fastened_VBN amongst_IN the_DT last_JJ stalks_NNS of_IN corn_NN left_VBD standing_VBG on_IN the_DT

sheaf_NN cut_NN is_VBZ attached_VBN to_TO its_PRP$ trunk_NN ._.

Again_RB ,_, the_DT tree-spirit_NN makes_VBZ the_DT herds_NNS to_TO multiply_VB and_CC blesses_NNS women_NNS
with_IN offspring_NN ._. In_IN Northern_JJ India_NNP the_DT Emblica_NNP officinalis_NNP is_VBZ a_DT

On_IN the_DT second_NN of_IN July_NNP some_DT of_IN the_DT Wends_NNP used_VBD to_TO set_VB up_RP an_DT oak-tree_NN

them_PRP thrive_VBP ._. The_DT Circassians_NNPS regard_VBP the_DT pear-tree_NN as_IN the_DT protector_NN

courtyard_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP remains_VBZ for_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, set_VBD up_RP against_IN
the_DT wall_NN ,_, without_IN receiving_VBG any_DT mark_NN of_IN respect_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT Tuhoe_NNP tribe_NN of_IN Maoris_NNP "_'' the_DT power_NN of_IN making_VBG women_NNS fruitful_JJ is_VBZ
ascribed_VBN to_TO trees_NNS ._. These_DT trees_NNS are_VBP associated_VBN with_IN the_DT navel-strings_NNS

children_NNS used_VBD to_TO be_VB hung_VBN upon_IN them_PRP down_RP to_TO quite_RB recent_JJ times_NNS ._. A_NN
barren_JJ woman_NN had_VBD to_TO embrace_VB such_JJ a_DT tree_NN with_IN her_PRP$ arms_NNS ,_, and_CC she_PRP
received_VBN a_DT male_NN or_CC a_DT female_JJ child_NN according_VBG as_IN she_PRP embraced_VBD the_DT east_JJ
or_CC the_DT west_JJ side_NN ."_IN The_DT common_JJ European_JJ custom_NN of_IN placing_VBG a_DT green_NN
bush_NN on_IN May_NNP Day_NNP before_IN or_CC on_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN a_DT beloved_JJ maiden_NN probably_RB

tree-spirit_NN ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Bavaria_NNP such_JJ bushes_NNS are_VBP set_VBN up_RP also_RB at_IN
the_DT houses_NNS of_IN newly-married_JJ pairs_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT practice_NN is_VBZ only_RB omitted_VBN
if_IN the_DT wife_NN is_VBZ near_IN her_PRP$ confinement_NN ;_: for_IN in_IN that_DT case_NN they_PRP say_VBP that_IN
the_DT husband_NN has_VBZ "_`` set_VBN up_RP a_DT May-bush_NNP for_IN himself_PRP ."_, Among_IN the_DT South_NNP
Slavonians_NNS a_DT barren_JJ woman_NN ,_, who_WP desires_VBZ to_TO have_VB a_DT child_NN ,_, places_VBZ a_DT new_JJ
chemise_NN upon_IN a_DT fruitful_JJ tree_NN on_IN the_DT eve_NN of_IN St_NNP ._. George_NNP '_POS s_PRP Day_NNP ._. Next_NNP
morning_NN before_IN sunrise_NN she_PRP examines_VBZ the_DT garment_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN she_PRP finds_VBZ
that_IN some_DT living_VBG creature_NN has_VBZ crept_VBN on_IN it_PRP ,_, she_PRP hopes_VBZ that_IN her_PRP wish_VB
will_MD be_VB fulfilled_VBN within_IN the_DT year_NN ._. Then_RB she_PRP puts_VBZ on_IN the_DT chemise_NN ,_,
confident_JJ that_IN she_PRP will_MD be_VB as_RB fruitful_JJ as_IN the_DT tree_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT
garment_NN has_VBZ passed_VBN the_DT night_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Kara-Kirghiz_NNP barren_JJ women_NNS
roll_NN themselves_PRP on_IN the_DT ground_NN under_IN a_DT solitary_JJ apple-tree_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN
to_TO obtain_VB offspring_NN ._. Lastly_RB ,_, the_DT power_NN of_IN granting_VBG to_TO women_NNS an_DT easy_JJ
delivery_NN at_IN child-birth_NN is_VBZ ascribed_VBN to_TO trees_NNS both_DT in_IN Sweden_NNP and_CC
Africa_NNP ._. In_IN some_DT districts_NNS of_IN Sweden_NNP there_EX was_VBD formerly_RB a_DT bardtr_JJ �_NN d_CC
or_CC guardian-tree_NN (_-LRB- lime_NN ,_, ash_NN ,_, or_CC elm_NN )_-RRB- in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN every_DT
farm_NN ._. No_DT one_NN would_MD pluck_VB a_DT single_JJ leaf_NN of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ tree_NN ,_, any_RB

X_NNP ._. Relics_NNS of_IN Tree_NNP Worship_NNP in_IN Modern_NNP Europe_NNP

FROM_NNP THE_DT FOREGOING_JJ review_NN of_IN the_DT beneficent_JJ qualities_NNS commonly_RB
ascribed_VBN to_TO tree-spirits_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ easy_JJ to_TO understand_VB why_WRB customs_NNS like_IN

prominently_RB in_IN the_DT popular_JJ festivals_NNS of_IN European_JJ peasants_NNS ._. In_IN spring_NN
or_CC early_JJ summer_NN or_CC even_RB on_IN Midsummer_NNP Day_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD and_CC still_RB is_VBZ in_IN
many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP the_DT custom_NN to_TO go_VB out_RP to_TO the_DT woods_NNS ,_, cut_VBD down_RP a_DT

few_JJ examples_NNS may_MD be_VB selected_VBN ._.

Sir_NNP Henry_NNP Piers_NNP ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ Description_NN of_IN Westmeath_NNP ,_, writing_VBG in_IN 1682_CD
says_VBZ :_: "_`` On_IN May-eve_NNP ,_, every_DT family_NN sets_VBZ up_RP before_IN their_PRP$ door_NN a_DT green_JJ
bush_NN ,_, strewed_VBD over_RP with_IN yellow_JJ flowers_NNS ,_, which_WDT the_DT meadows_NNS yield_NN

"_`` We_PRP '_'' ve_JJ been_VBN rambling_VBG all_PDT the_DT night_NN ,_,
And_CC sometime_RB of_IN this_DT day_NN ;_:

It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT sprout_NN well_RB budded_VBN out_RP ,_,
The_DT work_NN of_IN our_PRP$ Lord_NNP '_'' s_VBZ hand_NN ."_CC


At_IN the_DT towns_NNS of_IN Saffron_NNP Walden_NNP and_CC Debden_NNP in_IN Essex_NNP on_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN

On_IN the_DT Thursday_NNP before_IN Whitsunday_NNP the_DT Russian_JJ villagers_NNS "_`` go_VB out_RB into_IN

'_POS guest_NN '_'' is_VBZ ;_: but_CC on_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN ,_, Whitsunday_NNP ,_, they_PRP take_VBP her_PRP to_TO a_DT

In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Sweden_NNP on_IN the_DT eve_NN of_IN May_NNP Day_NNP lads_NNS go_VBP about_IN carrying_VBG

It_PRP would_MD be_VB needless_JJ to_TO illustrate_VB at_IN length_NN the_DT custom_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ

few_JJ examples_NNS will_MD suffice_VB ._. The_DT puritanical_JJ writer_NN Phillip_NNP Stubbes_NNP in_IN
his_PRP$ Anatomie_NNP of_IN Abuses_NNP ,_, first_RB published_VBN at_IN London_NNP in_IN 1583,_CD has_VBZ

wives_NNS ,_, run_VBP gadding_VBG over_IN night_NN to_TO the_DT woods_NNS ,_, groves_NNS ,_, hils_NNS ,_, and_CC

is_VBZ a_DT great_JJ Lord_NNP present_NN amongst_IN them_PRP ,_, as_IN superintendent_NN and_CC Lord_NNP

the_DT chiefest_NN jewel_NN they_PRP bring_VBP from_IN thence_DT is_VBZ their_PRP$ May-pole_NNP ,_, which_WDT
they_PRP bring_VBP home_NN with_IN great_JJ veneration_NN ,_, as_IN thus_RB ._. They_PRP have_VBP twentie_CD or_CC

placed_VBN on_IN the_DT tip_NN of_IN his_PRP$ hornes_NNS ,_, and_CC these_DT oxen_NNS drawe_VBP home_NN this_DT
May-pole_NNP (_-LRB- this_DT stinkyng_NN ydol_NN ,_, rather_RB ),_, which_WDT is_VBZ covered_VBN all_DT over_IN
with_IN floures_NNS and_CC hearbs_NNS ,_, bound_VBN round_NN about_IN with_IN strings_NNS ,_, from_IN the_DT
top_NN to_TO the_DT bottome_NN ,_, and_CC sometime_RB painted_VBN with_IN variable_JJ colours_NNS ,_, with_IN

boughes_NNS about_IN it_PRP ,_, set_VBN up_RP sommer_NN haules_NNS ,_, bowers_NNS ,_, and_CC arbors_NNS hard_RB by_IN
it_PRP ._. And_CC then_RB fall_VB they_PRP to_TO daunce_VB about_IN it_PRP ,_, like_IN as_IN the_DT heathen_NN
people_NNS did_VBD at_IN the_DT dedication_NN of_IN the_DT Idols_NNS ,_, whereof_IN this_DT is_VBZ a_DT perfect_JJ
pattern_NN ,_, or_CC rather_RB the_DT thing_NN itself_PRP ._. I_PRP have_VBP heard_VBN it_PRP credibly_RB
reported_VBN (_-LRB- and_CC that_DT viva_NN voce_NN )_-RRB- by_IN men_NNS of_IN great_JJ gravitie_NN and_CC
reputation_NN ,_, that_IN of_IN fortie_NN ,_, threescore_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT hundred_CD maides_NNS going_VBG to_TO
the_DT wood_NN over_IN night_NN ,_, there_RB have_VBP scaresly_RB the_DT third_JJ part_NN of_IN them_PRP
returned_VBN home_NN againe_NN undefiled_VBD ."_.

In_IN Swabia_NNP on_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN May_NNP a_DT tall_JJ fir-tree_JJ used_VBN to_TO be_VB fetched_VBN
into_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD decked_VBN with_IN ribbons_NNS and_CC set_VBN up_RB ;_: then_RB
the_DT people_NNS danced_VBD round_RB it_PRP merrily_RB to_TO music_NN ._. The_DT tree_NN stood_VBD on_IN the_DT

say_VBP ,_, "_`` You_PRP will_MD soon_RB die_VB ,_, but_CC let_VB us_PRP live_VB ."_RB Next_JJ morning_NN the_DT gypsies_NNS
gather_VB about_IN the_DT willow_NN ._. The_DT chief_JJ figure_NN of_IN the_DT festival_NN is_VBZ Green_NNP

pulls_VBZ them_PRP out_RB and_CC flings_VB them_PRP into_IN a_DT running_VBG stream_NN to_TO propitiate_VB

branches_NNS and_CC leaves_NNS which_WDT is_VBZ ducked_VBN in_IN the_DT stream_NN ._. In_IN this_DT version_NN
of_IN the_DT custom_NN the_DT powers_NNS of_IN granting_VBG an_DT easy_JJ delivery_NN to_TO women_NNS and_CC
of_IN communicating_VBG vital_JJ energy_NN to_TO the_DT sick_JJ and_CC old_JJ are_VBP clearly_RB
ascribed_VBN to_TO the_DT willow_NN ;_: while_IN Green_NNP George_NNP ,_, the_DT human_NN double_RB of_IN the_DT
tree_NN ,_, bestows_RB food_NN on_IN the_DT cattle_NNS ,_, and_CC further_RB ensures_VBZ the_DT favour_NN of_IN

Without_IN citing_VBG more_JJR examples_NNS to_TO the_DT same_JJ effect_NN ,_, we_PRP may_MD sum_VB up_RP the_DT

erected_VBD at_IN Whitsuntide_NNP in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ._. To_TO this_DT hut_NN

sword_VBN at_IN his_PRP$ side_NN and_CC a_DT sugar-loaf_JJ hat_NN of_IN rushes_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._. In_IN his_PRP$
train_NN are_VBP a_DT judge_NN ,_, a_DT crier_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT personage_NN called_VBD the_DT Frog-flayer_NNP
or_CC Hangman_NNP ._. This_DT last_JJ is_VBZ a_DT sort_NN of_IN ragged_JJ merryandrew_NN ,_, wearing_VBG a_DT
rusty_JJ old_JJ sword_NN and_CC bestriding_VBG a_DT sorry_JJ hack_NN ._. On_IN reaching_VBG the_DT hut_NN the_DT

it_PRP ,_, sets_VBZ up_RP a_DT gallows_NNS on_IN which_WDT he_PRP hangs_VBZ the_DT frogs_NNS in_IN a_DT row_NN ._. In_IN the_DT
neighbourhood_NN of_IN Plas_NNP the_DT ceremony_NN differs_NNS in_IN some_DT points_NNS ._. The_DT king_NN

of_IN producing_VBG rain_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN killing_VBG a_DT frog_NN is_VBZ a_DT European_JJ rain-charm_NN ._.

Often_RB the_DT spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN in_IN spring_NN is_VBZ represented_VBN by_IN a_DT queen_NN

In_IN a_DT parish_NN of_IN Denmark_NNP it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT custom_NN at_IN Whitsuntide_NNP to_TO

stamped_VBD clay_NN floor_NN till_IN the_DT sun_NN rose_VBD and_CC the_DT birds_NNS began_VBD to_TO sing_VB ._.

We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN in_IN Sweden_NNP the_DT ceremonies_NNS associated_VBN elsewhere_RB with_IN

similar_JJ ceremony_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB still_RB kept_VBN up_RP in_IN Norway_NNP ._.

In_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Brian_NNP �_NN on_IN (_-LRB- Dauphin_NNP �)_NNP on_IN May_NNP Day_NNP the_DT lads_NNS wrap_NN
up_RB in_IN green_JJ leaves_NNS a_DT young_JJ fellow_NN whose_WP$ sweetheart_NN has_VBZ deserted_VBN him_PRP

go_VB to_TO the_DT alehouse_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT pair_NN lead_NN off_IN the_DT dancing_NN ._. But_CC they_PRP

old_JJ maid_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP debarred_VBN the_DT company_NN of_IN the_DT young_JJ folks_NNS ._. The_DT lad_NN
is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Bridegroom_NNP of_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP ._. In_IN the_DT alehouse_NN he_PRP
puts_VBZ off_RP his_PRP$ garment_NN of_IN leaves_NNS ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT ,_, mixed_VBN with_IN flowers_NNS ,_,
his_PRP$ partner_NN in_IN the_DT dance_NN makes_VBZ a_DT nosegay_NN ,_, and_CC wears_VBZ it_PRP at_IN her_PRP breast_NN
next_JJ day_NN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP leads_VBZ her_PRP again_RB to_TO the_DT alehouse_NN ._. Like_IN this_DT is_VBZ a_DT
Russian_JJ custom_NN observed_VBN in_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Nerechta_NN on_IN the_DT Thursday_NNP
before_IN Whitsunday_NNP ._. The_DT girls_NNS go_VBP out_IN into_IN a_DT birch-wood_NN ,_, wind_VBP a_DT girdle_NN
or_CC band_NN round_RB a_DT stately_NN birch_NN ,_, twist_VBP its_PRP$ lower_JJR branches_NNS into_IN a_DT
wreath_NN ,_, and_CC kiss_VB each_DT other_JJ in_IN pairs_NNS through_IN the_DT wreath_NN ._. The_DT girls_NNS
who_WP kiss_VBP through_IN the_DT wreath_NN call_NN each_DT other_JJ gossips_NNS ._. Then_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT
girls_NNS steps_NNS forward_RB ,_, and_CC mimicking_VBG a_DT drunken_JJ man_NN ,_, flings_NNS herself_PRP on_IN
the_DT ground_NN ,_, rolls_NNS on_IN the_DT grass_NN ,_, and_CC feigns_NNS to_TO fall_VB fast_RB asleep_RB ._.
Another_DT girl_NN wakens_VBZ the_DT pretended_VBN sleeper_NN and_CC kisses_NNS him_PRP ;_: then_RB the_DT
whole_JJ bevy_NN trips_NNS singing_VBG through_IN the_DT wood_NN to_TO twine_NN garlands_NNS ,_, which_WDT
they_PRP throw_VBP into_IN the_DT water_NN ._. In_IN the_DT fate_NN of_IN the_DT garlands_NNS floating_VBG on_IN
the_DT stream_NN they_PRP read_VBP their_PRP$ own_JJ ._. Here_RB the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT sleeper_NN was_VBD
probably_RB at_IN one_CD time_NN played_VBN by_IN a_DT lad_NN ._. In_IN these_DT French_NNP and_CC Russian_NNP
customs_NNS we_PRP have_VBP a_DT forsaken_JJ bridegroom_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT following_VBG a_DT forsaken_JJ
bride_NN ._. On_IN Shrove_NNP Tuesday_NNP the_DT Slovenes_NNP of_IN Oberkrain_NNP drag_VBP a_DT straw_NN
puppet_NN with_IN joyous_JJ cries_NNS up_IN and_CC down_IN the_DT village_NN ;_: then_RB they_PRP throw_VBP it_PRP
into_IN the_DT water_NN or_CC burn_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC from_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN the_DT flames_NNS they_PRP
judge_NN of_IN the_DT abundance_NN of_IN the_DT next_JJ harvest_NN ._. The_DT noisy_JJ crew_NN is_VBZ
followed_VBN by_IN a_DT female_JJ masker_NN ,_, who_WP drags_VBZ a_DT great_JJ board_NN by_IN a_DT string_NN and_CC
gives_VBZ out_RP that_IN she_PRP is_VBZ a_DT forsaken_JJ bride_NN ._.

Viewed_NNP in_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN what_WP has_VBZ gone_VBN before_RB ,_, the_DT awakening_NN of_IN the_DT
forsaken_JJ sleeper_NN in_IN these_DT ceremonies_NNS probably_RB represents_VBZ the_DT revival_NN
of_IN vegetation_NN in_IN spring_NN ._. But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB easy_JJ to_TO assign_VB their_PRP$
respective_JJ parts_NNS to_TO the_DT forsaken_JJ bridegroom_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT girl_NN who_WP
wakes_NNS him_PRP from_IN his_PRP$ slumber_NN ._. Is_VBZ the_DT sleeper_NN the_DT leafless_JJ forest_NN or_CC

the_DT evidence_NN before_IN us_PRP ,_, to_TO answer_VB these_DT questions_NNS ._.

In_IN the_DT Highlands_NNP of_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT revival_NN of_IN vegetation_NN in_IN spring_NN
used_VBN to_TO be_VB graphically_RB represented_VBN on_IN St_NNP ._. Bride_NNP '_'' s_VBZ Day_NNP ,_, the_DT first_JJ of_IN

Maughold_NNP ._. The_DT custom_NN was_VBD to_TO gather_VB a_DT bundle_NN of_IN green_JJ rushes_NNS ,_, and_CC

night_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Manks_NNP language_NN ,_, the_DT invitation_NN ran_VBD thus_RB :_: '_POS Brede_NNP ,_,
Brede_NNP ,_, tar_NN gys_VBZ my_PRP$ thie_NN tar_NN dyn_NN thie_NN ayms_NNS noght_JJ Foshil_NNP jee_NN yn_NNP dorrys_.
da_NN Brede_NNP ,_, as_IN lhig_JJ da_NN Brede_NNP e_NN heet_NN staigh_NN .'_NNP In_IN English_NNP :_: '_POS Bridget_NNP ,_,
Bridget_NNP ,_, come_VBN to_TO my_PRP$ house_NN ,_, come_VBN to_TO my_PRP$ house_NN to-night_NN ._. Open_VB the_DT door_NN
for_IN Bridget_NNP ,_, and_CC let_VB Bridget_NNP come_VB in_IN .'_NNS After_IN these_DT words_NNS were_VBD
repeated_VBN ,_, the_DT rushes_NNS were_VBD strewn_VBN on_IN the_DT floor_NN by_IN way_NN of_IN a_DT carpet_NN or_CC

the_DT Celtic_NNP goddess_NN of_IN fire_NN and_CC apparently_RB of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ._.

Often_RB the_DT marriage_NN of_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN in_IN spring_NN ,_, though_IN not_RB

XI_NNP ._. The_DT Influence_NN of_IN the_DT Sexes_NNS on_IN Vegetation_NNP

FROM_NNP THE_DT PRECEDING_JJ examination_NN of_IN the_DT spring_NN and_CC summer_NN festivals_NNS of_IN
Europe_NNP we_PRP may_MD infer_VB that_IN our_PRP$ rude_JJ forefathers_NNS personified_VBD the_DT powers_NNS
of_IN vegetation_NN as_IN male_JJ and_CC female_JJ ,_, and_CC attempted_VBD ,_, on_IN the_DT principle_NN of_IN
homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ magic_NN ,_, to_TO quicken_VB the_DT growth_NN of_IN trees_NNS and_CC
plants_NNS by_IN representing_VBG the_DT marriage_NN of_IN the_DT sylvan_NN deities_NNS in_IN the_DT
persons_NNS of_IN a_DT King_NNP and_CC Queen_NNP of_IN May_NNP ,_, a_DT Whitsun_NNP Bridegroom_NNP and_CC Bride_NNP ,_,
and_CC so_RB forth_RB ._. Such_JJ representations_NNS were_VBD accordingly_RB no_DT mere_JJ symbolic_JJ
or_CC allegorical_JJ dramas_NN ,_, pastoral_JJ plays_NNS designed_VBN to_TO amuse_VB or_CC instruct_VB
a_DT rustic_JJ audience_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD charms_NNS intended_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT woods_NNS to_TO
grow_VB green_NN ,_, the_DT fresh_JJ grass_NN to_TO sprout_VB ,_, the_DT corn_NN to_TO shoot_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT
flowers_NNS to_TO blow_VB ._. And_CC it_PRP was_VBD natural_JJ to_TO suppose_VB that_IN the_DT more_RBR closely_RB
the_DT mock_JJ marriage_NN of_IN the_DT leaf-clad_JJ or_CC flower-decked_JJ mummers_NNS aped_VBD the_DT
real_JJ marriage_NN of_IN the_DT woodland_NN sprites_NNS ,_, the_DT more_RBR effective_JJ would_MD be_VB
the_DT charm_NN ._. Accordingly_RB we_PRP may_MD assume_VB with_IN a_DT high_JJ degree_NN of_IN
probability_NN that_IN the_DT profligacy_NN which_WDT notoriously_RB attended_VBD these_DT
ceremonies_NNS was_VBD at_IN one_CD time_NN not_RB an_DT accidental_JJ excess_NN but_CC an_DT essential_JJ
part_NN of_IN the_DT rites_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN those_DT who_WP performed_VBD
them_PRP the_DT marriage_NN of_IN trees_NNS and_CC plants_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB fertile_JJ without_IN
the_DT real_JJ union_NN of_IN the_DT human_JJ sexes_NNS ._. At_IN the_DT present_JJ day_NN it_PRP might_MD
perhaps_RB be_VB vain_JJ to_TO look_VB in_IN civilised_JJ Europe_NNP for_IN customs_NNS of_IN this_DT sort_NN
observed_VBN for_IN the_DT explicit_JJ purpose_NN of_IN promoting_VBG the_DT growth_NN of_IN
vegetation_NN ._. But_CC ruder_JJ races_NNS in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN have_VBP
consciously_RB employed_VBN the_DT intercourse_NN of_IN the_DT sexes_NNS as_IN a_DT means_VBZ to_TO
ensure_VB the_DT fruitfulness_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN ;_: and_CC some_DT rites_NNS which_WDT are_VBP
still_RB ,_, or_CC were_VBD till_IN lately_RB ,_, kept_VBD up_RP in_IN Europe_NNP can_MD be_VB reasonably_RB
explained_VBD only_RB as_IN stunted_JJ relics_NNS of_IN a_DT similar_JJ practice_NN ._. The_DT
following_VBG facts_NNS will_MD make_VB this_DT plain_NN ._.

For_IN four_CD days_NNS before_IN they_PRP committed_VBD the_DT seed_NN to_TO the_DT earth_NN the_DT
Pipiles_NNP of_IN Central_NNP America_NNP kept_VBD apart_RB from_IN their_PRP$ wives_NNS "_'' in_IN order_NN
that_WDT on_IN the_DT night_NN before_IN planting_VBG they_PRP might_MD indulge_VB their_PRP$ passions_NNS
to_TO the_DT fullest_JJS extent_NN ;_: certain_JJ persons_NNS are_VBP even_RB said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN
appointed_VBN to_TO perform_VB the_DT sexual_JJ act_NN at_IN the_DT very_JJ moment_NN when_WRB the_DT
first_JJ seeds_NNS were_VBD deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT ground_NN ."_IN The_DT use_NN of_IN their_PRP$ wives_NNS at_IN
that_DT time_NN was_VBD indeed_RB enjoined_VBN upon_IN the_DT people_NNS by_IN the_DT priests_NNS as_IN a_DT
religious_JJ duty_NN ,_, in_IN default_NN of_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD not_RB lawful_JJ to_TO sow_VB the_DT
seed_NN ._. The_DT only_RB possible_JJ explanation_NN of_IN this_DT custom_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB that_IN
the_DT Indians_NNPS confused_VBD the_DT process_NN by_IN which_WDT human_JJ beings_NNS reproduce_VB
their_PRP$ kind_NN with_IN the_DT process_NN by_IN which_WDT plants_NNS discharge_VB the_DT same_JJ
function_NN ,_, and_CC fancied_JJ that_IN by_IN resorting_VBG to_TO the_DT former_JJ they_PRP were_VBD
simultaneously_RB forwarding_VBG the_DT latter_NN ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Java_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT
season_NN when_WRB the_DT bloom_NN will_MD soon_RB be_VB on_IN the_DT rice_NN ,_, the_DT husbandman_NN and_CC
his_PRP$ wife_NN visit_VB their_PRP$ fields_NNS by_IN night_NN and_CC there_RB engage_VB in_IN sexual_JJ
intercourse_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN promoting_VBG the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT crop_NN ._. In_IN
the_DT Leti_NNP ,_, Sarmata_NNP ,_, and_CC some_DT other_JJ groups_NNS of_IN islands_NNS which_WDT lie_VBP
between_IN the_DT western_JJ end_NN of_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP and_CC the_DT northern_JJ part_NN of_IN
Australia_NNP ,_, the_DT heathen_NN population_NN regard_NN the_DT sun_NN as_IN the_DT male_NN
principle_NN by_IN whom_WP the_DT earth_NN or_CC female_NN pr_NN �_NN nciple_NN is_VBZ fertilised_VBN ._. They_PRP
call_VB him_PRP Upu-lera_NNP or_CC Mr_NNP ._. Sun_NNP ,_, and_CC represent_VB him_PRP under_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT
lamp_NN made_VBD of_IN coco-nut_NN leaves_NNS ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB seen_VBN hanging_VBG everywhere_RB
in_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS and_CC in_IN the_DT sacred_JJ fig-tree_NN ._. Under_IN the_DT tree_NN lies_VBZ a_DT
large_JJ flat_JJ stone_NN ,_, which_WDT serves_VBZ as_IN a_DT sacrificial_JJ table_NN ._. On_IN it_PRP the_DT
heads_NNS of_IN slain_NN foes_NNS were_VBD and_CC are_VBP still_RB placed_VBN in_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT
islands_NNS ._. Once_RB a_DT year_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT rainy_NN season_NN ,_, Mr_NNP ._. Sun_NNP
comes_VBZ down_RB into_IN the_DT holy_JJ fig-tree_NN to_TO fertilise_VB the_DT earth_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO
facilitate_VB his_PRP$ descent_NN a_DT ladder_NN with_IN seven_CD rungs_NNS is_VBZ considerately_RB
placed_VBN at_IN his_PRP$ disposal_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ set_VBN up_RP under_IN the_DT tree_NN and_CC is_VBZ adorned_VBN
with_IN carved_JJ figures_NNS of_IN the_DT birds_NNS whose_WP$ shrill_JJ clarion_NN heralds_VBZ the_DT
approach_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN in_IN the_DT east_JJ ._. On_IN this_DT occasion_NN pigs_NNS and_CC dogs_NNS are_VBP
sacrificed_JJ in_IN profusion_NN ;_: men_NNS and_CC women_NNS alike_RB indulge_VBP in_IN a_DT
saturnalia_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT mystic_JJ union_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN and_CC the_DT earth_NN is_VBZ
dramatically_RB represented_VBD in_IN public_JJ ,_, amid_IN song_NN and_CC dance_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT real_JJ
union_NN of_IN the_DT sexes_NNS under_IN the_DT tree_NN ._. The_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT festival_NN ,_, we_PRP
are_VBP told_VBN ,_, is_VBZ to_TO procure_VB rain_NN ,_, plenty_NN of_IN food_NN and_CC drink_NN ,_, abundance_NN of_IN
cattle_NNS and_CC children_NNS and_CC riches_NNS from_IN Grandfather_NNP Sun_NNP ._. They_PRP pray_NN that_WDT
he_PRP may_MD make_VB every_DT she-goat_NN to_TO cast_VB two_CD or_CC three_CD young_JJ ,_, the_DT people_NNS to_TO
multiply_RB ,_, the_DT dead_JJ pigs_NNS to_TO be_VB replaced_VBN by_IN living_VBG pigs_NNS ,_, the_DT empty_JJ
rice-baskets_NNS to_TO be_VB filled_VBN ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ._. And_CC to_TO induce_VB him_PRP to_TO grant_VB
their_PRP$ requests_NNS they_PRP offer_VBP him_PRP pork_NN and_CC rice_NN and_CC liquor_NN ,_, and_CC invite_NN
him_PRP to_TO fall_VB to_TO ._. In_IN the_DT Babar_NNP Islands_NNP a_DT special_JJ flag_NN is_VBZ hoisted_VBN at_IN
this_DT festival_NN as_IN a_DT symbol_NN of_IN the_DT creative_JJ energy_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ
of_IN white_JJ cotton_NN ,_, about_IN nine_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ,_, and_CC consists_VBZ of_IN the_DT figure_NN of_IN
a_DT man_NN in_IN an_DT appropriate_JJ attitude_NN ._. It_PRP would_MD be_VB unjust_JJ to_TO treat_VB these_DT
orgies_NNS as_IN a_DT mere_JJ outburst_NN of_IN unbridled_JJ passion_NN ;_: no_DT doubt_NN they_PRP are_VBP
deliberately_RB and_CC solemnly_RB organised_VBN as_IN essential_JJ to_TO the_DT fertility_NN of_IN
the_DT earth_NN and_CC the_DT welfare_NN of_IN man_NN ._.

The_DT same_JJ means_NNS which_WDT are_VBP thus_RB adopted_VBN to_TO stimulate_VB the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT
crops_NNS are_VBP naturally_RB employed_VBN to_TO ensure_VB the_DT fruitfulness_NN of_IN trees_NNS ._. In_IN
some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Amboyna_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT clove_NN plantation_NN
indicates_VBZ that_IN the_DT crop_NN is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO be_VB scanty_NN ,_, the_DT men_NNS go_VBP naked_JJ to_TO
the_DT plantations_NNS by_IN night_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB seek_VB to_TO fertilise_VB the_DT trees_NNS
precisely_RB as_IN they_PRP would_MD impregnate_VB women_NNS ,_, while_IN at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN
they_PRP call_VBP out_RP for_IN "_`` More_JJR cloves_NNS !"_'' This_DT is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT trees_NNS
bear_VB fruit_NN more_RBR abundantly_RB ._.

The_DT Baganda_NNP of_IN Central_NNP Africa_NNP believe_VBP so_RB strongly_RB in_IN the_DT intimate_JJ
relation_NN between_IN the_DT intercourse_NN of_IN the_DT sexes_NNS and_CC the_DT fertility_NN of_IN
the_DT ground_NN that_WDT among_IN them_PRP a_DT barren_JJ wife_NN is_VBZ generally_RB sent_VBN away_RB ,_,
because_IN she_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO prevent_VB her_PRP$ husband_NN '_'' s_VBZ garden_NN from_IN bearing_VBG
fruit_NN ._. On_IN the_DT contrary_NN ,_, a_DT couple_NN who_WP have_VBP given_VBN proof_NN of_IN
extraordinary_JJ fertility_NN by_IN becoming_VBG the_DT parents_NNS of_IN twins_NNS are_VBP
believed_VBN by_IN the_DT Baganda_NNP to_TO be_VB endowed_VBN with_IN a_DT corresponding_JJ power_NN of_IN
increasing_VBG the_DT fruitfulness_NN of_IN the_DT plantain-trees_NNS ,_, which_WDT furnish_VBP
them_PRP with_IN their_PRP$ staple_NN food_NN ._. Some_DT little_JJ time_NN after_IN the_DT birth_NN of_IN the_DT
twins_NNS a_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ performed_VBN ,_, the_DT object_NN of_IN which_WDT clearly_RB is_VBZ to_TO
transmit_VB the_DT reproductive_JJ virtue_NN of_IN the_DT parents_NNS to_TO the_DT plantains_NNS ._.
The_DT mother_NN lies_VBZ down_RP on_IN her_PRP$ back_NN in_IN the_DT thick_JJ grass_NN near_IN the_DT house_NN
and_CC places_NNS a_DT flower_NN of_IN the_DT plantain_NN between_IN her_PRP$ legs_NNS ;_: then_RB her_PRP$
husband_NN comes_VBZ and_CC knocks_VBZ the_DT flower_NN away_RB with_IN his_PRP$ genital_JJ member_NN ._.
Further_RB ,_, the_DT parents_NNS go_VBP through_IN the_DT country_NN performing_VBG dances_NNS in_IN the_DT
gardens_NNS of_IN favoured_JJ friends_NNS ,_, apparently_RB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN causing_VBG
the_DT plantain-trees_NNS to_TO bear_VB fruit_NN more_RBR abundantly_RB ._.

In_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP customs_NNS have_VBP prevailed_VBN both_DT at_IN spring_NN and_CC
harvest_NN which_WDT are_VBP clearly_RB based_VBN on_IN the_DT same_JJ crude_NN notion_NN that_IN the_DT
relation_NN of_IN the_DT human_JJ sexes_NNS to_TO each_DT other_JJ can_MD be_VB so_RB used_VBN as_IN to_TO
quicken_RB the_DT growth_NN of_IN plants_NNS ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT Ukraine_NNP on_IN St_NNP ._.
George_NNP '_POS s_PRP Day_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT twenty-third_JJ of_IN April_NNP )_-RRB- the_DT priest_NN in_IN his_PRP$ robes_NNS ,_,
attended_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ acolytes_NNS ,_, goes_VBZ out_RB to_TO the_DT fields_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_,
where_WRB the_DT crops_NNS are_VBP beginning_VBG to_TO show_VB green_JJ above_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC
blesses_NNS them_PRP ._. After_IN that_IN the_DT young_JJ married_JJ people_NNS lie_VBP down_RP in_IN
couples_NNS on_IN the_DT sown_NN fields_NNS and_CC roll_NN several_JJ times_NNS over_IN on_IN them_PRP ,_, in_IN
the_DT belief_NN that_IN this_DT will_MD promote_VB the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ._. In_IN some_DT
parts_NNS of_IN Russia_NNP the_DT priest_NN himself_PRP is_VBZ rolled_VBN by_IN women_NNS over_IN the_DT
sprouting_VBG crop_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN without_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT mud_NN and_CC holes_NNS which_WDT
he_PRP may_MD encounter_VB in_IN his_PRP$ beneficent_JJ progress_NN ._. If_IN the_DT shepherd_NN resists_NNS
or_CC remonstrates_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ flock_NN murmurs_NNS ,_, "_`` Little_NNP Father_NNP ,_, you_PRP do_VBP not_RB
really_RB wish_VB us_PRP well_RB ,_, you_PRP do_VBP not_RB wish_VB us_PRP to_TO have_VB corn_NN ,_, although_IN you_PRP
do_VB wish_VB to_TO live_VB on_IN our_PRP$ corn_NN ."_NN In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Germany_NNP at_IN harvest_NN
the_DT men_NNS and_CC women_NNS ,_, who_WP have_VBP reaped_VBN the_DT corn_NN ,_, roll_NN together_RB on_IN the_DT
field_NN ._. This_DT again_RB is_VBZ probably_RB a_DT mitigation_NN of_IN an_DT older_JJR and_CC ruder_VB
custom_NN designed_VBN to_TO impart_VB fertility_NN to_TO the_DT fields_NNS by_IN methods_NNS like_IN
those_DT resorted_VBN to_TO by_IN the_DT Pipiles_NNP of_IN Central_NNP America_NNP long_RB ago_RB and_CC by_IN
the_DT cultivators_NNS of_IN rice_NN in_IN Java_NNP at_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN ._.

To_TO the_DT student_NN who_WP cares_VBZ to_TO track_VB the_DT devious_JJ course_NN of_IN the_DT human_NN
mind_NN in_IN its_PRP$ gropings_NNS after_IN truth_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ of_IN some_DT interest_NN to_TO observe_VB
that_IN the_DT same_JJ theoretical_JJ belief_NN in_IN the_DT sympathetic_JJ influence_NN of_IN the_DT
sexes_NNS on_IN vegetation_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ led_VBN some_DT peoples_NNS to_TO indulge_VB their_PRP$
passions_NNS as_IN a_DT means_NN of_IN fertilising_VBG the_DT earth_NN ,_, has_VBZ led_VBN others_NNS to_TO seek_VB
the_DT same_JJ end_NN by_IN directly_RB opposite_JJ means_NNS ._. From_IN the_DT moment_NN that_IN they_PRP
sowed_VBN the_DT maize_NN till_IN the_DT time_NN that_IN they_PRP reaped_VBD it_PRP ,_, the_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN
Nicaragua_NNP lived_VBD chastely_RB ,_, keeping_VBG apart_RB from_IN their_PRP$ wives_NNS and_CC
sleeping_VBG in_IN a_DT separate_JJ place_NN ._. They_PRP ate_VBD no_DT salt_NN ,_, and_CC drank_VBD neither_CC
cocoa_NN nor_CC chicha_NN ,_, the_DT fermented_JJ liquor_NN made_VBN from_IN maize_NN ;_: in_IN short_JJ
the_DT season_NN was_VBD for_IN them_PRP ,_, as_IN the_DT Spanish_NNP historian_NN observes_VBZ ,_, a_DT time_NN
of_IN abstinence_NN ._. To_TO this_DT day_NN some_DT of_IN the_DT Indian_NNP tribes_NNS of_IN Central_NNP
America_NNP practise_NN continence_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN thereby_RB promoting_VBG the_DT
growth_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ._. Thus_RB we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN before_IN sowing_VBG the_DT maize_NN
the_DT Kekchi_NNP Indians_NNPS sleep_VBP apart_RB from_IN their_PRP$ wives_NNS ,_, and_CC eat_VB no_DT flesh_NN
for_IN five_CD days_NNS ,_, while_IN among_IN the_DT Lanquineros_NNS and_CC Cajaboneros_NNS the_DT
period_NN of_IN abstinence_NN from_IN these_DT carnal_JJ pleasures_NNS extends_VBZ to_TO thirteen_CD
days_NNS ._. So_RB amongst_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Germans_NNPS of_IN Transylvania_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT rule_NN
that_IN no_DT man_NN may_MD sleep_VB with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN during_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT time_NN
that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ engaged_VBN in_IN sowing_VBG his_PRP$ fields_NNS ._. The_DT same_JJ rule_NN is_VBZ observed_VBN
at_IN Kalotaszeg_NNP in_IN Hungary_NNP ;_: the_DT people_NNS think_VBP that_IN if_IN the_DT custom_NN were_VBD
not_RB observed_VBD the_DT corn_NN would_MD be_VB mildewed_VBN ._. Similarly_RB a_DT Central_NN
Australian_JJ headman_NN of_IN the_DT Kaitish_NNP tribe_NN strictly_RB abstains_VBZ from_IN
marital_JJ relations_NNS with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN all_PDT the_DT time_NN that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ performing_VBG
magical_JJ ceremonies_NNS to_TO make_VB the_DT grass_NN grow_VB ;_: for_IN he_PRP believes_VBZ that_IN a_DT
breach_NN of_IN this_DT rule_NN would_MD prevent_VB the_DT grass_NN seed_NN from_IN sprouting_VBG
properly_RB ._. In_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Melanesian_NNP islands_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT yam_NN vines_NNS are_VBP
being_VBG trained_VBN ,_, the_DT men_NNS sleep_NN near_IN the_DT gardens_NNS and_CC never_RB approach_VB
their_PRP$ wives_NNS ;_: should_MD they_PRP enter_VB the_DT garden_NN after_IN breaking_VBG this_DT rule_NN
of_IN continence_NN the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT garden_NN would_MD be_VB spoilt_VBN ._.

If_IN we_PRP ask_VBP why_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ that_IN similar_JJ beliefs_NNS should_MD logically_RB lead_VB ,_,
among_IN different_JJ peoples_NNS ,_, to_TO such_DT opposite_JJ modes_NNS of_IN conduct_NN as_IN strict_JJ
chastity_NN and_CC more_JJR or_CC less_JJR open_JJ debauchery_NN ,_, the_DT reason_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP
presents_VBZ itself_PRP to_TO the_DT primitive_JJ mind_NN ,_, is_VBZ perhaps_RB not_RB very_RB far_RB to_TO
seek_VB ._. If_IN rude_JJ man_NN identifies_VBZ himself_PRP ,_, in_IN a_DT manner_NN ,_, with_IN nature_NN ;_: if_IN
he_PRP fails_VBZ to_TO distinguish_VB the_DT impulses_NNS and_CC processes_NNS in_IN himself_PRP from_IN
the_DT methods_NNS which_WDT nature_NN adopts_VBZ to_TO ensure_VB the_DT reproduction_NN of_IN plants_NNS
and_CC animals_NNS ,_, he_PRP may_MD leap_VB to_TO one_CD of_IN two_CD conclusions_NNS ._. Either_CC he_PRP may_MD
infer_NN that_IN by_IN yielding_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ appetites_NNS he_PRP will_MD thereby_RB assist_VB in_IN
the_DT multiplication_NN of_IN plants_NNS and_CC animals_NNS ;_: or_CC he_PRP may_MD imagine_VB that_IN the_DT
vigour_NN which_WDT he_PRP refuses_VBZ to_TO expend_VB in_IN reproducing_VBG his_PRP$ own_JJ kind_NN ,_, will_MD
form_NN as_IN it_PRP were_VBD a_DT store_NN of_IN energy_NN whereby_WRB other_JJ creatures_NNS ,_, whether_IN
vegetable_NN or_CC animal_NN ,_, will_MD somehow_RB benefit_VB in_IN propagating_VBG their_PRP$
species_NNS ._. Thus_RB from_IN the_DT same_JJ crude_NN philosophy_NN ,_, the_DT same_JJ primitive_JJ
notions_NNS of_IN nature_NN and_CC life_NN ,_, the_DT savage_JJ may_MD derive_VB by_IN different_JJ
channels_NNS a_DT rule_NN either_RB of_IN profligacy_NN or_CC of_IN asceticism_NN ._.

To_TO readers_NNS bred_VBN in_IN religion_NN which_WDT is_VBZ saturated_VBN with_IN the_DT ascetic_NN
idealism_NN of_IN the_DT East_NNP ,_, the_DT explanation_NN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP given_VBN of_IN the_DT rule_NN
of_IN continence_NN observed_VBN under_IN certain_JJ circumstances_NNS by_IN rude_JJ or_CC savage_JJ
peoples_NNS may_MD seem_VB far-fetched_JJ and_CC improbable_JJ ._. They_PRP may_MD think_VB that_IN
moral_JJ purity_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ so_RB intimately_RB associated_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ minds_NNS with_IN
the_DT observance_NN of_IN such_JJ a_DT rule_NN ,_, furnishes_VBZ a_DT sufficient_JJ explanation_NN of_IN
it_PRP ;_: they_PRP may_MD hold_VB with_IN Milton_NNP that_IN chastity_NN in_IN itself_PRP is_VBZ a_DT noble_JJ
virtue_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT restraint_NN which_WDT it_PRP imposes_VBZ on_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT
strongest_JJS impulses_NNS of_IN our_PRP$ animal_NN nature_NN marks_NNS out_IN those_DT who_WP can_MD
submit_VB to_TO it_PRP as_IN men_NNS raised_VBD above_IN the_DT common_JJ herd_NN ,_, and_CC therefore_RB
worthy_JJ to_TO receive_VB the_DT seal_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ approbation_NN ._. However_RB
natural_JJ this_DT mode_NN of_IN thought_NN may_MD seem_VB to_TO us_PRP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ utterly_RB foreign_JJ
and_CC indeed_RB incomprehensible_JJ to_TO the_DT savage_JJ ._. If_IN he_PRP resists_VBZ on_IN occasion_NN
the_DT sexual_JJ instinct_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ from_IN no_DT high_JJ idealism_NN ,_, no_DT ethereal_NN
aspiration_NN after_IN moral_JJ purity_NN ,_, but_CC for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN some_DT ulterior_JJ yet_CC
perfectly_RB definite_JJ and_CC concrete_JJ object_NN ,_, to_TO gain_VB which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ prepared_VBN
to_TO sacrifice_VB the_DT immediate_JJ gratification_NN of_IN his_PRP$ senses_NNS ._. That_IN this_DT is_VBZ
or_CC may_MD be_VB so_RB ,_, the_DT examples_NNS I_PRP have_VBP cited_VBN are_VBP amply_RB sufficient_JJ to_TO
prove_VB ._. They_PRP show_VBP that_IN where_WRB the_DT instinct_NN of_IN self-preservation_NN ,_, which_WDT
manifests_NNS itself_PRP chiefly_RB in_IN the_DT search_NN for_IN food_NN ,_, conflicts_NNS or_CC
appears_VBZ to_TO conflict_NN with_IN the_DT instinct_NN which_WDT conduces_VBZ to_TO the_DT
propagation_NN of_IN the_DT species_NNS ,_, the_DT former_JJ instinct_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT primary_JJ and_CC
more_RBR fundamental_JJ ,_, is_VBZ capable_JJ of_IN overmastering_VBG the_DT latter_NN ._. In_IN short_JJ ,_,
the_DT savage_JJ is_VBZ willing_JJ to_TO restrain_VB his_PRP$ sexual_JJ propensity_NN for_IN the_DT sake_NN
of_IN food_NN ._. Another_DT object_NN for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN which_WDT he_PRP consents_NNS to_TO
exercise_NN the_DT same_JJ self-restraint_NN is_VBZ victory_NN in_IN war_NN ._. Not_RB only_RB the_DT
warrior_NN in_IN the_DT field_NN but_CC his_PRP$ friends_NNS at_IN home_NN will_MD often_RB bridle_VB their_PRP$
sensual_JJ appetites_NNS from_IN a_DT belief_NN that_IN by_IN so_RB doing_VBG they_PRP will_MD the_DT more_RBR
easily_RB overcome_VBP their_PRP$ enemies_NNS ._. The_DT fallacy_NN of_IN such_JJ a_DT belief_NN ,_, like_IN
the_DT belief_NN that_IN the_DT chastity_NN of_IN the_DT sower_NN conduces_VBZ to_TO the_DT growth_NN of_IN
the_DT seed_NN ,_, is_VBZ plain_JJ enough_RB to_TO us_PRP ;_: yet_RB perhaps_RB the_DT self-restraint_NN
which_WDT these_DT and_CC the_DT like_JJ beliefs_NNS ,_, vain_JJ and_CC false_JJ as_IN they_PRP are_VBP ,_, have_VBP
imposed_VBN on_IN mankind_NN ,_, has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN without_IN its_PRP$ utility_NN in_IN bracing_VBG and_CC
strengthening_VBG the_DT breed_NN ._. For_IN strength_NN of_IN character_NN in_IN the_DT race_NN as_RB in_IN
the_DT individual_NN consists_VBZ mainly_RB in_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN sacrificing_VBG the_DT
present_JJ to_TO the_DT future_NN ,_, of_IN disregarding_VBG the_DT immediate_JJ temptations_NNS of_IN
ephemeral_JJ pleasure_NN for_IN more_RBR distant_JJ and_CC lasting_JJ sources_NNS of_IN
satisfaction_NN ._. The_DT more_JJR the_DT power_NN is_VBZ exercised_VBN the_DT higher_JJR and_CC
stronger_JJR becomes_VBZ the_DT character_NN ;_: till_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN heroism_NN is_VBZ
reached_VBN in_IN men_NNS who_WP renounce_VBP the_DT pleasures_NNS of_IN life_NN and_CC even_RB life_NN
itself_PRP for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN keeping_VBG or_CC winning_VBG for_IN others_NNS ,_, perhaps_RB in_IN
distant_JJ ages_NNS ,_, the_DT blessings_NNS of_IN freedom_NN and_CC truth_NN ._.



XII_NNP ._. The_DT Sacred_NNP Marriage_NN



1._. Diana_NNP as_IN a_DT Goddess_NNP of_IN Fertility_NNP

WE_NNP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN according_VBG to_TO a_DT widespread_JJ belief_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB
without_IN a_DT foundation_NN in_IN fact_NN ,_, plants_NNS reproduce_VB their_PRP$ kinds_NNS through_IN
the_DT sexual_JJ union_NN of_IN male_JJ and_CC female_JJ elements_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN on_IN the_DT
principle_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ magic_NN this_DT reproduction_NN is_VBZ
supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB stimulated_VBN by_IN the_DT real_JJ or_CC mock_JJ marriage_NN of_IN men_NNS and_CC
women_NNS ,_, who_WP masquerade_VBP for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG as_IN spirits_NNS of_IN vegetation_NN ._.
Such_JJ magical_JJ dramas_NN have_VBP played_VBN a_DT great_JJ part_NN in_IN the_DT popular_JJ
festivals_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ,_, and_CC based_VBN as_IN they_PRP are_VBP on_IN a_DT very_RB crude_JJ
conception_NN of_IN natural_JJ law_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN they_PRP must_MD have_VB been_VBN
handed_VBN down_RP from_IN a_DT remote_JJ antiquity_NN ._. We_PRP shall_MD hardly_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, err_VBP
in_IN assuming_VBG that_IN they_PRP date_VBP from_IN a_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT forefathers_NNS of_IN the_DT
civilised_JJ nations_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP were_VBD still_RB barbarians_NNS ,_, herding_VBG their_PRP$
cattle_NNS and_CC cultivating_VBG patches_NNS of_IN corn_NN in_IN the_DT clearings_NNS of_IN the_DT vast_JJ
forests_NNS ,_, which_WDT then_RB covered_VBD the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT continent_NN ,_, from_IN
the_DT Mediterranean_NNP to_TO the_DT Arctic_NNP Ocean_NNP ._. But_CC if_IN these_DT old_JJ spells_NNS and_CC
enchantments_NNS for_IN the_DT growth_NN of_IN leaves_NNS and_CC blossoms_NNS ,_, of_IN grass_NN and_CC
flowers_NNS and_CC fruit_NN ,_, have_VBP lingered_VBN down_RP to_TO our_PRP$ own_JJ time_NN in_IN the_DT shape_NN
of_IN pastoral_JJ plays_NNS and_CC popular_JJ merry-makings_NNS ,_, is_VBZ it_PRP not_RB reasonable_JJ to_TO
suppose_VB that_IN they_PRP survived_VBD in_IN less_JJR attenuated_JJ forms_NNS some_DT two_CD
thousand_CD years_NNS ago_RB among_IN the_DT civilised_JJ peoples_NNS of_IN antiquity_NN ?_. Or_CC ,_, to_TO
put_VB it_PRP otherwise_RB ,_, is_VBZ it_PRP not_RB likely_JJ that_IN in_IN certain_JJ festivals_NNS of_IN the_DT
ancients_NNS we_PRP may_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO detect_VB the_DT equivalents_NNS of_IN our_PRP$ May_NNP Day_NNP ,_,
Whitsuntide_NNP ,_, and_CC Midsummer_NNP celebrations_NNS ,_, with_IN this_DT difference_NN ,_, that_WDT
in_IN those_DT days_NNS the_DT ceremonies_NNS had_VBD not_RB yet_RB dwindled_VBD into_IN mere_JJ shows_NNS
and_CC pageants_NNS ,_, but_CC were_VBD still_RB religious_JJ or_CC magical_JJ rites_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT
the_DT actors_NNS consciously_RB supported_VBD the_DT high_JJ parts_NNS of_IN gods_NNS and_CC
goddesses_NNS ?_. Now_RB in_IN the_DT first_JJ chapter_NN of_IN this_DT book_NN we_PRP found_VBD reason_NN to_TO
believe_VB that_IN the_DT priest_NN who_WP bore_VBD the_DT title_NN of_IN King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP at_IN
Nemi_NNP had_VBD for_IN his_PRP$ mate_NN the_DT goddess_NN of_IN the_DT grove_NN ,_, Diana_NNP herself_PRP ._. May_NNP
not_RB he_PRP and_CC she_PRP ,_, as_IN King_NNP and_CC Queen_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ,_, have_VBP been_VBN serious_JJ
counterparts_NNS of_IN the_DT merry_NN mummers_NNS who_WP play_VBP the_DT King_NNP and_CC Queen_NNP of_IN
May_NNP ,_, the_DT Whitsuntide_NNP Bridegroom_NNP and_CC Bride_NNP in_IN modern_JJ Europe_NNP ?_. and_CC may_MD
not_RB their_PRP$ union_NN have_VBP been_VBN yearly_JJ celebrated_VBN in_IN a_DT theogamy_NN or_CC
divine_JJ marriage_NN ?_. Such_JJ dramatic_JJ weddings_NNS of_IN gods_NNS and_CC goddesses_NNS ,_, as_IN we_PRP
shall_MD see_VB presently_RB ,_, were_VBD carried_VBN out_RP as_IN solemn_JJ religious_JJ rites_NNS in_IN
many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ancient_JJ world_NN ;_: hence_RB there_EX is_VBZ no_DT intrinsic_JJ
improbability_NN in_IN the_DT supposition_NN that_IN the_DT sacred_JJ grove_NN at_IN Nemi_NNP may_MD
have_VBP been_VBN the_DT scene_NN of_IN an_DT annual_JJ ceremony_NN of_IN this_DT sort_NN ._. Direct_JJ
evidence_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD so_RB there_RB is_VBZ none_NN ,_, but_CC analogy_NN pleads_NNS in_IN favour_NN
of_IN the_DT view_NN ,_, as_IN I_PRP shall_MD now_RB endeavour_VBG to_TO show_VB ._.

Diana_NNP was_VBD essentially_RB a_DT goddess_NN of_IN the_DT woodlands_NNS ,_, as_IN Ceres_NNP was_VBD a_DT
goddess_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN and_CC Bacchus_RB a_DT god_NN of_IN the_DT vine_NN ._. Her_PRP$ sanctuaries_NNS
were_VBD commonly_RB in_IN groves_NNS ,_, indeed_RB every_DT grove_NN was_VBD sacred_JJ to_TO her_PRP ,_, and_CC
she_PRP is_VBZ often_RB associated_VBN with_IN the_DT forest_NN god_NN Silvanus_NNP in_IN dedications_NNS ._.
But_CC whatever_WDT her_PRP$ origin_NN may_MD have_VB been_VBN ,_, Diana_NNP was_VBD not_RB always_RB a_DT mere_JJ
goddess_NN of_IN trees_NNS ._. Like_IN her_PRP$ Greek_NNP sister_NN Artemis_NNP ,_, she_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB
developed_VBN into_IN a_DT personification_NN of_IN the_DT teeming_VBG life_NN of_IN nature_NN ,_, both_CC
animal_NN and_CC vegetable_NN ._. As_IN mistress_NN of_IN the_DT greenwood_NN she_PRP would_MD
naturally_RB be_VB thought_VBN to_TO own_VB the_DT beasts_NNS ,_, whether_IN wild_JJ or_CC tame_JJ ,_, that_WDT
ranged_VBD through_IN it_PRP ,_, lurking_VBG for_IN their_PRP$ prey_NN in_IN its_PRP$ gloomy_JJ depths_NNS ,_,
munching_VBG the_DT fresh_JJ leaves_NNS and_CC shoots_NNS among_IN the_DT boughs_NNS ,_, or_CC cropping_VBG
the_DT herbage_NN in_IN the_DT open_JJ glades_NNS and_CC dells_NNS ._. Thus_RB she_PRP might_MD come_VB to_TO be_VB
the_DT patron_NN goddess_NN both_DT of_IN hunters_NNS and_CC herdsmen_NNS ,_, just_RB as_IN Silvanus_NN
was_VBD the_DT god_NN not_RB only_RB of_IN woods_NNS ,_, but_CC of_IN cattle_NNS ._. Similarly_RB in_IN Finland_NNP
the_DT wild_JJ beasts_NNS of_IN the_DT forest_NN were_VBD regarded_VBN as_IN the_DT herds_NNS of_IN the_DT
woodland_NN god_NN Tapio_NNP and_CC of_IN his_PRP$ stately_NN and_CC beautiful_JJ wife_NN ._. No_DT man_NN
might_MD slay_VB one_CD of_IN these_DT animals_NNS without_IN the_DT gracious_JJ permission_NN of_IN
their_PRP$ divine_JJ owners_NNS ._. Hence_RB the_DT hunter_NN prayed_VBD to_TO the_DT sylvan_NN deities_NNS ,_,
and_CC vowed_VBD rich_JJ offerings_NNS to_TO them_PRP if_IN they_PRP would_MD drive_VB the_DT game_NN across_IN
his_PRP$ path_NN ._. And_CC cattle_NNS also_RB seem_VBP to_TO have_VB enjoyed_VBN the_DT protection_NN of_IN
those_DT spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT woods_NNS ,_, both_CC when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD in_IN their_PRP$ stalls_NNS and_CC
while_IN they_PRP strayed_VBD in_IN the_DT forest_NN ._. Before_IN the_DT Gayos_NNP of_IN Sumatra_NNP hunt_NN
deer_NNS ,_, wild_JJ goats_NNS ,_, or_CC wild_JJ pigs_NNS with_IN hounds_NNS in_IN the_DT woods_NNS ,_, they_PRP deem_VBP
it_PRP necessary_JJ to_TO obtain_VB the_DT leave_NN of_IN the_DT unseen_JJ Lord_NNP of_IN the_DT forest_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ done_VBN according_VBG to_TO a_DT prescribed_VBN form_NN by_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP has_VBZ special_JJ
skill_NN in_IN woodcraft_NN ._. He_PRP lays_VBD down_RP a_DT quid_NN of_IN betel_NN before_IN a_DT stake_NN
which_WDT is_VBZ cut_VBN in_IN a_DT particular_JJ way_NN to_TO represent_VB the_DT Lord_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ,_,
and_CC having_VBG done_VBN so_IN he_PRP prays_VBZ to_TO the_DT spirit_NN to_TO signify_VB his_PRP$ consent_NN or_CC
refusal_NN ._. In_IN his_PRP$ treatise_NN on_IN hunting_NN ,_, Arrian_NNP tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN the_DT Celts_NNS
used_VBN to_TO offer_VB an_DT annual_JJ sacrifice_NN to_TO Artemis_NNP on_IN her_PRP$ birthday_NN ,_,
purchasing_VBG the_DT sacrificial_JJ victim_NN with_IN the_DT fines_NNS which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD paid_VBN
into_IN her_PRP$ treasury_NN for_IN every_DT fox_NN ,_, hare_NN ,_, and_CC roe_NN that_IN they_PRP had_VBD killed_VBN
in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._. The_DT custom_NN clearly_RB implied_VBD that_IN the_DT wild_JJ
beasts_NNS belonged_VBD to_TO the_DT goddess_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN she_PRP must_MD be_VB compensated_VBN for_IN
their_PRP$ slaughter_NN ._.

But_CC Diana_NNP was_VBD not_RB merely_RB a_DT patroness_NN of_IN wild_JJ beasts_NNS ,_, a_DT mistress_NN of_IN
woods_NNS and_CC hills_NNS ,_, of_IN lonely_JJ glades_NNS and_CC sounding_NN rivers_NNS ;_: conceived_VBN as_IN
the_DT moon_NN ,_, and_CC especially_RB ,_, it_PRP would_MD seem_VB ,_, as_IN the_DT yellow_JJ harvest_NN moon_NN ,_,
she_PRP filled_VBD the_DT farmer_NN '_POS s_VBZ grange_NN with_IN goodly_JJ fruits_NNS ,_, and_CC heard_VBD the_DT
prayers_NNS of_IN women_NNS in_IN travail_NN ._. In_IN her_PRP$ sacred_JJ grove_NN at_IN Nemi_NNP ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP
seen_VBN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD especially_RB worshipped_VBN as_IN a_DT goddess_NN of_IN childbirth_NN ,_, who_WP
bestowed_VBN offspring_NN on_IN men_NNS and_CC women_NNS ._. Thus_RB Diana_NNP ,_, like_IN the_DT Greek_NNP
Artemis_NNP ,_, with_IN whom_WP she_PRP was_VBD constantly_RB identified_VBN ,_, may_MD be_VB described_VBN
as_IN a_DT goddess_NN of_IN nature_NN in_IN general_JJ and_CC of_IN fertility_NN in_IN particular_JJ ._. We_PRP
need_NN not_RB wonder_VB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, that_IN in_IN her_PRP$ sanctuary_NN on_IN the_DT Aventine_NNP
she_PRP was_VBD represented_VBN by_IN an_DT image_NN copied_VBN from_IN the_DT many-breasted_JJ idol_NN
of_IN the_DT Ephesian_NNP Artemis_NNP ,_, with_IN all_DT its_PRP$ crowded_JJ emblems_NNS of_IN exuberant_NN
fecundity_NN ._. Hence_RB too_RB we_PRP can_MD understand_VB why_WRB an_DT ancient_JJ Roman_JJ law_NN ,_,
attributed_VBN to_TO King_NNP Tullus_NNP Hostilius_NNP ,_, prescribed_VBN that_IN ,_, when_WRB incest_NN
had_VBD been_VBN committed_VBN ,_, an_DT expiatory_JJ sacrifice_NN should_MD be_VB offered_VBN by_IN the_DT
pontiffs_NNS in_IN the_DT grove_NN of_IN Diana_NNP ._. For_IN we_PRP know_VBP that_IN the_DT crime_NN of_IN incest_NN
is_VBZ commonly_RB supposed_VBN to_TO cause_VB a_DT dearth_NN ;_: hence_RB it_PRP would_MD be_VB meet_VB that_IN
atonement_NN for_IN the_DT offence_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO the_DT goddess_NN of_IN
fertility_NN ._.

Now_RB on_IN the_DT principle_NN that_IN the_DT goddess_NN of_IN fertility_NN must_MD herself_PRP be_VB
fertile_JJ ,_, it_PRP behoved_VBD Diana_NNP to_TO have_VB a_DT male_JJ partner_NN ._. Her_PRP$ mate_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT
testimony_NN of_IN Servius_NNP may_MD be_VB trusted_VBN ,_, was_VBD that_IN Virbius_NNP who_WP had_VBD his_PRP$
representative_NN ,_, or_CC perhaps_RB rather_RB his_PRP$ embodiment_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT
Wood_NNP at_IN Nemi_NNP ._. The_DT aim_NN of_IN their_PRP$ union_NN would_MD be_VB to_TO promote_VB the_DT
fruitfulness_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, of_IN animals_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN mankind_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP might_MD
naturally_RB be_VB thought_VBN that_IN this_DT object_NN would_MD be_VB more_RBR surely_RB attained_VBN

divine_JJ bride_NN and_CC bridegroom_NN being_VBG played_VBN either_RB by_IN their_PRP$ images_NNS or_CC
by_IN living_VBG persons_NNS ._. No_DT ancient_JJ writer_NN mentions_VBZ that_IN this_DT was_VBD done_VBN in_IN
the_DT grove_NN at_IN Nemi_NNP ;_: but_CC our_PRP$ knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT Arician_JJ ritual_NN is_VBZ so_RB
scanty_NN that_IN the_DT want_NN of_IN information_NN on_IN this_DT head_NN can_MD hardly_RB count_VB as_IN
a_DT fatal_JJ objection_NN to_TO the_DT theory_NN ._. That_DT theory_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN
direct_JJ evidence_NN ,_, must_MD necessarily_RB be_VB based_VBN on_IN the_DT analogy_NN of_IN similar_JJ
customs_NNS practised_VBD elsewhere_RB ._. Some_DT modern_JJ examples_NNS of_IN such_JJ customs_NNS ,_,
more_RBR or_CC less_RBR degenerate_JJ ,_, were_VBD described_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ chapter_NN ._. Here_RB we_PRP
shall_MD consider_VB their_PRP$ ancient_JJ counterparts_NNS ._.



2._`` The_DT Marriage_NN of_IN the_DT Gods_NNS

AT_WDT BABYLON_NNP the_DT imposing_VBG sanctuary_NN of_IN Bel_NNP rose_VBD like_IN a_DT pyramid_NN above_IN
the_DT city_NN in_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN eight_CD towers_NNS or_CC stories_NNS ,_, planted_VBD one_CD on_IN the_DT
top_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ ._. On_IN the_DT highest_JJS tower_NN ,_, reached_VBN by_IN an_DT ascent_NN which_WDT
wound_NN about_IN all_PDT the_DT rest_NN ,_, there_EX stood_VBD a_DT spacious_JJ temple_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT
temple_NN a_DT great_JJ bed_NN ,_, magnificently_RB draped_VBD and_CC cushioned_VBN ,_, with_IN a_DT
golden_JJ table_NN beside_IN it_PRP ._. In_IN the_DT temple_NN no_DT image_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB seen_VBN ,_, and_CC
no_DT human_NN being_NN passed_VBD the_DT night_NN there_RB ,_, save_IN a_DT single_JJ woman_NN ,_, whom_WP ,_,

temple_NN at_IN night_NN and_CC slept_VBD in_IN the_DT great_JJ bed_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT woman_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT
consort_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ,_, might_MD have_VB no_DT intercourse_NN with_IN mortal_JJ man_NN ._.

At_IN Thebes_NNP in_IN Egypt_NNP a_DT woman_NN slept_VBN in_IN the_DT temple_NN of_IN Ammon_NNP as_IN the_DT
consort_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, like_IN the_DT human_JJ wife_NN of_IN Bel_NNP at_IN Babylon_NNP ,_, she_PRP

often_RB mentioned_VBN as_IN "_`` the_DT divine_JJ consort_NN ,"_NN and_CC usually_RB she_PRP was_VBD no_DT less_RBR
a_DT personage_NN than_IN the_DT Queen_NNP of_IN Egypt_NNP herself_PRP ._. For_IN ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT

oldest_JJS temples_NNS in_IN Egypt_NNP ,_, those_DT of_IN Deir_JJ el_NN Bahari_NNP and_CC Luxor_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT
inscriptions_NNS attached_VBN to_TO the_DT paintings_NNS leave_VBP no_DT doubt_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT

At_IN Athens_NNP the_DT god_NN of_IN the_DT vine_NN ,_, Dionysus_NNP ,_, was_VBD annually_RB married_VBN to_TO the_DT

meaning_VBG the_DT ceremony_NN would_MD answer_VB to_TO the_DT nuptials_NNS of_IN the_DT King_NNP and_CC

In_IN the_DT great_JJ mysteries_NNS solemnised_VBN at_IN Eleusis_NNP in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN

having_VBG dressed_VBN it_PRP as_IN a_DT bride_NN ,_, they_PRP set_VBD it_PRP on_IN a_DT bullock-cart_NN with_IN a_DT

and_CC then_RB to_TO the_DT top_NN of_IN Mount_NNP Cithaeron_NNP ,_, where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD burnt_VBN on_IN a_DT
great_JJ pyre_NN ._. The_DT story_NN told_VBD to_TO explain_VB the_DT festivals_NNS suggests_VBZ that_IN

Thus_RB the_DT custom_NN of_IN marrying_VBG gods_NNS either_CC to_TO images_NNS or_CC to_TO human_JJ beings_NNS

Thus_RB ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN the_DT Wotyaks_NNP of_IN

with_IN bells_NNS ringing_VBG ,_, as_IN they_PRP do_VBP when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP fetching_VBG home_NN a_DT bride_NN ,_,
to_TO the_DT sacred_JJ grove_NN at_IN Cura_NNP ._. There_EX they_PRP ate_VBD and_CC drank_VBD merrily_RB all_RB
night_NN ,_, and_CC next_JJ morning_NN they_PRP cut_VBD a_DT square_JJ piece_NN of_IN turf_NN in_IN the_DT grove_NN
and_CC took_VBD it_PRP home_NN with_IN them_PRP ._. After_IN that_DT ,_, though_IN it_PRP fared_VBD well_RB with_IN
the_DT people_NNS of_IN Malmyz_NNP ,_, it_PRP fared_VBD ill_RB with_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN Cura_NNP ;_: for_IN in_IN
Malmyz_NNP the_DT bread_NN was_VBD good_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN Cura_NNP it_PRP was_VBD bad_JJ ._. Hence_RB the_DT men_NNS of_IN
Cura_NNP who_WP had_VBD consented_VBN to_TO the_DT marriage_NN were_VBD blamed_VBN and_CC roughly_RB
handled_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ indignant_JJ fellow-villagers_NNS ._. "_'' What_WP they_PRP meant_VBD by_IN
this_DT marriage_NN ceremony_NN ,"_, says_VBZ the_DT writer_NN who_WP reports_VBZ it_PRP ,_, "_`` it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB
easy_JJ to_TO imagine_VB ._. Perhaps_RB ,_, as_IN Bechterew_NNP thinks_VBZ ,_, they_PRP meant_VBD to_TO marry_VB
Keremet_NNP to_TO the_DT kindly_JJ and_CC fruitful_JJ Mukylcin_NNP ,_, the_DT Earth-wife_NN ,_, in_IN
order_NN that_IN she_PRP might_MD influence_VB him_PRP for_IN good_JJ ."_NN When_WRB wells_NNS are_VBP dug_VBN in_IN
Bengal_NNP ,_, a_DT wooden_JJ image_NN of_IN a_DT god_NN is_VBZ made_VBN and_CC married_VBN to_TO the_DT goddess_NN
of_IN water_NN ._.

Often_RB the_DT bride_NN destined_VBN for_IN the_DT god_NN is_VBZ not_RB a_DT log_NN or_CC a_DT cloud_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT
living_VBG woman_NN of_IN flesh_NN and_CC blood_NN ._. The_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN a_DT village_NN in_IN Peru_NNP
have_VBP been_VBN known_VBN to_TO marry_VB a_DT beautiful_JJ girl_NN ,_, about_IN fourteen_CD years_NNS of_IN
age_NN ,_, to_TO a_DT stone_NN shaped_VBN like_IN a_DT human_JJ being_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP regarded_VBD as_IN a_DT
god_NN (_-LRB- huaca_NN )._, All_PDT the_DT villagers_NNS took_VBD part_NN in_IN the_DT marriage_NN ceremony_NN ,_,
which_WDT lasted_VBD three_CD days_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD attended_VBN with_IN much_JJ revelry_NN ._. The_DT
girl_NN thereafter_RB remained_VBD a_DT virgin_NN and_CC sacrificed_VBD to_TO the_DT idol_NN for_IN the_DT
people_NNS ._. They_PRP showed_VBD her_PRP$ the_DT utmost_JJ reverence_NN and_CC deemed_VBD her_PRP$ divine_JJ ._.
Every_DT year_NN about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN March_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT season_NN for_IN fishing_NN
with_IN the_DT dragnet_NN began_VBD ,_, the_DT Algonquins_NNP and_CC Hurons_NNP married_VBD their_PRP$ nets_NNS
to_TO two_CD young_JJ girls_NNS ,_, aged_VBN six_CD or_CC seven_CD ._. At_IN the_DT wedding_NN feast_NN the_DT net_NN
was_VBD placed_VBN between_IN the_DT two_CD maidens_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD exhorted_VBN to_TO take_VB courage_NN
and_CC catch_VB many_JJ fish_NN ._. The_DT reason_NN for_IN choosing_VBG the_DT brides_NNS so_IN young_JJ was_VBD
to_TO make_VB sure_JJ that_IN they_PRP were_VBD virgins_NNS ._. The_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT custom_NN is_VBZ
said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN this_DT ._. One_CD year_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT fishing_NN season_NN came_VBD
round_NN ,_, the_DT Algonquins_NNP cast_VBD their_PRP$ nets_NNS as_IN usual_JJ ,_, but_CC took_VBD nothing_NN ._.
Surprised_VBN at_IN their_PRP$ want_NN of_IN success_NN ,_, they_PRP did_VBD not_RB know_VB what_WP to_TO make_VB
of_IN it_PRP ,_, till_IN the_DT soul_NN or_CC genius_NN (_-LRB- oki_NNP )_-RRB- of_IN the_DT net_NN appeared_VBD to_TO them_PRP
in_IN the_DT likeness_NN of_IN a_DT tall_JJ well-built_JJ man_NN ,_, who_WP said_VBD to_TO them_PRP in_IN a_DT
great_JJ passion_NN ,_, "_`` I_PRP have_VBP lost_VBN my_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC I_PRP cannot_MD find_VB one_NN who_WP has_VBZ
known_VBN no_DT other_JJ man_NN but_CC me_PRP ;_: that_DT is_VBZ why_WRB you_PRP do_VBP not_RB succeed_VB ,_, and_CC why_WRB
you_PRP never_RB will_MD succeed_VB till_IN you_PRP give_VBP me_PRP satisfaction_NN on_IN this_DT head_NN ."_.
So_IN the_DT Algonquins_NNP held_VBD a_DT council_NN and_CC resolved_VBD to_TO appease_VB the_DT spirit_NN
of_IN the_DT net_NN by_IN marrying_VBG him_PRP to_TO two_CD such_JJ very_JJ young_JJ girls_NNS that_IN he_PRP
could_MD have_VB no_DT ground_NN of_IN complaint_NN on_IN that_DT score_NN for_IN the_DT future_NN ._. They_PRP
did_VBD so_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT fishing_NN turned_VBD out_RP all_DT that_DT could_MD be_VB wished_VBN ._. The_DT
thing_NN got_VBD wind_NN among_IN their_PRP$ neighbours_NNS the_DT Hurons_NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP adopted_VBD
the_DT custom_NN ._. A_DT share_NN of_IN the_DT catch_NN was_VBD always_RB given_VBN to_TO the_DT families_NNS of_IN
the_DT two_CD girls_NNS who_WP acted_VBD as_IN brides_NNS of_IN the_DT net_NN for_IN the_DT year_NN ._.

The_DT Oraons_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP worship_NN the_DT Earth_NNP as_IN a_DT goddess_NN ,_, and_CC annually_RB
celebrate_VB her_PRP$ marriage_NN with_IN the_DT Sun-god_NNP Dharme_NNP �_, at_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT
sa_NN �_VBZ l_JJ tree_NN is_VBZ in_IN blossom_NN ._. The_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ ._. All_DT bathe_NN ,_,
then_RB the_DT men_NNS repair_NN to_TO the_DT sacred_JJ grove_NN (_-LRB- sarna_FW ),_, while_IN the_DT women_NNS
assemble_NN at_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN priest_NN ._. After_IN sacrificing_VBG some_DT
fowls_NNS to_TO the_DT Sun-god_NNP and_CC the_DT demon_NN of_IN the_DT grove_NN ,_, the_DT men_NNS eat_VBP and_CC
drink_NN ._. "_'' The_DT priest_NN is_VBZ then_RB carried_VBN back_RB to_TO the_DT village_NN on_IN the_DT
shoulders_NNS of_IN a_DT strong_JJ man_NN ._. Near_IN the_DT village_NN the_DT women_NNS meet_VBP the_DT men_NNS
and_CC wash_VBP their_PRP$ feet_NNS ._. With_IN beating_VBG of_IN drums_NNS and_CC singing_NN ,_, dancing_NN ,_, and_CC
jumping_NN ,_, all_DT proceed_VBP to_TO the_DT priest_NN '_POS s_PRP house_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN decorated_VBN
with_IN leaves_NNS and_CC flowers_NNS ._. Then_RB the_DT usual_JJ form_NN of_IN marriage_NN is_VBZ
performed_VBN between_IN the_DT priest_NN and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, symbolising_VBG the_DT supposed_VBN
union_NN between_IN Sun_NNP and_CC Earth_NNP ._. After_IN the_DT ceremony_NN all_RB eat_VB and_CC drink_VB
and_CC make_VB merry_NN ;_: they_PRP dance_VBP and_CC sing_VBP obscene_JJ songs_NNS ,_, and_CC finally_RB
indulge_NN in_IN the_DT vilest_NN orgies_NNS ._. The_DT object_NN is_VBZ to_TO move_VB the_DT mother_NN earth_NN
to_TO become_VB fruitful_JJ ."_NN Thus_RB the_DT Sacred_NNP Marriage_NNP of_IN the_DT Sun_NNP and_CC Earth_NNP ,_,
personated_VBN by_IN the_DT priest_NN and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, is_VBZ celebrated_VBN as_IN a_DT charm_NN to_TO
ensure_VB the_DT fertility_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN ;_: and_CC for_IN the_DT same_JJ purpose_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT
principle_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS indulge_VBP in_IN licentious_VBG
orgy_NN ._.

It_PRP deserves_VBZ to_TO be_VB remarked_VBN that_IN the_DT supernatural_JJ being_VBG to_TO whom_WP women_NNS
are_VBP married_VBN is_VBZ often_RB a_DT god_NN or_CC spirit_NN of_IN water_NN ._. Thus_RB Mukasa_NNP ,_, the_DT god_NN
of_IN the_DT Victoria_NNP Nyanza_NNP lake_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD propitiated_VBN by_IN the_DT Baganda_NNP
every_DT time_NN they_PRP undertook_VBD a_DT long_JJ voyage_NN ,_, had_VBD virgins_NNS provided_VBN for_IN
him_PRP to_TO serve_VB as_IN his_PRP$ wives_NNS ._. Like_IN the_DT Vestals_NNS they_PRP were_VBD bound_VBN to_TO
chastity_NN ,_, but_CC unlike_IN the_DT Vestals_NNS they_PRP seem_VBP to_TO have_VB been_VBN often_RB
unfaithful_JJ ._. The_DT custom_NN lasted_VBD until_IN Mwanga_NNP was_VBD converted_VBN to_TO
Christianity_NNP ._. The_DT Akikuyu_NNP of_IN British_NNP East_NNP Africa_NNP worship_NN the_DT snake_NN
of_IN a_DT certain_JJ river_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN intervals_NNS of_IN several_JJ years_NNS they_PRP marry_VBP the_DT
snake-god_NN to_TO women_NNS ,_, but_CC especially_RB to_TO young_JJ girls_NNS ._. For_IN this_DT purpose_NN
huts_NNS are_VBP built_VBN by_IN order_NN of_IN the_DT medicine-men_NNS ,_, who_WP there_EX consummate_VBP
the_DT sacred_JJ marriage_NN with_IN the_DT credulous_JJ female_JJ devotees_NNS ._. If_IN the_DT girls_NNS
do_VBP not_RB repair_VB to_TO the_DT huts_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ accord_NN in_IN sufficient_JJ numbers_NNS ,_,
they_PRP are_VBP seized_VBN and_CC dragged_VBN thither_RB to_TO the_DT embraces_NNS of_IN the_DT deity_NN ._.
The_DT offspring_NN of_IN these_DT mystic_JJ unions_NNS appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB fathered_VBN on_RP God_NNP
(_-LRB- ngai_FW );_FW certainly_RB there_EX are_VBP children_NNS among_IN the_DT Akikuyu_NNS who_WP pass_VBP
for_IN children_NNS of_IN God_NNP ._. It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN once_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN
Cayeli_NNP in_IN Buru_NNP --_: an_DT East_NNP Indian_NNP island_NN --_: were_VBD threatened_VBN with_IN

certain_JJ girl_NN ._. Accordingly_RB ,_, they_PRP compelled_VBD the_DT damsel_NN '_POS s_VBZ father_NN to_TO
dress_NN her_PRP in_IN bridal_JJ array_NN and_CC deliver_VB her_PRP over_IN to_TO the_DT clutches_NNS of_IN
her_PRP$ crocodile_JJ lover_NN ._.

A_DT usage_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO have_VB prevailed_VBN in_IN the_DT
Maldive_NNP Islands_NNP before_IN the_DT conversion_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS to_TO Islam_NNP ._.
The_DT famous_JJ Arab_JJ traveller_NN Ibn_IN Batutah_NNP has_VBZ described_VBN the_DT custom_NN and_CC
the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PRP came_VBD to_TO an_DT end_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD assured_VBN by_IN several_JJ
