drew_VBD lots_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP upon_IN whom_WP the_DT lot_NN fell_VBD gave_VBD up_RP his_PRP$ daughter_NN to_TO the_DT
jinnee_NN of_IN the_DT sea_NN ._. The_DT last_JJ of_IN the_DT maidens_NNS thus_RB offered_VBN to_TO the_DT demon_NN

in_IN driving_VBG the_DT jinnee_NN back_RB into_IN the_DT sea_NN ._.

Ibn_NNP Batutah_NNP '_POS s_PRP narrative_NN of_IN the_DT demon_NN lover_NN and_CC his_PRP$ mortal_JJ brides_NNS
closely_RB resembles_VBZ a_DT well-known_JJ type_NN of_IN folk-tale_JJ ,_, of_IN which_WDT versions_NNS
have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN from_IN Japan_NNP and_CC Annam_NNP in_IN the_DT East_NNP to_TO Senegambia_NNP ,_,
Scandinavia_NNP ,_, and_CC Scotland_NNP in_IN the_DT West_NNP ._. The_DT story_NN varies_VBZ in_IN details_NNS
from_IN people_NNS to_TO people_NNS ,_, but_CC as_IN commonly_RB told_VBN it_PRP runs_VBZ thus_RB ._. A_DT certain_JJ
country_NN is_VBZ infested_VBN by_IN a_DT many-headed_JJ serpent_NN ,_, dragon_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ
monster_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD destroy_VB the_DT whole_JJ people_NNS if_IN a_DT human_JJ victim_NN ,_,

XIII_NNP ._. The_DT Kings_NNP of_IN Rome_NNP and_CC Alba_NNP



1._DT Numa_NNP and_CC Egeria_NNP

FROM_NNP THE_DT FOREGOING_NN survey_NN of_IN custom_NN and_CC legend_NN we_PRP may_MD infer_VB that_IN the_DT
sacred_JJ marriage_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS both_DT of_IN vegetation_NN and_CC of_IN water_NN has_VBZ

fertility_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, on_IN which_WDT the_DT life_NN of_IN animals_NNS and_CC men_NNS
ultimately_RB depends_VBZ ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN such_JJ rites_NNS the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ
bridegroom_NN or_CC bride_NN is_VBZ often_RB sustained_VBN by_IN a_DT man_NN or_CC woman_NN ._. The_DT

was_VBD credited_VBN with_IN a_DT power_NN of_IN facilitating_VBG conception_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN

sacred_JJ oak_NN ._. Such_PDT a_DT spring_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB gushed_VBD from_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN

This_DT would_MD explain_VB the_DT more_JJR than_IN mortal_JJ wisdom_NN with_IN which_WDT ,_, according_VBG

they_PRP may_MD originally_RB have_VB been_VBN invested_VBN with_IN a_DT sacred_JJ character_NN of_IN

birth_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN virtue_NN of_IN their_PRP$ supposed_VBN divinity_NN as_RB representatives_NNS

their_PRP$ remote_JJ predecessors_NNS in_IN the_DT dark_JJ ages_NNS which_WDT preceded_VBD the_DT dawn_NN
of_IN legend_NN ._.



2._`` The_DT King_NNP as_IN Jupiter_NNP

IN_IN THE_DT FIRST_NN place_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, it_PRP would_MD seem_VB that_IN the_DT Roman_NNP king_NN
personated_VBN no_DT less_JJR a_DT deity_NN than_IN Jupiter_NNP himself_PRP ._. For_IN down_RB to_TO
imperial_JJ times_NNS victorious_JJ generals_NNS celebrating_VBG a_DT triumph_NN ,_, and_CC
magistrates_NNS presiding_VBG at_IN the_DT games_NNS in_IN the_DT Circus_NNP ,_, wore_VBD the_DT costume_NN
of_IN Jupiter_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD borrowed_VBN for_IN the_DT occasion_NN from_IN his_PRP$ great_JJ
temple_NN on_IN the_DT Capitol_NNP ;_: and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN held_VBN with_IN a_DT high_JJ degree_NN of_IN
probability_NN both_DT by_IN ancients_NNS and_CC moderns_NNS that_IN in_IN so_RB doing_VBG they_PRP
copied_VBN the_DT traditionary_JJ attire_NN and_CC insignia_NN of_IN the_DT Roman_NNP kings_NNS ._. They_PRP
rode_VBD a_DT chariot_NN drawn_VBN by_IN four_CD laurel-crowned_JJ horses_NNS through_IN the_DT city_NN ,_,
where_WRB every_DT one_NN else_RB went_VBD on_IN foot_NN :_: they_PRP wore_VBD purple_JJ robes_NNS
embroidered_VBN or_CC spangled_VBN with_IN gold_NN :_: in_IN the_DT right_JJ hand_NN they_PRP bore_VBD a_DT
branch_NN of_IN laurel_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT left_JJ hand_NN an_DT ivory_NN sceptre_NN topped_VBN with_IN
an_DT eagle_NN :_: a_DT wreath_NN of_IN laurel_NN crowned_VBD their_PRP$ brows_NNS :_: their_PRP$ face_NN was_VBD
reddened_VBN with_IN vermilion_CD ;_: and_CC over_IN their_PRP$ head_NN a_DT slave_NN held_VBD a_DT heavy_NN
crown_NN of_IN massy_JJ gold_NN fashioned_VBN in_IN the_DT likeness_NN of_IN oak_NN leaves_NNS ._. In_IN this_DT
attire_NN the_DT assimilation_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN to_TO the_DT god_NN comes_VBZ out_RP above_IN all_DT in_IN
the_DT eagle-topped_JJ sceptre_NN ,_, the_DT oaken_JJ crown_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT reddened_JJ face_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT eagle_NN was_VBD the_DT bird_NN of_IN Jove_NNP ,_, the_DT oak_NN was_VBD his_PRP$ sacred_JJ tree_NN ,_, and_CC
the_DT face_NN of_IN his_PRP$ image_NN standing_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ four-horse_JJ chariot_NN on_IN the_DT
Capitol_NNP was_VBD in_IN like_JJ manner_NN regularly_RB dyed_VBN red_JJ on_IN festivals_NNS ;_: indeed_RB ,_,
so_RB important_JJ was_VBD it_PRP deemed_VBN to_TO keep_VB the_DT divine_JJ features_NNS properly_RB
rouged_VBD that_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT first_JJ duties_NNS of_IN the_DT censors_NNS was_VBD to_TO contract_VB
for_IN having_VBG this_DT done_VBN ._. As_IN the_DT triumphal_JJ procession_NN always_RB ended_VBD in_IN
the_DT temple_NN of_IN Jupiter_NNP on_IN the_DT Capitol_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD peculiarly_RB appropriate_JJ
that_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT victor_NN should_MD be_VB graced_VBN by_IN a_DT crown_NN of_IN oak_NN
leaves_NNS ,_, for_IN not_RB only_RB was_VBD every_DT oak_NN consecrated_VBN to_TO Jupiter_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT
Capitoline_NNP temple_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN was_VBD said_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN built_VBN by_IN Romulus_NNP
beside_IN a_DT sacred_JJ oak_NN ,_, venerated_VBN by_IN shepherds_NNS ,_, to_TO which_WDT the_DT king_NN
attached_VBN the_DT spoils_NNS won_VBN by_IN him_PRP from_IN the_DT enemy_NN '_'' s_PRP general_JJ in_IN battle_NN ._.
We_PRP are_VBP expressly_RB told_VBN that_IN the_DT oak_NN crown_NN was_VBD sacred_JJ to_TO Capitoline_NNP
Jupiter_NNP ;_: a_DT passage_NN of_IN Ovid_NNP proves_VBZ that_IN it_PRP was_VBD regarded_VBN as_IN the_DT god_NN '_'' s_PRP
special_JJ emblem_NN ._.

According_VBG to_TO a_DT tradition_NN which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP no_DT reason_NN to_TO reject_VB ,_, Rome_NNP was_VBD
founded_VBN by_IN settlers_NNS from_IN Alba_NNP Longa_NNP ,_, a_DT city_NN situated_VBN on_IN the_DT slope_NN of_IN
the_DT Alban_NNP hills_NNS ,_, overlooking_VBG the_DT lake_NN and_CC the_DT Campagna_NNP ._. Hence_RB if_IN the_DT
Roman_NNP kings_NNS claimed_VBD to_TO be_VB representatives_NNS or_CC embodiments_NNS of_IN Jupiter_NNP ,_,
the_DT god_NN of_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT thunder_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT oak_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ natural_JJ to_TO
suppose_VB that_IN the_DT kings_NNS of_IN Alba_NNP ,_, from_IN whom_WP the_DT founder_NN of_IN Rome_NNP traced_VBD
his_PRP$ descent_NN ,_, may_MD have_VB set_VBN up_RP the_DT same_JJ claim_NN before_IN them_PRP ._. Now_RB the_DT
Alban_NNP dynasty_NN bore_VBD the_DT name_NN of_IN Silvii_NNP or_CC Wood_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP can_MD hardly_RB be_VB
without_IN significance_NN that_IN in_IN the_DT vision_NN of_IN the_DT historic_JJ glories_NNS of_IN
Rome_NNP revealed_VBD to_TO Aeneas_NNP in_IN the_DT underworld_NN ,_, Virgil_NNP ,_, an_DT antiquary_JJ as_IN
well_RB as_IN a_DT poet_NN ,_, should_MD represent_VB all_PDT the_DT line_NN of_IN Silvii_NNP as_IN crowned_VBN
with_IN oak_NN ._. A_DT chaplet_NN of_IN oak_NN leaves_NNS would_MD thus_RB seem_VB to_TO have_VB been_VBN part_NN
of_IN the_DT insignia_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ kings_NNS of_IN Alba_NNP Longa_NNP as_IN of_IN their_PRP$
successors_NNS the_DT kings_NNS of_IN Rome_NNP ;_: in_IN both_DT cases_NNS it_PRP marked_VBD the_DT monarch_NN as_IN
the_DT human_JJ representative_NN of_IN the_DT oak-god_NN ._. The_DT Roman_NNP annals_NNS record_NN
that_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT kings_NNS of_IN Alba_NNP ,_, Romulus_NNP ,_, Remulus_NNP ,_, or_CC Amulius_NNP Silvius_NNP
by_IN name_NN ,_, set_VBN up_RP for_IN being_VBG a_DT god_NN in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ person_NN ,_, the_DT equal_JJ or_CC
superior_JJ of_IN Jupiter_NNP ._. To_TO support_VB his_PRP$ pretensions_NNS and_CC overawe_IN his_PRP$
subjects_NNS ,_, he_PRP constructed_VBD machines_NNS whereby_WRB he_PRP mimicked_VBD the_DT clap_NN of_IN

bottom_NN of_IN the_DT clear_JJ lake_NN ._. Taken_VBN along_IN with_IN the_DT similar_JJ story_NN of_IN

Thus_RB ,_, if_IN the_DT kings_NNS of_IN Alba_NNP and_CC Rome_NNP imitated_VBD Jupiter_NNP as_IN god_NN of_IN the_DT

If_IN at_IN any_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN the_DT Romans_NNPS celebrated_VBD the_DT sacred_JJ marriage_NN

ancient_JJ and_CC modern_JJ writers_NNS have_VBP regarded_VBN him_PRP ,_, with_IN much_JJ probability_NN ,_,

deities_NNS themselves_PRP bore_VBD the_DT title_NN of_IN King_NNP and_CC Queen_NNP ._.

Whether_IN that_DT was_VBD so_RB or_CC not_RB ,_, the_DT legend_NN of_IN Numa_NNP and_CC Egeria_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO

Of_IN the_DT two_CD forms_NNS of_IN the_DT rite_NN we_PRP can_MD hardly_RB doubt_VB that_IN the_DT Roman_NNP was_VBD
the_DT older_JJR ,_, and_CC that_DT long_JJ before_IN the_DT northern_JJ invaders_NNS met_VBD with_IN the_DT

XIV_NNP ._. The_DT Succession_NNP to_TO the_DT Kingdom_NNP in_IN Ancient_NNP Latium_NNP

IN_IN REGARD_NNP to_TO the_DT Roman_NNP king_NN ,_, whose_WP$ priestly_JJ functions_NNS were_VBD inherited_VBN
by_IN his_PRP$ successor_NN the_DT king_NN of_IN the_DT Sacred_NNP Rites_NNP ,_, the_DT foregoing_NN
discussion_NN has_VBZ led_VBN us_PRP to_TO the_DT following_VBG conclusions_NNS ._. He_PRP represented_VBD
and_CC indeed_RB personated_VBN Jupiter_NNP ,_, the_DT great_JJ god_NN of_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, the_DT
thunder_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT oak_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT character_NN made_VBD rain_NN ,_, thunder_NN ,_, and_CC
lightning_NN for_IN the_DT good_JJ of_IN his_PRP$ subjects_NNS ,_, like_IN many_JJ more_JJR kings_NNS of_IN the_DT
weather_NN in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ._. Further_RB ,_, he_PRP not_RB only_RB mimicked_VBN
the_DT oak-god_NN by_IN wearing_VBG an_DT oak_NN wreath_NN and_CC other_JJ insignia_NN of_IN divinity_NN ,_,
but_CC he_PRP was_VBD married_VBN to_TO an_DT oak-nymph_JJ Egeria_NNP ,_, who_WP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN
merely_RB a_DT local_JJ form_NN of_IN Diana_NNP in_IN her_PRP$ character_NN of_IN a_DT goddess_NN of_IN woods_NNS ,_,
of_IN waters_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN child-birth_NN ._. All_PDT these_DT conclusions_NNS ,_, which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP
reached_VBN mainly_RB by_IN a_DT consideration_NN of_IN the_DT Roman_NNP evidence_NN ,_, may_MD with_IN
great_JJ probability_NN be_VB applied_VBN to_TO the_DT other_JJ Latin_JJ communities_NNS ._. They_PRP
too_RB probably_RB had_VBD of_IN old_JJ their_PRP$ divine_JJ or_CC priestly_RB kings_NNS ,_, who_WP
transmitted_VBD their_PRP$ religious_JJ functions_NNS ,_, without_IN their_PRP$ civil_JJ powers_NNS ,_,
to_TO their_PRP$ successors_NNS the_DT Kings_NNP of_IN the_DT Sacred_NNP Rites_NNP ._.

But_CC we_PRP have_VBP still_RB to_TO ask_VB ,_, What_WP was_VBD the_DT rule_NN of_IN succession_NN to_TO the_DT
kingdom_NN among_IN the_DT old_JJ Latin_NNP tribes_NNS ?_. According_VBG to_TO tradition_NN ,_, there_EX
were_VBD in_IN all_DT eight_CD kings_NNS of_IN Rome_NNP ,_, and_CC with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT five_CD last_JJ of_IN
them_PRP ,_, at_IN all_DT events_NNS ,_, we_PRP can_MD hardly_RB doubt_VB that_IN they_PRP actually_RB sat_VBD on_IN
the_DT throne_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT traditional_JJ history_NN of_IN their_PRP$ reigns_NNS is_VBZ ,_, in_IN
its_PRP$ main_JJ outlines_NNS ,_, correct_JJ ._. Now_RB it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB remarkable_JJ that_IN though_IN
the_DT first_JJ king_NN of_IN Rome_NNP ,_, Romulus_NNP ,_, is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN descended_VBN from_IN
the_DT royal_JJ house_NN of_IN Alba_NNP ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT kingship_NN is_VBZ represented_VBN as_IN
hereditary_RB in_IN the_DT male_JJ line_NN ,_, not_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT Roman_NNP kings_NNS was_VBD
immediately_RB succeeded_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ son_NN on_IN the_DT throne_NN ._. Yet_RB several_JJ left_NN
sons_NNS or_CC grandsons_NNS behind_IN them_PRP ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, one_CD of_IN them_PRP was_VBD
descended_VBN from_IN a_DT former_JJ king_NN through_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, not_RB through_IN his_PRP$
father_NN ,_, and_CC three_CD of_IN the_DT kings_NNS ,_, namely_RB Tatius_NNP ,_, the_DT elder_JJR Tarquin_NNP ,_,
and_CC Servius_NNP Tullius_NNP ,_, were_VBD succeeded_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ sons-in_NN -_: law_NN ,_, who_WP were_VBD
all_DT either_CC foreigners_NNS or_CC of_IN foreign_JJ descent_NN ._. This_DT suggests_VBZ that_IN the_DT
right_NN to_TO the_DT kingship_NN was_VBD transmitted_VBN in_IN the_DT female_JJ line_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD
actually_RB exercised_VBN by_IN foreigners_NNS who_WP married_VBD the_DT royal_JJ princesses_NNS ._.
To_TO put_VB it_PRP in_IN technical_JJ language_NN ,_, the_DT succession_NN to_TO the_DT kingship_NN at_IN
Rome_NNP and_CC probably_RB in_IN Latium_NNP generally_RB would_MD seem_VB to_TO have_VB been_VBN
determined_VBN by_IN certain_JJ rules_NNS which_WDT have_VBP moulded_VBN early_JJ society_NN in_IN many_JJ
parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, namely_RB exogamy_JJ ,_, beena_IN marriage_NN ,_, and_CC female_NN
kinship_NN or_CC mother-kin_NN ._. Exogamy_NN is_VBZ the_DT rule_NN which_WDT obliges_VBZ a_DT man_NN to_TO
marry_VB a_DT woman_NN of_IN a_DT different_JJ clan_NN from_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ :_: beena_NN marriage_NN is_VBZ
the_DT rule_NN that_IN he_PRP must_MD leave_VB the_DT home_NN of_IN his_PRP$ birth_NN and_CC live_VB with_IN his_PRP$
wife_NN '_POS s_VBZ people_NNS ;_: and_CC female_JJ kinship_NN or_CC mother-kin_NN is_VBZ the_DT system_NN of_IN
tracing_VBG relationship_NN and_CC transmitting_VBG the_DT family_NN name_NN through_IN women_NNS
instead_RB of_IN through_IN men_NNS ._. If_IN these_DT principles_NNS regulated_JJ descent_NN of_IN the_DT
kingship_NN among_IN the_DT ancient_JJ Latins_NNS ,_, the_DT state_NN of_IN things_NNS in_IN this_DT
respect_NN would_MD be_VB somewhat_RB as_IN follows_VBZ ._. The_DT political_JJ and_CC religious_JJ

one_CD whom_WP she_PRP has_VBZ already_RB chosen_VBN in_IN her_PRP$ heart_NN ."_IN The_DT race_NN for_IN the_DT

takes_VBZ place_NN in_IN a_DT large_JJ tent_NN ,_, round_NN which_WDT many_JJ separate_JJ compartments_NNS

XV_NNP ._. The_DT Worship_NNP of_IN the_DT Oak_NNP

THE_DT WORSHIP_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN tree_NN or_CC of_IN the_DT oak_NN god_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN
shared_VBN by_IN all_DT the_DT branches_NNS of_IN the_DT Aryan_NNP stock_NN in_IN Europe_NNP ._. Both_DT Greeks_NNPS
and_CC Italians_NNPS associated_VBN the_DT tree_NN with_IN their_PRP$ highest_JJS god_NN ,_, Zeus_NNP or_CC
Jupiter_NNP ,_, the_DT divinity_NN of_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, the_DT rain_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT thunder_NN ._. Perhaps_RB
the_DT oldest_JJS and_CC certainly_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS famous_JJ sanctuaries_NNS in_IN
Greece_NNP was_VBD that_IN of_IN Dodona_NNP ,_, where_WRB Zeus_NNP was_VBD revered_VBN in_IN the_DT oracular_JJ
oak_NN ._. The_DT thunder-storms_NNS which_WDT are_VBP said_VBN to_TO rage_VB at_IN Dodona_NNP more_RBR
frequently_RB than_IN anywhere_RB else_RB in_IN Europe_NNP ,_, would_MD render_VB the_DT spot_NN a_DT
fitting_JJ home_NN for_IN the_DT god_NN whose_WP$ voice_NN was_VBD heard_VBN alike_RB in_IN the_DT rustling_NN
of_IN the_DT oak_NN leaves_NNS and_CC in_IN the_DT crash_NN of_IN thunder_NN ._. Perhaps_RB the_DT bronze_NN
gongs_NNS which_WDT kept_VBD up_RP a_DT humming_NN in_IN the_DT wind_NN round_VB the_DT sanctuary_NN were_VBD

rumbling_VBG in_IN the_DT coombs_NNS of_IN the_DT stern_NN and_CC barren_JJ mountains_NNS which_WDT shut_VBN
in_IN the_DT gloomy_JJ valley_NN ._. In_IN Boeotia_NNP ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, the_DT sacred_JJ
marriage_NN of_IN Zeus_NNP and_CC Hera_NNP ,_, the_DT oak_NN god_NN and_CC the_DT oak_NN goddess_NN ,_, appears_NNS
to_TO have_VB been_VBN celebrated_VBN with_IN much_JJ pomp_NN by_IN a_DT religious_JJ federation_NN of_IN

sacred_JJ spring_NN ._. In_IN his_PRP$ latter_JJ capacity_NN Zeus_NNP was_VBD the_DT god_NN to_TO whom_WP the_DT

clouds_NNS gather_VB and_CC the_DT oaks_NNS grow_VBP ._. On_IN the_DT Acropolis_NNP at_IN Athens_NNP there_EX
was_VBD an_DT image_NN of_IN Earth_NNP praying_VBG to_TO Zeus_NNP for_IN rain_NN ._. And_CC in_IN time_NN of_IN
drought_NN the_DT Athenians_NNPS themselves_PRP prayed_VBD ,_, "_`` Rain_NNP ,_, rain_NN ,_, O_UH dear_UH Zeus_NNP ,_,
on_IN the_DT cornland_NN of_IN the_DT Athenians_NNS and_CC on_IN the_DT plains_NNS ."_.

Again_RB ,_, Zeus_NNP wielded_VBD the_DT thunder_NN and_CC lightning_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT rain_NN ._.
At_IN Olympia_NNP and_CC elsewhere_RB he_PRP was_VBD worshipped_VBN under_IN the_DT surname_NN of_IN

watched_VBD for_IN lightning_NN over_IN Mount_NNP Parnes_NNP at_IN certain_JJ seasons_NNS of_IN the_DT
year_NN ._. Further_RB ,_, spots_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN struck_VBN by_IN lightning_NN were_VBD
regularly_RB fenced_VBD in_IN by_IN the_DT Greeks_NNP and_CC consecrated_VBD to_TO Zeus_NNP the_DT

heaven_NN ._. Altars_NNPS were_VBD set_VBN up_RP within_IN these_DT enclosures_NNS and_CC sacrifices_NNS
offered_VBN on_IN them_PRP ._. Several_JJ such_JJ places_NNS are_VBP known_VBN from_IN inscriptions_NNS to_TO
have_VBP existed_VBN in_IN Athens_NNP ._.

Thus_RB when_WRB ancient_JJ Greek_JJ kings_NNS claimed_VBN to_TO be_VB descended_VBN from_IN Zeus_NNP ,_, and_CC

their_PRP$ foes_NNS ._. In_IN this_DT respect_NN the_DT legend_NN of_IN Salmoneus_NNP probably_RB
reflects_VBZ the_DT pretensions_NNS of_IN a_DT whole_JJ class_NN of_IN petty_JJ sovereigns_NNS who_WP

the_DT cattle_NNS ;_: and_CC how_WRB could_MD they_PRP fulfil_VB these_DT expectations_NNS better_RB than_IN
by_IN acting_VBG the_DT part_NN of_IN their_PRP$ kinsman_NN Zeus_NN ,_, the_DT great_JJ god_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN ,_,
the_DT thunder_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT rain_NN ?_. They_PRP personified_VBD him_PRP ,_, apparently_RB ,_, just_RB as_IN
the_DT Italian_JJ kings_NNS personified_VBD Jupiter_NNP ._.

In_IN ancient_JJ Italy_NNP every_DT oak_NN was_VBD sacred_JJ to_TO Jupiter_NNP ,_, the_DT Italian_JJ
counterpart_NN of_IN Zeus_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT Capitol_NNP at_IN Rome_NNP the_DT god_NN was_VBD
worshipped_VBN as_IN the_DT deity_NN not_RB merely_RB of_IN the_DT oak_NN ,_, but_CC of_IN the_DT rain_NN and_CC
the_DT thunder_NN ._. Contrasting_VBG the_DT piety_NN of_IN the_DT good_JJ old_JJ times_NNS with_IN the_DT
scepticism_NN of_IN an_DT age_NN when_WRB nobody_NN thought_VBD that_IN heaven_NN was_VBD heaven_NN ,_, or_CC
cared_VBD a_DT fig_NN for_IN Jupiter_NNP ,_, a_DT Roman_NNP writer_NN tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN in_IN former_JJ days_NNS
noble_JJ matrons_NNS used_VBN to_TO go_VB with_IN bare_JJ feet_NNS ,_, streaming_VBG hair_NN ,_, and_CC pure_JJ
minds_NNS ,_, up_IN the_DT long_JJ Capitoline_NN slope_NN ,_, praying_VBG to_TO Jupiter_NNP for_IN rain_NN ._.
And_CC straightway_RB ,_, he_PRP goes_VBZ on_IN ,_, it_PRP rained_VBD bucketsful_JJ ,_, then_RB or_CC never_RB ,_,
and_CC everybody_NN returned_VBD dripping_VBG like_IN drowned_JJ rats_NNS ._. "_'' But_CC nowadays_RB ,"_NN
says_VBZ he_PRP ,_, "_`` we_PRP are_VBP no_RB longer_RB religious_JJ ,_, so_RB the_DT fields_NNS lie_VBP baking_VBG ."_NN

When_WRB we_PRP pass_VBP from_IN Southern_NNP to_TO Central_NNP Europe_NNP we_PRP still_RB meet_VBP with_IN the_DT
great_JJ god_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN and_CC the_DT thunder_NN among_IN the_DT barbarous_JJ Aryans_NNS who_WP
dwelt_NN in_IN the_DT vast_JJ primaeval_JJ forests_NNS ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT Celts_NNS of_IN Gaul_NNP
the_DT Druids_NNP esteemed_VBD nothing_NN more_RBR sacred_JJ than_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN and_CC the_DT
oak_NN on_IN which_WDT it_PRP grew_VBD ;_: they_PRP chose_VBD groves_NNS of_IN oaks_NNS for_IN the_DT scene_NN of_IN
their_PRP$ solemn_JJ service_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP performed_VBD none_NN of_IN their_PRP$ rites_NNS without_IN
oak_NN leaves_NNS ._. "_'' The_DT Celts_NNP ,"_NNP says_VBZ a_DT Greek_NNP writer_NN ,_, "_`` worship_NN Zeus_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
Celtic_JJ image_NN of_IN Zeus_NNP is_VBZ a_DT tall_JJ oak_NN ."_IN The_DT Celtic_NNP conquerors_NNS ,_, who_WP

the_DT heart_NN of_IN Asia_NNP Minor_NNP the_DT Galatian_NNP senate_NN met_VBD in_IN a_DT place_NN which_WDT

"_`` the_DT temple_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN ."_NN Indeed_RB the_DT very_JJ name_NN of_IN Druids_NNP is_VBZ believed_VBN
by_IN good_JJ authorities_NNS to_TO mean_VB no_DT more_JJR than_IN "_'' oak_NN men_NNS ."_.

In_IN the_DT religion_NN of_IN the_DT ancient_JJ Germans_NNS the_DT veneration_NN for_IN sacred_JJ

the_DT chief_NN of_IN their_PRP$ holy_JJ trees_NNS was_VBD the_DT oak_NN ._. It_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN

equivalent_NN of_IN the_DT Norse_NNP Thor_NNP ;_: for_IN a_DT sacred_JJ oak_NN near_IN Geismar_NNP ,_, in_IN

heathen_NN by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Jupiter_NNP '_POS s_VBZ oak_NN (_-LRB- robur_NN Jovis_NNP ),_, which_WDT in_IN old_JJ

as_IN the_DT great_JJ fertilising_NN power_NN ,_, who_WP sent_VBD rain_NN and_CC caused_VBD the_DT earth_NN

Amongst_IN the_DT Slavs_NNP also_RB the_DT oak_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN the_DT sacred_JJ tree_NN

attendants_NNS paid_VBD for_IN their_PRP$ negligence_NN with_IN their_PRP$ lives_NNS ._. Perun_NNP seems_VBZ ,_,

Procopius_NNP tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN the_DT Slavs_JJ "_`` believe_VB that_DT one_CD god_NN ,_, the_DT maker_NN
of_IN lightning_NN ,_, is_VBZ alone_RB lord_NN of_IN all_DT things_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP sacrifice_VB to_TO him_PRP

The_DT chief_JJ deity_NN of_IN the_DT Lithuanians_NNPS was_VBD Perkunas_NNP or_CC Perkuns_NNP ,_, the_DT god_NN
of_IN thunder_NN and_CC lightning_NN ,_, whose_WP$ resemblance_NN to_TO Zeus_NNP and_CC Jupiter_NNP has_VBZ
often_RB been_VBN pointed_VBN out_RP ._. Oaks_NNP were_VBD sacred_JJ to_TO him_PRP ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD
cut_VBN down_RP by_IN the_DT Christian_NNP missionaries_NNS ,_, the_DT people_NNS loudly_RB complained_VBN
that_IN their_PRP$ sylvan_NN deities_NNS were_VBD destroyed_VBN ._. Perpetual_NNP fires_NNS ,_, kindled_CC
with_IN the_DT wood_NN of_IN certain_JJ oak-trees_NNS ,_, were_VBD kept_VBN up_RP in_IN honour_NN of_IN
Perkunas_NNP ;_: if_IN such_JJ a_DT fire_NN went_VBD out_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD lighted_VBN again_RB by_IN friction_NN
of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ wood_NN ._. Men_NN sacrificed_VBD to_TO oak-trees_NNS for_IN good_JJ crops_NNS ,_,
while_IN women_NNS did_VBD the_DT same_JJ to_TO lime-trees_NNS ;_: from_IN which_WDT we_PRP may_MD infer_VB that_IN
they_PRP regarded_VBD oaks_NNS as_IN male_NN and_CC lime-trees_NNS as_IN female_NN ._. And_CC in_IN time_NN of_IN
drought_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP wanted_VBD rain_NN ,_, they_PRP used_VBD to_TO sacrifice_VB a_DT black_JJ

Perkunas_NNP ._. They_PRP carried_VBD a_DT bowl_NN of_IN beer_NN thrice_NN round_RB the_DT fire_NN ,_, then_RB
poured_VBD the_DT liquor_NN on_IN the_DT flames_NNS ,_, while_IN they_PRP prayed_VBD to_TO the_DT god_NN to_TO
send_VB showers_NNS ._. Thus_RB the_DT chief_NN Lithuanian_JJ deity_NN presents_VBZ a_DT close_NN
resemblance_NN to_TO Zeus_NNP and_CC Jupiter_NNP ,_, since_IN he_PRP was_VBD the_DT god_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN ,_,
the_DT thunder_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT rain_NN ._.

From_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ survey_NN it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN a_DT god_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN ,_, the_DT

XVI_NNP ._. Dianus_NNP and_CC Diana_NNP

IN_IN THIS_NNP CHAPTER_NNP I_PRP propose_VBP to_TO recapitulate_VB the_DT conclusions_NNS to_TO which_WDT
the_DT enquiry_NN has_VBZ thus_RB far_RB led_VBN us_PRP ,_, and_CC drawing_VBG together_RB the_DT scattered_VBN
rays_NNS of_IN light_NN ,_, to_TO turn_VB them_PRP on_IN the_DT dark_JJ figure_NN of_IN the_DT priest_NN of_IN
Nemi_NNP ._.

We_PRP have_VBP found_VBN that_IN at_IN an_DT early_JJ stage_NN of_IN society_NN men_NNS ,_, ignorant_JJ of_IN the_DT
secret_JJ processes_NNS of_IN nature_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT narrow_JJ limits_NNS within_IN which_WDT it_PRP
is_VBZ in_IN our_PRP$ power_NN to_TO control_VB and_CC direct_VB them_PRP ,_, have_VBP commonly_RB arrogated_VBN
to_TO themselves_PRP functions_NNS which_WDT in_IN the_DT present_JJ state_NN of_IN knowledge_NN we_PRP
should_MD deem_VB superhuman_JJ or_CC divine_JJ ._. The_DT illusion_NN has_VBZ been_VBN fostered_VBN and_CC
maintained_VBN by_IN the_DT same_JJ causes_NNS which_WDT begot_VBD it_PRP ,_, namely_RB ,_, the_DT marvellous_JJ
order_NN and_CC uniformity_NN with_IN which_WDT nature_NN conducts_VBD her_PRP$ operations_NNS ,_, the_DT
wheels_NNS of_IN her_PRP$ great_JJ machine_NN revolving_VBG with_IN a_DT smoothness_NN and_CC
precision_NN which_WDT enable_VBP the_DT patient_NN observer_NN to_TO anticipate_VB in_IN general_JJ
the_DT season_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB the_DT very_JJ hour_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP will_MD bring_VB round_RB the_DT
fulfilment_NN of_IN his_PRP$ hopes_NNS or_CC the_DT accomplishment_NN of_IN his_PRP$ fears_NNS ._. The_DT
regularly_RB recurring_VBG events_NNS of_IN this_DT great_JJ cycle_NN ,_, or_CC rather_RB series_NN of_IN
cycles_NNS ,_, soon_RB stamp_VB themselves_PRP even_RB on_IN the_DT dull_JJ mind_NN of_IN the_DT savage_JJ ._.
He_PRP foresees_VBZ them_PRP ,_, and_CC foreseeing_VBG them_PRP mistakes_NNS the_DT desired_VBN
recurrence_NN for_IN an_DT effect_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ will_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT dreaded_VBN recurrence_NN
for_IN an_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT will_NN of_IN his_PRP$ enemies_NNS ._. Thus_RB the_DT springs_NNS which_WDT set_NN
the_DT vast_JJ machine_NN in_IN motion_NN ,_, though_IN they_PRP lie_VBP far_RB beyond_IN our_PRP$ ken_JJ ,_,
shrouded_VBN in_IN a_DT mystery_NN which_WDT we_PRP can_MD never_RB hope_VB to_TO penetrate_VB ,_, appear_VB
to_TO ignorant_JJ man_NN to_TO lie_VB within_IN his_PRP$ reach_NN :_: he_PRP fancies_VBZ he_PRP can_MD touch_VB
them_PRP and_CC so_RB work_VB by_IN magic_JJ art_NN all_DT manner_NN of_IN good_JJ to_TO himself_PRP and_CC evil_JJ
to_TO his_PRP$ foes_NNS ._. In_IN time_NN the_DT fallacy_NN of_IN this_DT belief_NN becomes_VBZ apparent_JJ to_TO
him_PRP :_: he_PRP discovers_VBZ that_IN there_EX are_VBP things_NNS he_PRP cannot_MD do_VB ,_, pleasures_NNS
which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ unable_JJ of_IN himself_PRP to_TO procure_VB ,_, pains_NNS which_WDT even_RB the_DT most_RBS
potent_JJ magician_NN is_VBZ powerless_JJ to_TO avoid_VB ._. The_DT unattainable_JJ good_JJ ,_, the_DT
inevitable_JJ ill_JJ ,_, are_VBP now_RB ascribed_VBN by_IN him_PRP to_TO the_DT action_NN of_IN invisible_JJ
powers_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ favour_NN is_VBZ joy_NN and_CC life_NN ,_, whose_WP$ anger_NN is_VBZ misery_NN and_CC
death_NN ._. Thus_RB magic_NN tends_VBZ to_TO be_VB displaced_VBN by_IN religion_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
sorcerer_NN by_IN the_DT priest_NN ._. At_IN this_DT stage_NN of_IN thought_NN the_DT ultimate_JJ causes_NNS
of_IN things_NNS are_VBP conceived_VBN to_TO be_VB personal_JJ beings_NNS ,_, many_JJ in_IN number_NN and_CC
often_RB discordant_JJ in_IN character_NN ,_, who_WP partake_NN of_IN the_DT nature_NN and_CC even_RB of_IN
the_DT frailty_JJ of_IN man_NN ,_, though_IN their_PRP$ might_NN is_VBZ greater_JJR than_IN his_PRP ,_, and_CC
their_PRP$ life_NN far_RB exceeds_VBZ the_DT span_NN of_IN his_PRP$ ephemeral_JJ existence_NN ._. Their_PRP$
sharply-marked_JJ individualities_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ clear-cut_JJ outlines_NNS have_VBP not_RB
yet_RB begun_VBN ,_, under_IN the_DT powerful_JJ solvent_NN of_IN philosophy_NN ,_, to_TO melt_VB and_CC
coalesce_NN into_IN that_DT single_JJ unknown_JJ substratum_NN of_IN phenomena_NNS which_WDT ,_,
according_VBG to_TO the_DT qualities_NNS with_IN which_WDT our_PRP$ imagination_NN invests_VBZ it_PRP ,_,
goes_VBZ by_IN one_CD or_CC other_JJ of_IN the_DT high-sounding_JJ names_NNS which_WDT the_DT wit_NN of_IN man_NN
has_VBZ devised_VBN to_TO hide_VB his_PRP$ ignorance_NN ._. Accordingly_RB ,_, so_RB long_JJ as_IN men_NNS look_VBP
on_IN their_PRP$ gods_NNS as_IN beings_NNS akin_JJ to_TO themselves_PRP and_CC not_RB raised_VBN to_TO an_DT
unapproachable_JJ height_NN above_IN them_PRP ,_, they_PRP believe_VBP it_PRP to_TO be_VB possible_JJ for_IN
those_DT of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ number_NN who_WP surpass_VBD their_PRP$ fellows_NNS to_TO attain_VB to_TO the_DT
divine_JJ rank_NN after_IN death_NN or_CC even_RB in_IN life_NN ._. Incarnate_'' human_JJ deities_NNS of_IN
this_DT latter_JJ sort_NN may_MD be_VB said_VBN to_TO halt_VB midway_NN between_IN the_DT age_NN of_IN magic_NN
and_CC the_DT age_NN of_IN religion_NN ._. If_IN they_PRP bear_VBP the_DT names_NNS and_CC display_VB the_DT pomp_NN
of_IN deities_NNS ,_, the_DT powers_NNS which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO wield_VB are_VBP commonly_RB
those_DT of_IN their_PRP$ predecessor_NN the_DT magician_NN ._. Like_IN him_PRP ,_, they_PRP are_VBP expected_VBN
to_TO guard_VB their_PRP$ people_NNS against_IN hostile_JJ enchantments_NNS ,_, to_TO heal_VB them_PRP in_IN
sickness_NN ,_, to_TO bless_VB them_PRP with_IN offspring_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO provide_VB them_PRP with_IN an_DT
abundant_JJ supply_NN of_IN food_NN by_IN regulating_VBG the_DT weather_NN and_CC performing_VBG the_DT
other_JJ ceremonies_NNS which_WDT are_VBP deemed_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO ensure_VB the_DT fertility_NN
of_IN the_DT earth_NN and_CC the_DT multiplication_NN of_IN animals_NNS ._. Men_NN who_WP are_VBP credited_VBN
with_IN powers_NNS so_RB lofty_JJ and_CC far-reaching_JJ naturally_RB hold_VBP the_DT highest_JJS
place_NN in_IN the_DT land_NN ,_, and_CC while_IN the_DT rift_NN between_IN the_DT spiritual_JJ and_CC the_DT
temporal_JJ spheres_NNS has_VBZ not_RB yet_RB widened_VBN too_RB far_RB ,_, they_PRP are_VBP supreme_JJ in_IN
civil_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN religious_JJ matters_NNS :_: in_IN a_DT word_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP kings_NNS as_IN
well_RB as_IN gods_NNS ._. Thus_RB the_DT divinity_NN which_WDT hedges_VBZ a_DT king_NN has_VBZ its_PRP$ roots_NNS
deep_RB down_IN in_IN human_JJ history_NN ,_, and_CC long_JJ ages_NNS pass_VBP before_IN these_DT are_VBP
sapped_VBN by_IN a_DT profounder_NN view_NN of_IN nature_NN and_CC man_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT classical_JJ period_NN of_IN Greek_NNP and_CC Latin_NNP antiquity_IN the_DT reign_NN of_IN
kings_NNS was_VBD for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN a_DT thing_NN of_IN the_DT past_NN ;_: yet_CC the_DT stories_NNS of_IN
their_PRP$ lineage_NN ,_, titles_NNS ,_, and_CC pretensions_NNS suffice_NN to_TO prove_VB that_IN they_PRP
too_RB claimed_VBD to_TO rule_VB by_IN divine_JJ right_NN and_CC to_TO exercise_VB superhuman_NN
powers_NNS ._. Hence_RB we_PRP may_MD without_IN undue_JJ temerity_NN assume_VBP that_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN
the_DT Wood_NNP at_IN Nemi_NNP ,_, though_IN shorn_VBN in_IN later_JJ times_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ glory_NN and_CC
fallen_VBN on_IN evil_JJ days_NNS ,_, represented_VBD a_DT long_JJ line_NN of_IN sacred_JJ kings_NNS who_WP had_VBD
once_RB received_VBD not_RB only_RB the_DT homage_NN but_CC the_DT adoration_NN of_IN their_PRP$
subjects_NNS in_IN return_NN for_IN the_DT manifold_NN blessings_NNS which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD
supposed_VBN to_TO dispense_VB ._. What_WP little_RB we_PRP know_VBP of_IN the_DT functions_NNS of_IN Diana_NNP
in_IN the_DT Arician_NN grove_NN seems_VBZ to_TO prove_VB that_IN she_PRP was_VBD here_RB conceived_VBN as_IN a_DT
goddess_NN of_IN fertility_NN ,_, and_CC particularly_RB as_IN a_DT divinity_NN of_IN childbirth_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ reasonable_JJ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, to_TO suppose_VB that_IN in_IN the_DT discharge_NN of_IN
these_DT important_JJ duties_NNS she_PRP was_VBD assisted_VBN by_IN her_PRP$ priest_NN ,_, the_DT two_CD
figuring_VBG as_IN King_NNP and_CC Queen_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP in_IN a_DT solemn_JJ marriage_NN ,_, which_WDT
was_VBD intended_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT earth_NN gay_JJ with_IN the_DT blossoms_NNS of_IN spring_NN and_CC
the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN autumn_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO gladden_VB the_DT hearts_NNS of_IN men_NNS and_CC women_NNS
with_IN healthful_JJ offspring_NN ._.

If_IN the_DT priest_NN of_IN Nemi_NNP posed_VBD not_RB merely_RB as_IN a_DT king_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN a_DT god_NN of_IN
the_DT grove_NN ,_, we_PRP have_VBP still_RB to_TO ask_VB ,_, What_WP deity_NN in_IN particular_JJ did_VBD he_PRP
personate_NN ?_. The_DT answer_NN of_IN antiquity_NN is_VBZ that_IN he_PRP represented_VBD Virbius_NNP ,_,
the_DT consort_NN or_CC lover_NN of_IN Diana_NNP ._. But_CC this_DT does_VBZ not_RB help_VB us_PRP much_RB ,_, for_IN
of_IN Virbius_NNP we_PRP know_VBP little_RB more_JJR than_IN the_DT name_NN ._. A_DT clue_NN to_TO the_DT mystery_NN
is_VBZ perhaps_RB supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Vestal_JJ fire_NN which_WDT burned_VBD in_IN the_DT grove_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT perpetual_JJ holy_JJ fires_NNS of_IN the_DT Aryans_NNP in_IN Europe_NNP appear_VBP to_TO have_VB
been_VBN commonly_RB kindled_VBN and_CC fed_VBN with_IN oak-wood_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN Rome_NNP itself_PRP ,_, not_RB
many_JJ miles_NNS from_IN Nemi_NNP ,_, the_DT fuel_NN of_IN the_DT Vestal_JJ fire_NN consisted_VBD of_IN oaken_NN
sticks_NNS or_CC logs_NNS ,_, as_RB has_VBZ been_VBN proved_VBN by_IN a_DT microscopic_JJ analysis_NN of_IN the_DT
charred_VBN embers_NNS of_IN the_DT Vestal_JJ fire_NN ,_, which_WDT were_VBD discovered_VBN by_IN
Commendatore_NNP G_NNP ._. Boni_NNP in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT memorable_JJ excavations_NNS
which_WDT he_PRP conducted_VBD in_IN the_DT Roman_NNP forum_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ
century_NN ._. But_CC the_DT ritual_NN of_IN the_DT various_JJ Latin_JJ towns_NNS seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB
been_VBN marked_VBN by_IN great_JJ uniformity_NN ;_: hence_RB it_PRP is_VBZ reasonable_JJ to_TO conclude_VB
that_IN wherever_WRB in_IN Latium_NNP a_DT Vestal_JJ fire_NN was_VBD maintained_VBN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD fed_VBN ,_, as_IN
at_IN Rome_NNP ,_, with_IN wood_NN of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ oak_NN ._. If_IN this_DT was_VBD so_RB at_IN Nemi_NNP ,_, it_PRP
becomes_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN the_DT hallowed_NN grove_NN there_RB consisted_VBD of_IN a_DT
natural_JJ oak-wood_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN therefore_RB the_DT tree_NN which_WDT the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT
Wood_NNP had_VBD to_TO guard_VB at_IN the_DT peril_NN of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN was_VBD itself_PRP an_DT oak_NN ;_:
indeed_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD from_IN an_DT evergreen_JJ oak_NN ,_, according_VBG to_TO Virgil_NNP ,_, that_WDT
Aeneas_NNP plucked_VBD the_DT Golden_NNP Bough_NNP ._. Now_RB the_DT oak_NN was_VBD the_DT sacred_JJ tree_NN of_IN
Jupiter_NNP ,_, the_DT supreme_JJ god_NN of_IN the_DT Latins_NNP ._. Hence_RB it_PRP follows_VBZ that_IN the_DT
King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ life_NN was_VBD bound_VBN up_RP in_IN a_DT fashion_NN with_IN an_DT oak_NN ,_,
personated_VBN no_DT less_JJR a_DT deity_NN than_IN Jupiter_NNP himself_PRP ._. At_IN least_JJS the_DT
evidence_NN ,_, slight_JJ as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ ,_, seems_VBZ to_TO point_VB to_TO this_DT conclusion_NN ._. The_DT
old_JJ Alban_NNP dynasty_NN of_IN the_DT Silvii_NNP or_CC Woods_NNP ,_, with_IN their_PRP$ crown_NN of_IN oak_NN
leaves_NNS ,_, apparently_RB aped_VBD the_DT style_NN and_CC emulated_VBD the_DT powers_NNS of_IN Latian_JJ
Jupiter_NNP ,_, who_WP dwelt_VBD on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT Alban_NNP Mount_NNP ._. It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB
impossible_JJ that_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ,_, who_WP guarded_VBN the_DT sacred_JJ oak_NN a_DT
little_RB lower_JJR down_IN the_DT mountain_NN ,_, was_VBD the_DT lawful_JJ successor_NN and_CC
representative_NN of_IN this_DT ancient_JJ line_NN of_IN the_DT Silvii_NNP or_CC Woods_NNP ._. At_IN all_PDT
events_NNS ,_, if_IN I_PRP am_VBP right_RB in_IN supposing_NN that_IN he_PRP passed_VBD for_IN a_DT human_NN
Jupiter_NNP ,_, it_PRP would_MD appear_VB that_IN Virbius_NNP ,_, with_IN whom_WP legend_NN identified_VBN
him_PRP ,_, was_VBD nothing_NN but_CC a_DT local_JJ form_NN of_IN Jupiter_NNP ,_, considered_VBD perhaps_RB in_IN
his_PRP$ original_JJ aspect_NN as_IN a_DT god_NN of_IN the_DT greenwood_NN ._.

The_DT hypothesis_NN that_IN in_IN later_JJ times_NNS at_IN all_DT events_NNS the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT
Wood_NNP played_VBD the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN god_NN Jupiter_NNP ,_, is_VBZ confirmed_VBN by_IN an_DT
examination_NN of_IN his_PRP$ divine_JJ partner_NN Diana_NNP ._. For_IN two_CD distinct_JJ lines_NNS of_IN

them_PRP ,_, the_DT home_NN of_IN the_DT mysterious_JJ priest_NN of_IN Nemi_NNP ,_, the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT
Wood_NNP ._. There_EX ,_, among_IN the_DT green_JJ woods_NNS and_CC beside_IN the_DT still_JJ waters_NNS of_IN
the_DT lonely_JJ hills_NNS ,_, the_DT ancient_JJ Aryan_JJ worship_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN ,_,
the_DT thunder_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT dripping_VBG sky_NN lingered_VBD in_IN its_PRP$ early_JJ ,_, almost_RB
Druidical_JJ form_NN ,_, long_RB after_IN a_DT great_JJ political_JJ and_CC intellectual_JJ
revolution_NN had_VBD shifted_VBN the_DT capital_NN of_IN Latin_JJ religion_NN from_IN the_DT forest_NN
to_TO the_DT city_NN ,_, from_IN Nemi_NNP to_TO Rome_NNP ._.



XVII_NNP ._. The_DT Burden_NNP of_IN Royalty_NNP



1._DT Royal_NNP and_CC Priestly_RB Taboos_NNP

AT_WDT A_DT CERTAIN_JJ stage_NN of_IN early_JJ society_NN the_DT king_NN or_CC priest_NN is_VBZ often_RB
thought_VBD to_TO be_VB endowed_VBN with_IN supernatural_JJ powers_NNS or_CC to_TO be_VB an_DT
incarnation_NN of_IN a_DT deity_NN ,_, and_CC consistently_RB with_IN this_DT belief_NN the_DT course_NN
of_IN nature_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB more_RBR or_CC less_RBR under_IN his_PRP$ control_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP
is_VBZ held_VBN responsible_JJ for_IN bad_JJ weather_NN ,_, failure_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ,_, and_CC
similar_JJ calamities_NNS ._. To_TO some_DT extent_NN it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB assumed_VBN that_IN the_DT
king_NN '_POS s_VBZ power_NN over_IN nature_NN ,_, like_IN that_DT over_IN his_PRP$ subjects_NNS and_CC slaves_NNS ,_, is_VBZ
exerted_VBN through_IN definite_JJ acts_NNS of_IN will_NN ;_: and_CC therefore_RB if_IN drought_NN ,_,
famine_NN ,_, pestilence_NN ,_, or_CC storms_NNS arise_VBP ,_, the_DT people_NNS attribute_VBP the_DT
misfortune_NN to_TO the_DT negligence_NN or_CC guilt_NN of_IN their_PRP$ king_NN ,_, and_CC punish_VB him_PRP
accordingly_RB with_IN stripes_NNS and_CC bonds_NNS ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN he_PRP remains_VBZ obdurate_JJ ,_, with_IN
deposition_NN and_CC death_NN ._. Sometimes_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT course_NN of_IN nature_NN ,_,
while_IN regarded_VBN as_IN dependent_JJ on_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB partly_RB
independent_JJ of_IN his_PRP$ will_NN ._. His_PRP$ person_NN is_VBZ considered_VBN ,_, if_IN we_PRP may_MD express_VB
it_PRP so_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT dynamical_JJ centre_NN of_IN the_DT universe_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT lines_NNS of_IN
force_NN radiate_JJ to_TO all_DT quarters_NNS of_IN the_DT heaven_NN ;_: so_RB that_IN any_DT motion_NN of_IN
his_PRP --_: the_DT turning_NN of_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, the_DT lifting_NN of_IN his_PRP$
hand_NN --_: instantaneously_RB affects_VBZ and_CC may_MD seriously_RB disturb_VB some_DT part_NN of_IN
nature_NN ._. He_PRP is_VBZ the_DT point_NN of_IN support_NN on_IN which_WDT hangs_VBZ the_DT balance_NN of_IN the_DT
world_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT slightest_JJS irregularity_NN on_IN his_PRP$ part_NN may_MD overthrow_VB the_DT
delicate_JJ equipoise_NN ._. The_DT greatest_JJS care_NN must_MD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, be_VB taken_VBN both_CC
by_IN and_CC of_IN him_PRP ;_: and_CC his_PRP$ whole_JJ life_NN ,_, down_RB to_TO its_PRP$ minutest_NN details_NNS ,_,
must_MD be_VB so_RB regulated_VBN that_IN no_DT act_NN of_IN his_PRP$ ,_, voluntary_JJ or_CC involuntary_JJ ,_,
may_MD disarrange_VB or_CC upset_VB the_DT established_VBN order_NN of_IN nature_NN ._. Of_IN this_DT
class_NN of_IN monarchs_NNS the_DT Mikado_NNP or_CC Dairi_NNP ,_, the_DT spiritual_JJ emperor_NN of_IN
Japan_NNP ,_, is_VBZ or_CC rather_RB used_VBD to_TO be_VB a_DT typical_JJ example_NN ._. He_PRP is_VBZ an_DT
incarnation_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN goddess_NN ,_, the_DT deity_NN who_WP rules_VBZ the_DT universe_NN ,_,
gods_NNS and_CC men_NNS included_VBD ;_: once_RB a_DT year_NN all_RB the_DT gods_NNS wait_VBP upon_IN him_PRP and_CC
spend_VBP a_DT month_NN at_IN his_PRP$ court_NN ._. During_IN that_DT month_NN ,_, the_DT name_NN of_IN which_WDT
means_VBZ "_`` without_IN gods_NNS ,"_IN no_DT one_CD frequents_IN the_DT temples_NNS ,_, for_IN they_PRP are_VBP
believed_VBN to_TO be_VB deserted_VBN ._. The_DT Mikado_NNP receives_VBZ from_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS and_CC
assumes_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ official_JJ proclamations_NNS and_CC decrees_VBZ the_DT title_NN of_IN
"_`` manifest_JJ or_CC incarnate_JJ deity_NN ,"_, and_CC he_PRP claims_VBZ a_DT general_JJ authority_NN
over_IN the_DT gods_NNS of_IN Japan_NNP ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, in_IN an_DT official_JJ decree_NN of_IN the_DT
year_NN 646_IN the_DT emperor_NN is_VBZ described_VBN as_IN "_`` the_DT incarnate_JJ god_NN who_WP governs_NNPS
the_DT universe_NN ."_.

The_DT following_JJ description_NN of_IN the_DT Mikado_NNP '_POS s_PRP mode_NN of_IN life_NN was_VBD written_VBN
about_IN two_CD hundred_CD years_NNS ago_RB :_:

"_`` Even_RB to_TO this_DT day_NN the_DT princes_NNS descended_VBD of_IN this_DT family_NN ,_, more_RBR
particularly_RB those_DT who_WP sit_VBP on_IN the_DT throne_NN ,_, are_VBP looked_VBN upon_IN as_IN persons_NNS
most_RBS holy_JJ in_IN themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC as_IN Popes_NNP by_IN birth_NN ._. And_CC ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO
preserve_VB these_DT advantageous_JJ notions_NNS in_IN the_DT minds_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ subjects_NNS ,_,
they_PRP are_VBP obliged_VBN to_TO take_VB an_DT uncommon_JJ care_NN of_IN their_PRP$ sacred_JJ persons_NNS ,_,
and_CC to_TO do_VB such_JJ things_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, examined_VBN according_VBG to_TO the_DT customs_NNS of_IN
other_JJ nations_NNS ,_, would_MD be_VB thought_VBN ridiculous_JJ and_CC impertinent_JJ ._. It_PRP will_MD
not_RB be_VB improper_JJ to_TO give_VB a_DT few_JJ instances_NNS of_IN it_PRP ._. He_PRP thinks_VBZ that_IN it_PRP
would_MD be_VB very_RB prejudicial_JJ to_TO his_PRP$ dignity_NN and_CC holiness_NN to_TO touch_VB the_DT
ground_NN with_IN his_PRP$ feet_NNS ;_: for_IN this_DT reason_NN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP intends_VBZ to_TO go_VB
anywhere_RB ,_, he_PRP must_MD be_VB carried_VBN thither_JJ on_IN men_NNS '_POS s_PRP shoulders_NNS ._. Much_RB less_RBR
will_MD they_PRP suffer_VB that_IN he_PRP should_MD expose_VB his_PRP$ sacred_JJ person_NN to_TO the_DT open_JJ
air_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT sun_NN is_VBZ not_RB thought_VBN worthy_JJ to_TO shine_VB on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._. There_EX
is_VBZ such_JJ a_DT holiness_NN ascribed_VBN to_TO all_DT the_DT parts_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN that_IN he_PRP
dares_NNS to_TO cut_VB off_RP neither_CC his_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, nor_CC his_PRP$ beard_NN ,_, nor_CC his_PRP$ nails_NNS ._.
However_RB ,_, lest_IN he_PRP should_MD grow_VB too_RB dirty_JJ ,_, they_PRP may_MD clean_VB him_PRP in_IN the_DT
night_NN when_WRB he_PRP is_VBZ asleep_RB ;_: because_RB ,_, they_PRP say_VBP ,_, that_IN which_WDT is_VBZ taken_VBN from_IN
his_PRP$ body_NN at_IN that_DT time_NN ,_, hath_NN been_VBN stolen_VBN from_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC that_IN such_JJ a_DT
theft_NN doth_VBP not_RB prejudice_VB his_PRP$ holiness_NN or_CC dignity_NN ._. In_IN ancient_JJ times_NNS ,_,
he_PRP was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO sit_VB on_IN the_DT throne_NN for_IN some_DT hours_NNS every_DT morning_NN ,_,

indeed_RB any_DT part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ,_, because_RB ,_, by_IN this_DT means_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN
that_IN he_PRP could_MD preserve_VB peace_NN and_CC tranquillity_NN in_IN his_PRP$ empire_NN ;_: for_IN if_IN ,_,
unfortunately_RB ,_, he_PRP turned_VBD himself_PRP on_IN one_CD side_NN or_CC the_DT other_JJ ,_, or_CC if_IN he_PRP
looked_VBD a_DT good_JJ while_NN towards_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ dominions_NNS ,_, it_PRP was_VBD
apprehended_VBN that_IN war_NN ,_, famine_NN ,_, fire_NN ,_, or_CC some_DT other_JJ great_JJ misfortune_NN
was_VBD near_IN at_IN hand_NN to_TO desolate_JJ the_DT country_NN ._. But_CC it_PRP having_VBG been_VBN
afterwards_RB discovered_VBD ,_, that_IN the_DT imperial_JJ crown_NN was_VBD the_DT palladium_NN ,_,
which_WDT by_IN its_PRP$ immobility_NN could_MD preserve_VB peace_NN in_IN the_DT empire_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD
thought_VBD expedient_JJ to_TO deliver_VB his_PRP$ imperial_JJ person_NN ,_, consecrated_VBN only_RB
to_TO idleness_NN and_CC pleasures_NNS ,_, from_IN this_DT burthensome_JJ duty_NN ,_, and_CC therefore_RB
the_DT crown_NN is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ placed_VBN on_IN the_DT throne_NN for_IN some_DT hours_NNS every_DT
morning_NN ._. His_PRP$ victuals_NNS must_MD be_VB dressed_VBN every_DT time_NN in_IN new_JJ pots_NNS ,_, and_CC

may_MD be_VB laid_VBN aside_RB ,_, or_CC broke_VBD ,_, after_IN they_PRP have_VBP served_VBN once_RB ._. They_PRP are_VBP

Dairi_NNP '_POS s_PRP sacred_JJ habits_NNS ;_: for_IN they_PRP believe_VBP that_IN if_IN a_DT layman_NN should_MD wear_VB
them_PRP ,_, without_IN the_DT Emperor_NNP '_POS s_PRP express_VBP leave_NN or_CC command_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD
occasion_NN swellings_NNS and_CC pains_NNS in_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ."_VBD To_TO the_DT same_JJ
effect_NN an_DT earlier_JJR account_NN of_IN the_DT Mikado_NNP says_VBZ :_: "_`` It_PRP was_VBD considered_VBN as_IN
a_DT shameful_JJ degradation_NN for_IN him_PRP even_RB to_TO touch_VB the_DT ground_NN with_IN his_PRP$

him_PRP ,_, neither_CC his_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, his_PRP$ beard_NN ,_, nor_CC his_PRP$ nails_NNS were_VBD cut_VBN ._. Whatever_WDT
he_PRP eat_VB was_VBD dressed_VBN in_IN new_JJ vessels_NNS ."_.

Similar_JJ priestly_RB or_CC rather_RB divine_JJ kings_NNS are_VBP found_VBN ,_, at_IN a_DT lower_JJR level_NN
of_IN barbarism_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT west_JJ coast_NN of_IN Africa_NNP ._. At_IN Shark_NNP Point_NNP near_IN Cape_NNP

wood_NN ._. He_PRP may_MD not_RB touch_VB a_DT woman_NN nor_CC leave_VB his_PRP$ house_NN ;_: indeed_RB he_PRP may_MD
not_RB even_RB quit_VB his_PRP$ chair_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ obliged_VBN to_TO sleep_VB sitting_VBG ,_,
for_IN if_IN he_PRP lay_VBD down_IN no_DT wind_NN would_MD arise_VB and_CC navigation_NN would_MD be_VB
stopped_VBD ._. He_PRP regulates_VBZ storms_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN general_NN maintains_VBZ a_DT wholesome_JJ
and_CC equable_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT atmosphere_NN ._. On_IN Mount_NNP Agu_NNP in_IN Togo_NNP there_EX

including_VBG the_DT Harmattan_NNP ,_, the_DT dry_JJ ,_, hot_JJ wind_NN which_WDT blows_VBZ from_IN the_DT
interior_NN ._. His_PRP$ priest_NN dwells_VBZ in_IN a_DT house_NN on_IN the_DT highest_JJS peak_NN of_IN the_DT
mountain_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP keeps_VBZ the_DT winds_NNS bottled_VBN up_RP in_IN huge_JJ jars_NNS ._.
Applications_NNS for_IN rain_NN ,_, too_RB ,_, are_VBP made_VBN to_TO him_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP does_VBZ a_DT good_NN

Only_RB once_RB a_DT year_NN may_MD he_PRP come_VB down_RB to_TO make_VB purchases_NNS in_IN the_DT market_NN ;_:
but_CC even_RB then_RB he_PRP may_MD not_RB set_VB foot_NN in_IN the_DT hut_NN of_IN any_DT mortal_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC
must_MD return_VB to_TO his_PRP$ place_NN of_IN exile_NN the_DT same_JJ day_NN ._. The_DT business_NN of_IN
government_NN in_IN the_DT villages_NNS is_VBZ conducted_VBN by_IN subordinate_JJ chiefs_NNS ,_, who_WP
are_VBP appointed_VBN by_IN him_PRP ._. In_IN the_DT West_JJ African_JJ kingdom_NN of_IN Congo_NNP there_EX was_VBD
a_DT supreme_JJ pontiff_NN called_VBD Chitom_NNP �_NNP or_CC Chitomb_NNP �,_, whom_WP the_DT negroes_NNS
regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT god_NN on_IN earth_NN and_CC all-powerful_JJ in_IN heaven_NN ._. Hence_RB before_IN
they_PRP would_MD taste_VB the_DT new_JJ crops_NNS they_PRP offered_VBD him_PRP the_DT first-fruits_NNS ,_,
fearing_VBG that_IN manifold_NN misfortunes_NNS would_MD befall_VB them_PRP if_IN they_PRP broke_VBD
this_DT rule_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP left_VBD his_PRP$ residence_NN to_TO visit_VB other_JJ places_NNS within_IN
his_PRP$ jurisdiction_NN ,_, all_DT married_JJ people_NNS had_VBD to_TO observe_VB strict_JJ

act_NN of_IN incontinence_NN would_MD prove_VB fatal_JJ to_TO him_PRP ._. And_CC if_IN he_PRP were_VBD to_TO die_VB
a_DT natural_JJ death_NN ,_, they_PRP thought_VBD that_IN the_DT world_NN would_MD perish_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT
earth_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP alone_RB sustained_VBD by_IN his_PRP$ power_NN and_CC merit_NN ,_, would_MD

the_DT New_NNP World_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT Spanish_NNP conquest_NN ,_, there_EX were_VBD found_VBN
hierarchies_NNS or_CC theocracies_NNS like_IN those_DT of_IN Japan_NNP ;_: in_IN particular_JJ ,_, the_DT
high_JJ pontiff_NN of_IN the_DT Zapotecs_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB presented_VBN a_DT close_NN

overrate_IN the_DT reverence_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PRP was_VBD held_VBN ._. He_PRP was_VBD looked_VBN on_IN as_IN a_DT
god_NN whom_WP the_DT earth_NN was_VBD not_RB worthy_JJ to_TO hold_VB nor_CC the_DT sun_NN to_TO shine_VB upon_RB ._.
He_PRP profaned_VBD his_PRP$ sanctity_NN if_IN he_PRP even_RB touched_VBD the_DT ground_NN with_IN his_PRP$

the_DT earth_NN ,_, fearing_VBG that_IN death_NN would_MD overtake_VB them_PRP if_IN they_PRP saw_VBD even_RB

in_IN this_DT state_NN ,_, seeming_VBG to_TO belong_VB neither_RB to_TO heaven_NN nor_CC to_TO earth_NN ,_, one_CD
of_IN the_DT most_RBS beautiful_JJ of_IN the_DT virgins_NNS consecrated_VBN to_TO the_DT service_NN of_IN
the_DT gods_NNS was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO him_PRP ."_RB If_IN the_DT child_NN she_PRP bore_VBD him_PRP was_VBD a_DT son_NN ,_,
he_PRP was_VBD brought_VBN up_RP as_IN a_DT prince_NN of_IN the_DT blood_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT eldest_JJ son_NN
succeeded_VBN his_PRP$ father_NN on_IN the_DT pontifical_JJ throne_NN ._. The_DT supernatural_NN

they_PRP resembled_VBD those_DT of_IN the_DT Mikado_NNP and_CC Chitom_NNP �._.

Wherever_RB ,_, as_IN in_IN Japan_NNP and_CC West_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN that_IN the_DT order_NN
of_IN nature_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB the_DT existence_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, is_VBZ bound_VBN up_RP with_IN the_DT
life_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN or_CC priest_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN he_PRP must_MD be_VB regarded_VBN by_IN
his_PRP$ subjects_NNS as_IN a_DT source_NN both_DT of_IN infinite_JJ blessing_NN and_CC of_IN infinite_JJ
danger_NN ._. On_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS have_VBP to_TO thank_VB him_PRP for_IN the_DT rain_NN
and_CC sunshine_NN which_WDT foster_VB the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT wind_NN
which_WDT brings_VBZ ships_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ coasts_NNS ,_, and_CC even_RB for_IN the_DT solid_JJ ground_NN
beneath_IN their_PRP$ feet_NNS ._. But_CC what_WP he_PRP gives_VBZ he_PRP can_MD refuse_VB ;_: and_CC so_RB close_RB is_VBZ
the_DT dependence_NN of_IN nature_NN on_IN his_PRP$ person_NN ,_, so_RB delicate_JJ the_DT balance_NN of_IN
the_DT system_NN of_IN forces_NNS whereof_IN he_PRP is_VBZ the_DT centre_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT least_JJS
irregularity_NN on_IN his_PRP$ part_NN may_MD set_VB up_RP a_DT tremor_NN which_WDT shall_MD shake_VB the_DT
earth_NN to_TO its_PRP$ foundations_NNS ._. And_CC if_IN nature_NN may_MD be_VB disturbed_VBN by_IN the_DT
slightest_JJS involuntary_JJ act_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ easy_JJ to_TO conceive_VB the_DT
convulsion_NN which_WDT his_PRP$ death_NN might_MD provoke_VB ._. The_DT natural_JJ death_NN of_IN the_DT
Chitom_NNP �,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, was_VBD thought_VBN to_TO entail_VB the_DT destruction_NN of_IN
all_DT things_NNS ._. Clearly_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, out_IN of_IN a_DT regard_NN for_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ
safety_NN ,_, which_WDT might_MD be_VB imperilled_VBN by_IN any_DT rash_JJ act_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, and_CC
still_RB more_RBR by_IN his_PRP$ death_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS will_MD exact_JJ of_IN their_PRP$ king_NN or_CC
priest_NN a_DT strict_JJ conformity_NN to_TO those_DT rules_NNS ,_, the_DT observance_NN of_IN which_WDT
is_VBZ deemed_VBN necessary_JJ for_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ preservation_NN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB for_IN
the_DT preservation_NN of_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS and_CC the_DT world_NN ._. The_DT idea_NN that_IN early_RB
kingdoms_NNS are_VBP despotisms_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS exist_VBP only_RB for_IN the_DT
sovereign_JJ ,_, is_VBZ wholly_RB inapplicable_JJ to_TO the_DT monarchies_NNS we_PRP are_VBP

thunder_NN she_PRP was_VBD tabooed_VBN till_IN she_PRP had_VBD offered_VBN an_DT expiatory_JJ sacrifice_NN ._.

the_DT title_NN of_IN Bodia_NNP and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN compared_VBN ,_, on_IN somewhat_RB slender_JJ
grounds_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT high_JJ priest_NN of_IN the_DT Jews_NNPS ._. He_PRP is_VBZ appointed_VBN in_IN
accordance_NN with_IN the_DT behest_NN of_IN an_DT oracle_NN ._. At_IN an_DT elaborate_JJ ceremony_NN of_IN
installation_NN he_PRP is_VBZ anointed_VBN ,_, a_DT ring_NN is_VBZ put_VBN on_IN his_PRP$ ankle_NN as_IN a_DT badge_NN
of_IN office_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT door-posts_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ house_NN are_VBP sprinkled_VBN with_IN the_DT
blood_NN of_IN a_DT sacrificed_JJ goat_NN ._. He_PRP has_VBZ charge_NN of_IN the_DT public_JJ talismans_NNS
and_CC idols_NNS ,_, which_WDT he_PRP feeds_VBZ with_IN rice_NN and_CC oil_NN every_DT new_JJ moon_NN ;_: and_CC he_PRP
sacrifices_NNS on_IN behalf_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN to_TO the_DT dead_JJ and_CC to_TO demons_NNS ._.
Nominally_RB his_PRP$ power_NN is_VBZ very_RB great_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN practice_NN it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB
limited_VBN ;_: for_IN he_PRP dare_MD not_RB defy_VB public_JJ opinion_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ held_VBN
responsible_JJ ,_, even_RB with_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, for_IN any_DT adversity_NN that_WDT befalls_VBZ the_DT
country_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ expected_VBN of_IN him_PRP that_IN he_PRP should_MD cause_VB the_DT earth_NN to_TO
bring_VB forth_RB abundantly_RB ,_, the_DT people_NNS to_TO be_VB healthy_JJ ,_, war_NN to_TO be_VB driven_VBN
far_RB away_RB ,_, and_CC witchcraft_NN to_TO be_VB kept_VBN in_IN abeyance_NN ._. His_PRP$ life_NN is_VBZ
trammelled_VBN by_IN the_DT observance_NN of_IN certain_JJ restrictions_NNS or_CC taboos_NNS ._. Thus_RB
he_PRP may_MD not_RB sleep_VB in_RP any_DT house_NN but_CC his_PRP$ own_JJ official_JJ residence_NN ,_, which_WDT
is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT "_`` anointed_CC house_NN "_'' with_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT ceremony_NN of_IN
anointing_VBG him_PRP at_IN inauguration_NN ._. He_PRP may_MD not_RB drink_VB water_NN on_IN the_DT
highway_NN ._. He_PRP may_MD not_RB eat_VB while_IN a_DT corpse_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP may_MD
not_RB mourn_VB for_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._. If_IN he_PRP dies_VBZ while_IN in_IN office_NN ,_, he_PRP must_MD be_VB
buried_VBN at_IN dead_JJ of_IN night_NN ;_: few_JJ may_MD hear_VB of_IN his_PRP$ burial_NN ,_, and_CC none_NN may_MD
mourn_NN for_IN him_PRP when_WRB his_PRP$ death_NN is_VBZ made_VBN public_JJ ._. Should_MD he_PRP have_VB fallen_VBN a_DT
victim_NN to_TO the_DT poison_NN ordeal_NN by_IN drinking_VBG a_DT decoction_NN of_IN sassywood_NN ,_, as_IN
it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN ,_, he_PRP must_MD be_VB buried_VBN under_IN a_DT running_VBG stream_NN of_IN water_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT Todas_NNP of_IN Southern_NNP India_NNP the_DT holy_JJ milkman_NN ,_, who_WP acts_VBZ as_IN
priest_NN of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ dairy_NN ,_, is_VBZ subject_JJ to_TO a_DT variety_NN of_IN irksome_JJ and_CC
burdensome_JJ restrictions_NNS during_IN the_DT whole_JJ time_NN of_IN his_PRP$ incumbency_NN ,_,
which_WDT may_MD last_VB many_JJ years_NNS ._. Thus_RB he_PRP must_MD live_VB at_IN the_DT sacred_JJ dairy_NN and_CC
may_MD never_RB visit_VB his_PRP$ home_NN or_CC any_DT ordinary_JJ village_NN ._. He_PRP must_MD be_VB
celibate_NN ;_: if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ married_VBN he_PRP must_MD leave_VB his_PRP$ wife_NN ._. On_IN no_DT account_NN may_MD
any_DT ordinary_JJ person_NN touch_NN the_DT holy_JJ milkman_NN or_CC the_DT holy_JJ dairy_NN ;_: such_PDT a_DT
touch_NN would_MD so_RB defile_VB his_PRP$ holiness_NN that_IN he_PRP would_MD forfeit_VB his_PRP$ office_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB on_IN two_CD days_NNS a_DT week_NN ,_, namely_RB Mondays_NNS and_CC Thursdays_NNS ,_, that_IN a_DT
mere_JJ layman_NN may_MD even_RB approach_VB the_DT milkman_NN ;_: on_IN other_JJ days_NNS if_IN he_PRP has_VBZ
any_DT business_NN with_IN him_PRP ,_, he_PRP must_MD stand_VB at_IN a_DT distance_NN (_-LRB- some_DT say_VBP a_DT
quarter_NN of_IN a_DT mile_NN )_-RRB- and_CC shout_VB his_PRP$ message_NN across_IN the_DT intervening_NN
space_NN ._. Further_RB ,_, the_DT holy_JJ milkman_NN never_RB cuts_VBZ his_PRP$ hair_NN or_CC pares_NNS his_PRP$
nails_NNS so_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP holds_VBZ office_NN ;_: he_PRP never_RB crosses_VBZ a_DT river_NN by_IN a_DT
bridge_NN ,_, but_CC wades_NNS through_IN a_DT ford_NN and_CC only_RB certain_JJ fords_NNS ;_: if_IN a_DT death_NN
occurs_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ clan_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD not_RB attend_VB any_DT of_IN the_DT funeral_NN ceremonies_NNS ,_,
unless_IN he_PRP first_RB resigns_VBZ his_PRP$ office_NN and_CC descends_VBZ from_IN the_DT exalted_JJ

office_NN whenever_WRB any_DT member_NN of_IN his_PRP$ clan_NN departed_VBD this_DT life_NN ._. However_RB ,_,
these_DT heavy_JJ restraints_NNS are_VBP laid_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ entirety_NN only_RB on_IN milkmen_NNS of_IN
the_DT very_RB highest_JJS class_NN ._.



2._DT Divorce_NNP of_IN the_DT Spiritual_JJ from_IN the_DT Temporal_NNP Power_NN

THE_DT BURDENSOME_NNP observances_VBZ attached_VBN to_TO the_DT royal_JJ or_CC priestly_RB office_NN
produced_VBD their_PRP$ natural_JJ effect_NN ._. Either_DT men_NNS refused_VBD to_TO accept_VB the_DT
office_NN ,_, which_WDT hence_RB tended_VBD to_TO fall_VB into_IN abeyance_NN ;_: or_CC accepting_VBG it_PRP ,_,
they_PRP sank_VBD under_IN its_PRP$ weight_NN into_IN spiritless_JJ creatures_NNS ,_, cloistered_VBN
recluses_NNS ,_, from_IN whose_WP$ nerveless_JJ fingers_NNS the_DT reins_NNS of_IN government_NN
slipped_VBD into_IN the_DT firmer_JJR grasp_NN of_IN men_NNS who_WP were_VBD often_RB content_JJ to_TO wield_VB
the_DT reality_NN of_IN sovereignty_NN without_IN its_PRP$ name_NN ._. In_IN some_DT countries_NNS this_DT

separation_NN of_IN the_DT spiritual_JJ and_CC temporal_JJ powers_NNS ,_, the_DT old_JJ royal_JJ house_NN
retaining_VBG their_PRP$ purely_RB religious_JJ functions_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT civil_JJ
government_NN passed_VBD into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN a_DT younger_JJR and_CC more_RBR vigorous_JJ
race_NN ._.

To_TO take_VB examples_NNS ._. In_IN a_DT previous_JJ part_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN we_PRP saw_VBD that_IN in_IN
Cambodia_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ often_RB necessary_JJ to_TO force_VB the_DT kingships_NNS of_IN Fire_NNP and_CC

monarchy_NN actually_RB came_VBD to_TO an_DT end_NN because_IN at_IN last_JJ no_NN one_NN could_MD be_VB
induced_VBN to_TO accept_VB the_DT dangerous_JJ distinction_NN ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN West_NNP
Africa_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT king_NN dies_VBZ ,_, a_DT family_NN council_NN is_VBZ secretly_RB held_VBN to_TO
determine_VB his_PRP$ successor_NN ._. He_PRP on_RP whom_WP the_DT choice_NN falls_VBZ is_VBZ suddenly_RB
seized_VBN ,_, bound_VBN ,_, and_CC thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT fetish-house_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP is_VBZ kept_VBN in_IN
durance_NN till_IN he_PRP consents_NNS to_TO accept_VB the_DT crown_NN ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT heir_NN
finds_VBZ means_NNS of_IN evading_VBG the_DT honour_NN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ sought_VBN to_TO thrust_VB upon_IN
him_PRP ;_: a_DT ferocious_JJ chief_NN has_VBZ been_VBN known_VBN to_TO go_VB about_IN constantly_RB armed_VBN ,_,
resolute_VB to_TO resist_VB by_IN force_NN any_DT attempt_NN to_TO set_VB him_PRP on_IN the_DT throne_NN ._.
The_DT savage_JJ Timmes_NNPS of_IN Sierra_NNP Leone_NNP ,_, who_WP elect_VBP their_PRP$ king_NN ,_, reserve_NN to_TO
themselves_PRP the_DT right_JJ of_IN beating_VBG him_PRP on_IN the_DT eve_NN of_IN his_PRP$ coronation_NN ;_:
and_CC they_PRP avail_VBP themselves_PRP of_IN this_DT constitutional_JJ privilege_NN with_IN such_JJ
hearty_NN goodwill_NN that_WDT sometimes_RB the_DT unhappy_JJ monarch_NN does_VBZ not_RB long_RB
survive_VB his_PRP$ elevation_NN to_TO the_DT throne_NN ._. Hence_RB when_WRB the_DT leading_VBG chiefs_NNS
have_VBP a_DT spite_NN at_IN a_DT man_NN and_CC wish_VBP to_TO rid_VB themselves_PRP of_IN him_PRP ,_, they_PRP elect_VBP
him_PRP king_NN ._. Formerly_RB ,_, before_IN a_DT man_NN was_VBD proclaimed_VBN king_NN of_IN Sierra_NNP
Leone_NNP ,_, it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT custom_NN to_TO load_VB him_PRP with_IN chains_NNS and_CC thrash_NN
him_PRP ._. Then_RB the_DT fetters_NNS were_VBD knocked_VBN off_RB ,_, the_DT kingly_RB robe_NN was_VBD placed_VBN
on_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP received_VBD in_IN his_PRP$ hands_NNS the_DT symbol_NN of_IN royal_JJ dignity_NN ,_,
which_WDT was_VBD nothing_NN but_CC the_DT axe_NN of_IN the_DT executioner_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB
therefore_RB surprising_JJ to_TO read_VB that_IN in_IN Sierra_NNP Leone_NNP ,_, where_WRB such_JJ
customs_NNS have_VBP prevailed_VBN ,_, "_`` except_IN among_IN the_DT Mandingoes_NNPS and_CC Suzees_NNP ,_, few_JJ
kings_NNS are_VBP natives_NNS of_IN the_DT countries_NNS they_PRP govern_VBP ._. So_RB different_JJ are_VBP
their_PRP$ ideas_NNS from_IN ours_JJ ,_, that_DT very_RB few_JJ are_VBP solicitous_JJ of_IN the_DT honour_NN ,_,
and_CC competition_NN is_VBZ very_RB seldom_RB heard_VBN of_IN ."_NN

The_DT Mikados_NNP of_IN Japan_NNP seem_VBP early_RB to_TO have_VB resorted_VBN to_TO the_DT expedient_NN of_IN
transferring_VBG the_DT honours_NNS and_CC burdens_NNS of_IN supreme_JJ power_NN to_TO their_PRP$
infant_NN children_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT rise_NN of_IN the_DT Tycoons_NNS ,_, long_RB the_DT temporal_JJ
sovereigns_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, is_VBZ traced_VBN to_TO the_DT abdication_NN of_IN a_DT certain_JJ
Mikado_NNP in_IN favour_NN of_IN his_PRP$ three-year_JJ -_: old_JJ son_NN ._. The_DT sovereignty_NN having_VBG
been_VBN wrested_VBN by_IN a_DT usurper_NN from_IN the_DT infant_NN prince_NN ,_, the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT
Mikado_NNP was_VBD championed_VBN by_IN Yoritomo_NNP ,_, a_DT man_NN of_IN spirit_NN and_CC conduct_NN ,_, who_WP
overthrew_IN the_DT usurper_JJ and_CC restored_VBN to_TO the_DT Mikado_NNP the_DT shadow_NN ,_, while_IN
he_PRP retained_VBD for_IN himself_PRP the_DT substance_NN ,_, of_IN power_NN ._. He_PRP bequeathed_VBD to_TO
his_PRP$ descendants_NNS the_DT dignity_NN he_PRP had_VBD won_VBN ,_, and_CC thus_RB became_VBD the_DT founder_NN
of_IN the_DT line_NN of_IN Tycoons_NNS ._. Down_IN to_TO the_DT latter_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ
century_NN the_DT Tycoons_NNS were_VBD active_JJ and_CC efficient_JJ rulers_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT same_JJ
fate_NN overtook_VBD them_PRP which_WDT had_VBD befallen_VBN the_DT Mikados_NNP ._. Immeshed_NNP in_IN the_DT
same_JJ inextricable_JJ web_NN of_IN custom_NN and_CC law_NN ,_, they_PRP degenerated_VBD into_IN mere_JJ
puppets_NNS ,_, hardly_RB stirring_VBG from_IN their_PRP$ palaces_NNS and_CC occupied_VBD in_IN a_DT

monarchy_NN ran_VBD a_DT similar_JJ course_NN ._. Living_VBG like_IN his_PRP$ predecessors_NNS in_IN

be_VB Grand_NNP Mandarin_NNP ._. But_CC the_DT king_NN '_'' s_PRP brother_NN Tring_NNP put_VBD down_RP the_DT usurper_RBR
and_CC restored_VBD the_DT king_NN ,_, retaining_VBG ,_, however_RB ,_, for_IN himself_PRP and_CC his_PRP$
descendants_VBG the_DT dignity_NN of_IN general_JJ of_IN all_PDT the_DT forces_NNS ._. Thenceforward_''
the_DT kings_NNS ,_, though_IN invested_VBN with_IN the_DT title_NN and_CC pomp_NN of_IN sovereignty_NN ,_,
ceased_VBD to_TO govern_VB ._. While_IN they_PRP lived_VBD secluded_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ palaces_NNS ,_, all_DT
real_JJ political_JJ power_NN was_VBD wielded_VBN by_IN the_DT hereditary_JJ generals_NNS ._.

In_IN Mangaia_NNP ,_, a_DT Polynesian_NNP island_NN ,_, religious_JJ and_CC civil_JJ authority_NN were_VBD
lodged_VBN in_IN separate_JJ hands_NNS ,_, spiritual_JJ functions_NNS being_VBG discharged_VBN by_IN a_DT

Tonga_NNP ,_, besides_IN the_DT civil_JJ king_NN whose_WP$ right_NN to_TO the_DT throne_NN was_VBD partly_RB
hereditary_PRP and_CC partly_RB derived_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ warlike_JJ reputation_NN and_CC the_DT
number_NN of_IN his_PRP$ fighting_VBG men_NNS ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT great_JJ divine_JJ chief_NN who_WP
ranked_VBN above_IN the_DT king_NN and_CC the_DT other_JJ chiefs_NNS in_IN virtue_NN of_IN his_PRP$ supposed_VBN
descent_NN from_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT chief_NN gods_NNS ._. Once_RB a_DT year_NN the_DT first-fruits_NNS of_IN
the_DT ground_NN were_VBD offered_VBN to_TO him_PRP at_IN a_DT solemn_JJ ceremony_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD
believed_VBD that_IN if_IN these_DT offerings_NNS were_VBD not_RB made_VBN the_DT vengeance_NN of_IN the_DT
gods_NNS would_MD fall_VB in_IN a_DT signal_NN manner_NN on_IN the_DT people_NNS ._. Peculiar_NNP forms_NNS of_IN
speech_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN were_VBD applied_VBN to_TO no_DT one_NN else_RB ,_, were_VBD used_VBN in_IN speaking_VBG
of_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC everything_NN that_IN he_PRP chanced_VBD to_TO touch_VB became_VBD sacred_JJ or_CC
tabooed_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP and_CC the_DT king_NN met_VBD ,_, the_DT monarch_NN had_VBD to_TO sit_VB down_RP on_IN
the_DT ground_NN in_IN token_NN of_IN respect_NN until_IN his_PRP$ holiness_NN had_VBD passed_VBN by_IN ._. Yet_CC
though_IN he_PRP enjoyed_VBD the_DT highest_JJS veneration_NN by_IN reason_NN of_IN his_PRP$ divine_JJ
origin_NN ,_, this_DT sacred_JJ personage_NN possessed_VBD no_DT political_JJ authority_NN ,_, and_CC
if_IN he_PRP ventured_VBD to_TO meddle_VB with_IN affairs_NNS of_IN state_NN it_PRP was_VBD at_IN the_DT risk_NN of_IN
receiving_VBG a_DT rebuff_NN from_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, to_TO whom_WP the_DT real_JJ power_NN belonged_VBD ,_,
and_CC who_WP finally_RB succeeded_VBD in_IN ridding_VBG himself_PRP of_IN his_PRP$ spiritual_JJ rival_NN ._.

In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Western_NNP Africa_NNP two_CD kings_NNS reign_JJ side_NN by_IN side_NN ,_, a_DT
fetish_JJ or_CC religious_JJ king_NN and_CC a_DT civil_JJ king_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT fetish_JJ king_NN is_VBZ
really_RB supreme_JJ ._. He_PRP controls_VBZ the_DT weather_NN and_CC so_RB forth_RB ,_, and_CC can_MD put_VB a_DT
stop_VB to_TO everything_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP lays_VBD his_PRP$ red_JJ staff_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, no_DT one_CD
may_MD pass_VB that_DT way_NN ._. This_DT division_NN of_IN power_NN between_IN a_DT sacred_JJ and_CC a_DT
secular_JJ ruler_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB met_VBN with_IN wherever_WRB the_DT true_JJ negro_JJ culture_NN has_VBZ
been_VBN left_VBN unmolested_JJ ,_, but_CC where_WRB the_DT negro_JJ form_NN of_IN society_NN has_VBZ been_VBN

consolidate_VB the_DT two_CD powers_NNS in_IN a_DT single_JJ king_NN ._.

In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT East_NNP Indian_NNP island_NN of_IN Timor_NNP we_PRP meet_VBP with_IN a_DT
partition_NN of_IN power_NN like_IN that_DT which_WDT is_VBZ represented_VBN by_IN the_DT civil_JJ king_NN
and_CC the_DT fetish_JJ king_NN of_IN Western_NNP Africa_NNP ._. Some_DT of_IN the_DT Timorese_NNP tribes_NNS
recognise_NN two_CD rajahs_NNS ,_, the_DT ordinary_JJ or_CC civil_JJ rajah_NN ,_, who_WP governs_VBZ the_DT
people_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT fetish_JJ or_CC taboo_JJ rajah_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ charged_VBN with_IN the_DT
control_NN of_IN everything_NN that_WDT concerns_VBZ the_DT earth_NN and_CC its_PRP$ products_NNS ._. This_DT
latter_JJ ruler_NN has_VBZ the_DT right_NN of_IN declaring_VBG anything_NN taboo_JJ ;_: his_PRP$
permission_NN must_MD be_VB obtained_VBN before_IN new_JJ land_NN may_MD be_VB brought_VBN under_IN
cultivation_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP must_MD perform_VB certain_JJ necessary_JJ ceremonies_NNS when_WRB
the_DT work_NN is_VBZ being_VBG carried_VBN out_RP ._. If_IN drought_NN or_CC blight_NN threatens_VBZ the_DT
crops_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ help_NN is_VBZ invoked_VBN to_TO save_VB them_PRP ._. Though_IN he_PRP ranks_VBZ below_IN the_DT
civil_JJ rajah_NN ,_, he_PRP exercises_VBZ a_DT momentous_JJ influence_NN on_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN
events_NNS ,_, for_IN his_PRP$ secular_JJ colleague_NN is_VBZ bound_VBN to_TO consult_VB him_PRP in_IN all_DT
important_JJ matters_NNS ._. In_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT neighbouring_NN islands_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN
Rotti_NNP and_CC eastern_JJ Flores_NNS ,_, a_DT spiritual_JJ ruler_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN is_VBZ
recognised_VBN under_IN various_JJ native_JJ names_NNS ,_, which_WDT all_DT mean_VBP "_`` lord_NN of_IN the_DT
ground_NN ."_RB Similarly_RB in_IN the_DT Mekeo_NNP district_NN of_IN British_JJ New_NNP Guinea_NNP there_RB
is_VBZ a_DT double_JJ chieftainship_NN ._. The_DT people_NNS are_VBP divided_VBN into_IN two_CD groups_NNS
according_VBG to_TO families_NNS ,_, and_CC each_DT of_IN the_DT groups_NNS has_VBZ its_PRP$ chief_NN ._. One_CD of_IN
the_DT two_CD is_VBZ the_DT war_NN chief_NN ,_, the_DT other_JJ is_VBZ the_DT taboo_JJ chief_NN ._. The_DT office_NN
of_IN the_DT latter_NN is_VBZ hereditary_RB ;_: his_PRP$ duty_NN is_VBZ to_TO impose_VB a_DT taboo_NN on_IN any_DT of_IN
the_DT crops_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT coco-nuts_NNS and_CC areca_DT nuts_NNS ,_, whenever_WRB he_PRP thinks_VBZ
it_PRP desirable_JJ to_TO prohibit_VB their_PRP$ use_NN ._. In_IN his_PRP$ office_NN we_PRP may_MD perhaps_RB
detect_VB the_DT beginning_NN of_IN a_DT priestly_JJ dynasty_NN ,_, but_CC as_RB yet_RB his_PRP$ functions_NNS
appear_VB to_TO be_VB more_RBR magical_JJ than_IN religious_JJ ,_, being_VBG concerned_VBN with_IN the_DT
control_NN of_IN the_DT harvests_NNS rather_RB than_IN with_IN the_DT propitiation_NN of_IN higher_RBR
powers_NNS ._.




XVIII_NNP ._. The_DT Perils_NNPS of_IN the_DT Soul_NNP



1._DT The_DT Soul_NNP as_IN a_DT Mannikin_NN

THE_DT FOREGOING_NN examples_NNS have_VBP taught_VBN us_PRP that_IN the_DT office_NN of_IN a_DT sacred_JJ
king_NN or_CC priest_NN is_VBZ often_RB hedged_VBN in_IN by_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN burdensome_JJ
restrictions_NNS or_CC taboos_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT a_DT principal_JJ purpose_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB
to_TO preserve_VB the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ man_NN for_IN the_DT good_JJ of_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS ._.
But_CC if_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT taboos_NN is_VBZ to_TO save_VB his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, the_DT question_NN
arises_VBZ ,_, How_WRB is_VBZ their_PRP$ observance_NN supposed_VBD to_TO effect_VB this_DT end_NN ?_. To_TO
understand_VB this_DT we_PRP must_MD know_VB the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT danger_NN which_WDT
threatens_VBZ the_DT king_NN '_'' s_PRP life_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT intention_NN of_IN these_DT
curious_JJ restrictions_NNS to_TO guard_VB against_IN ._. We_PRP must_MD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, ask_VBP :_: What_WP
does_VBZ early_JJ man_NN understand_VB by_IN death_NN ?_. To_TO what_WP causes_VBZ does_VBZ he_PRP attribute_VB
it_PRP ?_. And_CC how_WRB does_VBZ he_PRP think_VB it_PRP may_MD be_VB guarded_VBN against_IN ?_.

As_IN the_DT savage_JJ commonly_RB explains_VBZ the_DT processes_NNS of_IN inanimate_JJ nature_NN by_IN
supposing_VBG that_IN they_PRP are_VBP produced_VBN by_IN living_VBG beings_NNS working_VBG in_IN or_CC
behind_IN the_DT phenomena_NNS ,_, so_RB he_PRP explains_VBZ the_DT phenomena_NNS of_IN life_NN itself_PRP ._.
If_IN an_DT animal_NN lives_VBZ and_CC moves_VBZ ,_, it_PRP can_MD only_RB be_VB ,_, he_PRP thinks_VBZ ,_, because_IN
there_EX is_VBZ a_DT little_JJ animal_NN inside_IN which_WDT moves_VBZ it_PRP :_: if_IN a_DT man_NN lives_VBZ and_CC
moves_NNS ,_, it_PRP can_MD only_RB be_VB because_IN he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT little_JJ man_NN or_CC animal_NN inside_IN
who_WP moves_VBZ him_PRP ._. The_DT animal_NN inside_IN the_DT animal_NN ,_, the_DT man_NN inside_IN the_DT man_NN ,_,
is_VBZ the_DT soul_NN ._. And_CC as_IN the_DT activity_NN of_IN an_DT animal_NN or_CC man_NN is_VBZ explained_VBN by_IN
the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN ,_, so_IN the_DT repose_NN of_IN sleep_NN or_CC death_NN is_VBZ
explained_VBN by_IN its_PRP$ absence_NN ;_: sleep_NN or_CC trance_NN being_VBG the_DT temporary_JJ ,_, death_NN
being_VBG the_DT permanent_JJ absence_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN ._. Hence_RB if_IN death_NN be_VB the_DT
permanent_JJ absence_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN ,_, the_DT way_NN to_TO guard_VB against_IN it_PRP is_VBZ either_RB
to_TO prevent_VB the_DT soul_NN from_IN leaving_VBG the_DT body_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN it_PRP does_VBZ depart_NN ,_, to_TO
ensure_VB that_IN it_PRP shall_MD return_VB ._. The_DT precautions_NNS adopted_VBN by_IN savages_NNS to_TO
secure_JJ one_CD or_CC other_JJ of_IN these_DT ends_NNS take_VBP the_DT form_NN of_IN certain_JJ
prohibitions_NNS or_CC taboos_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP nothing_NN but_CC rules_NNS intended_VBN to_TO
ensure_VB either_CC the_DT continued_VBN presence_NN or_CC the_DT return_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN ._. In_IN
short_JJ ,_, they_PRP are_VBP life-preservers_NNS or_CC life-guards_NNS ._. These_DT general_JJ
statements_NNS will_MD now_RB be_VB illustrated_VBN by_IN examples_NNS ._.

Addressing_VBG some_DT Australian_JJ blacks_NNS ,_, a_DT European_JJ missionary_NN said_VBD ,_, "_`` I_PRP am_VBP
not_RB one_CD ,_, as_IN you_PRP think_VBP ,_, but_CC two_CD ."_NNS Upon_IN this_DT they_PRP laughed_VBD ._. "_`` You_PRP may_MD
laugh_NN as_RB much_JJ as_IN you_PRP like_IN ,"_NNS continued_VBD the_DT missionary_NN ,_, "_'' I_PRP tell_VBP you_PRP
that_IN I_PRP am_VBP two_CD in_IN one_CD ;_: this_DT great_JJ body_NN that_IN you_PRP see_VBP is_VBZ one_CD ;_: within_IN
that_IN there_EX is_VBZ another_DT little_JJ one_NN which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB visible_JJ ._. The_DT great_JJ
body_NN dies_VBZ ,_, and_CC is_VBZ buried_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT little_JJ body_NN flies_VBZ away_RB when_WRB the_DT
great_JJ one_CD dies_VBZ ."_VBN To_TO this_DT some_DT of_IN the_DT blacks_NNS replied_VBD ,_, "_`` Yes_UH ,_, yes_UH ._. We_PRP
also_RB are_VBP two_CD ,_, we_PRP also_RB have_VBP a_DT little_JJ body_NN within_IN the_DT breast_NN ."_NN On_IN
being_VBG asked_VBD where_WRB the_DT little_JJ body_NN went_VBD after_IN death_NN ,_, some_DT said_VBD it_PRP
went_VBD behind_IN the_DT bush_NN ,_, others_NNS said_VBD it_PRP went_VBD into_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, and_CC some_DT
said_VBD they_PRP did_VBD not_RB know_VB ._. The_DT Hurons_NNPS thought_VBD that_IN the_DT soul_NN had_VBD a_DT head_NN
and_CC body_NN ,_, arms_NNS and_CC legs_NNS ;_: in_IN short_JJ ,_, that_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT complete_JJ little_JJ
model_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN himself_PRP ._. The_DT Esquimaux_NNP believe_VBP that_IN "_`` the_DT soul_NN
exhibits_VBZ the_DT same_JJ shape_NN as_IN the_DT body_NN it_PRP belongs_VBZ to_TO ,_, but_CC is_VBZ of_IN a_DT more_RBR
subtle_JJ and_CC ethereal_JJ nature_NN ."_VBD According_VBG to_TO the_DT Nootkas_NNP the_DT soul_NN has_VBZ
the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT tiny_JJ man_NN ;_: its_PRP$ seat_NN is_VBZ the_DT crown_NN of_IN the_DT head_NN ._. So_RB long_RB
as_IN it_PRP stands_VBZ erect_JJ ,_, its_PRP$ owner_NN is_VBZ hale_NN and_CC hearty_NN ;_: but_CC when_WRB from_IN any_DT
cause_VB it_PRP loses_VBZ its_PRP$ upright_JJ position_NN ,_, he_PRP loses_VBZ his_PRP$ senses_NNS ._. Among_IN the_DT
Indian_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN the_DT Lower_NNP Fraser_NNP River_NNP ,_, man_NN is_VBZ held_VBN to_TO have_VB four_CD
souls_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT the_DT principal_NN one_NN has_VBZ the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT mannikin_NN ,_, while_IN

So_RB exact_JJ is_VBZ the_DT resemblance_NN of_IN the_DT mannikin_NN to_TO the_DT man_NN ,_, in_IN other_JJ
words_NNS ,_, of_IN the_DT soul_NN to_TO the_DT body_NN ,_, that_WDT ,_, as_IN there_EX are_VBP fat_JJ bodies_NNS and_CC

there_EX are_VBP heavy_JJ souls_NNS and_CC light_JJ souls_NNS ,_, long_JJ souls_NNS and_CC short_JJ souls_NNS ._.
The_DT people_NNS of_IN Nias_NNP think_VBP that_IN every_DT man_NN ,_, before_IN he_PRP is_VBZ born_VBN ,_, is_VBZ asked_VBN

ever_RB given_VBN out_RP weighs_VBZ about_IN ten_CD grammes_NNS ._. The_DT length_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN '_'' s_PRP life_NN
is_VBZ proportioned_VBN to_TO the_DT length_NN of_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN ;_: children_NNS who_WP die_VBP young_JJ
had_VBD short_JJ souls_NNS ._. The_DT Fijian_NNP conception_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN as_IN a_DT tiny_JJ human_NN

only_RB a_DT little_JJ child_NN ."_NN People_NNS in_IN the_DT Punjaub_NNP who_WP tattoo_VBP themselves_PRP

2._DT Absence_NNP and_CC Recall_NNP of_IN the_DT Soul_NNP

THE_DT SOUL_NNP is_VBZ commonly_RB supposed_VBN to_TO escape_VB by_IN the_DT natural_JJ openings_NNS of_IN
the_DT body_NN ,_, especially_RB the_DT mouth_NN and_CC nostrils_NNS ._. Hence_RB in_IN Celebes_NNP they_PRP
sometimes_RB fasten_RB fish-hooks_NNS to_TO a_DT sick_JJ man_NN '_POS s_VBZ nose_NN ,_, navel_NN ,_, and_CC feet_NNS ,_,
so_RB that_IN if_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN should_MD try_VB to_TO escape_VB it_PRP may_MD be_VB hooked_JJ and_CC held_VBN
fast_RB ._. A_DT Turik_NNP on_IN the_DT Baram_NNP River_NNP ,_, in_IN Borneo_NNP ,_, refused_VBD to_TO part_NN with_IN
some_DT hook-like_JJ stones_NNS ,_, because_IN they_PRP ,_, as_IN it_PRP were_VBD ,_, hooked_VBD his_PRP$ soul_NN to_TO
his_PRP$ body_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB prevented_VBD the_DT spiritual_JJ portion_NN of_IN him_PRP from_IN
becoming_VBG detached_VBN from_IN the_DT material_NN ._. When_WRB a_DT Sea_NNP Dyak_NNP sorcerer_NN or_CC
medicine-man_NN is_VBZ initiated_VBN ,_, his_PRP$ fingers_NNS are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB furnished_VBN
with_IN fish-hooks_NNS ,_, with_IN which_WDT he_PRP will_MD thereafter_RB clutch_VB the_DT human_JJ soul_NN
in_IN the_DT act_NN of_IN flying_VBG away_RB ,_, and_CC restore_VB it_PRP to_TO the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT
sufferer_NN ._. But_CC hooks_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ plain_JJ ,_, may_MD be_VB used_VBN to_TO catch_VB the_DT souls_NNS of_IN
enemies_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN of_IN friends_NNS ._. Acting_NN on_IN this_DT principle_NN head-hunters_.
in_IN Borneo_NNP hang_VB wooden_JJ hooks_NNS beside_IN the_DT skulls_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ slain_NN enemies_NNS
in_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN this_DT helps_VBZ them_PRP on_IN their_PRP$ forays_NNS to_TO hook_VB in_IN fresh_JJ
heads_NNS ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT implements_NNS of_IN a_DT Haida_NNP medicine-man_NN is_VBZ a_DT hollow_NN
bone_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT he_PRP bottles_VBZ up_RP departing_VBG souls_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB restores_NNS them_PRP
to_TO their_PRP$ owners_NNS ._. When_WRB any_DT one_CD yawns_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ presence_NN the_DT Hindoos_NNP
always_RB snap_VB their_PRP$ thumbs_NNS ,_, believing_VBG that_IN this_DT will_MD hinder_VB the_DT soul_NN
from_IN issuing_VBG through_IN the_DT open_JJ mouth_NN ._. The_DT Marquesans_NNPS used_VBD to_TO hold_VB the_DT
mouth_NN and_CC nose_NN of_IN a_DT dying_VBG man_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO keep_VB him_PRP in_IN life_NN by_IN
preventing_VBG his_PRP$ soul_NN from_IN escaping_VBG ;_: the_DT same_JJ custom_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN of_IN
the_DT New_NNP Caledonians_NNPS ;_: and_CC with_IN the_DT like_JJ intention_NN the_DT Bagobos_NNP of_IN the_DT
Philippine_NNP Islands_NNP put_VBD rings_NNS of_IN brass_NN wire_NN on_IN the_DT wrists_NNS or_CC ankles_NNS
of_IN their_PRP$ sick_JJ ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT Itonamas_NNP of_IN South_NNP America_NNP seal_NN
up_IN the_DT eyes_NNS ,_, nose_NN ,_, and_CC mouth_NN of_IN a_DT dying_VBG person_NN ,_, in_IN case_NN his_PRP$ ghost_NN
should_MD get_VB out_RB and_CC carry_VB off_RP others_NNS ;_: and_CC for_IN a_DT similar_JJ reason_NN the_DT
people_NNS of_IN Nias_NNP ,_, who_WP fear_VBP the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT recently_RB deceased_JJ and_CC
identify_VB them_PRP with_IN the_DT breath_NN ,_, seek_VBP to_TO confine_VB the_DT vagrant_JJ soul_NN in_IN
its_PRP$ earthly_JJ tabernacle_NN by_IN bunging_VBG up_RP the_DT nose_NN or_CC tying_VBG up_IN the_DT jaws_NNS
of_IN the_DT corpse_NN ._. Before_IN leaving_VBG a_DT corpse_NN the_DT Wakelbura_NNP of_IN Australia_NNP
used_VBN to_TO place_VB hot_JJ coals_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ ears_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT ghost_NN in_IN
the_DT body_NN ,_, until_IN they_PRP had_VBD got_VBN such_JJ a_DT good_JJ start_NN that_IN he_PRP could_MD not_RB
overtake_IN them_PRP ._. In_IN Southern_JJ Celebes_NNP ,_, to_TO hinder_VB the_DT escape_NN of_IN a_DT
woman_NN '_POS s_PRP soul_NN in_IN childbed_NN ,_, the_DT nurse_NN ties_NNS a_DT band_NN as_RB tightly_RB as_IN
possible_JJ round_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT expectant_JJ mother_NN ._. The_DT Minangkabauers_NNPS

is_VBZ sometimes_RB fastened_VBN round_IN the_DT wrist_NN or_CC loins_NNS of_IN a_DT woman_NN in_IN

should_MD escape_VB and_CC be_VB lost_VBN as_RB soon_RB as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ born_VBN ,_, the_DT Alfoors_NNP of_IN
Celebes_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT birth_NN is_VBZ about_IN to_TO take_VB place_NN ,_, are_VBP careful_JJ to_TO close_VB
