child_NN '_POS s_VBZ soul_NN should_MD get_VB into_IN one_CD of_IN them_PRP ?_. the_DT answer_NN was_VBD that_IN breath_NN
being_VBG exhaled_VBN as_RB well_RB as_IN inhaled_VBN through_IN the_DT nostrils_NNS ,_, the_DT soul_NN
would_MD be_VB expelled_VBN before_IN it_PRP could_MD have_VB time_NN to_TO settle_VB down_RP ._. Popular_NNP
expressions_NNS in_IN the_DT language_NN of_IN civilised_JJ peoples_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN to_TO have_VB
one_CD '_POS s_PRP heart_NN in_IN one_CD '_POS s_PRP mouth_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT soul_NN on_IN the_DT lips_NNS or_CC in_IN the_DT nose_NN ,_,
show_NN how_WRB natural_JJ is_VBZ the_DT idea_NN that_IN the_DT life_NN or_CC soul_NN may_MD escape_VB by_IN the_DT
mouth_NN or_CC nostrils_NNS ._.

Often_RB the_DT soul_NN is_VBZ conceived_VBN as_IN a_DT bird_NN ready_JJ to_TO take_VB flight_NN ._. This_DT
conception_NN has_VBZ probably_RB left_VBN traces_NNS in_IN most_JJS languages_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP
lingers_VBZ as_IN a_DT metaphor_NN in_IN poetry_NN ._. The_DT Malays_NNP carry_VBP out_RP the_DT conception_NN
of_IN the_DT bird-soul_NN in_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN odd_JJ ways_NNS ._. If_IN the_DT soul_NN is_VBZ a_DT bird_NN on_IN
the_DT wing_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB attracted_VBN by_IN rice_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB either_RB prevented_VBN from_IN
flying_VBG away_RB or_CC lured_VBD back_RB again_RB from_IN its_PRP$ perilous_JJ flight_NN ._. Thus_RB in_IN
Java_NNP when_WRB a_DT child_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN on_IN the_DT ground_NN for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN (_-LRB- a_DT
moment_NN which_WDT uncultured_JJ people_NNS seem_VBP to_TO regard_VB as_IN especially_RB
dangerous_JJ ),_NN it_PRP is_VBZ put_VBN in_IN a_DT hen-coop_NN and_CC the_DT mother_NN makes_VBZ a_DT clucking_NN
sound_NN ,_, as_IN if_IN she_PRP were_VBD calling_VBG hens_NNS ._. And_CC in_IN Sintang_NNP ,_, a_DT district_NN of_IN
Borneo_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT person_NN ,_, whether_IN man_NN ,_, woman_NN ,_, or_CC child_NN ,_, has_VBZ fallen_VBN out_IN
of_IN a_DT house_NN or_CC off_IN a_DT tree_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN brought_VBN home_NN ,_, his_PRP$ wife_NN or_CC
other_JJ kinswoman_NN goes_VBZ as_RB speedily_RB as_IN possible_JJ to_TO the_DT spot_NN where_WRB the_DT
accident_NN happened_VBD ,_, and_CC there_EX strews_VBD rice_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN coloured_VBN
yellow_JJ ,_, while_IN she_PRP utters_VBD the_DT words_NNS ,_, "_'' Cluck_NNP !_. cluck_. !_. soul_NN !_. So-and_. -_: so_RB
is_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ house_NN again_RB ._. Cluck_NNP !_. cluck_. !_. soul_NN !"_VBD Then_RB she_PRP gathers_VBD up_RP the_DT
rice_NN in_IN a_DT basket_NN ,_, carries_VBZ it_PRP to_TO the_DT sufferer_NN ,_, and_CC drops_VBZ the_DT grains_NNS
from_IN her_PRP$ hand_NN on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, saying_VBG again_RB ,_, "_'' Cluck_NNP !_. cluck_NN !_. soul_NN !"_VBD Here_RB
the_DT intention_NN clearly_RB is_VBZ to_TO decoy_VB back_RB the_DT loitering_NN bird-soul_NN and_CC
replace_VB it_PRP in_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN its_PRP$ owner_NN ._.

The_DT soul_NN of_IN a_DT sleeper_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO wander_VB away_RB from_IN his_PRP$ body_NN and_CC
actually_RB to_TO visit_VB the_DT places_NNS ,_, to_TO see_VB the_DT persons_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO perform_VB the_DT
acts_NNS of_IN which_WDT he_PRP dreams_VBZ ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, when_WRB an_DT Indian_NNP of_IN Brazil_NNP or_CC
Guiana_NNP wakes_VBZ up_RP from_IN a_DT sound_JJ sleep_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ firmly_RB convinced_VBN that_IN his_PRP$
soul_NN has_VBZ really_RB been_VBN away_RB hunting_NN ,_, fishing_NN ,_, felling_NN trees_NNS ,_, or_CC
whatever_WDT else_RB he_PRP has_VBZ dreamed_VBN of_IN doing_VBG ,_, while_IN all_PDT the_DT time_NN his_PRP$ body_NN
has_VBZ been_VBN lying_VBG motionless_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ hammock_NN ._. A_DT whole_JJ Bororo_NNP village_NN has_VBZ
been_VBN thrown_VBN into_IN a_DT panic_NN and_CC nearly_RB deserted_VBN because_IN somebody_NN had_VBD
dreamed_VBD that_IN he_PRP saw_VBD enemies_NNS stealthily_RB approaching_VBG it_PRP ._. A_DT Macusi_NNP
Indian_NNP in_IN weak_JJ health_NN ,_, who_WP dreamed_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ employer_NN had_VBD made_VBN him_PRP
haul_VB the_DT canoe_NN up_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN difficult_JJ cataracts_NNS ,_, bitterly_RB
reproached_VBN his_PRP$ master_NN next_JJ morning_NN for_IN his_PRP$ want_NN of_IN consideration_NN in_IN
thus_RB making_VBG a_DT poor_JJ invalid_NN go_VB out_RB and_CC toil_NN during_IN the_DT night_NN ._. The_DT
Indians_NNPS of_IN the_DT Gran_NNP Chaco_NNP are_VBP often_RB heard_VBN to_TO relate_VB the_DT most_RBS
incredible_JJ stories_NNS as_IN things_NNS which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP themselves_PRP seen_VBN and_CC
heard_VBN ;_: hence_RB strangers_NNS who_WP do_VBP not_RB know_VB them_PRP intimately_RB say_VBP in_IN their_PRP$
haste_NN that_IN these_DT Indians_NNPS are_VBP liars_NNS ._. In_IN point_NN of_IN fact_NN the_DT Indians_NNPS are_VBP
firmly_RB convinced_VBN of_IN the_DT truth_NN of_IN what_WP they_PRP relate_VBP ;_: for_IN these_DT
wonderful_JJ adventures_NNS are_VBP simply_RB their_PRP$ dreams_NNS ,_, which_WDT they_PRP do_VBP not_RB
distinguish_VB from_IN waking_VBG realities_NNS ._.

Now_RB the_DT absence_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN in_IN sleep_NN has_VBZ its_PRP$ dangers_NNS ,_, for_IN if_IN from_IN
any_DT cause_NN the_DT soul_NN should_MD be_VB permanently_RB detained_VBN away_RB from_IN the_DT
body_NN ,_, the_DT person_NN thus_RB deprived_VBN of_IN the_DT vital_JJ principle_NN must_MD die_VB ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT German_JJ belief_NN that_IN the_DT soul_NN escapes_NNS from_IN a_DT sleeper_NN '_'' s_PRP
mouth_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT white_JJ mouse_NN or_CC a_DT little_JJ bird_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN to_TO
prevent_VB the_DT return_NN of_IN the_DT bird_NN or_CC animal_NN would_MD be_VB fatal_JJ to_TO the_DT
sleeper_NN ._. Hence_RB in_IN Transylvania_NNP they_PRP say_VBP that_IN you_PRP should_MD not_RB let_VB a_DT
child_NN sleep_NN with_IN its_PRP$ mouth_NN open_JJ ,_, or_CC its_PRP$ soul_NN will_MD slip_VB out_RP in_IN the_DT
shape_NN of_IN a_DT mouse_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT child_NN will_MD never_RB wake_VB ._. Many_JJ causes_NNS may_MD
detain_NN the_DT sleeper_NN '_POS s_PRP soul_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, his_PRP$ soul_NN may_MD meet_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN
another_DT sleeper_NN and_CC the_DT two_CD souls_NNS may_MD fight_VB ;_: if_IN a_DT Guinea_NNP negro_NN
wakens_NNS with_IN sore_JJ bones_NNS in_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_, he_PRP thinks_VBZ that_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN has_VBZ
been_VBN thrashed_VBN by_IN another_DT soul_NN in_IN sleep_NN ._. Or_CC it_PRP may_MD meet_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN a_DT
person_NN just_RB deceased_JJ and_CC be_VB carried_VBN off_RP by_IN it_PRP ;_: hence_RB in_IN the_DT Aru_NN
Islands_NNP the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN a_DT house_NN will_MD not_RB sleep_VB the_DT night_NN after_IN a_DT
death_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN place_NN in_IN it_PRP ,_, because_IN the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ is_NNS
supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB still_RB in_IN the_DT house_NN and_CC they_PRP fear_VBP to_TO meet_VB it_PRP in_IN a_DT
dream_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT sleeper_NN may_MD be_VB prevented_VBN by_IN an_DT
accident_NN or_CC by_IN physical_JJ force_NN from_IN returning_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ body_NN ._. When_WRB a_DT
Dyak_NNP dreams_VBZ of_IN falling_VBG into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, he_PRP supposes_VBZ that_IN this_DT
accident_NN has_VBZ really_RB befallen_VBN his_PRP$ spirit_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP sends_VBZ for_IN a_DT wizard_NN ,_,
who_WP fishes_VBZ for_IN the_DT spirit_NN with_IN a_DT hand-net_NN in_IN a_DT basin_NN of_IN water_NN till_IN
he_PRP catches_VBZ it_PRP and_CC restores_VBZ it_PRP to_TO its_PRP$ owner_NN ._. The_DT Santals_NNPS tell_VBP how_WRB a_DT
man_NN fell_VBD asleep_RB ,_, and_CC growing_VBG very_RB thirsty_JJ ,_, his_PRP$ soul_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN
a_DT lizard_NN ,_, left_VBD his_PRP$ body_NN and_CC entered_VBD a_DT pitcher_NN of_IN water_NN to_TO drink_VB ._.
Just_RB then_RB the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT pitcher_NN happened_VBD to_TO cover_VB it_PRP ;_: so_IN the_DT soul_NN
could_MD not_RB return_VB to_TO the_DT body_NN and_CC the_DT man_NN died_VBD ._. While_IN his_PRP$ friends_NNS
were_VBD preparing_VBG to_TO burn_VB the_DT body_NN some_DT one_CD uncovered_VBD the_DT pitcher_NN to_TO
get_VB water_NN ._. The_DT lizard_NN thus_RB escaped_VBD and_CC returned_VBD to_TO the_DT body_NN ,_, which_WDT
immediately_RB revived_VBN ;_: so_IN the_DT man_NN rose_VBD up_RB and_CC asked_VBD his_PRP$ friends_NNS why_WRB
they_PRP were_VBD weeping_VBG ._. They_PRP told_VBD him_PRP they_PRP thought_VBD he_PRP was_VBD dead_JJ and_CC were_VBD
about_IN to_TO burn_VB his_PRP$ body_NN ._. He_PRP said_VBD he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN down_IN a_DT well_RB to_TO get_VB
water_NN ,_, but_CC had_VBD found_VBN it_PRP hard_JJ to_TO get_VB out_RB and_CC had_VBD just_RB returned_VBN ._. So_CC
they_PRP saw_VBD it_PRP all_DT ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT common_JJ rule_NN with_IN primitive_JJ people_NNS not_RB to_TO waken_VB a_DT sleeper_NN ,_,
because_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN is_VBZ away_RB and_CC might_MD not_RB have_VB time_NN to_TO get_VB back_RB ;_: so_RB if_IN
the_DT man_NN wakened_VBD without_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD fall_VB sick_JJ ._. If_IN it_PRP is_VBZ
absolutely_RB necessary_JJ to_TO rouse_VB a_DT sleeper_NN ,_, it_PRP must_MD be_VB done_VBN very_RB
gradually_RB ,_, to_TO allow_VB the_DT soul_NN time_NN to_TO return_VB ._. A_DT Fijian_NNP in_IN Matuku_NNP ,_,
suddenly_RB wakened_VBN from_IN a_DT nap_NN by_IN somebody_NN treading_NN on_IN his_PRP$ foot_NN ,_, has_VBZ
been_VBN heard_VBN bawling_VBG after_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN and_CC imploring_VBG it_PRP to_TO return_VB ._. He_PRP had_VBD
just_RB been_VBN dreaming_VBG that_IN he_PRP was_VBD far_RB away_RB in_IN Tonga_NNP ,_, and_CC great_JJ was_VBD his_PRP$
alarm_NN on_IN suddenly_RB wakening_VBG to_TO find_VB his_PRP$ body_NN in_IN Matuku_NNP ._. Death_NNP stared_VBD
him_PRP in_IN the_DT face_NN unless_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN could_MD be_VB induced_VBN to_TO speed_VB at_IN once_RB
across_IN the_DT sea_NN and_CC reanimate_VB its_PRP$ deserted_JJ tenement_NN ._. The_DT man_NN would_MD
probably_RB have_VBP died_VBN of_IN fright_NN if_IN a_DT missionary_NN had_VBD not_RB been_VBN at_IN hand_NN to_TO
allay_VB his_PRP$ terror_NN ._.

Still_RB more_RBR dangerous_JJ is_VBZ it_PRP in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN primitive_JJ man_NN to_TO move_VB a_DT
sleeper_NN or_CC alter_VB his_PRP$ appearance_NN ,_, for_IN if_IN this_DT were_VBD done_VBN the_DT soul_NN on_IN
its_PRP$ return_NN might_MD not_RB be_VB able_JJ to_TO find_VB or_CC recognise_VB its_PRP$ body_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB
the_DT person_NN would_MD die_VB ._. The_DT Minangkabauers_NNPS deem_VBP it_PRP highly_RB improper_JJ to_TO
blacken_JJ or_CC dirty_JJ the_DT face_NN of_IN a_DT sleeper_NN ,_, lest_IN the_DT absent_JJ soul_NN should_MD
shrink_VB from_IN re-entering_VBG a_DT body_NN thus_RB disfigured_VBN ._. Patani_NNP Malays_NNP fancy_NN
that_IN if_IN a_DT person_NN '_POS s_VBZ face_NN be_VB painted_VBN while_IN he_PRP sleeps_VBZ ,_, the_DT soul_NN which_WDT
has_VBZ gone_VBN out_IN of_IN him_PRP will_MD not_RB recognise_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP will_MD sleep_VB on_IN
till_IN his_PRP$ face_NN is_VBZ washed_VBN ._. In_IN Bombay_NN it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN equivalent_JJ to_TO
murder_NN to_TO change_VB the_DT aspect_NN of_IN a_DT sleeper_NN ,_, as_IN by_IN painting_VBG his_PRP$ face_NN in_IN
fantastic_JJ colours_NNS or_CC giving_VBG moustaches_NNS to_TO a_DT sleeping_VBG woman_NN ._. For_IN when_WRB
the_DT soul_NN returns_VBZ it_PRP will_MD not_RB know_VB its_PRP$ own_JJ body_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT person_NN will_MD
die_VB ._.

But_CC in_IN order_NN that_IN a_DT man_NN '_POS s_VBZ soul_NN should_MD quit_VB his_PRP$ body_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB
necessary_JJ that_IN he_PRP should_MD be_VB asleep_RB ._. It_PRP may_MD quit_VB him_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ waking_VBG
hours_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB sickness_JJR ,_, insanity_NN ,_, or_CC death_NN will_MD be_VB the_DT result_NN ._.
Thus_RB a_DT man_NN of_IN the_DT Wurunjeri_NNP tribe_NN in_IN Australia_NNP lay_VBD at_IN his_PRP$ last_JJ gasp_NN
because_IN his_PRP$ spirit_NN had_VBD departed_VBN from_IN him_PRP ._. A_DT medicine-man_NN went_VBD in_IN
pursuit_NN and_CC caught_VBD the_DT spirit_NN by_IN the_DT middle_NN just_RB as_IN it_PRP was_VBD about_RB to_TO
plunge_NN into_IN the_DT sunset_NN glow_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT light_JJ cast_NN by_IN the_DT souls_NNS of_IN
the_DT dead_JJ as_IN they_PRP pass_VBP in_IN and_CC out_IN of_IN the_DT under-world_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT sun_NN
goes_VBZ to_TO rest_VB ._. Having_VBG captured_VBN the_DT vagrant_NN spirit_NN ,_, the_DT doctor_NN brought_VBN
it_PRP back_RB under_IN his_PRP$ opossum_JJ rug_NN ,_, laid_VBD himself_PRP down_RP on_IN the_DT dying_VBG man_NN ,_,
and_CC put_VBD the_DT soul_NN back_RB into_IN him_PRP ,_, so_RB that_IN after_IN a_DT time_NN he_PRP revived_VBD ._. The_DT
Karens_NNP of_IN Burma_NNP are_VBP perpetually_RB anxious_JJ about_IN their_PRP$ souls_NNS ,_, lest_IN
these_DT should_MD go_VB roving_VBG from_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS ,_, leaving_VBG the_DT owners_NNS to_TO die_VB ._.
When_WRB a_DT man_NN has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO fear_VB that_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN is_VBZ about_IN to_TO take_VB this_DT
fatal_JJ step_NN ,_, a_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ performed_VBN to_TO retain_VB or_CC recall_VB it_PRP ,_, in_IN which_WDT
the_DT whole_JJ family_NN must_MD take_VB part_NN ._. A_DT meal_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN consisting_VBG of_IN a_DT
cock_NN and_CC hen_NN ,_, a_DT special_JJ kind_NN of_IN rice_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT bunch_NN of_IN bananas_NNS ._. Then_RB
the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN takes_VBZ the_DT bowl_NN which_WDT is_VBZ used_VBN to_TO skim_VB rice_NN ,_,
and_CC knocking_VBG with_IN it_PRP thrice_NN on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT houseladder_NN says_VBZ :_:
"_`` Prrrroo_NNP !_. Come_VB back_RB ,_, soul_NN ,_, do_VBP not_RB tarry_VB outside_JJ !_. If_IN it_PRP rains_VBZ ,_, you_PRP
will_MD be_VB wet_JJ ._. If_IN the_DT sun_NN shines_NNS ,_, you_PRP will_MD be_VB hot_JJ ._. The_DT gnats_NNS will_MD
sting_VBG you_PRP ,_, the_DT leeches_NNS will_MD bite_VB you_PRP ,_, the_DT tigers_NNS will_MD devour_VB you_PRP ,_,
the_DT thunder_NN will_MD crush_VB you_PRP ._. Prrrroo_NNP !_. Come_VB back_RB ,_, soul_NN !_. Here_RB it_PRP will_MD
be_VB well_RB with_IN you_PRP ._. You_PRP shall_MD want_VB for_IN nothing_NN ._. Come_VB and_CC eat_VB under_IN
shelter_NN from_IN the_DT wind_NN and_CC the_DT storm_NN ."_VBD After_IN that_IN the_DT family_NN partakes_NNS
of_IN the_DT meal_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT ceremony_NN ends_VBZ with_IN everybody_NN tying_VBG their_PRP$ right_NN
wrist_NN with_IN a_DT string_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN charmed_VBN by_IN a_DT sorcerer_NN ._. Similarly_RB
the_DT Lolos_NNP of_IN South-western_NNP China_NNP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT soul_NN leaves_VBZ the_DT
body_NN in_IN chronic_JJ illness_NN ._. In_IN that_DT case_NN they_PRP read_VBD a_DT sort_NN of_IN elaborate_JJ
litany_NN ,_, calling_VBG on_IN the_DT soul_NN by_IN name_NN and_CC beseeching_VBG it_PRP to_TO return_VB from_IN
the_DT hills_NNS ,_, the_DT vales_NNS ,_, the_DT rivers_NNS ,_, the_DT forests_NNS ,_, the_DT fields_NNS ,_, or_CC from_IN
wherever_WRB it_PRP may_MD be_VB straying_VBG ._. At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN cups_NNS of_IN water_NN ,_, wine_NN ,_,
and_CC rice_NN are_VBP set_VBN at_IN the_DT door_NN for_IN the_DT refreshment_NN of_IN the_DT weary_JJ
wandering_VBG spirit_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ over_RB ,_, they_PRP tie_VB a_DT red_JJ cord_NN
round_VB the_DT arm_NN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ man_NN to_TO tether_VB the_DT soul_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT cord_NN is_VBZ
worn_VBN by_IN him_PRP until_IN it_PRP decays_VBZ and_CC drops_VBZ off_RP ._.

Some_DT of_IN the_DT Congo_NNP tribes_NNS believe_VBP that_IN when_WRB a_DT man_NN is_VBZ ill_JJ ,_, his_PRP$ soul_NN
has_VBZ left_VBN his_PRP$ body_NN and_CC is_VBZ wandering_VBG at_IN large_JJ ._. The_DT aid_NN of_IN the_DT sorcerer_NN
is_VBZ then_RB called_VBN in_IN to_TO capture_VB the_DT vagrant_NN spirit_NN and_CC restore_VB it_PRP to_TO
the_DT invalid_NN ._. Generally_RB the_DT physician_NN declares_VBZ that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ
successfully_RB chased_VBD the_DT soul_NN into_IN the_DT branch_NN of_IN a_DT tree_NN ._. The_DT whole_NN
town_NN thereupon_RB turns_VBZ out_RP and_CC accompanies_VBZ the_DT doctor_NN to_TO the_DT tree_NN ,_,
where_WRB the_DT strongest_JJS men_NNS are_VBP deputed_VBN to_TO break_VB off_RP the_DT branch_NN in_IN which_WDT
the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ man_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB lodged_VBN ._. This_DT they_PRP do_VBP and_CC
carry_VB the_DT branch_NN back_RB to_TO the_DT town_NN ,_, insinuating_VBG by_IN their_PRP$ gestures_NNS
that_IN the_DT burden_NN is_VBZ heavy_JJ and_CC hard_JJ to_TO bear_VB ._. When_WRB the_DT branch_NN has_VBZ been_VBN
brought_VBN to_TO the_DT sick_JJ man_NN '_'' s_PRP hut_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ placed_VBN in_IN an_DT upright_RB position_NN
by_IN its_PRP$ side_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT sorcerer_NN performs_VBZ the_DT enchantments_NNS by_IN which_WDT the_DT
soul_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO be_VB restored_VBN to_TO its_PRP$ owner_NN ._.

Pining_NNP ,_, sickness_NN ,_, great_JJ fright_NN ,_, and_CC death_NN are_VBP ascribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Bataks_NNPS
of_IN Sumatra_NNP to_TO the_DT absence_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN from_IN the_DT body_NN ._. At_IN first_RB they_PRP
try_VB to_TO beckon_VB the_DT wanderer_NN back_RB ,_, and_CC to_TO lure_VB him_PRP ,_, like_IN a_DT fowl_NN ,_, by_IN
strewing_VBG rice_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT following_VBG form_NN of_IN words_NNS is_VBZ commonly_RB
repeated_VBN :_: "_`` Come_VB back_RB ,_, O_UH soul_NN ,_, whether_IN thou_DT art_NN lingering_VBG in_IN the_DT
wood_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN the_DT hills_NNS ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT dale_NN ._. See_VB ,_, I_PRP call_VBP thee_PRP with_IN a_DT
toemba_DT bras_NNS ,_, with_IN an_DT egg_NN of_IN the_DT fowl_NN Rajah_NNP moelija_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT
eleven_CD healing_VBG leaves_NNS ._. Detain_NN it_PRP not_RB ,_, let_VB it_PRP come_VB straight_RB here_RB ,_,
detain_NN it_PRP not_RB ,_, neither_RB in_IN the_DT wood_NN ,_, nor_CC on_IN the_DT hill_NN ,_, nor_CC in_IN the_DT
dale_NN ._. That_DT may_MD not_RB be_VB ._. O_UH come_VBN straight_JJ home_NN !"_. Once_RB when_WRB a_DT popular_JJ
traveller_NN was_VBD leaving_VBG a_DT Kayan_NNP village_NN ,_, the_DT mothers_NNS ,_, fearing_VBG that_IN
their_PRP$ children_NNS '_POS s_PRP souls_NNS might_MD follow_VB him_PRP on_IN his_PRP$ journey_NN ,_, brought_VBD him_PRP
the_DT boards_NNS on_IN which_WDT they_PRP carry_VBP their_PRP$ infants_NNS and_CC begged_VBD him_PRP to_TO pray_VB
that_IN the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT little_JJ ones_NNS would_MD return_VB to_TO the_DT familiar_JJ
boards_NNS and_CC not_RB go_VB away_RB with_IN him_PRP into_IN the_DT far_JJ country_NN ._. To_TO each_DT board_NN
was_VBD fastened_VBN a_DT looped_JJ string_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN tethering_VBG the_DT
vagrant_JJ spirits_NNS ,_, and_CC through_IN the_DT loop_NN each_DT baby_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO pass_VB a_DT
chubby_JJ finger_NN to_TO make_VB sure_JJ that_IN its_PRP$ tiny_JJ soul_NN would_MD not_RB wander_VB away_RB ._.

In_IN an_DT Indian_JJ story_NN a_DT king_NN conveys_VBZ his_PRP$ soul_NN into_IN the_DT dead_JJ body_NN of_IN a_DT
Brahman_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT hunchback_NN conveys_VBZ his_PRP$ soul_NN into_IN the_DT deserted_JJ body_NN of_IN
the_DT king_NN ._. The_DT hunchback_NN is_VBZ now_RB king_NN and_CC the_DT king_NN is_VBZ a_DT Brahman_NNP ._.
However_RB ,_, the_DT hunchback_NN is_VBZ induced_VBN to_TO show_VB his_PRP$ skill_NN by_IN transferring_VBG
his_PRP$ soul_NN to_TO the_DT dead_JJ body_NN of_IN a_DT parrot_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT king_NN seizes_VBZ the_DT
opportunity_NN to_TO regain_VB possession_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ body_NN ._. A_DT tale_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ
type_NN ,_, with_IN variations_NNS of_IN detail_NN ,_, reappears_VBZ among_IN the_DT Malays_NNP ._. A_DT king_NN
has_VBZ incautiously_RB transferred_VBN his_PRP$ soul_NN to_TO an_DT ape_NN ,_, upon_IN which_WDT the_DT
vizier_JJR adroitly_RB inserts_VBZ his_PRP$ own_JJ soul_NN into_IN the_DT king_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN and_CC so_RB
takes_VBZ possession_NN of_IN the_DT queen_NN and_CC the_DT kingdom_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT true_JJ king_NN
languishes_NNS at_IN court_NN in_IN the_DT outward_JJ semblance_NN of_IN an_DT ape_NN ._. But_CC one_CD day_NN
the_DT false_JJ king_NN ,_, who_WP played_VBD for_IN high_JJ stakes_NNS ,_, was_VBD watching_VBG a_DT combat_NN of_IN
rams_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP happened_VBD that_IN the_DT animal_NN on_IN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD laid_VBN his_PRP$ money_NN
fell_VBD down_IN dead_NN ._. All_DT efforts_NNS to_TO restore_VB animation_NN proved_VBD unavailing_VBG
till_IN the_DT false_JJ king_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT instinct_NN of_IN a_DT true_JJ sportsman_NN ,_,
transferred_VBN his_PRP$ own_JJ soul_NN to_TO the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ ram_NN ,_, and_CC thus_RB
renewed_VBN the_DT fray_NN ._. The_DT real_JJ king_NN in_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT ape_NN saw_VBD his_PRP$
chance_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN great_JJ presence_NN of_IN mind_NN darted_VBD back_RB into_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ
body_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT vizier_JJR had_VBD rashly_RB vacated_VBN ._. So_IN he_PRP came_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ
again_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT usurper_NNP in_IN the_DT ram_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN met_VBN with_IN the_DT fate_NN he_PRP richly_RB
deserved_VBN ._. Similarly_RB the_DT Greeks_NNP told_VBD how_WRB the_DT soul_NN of_IN Hermotimus_NNP of_IN
Clazomenae_NNP used_VBD to_TO quit_VB his_PRP$ body_NN and_CC roam_NN far_RB and_CC wide_RB ,_, bringing_VBG
back_RB intelligence_NN of_IN what_WP he_PRP had_VBD seen_VBN on_IN his_PRP$ rambles_NNS to_TO his_PRP$ friends_NNS
at_IN home_NN ;_: until_IN one_CD day_NN ,_, when_WRB his_PRP$ spirit_NN was_VBD abroad_RB ,_, his_PRP$ enemies_NNS
contrived_VBN to_TO seize_VB his_PRP$ deserted_JJ body_NN and_CC committed_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT flames_NNS ._.

The_DT departure_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN is_VBZ not_RB always_RB voluntary_JJ ._. It_PRP may_MD be_VB
extracted_VBN from_IN the_DT body_NN against_IN its_PRP$ will_NN by_IN ghosts_NNS ,_, demons_NNS ,_, or_CC
sorcerers_NNS ._. Hence_RB ,_, when_WRB a_DT funeral_NN is_VBZ passing_VBG the_DT house_NN ,_, the_DT Karens_NNP
tie_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS with_IN a_DT special_JJ kind_NN of_IN string_NN to_TO a_DT particular_JJ
part_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, lest_IN the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT children_NNS should_MD leave_VB their_PRP$
bodies_NNS and_CC go_VB into_IN the_DT corpse_NN which_WDT is_VBZ passing_VBG ._. The_DT children_NNS are_VBP
kept_VBD tied_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN until_IN the_DT corpse_NN is_VBZ out_IN of_IN sight_NN ._. And_CC after_IN
the_DT corpse_NN has_VBZ been_VBN laid_VBN in_IN the_DT grave_NN ,_, but_CC before_IN the_DT earth_NN has_VBZ been_VBN
shovelled_VBN in_IN ,_, the_DT mourners_NNS and_CC friends_NNS range_VBP themselves_PRP round_VBP the_DT
grave_NN ,_, each_DT with_IN a_DT bamboo_NN split_NN lengthwise_NN in_IN one_CD hand_NN and_CC a_DT little_JJ
stick_NN in_IN the_DT other_JJ ;_: each_DT man_NN thrusts_VBD his_PRP$ bamboo_NN into_IN the_DT grave_NN ,_, and_CC
drawing_VBG the_DT stick_NN along_IN the_DT groove_NN of_IN the_DT bamboo_NN points_VBZ out_RP to_TO his_PRP$
soul_NN that_IN in_IN this_DT way_NN it_PRP may_MD easily_RB climb_VB up_RP out_IN of_IN the_DT tomb_NN ._. While_IN
the_DT earth_NN is_VBZ being_VBG shovelled_VBN in_IN ,_, the_DT bamboos_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT
way_NN ,_, lest_IN the_DT souls_NNS should_MD be_VB in_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC so_RB should_MD be_VB
inadvertently_RB buried_VBN with_IN the_DT earth_NN as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ being_VBG thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT
grave_NN ;_: and_CC when_WRB the_DT people_NNS leave_VBP the_DT spot_NN they_PRP carry_VBP away_RB the_DT
bamboos_NNS ,_, begging_VBG their_PRP$ souls_NNS to_TO come_VB with_IN them_PRP ._. Further_RB ,_, on_IN
returning_VBG from_IN the_DT grave_NN each_DT Karen_NNP provides_VBZ himself_PRP with_IN three_CD
little_JJ hooks_NNS made_VBD of_IN branches_NNS of_IN trees_NNS ,_, and_CC calling_VBG his_PRP$ spirit_NN to_TO
follow_VB him_PRP ,_, at_IN short_JJ intervals_NNS ,_, as_IN he_PRP returns_VBZ ,_, he_PRP makes_VBZ a_DT motion_NN as_IN
if_IN hooking_VBG it_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB thrusts_VBD the_DT hook_NN into_IN the_DT ground_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ
done_VBN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT living_NN from_IN staying_VBG behind_IN with_IN the_DT
soul_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._. When_WRB the_DT Karo-Bataks_NNP have_VBP buried_VBN somebody_NN and_CC are_VBP
filling_VBG in_RP the_DT grave_NN ,_, a_DT sorceress_NN runs_VBZ about_IN beating_VBG the_DT air_NN with_IN a_DT
stick_NN ._. This_DT she_PRP does_VBZ in_IN order_NN to_TO drive_VB away_RB the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT
survivors_NNS ,_, for_IN if_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT souls_NNS happened_VBD to_TO slip_VB into_IN the_DT grave_NN
and_CC to_TO be_VB covered_VBN up_RP with_IN earth_NN ,_, its_PRP$ owner_NN would_MD die_VB ._.

In_IN Uea_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT Loyalty_NNP Islands_NNP ,_, the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ seem_VBP to_TO
have_VBP been_VBN credited_VBN with_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN stealing_VBG the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT
living_VBG ._. For_IN when_WRB a_DT man_NN was_VBD sick_JJ the_DT soul-doctor_NN would_MD go_VB with_IN a_DT

the_DT soul_NN in_IN a_DT loud_JJ voice_NN to_TO enter_VB his_PRP$ body_NN ._.

Often_RB the_DT abduction_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN '_POS s_VBZ soul_NN is_VBZ set_VBN down_RP to_TO demons_NNS ._. Thus_RB fits_NNS
and_CC convulsions_NNS are_VBP generally_RB ascribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Chinese_JJ to_TO the_DT agency_NN
of_IN certain_JJ mischievous_JJ spirits_NNS who_WP love_VBP to_TO draw_VB men_NNS '_POS s_PRP souls_NNS out_IN of_IN
their_PRP$ bodies_NNS ._. At_IN Amoy_NNP the_DT spirits_NNS who_WP serve_VBP babies_NNS and_CC children_NNS in_IN

halfway_RB up_IN in_IN the_DT sky_NN ."_. When_WRB an_DT infant_NN is_VBZ writhing_VBG in_IN convulsions_NNS ,_,

gong_VBG in_IN the_DT hope_NN of_IN attracting_VBG the_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT strayed_JJ soul_NN ,_,
which_WDT is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO recognise_VB the_DT familiar_JJ garment_NN and_CC to_TO slip_VB into_IN
it_PRP ._. The_DT garment_NN containing_VBG the_DT soul_NN is_VBZ then_RB placed_VBN on_IN or_CC beside_IN the_DT
child_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT child_NN does_VBZ not_RB die_VB recovery_NN is_VBZ sure_JJ to_TO follow_VB ,_,
sooner_RBR or_CC later_RBR ._. Similarly_RB some_DT Indians_NNPS catch_VBP a_DT man_NN '_'' s_VBZ lost_VBN soul_NN in_IN
his_PRP$ boots_NNS and_CC restore_VB it_PRP to_TO his_PRP$ body_NN by_IN putting_VBG his_PRP$ feet_NNS into_IN them_PRP ._.

In_IN the_DT Moluccas_NNP when_WRB a_DT man_NN is_VBZ unwell_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN that_IN some_DT devil_NN
has_VBZ carried_VBN away_RP his_PRP$ soul_NN to_TO the_DT tree_NN ,_, mountain_NN ,_, or_CC hill_NN where_WRB he_PRP
(_-LRB- the_DT devil_NN )_-RRB- resides_VBZ ._. A_DT sorcerer_NN having_VBG pointed_VBN out_RP the_DT devil_NN '_POS s_PRP

shall_MD fare_VB well_RB and_CC live_VB to_TO grey_JJ hairs_NNS on_IN the_DT earth_NN ."_.

Demons_NNS are_VBP especially_RB feared_VBN by_IN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP just_RB entered_VBN a_DT new_JJ
house_NN ._. Hence_RB at_IN a_DT house-warming_NN among_IN the_DT Alfoors_NNP of_IN Minahassa_NNP in_IN

their_PRP$ souls_NNS to_TO the_DT inmates_NNS ._. He_PRP hangs_VBZ up_RP a_DT bag_NN at_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN
sacrifice_NN and_CC then_RB goes_VBZ through_IN a_DT list_NN of_IN the_DT gods_NNS ._. There_EX are_VBP so_RB
many_JJ of_IN them_PRP that_IN this_DT takes_VBZ him_PRP the_DT whole_JJ night_NN through_IN without_IN

to-morrow_JJ away_RB again_RB ."_. He_PRP then_RB does_VBZ the_DT same_JJ ,_, saying_VBG the_DT same_JJ words_NNS ,_,

the_DT same_JJ Alfoors_NNP one_CD way_NN of_IN recovering_VBG a_DT sick_JJ man_NN '_POS s_VBZ soul_NN is_VBZ to_TO let_VB

Sometimes_RB the_DT lost_VBN soul_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN back_RB in_IN a_DT visible_JJ shape_NN ._. The_DT
Salish_NNP or_CC Flathead_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN Oregon_NNP believe_VBP that_IN a_DT man_NN '_POS s_VBZ soul_NN may_MD

that_IN the_DT lost_JJ soul_NN should_MD be_VB soon_RB found_VBN and_CC restored_VBN to_TO its_PRP$ owner_NN or_CC

which_WDT he_PRP receives_VBZ on_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN matting_NN ._. A_DT fire_NN is_VBZ next_JJ kindled_JJ ,_, by_IN

resumes_VBZ its_PRP$ proper_JJ place_NN ._.

Again_RB ,_, souls_NNS may_MD be_VB extracted_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS or_CC detained_VBN on_IN their_PRP$
wanderings_NNS not_RB only_RB by_IN ghosts_NNS and_CC demons_NNS but_CC also_RB by_IN men_NNS ,_, especially_RB
by_IN sorcerers_NNS ._. In_IN Fiji_NNP ,_, if_IN a_DT criminal_JJ refused_VBD to_TO confess_VB ,_, the_DT chief_NN
sent_VBN for_IN a_DT scarf_NN with_IN which_WDT "_'' to_TO catch_VB away_RB the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT rogue_NN ."_.
At_IN the_DT sight_NN or_CC even_RB at_IN the_DT mention_NN of_IN the_DT scarf_NN the_DT culprit_NN
generally_RB made_VBD a_DT clean_JJ breast_NN ._. For_IN if_IN he_PRP did_VBD not_RB ,_, the_DT scarf_NN would_MD be_VB
waved_VBD over_IN his_PRP$ head_NN till_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN was_VBD caught_VBN in_IN it_PRP ,_, when_WRB it_PRP would_MD be_VB
carefully_RB folded_VBN up_RP and_CC nailed_VBN to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN a_DT chief_NN '_POS s_PRP canoe_NN ;_: and_CC

souls_NNS ;_: for_IN fat_JJ souls_NNS there_RB were_VBD large_JJ loops_NNS ,_, for_IN thin_JJ souls_NNS there_RB
were_VBD small_JJ ones_NNS ._. When_WRB a_DT man_NN was_VBD sick_JJ against_IN whom_WP the_DT sorcerers_NNS had_VBD
a_DT grudge_NN ,_, they_PRP set_VBD up_RP these_DT soul-snares_NNS near_IN his_PRP$ house_NN and_CC watched_VBN
for_IN the_DT flight_NN of_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN ._. If_IN in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT bird_NN or_CC an_DT insect_NN
it_PRP was_VBD caught_VBN in_IN the_DT snare_NN ,_, the_DT man_NN would_MD infallibly_RB die_VB ._. In_IN some_DT
parts_NNS of_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, indeed_RB ,_, wizards_NNS are_VBP continually_RB setting_VBG traps_NNS

does_VBZ not_RB care_VB whose_WP$ soul_NN he_PRP has_VBZ captured_VBN ,_, and_CC will_MD readily_RB restore_VB
it_PRP to_TO its_PRP$ owner_NN ,_, if_IN only_RB he_PRP is_VBZ paid_VBN for_IN doing_VBG so_RB ._. Some_DT sorcerers_NNS

profession_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT exercise_NN of_IN it_PRP they_PRP are_VBP actuated_VBN by_IN no_DT harsh_JJ

or_CC mauling_VBG it_PRP so_RB as_IN to_TO impair_VB the_DT health_NN of_IN its_PRP$ owner_NN when_WRB it_PRP
succeeds_VBZ in_IN escaping_VBG and_CC returning_VBG to_TO him_PRP ._. Miss_NNP Kingsley_NNP knew_VBD a_DT
Kruman_NNP who_WP became_VBD very_RB anxious_JJ about_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN ,_, because_IN for_IN several_JJ
nights_NNS he_PRP had_VBD smelt_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ dreams_NNS the_DT savoury_NN smell_NN of_IN smoked_VBN

them_PRP up_RP in_IN calabashes_NNS ,_, and_CC gave_VBD them_PRP to_TO people_NNS to_TO eat_VB ._. By_IN squeezing_VBG
a_DT captured_VBN soul_NN in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS they_PRP discovered_VBD the_DT place_NN where_WRB
people_NNS had_VBD been_VBN secretly_RB buried_VBN ._.

Nowhere_RB perhaps_RB is_VBZ the_DT art_NN of_IN abducting_NN human_JJ souls_NNS more_RBR carefully_RB
cultivated_JJ or_CC carried_VBN to_TO higher_JJR perfection_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT Malay_NNP
Peninsula_NNP ._. Here_RB the_DT methods_NNS by_IN which_WDT the_DT wizard_NN works_VBZ his_PRP$ will_NN are_VBP
various_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB too_RB are_VBP his_PRP$ motives_NNS ._. Sometimes_RB he_PRP desires_VBZ to_TO destroy_VB
an_DT enemy_NN ,_, sometimes_RB to_TO win_VB the_DT love_NN of_IN a_DT cold_JJ or_CC bashful_JJ beauty_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, to_TO take_VB an_DT instance_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ sort_NN of_IN charm_NN ,_, the_DT following_VBG
are_VBP the_DT directions_NNS given_VBN for_IN securing_VBG the_DT soul_NN of_IN one_CD whom_WP you_PRP wish_VBP
to_TO render_NN distraught_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT moon_NN ,_, just_RB risen_VBN ,_, looks_VBZ red_JJ above_IN the_DT
eastern_JJ horizon_NN ,_, go_VB out_RB ,_, and_CC standing_VBG in_IN the_DT moonlight_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT big_JJ
toe_NN of_IN your_PRP$ right_JJ foot_NN on_IN the_DT big_JJ toe_NN of_IN your_PRP$ left_NN ,_, make_VB a_DT
speaking-trumpet_NN of_IN your_PRP$ right_JJ hand_NN and_CC recite_VB through_IN it_PRP the_DT
following_VBG words_NNS :_:


"_`` OM_NNP ._. I_PRP loose_RB my_PRP$ shaft_NN ,_, I_PRP loose_RB it_PRP and_CC the_DT moon_NN clouds_NNS over_RB ,_,
I_PRP loose_RB it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT sun_NN is_VBZ extinguished_VBN ._.
I_PRP loose_RB it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT stars_NNS burn_VBP dim_JJ ._.
But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB the_DT sun_NN ,_, moon_NN ,_, and_CC stars_NNS that_IN I_PRP shoot_VBP at_IN ,_,
It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT stalk_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN that_DT child_NN of_IN the_DT congregation_NN ,_,
So-and_NN -_: so_RB ._.

Cluck_NNP !_. cluck_NN !_. soul_NN of_IN So-and_NNP -_: so_RB ,_, come_VB and_CC walk_VB with_IN me_PRP ,_,
Come_VB and_CC sit_VB with_IN me_PRP ,_,
Come_VB and_CC sleep_VB and_CC share_VB my_PRP$ pillow_NN ._.
Cluck_NNP !_. cluck_. !_. soul_NN ."_VBG


Repeat_NN this_DT thrice_NN and_CC after_IN every_DT repetition_NN blow_NN through_IN your_PRP$
hollow_JJ fist_NN ._. Or_CC you_PRP may_MD catch_VB the_DT soul_NN in_IN your_PRP$ turban_NN ,_, thus_RB ._. Go_VB out_RB
on_IN the_DT night_NN of_IN the_DT full_JJ moon_NN and_CC the_DT two_CD succeeding_VBG nights_NNS ;_: sit_VB
down_RB on_IN an_DT ant-hill_NN facing_VBG the_DT moon_NN ,_, burn_VBP incense_NN ,_, and_CC recite_VB the_DT
following_VBG incantation_NN :_:


"_`` I_PRP bring_VBP you_PRP a_DT betel_NN leaf_NN to_TO chew_VB ,_,
Dab_NNP the_DT lime_NN on_IN to_TO it_PRP ,_, Prince_NNP Ferocious_NNP ,_,
For_IN Somebody_NN ,_, Prince_NNP Distraction_NNP '_'' s_VBZ daughter_NN ,_, to_TO chew_VB ._.
Somebody_NN at_IN sunrise_NN be_VB distraught_VBN for_IN love_NN of_IN me_PRP
Somebody_NN at_IN sunset_NN be_VB distraught_VBN for_IN love_NN of_IN me_PRP ._.
As_IN you_PRP remember_VBP your_PRP$ parents_NNS ,_, remember_VB me_PRP ;_:
As_IN you_PRP remember_VBP your_PRP$ house_NN and_CC houseladder_NN ,_, remember_VB me_PRP ;_:
When_WRB thunder_NN rumbles_NNS ,_, remember_VB me_PRP ;_:
When_WRB wind_NN whistles_NNS ,_, remember_VB me_PRP ;_:
When_WRB the_DT heavens_NNS rain_NN ,_, remember_VB me_PRP ;_:
When_WRB cocks_NNS crow_NN ,_, remember_VB me_PRP ;_:
When_WRB the_DT dial-bird_NN tells_VBZ its_PRP$ tales_NNS ,_, remember_VB me_PRP ;_:
When_WRB you_PRP look_VBP up_RB at_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, remember_VB me_PRP ;_:
When_WRB you_PRP look_VBP up_RB at_IN the_DT moon_NN ,_, remember_VB me_PRP ,_,
For_IN in_IN that_DT self-same_JJ moon_NN I_PRP am_VBP there_RB ._.
Cluck_NNP !_. cluck_NN !_. soul_NN of_IN Somebody_NN come_VBN hither_RB to_TO me_PRP ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB mean_VB to_TO let_VB you_PRP have_VB my_PRP$ soul_NN ,_,
Let_VB your_PRP$ soul_NN come_VB hither_RB to_TO mine_PRP ."_.


Now_RB wave_VB the_DT end_NN of_IN your_PRP$ turban_NN towards_IN the_DT moon_NN seven_CD times_NNS each_DT
night_NN ._. Go_VB home_NN and_CC put_VBD it_PRP under_IN your_PRP$ pillow_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN you_PRP want_VBP to_TO wear_VB
it_PRP in_IN the_DT daytime_NN ,_, burn_VBP incense_NN and_CC say_VB ,_, "_`` It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB a_DT turban_NN that_IN I_PRP
carry_VB in_IN my_PRP$ girdle_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT soul_NN of_IN Somebody_NN ."_.

The_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN the_DT Nass_NNP River_NNP ,_, in_IN British_NNP Columbia_NNP ,_, are_VBP impressed_VBN
with_IN a_DT belief_NN that_IN a_DT physician_NN may_MD swallow_VB his_PRP$ patient_NN '_'' s_VBZ soul_NN by_IN
mistake_NN ._. A_DT doctor_NN who_WP is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO have_VB done_VBN so_RB is_VBZ made_VBN by_IN the_DT
other_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT faculty_NN to_TO stand_VB over_IN the_DT patient_NN ,_, while_IN one_CD of_IN
them_PRP thrusts_VBD his_PRP$ fingers_NNS down_IN the_DT doctor_NN '_POS s_VBZ throat_NN ,_, another_DT kneads_NNS
him_PRP in_IN the_DT stomach_NN with_IN his_PRP$ knuckles_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT third_JJ slaps_NNS him_PRP on_IN the_DT
back_RB ._. If_IN the_DT soul_NN is_VBZ not_RB in_IN him_PRP after_IN all_DT ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT same_JJ process_NN
has_VBZ been_VBN repeated_VBN upon_IN all_PDT the_DT medical_JJ men_NNS without_IN success_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ
concluded_VBD that_IN the_DT soul_NN must_MD be_VB in_IN the_DT head-doctor_NN '_'' s_PRP box_NN ._. A_DT party_NN of_IN
doctors_NNS ,_, therefore_RB ,_, waits_VBZ upon_IN him_PRP at_IN his_PRP$ house_NN and_CC requests_NNS him_PRP to_TO
produce_VB his_PRP$ box_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP has_VBZ done_VBN so_RB and_CC arranged_VBD its_PRP$ contents_NNS on_IN a_DT
new_JJ mat_NN ,_, they_PRP take_VBP the_DT votary_NN of_IN Aesculapius_NNP and_CC hold_VB him_PRP up_RP by_IN the_DT
heels_NNS with_IN his_PRP$ head_NN in_IN a_DT hole_NN in_IN the_DT floor_NN ._. In_IN this_DT position_NN they_PRP
wash_VB his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, and_CC "_`` any_DT water_NN remaining_VBG from_IN the_DT ablution_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN
and_CC poured_VBD upon_IN the_DT sick_JJ man_NN '_'' s_PRP head_NN ."_CC No_DT doubt_NN the_DT lost_VBN soul_NN is_VBZ in_IN
the_DT water_NN ._.



3._DT The_DT Soul_NNP as_IN a_DT Shadow_NNP and_CC a_DT Reflection_NN

BUT_NNP the_DT spiritual_JJ dangers_NNS I_PRP have_VBP enumerated_VBN are_VBP not_RB the_DT only_JJ ones_NNS
which_WDT beset_JJ the_DT savage_JJ ._. Often_RB he_PRP regards_VBZ his_PRP$ shadow_NN or_CC reflection_NN as_IN
his_PRP$ soul_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN all_DT events_NNS as_IN a_DT vital_JJ part_NN of_IN himself_PRP ,_, and_CC as_IN such_JJ
it_PRP is_VBZ necessarily_RB a_DT source_NN of_IN danger_NN to_TO him_PRP ._. For_IN if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ trampled_VBN
upon_IN ,_, struck_VBD ,_, or_CC stabbed_VBD ,_, he_PRP will_MD feel_VB the_DT injury_NN as_IN if_IN it_PRP were_VBD done_VBN
to_TO his_PRP$ person_NN ;_: and_CC if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ detached_VBN from_IN him_PRP entirely_RB (_-LRB- as_IN he_PRP
believes_VBZ that_IN it_PRP may_MD be_VB )_-RRB- he_PRP will_MD die_VB ._. In_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Wetar_NNP there_EX
are_VBP magicians_NNS who_WP can_MD make_VB a_DT man_NN ill_RB by_IN stabbing_VBG his_PRP$ shadow_NN with_IN a_DT
pike_NN or_CC hacking_VBG it_PRP with_IN a_DT sword_NN ._. After_IN Sankara_NNP had_VBD destroyed_VBN the_DT
Buddhists_NNS in_IN India_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN he_PRP journeyed_VBD to_TO Nepaul_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP
had_VBD some_DT difference_NN of_IN opinion_NN with_IN the_DT Grand_NNP Lama_NNP ._. To_TO prove_VB his_PRP$
supernatural_JJ powers_NNS ,_, he_PRP soared_VBD into_IN the_DT air_NN ._. But_CC as_IN he_PRP mounted_VBD up_IN
the_DT Grand_NNP Lama_NNP ,_, perceiving_VBG his_PRP$ shadow_NN swaying_VBG and_CC wavering_VBG on_IN the_DT
ground_NN ,_, struck_VBD his_PRP$ knife_NN into_IN it_PRP and_CC down_RB fell_VBD Sankara_NNP and_CC broke_VBD his_PRP$
neck_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT Banks_NNPS Islands_NNPS there_EX are_VBP some_DT stones_NNS of_IN a_DT remarkably_RB long_JJ
shape_NN which_WDT go_VBP by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN "_`` eating_VBG ghosts_NNS ,"_RB because_IN certain_JJ
powerful_JJ and_CC dangerous_JJ ghosts_NNS are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO lodge_VB in_IN them_PRP ._. If_IN a_DT
man_NN '_POS s_VBZ shadow_NN falls_VBZ on_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT stones_NNS ,_, the_DT ghost_NN will_MD draw_VB his_PRP$
soul_NN out_RB from_IN him_PRP ,_, so_RB that_IN he_PRP will_MD die_VB ._. Such_JJ stones_NNS ,_, therefore_RB ,_, are_VBP
set_VBN in_IN a_DT house_NN to_TO guard_VB it_PRP ;_: and_CC a_DT messenger_NN sent_VBD to_TO a_DT house_NN by_IN the_DT
absent_JJ owner_NN will_MD call_VB out_RP the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT sender_NN ,_, lest_IN the_DT watchful_NN
ghost_NN in_IN the_DT stone_NN should_MD fancy_VB that_IN he_PRP came_VBD with_IN evil_JJ intent_NN and_CC
should_MD do_VB him_PRP a_DT mischief_NN ._. At_IN a_DT funeral_NN in_IN China_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT lid_NN is_VBZ
about_IN to_TO be_VB placed_VBN on_IN the_DT coffin_NN ,_, most_JJS of_IN the_DT bystanders_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT
exception_NN of_IN the_DT nearest_JJS kin_NN ,_, retire_VB a_DT few_JJ steps_NNS or_CC even_RB retreat_VB to_TO
another_DT room_NN ,_, for_IN a_DT person_NN '_POS s_VBZ health_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO be_VB endangered_VBN by_IN
allowing_VBG his_PRP$ shadow_NN to_TO be_VB enclosed_VBN in_IN a_DT coffin_NN ._. And_CC when_WRB the_DT coffin_NN
is_VBZ about_IN to_TO be_VB lowered_VBN into_IN the_DT grave_JJ most_JJS of_IN the_DT spectators_NNS recoil_NN
to_TO a_DT little_JJ distance_NN lest_IN their_PRP$ shadows_NNS should_MD fall_VB into_IN the_DT grave_NN
and_CC harm_NN should_MD thus_RB be_VB done_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ persons_NNS ._. The_DT geomancer_NN and_CC his_PRP$
assistants_NNS stand_VBP on_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT grave_NN which_WDT is_VBZ turned_VBN away_RB from_IN
the_DT sun_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT grave-diggers_NNS and_CC coffin-bearers_NNS attach_VBP their_PRP$
shadows_NNS firmly_RB to_TO their_PRP$ persons_NNS by_IN tying_VBG a_DT strip_NN of_IN cloth_NN tightly_RB
round_VBP their_PRP$ waists_NNS ._. Nor_CC is_VBZ it_PRP human_JJ beings_NNS alone_RB who_WP are_VBP thus_RB liable_JJ
to_TO be_VB injured_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ shadows_NNS ._. Animals_NNS are_VBP to_TO some_DT extent_NN
in_IN the_DT same_JJ predicament_NN ._. A_DT small_JJ snail_NN ,_, which_WDT frequents_VBZ the_DT
neighbourhood_NN of_IN the_DT limestone_NN hills_NNS in_IN Perak_NNP ,_, is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO suck_VB
the_DT blood_NN of_IN cattle_NNS through_IN their_PRP$ shadows_NNS ;_: hence_RB the_DT beasts_NNS grow_VBP
lean_JJ and_CC sometimes_RB die_VBP from_IN loss_NN of_IN blood_NN ._. The_DT ancients_NNS supposed_VBN
that_IN in_IN Arabia_NNP ,_, if_IN a_DT hyaena_NN trod_NN on_IN a_DT man_NN '_POS s_VBZ shadow_NN ,_, it_PRP deprived_VBD him_PRP
of_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN speech_NN and_CC motion_NN ;_: and_CC that_IN if_IN a_DT dog_NN ,_, standing_VBG on_IN a_DT
roof_NN in_IN the_DT moonlight_NN ,_, cast_VBD a_DT shadow_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN and_CC a_DT hyaena_NN trod_NN
on_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT dog_NN would_MD fall_VB down_RB as_IN if_IN dragged_VBN with_IN a_DT rope_NN ._. Clearly_RB in_IN
these_DT cases_NNS the_DT shadow_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB equivalent_JJ to_TO the_DT soul_NN ,_, is_VBZ at_IN least_JJS
regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT living_VBG part_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN or_CC the_DT animal_NN ,_, so_RB that_IN injury_NN
done_VBN to_TO the_DT shadow_NN is_VBZ felt_VBN by_IN the_DT person_NN or_CC animal_NN as_IN if_IN it_PRP were_VBD
done_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ body_NN ._.

Conversely_RB ,_, if_IN the_DT shadow_NN is_VBZ a_DT vital_JJ part_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN or_CC an_DT animal_NN ,_, it_PRP
may_MD under_IN certain_JJ circumstances_NNS be_VB as_RB hazardous_JJ to_TO be_VB touched_VBN by_IN it_PRP
as_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB to_TO come_VB into_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT person_NN or_CC animal_NN ._. Hence_RB
the_DT savage_JJ makes_VBZ it_PRP a_DT rule_NN to_TO shun_VB the_DT shadow_NN of_IN certain_JJ persons_NNS
whom_WP for_IN various_JJ reasons_NNS he_PRP regards_VBZ as_IN sources_NNS of_IN dangerous_JJ
influence_NN ._. Amongst_IN the_DT dangerous_JJ classes_NNS he_PRP commonly_RB ranks_VBZ mourners_NNS
and_CC women_NNS in_IN general_JJ ,_, but_CC especially_RB his_PRP$ mother-in_NN -_: law_NN ._. The_DT Shuswap_NN
Indians_NNPS think_VBP that_IN the_DT shadow_NN of_IN a_DT mourner_NN falling_VBG upon_IN a_DT person_NN
would_MD make_VB him_PRP sick_JJ ._. Amongst_IN the_DT Kurnai_NNP of_IN Victoria_NNP novices_NNS at_IN
initiation_NN were_VBD cautioned_VBD not_RB to_TO let_VB a_DT woman_NN '_'' s_PRP shadow_NN fall_VB across_IN
them_PRP ,_, as_IN this_DT would_MD make_VB them_PRP thin_JJ ,_, lazy_JJ ,_, and_CC stupid_JJ ._. An_DT Australian_JJ
native_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO have_VB once_RB nearly_RB died_VBD of_IN fright_NN because_IN the_DT shadow_NN
of_IN his_PRP$ mother-in_NN -_: law_NN fell_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ legs_NNS as_IN he_PRP lay_VBD asleep_RB under_IN a_DT tree_NN ._.
The_DT awe_NN and_CC dread_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT untutored_JJ savage_JJ contemplates_NNPS his_PRP$
mother-in_NN -_: law_NN are_VBP amongst_IN the_DT most_RBS familiar_JJ facts_NNS of_IN anthropology_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Yuin_NNP tribes_NNS of_IN New_NNP South_NNP Wales_NNP the_DT rule_NN which_WDT forbade_VBD a_DT man_NN
to_TO hold_VB any_DT communication_NN with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN '_'' s_VBZ mother_NN was_VBD very_RB strict_JJ ._. He_PRP
might_MD not_RB look_VB at_IN her_PRP or_CC even_RB in_IN her_PRP$ direction_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD a_DT ground_NN of_IN
divorce_NN if_IN his_PRP$ shadow_NN happened_VBD to_TO fall_VB on_IN his_PRP$ mother-in_NN -_: law_NN :_: in_IN that_WDT
case_NN he_PRP had_VBD to_TO leave_VB his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP returned_VBD to_TO her_PRP$ parents_NNS ._. In_IN
New_NNP Britain_NNP the_DT native_JJ imagination_NN fails_VBZ to_TO conceive_VB the_DT extent_NN and_CC
nature_NN of_IN the_DT calamities_NNS which_WDT would_MD result_VB from_IN a_DT man_NN '_POS s_PRP
accidentally_RB speaking_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ wife_NN '_'' s_VBZ mother_NN ;_: suicide_NN of_IN one_CD or_CC both_DT
would_MD probably_RB be_VB the_DT only_JJ course_NN open_JJ to_TO them_PRP ._. The_DT most_RBS solemn_JJ form_NN
of_IN oath_NN a_DT New_NNP Briton_NNP can_MD take_VB is_VBZ ,_, "_`` Sir_NNP ,_, if_IN I_PRP am_VBP not_RB telling_VBG the_DT
truth_NN ,_, I_PRP hope_VBP I_PRP may_MD shake_VB hands_NNS with_IN my_PRP$ mother-in_NN -_: law_NN ."_NN

Where_WRB the_DT shadow_NN is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN so_RB intimately_RB bound_VBN up_RP with_IN the_DT life_NN
of_IN the_DT man_NN that_IN its_PRP$ loss_NN entails_VBZ debility_NN or_CC death_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ natural_JJ to_TO
expect_VB that_IN its_PRP$ diminution_NN should_MD be_VB regarded_VBN with_IN solicitude_NN and_CC
apprehension_NN ,_, as_IN betokening_VBG a_DT corresponding_JJ decrease_NN in_IN the_DT vital_JJ
energy_NN of_IN its_PRP$ owner_NN ._. In_IN Amboyna_NNP and_CC Uliase_NNP ,_, two_CD islands_NNS near_IN the_DT
equator_NN ,_, where_WRB necessarily_RB there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ or_CC no_DT shadow_NN cast_VBD at_IN
noon_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS make_VBP it_PRP a_DT rule_NN not_RB to_TO go_VB out_IN of_IN the_DT house_NN at_IN
mid-day_NN ,_, because_IN they_PRP fancy_JJ that_IN by_IN doing_VBG so_RB a_DT man_NN may_MD lose_VB the_DT
shadow_NN of_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN ._. The_DT Mangaians_NNPS tell_VBP of_IN a_DT mighty_JJ warrior_NN ,_,
Tukaitawa_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ strength_NN waxed_VBD and_CC waned_VBD with_IN the_DT length_NN of_IN his_PRP$
shadow_NN ._. In_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_, when_WRB his_PRP$ shadow_NN fell_VBD longest_JJS ,_, his_PRP$ strength_NN
was_VBD greatest_JJS ;_: but_CC as_IN the_DT shadow_NN shortened_VBD towards_IN noon_NN his_PRP$ strength_NN
ebbed_VBN with_IN it_PRP ,_, till_IN exactly_RB at_IN noon_NN it_PRP reached_VBD its_PRP$ lowest_JJS point_NN ;_:
then_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT shadow_NN stretched_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT afternoon_NN ,_, his_PRP$ strength_NN
returned_VBN ._. A_DT certain_JJ hero_NN discovered_VBD the_DT secret_NN of_IN Tukaitawa_NNP '_POS s_PRP
strength_NN and_CC slew_NN him_PRP at_IN noon_NN ._. The_DT savage_JJ Besisis_IN of_IN the_DT Malay_NNP
Peninsula_NNP fear_NN to_TO bury_VB their_PRP$ dead_NN at_IN noon_NN ,_, because_IN they_PRP fancy_JJ that_IN
the_DT shortness_NN of_IN their_PRP$ shadows_NNS at_IN that_DT hour_NN would_MD sympathetically_RB
shorten_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ lives_NNS ._.

Nowhere_RB ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, does_VBZ the_DT equivalence_NN of_IN the_DT shadow_NN to_TO the_DT life_NN or_CC
soul_NN come_VB out_RP more_RBR clearly_RB than_IN in_IN some_DT customs_NNS practised_VBD to_TO this_DT
day_NN in_IN South-eastern_NNP Europe_NNP ._. In_IN modern_JJ Greece_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT foundation_NN
of_IN a_DT new_JJ building_NN is_VBZ being_VBG laid_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT custom_NN to_TO kill_VB a_DT cock_NN ,_, a_DT
ram_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT lamb_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO let_VB its_PRP$ blood_NN flow_NN on_IN the_DT foundation-stone_NN ,_,
under_IN which_WDT the_DT animal_NN is_VBZ afterwards_RB buried_VBN ._. The_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT
sacrifice_NN is_VBZ to_TO give_VB strength_NN and_CC stability_NN to_TO the_DT building_NN ._. But_CC
sometimes_RB ,_, instead_RB of_IN killing_VBG an_DT animal_NN ,_, the_DT builder_NN entices_NNS a_DT man_NN
to_TO the_DT foundation-stone_NN ,_, secretly_RB measures_VBZ his_PRP$ body_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT part_NN of_IN
it_PRP ,_, or_CC his_PRP$ shadow_NN ,_, and_CC buries_NNS the_DT measure_NN under_IN the_DT
foundation-stone_NN ;_: or_CC he_PRP lays_VBZ the_DT foundation-stone_NN upon_IN the_DT man_NN '_POS s_PRP
shadow_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN the_DT man_NN will_MD die_VB within_IN the_DT year_NN ._. The_DT
Roumanians_NNS of_IN Transylvania_NNP think_VBP that_IN he_PRP whose_WP$ shadow_NN is_VBZ thus_RB
immured_JJ will_MD die_VB within_IN forty_CD days_NNS ;_: so_RB persons_NNS passing_VBG by_IN a_DT building_NN
which_WDT is_VBZ in_IN course_NN of_IN erection_NN may_MD hear_VB a_DT warning_NN cry_NN ,_, "_`` Beware_VB lest_IN
they_PRP take_VBP thy_JJ shadow_NN !"_VB Not_RB long_RB ago_RB there_EX were_VBD still_RB shadow-traders_NNS
whose_WP$ business_NN it_PRP was_VBD to_TO provide_VB architects_NNS with_IN the_DT shadows_NNS
necessary_JJ for_IN securing_VBG their_PRP$ walls_NNS ._. In_IN these_DT cases_NNS the_DT measure_NN of_IN
the_DT shadow_NN is_VBZ looked_VBN on_IN as_IN equivalent_JJ to_TO the_DT shadow_NN itself_PRP ,_, and_CC to_TO
bury_VB it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO bury_VB the_DT life_NN or_CC soul_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, deprived_VBN of_IN it_PRP ,_,
must_MD die_VB ._. Thus_RB the_DT custom_NN is_VBZ a_DT substitute_NN for_IN the_DT old_JJ practice_NN of_IN
immuring_VBG a_DT living_VBG person_NN in_IN the_DT walls_NNS ,_, or_CC crushing_VBG him_PRP under_IN the_DT
foundation-stone_NN of_IN a_DT new_JJ building_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO give_VB strength_NN and_CC
durability_NN to_TO the_DT structure_NN ,_, or_CC more_JJR definitely_RB in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT
angry_JJ ghost_NN may_MD haunt_VB the_DT place_NN and_CC guard_NN it_PRP against_IN the_DT intrusion_NN
of_IN enemies_NNS ._.

As_IN some_DT peoples_NNS believe_VBP a_DT man_NN '_'' s_PRP soul_NN to_TO be_VB in_IN his_PRP$ shadow_NN ,_, so_RB other_JJ
(_-LRB- or_CC the_DT same_JJ )_-RRB- peoples_NNS believe_VBP it_PRP to_TO be_VB in_IN his_PRP$ reflection_NN in_IN water_NN or_CC
a_DT mirror_NN ._. Thus_RB "_'' the_DT Andamanese_NNP do_VBP not_RB regard_VB their_PRP$ shadows_NNS but_CC their_PRP$
reflections_NNS (_-LRB- in_IN any_DT mirror_NN )_-RRB- as_IN their_PRP$ souls_NNS ."_VBP When_WRB the_DT Motumotu_NNP of_IN
New_NNP Guinea_NNP first_RB saw_VBD their_PRP$ likenesses_NNS in_IN a_DT looking-glass_NN ,_, they_PRP
thought_VBD that_IN their_PRP$ reflections_NNS were_VBD their_PRP$ souls_NNS ._. In_IN New_NNP Caledonia_NNP
the_DT old_JJ men_NNS are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN a_DT person_NN '_POS s_VBZ reflection_NN in_IN water_NN or_CC a_DT
mirror_NN is_VBZ his_PRP$ soul_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT younger_JJR men_NNS ,_, taught_VBN by_IN the_DT Catholic_NNP
priests_NNS ,_, maintain_VBP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT reflection_NN and_CC nothing_NN more_RBR ,_, just_RB
like_IN the_DT reflection_NN of_IN palm-trees_NNS in_IN the_DT water_NN ._. The_DT reflection-soul_NN ,_,
being_VBG external_JJ to_TO the_DT man_NN ,_, is_VBZ exposed_VBN to_TO much_RB the_DT same_JJ dangers_NNS as_IN
the_DT shadow-soul_NN ._. The_DT Zulus_NNP will_MD not_RB look_VB into_IN a_DT dark_JJ pool_NN because_IN
they_PRP think_VBP there_EX is_VBZ a_DT beast_NN in_IN it_PRP which_WDT will_MD take_VB away_RP their_PRP$
reflections_NNS ,_, so_RB that_IN they_PRP die_VBP ._. The_DT Basutos_NNS say_VBP that_IN crocodiles_NNS have_VBP
the_DT power_NN of_IN thus_RB killing_VBG a_DT man_NN by_IN dragging_VBG his_PRP$ reflection_NN under_IN
water_NN ._. When_WRB one_CD of_IN them_PRP dies_VBZ suddenly_RB and_CC from_IN no_DT apparent_JJ cause_NN ,_,
his_PRP$ relatives_NNS will_MD allege_VB that_IN a_DT crocodile_NN must_MD have_VB taken_VBN his_PRP$
shadow_NN some_DT time_NN when_WRB he_PRP crossed_VBD a_DT stream_NN ._. In_IN Saddle_NNP Island_NNP ,_,
Melanesia_NNP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT pool_NN "_'' into_IN which_WDT if_IN any_DT one_CD looks_VBZ he_PRP dies_VBZ ;_: the_DT
malignant_JJ spirit_NN takes_VBZ hold_NN upon_IN his_PRP$ life_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ reflection_NN
on_IN the_DT water_NN ."_.

We_PRP can_MD now_RB understand_VB why_WRB it_PRP was_VBD a_DT maxim_NN both_DT in_IN ancient_JJ India_NNP and_CC
ancient_JJ Greece_NNP not_RB to_TO look_VB at_IN one_CD '_POS s_PRP reflection_NN in_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC why_WRB the_DT
Greeks_NNP regarded_VBD it_PRP as_IN an_DT omen_NN of_IN death_NN if_IN a_DT man_NN dreamed_VBD of_IN seeing_VBG
himself_PRP so_RB reflected_VBD ._. They_PRP feared_VBD that_IN the_DT water-spirits_NNS would_MD drag_VB
the_DT person_NN '_POS s_VBZ reflection_NN or_CC soul_NN under_IN water_NN ,_, leaving_VBG him_PRP soulless_JJ to_TO
perish_JJ ._. This_DT was_VBD probably_RB the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT classical_JJ story_NN of_IN the_DT
beautiful_JJ Narcissus_NNP ,_, who_WP languished_VBD and_CC died_VBD through_IN seeing_VBG his_PRP$
reflection_NN in_IN the_DT water_NN ._.

Further_RB ,_, we_PRP can_MD now_RB explain_VB the_DT widespread_JJ custom_NN of_IN covering_VBG up_RB
mirrors_NNS or_CC turning_VBG them_PRP to_TO the_DT wall_NN after_IN a_DT death_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN place_NN in_IN
the_DT house_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ feared_VBN that_IN the_DT soul_NN ,_, projected_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT person_NN
in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN his_PRP$ reflection_NN in_IN the_DT mirror_NN ,_, may_MD be_VB carried_VBN off_RP by_IN
the_DT ghost_NN of_IN the_DT departed_VBN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ commonly_RB supposed_VBN to_TO linger_VB
about_IN the_DT house_NN till_IN the_DT burial_NN ._. The_DT custom_NN is_VBZ thus_RB exactly_RB parallel_VB
to_TO the_DT Aru_NNP custom_NN of_IN not_RB sleeping_VBG in_IN a_DT house_NN after_IN a_DT death_NN for_IN fear_NN
that_IN the_DT soul_NN ,_, projected_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT body_NN in_IN a_DT dream_NN ,_, may_MD meet_VB the_DT
ghost_NN and_CC be_VB carried_VBN off_RP by_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT reason_NN why_WRB sick_JJ people_NNS should_MD
not_RB see_VB themselves_PRP in_IN a_DT mirror_NN ,_, and_CC why_WRB the_DT mirror_NN in_IN a_DT sick-room_NN is_VBZ
therefore_RB covered_VBD up_RP ,_, is_VBZ also_RB plain_JJ ;_: in_IN time_NN of_IN sickness_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT
soul_NN might_MD take_VB flight_NN so_RB easily_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ particularly_RB dangerous_JJ to_TO
project_NN it_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT body_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT reflection_NN in_IN a_DT mirror_NN ._.
The_DT rule_NN is_VBZ therefore_RB precisely_RB parallel_JJ to_TO the_DT rule_NN observed_VBN by_IN
some_DT peoples_NNS of_IN not_RB allowing_VBG sick_JJ people_NNS to_TO sleep_VB ;_: for_IN in_IN sleep_NN the_DT
soul_NN is_VBZ projected_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ always_RB a_DT risk_NN that_WDT
it_PRP may_MD not_RB return_VB ._.

As_IN with_IN shadows_NNS and_CC reflections_NNS ,_, so_RB with_IN portraits_NNS ;_: they_PRP are_VBP often_RB
believed_VBN to_TO contain_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN portrayed_VBN ._. People_NNS who_WP
hold_VB this_DT belief_NN are_VBP naturally_RB loth_JJ to_TO have_VB their_PRP$ likenesses_NNS taken_VBN ;_:

exercise_NN a_DT fatal_JJ influence_NN over_IN the_DT original_JJ of_IN it_PRP ._. Thus_RB the_DT
Esquimaux_NNP of_IN Bering_NNP Strait_NNP believe_VBP that_IN persons_NNS dealing_VBG in_IN
witchcraft_NN have_VBP the_DT power_NN of_IN stealing_VBG a_DT person_NN '_POS s_PRP shade_NN ,_, so_RB that_IN
without_IN it_PRP he_PRP will_MD pine_NN away_RB and_CC die_VBP ._. Once_RB at_IN a_DT village_NN on_IN the_DT lower_RBR
Yukon_NNP River_NNP an_DT explorer_NN had_VBD set_VBN up_RP his_PRP$ camera_NN to_TO get_VB a_DT picture_NN of_IN

voice_NN to_TO the_DT people_NNS ,_, "_`` He_PRP has_VBZ all_DT of_IN your_PRP$ shades_NNS in_IN this_DT box_NN ."_NN A_DT
panic_NN ensued_VBD among_IN the_DT group_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN an_DT instant_NN they_PRP disappeared_VBD

would_MD befall_VB them_PRP ._. When_NNP Dr_NNP ._. Catat_NNP and_CC some_DT companions_NNS were_VBD exploring_VBG

Some_DT villagers_NNS in_IN Sikhim_NNP betrayed_VBD a_DT lively_JJ horror_NN and_CC hid_VBN away_RB

called_VBN it_PRP ,_, was_VBD turned_VBN on_IN them_PRP ._. They_PRP thought_VBD it_PRP took_VBD away_RP their_PRP$ souls_NNS
with_IN their_PRP$ pictures_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB put_VBD it_PRP in_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT

of_IN the_DT scenery_NN blighted_VBD the_DT landscape_NN ._. Until_IN the_DT reign_NN of_IN the_DT late_JJ

Beliefs_NNP of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN still_RB linger_VBZ in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ._.

XIX_NNP ._. Tabooed_NNP Acts_NNPS



1._DT Taboos_NNP on_IN Intercourse_NNP with_IN Strangers_NNS

SO_JJ much_JJ for_IN the_DT primitive_JJ conceptions_NNS of_IN the_DT soul_NN and_CC the_DT dangers_NNS to_TO
which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ exposed_VBN ._. These_DT conceptions_NNS are_VBP not_RB limited_VBN to_TO one_CD people_NNS
or_CC country_NN ;_: with_IN variations_NNS of_IN detail_NN they_PRP are_VBP found_VBN all_DT over_IN the_DT
world_NN ,_, and_CC survive_VBP ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, in_IN modern_JJ Europe_NNP ._. Beliefs_NNPS so_RB
deep-seated_JJ and_CC so_RB widespread_JJ must_MD necessarily_RB have_VB contributed_VBN to_TO
shape_NN the_DT mould_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT early_JJ kingship_NN was_VBD cast_VBN ._. For_IN if_IN every_DT
person_NN was_VBD at_IN such_JJ pains_NNS to_TO save_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ soul_NN from_IN the_DT perils_NNS which_WDT
threatened_VBD it_PRP on_RP so_IN many_JJ sides_NNS ,_, how_WRB much_RB more_JJR carefully_RB must_MD he_PRP
have_VBP been_VBN guarded_VBN upon_IN whose_WP$ life_NN hung_VBD the_DT welfare_NN and_CC even_RB the_DT
existence_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ people_NNS ,_, and_CC whom_WP therefore_RB it_PRP was_VBD the_DT common_JJ
interest_NN of_IN all_DT to_TO preserve_VB ?_. Therefore_CC we_PRP should_MD expect_VB to_TO find_VB the_DT
king_NN '_POS s_PRP life_NN protected_VBN by_IN a_DT system_NN of_IN precautions_NNS or_CC safeguards_NNS still_RB
more_RBR numerous_JJ and_CC minute_JJ than_IN those_DT which_WDT in_IN primitive_JJ society_NN every_DT
man_NN adopts_VBZ for_IN the_DT safety_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ soul_NN ._. Now_RB in_IN point_NN of_IN fact_NN the_DT
life_NN of_IN the_DT early_JJ kings_NNS is_VBZ regulated_VBN ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN and_CC shall_MD see_VB
more_RBR fully_RB presently_RB ,_, by_IN a_DT very_JJ exact_JJ code_NN of_IN rules_NNS ._. May_NNP we_PRP not_RB then_RB
conjecture_NN that_IN these_DT rules_NNS are_VBP in_IN fact_NN the_DT very_JJ safeguards_NNS which_WDT we_PRP
should_MD expect_VB to_TO find_VB adopted_VBN for_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN '_'' s_PRP life_NN ?_.
An_DT examination_NN of_IN the_DT rules_NNS themselves_PRP confirms_VBZ this_DT conjecture_NN ._. For_IN
from_IN this_DT it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT rules_NNS observed_VBN by_IN the_DT kings_NNS
are_VBP identical_JJ with_IN those_DT observed_VBN by_IN private_JJ persons_NNS out_IN of_IN regard_NN
for_IN the_DT safety_NN of_IN their_PRP$ souls_NNS ;_: and_CC even_RB of_IN those_DT which_WDT seem_VBP peculiar_JJ
to_TO the_DT king_NN ,_, many_JJ ,_, if_IN not_RB all_DT ,_, are_VBP most_RBS readily_RB explained_VBN on_IN the_DT
hypothesis_NN that_IN they_PRP are_VBP nothing_NN but_CC safeguards_NNS or_CC lifeguards_NNS of_IN the_DT
king_NN ._. I_PRP will_MD now_RB enumerate_VB some_DT of_IN these_DT royal_JJ rules_NNS or_CC taboos_NNS ,_,
offering_VBG on_IN each_DT of_IN them_PRP such_JJ comments_NNS and_CC explanations_NNS as_RB may_MD serve_VB
to_TO set_VB the_DT original_JJ intention_NN of_IN the_DT rule_NN in_IN its_PRP$ proper_JJ light_NN ._.

As_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT royal_JJ taboos_NN is_VBZ to_TO isolate_VB the_DT king_NN from_IN all_PDT
sources_NNS of_IN danger_NN ,_, their_PRP$ general_JJ effect_NN is_VBZ to_TO compel_VB him_PRP to_TO live_VB in_IN
a_DT state_NN of_IN seclusion_NN ,_, more_RBR or_CC less_RBR complete_JJ ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT number_NN
and_CC stringency_NN of_IN the_DT rules_NNS he_PRP observes_VBZ ._. Now_RB of_IN all_DT sources_NNS of_IN
danger_NN none_NN are_VBP more_RBR dreaded_VBN by_IN the_DT savage_JJ than_IN magic_JJ and_CC
witchcraft_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP suspects_VBZ all_DT strangers_NNS of_IN practising_VBG these_DT black_JJ
arts_NNS ._. To_TO guard_VB against_IN the_DT baneful_JJ influence_NN exerted_VBN voluntarily_RB or_CC
involuntarily_RB by_IN strangers_NNS is_VBZ therefore_RB an_DT elementary_JJ dictate_NN of_IN
savage_JJ prudence_NN ._. Hence_RB before_IN strangers_NNS are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO enter_VB a_DT
district_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS before_IN they_PRP are_VBP permitted_VBN to_TO mingle_VB freely_RB
with_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS ,_, certain_JJ ceremonies_NNS are_VBP often_RB performed_VBN by_IN the_DT
natives_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN disarming_VBG the_DT strangers_NNS of_IN
their_PRP$ magical_JJ powers_NNS ,_, of_IN counteracting_VBG the_DT baneful_JJ influence_NN which_WDT
is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO emanate_VB from_IN them_PRP ,_, or_CC of_IN disinfecting_VBG ,_, so_RB to_TO speak_VB ,_,
the_DT tainted_JJ atmosphere_NN by_IN which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB surrounded_VBN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT ambassadors_NNS sent_VBN by_IN Justin_NNP II_NNP .,_, Emperor_NNP of_IN the_DT East_NNP ,_,
to_TO conclude_VB a_DT peace_NN with_IN the_DT Turks_NNPS had_VBD reached_VBN their_PRP$ destination_NN ,_,
they_PRP were_VBD received_VBN by_IN shamans_NNS ,_, who_WP subjected_VBN them_PRP to_TO a_DT ceremonial_NN

Having_VBG deposited_VBN the_DT goods_NNS brought_VBN by_IN the_DT ambassadors_NNS in_IN an_DT open_JJ
place_NN ,_, these_DT wizards_NNS carried_VBD burning_VBG branches_NNS of_IN incense_JJ round_JJ them_PRP ,_,
while_IN they_PRP rang_VBD a_DT bell_NN and_CC beat_NN on_IN a_DT tambourine_NN ,_, snorting_VBG and_CC
falling_VBG into_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN frenzy_NN in_IN their_PRP$ efforts_NNS to_TO dispel_VB the_DT powers_NNS
of_IN evil_JJ ._. Afterwards_IN they_PRP purified_VBD the_DT ambassadors_NNS themselves_PRP by_IN
leading_VBG them_PRP through_IN the_DT flames_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Nanumea_NNP (_-LRB- South_NN
Pacific_NNP )_-RRB- strangers_NNS from_IN ships_NNS or_CC from_IN other_JJ islands_NNS were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN
to_TO communicate_VB with_IN the_DT people_NNS until_IN they_PRP all_DT ,_, or_CC a_DT few_JJ as_IN
representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT rest_NN ,_, had_VBD been_VBN taken_VBN to_TO each_DT of_IN the_DT four_CD
temples_NNS in_IN the_DT island_NN ,_, and_CC prayers_NNS offered_VBD that_IN the_DT god_NN would_MD avert_VB
any_DT disease_NN or_CC treachery_NN which_WDT these_DT strangers_NNS might_MD have_VB brought_VBN
with_IN them_PRP ._. Meat_NNP offerings_NNS were_VBD also_RB laid_VBN upon_IN the_DT altars_NNS ,_,
accompanied_VBN by_IN songs_NNS and_CC dances_NNS in_IN honour_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ._. While_IN these_DT
ceremonies_NNS were_VBD going_VBG on_IN ,_, all_PDT the_DT people_NNS except_IN the_DT priests_NNS and_CC
their_PRP$ attendants_NNS kept_VBD out_IN of_IN sight_NN ._. Amongst_IN the_DT Ot_JJ Danoms_NNP of_IN Borneo_NNP
it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT custom_NN that_IN strangers_NNS entering_VBG the_DT territory_NN should_MD pay_VB to_TO
the_DT natives_NNS a_DT certain_JJ sum_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ spent_VBN in_IN the_DT sacrifice_NN of_IN
buffaloes_NNS or_CC pigs_NNS to_TO the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT land_NN and_CC water_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO
reconcile_VB them_PRP to_TO the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT strangers_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO induce_VB them_PRP
not_RB to_TO withdraw_VB their_PRP$ favour_NN from_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, but_CC to_TO
bless_VB the_DT rice-harvest_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ._. The_DT men_NNS of_IN a_DT certain_JJ district_NN
in_IN Borneo_NNP ,_, fearing_VBG to_TO look_VB upon_IN a_DT European_JJ traveller_NN lest_IN he_PRP should_MD
make_VB them_PRP ill_JJ ,_, warned_VBD their_PRP$ wives_NNS and_CC children_NNS not_RB to_TO go_VB near_IN him_PRP ._.
Those_DT who_WP could_MD not_RB restrain_VB their_PRP$ curiosity_NN killed_VBD fowls_NNS to_TO appease_VB
the_DT evil_JJ spirits_NNS and_CC smeared_VBD themselves_PRP with_IN the_DT blood_NN ._. "_'' More_RBR
dreaded_VBN ,"_NN says_VBZ a_DT traveller_NN in_IN Central_NNP Borneo_NNP ,_, "_'' than_IN the_DT evil_JJ spirits_NNS
of_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN are_VBP the_DT evil_JJ spirits_NNS from_IN a_DT distance_NN which_WDT
accompany_VB travellers_NNS ._. When_WRB a_DT company_NN from_IN the_DT middle_JJ Mahakam_NNP River_NNP
visited_VBD me_PRP among_IN the_DT Blu-u_NNP Kayans_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 1897,_IN no_DT woman_NN showed_VBN
herself_PRP outside_IN her_PRP$ house_NN without_IN a_DT burning_VBG bundle_NN of_IN plehiding_VBG
bark_NN ,_, the_DT stinking_VBG smoke_NN of_IN which_WDT drives_VBZ away_RB evil_JJ spirits_NNS ."_VBP

When_WRB Crevaux_NNP was_VBD travelling_VBG in_IN South_NNP America_NNP he_PRP entered_VBD a_DT village_NN of_IN
the_DT Apalai_NNP Indians_NNPS ._. A_DT few_JJ moments_NNS after_IN his_PRP$ arrival_NN some_DT of_IN the_DT
Indians_NNPS brought_VBD him_PRP a_DT number_NN of_IN large_JJ black_JJ ants_NNS ,_, of_IN a_DT species_NN whose_WP$
bite_NN is_VBZ painful_JJ ,_, fastened_VBD on_IN palm_NN leaves_NNS ._. Then_RB all_PDT the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT
village_NN ,_, without_IN distinction_NN of_IN age_NN or_CC sex_NN ,_, presented_VBD themselves_PRP to_TO
him_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP had_VBD to_TO sting_VB them_PRP all_DT with_IN the_DT ants_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ faces_NNS ,_,
thighs_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS ._. Sometimes_RB ,_, when_WRB he_PRP applied_VBD
the_DT ants_NNS too_RB tenderly_RB ,_, they_PRP called_VBD out_RP "_`` More_JJR !_. more_JJR !"_NNS and_CC were_VBD not_RB
satisfied_VBN till_IN their_PRP$ skin_NN was_VBD thickly_RB studded_VBN with_IN tiny_JJ swellings_NNS
like_IN what_WP might_MD have_VB been_VBN produced_VBN by_IN whipping_VBG them_PRP with_IN nettles_NNS ._.
The_DT object_NN of_IN this_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ made_VBN plain_JJ by_IN the_DT custom_NN observed_VBD in_IN
Amboyna_NNP and_CC Uliase_NNP of_IN sprinkling_VBG sick_JJ people_NNS with_IN pungent_JJ spices_NNS ,_,
such_JJ as_IN ginger_NN and_CC cloves_NNS ,_, chewed_VBD fine_JJ ,_, in_IN order_NN by_IN the_DT prickling_NN
sensation_NN to_TO drive_VB away_RB the_DT demon_NN of_IN disease_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB clinging_VBG
to_TO their_PRP$ persons_NNS ._. In_IN Java_NNP a_DT popular_JJ cure_NN for_IN gout_NN or_CC rheumatism_NN is_VBZ
to_TO rub_VB Spanish_JJ pepper_NN into_IN the_DT nails_NNS of_IN the_DT fingers_NNS and_CC toes_NNS of_IN the_DT
sufferer_NN ;_: the_DT pungency_NN of_IN the_DT pepper_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB too_RB much_RB for_IN
the_DT gout_NN or_CC rheumatism_NN ,_, who_WP accordingly_RB departs_VBZ in_IN haste_NN ._. So_RB on_IN the_DT
Slave_NNP Coast_NNP the_DT mother_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ child_NN sometimes_RB believes_VBZ that_IN an_DT
evil_JJ spirit_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN possession_NN of_IN the_DT child_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN order_NN
to_TO drive_VB him_PRP out_RP ,_, she_PRP makes_VBZ small_JJ cuts_NNS in_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT little_JJ
sufferer_NN and_CC inserts_NNS green_JJ peppers_NNS or_CC spices_NNS in_IN the_DT wounds_NNS ,_,
believing_VBG that_IN she_PRP will_MD thereby_RB hurt_VB the_DT evil_JJ spirit_NN and_CC force_VB him_PRP
to_TO be_VB gone_VBN ._. The_DT poor_JJ child_NN naturally_RB screams_VBZ with_IN pain_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT
mother_NN hardens_VBZ her_PRP$ heart_NN in_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN the_DT demon_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG
equally_RB ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN the_DT same_JJ dread_NN of_IN strangers_NNS ,_, rather_RB than_IN any_DT
desire_NN to_TO do_VB them_PRP honour_VB ,_, is_VBZ the_DT motive_NN of_IN certain_JJ ceremonies_NNS which_WDT
are_VBP sometimes_RB observed_VBN at_IN their_PRP$ reception_NN ,_, but_CC of_IN which_WDT the_DT
intention_NN is_VBZ not_RB directly_RB stated_VBN ._. In_IN the_DT Ongtong_NNP Java_NNP Islands_NNP ,_, which_WDT
are_VBP inhabited_VBN by_IN Polynesians_NNS ,_, the_DT priests_NNS or_CC sorcerers_NNS seem_VBP to_TO wield_VB
great_JJ influence_NN ._. Their_PRP$ main_JJ business_NN is_VBZ to_TO summon_VB or_CC exorcise_VB

strangers_NNS land_NN on_IN the_DT islands_NNS ,_, they_PRP are_VBP first_RB of_IN all_DT received_VBN by_IN the_DT

wiped_VBN with_IN green_JJ leaves_NNS ._. After_IN this_DT ceremony_NN the_DT strangers_NNS are_VBP

parts_NNS of_IN Persia_NNP the_DT traveller_NN ,_, before_IN he_PRP enters_VBZ a_DT village_NN ,_, is_VBZ
frequently_RB received_VBN with_IN a_DT sacrifice_NN of_IN animal_JJ life_NN or_CC food_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN
fire_NN and_CC incense_NN ._. The_DT Afghan_NNP Boundary_NNP Mission_NNP ,_, in_IN passing_NN by_IN
villages_NNS in_IN Afghanistan_NNP ,_, was_VBD often_RB met_VBN with_IN fire_NN and_CC incense_NN ._.
Sometimes_RB a_DT tray_NN of_IN lighted_JJ embers_NNS is_VBZ thrown_VBN under_IN the_DT hoofs_NNS of_IN the_DT
traveller_NN '_POS s_PRP horse_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT words_NNS ,_, "_`` You_PRP are_VBP welcome_JJ ."_NN On_IN entering_VBG a_DT

Watuta_NNP transformed_VBD and_CC come_VB to_TO kill_VB us_PRP ?_. You_PRP cannot_MD be_VB admitted_VBN .'_NNS No_RB

the_DT next_JJ village_NN ."_.

The_DT fear_NN thus_RB entertained_VBN of_IN alien_JJ visitors_NNS is_VBZ often_RB mutual_JJ ._.
Entering_VBG a_DT strange_JJ land_NN the_DT savage_JJ feels_VBZ that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ treading_VBG
enchanted_VBN ground_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP takes_VBZ steps_NNS to_TO guard_VB against_IN the_DT demons_NNS
that_IN haunt_VBP it_PRP and_CC the_DT magical_JJ arts_NNS of_IN its_PRP$ inhabitants_NNS ._. Thus_RB on_IN going_VBG

"_`` common_JJ ,"_NN lest_IN it_PRP might_MD have_VB been_VBN previously_RB "_'' sacred_JJ ."_NN When_WRB Baron_NNP

Guinea_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT natives_NNS who_WP accompanied_VBD him_PRP broke_VBD a_DT branch_NN from_IN a_DT

they_PRP were_VBD approaching_VBG ._. The_DT idea_NN probably_RB was_VBD that_IN the_DT malignant_JJ
influences_NNS were_VBD drawn_VBN off_RB from_IN the_DT persons_NNS into_IN the_DT branch_NN and_CC
buried_VBN with_IN it_PRP in_IN the_DT depths_NNS of_IN the_DT forest_NN ._. In_IN Australia_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT

something_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN or_CC spiritual_JJ essence_NN of_IN the_DT enemy_NN into_IN
themselves_PRP ,_, which_WDT would_MD destroy_VB the_DT mystic_JJ virtue_NN of_IN their_PRP$

Again_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP has_VBZ been_VBN on_IN a_DT journey_NN may_MD have_VB

associated_VBN ._. Hence_RB ,_, on_IN returning_VBG home_NN ,_, before_IN he_PRP is_VBZ readmitted_VBN to_TO the_DT
society_NN of_IN his_PRP$ tribe_NN and_CC friends_NNS ,_, he_PRP has_VBZ to_TO undergo_VB certain_JJ
purificatory_NN ceremonies_NNS ._. Thus_RB the_DT Bechuanas_NNPS "_`` cleanse_VB or_CC purify_VB
themselves_PRP after_IN journeys_NNS by_IN shaving_VBG their_PRP$ heads_NNS ,_, etc_FW .,_, lest_IN they_PRP
should_MD have_VB contracted_VBN from_IN strangers_NNS some_DT evil_JJ by_IN witchcraft_NN or_CC
sorcery_NN ."_NN In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Western_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT man_NN returns_VBZ home_NN

must_MD wash_VB his_PRP$ person_NN with_IN a_DT particular_JJ fluid_NN ,_, and_CC receive_VB from_IN the_DT

magic_NN spell_NN which_WDT a_DT stranger_NN woman_NN may_MD have_VB cast_VBN on_IN him_PRP in_IN his_PRP$
absence_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT might_MD be_VB communicated_VBN through_IN him_PRP to_TO the_DT women_NNS of_IN
his_PRP$ village_NN ._. Two_CD Hindoo_NNP ambassadors_NNS ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN sent_VBN to_TO England_NNP by_IN
a_DT native_JJ prince_NN and_CC had_VBD returned_VBN to_TO India_NNP ,_, were_VBD considered_VBN to_TO have_VB
