In_IN this_DT statue_NN the_DT person_NN to_TO be_VB regenerated_VBN is_VBZ enclosed_VBN ,_, and_CC dragged_VBN
through_IN the_DT usual_JJ channel_NN ._. As_IN a_DT statue_NN of_IN pure_JJ gold_NN and_CC of_IN proper_JJ
dimensions_NNS would_MD be_VB too_RB expensive_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO make_VB an_DT image_NN
of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ Yoni_NNP ,_, through_IN which_WDT the_DT person_NN to_TO be_VB regenerated_VBN is_VBZ
to_TO pass_VB ."_RB Such_JJ an_DT image_NN of_IN pure_JJ gold_NN was_VBD made_VBN at_IN the_DT prince_NN '_POS s_PRP
command_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ ambassadors_NNS were_VBD born_VBN again_RB by_IN being_VBG dragged_VBN
through_IN it_PRP ._.

When_WRB precautions_NNS like_IN these_DT are_VBP taken_VBN on_IN behalf_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN
general_JJ against_IN the_DT malignant_JJ influence_NN supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB exercised_VBN by_IN
strangers_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ no_DT wonder_NN that_IN special_JJ measures_NNS are_VBP adopted_VBN to_TO
protect_VB the_DT king_NN from_IN the_DT same_JJ insidious_JJ danger_NN ._. In_IN the_DT middle_JJ ages_NNS
the_DT envoys_NNS who_WP visited_VBD a_DT Tartar_NNP Khan_NNP were_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO pass_VB between_IN
two_CD fires_NNS before_IN they_PRP were_VBD admitted_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ presence_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT gifts_NNS
they_PRP brought_VBD were_VBD also_RB carried_VBN between_IN the_DT fires_NNS ._. The_DT reason_NN
assigned_VBN for_IN the_DT custom_NN was_VBD that_IN the_DT fire_NN purged_VBN away_RB any_DT magic_NN
influence_NN which_WDT the_DT strangers_NNS might_MD mean_VB to_TO exercise_VB over_IN the_DT Khan_NNP ._.
When_WRB subject_JJ chiefs_NNS come_VBP with_IN their_PRP$ retinues_NNS to_TO visit_VB Kalamba_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT
most_RBS powerful_JJ chief_NN of_IN the_DT Bashilange_NNP in_IN the_DT Congo_NNP Basin_NNP )_-RRB- for_IN the_DT
first_JJ time_NN or_CC after_IN being_VBG rebellious_JJ ,_, they_PRP have_VBP to_TO bathe_VB ,_, men_NNS and_CC
women_NNS together_RB ,_, in_IN two_CD brooks_NNS on_IN two_CD successive_JJ days_NNS ,_, passing_VBG the_DT
nights_NNS under_IN the_DT open_JJ sky_NN in_IN the_DT market-place_NN ._. After_IN the_DT second_JJ bath_NN
they_PRP proceed_VBP ,_, entirely_RB naked_JJ ,_, to_TO the_DT house_NN of_IN Kalamba_NNP ,_, who_WP makes_VBZ a_DT
long_JJ white_JJ mark_NN on_IN the_DT breast_NN and_CC forehead_NN of_IN each_DT of_IN them_PRP ._. Then_RB
they_PRP return_VBP to_TO the_DT market-place_NN and_CC dress_NN ,_, after_IN which_WDT they_PRP undergo_VBP
the_DT pepper_NN ordeal_NN ._. Pepper_NNP is_VBZ dropped_VBN into_IN the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN each_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_,
and_CC while_IN this_DT is_VBZ being_VBG done_VBN the_DT sufferer_NN has_VBZ to_TO make_VB a_DT confession_NN
of_IN all_DT his_PRP$ sins_NNS ,_, to_TO answer_VB all_DT questions_NNS that_WDT may_MD be_VB put_VBN to_TO him_PRP ,_, and_CC
to_TO take_VB certain_JJ vows_NNS ._. This_DT ends_VBZ the_DT ceremony_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT strangers_NNS are_VBP
now_RB free_JJ to_TO take_VB up_RP their_PRP$ quarters_NNS in_IN the_DT town_NN for_IN as_RB long_JJ as_IN they_PRP
choose_VB to_TO remain_VB ._.



2._DT Taboos_NNP on_IN Eating_NNP and_CC Drinking_VBG

IN_IN THE_DT OPINION_NN of_IN savages_NNS the_DT acts_NNS of_IN eating_NN and_CC drinking_NN are_VBP
attended_VBN with_IN special_JJ danger_NN ;_: for_IN at_IN these_DT times_NNS the_DT soul_NN may_MD escape_VB
from_IN the_DT mouth_NN ,_, or_CC be_VB extracted_VBN by_IN the_DT magic_JJ arts_NNS of_IN an_DT enemy_NN
present_JJ ._. Among_IN the_DT Ewe-speaking_JJ peoples_NNS of_IN the_DT Slave_NNP Coast_NNP "_'' the_DT
common_JJ belief_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB that_IN the_DT indwelling_NN spirit_NN leaves_VBZ the_DT body_NN
and_CC returns_NNS to_TO it_PRP through_IN the_DT mouth_NN ;_: hence_RB ,_, should_MD it_PRP have_VB gone_VBN out_RB ,_,
it_PRP behoves_VBZ a_DT man_NN to_TO be_VB careful_JJ about_IN opening_VBG his_PRP$ mouth_NN ,_, lest_IN a_DT
homeless_JJ spirit_NN should_MD take_VB advantage_NN of_IN the_DT opportunity_NN and_CC enter_VB
his_PRP$ body_NN ._. This_DT ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ ,_, is_VBZ considered_VBN most_RBS likely_JJ to_TO take_VB place_NN
while_IN the_DT man_NN is_VBZ eating_VBG ."_JJ Precautions_NNS are_VBP therefore_RB adopted_VBN to_TO guard_VB
against_IN these_DT dangers_NNS ._. Thus_RB of_IN the_DT Bataks_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN "_`` since_IN the_DT
soul_NN can_MD leave_VB the_DT body_NN ,_, they_PRP always_RB take_VBP care_NN to_TO prevent_VB their_PRP$ soul_NN
from_IN straying_VBG on_IN occasions_NNS when_WRB they_PRP have_VBP most_JJS need_NN of_IN it_PRP ._. But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ
only_RB possible_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT soul_NN from_IN straying_VBG when_WRB one_CD is_VBZ in_IN the_DT
house_NN ._. At_IN feasts_NNS one_CD may_MD find_VB the_DT whole_JJ house_NN shut_VBN up_RB ,_, in_IN order_NN that_WDT
the_DT soul_NN may_MD stay_VB and_CC enjoy_VB the_DT good_JJ things_NNS set_VBN before_IN it_PRP ."_VBD The_DT
Zafimanelo_NNP in_IN Madagascar_NNP lock_VBP their_PRP$ doors_NNS when_WRB they_PRP eat_VBP ,_, and_CC hardly_RB
any_DT one_CD ever_RB sees_VBZ them_PRP eating_VBG ._. The_DT Warua_NNP will_MD not_RB allow_VB any_DT one_NN to_TO
see_VB them_PRP eating_NN and_CC drinking_NN ,_, being_VBG doubly_RB particular_JJ that_IN no_DT person_NN
of_IN the_DT opposite_JJ sex_NN shall_MD see_VB them_PRP doing_VBG so_RB ._. "_'' I_PRP had_VBD to_TO pay_VB a_DT man_NN to_TO
let_VB me_PRP see_VB him_PRP drink_VB ;_: I_PRP could_MD not_RB make_VB a_DT man_NN let_VB a_DT woman_NN see_VB him_PRP
drink_NN ."_NN When_WRB offered_VBN a_DT drink_NN they_PRP often_RB ask_VBP that_IN a_DT cloth_NN may_MD be_VB held_VBN
up_RB to_TO hide_VB them_PRP whilst_IN drinking_NN ._.

If_IN these_DT are_VBP the_DT ordinary_JJ precautions_NNS taken_VBN by_IN common_JJ people_NNS ,_, the_DT
precautions_NNS taken_VBN by_IN kings_NNS are_VBP extraordinary_JJ ._. The_DT king_NN of_IN Loango_NN may_MD
not_RB be_VB seen_VBN eating_NN or_CC drinking_NN by_IN man_NN or_CC beast_NN under_IN pain_NN of_IN death_NN ._.
A_DT favourite_JJ dog_NN having_VBG broken_VBN into_IN the_DT room_NN where_WRB the_DT king_NN was_VBD
dining_VBG ,_, the_DT king_NN ordered_VBD it_PRP to_TO be_VB killed_VBN on_IN the_DT spot_NN ._. Once_RB the_DT
king_NN '_'' s_PRP own_JJ son_NN ,_, a_DT boy_NN of_IN twelve_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, inadvertently_RB saw_VBD the_DT
king_NN drink_NN ._. Immediately_RB the_DT king_NN ordered_VBD him_PRP to_TO be_VB finely_RB apparelled_VBN
and_CC feasted_VBD ,_, after_IN which_WDT he_PRP commanded_VBD him_PRP to_TO be_VB cut_VBN in_IN quarters_NNS ,_, and_CC
carried_VBD about_IN the_DT city_NN with_IN a_DT proclamation_NN that_IN he_PRP had_VBD seen_VBN the_DT king_NN
drink_NN ._. "_'' When_WRB the_DT king_NN has_VBZ a_DT mind_NN to_TO drink_VB ,_, he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT cup_NN of_IN wine_NN
brought_VBN ;_: he_PRP that_WDT brings_VBZ it_PRP has_VBZ a_DT bell_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, and_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP
has_VBZ delivered_VBN the_DT cup_NN to_TO the_DT king_NN ,_, he_PRP turns_VBZ his_PRP$ face_NN from_IN him_PRP and_CC
rings_NNS the_DT bell_NN ,_, on_IN which_WDT all_DT present_JJ fall_NN down_IN with_IN their_PRP$ faces_NNS to_TO
the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC continue_VB so_RB till_IN the_DT king_NN has_VBZ drank_VBD ._. ._. ._. ._. His_PRP$
eating_NN is_VBZ much_RB in_IN the_DT same_JJ style_NN ,_, for_IN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT house_NN on_IN
purpose_NN ,_, where_WRB his_PRP$ victuals_NNS are_VBP set_VBN upon_IN a_DT bensa_NN or_CC table_NN :_: which_WDT he_PRP
goes_VBZ to_TO ,_, and_CC shuts_VBD the_DT door_NN :_: when_WRB he_PRP has_VBZ done_VBN ,_, he_PRP knocks_VBZ and_CC comes_VBZ
out_RB ._. So_IN that_DT none_NN ever_RB see_VB the_DT king_NN eat_VB or_CC drink_VB ._. For_IN it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN
that_IN if_IN any_DT one_NN should_MD ,_, the_DT king_NN shall_MD immediately_RB die_VB ."_RP The_DT
remnants_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ food_NN are_VBP buried_VBN ,_, doubtless_RB to_TO prevent_VB them_PRP from_IN
falling_VBG into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN sorcerers_NNS ,_, who_WP by_IN means_VBZ of_IN these_DT fragments_NNS
might_MD cast_VBD a_DT fatal_JJ spell_NN over_IN the_DT monarch_NN ._. The_DT rules_NNS observed_VBN by_IN the_DT
neighbouring_VBG king_NN of_IN Cacongo_NNP were_VBD similar_JJ ;_: it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN that_IN the_DT
king_NN would_MD die_VB if_IN any_DT of_IN his_PRP$ subjects_NNS were_VBD to_TO see_VB him_PRP drink_VB ._. It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT
capital_NN offence_NN to_TO see_VB the_DT king_NN of_IN Dahomey_NNP at_IN his_PRP$ meals_NNS ._. When_WRB he_PRP
drinks_NNS in_IN public_JJ ,_, as_IN he_PRP does_VBZ on_IN extraordinary_JJ occasions_NNS ,_, he_PRP hides_PRP$
himself_PRP behind_IN a_DT curtain_NN ,_, or_CC handkerchiefs_NNS are_VBP held_VBN up_RP round_RB his_PRP$
head_NN ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT people_NNS throw_VBP themselves_PRP with_IN their_PRP$ faces_NNS to_TO the_DT
earth_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT king_NN of_IN Bunyoro_NNP in_IN Central_NNP Africa_NNP went_VBD to_TO drink_VB milk_NN
in_IN the_DT dairy_NN ,_, every_DT man_NN must_MD leave_VB the_DT royal_JJ enclosure_NN and_CC all_PDT the_DT
women_NNS had_VBD to_TO cover_VB their_PRP$ heads_NNS till_IN the_DT king_NN returned_VBD ._. No_DT one_NN might_MD
see_VB him_PRP drink_VB ._. One_CD wife_NN accompanied_VBD him_PRP to_TO the_DT dairy_NN and_CC handed_VBD him_PRP
the_DT milk-pot_NN ,_, but_CC she_PRP turned_VBD away_RB her_PRP$ face_NN while_IN he_PRP drained_VBD it_PRP ._.



3._DT Taboos_NNP on_IN Showing_VBG the_DT Face_NN

IN_IN SOME_NNP of_IN the_DT preceding_VBG cases_NNS the_DT intention_NN of_IN eating_VBG and_CC drinking_VBG
in_IN strict_JJ seclusion_NN may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB to_TO hinder_VB evil_JJ influences_NNS from_IN
entering_VBG the_DT body_NN rather_RB than_IN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT escape_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN ._.
This_DT certainly_RB is_VBZ the_DT motive_NN of_IN some_DT drinking_NN customs_NNS observed_VBN by_IN
natives_NNS of_IN the_DT Congo_NNP region_NN ._. Thus_RB we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN of_IN these_DT people_NNS that_IN
"_`` there_EX is_VBZ hardly_RB a_DT native_NN who_WP would_MD dare_VB to_TO swallow_VB a_DT liquid_NN without_IN
first_RB conjuring_VBG the_DT spirits_NNS ._. One_CD of_IN them_PRP rings_NNS a_DT bell_NN all_DT the_DT time_NN
he_PRP is_VBZ drinking_VBG ;_: another_DT crouches_NNS down_RB and_CC places_VBZ his_PRP$ left_JJ hand_NN on_IN
the_DT earth_NN ;_: another_DT veils_VBZ his_PRP$ head_NN ;_: another_DT puts_VBZ a_DT stalk_NN of_IN grass_NN or_CC
a_DT leaf_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, or_CC marks_VBZ his_PRP$ forehead_NN with_IN a_DT line_NN of_IN clay_NN ._. This_DT
fetish_JJ custom_NN assumes_VBZ very_RB varied_JJ forms_NNS ._. To_TO explain_VB them_PRP ,_, the_DT black_JJ
is_VBZ satisfied_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN they_PRP are_VBP an_DT energetic_JJ mode_NN of_IN conjuring_VBG
spirits_NNS ."_VBP In_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN a_DT chief_NN will_MD commonly_RB ring_VB a_DT
bell_NN at_IN each_DT draught_NN of_IN beer_NN which_WDT he_PRP swallows_VBZ ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ
moment_NN a_DT lad_NN stationed_VBN in_IN front_NN of_IN him_PRP brandishes_VBZ a_DT spear_NN "_'' to_TO keep_VB
at_IN bay_NN the_DT spirits_NNS which_WDT might_MD try_VB to_TO sneak_VB into_IN the_DT old_JJ chief_NN '_'' s_PRP
body_NN by_IN the_DT same_JJ road_NN as_IN the_DT beer_NN ."_IN The_DT same_JJ motive_NN of_IN warding_VBG off_IN
evil_JJ spirits_NNS probably_RB explains_VBZ the_DT custom_NN observed_VBN by_IN some_DT African_JJ
sultans_NNS of_IN veiling_VBG their_PRP$ faces_NNS ._. The_DT Sultan_NNP of_IN Darfur_NNP wraps_VBZ up_RP his_PRP$
face_NN with_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN white_JJ muslin_NN ,_, which_WDT goes_VBZ round_IN his_PRP$ head_NN several_JJ
times_NNS ,_, covering_VBG his_PRP$ mouth_NN and_CC nose_NN first_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB his_PRP$ forehead_NN ,_, so_RB
that_IN only_RB his_PRP$ eyes_NNS are_VBP visible_JJ ._. The_DT same_JJ custom_NN of_IN veiling_VBG the_DT face_NN
as_IN a_DT mark_NN of_IN sovereignty_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO be_VB observed_VBN in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN
Central_NNP Africa_NNP ._. The_DT Sultan_NNP of_IN Wadai_NNP always_RB speaks_VBZ from_IN behind_IN a_DT
curtain_NN ;_: no_DT one_NN sees_VBZ his_PRP$ face_NN except_IN his_PRP$ intimates_NNS and_CC a_DT few_JJ
favoured_JJ persons_NNS ._.



4._DT Taboos_NNP on_IN Quitting_VBG the_DT House_NNP

BY_NNP AN_DT EXTENSION_NN of_IN the_DT like_JJ precaution_NN kings_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB forbidden_VBN
ever_RB to_TO leave_VB their_PRP$ palaces_NNS ;_: or_CC ,_, if_IN they_PRP are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, their_PRP$
subjects_NNS are_VBP forbidden_VBN to_TO see_VB them_PRP abroad_RB ._. The_DT fetish_JJ king_NN of_IN Benin_NNP ,_,
who_WP was_VBD worshipped_VBN as_IN a_DT deity_NN by_IN his_PRP$ subjects_NNS ,_, might_MD not_RB quit_VB his_PRP$
palace_NN ._. After_IN his_PRP$ coronation_NN the_DT king_NN of_IN Loango_NNP is_VBZ confined_VBN to_TO his_PRP$
palace_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP may_MD not_RB leave_VB ._. The_DT king_NN of_IN Onitsha_NNP "_`` does_VBZ not_RB step_VB
out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ house_NN into_IN the_DT town_NN unless_IN a_DT human_JJ sacrifice_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO
propitiate_VB the_DT gods_NNS :_: on_IN this_DT account_NN he_PRP never_RB goes_VBZ out_RB beyond_IN the_DT
precincts_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ premises_NNS ."_IN Indeed_RB we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN he_PRP may_MD not_RB quit_VB
his_PRP$ palace_NN under_IN pain_NN of_IN death_NN or_CC of_IN giving_VBG up_RP one_CD or_CC more_JJR slaves_NNS to_TO
be_VB executed_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ presence_NN ._. As_IN the_DT wealth_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN is_VBZ
measured_VBN in_IN slaves_NNS ,_, the_DT king_NN takes_VBZ good_JJ care_NN not_RB to_TO infringe_VB the_DT
law_NN ._. Yet_RB once_RB a_DT year_NN at_IN the_DT Feast_NNP of_IN Yams_NNP the_DT king_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN ,_, and_CC
even_RB required_VBN by_IN custom_NN ,_, to_TO dance_VB before_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS outside_IN the_DT high_JJ
mud_NN wall_NN of_IN the_DT palace_NN ._. In_IN dancing_VBG he_PRP carries_VBZ a_DT great_JJ weight_NN ,_,
generally_RB a_DT sack_NN of_IN earth_NN ,_, on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN to_TO prove_VB that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ still_RB
able_JJ to_TO support_VB the_DT burden_NN and_CC cares_NNS of_IN state_NN ._. Were_VBD he_PRP unable_JJ to_TO
discharge_NN this_DT duty_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD be_VB immediately_RB deposed_VBN and_CC perhaps_RB
stoned_VBN ._. The_DT kings_NNS of_IN Ethiopia_NNP were_VBD worshipped_VBN as_IN gods_NNS ,_, but_CC were_VBD
mostly_RB kept_VBD shut_VBN up_RP in_IN their_PRP$ palaces_NNS ._. On_IN the_DT mountainous_JJ coast_NN of_IN
Pontus_NNP there_RB dwelt_VBD in_IN antiquity_NN a_DT rude_JJ and_CC warlike_JJ people_NNS named_VBN the_DT
Mosyni_NNP or_CC Mosynoeci_NNP ,_, through_IN whose_WP$ rugged_JJ country_NN the_DT Ten_CD Thousand_NNP
marched_VBD on_IN their_PRP$ famous_JJ retreat_NN from_IN Asia_NNP to_TO Europe_NNP ._. These_DT
barbarians_NNS kept_VBD their_PRP$ king_NN in_IN close_NN custody_NN at_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN a_DT high_JJ
tower_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT after_IN his_PRP$ election_NN he_PRP was_VBD never_RB more_JJR allowed_VBN to_TO
descend_NN ._. Here_RB he_PRP dispensed_VBD justice_NN to_TO his_PRP$ people_NNS ;_: but_CC if_IN he_PRP offended_CC
them_PRP ,_, they_PRP punished_VBN him_PRP by_IN stopping_VBG his_PRP$ rations_NNS for_IN a_DT whole_JJ day_NN ,_, or_CC
even_RB starving_VBG him_PRP to_TO death_NN ._. The_DT kings_NNS of_IN Sabaea_NNP or_CC Sheba_NNP ,_, the_DT spice_NN
country_NN of_IN Arabia_NNP ,_, were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ palaces_NNS ;_: if_IN
they_PRP did_VBD so_RB ,_, the_DT mob_NN stoned_VBD them_PRP to_TO death_NN ._. But_CC at_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT
palace_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT window_NN with_IN a_DT chain_NN attached_VBN to_TO it_PRP ._. If_IN any_DT man_NN
deemed_VBN he_PRP had_VBD suffered_VBN wrong_JJ ,_, he_PRP pulled_VBD the_DT chain_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT king_NN
perceived_VBN him_PRP and_CC called_VBD him_PRP in_IN and_CC gave_VBD judgment_NN ._.



5._DT Taboos_NNP on_IN Leaving_VBG Food_NNP over_IN

AGAIN_NNP ,_, magic_JJ mischief_NN may_MD be_VB wrought_VBN upon_IN a_DT man_NN through_IN the_DT remains_NNS
of_IN the_DT food_NN he_PRP has_VBZ partaken_VBN of_IN ,_, or_CC the_DT dishes_NNS out_IN of_IN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ
eaten_VBN ._. On_IN the_DT principles_NNS of_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN a_DT real_JJ connexion_NN
continues_VBZ to_TO subsist_VB between_IN the_DT food_NN which_WDT a_DT man_NN has_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ stomach_NN
and_CC the_DT refuse_NN of_IN it_PRP which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ left_VBN untouched_JJ ,_, and_CC hence_RB by_IN
injuring_VBG the_DT refuse_NN you_PRP can_MD simultaneously_RB injure_VB the_DT eater_NN ._. Among_IN
the_DT Narrinyeri_NNP of_IN South_NNP Australia_NNP every_DT adult_NN is_VBZ constantly_RB on_IN the_DT
look-out_NN for_IN bones_NNS of_IN beasts_NNS ,_, birds_NNS ,_, or_CC fish_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT the_DT flesh_NN has_VBZ
been_VBN eaten_VBN by_IN somebody_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO construct_VB a_DT deadly_JJ charm_NN out_IN of_IN
them_PRP ._. Every_DT one_NN is_VBZ therefore_RB careful_JJ to_TO burn_VB the_DT bones_NNS of_IN the_DT
animals_NNS which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ eaten_VBN ,_, lest_IN they_PRP should_MD fall_VB into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN
a_DT sorcerer_NN ._. Too_RB often_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT sorcerer_NN succeeds_VBZ in_IN getting_VBG
hold_NN of_IN such_JJ a_DT bone_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP does_VBZ so_RB he_PRP believes_VBZ that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ the_DT
power_NN of_IN life_NN and_CC death_NN over_IN the_DT man_NN ,_, woman_NN ,_, or_CC child_NN who_WP ate_VBD the_DT
flesh_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN ._. To_TO put_VB the_DT charm_NN in_IN operation_NN he_PRP makes_VBZ a_DT paste_NN
of_IN red_JJ ochre_NN and_CC fish_NN oil_NN ,_, inserts_NNS in_IN it_PRP the_DT eye_NN of_IN a_DT cod_NN and_CC a_DT
small_JJ piece_NN of_IN the_DT flesh_NN of_IN a_DT corpse_NN ,_, and_CC having_VBG rolled_VBD the_DT compound_NN
into_IN a_DT ball_NN sticks_VBZ it_PRP on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT bone_NN ._. After_IN being_VBG left_VBN for_IN
some_DT time_NN in_IN the_DT bosom_NN of_IN a_DT dead_JJ body_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN it_PRP may_MD derive_VB a_DT
deadly_JJ potency_NN by_IN contact_NN with_IN corruption_NN ,_, the_DT magical_JJ implement_VB is_VBZ
set_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT ground_NN near_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT ball_NN melts_VBZ ,_, so_RB the_DT
person_NN against_IN whom_WP the_DT charm_NN is_VBZ directed_VBN wastes_NNS with_IN disease_NN ;_: if_IN
the_DT ball_NN is_VBZ melted_VBN quite_RB away_RB ,_, the_DT victim_NN will_MD die_VB ._. When_WRB the_DT
bewitched_JJ man_NN learns_VBZ of_IN the_DT spell_NN that_WDT is_VBZ being_VBG cast_VBN upon_IN him_PRP ,_, he_PRP
endeavours_NNS to_TO buy_VB the_DT bone_NN from_IN the_DT sorcerer_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP obtains_VBZ it_PRP
he_PRP breaks_VBZ the_DT charm_NN by_IN throwing_VBG the_DT bone_NN into_IN a_DT river_NN or_CC lake_NN ._. In_IN
Tana_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT New_NNP Hebrides_NNP ,_, people_NNS bury_VBP or_CC throw_VBP into_IN the_DT sea_NN the_DT
leavings_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ food_NN ,_, lest_IN these_DT should_MD fall_VB into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT
disease-makers_NNS ._. For_IN if_IN a_DT disease-maker_NN finds_VBZ the_DT remnants_NNS of_IN a_DT meal_NN ,_,
say_VB the_DT skin_NN of_IN a_DT banana_NN ,_, he_PRP picks_VBZ it_PRP up_RB and_CC burns_NNS it_PRP slowly_RB in_IN the_DT
fire_NN ._. As_IN it_PRP burns_VBZ ,_, the_DT person_NN who_WP ate_VBD the_DT banana_NN falls_VBZ ill_JJ and_CC sends_VBZ
to_TO the_DT disease-maker_NN ,_, offering_VBG him_PRP presents_NNS if_IN he_PRP will_MD stop_VB burning_VBG
the_DT banana_NN skin_NN ._. In_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP the_DT natives_NNS take_VBP the_DT utmost_JJ care_NN to_TO
destroy_VB or_CC conceal_VB the_DT husks_NNS and_CC other_JJ remains_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ food_NN ,_, lest_IN
these_DT should_MD be_VB found_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ enemies_NNS and_CC used_VBN by_IN them_PRP for_IN the_DT
injury_NN or_CC destruction_NN of_IN the_DT eaters_NNS ._. Hence_RB they_PRP burn_VBP their_PRP$ leavings_NNS ,_,
throw_VB them_PRP into_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, or_CC otherwise_RB put_VB them_PRP out_IN of_IN harm_NN '_POS s_PRP way_NN ._.

From_IN a_DT like_JJ fear_NN ,_, no_DT doubt_NN ,_, of_IN sorcery_NN ,_, no_DT one_NN may_MD touch_VB the_DT food_NN
which_WDT the_DT king_NN of_IN Loango_NN leaves_VBZ upon_IN his_PRP$ plate_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ buried_VBN in_IN a_DT
hole_NN in_IN the_DT ground_NN ._. And_CC no_DT one_NN may_MD drink_VB out_IN of_IN the_DT king_NN '_POS s_PRP vessel_NN ._.
In_IN antiquity_NN the_DT Romans_NNPS used_VBD immediately_RB to_TO break_VB the_DT shells_NNS of_IN eggs_NNS
and_CC of_IN snails_NNS which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD eaten_VBN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO prevent_VB enemies_NNS from_IN
making_VBG magic_NN with_IN them_PRP ._. The_DT common_JJ practice_NN ,_, still_RB observed_VBD among_IN
us_PRP ,_, of_IN breaking_VBG egg-shells_NNS after_IN the_DT eggs_NNS have_VBP been_VBN eaten_VBN may_MD very_RB
well_RB have_VBP originated_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ superstition_NN ._.

The_DT superstitious_JJ fear_NN of_IN the_DT magic_NN that_WDT may_MD be_VB wrought_VBN on_IN a_DT man_NN
through_IN the_DT leavings_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ food_NN has_VBZ had_VBN the_DT beneficial_JJ effect_NN of_IN
inducing_VBG many_JJ savages_NNS to_TO destroy_VB refuse_NN which_WDT ,_, if_IN left_VBN to_TO rot_NN ,_, might_MD
through_IN its_PRP$ corruption_NN have_VBP proved_VBN a_DT real_JJ ,_, not_RB a_DT merely_RB imaginary_NN ,_,
source_NN of_IN disease_NN and_CC death_NN ._. Nor_CC is_VBZ it_PRP only_RB the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN
of_IN a_DT tribe_NN which_WDT has_VBZ benefited_VBN by_IN this_DT superstition_NN ;_: curiously_RB
enough_RB the_DT same_JJ baseless_JJ dread_NN ,_, the_DT same_JJ false_JJ notion_NN of_IN causation_NN ,_,
has_VBZ indirectly_RB strengthened_VBN the_DT moral_JJ bonds_NNS of_IN hospitality_NN ,_, honour_NN ,_,
and_CC good_JJ faith_NN among_IN men_NNS who_WP entertain_VB it_PRP ._. For_IN it_PRP is_VBZ obvious_JJ that_IN no_NN
one_NN who_WP intends_VBZ to_TO harm_VB a_DT man_NN by_IN working_VBG magic_NN on_IN the_DT refuse_NN of_IN his_PRP$
food_NN will_MD himself_PRP partake_VB of_IN that_DT food_NN ,_, because_IN if_IN he_PRP did_VBD so_RB he_PRP
would_MD ,_, on_IN the_DT principles_NNS of_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_JJ ,_, suffer_VB equally_RB with_IN
his_PRP$ enemy_NN from_IN any_DT injury_NN done_VBN to_TO the_DT refuse_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ the_DT idea_NN which_WDT
in_IN primitive_JJ society_NN lends_VBZ sanctity_NN to_TO the_DT bond_NN produced_VBN by_IN eating_VBG
together_RB ;_: by_IN participation_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ food_NN two_CD men_NNS give_VBP ,_, as_IN it_PRP
were_VBD ,_, hostages_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ good_JJ behaviour_NN ;_: each_DT guarantees_VBZ the_DT other_JJ
that_IN he_PRP will_MD devise_VB no_DT mischief_NN against_IN him_PRP ,_, since_IN ,_, being_VBG physically_RB
united_VBN with_IN him_PRP by_IN the_DT common_JJ food_NN in_IN their_PRP$ stomachs_NNS ,_, any_DT harm_NN he_PRP
might_MD do_VB to_TO his_PRP$ fellow_NN would_MD recoil_VB on_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ head_NN with_IN precisely_RB
the_DT same_JJ force_NN with_IN which_WDT it_PRP fell_VBD on_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN his_PRP$ victim_NN ._. In_IN
strict_JJ logic_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT sympathetic_JJ bond_NN lasts_VBZ only_RB so_RB long_JJ as_IN
the_DT food_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT stomach_NN of_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT parties_NNS ._. Hence_RB the_DT
covenant_NN formed_VBN by_IN eating_VBG together_RB is_VBZ less_JJR solemn_JJ and_CC durable_JJ than_IN
the_DT covenant_NN formed_VBN by_IN transfusing_VBG the_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT covenanting_VBG
parties_NNS into_IN each_DT other_JJ '_POS s_PRP veins_VBZ ,_, for_IN this_DT transfusion_NN seems_VBZ to_TO knit_VB
them_PRP together_RB for_IN life_NN ._.




XX_NNP ._. Tabooed_NNP Persons_NNPS



1._DT Chiefs_NNPS and_CC Kings_NNP tabooed_.

WE_NNP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN the_DT Mikado_NNP '_POS s_PRP food_NN was_VBD cooked_VBN every_DT day_NN in_IN new_JJ pots_NNS
and_CC served_VBD up_RP in_IN new_JJ dishes_NNS ;_: both_DT pots_NNS and_CC dishes_NNS were_VBD of_IN common_JJ
clay_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN they_PRP might_MD be_VB broken_VBN or_CC laid_VBN aside_RB after_IN they_PRP
had_VBD been_VBN once_RB used_VBN ._. They_PRP were_VBD generally_RB broken_VBN ,_, for_IN it_PRP was_VBD believed_VBN
that_IN if_IN any_DT one_NN else_RB ate_VBD his_PRP$ food_NN out_IN of_IN these_DT sacred_JJ dishes_NNS ,_, his_PRP$
mouth_NN and_CC throat_NN would_MD become_VB swollen_JJ and_CC inflamed_JJ ._. The_DT same_JJ ill_JJ
effect_NN was_VBD thought_VBN to_TO be_VB experienced_VBN by_IN any_DT one_NN who_WP should_MD wear_VB the_DT
Mikado_NNP '_POS s_PRP clothes_NNS without_IN his_PRP$ leave_NN ;_: he_PRP would_MD have_VB swellings_NNS and_CC
pains_NNS all_DT over_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ._. In_IN Fiji_NNP there_RB is_VBZ a_DT special_JJ name_NN (_-LRB- kana_FW
lama_NN )_-RRB- for_IN the_DT disease_NN supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB caused_VBN by_IN eating_VBG out_IN of_IN a_DT
chief_NN '_POS s_VBZ dishes_NNS or_CC wearing_VBG his_PRP$ clothes_NNS ._. "_'' The_DT throat_NN and_CC body_NN swell_NN ,_,
and_CC the_DT impious_JJ person_NN dies_VBZ ._. I_PRP had_VBD a_DT fine_JJ mat_NN given_VBN to_TO me_PRP by_IN a_DT man_NN
who_WP durst_VBD not_RB use_VB it_PRP because_IN Thakombau_NNP '_POS s_PRP eldest_JJ son_NN had_VBD sat_VBN upon_IN it_PRP ._.
There_EX was_VBD always_RB a_DT family_NN or_CC clan_NN of_IN commoners_NNS who_WP were_VBD exempt_JJ from_IN
this_DT danger_NN ._. I_PRP was_VBD talking_VBG about_IN this_DT once_RB to_TO Thakombau_NNP ._. '_'' Oh_UH yes_UH ,'_.
said_VBD he_PRP ._. '_'' Here_RB ,_, So-and_NNP -_: so_RB !_. come_VB and_CC scratch_VB my_PRP$ back_NN .'_IN The_DT man_NN
scratched_VBN ;_: he_PRP was_VBD one_CD of_IN those_DT who_WP could_MD do_VB it_PRP with_IN impunity_NN ."_NNS The_DT
name_NN of_IN the_DT men_NNS thus_RB highly_RB privileged_JJ was_VBD Na_NNP nduka_CD ni_NNS ,_, or_CC the_DT
dirt_NN of_IN the_DT chief_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT evil_JJ effects_NNS thus_RB supposed_VBN to_TO follow_VB upon_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT
vessels_NNS or_CC clothes_NNS of_IN the_DT Mikado_NNP and_CC a_DT Fijian_JJ chief_NN we_PRP see_VBP that_IN
other_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT god-man_NN '_'' s_PRP character_NN to_TO which_WDT attention_NN has_VBZ been_VBN
already_RB called_VBN ._. The_DT divine_JJ person_NN is_VBZ a_DT source_NN of_IN danger_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN
of_IN blessing_NN ;_: he_PRP must_MD not_RB only_RB be_VB guarded_VBN ,_, he_PRP must_MD also_RB be_VB guarded_VBN
against_IN ._. His_PRP$ sacred_JJ organism_NN ,_, so_RB delicate_JJ that_IN a_DT touch_NN may_MD disorder_VB
it_PRP ,_, is_VBZ also_RB ,_, as_IN it_PRP were_VBD ,_, electrically_RB charged_VBN with_IN a_DT powerful_JJ
magical_JJ or_CC spiritual_JJ force_NN which_WDT may_MD discharge_VB itself_PRP with_IN fatal_JJ
effect_NN on_IN whatever_WDT comes_VBZ in_IN contact_NN with_IN it_PRP ._. Accordingly_RB the_DT
isolation_NN of_IN the_DT man-god_NN is_VBZ quite_RB as_RB necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT safety_NN of_IN
others_NNS as_IN for_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ._. His_PRP$ magical_JJ virtue_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT strictest_NN sense_NN
of_IN the_DT word_NN contagious_VBD :_: his_PRP$ divinity_NN is_VBZ a_DT fire_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, under_IN proper_JJ
restraints_NNS ,_, confers_VBZ endless_JJ blessings_NNS ,_, but_CC ,_, if_IN rashly_RB touched_VBN or_CC
allowed_VBN to_TO break_VB bounds_NNS ,_, burns_NNS and_CC destroys_VBZ what_WP it_PRP touches_VBZ ._. Hence_RB
the_DT disastrous_JJ effects_NNS supposed_VBN to_TO attend_VB a_DT breach_NN of_IN taboo_NN ;_: the_DT
offender_NN has_VBZ thrust_VBN his_PRP$ hand_NN into_IN the_DT divine_JJ fire_NN ,_, which_WDT shrivels_VBZ up_RB
and_CC consumes_VBZ him_PRP on_IN the_DT spot_NN ._.

The_DT Nubas_NNP ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, who_WP inhabit_VBP the_DT wooded_JJ and_CC fertile_JJ range_NN of_IN
Jebel_NNP Nuba_NNP in_IN Eastern_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, believe_VBP that_IN they_PRP would_MD die_VB if_IN they_PRP
entered_VBD the_DT house_NN of_IN their_PRP$ priestly_JJ king_NN ;_: however_RB ,_, they_PRP can_MD evade_FW
the_DT penalty_NN of_IN their_PRP$ intrusion_NN by_IN baring_VBG the_DT left_JJ shoulder_NN and_CC
getting_VBG the_DT king_NN to_TO lay_VB his_PRP$ hand_NN on_IN it_PRP ._. And_CC were_VBD any_DT man_NN to_TO sit_VB on_IN a_DT
stone_NN which_WDT the_DT king_NN has_VBZ consecrated_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ use_NN ,_, the_DT
transgressor_NN would_MD die_VB within_IN the_DT year_NN ._. The_DT Cazembes_NNP of_IN Angola_NNP
regard_VB their_PRP$ king_NN as_IN so_RB holy_JJ that_IN no_DT one_NN can_MD touch_VB him_PRP without_IN being_VBG
killed_VBN by_IN the_DT magical_JJ power_NN which_WDT pervades_VBZ his_PRP$ sacred_JJ person_NN ._. But_CC
since_IN contact_NN with_IN him_PRP is_VBZ sometimes_RB unavoidable_JJ ,_, they_PRP have_VBP devised_VBN a_DT
means_VBZ whereby_WRB the_DT sinner_NN can_MD escape_VB with_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ._. Kneeling_VBG down_IN
before_IN the_DT king_NN he_PRP touches_VBZ the_DT back_NN of_IN the_DT royal_JJ hand_NN with_IN the_DT back_NN
of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, then_RB snaps_VBZ his_PRP$ fingers_NNS ;_: afterwards_RB he_PRP lays_VBZ the_DT palm_NN of_IN
his_PRP$ hand_NN on_IN the_DT palm_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN '_POS s_PRP hand_NN ,_, then_RB snaps_VBZ his_PRP$ fingers_NNS
again_RB ._. This_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN four_CD or_CC five_CD times_NNS ,_, and_CC averts_VBD the_DT
imminent_JJ danger_NN of_IN death_NN ._. In_IN Tonga_NNP it_PRP was_VBD believed_VBN that_IN if_IN any_DT one_CD
fed_VBN himself_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ hands_NNS after_IN touching_VBG the_DT sacred_JJ person_NN of_IN a_DT
superior_JJ chief_NN or_CC anything_NN that_WDT belonged_VBD to_TO him_PRP ,_, he_PRP would_MD swell_VB up_IN
and_CC die_VBP ;_: the_DT sanctity_NN of_IN the_DT chief_NN ,_, like_IN a_DT virulent_JJ poison_NN ,_, infected_VBN
the_DT hands_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ inferior_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, being_VBG communicated_VBN through_IN them_PRP to_TO
the_DT food_NN ,_, proved_VBD fatal_JJ to_TO the_DT eater_NN ._. A_DT commoner_NN who_WP had_VBD incurred_VBN
this_DT danger_NN could_MD disinfect_VB himself_PRP by_IN performing_VBG a_DT certain_JJ
ceremony_NN ,_, which_WDT consisted_VBD in_IN touching_VBG the_DT sole_NN of_IN a_DT chief_NN '_'' s_PRP foot_NN
with_IN the_DT palm_NN and_CC back_RB of_IN each_DT of_IN his_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, and_CC afterwards_RB rinsing_VBG
his_PRP$ hands_NNS in_IN water_NN ._. If_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT water_NN near_IN ,_, he_PRP rubbed_VBD his_PRP$ hands_NNS
with_IN the_DT juicy_JJ stem_NN of_IN a_DT plantain_NN or_CC banana_NN ._. After_IN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD free_JJ
to_TO feed_VB himself_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ hands_NNS without_IN danger_NN of_IN being_VBG attacked_VBN
by_IN the_DT malady_NN which_WDT would_MD otherwise_RB follow_VB from_IN eating_VBG with_IN tabooed_NN
or_CC sanctified_VBD hands_NNS ._. But_CC until_IN the_DT ceremony_NN of_IN expiation_NN or_CC
disinfection_NN had_VBD been_VBN performed_VBN ,_, if_IN he_PRP wished_VBD to_TO eat_VB he_PRP had_VBD either_CC
to_TO get_VB some_DT one_CD to_TO feed_VB him_PRP ,_, or_CC else_RB to_TO go_VB down_RP on_IN his_PRP$ knees_NNS and_CC
pick_VB up_RP the_DT food_NN from_IN the_DT ground_NN with_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN like_IN a_DT beast_NN ._. He_PRP
might_MD not_RB even_RB use_VB a_DT toothpick_NN himself_PRP ,_, but_CC might_MD guide_VB the_DT hand_NN of_IN
another_DT person_NN holding_VBG the_DT toothpick_NN ._. The_DT Tongans_NNPS were_VBD subject_JJ to_TO
induration_NN of_IN the_DT liver_NN and_CC certain_JJ forms_NNS of_IN scrofula_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP
often_RB attributed_VBD to_TO a_DT failure_NN to_TO perform_VB the_DT requisite_JJ expiation_NN
after_IN having_VBG inadvertently_RB touched_VBN a_DT chief_NN or_CC his_PRP$ belongings_NNS ._. Hence_RB
they_PRP often_RB went_VBD through_IN the_DT ceremony_NN as_IN a_DT precaution_NN ,_, without_IN
knowing_VBG that_IN they_PRP had_VBD done_VBN anything_NN to_TO call_VB for_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT king_NN of_IN
Tonga_NNP could_MD not_RB refuse_VB to_TO play_VB his_PRP$ part_NN in_IN the_DT rite_NN by_IN presenting_VBG
his_PRP$ foot_NN to_TO such_JJ as_IN desired_VBN to_TO touch_VB it_PRP ,_, even_RB when_WRB they_PRP applied_VBD to_TO
him_PRP at_IN an_DT inconvenient_JJ time_NN ._. A_DT fat_JJ unwieldy_JJ king_NN ,_, who_WP perceived_VBD his_PRP$
subjects_NNS approaching_VBG with_IN this_DT intention_NN ,_, while_IN he_PRP chanced_VBD to_TO be_VB
taking_VBG his_PRP$ walks_NNS abroad_RB ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN sometimes_RB seen_VBN to_TO waddle_VB as_RB fast_RB
as_IN his_PRP$ legs_NNS could_MD carry_VB him_PRP out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ way_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO escape_VB the_DT
importunate_JJ and_CC not_RB wholly_RB disinterested_JJ expression_NN of_IN their_PRP$ homage_NN ._.
If_IN any_DT one_CD fancied_JJ he_PRP might_MD have_VB already_RB unwittingly_RB eaten_VBN with_IN
tabooed_JJ hands_NNS ,_, he_PRP sat_VBD down_RB before_IN the_DT chief_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, taking_VBG the_DT chief_NN '_POS s_PRP

might_MD not_RB injure_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP might_MD not_RB swell_VB up_RP and_CC die_VB ._. Since_IN

tabooed_JJ hands_NNS ,_, we_PRP may_MD conjecture_VB that_IN persons_NNS who_WP suffered_VBD from_IN it_PRP

from_IN a_DT belief_NN ,_, like_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT Tongans_NNS ,_, that_IN it_PRP was_VBD caused_VBN as_RB well_RB
as_IN cured_VBN by_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT divine_JJ majesty_NN of_IN kings_NNS ._.

In_IN New_NNP Zealand_NNP the_DT dread_NN of_IN the_DT sanctity_NN of_IN chiefs_NNS was_VBD at_IN least_JJS as_IN
great_JJ as_IN in_IN Tonga_NNP ._. Their_PRP$ ghostly_JJ power_NN ,_, derived_VBN from_IN an_DT ancestral_JJ
spirit_NN ,_, diffused_VBD itself_PRP by_IN contagion_NN over_IN everything_NN they_PRP touched_VBD ,_,
and_CC could_MD strike_VB dead_JJ all_DT who_WP rashly_RB or_CC unwittingly_RB meddled_VBN with_IN it_PRP ._.
For_IN instance_NN ,_, it_PRP once_RB happened_VBD that_IN a_DT New_NNP Zealand_NNP chief_NN of_IN high_JJ rank_NN
and_CC great_JJ sanctity_NN had_VBD left_VBN the_DT remains_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ dinner_NN by_IN the_DT
wayside_NN ._. A_DT slave_NN ,_, a_DT stout_NN ,_, hungry_JJ fellow_NN ,_, coming_VBG up_RP after_IN the_DT chief_NN
had_VBD gone_VBN ,_, saw_VBD the_DT unfinished_JJ dinner_NN ,_, and_CC ate_VBD it_PRP up_RP without_IN asking_VBG
questions_NNS ._. Hardly_RB had_VBD he_PRP finished_VBD when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD informed_VBN by_IN a_DT
horror-stricken_JJ spectator_NN that_IN the_DT food_NN of_IN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD eaten_VBN was_VBD
the_DT chief_NN '_POS s_PRP ._. "_'' I_PRP knew_VBD the_DT unfortunate_JJ delinquent_NN well_RB ._. He_PRP was_VBD
remarkable_JJ for_IN courage_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD signalised_VBN himself_PRP in_IN the_DT wars_NNS of_IN
the_DT tribe_NN ,"_, but_CC "_`` no_UH sooner_RBR did_VBD he_PRP hear_VB the_DT fatal_JJ news_NN than_IN he_PRP was_VBD
seized_VBN by_IN the_DT most_RBS extraordinary_JJ convulsions_NNS and_CC cramp_NN in_IN the_DT
stomach_NN ,_, which_WDT never_RB ceased_VBD till_IN he_PRP died_VBD ,_, about_IN sundown_NN the_DT same_JJ
day_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD a_DT strong_JJ man_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT prime_JJ of_IN life_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN any_DT pakeha_NN
[_JJ European_JJ ]_SYM freethinker_JJR should_MD have_VB said_VBD he_PRP was_VBD not_RB killed_VBN by_IN the_DT
tapu_NN of_IN the_DT chief_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN communicated_VBN to_TO the_DT food_NN by_IN
contact_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD have_VB been_VBN listened_VBD to_TO with_IN feelings_NNS of_IN contempt_NN
for_IN his_PRP$ ignorance_NN and_CC inability_NN to_TO understand_VB plain_JJ and_CC direct_JJ
evidence_NN ."_VBP This_DT is_VBZ not_RB a_DT solitary_JJ case_NN ._. A_DT Maori_NNP woman_NN having_VBG eaten_VBN
of_IN some_DT fruit_NN ,_, and_CC being_VBG afterwards_RB told_VBN that_IN the_DT fruit_NN had_VBD been_VBN
taken_VBN from_IN a_DT tabooed_JJ place_NN ,_, exclaimed_VBD that_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT chief_NN ,_,
whose_WP$ sanctity_NN had_VBD been_VBN thus_RB profaned_VBN ,_, would_MD kill_VB her_PRP ._. This_DT was_VBD in_IN
the_DT afternoon_NN ,_, and_CC next_JJ day_NN by_IN twelve_CD o_IN '_'' clock_NN she_PRP was_VBD dead_JJ ._. A_DT Maori_NNP
chief_NN '_POS s_PRP tinder-box_NN was_VBD once_RB the_DT means_NNS of_IN killing_VBG several_JJ persons_NNS ;_:
for_IN ,_, having_VBG been_VBN lost_VBN by_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC found_VBN by_IN some_DT men_NNS who_WP used_VBD it_PRP to_TO
light_JJ their_PRP$ pipes_NNS ,_, they_PRP died_VBD of_IN fright_NN on_IN learning_VBG to_TO whom_WP it_PRP had_VBD
belonged_VBD ._. So_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, the_DT garments_NNS of_IN a_DT high_JJ New_NNP Zealand_NNP chief_NN will_MD
kill_VB any_DT one_NN else_RB who_WP wears_VBZ them_PRP ._. A_DT chief_NN was_VBD observed_VBN by_IN a_DT
missionary_JJ to_TO throw_VB down_RP a_DT precipice_NN a_DT blanket_NN which_WDT he_PRP found_VBD too_RB
heavy_JJ to_TO carry_VB ._. Being_VBG asked_VBN by_IN the_DT missionary_NN why_WRB he_PRP did_VBD not_RB leave_VB
it_PRP on_IN a_DT tree_NN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN a_DT future_JJ traveller_NN ,_, the_DT chief_NN replied_VBD
that_IN "_`` it_PRP was_VBD the_DT fear_NN of_IN its_PRP$ being_VBG taken_VBN by_IN another_DT which_WDT caused_VBD him_PRP
to_TO throw_VB it_PRP where_WRB he_PRP did_VBD ,_, for_IN if_IN it_PRP were_VBD worn_VBN ,_, his_PRP$ tapu_NN "_'' (_-LRB- that_DT is_VBZ ,_,
his_PRP$ spiritual_JJ power_NN communicated_VBN by_IN contact_NN to_TO the_DT blanket_NN and_CC
through_IN the_DT blanket_NN to_TO the_DT man_NN )_-RRB- "_`` would_MD kill_VB the_DT person_NN ."_NN For_IN a_DT
similar_JJ reason_NN a_DT Maori_NNP chief_NN would_MD not_RB blow_VB a_DT fire_NN with_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN ;_:
for_IN his_PRP$ sacred_JJ breath_NN would_MD communicate_VB its_PRP$ sanctity_NN to_TO the_DT fire_NN ,_,
which_WDT would_MD pass_VB it_PRP on_RP to_TO the_DT pot_NN on_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD pass_VB it_PRP
on_IN to_TO the_DT meat_NN in_IN the_DT pot_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD pass_VB it_PRP on_RP to_TO the_DT man_NN who_WP ate_VBD
the_DT meat_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD in_IN the_DT pot_NN ,_, which_WDT stood_VBD on_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD
breathed_VBD on_IN by_IN the_DT chief_NN ;_: so_RB that_IN the_DT eater_NN ,_, infected_VBN by_IN the_DT chief_NN '_POS s_PRP
breath_NN conveyed_VBD through_IN these_DT intermediaries_NNS ,_, would_MD surely_RB die_VB ._.

Thus_RB in_IN the_DT Polynesian_NNP race_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT the_DT Maoris_NNP belong_VBP ,_,
superstition_NN erected_VBD round_RB the_DT persons_NNS of_IN sacred_JJ chiefs_NNS a_DT real_JJ ,_,
though_IN at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN purely_RB imaginary_JJ barrier_NN ,_, to_TO transgress_VB
which_WDT actually_RB entailed_VBD the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT transgressor_NN whenever_WRB he_PRP
became_VBD aware_JJ of_IN what_WP he_PRP had_VBD done_VBN ._. This_DT fatal_JJ power_NN of_IN the_DT
imagination_NN working_VBG through_IN superstitious_JJ terrors_NNS is_VBZ by_IN no_DT means_NNS
confined_VBN to_TO one_CD race_NN ;_: it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB common_JJ among_IN savages_NNS ._. For_IN
example_NN ,_, among_IN the_DT aborigines_NNS of_IN Australia_NNP a_DT native_NN will_MD die_VB after_IN
the_DT infliction_NN of_IN even_RB the_DT most_RBS superficial_JJ wound_NN ,_, if_IN only_RB he_PRP
believes_VBZ that_IN the_DT weapon_NN which_WDT inflicted_VBD the_DT wound_NN had_VBD been_VBN sung_VBN
over_IN and_CC thus_RB endowed_VBN with_IN magical_JJ virtue_NN ._. He_PRP simply_RB lies_VBZ down_RB ,_,
refuses_VBZ food_NN ,_, and_CC pines_NNS away_RB ._. Similarly_RB among_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Indian_NNP
tribes_NNS of_IN Brazil_NNP ,_, if_IN the_DT medicine-man_NN predicted_VBD the_DT death_NN of_IN any_DT one_CD
who_WP had_VBD offended_VBN him_PRP ,_, "_`` the_DT wretch_NN took_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ hammock_NN instantly_RB in_IN
such_JJ full_JJ expectation_NN of_IN dying_VBG ,_, that_IN he_PRP would_MD neither_RB eat_VB nor_CC drink_VB ,_,
and_CC the_DT prediction_NN was_VBD a_DT sentence_NN which_WDT faith_NN effectually_RB executed_VBN ."_.



2._. Mourners_NNP tabooed_.

THUS_PRP regarding_VBG his_PRP$ sacred_JJ chiefs_NNS and_CC kings_NNS as_IN charged_VBN with_IN a_DT
mysterious_JJ spiritual_JJ force_NN which_WDT so_RB to_TO say_VB explodes_NNS at_IN contact_NN ,_, the_DT
savage_JJ naturally_RB ranks_NNS them_PRP among_IN the_DT dangerous_JJ classes_NNS of_IN society_NN ,_,
and_CC imposes_VBZ upon_IN them_PRP the_DT same_JJ sort_NN of_IN restraints_NNS that_WDT he_PRP lays_VBD on_IN
manslayers_NNS ,_, menstruous_JJ women_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ persons_NNS whom_WP he_PRP looks_VBZ upon_IN
with_IN a_DT certain_JJ fear_NN and_CC horror_NN ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, sacred_JJ kings_NNS and_CC
priests_NNS in_IN Polynesia_NNP were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO touch_VB food_NN with_IN their_PRP$
hands_NNS ,_, and_CC had_VBD therefore_RB to_TO be_VB fed_VBN by_IN others_NNS ;_: and_CC as_IN we_PRP have_VBP just_RB
seen_VBN ,_, their_PRP$ vessels_NNS ,_, garments_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ property_NN might_MD not_RB be_VB used_VBN
by_IN others_NNS on_IN pain_NN of_IN disease_NN and_CC death_NN ._. Now_RB precisely_RB the_DT same_JJ
observances_NNS are_VBP exacted_VBN by_IN some_DT savages_NNS from_IN girls_NNS at_IN their_PRP$ first_JJ
menstruation_NN ,_, women_NNS after_IN childbirth_NN ,_, homicides_NNS ,_, mourners_NNS ,_, and_CC all_PDT
persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP come_VBN into_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._. Thus_RB ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_,
to_TO begin_VB with_IN the_DT last_JJ class_NN of_IN persons_NNS ,_, among_IN the_DT Maoris_NNP any_DT one_CD
who_WP had_VBD handled_VBN a_DT corpse_NN ,_, helped_VBN to_TO convey_VB it_PRP to_TO the_DT grave_NN ,_, or_CC
touched_VBN a_DT dead_JJ man_NN '_'' s_PRP bones_NNS ,_, was_VBD cut_VBN off_RP from_IN all_DT intercourse_NN and_CC
almost_RB all_DT communication_NN with_IN mankind_NN ._. He_PRP could_MD not_RB enter_VB any_DT house_NN ,_,
or_CC come_VBP into_IN contact_NN with_IN any_DT person_NN or_CC thing_NN ,_, without_IN utterly_RB
bedevilling_VBG them_PRP ._. He_PRP might_MD not_RB even_RB touch_VB food_NN with_IN his_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, which_WDT
had_VBD become_VBN so_RB frightfully_RB tabooed_VBN or_CC unclean_JJ as_IN to_TO be_VB quite_RB useless_JJ ._.
Food_NN would_MD be_VB set_VBN for_IN him_PRP on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP would_MD then_RB sit_VB or_CC
kneel_VB down_RB ,_, and_CC ,_, with_IN his_PRP$ hands_NNS carefully_RB held_VBN behind_IN his_PRP$ back_NN ,_,
would_MD gnaw_VB at_IN it_PRP as_RB best_RB he_PRP could_MD ._. In_IN some_DT cases_NNS he_PRP would_MD be_VB fed_VBN by_IN
another_DT person_NN ,_, who_WP with_IN outstretched_JJ arm_NN contrived_VBD to_TO do_VB it_PRP without_IN
touching_VBG the_DT tabooed_JJ man_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT feeder_NN was_VBD himself_PRP subjected_VBN to_TO
many_JJ severe_JJ restrictions_NNS ,_, little_RB less_RBR onerous_JJ than_IN those_DT which_WDT were_VBD
imposed_VBN upon_IN the_DT other_JJ ._. In_IN almost_RB every_DT populous_JJ village_NN there_RB lived_VBD
a_DT degraded_VBD wretch_NN ,_, the_DT lowest_JJS of_IN the_DT low_JJ ,_, who_WP earned_VBD a_DT sorry_JJ
pittance_NN by_IN thus_RB waiting_VBG upon_IN the_DT defiled_JJ ._. Clad_NNP in_IN rags_NNS ,_, daubed_VBN from_IN
head_NN to_TO foot_NN with_IN red_JJ ochre_NN and_CC stinking_VBG shark_NN oil_NN ,_, always_RB solitary_JJ
and_CC silent_JJ ,_, generally_RB old_JJ ,_, haggard_JJ ,_, and_CC wizened_VBD ,_, often_RB half_DT crazed_JJ ,_,
he_PRP might_MD be_VB seen_VBN sitting_VBG motionless_JJ all_DT day_NN apart_RB from_IN the_DT common_JJ
path_NN or_CC thoroughfare_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, gazing_VBG with_IN lack-lustre_JJ eyes_NNS on_IN
the_DT busy_JJ doings_NNS in_IN which_WDT he_PRP might_MD never_RB take_VB a_DT part_NN ._. Twice_RB a_DT day_NN a_DT
dole_NN of_IN food_NN would_MD be_VB thrown_VBN on_IN the_DT ground_NN before_IN him_PRP to_TO munch_VB as_IN
well_RB as_IN he_PRP could_MD without_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN his_PRP$ hands_NNS ;_: and_CC at_IN night_NN ,_,
huddling_VBG his_PRP$ greasy_JJ tatters_NNS about_IN him_PRP ,_, he_PRP would_MD crawl_VB into_IN some_DT
miserable_JJ lair_NN of_IN leaves_NNS and_CC refuse_NN ,_, where_WRB ,_, dirty_JJ ,_, cold_JJ ,_, and_CC hungry_JJ ,_,
he_PRP passed_VBD ,_, in_IN broken_VBN ghost-haunted_JJ slumbers_NNS ,_, a_DT wretched_JJ night_NN as_IN a_DT
prelude_NN to_TO another_DT wretched_JJ day_NN ._. Such_DT was_VBD the_DT only_JJ human_NN being_VBG
deemed_VBN fit_NN to_TO associate_VB at_IN arm_NN '_'' s_PRP length_NN with_IN one_NN who_WP had_VBD paid_VBN the_DT
last_JJ offices_NNS of_IN respect_NN and_CC friendship_NN to_TO the_DT dead_JJ ._. And_CC when_WRB ,_, the_DT
dismal_JJ term_NN of_IN his_PRP$ seclusion_NN being_VBG over_RB ,_, the_DT mourner_NN was_VBD about_RB to_TO
mix_NN with_IN his_PRP$ fellows_NNS once_RB more_RBR ,_, all_PDT the_DT dishes_NNS he_PRP had_VBD used_VBN in_IN his_PRP$
seclusion_NN were_VBD diligently_RB smashed_VBN ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT garments_NNS he_PRP had_VBD worn_VBN
were_VBD carefully_RB thrown_VBN away_RB ,_, lest_IN they_PRP should_MD spread_VB the_DT contagion_NN of_IN
his_PRP$ defilement_NN among_IN others_NNS ,_, just_RB as_IN the_DT vessels_NNS and_CC clothes_NNS of_IN
sacred_JJ kings_NNS and_CC chiefs_NNS are_VBP destroyed_VBN or_CC cast_VBN away_RB for_IN a_DT similar_JJ
reason_NN ._. So_RB complete_JJ in_IN these_DT respects_NNS is_VBZ the_DT analogy_NN which_WDT the_DT
savage_JJ traces_NNS between_IN the_DT spiritual_JJ influences_NNS that_WDT emanate_VBP from_IN
divinities_NNS and_CC from_IN the_DT dead_JJ ,_, between_IN the_DT odour_NN of_IN sanctity_NN and_CC the_DT
stench_NN of_IN corruption_NN ._.

The_DT rule_NN which_WDT forbids_VBZ persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT
dead_JJ to_TO touch_VB food_NN with_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS would_MD seem_VB to_TO have_VB been_VBN
universal_JJ in_IN Polynesia_NNP ._. Thus_RB in_IN Samoa_NNP "_`` those_DT who_WP attended_VBD the_DT
deceased_JJ were_VBD most_RBS careful_JJ not_RB to_TO handle_VB food_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN days_NNS were_VBD fed_VBN
by_IN others_NNS as_IN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD helpless_JJ infants_NNS ._. Baldness_NN and_CC the_DT loss_NN of_IN
teeth_NNS were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT punishment_NN inflicted_VBN by_IN the_DT household_NN
god_NN if_IN they_PRP violated_VBD the_DT rule_NN ."_RB Again_RB ,_, in_IN Tonga_NNP ,_, "_`` no_DT person_NN can_MD
touch_VB a_DT dead_JJ chief_NN without_IN being_VBG taboo_NN '_POS d_NN for_IN ten_CD lunar_JJ months_NNS ,_,
except_IN chiefs_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP only_RB taboo_JJ '_'' d_NN for_IN three_CD ,_, four_CD ,_, or_CC five_CD months_NNS ,_,
according_VBG to_TO the_DT superiority_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ chief_NN ;_: except_IN again_RB it_PRP be_VB
the_DT body_NN of_IN Tooitonga_NNP [_VBD the_DT great_JJ divine_JJ chief_NN ],_NN and_CC then_RB even_RB the_DT
greatest_JJS chief_NN would_MD be_VB taboo_JJ '_'' d_NN ten_CD months_NNS ._. ._. ._. ._. During_IN the_DT time_NN a_DT
man_NN is_VBZ taboo_JJ '_'' d_NN he_PRP must_MD not_RB feed_VB himself_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ hands_NNS ,_, but_CC must_MD
be_VB fed_VBN by_IN somebody_NN else_RB :_: he_PRP must_MD not_RB even_RB use_VB a_DT toothpick_NN himself_PRP ,_,
but_CC must_MD guide_VB another_DT person_NN '_POS s_VBZ hand_NN holding_VBG the_DT toothpick_NN ._. If_IN he_PRP is_VBZ
hungry_JJ and_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT one_NN to_TO feed_VB him_PRP ,_, he_PRP must_MD go_VB down_RP upon_IN his_PRP$
hands_NNS and_CC knees_NNS ,_, and_CC pick_VB up_RP his_PRP$ victuals_NNS with_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN :_: and_CC if_IN he_PRP
infringes_VBZ upon_IN any_DT of_IN these_DT rules_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ firmly_RB expected_VBN that_IN he_PRP
will_MD swell_VB up_RB and_CC die_VB ."_.

Among_IN the_DT Shuswap_NNP of_IN British_NNP Columbia_NNP widows_NNS and_CC widowers_NNS in_IN
mourning_VBG are_VBP secluded_VBN and_CC forbidden_VBN to_TO touch_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ head_NN or_CC body_NN ;_:
the_DT cups_NNS and_CC cooking-vessels_NNS which_WDT they_PRP use_VBP may_MD be_VB used_VBN by_IN no_DT one_CD
else_RB ._. They_PRP must_MD build_VB a_DT sweat-house_NN beside_IN a_DT creek_NN ,_, sweat_NN there_RB all_PDT
night_NN and_CC bathe_VB regularly_RB ,_, after_IN which_WDT they_PRP must_MD rub_VB their_PRP$ bodies_NNS
with_IN branches_NNS of_IN spruce_NN ._. The_DT branches_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB used_VBN more_RBR than_IN
once_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP have_VBP served_VBN their_PRP$ purpose_NN they_PRP are_VBP stuck_VBN into_IN
the_DT ground_NN all_DT round_VBP the_DT hut_NN ._. No_DT hunter_NN would_MD come_VB near_IN such_JJ
mourners_NNS ,_, for_IN their_PRP$ presence_NN is_VBZ unlucky_JJ ._. If_IN their_PRP$ shadow_NN were_VBD to_TO
fall_NN on_IN any_DT one_CD ,_, he_PRP would_MD be_VB taken_VBN ill_JJ at_IN once_RB ._. They_PRP employ_VBP thorn_NN
bushes_NNS for_IN bed_NN and_CC pillow_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO keep_VB away_RB the_DT ghost_NN of_IN the_DT
deceased_JJ ;_: and_CC thorn_JJ bushes_NNS are_VBP also_RB laid_VBN all_DT around_IN their_PRP$ beds_NNS ._. This_DT
last_JJ precaution_NN shows_VBZ clearly_RB what_WP the_DT spiritual_JJ danger_NN is_VBZ which_WDT
leads_VBZ to_TO the_DT exclusion_NN of_IN such_JJ persons_NNS from_IN ordinary_JJ society_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ
simply_RB a_DT fear_NN of_IN the_DT ghost_NN who_WP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB hovering_VBG near_IN them_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT Mekeo_NNP district_NN of_IN British_JJ New_NNP Guinea_NNP a_DT widower_NN loses_VBZ all_DT his_PRP$
civil_JJ rights_NNS and_CC becomes_VBZ a_DT social_JJ outcast_NN ,_, an_DT object_NN of_IN fear_NN and_CC
horror_NN ,_, shunned_VBN by_IN all_DT ._. He_PRP may_MD not_RB cultivate_VB a_DT garden_NN ,_, nor_CC show_VB
himself_PRP in_IN public_JJ ,_, nor_CC traverse_VB the_DT village_NN ,_, nor_CC walk_VB on_IN the_DT roads_NNS
and_CC paths_NNS ._. Like_IN a_DT wild_JJ beast_NN he_PRP must_MD skulk_VB in_IN the_DT long_JJ grass_NN and_CC the_DT
bushes_NNS ;_: and_CC if_IN he_PRP sees_VBZ or_CC hears_VBZ any_DT one_NN coming_VBG ,_, especially_RB a_DT woman_NN ,_,
he_PRP must_MD hide_VB behind_IN a_DT tree_NN or_CC a_DT thicket_NN ._. If_IN he_PRP wishes_VBZ to_TO fish_NN or_CC
hunt_NN ,_, he_PRP must_MD do_VB it_PRP alone_RB and_CC at_IN night_NN ._. If_IN he_PRP would_MD consult_VB any_DT one_NN ,_,
even_RB the_DT missionary_JJ ,_, he_PRP does_VBZ so_RB by_IN stealth_NN and_CC at_IN night_NN ;_: he_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO
have_VB lost_VBD his_PRP$ voice_NN and_CC speaks_VBZ only_RB in_IN whispers_NNS ._. Were_VBD he_PRP to_TO join_VB a_DT
party_NN of_IN fishers_NNS or_CC hunters_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ presence_NN would_MD bring_VB misfortune_NN on_IN
them_PRP ;_: the_DT ghost_NN of_IN his_PRP$ dead_JJ wife_NN would_MD frighten_VB away_RP the_DT fish_NN or_CC the_DT
game_NN ._. He_PRP goes_VBZ about_RB everywhere_RB and_CC at_IN all_DT times_NNS armed_VBN with_IN a_DT
tomahawk_NN to_TO defend_VB himself_PRP ,_, not_RB only_RB against_IN wild_JJ boars_NNS in_IN the_DT
jungle_NN ,_, but_CC against_IN the_DT dreaded_VBN spirit_NN of_IN his_PRP$ departed_VBN spouse_NN ,_, who_WP
would_MD do_VB him_PRP an_DT ill_JJ turn_NN if_IN she_PRP could_MD ;_: for_IN all_DT the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ
are_VBP malignant_JJ and_CC their_PRP$ only_JJ delight_NN is_VBZ to_TO harm_VB the_DT living_NN ._.



3._. Women_NNP tabooed_VBD at_IN Menstruation_NNP and_CC Childbirth_NNP

IN_IN GENERAL_NNP ,_, we_PRP may_MD say_VB that_IN the_DT prohibition_NN to_TO use_VB the_DT vessels_NNS ,_,
garments_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB of_IN certain_JJ persons_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT effects_NNS supposed_VBN
to_TO follow_VB an_DT infraction_NN of_IN the_DT rule_NN ,_, are_VBP exactly_RB the_DT same_JJ whether_IN
the_DT persons_NNS to_TO whom_WP the_DT things_NNS belong_VBP are_VBP sacred_JJ or_CC what_WP we_PRP might_MD
call_NN unclean_JJ and_CC polluted_JJ ._. As_IN the_DT garments_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN touched_VBN
by_IN a_DT sacred_JJ chief_NN kill_VB those_DT who_WP handle_VBP them_PRP ,_, so_RB do_VB the_DT things_NNS which_WDT
have_VBP been_VBN touched_VBN by_IN a_DT menstruous_JJ women_NNS ._. An_DT Australian_JJ blackfellow_NN ,_,
who_WP discovered_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN had_VBD lain_VBN on_IN his_PRP$ blanket_NN at_IN her_PRP$
menstrual_JJ period_NN ,_, killed_VBD her_PRP and_CC died_VBD of_IN terror_NN himself_PRP within_IN a_DT
fortnight_NN ._. Hence_RB Australian_JJ women_NNS at_IN these_DT times_NNS are_VBP forbidden_VBN under_IN
pain_NN of_IN death_NN to_TO touch_VB anything_NN that_IN men_NNS use_VBP ,_, or_CC even_RB to_TO walk_VB on_IN a_DT
path_NN that_IN any_DT man_NN frequents_NNS ._. They_PRP are_VBP also_RB secluded_VBN at_IN childbirth_NN ,_,
and_CC all_DT vessels_NNS used_VBN by_IN them_PRP during_IN their_PRP$ seclusion_NN are_VBP burned_VBN ._. In_IN
Uganda_NNP the_DT pots_NNS which_WDT a_DT woman_NN touches_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT impurity_NN of_IN
childbirth_NN or_CC of_IN menstruation_NN is_VBZ on_IN her_PRP ,_, should_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN ;_: spears_NNS
and_CC shields_NNS defiled_VBN by_IN her_PRP$ touch_NN are_VBP not_RB destroyed_VBN ,_, but_CC only_RB
purified_VBN ._. "_'' Among_IN all_PDT the_DT D_NNP �_VBD n_RB �_VB and_CC most_RBS other_JJ American_JJ tribes_NNS ,_, hardly_RB
any_DT other_JJ being_NN was_VBD the_DT object_NN of_IN so_RB much_JJ dread_NN as_IN a_DT menstruating_NN
woman_NN ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN signs_NNS of_IN that_DT condition_NN made_VBD themselves_PRP apparent_JJ
in_IN a_DT young_JJ girl_NN she_PRP was_VBD carefully_RB segregated_VBN from_IN all_DT but_CC female_NN
company_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD to_TO live_VB by_IN herself_PRP in_IN a_DT small_JJ hut_NN away_RB from_IN the_DT
gaze_NN of_IN the_DT villagers_NNS or_CC of_IN the_DT male_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT roving_VBG band_NN ._.
While_IN in_IN that_DT awful_JJ state_NN ,_, she_PRP had_VBD to_TO abstain_JJ from_IN touching_VBG anything_NN
belonging_VBG to_TO man_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT spoils_NNS of_IN any_DT venison_NN or_CC other_JJ animal_NN ,_, lest_IN
she_PRP would_MD thereby_RB pollute_VB the_DT same_JJ ,_, and_CC condemn_VB the_DT hunters_NNS to_TO
failure_NN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT anger_NN of_IN the_DT game_NN thus_RB slighted_VBD ._. Dried_VBN fish_NN
formed_VBD her_PRP$ diet_NN ,_, and_CC cold_JJ water_NN ,_, absorbed_VBN through_IN a_DT drinking_NN tube_NN ,_,
was_VBD her_PRP$ only_JJ beverage_NN ._. Moreover_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT very_JJ sight_NN of_IN her_PRP was_VBD
dangerous_JJ to_TO society_NN ,_, a_DT special_JJ skin_NN bonnet_NN ,_, with_IN fringes_NNS falling_VBG
over_IN her_PRP$ face_NN down_IN to_TO her_PRP$ breast_NN ,_, hid_VBD her_PRP from_IN the_DT public_JJ gaze_NN ,_, even_RB
some_DT time_NN after_IN she_PRP had_VBD recovered_VBN her_PRP$ normal_JJ state_NN ."_NN Among_IN the_DT
Bribri_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN Costa_NNP Rica_NNP a_DT menstruous_JJ woman_NN is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN
unclean_JJ ._. The_DT only_JJ plates_NNS she_PRP may_MD use_VB for_IN her_PRP$ food_NN are_VBP banana_NN leaves_NNS ,_,
which_WDT ,_, when_WRB she_PRP has_VBZ done_VBN with_IN them_PRP ,_, she_PRP throws_VBZ away_RB in_IN some_DT
sequestered_VBN spot_NN ;_: for_IN were_VBD a_DT cow_NN to_TO find_VB them_PRP and_CC eat_VB them_PRP ,_, the_DT
animal_NN would_MD waste_VB away_RB and_CC perish_JJ ._. And_CC she_PRP drinks_VBZ out_IN of_IN a_DT special_JJ
vessel_NN for_IN a_DT like_JJ reason_NN ;_: because_IN if_IN any_DT one_NN drank_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT same_JJ
cup_NN after_IN her_PRP ,_, he_PRP would_MD surely_RB die_VB ._.

Among_IN many_JJ peoples_NNS similar_JJ restrictions_NNS are_VBP imposed_VBN on_IN women_NNS in_IN
childbed_NN and_CC apparently_RB for_IN similar_JJ reasons_NNS ;_: at_IN such_JJ periods_NNS women_NNS
are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB in_IN a_DT dangerous_JJ condition_NN which_WDT would_MD infect_VB any_DT

until_IN ,_, with_IN the_DT recovery_NN of_IN their_PRP$ health_NN and_CC strength_NN ,_, the_DT imaginary_NN
danger_NN has_VBZ passed_VBN away_RB ._. Thus_RB ,_, in_IN Tahiti_NNP a_DT woman_NN after_IN childbirth_NN was_VBD
secluded_VBN for_IN a_DT fortnight_NN or_CC three_CD weeks_NNS in_IN a_DT temporary_JJ hut_NN erected_IN

from_IN touching_VBG provisions_NNS ,_, and_CC had_VBD to_TO be_VB fed_VBN by_IN another_DT ._. Further_RB ,_, if_IN
any_DT one_NN else_RB touched_VBD the_DT child_NN at_IN this_DT period_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD subjected_VBN to_TO
the_DT same_JJ restrictions_NNS as_IN the_DT mother_NN until_IN the_DT ceremony_NN of_IN her_PRP$
purification_NN had_VBD been_VBN performed_VBN ._. Similarly_RB in_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Kadiak_NNP ,_,
off_IN Alaska_NNP ,_, a_DT woman_NN about_IN to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN retires_NNS to_TO a_DT miserable_JJ low_NN
