the_DT birth_NN of_IN her_PRP$ child_NN ,_, whatever_WDT the_DT season_NN may_MD be_VB ,_, and_CC she_PRP is_VBZ
considered_VBN so_RB unclean_JJ that_IN no_DT one_NN will_MD touch_VB her_PRP ,_, and_CC food_NN is_VBZ
reached_VBN to_TO her_PRP on_IN sticks_NNS ._. The_DT Bribri_NNP Indians_NNPS regard_VBP the_DT pollution_NN of_IN
childbed_NN as_RB much_RB more_RBR dangerous_JJ even_RB than_IN that_DT of_IN menstruation_NN ._. When_WRB
a_DT woman_NN feels_VBZ her_PRP$ time_NN approaching_VBG ,_, she_PRP informs_VBZ her_PRP$ husband_NN ,_, who_WP
makes_VBZ haste_NN to_TO build_VB a_DT hut_NN for_IN her_PRP in_IN a_DT lonely_JJ spot_NN ._. There_EX she_PRP must_MD
live_VB alone_RB ,_, holding_VBG no_DT converse_NN with_IN anybody_NN save_IN her_PRP$ mother_NN or_CC
another_DT woman_NN ._. After_IN her_PRP$ delivery_NN the_DT medicine-man_NN purifies_VBZ her_PRP by_IN
breathing_NN on_IN her_PRP and_CC laying_VBG an_DT animal_NN ,_, it_PRP matters_VBZ not_RB what_WP ,_, upon_IN
her_PRP ._. But_CC even_RB this_DT ceremony_NN only_RB mitigates_VBZ her_PRP$ uncleanness_NN into_IN a_DT
state_NN considered_VBD to_TO be_VB equivalent_JJ to_TO that_DT of_IN a_DT menstruous_JJ woman_NN ;_: and_CC
for_IN a_DT full_JJ lunar_NN month_NN she_PRP must_MD live_VB apart_RB from_IN her_PRP$ housemates_NNS ,_,
observing_VBG the_DT same_JJ rules_NNS with_IN regard_NN to_TO eating_NN and_CC drinking_NN as_IN at_IN
her_PRP$ monthly_JJ periods_NNS ._. The_DT case_NN is_VBZ still_RB worse_JJR ,_, the_DT pollution_NN is_VBZ still_RB
more_RBR deadly_JJ ,_, if_IN she_PRP has_VBZ had_VBN a_DT miscarriage_NN or_CC has_VBZ been_VBN delivered_VBN of_IN a_DT
stillborn_JJ child_NN ._. In_IN that_DT case_NN she_PRP may_MD not_RB go_VB near_IN a_DT living_VBG soul_NN :_: the_DT
mere_JJ contact_NN with_IN things_NNS she_PRP has_VBZ used_VBN is_VBZ exceedingly_RB dangerous_JJ :_: her_PRP$
food_NN is_VBZ handed_VBN to_TO her_PRP at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN a_DT long_JJ stick_NN ._. This_DT lasts_VBZ
generally_RB for_IN three_CD weeks_NNS ,_, after_IN which_WDT she_PRP may_MD go_VB home_NN ,_, subject_NN only_RB
to_TO the_DT restrictions_NNS incident_NN to_TO an_DT ordinary_JJ confinement_NN ._.

Some_DT Bantu_NNP tribes_VBZ entertain_VB even_RB more_RBR exaggerated_JJ notions_NNS of_IN the_DT
virulent_NN infection_NN spread_VBN by_IN a_DT woman_NN who_WP has_VBZ had_VBN a_DT miscarriage_NN and_CC
has_VBZ concealed_VBN it_PRP ._. An_DT experienced_VBN observer_NN of_IN these_DT people_NNS tells_VBZ us_PRP
that_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN childbirth_NN "_`` appears_VBZ to_TO the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN the_DT South_NNP
Africans_NNPS to_TO be_VB tainted_VBN with_IN a_DT pollution_NN still_RB more_RBR dangerous_JJ than_IN
that_IN of_IN the_DT menstrual_JJ fluid_NN ._. The_DT husband_NN is_VBZ excluded_VBN from_IN the_DT hut_NN
for_IN eight_CD days_NNS of_IN the_DT lying-in_JJ period_NN ,_, chiefly_RB from_IN fear_NN that_IN he_PRP
might_MD be_VB contaminated_VBN by_IN this_DT secretion_NN ._. He_PRP dare_MD not_RB take_VB his_PRP$ child_NN
in_IN his_PRP$ arms_NNS for_IN the_DT three_CD first_JJ months_NNS after_IN the_DT birth_NN ._. But_CC the_DT
secretion_NN of_IN childbed_NN is_VBZ particularly_RB terrible_JJ when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT
product_NN of_IN a_DT miscarriage_NN ,_, especially_RB a_DT concealed_VBN miscarriage_NN ._. In_IN
this_DT case_NN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB merely_RB the_DT man_NN who_WP is_VBZ threatened_VBN or_CC killed_VBN ,_, it_PRP
is_VBZ the_DT whole_JJ country_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT sky_NN itself_PRP which_WDT suffers_VBZ ._. By_IN a_DT
curious_JJ association_NN of_IN ideas_NNS a_DT physiological_JJ fact_NN causes_VBZ cosmic_JJ
troubles_NNS !"_VBP As_IN for_IN the_DT disastrous_JJ effect_NN which_WDT a_DT miscarriage_NN may_MD have_VB
on_IN the_DT whole_JJ country_NN I_PRP will_MD quote_VB the_DT words_NNS of_IN a_DT medicine-man_NN and_CC
rain-maker_NN of_IN the_DT Ba-Pedi_NNP tribe_NN :_: "_`` When_WRB a_DT woman_NN has_VBZ had_VBN a_DT
miscarriage_NN ,_, when_WRB she_PRP has_VBZ allowed_VBN her_PRP$ blood_NN to_TO flow_VB ,_, and_CC has_VBZ hidden_VBN
the_DT child_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ enough_RB to_TO cause_VB the_DT burning_VBG winds_NNS to_TO blow_VB and_CC to_TO
parch_NN the_DT country_NN with_IN heat_NN ._. The_DT rain_NN no_RB longer_RB falls_VBZ ,_, for_IN the_DT
country_NN is_VBZ no_RB longer_RB in_IN order_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT rain_NN approaches_VBZ the_DT place_NN
where_WRB the_DT blood_NN is_VBZ ,_, it_PRP will_MD not_RB dare_VB to_TO approach_VB ._. It_PRP will_MD fear_VB and_CC
remain_VB at_IN a_DT distance_NN ._. That_DT woman_NN has_VBZ committed_VBN a_DT great_JJ fault_NN ._. She_PRP
has_VBZ spoiled_VBN the_DT country_NN of_IN the_DT chief_NN ,_, for_IN she_PRP has_VBZ hidden_VBN blood_NN which_WDT
had_VBD not_RB yet_RB been_VBN well_RB congealed_VBN to_TO fashion_VB a_DT man_NN ._. That_DT blood_NN is_VBZ
taboo_NN ._. It_PRP should_MD never_RB drip_VB on_IN the_DT road_NN !_. The_DT chief_NN will_MD assemble_VB his_PRP$
men_NNS and_CC say_VB to_TO them_PRP ,_, '_'' Are_VBP you_PRP in_IN order_NN in_IN your_PRP$ villages_NNS ?'_IN Some_DT one_CD
will_MD answer_VB ,_, '_'' Such_JJ and_CC such_JJ a_DT woman_NN was_VBD pregnant_JJ and_CC we_PRP have_VBP not_RB yet_RB
seen_VBN the_DT child_NN which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ given_VBN birth_NN to_TO .'_VB Then_RB they_PRP go_VBP and_CC
arrest_VB the_DT woman_NN ._. They_PRP say_VBP to_TO her_PRP ,_, '_'' Show_NNP us_PRP where_WRB you_PRP have_VBP hidden_VBN
it_PRP .'_VBD They_PRP go_VBP and_CC dig_VBP at_IN the_DT spot_NN ,_, they_PRP sprinkle_VBP the_DT hole_NN with_IN a_DT
decoction_NN of_IN two_CD sorts_NNS of_IN roots_NNS prepared_VBN in_IN a_DT special_JJ pot_NN ._. They_PRP take_VBP
a_DT little_JJ of_IN the_DT earth_NN of_IN this_DT grave_NN ,_, they_PRP throw_VBP it_PRP into_IN the_DT river_NN ,_,
then_RB they_PRP bring_VBP back_RP water_NN from_IN the_DT river_NN and_CC sprinkle_VB it_PRP where_WRB she_PRP
shed_VBD her_PRP$ blood_NN ._. She_PRP herself_PRP must_MD wash_VB every_DT day_NN with_IN the_DT medicine_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT country_NN will_MD be_VB moistened_JJ again_RB (_-LRB- by_IN rain_NN )._, Further_RB ,_, we_PRP
(_-LRB- medicine-men_NNS ),_VBN summon_IN the_DT women_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ;_: we_PRP tell_VBP them_PRP to_TO
prepare_VB a_DT ball_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN which_WDT contains_VBZ the_DT blood_NN ._. They_PRP bring_VBP it_PRP
to_TO us_PRP one_CD morning_NN ._. If_IN we_PRP wish_VBP to_TO prepare_VB medicine_NN with_IN which_WDT to_TO
sprinkle_NN the_DT whole_JJ country_NN ,_, we_PRP crumble_VB this_DT earth_NN to_TO powder_NN ;_: at_IN the_DT
end_NN of_IN five_CD days_NNS we_PRP send_VBP little_JJ boys_NNS and_CC little_JJ girls_NNS ,_, girls_NNS that_WDT
yet_RB know_VBP nothing_NN of_IN women_NNS '_POS s_VBZ affairs_NNS and_CC have_VBP not_RB yet_RB had_VBD relations_NNS
with_IN men_NNS ._. We_PRP put_VBD the_DT medicine_NN in_IN the_DT horns_NNS of_IN oxen_NNS ,_, and_CC these_DT
children_NNS go_VBP to_TO all_PDT the_DT fords_NNS ,_, to_TO all_DT the_DT entrances_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ._. A_DT
little_JJ girl_NN turns_VBZ up_RP the_DT soil_NN with_IN her_PRP$ mattock_NN ,_, the_DT others_NNS dip_VB a_DT
branch_NN in_IN the_DT horn_NN and_CC sprinkle_NN the_DT inside_NN of_IN the_DT hole_NN saying_VBG ,_,
'_POS Rain_NNP !_. rain_VB !'_RB So_IN we_PRP remove_VBP the_DT misfortune_NN which_WDT the_DT women_NNS have_VBP
brought_VBN on_IN the_DT roads_NNS ;_: the_DT rain_NN will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO come_VB ._. The_DT country_NN is_VBZ
purified_VBN !"_NN



4._. Warriors_NNS tabooed_.

ONCE_RB more_RBR ,_, warriors_NNS are_VBP conceived_VBN by_IN the_DT savage_JJ to_TO move_VB ,_, so_RB to_TO say_VB ,_,
in_IN an_DT atmosphere_NN of_IN spiritual_JJ danger_NN which_WDT constrains_VBZ them_PRP to_TO
practise_NN a_DT variety_NN of_IN superstitious_JJ observances_NNS quite_RB different_JJ in_IN
their_PRP$ nature_NN from_IN those_DT rational_JJ precautions_NNS which_WDT ,_, as_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN
course_NN ,_, they_PRP adopt_VBP against_IN foes_NNS of_IN flesh_NN and_CC blood_NN ._. The_DT general_NN
effect_NN of_IN these_DT observances_NNS is_VBZ to_TO place_VB the_DT warrior_NN ,_, both_DT before_RB and_CC
after_IN victory_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT same_JJ state_NN of_IN seclusion_NN or_CC spiritual_JJ
quarantine_NN in_IN which_WDT ,_, for_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ safety_NN ,_, primitive_JJ man_NN puts_VBZ his_PRP$
human_JJ gods_NNS and_CC other_JJ dangerous_JJ characters_NNS ._. Thus_RB when_WRB the_DT Maoris_NNP went_VBD
out_RB on_IN the_DT war-path_NN they_PRP were_VBD sacred_JJ or_CC taboo_JJ in_IN the_DT highest_JJS degree_NN ,_,
and_CC they_PRP and_CC their_PRP$ friends_NNS at_IN home_NN had_VBD to_TO observe_VB strictly_RB many_JJ
curious_JJ customs_NNS over_IN and_CC above_IN the_DT numerous_JJ taboos_NNS of_IN ordinary_JJ life_NN ._.
They_PRP became_VBD ,_, in_IN the_DT irreverent_JJ language_NN of_IN Europeans_NNPS who_WP knew_VBD them_PRP
in_IN the_DT old_JJ fighting_NN days_NNS ,_, "_'' tabooed_VBD an_DT inch_NN thick_JJ ";_NNS and_CC as_IN for_IN the_DT
leader_NN of_IN the_DT expedition_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD quite_RB unapproachable_JJ ._. Similarly_RB ,_,
when_WRB the_DT Israelites_NNPS marched_VBD forth_RB to_TO war_NN they_PRP were_VBD bound_VBN by_IN certain_JJ
rules_NNS of_IN ceremonial_NN purity_NN identical_JJ with_IN rules_NNS observed_VBN by_IN Maoris_NNP
and_CC Australian_JJ blackfellows_NNS on_IN the_DT war-path_NN ._. The_DT vessels_NNS they_PRP used_VBD
were_VBD sacred_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP had_VBD to_TO practise_VB continence_NN and_CC a_DT custom_NN of_IN
personal_JJ cleanliness_NN of_IN which_WDT the_DT original_JJ motive_NN ,_, if_IN we_PRP may_MD judge_VB
from_IN the_DT avowed_VBN motive_NN of_IN savages_NNS who_WP conform_VBP to_TO the_DT same_JJ custom_NN ,_,
was_VBD a_DT fear_NN lest_IN the_DT enemy_NN should_MD obtain_VB the_DT refuse_NN of_IN their_PRP$ persons_NNS ,_,
and_CC thus_RB be_VB enabled_VBN to_TO work_VB their_PRP$ destruction_NN by_IN magic_NN ._. Among_IN some_DT
Indian_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN North_NNP America_NNP a_DT young_JJ warrior_NN in_IN his_PRP$ first_JJ campaign_NN
had_VBD to_TO conform_VB to_TO certain_JJ customs_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT two_CD were_VBD identical_JJ with_IN
the_DT observances_NNS imposed_VBN by_IN the_DT same_JJ Indians_NNPS on_IN girls_NNS at_IN their_PRP$ first_JJ
menstruation_NN :_: the_DT vessels_NNS he_PRP ate_VBD and_CC drank_VBD out_IN of_IN might_MD be_VB touched_VBN
by_IN no_DT other_JJ person_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD forbidden_VBN to_TO scratch_VB his_PRP$ head_NN or_CC any_DT
other_JJ part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN with_IN his_PRP$ fingers_NNS ;_: if_IN he_PRP could_MD not_RB help_VB
scratching_VBG himself_PRP ,_, he_PRP had_VBD to_TO do_VB it_PRP with_IN a_DT stick_NN ._. The_DT latter_JJ rule_NN ,_,
like_IN the_DT one_NN which_WDT forbids_VBZ a_DT tabooed_JJ person_NN to_TO feed_VB himself_PRP with_IN his_PRP$
own_JJ fingers_NNS ,_, seems_VBZ to_TO rest_VB on_IN the_DT supposed_VBN sanctity_NN or_CC pollution_NN ,_,
whichever_WDT we_PRP choose_VBP to_TO call_VB it_PRP ,_, of_IN the_DT tabooed_JJ hands_NNS ._. Moreover_RB among_IN
these_DT Indian_JJ tribes_NNS the_DT men_NNS on_IN the_DT war-path_NN had_VBD always_RB to_TO sleep_VB at_IN
night_NN with_IN their_PRP$ faces_NNS turned_VBD towards_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ country_NN ;_: however_RB
uneasy_JJ the_DT posture_NN ,_, they_PRP might_MD not_RB change_VB it_PRP ._. They_PRP might_MD not_RB sit_VB
upon_IN the_DT bare_JJ ground_NN ,_, nor_CC wet_JJ their_PRP$ feet_NNS ,_, nor_CC walk_VB on_IN a_DT beaten_VBN path_NN
if_IN they_PRP could_MD help_VB it_PRP ;_: when_WRB they_PRP had_VBD no_DT choice_NN but_CC to_TO walk_VB on_IN a_DT
path_NN ,_, they_PRP sought_VBD to_TO counteract_VB the_DT ill_JJ effect_NN of_IN doing_VBG so_RB by_IN
doctoring_VBG their_PRP$ legs_NNS with_IN certain_JJ medicines_NNS or_CC charms_NNS which_WDT they_PRP
carried_VBN with_IN them_PRP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._. No_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT party_NN was_VBD
permitted_VBN to_TO step_VB over_IN the_DT legs_NNS ,_, hands_NNS ,_, or_CC body_NN of_IN any_DT other_JJ member_NN
who_WP chanced_VBD to_TO be_VB sitting_VBG or_CC lying_VBG on_IN the_DT ground_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP was_VBD equally_RB
forbidden_VBN to_TO step_VB over_IN his_PRP$ blanket_NN ,_, gun_NN ,_, tomahawk_NN ,_, or_CC anything_NN that_WDT
belonged_VBD to_TO him_PRP ._. If_IN this_DT rule_NN was_VBD inadvertently_RB broken_VBN ,_, it_PRP became_VBD
the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT member_NN whose_WP$ person_NN or_CC property_NN had_VBD been_VBN stepped_VBN
over_IN to_TO knock_VB the_DT other_JJ member_NN down_IN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD similarly_RB the_DT duty_NN
of_IN that_DT other_JJ to_TO be_VB knocked_VBN down_RP peaceably_RB and_CC without_IN resistance_NN ._.
The_DT vessels_NNS out_IN of_IN which_WDT the_DT warriors_NNS ate_VBD their_PRP$ food_NN were_VBD commonly_RB
small_JJ bowls_NNS of_IN wood_NN or_CC birch_NN bark_NN ,_, with_IN marks_NNS to_TO distinguish_VB the_DT two_CD
sides_NNS ;_: in_IN marching_NN from_IN home_NN the_DT Indians_NNPS invariably_RB drank_VBD out_IN of_IN one_CD
side_NN of_IN the_DT bowl_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN returning_VBG they_PRP drank_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT other_JJ ._. When_WRB
on_IN their_PRP$ way_NN home_NN they_PRP came_VBD within_IN a_DT day_NN '_'' s_PRP march_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_,
they_PRP hung_VBD up_RP all_DT their_PRP$ bowls_NNS on_IN trees_NNS ,_, or_CC threw_VBD them_PRP away_RB on_IN the_DT
prairie_NN ,_, doubtless_RB to_TO prevent_VB their_PRP$ sanctity_NN or_CC defilement_NN from_IN
being_VBG communicated_VBN with_IN disastrous_JJ effects_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ friends_NNS ,_, just_RB as_IN
we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN the_DT vessels_NNS and_CC clothes_NNS of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ Mikado_NNP ,_, of_IN
women_NNS at_IN childbirth_NN and_CC menstruation_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN persons_NNS defiled_VBN by_IN
contact_NN with_IN the_DT dead_JJ are_VBP destroyed_VBN or_CC laid_VBN aside_RB for_IN a_DT similar_JJ
reason_NN ._. The_DT first_JJ four_CD times_NNS that_IN an_DT Apache_NNPS Indian_NNP goes_VBZ out_RP on_IN the_DT
war-path_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ bound_VBN to_TO refrain_VB from_IN scratching_VBG his_PRP$ head_NN with_IN his_PRP$
fingers_NNS and_CC from_IN letting_VBG water_NN touch_VB his_PRP$ lips_NNS ._. Hence_RB he_PRP scratches_VBG
his_PRP$ head_NN with_IN a_DT stick_NN ,_, and_CC drinks_NNS through_IN a_DT hollow_JJ reed_NN or_CC cane_NN ._.
Stick_VB and_CC reed_VBN are_VBP attached_VBN to_TO the_DT warrior_NN '_POS s_PRP belt_NN and_CC to_TO each_DT other_JJ
by_IN a_DT leathern_NN thong_NN ._. The_DT rule_NN not_RB to_TO scratch_VB their_PRP$ heads_NNS with_IN their_PRP$
fingers_NNS ,_, but_CC to_TO use_VB a_DT stick_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN instead_RB ,_, was_VBD regularly_RB
observed_VBN by_IN Ojebways_NNS on_IN the_DT war-path_NN ._.

With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT Creek_NNP Indians_NNPS and_CC kindred_VBD tribes_NNS we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN they_PRP
"_`` will_MD not_RB cohabit_VB with_IN women_NNS while_IN they_PRP are_VBP out_IN at_IN war_NN ;_: they_PRP
religiously_RB abstain_JJ from_IN every_DT kind_NN of_IN intercourse_NN even_RB with_IN their_PRP$
own_JJ wives_NNS ,_, for_IN the_DT space_NN of_IN three_CD days_NNS and_CC nights_NNS before_IN they_PRP go_VBP to_TO
war_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB after_IN they_PRP return_VBP home_NN ,_, because_IN they_PRP are_VBP to_TO sanctify_VB
themselves_PRP ."_VBP Among_IN the_DT Ba-Pedi_NNP and_CC Ba-Thonga_NNP tribes_NNS of_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP
not_RB only_RB have_VB the_DT warriors_NNS to_TO abstain_VB from_IN women_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT people_NNS
left_VBN behind_IN in_IN the_DT villages_NNS are_VBP also_RB bound_VBN to_TO continence_VB ;_: they_PRP think_VBP
that_IN any_DT incontinence_NN on_IN their_PRP$ part_NN would_MD cause_VB thorns_NNS to_TO grow_VB on_IN
the_DT ground_NN traversed_VBN by_IN the_DT warriors_NNS ,_, and_CC that_DT success_NN would_MD not_RB
attend_VB the_DT expedition_NN ._.

Why_WRB exactly_RB many_JJ savages_NNS have_VBP made_VBN it_PRP a_DT rule_NN to_TO refrain_VB from_IN women_NNS
in_IN time_NN of_IN war_NN ,_, we_PRP cannot_MD say_VB for_IN certain_JJ ,_, but_CC we_PRP may_MD conjecture_VB
that_IN their_PRP$ motive_NN was_VBD a_DT superstitious_JJ fear_NN lest_IN ,_, on_IN the_DT principles_NNS
of_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN ,_, close_JJ contact_NN with_IN women_NNS should_MD infect_VB them_PRP
with_IN feminine_JJ weakness_NN and_CC cowardice_NN ._. Similarly_RB some_DT savages_NNS imagine_VBP
that_IN contact_NN with_IN a_DT woman_NN in_IN childbed_NN enervates_NNS warriors_NNS and_CC
enfeebles_VBZ their_PRP$ weapons_NNS ._. Indeed_RB the_DT Kayans_NNP of_IN Central_NNP Borneo_NNP go_VBP so_RB
far_RB as_IN to_TO hold_VB that_IN to_TO touch_VB a_DT loom_NN or_CC women_NNS '_POS s_PRP clothes_NNS would_MD so_RB
weaken_VB a_DT man_NN that_IN he_PRP would_MD have_VB no_DT success_NN in_IN hunting_NN ,_, fishing_NN ,_, and_CC
war_NN ._. Hence_RB it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB merely_RB sexual_JJ intercourse_NN with_IN women_NNS that_IN the_DT
savage_JJ warrior_NN sometimes_RB shuns_VBZ ;_: he_PRP is_VBZ careful_JJ to_TO avoid_VB the_DT sex_NN
altogether_RB ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT hill_NN tribes_NNS of_IN Assam_NNP ,_, not_RB only_RB are_VBP men_NNS
forbidden_VBN to_TO cohabit_VB with_IN their_PRP$ wives_NNS during_IN or_CC after_IN a_DT raid_NN ,_, but_CC
they_PRP may_MD not_RB eat_VB food_NN cooked_VBN by_IN a_DT woman_NN ;_: nay_RB ,_, they_PRP should_MD not_RB
address_NN a_DT word_NN even_RB to_TO their_PRP$ own_JJ wives_NNS ._. Once_RB a_DT woman_NN ,_, who_WP
unwittingly_RB broke_VBD the_DT rule_NN by_IN speaking_VBG to_TO her_PRP$ husband_NN while_IN he_PRP was_VBD
under_IN the_DT war_NN taboo_NN ,_, sickened_VBN and_CC died_VBD when_WRB she_PRP learned_VBD the_DT awful_JJ
crime_NN she_PRP had_VBD committed_VBN ._.



5._. Manslayers_NNP tabooed_.

IF_IN THE_DT READER_NN still_RB doubts_VBZ whether_IN the_DT rules_NNS of_IN conduct_NN which_WDT we_PRP
have_VBP just_RB been_VBN considering_VBG are_VBP based_VBN on_IN superstitious_JJ fears_NNS or_CC
dictated_VBN by_IN a_DT rational_JJ prudence_NN ,_, his_PRP$ doubts_NNS will_MD probably_RB be_VB
dissipated_VBN when_WRB he_PRP learns_VBZ that_DT rules_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN are_VBP often_RB
imposed_VBN even_RB more_RBR stringently_RB on_IN warriors_NNS after_IN the_DT victory_NN has_VBZ been_VBN
won_VBN and_CC when_WRB all_DT fear_NN of_IN the_DT living_VBG corporeal_JJ foe_NN is_VBZ at_IN an_DT end_NN ._. In_IN
such_JJ cases_NNS one_CD motive_NN for_IN the_DT inconvenient_NN restrictions_NNS laid_VBN on_IN the_DT
victors_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ hour_NN of_IN triumph_NN is_VBZ probably_RB a_DT dread_NN of_IN the_DT angry_JJ
ghosts_NNS of_IN the_DT slain_NN ;_: and_CC that_IN the_DT fear_NN of_IN the_DT vengeful_JJ ghosts_NNS does_VBZ
influence_NN the_DT behaviour_NN of_IN the_DT slayers_NNS is_VBZ often_RB expressly_RB affirmed_VBN ._.
The_DT general_JJ effect_NN of_IN the_DT taboos_NNS laid_VBN on_IN sacred_JJ chiefs_NNS ,_, mourners_NNS ,_,
women_NNS at_IN childbirth_NN ,_, men_NNS on_IN the_DT war-path_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ,_, is_VBZ to_TO seclude_VB
or_CC isolate_VBP the_DT tabooed_JJ persons_NNS from_IN ordinary_JJ society_NN ,_, this_DT effect_NN
being_VBG attained_VBN by_IN a_DT variety_NN of_IN rules_NNS ,_, which_WDT oblige_VBP the_DT men_NNS or_CC women_NNS
to_TO live_VB in_IN separate_JJ huts_NNS or_CC in_IN the_DT open_JJ air_NN ,_, to_TO shun_VB the_DT commerce_NN of_IN
the_DT sexes_NNS ,_, to_TO avoid_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN vessels_NNS employed_VBN by_IN others_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB
forth_RB ._. Now_RB the_DT same_JJ effect_NN is_VBZ produced_VBN by_IN similar_JJ means_NNS in_IN the_DT case_NN
of_IN victorious_JJ warriors_NNS ,_, particularly_RB such_JJ as_IN have_VBP actually_RB shed_VBN the_DT
blood_NN of_IN their_PRP$ enemies_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Timor_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT warlike_NN
expedition_NN has_VBZ returned_VBN in_IN triumph_NN bringing_VBG the_DT heads_NNS of_IN the_DT
vanquished_VBN foe_NN ,_, the_DT leader_NN of_IN the_DT expedition_NN is_VBZ forbidden_VBN by_IN
religion_NN and_CC custom_NN to_TO return_VB at_IN once_RB to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ house_NN ._. A_DT special_JJ
hut_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN for_IN him_PRP ,_, in_IN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ to_TO reside_VB for_IN two_CD months_NNS ,_,
undergoing_VBG bodily_JJ and_CC spiritual_JJ purification_NN ._. During_IN this_DT time_NN he_PRP
may_MD not_RB go_VB to_TO his_PRP$ wife_NN nor_CC feed_VB himself_PRP ;_: the_DT food_NN must_MD be_VB put_VBN into_IN
his_PRP$ mouth_NN by_IN another_DT person_NN ._. That_IN these_DT observances_NNS are_VBP dictated_VBN by_IN
fear_NN of_IN the_DT ghosts_NNS of_IN the_DT slain_NN seems_VBZ certain_JJ ;_: for_IN from_IN another_DT
account_NN of_IN the_DT ceremonies_NNS performed_VBN on_IN the_DT return_NN of_IN a_DT successful_JJ
head-hunter_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ island_NN we_PRP learn_VBP that_IN sacrifices_NNS are_VBP offered_VBN
on_IN this_DT occasion_NN to_TO appease_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN whose_WP$ head_NN has_VBZ been_VBN
taken_VBN ;_: the_DT people_NNS think_VBP that_IN some_DT misfortune_NN would_MD befall_VB the_DT victor_NN
were_VBD such_JJ offerings_NNS omitted_VBN ._. Moreover_RB ,_, a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT ceremony_NN
consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT dance_NN accompanied_VBN by_IN a_DT song_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT
slain_JJ man_NN is_VBZ lamented_JJ and_CC his_PRP$ forgiveness_NN is_VBZ entreated_VBN ._. "_'' Be_VB not_RB
angry_JJ ,"_, they_PRP say_VBP ,_, "_`` because_IN your_PRP$ head_NN is_VBZ here_RB with_IN us_PRP ;_: had_VBD we_PRP been_VBN
less_RBR lucky_JJ ,_, our_PRP$ heads_NNS might_MD now_RB have_VB been_VBN exposed_VBN in_IN your_PRP$ village_NN ._.
We_PRP have_VBP offered_VBN the_DT sacrifice_NN to_TO appease_VB you_PRP ._. Your_PRP$ spirit_NN may_MD now_RB
rest_NN and_CC leave_VB us_PRP at_IN peace_NN ._. Why_WRB were_VBD you_PRP our_PRP$ enemy_NN ?_. Would_MD it_PRP not_RB
have_VBP been_VBN better_RB that_IN we_PRP should_MD remain_VB friends_NNS ?_. Then_RB your_PRP$ blood_NN
would_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN spilt_VBN and_CC your_PRP$ head_NN would_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN cut_VBN
off_IN ."_JJ The_DT people_NNS of_IN Paloo_NNP in_IN Central_NNP Celebes_NNP take_VBP the_DT heads_NNS of_IN their_PRP$
enemies_NNS in_IN war_NN and_CC afterwards_RB propitiate_VB the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT slain_NN in_IN
the_DT temple_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT tribes_NNS at_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT Wanigela_NNP River_NNP ,_, in_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP ,_,
"_`` a_DT man_NN who_WP has_VBZ taken_VBN life_NN is_VBZ considered_VBN to_TO be_VB impure_JJ until_IN he_PRP has_VBZ
undergone_IN certain_JJ ceremonies_NNS :_: as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ after_IN the_DT deed_NN he_PRP
cleanses_NNS himself_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ weapon_NN ._. This_DT satisfactorily_RB accomplished_VBN ,_,
he_PRP repairs_NNS to_TO his_PRP$ village_NN and_CC seats_NNS himself_PRP on_IN the_DT logs_NNS of_IN
sacrificial_JJ staging_NN ._. No_DT one_NN approaches_VBZ him_PRP or_CC takes_VBZ any_DT notice_NN
whatever_WDT of_IN him_PRP ._. A_DT house_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN for_IN him_PRP which_WDT is_VBZ put_VBN in_IN charge_NN
of_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD small_JJ boys_NNS as_IN servants_NNS ._. He_PRP may_MD eat_VB only_RB toasted_VBN
bananas_NNS ,_, and_CC only_RB the_DT centre_NN portion_NN of_IN them_PRP --_: the_DT ends_NNS being_VBG thrown_VBN
away_RB ._. On_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN of_IN his_PRP$ seclusion_NN a_DT small_JJ feast_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN by_IN
his_PRP$ friends_NNS ,_, who_WP also_RB fashion_NN some_DT new_JJ perineal_NN bands_NNS for_IN him_PRP ._. This_DT
is_VBZ called_VBN ivi_IN poro_NN ._. The_DT next_JJ day_NN the_DT man_NN dons_VBZ all_DT his_PRP$ best_JJS
ornaments_NNS and_CC badges_NNS for_IN taking_VBG life_NN ,_, and_CC sallies_NNS forth_RB fully_RB armed_VBN
and_CC parades_VBZ the_DT village_NN ._. The_DT next_JJ day_NN a_DT hunt_NN is_VBZ organised_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT
kangaroo_NN selected_VBN from_IN the_DT game_NN captured_VBN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ cut_VBN open_JJ and_CC the_DT
spleen_NN and_CC liver_NN rubbed_VBD over_IN the_DT back_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN ._. He_PRP then_RB walks_VBZ
solemnly_RB down_RB to_TO the_DT nearest_JJS water_NN ,_, and_CC standing_VBG straddle-legs_NNS in_IN it_PRP
washes_VBG himself_PRP ._. All_PDT the_DT young_JJ untried_JJ warriors_NNS swim_VBP between_IN his_PRP$
legs_NNS ._. This_DT is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO impart_VB courage_NN and_CC strength_NN to_TO them_PRP ._. The_DT
following_VBG day_NN ,_, at_IN early_JJ dawn_NN ,_, he_PRP dashes_VBZ out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ house_NN ,_, fully_RB
armed_VBN ,_, and_CC calls_VBZ aloud_RB the_DT name_NN of_IN his_PRP$ victim_NN ._. Having_VBG satisfied_VBN
himself_PRP that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ thoroughly_RB scared_VBN the_DT ghost_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ man_NN ,_, he_PRP
returns_NNS to_TO his_PRP$ house_NN ._. The_DT beating_NN of_IN flooring-boards_NNS and_CC the_DT
lighting_NN of_IN fires_NNS is_VBZ also_RB a_DT certain_JJ method_NN of_IN scaring_VBG the_DT ghost_NN ._. A_DT
day_NN later_RB his_PRP$ purification_NN is_VBZ finished_VBN ._. He_PRP can_MD then_RB enter_VB his_PRP$ wife_NN '_'' s_PRP
house_NN ."_NNS

In_IN Windessi_NNP ,_, Dutch_NNP New_NNP Guinea_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT party_NN of_IN head-hunters_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN
successful_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP are_VBP nearing_VBG home_NN ,_, they_PRP announce_VBP their_PRP$ approach_NN
and_CC success_NN by_IN blowing_VBG on_IN triton_NN shells_NNS ._. Their_PRP$ canoes_NNS are_VBP also_RB
decked_VBN with_IN branches_NNS ._. The_DT faces_NNS of_IN the_DT men_NNS who_WP have_VBP taken_VBN a_DT head_NN are_VBP
blackened_VBN with_IN charcoal_NN ._. If_IN several_JJ have_VBP taken_VBN part_NN in_IN killing_VBG the_DT
same_JJ victim_NN ,_, his_PRP$ head_NN is_VBZ divided_VBN among_IN them_PRP ._. They_PRP always_RB time_NN their_PRP$
arrival_NN so_RB as_IN to_TO reach_VB home_NN in_IN the_DT early_JJ morning_NN ._. They_PRP come_VBP rowing_VBG
to_TO the_DT village_NN with_IN a_DT great_JJ noise_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT women_NNS stand_VBP ready_JJ to_TO
dance_NN in_IN the_DT verandahs_NNS of_IN the_DT houses_NNS ._. The_DT canoes_NNS row_VBP past_IN the_DT room_NN
sram_NN or_CC house_NN where_WRB the_DT young_JJ men_NNS live_VBP ;_: and_CC as_IN they_PRP pass_VBP ,_, the_DT
murderers_NNS throw_VBP as_RB many_JJ pointed_JJ sticks_NNS or_CC bamboos_NNS at_IN the_DT wall_NN or_CC the_DT
roof_NN as_IN there_EX were_VBD enemies_NNS killed_VBN ._. The_DT day_NN is_VBZ spent_VBN very_RB quietly_RB ._.
Now_RB and_CC then_RB they_PRP drum_VB or_CC blow_VB on_IN the_DT conch_NN ;_: at_IN other_JJ times_NNS they_PRP
beat_VB the_DT walls_NNS of_IN the_DT houses_NNS with_IN loud_JJ shouts_NNS to_TO drive_VB away_RB the_DT
ghosts_NNS of_IN the_DT slain_NN ._. So_IN the_DT Yabim_NNP of_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT
spirit_NN of_IN a_DT murdered_JJ man_NN pursues_VBZ his_PRP$ murderer_NN and_CC seeks_VBZ to_TO do_VB him_PRP a_DT
mischief_NN ._. Hence_RB they_PRP drive_VBP away_RB the_DT spirit_NN with_IN shouts_NNS and_CC the_DT
beating_VBG of_IN drums_NNS ._. When_WRB the_DT Fijians_NNPS had_VBD buried_VBN a_DT man_NN alive_JJ ,_, as_IN they_PRP
often_RB did_VBD ,_, they_PRP used_VBD at_IN nightfall_NN to_TO make_VB a_DT great_JJ uproar_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN
bamboos_NNS ,_, trumpet-shells_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN
frightening_VBG away_RB his_PRP$ ghost_NN ,_, lest_IN he_PRP should_MD attempt_VB to_TO return_VB to_TO his_PRP$
old_JJ home_NN ._. And_CC to_TO render_VB his_PRP$ house_NN unattractive_JJ to_TO him_PRP they_PRP
dismantled_VBN it_PRP and_CC clothed_VBD it_PRP with_IN everything_NN that_IN to_TO their_PRP$ ideas_NNS
seemed_VBD most_RBS repulsive_JJ ._. On_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN on_IN which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD
tortured_VBD a_DT prisoner_NN to_TO death_NN ,_, the_DT American_NNP Indians_NNPS were_VBD wont_JJ to_TO run_VB
through_IN the_DT village_NN with_IN hideous_JJ yells_NNS ,_, beating_VBG with_IN sticks_NNS on_IN the_DT
furniture_NN ,_, the_DT walls_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT roofs_NNS of_IN the_DT huts_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT angry_JJ
ghost_NN of_IN their_PRP$ victim_NN from_IN settling_VBG there_RB and_CC taking_VBG vengeance_NN for_IN
the_DT torments_NNS that_IN his_PRP$ body_NN had_VBD endured_VBN at_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ._. "_'' Once_RB ,"_RB says_VBZ
a_DT traveller_NN ,_, "_'' on_IN approaching_VBG in_IN the_DT night_NN a_DT village_NN of_IN Ottawas_NNP ,_, I_PRP
found_VBN all_PDT the_DT inhabitants_NNS in_IN confusion_NN :_: they_PRP were_VBD all_DT busily_RB engaged_VBN
in_IN raising_VBG noises_NNS of_IN the_DT loudest_JJS and_CC most_RBS inharmonious_JJ kind_NN ._. Upon_IN
inquiry_NN ,_, I_PRP found_VBD that_IN a_DT battle_NN had_VBD been_VBN lately_RB fought_VBN between_IN the_DT
Ottawas_NNP and_CC the_DT Kickapoos_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN all_PDT this_DT noise_NN was_VBD
to_TO prevent_VB the_DT ghosts_NNS of_IN the_DT departed_VBN combatants_NNS from_IN entering_VBG the_DT
village_NN ."_NNS

Among_IN the_DT Basutos_NNS "_`` ablution_NN is_VBZ specially_RB performed_VBN on_IN return_NN from_IN
battle_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ absolutely_RB necessary_JJ that_IN the_DT warriors_NNS should_MD rid_VB
themselves_PRP ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, of_IN the_DT blood_NN they_PRP have_VBP shed_VBN ,_, or_CC the_DT
shades_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ victims_NNS would_MD pursue_VB them_PRP incessantly_RB ,_, and_CC disturb_VB
their_PRP$ slumbers_NNS ._. They_PRP go_VBP in_IN a_DT procession_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN full_JJ armour_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT
nearest_JJS stream_NN ._. At_IN the_DT moment_NN they_PRP enter_VBP the_DT water_NN a_DT diviner_NN ,_, placed_VBN
higher_JJR up_IN ,_, throws_VBZ some_DT purifying_VBG substances_NNS into_IN the_DT current_JJ ._. This_DT
is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, not_RB strictly_RB necessary_JJ ._. The_DT javelins_NNP and_CC battle-axes_NNS
also_RB undergo_VBP the_DT process_NN of_IN washing_VBG ."_NN Among_IN the_DT Bageshu_NNP of_IN East_NNP
Africa_NNP a_DT man_NN who_WP has_VBZ killed_VBN another_DT may_MD not_RB return_VB to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ house_NN
on_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN ,_, though_IN he_PRP may_MD enter_VB the_DT village_NN and_CC spend_VBP the_DT night_NN
in_IN a_DT friend_NN '_'' s_PRP house_NN ._. He_PRP kills_VBZ a_DT sheep_NN and_CC smears_VBZ his_PRP$ chest_NN ,_, his_PRP$
right_JJ arm_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ head_NN with_IN the_DT contents_NNS of_IN the_DT animal_NN '_POS s_PRP stomach_NN ._.
His_PRP$ children_NNS are_VBP brought_VBN to_TO him_PRP and_CC he_PRP smears_VBZ them_PRP in_IN like_IN manner_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP smears_VBZ each_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT doorway_NN with_IN the_DT tripe_NN and_CC entrails_NNS ,_,
and_CC finally_RB throws_VBZ the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT stomach_NN on_IN the_DT roof_NN of_IN his_PRP$ house_NN ._.
For_IN a_DT whole_JJ day_NN he_PRP may_MD not_RB touch_VB food_NN with_IN his_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, but_CC picks_VBZ it_PRP
up_IN with_IN two_CD sticks_NNS and_CC so_RB conveys_VBZ it_PRP to_TO his_PRP$ mouth_NN ._. His_PRP$ wife_NN is_VBZ not_RB
under_IN any_DT such_JJ restrictions_NNS ._. She_PRP may_MD even_RB go_VB to_TO mourn_VB for_IN the_DT man_NN
whom_WP her_PRP$ husband_NN has_VBZ killed_VBN ,_, if_IN she_PRP wishes_VBZ to_TO do_VB so_RB ._. Among_IN the_DT
Angoni_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT Zambesi_NNP ,_, warriors_NNS who_WP have_VBP slain_NN foes_NNS on_IN
an_DT expedition_NN smear_VB their_PRP$ bodies_NNS and_CC faces_NNS with_IN ashes_NNS ,_, hang_VB garments_NNS
of_IN their_PRP$ victims_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ persons_NNS ,_, and_CC tie_VB bark_NN ropes_NNS round_VBP their_PRP$
necks_NNS ,_, so_RB that_IN the_DT ends_NNS hang_VB down_RB over_IN their_PRP$ shoulders_NNS or_CC breasts_NNS ._.
This_DT costume_NN they_PRP wear_VBP for_IN three_CD days_NNS after_IN their_PRP$ return_NN ,_, and_CC rising_VBG
at_IN break_NN of_IN day_NN they_PRP run_VBP through_IN the_DT village_NN uttering_VBG frightful_JJ
yells_NNS to_TO drive_VB away_RB the_DT ghosts_NNS of_IN the_DT slain_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, if_IN they_PRP were_VBD not_RB
thus_RB banished_VBN from_IN the_DT houses_NNS ,_, might_MD bring_VB sickness_JJR and_CC misfortune_NN
on_IN the_DT inmates_NNS ._.

In_IN some_DT of_IN these_DT accounts_NNS nothing_NN is_VBZ said_VBN of_IN an_DT enforced_VBN seclusion_NN ,_,
at_IN least_JJS after_IN the_DT ceremonial_JJ cleansing_NN ,_, but_CC some_DT South_JJ African_JJ
tribes_NNS certainly_RB require_VBP the_DT slayer_NN of_IN a_DT very_RB gallant_JJ foe_NN in_IN war_NN to_TO
keep_VB apart_RB from_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC family_NN for_IN ten_CD days_NNS after_IN he_PRP has_VBZ washed_VBN
his_PRP$ body_NN in_IN running_VBG water_NN ._. He_PRP also_RB receives_VBZ from_IN the_DT tribal_JJ doctor_NN a_DT
medicine_NN which_WDT he_PRP chews_VBZ with_IN his_PRP$ food_NN ._. When_WRB a_DT Nandi_NNP of_IN East_NNP Africa_NNP
has_VBZ killed_VBN a_DT member_NN of_IN another_DT tribe_NN ,_, he_PRP paints_VBZ one_CD side_NN of_IN his_PRP$
body_NN ,_, spear_NN ,_, and_CC sword_VBD red_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ side_NN white_JJ ._. For_IN four_CD days_NNS
after_IN the_DT slaughter_NN he_PRP is_VBZ considered_VBN unclean_JJ and_CC may_MD not_RB go_VB home_NN ._. He_PRP
has_VBZ to_TO build_VB a_DT small_JJ shelter_NN by_IN a_DT river_NN and_CC live_VB there_RB ;_: he_PRP may_MD not_RB
associate_NN with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN or_CC sweetheart_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP may_MD eat_VB nothing_NN but_CC
porridge_NN ,_, beef_NN ,_, and_CC goat_NN '_'' s_PRP flesh_NN ._. At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT fourth_JJ day_NN he_PRP
must_MD purify_VB himself_PRP by_IN taking_VBG a_DT strong_JJ purge_NN made_VBN from_IN the_DT bark_NN of_IN
the_DT segetet_NN tree_NN and_CC by_IN drinking_VBG goat_NN '_'' s_VBZ milk_NN mixed_JJ with_IN blood_NN ._.
Among_IN the_DT Bantu_NNP tribes_NNS of_IN Kavirondo_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT man_NN has_VBZ killed_VBN an_DT enemy_NN
in_IN warfare_NN he_PRP shaves_VBZ his_PRP$ head_NN on_IN his_PRP$ return_NN home_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ friends_NNS
rub_NN a_DT medicine_NN ,_, which_WDT generally_RB consists_VBZ of_IN goat_NN '_'' s_PRP dung_JJ ,_, over_IN his_PRP$
body_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT slain_JJ man_NN from_IN troubling_VBG him_PRP ._.
Exactly_RB the_DT same_JJ custom_NN is_VBZ practised_VBN for_IN the_DT same_JJ reason_NN by_IN the_DT
Wageia_NNP of_IN East_NNP Africa_NNP ._. With_IN the_DT Ja-Luo_NNP of_IN Kavirondo_NNP the_DT custom_NN is_VBZ
somewhat_RB different_JJ ._. Three_CD days_NNS after_IN his_PRP$ return_NN from_IN the_DT fight_NN the_DT
warrior_NN shaves_VBZ his_PRP$ head_NN ._. But_CC before_IN he_PRP may_MD enter_VB his_PRP$ village_NN he_PRP has_VBZ
to_TO hang_VB a_DT live_JJ fowl_NN ,_, head_NN uppermost_RB ,_, round_IN his_PRP$ neck_NN ;_: then_RB the_DT bird_NN
is_VBZ decapitated_JJ and_CC its_PRP$ head_NN left_VBD hanging_VBG round_IN his_PRP$ neck_NN ._. Soon_RB after_IN
his_PRP$ return_NN a_DT feast_NN is_VBZ made_VBN for_IN the_DT slain_JJ man_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN his_PRP$
ghost_NN may_MD not_RB haunt_VB his_PRP$ slayer_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Pelew_NNP Islands_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT men_NNS
return_NN from_IN a_DT warlike_JJ expedition_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP taken_VBN a_DT life_NN ,_,
the_DT young_JJ warriors_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN out_RP fighting_VBG for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN ,_,
and_CC all_DT who_WP handled_VBD the_DT slain_NN ,_, are_VBP shut_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT large_JJ
council-house_NN and_CC become_VB tabooed_NN ._. They_PRP may_MD not_RB quit_VB the_DT edifice_NN ,_, nor_CC
bathe_VB ,_, nor_CC touch_VB a_DT woman_NN ,_, nor_CC eat_VB fish_NN ;_: their_PRP$ food_NN is_VBZ limited_VBN to_TO
coco-nuts_NNS and_CC syrup_NN ._. They_PRP rub_VBP themselves_PRP with_IN charmed_VBN leaves_NNS and_CC
chew_VBP charmed_JJ betel_NN ._. After_IN three_CD days_NNS they_PRP go_VBP together_RB to_TO bathe_VB as_IN
near_IN as_IN possible_JJ to_TO the_DT spot_NN where_WRB the_DT man_NN was_VBD killed_VBN ._.

Among_IN the_DT Natchez_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN North_NNP America_NNP young_JJ braves_NNS who_WP had_VBD
taken_VBN their_PRP$ first_JJ scalps_NNS were_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO observe_VB certain_JJ rules_NNS of_IN

eat_VB flesh_NN ;_: their_PRP$ only_JJ food_NN was_VBD fish_NN and_CC hasty-pudding_NN ._. If_IN they_PRP broke_VBD
these_DT rules_NNS ,_, they_PRP believed_VBD that_IN the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN they_PRP had_VBD killed_VBN
would_MD work_VB their_PRP$ death_NN by_IN magic_NN ,_, that_IN they_PRP would_MD gain_VB no_DT more_RBR
successes_NNS over_IN the_DT enemy_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT least_JJS wound_NN inflicted_VBN on_IN them_PRP
would_MD prove_VB mortal_JJ ._. When_WRB a_DT Choctaw_NNP had_VBD killed_VBN an_DT enemy_NN and_CC taken_VBN his_PRP$
