comb_NN his_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN his_PRP$ head_NN itched_VBD he_PRP might_MD not_RB scratch_VB it_PRP except_IN
with_IN a_DT little_JJ stick_NN which_WDT he_PRP wore_VBD fastened_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ wrist_NN for_IN the_DT
purpose_NN ._. This_DT ceremonial_NN mourning_VBG for_IN the_DT enemies_NNS they_PRP had_VBD slain_NN was_VBD
not_RB uncommon_JJ among_IN the_DT North_JJ American_NNP Indians_NNPS ._.

Thus_RB we_PRP see_VBP that_IN warriors_NNS who_WP have_VBP taken_VBN the_DT life_NN of_IN a_DT foe_NN in_IN battle_NN
are_VBP temporarily_RB cut_VBN off_RP from_IN free_JJ intercourse_NN with_IN their_PRP$ fellows_NNS ,_,
and_CC especially_RB with_IN their_PRP$ wives_NNS ,_, and_CC must_MD undergo_VB certain_JJ rites_NNS of_IN
purification_NN before_IN they_PRP are_VBP readmitted_VBN to_TO society_NN ._. Now_RB if_IN the_DT
purpose_NN of_IN their_PRP$ seclusion_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT expiatory_NN rites_NNS which_WDT they_PRP
have_VBP to_TO perform_VB is_VBZ ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP been_VBN led_VBN to_TO believe_VB ,_, no_DT other_JJ than_IN to_TO
shake_VB off_RP ,_, frighten_VB ,_, or_CC appease_VB the_DT angry_JJ spirit_NN of_IN the_DT slain_JJ man_NN ,_,
we_PRP may_MD safely_RB conjecture_VB that_IN the_DT similar_JJ purification_NN of_IN homicides_NNS
and_CC murderers_NNS ,_, who_WP have_VBP imbrued_VBN their_PRP$ hands_NNS in_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN a_DT
fellow-tribesman_NN ,_, had_VBD at_IN first_RB the_DT same_JJ significance_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT
idea_NN of_IN a_DT moral_JJ or_CC spiritual_JJ regeneration_NN symbolised_VBN by_IN the_DT washing_NN ,_,
the_DT fasting_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ,_, was_VBD merely_RB a_DT later_JJ interpretation_NN put_VBN upon_IN
the_DT old_JJ custom_NN by_IN men_NNS who_WP had_VBD outgrown_VBN the_DT primitive_JJ modes_NNS of_IN
thought_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT custom_NN originated_VBD ._. The_DT conjecture_NN will_MD be_VB
confirmed_VBN if_IN we_PRP can_MD show_VB that_IN savages_NNS have_VBP actually_RB imposed_VBN certain_JJ
restrictions_NNS on_IN the_DT murderer_NN of_IN a_DT fellow-tribesman_NN from_IN a_DT definite_JJ
fear_NN that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ haunted_VBN by_IN the_DT ghost_NN of_IN his_PRP$ victim_NN ._. This_DT we_PRP can_MD do_VB
with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT Omahas_NNP of_IN North_NNP America_NNP ._. Among_IN these_DT Indians_NNPS the_DT
kinsmen_NNS of_IN a_DT murdered_JJ man_NN had_VBD the_DT right_NN to_TO put_VB the_DT murderer_NN to_TO
death_NN ,_, but_CC sometimes_RB they_PRP waived_VBD their_PRP$ right_JJ in_IN consideration_NN of_IN
presents_NNS which_WDT they_PRP consented_VBD to_TO accept_VB ._. When_WRB the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT
murderer_NN was_VBD spared_VBN ,_, he_PRP had_VBD to_TO observe_VB certain_JJ stringent_JJ rules_NNS for_IN a_DT
period_NN which_WDT varied_VBD from_IN two_CD to_TO four_CD years_NNS ._. He_PRP must_MD walk_VB barefoot_RB ,_,
and_CC he_PRP might_MD eat_VB no_DT warm_JJ food_NN ,_, nor_CC raise_VB his_PRP$ voice_NN ,_, nor_CC look_VBP around_RB ._.
He_PRP was_VBD compelled_VBN to_TO pull_VB his_PRP$ robe_NN about_IN him_PRP and_CC to_TO have_VB it_PRP tied_VBN at_IN
the_DT neck_NN even_RB in_IN hot_JJ weather_NN ;_: he_PRP might_MD not_RB let_VB it_PRP hang_VB loose_JJ or_CC fly_VB
open_JJ ._. He_PRP might_MD not_RB move_VB his_PRP$ hands_NNS about_RB ,_, but_CC had_VBD to_TO keep_VB them_PRP close_RB
to_TO his_PRP$ body_NN ._. He_PRP might_MD not_RB comb_NN his_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP might_MD not_RB be_VB blown_VBN
about_RB by_IN the_DT wind_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT tribe_NN went_VBD out_IN hunting_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD obliged_VBN
to_TO pitch_VB his_PRP$ tent_NN about_IN a_DT quarter_NN of_IN mile_NN from_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT
people_NNS "_`` lest_IN the_DT ghost_NN of_IN his_PRP$ victim_NN should_MD raise_VB a_DT high_JJ wind_NN ,_, which_WDT
might_MD cause_VB damage_NN ."_NNS Only_RB one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ kindred_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO remain_VB
with_IN him_PRP at_IN his_PRP$ tent_NN ._. No_DT one_NN wished_VBD to_TO eat_VB with_IN him_PRP ,_, for_IN they_PRP said_VBD ,_,
"_`` If_IN we_PRP eat_VBP with_IN him_PRP whom_WP Wakanda_NNP hates_VBZ ,_, Wakanda_NNP will_MD hate_VB us_PRP ."_.
Sometimes_RB he_PRP wandered_VBD at_IN night_NN crying_VBG and_CC lamenting_VBG his_PRP$ offence_NN ._. At_IN
the_DT end_NN of_IN his_PRP$ long_JJ isolation_NN the_DT kinsmen_NNS of_IN the_DT murdered_VBN man_NN heard_VBN
his_PRP$ crying_VBG and_CC said_VBD ,_, "_`` It_PRP is_VBZ enough_JJ ._. Begone_NNP ,_, and_CC walk_NN among_IN the_DT
crowd_NN ._. Put_VB on_RP moccasins_NNS and_CC wear_VB a_DT good_JJ robe_NN ."_, Here_RB the_DT reason_NN
alleged_VBN for_IN keeping_VBG the_DT murderer_NN at_IN a_DT considerable_JJ distance_NN from_IN the_DT
hunters_NNS gives_VBZ the_DT clue_NN to_TO all_PDT the_DT other_JJ restrictions_NNS laid_VBN on_IN him_PRP :_: he_PRP
was_VBD haunted_VBN and_CC therefore_RB dangerous_JJ ._. The_DT ancient_JJ Greeks_NNS believed_VBN
that_IN the_DT soul_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD just_RB been_VBN killed_VBN was_VBD wroth_JJ with_IN his_PRP$
slayer_NN and_CC troubled_VBD him_PRP ;_: wherefore_IN it_PRP was_VBD needful_JJ even_RB for_IN the_DT
involuntary_JJ homicide_NN to_TO depart_VB from_IN his_PRP$ country_NN for_IN a_DT year_NN until_IN the_DT
anger_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ man_NN had_VBD cooled_VBN down_RB ;_: nor_CC might_MD the_DT slayer_NN return_NN
until_IN sacrifice_NN had_VBD been_VBN offered_VBN and_CC ceremonies_NNS of_IN purification_NN
performed_VBN ._. If_IN his_PRP$ victim_NN chanced_VBD to_TO be_VB a_DT foreigner_NN ,_, the_DT homicide_NN had_VBD
to_TO shun_VB the_DT native_JJ country_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ man_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ._. The_DT
legend_NN of_IN the_DT matricide_NN Orestes_NNP ,_, how_WRB he_PRP roamed_VBD from_IN place_NN to_TO place_VB
pursued_VBN by_IN the_DT Furies_NNP of_IN his_PRP$ murdered_JJ mother_NN ,_, and_CC none_NN would_MD sit_VB at_IN
meat_NN with_IN him_PRP ,_, or_CC take_VB him_PRP in_IN ,_, till_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN purified_VBN ,_, reflects_VBZ
faithfully_RB the_DT real_JJ Greek_NNP dread_NN of_IN such_JJ as_IN were_VBD still_RB haunted_VBN by_IN an_DT
angry_JJ ghost_NN ._.



6._DT Hunters_NNP and_CC Fishers_NNP tabooed_.

IN_IN SAVAGE_NNP society_NN the_DT hunter_NN and_CC the_DT fisherman_NN have_VBP often_RB to_TO observe_VB
rules_NNS of_IN abstinence_NN and_CC to_TO submit_VB to_TO ceremonies_NNS of_IN purification_NN of_IN
the_DT same_JJ sort_NN as_IN those_DT which_WDT are_VBP obligatory_JJ on_IN the_DT warrior_NN and_CC the_DT
manslayer_NN ;_: and_CC though_IN we_PRP cannot_VBD in_IN all_DT cases_NNS perceive_VBP the_DT exact_JJ
purpose_NN which_WDT these_DT rules_NNS and_CC ceremonies_NNS are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO serve_VB ,_, we_PRP
may_MD with_IN some_DT probability_NN assume_VBP that_IN ,_, just_RB as_IN the_DT dread_NN of_IN the_DT
spirits_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ enemies_NNS is_VBZ the_DT main_JJ motive_NN for_IN the_DT seclusion_NN and_CC
purification_NN of_IN the_DT warrior_NN who_WP hopes_VBZ to_TO take_VB or_CC has_VBZ already_RB taken_VBN
their_PRP$ lives_NNS ,_, so_IN the_DT huntsman_NN or_CC fisherman_NN who_WP complies_VBZ with_IN similar_JJ
customs_NNS is_VBZ principally_RB actuated_VBN by_IN a_DT fear_NN of_IN the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT
beasts_NNS ,_, birds_NNS ,_, or_CC fish_NN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ killed_VBN or_CC intends_VBZ to_TO kill_VB ._. For_IN
the_DT savage_JJ commonly_RB conceives_NNS animals_NNS to_TO be_VB endowed_VBN with_IN souls_NNS and_CC
intelligences_NNS like_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, and_CC hence_RB he_PRP naturally_RB treats_VBZ them_PRP with_IN
similar_JJ respect_NN ._. Just_RB as_IN he_PRP attempts_VBZ to_TO appease_VB the_DT ghosts_NNS of_IN the_DT
men_NNS he_PRP has_VBZ slain_VBN ,_, so_RB he_PRP essays_VBZ to_TO propitiate_VB the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT
animals_NNS he_PRP has_VBZ killed_VBN ._. These_DT ceremonies_NNS of_IN propitiation_NN will_MD be_VB
described_VBN later_RB on_IN in_IN this_DT work_NN ;_: here_RB we_PRP have_VBP to_TO deal_VB ,_, first_RB ,_, with_IN
the_DT taboos_NN observed_VBN by_IN the_DT hunter_NN and_CC the_DT fisherman_NN before_IN or_CC during_IN
the_DT hunting_NN and_CC fishing_NN seasons_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, second_JJ ,_, with_IN the_DT ceremonies_NNS of_IN
purification_NN which_WDT have_VBP to_TO be_VB practised_VBN by_IN these_DT men_NNS on_IN returning_VBG
with_IN their_PRP$ booty_NN from_IN a_DT successful_JJ chase_NN ._.

While_IN the_DT savage_JJ respects_NNS ,_, more_RBR or_CC less_RBR ,_, the_DT souls_NNS of_IN all_DT animals_NNS ,_,
he_PRP treats_VBZ with_IN particular_JJ deference_NN the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN such_JJ as_IN are_VBP
either_CC especially_RB useful_JJ to_TO him_PRP or_CC formidable_JJ on_IN account_NN of_IN their_PRP$
size_NN ,_, strength_NN ,_, or_CC ferocity_NN ._. Accordingly_RB the_DT hunting_NN and_CC killing_NN of_IN
these_DT valuable_JJ or_CC dangerous_JJ beasts_NNS are_VBP subject_JJ to_TO more_RBR elaborate_JJ
rules_NNS and_CC ceremonies_NNS than_IN the_DT slaughter_NN of_IN comparatively_RB useless_JJ and_CC
insignificant_JJ creatures_NNS ._. Thus_RB the_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN Nootka_NNP Sound_NN prepared_VBN
themselves_PRP for_IN catching_VBG whales_NNS by_IN observing_VBG a_DT fast_RB for_IN a_DT week_NN ,_,
during_IN which_WDT they_PRP ate_VBD very_RB little_JJ ,_, bathed_VBN in_IN the_DT water_NN several_JJ times_NNS
a_DT day_NN ,_, sang_VBD ,_, and_CC rubbed_VBD their_PRP$ bodies_NNS ,_, limbs_NNS ,_, and_CC faces_NNS with_IN shells_NNS
and_CC bushes_NNS till_IN they_PRP looked_VBD as_IN if_IN they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN severely_RB torn_VBN with_IN
briars_NNS ._. They_PRP were_VBD likewise_RB required_VBN to_TO abstain_VB from_IN any_DT commerce_NN
with_IN their_PRP$ women_NNS for_IN the_DT like_JJ period_NN ,_, this_DT last_JJ condition_NN being_VBG
considered_VBN indispensable_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ success_NN ._. A_DT chief_NN who_WP failed_VBD to_TO
catch_VB a_DT whale_NN has_VBZ been_VBN known_VBN to_TO attribute_VB his_PRP$ failure_NN to_TO a_DT breach_NN of_IN
chastity_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ men_NNS ._. It_PRP should_MD be_VB remarked_VBN that_IN the_DT
conduct_NN thus_RB prescribed_VBN as_IN a_DT preparation_NN for_IN whaling_NN is_VBZ precisely_RB
that_IN which_WDT in_IN the_DT same_JJ tribe_NN of_IN Indians_NNPS was_VBD required_VBN of_IN men_NNS about_RB to_TO
go_VB on_IN the_DT war-path_NN ._. Rules_NNPS of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN are_VBP ,_, or_CC were_VBD formerly_RB ,_,
observed_VBN by_IN Malagasy_JJ whalers_NNS ._. For_IN eight_CD days_NNS before_IN they_PRP went_VBD to_TO sea_NN
the_DT crew_NN of_IN a_DT whaler_NN used_VBN to_TO fast_RB ,_, abstaining_VBG from_IN women_NNS and_CC liquor_NN ,_,
and_CC confessing_VBG their_PRP$ most_RBS secret_JJ faults_NNS to_TO each_DT other_JJ ;_: and_CC if_IN any_DT
man_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO have_VB sinned_JJ deeply_RB ,_, he_PRP was_VBD forbidden_VBN to_TO share_VB in_IN
the_DT expedition_NN ._. In_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Mabuiag_NNP continence_NN was_VBD imposed_VBN on_IN
the_DT people_NNS both_CC before_IN they_PRP went_VBD to_TO hunt_VB the_DT dugong_JJ and_CC while_IN the_DT
turtles_NNS were_VBD pairing_VBG ._. The_DT turtle-season_NN lasts_VBZ during_IN parts_NNS of_IN
October_NNP and_CC November_NNP ;_: and_CC if_IN at_IN that_DT time_NN unmarried_JJ persons_NNS had_VBN
sexual_JJ intercourse_NN with_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_, it_PRP was_VBD believed_VBN that_IN when_WRB the_DT
canoe_NN approached_VBD the_DT floating_VBG turtle_NN ,_, the_DT male_NN would_MD separate_VB from_IN
the_DT female_NN and_CC both_DT would_MD dive_VB down_RB in_IN different_JJ directions_NNS ._. So_RB at_IN
Mowat_NNP in_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP men_NNS have_VBP no_DT relation_NN with_IN women_NNS when_WRB the_DT turtles_NNS
are_VBP coupling_VBG ,_, though_IN there_EX is_VBZ considerable_JJ laxity_NN of_IN morals_NNS at_IN other_JJ
times_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Uap_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT Caroline_NNP group_NN ,_, every_DT
fisherman_NN plying_VBG his_PRP$ craft_NN lies_VBZ under_IN a_DT most_RBS strict_JJ taboo_NN during_IN the_DT
whole_NN of_IN the_DT fishing_NN season_NN ,_, which_WDT lasts_VBZ for_IN six_CD or_CC eight_CD weeks_NNS ._.
Whenever_WRB he_PRP is_VBZ on_IN shore_NN he_PRP must_MD spend_VB all_PDT his_PRP$ time_NN in_IN the_DT men_NNS '_POS s_PRP
clubhouse_NN ,_, and_CC under_IN no_DT pretext_NN whatever_WDT may_MD he_PRP visit_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ house_NN
or_CC so_RB much_RB as_IN look_NN upon_IN the_DT faces_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC womenkind_NN ._. Were_VBD he_PRP
but_CC to_TO steal_VB a_DT glance_NN at_IN them_PRP ,_, they_PRP think_VBP that_IN flying_VBG fish_NN must_MD
inevitably_RB bore_VBD out_RP his_PRP$ eyes_NNS at_IN night_NN ._. If_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, mother_NN ,_, or_CC
daughter_NN brings_VBZ any_DT gift_NN for_IN him_PRP or_CC wishes_VBZ to_TO talk_VB with_IN him_PRP ,_, she_PRP
must_MD stand_VB down_RP towards_IN the_DT shore_NN with_IN her_PRP$ back_NN turned_VBD to_TO the_DT men_NNS '_POS s_PRP
clubhouse_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT fisherman_NN may_MD go_VB out_RB and_CC speak_VB to_TO her_PRP ,_, or_CC with_IN
his_PRP$ back_NN turned_VBD to_TO her_PRP$ he_PRP may_MD receive_VB what_WP she_PRP has_VBZ brought_VBN him_PRP ;_:
after_IN which_WDT he_PRP must_MD return_VB at_IN once_RB to_TO his_PRP$ rigorous_JJ confinement_NN ._.
Indeed_RB the_DT fishermen_NNS may_MD not_RB even_RB join_VB in_IN dance_NN and_CC song_NN with_IN the_DT
other_JJ men_NNS of_IN the_DT clubhouse_NN in_IN the_DT evening_NN ;_: they_PRP must_MD keep_VB to_TO
themselves_PRP and_CC be_VB silent_JJ ._. In_IN Mirzapur_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT seed_NN of_IN the_DT silkworm_NN
is_VBZ brought_VBN into_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, the_DT Kol_NNP or_CC Bhuiyar_NNP puts_VBZ it_PRP in_IN a_DT place_NN
which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN carefully_RB plastered_VBN with_IN holy_JJ cowdung_NN to_TO bring_VB good_JJ
luck_NN ._. From_IN that_DT time_NN the_DT owner_NN must_MD be_VB careful_JJ to_TO avoid_VB ceremonial_NN
impurity_NN ._. He_PRP must_MD give_VB up_RP cohabitation_NN with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ;_: he_PRP may_MD not_RB
sleep_NN on_IN a_DT bed_NN ,_, nor_CC shave_VB himself_PRP ,_, nor_CC cut_VBD his_PRP$ nails_NNS ,_, nor_CC anoint_MD
himself_PRP with_IN oil_NN ,_, nor_CC eat_VB food_NN cooked_VBN with_IN butter_NN ,_, nor_CC tell_VB lies_NNS ,_,
nor_CC do_VBP anything_NN else_RB that_IN he_PRP deems_VBZ wrong_JJ ._. He_PRP vows_VBZ to_TO Singarmati_NNP Devi_NNP
that_IN ,_, if_IN the_DT worms_NNS are_VBP duly_RB born_VBN ,_, he_PRP will_MD make_VB her_PRP$ an_DT offering_NN ._. When_WRB
the_DT cocoons_NNS open_JJ and_CC the_DT worms_NNS appear_VBP ,_, he_PRP assembles_VBZ the_DT women_NNS of_IN the_DT
house_NN and_CC they_PRP sing_VBP the_DT same_JJ song_NN as_IN at_IN the_DT birth_NN of_IN a_DT baby_NN ,_, and_CC red_JJ
lead_NN is_VBZ smeared_VBN on_IN the_DT parting_NN of_IN the_DT hair_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT married_JJ women_NNS
of_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT worms_NNS pair_NN ,_, rejoicings_NNS are_VBP made_VBN as_IN at_IN
a_DT marriage_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT silkworms_NNS are_VBP treated_VBN as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ like_IN
human_JJ beings_NNS ._. Hence_RB the_DT custom_NN which_WDT prohibits_VBZ the_DT commerce_NN of_IN the_DT
sexes_NNS while_IN the_DT worms_NNS are_VBP hatching_NN may_MD be_VB only_RB an_DT extension_NN ,_, by_IN
analogy_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT rule_NN which_WDT is_VBZ observed_VBN by_IN many_JJ races_NNS ,_, that_IN the_DT
husband_NN may_MD not_RB cohabit_VB with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN during_IN pregnancy_NN and_CC
lactation_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Nias_NNP the_DT hunters_NNS sometimes_RB dig_VB pits_NNS ,_, cover_VB them_PRP
lightly_RB over_IN with_IN twigs_NNS ,_, grass_NN ,_, and_CC leaves_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB drive_VB the_DT game_NN
into_IN them_PRP ._. While_IN they_PRP are_VBP engaged_VBN in_IN digging_VBG the_DT pits_NNS ,_, they_PRP have_VBP to_TO
observe_VB a_DT number_NN of_IN taboos_NNS ._. They_PRP may_MD not_RB spit_VB ,_, or_CC the_DT game_NN would_MD
turn_NN back_RB in_IN disgust_NN from_IN the_DT pits_NNS ._. They_PRP may_MD not_RB laugh_VB ,_, or_CC the_DT sides_NNS
of_IN the_DT pit_NN would_MD fall_VB in_IN ._. They_PRP may_MD eat_VB no_DT salt_NN ,_, prepare_VBP no_DT fodder_NN
for_IN swine_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT pit_NN they_PRP may_MD not_RB scratch_VB themselves_PRP ,_, for_IN if_IN
they_PRP did_VBD ,_, the_DT earth_NN would_MD be_VB loosened_VBN and_CC would_MD collapse_VB ._. And_CC the_DT
night_NN after_IN digging_VBG the_DT pit_NN they_PRP may_MD have_VB no_DT intercourse_NN with_IN a_DT
woman_NN ,_, or_CC all_DT their_PRP$ labour_NN would_MD be_VB in_IN vain_JJ ._.

This_DT practice_NN of_IN observing_VBG strict_JJ chastity_NN as_IN a_DT condition_NN of_IN success_NN
in_IN hunting_NN and_CC fishing_NN is_VBZ very_RB common_JJ among_IN rude_JJ races_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT
instances_NNS of_IN it_PRP which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN cited_VBN render_NN it_PRP probable_JJ that_IN the_DT
rule_NN is_VBZ always_RB based_VBN on_IN a_DT superstition_NN rather_RB than_IN on_IN a_DT
consideration_NN of_IN the_DT temporary_JJ weakness_NN which_WDT a_DT breach_NN of_IN the_DT custom_NN
may_MD entail_VB on_IN the_DT hunter_NN or_CC fisherman_NN ._. In_IN general_JJ it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB
supposed_VBN that_IN the_DT evil_JJ effect_NN of_IN incontinence_NN is_VBZ not_RB so_RB much_JJ that_IN it_PRP
weakens_VBZ him_PRP ,_, as_IN that_DT ,_, for_IN some_DT reason_NN or_CC other_JJ ,_, it_PRP offends_VBZ the_DT
animals_NNS ,_, who_WP in_IN consequence_NN will_MD not_RB suffer_VB themselves_PRP to_TO be_VB caught_VBN ._.
A_DT Carrier_NNP Indian_NNP of_IN British_NNP Columbia_NNP used_VBD to_TO separate_VB from_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN
for_IN a_DT full_JJ month_NN before_IN he_PRP set_VBD traps_NNS for_IN bears_NNS ,_, and_CC during_IN this_DT time_NN
he_PRP might_MD not_RB drink_VB from_IN the_DT same_JJ vessel_NN as_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, but_CC had_VBD to_TO use_VB
a_DT special_JJ cup_NN made_VBN of_IN birch_NN bark_NN ._. The_DT neglect_NN of_IN these_DT precautions_NNS
would_MD cause_VB the_DT game_NN to_TO escape_VB after_IN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN snared_VBN ._. But_CC when_WRB he_PRP
was_VBD about_IN to_TO snare_VB martens_NNS ,_, the_DT period_NN of_IN continence_NN was_VBD cut_VBN down_RP to_TO
ten_CD days_NNS ._.

An_DT examination_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT many_JJ cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT savage_JJ bridles_NNPS his_PRP$
passions_NNS and_CC remains_VBZ chaste_NN from_IN motives_NNS of_IN superstition_NN ,_, would_MD be_VB
instructive_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP cannot_MD attempt_VB it_PRP now_RB ._. I_PRP will_MD only_RB add_VB a_DT few_JJ
miscellaneous_JJ examples_NNS of_IN the_DT custom_NN before_IN passing_VBG to_TO the_DT
ceremonies_NNS of_IN purification_NN which_WDT are_VBP observed_VBN by_IN the_DT hunter_NN and_CC
fisherman_NN after_IN the_DT chase_NN and_CC the_DT fishing_NN are_VBP over_RB ._. The_DT workers_NNS in_IN
the_DT salt-pans_NNS near_IN Siphoum_NNP ,_, in_IN Laos_NNP ,_, must_MD abstain_VB from_IN all_DT sexual_JJ
relations_NNS at_IN the_DT place_NN where_WRB they_PRP are_VBP at_IN work_NN ;_: and_CC they_PRP may_MD not_RB
cover_VB their_PRP$ heads_NNS nor_CC shelter_NN themselves_PRP under_IN an_DT umbrella_NN from_IN the_DT
burning_VBG rays_NNS of_IN the_DT sun_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Kachins_NNP of_IN Burma_NNP the_DT ferment_NN used_VBN
in_IN making_VBG beer_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN by_IN two_CD women_NNS ,_, chosen_VBN by_IN lot_NN ,_, who_WP during_IN
the_DT three_CD days_NNS that_IN the_DT process_NN lasts_VBZ may_MD eat_VB nothing_NN acid_NN and_CC may_MD
have_VBP no_DT conjugal_JJ relations_NNS with_IN their_PRP$ husbands_NNS ;_: otherwise_RB it_PRP is_VBZ
supposed_VBN that_IN the_DT beer_NN would_MD be_VB sour_JJ ._. Among_IN the_DT Masai_NNP honey-wine_NN is_VBZ
brewed_VBN by_IN a_DT man_NN and_CC a_DT woman_NN who_WP live_VBP in_IN a_DT hut_NN set_VBN apart_RB for_IN them_PRP
till_IN the_DT wine_NN is_VBZ ready_JJ for_IN drinking_VBG ._. But_CC they_PRP are_VBP strictly_RB forbidden_VBN
to_TO have_VB sexual_JJ intercourse_NN with_IN each_DT other_JJ during_IN this_DT time_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ
deemed_VBN essential_JJ that_IN they_PRP should_MD be_VB chaste_NN for_IN two_CD days_NNS before_IN they_PRP
begin_VB to_TO brew_VB and_CC for_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT six_CD days_NNS that_IN the_DT brewing_NN
lasts_VBZ ._. The_DT Masai_NNP believe_VBP that_IN were_VBD the_DT couple_NN to_TO commit_VB a_DT breach_NN of_IN
chastity_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB would_MD the_DT wine_NN be_VB undrinkable_JJ but_CC the_DT bees_NNS which_WDT
made_VBN the_DT honey_NN would_MD fly_VB away_RB ._. Similarly_RB they_PRP require_VBP that_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP
is_VBZ making_VBG poison_NN should_MD sleep_VB alone_RB and_CC observe_VB other_JJ taboos_NNS which_WDT
render_VB him_PRP almost_RB an_DT outcast_NN ._. The_DT Wandorobbo_NNP ,_, a_DT tribe_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ
region_NN as_IN the_DT Masai_NNP ,_, believe_VBP that_IN the_DT mere_JJ presence_NN of_IN a_DT woman_NN in_IN
the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP is_VBZ brewing_VBG poison_NN would_MD deprive_VB the_DT
poison_NN of_IN its_PRP$ venom_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT same_JJ thing_NN would_MD happen_VB if_IN the_DT
wife_NN of_IN the_DT poison-maker_NN were_VBD to_TO commit_VB adultery_NN while_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN
was_VBD brewing_VBG the_DT poison_NN ._. In_IN this_DT last_JJ case_NN it_PRP is_VBZ obvious_JJ that_IN a_DT
rationalistic_JJ explanation_NN of_IN the_DT taboo_NN is_VBZ impossible_JJ ._. How_WRB could_MD the_DT
loss_NN of_IN virtue_NN in_IN the_DT poison_NN be_VB a_DT physical_JJ consequence_NN of_IN the_DT loss_NN
of_IN virtue_NN in_IN the_DT poison-maker_NN '_'' s_PRP wife_NN ?_. Clearly_RB the_DT effect_NN which_WDT the_DT
wife_NN '_POS s_VBZ adultery_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB on_IN the_DT poison_NN is_VBZ a_DT case_NN of_IN
sympathetic_JJ magic_NN ;_: her_PRP misconduct_NN sympathetically_RB affects_VBZ her_PRP$
husband_NN and_CC his_PRP$ work_NN at_IN a_DT distance_NN ._. We_PRP may_MD ,_, accordingly_RB ,_, infer_NN with_IN
some_DT confidence_NN that_IN the_DT rule_NN of_IN continence_NN imposed_VBN on_IN the_DT
poison-maker_NN himself_PRP is_VBZ also_RB a_DT simple_JJ case_NN of_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN ,_, and_CC
not_RB ,_, as_IN a_DT civilised_JJ reader_NN might_MD be_VB disposed_VBN to_TO conjecture_VB ,_, a_DT wise_JJ
precaution_NN designed_VBN to_TO prevent_VB him_PRP from_IN accidentally_RB poisoning_VBG his_PRP$
wife_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT Ba-Pedi_NNP and_CC Ba-Thonga_NNP tribes_NNS of_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT
site_NN of_IN a_DT new_JJ village_NN has_VBZ been_VBN chosen_VBN and_CC the_DT houses_NNS are_VBP building_NN ,_,
all_PDT the_DT married_JJ people_NNS are_VBP forbidden_VBN to_TO have_VB conjugal_JJ relations_NNS with_IN
each_DT other_JJ ._. If_IN it_PRP were_VBD discovered_VBN that_IN any_DT couple_NN had_VBD broken_VBN this_DT
rule_NN ,_, the_DT work_NN of_IN building_NN would_MD immediately_RB be_VB stopped_VBN ,_, and_CC another_DT
site_NN chosen_VBN for_IN the_DT village_NN ._. For_IN they_PRP think_VBP that_IN a_DT breach_NN of_IN
chastity_NN would_MD spoil_VB the_DT village_NN which_WDT was_VBD growing_VBG up_RP ,_, that_IN the_DT
chief_NN would_MD grow_VB lean_JJ and_CC perhaps_RB die_VB ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT guilty_JJ woman_NN
would_MD never_RB bear_VB another_DT child_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Chams_NNP of_IN Cochin-China_NNP ,_,
when_WRB a_DT dam_NN is_VBZ made_VBN or_CC repaired_VBN on_IN a_DT river_NN for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN
irrigation_NN ,_, the_DT chief_NN who_WP offers_VBZ the_DT traditional_JJ sacrifices_NNS and_CC
implores_VBZ the_DT protection_NN of_IN the_DT deities_NNS on_IN the_DT work_NN has_VBZ to_TO stay_VB all_PDT
the_DT time_NN in_IN a_DT wretched_JJ hovel_NN of_IN straw_NN ,_, taking_VBG no_DT part_NN in_IN the_DT labour_NN ,_,
and_CC observing_VBG the_DT strictest_NN continence_NN ;_: for_IN the_DT people_NNS believe_VBP that_IN
a_DT breach_NN of_IN his_PRP$ chastity_NN would_MD entail_VB a_DT breach_NN of_IN the_DT dam_NN ._. Here_RB ,_, it_PRP
is_VBZ plain_JJ ,_, there_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT idea_NN of_IN maintaining_VBG the_DT mere_JJ bodily_NN vigour_NN
of_IN the_DT chief_NN for_IN the_DT accomplishment_NN of_IN a_DT task_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PRP does_VBZ not_RB
even_RB bear_VB a_DT hand_NN ._.

If_IN the_DT taboos_NN or_CC abstinences_NNS observed_VBN by_IN hunters_NNS and_CC fishermen_NNS
before_IN and_CC during_IN the_DT chase_NN are_VBP dictated_VBN ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN reason_NN to_TO
believe_VB ,_, by_IN superstitious_JJ motives_NNS ,_, and_CC chiefly_RB by_IN a_DT dread_NN of_IN
offending_NN or_CC frightening_VBG the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT creatures_NNS whom_WP it_PRP is_VBZ
proposed_VBN to_TO kill_VB ,_, we_PRP may_MD expect_VB that_IN the_DT restraints_NNS imposed_VBN after_IN
the_DT slaughter_NN has_VBZ been_VBN perpetrated_VBN will_MD be_VB at_IN least_JJS as_IN stringent_JJ ,_,
the_DT slayer_NN and_CC his_PRP$ friends_NNS having_VBG now_RB the_DT added_VBN fear_NN of_IN the_DT angry_JJ
ghosts_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ victims_NNS before_IN their_PRP$ eyes_NNS ._. Whereas_NNS on_IN the_DT hypothesis_NN
that_IN the_DT abstinences_NNS in_IN question_NN ,_, including_VBG those_DT from_IN food_NN ,_, drink_NN ,_,
and_CC sleep_NN ,_, are_VBP merely_RB salutary_JJ precautions_NNS for_IN maintaining_VBG the_DT men_NNS
in_IN health_NN and_CC strength_NN to_TO do_VB their_PRP$ work_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ obvious_JJ that_IN the_DT
observance_NN of_IN these_DT abstinences_NNS or_CC taboos_NNS after_IN the_DT work_NN is_VBZ done_VBN ,_,
that_DT is_VBZ ,_, when_WRB the_DT game_NN is_VBZ killed_VBN and_CC the_DT fish_NN caught_VBD ,_, must_MD be_VB wholly_RB
superfluous_JJ ,_, absurd_JJ ,_, and_CC inexplicable_JJ ._. But_CC as_IN I_PRP shall_MD now_RB show_VB ,_,
these_DT taboos_NNS often_RB continue_VBP to_TO be_VB enforced_VBN or_CC even_RB increased_VBN in_IN
stringency_NN after_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT animals_NNS ,_, in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, after_IN the_DT
hunter_NN or_CC fisher_NN has_VBZ accomplished_VBN his_PRP$ object_NN by_IN making_VBG his_PRP$ bag_NN or_CC
landing_VBG his_PRP$ fish_NN ._. The_DT rationalistic_JJ theory_NN of_IN them_PRP therefore_RB breaks_NNS
down_RB entirely_RB ;_: the_DT hypothesis_NN of_IN superstition_NN is_VBZ clearly_RB the_DT only_RB
one_CD open_JJ to_TO us_PRP ._.

Among_IN the_DT Inuit_NNP or_CC Esquimaux_NNP of_IN Bering_NNP Strait_NNP "_'' the_DT dead_JJ bodies_NNS of_IN
various_JJ animals_NNS must_MD be_VB treated_VBN very_RB carefully_RB by_IN the_DT hunter_NN who_WP
obtains_NNS them_PRP ,_, so_RB that_IN their_PRP$ shades_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB offended_VBN and_CC bring_VB bad_JJ
luck_NN or_CC even_RB death_NN upon_IN him_PRP or_CC his_PRP$ people_NNS ."_RB Hence_RB the_DT Unalit_JJ hunter_NN
who_WP has_VBZ had_VBN a_DT hand_NN in_IN the_DT killing_NN of_IN a_DT white_JJ whale_NN ,_, or_CC even_RB has_VBZ
helped_VBD to_TO take_VB one_CD from_IN the_DT net_NN ,_, is_VBZ not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO do_VB any_DT work_NN for_IN
the_DT next_JJ four_CD days_NNS ,_, that_IN being_VBG the_DT time_NN during_IN which_WDT the_DT shade_NN or_CC
ghost_NN of_IN the_DT whale_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO stay_VB with_IN its_PRP$ body_NN ._. At_IN the_DT same_JJ
time_NN no_DT one_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN may_MD use_VB any_DT sharp_JJ or_CC pointed_JJ instrument_NN
for_IN fear_NN of_IN wounding_VBG the_DT whale_NN '_'' s_PRP shade_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO be_VB
hovering_VBG invisible_JJ in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN ;_: and_CC no_DT loud_JJ noise_NN may_MD be_VB
made_VBN lest_IN it_PRP should_MD frighten_VB or_CC offend_VB the_DT ghost_NN ._. Whoever_WP cuts_VBZ a_DT
whale_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN with_IN an_DT iron_NN axe_NN will_MD die_VB ._. Indeed_RB the_DT use_NN of_IN all_DT iron_NN
instruments_NNS is_VBZ forbidden_VBN in_IN the_DT village_NN during_IN these_DT four_CD days_NNS ._.

These_DT same_JJ Esquimaux_NNP celebrate_VBP a_DT great_JJ annual_JJ festival_NN in_IN December_NNP
when_WRB the_DT bladders_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT seals_NNS ,_, whales_NNS ,_, walrus_NN ,_, and_CC white_JJ bears_NNS
that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN killed_VBN in_IN the_DT year_NN are_VBP taken_VBN into_IN the_DT assembly-house_NN
of_IN the_DT village_NN ._. They_PRP remain_VBP there_RB for_IN several_JJ days_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB long_JJ as_IN
they_PRP do_VBP so_RB the_DT hunters_NNS avoid_VBP all_DT intercourse_NN with_IN women_NNS ,_, saying_VBG that_IN
if_IN they_PRP failed_VBD in_IN that_DT respect_NN the_DT shades_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ animals_NNS would_MD
be_VB offended_VBN ._. Similarly_RB among_IN the_DT Aleuts_NNP of_IN Alaska_NNP the_DT hunter_NN who_WP had_VBD
struck_VBD a_DT whale_NN with_IN a_DT charmed_JJ spear_NN would_MD not_RB throw_VB again_RB ,_, but_CC
returned_VBD at_IN once_RB to_TO his_PRP$ home_NN and_CC separated_VBD himself_PRP from_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS
in_IN a_DT hut_NN specially_RB constructed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP stayed_VBD for_IN
three_CD days_NNS without_IN food_NN or_CC drink_NN ,_, and_CC without_IN touching_VBG or_CC looking_VBG
upon_IN a_DT woman_NN ._. During_IN this_DT time_NN of_IN seclusion_NN he_PRP snorted_VBD occasionally_RB
in_IN imitation_NN of_IN the_DT wounded_JJ and_CC dying_VBG whale_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT
whale_NN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD struck_VBN from_IN leaving_VBG the_DT coast_NN ._. On_IN the_DT fourth_JJ day_NN
he_PRP emerged_VBD from_IN his_PRP$ seclusion_NN and_CC bathed_VBN in_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, shrieking_VBG in_IN a_DT
hoarse_JJ voice_NN and_CC beating_VBG the_DT water_NN with_IN his_PRP$ hands_NNS ._. Then_RB ,_, taking_VBG with_IN
him_PRP a_DT companion_NN ,_, he_PRP repaired_VBD to_TO that_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT shore_NN where_WRB he_PRP
expected_VBN to_TO find_VB the_DT whale_NN stranded_VBN ._. If_IN the_DT beast_NN was_VBD dead_JJ ,_, he_PRP at_IN
once_RB cut_VBD out_IN the_DT place_NN where_WRB the_DT death-wound_NN had_VBD been_VBN inflicted_VBN ._. If_IN
the_DT whale_NN was_VBD not_RB dead_JJ ,_, he_PRP again_RB returned_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ home_NN and_CC continued_VBN
washing_VBG himself_PRP until_IN the_DT whale_NN died_VBD ._. Here_RB the_DT hunter_NN '_POS s_VBZ imitation_NN of_IN
the_DT wounded_JJ whale_NN is_VBZ probably_RB intended_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN homoeopathic_NN
magic_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT beast_NN die_VBP in_IN earnest_JJ ._. Once_RB more_RBR the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT
grim_JJ polar_JJ bear_NN is_VBZ offended_VBN if_IN the_DT taboos_NNS which_WDT concern_NN him_PRP are_VBP not_RB
observed_VBN ._. His_PRP$ soul_NN tarries_NNS for_IN three_CD days_NNS near_IN the_DT spot_NN where_WRB it_PRP
left_VBD his_PRP$ body_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN these_DT days_NNS the_DT Esquimaux_NNP are_VBP particularly_RB
careful_JJ to_TO conform_VB rigidly_RB to_TO the_DT laws_NNS of_IN taboo_NN ,_, because_IN they_PRP
believe_VB that_IN punishment_NN overtakes_VBZ the_DT transgressor_NN who_WP sins_NNS against_IN
the_DT soul_NN of_IN a_DT bear_NN far_RB more_RBR speedily_RB than_IN him_PRP who_WP sins_NNS against_IN the_DT
souls_NNS of_IN the_DT sea-beasts_NNS ._.

When_WRB the_DT Kayans_NNP have_VBP shot_VBN one_CD of_IN the_DT dreaded_VBN Bornean_JJ panthers_NNS ,_, they_PRP
are_VBP very_RB anxious_JJ about_IN the_DT safety_NN of_IN their_PRP$ souls_NNS ,_, for_IN they_PRP think_VBP
that_IN the_DT soul_NN of_IN a_DT panther_NN is_VBZ almost_RB more_RBR powerful_JJ than_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
Hence_RB they_PRP step_VBP eight_CD times_NNS over_IN the_DT carcase_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ beast_NN
reciting_VBG the_DT spell_NN ,_, "_'' Panther_NNP ,_, thy_JJ soul_NN under_IN my_PRP$ soul_NN ."_NN On_IN returning_VBG
home_NN they_PRP smear_VBP themselves_PRP ,_, their_PRP$ dogs_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ weapons_NNS with_IN the_DT
blood_NN of_IN fowls_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO calm_VB their_PRP$ souls_NNS and_CC hinder_VB them_PRP from_IN
fleeing_VBG away_RB ;_: for_IN ,_, being_VBG themselves_PRP fond_JJ of_IN the_DT flesh_NN of_IN fowls_NNS ,_, they_PRP
ascribe_VB the_DT same_JJ taste_NN to_TO their_PRP$ souls_NNS ._. For_IN eight_CD days_NNS afterwards_RB
they_PRP must_MD bathe_VB by_IN day_NN and_CC by_IN night_NN before_IN going_VBG out_RP again_RB to_TO the_DT
chase_VB ._. Among_IN the_DT Hottentots_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT man_NN has_VBZ killed_VBN a_DT lion_NN ,_, leopard_NN ,_,
elephant_NN ,_, or_CC rhinoceros_NNS ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ esteemed_VBN a_DT great_JJ hero_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP has_VBZ to_TO
remain_VB at_IN home_NN quite_RB idle_JJ for_IN three_CD days_NNS ,_, during_IN which_WDT his_PRP$ wife_NN may_MD
not_RB come_VB near_IN him_PRP ;_: she_PRP is_VBZ also_RB enjoined_VBN to_TO restrict_VB herself_PRP to_TO a_DT
poor_JJ diet_NN and_CC to_TO eat_VB no_RB more_JJR than_IN is_VBZ barely_RB necessary_JJ to_TO keep_VB her_PRP in_IN
health_NN ._. Similarly_RB the_DT Lapps_NNP deem_VBP it_PRP the_DT height_NN of_IN glory_NN to_TO kill_VB a_DT
bear_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP consider_VBP the_DT king_NN of_IN beasts_NNS ._. Nevertheless_RB ,_, all_PDT the_DT
men_NNS who_WP take_VBP part_NN in_IN the_DT slaughter_NN are_VBP regarded_VBN as_IN unclean_JJ ,_, and_CC must_MD
live_VB by_IN themselves_PRP for_IN three_CD days_NNS in_IN a_DT hut_NN or_CC tent_NN made_VBN specially_RB
for_IN them_PRP ,_, where_WRB they_PRP cut_VBD up_RP and_CC cook_VB the_DT bear_NN '_POS s_VBZ carcase_NN ._. The_DT
reindeer_NN which_WDT brought_VBD in_IN the_DT carcase_NN on_IN a_DT sledge_NN may_MD not_RB be_VB driven_VBN
by_IN a_DT woman_NN for_IN a_DT whole_JJ year_NN ;_: indeed_RB ,_, according_VBG to_TO one_CD account_NN ,_, it_PRP
may_MD not_RB be_VB used_VBN by_IN anybody_NN for_IN that_DT period_NN ._. Before_IN the_DT men_NNS go_VBP into_IN
the_DT tent_NN where_WRB they_PRP are_VBP to_TO be_VB secluded_VBN ,_, they_PRP strip_VBP themselves_PRP of_IN the_DT
garments_NNS they_PRP had_VBD worn_VBN in_IN killing_VBG the_DT bear_NN ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ wives_NNS spit_VB the_DT
red_JJ juice_NN of_IN alder_NN bark_NN in_IN their_PRP$ faces_NNS ._. They_PRP enter_VBP the_DT tent_NN not_RB by_IN
the_DT ordinary_JJ door_NN but_CC by_IN an_DT opening_NN at_IN the_DT back_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT bear_NN '_POS s_PRP
flesh_NN has_VBZ been_VBN cooked_VBN ,_, a_DT portion_NN of_IN it_PRP is_VBZ sent_VBN by_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN two_CD
men_NNS to_TO the_DT women_NNS ,_, who_WP may_MD not_RB approach_VB the_DT men_NNS '_POS s_PRP tent_NN while_IN the_DT
cooking_NN is_VBZ going_VBG on_RP ._. The_DT men_NNS who_WP convey_VB the_DT flesh_NN to_TO the_DT women_NNS
pretend_VB to_TO be_VB strangers_NNS bringing_VBG presents_NNS from_IN a_DT foreign_JJ land_NN ;_: the_DT
women_NNS keep_VB up_RP the_DT pretence_NN and_CC promise_NN to_TO tie_VB red_JJ threads_NNS round_VBP the_DT
legs_NNS of_IN the_DT strangers_NNS ._. The_DT bear_NN '_POS s_VBZ flesh_NN may_MD not_RB be_VB passed_VBN in_IN to_TO the_DT
women_NNS through_IN the_DT door_NN of_IN their_PRP$ tent_NN ,_, but_CC must_MD be_VB thrust_VBN in_IN at_IN a_DT
special_JJ opening_NN made_VBN by_IN lifting_VBG up_RP the_DT hem_NN of_IN the_DT tent-cover_NN ._. When_WRB
the_DT three_CD days_NNS '_POS seclusion_NN is_VBZ over_RB and_CC the_DT men_NNS are_VBP at_IN liberty_NN to_TO
return_NN to_TO their_PRP$ wives_NNS ,_, they_PRP run_VBP ,_, one_CD after_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, round_RB the_DT
fire_NN ,_, holding_VBG the_DT chain_NN by_IN which_WDT pots_NNS are_VBP suspended_VBN over_IN it_PRP ._. This_DT is_VBZ
regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT form_NN of_IN purification_NN ;_: they_PRP may_MD now_RB leave_VB the_DT tent_NN by_IN
the_DT ordinary_JJ door_NN and_CC rejoin_VB the_DT women_NNS ._. But_CC the_DT leader_NN of_IN the_DT party_NN
must_MD still_RB abstain_VB from_IN cohabitation_NN with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN for_IN two_CD days_NNS
more_RBR ._.

Again_RB ,_, the_DT Caffres_NNP are_VBP said_VBN to_TO dread_NN greatly_RB the_DT boa-constrictor_NN or_CC
an_DT enormous_JJ serpent_NN resembling_NN it_PRP ;_: "_`` and_CC being_VBG influenced_VBN by_IN certain_JJ
superstitious_JJ notions_NNS they_PRP even_RB fear_VBP to_TO kill_VB it_PRP ._. The_DT man_NN who_WP
happened_VBN to_TO put_VB it_PRP to_TO death_NN ,_, whether_IN in_IN self-defence_NN or_CC otherwise_RB ,_,
was_VBD formerly_RB required_VBN to_TO lie_VB in_IN a_DT running_VBG stream_NN of_IN water_NN during_IN the_DT
day_NN for_IN several_JJ weeks_NNS together_RB ;_: and_CC no_DT beast_NN whatever_WDT was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO
be_VB slaughtered_VBN at_IN the_DT hamlet_NN to_TO which_WDT he_PRP belonged_VBD ,_, until_IN this_DT duty_NN
had_VBD been_VBN fully_RB performed_VBN ._. The_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT snake_NN was_VBD then_RB taken_VBN and_CC
carefully_RB buried_VBN in_IN a_DT trench_NN ,_, dug_VBD close_RB to_TO the_DT cattle-fold_JJ ,_, where_WRB
its_PRP$ remains_NNS ,_, like_IN those_DT of_IN a_DT chief_NN ,_, were_VBD henceforward_RB kept_VBN perfectly_RB
undisturbed_JJ ._. The_DT period_NN of_IN penance_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN mourning_VBG for_IN
the_DT dead_JJ ,_, is_VBZ now_RB happily_RB reduced_VBN to_TO a_DT few_JJ days_NNS ."_IN In_IN Madras_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ
considered_VBN a_DT great_JJ sin_NN to_TO kill_VB a_DT cobra_NN ._. When_WRB this_DT has_VBZ happened_VBN ,_, the_DT
people_NNS generally_RB burn_VBP the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT serpent_NN ,_, just_RB as_IN they_PRP burn_VBP the_DT
bodies_NNS of_IN human_JJ beings_NNS ._. The_DT murderer_NN deems_VBZ himself_PRP polluted_VBN for_IN
three_CD days_NNS ._. On_IN the_DT second_JJ day_NN milk_NN is_VBZ poured_VBN on_IN the_DT remains_NNS of_IN the_DT
cobra_NN ._. On_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN the_DT guilty_JJ wretch_NN is_VBZ free_JJ from_IN pollution_NN ._.

In_IN these_DT last_JJ cases_NNS the_DT animal_NN whose_WP$ slaughter_NN has_VBZ to_TO be_VB atoned_VBN for_IN
is_VBZ sacred_JJ ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ one_CD whose_WP$ life_NN is_VBZ commonly_RB spared_VBN from_IN
motives_NNS of_IN superstition_NN ._. Yet_CC the_DT treatment_NN of_IN the_DT sacrilegious_JJ
slayer_NN seems_VBZ to_TO resemble_VB so_RB closely_RB the_DT treatment_NN of_IN hunters_NNS and_CC
fishermen_NNS who_WP have_VBP killed_VBN animals_NNS for_IN food_NN in_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ course_NN of_IN
business_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT ideas_NNS on_IN which_WDT both_DT sets_NNS of_IN customs_NNS are_VBP based_VBN may_MD
be_VB assumed_VBN to_TO be_VB substantially_RB the_DT same_JJ ._. Those_DT ideas_NNS ,_, if_IN I_PRP am_VBP right_RB ,_,
are_VBP the_DT respect_NN which_WDT the_DT savage_JJ feels_VBZ for_IN the_DT souls_NNS of_IN beasts_NNS ,_,
especially_RB valuable_JJ or_CC formidable_JJ beasts_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT dread_NN which_WDT he_PRP
entertains_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ vengeful_JJ ghosts_NNS ._. Some_DT confirmation_NN of_IN this_DT view_NN
may_MD be_VB drawn_VBN from_IN the_DT ceremonies_NNS observed_VBN by_IN fishermen_NNS of_IN Annam_NNP when_WRB
the_DT carcase_NN of_IN a_DT whale_NN is_VBZ washed_VBN ashore_RB ._. These_DT fisherfolk_NN ,_, we_PRP are_VBP
told_VBN ,_, worship_NN the_DT whale_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT benefits_NNS they_PRP derive_VBP from_IN
it_PRP ._. There_EX is_VBZ hardly_RB a_DT village_NN on_IN the_DT sea-shore_NN which_WDT has_VBZ not_RB its_PRP$
small_JJ pagoda_NN ,_, containing_VBG the_DT bones_NNS ,_, more_RBR or_CC less_RBR authentic_JJ ,_, of_IN a_DT
whale_NN ._. When_WRB a_DT dead_JJ whale_NN is_VBZ washed_VBN ashore_RB ,_, the_DT people_NNS accord_VBP it_PRP a_DT
solemn_JJ burial_NN ._. The_DT man_NN who_WP first_RB caught_VBD sight_NN of_IN it_PRP acts_VBZ as_IN chief_NN
mourner_NN ,_, performing_VBG the_DT rites_NNS which_WDT as_IN chief_JJ mourner_NN and_CC heir_NN he_PRP
would_MD perform_VB for_IN a_DT human_JJ kinsman_NN ._. He_PRP puts_VBZ on_IN all_DT the_DT garb_NN of_IN woe_NN ,_,
the_DT straw_NN hat_NN ,_, the_DT white_JJ robe_NN with_IN long_JJ sleeves_NNS turned_VBN inside_RB out_RB ,_,
and_CC the_DT other_JJ paraphernalia_NNS of_IN full_JJ mourning_VBG ._. As_IN next_JJ of_IN kin_NN to_TO the_DT
deceased_JJ he_PRP presides_VBZ over_IN the_DT funeral_NN rites_NNS ._. Perfumes_NNS are_VBP burned_VBN ,_,
sticks_NNS of_IN incense_NN kindled_VBD ,_, leaves_NNS of_IN gold_NN and_CC silver_NN scattered_VBN ,_,
crackers_NNS let_VB off_RP ._. When_WRB the_DT flesh_NN has_VBZ been_VBN cut_VBN off_RB and_CC the_DT oil_NN
extracted_VBN ,_, the_DT remains_NNS of_IN the_DT carcase_NN are_VBP buried_VBN in_IN the_DT sand_NN ._. After_IN
wards_NNS a_DT shed_VBP is_VBZ set_VBN up_RP and_CC offerings_NNS are_VBP made_VBN in_IN it_PRP ._. Usually_RB some_DT
time_NN after_IN the_DT burial_NN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ whale_NN takes_VBZ possession_NN
of_IN some_DT person_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC declares_VBZ by_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN whether_IN he_PRP
is_VBZ a_DT male_NN or_CC a_DT female_NN ._.




XXI_NNP ._. Tabooed_NNP Things_NNS



1._`` The_DT Meaning_NN of_IN Taboo_NN

THUS_PRP in_IN primitive_JJ society_NN the_DT rules_NNS of_IN ceremonial_NN purity_NN observed_VBN by_IN
divine_JJ kings_NNS ,_, chiefs_NNS ,_, and_CC priests_NNS agree_VBP in_IN many_JJ respects_NNS with_IN the_DT
rules_NNS observed_VBN by_IN homicides_NNS ,_, mourners_NNS ,_, women_NNS in_IN childbed_NN ,_, girls_NNS at_IN
puberty_NN ,_, hunters_NNS and_CC fishermen_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ._. To_TO us_PRP these_DT various_JJ
classes_NNS of_IN persons_NNS appear_VBP to_TO differ_VB totally_RB in_IN character_NN and_CC
condition_NN ;_: some_DT of_IN them_PRP we_PRP should_MD call_VB holy_JJ ,_, others_NNS we_PRP might_MD
pronounce_NN unclean_JJ and_CC polluted_VBN ._. But_CC the_DT savage_JJ makes_VBZ no_DT such_JJ moral_JJ
distinction_NN between_IN them_PRP ;_: the_DT conceptions_NNS of_IN holiness_NN and_CC pollution_NN
are_VBP not_RB yet_RB differentiated_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ mind_NN ._. To_TO him_PRP the_DT common_JJ feature_NN of_IN
all_PDT these_DT persons_NNS is_VBZ that_IN they_PRP are_VBP dangerous_JJ and_CC in_IN danger_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
danger_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP stand_VBP and_CC to_TO which_WDT they_PRP expose_VBP others_NNS is_VBZ what_WP
we_PRP should_MD call_VB spiritual_JJ or_CC ghostly_RB ,_, and_CC therefore_RB imaginary_NN ._. The_DT
danger_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, is_VBZ not_RB less_RBR real_JJ because_IN it_PRP is_VBZ imaginary_NN ;_:
imagination_NN acts_VBZ upon_IN man_NN as_RB really_RB as_IN does_VBZ gravitation_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD
kill_VB him_PRP as_RB certainly_RB as_IN a_DT dose_NN of_IN prussic_JJ acid_NN ._. To_TO seclude_VB these_DT
persons_NNS from_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN so_RB that_IN the_DT dreaded_VBN spiritual_JJ
danger_NN shall_MD neither_RB reach_VB them_PRP nor_CC spread_VBD from_IN them_PRP ,_, is_VBZ the_DT object_NN
of_IN the_DT taboos_NNS which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP to_TO observe_VB ._. These_DT taboos_NNS act_VBP ,_, so_RB to_TO
say_VB ,_, as_IN electrical_JJ insulators_NNS to_TO preserve_VB the_DT spiritual_JJ force_NN with_IN
which_WDT these_DT persons_NNS are_VBP charged_VBN from_IN suffering_VBG or_CC inflicting_VBG harm_NN by_IN
contact_NN with_IN the_DT outer_JJ world_NN ._.

To_TO the_DT illustrations_NNS of_IN these_DT general_JJ principles_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN
already_RB given_VBN I_PRP shall_MD now_RB add_VB some_DT more_JJR ,_, drawing_VBG my_PRP$ examples_NNS ,_, first_JJ ,_,
from_IN the_DT class_NN of_IN tabooed_JJ things_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, second_JJ ,_, from_IN the_DT class_NN of_IN
tabooed_JJ words_NNS ;_: for_IN in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT savage_JJ both_DT things_NNS and_CC
words_NNS may_MD ,_, like_IN persons_NNS ,_, be_VB charged_VBN or_CC electrified_VBN ,_, either_CC
temporarily_RB or_CC permanently_RB ,_, with_IN the_DT mysterious_JJ virtue_NN of_IN taboo_NN ,_, and_CC
may_MD therefore_RB require_VB to_TO be_VB banished_VBN for_IN a_DT longer_JJR or_CC shorter_JJR time_NN
from_IN the_DT familiar_JJ usage_NN of_IN common_JJ life_NN ._. And_CC the_DT examples_NNS will_MD be_VB
chosen_VBN with_IN special_JJ reference_NN to_TO those_DT sacred_JJ chiefs_NNS ,_, kings_NNS and_CC
priests_NNS ,_, who_WP ,_, more_RBR than_IN anybody_NN else_RB ,_, live_VBP fenced_VBN about_RB by_IN taboo_NN as_IN
by_IN a_DT wall_NN ._. Tabooed_DT things_NNS will_MD be_VB illustrated_VBN in_IN the_DT present_NN
chapter_NN ,_, and_CC tabooed_JJ words_NNS in_IN the_DT next_JJ ._.



2._DT Iron_NNP tabooed_NN

IN_IN THE_DT FIRST_NN place_NN we_PRP may_MD observe_VB that_IN the_DT awful_JJ sanctity_NN of_IN kings_NNS
naturally_RB leads_VBZ to_TO a_DT prohibition_NN to_TO touch_VB their_PRP$ sacred_JJ persons_NNS ._. Thus_RB
it_PRP was_VBD unlawful_JJ to_TO lay_VB hands_NNS on_IN the_DT person_NN of_IN a_DT Spartan_NNP king_NN :_: no_DT one_CD
might_MD touch_VB the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN or_CC queen_NN of_IN Tahiti_NNP :_: it_PRP is_VBZ forbidden_VBN
to_TO touch_VB the_DT person_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN of_IN Siam_NNP under_IN pain_NN of_IN death_NN ;_: and_CC no_RB
one_CD may_MD touch_VB the_DT king_NN of_IN Cambodia_NNP ,_, for_IN any_DT purpose_NN whatever_RB ,_,
without_IN his_PRP$ express_JJ command_NN ._. In_IN July_NNP 1874_CD the_DT king_NN was_VBD thrown_VBN from_IN
his_PRP$ carriage_NN and_CC lay_VBD insensible_JJ on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB one_CD of_IN his_PRP$
suite_NN dared_VBD to_TO touch_VB him_PRP ;_: a_DT European_JJ coming_VBG to_TO the_DT spot_NN carried_VBD the_DT
injured_VBN monarch_NN to_TO his_PRP$ palace_NN ._. Formerly_RB no_DT one_NN might_MD touch_VB the_DT king_NN
of_IN Corea_NNP ;_: and_CC if_IN he_PRP deigned_VBD to_TO touch_VB a_DT subject_NN ,_, the_DT spot_NN touched_VBN
became_VBD sacred_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT person_NN thus_RB honoured_VBD had_VBD to_TO wear_VB a_DT visible_JJ
mark_NN (_-LRB- generally_RB a_DT cord_NN of_IN red_JJ silk_NN )_-RRB- for_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ._. Above_IN
all_DT ,_, no_DT iron_NN might_MD touch_VB the_DT king_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN ._. In_IN 1800_CD King_NNP
Tieng-tsong_NNP -_: tai-oang_NN died_VBD of_IN a_DT tumour_NN in_IN the_DT back_NN ,_, no_DT one_NN dreaming_VBG
of_IN employing_VBG the_DT lancet_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD probably_RB have_VB saved_VBN his_PRP$ life_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN one_CD king_NN suffered_VBD terribly_RB from_IN an_DT abscess_NN in_IN the_DT
lip_NN ,_, till_IN his_PRP$ physician_NN called_VBD in_IN a_DT jester_NN ,_, whose_WP$ pranks_NNS made_VBD the_DT
king_NN laugh_NN heartily_RB ,_, and_CC so_RB the_DT abscess_NN burst_NN ._. Roman_NNP and_CC Sabine_NNP
priests_NNS might_MD not_RB be_VB shaved_VBN with_IN iron_NN but_CC only_RB with_IN bronze_JJ razors_NNS or_CC
shears_NNS ;_: and_CC whenever_WRB an_DT iron_NN graving-tool_NN was_VBD brought_VBN into_IN the_DT
sacred_JJ grove_NN of_IN the_DT Arval_NNP Brothers_NNPS at_IN Rome_NNP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN
cutting_VBG an_DT inscription_NN in_IN stone_NN ,_, an_DT expiatory_JJ sacrifice_NN of_IN a_DT lamb_NN
and_CC a_DT pig_NN must_MD be_VB offered_VBN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD repeated_VBN when_WRB the_DT graving-tool_NN
was_VBD removed_VBN from_IN the_DT grove_NN ._. As_IN a_DT general_JJ rule_NN iron_NN might_MD not_RB be_VB
brought_VBN into_IN Greek_NNP sanctuaries_NNS ._. In_IN Crete_JJ sacrifices_NNS were_VBD offered_VBN to_TO
Menedemus_NNP without_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN iron_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT legend_NN ran_VBD that_IN
Menedemus_NNP had_VBD been_VBN killed_VBN by_IN an_DT iron_NN weapon_NN in_IN the_DT Trojan_NNP war_NN ._. The_DT
Archon_NNP of_IN Plataea_NNP might_MD not_RB touch_VB iron_NN ;_: but_CC once_RB a_DT year_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT
annual_JJ commemoration_NN of_IN the_DT men_NNS who_WP fell_VBD at_IN the_DT battle_NN of_IN Plataea_NNP ,_,
he_PRP was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO carry_VB a_DT sword_NN wherewith_IN to_TO sacrifice_VB a_DT bull_NN ._. To_TO
this_DT day_NN a_DT Hottentot_NNP priest_NN never_RB uses_VBZ an_DT iron_NN knife_NN ,_, but_CC always_RB a_DT
sharp_JJ splint_NN of_IN quartz_NN ,_, in_IN sacrificing_VBG an_DT animal_NN or_CC circumcising_VBG a_DT
lad_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Ovambo_NNP of_IN South-west_NNP Africa_NNP custom_NN requires_VBZ that_IN lads_NNS
should_MD be_VB circumcised_VBN with_IN a_DT sharp_JJ flint_NN ;_: if_IN none_NN is_VBZ to_TO hand_VB ,_, the_DT
operation_NN may_MD be_VB performed_VBN with_IN iron_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT iron_NN must_MD afterwards_RB
be_VB buried_VBN ._. Amongst_IN the_DT Moquis_NNP of_IN Arizona_NNP stone_NN knives_NNS ,_, hatchets_NNS ,_, and_CC
so_RB on_IN have_VBP passed_VBN out_IN of_IN common_JJ use_NN ,_, but_CC are_VBP retained_VBN in_IN religious_JJ
ceremonies_NNS ._. After_IN the_DT Pawnees_NNS had_VBD ceased_VBN to_TO use_VB stone_NN arrow-heads_NNS
for_IN ordinary_JJ purposes_NNS ,_, they_PRP still_RB employed_VBD them_PRP to_TO slay_VB the_DT
sacrifices_NNS ,_, whether_IN human_JJ captives_NNS or_CC buffalo_NN and_CC deer_JJ ._. Amongst_IN the_DT
Jews_NNS no_DT iron_NN tool_NN was_VBD used_VBN in_IN building_VBG the_DT Temple_NN at_IN Jerusalem_NNP or_CC in_IN
making_VBG an_DT altar_NN ._. The_DT old_JJ wooden_JJ bridge_NN (_-LRB- Pons_NNP Sublicius_NNP )_-RRB- at_IN Rome_NNP ,_,
which_WDT was_VBD considered_VBN sacred_JJ ,_, was_VBD made_VBN and_CC had_VBN to_TO be_VB kept_VBN in_IN repair_NN
without_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN iron_NN or_CC bronze_JJ ._. It_PRP was_VBD expressly_RB provided_VBN by_IN law_NN

without_IN any_DT iron_NN nails_NNS ,_, the_DT beams_NNS being_VBG so_RB arranged_VBN that_IN they_PRP could_MD

This_DT superstitious_JJ objection_NN to_TO iron_VB perhaps_RB dates_NNS from_IN that_DT early_JJ
time_NN in_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN society_NN when_WRB iron_NN was_VBD still_RB a_DT novelty_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN
such_JJ was_VBD viewed_VBN by_IN many_JJ with_IN suspicion_NN and_CC dislike_NN ._. For_IN everything_NN
new_JJ is_VBZ apt_JJ to_TO excite_VB the_DT awe_NN and_CC dread_NN of_IN the_DT savage_JJ ._. "_`` It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT
curious_JJ superstition_NN ,"_, says_VBZ a_DT pioneer_NN in_IN Borneo_NNP ,_, "_`` this_DT of_IN the_DT
Dusuns_NNS ,_, to_TO attribute_VB anything_NN --_: whether_IN good_JJ or_CC bad_JJ ,_, lucky_JJ or_CC
unlucky_JJ --_: that_DT happens_VBZ to_TO them_PRP to_TO something_NN novel_NN which_WDT has_VBZ arrived_VBN
in_IN their_PRP$ country_NN ._. For_IN instance_NN ,_, my_PRP$ living_NN in_IN Kindram_NNP has_VBZ caused_VBN the_DT
intensely_RB hot_JJ weather_NN we_PRP have_VBP experienced_VBN of_IN late_JJ ."_NNS The_DT unusually_RB

Baduwis_NNP of_IN Java_NNP ,_, who_WP live_VBP chiefly_RB by_IN husbandry_NN ,_, will_MD use_VB no_DT iron_NN

The_DT general_JJ dislike_NN of_IN innovation_NN ,_, which_WDT always_RB makes_VBZ itself_PRP

And_CC often_RB it_PRP is_VBZ so_RB used_VBN ._. Thus_RB in_IN the_DT Highlands_NNP of_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT great_JJ

Nails_NNS in_IN the_DT front_NN of_IN a_DT bed_NN ward_NN off_IN elves_NNS from_IN women_NNS "_`` in_IN the_DT straw_NN "_''
and_CC from_IN their_PRP$ babes_NNS ;_: but_CC to_TO make_VB quite_RB sure_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ better_JJR to_TO put_VB the_DT

Jew_NNP '_POS s_PRP harp_JJ keeps_VBZ the_DT elfin_NN women_NNS away_RB from_IN the_DT hunter_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT
tongue_NN of_IN the_DT instrument_NN is_VBZ of_IN steel_NN ._. In_IN Morocco_NNP iron_NN is_VBZ considered_VBN

that_IN they_PRP are_VBP constantly_RB surrounded_VBN by_IN evil_JJ spirits_NNS ,_, who_WP lie_VBP in_IN wait_NN
