3._. Sharp_NNP Weapons_NNP tabooed_.

THERE_NNP is_VBZ a_DT priestly_RB king_NN to_TO the_DT north_NN of_IN Zengwih_NNP in_IN Burma_NNP ,_, revered_VBN
by_IN the_DT Sotih_NNP as_IN the_DT highest_JJS spiritual_JJ and_CC temporal_JJ authority_NN ,_, into_IN
whose_WP$ house_NN no_DT weapon_NN or_CC cutting_VBG instrument_NN may_MD be_VB brought_VBN ._. This_DT
rule_NN may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB explained_VBN by_IN a_DT custom_NN observed_VBN by_IN various_JJ
peoples_NNS after_IN a_DT death_NN ;_: they_PRP refrain_VB from_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN sharp_JJ
instruments_NNS so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT ghost_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB
near_JJ ,_, lest_IN they_PRP should_MD wound_VB it_PRP ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT Esquimaux_NNP of_IN Bering_VBG
Strait_NNP "_`` during_IN the_DT day_NN on_IN which_WDT a_DT person_NN dies_VBZ in_IN the_DT village_NN no_DT one_CD
is_VBZ permitted_VBN to_TO work_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT relatives_NNS must_MD perform_VB no_DT labour_NN
during_IN the_DT three_CD following_JJ days_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ especially_RB forbidden_VBN during_IN
this_DT period_NN to_TO cut_VB with_IN any_DT edged_VBN instrument_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN a_DT knife_NN or_CC an_DT
axe_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT use_NN of_IN pointed_JJ instruments_NNS ,_, like_IN needles_NNS or_CC bodkins_NNS ,_, is_VBZ
also_RB forbidden_VBN ._. This_DT is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO be_VB done_VBN to_TO avoid_VB cutting_VBG or_CC injuring_VBG
the_DT shade_NN ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB present_JJ at_IN any_DT time_NN during_IN this_DT period_NN ,_, and_CC ,_,
if_IN accidentally_RB injured_VBN by_IN any_DT of_IN these_DT things_NNS ,_, it_PRP would_MD become_VB very_RB
angry_JJ and_CC bring_VB sickness_JJR or_CC death_NN to_TO the_DT people_NNS ._. The_DT relatives_NNS must_MD
also_RB be_VB very_RB careful_JJ at_IN this_DT time_NN not_RB to_TO make_VB any_DT loud_JJ or_CC harsh_JJ
noises_NNS that_WDT may_MD startle_VB or_CC anger_NN the_DT shade_NN ."_IN We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN in_IN
like_IN manner_NN after_IN killing_VBG a_DT white_JJ whale_NN these_DT Esquimaux_NNP abstain_RB from_IN
the_DT use_NN of_IN cutting_NN or_CC pointed_JJ instruments_NNS for_IN four_CD days_NNS ,_, lest_IN they_PRP
should_MD unwittingly_RB cut_VB or_CC stab_VB the_DT whale_NN '_'' s_PRP ghost_NN ._. The_DT same_JJ taboo_NN is_VBZ
sometimes_RB observed_VBN by_IN them_PRP when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT sick_JJ person_NN in_IN the_DT
village_NN ,_, probably_RB from_IN a_DT fear_NN of_IN injuring_VBG his_PRP$ shade_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB
hovering_VBG outside_IN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ._. After_IN a_DT death_NN the_DT Roumanians_NNPS of_IN
Transylvania_NNP are_VBP careful_JJ not_RB to_TO leave_VB a_DT knife_NN lying_VBG with_IN the_DT sharp_JJ
edge_NN uppermost_RB so_RB long_JJ as_IN the_DT corpse_NN remains_VBZ in_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, "_'' or_CC else_RB
the_DT soul_NN will_MD be_VB forced_VBN to_TO ride_VB on_IN the_DT blade_NN ."_RB For_IN seven_CD days_NNS after_IN
a_DT death_NN ,_, the_DT corpse_NN being_VBG still_RB in_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, the_DT Chinese_JJ abstain_NN
from_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN knives_NNS and_CC needles_NNS ,_, and_CC even_RB of_IN chopsticks_NNS ,_, eating_VBG
their_PRP$ food_NN with_IN their_PRP$ fingers_NNS ._. On_IN the_DT third_JJ ,_, sixth_JJ ,_, ninth_JJ ,_, and_CC
fortieth_IN days_NNS after_IN the_DT funeral_NN the_DT old_JJ Prussians_NNS and_CC Lithuanians_NNS
used_VBN to_TO prepare_VB a_DT meal_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT ,_, standing_VBG at_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, they_PRP invited_VBD
the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ ._. At_IN these_DT meals_NNS they_PRP sat_VBD silent_JJ round_IN the_DT
table_NN and_CC used_VBD no_DT knives_NNS and_CC the_DT women_NNS who_WP served_VBD up_RP the_DT food_NN were_VBD
also_RB without_IN knives_NNS ._. If_IN any_DT morsels_NNS fell_VBD from_IN the_DT table_NN they_PRP were_VBD
left_VBN lying_VBG there_RB for_IN the_DT lonely_JJ souls_NNS that_WDT had_VBD no_DT living_NN relations_NNS
or_CC friends_NNS to_TO feed_VB them_PRP ._. When_WRB the_DT meal_NN was_VBD over_IN the_DT priest_NN took_VBD a_DT
broom_NN and_CC swept_VBD the_DT souls_NNS out_IN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_`` Dear_UH souls_NNS ,_, ye_PRP
have_VBP eaten_VBN and_CC drunk_JJ ._. Go_VB forth_RB ,_, go_VB forth_RB ."_IN We_PRP can_MD now_RB understand_VB why_WRB
no_DT cutting_VBG instrument_NN may_MD be_VB taken_VBN into_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT Burmese_NNP
pontiff_NN ._. Like_IN so_RB many_JJ priestly_RB kings_NNS ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ probably_RB regarded_VBN as_IN
divine_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ therefore_RB right_JJ that_IN his_PRP$ sacred_JJ spirit_NN should_MD not_RB
be_VB exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT risk_NN of_IN being_VBG cut_VBN or_CC wounded_VBN whenever_WRB it_PRP quits_VBD his_PRP$
body_NN to_TO hover_VB invisible_JJ in_IN the_DT air_NN or_CC to_TO fly_VB on_IN some_DT distant_JJ
mission_NN ._.



4._CD Blood_NN tabooed_NN

WE_NNP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN the_DT Flamen_NNP Dialis_NNP was_VBD forbidden_VBN to_TO touch_VB or_CC even_RB
name_NN raw_JJ flesh_NN ._. At_IN certain_JJ times_NNS a_DT Brahman_NNP teacher_NN is_VBZ enjoined_VBN not_RB
to_TO look_VB on_IN raw_JJ flesh_NN ,_, blood_NN ,_, or_CC persons_NNS whose_WP$ hands_NNS have_VBP been_VBN cut_VBN
off_RB ._. In_IN Uganda_NNP the_DT father_NN of_IN twins_NNS is_VBZ in_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN taboo_NN for_IN some_DT
time_NN after_IN birth_NN ;_: among_IN other_JJ rules_NNS he_PRP is_VBZ forbidden_VBN to_TO kill_VB anything_NN
or_CC to_TO see_VB blood_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Pelew_NNP Islands_NNP when_WRB a_DT raid_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN on_IN a_DT
village_NN and_CC a_DT head_NN carried_VBD off_RP ,_, the_DT relations_NNS of_IN the_DT slain_JJ man_NN are_VBP
tabooed_NN and_CC have_VB to_TO submit_VB to_TO certain_JJ observances_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO escape_VB
the_DT wrath_NN of_IN his_PRP$ ghost_NN ._. They_PRP are_VBP shut_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, touch_VB no_DT raw_JJ
flesh_NN ,_, and_CC chew_VBP betel_NN over_IN which_WDT an_DT incantation_NN has_VBZ been_VBN uttered_VBN by_IN
the_DT exorcist_NN ._. After_IN this_DT the_DT ghost_NN of_IN the_DT slaughtered_JJ man_NN goes_VBZ away_RB
to_TO the_DT enemy_NN '_POS s_PRP country_NN in_IN pursuit_NN of_IN his_PRP$ murderer_NN ._. The_DT taboo_NN is_VBZ
probably_RB based_VBN on_IN the_DT common_JJ belief_NN that_IN the_DT soul_NN or_CC spirit_NN of_IN the_DT
animal_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT blood_NN ._. As_IN tabooed_JJ persons_NNS are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO be_VB in_IN a_DT
perilous_JJ state_NN --_: for_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT relations_NNS of_IN the_DT slain_JJ man_NN are_VBP
liable_JJ to_TO the_DT attacks_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ indignant_JJ ghost_NN --_: it_PRP is_VBZ especially_RB
necessary_JJ to_TO isolate_VB them_PRP from_IN contact_NN with_IN spirits_NNS ;_: hence_RB the_DT
prohibition_NN to_TO touch_VB raw_JJ meat_NN ._. But_CC as_RB usual_JJ the_DT taboo_NN is_VBZ only_RB the_DT
special_JJ enforcement_NN of_IN a_DT general_JJ precept_NN ;_: in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, its_PRP$
observance_NN is_VBZ particularly_RB enjoined_VBN in_IN circumstances_NNS which_WDT seem_VBP
urgently_RB to_TO call_VB for_IN its_PRP$ application_NN ,_, but_CC apart_RB from_IN such_JJ
circumstances_NNS the_DT prohibition_NN is_VBZ also_RB observed_VBN ,_, though_IN less_RBR
strictly_RB ,_, as_IN a_DT common_JJ rule_NN of_IN life_NN ._. Thus_RB some_DT of_IN the_DT Esthonians_NNS will_MD
not_RB taste_NN blood_NN because_IN they_PRP believe_VBP that_IN it_PRP contains_VBZ the_DT animal_NN '_POS s_PRP
soul_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD enter_VB the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP tasted_VBD the_DT blood_NN ._.
Some_DT Indian_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN North_NNP America_NNP ,_, "_`` through_IN a_DT strong_JJ principle_NN of_IN
religion_NN ,_, abstain_NN in_IN the_DT strictest_NN manner_NN from_IN eating_VBG the_DT blood_NN of_IN
any_DT animal_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP contains_VBZ the_DT life_NN and_CC spirit_NN of_IN the_DT beast_NN ."_VBN Jewish_JJ
hunters_NNS poured_VBD out_RP the_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT game_NN they_PRP had_VBD killed_VBN and_CC covered_VBN
it_PRP up_RP with_IN dust_NN ._. They_PRP would_MD not_RB taste_VB the_DT blood_NN ,_, believing_VBG that_IN the_DT
soul_NN or_CC life_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT blood_NN ,_, or_CC actually_RB was_VBD the_DT
blood_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT common_JJ rule_NN that_IN royal_JJ blood_NN may_MD not_RB be_VB shed_VBN upon_IN the_DT
ground_NN ._. Hence_RB when_WRB a_DT king_NN or_CC one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ family_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB put_VBN to_TO death_NN
a_DT mode_NN of_IN execution_NN is_VBZ devised_VBN by_IN which_WDT the_DT royal_JJ blood_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB
spilt_NN upon_IN the_DT earth_NN ._. About_IN the_DT year_NN 1688_IN the_DT generalissimo_NN of_IN the_DT
army_NN rebelled_VBD against_IN the_DT king_NN of_IN Siam_NNP and_CC put_VBD him_PRP to_TO death_NN "_'' after_IN
the_DT manner_NN of_IN royal_JJ criminals_NNS ,_, or_CC as_IN princes_NNS of_IN the_DT blood_NN are_VBP
treated_VBN when_WRB convicted_VBN of_IN capital_NN crimes_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ by_IN putting_VBG them_PRP
into_IN a_DT large_JJ iron_NN caldron_NN ,_, and_CC pounding_VBG them_PRP to_TO pieces_NNS with_IN wooden_JJ
pestles_NNS ,_, because_IN none_NN of_IN their_PRP$ royal_JJ blood_NN must_MD be_VB spilt_VBN on_IN the_DT
ground_NN ,_, it_PRP being_VBG ,_, by_IN their_PRP$ religion_NN ,_, thought_VBD great_JJ impiety_NN to_TO
contaminate_VB the_DT divine_JJ blood_NN by_IN mixing_VBG it_PRP with_IN earth_NN ."_. When_WRB Kublai_NNP
Khan_NNP defeated_VBD and_CC took_VBD his_PRP$ uncle_NN Nayan_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD rebelled_VBN against_IN
him_PRP ,_, he_PRP caused_VBD Nayan_NNP to_TO be_VB put_VBN to_TO death_NN by_IN being_VBG wrapt_VBN in_IN a_DT carpet_NN
and_CC tossed_VBD to_TO and_CC fro_IN till_IN he_PRP died_VBD ,_, "_'' because_IN he_PRP would_MD not_RB have_VB the_DT
blood_NN of_IN his_PRP$ Line_NNP Imperial_NNP spilt_NN upon_IN the_DT ground_NN or_CC exposed_VBN in_IN the_DT
eye_NN of_IN Heaven_NNP and_CC before_IN the_DT Sun_NNP ."_. "_'' Friar_NNP Ricold_NNP mentions_VBZ the_DT Tartar_NNP
maxim_NN :_: '_POS One_CD Khan_NNP will_MD put_VB another_DT to_TO death_NN to_TO get_VB possession_NN of_IN the_DT
throne_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP takes_VBZ great_JJ care_NN that_IN the_DT blood_NN be_VB not_RB spilt_VBN ._. For_IN
they_PRP say_VBP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ highly_RB improper_JJ that_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT Great_NNP Khan_NNP
should_MD be_VB spilt_VBN upon_IN the_DT ground_NN ;_: so_IN they_PRP cause_VBP the_DT victim_NN to_TO be_VB
smothered_VBN somehow_RB or_CC other_JJ .'_NNS The_DT like_IN feeling_NN prevails_VBZ at_IN the_DT court_NN
of_IN Burma_NNP ,_, where_WRB a_DT peculiar_JJ mode_NN of_IN execution_NN without_IN bloodshed_JJ is_NNS
reserved_VBN for_IN princes_NNS of_IN the_DT blood_NN ."_.

The_DT reluctance_NN to_TO spill_VB royal_JJ blood_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB only_RB a_DT particular_JJ
case_NN of_IN a_DT general_JJ unwillingness_NN to_TO shed_VB blood_NN or_CC at_IN least_JJS to_TO allow_VB
it_PRP to_TO fall_VB on_IN the_DT ground_NN ._. Marco_NNP Polo_NNP tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN in_IN his_PRP$ day_NN
persons_NNS caught_VBD in_IN the_DT streets_NNS of_IN Cambaluc_NNP (_-LRB- Peking_NN )_-RRB- at_IN unseasonable_JJ
hours_NNS were_VBD arrested_VBN ,_, and_CC if_IN found_VBN guilty_JJ of_IN a_DT misdemeanor_NN were_VBD
beaten_VBN with_IN a_DT stick_NN ._. "_'' Under_IN this_DT punishment_NN people_NNS sometimes_RB die_VBP ,_,
but_CC they_PRP adopt_VBP it_PRP in_IN order_NN to_TO eschew_VB bloodshed_JJ ,_, for_IN their_PRP$ Bacsis_NN
say_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ an_DT evil_JJ thing_NN to_TO shed_VB man_NN '_'' s_VBZ blood_NN ."_CC In_IN West_NNP Sussex_NNP
people_NNS believe_VBP that_IN the_DT ground_NN on_IN which_WDT human_JJ blood_NN has_VBZ been_VBN shed_VBN is_NNS
accursed_VBN and_CC will_MD remain_VB barren_JJ for_IN ever_RB ._. Among_IN some_DT primitive_JJ
peoples_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT blood_NN of_IN a_DT tribesman_NN has_VBZ to_TO be_VB spilt_VBN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB
suffered_VBN to_TO fall_VB upon_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, but_CC is_VBZ received_VBN upon_IN the_DT bodies_NNS of_IN
his_PRP$ fellow-tribesmen_NNS ._. Thus_RB in_IN some_DT Australian_JJ tribes_NNS boys_NNS who_WP are_VBP
being_VBG circumcised_VBN are_VBP laid_VBN on_IN a_DT platform_NN ,_, formed_VBN by_IN the_DT living_VBG
bodies_NNS of_IN the_DT tribesmen_NNS ;_: and_CC when_WRB a_DT boy_NN '_'' s_PRP tooth_NN is_VBZ knocked_VBN out_RP as_IN an_DT
initiatory_NN ceremony_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ seated_VBN on_IN the_DT shoulders_NNS of_IN a_DT man_NN ,_, on_IN
whose_WP$ breast_NN the_DT blood_NN flows_NNS and_CC may_MD not_RB be_VB wiped_VBN away_RB ._. "_'' Also_RB the_DT
Gauls_NNP used_VBD to_TO drink_VB their_PRP$ enemies_NNS '_POS blood_NN and_CC paint_VBP themselves_PRP
therewith_DT ._. So_CC also_RB they_PRP write_VBP that_IN the_DT old_JJ Irish_NNP were_VBD wont_JJ ;_: and_CC so_RB
have_VBP I_PRP seen_VBN some_DT of_IN the_DT Irish_NNP do_VBP ,_, but_CC not_RB their_PRP$ enemies_NNS '_'' but_CC
friends_NNS '_POS blood_NN ,_, as_IN ,_, namely_RB ,_, at_IN the_DT execution_NN of_IN a_DT notable_JJ traitor_NN at_IN
Limerick_NNP ,_, called_VBD Murrogh_NNP O_NNP '_POS Brien_NNP ,_, I_PRP saw_VBD an_DT old_JJ woman_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD his_PRP$
foster-mother_JJ ,_, take_VB up_RP his_PRP$ head_NN whilst_IN he_PRP was_VBD quartered_VBN and_CC suck_VB up_IN
all_PDT the_DT blood_NN that_WDT ran_VBD thereout_RB ,_, saying_VBG that_IN the_DT earth_NN was_VBD not_RB
worthy_JJ to_TO drink_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC therewith_RB also_RB steeped_VBN her_PRP$ face_NN and_CC breast_NN
and_CC tore_VBD her_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, crying_VBG out_RP and_CC shrieking_VBG most_RBS terribly_RB ."_VBN Among_IN
the_DT Latuka_NNP of_IN Central_NNP Africa_NNP the_DT earth_NN on_IN which_WDT a_DT drop_NN of_IN blood_NN has_VBZ
fallen_VBN at_IN childbirth_NN is_VBZ carefully_RB scraped_VBN up_RP with_IN an_DT iron_NN shovel_NN ,_,
put_VBN into_IN a_DT pot_NN along_IN with_IN the_DT water_NN used_VBN in_IN washing_VBG the_DT mother_NN ,_, and_CC
buried_VBN tolerably_RB deep_JJ outside_IN the_DT house_NN on_IN the_DT left-hand_JJ side_NN ._. In_IN
West_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, if_IN a_DT drop_NN of_IN your_PRP$ blood_NN has_VBZ fallen_VBN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, you_PRP
must_MD carefully_RB cover_VB it_PRP up_RB ,_, rub_NN and_CC stamp_VB it_PRP into_IN the_DT soil_NN ;_: if_IN it_PRP
has_VBZ fallen_VBN on_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN a_DT canoe_NN or_CC a_DT tree_NN ,_, the_DT place_NN is_VBZ cut_VBN out_IN
and_CC the_DT chip_NN destroyed_VBD ._. One_CD motive_NN of_IN these_DT African_JJ customs_NNS may_MD be_VB a_DT
wish_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT blood_NN from_IN falling_VBG into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN magicians_NNS ,_,
who_WP might_MD make_VB an_DT evil_JJ use_NN of_IN it_PRP ._. That_DT is_VBZ admittedly_RB the_DT reason_NN why_WRB
people_NNS in_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP stamp_VB out_RP any_DT blood_NN of_IN theirs_PRP which_WDT has_VBZ
dropped_VBD on_IN the_DT ground_NN or_CC cut_VB out_RP any_DT wood_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN soaked_VBN with_IN
it_PRP ._. From_IN a_DT like_JJ dread_NN of_IN sorcery_NN natives_NNS of_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP are_VBP careful_JJ
to_TO burn_VB any_DT sticks_NNS ,_, leaves_NNS ,_, or_CC rags_NNS which_WDT are_VBP stained_VBN with_IN their_PRP$
blood_NN ;_: and_CC if_IN the_DT blood_NN has_VBZ dripped_VBD on_IN the_DT ground_NN they_PRP turn_VBP up_RP the_DT
soil_NN and_CC if_IN possible_JJ light_NN a_DT fire_NN on_IN the_DT spot_NN ._. The_DT same_JJ fear_NN
explains_VBZ the_DT curious_JJ duties_NNS discharged_VBN by_IN a_DT class_NN of_IN men_NNS called_VBN
ramanga_NN or_CC "_`` blue_JJ blood_NN "_'' among_IN the_DT Betsileo_NNP of_IN Madagascar_NNP ._. It_PRP is_VBZ
their_PRP$ business_NN to_TO eat_VB all_PDT the_DT nail-parings_NNS and_CC to_TO lick_VB up_RP all_PDT the_DT
spilt_NN blood_NN of_IN the_DT nobles_NNS ._. When_WRB the_DT nobles_NNS pare_VBP their_PRP$ nails_NNS ,_, the_DT
parings_NNS are_VBP collected_VBN to_TO the_DT last_JJ scrap_NN and_CC swallowed_VBN by_IN these_DT
ramanga_NN ._. If_IN the_DT parings_NNS are_VBP too_RB large_JJ ,_, they_PRP are_VBP minced_JJ small_JJ and_CC
so_RB gulped_VBD down_RP ._. Again_RB ,_, should_MD a_DT nobleman_NN wound_NN himself_PRP ,_, say_VBP in_IN
cutting_VBG his_PRP$ nails_NNS or_CC treading_NN on_IN something_NN ,_, the_DT ramanga_NN lick_NN up_IN
the_DT blood_NN as_RB fast_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._. Nobles_NNP of_IN high_JJ rank_NN hardly_RB go_VBP
anywhere_RB without_IN these_DT humble_JJ attendants_NNS ;_: but_CC if_IN it_PRP should_MD happen_VB
that_IN there_EX are_VBP none_NN of_IN them_PRP present_JJ ,_, the_DT cut_NN nails_NNS and_CC the_DT spilt_NN
blood_NN are_VBP carefully_RB collected_VBN to_TO be_VB afterwards_RB swallowed_VBN by_IN the_DT
ramanga_NN ._. There_EX is_VBZ scarcely_RB a_DT nobleman_NN of_IN any_DT pretensions_NNS who_WP does_VBZ
not_RB strictly_RB observe_VB this_DT custom_NN ,_, the_DT intention_NN of_IN which_WDT probably_RB is_VBZ
to_TO prevent_VB these_DT parts_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ person_NN from_IN falling_VBG into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN
sorcerers_NNS ,_, who_WP on_IN the_DT principles_NNS of_IN contagious_JJ magic_NN could_MD work_VB him_PRP
harm_NN thereby_RB ._.

The_DT general_JJ explanation_NN of_IN the_DT reluctance_NN to_TO shed_VB blood_NN on_IN the_DT
ground_NN is_VBZ probably_RB to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN the_DT soul_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT
blood_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN therefore_RB any_DT ground_NN on_IN which_WDT it_PRP may_MD fall_VB
necessarily_RB becomes_VBZ taboo_JJ or_CC sacred_JJ ._. In_IN New_NNP Zealand_NNP anything_NN upon_IN
which_WDT even_RB a_DT drop_NN of_IN a_DT high_JJ chief_NN '_'' s_PRP blood_NN chances_NNS to_TO fall_VB becomes_VBZ
taboo_NN or_CC sacred_JJ to_TO him_PRP ._. For_IN instance_NN ,_, a_DT party_NN of_IN natives_NNS having_VBG come_VBN
to_TO visit_VB a_DT chief_NN in_IN a_DT fine_JJ new_JJ canoe_NN ,_, the_DT chief_NN got_VBD into_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC in_IN
doing_VBG so_RB a_DT splinter_NN entered_VBD his_PRP$ foot_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT blood_NN trickled_VBD on_IN the_DT
canoe_NN ,_, which_WDT at_IN once_RB became_VBD sacred_JJ to_TO him_PRP ._. The_DT owner_NN jumped_VBD out_RB ,_,
dragged_VBD the_DT canoe_NN ashore_RB opposite_IN the_DT chief_NN '_'' s_PRP house_NN ,_, and_CC left_VBD it_PRP
there_EX ._. Again_RB ,_, a_DT chief_NN in_IN entering_VBG a_DT missionary_JJ '_'' s_PRP house_NN knocked_VBD his_PRP$
head_NN against_IN a_DT beam_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT blood_NN flowed_VBD ._. The_DT natives_NNS said_VBD that_IN in_IN
former_JJ times_NNS the_DT house_NN would_MD have_VB belonged_VBN to_TO the_DT chief_NN ._. As_IN usually_RB
happens_VBZ with_IN taboos_NNS of_IN universal_JJ application_NN ,_, the_DT prohibition_NN to_TO
spill_VB the_DT blood_NN of_IN a_DT tribesman_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN applies_VBZ with_IN peculiar_JJ
stringency_NN to_TO chiefs_NNS and_CC kings_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ observed_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ case_NN long_RB
after_IN it_PRP has_VBZ ceased_VBN to_TO be_VB observed_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN others_NNS ._.



5._CD The_DT Head_NN tabooed_NN

MANY_JJ peoples_NNS regard_VBP the_DT head_NN as_IN peculiarly_RB sacred_JJ ;_: the_DT special_JJ
sanctity_NN attributed_VBD to_TO it_PRP is_VBZ sometimes_RB explained_VBN by_IN a_DT belief_NN that_IN it_PRP
contains_VBZ a_DT spirit_NN which_WDT is_VBZ very_RB sensitive_JJ to_TO injury_NN or_CC disrespect_NN ._.
Thus_RB the_DT Yorubas_NNP hold_NN that_IN every_DT man_NN has_VBZ three_CD spiritual_JJ inmates_NNS ,_, of_IN
whom_WP the_DT first_JJ ,_, called_VBN Olori_NNP ,_, dwells_VBZ in_IN the_DT head_NN and_CC is_VBZ the_DT man_NN '_POS s_PRP
protector_NN ,_, guardian_NN ,_, and_CC guide_NN ._. Offerings_NNS are_VBP made_VBN to_TO this_DT spirit_NN ,_,
chiefly_RB of_IN fowls_NNS ,_, and_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT blood_NN mixed_JJ with_IN palmoil_NN is_VBZ rubbed_VBN
on_IN the_DT forehead_NN ._. The_DT Karens_NNP suppose_VBP that_IN a_DT being_VBG called_VBN the_DT tso_NN
resides_NNS in_IN the_DT upper_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, and_CC while_IN it_PRP retains_VBZ its_PRP$ seat_NN
no_DT harm_NN can_MD befall_VB the_DT person_NN from_IN the_DT efforts_NNS of_IN the_DT seven_CD
Kelahs_NNP ,_, or_CC personified_JJ passions_NNS ._. "_'' But_CC if_IN the_DT tso_NN becomes_VBZ
heedless_JJ or_CC weak_JJ certain_JJ evil_NN to_TO the_DT person_NN is_VBZ the_DT result_NN ._. Hence_RB the_DT
head_NN is_VBZ carefully_RB attended_VBN to_TO ,_, and_CC all_DT possible_JJ pains_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN to_TO
provide_VB such_JJ dress_NN and_CC attire_NN as_RB will_MD be_VB pleasing_VBG to_TO the_DT tso_NN ._. "_'' The_DT
Siamese_NNP think_VBP that_IN a_DT spirit_NN called_VBN khuan_JJ or_CC kwun_JJ dwells_NNS in_IN the_DT
human_JJ head_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT guardian_NN spirit_NN ._. The_DT spirit_NN must_MD be_VB
carefully_RB protected_VBD from_IN injury_NN of_IN every_DT kind_NN ;_: hence_RB the_DT act_NN of_IN
shaving_NN or_CC cutting_VBG the_DT hair_NN is_VBZ accompanied_VBN with_IN many_JJ ceremonies_NNS ._. The_DT
kwun_NN is_VBZ very_RB sensitive_JJ on_IN points_NNS of_IN honour_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD feel_VB
mortally_RB insulted_VBN if_IN the_DT head_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PRP resides_VBZ were_VBD touched_VBN by_IN
the_DT hand_NN of_IN a_DT stranger_NN ._. The_DT Cambodians_NNPS esteem_VBP it_PRP a_DT grave_JJ offence_NN to_TO
touch_VB a_DT man_NN '_'' s_PRP head_NN ;_: some_DT of_IN them_PRP will_MD not_RB enter_VB a_DT place_NN where_WRB
anything_NN whatever_WDT is_VBZ suspended_VBN over_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT meanest_JJS
Cambodian_JJ would_MD never_RB consent_VB to_TO live_VB under_IN an_DT inhabited_JJ room_NN ._. Hence_RB
the_DT houses_NNS are_VBP built_VBN of_IN one_CD story_NN only_RB ;_: and_CC even_RB the_DT Government_NN
respects_VBZ the_DT prejudice_NN by_IN never_RB placing_VBG a_DT prisoner_NN in_IN the_DT stocks_NNS
under_IN the_DT floor_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN ,_, though_IN the_DT houses_NNS are_VBP raised_VBN high_JJ above_IN
the_DT ground_NN ._. The_DT same_JJ superstition_NN exists_VBZ amongst_IN the_DT Malays_NNP ;_: for_IN an_DT
early_JJ traveller_NN reports_NNS that_IN in_IN Java_NNP people_NNS "_`` wear_VB nothing_NN on_IN their_PRP$
heads_NNS ,_, and_CC say_VB that_IN nothing_NN must_MD be_VB on_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS ._. ._. ._. and_CC if_IN any_DT
person_NN were_VBD to_TO put_VB his_PRP$ hand_NN upon_IN their_PRP$ head_NN they_PRP would_MD kill_VB him_PRP ;_: and_CC
they_PRP do_VBP not_RB build_VB houses_NNS with_IN storeys_NNS ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN they_PRP may_MD not_RB
walk_NN over_IN each_DT other_JJ '_POS s_PRP heads_VBZ ."_CC

The_DT same_JJ superstition_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT head_NN is_VBZ found_VBN in_IN full_JJ force_NN
throughout_IN Polynesia_NNP ._. Thus_RB of_IN Gattanewa_NNP ,_, a_DT Marquesan_NNP chief_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ
said_VBD that_IN "_`` to_TO touch_VB the_DT top_NN of_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, or_CC anything_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN
on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, was_VBD sacrilege_NN ._. To_TO pass_VB over_IN his_PRP$ head_NN was_VBD an_DT indignity_NN
never_RB to_TO be_VB forgotten_VBN ."_IN The_DT son_NN of_IN a_DT Marquesan_NNP high_JJ priest_NN has_VBZ been_VBN
seen_VBN to_TO roll_VB on_IN the_DT ground_NN in_IN an_DT agony_NN of_IN rage_NN and_CC despair_NN ,_, begging_VBG
for_IN death_NN ,_, because_IN some_DT one_NN had_VBD desecrated_VBN his_PRP$ head_NN and_CC deprived_VBD him_PRP
of_IN his_PRP$ divinity_NN by_IN sprinkling_VBG a_DT few_JJ drops_NNS of_IN water_NN on_IN his_PRP$ hair_NN ._. But_CC
it_PRP was_VBD not_RB the_DT Marquesan_NNP chiefs_NNS only_RB whose_WP$ heads_NNS were_VBD sacred_JJ ._. The_DT
head_NN of_IN every_DT Marquesan_NNP was_VBD taboo_JJ ,_, and_CC might_MD neither_RB be_VB touched_VBN nor_CC
stepped_VBD over_IN by_IN another_DT ;_: even_RB a_DT father_NN might_MD not_RB step_VB over_IN the_DT head_NN
of_IN his_PRP$ sleeping_VBG child_NN ;_: women_NNS were_VBD forbidden_VBN to_TO carry_VB or_CC touch_VB
anything_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN in_IN contact_NN with_IN ,_, or_CC had_VBD merely_RB hung_VBN over_RP ,_, the_DT
head_NN of_IN their_PRP$ husband_NN or_CC father_NN ._. No_DT one_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB over_IN the_DT
head_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN of_IN Tonga_NNP ._. In_IN Tahiti_NNP any_DT one_NN who_WP stood_VBD over_IN the_DT king_NN
or_CC queen_NN ,_, or_CC passed_VBD his_PRP$ hand_NN over_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS ,_, might_MD be_VB put_VBN to_TO
death_NN ._. Until_IN certain_JJ rites_NNS were_VBD performed_VBN over_IN it_PRP ,_, a_DT Tahitian_NNP infant_NN
was_VBD especially_RB taboo_JJ ;_: whatever_WDT touched_VBD the_DT child_NN '_POS s_PRP head_NN ,_, while_IN it_PRP
was_VBD in_IN this_DT state_NN ,_, became_VBD sacred_JJ and_CC was_VBD deposited_VBN in_IN a_DT consecrated_VBN
place_NN railed_VBD in_IN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN at_IN the_DT child_NN '_POS s_VBZ house_NN ._. If_IN a_DT branch_NN of_IN
a_DT tree_NN touched_VBD the_DT child_NN '_POS s_PRP head_NN ,_, the_DT tree_NN was_VBD cut_VBN down_RB ;_: and_CC if_IN in_IN
its_PRP$ fall_VBP it_PRP injured_VBD another_DT tree_NN so_RB as_RB to_TO penetrate_VB the_DT bark_NN ,_, that_WDT
tree_NN also_RB was_VBD cut_VBN down_RP as_IN unclean_JJ and_CC unfit_JJ for_IN use_NN ._. After_IN the_DT rites_NNS
were_VBD performed_VBN these_DT special_JJ taboos_NN ceased_VBD ;_: but_CC the_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT
Tahitian_NNP was_VBD always_RB sacred_JJ ,_, he_PRP never_RB carried_VBD anything_NN on_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC to_TO
touch_NN it_PRP was_VBD an_DT offence_NN ._. So_IN sacred_JJ was_VBD the_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT Maori_NNP chief_NN
that_IN "_`` if_IN he_PRP only_RB touched_VBD it_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ fingers_NNS ,_, he_PRP was_VBD obliged_VBN
immediately_RB to_TO apply_VB them_PRP to_TO his_PRP$ nose_NN ,_, and_CC snuff_NN up_IN the_DT sanctity_NN
which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD acquired_VBN by_IN the_DT touch_NN ,_, and_CC thus_RB restore_VB it_PRP to_TO the_DT
part_NN from_IN whence_IN it_PRP was_VBD taken_VBN ."_NNP On_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT sacredness_NN of_IN his_PRP$
head_NN a_DT Maori_NNP chief_NN "_`` could_MD not_RB blow_VB the_DT fire_NN with_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT
breath_NN being_VBG sacred_JJ ,_, communicated_VBD his_PRP$ sanctity_NN to_TO it_PRP ,_, and_CC a_DT brand_NN
might_MD be_VB taken_VBN by_IN a_DT slave_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT man_NN of_IN another_DT tribe_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT fire_NN
might_MD be_VB used_VBN for_IN other_JJ purposes_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN cooking_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB cause_VB his_PRP$
death_NN ."_NN



6._. Hair_NNP tabooed_.

WHEN_WRB the_DT head_NN was_VBD considered_VBN so_RB sacred_JJ that_IN it_PRP might_MD not_RB even_RB be_VB
touched_VBN without_IN grave_JJ offence_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ obvious_JJ that_IN the_DT cutting_NN of_IN the_DT
hair_NN must_MD have_VB been_VBN a_DT delicate_JJ and_CC difficult_JJ operation_NN ._. The_DT
difficulties_NNS and_CC dangers_NNS which_WDT ,_, on_IN the_DT primitive_JJ view_NN ,_, beset_VBN the_DT
operation_NN are_VBP of_IN two_CD kinds_NNS ._. There_EX is_VBZ first_RB the_DT danger_NN of_IN disturbing_VBG
the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB injured_VBN in_IN the_DT process_NN and_CC may_MD
revenge_NN itself_PRP upon_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP molests_VBZ him_PRP ._. Secondly_RB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ
the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN disposing_VBG of_IN the_DT shorn_JJ locks_NNS ._. For_IN the_DT savage_JJ
believes_VBZ that_IN the_DT sympathetic_JJ connexion_NN which_WDT exists_VBZ between_IN himself_PRP
and_CC every_DT part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN continues_VBZ to_TO exist_VB even_RB after_IN the_DT
physical_JJ connexion_NN has_VBZ been_VBN broken_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN therefore_RB he_PRP will_MD
suffer_VB from_IN any_DT harm_NN that_WDT may_MD befall_VB the_DT several_JJ parts_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ,_,
such_JJ as_IN the_DT clippings_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ hair_NN or_CC the_DT parings_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ nails_NNS ._.
Accordingly_RB he_PRP takes_VBZ care_NN that_WDT these_DT severed_VBN portions_NNS of_IN himself_PRP
shall_MD not_RB be_VB left_VBN in_IN places_NNS where_WRB they_PRP might_MD either_RB be_VB exposed_VBN to_TO
accidental_JJ injury_NN or_CC fall_VB into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN malicious_JJ persons_NNS who_WP
might_MD work_VB magic_NN on_IN them_PRP to_TO his_PRP$ detriment_NN or_CC death_NN ._. Such_DT dangers_NNS are_VBP
common_JJ to_TO all_DT ,_, but_CC sacred_JJ persons_NNS have_VBP more_JJR to_TO fear_VB from_IN them_PRP than_IN
ordinary_JJ people_NNS ,_, so_IN the_DT precautions_NNS taken_VBN by_IN them_PRP are_VBP
proportionately_RB stringent_JJ ._. The_DT simplest_JJS way_NN of_IN evading_VBG the_DT peril_NN is_VBZ
not_RB to_TO cut_VB the_DT hair_NN at_IN all_DT ;_: and_CC this_DT is_VBZ the_DT expedient_JJ adopted_VBN where_WRB
the_DT risk_NN is_VBZ thought_VBN to_TO be_VB more_JJR than_IN usually_RB great_JJ ._. The_DT Frankish_NNP
kings_NNS were_VBD never_RB allowed_VBN to_TO crop_VB their_PRP$ hair_NN ;_: from_IN their_PRP$ childhood_NN
upwards_RB they_PRP had_VBD to_TO keep_VB it_PRP unshorn_VBN ._. To_TO poll_VB the_DT long_JJ locks_NNS that_WDT
floated_VBN on_IN their_PRP$ shoulders_NNS would_MD have_VB been_VBN to_TO renounce_VB their_PRP$ right_NN
to_TO the_DT throne_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT wicked_JJ brothers_NNS Clotaire_NNP and_CC Childebert_NNP
coveted_VBN the_DT kingdom_NN of_IN their_PRP$ dead_JJ brother_NN Clodomir_NNP ,_, they_PRP inveigled_VBD
into_IN their_PRP$ power_NN their_PRP$ little_JJ nephews_NNS ,_, the_DT two_CD sons_NNS of_IN Clodomir_NNP ;_: and_CC
having_VBG done_VBN so_RB ,_, they_PRP sent_VBD a_DT messenger_NN bearing_NN scissors_NNS and_CC a_DT naked_JJ
sword_VBN to_TO the_DT children_NNS '_POS s_PRP grandmother_NN ,_, Queen_NNP Clotilde_NNP ,_, at_IN Paris_NNP ._. The_DT
envoy_NN showed_VBD the_DT scissors_NNS and_CC the_DT sword_NN to_TO Clotilde_NNP ,_, and_CC bade_VB her_PRP$
choose_VB whether_IN the_DT children_NNS should_MD be_VB shorn_VBN and_CC live_VB or_CC remain_VB
unshorn_JJ and_CC die_VB ._. The_DT proud_JJ queen_NN replied_VBD that_IN if_IN her_PRP grandchildren_NNS
were_VBD not_RB to_TO come_VB to_TO the_DT throne_NN she_PRP would_MD rather_RB see_VB them_PRP dead_JJ than_IN
shorn_NN ._. And_CC murdered_VBN they_PRP were_VBD by_IN their_PRP$ ruthless_JJ uncle_NN Clotaire_NNP with_IN
his_PRP$ own_JJ hand_NN ._. The_DT king_NN of_IN Ponape_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT Caroline_NNP Islands_NNP ,_, must_MD
wear_VB his_PRP$ hair_NN long_RB ,_, and_CC so_RB must_MD his_PRP$ grandees_NNS ._. Among_IN the_DT Hos_NNP ,_, a_DT negro_NN
tribe_NN of_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, "_`` there_EX are_VBP priests_NNS on_IN whose_WP$ head_NN no_DT razor_NN may_MD
come_VBN during_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN their_PRP$ lives_NNS ._. The_DT god_NN who_WP dwells_VBZ in_IN the_DT man_NN
forbids_VBZ the_DT cutting_NN of_IN his_PRP$ hair_NN on_IN pain_NN of_IN death_NN ._. If_IN the_DT hair_NN is_VBZ at_IN
last_JJ too_RB long_RB ,_, the_DT owner_NN must_MD pray_VB to_TO his_PRP$ god_NN to_TO allow_VB him_PRP at_IN least_JJS
to_TO clip_VB the_DT tips_NNS of_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT hair_NN is_VBZ in_IN fact_NN conceived_VBN as_IN the_DT seat_NN
and_CC lodging-place_NN of_IN his_PRP$ god_NN ,_, so_RB that_IN were_VBD it_PRP shorn_VB the_DT god_NN would_MD
lose_VB his_PRP$ abode_NN in_IN the_DT priest_NN ."_IN The_DT members_NNS of_IN a_DT Masai_NNP clan_NN ,_, who_WP are_VBP
believed_VBD to_TO possess_VB the_DT art_NN of_IN making_VBG rain_NN ,_, may_MD not_RB pluck_VB out_RP their_PRP$
beards_NNS ,_, because_IN the_DT loss_NN of_IN their_PRP$ beards_NNS would_MD ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN ,_,
entail_VB the_DT loss_NN of_IN their_PRP$ rain-making_JJ powers_NNS ._. The_DT head_NN chief_NN and_CC the_DT
sorcerers_NNS of_IN the_DT Masai_NNP observe_VBP the_DT same_JJ rule_NN for_IN a_DT like_JJ reason_NN :_: they_PRP
think_VB that_DT were_VBD they_PRP to_TO pull_VB out_RP their_PRP$ beards_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ supernatural_JJ
gifts_NNS would_MD desert_VB them_PRP ._.

Again_RB ,_, men_NNS who_WP have_VBP taken_VBN a_DT vow_NN of_IN vengeance_NN sometimes_RB keep_VB their_PRP$
hair_NN unshorn_JJ till_IN they_PRP have_VBP fulfilled_VBN their_PRP$ vow_NN ._. Thus_RB of_IN the_DT
Marquesans_NNS we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN "_`` occasionally_RB they_PRP have_VBP their_PRP$ head_NN

or_CC put_VB up_RP in_IN a_DT knot_NN ._. But_CC the_DT latter_JJ mode_NN of_IN wearing_VBG the_DT hair_NN is_VBZ only_RB
adopted_VBN by_IN them_PRP when_WRB they_PRP have_VBP a_DT solemn_JJ vow_NN ,_, as_IN to_TO revenge_VB the_DT death_NN
of_IN some_DT near_JJ relation_NN ,_, etc_FW ._. In_IN such_JJ case_NN the_DT lock_NN is_VBZ never_RB cut_VBN off_IN
until_IN they_PRP have_VBP fulfilled_VBN their_PRP$ promise_NN ."_IN A_DT similar_JJ custom_NN was_VBD
sometimes_RB observed_VBN by_IN the_DT ancient_JJ Germans_NNPS ;_: among_IN the_DT Chatti_NNP the_DT
young_JJ warriors_NNS never_RB clipped_VBD their_PRP$ hair_NN or_CC their_PRP$ beard_NN till_IN they_PRP had_VBD
slain_VB an_DT enemy_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Toradjas_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT child_NN '_POS s_VBZ hair_NN is_VBZ cut_VBN to_TO
rid_VB it_PRP of_IN vermin_NN ,_, some_DT locks_NNS are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO remain_VB on_IN the_DT crown_NN of_IN

soul_NN would_MD have_VB no_DT place_NN in_IN which_WDT to_TO settle_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT child_NN would_MD
sicken_VBN ._. The_DT Karo-Bataks_NNP are_VBP much_JJ afraid_JJ of_IN frightening_VBG away_RB the_DT soul_NN

this_DT lock_NN remains_VBZ unshorn_VBN all_DT through_IN life_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS up_RB till_IN
manhood_NN ._.



7._CD Ceremonies_NNS at_IN Hair-cutting_NN

BUT_NNP when_WRB it_PRP becomes_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO crop_VB the_DT hair_NN ,_, measures_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN
to_TO lessen_VB the_DT dangers_NNS which_WDT are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO attend_VB the_DT operation_NN ._.
The_DT chief_NN of_IN Namosi_NNP in_IN Fiji_NNP always_RB ate_VBD a_DT man_NN by_IN way_NN of_IN precaution_NN
when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD had_VBN his_PRP$ hair_NN cut_VBD ._. "_`` There_EX was_VBD a_DT certain_JJ clan_NN that_WDT had_VBD to_TO
provide_VB the_DT victim_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP used_VBD to_TO sit_VB in_IN solemn_JJ council_NN among_IN
themselves_PRP to_TO choose_VB him_PRP ._. It_PRP was_VBD a_DT sacrificial_JJ feast_NN to_TO avert_VB evil_NN
from_IN the_DT chief_NN ."_NN Amongst_IN the_DT Maoris_NNP many_JJ spells_NNS were_VBD uttered_VBN at_IN
hair-cutting_NN ;_: one_CD ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, was_VBD spoken_VBN to_TO consecrate_VB the_DT
obsidian_JJ knife_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT hair_NN was_VBD cut_VBN ;_: another_DT was_VBD pronounced_VBN
to_TO avert_VB the_DT thunder_NN and_CC lightning_NN which_WDT hair-cutting_NN was_VBD believed_VBN
to_TO cause_VB ._. "_'' He_PRP who_WP has_VBZ had_VBN his_PRP$ hair_NN cut_NN is_VBZ in_IN immediate_JJ charge_NN of_IN the_DT
Atua_NNP (_-LRB- spirit_NN );_NN he_PRP is_VBZ removed_VBN from_IN the_DT contact_NN and_CC society_NN of_IN his_PRP$
family_NN and_CC his_PRP$ tribe_NN ;_: he_PRP dare_MD not_RB touch_VB his_PRP$ food_NN himself_PRP ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ put_VBN
into_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN by_IN another_DT person_NN ;_: nor_CC can_MD he_PRP for_IN some_DT days_NNS resume_VBP
his_PRP$ accustomed_JJ occupations_NNS or_CC associate_NN with_IN his_PRP$ fellow-men_NNS ."_. The_DT
person_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT hair_NN is_VBZ also_RB tabooed_VBN ;_: his_PRP$ hands_NNS having_VBG been_VBN in_IN
contact_NN with_IN a_DT sacred_JJ head_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD not_RB touch_VB food_NN with_IN them_PRP or_CC
engage_VB in_IN any_DT other_JJ employment_NN ;_: he_PRP is_VBZ fed_VBN by_IN another_DT person_NN with_IN
food_NN cooked_VBN over_IN a_DT sacred_JJ fire_NN ._. He_PRP cannot_MD be_VB released_VBN from_IN the_DT taboo_NN
before_IN the_DT following_VBG day_NN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP rubs_VBZ his_PRP$ hands_NNS with_IN potato_NN or_CC fern_NN
root_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN cooked_VBN on_IN a_DT sacred_JJ fire_NN ;_: and_CC this_DT food_NN having_VBG
been_VBN taken_VBN to_TO the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN in_IN the_DT female_JJ line_NN and_CC eaten_VBN by_IN
her_PRP ,_, his_PRP$ hands_NNS are_VBP freed_VBN from_IN the_DT taboo_NN ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN New_NNP
Zealand_NNP the_DT most_RBS sacred_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN was_VBD that_IN appointed_VBN for_IN
hair-cutting_NN ;_: the_DT people_NNS assembled_VBN in_IN large_JJ numbers_NNS on_IN that_DT day_NN from_IN
all_PDT the_DT neighbourhood_NN ._.



8._DT Disposal_NNP of_IN Cut_NNP Hair_NNP and_CC Nails_NNS

BUT_NNP even_RB when_WRB the_DT hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS have_VBP been_VBN safely_RB cut_VBN ,_, there_EX remains_VBZ
the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN disposing_VBG of_IN them_PRP ,_, for_IN their_PRP$ owner_NN believes_VBZ
himself_PRP liable_JJ to_TO suffer_VB from_IN any_DT harm_NN that_WDT may_MD befall_VB them_PRP ._. The_DT
notion_NN that_IN a_DT man_NN may_MD be_VB bewitched_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT clippings_NNS of_IN his_PRP$
hair_NN ,_, the_DT parings_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ nails_NNS ,_, or_CC any_DT other_JJ severed_VBN portion_NN of_IN his_PRP$
person_NN is_VBZ almost_RB world-wide_JJ ,_, and_CC attested_VBD by_IN evidence_NN too_RB ample_JJ ,_, too_RB
familiar_JJ ,_, and_CC too_RB tedious_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ uniformity_NN to_TO be_VB here_RB analysed_VBN at_IN
length_NN ._. The_DT general_JJ idea_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT superstition_NN rests_VBZ is_VBZ that_IN of_IN
the_DT sympathetic_JJ connexion_NN supposed_VBD to_TO persist_VB between_IN a_DT person_NN and_CC
everything_NN that_WDT has_VBZ once_RB been_VBN part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN or_CC in_IN any_DT way_NN closely_RB
related_VBN to_TO him_PRP ._. A_DT very_RB few_JJ examples_NNS must_MD suffice_VB ._. They_PRP belong_VBP to_TO
that_DT branch_NN of_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB called_VBN contagious_JJ ._.
Dread_VB of_IN sorcery_NN ,_, we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN ,_, formed_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS salient_JJ
characteristics_NNS of_IN the_DT Marquesan_NNP islanders_NNS in_IN the_DT old_JJ days_NNS ._. The_DT
sorcerer_NN took_VBD some_DT of_IN the_DT hair_NN ,_, spittle_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ bodily_JJ refuse_NN of_IN
the_DT man_NN he_PRP wished_VBD to_TO injure_VB ,_, wrapped_VBD it_PRP up_RP in_IN a_DT leaf_NN ,_, and_CC placed_VBD the_DT
packet_NN in_IN a_DT bag_NN woven_VBN of_IN threads_NNS or_CC fibres_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD knotted_VBN in_IN an_DT
intricate_JJ way_NN ._. The_DT whole_NN was_VBD then_RB buried_VBN with_IN certain_JJ rites_NNS ,_, and_CC
thereupon_RB the_DT victim_NN wasted_VBD away_RB of_IN a_DT languishing_JJ sickness_NN which_WDT
lasted_VBD twenty_CD days_NNS ._. His_PRP$ life_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, might_MD be_VB saved_VBN by_IN discovering_VBG
and_CC digging_VBG up_RP the_DT buried_VBN hair_NN ,_, spittle_NN ,_, or_CC what_WP not_RB ;_: for_IN as_RB soon_RB as_IN
this_DT was_VBD done_VBN the_DT power_NN of_IN the_DT charm_NN ceased_VBD ._. A_DT Maori_NNP sorcerer_NN intent_NN
on_IN bewitching_VBG somebody_NN sought_VBD to_TO get_VB a_DT tress_NN of_IN his_PRP$ victim_NN '_POS s_VBZ hair_NN ,_,
the_DT parings_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ nails_NNS ,_, some_DT of_IN his_PRP$ spittle_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT shred_JJ of_IN his_PRP$
garment_NN ._. Having_VBG obtained_VBN the_DT object_NN ,_, whatever_WDT it_PRP was_VBD ,_, he_PRP chanted_VBD
certain_JJ spells_NNS and_CC curses_NNS over_IN it_PRP in_IN a_DT falsetto_NN voice_NN and_CC buried_VBD it_PRP
in_IN the_DT ground_NN ._. As_IN the_DT thing_NN decayed_VBD ,_, the_DT person_NN to_TO whom_WP it_PRP had_VBD
belonged_VBD was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO waste_VB away_RB ._. When_WRB an_DT Australian_JJ blackfellow_NN
wishes_NNS to_TO get_VB rid_JJ of_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, he_PRP cuts_VBZ off_RP a_DT lock_NN of_IN her_PRP$ hair_NN in_IN her_PRP$
sleep_NN ,_, ties_VBZ it_PRP to_TO his_PRP$ spear-thrower_NN ,_, and_CC goes_VBZ with_IN it_PRP to_TO a_DT
neighbouring_VBG tribe_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP gives_VBZ it_PRP to_TO a_DT friend_NN ._. His_PRP$ friend_NN sticks_NNS
the_DT spear-thrower_NN up_IN every_DT night_NN before_IN the_DT camp_NN fire_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB it_PRP
falls_VBZ down_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT sign_NN that_IN the_DT wife_NN is_VBZ dead_JJ ._. The_DT way_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT
charm_NN operates_VBZ was_VBD explained_VBN to_TO Dr_NNP ._. Howitt_NNP by_IN a_DT Wirajuri_JJ man_NN ._. "_'' You_PRP
see_VB ,"_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, "_`` when_WRB a_DT blackfellow_JJ doctor_NN gets_VBZ hold_NN of_IN something_NN
belonging_VBG to_TO a_DT man_NN and_CC roasts_NNS it_PRP with_IN things_NNS ,_, and_CC sings_NNS over_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT
fire_NN catches_NNS hold_VBP of_IN the_DT smell_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN settles_VBZ the_DT poor_JJ
fellow_NN ."_NNS

The_DT Huzuls_NNP of_IN the_DT Carpathians_NNS imagine_VBP that_IN if_IN mice_NNS get_VBP a_DT person_NN '_POS s_PRP
shorn_JJ hair_NN and_CC make_VB a_DT nest_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT person_NN will_MD suffer_VB from_IN
headache_NN or_CC even_RB become_VB idiotic_JJ ._. Similarly_RB in_IN Germany_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT common_JJ
notion_NN that_IN if_IN birds_NNS find_VBP a_DT person_NN '_POS s_VBZ cut_VBN hair_NN ,_, and_CC build_VB their_PRP$ nests_NNS
with_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT person_NN will_MD suffer_VB from_IN headache_NN ;_: sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ
thought_VBD that_IN he_PRP will_MD have_VB an_DT eruption_NN on_IN the_DT head_NN ._. The_DT same_JJ
superstition_NN prevails_VBZ ,_, or_CC used_VBN to_TO prevail_VB ,_, in_IN West_NNP Sussex_NNP ._.

Again_RB it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN that_IN cut_NN or_CC combed-out_JJ hair_NN may_MD disturb_VB the_DT
weather_NN by_IN producing_VBG rain_NN and_CC hail_NN ,_, thunder_NN and_CC lightning_NN ._. We_PRP have_VBP
seen_VBN that_IN in_IN New_NNP Zealand_NNP a_DT spell_NN was_VBD uttered_VBN at_IN hair-cutting_NN to_TO
avert_JJ thunder_NN and_CC lightning_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Tyrol_NNP ,_, witches_NNS are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO
use_NN cut_NN or_CC combed-out_JJ hair_NN to_TO make_VB hailstones_NNS or_CC thunderstorms_NNS with_IN ._.
Thlinkeet_NNP Indians_NNPS have_VBP been_VBN known_VBN to_TO attribute_VB stormy_JJ weather_NN to_TO the_DT
rash_JJ act_NN of_IN a_DT girl_NN who_WP had_VBD combed_VBN her_PRP$ hair_NN outside_IN of_IN the_DT house_NN ._. The_DT
Romans_NNS seem_VBP to_TO have_VB held_VBN similar_JJ views_NNS ,_, for_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT maxim_NN with_IN them_PRP
that_IN no_DT one_NN on_IN shipboard_NN should_MD cut_VB his_PRP$ hair_NN or_CC nails_NNS except_IN in_IN a_DT
storm_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, when_WRB the_DT mischief_NN was_VBD already_RB done_VBN ._. In_IN the_DT Highlands_NNS
of_IN Scotland_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN no_DT sister_NN should_MD comb_NN her_PRP$ hair_NN at_IN night_NN
if_IN she_PRP have_VBP a_DT brother_NN at_IN sea_NN ._. In_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT Mani_NNP of_IN
Chitombe_NNP or_CC Jumba_NNP died_VBD ,_, the_DT people_NNS used_VBD to_TO run_VB in_IN crowds_NNS to_TO the_DT
corpse_NN and_CC tear_VB out_RP his_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, teeth_NNS ,_, and_CC nails_NNS ,_, which_WDT they_PRP kept_VBD as_IN a_DT
rain-charm_NN ,_, believing_VBG that_IN otherwise_RB no_DT rain_NN would_MD fall_VB ._. The_DT Makoko_NNPS
of_IN the_DT Anzikos_NNP begged_VBD the_DT missionaries_NNS to_TO give_VB him_PRP half_DT their_PRP$ beards_NNS
as_IN a_DT rain-charm_NN ._.

If_IN cut_VBN hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS remain_VBP in_IN sympathetic_JJ connexion_NN with_IN the_DT
person_NN from_IN whose_WP$ body_NN they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN severed_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN they_PRP
can_MD be_VB used_VBN as_IN hostages_NNS for_IN his_PRP$ good_JJ behaviour_NN by_IN any_DT one_NN who_WP may_MD
chance_NN to_TO possess_VB them_PRP ;_: for_IN on_IN the_DT principles_NNS of_IN contagious_JJ magic_NN he_PRP
has_VBZ only_RB to_TO injure_VB the_DT hair_NN or_CC nails_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO hurt_VB simultaneously_RB
their_PRP$ original_JJ owner_NN ._. Hence_RB when_WRB the_DT Nandi_NNP have_VBP taken_VBN a_DT prisoner_NN
they_PRP shave_VB his_PRP$ head_NN and_CC keep_VB the_DT shorn_JJ hair_NN as_IN a_DT surety_JJ that_IN he_PRP will_MD
not_RB attempt_NN to_TO escape_VB ;_: but_CC when_WRB the_DT captive_NN is_VBZ ransomed_VBN ,_, they_PRP return_VBP
his_PRP$ shorn_JJ hair_NN with_IN him_PRP to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ people_NNS ._.

To_TO preserve_VB the_DT cut_VBN hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS from_IN injury_NN and_CC from_IN the_DT
dangerous_JJ uses_NNS to_TO which_WDT they_PRP may_MD be_VB put_VBN by_IN sorcerers_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ
necessary_JJ to_TO deposit_VB them_PRP in_IN some_DT safe_JJ place_NN ._. The_DT shorn_JJ locks_NNS of_IN a_DT
Maori_NNP chief_NN were_VBD gathered_VBN with_IN much_JJ care_NN and_CC placed_VBD in_IN an_DT adjoining_VBG
cemetery_NN ._. The_DT Tahitians_NNPS buried_VBD the_DT cuttings_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ hair_NN at_IN the_DT
temples_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT streets_NNS of_IN Soku_NNP a_DT modern_JJ traveller_NN observed_VBD cairns_NNS
of_IN large_JJ stones_NNS piled_VBN against_IN walls_NNS with_IN tufts_NNS of_IN human_JJ hair_NN
inserted_VBN in_IN the_DT crevices_NNS ._. On_IN asking_VBG the_DT meaning_NN of_IN this_DT ,_, he_PRP was_VBD told_VBN
that_IN when_WRB any_DT native_NN of_IN the_DT place_NN polled_VBN his_PRP$ hair_NN he_PRP carefully_RB
gathered_VBN up_RP the_DT clippings_NNS and_CC deposited_VBD them_PRP in_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT cairns_NNS ,_,
all_DT of_IN which_WDT were_VBD sacred_JJ to_TO the_DT fetish_JJ and_CC therefore_RB inviolable_JJ ._.
These_DT cairns_NNS of_IN sacred_JJ stones_NNS ,_, he_PRP further_RB learned_VBD ,_, were_VBD simply_RB a_DT
precaution_NN against_IN witchcraft_NN ,_, for_IN if_IN a_DT man_NN were_VBD not_RB thus_RB careful_JJ in_IN
disposing_VBG of_IN his_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, some_DT of_IN it_PRP might_MD fall_VB into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN his_PRP$
enemies_NNS ,_, who_WP would_MD ,_, by_IN means_NNS of_IN it_PRP ,_, be_VB able_JJ to_TO cast_VB spells_NNS over_IN him_PRP
and_CC so_IN compass_NN his_PRP$ destruction_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT top-knot_JJ of_IN a_DT Siamese_NNP child_NN
has_VBZ been_VBN cut_VBN with_IN great_JJ ceremony_NN ,_, the_DT short_JJ hairs_NNS are_VBP put_VBN into_IN a_DT
little_JJ vessel_NN made_VBN of_IN plantain_NN leaves_NNS and_CC set_VBN adrift_NN on_IN the_DT nearest_JJS
river_NN or_CC canal_NN ._. As_IN they_PRP float_VBP away_RB ,_, all_DT that_WDT was_VBD wrong_JJ or_CC harmful_JJ in_IN
the_DT child_NN '_POS s_VBZ disposition_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO depart_VB with_IN them_PRP ._. The_DT long_JJ
hairs_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN till_IN the_DT child_NN makes_VBZ a_DT pilgrimage_NN to_TO the_DT holy_JJ
Footprint_NN of_IN Buddha_NNP on_IN the_DT sacred_JJ hill_NN at_IN Prabat_NNP ._. They_PRP are_VBP then_RB
presented_VBN to_TO the_DT priests_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO make_VB them_PRP into_IN brushes_NNS
with_IN which_WDT they_PRP sweep_VB the_DT Footprint_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN fact_NN so_IN much_JJ hair_NN is_VBZ
thus_RB offered_VBD every_DT year_NN that_IN the_DT priests_NNS cannot_MD use_VB it_PRP all_DT ,_, so_RB they_PRP
quietly_RB burn_VBP the_DT superfluity_NN as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT pilgrims_NNS '_POS backs_NNS are_VBP
turned_VBD ._. The_DT cut_VBN hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS of_IN the_DT Flamen_NNP Dialis_NNP were_VBD buried_VBN
under_IN a_DT lucky_JJ tree_NN ._. The_DT shorn_JJ tresses_NNS of_IN the_DT Vestal_NNP Virgins_NNP were_VBD
hung_VBN on_IN an_DT ancient_JJ lotus-tree_NN ._.

Often_RB the_DT clipped_JJ hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS are_VBP stowed_VBN away_RB in_IN any_DT secret_NN
place_NN ,_, not_RB necessarily_RB in_IN a_DT temple_NN or_CC cemetery_NN or_CC at_IN a_DT tree_NN ,_, as_RB in_IN
the_DT cases_NNS already_RB mentioned_VBN ._. Thus_RB in_IN Swabia_NNP you_PRP are_VBP recommended_VBN to_TO
deposit_NN your_PRP$ clipped_JJ hair_NN in_IN some_DT spot_NN where_WRB neither_DT sun_NN nor_CC moon_NN
can_MD shine_VB on_IN it_PRP ,_, for_IN example_NN in_IN the_DT earth_NN or_CC under_IN a_DT stone_NN ._. In_IN
Danzig_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ buried_VBN in_IN a_DT bag_NN under_IN the_DT threshold_NN ._. In_IN Ugi_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT
Solomon_NNP Islands_NNPS ,_, men_NNS bury_VBP their_PRP$ hair_NN lest_IN it_PRP should_MD fall_VB into_IN the_DT
hands_NNS of_IN an_DT enemy_NN ,_, who_WP would_MD make_VB magic_JJ with_IN it_PRP and_CC so_RB bring_VB
sickness_NN or_CC calamity_NN on_IN them_PRP ._. The_DT same_JJ fear_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB general_JJ in_IN
Melanesia_NNP ,_, and_CC has_VBZ led_VBN to_TO a_DT regular_JJ practice_NN of_IN hiding_VBG cut_VBN hair_NN and_CC
nails_NNS ._. The_DT same_JJ practice_NN prevails_VBZ among_IN many_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP ,_,
from_IN a_DT fear_NN lest_IN wizards_NNS should_MD get_VB hold_NN of_IN the_DT severed_VBN particles_NNS
and_CC work_NN evil_NN with_IN them_PRP ._. The_DT Caffres_NNPS carry_VBP still_RB further_RBR this_DT dread_NN
of_IN allowing_VBG any_DT portion_NN of_IN themselves_PRP to_TO fall_VB into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN an_DT
enemy_NN ;_: for_IN not_RB only_RB do_VB they_PRP bury_VB their_PRP$ cut_VBN hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS in_IN a_DT
secret_JJ spot_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB one_CD of_IN them_PRP cleans_VBZ the_DT head_NN of_IN another_DT he_PRP
preserves_VBZ the_DT vermin_NN which_WDT he_PRP catches_VBZ ,_, "_`` carefully_RB delivering_VBG them_PRP to_TO
the_DT person_NN to_TO whom_WP they_PRP originally_RB appertained_VBD ,_, supposing_VBG ,_, according_VBG
to_TO their_PRP$ theory_NN ,_, that_IN as_IN they_PRP derived_VBD their_PRP$ support_NN from_IN the_DT blood_NN
of_IN the_DT man_NN from_IN whom_WP they_PRP were_VBD taken_VBN ,_, should_MD they_PRP be_VB killed_VBN by_IN
another_DT ,_, the_DT blood_NN of_IN his_PRP$ neighbour_NN would_MD be_VB in_IN his_PRP$ possession_NN ,_, thus_RB
placing_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ hands_NNS the_DT power_NN of_IN some_DT superhuman_JJ influence_NN ."_.

Sometimes_RB the_DT severed_VBN hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS are_VBP preserved_VBN ,_, not_RB to_TO prevent_VB
them_PRP from_IN falling_VBG into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN a_DT magician_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN the_DT owner_NN
may_MD have_VB them_PRP at_IN the_DT resurrection_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT some_DT races_NNS
look_VB forward_RB ._. Thus_RB the_DT Incas_NNP of_IN Peru_NNP "_'' took_VBD extreme_JJ care_NN to_TO preserve_VB
the_DT nail-parings_NNS and_CC the_DT hairs_NNS that_WDT were_VBD shorn_VBN off_RP or_CC torn_VBN out_RB with_IN
a_DT comb_NN ;_: placing_VBG them_PRP in_IN holes_NNS or_CC niches_NNS in_IN the_DT walls_NNS ;_: and_CC if_IN they_PRP
fell_VBD out_RB ,_, any_DT other_JJ Indian_NNP that_WDT saw_VBD them_PRP picked_VBD them_PRP up_RP and_CC put_VBD them_PRP
in_IN their_PRP$ places_NNS again_RB ._. I_PRP very_RB often_RB asked_VBN different_JJ Indians_NNPS ,_, at_IN
various_JJ times_NNS ,_, why_WRB they_PRP did_VBD this_DT ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO see_VB what_WP they_PRP would_MD
say_VB ,_, and_CC they_PRP all_DT replied_VBD in_IN the_DT same_JJ words_NNS saying_VBG ,_, '_'' Know_NNP that_IN all_PDT
persons_NNS who_WP are_VBP born_VBN must_MD return_VB to_TO life_NN '_POS (_-LRB- they_PRP have_VBP no_DT word_NN to_TO
express_VB resurrection_NN ),_NNS '_'' and_CC the_DT souls_NNS must_MD rise_VB out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ tombs_NNS
with_IN all_DT that_WDT belonged_VBD to_TO their_PRP$ bodies_NNS ._. We_PRP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, in_IN order_NN that_WDT
we_PRP may_MD not_RB have_VB to_TO search_VB for_IN our_PRP$ hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS at_IN a_DT time_NN when_WRB
there_EX will_MD be_VB much_JJ hurry_NN and_CC confusion_NN ,_, place_NN them_PRP in_IN one_CD place_NN ,_,
that_IN they_PRP may_MD be_VB brought_VBN together_RB more_RBR conveniently_RB ,_, and_CC ,_, whenever_WRB
it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ ,_, we_PRP are_VBP also_RB careful_JJ to_TO spit_VB in_IN one_CD place_NN .'"_.
Similarly_RB the_DT Turks_NNPS never_RB throw_VBP away_RB the_DT parings_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ nails_NNS ,_, but_CC
carefully_RB stow_VB them_PRP in_IN cracks_NNS of_IN the_DT walls_NNS or_CC of_IN the_DT boards_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT
belief_NN that_IN they_PRP will_MD be_VB needed_VBN at_IN the_DT resurrection_NN ._. The_DT Armenians_NNPS
do_VBP not_RB throw_VB away_RP their_PRP$ cut_VBN hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS and_CC extracted_VBN teeth_NNS ,_, but_CC
hide_VB them_PRP in_IN places_NNS that_WDT are_VBP esteemed_VBN holy_JJ ,_, such_JJ as_IN a_DT crack_NN in_IN the_DT
church_NN wall_NN ,_, a_DT pillar_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT hollow_JJ tree_NN ._. They_PRP think_VBP
that_IN all_PDT these_DT severed_VBN portions_NNS of_IN themselves_PRP will_MD be_VB wanted_VBN at_IN the_DT
resurrection_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP who_WP has_VBZ not_RB stowed_VBN them_PRP away_RB in_IN a_DT safe_JJ
place_NN will_MD have_VB to_TO hunt_VB about_IN for_IN them_PRP on_IN the_DT great_JJ day_NN ._. In_IN the_DT
village_NN of_IN Drumconrath_NNP in_IN Ireland_NNP there_RB used_VBD to_TO be_VB some_DT old_JJ women_NNS
who_WP ,_, having_VBG ascertained_VBN from_IN Scripture_NNP that_IN the_DT hairs_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS
were_VBD all_DT numbered_VBN by_IN the_DT Almighty_NNP ,_, expected_VBN to_TO have_VB to_TO account_VB for_IN
them_PRP at_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN judgment_NN ._. In_IN order_NN to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO do_VB so_RB they_PRP
stuffed_VBD the_DT severed_VBN hair_NN away_RB in_IN the_DT thatch_NN of_IN their_PRP$ cottages_NNS ._.

Some_DT people_NNS burn_VBP their_PRP$ loose_JJ hair_NN to_TO save_VB it_PRP from_IN falling_VBG into_IN the_DT
hands_NNS of_IN sorcerers_NNS ._. This_DT is_VBZ done_VBN by_IN the_DT Patagonians_NNPS and_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT
Victorian_JJ tribes_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT Upper_NNP Vosges_NNP they_PRP say_VBP that_IN you_PRP should_MD never_RB
leave_VB the_DT clippings_NNS of_IN your_PRP$ hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS lying_VBG about_RB ,_, but_CC burn_VBP
them_PRP to_TO hinder_VB the_DT sorcerers_NNS from_IN using_VBG them_PRP against_IN you_PRP ._. For_IN the_DT
same_JJ reason_NN Italian_JJ women_NNS either_CC burn_VBP their_PRP$ loose_JJ hairs_NNS or_CC throw_VB
them_PRP into_IN a_DT place_NN where_WRB no_DT one_NN is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO look_VB for_IN them_PRP ._. The_DT
almost_RB universal_JJ dread_NN of_IN witchcraft_NN induces_VBZ the_DT West_JJ African_JJ
negroes_NNS ,_, the_DT Makololo_NNP of_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Tahitians_NNPS to_TO burn_VB or_CC
bury_VB their_PRP$ shorn_JJ hair_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Tyrol_NN many_JJ people_NNS burn_VBP their_PRP$ hair_NN lest_IN
the_DT witches_NNS should_MD use_VB it_PRP to_TO raise_VB thunderstorms_NNS ;_: others_NNS burn_VBP or_CC
bury_VB it_PRP to_TO prevent_VB the_DT birds_NNS from_IN lining_VBG their_PRP$ nests_NNS with_IN it_PRP ,_, which_WDT
would_MD cause_VB the_DT heads_NNS from_IN which_WDT the_DT hair_NN came_VBD to_TO ache_VB ._.

This_DT destruction_NN of_IN the_DT hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS plainly_RB involves_VBZ an_DT
inconsistency_NN of_IN thought_NN ._. The_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT destruction_NN is_VBZ avowedly_RB
to_TO prevent_VB these_DT severed_VBN portions_NNS of_IN the_DT body_NN from_IN being_VBG used_VBN by_IN
sorcerers_NNS ._. But_CC the_DT possibility_NN of_IN their_PRP$ being_VBG so_RB used_VBN depends_VBZ upon_IN
the_DT supposed_VBN sympathetic_JJ connexion_NN between_IN them_PRP and_CC the_DT man_NN from_IN
whom_WP they_PRP were_VBD severed_VBN ._. And_CC if_IN this_DT sympathetic_JJ connexion_NN still_RB
exists_VBZ ,_, clearly_RB these_DT severed_VBN portions_NNS cannot_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN without_IN
injury_NN to_TO the_DT man_NN ._.



9._. Spittle_NNP tabooed_.

THE_DT SAME_NNP fear_NN of_IN witchcraft_NN which_WDT has_VBZ led_VBN so_RB many_JJ people_NNS to_TO hide_VB or_CC
destroy_VB their_PRP$ loose_JJ hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS has_VBZ induced_VBN other_JJ or_CC the_DT same_JJ
people_NNS to_TO treat_VB their_PRP$ spittle_NN in_IN a_DT like_JJ fashion_NN ._. For_IN on_IN the_DT
principles_NNS of_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN the_DT spittle_NN is_VBZ part_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN ,_, and_CC
whatever_WDT is_VBZ done_VBN to_TO it_PRP will_MD have_VB a_DT corresponding_JJ effect_NN on_IN him_PRP ._. A_DT
Chilote_NNP Indian_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ gathered_VBN up_RP the_DT spittle_NN of_IN an_DT enemy_NN ,_, will_MD
put_VB it_PRP in_IN a_DT potato_NN ,_, and_CC hang_VB the_DT potato_NN in_IN the_DT smoke_NN ,_, uttering_VBG
certain_JJ spells_NNS as_IN he_PRP does_VBZ so_RB in_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN his_PRP$ foe_NN will_MD waste_VB
away_RB as_IN the_DT potato_NN dries_NNS in_IN the_DT smoke_NN ._. Or_CC he_PRP will_MD put_VB the_DT spittle_NN in_IN
a_DT frog_NN and_CC throw_VB the_DT animal_NN into_IN an_DT inaccessible_JJ ,_, unnavigable_JJ river_NN ,_,
which_WDT will_MD make_VB the_DT victim_NN quake_NN and_CC shake_NN with_IN ague_NN ._. The_DT natives_NNS of_IN
Urewera_NNP ,_, a_DT district_NN of_IN New_NNP Zealand_NNP ,_, enjoyed_VBD a_DT high_JJ reputation_NN for_IN
their_PRP$ skill_NN in_IN magic_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD said_VBN that_IN they_PRP made_VBD use_NN of_IN people_NNS '_POS s_PRP
spittle_NN to_TO bewitch_VB them_PRP ._. Hence_RB visitors_NNS were_VBD careful_JJ to_TO conceal_VB
their_PRP$ spittle_NN ,_, lest_IN they_PRP should_MD furnish_VB these_DT wizards_NNS with_IN a_DT handle_NN
for_IN working_VBG them_PRP harm_NN ._. Similarly_RB among_IN some_DT tribes_NNS of_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP
no_DT man_NN will_MD spit_VB when_WRB an_DT enemy_NN is_VBZ near_JJ ,_, lest_IN his_PRP$ foe_NN should_MD find_VB the_DT
spittle_NN and_CC give_VB it_PRP to_TO a_DT wizard_NN ,_, who_WP would_MD then_RB mix_VB it_PRP with_IN magical_JJ
ingredients_NNS so_RB as_IN to_TO injure_VB the_DT person_NN from_IN whom_WP it_PRP fell_VBD ._. Even_RB in_IN a_DT
man_NN '_'' s_PRP own_JJ house_NN his_PRP$ saliva_NN is_VBZ carefully_RB swept_VBN away_RB and_CC obliterated_VBN
for_IN a_DT similar_JJ reason_NN ._.

If_IN common_JJ folk_NN are_VBP thus_RB cautious_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ natural_JJ that_IN kings_NNS and_CC
chiefs_NNS should_MD be_VB doubly_RB so_RB ._. In_IN the_DT Sandwich_NNP Islands_NNP chiefs_NNS were_VBD
attended_VBN by_IN a_DT confidential_JJ servant_NN bearing_VBG a_DT portable_JJ spittoon_NN ,_, and_CC
the_DT deposit_NN was_VBD carefully_RB buried_VBN every_DT morning_NN to_TO put_VB it_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT
reach_NN of_IN sorcerers_NNS ._. On_IN the_DT Slave_NNP Coast_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT same_JJ reason_NN ,_,
whenever_WRB a_DT king_NN or_CC chief_NN expectorates_NNS ,_, the_DT saliva_NN is_VBZ scrupulously_RB
gathered_VBN up_RP and_CC hidden_VBN or_CC buried_VBN ._. The_DT same_JJ precautions_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN for_IN
the_DT same_JJ reason_NN with_IN the_DT spittle_NN of_IN the_DT chief_NN of_IN Tabali_NNP in_IN Southern_NNP
Nigeria_NNP ._.

The_DT magical_JJ use_NN to_TO which_WDT spittle_NN may_MD be_VB put_VBN marks_NNS it_PRP out_RB ,_, like_IN blood_NN
or_CC nail-parings_NNS ,_, as_IN a_DT suitable_JJ material_NN basis_NN for_IN a_DT covenant_NN ,_, since_IN
by_IN exchanging_VBG their_PRP$ saliva_NN the_DT covenanting_NN parties_NNS give_VBP each_DT other_JJ a_DT
guarantee_NN of_IN good_JJ faith_NN ._. If_IN either_DT of_IN them_PRP afterwards_RB foreswears_.
himself_PRP ,_, the_DT other_JJ can_MD punish_VB his_PRP$ perfidy_NN by_IN a_DT magical_JJ treatment_NN of_IN
the_DT purjurer_NN '_'' s_PRP spittle_NN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ custody_NN ._. Thus_RB when_WRB the_DT
Wajagga_NNP of_IN East_NNP Africa_NNP desire_NN to_TO make_VB a_DT covenant_NN ,_, the_DT two_CD parties_NNS
will_MD sometimes_RB sit_VB down_RP with_IN a_DT bowl_NN of_IN milk_NN or_CC beer_NN between_IN them_PRP ,_,
and_CC after_IN uttering_VBG an_DT incantation_NN over_IN the_DT beverage_NN they_PRP each_DT take_VBP a_DT
mouthful_NN of_IN the_DT milk_NN or_CC beer_NN and_CC spit_VB it_PRP into_IN the_DT other_JJ '_POS s_PRP mouth_NN ._. In_IN
urgent_JJ cases_NNS ,_, when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ no_DT time_NN to_TO spend_VB on_IN ceremony_NN ,_, the_DT two_CD
will_MD simply_RB spit_VB into_IN each_DT other_JJ '_POS s_PRP mouth_NN ,_, which_WDT seals_VBZ the_DT covenant_NN
just_RB as_RB well_RB ._.



10._CD Foods_NNP tabooed_NN

AS_IN MIGHT_NNP have_VBP been_VBN expected_VBN ,_, the_DT superstitions_NNS of_IN the_DT savage_JJ cluster_NN
thick_JJ about_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN food_NN ;_: and_CC he_PRP abstains_VBZ from_IN eating_VBG many_JJ
animals_NNS and_CC plants_NNS ,_, wholesome_JJ enough_RB in_IN themselves_PRP ,_, which_WDT for_IN one_CD
reason_NN or_CC another_DT he_PRP fancies_VBZ would_MD prove_VB dangerous_JJ or_CC fatal_JJ to_TO the_DT
eater_NN ._. Examples_NNS of_IN such_JJ abstinence_NN are_VBP too_RB familiar_JJ and_CC far_RB too_RB
numerous_JJ to_TO quote_VB ._. But_CC if_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ man_NN is_VBZ thus_RB deterred_VBN by_IN
superstitious_JJ fear_NN from_IN partaking_NN of_IN various_JJ foods_NNS ,_, the_DT restraints_NNS
of_IN this_DT kind_NN which_WDT are_VBP laid_VBN upon_IN sacred_JJ or_CC tabooed_JJ persons_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN
kings_NNS and_CC priests_NNS ,_, are_VBP still_RB more_RBR numerous_JJ and_CC stringent_JJ ._. We_PRP have_VBP
already_RB seen_VBN that_IN the_DT Flamen_NNP Dialis_NNP was_VBD forbidden_VBN to_TO eat_VB or_CC even_RB
name_NN several_JJ plants_NNS and_CC animals_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT flesh_NN diet_NN of_IN Egyptian_JJ
kings_NNS was_VBD restricted_VBN to_TO veal_VB and_CC goose_VB ._. In_IN antiquity_NN many_JJ priests_NNS
and_CC many_JJ kings_NNS of_IN barbarous_JJ peoples_NNS abstained_VBD wholly_RB from_IN a_DT flesh_NN
diet_NN ._. The_DT Gangas_NNP or_CC fetish_JJ priests_NNS of_IN the_DT Loango_NNP Coast_NNP are_VBP
forbidden_VBN to_TO eat_VB or_CC even_RB see_VB a_DT variety_NN of_IN animals_NNS and_CC fish_NN ,_, in_IN
consequence_NN of_IN which_WDT their_PRP$ flesh_NN diet_NN is_VBZ extremely_RB limited_JJ ;_: often_RB
they_PRP live_VBP only_RB on_IN herbs_NNS and_CC roots_NNS ,_, though_IN they_PRP may_MD drink_VB fresh_JJ
blood_NN ._. The_DT heir_NN to_TO the_DT throne_NN of_IN Loango_NNP is_VBZ forbidden_VBN from_IN infancy_NN to_TO
eat_VB pork_NN ;_: from_IN early_JJ childhood_NN he_PRP is_VBZ interdicted_VBN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT
cola_NN fruit_NN in_IN company_NN ;_: at_IN puberty_NN he_PRP is_VBZ taught_VBN by_IN a_DT priest_NN not_RB to_TO
partake_NN of_IN fowls_NNS except_IN such_JJ as_IN he_PRP has_VBZ himself_PRP killed_VBN and_CC cooked_VBN ;_:
and_CC so_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN taboos_NNS goes_VBZ on_IN increasing_VBG with_IN his_PRP$ years_NNS ._. In_IN
Fernando_NNP Po_NNP the_DT king_NN after_IN installation_NN is_VBZ forbidden_VBN to_TO eat_VB cocco_NN
(_-LRB- arum_NN acaule_NN ),_IN deer_NNS ,_, and_CC porcupine_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP the_DT ordinary_JJ foods_NNS
of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._. The_DT head_NN chief_NN of_IN the_DT Masai_NNP may_MD eat_VB nothing_NN but_CC milk_NN ,_,
honey_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT roasted_VBN livers_NNS of_IN goats_NNS ;_: for_IN if_IN he_PRP partook_VBD of_IN any_DT
other_JJ food_NN he_PRP would_MD lose_VB his_PRP$ power_NN of_IN soothsaying_JJ and_CC of_IN compounding_VBG
charms_NNS ._.



11._DT Knots_NNP and_CC Rings_NNP tabooed_.

WE_NNP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN among_IN the_DT many_JJ taboos_NNS which_WDT the_DT Flamen_NNP Dialis_NNP at_IN
Rome_NNP had_VBD to_TO observe_VB ,_, there_EX was_VBD one_CD that_IN forbade_VBD him_PRP to_TO have_VB a_DT knot_NN
on_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ garments_NNS ,_, and_CC another_DT that_IN obliged_VBN him_PRP to_TO wear_VB no_NN
ring_NN unless_IN it_PRP were_VBD broken_VBN ._. In_IN like_JJ manner_NN Moslem_NNP pilgrims_NNS to_TO Mecca_NNP
are_VBP in_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN sanctity_NN or_CC taboo_NN and_CC may_MD wear_VB on_IN their_PRP$ persons_NNS
neither_CC knots_NNS nor_CC rings_NNS ._. These_DT rules_NNS are_VBP probably_RB of_IN kindred_PRP$
significance_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD conveniently_RB be_VB considered_VBN together_RB ._. To_TO begin_VB
with_IN knots_NNS ,_, many_JJ people_NNS in_IN different_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN entertain_VB a_DT
strong_JJ objection_NN to_TO having_VBG any_DT knot_NN about_IN their_PRP$ person_NN at_IN certain_JJ
critical_JJ seasons_NNS ,_, particularly_RB childbirth_NN ,_, marriage_NN ,_, and_CC death_NN ._. Thus_RB
among_IN the_DT Saxons_NNS of_IN Transylvania_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT woman_NN is_VBZ in_IN travail_NN all_DT
knots_NNS on_IN her_PRP$ garments_NNS are_VBP untied_VBN ,_, because_IN it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN this_DT
will_MD facilitate_VB her_PRP$ delivery_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT same_JJ intention_NN all_RB the_DT
locks_NNS in_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, whether_IN on_IN doors_NNS or_CC boxes_NNS ,_, are_VBP unlocked_VBN ._. The_DT
Lapps_NNP think_VBP that_IN a_DT lying-in_JJ woman_NN should_MD have_VB no_DT knot_NN on_IN her_PRP$
garments_NNS ,_, because_IN a_DT knot_NN would_MD have_VB the_DT effect_NN of_IN making_VBG the_DT
delivery_NN difficult_JJ and_CC painful_JJ ._. In_IN the_DT East_NNP Indies_NNP this_DT superstition_NN
is_VBZ extended_VBN to_TO the_DT whole_JJ time_NN of_IN pregnancy_NN ;_: the_DT people_NNS believe_VBP that_IN
if_IN a_DT pregnant_JJ woman_NN were_VBD to_TO tie_VB knots_NNS ,_, or_CC braid_JJ ,_, or_CC make_VB anything_NN
fast_RB ,_, the_DT child_NN would_MD thereby_RB be_VB constricted_VBN or_CC the_DT woman_NN would_MD
herself_PRP be_VB "_`` tied_VBN up_RP "_'' when_WRB her_PRP$ time_NN came_VBD ._. Nay_NNP ,_, some_DT of_IN them_PRP enforce_VB
the_DT observance_NN of_IN the_DT rule_NN on_IN the_DT father_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT mother_NN of_IN
the_DT unborn_JJ child_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Sea_NNP Dyaks_NNP neither_RB of_IN the_DT parents_NNS may_MD
bind_NN up_IN anything_NN with_IN a_DT string_NN or_CC make_VB anything_NN fast_RB during_IN the_DT
wife_NN '_POS s_PRP pregnancy_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Toumbuluh_NNP tribe_NN of_IN North_NNP Celebes_NNP a_DT ceremony_NN
is_VBZ performed_VBN in_IN the_DT fourth_JJ or_CC fifth_JJ month_NN of_IN a_DT woman_NN '_'' s_PRP pregnancy_NN ,_,
and_CC after_IN it_PRP her_PRP$ husband_NN is_VBZ forbidden_VBN ,_, among_IN many_JJ other_JJ things_NNS ,_, to_TO
tie_VB any_DT fast_JJ knots_NNS and_CC to_TO sit_VB with_IN his_PRP$ legs_NNS crossed_VBD over_IN each_DT other_JJ ._.

In_IN all_PDT these_DT cases_NNS the_DT idea_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB that_IN the_DT tying_VBG of_IN a_DT knot_NN
would_MD ,_, as_IN they_PRP say_VBP in_IN the_DT East_NNP Indies_NNP ,_, "_`` tie_VB up_RB "_'' the_DT woman_NN ,_, in_IN other_JJ
words_NNS ,_, impede_NN and_CC perhaps_RB prevent_VB her_PRP delivery_NN ,_, or_CC delay_VB her_PRP$
convalescence_NN after_IN the_DT birth_NN ._. On_IN the_DT principles_NNS of_IN homoeopathic_JJ or_CC
imitative_VBG magic_JJ the_DT physical_JJ obstacle_NN or_CC impediment_NN of_IN a_DT knot_NN on_IN a_DT
cord_NN would_MD create_VB a_DT corresponding_JJ obstacle_NN or_CC impediment_NN in_IN the_DT body_NN
of_IN the_DT woman_NN ._. That_IN this_DT is_VBZ really_RB the_DT explanation_NN of_IN the_DT rule_NN

If_IN knots_NNS are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO kill_VB ,_, they_PRP are_VBP also_RB supposed_VBN to_TO cure_VB ._. This_DT

employed_VBN to_TO stop_VB a_DT runaway_JJ ._. In_IN Swazieland_NNP you_PRP may_MD often_RB see_VB grass_NN

tells_VBZ of_IN a_DT domestic_JJ tragedy_NN ._. A_DT wife_NN has_VBZ run_VBN away_RB from_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN ,_,

always_RB been_VBN considered_VBN in_IN Russia_NNP very_RB efficacious_JJ against_IN sorcerers_NNS ;_:
