herd_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO keep_VB off_RP wolves_NNS ;_: its_PRP$ force_NN binds_NNS the_DT maw_NN of_IN the_DT
ravening_NN beast_NN ._. On_IN the_DT same_JJ principle_NN ,_, a_DT padlock_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN thrice_NN
round_RB a_DT herd_NN of_IN horses_NNS before_IN they_PRP go_VBP afield_NN in_IN the_DT spring_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
bearer_NN locks_NNS and_CC unlocks_NNS it_PRP as_IN he_PRP goes_VBZ ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_`` I_PRP lock_VBP from_IN my_PRP$ herd_NN
the_DT mouths_NNS of_IN the_DT grey_JJ wolves_NNS with_IN this_DT steel_NN lock_NN ."_RB

Knots_NNS and_CC locks_NNS may_MD serve_VB to_TO avert_VB not_RB only_RB wizards_NNS and_CC wolves_NNS but_CC
death_NN itself_PRP ._. When_WRB they_PRP brought_VBD a_DT woman_NN to_TO the_DT stake_NN at_IN St_NNP ._. Andrews_NNP
in_IN 1572_CD to_TO burn_VB her_PRP$ alive_JJ for_IN a_DT witch_NN ,_, they_PRP found_VBD on_IN her_PRP a_DT white_JJ
cloth_NN like_IN a_DT collar_NN ,_, with_IN strings_NNS and_CC many_JJ knots_NNS on_IN the_DT strings_NNS ._.
They_PRP took_VBD it_PRP from_IN her_PRP ,_, sorely_RB against_IN her_PRP will_MD ,_, for_IN she_PRP seemed_VBD to_TO
think_VB that_IN she_PRP could_MD not_RB die_VB in_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, if_IN only_RB the_DT cloth_NN with_IN the_DT
knotted_VBN strings_NNS was_VBD on_IN her_PRP ._. When_WRB it_PRP was_VBD taken_VBN away_RB ,_, she_PRP said_VBD ,_, "_`` Now_RB I_PRP
have_VBP no_DT hope_NN of_IN myself_PRP ."_. In_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN England_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN that_IN
a_DT person_NN cannot_MD die_VB so_RB long_JJ as_IN any_DT locks_NNS are_VBP locked_VBN or_CC bolts_NNS shot_VBN in_IN
the_DT house_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ therefore_RB a_DT very_RB common_JJ practice_NN to_TO undo_VB all_DT locks_NNS
and_CC bolts_NNS when_WRB the_DT sufferer_NN is_VBZ plainly_RB near_IN his_PRP$ end_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_WDT
his_PRP$ agony_NN may_MD not_RB be_VB unduly_RB prolonged_VBN ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT year_NN
1863,_CD at_IN Taunton_NNP ,_, a_DT child_NN lay_VBD sick_JJ of_IN scarlatina_NN and_CC death_NN seemed_VBN
inevitable_JJ ._. "_'' A_DT jury_NN of_IN matrons_NNS was_VBD ,_, as_IN it_PRP were_VBD ,_, empanelled_VBN ,_, and_CC to_TO
prevent_VB the_DT child_NN '_POS dying_VBG hard_JJ '_'' all_PDT the_DT doors_NNS in_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, all_PDT the_DT
drawers_NNS ,_, all_DT the_DT boxes_NNS ,_, all_RB the_DT cupboards_NNS were_VBD thrown_VBN wide_JJ open_JJ ,_, the_DT
keys_NNS taken_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT child_NN placed_VBN under_IN a_DT beam_NN ,_,
whereby_WRB a_DT sure_JJ ,_, certain_JJ ,_, and_CC easy_JJ passage_NN into_IN eternity_NN could_MD be_VB
secured_VBN ."_NNS Strange_JJ to_TO say_VB ,_, the_DT child_NN declined_VBD to_TO avail_VB itself_PRP of_IN the_DT
facilities_NNS for_IN dying_VBG so_RB obligingly_RB placed_VBN at_IN its_PRP$ disposal_NN by_IN the_DT
sagacity_NN and_CC experience_NN of_IN the_DT British_JJ matrons_NNS of_IN Taunton_NNP ;_: it_PRP
preferred_VBN to_TO live_VB rather_RB than_IN give_VB up_RP the_DT ghost_NN just_RB then_RB ._.

The_DT rule_NN which_WDT prescribes_VBZ that_IN at_IN certain_JJ magical_JJ and_CC religious_JJ
ceremonies_NNS the_DT hair_NN should_MD hang_VB loose_RB and_CC the_DT feet_NNS should_MD be_VB bare_JJ is_NNS
probably_RB based_VBN on_IN the_DT same_JJ fear_NN of_IN trammelling_VBG and_CC impeding_VBG the_DT
action_NN in_IN hand_NN ,_, whatever_WDT it_PRP may_MD be_VB ,_, by_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN any_DT knot_NN or_CC
constriction_NN ,_, whether_IN on_IN the_DT head_NN or_CC on_IN the_DT feet_NNS of_IN the_DT performer_NN ._. A_DT
similar_JJ power_NN to_TO bind_NN and_CC hamper_VB spiritual_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN bodily_JJ
activities_NNS is_VBZ ascribed_VBN by_IN some_DT people_NNS to_TO rings_NNS ._. Thus_RB in_IN the_DT island_NN
of_IN Carpathus_NNP people_NNS never_RB button_NN the_DT clothes_NNS they_PRP put_VBD upon_IN a_DT dead_JJ
body_NN and_CC they_PRP are_VBP careful_JJ to_TO remove_VB all_DT rings_NNS from_IN it_PRP ;_: "_`` for_IN the_DT
spirit_NN ,_, they_PRP say_VBP ,_, can_MD even_RB be_VB detained_VBN in_IN the_DT little_JJ finger_NN ,_, and_CC
cannot_IN rest_NN ."_NN Here_RB it_PRP is_VBZ plain_JJ that_IN even_RB if_IN the_DT soul_NN is_VBZ not_RB
definitely_RB supposed_VBN to_TO issue_VB at_IN death_NN from_IN the_DT finger-tips_NNS ,_, yet_RB the_DT
ring_NN is_VBZ conceived_VBN to_TO exercise_VB a_DT certain_JJ constrictive_JJ influence_NN which_WDT
detains_NNS and_CC imprisons_NNS the_DT immortal_JJ spirit_NN in_IN spite_NN of_IN its_PRP$ efforts_NNS to_TO
escape_NN from_IN the_DT tabernacle_NN of_IN clay_NN ;_: in_IN short_JJ the_DT ring_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT
knot_NN ,_, acts_VBZ as_IN a_DT spiritual_JJ fetter_NN ._. This_DT may_MD have_VB been_VBN the_DT reason_NN of_IN
an_DT ancient_JJ Greek_JJ maxim_NN ,_, attributed_VBD to_TO Pythagoras_NNP ,_, which_WDT forbade_RB
people_NNS to_TO wear_VB rings_NNS ._. Nobody_NN might_MD enter_VB the_DT ancient_JJ Arcadian_NN
sanctuary_NN of_IN the_DT Mistress_NNP at_IN Lycosura_NNP with_IN a_DT ring_NN on_IN his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$
finger_NN ._. Persons_NNPS who_WP consulted_VBD the_DT oracle_NN of_IN Faunus_NNP had_VBD to_TO be_VB chaste_NN ,_,
to_TO eat_VB no_DT flesh_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO wear_VB no_DT rings_NNS ._.

On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT same_JJ constriction_NN which_WDT hinders_VBD the_DT egress_NN of_IN
the_DT soul_NN may_MD prevent_VB the_DT entrance_NN of_IN evil_JJ spirits_NNS ;_: hence_RB we_PRP find_VBP
rings_NNS used_VBD as_IN amulets_NNS against_IN demons_NNS ,_, witches_NNS ,_, and_CC ghosts_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT
Tyrol_NN it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN a_DT woman_NN in_IN childbed_NN should_MD never_RB take_VB off_RP her_PRP$
wedding-ring_NN ,_, or_CC spirits_NNS and_CC witches_NNS will_MD have_VB power_NN over_IN her_PRP ._. Among_IN
the_DT Lapps_NNP ,_, the_DT person_NN who_WP is_VBZ about_IN to_TO place_VB a_DT corpse_NN in_IN the_DT coffin_NN
receives_VBZ from_IN the_DT husband_NN ,_, wife_NN ,_, or_CC children_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ a_DT brass_NN
ring_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP must_MD wear_VB fastened_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ right_JJ arm_NN until_IN the_DT corpse_NN
is_VBZ safely_RB deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT grave_NN ._. The_DT ring_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO serve_VB the_DT
person_NN as_IN an_DT amulet_NN against_IN any_DT harm_NN which_WDT the_DT ghost_NN might_MD do_VB to_TO
him_PRP ._. How_WRB far_RB the_DT custom_NN of_IN wearing_VBG finger-rings_NNS may_MD have_VB been_VBN
influenced_VBN by_IN ,_, or_CC even_RB have_VBP sprung_VBN from_IN ,_, a_DT belief_NN in_IN their_PRP$ efficacy_NN
as_IN amulets_NNS to_TO keep_VB the_DT soul_NN in_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, or_CC demons_NNS out_IN of_IN it_PRP ,_, is_VBZ a_DT
question_NN which_WDT seems_VBZ worth_JJ considering_VBG ._. Here_RB we_PRP are_VBP only_RB concerned_VBN
with_IN the_DT belief_NN in_IN so_RB far_RB as_IN it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO throw_VB light_NN on_IN the_DT rule_NN
that_IN the_DT Flamen_NNP Dialis_NNPS might_MD not_RB wear_VB a_DT ring_NN unless_IN it_PRP were_VBD broken_VBN ._.
Taken_VBN in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN the_DT rule_NN which_WDT forbade_VBD him_PRP to_TO have_VB a_DT knot_NN
on_IN his_PRP$ garments_NNS ,_, it_PRP points_VBZ to_TO a_DT fear_NN that_IN the_DT powerful_JJ spirit_NN
embodied_VBN in_IN him_PRP might_MD be_VB trammelled_JJ and_CC hampered_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ goings-out_NN
and_CC comings-in_JJ by_IN such_JJ corporeal_JJ and_CC spiritual_JJ fetters_NNS as_IN rings_NNS and_CC
knots_NNS ._.




XXII_NNP ._. Tabooed_NNP Words_NNPS



1._. Personal_NNP Names_NNP tabooed_.

UNABLE_JJ to_TO discriminate_VB clearly_RB between_IN words_NNS and_CC things_NNS ,_, the_DT savage_JJ
commonly_RB fancies_NNS that_IN the_DT link_NN between_IN a_DT name_NN and_CC the_DT person_NN or_CC
thing_NN denominated_VBN by_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB a_DT mere_JJ arbitrary_JJ and_CC ideal_JJ
association_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT real_JJ and_CC substantial_JJ bond_NN which_WDT unites_VBZ the_DT two_CD in_IN
such_PDT a_DT way_NN that_IN magic_NN may_MD be_VB wrought_VBN on_IN a_DT man_NN just_RB as_RB easily_RB through_IN
his_PRP$ name_NN as_IN through_IN his_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, his_PRP$ nails_NNS ,_, or_CC any_DT other_JJ material_NN part_NN
of_IN his_PRP$ person_NN ._. In_IN fact_NN ,_, primitive_JJ man_NN regards_VBZ his_PRP$ name_NN as_IN a_DT vital_JJ
portion_NN of_IN himself_PRP and_CC takes_VBZ care_NN of_IN it_PRP accordingly_RB ._. Thus_RB ,_, for_IN
example_NN ,_, the_DT North_NNP American_NNP Indian_NNP "_'' regards_VBZ his_PRP$ name_NN ,_, not_RB as_IN a_DT mere_JJ
label_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN a_DT distinct_JJ part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ personality_NN ,_, just_RB as_RB much_JJ as_IN
are_VBP his_PRP$ eyes_NNS or_CC his_PRP$ teeth_NNS ,_, and_CC believes_VBZ that_DT injury_NN will_MD result_VB as_IN
surely_RB from_IN the_DT malicious_JJ handling_NN of_IN his_PRP$ name_NN as_IN from_IN a_DT wound_NN
inflicted_VBN on_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ physical_JJ organism_NN ._. This_DT belief_NN was_VBD
found_VBN among_IN the_DT various_JJ tribes_NNS from_IN the_DT Atlantic_NNP to_TO the_DT Pacific_NNP ,_, and_CC
has_VBZ occasioned_VBN a_DT number_NN of_IN curious_JJ regulations_NNS in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT
concealment_NN and_CC change_NN of_IN names_NNS ."_IN Some_DT Esquimaux_NNP take_VBP new_JJ names_NNS when_WRB
they_PRP are_VBP old_JJ ,_, hoping_VBG thereby_RB to_TO get_VB a_DT new_JJ lease_NN of_IN life_NN ._. The_DT
Tolampoos_NNP of_IN Celebes_NNPS believe_VBP that_IN if_IN you_PRP write_VBP a_DT man_NN '_'' s_VBZ name_NN down_IN you_PRP
can_MD carry_VB off_RP his_PRP$ soul_NN along_IN with_IN it_PRP ._. Many_JJ savages_NNS at_IN the_DT present_NN
day_NN regard_VBP their_PRP$ names_NNS as_IN vital_JJ parts_NNS of_IN themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC therefore_RB
take_VBP great_JJ pains_NNS to_TO conceal_VB their_PRP$ real_JJ names_NNS ,_, lest_IN these_DT should_MD give_VB
to_TO evil-disposed_JJ persons_NNS a_DT handle_NN by_IN which_WDT to_TO injure_VB their_PRP$ owners_NNS ._.

Thus_RB ,_, to_TO begin_VB with_IN the_DT savages_NNS who_WP rank_VBP at_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN the_DT social_JJ
scale_NN ,_, we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN the_DT secrecy_NN with_IN which_WDT among_IN the_DT Australian_JJ
aborigines_NNS personal_JJ names_NNS are_VBP often_RB kept_VBN from_IN general_JJ knowledge_NN
"_`` arises_VBZ in_IN great_JJ measure_NN from_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN an_DT enemy_NN ,_, who_WP knows_VBZ
your_PRP$ name_NN ,_, has_VBZ in_IN it_PRP something_NN which_WDT he_PRP can_MD use_VB magically_RB to_TO your_PRP$
detriment_NN ."_, "_`` An_DT Australian_JJ black_NN ,"_, says_VBZ another_DT writer_NN ,_, "_'' is_VBZ always_RB
very_RB unwilling_JJ to_TO tell_VB his_PRP$ real_JJ name_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN
this_DT reluctance_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT fear_NN that_IN through_IN his_PRP$ name_NN he_PRP may_MD be_VB
injured_VBN by_IN sorcerers_NNS ."_IN Amongst_IN the_DT tribes_NNS of_IN Central_NNP Australia_NNP every_DT
man_NN ,_, woman_NN ,_, and_CC child_NN has_VBZ ,_, besides_IN a_DT personal_JJ name_NN which_WDT is_VBZ in_IN
common_JJ use_NN ,_, a_DT secret_JJ or_CC sacred_JJ name_NN which_WDT is_VBZ bestowed_VBN by_IN the_DT older_JJR
men_NNS upon_IN him_PRP or_CC her_PRP$ soon_RB after_IN birth_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT is_VBZ known_VBN to_TO none_NN but_CC
the_DT fully_RB initiated_VBN members_NNS of_IN the_DT group_NN ._. This_DT secret_JJ name_NN is_VBZ never_RB
mentioned_VBD except_IN upon_IN the_DT most_RBS solemn_JJ occasions_NNS ;_: to_TO utter_JJ it_PRP in_IN the_DT
hearing_NN of_IN women_NNS or_CC of_IN men_NNS of_IN another_DT group_NN would_MD be_VB a_DT most_RBS serious_JJ
breach_NN of_IN tribal_JJ custom_NN ,_, as_RB serious_JJ as_IN the_DT most_RBS flagrant_JJ case_NN of_IN
sacrilege_NN among_IN ourselves_PRP ._. When_WRB mentioned_VBN at_IN all_DT ,_, the_DT name_NN is_VBZ spoken_VBN
only_RB in_IN a_DT whisper_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB until_IN the_DT most_RBS elaborate_JJ precautions_NNS have_VBP
been_VBN taken_VBN that_IN it_PRP shall_MD be_VB heard_VBN by_IN no_DT one_NN but_CC members_NNS of_IN the_DT
group_NN ._. "_'' The_DT native_JJ thinks_VBZ that_IN a_DT stranger_NN knowing_VBG his_PRP$ secret_JJ name_NN
would_MD have_VB special_JJ power_NN to_TO work_VB him_PRP ill_RB by_IN means_NNS of_IN magic_NN ."_.

The_DT same_JJ fear_NN seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB led_VBN to_TO a_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN amongst_IN
the_DT ancient_JJ Egyptians_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ comparatively_RB high_JJ civilisation_NN was_VBD
strangely_RB dashed_VBD and_CC chequered_VBD with_IN relics_NNS of_IN the_DT lowest_JJS savagery_NN ._.
Every_DT Egyptian_JJ received_VBN two_CD names_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD known_VBN respectively_RB as_IN
the_DT true_JJ name_NN and_CC the_DT good_JJ name_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT great_JJ name_NN and_CC the_DT little_JJ
name_NN ;_: and_CC while_IN the_DT good_JJ or_CC little_JJ name_NN was_VBD made_VBN public_JJ ,_, the_DT true_JJ or_CC
great_JJ name_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN carefully_RB concealed_VBN ._. A_DT Brahman_NNP child_NN
receives_VBZ two_CD names_NNS ,_, one_CD for_IN common_JJ use_NN ,_, the_DT other_JJ a_DT secret_JJ name_NN
which_WDT none_NN but_CC his_PRP$ father_NN and_CC mother_NN should_MD know_VB ._. The_DT latter_NN is_VBZ only_RB
used_VBN at_IN ceremonies_NNS such_JJ as_IN marriage_NN ._. The_DT custom_NN is_VBZ intended_VBN to_TO
protect_VBP the_DT person_NN against_IN magic_NN ,_, since_IN a_DT charm_NN only_RB becomes_VBZ
effectual_JJ in_IN combination_NN with_IN the_DT real_JJ name_NN ._. Similarly_RB ,_, the_DT natives_NNS
of_IN Nias_NNP believe_VBP that_IN harm_NN may_MD be_VB done_VBN to_TO a_DT person_NN by_IN the_DT demons_NNS who_WP
hear_VB his_PRP$ name_NN pronounced_VBD ._. Hence_RB the_DT names_NNS of_IN infants_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP
especially_RB exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT assaults_NNS of_IN evil_JJ sprits_NNS ,_, are_VBP never_RB spoken_VBN ;_:
and_CC often_RB in_IN haunted_JJ spots_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT gloomy_JJ depths_NNS of_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_,
the_DT banks_NNS of_IN a_DT river_NN ,_, or_CC beside_IN a_DT bubbling_JJ spring_NN ,_, men_NNS will_MD abstain_VB
from_IN calling_VBG each_DT other_JJ by_IN their_PRP$ names_NNS for_IN a_DT like_JJ reason_NN ._.

The_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN Chiloe_NNP keep_VBP their_PRP$ names_NNS secret_JJ and_CC do_VBP not_RB like_VB to_TO
have_VBP them_PRP uttered_VBN aloud_RB ;_: for_IN they_PRP say_VBP that_IN there_EX are_VBP fairies_NNS or_CC imps_NNS
on_IN the_DT mainland_NN or_CC neighbouring_VBG islands_NNS who_WP ,_, if_IN they_PRP knew_VBD folk_NN '_'' s_PRP
names_NNS ,_, would_MD do_VB them_PRP an_DT injury_NN ;_: but_CC so_RB long_RB as_IN they_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB the_DT
names_NNS ,_, these_DT mischievous_JJ sprites_NNS are_VBP powerless_JJ ._. The_DT Araucanians_NNPS will_MD
hardly_RB ever_RB tell_VB a_DT stranger_NN their_PRP$ names_NNS because_IN they_PRP fear_VBP that_IN he_PRP
would_MD thereby_RB acquire_VB some_DT supernatural_JJ power_NN over_IN themselves_PRP ._. Asked_VBN
his_PRP$ name_NN by_IN a_DT stranger_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ ignorant_JJ of_IN their_PRP$ superstitions_NNS ,_, an_DT
Araucanian_NNP will_MD answer_VB ,_, "_`` I_PRP have_VBP none_NN ."_. When_WRB an_DT Ojebway_NN is_VBZ asked_VBN his_PRP$
name_NN ,_, he_PRP will_MD look_VB at_IN some_DT bystander_NN and_CC ask_VB him_PRP to_TO answer_VB ._. "_'' This_DT
reluctance_NN arises_VBZ from_IN an_DT impression_NN they_PRP receive_VBP when_WRB young_JJ ,_, that_WDT
if_IN they_PRP repeat_VBP their_PRP$ own_JJ names_NNS it_PRP will_MD prevent_VB their_PRP$ growth_NN ,_, and_CC
they_PRP will_MD be_VB small_JJ in_IN stature_NN ._. On_IN account_NN of_IN this_DT unwillingness_NN to_TO
tell_VBP their_PRP$ names_NNS ,_, many_JJ strangers_NNS have_VBP fancied_VBN that_IN they_PRP either_RB have_VBP
no_DT names_NNS or_CC have_VB forgotten_VBN them_PRP ."_.

In_IN this_DT last_JJ case_NN no_DT scruple_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB felt_VBN about_IN communicating_VBG a_DT
man_NN '_'' s_VBZ name_NN to_TO strangers_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT ill_JJ effects_NNS appear_VBP to_TO be_VB dreaded_VBN as_IN
a_DT consequence_NN of_IN divulging_VBG it_PRP ;_: harm_NN is_VBZ only_RB done_VBN when_WRB a_DT name_NN is_VBZ
spoken_VBN by_IN its_PRP$ owner_NN ._. Why_WRB is_VBZ this_DT ?_. and_CC why_WRB in_IN particular_NN should_MD a_DT man_NN
be_VB thought_VBN to_TO stunt_VB his_PRP$ growth_NN by_IN uttering_VBG his_PRP$ own_JJ name_NN ?_. We_PRP may_MD
conjecture_NN that_IN to_TO savages_NNS who_WP act_VBP and_CC think_VBP thus_RB a_DT person_NN '_'' s_VBZ name_NN
only_RB seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB a_DT part_NN of_IN himself_PRP when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ uttered_VBN with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ
breath_NN ;_: uttered_VBN by_IN the_DT breath_NN of_IN others_NNS it_PRP has_VBZ no_DT vital_JJ connexion_NN
with_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC no_DT harm_NN can_MD come_VB to_TO him_PRP through_IN it_PRP ._. Whereas_NNP ,_, so_RB these_DT
primitive_JJ philosophers_NNS may_MD have_VB argued_VBN ,_, when_WRB a_DT man_NN lets_VBZ his_PRP$ own_JJ name_NN
pass_VB his_PRP$ lips_NNS ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ parting_VBG with_IN a_DT living_VBG piece_NN of_IN himself_PRP ,_, and_CC if_IN
he_PRP persists_VBZ in_IN so_RB reckless_JJ a_DT course_NN he_PRP must_MD certainly_RB end_VB by_IN
dissipating_VBG his_PRP$ energy_NN and_CC shattering_VBG his_PRP$ constitution_NN ._. Many_PDT a_DT
broken-down_JJ debauchee_NN ,_, many_JJ a_DT feeble_JJ frame_NN wasted_VBN with_IN disease_NN ,_, may_MD
have_VBP been_VBN pointed_VBN out_RP by_IN these_DT simple_JJ moralists_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ awe-struck_NN
disciples_NNS as_IN a_DT fearful_JJ example_NN of_IN the_DT fate_NN that_WDT must_MD sooner_RBR or_CC later_RBR
overtake_IN the_DT profligate_NN who_WP indulges_VBZ immoderately_RB in_IN the_DT seductive_NN
habit_NN of_IN mentioning_VBG his_PRP$ own_JJ name_NN ._.

However_RB we_PRP may_MD explain_VB it_PRP ,_, the_DT fact_NN is_VBZ certain_JJ that_IN many_JJ a_DT savage_JJ
evinces_NNS the_DT strongest_JJS reluctance_NN to_TO pronounce_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ name_NN ,_, while_IN at_IN
the_DT same_JJ time_NN he_PRP makes_VBZ no_DT objection_NN at_IN all_DT to_TO other_JJ people_NNS
pronouncing_VBG it_PRP ,_, and_CC will_MD even_RB invite_VB them_PRP to_TO do_VB so_RB for_IN him_PRP in_IN order_NN
to_TO satisfy_VB the_DT curiosity_NN of_IN an_DT inquisitive_JJ stranger_NN ._. Thus_RB in_IN some_DT
parts_NNS of_IN Madagascar_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ taboo_JJ for_IN a_DT person_NN to_TO tell_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ name_NN ,_,
but_CC a_DT slave_NN or_CC attendant_NN will_MD answer_VB for_IN him_PRP ._. The_DT same_JJ curious_JJ
inconsistency_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP may_MD seem_VB to_TO us_PRP ,_, is_VBZ recorded_VBN of_IN some_DT tribes_NNS of_IN
American_JJ Indians_NNPS ._. Thus_RB we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN "_`` the_DT name_NN of_IN an_DT American_JJ
Indian_NNP is_VBZ a_DT sacred_JJ thing_NN ,_, not_RB to_TO be_VB divulged_VBN by_IN the_DT owner_NN himself_PRP
without_IN due_JJ consideration_NN ._. One_CD may_MD ask_VB a_DT warrior_NN of_IN any_DT tribe_NN to_TO
give_VB his_PRP$ name_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT question_NN will_MD be_VB met_VBN with_IN either_RB a_DT
point-blank_JJ refusal_NN or_CC the_DT more_JJR diplomatic_JJ evasion_NN that_IN he_PRP cannot_MD
understand_VB what_WP is_VBZ wanted_VBN of_IN him_PRP ._. The_DT moment_NN a_DT friend_NN approaches_NNS ,_,
the_DT warrior_NN first_RB interrogated_VBN will_MD whisper_VB what_WP is_VBZ wanted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT
friend_NN can_MD tell_VB the_DT name_NN ,_, receiving_VBG a_DT reciprocation_NN of_IN the_DT courtesy_NN
from_IN the_DT other_JJ ."_NN This_DT general_JJ statement_NN applies_VBZ ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT
Indian_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN British_NNP Columbia_NNP ,_, as_IN to_TO whom_WP it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN "_`` one_CD
of_IN their_PRP$ strangest_JJ prejudices_NNS ,_, which_WDT appears_VBZ to_TO pervade_VB all_DT tribes_NNS
alike_RB ,_, is_VBZ a_DT dislike_NN to_TO telling_VBG their_PRP$ names_NNS --_: thus_RB you_PRP never_RB get_VB a_DT
man_NN '_POS s_VBZ right_JJ name_NN from_IN himself_PRP ;_: but_CC they_PRP will_MD tell_VB each_DT other_JJ '_POS s_PRP names_NNS
without_IN hesitation_NN ."_IN In_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT East_NNP Indian_NNP Archipelago_NNP the_DT
etiquette_NN is_VBZ the_DT same_JJ ._. As_IN a_DT general_JJ rule_NN no_DT one_NN will_MD utter_JJ his_PRP$ own_JJ
name_NN ._. To_TO enquire_VB ,_, "_`` What_WP is_VBZ your_PRP$ name_NN ?"_NN is_VBZ a_DT very_RB indelicate_JJ question_NN

the_DT Motu_NNP and_CC Motumotu_NNP tribes_NNS ,_, the_DT Papuans_NNP of_IN Finsch_NNP Haven_NNP in_IN North_NNP

Sometimes_RB the_DT embargo_NN laid_VBD on_IN personal_JJ names_NNS is_VBZ not_RB permanent_JJ ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ
conditional_JJ on_IN circumstances_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB these_DT change_NN it_PRP ceases_VBZ to_TO
operate_VB ._. Thus_RB when_WRB the_DT Nandi_NNP men_NNS are_VBP away_RB on_IN a_DT foray_NN ,_, nobody_NN at_IN home_NN

Bangala_NNP of_IN the_DT Upper_NNP Congo_NNP ,_, while_IN a_DT man_NN is_VBZ fishing_NN and_CC when_WRB he_PRP

"_`` Father_NNP of_IN So-and_NNP -_: so_RB ."_JJ Nay_NNP ,_, these_DT Alfoors_NNS are_VBP shy_JJ of_IN uttering_VBG the_DT

Kukis_NNP and_CC Zemis_NNP or_CC Kacha_NNP Nagas_NNP of_IN Assam_NNP parents_NNS drop_VBP their_PRP$ names_NNS

2._CD Names_NNS of_IN Relations_NNP tabooed_.

IT_PRP might_MD naturally_RB be_VB expected_VBN that_IN the_DT reserve_NN so_RB commonly_RB
maintained_VBN with_IN regard_NN to_TO personal_JJ names_NNS would_MD be_VB dropped_VBN or_CC at_IN
least_JJS relaxed_VBD among_IN relations_NNS and_CC friends_NNS ._. But_CC the_DT reverse_NN of_IN this_DT
is_VBZ often_RB the_DT case_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ precisely_RB the_DT persons_NNS most_RBS intimately_RB
connected_VBN by_IN blood_NN and_CC especially_RB by_IN marriage_NN to_TO whom_WP the_DT rule_NN
applies_VBZ with_IN the_DT greatest_JJS stringency_NN ._. Such_JJ people_NNS are_VBP often_RB
forbidden_VBN ,_, not_RB only_RB to_TO pronounce_VB each_DT other_JJ '_POS s_PRP names_NNS ,_, but_CC even_RB to_TO
utter_JJ ordinary_JJ words_NNS which_WDT resemble_VBP or_CC have_VBP a_DT single_JJ syllable_NN in_IN
common_JJ with_IN these_DT names_NNS ._. The_DT persons_NNS who_WP are_VBP thus_RB mutually_RB debarred_VBN
from_IN mentioning_VBG each_DT other_JJ '_POS s_PRP names_NNS are_VBP especially_RB husbands_NNS and_CC
wives_NNS ,_, a_DT man_NN and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN '_'' s_PRP parents_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT woman_NN and_CC her_PRP$ husband_NN '_POS s_PRP
father_NN ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, among_IN the_DT Caffres_NNS a_DT woman_NN may_MD not_RB publicly_RB
pronounce_VB the_DT birth-name_NN of_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN or_CC of_IN any_DT of_IN his_PRP$ brothers_NNS ,_,
nor_CC may_MD she_PRP use_VB the_DT interdicted_JJ word_NN in_IN its_PRP$ ordinary_JJ sense_NN ._. If_IN her_PRP$
husband_NN ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, be_VB called_VBN u-Mpaka_NNP ,_, from_IN impaka_NN ,_, a_DT small_JJ
feline_NN animal_NN ,_, she_PRP must_MD speak_VB of_IN that_DT beast_NN by_IN some_DT other_JJ name_NN ._.
Further_RB ,_, a_DT Caffre_NNP wife_NN is_VBZ forbidden_VBN to_TO pronounce_VB even_RB mentally_RB the_DT
names_NNS of_IN her_PRP$ father-in_JJ -_: law_NN and_CC of_IN all_DT her_PRP$ husband_NN '_POS s_PRP male_JJ relations_NNS
in_IN the_DT ascending_VBG line_NN ;_: and_CC whenever_WRB the_DT emphatic_JJ syllable_NN of_IN any_DT of_IN
their_PRP$ names_NNS occurs_VBZ in_IN another_DT word_NN ,_, she_PRP must_MD avoid_VB it_PRP by_IN
substituting_VBG either_RB an_DT entirely_RB new_JJ word_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, at_IN least_JJS ,_, another_DT
syllable_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ place_NN ._. Hence_RB this_DT custom_NN has_VBZ given_VBN rise_NN to_TO an_DT almost_RB
distinct_JJ language_NN among_IN the_DT women_NNS ,_, which_WDT the_DT Caffres_NNS call_VBP "_`` women_NNS '_'' s_PRP
speech_NN ."_VBD The_DT interpretation_NN of_IN this_DT "_`` women_NNS '_'' s_VBZ speech_NN "_`` is_VBZ naturally_RB
very_RB difficult_JJ ,_, "_'' for_IN no_DT definite_JJ rules_NNS can_MD be_VB given_VBN for_IN the_DT
formation_NN of_IN these_DT substituted_VBN words_NNS ,_, nor_CC is_VBZ it_PRP possible_JJ to_TO form_VB a_DT
dictionary_NN of_IN them_PRP ,_, their_PRP$ number_NN being_VBG so_RB great_JJ --_: since_IN there_EX may_MD be_VB
many_JJ women_NNS ,_, even_RB in_IN the_DT same_JJ tribe_NN ,_, who_WP would_MD be_VB no_DT more_JJR at_IN liberty_NN
to_TO use_VB the_DT substitutes_NNS employed_VBN by_IN some_DT others_NNS ,_, than_IN they_PRP are_VBP to_TO use_VB
the_DT original_JJ words_NNS themselves_PRP ."_VBP A_DT Caffre_JJ man_NN ,_, on_IN his_PRP$ side_NN ,_, may_MD not_RB
mention_VBP the_DT name_NN of_IN his_PRP$ mother-in_NN -_: law_NN ,_, nor_CC may_MD she_PRP pronounce_VB his_PRP$ ;_:
but_CC he_PRP is_VBZ free_JJ to_TO utter_JJ words_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT emphatic_JJ syllable_NN of_IN her_PRP$
name_NN occurs_VBZ ._. A_DT Kirghiz_NNP woman_NN dares_NNS not_RB pronounce_VB the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT
older_JJR relations_NNS of_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN ,_, nor_CC even_RB use_VB words_NNS which_WDT resemble_VBP
them_PRP in_IN sound_NN ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, if_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT relations_NNS is_VBZ called_VBN

bleating_VBG ones_NNS ";_RB if_IN his_PRP$ name_NN is_VBZ Lamb_NNP ,_, she_PRP must_MD refer_VB to_TO lambs_NNS as_IN "_`` the_DT
young_JJ bleating_VBG ones_NNS ."_. In_IN Southern_JJ India_NNP wives_NNS believe_VBP that_IN to_TO tell_VB
their_PRP$ husband_NN '_'' s_VBZ name_NN or_CC to_TO pronounce_VB it_PRP even_RB in_IN a_DT dream_NN would_MD bring_VB
him_PRP to_TO an_DT untimely_JJ end_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Sea_NNP Dyaks_NNP a_DT man_NN may_MD not_RB pronounce_VB
the_DT name_NN of_IN his_PRP$ father-in_JJ -_: law_NN or_CC mother-in_NN -_: law_NN without_IN incurring_VBG the_DT
wrath_NN of_IN the_DT spirits_NNS ._. And_CC since_IN he_PRP reckons_VBZ as_IN his_PRP$ father-in_NN -_: law_NN and_CC
mother-in_NN -_: law_NN not_RB only_RB the_DT father_NN and_CC mother_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ wife_NN ,_, but_CC
also_RB the_DT fathers_NNS and_CC mothers_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ brothers_NNS '_POS wives_NNS and_CC sisters_NNS '_POS
husbands_NNS ,_, and_CC likewise_RB the_DT fathers_NNS and_CC mothers_NNS of_IN all_DT his_PRP$ cousins_NNS ,_,
the_DT number_NN of_IN tabooed_JJ names_NNS may_MD be_VB very_RB considerable_JJ and_CC the_DT
opportunities_NNS of_IN error_NN correspondingly_RB numerous_JJ ._. To_TO make_VB confusion_NN
worse_JJR confounded_VBN ,_, the_DT names_NNS of_IN persons_NNS are_VBP often_RB the_DT names_NNS of_IN common_JJ
things_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN moon_NN ,_, bridge_NN ,_, barley_NN ,_, cobra_NN ,_, leopard_NN ;_: so_RB that_IN when_WRB
any_DT of_IN a_DT man_NN '_POS s_VBZ many_JJ fathers-in_NN -_: law_NN and_CC mothers-in_NN -_: law_NN are_VBP called_VBN by_IN
such_JJ names_NNS ,_, these_DT common_JJ words_NNS may_MD not_RB pass_VB his_PRP$ lips_NNS ._. Among_IN the_DT
Alfoors_NNP of_IN Minahassa_NNP ,_, in_IN Celebes_NNP ,_, the_DT custom_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN still_RB
further_RB so_RB as_IN to_TO forbid_VB the_DT use_NN even_RB of_IN words_NNS which_WDT merely_RB resemble_VBP
the_DT personal_JJ names_NNS in_IN sound_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ especially_RB the_DT name_NN of_IN a_DT
father-in_JJ -_: law_NN which_WDT is_VBZ thus_RB laid_VBN under_IN an_DT interdict_NN ._. If_IN he_PRP ,_, for_IN
example_NN ,_, is_VBZ called_VBN Kalala_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ son-in_NN -_: law_NN may_MD not_RB speak_VB of_IN a_DT horse_NN
by_IN its_PRP$ common_JJ name_NN kawalo_NN ;_: he_PRP must_MD call_VB it_PRP a_DT "_`` riding-beast_JJ "_''
(_-LRB- sasakajan_NN )._, So_RB among_IN the_DT Alfoors_NNP of_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Buru_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ
taboo_NN to_TO mention_VB the_DT names_NNS of_IN parents_NNS and_CC parents-in_JJ -_: law_NN ,_, or_CC even_RB to_TO
speak_VB of_IN common_JJ objects_NNS by_IN words_NNS which_WDT resemble_VBP these_DT names_NNS in_IN
sound_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, if_IN your_PRP$ mother-in_FW -_: law_NN is_VBZ called_VBN Dalu_NNP ,_, which_WDT means_VBZ
"_`` betel_VB ,"_, you_PRP may_MD not_RB ask_VB for_IN betel_NN by_IN its_PRP$ ordinary_JJ name_NN ,_, you_PRP must_MD

island_NN it_PRP is_VBZ also_RB taboo_JJ to_TO mention_VB the_DT name_NN of_IN an_DT elder_JJR brother_NN in_IN
his_PRP$ presence_NN ._. Transgressions_NNS of_IN these_DT rules_NNS are_VBP punished_VBN with_IN fines_NNS ._.
In_IN Sunda_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN that_IN a_DT particular_JJ crop_NN would_MD be_VB spoilt_VBN if_IN a_DT
man_NN were_VBD to_TO mention_VB the_DT names_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ father_NN and_CC mother_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT Nufoors_NNP of_IN Dutch_NNP New_NNP Guinea_NNP persons_NNS who_WP are_VBP related_VBN to_TO
each_DT other_JJ by_IN marriage_NN are_VBP forbidden_VBN to_TO mention_VB each_DT other_JJ '_POS s_PRP names_NNS ._.
Among_IN the_DT connexions_NNS whose_WP$ names_NNS are_VBP thus_RB tabooed_VBN are_VBP wife_NN ,_,

her_PRP$ grand-uncles_NNS and_CC grand-aunts_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT whole_NN of_IN your_PRP$ wife_NN '_'' s_PRP or_CC

that_DT men_NNS may_MD mention_VB the_DT names_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ brothers-in_NN -_: law_NN ,_, though_IN

scrupulously_RB avoided_VBN and_CC other_JJ words_NNS used_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ place_NN ._. If_IN it_PRP
should_MD chance_VB that_IN a_DT person_NN has_VBZ inadvertently_RB uttered_VBN a_DT forbidden_VBN

in_IN order_NN that_IN I_PRP may_MD eat_VB well_RB ."_.

In_IN the_DT western_JJ islands_NNS of_IN Torres_NNP Straits_NNS a_DT man_NN never_RB mentioned_VBD the_DT

A_DT brother-in_NN -_: law_NN might_MD be_VB spoken_VBN of_IN as_IN the_DT husband_NN or_CC brother_NN of_IN

other_JJ '_POS s_PRP names_NNS ._. And_CC not_RB only_RB are_VBP all_PDT these_DT persons_NNS forbidden_VBN to_TO utter_JJ

The_DT reluctance_NN to_TO mention_VB the_DT names_NNS or_CC even_RB syllables_NNS of_IN the_DT names_NNS

and_CC kings_NNS ;_: and_CC if_IN the_DT reticence_NN as_IN to_TO these_DT latter_JJ names_NNS springs_NNS

the_DT similar_JJ usage_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ and_CC of_IN royal_JJ
personages_NNS ._.



3._CD Names_NNS of_IN the_DT Dead_NNP tabooed_.

THE_DT CUSTOM_NNP of_IN abstaining_VBG from_IN all_DT mention_NN of_IN the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ
was_VBD observed_VBN in_IN antiquity_NN by_IN the_DT Albanians_NNS of_IN the_DT Caucasus_NNP ,_, and_CC at_IN
the_DT present_JJ day_NN it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN full_JJ force_NN among_IN many_JJ savage_JJ tribes_NNS ._. Thus_RB
we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT customs_NNS most_RBS rigidly_RB observed_VBN and_CC
enforced_VBN amongst_IN the_DT Australian_JJ aborigines_NNS is_VBZ never_RB to_TO mention_VB the_DT
name_NN of_IN a_DT deceased_JJ person_NN ,_, whether_IN male_JJ or_CC female_JJ ;_: to_TO name_VB aloud_RB one_CD
who_WP has_VBZ departed_VBN this_DT life_NN would_MD be_VB a_DT gross_JJ violation_NN of_IN their_PRP$ most_RBS
sacred_JJ prejudices_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP carefully_RB abstain_RB from_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT chief_NN
motive_NN for_IN this_DT abstinence_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB a_DT fear_NN of_IN evoking_VBG the_DT
ghost_NN ,_, although_IN the_DT natural_JJ unwillingness_NN to_TO revive_VB past_JJ sorrows_NNS
undoubtedly_RB operates_VBZ also_RB to_TO draw_VB the_DT veil_NN of_IN oblivion_NN over_IN the_DT
names_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._. Once_RB Mr_NNP ._. Oldfield_NNP so_RB terrified_VBN a_DT native_NN by_IN
shouting_VBG out_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN a_DT deceased_JJ person_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT man_NN fairly_RB took_VBD
to_TO his_PRP$ heels_NNS and_CC did_VBD not_RB venture_NN to_TO show_VB himself_PRP again_RB for_IN several_JJ
days_NNS ._. At_IN their_PRP$ next_JJ meeting_NN he_PRP bitterly_RB reproached_VBD the_DT rash_JJ white_JJ
man_NN for_IN his_PRP$ indiscretion_NN ;_: "_`` nor_CC could_MD I_PRP ,"_IN adds_VBZ Mr_NNP ._. Oldfield_NNP ,_, "_'' induce_VB
him_PRP by_IN any_DT means_NNS to_TO utter_JJ the_DT awful_JJ sound_NN of_IN a_DT dead_JJ man_NN '_'' s_VBZ name_NN ,_, for_IN
by_IN so_RB doing_VBG he_PRP would_MD have_VB placed_VBN himself_PRP in_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN the_DT malign_NN
spirits_NNS ."_VBP Among_IN the_DT aborigines_NNS of_IN Victoria_NNP the_DT dead_JJ were_VBD very_RB rarely_RB
spoken_VBN of_IN ,_, and_CC then_RB never_RB by_IN their_PRP$ names_NNS ;_: they_PRP were_VBD referred_VBN to_TO in_IN a_DT
subdued_VBN voice_NN as_IN "_`` the_DT lost_JJ one_CD "_`` or_CC "_`` the_DT poor_JJ fellow_NN that_WDT is_VBZ no_RB
more_RBR ."_JJ To_TO speak_VB of_IN them_PRP by_IN name_NN would_MD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD supposed_VBN ,_, excite_RB the_DT
malignity_NN of_IN Couit-gil_NNP ,_, the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT departed_VBN ,_, which_WDT hovers_VBZ on_IN
earth_NN for_IN a_DT time_NN before_IN it_PRP departs_VBZ for_IN ever_RB towards_IN the_DT setting_VBG sun_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT tribes_NNS on_IN the_DT Lower_NNP Murray_NNP River_NNP we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN when_WRB a_DT
person_NN dies_VBZ "_`` they_PRP carefully_RB avoid_VB mentioning_VBG his_PRP$ name_NN ;_: but_CC if_IN
compelled_VBN to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, they_PRP pronounce_VBP it_PRP in_IN a_DT very_RB low_JJ whisper_NN ,_, so_RB
faint_JJ that_IN they_PRP imagine_VBP the_DT spirit_NN cannot_MD hear_VB their_PRP$ voice_NN ."_RB Amongst_IN
the_DT tribes_NNS of_IN Central_NNP Australia_NNP no_DT one_NN may_MD utter_JJ the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT
deceased_VBN during_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN mourning_VBG ,_, unless_IN it_PRP is_VBZ absolutely_RB
necessary_JJ to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB done_VBN in_IN a_DT whisper_NN for_IN fear_NN
of_IN disturbing_JJ and_CC annoying_VBG the_DT man_NN '_POS s_PRP spirit_NN which_WDT is_VBZ walking_VBG about_IN
in_IN ghostly_JJ form_NN ._. If_IN the_DT ghost_NN hears_VBZ his_PRP$ name_NN mentioned_VBD he_PRP concludes_VBZ
that_IN his_PRP$ kinsfolk_NN are_VBP not_RB mourning_VBG for_IN him_PRP properly_RB ;_: if_IN their_PRP$ grief_NN
were_VBD genuine_JJ they_PRP could_MD not_RB bear_VB to_TO bandy_VB his_PRP$ name_NN about_RB ._. Touched_JJ to_TO
the_DT quick_JJ by_IN their_PRP$ hard-hearted_JJ indifference_NN the_DT indignant_JJ ghost_NN
will_MD come_VB and_CC trouble_VB them_PRP in_IN dreams_NNS ._.

The_DT same_JJ reluctance_NN to_TO utter_JJ the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ appears_VBZ to_TO
prevail_VB among_IN all_DT the_DT Indian_NNP tribes_NNS of_IN America_NNP from_IN Hudson_NNP '_POS s_PRP Bay_NNP
Territory_NNP to_TO Patagonia_NNP ._. Among_IN the_DT Goajiros_NNP of_IN Colombia_NNP to_TO mention_VB
the_DT dead_JJ before_IN his_PRP$ kinsmen_NNS is_VBZ a_DT dreadful_JJ offence_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ often_RB
punished_VBN with_IN death_NN ;_: for_IN if_IN it_PRP happens_VBZ on_IN the_DT rancho_NN of_IN the_DT
deceased_JJ ,_, in_IN presence_NN of_IN his_PRP$ nephew_NN or_CC uncle_NN ,_, they_PRP will_MD assuredly_RB
kill_VB the_DT offender_NN on_IN the_DT spot_NN if_IN they_PRP can_MD ._. But_CC if_IN he_PRP escapes_VBZ ,_, the_DT
penalty_NN resolves_VBZ itself_PRP into_IN a_DT heavy_JJ fine_NN ,_, usually_RB of_IN two_CD or_CC more_RBR
oxen_NNS ._.

A_DT similar_JJ reluctance_NN to_TO mention_VB the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN of_IN
peoples_NNS so_RB widely_RB separated_VBN from_IN each_DT other_JJ as_IN the_DT Samoyeds_NNS of_IN
Siberia_NNP and_CC the_DT Todas_NNP of_IN Southern_NNP India_NNP ;_: the_DT Mongols_NNP of_IN Tartary_NNP and_CC
the_DT Tuaregs_NNP of_IN the_DT Sahara_NNP ;_: the_DT Ainos_NNS of_IN Japan_NNP and_CC the_DT Akamba_NNP and_CC
Nandi_NNP of_IN Eastern_NNP Africa_NNP ;_: the_DT Tinguianes_NNP of_IN the_DT Philippines_NNPS and_CC the_DT
inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT Nicobar_NNP Islands_NNP ,_, of_IN Borneo_NNP ,_, of_IN Madagascar_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN
Tasmania_NNP ._. In_IN all_DT cases_NNS ,_, even_RB where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB expressly_RB stated_VBN ,_, the_DT
fundamental_JJ reason_NN for_IN this_DT avoidance_NN is_VBZ probably_RB the_DT fear_NN of_IN the_DT
ghost_NN ._. That_IN this_DT is_VBZ the_DT real_JJ motive_NN with_IN the_DT Tuaregs_NNS we_PRP are_VBP
positively_RB informed_VBN ._. They_PRP dread_NN the_DT return_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ man_NN '_POS s_PRP spirit_NN ,_,
and_CC do_VBP all_DT they_PRP can_MD to_TO avoid_VB it_PRP by_IN shifting_VBG their_PRP$ camp_NN after_IN a_DT
death_NN ,_, ceasing_VBG for_IN ever_RB to_TO pronounce_VB the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT departed_VBN ,_, and_CC
eschewing_VBG everything_NN that_WDT might_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN an_DT evocation_NN or_CC
recall_NN of_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN ._. Hence_RB they_PRP do_VBP not_RB ,_, like_IN the_DT Arabs_NNPS ,_, designate_VB
individuals_NNS by_IN adding_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ personal_JJ names_NNS the_DT names_NNS of_IN their_PRP$
fathers_NNS ;_: they_PRP never_RB speak_VBP of_IN So-and_NNP -_: so_RB ,_, son_NN of_IN So-and_NNP -_: so_RB ;_: they_PRP give_VBP
to_TO every_DT man_NN a_DT name_NN which_WDT will_MD live_VB and_CC die_VB with_IN him_PRP ._. So_RB among_IN some_DT
of_IN the_DT Victorian_JJ tribes_NNS in_IN Australia_NNP personal_JJ names_NNS were_VBD rarely_RB
perpetuated_VBN ,_, because_IN the_DT natives_NNS believed_VBD that_IN any_DT one_NN who_WP adopted_VBD
the_DT name_NN of_IN a_DT deceased_JJ person_NN would_MD not_RB live_VB long_RB ;_: probably_RB his_PRP$
ghostly_RB namesake_NN was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO come_VB and_CC fetch_VB him_PRP away_RB to_TO the_DT
spirit-land_NN ._.

The_DT same_JJ fear_NN of_IN the_DT ghost_NN ,_, which_WDT moves_VBZ people_NNS to_TO suppress_VB his_PRP$ old_JJ
name_NN ,_, naturally_RB leads_VBZ all_DT persons_NNS who_WP bear_VBP a_DT similar_JJ name_NN to_TO
exchange_NN it_PRP for_IN another_DT ,_, lest_IN its_PRP$ utterance_NN should_MD attract_VB the_DT
attention_NN of_IN the_DT ghost_NN ,_, who_WP cannot_MD reasonably_RB be_VB expected_VBN to_TO
discriminate_NN between_IN all_PDT the_DT different_JJ applications_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ
name_NN ._. Thus_RB we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN in_IN the_DT Adelaide_NNP and_CC Encounter_NNP Bay_NNP tribes_NNS
of_IN South_NNP Australia_NNP the_DT repugnance_NN to_TO mentioning_VBG the_DT names_NNS of_IN those_DT
who_WP have_VBP died_VBN lately_RB is_VBZ carried_VBN so_RB far_RB ,_, that_IN persons_NNS who_WP bear_VBP the_DT
same_JJ name_NN as_IN the_DT deceased_JJ abandon_NN it_PRP ,_, and_CC either_DT adopt_VBP temporary_JJ
names_NNS or_CC are_VBP known_VBN by_IN any_DT others_NNS that_WDT happen_VBP to_TO belong_VB to_TO them_PRP ._. A_DT
similar_JJ custom_NN prevails_VBZ among_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Queensland_NNP tribes_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT
prohibition_NN to_TO use_VB the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_NN is_VBZ not_RB permanent_JJ ,_, though_IN it_PRP
may_MD last_VB for_IN many_JJ years_NNS ._. In_IN some_DT Australian_JJ tribes_NNS the_DT change_NN of_IN
name_NN thus_RB brought_VBD about_RB is_VBZ permanent_JJ ;_: the_DT old_JJ name_NN is_VBZ laid_VBN aside_RB for_IN
ever_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT man_NN is_VBZ known_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ new_JJ name_NN for_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ,_,
or_CC at_IN least_JJS until_IN he_PRP is_VBZ obliged_VBN to_TO change_VB it_PRP again_RB for_IN a_DT like_JJ
reason_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT North_NNP American_NNP Indians_NNPS all_DT persons_NNS ,_, whether_IN men_NNS or_CC
women_NNS ,_, who_WP bore_VBD the_DT name_NN of_IN one_NN who_WP had_VBD just_RB died_VBN were_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO
abandon_VB it_PRP and_CC to_TO adopt_VB other_JJ names_NNS ,_, which_WDT was_VBD formally_RB done_VBN at_IN the_DT
first_JJ ceremony_NN of_IN mourning_VBG for_IN the_DT dead_NN ._. In_IN some_DT tribes_NNS to_TO the_DT east_JJ
of_IN the_DT Rocky_NNP Mountains_NNPS this_DT change_NN of_IN name_NN lasted_VBD only_RB during_IN the_DT
season_NN of_IN mourning_VBG ,_, but_CC in_IN other_JJ tribes_NNS on_IN the_DT Pacific_NNP Coast_NNP of_IN
North_NNP America_NNP it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN permanent_JJ ._.

Sometimes_RB by_IN an_DT extension_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ reasoning_NN all_DT the_DT near_JJ
relations_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ change_NN their_PRP$ names_NNS ,_, whatever_WDT they_PRP may_MD
happen_VB to_TO be_VB ,_, doubtless_RB from_IN a_DT fear_NN that_IN the_DT sound_NN of_IN the_DT familiar_JJ
names_NNS might_MD lure_VB back_RP the_DT vagrant_NN spirit_NN to_TO its_PRP$ old_JJ home_NN ._. Thus_RB in_IN
some_DT Victorian_JJ tribes_NNS the_DT ordinary_JJ names_NNS of_IN all_DT the_DT next_JJ of_IN kin_NN were_VBD
disused_VBN during_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN mourning_VBG ,_, and_CC certain_JJ general_JJ terms_NNS ,_,
prescribed_VBN by_IN custom_NN ,_, were_VBD substituted_VBN for_IN them_PRP ._. To_TO call_VB a_DT mourner_NN
by_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ name_NN was_VBD considered_VBN an_DT insult_NN to_TO the_DT departed_VBN ,_, and_CC often_RB
led_VBN to_TO fighting_VBG and_CC bloodshed_VBD ._. Among_IN Indian_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN North-western_JJ
America_NNP near_IN relations_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ often_RB change_VBP their_PRP$ names_NNS
"_`` under_IN an_DT impression_NN that_IN spirits_NNS will_MD be_VB attracted_VBN back_RB to_TO earth_NN if_IN
they_PRP hear_VBP familiar_JJ names_NNS often_RB repeated_VBD ."_RB Among_IN the_DT Kiowa_NNP Indians_NNPS

take_VB new_JJ names_NNS ._. This_DT custom_NN was_VBD noted_VBN by_IN Raleigh_NNP '_POS s_PRP colonists_NNS on_IN

survivors_NNS change_VBP their_PRP$ names_NNS also_RB ._. They_PRP say_VBP that_IN Death_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN
among_IN them_PRP and_CC has_VBZ carried_VBN off_RP a_DT list_NN of_IN the_DT living_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP
will_MD soon_RB come_VB back_RB for_IN more_JJR victims_NNS ;_: hence_RB in_IN order_NN to_TO defeat_VB his_PRP$
fell_VBD purpose_NN they_PRP change_VBP their_PRP$ names_NNS ,_, believing_VBG that_IN on_IN his_PRP$ return_NN

ghost_NN is_VBZ unable_JJ to_TO recognise_VB them_PRP ._.

Further_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ happens_VBZ to_TO be_VB that_IN of_IN some_DT

4._CD Names_NNS of_IN Kings_NNP and_CC other_JJ Sacred_NNP Persons_NNPS tabooed_.

WHEN_WRB we_PRP see_VBP that_IN in_IN primitive_JJ society_NN the_DT names_NNS of_IN mere_JJ commoners_NNS ,_,
whether_IN alive_JJ or_CC dead_JJ ,_, are_VBP matters_NNS of_IN such_JJ anxious_JJ care_NN ,_, we_PRP need_VBP not_RB
be_VB surprised_VBN that_IN great_JJ precautions_NNS should_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO guard_VB from_IN
harm_NN the_DT names_NNS of_IN sacred_JJ kings_NNS and_CC priests_NNS ._. Thus_RB the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT
king_NN of_IN Dahomey_NNP is_VBZ always_RB kept_VBN secret_JJ ,_, lest_IN the_DT knowledge_NN of_IN it_PRP
should_MD enable_VB some_DT evil-minded_JJ person_NN to_TO do_VB him_PRP a_DT mischief_NN ._. The_DT
appellations_NNS by_IN which_WDT the_DT different_JJ kings_NNS of_IN Dahomey_NNP have_VBP been_VBN known_VBN
to_TO Europeans_NNS are_VBP not_RB their_PRP$ true_JJ names_NNS ,_, but_CC mere_JJ titles_NNS ,_, or_CC what_WP the_DT
natives_NNS call_VBP "_`` strong_JJ names_NNS ."_IN The_DT natives_NNS seem_VBP to_TO think_VB that_IN no_DT harm_NN
comes_VBZ of_IN such_JJ titles_NNS being_VBG known_VBN ,_, since_IN they_PRP are_VBP not_RB ,_, like_IN the_DT
birth-names_NNS ,_, vitally_RB connected_VBN with_IN their_PRP$ owners_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT Galla_NNP
kingdom_NN of_IN Ghera_NNP the_DT birth-name_NN of_IN the_DT sovereign_NN may_MD not_RB be_VB
pronounced_VBN by_IN a_DT subject_NN under_IN pain_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, and_CC common_JJ words_NNS which_WDT
resemble_VB it_PRP in_IN sound_NN are_VBP changed_VBN for_IN others_NNS ._. Among_IN the_DT Bahima_NNP of_IN
Central_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT king_NN dies_VBZ ,_, his_PRP$ name_NN is_VBZ abolished_VBN from_IN the_DT
language_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN his_PRP$ name_NN was_VBD that_IN of_IN an_DT animal_NN ,_, a_DT new_JJ appellation_NN
must_MD be_VB found_VBN for_IN the_DT creature_NN at_IN once_RB ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT king_NN is_VBZ
often_RB called_VBD a_DT lion_NN ;_: hence_RB at_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT king_NN named_VBN Lion_NNP a_DT new_JJ
name_NN for_IN lions_NNS in_IN general_JJ has_VBZ to_TO be_VB coined_VBN ._. In_IN Siam_NNP it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB
difficult_JJ to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT king_NN '_'' s_PRP real_JJ name_NN ,_, since_IN it_PRP was_VBD carefully_RB
kept_VBD secret_JJ from_IN fear_NN of_IN sorcery_NN ;_: any_DT one_NN who_WP mentioned_VBD it_PRP was_VBD

supreme_JJ ,"_, "_'' the_DT great_JJ emperor_NN ,"_, "_`` descendant_NN of_IN the_DT angels_NNS ,"_, and_CC so_RB
on_IN ._. In_IN Burma_NNP it_PRP was_VBD accounted_VBN an_DT impiety_NN of_IN the_DT deepest_JJS dye_NN to_TO

his_PRP$ royal_JJ titles_NNS only_RB ._.

Among_IN the_DT Zulus_NNP no_DT man_NN will_MD mention_VB the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT chief_NN of_IN his_PRP$

In_IN Madagascar_NNP a_DT similar_JJ custom_NN everywhere_RB prevails_VBZ and_CC has_VBZ resulted_VBN ,_,

But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB merely_RB the_DT names_NNS of_IN living_VBG kings_NNS and_CC chiefs_NNS which_WDT are_VBP

The_DT sanctity_NN attributed_VBD to_TO the_DT persons_NNS of_IN chiefs_NNS in_IN Polynesia_NNP

In_IN ancient_JJ Greece_NNP the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT priests_NNS and_CC other_JJ high_JJ officials_NNS

5._CD Names_NNS of_IN Gods_NNP tabooed_.

PRIMITIVE_JJ man_NN creates_VBZ his_PRP$ gods_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ image_NN ._. Xenophanes_NNS remarked_VBD
long_RB ago_RB that_IN the_DT complexion_NN of_IN negro_NN gods_NNS was_VBD black_JJ and_CC their_PRP$ noses_NNS
flat_JJ ;_: that_IN Thracian_DT gods_NNS were_VBD ruddy_JJ and_CC blue-eyed_JJ ;_: and_CC that_IN if_IN
horses_NNS ,_, oxen_NNS ,_, and_CC lions_NNS only_RB believed_VBD in_IN gods_NNS and_CC had_VBD hands_NNS
wherewith_IN to_TO portray_VB them_PRP ,_, they_PRP would_MD doubtless_RB fashion_VB their_PRP$
deities_NNS in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN horses_NNS ,_, and_CC oxen_NNS ,_, and_CC lions_NNS ._. Hence_RB just_RB as_IN
the_DT furtive_JJ savage_JJ conceals_NNS his_PRP$ real_JJ name_NN because_IN he_PRP fears_VBZ that_IN
sorcerers_NNS might_MD make_VB an_DT evil_JJ use_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, so_RB he_PRP fancies_VBZ that_IN his_PRP$ gods_NNS
must_MD likewise_RB keep_VB their_PRP$ true_JJ name_NN secret_JJ ,_, lest_IN other_JJ gods_NNS or_CC even_RB
men_NNS should_MD learn_VB the_DT mystic_JJ sounds_NNS and_CC thus_RB be_VB able_JJ to_TO conjure_VB with_IN
them_PRP ._. Nowhere_RB was_VBD this_DT crude_JJ conception_NN of_IN the_DT secrecy_NN and_CC magical_JJ
virtue_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ name_NN more_RBR firmly_RB held_VBN or_CC more_RBR fully_RB developed_VBN
than_IN in_IN ancient_JJ Egypt_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT superstitions_NNS of_IN a_DT dateless_JJ past_NN
were_VBD embalmed_VBN in_IN the_DT hearts_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS hardly_RB less_RBR effectually_RB
than_IN the_DT bodies_NNS of_IN cats_NNS and_CC crocodiles_NNS and_CC the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ
menagerie_NN in_IN their_PRP$ rock-cut_JJ tombs_NNS ._. The_DT conception_NN is_VBZ well_RB
illustrated_VBN by_IN a_DT story_NN which_WDT tells_VBZ how_WRB the_DT subtle_JJ Isis_NNP wormed_VBD his_PRP$
secret_JJ name_NN from_IN Ra_NNP ,_, the_DT great_JJ Egyptian_JJ god_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN ._. Isis_NNP ,_, so_RB
runs_VBZ the_DT tale_NN ,_, was_VBD a_DT woman_NN mighty_RB in_IN words_NNS ,_, and_CC she_PRP was_VBD weary_JJ of_IN the_DT
world_NN of_IN men_NNS ,_, and_CC yearned_JJ after_IN the_DT world_NN of_IN the_DT gods_NNS ._. And_CC she_PRP
meditated_VBN in_IN her_PRP$ heart_NN ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_'' Cannot_NNP I_PRP by_IN virtue_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ
name_NN of_IN Ra_NNP make_VBP myself_PRP a_DT goddess_NN and_CC reign_NN like_IN him_PRP in_IN heaven_NN and_CC
earth_NN ?"_NN For_IN Ra_NNP had_VBD many_JJ names_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT great_JJ name_NN which_WDT gave_VBD him_PRP all_DT
power_NN over_IN gods_NNS and_CC men_NNS was_VBD known_VBN to_TO none_NN but_CC himself_PRP ._. Now_RB the_DT god_NN
was_VBD by_IN this_DT time_NN grown_JJ old_JJ ;_: he_PRP slobbered_VBD at_IN the_DT mouth_NN and_CC his_PRP$
spittle_NN fell_VBD upon_IN the_DT ground_NN ._. So_IN Isis_NNP gathered_VBD up_RP the_DT spittle_NN and_CC
the_DT earth_NN with_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC kneaded_VBD thereof_, a_DT serpent_NN and_CC laid_VBD it_PRP in_IN the_DT
path_NN where_WRB the_DT great_JJ god_NN passed_VBD every_DT day_NN to_TO his_PRP$ double_JJ kingdom_NN
after_IN his_PRP$ heart_NN '_POS s_VBZ desire_NN ._. And_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD forth_RB according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$
wont_NN ,_, attended_VBN by_IN all_DT his_PRP$ company_NN of_IN gods_NNS ,_, the_DT sacred_JJ serpent_NN stung_VBN
him_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT god_NN opened_VBD his_PRP$ mouth_NN and_CC cried_VBD ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ cry_NN went_VBD up_RB to_TO
heaven_NN ._. And_CC the_DT company_NN of_IN gods_NNS cried_VBD ,_, "_`` What_WP aileth_VBZ thee_DT ?"_NN and_CC the_DT
gods_NNS shouted_VBD ,_, "_`` Lo_VB and_CC behold_VB !"_NNP But_CC he_PRP could_MD not_RB answer_VB ;_: his_PRP$ jaws_NNS
rattled_VBN ,_, his_PRP$ limbs_NNS shook_VBD ,_, the_DT poison_NN ran_VBD through_IN his_PRP$ flesh_NN as_IN the_DT
Nile_NNP floweth_VBZ over_IN the_DT land_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT great_JJ god_NN had_VBD stilled_VBN his_PRP$
heart_NN ,_, he_PRP cried_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ followers_NNS ,_, "_`` Come_VB to_TO me_PRP ,_, O_UH my_PRP$ children_NNS ,_,
offspring_NN of_IN my_PRP$ body_NN ._. I_PRP am_VBP a_DT prince_NN ,_, the_DT son_NN of_IN a_DT prince_NN ,_, the_DT divine_JJ
seed_NN of_IN a_DT god_NN ._. My_PRP$ father_NN devised_VBD my_PRP$ name_NN ;_: my_PRP$ father_NN and_CC my_PRP$ mother_NN
gave_VBD me_PRP my_PRP$ name_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP remained_VBD hidden_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ body_NN since_IN my_PRP$ birth_NN ,_,
that_IN no_DT magician_NN might_MD have_VB magic_JJ power_NN over_IN me_PRP ._. I_PRP went_VBD out_RB to_TO
behold_NN that_IN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP made_VBN ,_, I_PRP walked_VBD in_IN the_DT two_CD lands_NNS which_WDT I_PRP
have_VB created_VBN ,_, and_CC lo_NN !_. something_NN stung_VBD me_PRP ._. What_WP it_PRP was_VBD ,_, I_PRP know_VBP not_RB ._.
Was_VBD it_PRP fire_NN ?_. was_VBD it_PRP water_NN ?_. My_PRP$ heart_NN is_VBZ on_IN fire_NN ,_, my_PRP$ flesh_NN trembleth_RB ,_,
all_DT my_PRP$ limbs_NNS do_VBP quake_NN ._. Bring_VB me_PRP the_DT children_NNS of_IN the_DT gods_NNS with_IN
healing_VBG words_NNS and_CC understanding_VBG lips_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ power_NN reacheth_VBZ to_TO
heaven_NN ."_NN Then_RB came_VBD to_TO him_PRP the_DT children_NNS of_IN the_DT gods_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD
very_RB sorrowful_JJ ._. And_CC Isis_NNP came_VBD with_IN her_PRP$ craft_NN ,_, whose_WP$ mouth_NN is_VBZ full_JJ of_IN

The_DT holy_JJ god_NN opened_VBD his_PRP$ mouth_NN ,_, he_PRP spake_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, "_`` I_PRP went_VBD upon_IN my_PRP$

Then_RB said_VBD Isis_NNP to_TO him_PRP ,_, "_`` That_DT was_VBD not_RB thy_JJ name_NN that_WDT thou_VBD spakest_NN unto_IN

From_IN this_DT story_NN it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN the_DT real_JJ name_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT

When_WRB once_RB a_DT god_NN in_IN a_DT moment_NN of_IN weakness_NN or_CC forgetfulness_NN had_VBN

The_DT belief_NN in_IN the_DT magic_JJ virtue_NN of_IN divine_JJ names_NNS was_VBD shared_VBN by_IN the_DT
Romans_NNS ._. When_WRB they_PRP sat_VBD down_RP before_IN a_DT city_NN ,_, the_DT priests_NNS addressed_VBD the_DT

the_DT names_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ communal_NN villages_NNS secret_JJ from_IN motives_NNS of_IN
superstition_NN ._.

If_IN the_DT reader_NN has_VBZ had_VBN the_DT patience_NN to_TO follow_VB this_DT examination_NN of_IN the_DT

XXIII_NN ._. Our_PRP$ Debt_NN to_TO the_DT Savage_NNP

IT_PRP would_MD be_VB easy_JJ to_TO extend_VB the_DT list_NN of_IN royal_JJ and_CC priestly_RB taboos_NNS ,_,
but_CC the_DT instances_NNS collected_VBN in_IN the_DT preceding_VBG pages_NNS may_MD suffice_VB as_IN
specimens_NNS ._. To_TO conclude_VB this_DT part_NN of_IN our_PRP$ subject_NN it_PRP only_RB remains_VBZ to_TO
state_NN summarily_RB the_DT general_JJ conclusions_NNS to_TO which_WDT our_PRP$ enquiries_NNS have_VBP
thus_RB far_RB conducted_VBN us_PRP ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN in_IN savage_JJ or_CC barbarous_JJ
society_NN there_EX are_VBP often_RB found_VBN men_NNS to_TO whom_WP the_DT superstition_NN of_IN their_PRP$
fellows_NNS ascribes_VBZ a_DT controlling_VBG influence_NN over_IN the_DT general_JJ course_NN of_IN
nature_NN ._. Such_JJ men_NNS are_VBP accordingly_RB adored_VBN and_CC treated_VBN as_IN gods_NNS ._. Whether_IN
these_DT human_JJ divinities_NNS also_RB hold_VBP temporal_JJ sway_NN over_IN the_DT lives_NNS and_CC
fortunes_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ adorers_NNS ,_, or_CC whether_IN their_PRP$ functions_NNS are_VBP purely_RB
spiritual_JJ and_CC supernatural_JJ ,_, in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, whether_IN they_PRP are_VBP kings_NNS
as_RB well_RB as_IN gods_NNS or_CC only_RB the_DT latter_JJ ,_, is_VBZ a_DT distinction_NN which_WDT hardly_RB
concerns_NNS us_PRP here_RB ._. Their_PRP$ supposed_VBN divinity_NN is_VBZ the_DT essential_JJ fact_NN with_IN
which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP to_TO deal_VB ._. In_IN virtue_NN of_IN it_PRP they_PRP are_VBP a_DT pledge_NN and_CC
guarantee_NN to_TO their_PRP$ worshippers_NNS of_IN the_DT continuance_NN and_CC orderly_JJ
succession_NN of_IN those_DT physical_JJ phenomena_NNS upon_IN which_WDT mankind_NN depends_VBZ
for_IN subsistence_NN ._. Naturally_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, the_DT life_NN and_CC health_NN of_IN such_JJ a_DT
god-man_NN are_VBP matters_NNS of_IN anxious_JJ concern_NN to_TO the_DT people_NNS whose_WP$ welfare_NN
and_CC even_RB existence_NN are_VBP bound_VBN up_RP with_IN his_PRP$ ;_: naturally_RB he_PRP is_VBZ
constrained_VBN by_IN them_PRP to_TO conform_VB to_TO such_JJ rules_NNS as_IN the_DT wit_NN of_IN early_JJ man_NN
has_VBZ devised_VBN for_IN averting_VBG the_DT ills_NNS to_TO which_WDT flesh_NN is_VBZ heir_NN ,_, including_VBG
the_DT last_JJ ill_JJ ,_, death_NN ._. These_DT rules_NNS ,_, as_IN an_DT examination_NN of_IN them_PRP has_VBZ
shown_VBN ,_, are_VBP nothing_NN but_CC the_DT maxims_NNS with_IN which_WDT ,_, on_IN the_DT primitive_JJ view_NN ,_,
every_DT man_NN of_IN common_JJ prudence_NN must_MD comply_VB if_IN he_PRP would_MD live_VB long_RB in_IN
the_DT land_NN ._. But_CC while_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ men_NNS the_DT observance_NN of_IN
the_DT rules_NNS is_VBZ left_VBN to_TO the_DT choice_NN of_IN the_DT individual_JJ ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN
the_DT god-man_NN it_PRP is_VBZ enforced_VBN under_IN penalty_NN of_IN dismissal_NN from_IN his_PRP$ high_JJ
station_NN ,_, or_CC even_RB of_IN death_NN ._. For_IN his_PRP$ worshippers_NNS have_VBP far_RB too_RB great_JJ a_DT
stake_NN in_IN his_PRP$ life_NN to_TO allow_VB him_PRP to_TO play_VB fast_JJ and_CC loose_JJ with_IN it_PRP ._.
Therefore_RB all_DT the_DT quaint_JJ superstitions_NNS ,_, the_DT old-world_NN maxims_NNS ,_, the_DT
venerable_JJ saws_NNS which_WDT the_DT ingenuity_NN of_IN savage_JJ philosophers_NNS elaborated_VBN
long_RB ago_RB ,_, and_CC which_WDT old_JJ women_NNS at_IN chimney_NN corners_NNS still_RB impart_RB as_IN
treasures_NNS of_IN great_JJ price_NN to_TO their_PRP$ descendants_NNS gathered_VBD round_IN the_DT
cottage_NN fire_NN on_IN winter_NN evenings_NNS --_: all_DT these_DT antique_JJ fancies_NNS
clustered_VBN ,_, all_PDT these_DT cobwebs_NNS of_IN the_DT brain_NN were_VBD spun_VBN about_IN the_DT path_NN
of_IN the_DT old_JJ king_NN ,_, the_DT human_JJ god_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, immeshed_VBD in_IN them_PRP like_IN a_DT fly_NN in_IN
the_DT toils_NNS of_IN a_DT spider_NN ,_, could_MD hardly_RB stir_VB a_DT limb_NN for_IN the_DT threads_NNS of_IN
custom_NN ,_, "_'' light_JJ as_IN air_NN but_CC strong_JJ as_IN links_NNS of_IN iron_NN ,"_NNS that_IN crossing_VBG
and_CC recrossing_VBG each_DT other_JJ in_IN an_DT endless_JJ maze_NN bound_VBD him_PRP fast_RB within_IN a_DT
network_NN of_IN observances_NNS from_IN which_WDT death_NN or_CC deposition_NN alone_RB could_MD
release_VB him_PRP ._.

Thus_RB to_TO students_NNS of_IN the_DT past_NN the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ kings_NNS and_CC priests_NNS
teems_VBZ with_IN instruction_NN ._. In_IN it_PRP was_VBD summed_VBN up_RP all_DT that_IN passed_VBN for_IN
wisdom_NN when_WRB the_DT world_NN was_VBD young_JJ ._. It_PRP was_VBD the_DT perfect_JJ pattern_NN after_IN
which_WDT every_DT man_NN strove_VBD to_TO shape_VB his_PRP$ life_NN ;_: a_DT faultless_JJ model_NN
constructed_VBN with_IN rigorous_JJ accuracy_NN upon_IN the_DT lines_NNS laid_VBN down_RP by_IN a_DT
barbarous_JJ philosophy_NN ._. Crude_NN and_CC false_JJ as_IN that_DT philosophy_NN may_MD seem_VB to_TO
us_PRP ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB unjust_RB to_TO deny_VB it_PRP the_DT merit_NN of_IN logical_JJ consistency_NN ._.
Starting_VBG from_IN a_DT conception_NN of_IN the_DT vital_JJ principle_NN as_IN a_DT tiny_JJ being_NN or_CC
soul_NN existing_VBG in_IN ,_, but_CC distinct_JJ and_CC separable_JJ from_IN ,_, the_DT living_VBG being_NN ,_,
it_PRP deduces_VBZ for_IN the_DT practical_JJ guidance_NN of_IN life_NN a_DT system_NN of_IN rules_NNS
which_WDT in_IN general_NN hangs_VBZ well_RB together_RB and_CC forms_NNS a_DT fairly_RB complete_JJ and_CC
harmonious_JJ whole_NN ._. The_DT flaw_NN --_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT fatal_JJ one_CD --_: of_IN the_DT system_NN
lies_VBZ not_RB in_IN its_PRP$ reasoning_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN its_PRP$ premises_NNS ;_: in_IN its_PRP$ conception_NN of_IN
the_DT nature_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, not_RB in_IN any_DT irrelevancy_NN of_IN the_DT conclusions_NNS which_WDT
it_PRP draws_VBZ from_IN that_DT conception_NN ._. But_CC to_TO stigmatise_VB these_DT premises_NNS as_IN
ridiculous_JJ because_IN we_PRP can_MD easily_RB detect_VB their_PRP$ falseness_NN ,_, would_MD be_VB
ungrateful_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN unphilosophical_JJ ._. We_PRP stand_VBP upon_IN the_DT foundation_NN
reared_VBN by_IN the_DT generations_NNS that_WDT have_VBP gone_VBN before_RB ,_, and_CC we_PRP can_MD but_CC
dimly_RB realise_VBP the_DT painful_JJ and_CC prolonged_JJ efforts_NNS which_WDT it_PRP has_VBZ cost_VBN
humanity_NN to_TO struggle_VB up_RP to_TO the_DT point_NN ,_, no_DT very_RB exalted_JJ one_NN after_IN all_DT ,_,
which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP reached_VBN ._. Our_PRP$ gratitude_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT nameless_NN and_CC
forgotten_VBN toilers_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ patient_JJ thought_NN and_CC active_JJ exertions_NNS have_VBP
largely_RB made_VBD us_PRP what_WP we_PRP are_VBP ._. The_DT amount_NN of_IN new_JJ knowledge_NN which_WDT one_CD
age_NN ,_, certainly_RB which_WDT one_CD man_NN ,_, can_MD add_VB to_TO the_DT common_JJ store_NN is_VBZ small_JJ ,_,
and_CC it_PRP argues_VBZ stupidity_NN or_CC dishonesty_NN ,_, besides_IN ingratitude_NN ,_, to_TO
ignore_VB the_DT heap_NN while_IN vaunting_VBG the_DT few_JJ grains_NNS which_WDT it_PRP may_MD have_VB been_VBN
our_PRP$ privilege_NN to_TO add_VB to_TO it_PRP ._. There_EX is_VBZ indeed_RB little_JJ danger_NN at_IN present_JJ
of_IN undervaluing_VBG the_DT contributions_NNS which_WDT modern_JJ times_NNS and_CC even_RB
classical_JJ antiquity_NN have_VBP made_VBN to_TO the_DT general_JJ advancement_NN of_IN our_PRP$
race_NN ._. But_CC when_WRB we_PRP pass_VBP these_DT limits_NNS ,_, the_DT case_NN is_VBZ different_JJ ._. Contempt_NN
and_CC ridicule_NN or_CC abhorrence_NN and_CC denunciation_NN are_VBP too_RB often_RB the_DT only_RB
recognition_NN vouchsafed_VBD to_TO the_DT savage_JJ and_CC his_PRP$ ways_NNS ._. Yet_RB of_IN the_DT
benefactors_NNS whom_WP we_PRP are_VBP bound_VBN thankfully_RB to_TO commemorate_VB ,_, many_JJ ,_,
perhaps_RB most_RBS ,_, were_VBD savages_NNS ._. For_IN when_WRB all_DT is_VBZ said_VBD and_CC done_VBD our_PRP$
resemblances_NNS to_TO the_DT savage_JJ are_VBP still_RB far_RB more_RBR numerous_JJ than_IN our_PRP$
differences_NNS from_IN him_PRP ;_: and_CC what_WP we_PRP have_VBP in_IN common_JJ with_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC
deliberately_RB retain_VB as_IN true_JJ and_CC useful_JJ ,_, we_PRP owe_VBP to_TO our_PRP$ savage_JJ
forefathers_NNS who_WP slowly_RB acquired_VBD by_IN experience_NN and_CC transmitted_VBD to_TO us_PRP
by_IN inheritance_NN those_DT seemingly_RB fundamental_JJ ideas_NNS which_WDT we_PRP are_VBP apt_JJ to_TO
regard_NN as_IN original_JJ and_CC intuitive_JJ ._. We_PRP are_VBP like_IN heirs_NNS to_TO a_DT fortune_NN
which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN handed_VBN down_RP for_IN so_RB many_JJ ages_NNS that_IN the_DT memory_NN of_IN those_DT
who_WP built_VBD it_PRP up_RP is_VBZ lost_VBN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ possessors_NNS for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG
regard_NN it_PRP as_IN having_VBG been_VBN an_DT original_JJ and_CC unalterable_JJ possession_NN of_IN
their_PRP$ race_NN since_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN ._. But_CC reflection_NN and_CC
enquiry_NN should_MD satisfy_VB us_PRP that_IN to_TO our_PRP$ predecessors_NNS we_PRP are_VBP indebted_JJ
for_IN much_JJ of_IN what_WP we_PRP thought_VBD most_RBS our_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN their_PRP$ errors_NNS were_VBD
not_RB wilful_JJ extravagances_NNS or_CC the_DT ravings_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ,_, but_CC simply_RB
hypotheses_NNS ,_, justifiable_JJ as_IN such_JJ at_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD
propounded_VBN ,_, but_CC which_WDT a_DT fuller_JJR experience_NN has_VBZ proved_VBN to_TO be_VB
inadequate_JJ ._. It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB by_IN the_DT successive_JJ testing_NN of_IN hypotheses_NNS and_CC
rejection_NN of_IN the_DT false_JJ that_IN truth_NN is_VBZ at_IN last_JJ elicited_JJ ._. After_IN all_DT ,_,
what_WP we_PRP call_VBP truth_NN is_VBZ only_RB the_DT hypothesis_NN which_WDT is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO work_VB
best_JJS ._. Therefore_RB in_IN reviewing_VBG the_DT opinions_NNS and_CC practices_NNS of_IN ruder_NN
ages_NNS and_CC races_NNS we_PRP shall_MD do_VB well_RB to_TO look_VB with_IN leniency_NN upon_IN their_PRP$
errors_NNS as_IN inevitable_JJ slips_NNS made_VBD in_IN the_DT search_NN for_IN truth_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO give_VB
them_PRP the_DT benefit_NN of_IN that_DT indulgence_NN which_WDT we_PRP ourselves_PRP may_MD one_CD day_NN
stand_NN in_IN need_NN of_IN :_: cum_NN excusatione_NN itaque_IN veteres_NNS audiendi_IN sunt_NN ._.



XXIV_NNP ._. The_DT Killing_NNP of_IN the_DT Divine_NNP King_NNP



1._DT The_DT Mortality_NNP of_IN the_DT Gods_NNS

MAN_NNP has_VBZ created_VBN gods_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ likeness_NN and_CC being_VBG himself_PRP mortal_JJ he_PRP
has_VBZ naturally_RB supposed_VBN his_PRP$ creatures_NNS to_TO be_VB in_IN the_DT same_JJ sad_JJ
predicament_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT Greenlanders_NNPS believed_VBD that_IN a_DT wind_NN could_MD kill_VB
their_PRP$ most_RBS powerful_JJ god_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP would_MD certainly_RB die_VB if_IN he_PRP
touched_VBD a_DT dog_NN ._. When_WRB they_PRP heard_VBD of_IN the_DT Christian_NNP God_NNP ,_, they_PRP kept_VBD
asking_VBG if_IN he_PRP never_RB died_VBD ,_, and_CC being_VBG informed_VBN that_IN he_PRP did_VBD not_RB ,_, they_PRP

indeed_RB ._. In_IN answer_NN to_TO the_DT enquiries_NNS of_IN Colonel_NNP Dodge_NNP ,_, a_DT North_NNP

one_CD ,_, "_`` Oh_UH ,_, neither_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, "_'' replied_VBD he_PRP ,_, "_`` the_DT Great_JJ Spirit_NNP that_WDT
made_VBN the_DT world_NN is_VBZ dead_JJ long_RB ago_RB ._. He_PRP could_MD not_RB possibly_RB have_VB lived_VBN as_IN
long_RB as_IN this_DT ."_NN A_DT tribe_NN in_IN the_DT Philippine_NNP Islands_NNP told_VBD the_DT Spanish_NNP

Cabunian_JJ ._. Heitsi-eibib_NNP ,_, a_DT god_NN or_CC divine_JJ hero_NN of_IN the_DT Hottentots_NNS ,_, died_VBN

muttering_VBG ,_, "_`` Give_VB us_PRP plenty_NN of_IN cattle_NNS ."_IN The_DT grave_NN of_IN Zeus_NNP ,_, the_DT great_JJ
god_NN of_IN Greece_NNP ,_, was_VBD shown_VBN to_TO visitors_NNS in_IN Crete_NNP as_IN late_JJ as_IN about_IN the_DT

The_DT great_JJ gods_NNS of_IN Egypt_NNP themselves_PRP were_VBD not_RB exempt_JJ from_IN the_DT common_JJ
lot_NN ._. They_PRP too_RB grew_VBD old_JJ and_CC died_VBD ._. But_CC when_WRB at_IN a_DT later_JJ time_NN the_DT

2._PRP Kings_NNP killed_VBD when_WRB their_PRP$ Strength_NN fails_VBZ

IF_IN THE_DT HIGH_NNP gods_NNS ,_, who_WP dwell_VBP remote_JJ from_IN the_DT fret_VBP and_CC fever_NN of_IN this_DT
earthly_JJ life_NN ,_, are_VBP yet_RB believed_VBN to_TO die_VB at_IN last_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB
expected_VBN that_IN a_DT god_NN who_WP lodges_VBZ in_IN a_DT frail_JJ tabernacle_NN of_IN flesh_NN should_MD
escape_VB the_DT same_JJ fate_NN ,_, though_IN we_PRP hear_VBP of_IN African_JJ kings_NNS who_WP have_VBP
imagined_VBN themselves_PRP immortal_JJ by_IN virtue_NN of_IN their_PRP$ sorceries_NNS ._. Now_RB
primitive_JJ peoples_NNS ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, sometimes_RB believe_VBP that_IN their_PRP$
safety_NN and_CC even_RB that_IN of_IN the_DT world_NN is_VBZ bound_VBN up_RP with_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN one_CD
of_IN these_DT god-men_NNS or_CC human_JJ incarnations_NNS of_IN the_DT divinity_NN ._. Naturally_RB ,_,
therefore_RB ,_, they_PRP take_VBP the_DT utmost_JJ care_NN of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN a_DT regard_NN
for_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ._. But_CC no_DT amount_NN of_IN care_NN and_CC precaution_NN will_MD prevent_VB the_DT
man-god_NN from_IN growing_VBG old_JJ and_CC feeble_JJ and_CC at_IN last_JJ dying_VBG ._. His_PRP$
worshippers_NNS have_VBP to_TO lay_VB their_PRP$ account_NN with_IN this_DT sad_JJ necessity_NN and_CC to_TO
meet_VB it_PRP as_IN best_RB they_PRP can_MD ._. The_DT danger_NN is_VBZ a_DT formidable_JJ one_CD ;_: for_IN if_IN the_DT
course_NN of_IN nature_NN is_VBZ dependent_JJ on_IN the_DT man-god_NN '_'' s_PRP life_NN ,_, what_WP
catastrophes_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB expected_VBN from_IN the_DT gradual_JJ enfeeblement_NN of_IN
his_PRP$ powers_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ final_JJ extinction_NN in_IN death_NN ?_. There_EX is_VBZ only_RB one_CD
way_NN of_IN averting_VBG these_DT dangers_NNS ._. The_DT man-god_NN must_MD be_VB killed_VBN as_RB soon_RB as_IN
he_PRP shows_VBZ symptoms_NNS that_IN his_PRP$ powers_NNS are_VBP beginning_VBG to_TO fail_VB ,_, and_CC his_PRP$
soul_NN must_MD be_VB transferred_VBN to_TO a_DT vigorous_JJ successor_NN before_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN
seriously_RB impaired_VBN by_IN the_DT threatened_JJ decay_NN ._. The_DT advantages_NNS of_IN thus_RB
putting_VBG the_DT man-god_NN to_TO death_NN instead_RB of_IN allowing_VBG him_PRP to_TO die_VB of_IN old_JJ
age_NN and_CC disease_NN are_VBP ,_, to_TO the_DT savage_JJ ,_, obvious_JJ enough_RB ._. For_IN if_IN the_DT
man-god_NN dies_VBZ what_WP we_PRP call_VBP a_DT natural_JJ death_NN ,_, it_PRP means_VBZ ,_, according_VBG to_TO
the_DT savage_JJ ,_, that_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN has_VBZ either_DT voluntarily_RB departed_VBN from_IN his_PRP$
body_NN and_CC refuses_VBZ to_TO return_VB ,_, or_CC more_JJR commonly_RB that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN
extracted_VBN ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS detained_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ wanderings_NNS ,_, by_IN a_DT demon_NN or_CC
sorcerer_NN ._. In_IN any_DT of_IN these_DT cases_NNS the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT man-god_NN is_VBZ lost_VBN to_TO
his_PRP$ worshippers_NNS ,_, and_CC with_IN it_PRP their_PRP$ prosperity_NN is_VBZ gone_VBN and_CC their_PRP$ very_RB
existence_NN endangered_VBN ._. Even_RB if_IN they_PRP could_MD arrange_VB to_TO catch_VB the_DT soul_NN
of_IN the_DT dying_VBG god_NN as_IN it_PRP left_VBD his_PRP$ lips_NNS or_CC his_PRP$ nostrils_NNS and_CC so_RB transfer_VB

be_VB transferred_VBN ._. Whereas_NNP by_IN slaying_VBG him_PRP his_PRP$ worshippers_NNS could_MD ,_, in_IN the_DT
first_JJ place_NN ,_, make_VB sure_JJ of_IN catching_VBG his_PRP$ soul_NN as_IN it_PRP escaped_VBD and_CC

would_MD secure_VB that_IN the_DT world_NN should_MD not_RB fall_VB into_IN decay_NN with_IN the_DT
decay_NN of_IN the_DT man-god_NN ._. Every_DT purpose_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, was_VBD answered_VBN ,_, and_CC

soul_NN ,_, while_IN yet_RB at_IN its_PRP$ prime_JJ ,_, to_TO a_DT vigorous_JJ successor_NN ._.

The_DT mystic_JJ kings_NNS of_IN Fire_NNP and_CC Water_NNP in_IN Cambodia_NNP are_VBP not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO
die_VB a_DT natural_JJ death_NN ._. Hence_RB when_WRB one_NN of_IN them_PRP is_VBZ seriously_RB ill_JJ and_CC the_DT
elders_NNS think_VBP that_IN he_PRP cannot_MD recover_VB ,_, they_PRP stab_VBD him_PRP to_TO death_NN ._. The_DT
people_NNS of_IN Congo_NNP believed_VBD ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, that_IN if_IN their_PRP$ pontiff_NN the_DT
Chitom_NNP �_NNS were_VBD to_TO die_VB a_DT natural_JJ death_NN ,_, the_DT world_NN would_MD perish_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT
earth_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP alone_RB sustained_VBD by_IN his_PRP$ power_NN and_CC merit_NN ,_, would_MD

to_TO the_DT reign_NN of_IN Ergamenes_NNP ,_, a_DT contemporary_NN of_IN Ptolemy_NNP II_NNP .,_VBD King_NNP of_IN

body_NN of_IN soldiers_NNS ,_, put_VBD the_DT priests_NNS to_TO the_DT sword_NN ._.

Customs_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN appear_VBP to_TO have_VB prevailed_VBN in_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN
Africa_NNP down_RB to_TO modern_JJ times_NNS ._. In_IN some_DT tribes_NNS of_IN Fazoql_NNP the_DT king_NN had_VBD
to_TO administer_VB justice_NN daily_RB under_IN a_DT certain_JJ tree_NN ._. If_IN from_IN sickness_NN
or_CC any_DT other_JJ cause_NN he_PRP was_VBD unable_JJ to_TO discharge_VB this_DT duty_NN for_IN three_CD
whole_JJ days_NNS ,_, he_PRP was_VBD hanged_VBN on_IN the_DT tree_NN in_IN a_DT noose_NN ,_, which_WDT contained_VBD
two_CD razors_NNS so_RB arranged_VBD that_IN when_WRB the_DT noose_NN was_VBD drawn_VBN tight_RB by_IN the_DT
weight_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN they_PRP cut_VBD his_PRP$ throat_NN ._.

A_DT custom_NN of_IN putting_VBG their_PRP$ divine_JJ kings_NNS to_TO death_NN at_IN the_DT first_JJ
symptoms_NNS of_IN infirmity_NN or_CC old_JJ age_NN prevailed_VBD until_IN lately_RB ,_, if_IN indeed_RB
it_PRP is_VBZ even_RB now_RB extinct_JJ and_CC not_RB merely_RB dormant_JJ ,_, among_IN the_DT Shilluk_NNP of_IN
the_DT White_NNP Nile_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN recent_JJ years_NNS it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN carefully_RB
investigated_VBN by_IN Dr_NNP ._. C_NNP ._. G_NNP ._. Seligman_NNP ._. The_DT reverence_NN which_WDT the_DT Shilluk_NNP
pay_NN to_TO their_PRP$ king_NN appears_VBZ to_TO arise_VB chiefly_RB from_IN the_DT conviction_NN that_WDT
he_PRP is_VBZ a_DT reincarnation_NN of_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN Nyakang_NNP ,_, the_DT semi-divine_JJ hero_NN
who_WP founded_VBD the_DT dynasty_NN and_CC settled_VBD the_DT tribe_NN in_IN their_PRP$ present_NN
territory_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT fundamental_JJ article_NN of_IN the_DT Shilluk_NNP creed_VBD that_IN the_DT

senile_JJ ,_, lest_IN with_IN his_PRP$ diminishing_VBG vigour_NN the_DT cattle_NNS should_MD sicken_VB
and_CC fail_VB to_TO bear_VB their_PRP$ increase_NN ,_, the_DT crops_NNS should_MD rot_VB in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_,
and_CC man_NN ,_, stricken_VBN with_IN disease_NN ,_, should_MD die_VB in_IN ever-increasing_NN
numbers_NNS ."_VBP To_TO prevent_VB these_DT calamities_NNS it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT regular_JJ
custom_NN with_IN the_DT Shilluk_NNP to_TO put_VB the_DT king_NN to_TO death_NN whenever_WRB he_PRP showed_VBD
signs_NNS of_IN ill-health_NN or_CC failing_VBG strength_NN ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT fatal_JJ symptoms_NNS
of_IN decay_NN was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO be_VB an_DT incapacity_NN to_TO satisfy_VB the_DT sexual_JJ
passions_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ wives_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP he_PRP has_VBZ very_RB many_JJ ,_, distributed_VBN in_IN a_DT
large_JJ number_NN of_IN houses_NNS at_IN Fashoda_NNP ._. When_WRB this_DT ominous_JJ weakness_NN
manifested_VBN itself_PRP ,_, the_DT wives_NNS reported_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT chiefs_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP
popularly_RB said_VBD to_TO have_VB intimated_VBN to_TO the_DT king_NN his_PRP$ doom_NN by_IN spreading_VBG a_DT
white_JJ cloth_NN over_IN his_PRP$ face_NN and_CC knees_NNS as_IN he_PRP lay_VBD slumbering_VBG in_IN the_DT heat_NN
of_IN the_DT sultry_JJ afternoon_NN ._. Execution_NN soon_RB followed_VBD the_DT sentence_NN of_IN
death_NN ._. A_DT hut_NN was_VBD specially_RB built_VBN for_IN the_DT occasion_NN :_: the_DT king_NN was_VBD led_VBN
into_IN it_PRP and_CC lay_VBD down_RP with_IN his_PRP$ head_NN resting_VBG on_IN the_DT lap_NN of_IN a_DT nubile_NN
virgin_NN :_: the_DT door_NN of_IN the_DT hut_NN was_VBD then_RB walled_VBN up_RB ;_: and_CC the_DT couple_NN were_VBD
left_VBN without_IN food_NN ,_, water_NN ,_, or_CC fire_NN to_TO die_VB of_IN hunger_NN and_CC suffocation_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD the_DT old_JJ custom_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD abolished_VBN some_DT five_CD generations_NNS

perished_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN the_DT chiefs_NNS announce_VBP his_PRP$ fate_NN
to_TO the_DT king_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN afterwards_RB he_PRP is_VBZ strangled_VBN in_IN a_DT hut_NN which_WDT has_VBZ
been_VBN specially_RB built_VBN for_IN the_DT occasion_NN ._.

From_IN Dr_NNP ._. Seligman_NNP '_POS s_PRP enquiries_VBZ it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN not_RB only_RB was_VBD the_DT
Shilluk_NNP king_NN liable_JJ to_TO be_VB killed_VBN with_IN due_JJ ceremony_NN at_IN the_DT first_JJ

herdsmen_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ huts_NNS stood_VBD a_DT little_JJ way_NN off_RB ._. The_DT hours_NNS of_IN darkness_NN
were_VBD therefore_RB the_DT season_NN of_IN peril_NN for_IN the_DT king_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN he_PRP
used_VBN to_TO pass_VB them_PRP in_IN constant_JJ watchfulness_NN ,_, prowling_VBG round_IN his_PRP$ huts_NNS

silent_JJ and_CC alert_JJ ,_, like_IN a_DT sentinel_NN on_IN duty_NN ,_, in_IN some_DT dark_JJ corner_NN ._. When_WRB
at_IN last_JJ his_PRP$ rival_NN appeared_VBD ,_, the_DT fight_NN would_MD take_VB place_NN in_IN grim_JJ
silence_NN ,_, broken_VBN only_RB by_IN the_DT clash_NN of_IN spears_NNS and_CC shields_NNS ,_, for_IN it_PRP was_VBD
a_DT point_NN of_IN honour_NN with_IN the_DT king_NN not_RB to_TO call_VB the_DT herdsmen_NNS to_TO his_PRP$
assistance_NN ._.

Like_IN Nyakang_NNP himself_PRP ,_, their_PRP$ founder_NN ,_, each_DT of_IN the_DT Shilluk_NNP kings_NNS after_IN
death_NN is_VBZ worshipped_VBN at_IN a_DT shrine_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ erected_VBN over_IN his_PRP$ grave_NN ,_,
and_CC the_DT grave_NN of_IN a_DT king_NN is_VBZ always_RB in_IN the_DT village_NN where_WRB he_PRP was_VBD born_VBN ._.
The_DT tomb-shrine_NN of_IN a_DT king_NN resembles_VBZ the_DT shrine_NN of_IN Nyakang_NNP ,_,
consisting_VBG of_IN a_DT few_JJ huts_NNS enclosed_VBN by_IN a_DT fence_NN ;_: one_CD of_IN the_DT huts_NNS is_VBZ
built_VBN over_IN the_DT king_NN '_POS s_PRP grave_JJ ,_, the_DT others_NNS are_VBP occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT
guardians_NNS of_IN the_DT shrine_NN ._. Indeed_RB the_DT shrines_NNS of_IN Nyakang_NNP and_CC the_DT
shrines_NNS of_IN the_DT kings_NNS are_VBP scarcely_RB to_TO be_VB distinguished_VBN from_IN each_DT
other_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT religious_JJ rituals_NNS observed_VBD at_IN all_DT of_IN them_PRP are_VBP
identical_JJ in_IN form_NN and_CC vary_VB only_RB in_IN matters_NNS of_IN detail_NN ,_, the_DT variations_NNS

In_IN general_JJ the_DT principal_JJ element_NN in_IN the_DT religion_NN of_IN the_DT Shilluk_NNP

The_DT Dinka_NNP are_VBP a_DT congeries_NNS of_IN independent_JJ tribes_NNS in_IN the_DT valley_NN of_IN the_DT
White_NNP Nile_NNP ._. They_PRP are_VBP essentially_RB a_DT pastoral_JJ people_NNS ,_, passionately_RB

also_RB keep_VBP sheep_NN and_CC goats_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT women_NNS cultivate_VBP small_JJ quantities_NNS
of_IN millet_NN and_CC sesame_JJ ._. For_IN their_PRP$ crops_NNS and_CC above_IN all_DT for_IN their_PRP$

prolonged_VBN drought_NN they_PRP are_VBP said_VBN to_TO be_VB reduced_VBN to_TO great_JJ extremities_NNS ._.
Hence_RB the_DT rain-maker_NN is_VBZ a_DT very_RB important_JJ personage_NN among_IN them_PRP to_TO

infirm_NN ,_, he_PRP tells_VBZ his_PRP$ children_NNS that_IN he_PRP wishes_VBZ to_TO die_VB ._. Among_IN the_DT Agar_NNP

Such_JJ ,_, with_IN minor_JJ variations_NNS ,_, appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT regular_JJ end_NN of_IN the_DT

In_IN the_DT Central_JJ African_JJ kingdom_NN of_IN Bunyoro_NNP down_IN to_TO recent_JJ years_NNS

they_PRP do_VBP it_PRP that_IN he_PRP may_MD not_RB die_VB by_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ enemies_NNS ._. The_DT
Jukos_NNP are_VBP a_DT heathen_NN tribe_NN of_IN the_DT Benue_NNP River_NNP ,_, a_DT great_JJ tributary_NN of_IN
the_DT Niger_NNP ._. In_IN their_PRP$ country_NN "_'' the_DT town_NN of_IN Gatri_NNP is_VBZ ruled_VBN by_IN a_DT king_NN

more_RBR plainly_RB ._. They_PRP then_RB decide_VBP who_WP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT next_JJ king_NN ._. How_WRB long_RB
he_PRP is_VBZ to_TO reign_VB is_VBZ settled_VBN by_IN the_DT influential_JJ men_NNS at_IN a_DT meeting_NN ;_: the_DT

the_DT king_NN gets_VBZ drunk_JJ on_IN guinea-corn_JJ beer_NN ._. After_IN that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ speared_VBN ,_,

that_IN he_PRP cannot_MD have_VB very_RB many_JJ more_JJR years_NNS to_TO live_VB ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ
certain_JJ of_IN his_PRP$ predecessor_NN '_'' s_PRP fate_NN ._. This_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, does_VBZ not_RB seem_VB to_TO
frighten_VB candidates_NNS ._. The_DT same_JJ custom_NN of_IN king-killing_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO
prevail_VB at_IN Quonde_NNP and_CC Wukari_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN at_IN Gatri_NNP ."_NNP In_IN the_DT three_CD
Hausa_NNP kingdoms_NNS of_IN Gobir_NNP ,_, Katsina_NNP ,_, and_CC Daura_NNP ,_, in_IN Northern_NNP Nigeria_NNP ,_, as_IN

The_DT Matiamvo_NNP is_VBZ a_DT great_JJ king_NN or_CC emperor_NN in_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN Angola_NNP ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT inferior_JJ kings_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, by_IN name_NN Challa_NNP ,_, gave_VBD to_TO a_DT
Portuguese_NNP expedition_NN the_DT following_VBG account_NN of_IN the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT
the_DT Matiamvo_NNP comes_VBZ by_IN his_PRP$ end_NN ._. "_`` It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN customary_JJ ,"_NN he_PRP said_VBD ,_,
"_`` for_IN our_PRP$ Matiamvos_NNP to_TO die_VB either_CC in_IN war_NN or_CC by_IN a_DT violent_JJ death_NN ,_, and_CC
the_DT present_JJ Matiamvo_NNP must_MD meet_VB this_DT last_JJ fate_NN ,_, as_RB ,_, in_IN consequence_NN of_IN
his_PRP$ great_JJ exactions_NNS ,_, he_PRP has_VBZ lived_VBN long_RB enough_RB ._. When_WRB we_PRP come_VBP to_TO this_DT
understanding_NN ,_, and_CC decide_VB that_IN he_PRP should_MD be_VB killed_VBN ,_, we_PRP invite_VB him_PRP to_TO
make_VB war_NN with_IN our_PRP$ enemies_NNS ,_, on_IN which_WDT occasion_NN we_PRP all_DT accompany_VB him_PRP
and_CC his_PRP$ family_NN to_TO the_DT war_NN ,_, when_WRB we_PRP lose_VBP some_DT of_IN our_PRP$ people_NNS ._. If_IN he_PRP
escapes_NNS unhurt_JJ ,_, we_PRP return_VBP to_TO the_DT war_NN again_RB and_CC fight_VB for_IN three_CD or_CC
four_CD days_NNS ._. We_PRP then_RB suddenly_RB abandon_VB him_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ family_NN to_TO their_PRP$
fate_NN ,_, leaving_VBG him_PRP in_IN the_DT enemy_NN '_POS s_VBZ hands_NNS ._. Seeing_VBG himself_PRP thus_RB
deserted_VBN ,_, he_PRP causes_VBZ his_PRP$ throne_NN to_TO be_VB erected_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, sitting_VBG down_RB ,_,
calls_VBZ his_PRP$ family_NN around_IN him_PRP ._. He_PRP then_RB orders_NNS his_PRP$ mother_NN to_TO approach_VB ;_:
she_PRP kneels_VBZ at_IN his_PRP$ feet_NNS ;_: he_PRP first_RB cuts_VBZ off_RP her_PRP$ head_NN ,_, then_RB decapitates_VBG
his_PRP$ sons_NNS in_IN succession_NN ,_, next_IN his_PRP$ wives_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, last_JJ of_IN
all_DT ,_, his_PRP$ most_RBS beloved_JJ wife_NN ,_, called_VBN Anacullo_NNP ._. This_DT slaughter_NN being_VBG
accomplished_VBN ,_, the_DT Matiamvo_NNP ,_, dressed_VBN in_IN all_DT his_PRP$ pomp_NN ,_, awaits_VBZ his_PRP$ own_JJ
death_NN ,_, which_WDT immediately_RB follows_VBZ ,_, by_IN an_DT officer_NN sent_VBN by_IN the_DT powerful_JJ
neighbouring_VBG chiefs_NNS ,_, Caniquinha_NNP and_CC Canica_NNP ._. This_DT officer_NN first_JJ cuts_NNS
off_IN his_PRP$ legs_NNS and_CC arms_NNS at_IN the_DT joints_NNS ,_, and_CC lastly_RB he_PRP cuts_VBZ off_RP his_PRP$
head_NN ;_: after_IN which_WDT the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT officer_NN is_VBZ struck_VBN off_RP ._. All_PDT the_DT
potentates_NNS retire_VBP from_IN the_DT encampment_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN not_RB to_TO witness_VB his_PRP$
death_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ my_PRP$ duty_NN to_TO remain_VB and_CC witness_VB his_PRP$ death_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO mark_VB
the_DT place_NN where_WRB the_DT head_NN and_CC arms_NNS have_VBP been_VBN deposited_VBN by_IN the_DT two_CD
