It_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN a_DT Zulu_NNP custom_NN to_TO put_VB the_DT king_NN to_TO death_NN as_IN

The_DT custom_NN of_IN putting_VBG kings_NNS to_TO death_NN as_RB soon_RB as_IN they_PRP suffered_VBD from_IN

The_DT king_NN of_IN Sofala_NNP who_WP dared_VBD to_TO survive_VB the_DT loss_NN of_IN his_PRP$ front_JJ tooth_NN

Many_JJ days_NNS '_POS journey_NN to_TO the_DT north-east_JJ of_IN Abomey_NNP ,_, the_DT old_JJ capital_NN of_IN

is_VBZ immediately_RB executed_VBN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ son_NN quietly_RB ascends_VBZ the_DT throne_NN upon_IN

unquestionably_RB that_IN of_IN judging_VBG ,_, and_CC punishing_VBG the_DT king_NN ._. Should_MD he_PRP

his_PRP$ councillors_NNS ,_, on_IN whom_WP the_DT heavy_JJ duty_NN is_VBZ laid_VBN ,_, requires_VBZ of_IN the_DT
prince_NN that_IN he_PRP shall_MD '_POS go_JJ to_TO sleep_VB ,'_RP which_WDT means_VBZ simply_RB '_'' take_VB poison_NN
and_CC die_VBP .'_JJ If_IN his_PRP$ courage_NN fails_VBZ him_PRP at_IN the_DT supreme_JJ moment_NN ,_, a_DT friend_NN

Yoruba_NNP the_DT thing_NN is_VBZ managed_VBN a_DT little_JJ differently_RB ._. When_WRB a_DT son_NN is_VBZ born_VBN
to_TO the_DT king_NN of_IN Oyo_NNP ,_, they_PRP make_VBP a_DT model_NN of_IN the_DT infant_NN '_'' s_PRP right_JJ foot_NN in_IN
clay_NN and_CC keep_VB it_PRP in_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT elders_NNS (_-LRB- ogboni_NNS )._, If_IN the_DT king_NN
fails_VBZ to_TO observe_VB the_DT customs_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, a_DT messenger_NN ,_, without_IN
speaking_VBG a_DT word_NN ,_, shows_VBZ him_PRP his_PRP$ child_NN '_POS s_VBZ foot_NN ._. The_DT king_NN knows_VBZ what_WP
that_DT means_VBZ ._. He_PRP takes_VBZ poison_NN and_CC goes_VBZ to_TO sleep_VB ."_RP The_DT old_JJ Prussians_NNS
acknowledged_VBD as_IN their_PRP$ supreme_JJ lord_NN a_DT ruler_NN who_WP governed_VBD them_PRP in_IN the_DT
name_NN of_IN the_DT gods_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD known_VBN as_IN "_`` God_NNP '_'' s_VBZ Mouth_NNP ."_CC When_WRB he_PRP felt_VBD
himself_PRP weak_JJ and_CC ill_JJ ,_, if_IN he_PRP wished_VBD to_TO leave_VB a_DT good_JJ name_NN behind_IN him_PRP ,_,
he_PRP had_VBD a_DT great_JJ heap_NN made_VBN of_IN thorn-bushes_NNS and_CC straw_NN ,_, on_IN which_WDT he_PRP

serve_VB the_DT gods_NNS and_CC promising_VBG to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT gods_NNS and_CC speak_VB for_IN the_DT

3._PRP Kings_NNP killed_VBD at_IN the_DT End_NN of_IN a_DT Fixed_NNP Term_NN

IN_IN THE_DT CASES_NNP hitherto_VBD described_VBN ,_, the_DT divine_JJ king_NN or_CC priest_NN is_VBZ
suffered_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS to_TO retain_VB office_NN until_IN some_DT outward_JJ defect_NN ,_,
some_DT visible_JJ symptom_NN of_IN failing_VBG health_NN or_CC advancing_VBG age_NN ,_, warns_VBZ them_PRP
that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ no_RB longer_RB equal_JJ to_TO the_DT discharge_NN of_IN his_PRP$ divine_JJ duties_NNS ;_:
but_CC not_RB until_IN such_JJ symptoms_NNS have_VBP made_VBN their_PRP$ appearance_NN is_VBZ he_PRP put_VB to_TO
death_NN ._. Some_DT peoples_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, appear_VBP to_TO have_VB thought_VBN it_PRP unsafe_JJ to_TO
wait_VB for_IN even_RB the_DT slightest_JJS symptom_NN of_IN decay_NN and_CC have_VB preferred_VBN to_TO
kill_VB the_DT king_NN while_IN he_PRP was_VBD still_RB in_IN the_DT full_JJ vigour_NN of_IN life_NN ._.
Accordingly_RB ,_, they_PRP have_VBP fixed_VBN a_DT term_NN beyond_IN which_WDT he_PRP might_MD not_RB reign_VB ,_,
and_CC at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN which_WDT he_PRP must_MD die_VB ,_, the_DT term_NN fixed_VBN upon_IN being_VBG
short_JJ enough_JJ to_TO exclude_VB the_DT probability_NN of_IN his_PRP$ degenerating_VBG
physically_RB in_IN the_DT interval_NN ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Southern_NNP India_NNP the_DT
period_NN fixed_VBN was_VBD twelve_CD years_NNS ._. Thus_RB ,_, according_VBG to_TO an_DT old_JJ traveller_NN ,_,
in_IN the_DT province_NN of_IN Quilacare_NNP ,_, "_`` there_EX is_VBZ a_DT Gentile_JJ house_NN of_IN prayer_NN ,_,
in_IN which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ an_DT idol_NN which_WDT they_PRP hold_VBP in_IN great_JJ account_NN ,_, and_CC
every_DT twelve_CD years_NNS they_PRP celebrate_VBP a_DT great_JJ feast_NN to_TO it_PRP ,_, whither_IN all_PDT
the_DT Gentiles_NNS go_VBP as_IN to_TO a_DT jubilee_JJ ._. This_DT temple_NN possesses_VBZ many_JJ lands_NNS
and_CC much_JJ revenue_NN :_: it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT very_RB great_JJ affair_NN ._. This_DT province_NN has_VBZ a_DT
king_NN over_IN it_PRP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ not_RB more_JJR than_IN twelve_CD years_NNS to_TO reign_VB from_IN
jubilee_JJ to_TO jubilee_JJ ._. His_PRP$ manner_NN of_IN living_VBG is_VBZ in_IN this_DT wise_JJ ,_, that_DT is_VBZ to_TO
say_VB :_: when_WRB the_DT twelve_CD years_NNS are_VBP completed_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN this_DT feast_NN
there_EX assemble_VBP together_RB innumerable_JJ people_NNS ,_, and_CC much_JJ money_NN is_VBZ spent_VBN
in_IN giving_VBG food_NN to_TO Bramans_NNP ._. The_DT king_NN has_VBZ a_DT wooden_JJ scaffolding_NN made_VBN ,_,
spread_NN over_IN with_IN silken_JJ hangings_NNS :_: and_CC on_IN that_DT day_NN he_PRP goes_VBZ to_TO bathe_VB
at_IN a_DT tank_NN with_IN great_JJ ceremonies_NNS and_CC sound_NN of_IN music_NN ,_, after_IN that_IN he_PRP
comes_VBZ to_TO the_DT idol_NN and_CC prays_NNS to_TO it_PRP ,_, and_CC mounts_NNS on_IN to_TO the_DT scaffolding_NN ,_,
and_CC there_RB before_IN all_PDT the_DT people_NNS he_PRP takes_VBZ some_DT very_RB sharp_JJ knives_NNS ,_, and_CC
begins_VBZ to_TO cut_VB off_RP his_PRP$ nose_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB his_PRP$ ears_NNS ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ lips_NNS ,_, and_CC all_PDT
his_PRP$ members_NNS ,_, and_CC as_IN much_JJ flesh_NN off_IN himself_PRP as_IN he_PRP can_MD ;_: and_CC he_PRP throws_VBZ
it_PRP away_RB very_RB hurriedly_RB until_IN so_RB much_RB of_IN his_PRP$ blood_NN is_VBZ spilled_VBN that_IN he_PRP
begins_VBZ to_TO faint_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP cuts_VBZ his_PRP$ throat_NN himself_PRP ._. And_CC he_PRP
performs_NNS this_DT sacrifice_NN to_TO the_DT idol_NN ,_, and_CC whoever_WP desires_VBZ to_TO reign_VB
another_DT twelve_CD years_NNS and_CC undertake_VB this_DT martyrdom_NN for_IN love_NN of_IN the_DT
idol_NN ,_, has_VBZ to_TO be_VB present_JJ looking_VBG on_IN at_IN this_DT :_: and_CC from_IN that_DT place_NN they_PRP
raise_VB him_PRP up_RP as_IN king_NN ."_.

The_DT king_NN of_IN Calicut_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT Malabar_NNP coast_NN ,_, bears_VBZ the_DT title_NN of_IN
Samorin_NNP or_CC Samory_NNP ._. He_PRP "_'' pretends_NNS to_TO be_VB of_IN a_DT higher_JJR rank_NN than_IN the_DT
Brahmans_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO be_VB inferior_JJ only_RB to_TO the_DT invisible_JJ gods_NNS ;_: a_DT
pretention_NN that_DT was_VBD acknowledged_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ subjects_NNS ,_, but_CC which_WDT is_VBZ held_VBN

The_DT festival_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT king_NN of_IN Calicut_NNP staked_VBD his_PRP$ crown_NN and_CC his_PRP$

fell_VBD every_DT twelfth_JJ year_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT planet_NN Jupiter_NNP was_VBD in_IN retrograde_NN

Ponnani_NNP River_NNP ._. The_DT spot_NN is_VBZ close_RB to_TO the_DT present_JJ railway_NN line_NN ._. As_IN the_DT
train_NN rushes_NNS by_IN ,_, you_PRP can_MD just_RB catch_VB a_DT glimpse_NN of_IN the_DT temple_NN ,_, almost_RB

traced_VBN ._. On_IN the_DT topmost_JJ of_IN these_DT terraces_NNS the_DT king_NN took_VBD his_PRP$ stand_NN on_IN
the_DT eventful_JJ day_NN ._. The_DT view_NN which_WDT it_PRP commands_VBZ is_VBZ a_DT fine_JJ one_CD ._. Across_IN
the_DT flat_JJ expanse_NN of_IN the_DT rice-fields_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT broad_JJ placid_JJ river_NN

Neilgherries_NNP or_CC Blue_NNP Mountains_NNPS ,_, hardly_RB distinguishable_JJ from_IN the_DT

But_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB to_TO the_DT distant_JJ prospect_NN that_IN the_DT king_NN '_'' s_PRP eyes_NNS

"_`` It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT singular_JJ custom_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP ,"_, says_VBZ an_DT old_JJ native_JJ historian_NN of_IN

the_DT throne_NN we_PRP are_VBP obedient_JJ and_CC true_JJ to_TO it_PRP .'"_IN A_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ
sort_NN formerly_RB prevailed_VBD in_IN the_DT little_JJ kingdom_NN of_IN Passier_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT
northern_JJ coast_NN of_IN Sumatra_NNP ._. The_DT old_JJ Portuguese_NNP historian_NN De_NNP Barros_NNP ,_,

subjects_NNS to_TO live_VB long_RB ._. From_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN a_DT sort_NN of_IN fury_NN seized_VBD the_DT

heard_VBN that_IN song_NN of_IN death_NN he_PRP knew_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ hour_NN had_VBD come_VBN ._. The_DT man_NN who_WP
struck_VBD the_DT fatal_JJ blow_NN was_VBD of_IN the_DT royal_JJ lineage_NN ,_, and_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP

regicide_NN did_VBD not_RB always_RB succeed_VB in_IN doing_VBG ._. When_WRB Fern_NNP �_NNP o_IN Peres_NNP
d_CC '_POS Andrade_NNP ,_, on_IN a_DT voyage_NN to_TO China_NNP ,_, put_VBD in_RP at_IN Passier_NNP for_IN a_DT cargo_NN of_IN

Indeed_RB ,_, on_IN one_CD occasion_NN three_CD kings_NNS were_VBD raised_VBN to_TO the_DT dangerous_JJ

When_WRB kings_NNS were_VBD bound_VBN to_TO suffer_VB death_NN ,_, whether_IN at_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ hands_NNS or_CC
at_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN others_NNS ,_, on_IN the_DT expiration_NN of_IN a_DT fixed_JJ term_NN of_IN years_NNS ,_,
it_PRP was_VBD natural_JJ that_IN they_PRP should_MD seek_VB to_TO delegate_VB the_DT painful_JJ duty_NN ,_,

to_TO have_VB been_VBN resorted_VBN to_TO by_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT princes_NNS of_IN Malabar_NNP ._. Thus_RB we_PRP
are_VBP informed_VBN by_IN a_DT native_JJ authority_NN on_IN that_DT country_NN that_IN "_`` in_IN some_DT

styled_VBN Thalavettiparothiam_NNP or_CC authority_NN obtained_VBN by_IN decapitation_NN ._.
._. ._. ._. It_PRP was_VBD an_DT office_NN tenable_NN for_IN five_CD years_NNS during_IN which_WDT its_PRP$ bearer_NN
was_VBD invested_VBN with_IN supreme_JJ despotic_JJ powers_NNS within_IN his_PRP$ jurisdiction_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT expiry_NN of_IN the_DT five_CD years_NNS the_DT man_NN '_POS s_PRP head_NN was_VBD cut_VBN off_RP and_CC
thrown_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT air_NN amongst_IN a_DT large_JJ concourse_NN of_IN villagers_NNS ,_, each_DT of_IN
whom_WP vied_VBD with_IN the_DT other_JJ in_IN trying_VBG to_TO catch_VB it_PRP in_IN its_PRP$ course_NN down_RB ._.
He_PRP who_WP succeeded_VBD was_VBD nominated_VBN to_TO the_DT post_NN for_IN the_DT next_JJ five_CD years_NNS ."_.

When_WRB once_RB kings_NNS ,_, who_WP had_VBD hitherto_VBN been_VBN bound_JJ to_TO die_VB a_DT violent_JJ death_NN
at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN a_DT term_NN of_IN years_NNS ,_, conceived_VBD the_DT happy_JJ thought_NN of_IN dying_VBG
by_IN deputy_NN in_IN the_DT persons_NNS of_IN others_NNS ,_, they_PRP would_MD very_RB naturally_RB put_VB it_PRP
in_IN practice_NN ;_: and_CC accordingly_RB we_PRP need_VBP not_RB wonder_VB at_IN finding_VBG so_RB
popular_JJ an_DT expedient_NN ,_, or_CC traces_NNS of_IN it_PRP ,_, in_IN many_JJ lands_NNS ._. Scandinavian_NN
traditions_NNS contain_VBP some_DT hints_NNS that_IN of_IN old_JJ the_DT Swedish_JJ kings_NNS reigned_VBN
only_RB for_IN periods_NNS of_IN nine_CD years_NNS ,_, after_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD put_VBN to_TO death_NN
or_CC had_VBD to_TO find_VB a_DT substitute_NN to_TO die_VB in_IN their_PRP$ stead_NN ._. Thus_RB Aun_NNP or_CC On_NNP ,_,

At_IN Babylon_NNP ,_, within_IN historical_JJ times_NNS ,_, the_DT tenure_NN of_IN the_DT kingly_RB office_NN

modifying_VBG the_DT stern_JJ old_JJ rule_NN is_VBZ seen_VBN in_IN the_DT Babylonian_NNP custom_NN just_RB

A_DT vestige_NN of_IN a_DT practice_NN of_IN putting_VBG the_DT king_NN to_TO death_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN a_DT

XXV_NNP ._. Temporary_NNP Kings_NNP

"_`` mountain_NN of_IN rice_NN ,"_, which_WDT was_VBD a_DT scaffold_NN of_IN bamboo_NN surrounded_VBN by_IN

Such_JJ were_VBD the_DT duties_NNS and_CC privileges_NNS of_IN the_DT Siamese_NNP King_NNP Hop_NNP down_IN to_TO

The_DT Mohammedan_NNP students_NNS of_IN Fez_NNP ,_, in_IN Morocco_NNP ,_, are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO appoint_VB a_DT
sultan_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, who_WP reigns_VBZ for_IN a_DT few_JJ weeks_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ known_VBN as_IN
Sultan_NNP t-tulba_NN ,_, "_'' the_DT Sultan_NNP of_IN the_DT Scribes_NNP ."_'' This_DT brief_JJ authority_NN
is_VBZ put_VBN up_RP for_IN auction_NN and_CC knocked_VBD down_RB to_TO the_DT highest_JJS bidder_NN ._. It_PRP
brings_VBZ some_DT substantial_JJ privileges_NNS with_IN it_PRP ,_, for_IN the_DT holder_NN is_VBZ freed_VBN
from_IN taxes_NNS thenceforward_RB ,_, and_CC he_PRP has_VBZ the_DT right_NN of_IN asking_VBG a_DT favour_NN
from_IN the_DT real_JJ sultan_NN ._. That_DT favour_NN is_VBZ seldom_RB refused_VBN ;_: it_PRP usually_RB
consists_VBZ in_IN the_DT release_NN of_IN a_DT prisoner_NN ._. Moreover_RB ,_, the_DT agents_NNS of_IN the_DT
student-sultan_NN levy_NN fines_NNS on_IN the_DT shopkeepers_NNS and_CC householders_NNS ,_,
against_IN whom_WP they_PRP trump_VBP up_IN various_JJ humorous_JJ charges_NNS ._. The_DT temporary_JJ
sultan_NN is_VBZ surrounded_VBN with_IN the_DT pomp_NN of_IN a_DT real_JJ court_NN ,_, and_CC parades_VBZ the_DT
streets_NNS in_IN state_NN with_IN music_NN and_CC shouting_NN ,_, while_IN a_DT royal_JJ umbrella_NN is_VBZ

provisions_NNS ,_, the_DT students_NNS have_VBP enough_RB to_TO furnish_VB forth_RB a_DT magnificent_JJ

been_VBN as_RB follows_VBZ ._. When_WRB Mulai_NNP Rasheed_NNP II_NNP ._. was_VBD fighting_VBG for_IN the_DT throne_NN
in_IN 1664_CD or_CC 1665,_CD a_DT certain_JJ Jew_NNP usurped_VBD the_DT royal_JJ authority_NN at_IN Taza_NNP ._.
But_CC the_DT rebellion_NN was_VBD soon_RB suppressed_VBN through_IN the_DT loyalty_NN and_CC

which_WDT the_DT real_JJ meaning_NN and_CC origin_NN had_VBD been_VBN forgotten_VBN ._.

A_DT custom_NN of_IN annually_RB appointing_VBG a_DT mock_JJ king_NN for_IN a_DT single_JJ day_NN was_VBD
observed_VBN at_IN Lostwithiel_NNP in_IN Cornwall_NNP down_IN to_TO the_DT sixteenth_JJ century_NN ._.
On_IN "_`` little_JJ Easter_JJ Sunday_NNP "_'' the_DT freeholders_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC manor_NN

the_DT estate_NN of_IN a_DT prince_NN ._. The_DT ceremony_NN ended_VBD with_IN the_DT dinner_NN ,_, and_CC
every_DT man_NN returned_VBD home_NN ._.

Sometimes_RB the_DT temporary_JJ king_NN occupies_VBZ the_DT throne_NN ,_, not_RB annually_RB ,_, but_CC

the_DT four_CD elder_JJR of_IN whom_WP all_DT declined_VBD the_DT throne_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN of_IN
various_JJ bodily_JJ defects_NNS ,_, leaving_VBG it_PRP to_TO their_PRP$ youngest_JJS brother_NN ._. But_CC

descendants_NNS a_DT similar_JJ privilege_NN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN every_DT reign_NN ._.
Thus_RB the_DT office_NN of_IN temporary_JJ king_NN is_VBZ hereditary_RB in_IN a_DT family_NN akin_JJ to_TO
the_DT royal_JJ house_NN ._. In_IN Bilaspur_FW it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT custom_NN ,_, after_IN the_DT
death_NN of_IN a_DT Rajah_NNP ,_, for_IN a_DT Brahman_NNP to_TO eat_VB rice_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ Rajah_NNP '_POS s_PRP
hand_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB to_TO occupy_VB the_DT throne_NN for_IN a_DT year_NN ._. At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT
year_NN the_DT Brahman_NNP receives_VBZ presents_NNS and_CC is_VBZ dismissed_VBN from_IN the_DT
territory_NN ,_, being_VBG forbidden_VBN apparently_RB to_TO return_VB ._. "_'' The_DT idea_NN seems_VBZ to_TO
be_VB that_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT R_NN �_VBZ j_RB �_RB enters_VBZ into_IN the_DT Br_NNP �_NNP hman_NN who_WP eats_VBZ the_DT
khir_NN (_-LRB- rice_NN and_CC milk_NN )_-RRB- out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN when_WRB he_PRP is_VBZ dead_JJ ,_, as_IN the_DT
Brahman_NNP is_VBZ apparently_RB carefully_RB watched_VBN during_IN the_DT whole_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC

him_PRP to_TO death_NN ._. At_IN the_DT installation_NN of_IN a_DT prince_NN of_IN Carinthia_NNP a_DT

on_IN his_PRP$ right_NN stood_VBD a_DT black_JJ mother-cow_NN ,_, on_IN his_PRP$ left_NN a_DT lean_JJ ugly_JJ mare_NN ._.
A_DT rustic_JJ crowd_NN gathered_VBD about_IN him_PRP ._. Then_RB the_DT future_JJ prince_NN ,_, dressed_VBN

"_`` Who_WP is_VBZ this_DT whom_WP I_PRP see_VBP coming_VBG so_RB proudly_RB along_IN ?"_IN The_DT people_NNS
answered_VBN ,_, "_`` The_DT prince_NN of_IN the_DT land_NN ."_IN The_DT peasant_NN was_VBD then_RB prevailed_VBN

But_CC before_IN yielding_VBG his_PRP$ place_NN he_PRP gave_VBD the_DT prince_NN a_DT light_JJ blow_NN on_IN the_DT

Some_DT points_NNS about_IN these_DT temporary_JJ kings_NNS deserve_VBP to_TO be_VB specially_RB

is_VBZ especially_RB the_DT divine_JJ or_CC magical_JJ functions_NNS of_IN the_DT king_NN which_WDT are_VBP
transferred_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ temporary_JJ substitute_JJ ._. This_DT appears_VBZ from_IN the_DT
belief_NN that_IN by_IN keeping_VBG up_RP his_PRP$ foot_NN the_DT temporary_JJ king_NN of_IN Siam_NNP gained_VBN
a_DT victory_NN over_IN the_DT evil_JJ spirits_NNS ,_, whereas_IN by_IN letting_VBG it_PRP down_IN he_PRP
imperilled_VBN the_DT existence_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT Cambodian_JJ ceremony_NN
of_IN trampling_VBG down_IN the_DT "_`` mountain_NN of_IN rice_NN ,"_, and_CC the_DT Siamese_NNP ceremony_NN
of_IN opening_VBG the_DT ploughing_NN and_CC sowing_NN ,_, are_VBP charms_NNS to_TO produce_VB a_DT

home_NN some_DT of_IN the_DT trampled_JJ rice_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN the_DT seed_NN sown_NN ,_, will_MD thereby_RB
secure_VB a_DT good_JJ crop_NN ._. Moreover_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT Siamese_NNP representative_NN of_IN the_DT
king_NN is_VBZ guiding_VBG the_DT plough_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS watch_VBP him_PRP anxiously_RB ,_, not_RB to_TO
see_VB whether_IN he_PRP drives_VBZ a_DT straight_JJ furrow_NN ,_, but_CC to_TO mark_VB the_DT exact_JJ point_NN
on_IN his_PRP$ leg_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT skirt_NN of_IN his_PRP$ silken_JJ robe_NN reaches_VBZ ;_: for_IN on_IN
that_WDT is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO hang_VB the_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT weather_NN and_CC the_DT crops_NNS
during_IN the_DT ensuing_VBG season_NN ._. If_IN the_DT Lord_NNP of_IN the_DT Heavenly_NNP Hosts_NNS hitches_NNS
up_IN his_PRP$ garment_NN above_IN his_PRP$ knee_NN ,_, the_DT weather_NN will_MD be_VB wet_JJ and_CC heavy_JJ
rains_NNS will_MD spoil_VB the_DT harvest_NN ._. If_IN he_PRP lets_VBZ it_PRP trail_VB to_TO his_PRP$ ankle_NN ,_, a_DT
drought_NN will_MD be_VB the_DT consequence_NN ._. But_CC fine_JJ weather_NN and_CC heavy_JJ crops_NNS
will_MD follow_VB if_IN the_DT hem_NN of_IN his_PRP$ robe_NN hangs_VBZ exactly_RB half-way_RB down_IN the_DT
calf_NN of_IN his_PRP$ leg_NN ._. So_CC closely_RB is_VBZ the_DT course_NN of_IN nature_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN it_PRP the_DT
weal_NN or_CC woe_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, dependent_JJ on_IN the_DT minutest_NN act_NN or_CC gesture_NN
of_IN the_DT king_NN '_POS s_PRP representative_JJ ._. But_CC the_DT task_NN of_IN making_VBG the_DT crops_NNS grow_VBP ,_,
thus_RB deputed_VBN to_TO the_DT temporary_JJ kings_NNS ,_, is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT magical_JJ functions_NNS
regularly_RB supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB discharged_VBN by_IN kings_NNS in_IN primitive_JJ society_NN ._.
The_DT rule_NN that_IN the_DT mock_JJ king_NN must_MD stand_VB on_IN one_CD foot_NN upon_IN a_DT raised_VBN
seat_NN in_IN the_DT rice-field_NN was_VBD perhaps_RB originally_RB meant_VBN as_IN a_DT charm_NN to_TO
make_VB the_DT crop_NN grow_VBP high_JJ ;_: at_IN least_JJS this_DT was_VBD the_DT object_NN of_IN a_DT similar_JJ
ceremony_NN observed_VBN by_IN the_DT old_JJ Prussians_NNS ._. The_DT tallest_JJS girl_NN ,_, standing_VBG
on_IN one_CD foot_NN upon_IN a_DT seat_NN ,_, with_IN her_PRP$ lap_NN full_JJ of_IN cakes_NNS ,_, a_DT cup_NN of_IN brandy_NN
in_IN her_PRP$ right_JJ hand_NN and_CC a_DT piece_NN of_IN elm-bark_NN or_CC linden-bark_NN in_IN her_PRP$

as_IN she_PRP was_VBD standing_VBG ._. Then_RB ,_, after_IN draining_VBG the_DT cup_NN ,_, she_PRP had_VBD it_PRP
refilled_VBN ,_, and_CC poured_VBD the_DT brandy_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN as_IN an_DT offering_NN to_TO
Waizganthos_NNP ,_, and_CC threw_VBD down_RP the_DT cakes_NNS for_IN his_PRP$ attendant_JJ sprites_NNS ._. If_IN
she_PRP remained_VBD steady_JJ on_IN one_CD foot_NN throughout_IN the_DT ceremony_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD an_DT

it_PRP was_VBD feared_VBN that_IN the_DT crop_NN might_MD fail_VB ._. The_DT same_JJ significance_NN
perhaps_RB attaches_NNS to_TO the_DT swinging_VBG of_IN the_DT Brahmans_NNPS ,_, which_WDT the_DT Lord_NNP of_IN
the_DT Heavenly_NNP Hosts_NNP had_VBD formerly_RB to_TO witness_NN standing_NN on_IN one_CD foot_NN ._. On_IN
the_DT principles_NNS of_IN homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ magic_NN it_PRP might_MD be_VB
thought_VBD that_IN the_DT higher_JJR the_DT priests_NNS swing_VBP the_DT higher_JJR will_MD grow_VB the_DT
rice_NN ._. For_IN the_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ described_VBN as_IN a_DT harvest_NN festival_NN ,_, and_CC
swinging_VBG is_VBZ practised_VBN by_IN the_DT Letts_NNP of_IN Russia_NNP with_IN the_DT avowed_VBN
intention_NN of_IN influencing_VBG the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT spring_NN and_CC
early_JJ summer_NN ,_, between_IN Easter_NNP and_CC St_NNP ._. John_NNP '_POS s_PRP Day_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT summer_NN
solstice_NN ),_, every_DT Lettish_NNP peasant_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO devote_VB his_PRP$ leisure_NN hours_NNS
to_TO swinging_VBG diligently_RB ;_: for_IN the_DT higher_JJR he_PRP rises_VBZ in_IN the_DT air_NN the_DT
higher_JJR will_MD his_PRP$ flax_NN grow_VB that_IN season_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ cases_NNS the_DT temporary_JJ king_NN is_VBZ appointed_VBN annually_RB in_IN
accordance_NN with_IN a_DT regular_JJ custom_NN ._. But_CC in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS the_DT appointment_NN
is_VBZ made_VBN only_RB to_TO meet_VB a_DT special_JJ emergency_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN to_TO relieve_VB the_DT
real_JJ king_NN from_IN some_DT actual_JJ or_CC threatened_VBN evil_JJ by_IN diverting_VBG it_PRP to_TO a_DT
substitute_NN ,_, who_WP takes_VBZ his_PRP$ place_NN on_IN the_DT throne_NN for_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN ._. The_DT
history_NN of_IN Persia_NNP furnishes_VBZ instances_NNS of_IN such_JJ occasional_JJ substitutes_NNS
for_IN the_DT Shah_NNP ._. Thus_RB Shah_WRB Abbas_NNP the_DT Great_NNP ,_, being_VBG warned_VBN by_IN his_PRP$
astrologers_NNS in_IN the_DT year_NN 1591_CD that_IN a_DT serious_JJ danger_NN impended_VBN over_IN
him_PRP ,_, attempted_VBD to_TO avert_VB the_DT omen_NNS by_IN abdicating_VBG the_DT throne_NN and_CC
appointing_VBG a_DT certain_JJ unbeliever_IN named_VBN Yusoofee_NNP ,_, probably_RB a_DT
Christian_NNP ,_, to_TO reign_VB in_IN his_PRP$ stead_NN ._. The_DT substitute_NN was_VBD accordingly_RB
crowned_VBN ,_, and_CC for_IN three_CD days_NNS ,_, if_IN we_PRP may_MD trust_VB the_DT Persian_JJ historians_NNS ,_,
he_PRP enjoyed_VBD not_RB only_RB the_DT name_NN and_CC the_DT state_NN but_CC the_DT power_NN of_IN the_DT
king_NN ._. At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN his_PRP$ brief_JJ reign_NN he_PRP was_VBD put_VBN to_TO death_NN :_: the_DT decree_NN
of_IN the_DT stars_NNS was_VBD fulfilled_VBN by_IN this_DT sacrifice_NN ;_: and_CC Abbas_NNP ,_, who_WP
reascended_VBD his_PRP$ throne_NN in_IN a_DT most_RBS propitious_JJ hour_NN ,_, was_VBD promised_VBN by_IN his_PRP$
astrologers_NNS a_DT long_JJ and_CC glorious_JJ reign_NN ._.



XXVI_NNP ._. Sacrifice_NNP of_IN the_DT King_NNP '_POS s_PRP Son_NN

A_DT POINT_NNP to_TO notice_VB about_IN the_DT temporary_JJ kings_NNS described_VBN in_IN the_DT
foregoing_JJ chapter_NN is_VBZ that_IN in_IN two_CD places_NNS (_-LRB- Cambodia_NNP and_CC Jambi_NNP )_-RRB- they_PRP
come_VBN of_IN a_DT stock_NN which_WDT is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO be_VB akin_JJ to_TO the_DT royal_JJ family_NN ._. If_IN
the_DT view_NN here_RB taken_VBN of_IN the_DT origin_NN of_IN these_DT temporary_JJ kingships_NNS is_VBZ
correct_JJ ,_, we_PRP can_MD easily_RB understand_VB why_WRB the_DT king_NN '_POS s_VBZ substitute_NN should_MD
sometimes_RB be_VB of_IN the_DT same_JJ race_NN as_IN the_DT king_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT king_NN first_RB
succeeded_VBN in_IN getting_VBG the_DT life_NN of_IN another_DT accepted_VBN as_IN a_DT sacrifice_NN
instead_RB of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, he_PRP would_MD have_VB to_TO show_VB that_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN that_WDT
other_JJ would_MD serve_VB the_DT purpose_NN quite_RB as_RB well_RB as_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ would_MD have_VB
done_VBN ._. Now_RB it_PRP was_VBD as_IN a_DT god_NN or_CC demigod_NN that_IN the_DT king_NN had_VBD to_TO die_VB ;_:
therefore_RB the_DT substitute_NN who_WP died_VBD for_IN him_PRP had_VBD to_TO be_VB invested_VBN ,_, at_IN
least_JJS for_IN the_DT occasion_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT divine_JJ attributes_NNS of_IN the_DT king_NN ._.
This_DT ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP just_RB seen_VBN ,_, was_VBD certainly_RB the_DT case_NN with_IN the_DT
temporary_JJ kings_NNS of_IN Siam_NNP and_CC Cambodia_NNP ;_: they_PRP were_VBD invested_VBN with_IN the_DT
supernatural_JJ functions_NNS ,_, which_WDT in_IN an_DT earlier_JJR stage_NN of_IN society_NN were_VBD
the_DT special_JJ attributes_NNS of_IN the_DT king_NN ._. But_CC no_DT one_NN could_MD so_RB well_RB
represent_VB the_DT king_NN in_IN his_PRP$ divine_JJ character_NN as_IN his_PRP$ son_NN ,_, who_WP might_MD be_VB
supposed_VBN to_TO share_VB the_DT divine_JJ afflatus_NN of_IN his_PRP$ father_NN ._. No_DT one_NN ,_,
therefore_RB ,_, could_MD so_RB appropriately_RB die_VBP for_IN the_DT king_NN and_CC ,_, through_IN him_PRP ,_,
for_IN the_DT whole_JJ people_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT king_NN '_'' s_PRP son_NN ._.

We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN according_VBG to_TO tradition_NN ,_, Aun_NNP or_CC On_IN ,_, King_NNP of_IN Sweden_NNP ,_,
sacrificed_JJ nine_CD of_IN his_PRP$ sons_NNS to_TO Odin_NNP at_IN Upsala_NNP in_IN order_NN that_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ
life_NN might_MD be_VB spared_VBN ._. After_IN he_PRP had_VBD sacrificed_VBN his_PRP$ second_JJ son_NN he_PRP

gave_VBD him_PRP one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ sons_NNS every_DT ninth_JJ year_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP had_VBD sacrificed_VBN
his_PRP$ seventh_JJ son_NN ,_, he_PRP still_RB lived_VBD ,_, but_CC was_VBD so_RB feeble_JJ that_IN he_PRP could_MD not_RB
walk_NN but_CC had_VBD to_TO be_VB carried_VBN in_IN a_DT chair_NN ._. Then_RB he_PRP offered_VBD up_IN his_PRP$ eighth_JJ
son_NN ,_, and_CC lived_VBD nine_CD years_NNS more_RBR ,_, lying_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ bed_NN ._. After_IN that_IN he_PRP
sacrificed_VBD his_PRP$ ninth_JJ son_NN ,_, and_CC lived_VBD another_DT nine_CD years_NNS ,_, but_CC so_RB that_IN
he_PRP drank_VBD out_IN of_IN a_DT horn_NN like_IN a_DT weaned_JJ child_NN ._. He_PRP now_RB wished_VBD to_TO
sacrifice_VB his_PRP$ only_JJ remaining_VBG son_NN to_TO Odin_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT Swedes_NNPS would_MD not_RB
allow_VB him_PRP ._. So_RB he_PRP died_VBD and_CC was_VBD buried_VBN in_IN a_DT mound_NN at_IN Upsala_NNP ._.

In_IN ancient_JJ Greece_NNP there_EX seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN at_IN least_JJS one_CD kingly_RB house_NN
of_IN great_JJ antiquity_NN of_IN which_WDT the_DT eldest_JJ sons_NNS were_VBD always_RB liable_JJ to_TO be_VB
sacrificed_JJ in_IN room_NN of_IN their_PRP$ royal_JJ sires_NNS ._. When_WRB Xerxes_NNP was_VBD marching_VBG

When_WRB Athamas_NNP heard_VBD that_IN ,_, he_PRP sent_VBD for_IN the_DT children_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD with_IN the_DT

The_DT suspicion_NN that_IN this_DT barbarous_JJ custom_NN by_IN no_DT means_NNS fell_VBD into_IN

In_IN Plutarch_NNP '_POS s_PRP lifetime_NN the_DT right_NN was_VBD actually_RB exercised_VBN by_IN a_DT priest_NN
Zoilus_NNP ._. The_DT family_NN thus_RB liable_JJ to_TO furnish_VB at_IN least_JJS one_CD human_JJ victim_NN

Now_RB this_DT practice_NN of_IN taking_VBG human_JJ victims_NNS from_IN a_DT family_NN of_IN royal_JJ
descent_NN at_IN Orchomenus_NNP is_VBZ all_DT the_DT more_RBR significant_JJ because_IN Athamas_NNP
himself_PRP is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO have_VB reigned_VBN in_IN the_DT land_NN of_IN Orchomenus_NNP even_RB

that_IN obtained_VBN with_IN regard_NN to_TO his_PRP$ descendants_NNS in_IN historical_JJ times_NNS ,_, we_PRP
may_MD fairly_RB infer_VB that_IN in_IN Thessaly_NNP and_CC probably_RB in_IN Boeotia_NNP there_EX
reigned_NN of_IN old_JJ a_DT dynasty_NN of_IN which_WDT the_DT kings_NNS were_VBD liable_JJ to_TO be_VB

the_DT altar_NN ._. As_IN time_NN went_VBD on_IN ,_, the_DT cruel_JJ custom_NN was_VBD so_RB far_RB mitigated_VBN
that_IN a_DT ram_NN was_VBD accepted_VBN as_IN a_DT vicarious_JJ sacrifice_NN in_IN room_NN of_IN the_DT

no_DT help_NN for_IN it_PRP but_CC he_PRP must_MD die_VB ._. The_DT tradition_NN which_WDT associated_VBN the_DT
sacrifice_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN or_CC his_PRP$ children_NNS with_IN a_DT great_JJ dearth_NN points_NNS
clearly_RB to_TO the_DT belief_NN ,_, so_RB common_JJ among_IN primitive_JJ folk_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT king_NN
is_VBZ responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT weather_NN and_CC the_DT crops_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP may_MD justly_RB
pay_NN with_IN his_PRP$ life_NN for_IN the_DT inclemency_NN of_IN the_DT one_CD or_CC the_DT failure_NN of_IN
the_DT other_JJ ._. Athamas_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ line_NN ,_, in_IN short_JJ ,_, appear_VB to_TO have_VB united_VBN
divine_JJ or_CC magical_JJ with_IN royal_JJ functions_NNS ;_: and_CC this_DT view_NN is_VBZ strongly_RB
supported_VBN by_IN the_DT claims_NNS to_TO divinity_NN which_WDT Salmoneus_NNP ,_, the_DT brother_NN of_IN

mortal_JJ professed_JJ to_TO be_VB no_DT other_JJ than_IN Zeus_NNP himself_PRP ,_, and_CC to_TO wield_VB the_DT
thunder_NN and_CC lightning_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT he_PRP made_VBD a_DT trumpery_JJ imitation_NN by_IN the_DT
help_NN of_IN tinkling_VBG kettles_NNS and_CC blazing_VBG torches_NNS ._. If_IN we_PRP may_MD judge_VB from_IN
analogy_NN ,_, his_PRP$ mock_JJ thunder_NN and_CC lightning_NN were_VBD no_DT mere_JJ scenic_NN
exhibition_NN designed_VBN to_TO deceive_VB and_CC impress_VB the_DT beholders_NNS ;_: they_PRP were_VBD

bringing_VBG about_IN the_DT celestial_JJ phenomena_NNS which_WDT they_PRP feebly_RB mimicked_VBD ._.

Among_IN the_DT Semites_NNS of_IN Western_NNP Asia_NNP the_DT king_NN ,_, in_IN a_DT time_NN of_IN national_JJ
danger_NN ,_, sometimes_RB gave_VBD his_PRP$ own_JJ son_NN to_TO die_VB as_IN a_DT sacrifice_NN for_IN the_DT
people_NNS ._. Thus_RB Philo_NNP of_IN Byblus_NNP ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ work_NN on_IN the_DT Jews_NNPS ,_, says_VBZ :_: "_`` It_PRP was_VBD
an_DT ancient_JJ custom_NN in_IN a_DT crisis_NN of_IN great_JJ danger_NN that_IN the_DT ruler_NN of_IN a_DT
city_NN or_CC nation_NN should_MD give_VB his_PRP$ beloved_JJ son_NN to_TO die_VB for_IN the_DT whole_NN
people_NNS ,_, as_IN a_DT ransom_NN offered_VBN to_TO the_DT avenging_VBG demons_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT children_NNS
thus_RB offered_VBN were_VBD slain_VB with_IN mystic_JJ rites_NNS ._. So_RB Cronus_NNP ,_, whom_WP the_DT
Phoenicians_NNS call_VBP Israel_NNP ,_, being_VBG king_NN of_IN the_DT land_NN and_CC having_VBG an_DT
only-begotten_JJ son_NN called_VBD Jeoud_NNP (_-LRB- for_IN in_IN the_DT Phoenician_JJ tongue_NN Jeoud_.
signifies_NNS '_POS only_RB begotten_VBN '),_, dressed_VBN him_PRP in_IN royal_JJ robes_NNS and_CC
sacrificed_JJ him_PRP upon_IN an_DT altar_NN in_IN a_DT time_NN of_IN war_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT country_NN was_VBD
in_IN great_JJ danger_NN from_IN the_DT enemy_NN ."_NN When_WRB the_DT king_NN of_IN Moab_NNP was_VBD besieged_VBN
by_IN the_DT Israelites_NNPS and_CC hard_JJ beset_JJ ,_, he_PRP took_VBD his_PRP$ eldest_JJ son_NN ,_, who_WP should_MD
have_VBP reigned_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ stead_NN ,_, and_CC offered_VBD him_PRP for_IN a_DT burnt_JJ offering_NN on_IN
the_DT wall_NN ._.



XXVII_NNP ._. Succession_NNP to_TO the_DT Soul_NNP

TO_TO THE_DT VIEW_NNP that_IN in_IN early_JJ times_NNS ,_, and_CC among_IN barbarous_JJ races_NNS ,_, kings_NNS
have_VBP frequently_RB been_VBN put_VBN to_TO death_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN a_DT short_JJ reign_NN ,_, it_PRP
may_MD be_VB objected_VBN that_IN such_JJ a_DT custom_NN would_MD tend_VB to_TO the_DT extinction_NN of_IN
the_DT royal_JJ family_NN ._. The_DT objection_NN may_MD be_VB met_VBN by_IN observing_VBG ,_, first_RB ,_, that_IN
the_DT kingship_NN is_VBZ often_RB not_RB confined_VBN to_TO one_CD family_NN ,_, but_CC may_MD be_VB shared_VBN
in_IN turn_NN by_IN several_JJ ;_: second_JJ ,_, that_IN the_DT office_NN is_VBZ frequently_RB not_RB
hereditary_RB ,_, but_CC is_VBZ open_JJ to_TO men_NNS of_IN any_DT family_NN ,_, even_RB to_TO foreigners_NNS ,_,
who_WP may_MD fulfil_VB the_DT requisite_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN marrying_VBG a_DT princess_NN
or_CC vanquishing_VBG the_DT king_NN in_IN battle_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, third_JJ ,_, that_IN even_RB if_IN the_DT
custom_NN did_VBD tend_VB to_TO the_DT extinction_NN of_IN a_DT dynasty_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ not_RB a_DT
consideration_NN which_WDT would_MD prevent_VB its_PRP$ observance_NN among_IN people_NNS less_RBR
provident_NN of_IN the_DT future_NN and_CC less_JJR heedful_NN of_IN human_JJ life_NN than_IN
ourselves_PRP ._. Many_JJ races_NNS ,_, like_IN many_JJ individuals_NNS ,_, have_VBP indulged_VBN in_IN
practices_NNS which_WDT must_MD in_IN the_DT end_NN destroy_VB them_PRP ._. The_DT Polynesians_NNPS seem_VBP
regularly_RB to_TO have_VB killed_VBN two-thirds_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ children_NNS ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS
of_IN East_NNP Africa_NNP the_DT proportion_NN of_IN infants_NNS massacred_VBN at_IN birth_NN is_VBZ said_VBN
to_TO be_VB the_DT same_JJ ._. Only_JJ children_NNS born_VBN in_IN certain_JJ presentations_NNS are_VBP
allowed_VBN to_TO live_VB ._. The_DT Jagas_NNP ,_, a_DT conquering_NN tribe_NN in_IN Angola_NNP ,_, are_VBP
reported_VBN to_TO have_VB put_VBN to_TO death_NN all_DT their_PRP$ children_NNS ,_, without_IN exception_NN ,_,
in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT women_NNS might_MD not_RB be_VB cumbered_VBN with_IN babies_NNS on_IN the_DT
march_NN ._. They_PRP recruited_VBD their_PRP$ numbers_NNS by_IN adopting_VBG boys_NNS and_CC girls_NNS of_IN
thirteen_CD or_CC fourteen_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, whose_WP$ parents_NNS they_PRP had_VBD killed_VBN and_CC
eaten_VBN ._. Among_IN the_DT Mbaya_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN South_NNP America_NNP the_DT women_NNS used_VBD to_TO
murder_NN all_DT their_PRP$ children_NNS except_IN the_DT last_JJ ,_, or_CC the_DT one_NN they_PRP believed_VBD
to_TO be_VB the_DT last_JJ ._. If_IN one_CD of_IN them_PRP had_VBD another_DT child_NN afterwards_RB ,_, she_PRP
killed_VBN it_PRP ._. We_PRP need_VBP not_RB wonder_VB that_IN this_DT practice_NN entirely_RB destroyed_VBN
a_DT branch_NN of_IN the_DT Mbaya_NNP nation_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN for_IN many_JJ years_NNS the_DT most_RBS
formidable_JJ enemies_NNS of_IN the_DT Spaniards_NNS ._. Among_IN the_DT Lengua_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN the_DT
Gran_NNP Chaco_NNP ,_, the_DT missionaries_NNS discovered_VBD what_WP they_PRP describe_VBP as_IN "_`` a_DT
carefully_RB planned_VBD system_NN of_IN racial_JJ suicide_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN
infanticide_NN by_IN abortion_NN ,_, and_CC other_JJ methods_NNS ."_JJ Nor_CC is_VBZ infanticide_IN the_DT
only_RB mode_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT savage_JJ tribe_NN commits_NNS suicide_NN ._. A_DT lavish_JJ use_NN of_IN
the_DT poison_NN ordeal_NN may_MD be_VB equally_RB effective_JJ ._. Some_DT time_NN ago_IN a_DT small_JJ
tribe_NN named_VBN Uwet_NNP came_VBD down_RB from_IN the_DT hill_NN country_NN ,_, and_CC settled_VBD on_IN the_DT
left_JJ branch_NN of_IN the_DT Calabar_NNP River_NNP in_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP ._. When_WRB the_DT
missionaries_NNS first_RB visited_VBD the_DT place_NN ,_, they_PRP found_VBD the_DT population_NN
considerable_JJ ,_, distributed_VBN into_IN three_CD villages_NNS ._. Since_IN then_RB the_DT
constant_JJ use_NN of_IN the_DT poison_NN ordeal_NN has_VBZ almost_RB extinguished_VBN the_DT tribe_NN ._.
On_IN one_CD occasion_NN the_DT whole_JJ population_NN took_VBD poison_NN to_TO prove_VB their_PRP$
innocence_NN ._. About_IN half_NN perished_VBD on_IN the_DT spot_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT remnant_NN ,_, we_PRP are_VBP

The_DT explanation_NN here_RB given_VBN of_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN killing_VBG divine_JJ persons_NNS
assumes_VBZ ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS is_VBZ readily_RB combined_VBN with_IN ,_, the_DT idea_NN that_IN the_DT

successor_NN is_VBZ perfectly_RB familiar_JJ to_TO primitive_JJ peoples_NNS ._. In_IN Nias_NNP the_DT

and_CC with_IN it_PRP the_DT soul_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT dying_VBG chief_JJ ._. For_IN whoever_WP catches_VBZ his_PRP$
last_JJ breath_NN is_VBZ chief_JJ equally_RB with_IN the_DT appointed_VBN successor_NN ._. Hence_RB the_DT
other_JJ brothers_NNS ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB also_RB strangers_NNS ,_, crowd_NN round_IN the_DT dying_VBG
man_NN to_TO catch_VB his_PRP$ soul_NN as_IN it_PRP passes_VBZ ._. The_DT houses_NNS in_IN Nias_NNP are_VBP raised_VBN
above_IN the_DT ground_NN on_IN posts_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ happened_VBN that_IN when_WRB the_DT dying_VBG
man_NN lay_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ face_NN on_IN the_DT floor_NN ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT candidates_NNS has_VBZ bored_VBN
a_DT hole_NN in_IN the_DT floor_NN and_CC sucked_VBD in_IN the_DT chief_NN '_POS s_VBZ last_JJ breath_NN through_IN a_DT
bamboo_JJ tube_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT chief_NN has_VBZ no_DT son_NN ,_, his_PRP$ soul_NN is_VBZ caught_VBN in_IN a_DT bag_NN ,_,
which_WDT is_VBZ fastened_VBN to_TO an_DT image_NN made_VBN to_TO represent_VB the_DT deceased_JJ ;_: the_DT
soul_NN is_VBZ then_RB believed_VBN to_TO pass_VB into_IN the_DT image_NN ._.

Sometimes_RB it_PRP would_MD appear_VB that_IN the_DT spiritual_JJ link_NN between_IN a_DT king_NN and_CC
the_DT souls_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ predecessors_NNS is_VBZ formed_VBN by_IN the_DT possession_NN of_IN some_DT
part_NN of_IN their_PRP$ persons_NNS ._. In_IN southern_JJ Celebes_NNP the_DT regalia_NNS often_RB consist_VBP

bound_VBN to_TO pay_VB it_PRP honours_VBZ ._. Sometimes_RB ,_, in_IN order_NN apparently_RB that_IN the_DT new_JJ

is_VBZ still_RB practised_VBN at_IN Ibadan_NNP ,_, a_DT large_JJ town_NN in_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN Lagos_NNP ,_,
West_NNP Africa_NNP ._. When_WRB the_DT king_NN dies_VBZ his_PRP$ head_NN is_VBZ cut_VBN off_RP and_CC sent_VBD to_TO his_PRP$
nominal_JJ suzerain_NN ,_, the_DT Alafin_NNP of_IN Oyo_NNP ,_, the_DT paramount_JJ king_NN of_IN Yoruba_NNP
land_NN ;_: but_CC his_PRP$ heart_NN is_VBZ eaten_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ successor_NN ._. This_DT ceremony_NN was_VBD
performed_VBN not_RB very_RB many_JJ years_NNS ago_RB at_IN the_DT accession_NN of_IN a_DT new_JJ king_NN of_IN
Ibadan_NNP ._.

Taking_VBG the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT preceding_VBG evidence_NN into_IN account_NN ,_, we_PRP may_MD
fairly_RB suppose_VBP that_IN when_WRB the_DT divine_JJ king_NN or_CC priest_NN is_VBZ put_VBN to_TO death_NN
his_PRP$ spirit_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO pass_VB into_IN his_PRP$ successor_NN ._. In_IN point_NN of_IN fact_NN ,_,

kings_NNS ,_, every_DT king_NN on_IN his_PRP$ accession_NN has_VBZ to_TO perform_VB a_DT ceremony_NN which_WDT

the_DT throne_NN ._.



XXVIII_NNP ._. The_DT Killing_NNP of_IN the_DT Tree-Spirit_NN



1._DT The_DT Whitsuntide_NNP Mummers_NNP

IT_PRP remains_VBZ to_TO ask_VB what_WP light_NN the_DT custom_NN of_IN killing_VBG the_DT divine_JJ king_NN
or_CC priest_NN sheds_NNS upon_IN the_DT special_JJ subject_NN to_TO our_PRP$ enquiry_NN ._. In_IN an_DT
earlier_JJR part_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN we_PRP saw_VBD reason_NN to_TO suppose_VB that_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN
the_DT Wood_NNP at_IN Nemi_NNP was_VBD regarded_VBN as_IN an_DT incarnation_NN of_IN a_DT tree-spirit_NN or_CC
of_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN as_IN such_JJ he_PRP would_MD be_VB endowed_VBN ,_,
in_IN the_DT belief_NN of_IN his_PRP$ worshippers_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT magical_JJ power_NN of_IN making_VBG the_DT
trees_NNS to_TO bear_VB fruit_NN ,_, the_DT crops_NNS to_TO grow_VB ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ._. His_PRP$ life_NN must_MD
therefore_RB have_VBP been_VBN held_VBN very_RB precious_JJ by_IN his_PRP$ worshippers_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD
probably_RB hedged_VBD in_IN by_IN a_DT system_NN of_IN elaborate_JJ precautions_NNS or_CC taboos_NNS
like_IN those_DT by_IN which_WDT ,_, in_IN so_RB many_JJ places_NNS ,_, the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT man-god_NN has_VBZ
been_VBN guarded_VBN against_IN the_DT malignant_JJ influence_NN of_IN demons_NNS and_CC
sorcerers_NNS ._. But_CC we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN the_DT very_JJ value_NN attached_VBN to_TO the_DT life_NN
of_IN the_DT man-god_NN necessitates_VBZ his_PRP$ violent_JJ death_NN as_IN the_DT only_JJ means_NNS of_IN
preserving_VBG it_PRP from_IN the_DT inevitable_JJ decay_NN of_IN age_NN ._. The_DT same_JJ reasoning_NN
would_MD apply_VB to_TO the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ;_: he_PRP ,_, too_RB ,_, had_VBD to_TO be_VB killed_VBN in_IN
order_NN that_IN the_DT divine_JJ spirit_NN ,_, incarnate_JJ in_IN him_PRP ,_, might_MD be_VB transferred_VBN
in_IN its_PRP$ integrity_NN to_TO his_PRP$ successor_NN ._. The_DT rule_NN that_IN he_PRP held_VBD office_NN till_IN
a_DT stronger_JJR should_MD slay_VB him_PRP might_MD be_VB supposed_VBN to_TO secure_VB both_DT the_DT
preservation_NN of_IN his_PRP$ divine_JJ life_NN in_IN full_JJ vigour_NN and_CC its_PRP$ transference_NN
to_TO a_DT suitable_JJ successor_NN as_RB soon_RB as_IN that_DT vigour_NN began_VBD to_TO be_VB impaired_VBN ._.
For_IN so_RB long_JJ as_IN he_PRP could_MD maintain_VB his_PRP$ position_NN by_IN the_DT strong_JJ hand_NN ,_, it_PRP
might_MD be_VB inferred_VBN that_IN his_PRP$ natural_JJ force_NN was_VBD not_RB abated_VBN ;_: whereas_IN his_PRP$
defeat_NN and_CC death_NN at_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN another_DT proved_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ strength_NN
was_VBD beginning_VBG to_TO fail_VB and_CC that_IN it_PRP was_VBD time_NN his_PRP$ divine_JJ life_NN should_MD be_VB
lodged_VBN in_IN a_DT less_JJR dilapidated_JJ tabernacle_NN ._. This_DT explanation_NN of_IN the_DT
rule_NN that_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP had_VBD to_TO be_VB slain_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ successor_NN at_IN
least_JJS renders_NNS that_IN rule_NN perfectly_RB intelligible_JJ ._. It_PRP is_VBZ strongly_RB
supported_VBN by_IN the_DT theory_NN and_CC practice_NN of_IN the_DT Shilluk_NNP ,_, who_WP put_VBD their_PRP$
divine_JJ king_NN to_TO death_NN at_IN the_DT first_JJ signs_NNS of_IN failing_VBG health_NN ,_, lest_IN his_PRP$
decrepitude_NN should_MD entail_VB a_DT corresponding_JJ failure_NN of_IN vital_JJ energy_NN on_IN
the_DT corn_NN ,_, the_DT cattle_NNS ,_, and_CC men_NNS ._. Moreover_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ countenanced_VBN by_IN the_DT
analogy_NN of_IN the_DT Chitom_NNP �,_NN upon_IN whose_WP$ life_NN the_DT existence_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN
was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO hang_VB ,_, and_CC who_WP was_VBD therefore_RB slain_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ successor_NN
as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP showed_VBD signs_NNS of_IN breaking_VBG up_RP ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT terms_NNS on_IN which_WDT
in_IN later_JJ times_NNS the_DT King_NNP of_IN Calicut_NNP held_VBD office_NN are_VBP identical_JJ with_IN
those_DT attached_VBN to_TO the_DT office_NN of_IN King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ,_, except_IN that_WDT
whereas_IN the_DT former_JJ might_MD be_VB assailed_VBN by_IN a_DT candidate_NN at_IN any_DT time_NN ,_, the_DT
King_NNP of_IN Calicut_NNP might_MD only_RB be_VB attacked_VBN once_RB every_DT twelve_CD years_NNS ._. But_CC
as_IN the_DT leave_NN granted_VBN to_TO the_DT King_NNP of_IN Calicut_NNP to_TO reign_VB so_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP
could_MD defend_VB himself_PRP against_IN all_DT comers_NNS was_VBD a_DT mitigation_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ
rule_NN which_WDT set_VBD a_DT fixed_JJ term_NN to_TO his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, so_IN we_PRP may_MD conjecture_VB that_IN
the_DT similar_JJ permission_NN granted_VBN to_TO the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP was_VBD a_DT
mitigation_NN of_IN an_DT older_JJR custom_NN of_IN putting_VBG him_PRP to_TO death_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN
a_DT definite_JJ period_NN ._. In_IN both_DT cases_NNS the_DT new_JJ rule_NN gave_VBD to_TO the_DT god-man_NN at_IN
least_JJS a_DT chance_NN for_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, which_WDT under_IN the_DT old_JJ rule_NN was_VBD denied_VBN
him_PRP ;_: and_CC people_NNS probably_RB reconciled_VBD themselves_PRP to_TO the_DT change_NN by_IN
reflecting_VBG that_DT so_RB long_JJ as_IN the_DT god-man_NN could_MD maintain_VB himself_PRP by_IN the_DT
sword_VBN against_IN all_DT assaults_NNS ,_, there_EX was_VBD no_DT reason_NN to_TO apprehend_VB that_IN
the_DT fatal_JJ decay_NN had_VBD set_VBN in_IN ._.

The_DT conjecture_NN that_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP was_VBD formerly_RB put_VBN to_TO death_NN
at_IN the_DT expiry_NN of_IN a_DT fixed_JJ term_NN ,_, without_IN being_VBG allowed_VBN a_DT chance_NN for_IN
his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB confirmed_VBN if_IN evidence_NN can_MD be_VB adduced_VBN of_IN a_DT custom_NN
of_IN periodically_RB killing_VBG his_PRP$ counterparts_NNS ,_, the_DT human_JJ representatives_NNS
of_IN the_DT tree-spirit_NN ,_, in_IN Northern_NNP Europe_NNP ._. Now_RB in_IN point_NN of_IN fact_NN such_JJ a_DT
custom_NN has_VBZ left_VBN unmistakable_JJ traces_NNS of_IN itself_PRP in_IN the_DT rural_JJ festivals_NNS
of_IN the_DT peasantry_NN ._. To_TO take_VB examples_NNS ._.

At_IN Niederp_NNP �_NNP ring_NN ,_, in_IN Lower_NNP Bavaria_NNP ,_, the_DT Whitsuntide_NNP representative_NN of_IN
the_DT tree-spirit_NN --_: the_DT Pfingstl_NNP as_IN he_PRP was_VBD called_VBN --_: was_VBD clad_VBN from_IN top_NN
to_TO toe_VB in_IN leaves_NNS and_CC flowers_NNS ._. On_IN his_PRP$ head_NN he_PRP wore_VBD a_DT high_JJ pointed_JJ
cap_NN ,_, the_DT ends_NNS of_IN which_WDT rested_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ shoulders_NNS ,_, only_RB two_CD holes_NNS being_VBG
left_VBN in_IN it_PRP for_IN his_PRP$ eyes_NNS ._. The_DT cap_NN was_VBD covered_VBN with_IN water-flowers_NNS and_CC
surmounted_VBN with_IN a_DT nosegay_NN of_IN peonies_NNS ._. The_DT sleeves_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ coat_NN were_VBD
also_RB made_VBD of_IN water-plants_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT rest_NN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN was_VBD enveloped_VBN in_IN
alder_NN and_CC hazel_NN leaves_NNS ._. On_IN each_DT side_NN of_IN him_PRP marched_VBD a_DT boy_NN holding_VBG up_RB
one_CD of_IN the_DT Pfingstl_NNP '_POS s_PRP arms_NNS ._. These_DT two_CD boys_NNS carried_VBD drawn_VBN swords_NNS ,_,
and_CC so_RB did_VBD most_RBS of_IN the_DT others_NNS who_WP formed_VBD the_DT procession_NN ._. They_PRP
stopped_VBD at_IN every_DT house_NN where_WRB they_PRP hoped_VBD to_TO receive_VB a_DT present_NN ;_: and_CC
the_DT people_NNS ,_, in_IN hiding_NN ,_, soused_VBD the_DT leaf-clad_JJ boy_NN with_IN water_NN ._. All_PDT
rejoiced_VBN when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD well_RB drenched_VBN ._. Finally_RB he_PRP waded_VBD into_IN the_DT brook_NN
up_RB to_TO his_PRP$ middle_NN ;_: whereupon_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT boys_NNS ,_, standing_VBG on_IN the_DT bridge_NN ,_,

young_JJ fellows_NNS dress_VBP themselves_PRP on_IN Whit-Monday_NNP in_IN white_JJ shirts_NNS and_CC

May-tree_NNP ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN set_VBN up_RP a_DT little_JJ way_NN off_RB ._. The_DT first_JJ man_NN who_WP

In_IN the_DT Erzgebirge_NNP the_DT following_VBG custom_NN was_VBD annually_RB observed_VBN at_IN

In_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT personages_NNS who_WP are_VBP thus_RB slain_VBN in_IN mimicry_NN it_PRP is_VBZ

But_CC if_IN these_DT personages_NNS represent_VBP ,_, as_IN they_PRP certainly_RB do_VBP ,_, the_DT spirit_NN

increasing_VBG enfeeblement_NN which_WDT it_PRP must_MD necessarily_RB share_VB with_IN its_PRP$

associated_VBN always_RB (_-LRB- we_PRP must_MD suppose_VB )_-RRB- implicitly_RB ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB

youthful_JJ and_CC vigorous_JJ form_NN ._. So_RB in_IN the_DT Saxon_NNP and_CC Th_NNP �_NNP ringen_NN custom_NN ,_,
after_IN the_DT Wild_NNP Man_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN shot_VBN he_PRP is_VBZ brought_VBN to_TO life_NN again_RB by_IN a_DT
doctor_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT Wurmlingen_NNP ceremony_NN there_EX figures_VBZ a_DT Dr_NNP ._.
Iron-Beard_NNP ,_, who_WP probably_RB once_RB played_VBD a_DT similar_JJ part_NN ;_: certainly_RB in_IN
another_DT spring_NN ceremony_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD be_VB described_VBN presently_RB ,_, Dr_NNP ._.
Iron-Beard_NNP pretends_VBZ to_TO restore_VB a_DT dead_JJ man_NN to_TO life_NN ._. But_CC of_IN this_DT
revival_NN or_CC resurrection_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN we_PRP shall_MD have_VB more_RBR to_TO say_VB anon_NN ._.

The_DT points_NNS of_IN similarity_NN between_IN these_DT North_JJ European_JJ personages_NNS and_CC
the_DT subject_NN of_IN our_PRP$ enquiry_NN --_: the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP or_CC priest_NN of_IN
Nemi_NNP --_: are_VBP sufficiently_RB striking_VBG ._. In_IN these_DT northern_JJ maskers_NNS we_PRP see_VBP
kings_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ dress_NN of_IN bark_NN and_CC leaves_NNS along_IN with_IN the_DT hut_NN of_IN green_JJ
boughs_NNS and_CC the_DT fir-trees_NNS ,_, under_IN which_WDT they_PRP hold_VBP their_PRP$ court_NN ,_,
proclaim_VB them_PRP unmistakably_RB as_RB ,_, like_IN their_PRP$ Italian_JJ counterpart_NN ,_, Kings_NNP
of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ._. Like_IN him_PRP they_PRP die_VBP a_DT violent_JJ death_NN ,_, but_CC like_IN him_PRP they_PRP

2._PRP Burying_VBG the_DT Carnival_NN

THUS_PRP far_RB I_PRP have_VBP offered_VBN an_DT explanation_NN of_IN the_DT rule_NN which_WDT required_VBD
that_IN the_DT priest_NN of_IN Nemi_NNP should_MD be_VB slain_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ successor_NN ._. The_DT
explanation_NN claims_VBZ to_TO be_VB no_DT more_JJR than_IN probable_JJ ;_: our_PRP$ scanty_NN knowledge_NN
of_IN the_DT custom_NN and_CC of_IN its_PRP$ history_NN forbids_VBZ it_PRP to_TO be_VB more_JJR ._. But_CC its_PRP$
probability_NN will_MD be_VB augmented_VBN in_IN proportion_NN to_TO the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT
the_DT motives_NNS and_CC modes_NNS of_IN thought_NN which_WDT it_PRP assumes_VBZ can_MD be_VB proved_VBN to_TO
have_VBP operated_VBN in_IN primitive_JJ society_NN ._. Hitherto_'' the_DT god_NN with_IN whose_WP$
death_NN and_CC resurrection_NN we_PRP have_VBP been_VBN chiefly_RB concerned_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT
tree-god_NN ._. But_CC if_IN I_PRP can_MD show_VB that_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN killing_VBG the_DT god_NN and_CC
the_DT belief_NN in_IN his_PRP$ resurrection_NN originated_VBD ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS existed_VBD ,_, in_IN
the_DT hunting_NN and_CC pastoral_JJ stage_NN of_IN society_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT slain_NN god_NN was_VBD an_DT
animal_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP survived_VBD into_IN the_DT agricultural_JJ stage_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT
slain_JJ god_NN was_VBD the_DT corn_NN or_CC a_DT human_JJ being_NN representing_VBG the_DT corn_NN ,_, the_DT
probability_NN of_IN my_PRP$ explanation_NN will_MD have_VB been_VBN considerably_RB increased_VBN ._.
This_DT I_PRP shall_MD attempt_VB to_TO do_VB in_IN the_DT sequel_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT
discussion_NN I_PRP hope_VBP to_TO clear_VB up_RP some_DT obscurities_NNS which_WDT still_RB remain_VBP ,_,

the_DT reader_NN ._.

We_PRP start_VBP from_IN the_DT point_NN at_IN which_WDT we_PRP left_VBD off_RP --_: the_DT spring_NN customs_NNS of_IN
European_JJ peasantry_NN ._. Besides_IN the_DT ceremonies_NNS already_RB described_VBN there_EX
are_VBP two_CD kindred_JJ sets_NNS of_IN observances_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT simulated_VBN death_NN of_IN
a_DT divine_JJ or_CC supernatural_JJ being_NN is_VBZ a_DT conspicuous_JJ feature_NN ._. In_IN one_CD of_IN
them_PRP the_DT being_VBG whose_WP$ death_NN is_VBZ dramatically_RB represented_VBN is_VBZ a_DT
personification_NN of_IN the_DT Carnival_NNP ;_: in_IN the_DT other_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ Death_NNP himself_PRP ._.
The_DT former_JJ ceremony_NN falls_VBZ naturally_RB at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT Carnival_NNP ,_,
either_CC on_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN that_DT merry_NN season_NN ,_, namely_RB Shrove_NNP Tuesday_NNP ,_,

other_JJ ceremony_NN --_: the_DT Carrying_NNP or_CC Driving_VBG out_IN of_IN Death_NNP ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ
commonly_RB called_VBN --_: is_VBZ not_RB so_RB uniformly_RB fixed_VBN ._. Generally_RB it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT
fourth_JJ Sunday_NNP in_IN Lent_NNP ,_, which_WDT hence_RB goes_VBZ by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Dead_NNP Sunday_NNP ;_:
but_CC in_IN some_DT places_NNS the_DT celebration_NN falls_VBZ a_DT week_NN earlier_RB ,_, in_IN others_NNS ,_,

German_JJ villages_NNS of_IN Moravia_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ held_VBN on_IN the_DT first_JJ Sunday_NNP after_IN
Easter_NNP ._. Perhaps_RB ,_, as_RB has_VBZ been_VBN suggested_VBN ,_, the_DT date_NN may_MD originally_RB have_VB

always_RB falls_VBZ before_IN the_DT other_JJ in_IN the_DT calendar_NN ._.

At_IN Frosinone_NNP ,_, in_IN Latium_NNP ,_, about_IN half-way_NN between_IN Rome_NNP and_CC Naples_NNP ,_, the_DT

high_JJ with_IN a_DT rubicund_NN and_CC smiling_VBG countenance_NN ._. Enormous_JJ boots_NNS ,_, a_DT tin_NN

the_DT crowd_NN ,_, being_VBG moved_VBN to_TO this_DT act_NN of_IN civility_NN by_IN a_DT string_NN which_WDT is_VBZ

being_VBG mixed_VBN up_RP together_RB and_CC all_DT dancing_VBG furiously_RB the_DT Saltarello_NNP ._.
A_DT special_JJ feature_NN of_IN the_DT festival_NN is_VBZ that_IN every_DT one_NN must_MD carry_VB in_IN
his_PRP$ hand_NN what_WP is_VBZ called_VBN a_DT radica_NN (_-LRB- "_`` root_NN "),_NN by_IN which_WDT is_VBZ meant_VBN a_DT

the_DT crowd_NN without_IN such_JJ a_DT leaf_NN would_MD be_VB unceremoniously_RB hustled_VBN out_IN
of_IN it_PRP ,_, unless_IN indeed_RB he_PRP bore_VBD as_IN a_DT substitute_NN a_DT large_JJ cabbage_NN at_IN the_DT
end_NN of_IN a_DT long_JJ stick_NN or_CC a_DT bunch_NN of_IN grass_NN curiously_RB plaited_VBN ._. When_WRB the_DT
multitude_NN ,_, after_IN a_DT short_JJ turn_NN ,_, has_VBZ escorted_VBN the_DT slow-moving_JJ car_NN to_TO
the_DT gate_NN of_IN the_DT Sub-Prefecture_JJ ,_, they_PRP halt_VBP ,_, and_CC the_DT car_NN ,_, jolting_VBG over_IN

the_DT crowd_NN ,_, their_PRP$ subdued_JJ voices_NNS sounding_VBG ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT

In_IN the_DT Abruzzi_NNP a_DT pasteboard_JJ figure_NN of_IN the_DT Carnival_NNP is_VBZ carried_VBN by_IN

pull_VB at_IN the_DT bottle_NN ._. In_IN the_DT open_JJ square_NN the_DT mimic_JJ corpse_NN is_VBZ laid_VBN on_IN a_DT

At_IN Lerida_NNP ,_, in_IN Catalonia_NNP ,_, the_DT funeral_NN of_IN the_DT Carnival_NNP was_VBD witnessed_VBN
by_IN an_DT English_NNP traveller_NN in_IN 1877._CD On_IN the_DT last_JJ Sunday_NNP of_IN the_DT Carnival_NN
a_DT grand_JJ procession_NN of_IN infantry_NN ,_, cavalry_NN ,_, and_CC maskers_NNS of_IN many_JJ sorts_NNS ,_,

principal_JJ streets_NNS ._. For_IN three_CD days_NNS the_DT revelry_NN ran_VBD high_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB at_IN
midnight_NN on_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT Carnival_NNP the_DT same_JJ procession_NN again_RB
wound_NN through_IN the_DT streets_NNS ,_, but_CC under_IN a_DT different_JJ aspect_NN and_CC for_IN a_DT
different_JJ end_NN ._. The_DT triumphal_JJ car_NN was_VBD exchanged_VBN for_IN a_DT hearse_NN ,_, in_IN
which_WDT reposed_VBD the_DT effigy_NN of_IN his_PRP$ dead_JJ Grace_NNP :_: a_DT troop_NN of_IN maskers_NNS ,_, who_WP
in_IN the_DT first_JJ procession_NN had_VBD played_VBN the_DT part_NN of_IN Students_NNS of_IN Folly_NNP
with_IN many_JJ a_DT merry_NN quip_NN and_CC jest_NN ,_, now_RB ,_, robed_VBN as_IN priests_NNS and_CC bishops_NNS ,_,
paced_VBD slowly_RB along_RB holding_VBG aloft_RB huge_JJ lighted_JJ tapers_NNS and_CC singing_VBG a_DT
dirge_NN ._. All_PDT the_DT mummers_NNS wore_VBD crape_NN ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT horsemen_NNS carried_VBN

the_DT military_JJ bands_NNS struck_VBD in_IN with_IN the_DT solemn_JJ roll_NN of_IN the_DT muffled_JJ

burlesque_JJ funeral_NN oration_NN was_VBD pronounced_VBN over_IN the_DT defunct_JJ Pau_NNP Pi_NNP ,_,
and_CC the_DT lights_NNS were_VBD extinguished_VBN ._. Immediately_RB the_DT devil_NN and_CC his_PRP$
angels_NNS darted_VBD from_IN the_DT crowd_NN ,_, seized_VBD the_DT body_NN and_CC fled_VBD away_RB with_IN it_PRP ,_,
hotly_RB pursued_VBN by_IN the_DT whole_JJ multitude_NN ,_, yelling_VBG ,_, screaming_VBG ,_, and_CC
cheering_VBG ._. Naturally_RB the_DT fiends_NNS were_VBD overtaken_VBN and_CC dispersed_VBN ;_: and_CC the_DT
sham_NN corpse_NN ,_, rescued_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ clutches_NNS ,_, was_VBD laid_VBN in_IN a_DT grave_NN that_WDT
had_VBD been_VBN made_VBN ready_JJ for_IN its_PRP$ reception_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT Carnival_NNP of_IN 1877_CD at_IN
Lerida_NNP died_VBD and_CC was_VBD buried_VBN ._.

A_DT ceremony_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN is_VBZ observed_VBN in_IN Provence_NNP on_IN Ash_NNP
Wednesday_NNP ._. An_DT effigy_NN called_VBD Caramantran_NNP ,_, whimsically_RB attired_VBN ,_, is_VBZ

In_IN Normandy_NNP on_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN Ash_NNP Wednesday_NNP it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT custom_NN

In_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN T_NNP �_NNP bingen_NN on_IN Shrove_NNP Tuesday_NNP a_DT straw-man_NN ,_,

Sometimes_RB at_IN these_DT Shrovetide_NNP or_CC Lenten_NNP ceremonies_NNS the_DT resurrection_NN

the_DT Harz_NNP Mountains_NNPS ,_, when_WRB Carnival_NNP is_VBZ over_RB ,_, a_DT man_NN is_VBZ laid_VBN on_IN a_DT

following_VBG year_NN the_DT brandy_NN is_VBZ dug_VBN up_RB and_CC the_DT festival_NN begins_VBZ by_IN every_DT
one_CD tasting_VBG the_DT spirit_NN which_WDT ,_, as_IN the_DT phrase_NN goes_VBZ ,_, has_VBZ come_VBN to_TO life_NN
again_RB ._.



3._PRP Carrying_VBG out_IN Death_NN

THE_DT CEREMONY_NNS of_IN "_`` Carrying_VBG out_IN Death_NNP "_'' presents_VBZ much_RB the_DT same_JJ features_NNS
as_IN "_`` Burying_VBG the_DT Carnival_NNP ";_NNP except_IN that_IN the_DT carrying_VBG out_IN of_IN Death_NNP is_VBZ
generally_RB followed_VBN by_IN a_DT ceremony_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS accompanied_VBN by_IN a_DT
profession_NN ,_, of_IN bringing_VBG in_IN Summer_NN ,_, Spring_NNP ,_, or_CC Life_NN ._. Thus_RB in_IN Middle_NN
Franken_NNP ,_, a_DT province_NN of_IN Bavaria_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT fourth_JJ Sunday_NNP in_IN Lent_NNP ,_, the_DT
village_NN urchins_NNS used_VBD to_TO make_VB a_DT straw_NN effigy_NN of_IN Death_NNP ,_, which_WDT they_PRP
carried_VBD about_IN with_IN burlesque_JJ pomp_NN through_IN the_DT streets_NNS ,_, and_CC
afterwards_RB burned_VBN with_IN loud_JJ cries_NNS beyond_IN the_DT bounds_NNS ._. The_DT Frankish_NNP
custom_NN is_VBZ thus_RB described_VBN by_IN a_DT writer_NN of_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ century_NN :_: "_`` At_IN
Mid-Lent_NNP ,_, the_DT season_NN when_WRB the_DT church_NN bids_NNS us_PRP rejoice_VBP ,_, the_DT young_JJ
people_NNS of_IN my_PRP$ native_JJ country_NN make_VBP a_DT straw_NN image_NN of_IN Death_NNP ,_, and_CC
fastening_VBG it_PRP to_TO a_DT pole_NN carry_VB it_PRP with_IN shouts_NNS to_TO the_DT neighbouring_NN
villages_NNS ._. By_IN some_DT they_PRP are_VBP kindly_RB received_VBN ,_, and_CC after_IN being_VBG
refreshed_JJ with_IN milk_NN ,_, peas_NNS ,_, and_CC dried_VBD pears_NNS ,_, the_DT usual_JJ food_NN of_IN that_WDT
season_NN ,_, are_VBP sent_VBN home_NN again_RB ._. Others_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, treat_VB them_PRP with_IN
anything_NN but_CC hospitality_NN ;_: for_IN ,_, looking_VBG on_IN them_PRP as_IN harbingers_NNS of_IN
misfortune_NN ,_, to_TO wit_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, they_PRP drive_VBP them_PRP from_IN their_PRP$ boundaries_NNS
with_IN weapons_NNS and_CC insults_NNS ."_VBP In_IN the_DT villages_NNS near_IN Erlangen_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT
fourth_JJ Sunday_NNP in_IN Lent_NNP came_VBD around_RB ,_, the_DT peasant_NN girls_NNS used_VBD to_TO dress_VB
themselves_PRP in_IN all_DT their_PRP$ finery_NN with_IN flowers_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ hair_NN ._. Thus_RB
attired_VBN they_PRP repaired_VBD to_TO the_DT neighbouring_NN town_NN ,_, carrying_VBG puppets_NNS
which_WDT were_VBD adorned_VBN with_IN leaves_NNS and_CC covered_VBN with_IN white_JJ cloths_NNS ._. These_DT
they_PRP took_VBD from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN in_IN pairs_NNS ,_, stopping_VBG at_IN every_DT door_NN where_WRB
they_PRP expected_VBD to_TO receive_VB something_NN ,_, and_CC singing_VBG a_DT few_JJ lines_NNS in_IN which_WDT
they_PRP announced_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD Mid-Lent_JJ and_CC that_IN they_PRP were_VBD about_RB to_TO
throw_VB Death_NNP into_IN the_DT water_NN ._. When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD collected_VBN some_DT trifling_VBG
gratuities_NNS they_PRP went_VBD to_TO the_DT river_NN Regnitz_NNP and_CC flung_VBD the_DT puppets_NNS
representing_VBG Death_NNP into_IN the_DT stream_NN ._. This_DT was_VBD done_VBN to_TO ensure_VB a_DT
fruitful_JJ and_CC prosperous_JJ year_NN ;_: further_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD considered_VBN a_DT safeguard_NN
against_IN pestilence_NN and_CC sudden_JJ death_NN ._. At_IN Nuremberg_NNP girls_NNS of_IN seven_CD to_TO
eighteen_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN go_VBP through_IN the_DT streets_NNS bearing_VBG a_DT little_RB open_JJ
coffin_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT doll_NN hidden_VBN under_IN a_DT shroud_JJ ._. Others_NNS carry_VBP a_DT
beech_NN branch_NN ,_, with_IN an_DT apple_NN fastened_VBN to_TO it_PRP for_IN a_DT head_NN ,_, in_IN an_DT open_JJ
box_NN ._. They_PRP sing_VBP ,_, "_`` We_PRP carry_VBP Death_NNP into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ well_RB ,"_JJ or_CC "_'' We_PRP
carry_VB Death_NNP into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, carry_VB him_PRP in_IN and_CC out_IN again_RB ."_VBN In_IN some_DT
parts_NNS of_IN Bavaria_NNP down_IN to_TO 1780_CD it_PRP was_VBD believed_VBN that_IN a_DT fatal_JJ epidemic_NN
would_MD ensue_VB if_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN "_`` Carrying_VBG out_IN Death_NNP "_'' were_VBD not_RB observed_VBN ._.

In_IN some_DT villages_NNS of_IN Th_DT �_NN ringen_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT fourth_JJ Sunday_NNP of_IN Lent_NNP ,_, the_DT
children_NNS used_VBD to_TO carry_VB a_DT puppet_NN of_IN birchen_NN twigs_NNS through_IN the_DT
village_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB threw_VBD it_PRP into_IN a_DT pool_NN ,_, while_IN they_PRP sang_VBD ,_, "_`` We_PRP carry_VBP
the_DT old_JJ Death_NN out_IN behind_IN the_DT herdman_NN '_'' s_PRP old_JJ house_NN ;_: we_PRP have_VBP got_VBN
Summer_NN ,_, and_CC Kroden_NNP '_'' s_VBZ (?)_JJ power_NN is_VBZ destroyed_VBN ."_IN At_IN Debschwitz_NNP or_CC
Dobschwitz_NNP ,_, near_IN Gera_NNP ,_, the_DT ceremony_NN of_IN "_`` Driving_VBG out_IN Death_NNP "_'' is_VBZ or_CC was_VBD
annually_RB observed_VBD on_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN March_NNP ._. The_DT young_JJ people_NNS make_VBP up_RP a_DT
figure_NN of_IN straw_NN or_CC the_DT like_JJ materials_NNS ,_, dress_NN it_PRP in_IN old_JJ clothes_NNS ,_,
which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP begged_VBN from_IN houses_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC carry_VB it_PRP out_IN
and_CC throw_VBP it_PRP into_IN the_DT river_NN ._. On_IN returning_VBG to_TO the_DT village_NN they_PRP break_VBP
the_DT good_JJ news_NN to_TO the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC receive_VBP eggs_NNS and_CC other_JJ victuals_NNS as_IN
a_DT reward_NN ._. The_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ or_CC was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO purify_VB the_DT village_NN and_CC
to_TO protect_VB the_DT inhabitants_NNS from_IN sickness_NN and_CC plague_NN ._. In_IN other_JJ
villages_NNS of_IN Th_DT �_NN ringen_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT population_NN was_VBD originally_RB
Slavonic_NNP ,_, the_DT carrying_VBG out_RB of_IN the_DT puppet_NN is_VBZ accompanied_VBN with_IN the_DT
singing_NN of_IN a_DT song_NN ,_, which_WDT begins_VBZ ,_, "_`` Now_RB we_PRP carry_VBP Death_NNP out_IN of_IN the_DT
village_NN and_CC Spring_NNP into_IN the_DT village_NN ."_VBN At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT seventeenth_JJ
and_CC beginning_NN of_IN the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN the_DT custom_NN was_VBD observed_VBN in_IN
Th_DT �_NN ringen_NN as_IN follows_VBZ ._. The_DT boys_NNS and_CC girls_NNS made_VBD an_DT effigy_NN of_IN straw_NN or_CC

year_NN ._. In_IN one_CD year_NN it_PRP would_MD represent_VB an_DT old_JJ man_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT next_JJ an_DT old_JJ
woman_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT third_JJ a_DT young_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT fourth_JJ a_DT maiden_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
dress_NN of_IN the_DT figure_NN varied_VBN with_IN the_DT character_NN it_PRP personated_VBD ._. There_EX
used_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT sharp_JJ contest_NN as_IN to_TO where_WRB the_DT effigy_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB made_VBN ,_,
for_IN the_DT people_NNS thought_VBD that_IN the_DT house_NN from_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD carried_VBN
forth_RB would_MD not_RB be_VB visited_VBN with_IN death_NN that_DT year_NN ._. Having_VBG been_VBN made_VBN ,_,
the_DT puppet_NN was_VBD fastened_VBN to_TO a_DT pole_NN and_CC carried_VBN by_IN a_DT girl_NN if_IN it_PRP
represented_VBD an_DT old_JJ man_NN ,_, but_CC by_IN a_DT boy_NN if_IN it_PRP represented_VBD an_DT old_JJ woman_NN ._.
Thus_RB it_PRP was_VBD borne_VBN in_IN procession_NN ,_, the_DT young_JJ people_NNS holding_VBG sticks_NNS in_IN
their_PRP$ hands_NNS and_CC singing_VBG that_IN they_PRP were_VBD driving_VBG out_IN Death_NNP ._. When_WRB they_PRP
came_VBD to_TO water_NN they_PRP threw_VBD the_DT effigy_NN into_IN it_PRP and_CC ran_VBD hastily_RB back_RB ,_,
fearing_VBG that_IN it_PRP might_MD jump_VB on_IN their_PRP$ shoulders_NNS and_CC wring_VBG their_PRP$ necks_NNS ._.
They_PRP also_RB took_VBD care_NN not_RB to_TO touch_VB it_PRP ,_, lest_IN it_PRP should_MD dry_VB them_PRP up_RP ._. On_IN

this_DT would_MD make_VB the_DT animals_NNS fat_JJ or_CC fruitful_JJ ._. Afterwards_RB they_PRP visited_VBD

where_WRB they_PRP received_VBD a_DT dole_NN of_IN half-boiled_JJ peas_NNS ._. The_DT custom_NN of_IN
"_`` Carrying_VBG out_IN Death_NNP "_'' was_VBD practised_JJ also_RB in_IN Saxony_NNP ._. At_IN Leipsic_NNP the_DT

songs_NNS and_CC showed_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT young_JJ married_JJ women_NNS ._. Finally_RB they_PRP threw_VBD
it_PRP into_IN the_DT river_NN Parthe_NNP ._. By_IN this_DT ceremony_NN they_PRP professed_VBD to_TO make_VB
the_DT young_JJ wives_NNS fruitful_JJ ,_, to_TO purify_VB the_DT city_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO protect_VB the_DT
inhabitants_NNS for_IN that_DT year_NN from_IN plague_NN and_CC other_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.

Ceremonies_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN are_VBP observed_VBN at_IN Mid-Lent_JJ in_IN Silesia_NNP ._.
Thus_RB in_IN many_JJ places_NNS the_DT grown_JJ girls_NNS with_IN the_DT help_NN of_IN the_DT young_JJ men_NNS
dress_NN up_IN a_DT straw_NN figure_NN with_IN women_NNS '_'' s_VBZ clothes_NNS and_CC carry_VB it_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT
village_NN towards_IN the_DT setting_VBG sun_NN ._. At_IN the_DT boundary_NN they_PRP strip_VBP it_PRP of_IN
its_PRP$ clothes_NNS ,_, tear_VB it_PRP in_IN pieces_NNS ,_, and_CC scatter_VB the_DT fragments_NNS about_IN the_DT
fields_NNS ._. This_DT is_VBZ called_VBN "_`` Burying_NNP Death_NNP ."_. As_IN they_PRP carry_VBP the_DT image_NN out_RB ,_,
they_PRP sing_VBP that_IN they_PRP are_VBP about_RB to_TO bury_VB Death_NNP under_IN an_DT oak_NN ,_, that_IN he_PRP
may_MD depart_VB from_IN the_DT people_NNS ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT song_NN runs_VBZ that_IN they_PRP are_VBP
bearing_VBG Death_NNP over_IN hill_NN and_CC dale_NN to_TO return_VB no_DT more_JJR ._. In_IN the_DT Polish_JJ
neighbourhood_NN of_IN Gross-Strehlitz_NNP the_DT puppet_NN is_VBZ called_VBN Goik_NNP ._. It_PRP is_VBZ

think_VB that_IN the_DT ceremony_NN protects_VBZ them_PRP from_IN sickness_JJR of_IN every_DT sort_NN in_IN
the_DT coming_JJ year_NN ._. In_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN Wohlau_NNP and_CC Guhrau_NNP the_DT image_NN of_IN
Death_NNP used_VBD to_TO be_VB thrown_VBN over_IN the_DT boundary_NN of_IN the_DT next_JJ village_NN ._. But_CC
as_IN the_DT neighbours_NNS feared_VBD to_TO receive_VB the_DT ill-omened_JJ figure_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD
on_IN the_DT look-out_NN to_TO repel_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC hard_JJ knocks_NNS were_VBD often_RB exchanged_VBN
between_IN the_DT two_CD parties_NNS ._. In_IN some_DT Polish_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Upper_NNP Silesia_NNP the_DT
effigy_NN ,_, representing_VBG an_DT old_JJ woman_NN ,_, goes_VBZ by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Marzana_NNP ,_, the_DT
goddess_NN of_IN death_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ made_VBN in_IN the_DT house_NN where_WRB the_DT last_JJ death_NN
occurred_VBD ,_, and_CC is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN a_DT pole_NN to_TO the_DT boundary_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_,
where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ thrown_VBN into_IN a_DT pond_NN or_CC burnt_NN ._. At_IN Polkwitz_NNP the_DT custom_NN of_IN
"_`` Carrying_VBG out_IN Death_NNP "_'' fell_VBD into_IN abeyance_NN ;_: but_CC an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN fatal_JJ
sickness_JJR which_WDT followed_VBD the_DT intermission_NN of_IN the_DT ceremony_NN induced_VBD the_DT
people_NNS to_TO resume_VB it_PRP ._.

In_IN Bohemia_NNP the_DT children_NNS go_VBP out_RP with_IN a_DT straw-man_JJ ,_, representing_VBG Death_NNP ,_,
to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP burn_VBP it_PRP ,_, singing_VBG --_:


"_`` Now_RB carry_VB we_PRP Death_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_,
The_DT new_JJ Summer_NN into_IN the_DT village_NN ,_,
Welcome_UH ,_, dear_UH Summer_NNP ,_,
Green_JJ little_JJ corn_NN ."_.


At_IN Tabor_NNP in_IN Bohemia_NNP the_DT figure_NN of_IN Death_NNP is_VBZ carried_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT town_NN
and_CC flung_VBD from_IN a_DT high_JJ rock_NN into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, while_IN they_PRP sing_VBP --_:


"_`` Death_NNP swims_VBZ on_IN the_DT water_NN ,_,
Summer_NN will_MD soon_RB be_VB here_RB ,_,
We_PRP carried_VBD Death_NNP away_RB for_IN you_PRP
We_PRP brought_VBD the_DT Summer_NN ._.
And_CC do_VB thou_PRP ,_, O_UH holy_JJ Marketa_NNP ,_,
Give_VB us_PRP a_DT good_JJ year_NN
For_IN wheat_NN and_CC for_IN rye_NN ."_NN


In_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Bohemia_NNP they_PRP carry_VBP Death_NNP to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT
village_NN ,_, singing_VBG --_:


"_`` We_PRP carry_VBP Death_NNP out_IN of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_,
And_CC the_DT New_NNP Year_NN into_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
Dear_NNP Spring_NNP ,_, we_PRP bid_VBD you_PRP welcome_VB ,_,
Green_NNP grass_NN ,_, we_PRP bid_VBD you_PRP welcome_VB ."_.


Behind_IN the_DT village_NN they_PRP erect_JJ a_DT pyre_NN ,_, on_IN which_WDT they_PRP burn_VBP the_DT straw_NN
figure_NN ,_, reviling_VBG and_CC scoffing_VBG at_IN it_PRP the_DT while_NN ._. Then_RB they_PRP return_VBP ,_,
singing_NN --_:


"_`` We_PRP have_VBP carried_VBN away_RB Death_NNP ,_,
And_CC brought_VBD Life_NNP back_RB ._.
He_PRP has_VBZ taken_VBN up_RP his_PRP$ quarters_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_,
Therefore_RB sing_VBP joyous_JJ songs_NNS ."_.


In_IN some_DT German_JJ villages_NNS of_IN Moravia_NNP ,_, as_IN in_IN Jassnitz_NNP and_CC Seitendorf_NNP ,_,
the_DT young_JJ folk_NN assemble_NN on_IN the_DT third_JJ Sunday_NNP in_IN Lent_NNP and_CC fashion_NN a_DT
straw-man_JJ ,_, who_WP is_VBZ generally_RB adorned_VBN with_IN a_DT fur_NN cap_NN and_CC a_DT pair_NN of_IN old_JJ
leathern_NN hose_NN ,_, if_IN such_JJ are_VBP to_TO be_VB had_VBN ._. The_DT effigy_NN is_VBZ then_RB hoisted_VBN on_IN
a_DT pole_NN and_CC carried_VBN by_IN the_DT lads_NNS and_CC lasses_NNS out_IN into_IN the_DT open_JJ fields_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT way_NN they_PRP sing_VBP a_DT song_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN they_PRP are_VBP
carrying_VBG Death_NNP away_RB and_CC bringing_VBG dear_JJ Summer_NN into_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, and_CC
with_IN Summer_NNP the_DT May_NNP and_CC the_DT flowers_NNS ._. On_IN reaching_VBG an_DT appointed_VBN place_NN
they_PRP dance_VBP in_IN a_DT circle_NN round_RB the_DT effigy_NN with_IN loud_JJ shouts_NNS and_CC
screams_NNS ,_, then_RB suddenly_RB rush_VB at_IN it_PRP and_CC tear_VB it_PRP to_TO pieces_NNS with_IN their_PRP$
hands_NNS ._. Lastly_RB ,_, the_DT pieces_NNS are_VBP thrown_VBN together_RB in_IN a_DT heap_NN ,_, the_DT pole_NN is_VBZ
broken_VBN ,_, and_CC fire_NN is_VBZ set_VBN to_TO the_DT whole_JJ ._. While_IN it_PRP burns_VBZ the_DT troop_NN
dances_NNS merrily_RB round_VBP it_PRP ,_, rejoicing_VBG at_IN the_DT victory_NN won_VBN by_IN Spring_NNP ;_: and_CC
when_WRB the_DT fire_NN has_VBZ nearly_RB died_VBN out_IN they_PRP go_VBP to_TO the_DT householders_NNS to_TO beg_VB
for_IN a_DT present_NN of_IN eggs_NNS wherewith_IN to_TO hold_VB a_DT feast_NN ,_, taking_VBG care_NN to_TO give_VB
as_IN a_DT reason_NN for_IN the_DT request_NN that_IN they_PRP have_VBP carried_VBN Death_NNP out_IN and_CC
away_RB ._.

The_DT preceding_VBG evidence_NN shows_VBZ that_IN the_DT effigy_NN of_IN Death_NNP is_VBZ often_RB
regarded_VBN with_IN fear_NN and_CC treated_VBD with_IN marks_NNS of_IN hatred_NN and_CC abhorrence_NN ._.
Thus_RB the_DT anxiety_NN of_IN the_DT villagers_NNS to_TO transfer_VB the_DT figure_NN from_IN their_PRP$
own_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ neighbours_NNS '_POS land_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT reluctance_NN of_IN the_DT latter_NN to_TO
receive_VBP the_DT ominous_JJ guest_NN ,_, are_VBP proof_JJ enough_RB of_IN the_DT dread_NN which_WDT it_PRP
inspires_NNS ._. Further_RB ,_, in_IN Lusatia_NNP and_CC Silesia_NNP the_DT puppet_NN is_VBZ sometimes_RB
made_VBN to_TO look_VB in_IN at_IN the_DT window_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN
some_DT one_CD in_IN the_DT house_NN will_MD die_VB within_IN the_DT year_NN unless_IN his_PRP$ life_NN is_VBZ
redeemed_VBN by_IN the_DT payment_NN of_IN money_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, after_IN throwing_VBG the_DT effigy_NN
away_RB ,_, the_DT bearers_NNS sometimes_RB run_VBP home_NN lest_IN Death_NNP should_MD follow_VB them_PRP ,_,
and_CC if_IN one_CD of_IN them_PRP falls_VBZ in_IN running_VBG ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN he_PRP will_MD die_VB
within_IN the_DT year_NN ._. At_IN Chrudim_NNP ,_, in_IN Bohemia_NNP ,_, the_DT figure_NN of_IN Death_NNP is_VBZ made_VBN
out_IN of_IN a_DT cross_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT head_NN and_CC mask_VB stuck_VBN at_IN the_DT top_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT shirt_NN
stretched_VBD out_RP on_IN it_PRP ._. On_IN the_DT fifth_JJ Sunday_NNP in_IN Lent_NNP the_DT boys_NNS take_VBP this_DT
effigy_NN to_TO the_DT nearest_JJS brook_NN or_CC pool_NN ,_, and_CC standing_VBG in_IN a_DT line_NN throw_VBP it_PRP
into_IN the_DT water_NN ._. Then_RB they_PRP all_DT plunge_NN in_IN after_IN it_PRP ;_: but_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN it_PRP
is_VBZ caught_VBN no_DT one_NN more_RBR may_MD enter_VB the_DT water_NN ._. The_DT boy_NN who_WP did_VBD not_RB enter_VB
the_DT water_NN or_CC entered_VBD it_PRP last_JJ will_MD die_VB within_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ
obliged_VBN to_TO carry_VB the_DT Death_NN back_RB to_TO the_DT village_NN ._. The_DT effigy_NN is_VBZ then_RB
burned_VBN ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN no_DT one_NN will_MD die_VB
within_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN the_DT house_NN out_IN of_IN which_WDT the_DT figure_NN of_IN Death_NNP has_VBZ
been_VBN carried_VBN ;_: and_CC the_DT village_NN out_IN of_IN which_WDT Death_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN driven_VBN is_NNS
sometimes_RB supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB protected_VBN against_IN sickness_NN and_CC plague_NN ._. In_IN
some_DT villages_NNS of_IN Austrian_NNP Silesia_NNP on_IN the_DT Saturday_NNP before_IN Dead_NNP Sunday_NNP
an_DT effigy_NN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN old_JJ clothes_NNS ,_, hay_NN ,_, and_CC straw_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN
driving_VBG Death_NNP out_IN of_IN the_DT village_NN ._. On_IN Sunday_NNP the_DT people_NNS ,_, armed_VBN with_IN
sticks_NNS and_CC straps_NNS ,_, assemble_NN before_IN the_DT house_NN where_WRB the_DT figure_NN is_VBZ
lodged_VBN ._. Four_CD lads_NNS then_RB draw_VBP the_DT effigy_NN by_IN cords_NNS through_IN the_DT village_NN
amid_IN exultant_JJ shouts_NNS ,_, while_IN all_PDT the_DT others_NNS beat_VBD it_PRP with_IN their_PRP$ sticks_NNS
and_CC straps_NNS ._. On_IN reaching_VBG a_DT field_NN which_WDT belongs_VBZ to_TO a_DT neighbouring_NN
village_NN they_PRP lay_VBD down_IN the_DT figure_NN ,_, cudgel_VB it_PRP soundly_RB ,_, and_CC scatter_NN the_DT
fragments_NNS over_IN the_DT field_NN ._. The_DT people_NNS believe_VBP that_IN the_DT village_NN from_IN
which_WDT Death_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN thus_RB carried_VBN out_RP will_MD be_VB safe_JJ from_IN any_DT
infectious_JJ disease_NN for_IN the_DT whole_JJ year_NN ._.



4._DT Bringing_NNP in_IN Summer_NN

IN_IN THE_DT PRECEDING_NN ceremonies_VBZ the_DT return_NN of_IN Spring_NNP ,_, Summer_NNP ,_, or_CC Life_NNP ,_,
as_IN a_DT sequel_NN to_TO the_DT expulsion_NN of_IN Death_NNP ,_, is_VBZ only_RB implied_VBN or_CC at_IN most_JJS
announced_VBN ._. In_IN the_DT following_VBG ceremonies_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ plainly_RB enacted_VBN ._. Thus_RB
in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Bohemia_NNP the_DT effigy_NN of_IN Death_NNP is_VBZ drowned_VBN by_IN being_VBG
thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT water_NN at_IN sunset_NN ;_: then_RB the_DT girls_NNS go_VBP out_IN into_IN the_DT wood_NN
and_CC cut_VBD down_RP a_DT young_JJ tree_NN with_IN a_DT green_JJ crown_NN ,_, hang_VB a_DT doll_NN dressed_VBN as_IN
a_DT woman_NN on_IN it_PRP ,_, deck_NN the_DT whole_JJ with_IN green_JJ ,_, red_JJ ,_, and_CC white_JJ ribbons_NNS ,_,
and_CC march_NN in_IN procession_NN with_IN their_PRP$ L_NNP �_NN to_TO (_-LRB- Summer_NN )_-RRB- into_IN the_DT village_NN ,_,
collecting_VBG gifts_NNS and_CC singing_NN --_:


"_`` Death_NNP swims_VBZ in_IN the_DT water_NN ,_,
Spring_NN comes_VBZ to_TO visit_VB us_PRP ,_,
With_IN eggs_NNS that_WDT are_VBP red_JJ ,_,
With_IN yellow_JJ pancakes_NNS ._.
We_PRP carried_VBD Death_NNP out_IN of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_,
We_PRP are_VBP carrying_VBG Summer_NNP into_IN the_DT village_NN ."_.


In_IN many_JJ Silesian_NN villages_NNS the_DT figure_NN of_IN Death_NNP ,_, after_IN being_VBG treated_VBN
with_IN respect_NN ,_, is_VBZ stript_NN of_IN its_PRP$ clothes_NNS and_CC flung_VBN with_IN curses_NNS into_IN
the_DT water_NN ,_, or_CC torn_VBN to_TO pieces_NNS in_IN a_DT field_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT young_JJ folk_NN repair_NN
to_TO a_DT wood_NN ,_, cut_VB down_RP a_DT small_JJ fir-tree_NN ,_, peel_VB the_DT trunk_NN ,_, and_CC deck_NN it_PRP
with_IN festoons_NNS of_IN evergreens_NNS ,_, paper_NN roses_NNS ,_, painted_VBN egg-shells_NNS ,_, motley_NN
bits_NNS of_IN cloth_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ._. The_DT tree_NN thus_RB adorned_VBN is_VBZ called_VBN Summer_NN
or_CC May_NNP ._. Boys_NNPS carry_VBP it_PRP from_IN house_NN to_TO house_VB singing_VBG appropriate_JJ songs_NNS
and_CC begging_VBG for_IN presents_NNS ._. Among_IN their_PRP$ songs_NNS is_VBZ the_DT following_VBG :_:


"_`` We_PRP have_VBP carried_VBN Death_NNP out_RB ,_,
We_PRP are_VBP bringing_VBG the_DT dear_NN Summer_NN back_RB ,_,
The_DT Summer_NN and_CC the_DT May_NNP
And_CC all_PDT the_DT flowers_NNS gay_JJ ."_.


Sometimes_RB they_PRP also_RB bring_VBP back_RB from_IN the_DT wood_NN a_DT prettily_RB adorned_VBN
figure_NN ,_, which_WDT goes_VBZ by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Summer_NNP ,_, May_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT Bride_NNP ;_: in_IN the_DT
Polish_JJ districts_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN Dziewanna_NNP ,_, the_DT goddess_NN of_IN spring_NN ._.

At_IN Eisenach_NNP on_IN the_DT fourth_JJ Sunday_NNP in_IN Lent_NNP young_JJ people_NNS used_VBN to_TO fasten_VB
a_DT straw-man_JJ ,_, representing_VBG Death_NNP ,_, to_TO a_DT wheel_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP trundled_VBD to_TO
the_DT top_NN of_IN a_DT hill_NN ._. Then_RB setting_VBG fire_NN to_TO the_DT figure_NN they_PRP allowed_VBD it_PRP
and_CC the_DT wheel_NN to_TO roll_VB down_RP the_DT slope_NN ._. Next_JJ day_NN they_PRP cut_VBP a_DT tall_JJ
fir-tree_JJ ,_, tricked_VBD it_PRP out_RP with_IN ribbons_NNS ,_, and_CC set_VBD it_PRP up_RP in_IN the_DT plain_NN ._.
The_DT men_NNS then_RB climbed_VBD the_DT tree_NN to_TO fetch_VB down_RP the_DT ribbons_NNS ._. In_IN Upper_NNP
Lusatia_NNP the_DT figure_NN of_IN Death_NNP ,_, made_VBN of_IN straw_NN and_CC rags_NNS ,_, is_VBZ dressed_VBN in_IN a_DT
veil_NN furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT last_JJ bride_NN and_CC a_DT shirt_NN provided_VBN by_IN the_DT house_NN
in_IN which_WDT the_DT last_JJ death_NN took_VBD place_NN ._. Thus_RB arrayed_VBD the_DT figure_NN is_VBZ stuck_VBN
on_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN a_DT long_JJ pole_NN and_CC carried_VBD at_IN full_JJ speed_NN by_IN the_DT tallest_JJS
and_CC strongest_JJS girl_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT rest_NN pelt_VBD the_DT effigy_NN with_IN sticks_NNS and_CC
stones_NNS ._. Whoever_NNP hits_VBZ it_PRP will_MD be_VB sure_JJ to_TO live_VB through_IN the_DT year_NN ._. In_IN
this_DT way_NN Death_NNP is_VBZ carried_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT
water_NN or_CC over_IN the_DT boundary_NN of_IN the_DT next_JJ village_NN ._. On_IN their_PRP$ way_NN home_NN

reaches_VBZ the_DT village_NN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP throws_VBZ it_PRP away_RB ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT young_JJ

among_IN them_PRP ._. Hence_RB the_DT two_CD parties_NNS occasionally_RB come_VBP to_TO blows_NNS ._.

In_IN these_DT cases_NNS Death_NN is_VBZ represented_VBN by_IN the_DT puppet_NN which_WDT is_VBZ thrown_VBN
away_RB ,_, Summer_NNP or_CC Life_NNP by_IN the_DT branches_NNS or_CC trees_NNS which_WDT are_VBP brought_VBN
back_RB ._. But_CC sometimes_RB a_DT new_JJ potency_NN of_IN life_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB attributed_VBN to_TO

Death_NNP ."_NNP So_IN the_DT procession_NN goes_VBZ through_IN all_DT the_DT streets_NNS of_IN the_DT
