"_`` Gott_FW mein_FW Vater_NNP ,_, deine_NN Liebe_NN
Reicht_NNP so_RB weit_JJ der_NN Himmel_NNP ist_NN ,"_.


to_TO a_DT tune_NN that_IN differs_NNS from_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ one_CD ._. When_WRB the_DT procession_NN

Very_RB similar_JJ is_VBZ the_DT ceremony_NN which_WDT ,_, down_IN to_TO recent_JJ years_NNS ,_, was_VBD

In_IN the_DT Lusatian_JJ ceremony_NN described_VBN above_IN ,_, the_DT tree_NN which_WDT is_VBZ brought_VBN

causes_VBZ the_DT crops_NNS to_TO grow_VB better_RBR ._. In_IN the_DT Troppau_NNP district_NN of_IN Austrian_JJ

Leipsic_NNP a_DT straw_NN effigy_NN of_IN Death_NNP was_VBD shown_VBN to_TO young_JJ wives_NNS to_TO make_VB
them_PRP fruitful_JJ ._.

It_PRP seems_VBZ hardly_RB possible_JJ to_TO separate_VB from_IN the_DT May-trees_NNS the_DT trees_NNS or_CC
branches_NNS which_WDT are_VBP brought_VBN into_IN the_DT village_NN after_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN
the_DT Death_NNP ._. The_DT bearers_NNS who_WP bring_VBP them_PRP in_IN profess_NN to_TO be_VB bringing_VBG in_IN
the_DT Summer_NNP ,_, therefore_RB the_DT trees_NNS obviously_RB represent_VBP the_DT Summer_NN ;_:
indeed_RB in_IN Silesia_NN they_PRP are_VBP commonly_RB called_VBN the_DT Summer_NN or_CC the_DT May_NNP ,_,
and_CC the_DT doll_NN which_WDT is_VBZ sometimes_RB attached_VBN to_TO the_DT Summer-tree_NNP is_VBZ a_DT

the_DT Summer-trees_NNP are_VBP adorned_VBN like_IN May-trees_NNS with_IN ribbons_NNS and_CC so_RB on_IN ;_:

And_CC as_IN if_IN to_TO demonstrate_VB the_DT identity_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD sets_NNS of_IN customs_NNS the_DT

the_DT May_NNP and_CC bringing_VBG in_IN the_DT Summer_NNP are_VBP essentially_RB the_DT same_JJ ;_: and_CC the_DT
Summer-tree_NNP is_VBZ merely_RB another_DT form_NN of_IN the_DT May-tree_NNP ,_, the_DT only_RB
distinction_NN (_-LRB- besides_IN that_DT of_IN name_NN )_-RRB- being_VBG in_IN the_DT time_NN at_IN which_WDT they_PRP
are_VBP respectively_RB brought_VBN in_IN ;_: for_IN while_IN the_DT May-tree_NNP is_VBZ usually_RB
fetched_VBD in_IN on_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN May_NNP or_CC at_IN Whitsuntide_NNP ,_, the_DT Summer-tree_NNP is_VBZ
fetched_VBD in_IN on_IN the_DT fourth_JJ Sunday_NNP in_IN Lent_NNP ._. Therefore_RB ,_, if_IN the_DT May-tree_NNP
is_VBZ an_DT embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT tree-spirit_NN or_CC spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ,_, the_DT
Summer-tree_NNP must_MD likewise_RB be_VB an_DT embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT tree-spirit_NN or_CC

some_DT cases_NNS a_DT revivification_NN of_IN the_DT effigy_NN of_IN Death_NNP ._. It_PRP follows_VBZ ,_,
therefore_RB ,_, that_IN in_IN these_DT cases_NNS the_DT effigy_NN called_VBD Death_NNP must_MD be_VB an_DT
embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT tree-spirit_NN or_CC spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ._. This_DT
inference_NN is_VBZ confirmed_VBN ,_, first_RB ,_, by_IN the_DT vivifying_JJ and_CC fertilising_VBG
influence_NN which_WDT the_DT fragments_NNS of_IN the_DT effigy_NN of_IN Death_NNP are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO
exercise_NN both_DT on_IN vegetable_NN and_CC on_IN animal_NN life_NN ;_: for_IN this_DT influence_NN ,_,
as_IN we_PRP saw_VBD in_IN an_DT earlier_JJR part_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN ,_, is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT
special_JJ attribute_NN of_IN the_DT tree-spirit_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ confirmed_VBN ,_, secondly_RB ,_, by_IN
observing_VBG that_IN the_DT effigy_NN of_IN Death_NNP is_VBZ sometimes_RB decked_VBN with_IN leaves_NNS
or_CC made_VBN of_IN twigs_NNS ,_, branches_NNS ,_, hemp_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT threshed-out_JJ sheaf_NN of_IN corn_NN ;_:
and_CC that_IN sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ hung_VBN on_IN a_DT little_JJ tree_NN and_CC so_RB carried_VBD about_IN
by_IN girls_NNS collecting_VBG money_NN ,_, just_RB as_RB is_VBZ done_VBN with_IN the_DT May-tree_NNP and_CC the_DT
May_NNP Lady_NNP ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT Summer-tree_NNP and_CC the_DT doll_NN attached_VBN to_TO it_PRP ._. In_IN
short_JJ we_PRP are_VBP driven_VBN to_TO regard_VB the_DT expulsion_NN of_IN Death_NNP and_CC the_DT
bringing_VBG in_IN of_IN Summer_NNP as_IN ,_, in_IN some_DT cases_NNS at_IN least_JJS ,_, merely_RB another_DT
form_NN of_IN that_DT death_NN and_CC revival_NN of_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN in_IN spring_NN
which_WDT we_PRP saw_VBD enacted_VBN in_IN the_DT killing_NN and_CC resurrection_NN of_IN the_DT Wild_NNP
Man_NN ._. The_DT burial_NN and_CC resurrection_NN of_IN the_DT Carnival_NNP is_VBZ probably_RB another_DT
way_NN of_IN expressing_VBG the_DT same_JJ idea_NN ._. The_DT interment_NN of_IN the_DT representative_NN
of_IN the_DT Carnival_NNP under_IN a_DT dung-heap_NN is_VBZ natural_JJ ,_, if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO
possess_VBP a_DT quickening_JJ and_CC fertilising_JJ influence_NN like_IN that_DT ascribed_VBN to_TO
the_DT effigy_NN of_IN Death_NNP ._. The_DT Esthonians_NNPS ,_, indeed_RB ,_, who_WP carry_VBP the_DT straw_NN
figure_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT village_NN in_IN the_DT usual_JJ way_NN on_IN Shrove_NNP Tuesday_NNP ,_, do_VBP not_RB
call_VB it_PRP the_DT Carnival_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT Wood-spirit_NNP (_-LRB- Metsik_NNP ),_, and_CC they_PRP
clearly_RB indicate_VBP the_DT identity_NN of_IN the_DT effigy_NN with_IN the_DT wood-spirit_NN by_IN
fixing_VBG it_PRP to_TO the_DT top_NN of_IN a_DT tree_NN in_IN the_DT wood_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP remains_VBZ for_IN a_DT
year_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ besought_VBN almost_RB daily_RB with_IN prayers_NNS and_CC offerings_NNS to_TO
protect_VBP the_DT herds_NNS ;_: for_IN like_IN a_DT true_JJ wood-spirit_NN the_DT Metsik_NNP is_VBZ a_DT
patron_NN of_IN cattle_NNS ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT Metsik_NNP is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN sheaves_NNS of_IN corn_NN ._.

Thus_RB we_PRP may_MD fairly_RB conjecture_VB that_IN the_DT names_NNS Carnival_NNP ,_, Death_NNP ,_, and_CC
Summer_NN are_VBP comparatively_RB late_JJ and_CC inadequate_JJ expressions_NNS for_IN the_DT
beings_NNS personified_VBN or_CC embodied_VBN in_IN the_DT customs_NNS with_IN which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP
been_VBN dealing_VBG ._. The_DT very_JJ abstractness_NN of_IN the_DT names_NNS bespeaks_IN a_DT modern_JJ
origin_NN ;_: for_IN the_DT personification_NN of_IN times_NNS and_CC seasons_NNS like_IN the_DT
Carnival_NNP and_CC Summer_NNP ,_, or_CC of_IN an_DT abstract_JJ notion_NN like_IN death_NN ,_, is_VBZ not_RB
primitive_JJ ._. But_CC the_DT ceremonies_NNS themselves_PRP bear_VBP the_DT stamp_NN of_IN a_DT
dateless_JJ antiquity_NN ;_: therefore_RB we_PRP can_MD hardly_RB help_VB supposing_VBG that_IN in_IN
their_PRP$ origin_NN the_DT ideas_NNS which_WDT they_PRP embodied_VBD were_VBD of_IN a_DT more_RBR simple_JJ and_CC
concrete_JJ order_NN ._. The_DT notion_NN of_IN a_DT tree_NN ,_, perhaps_RB of_IN a_DT particular_JJ kind_NN
of_IN tree_NN (_-LRB- for_IN some_DT savages_NNS have_VBP no_DT word_NN for_IN tree_NN in_IN general_JJ ),_NN or_CC even_RB
of_IN an_DT individual_JJ tree_NN ,_, is_VBZ sufficiently_RB concrete_JJ to_TO supply_VB a_DT basis_NN
from_IN which_WDT by_IN a_DT gradual_JJ process_NN of_IN generalisation_NN the_DT wider_JJR idea_NN of_IN
a_DT spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN might_MD be_VB reached_VBN ._. But_CC this_DT general_JJ idea_NN of_IN
vegetation_NN would_MD readily_RB be_VB confounded_VBN with_IN the_DT season_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PRP
manifests_NNS itself_PRP ;_: hence_RB the_DT substitution_NN of_IN Spring_NNP ,_, Summer_NNP ,_, or_CC May_MD
for_IN the_DT tree-spirit_NN or_CC spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN would_MD be_VB easy_JJ and_CC
natural_JJ ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT concrete_JJ notion_NN of_IN the_DT dying_VBG tree_NN or_CC dying_VBG
vegetation_NN would_MD by_RP a_DT similar_JJ process_NN of_IN generalisation_NN glide_NN into_IN a_DT
notion_NN of_IN death_NN in_IN general_JJ ;_: so_RB that_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN carrying_VBG out_RP the_DT
dying_VBG or_CC dead_JJ vegetation_NN in_IN spring_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT preliminary_JJ to_TO its_PRP$ revival_NN ,_,
would_MD in_IN time_NN widen_VB out_RB into_IN an_DT attempt_NN to_TO banish_VB Death_NNP in_IN general_JJ
from_IN the_DT village_NN or_CC district_NN ._. The_DT view_NN that_IN in_IN these_DT spring_NN
ceremonies_NNS Death_NNP meant_VBD originally_RB the_DT dying_NN or_CC dead_JJ vegetation_NN of_IN
winter_NN has_VBZ the_DT high_JJ support_NN of_IN W_NNP ._. Mannhardt_NNP ;_: and_CC he_PRP confirms_VBZ it_PRP by_IN
the_DT analogy_NN of_IN the_DT name_NN Death_NNP as_IN applied_VBN to_TO the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT ripe_JJ
corn_NN ._. Commonly_RB the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT ripe_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ conceived_VBN ,_, not_RB as_IN
dead_JJ ,_, but_CC as_IN old_JJ ,_, and_CC hence_RB it_PRP goes_VBZ by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT Old_NNP Man_NN or_CC
the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NNP ._. But_CC in_IN some_DT places_NNS the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN cut_VBN at_IN harvest_NN ,_,
which_WDT is_VBZ generally_RB believed_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT seat_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN spirit_NN ,_, is_VBZ
called_VBN "_`` the_DT Dead_JJ One_CD ":_JJ children_NNS are_VBP warned_VBN against_IN entering_VBG the_DT
corn-fields_NNS because_IN Death_NNP sits_VBZ in_IN the_DT corn_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, in_IN a_DT game_NN played_VBN by_IN
Saxon_NNP children_NNS in_IN Transylvania_NNP at_IN the_DT maize_NN harvest_NN ,_, Death_NNP is_VBZ
represented_VBN by_IN a_DT child_NN completely_RB covered_VBN with_IN maize_NN leaves_NNS ._.



5._DT Battle_NNP of_IN Summer_NNP and_CC Winter_NNP

SOMETIMES_NNS in_IN the_DT popular_JJ customs_NNS of_IN the_DT peasantry_NN the_DT contrast_NN
between_IN the_DT dormant_JJ powers_NNS of_IN vegetation_NN in_IN winter_NN and_CC their_PRP$
awakening_VBG vitality_NN in_IN spring_NN takes_VBZ the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT dramatic_JJ contest_NN
between_IN actors_NNS who_WP play_VBP the_DT parts_NNS respectively_RB of_IN Winter_NNP and_CC Summer_NNP ._.
Thus_RB in_IN the_DT towns_NNS of_IN Sweden_NNP on_IN May_NNP Day_NNP two_CD troops_NNS of_IN young_JJ men_NNS on_IN
horseback_NN used_VBN to_TO meet_VB as_IN if_IN for_IN mortal_JJ combat_NN ._. One_CD of_IN them_PRP was_VBD led_VBN
by_IN a_DT representative_NN of_IN Winter_NNP clad_VBN in_IN furs_NNS ,_, who_WP threw_VBD snowballs_NNS and_CC
ice_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO prolong_VB the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN ._. The_DT other_JJ troop_NN was_VBD
commanded_VBN by_IN a_DT representative_NN of_IN Summer_NN covered_VBN with_IN fresh_JJ leaves_NNS
and_CC flowers_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT sham_NN fight_NN which_WDT followed_VBD the_DT party_NN of_IN Summer_NN
came_VBD off_IN victorious_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT ceremony_NN ended_VBN with_IN a_DT feast_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, in_IN
the_DT region_NN of_IN the_DT middle_JJ Rhine_NNP ,_, a_DT representative_NN of_IN Summer_NN clad_VBN in_IN
ivy_NN combats_VBZ a_DT representative_NN of_IN Winter_NNP clad_VBN in_IN straw_NN or_CC moss_NN and_CC
finally_RB gains_VBZ a_DT victory_NN over_IN him_PRP ._. The_DT vanquished_VBN foe_NN is_VBZ thrown_VBN to_TO
the_DT ground_NN and_CC stripped_VBD of_IN his_PRP$ casing_NN of_IN straw_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ torn_VBN to_TO
pieces_NNS and_CC scattered_VBN about_IN ,_, while_IN the_DT youthful_JJ comrades_NNS of_IN the_DT two_CD
champions_NNS sing_VBP a_DT song_NN to_TO commemorate_VB the_DT defeat_NN of_IN Winter_NNP by_IN Summer_NNP ._.
Afterwards_RB they_PRP carry_VBP about_IN a_DT summer_NN garland_NN or_CC branch_NN and_CC collect_VB
gifts_NNS of_IN eggs_NNS and_CC bacon_NN from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT champion_NN
who_WP acts_VBZ the_DT part_NN of_IN Summer_NN is_VBZ dressed_VBN in_IN leaves_NNS and_CC flowers_NNS and_CC
wears_VBZ a_DT chaplet_NN of_IN flowers_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Palatinate_NNP this_DT mimic_JJ
conflict_NN takes_VBZ place_NN on_IN the_DT fourth_JJ Sunday_NNP in_IN Lent_NNP ._. All_DT over_IN Bavaria_NNP
the_DT same_JJ drama_NN used_VBD to_TO be_VB acted_VBN on_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD still_RB
kept_VBD up_RP in_IN some_DT places_NNS down_IN to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN
or_CC later_RB ._. While_IN Summer_NNP appeared_VBD clad_VBN all_DT in_IN green_JJ ,_, decked_VBN with_IN
fluttering_NN ribbons_NNS ,_, and_CC carrying_VBG a_DT branch_NN in_IN blossom_NN or_CC a_DT little_JJ
tree_NN hung_VBD with_IN apples_NNS and_CC pears_NNS ,_, Winter_NNP was_VBD muffled_VBN up_RP in_IN cap_NN and_CC
mantle_NN of_IN fur_NN and_CC bore_VBD in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN a_DT snow-shovel_NN or_CC a_DT flail_NN ._.
Accompanied_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ respective_JJ retinues_NNS dressed_VBN in_IN corresponding_JJ
attire_NN ,_, they_PRP went_VBD through_IN all_DT the_DT streets_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, halting_VBG
before_IN the_DT houses_NNS and_CC singing_VBG staves_NNS of_IN old_JJ songs_NNS ,_, for_IN which_WDT they_PRP
received_VBN presents_NNS of_IN bread_NN ,_, eggs_NNS ,_, and_CC fruit_NN ._. Finally_RB ,_, after_IN a_DT short_JJ
struggle_NN ,_, Winter_NNP was_VBD beaten_VBN by_IN Summer_NNP and_CC ducked_VBD in_IN the_DT village_NN well_RB
or_CC driven_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT village_NN with_IN shouts_NNS and_CC laughter_NN into_IN the_DT
forest_NN ._.

At_IN Goepfritz_NNP in_IN Lower_NNP Austria_NNP ,_, two_CD men_NNS personating_VBG Summer_NNP and_CC Winter_NNP
used_VBN to_TO go_VB from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN on_IN Shrove_NNP Tuesday_NNP ,_, and_CC were_VBD
everywhere_RB welcomed_VBN by_IN the_DT children_NNS with_IN great_JJ delight_NN ._. The_DT
representative_NN of_IN Summer_NN was_VBD clad_VBN in_IN white_JJ and_CC bore_VBD a_DT sickle_JJ ;_: his_PRP$
comrade_NN ,_, who_WP played_VBD the_DT part_NN of_IN Winter_NNP ,_, had_VBD a_DT fur-cap_NN on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_,
his_PRP$ arms_NNS and_CC legs_NNS were_VBD swathed_VBN in_IN straw_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP carried_VBD a_DT flail_NN ._. In_IN
every_DT house_NN they_PRP sang_VBD verses_NNS alternately_RB ._. At_IN Dr_NNP �_, mling_VBG in_IN Brunswick_NNP ,_,
down_RB to_TO the_DT present_JJ time_NN ,_, the_DT contest_NN between_IN Summer_NNP and_CC Winter_NNP is_VBZ
acted_VBN every_DT year_NN at_IN Whitsuntide_NNP by_IN a_DT troop_NN of_IN boys_NNS and_CC a_DT troop_NN of_IN
girls_NNS ._. The_DT boys_NNS rush_VBP singing_VBG ,_, shouting_VBG ,_, and_CC ringing_NN bells_NNS from_IN house_NN

flowers_NNS and_CC garlands_NNS to_TO represent_VB the_DT genial_JJ advent_NN of_IN spring_NN ._.
Formerly_RB the_DT part_NN of_IN Winter_NNP was_VBD played_VBN by_IN a_DT straw-man_NN which_WDT the_DT boys_NNS
carried_VBN with_IN them_PRP ;_: now_RB it_PRP is_VBZ acted_VBN by_IN a_DT real_JJ man_NN in_IN disguise_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT Central_NNP Esquimaux_NNP of_IN North_NNP America_NNP the_DT contest_NN between_IN
representatives_NNS of_IN summer_NN and_CC winter_NN ,_, which_WDT in_IN Europe_NNP has_VBZ long_RB
degenerated_VBD into_IN a_DT mere_JJ dramatic_JJ performance_NN ,_, is_VBZ still_RB kept_VBN up_RP as_IN a_DT
magical_JJ ceremony_NN of_IN which_WDT the_DT avowed_VBN intention_NN is_VBZ to_TO influence_VB the_DT
weather_NN ._. In_IN autumn_NN ,_, when_WRB storms_NNS announce_VBP the_DT approach_NN of_IN the_DT dismal_JJ

comprising_VBG all_DT persons_NNS born_VBN in_IN winter_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT ducks_NNS all_DT persons_NNS
born_VBN in_IN summer_NN ._. A_DT long_JJ rope_NN of_IN sealskin_NN is_VBZ then_RB stretched_VBN out_RB ,_, and_CC
each_DT party_NN laying_VBG hold_NN of_IN one_CD end_NN of_IN it_PRP seeks_VBZ by_IN tugging_VBG with_IN might_MD
and_CC main_JJ to_TO drag_VB the_DT other_JJ party_NN over_IN to_TO its_PRP$ side_NN ._. If_IN the_DT ptarmigans_NNS
get_VB the_DT worst_JJS of_IN it_PRP ,_, then_RB summer_NN has_VBZ won_VBN the_DT game_NN and_CC fine_JJ weather_NN
may_MD be_VB expected_VBN to_TO prevail_VB through_IN the_DT winter_NN ._.



6._DT Death_NNP and_CC Resurrection_NNP of_IN Kostrubonko_NNP

I_PRP RUSSIA_IN funeral_NN ceremonies_NNS like_IN those_DT of_IN "_`` Burying_VBG the_DT Carnival_NNP "_'' and_CC
"_`` Carrying_VBG out_IN Death_NNP "_'' are_VBP celebrated_VBN under_IN the_DT names_NNS ,_, not_RB of_IN Death_NNP or_CC
the_DT Carnival_NNP ,_, but_CC of_IN certain_JJ mythic_JJ figures_NNS ,_, Kostrubonko_NNP ,_, Kostroma_NNP ,_,
Kupalo_NNP ,_, Lada_NNP ,_, and_CC Yarilo_NNP ._. These_DT Russian_NNP ceremonies_NNS are_VBP observed_VBN both_CC
in_IN spring_NN and_CC at_IN midsummer_NN ._. Thus_RB "_'' in_IN Little_JJ Russia_NNP it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT
custom_NN at_IN Eastertide_NNP to_TO celebrate_VB the_DT funeral_NN of_IN a_DT being_NN called_VBN
Kostrubonko_NNP ,_, the_DT deity_NN of_IN the_DT spring_NN ._. A_DT circle_NN was_VBD formed_VBN of_IN singers_NNS
who_WP moved_VBD slowly_RB around_IN a_DT girl_NN who_WP lay_VBD on_IN the_DT ground_NN as_IN if_IN dead_JJ ,_, and_CC
as_IN they_PRP went_VBD they_PRP sang_VBD :_:


'_POS Dead_JJ ,_, dead_JJ is_VBZ our_PRP$ Kostrubonko_NNP !_.
Dead_JJ ,_, dead_JJ is_VBZ our_PRP$ dear_JJ one_NN !'_.


until_IN the_DT girl_NN suddenly_RB sprang_VBD up_RB ,_, on_IN which_WDT the_DT chorus_NN joyfully_RB
exclaimed_VBD :_:


'_POS Come_VB to_TO life_NN ,_, come_VBN to_TO life_NN has_VBZ our_PRP$ Kostrubonko_NNP !_.
Come_VB to_TO life_NN ,_, come_VBN to_TO life_NN has_VBZ our_PRP$ dear_JJ one_NN !'"_NN


On_IN the_DT Eve_NNP of_IN St_NNP ._. John_NNP (_-LRB- Midsummer_NN Eve_NNP )_-RRB- a_DT figure_NN of_IN Kupalo_NNP is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN
straw_NN and_CC "_`` is_VBZ dressed_VBN in_IN woman_NN '_'' s_PRP clothes_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT necklace_NN and_CC a_DT
floral_JJ crown_NN ._. Then_RB a_DT tree_NN is_VBZ felled_VBN ,_, and_CC ,_, after_IN being_VBG decked_VBN with_IN
ribbons_NNS ,_, is_VBZ set_VBN up_RP on_IN some_DT chosen_VBN spot_NN ._. Near_IN this_DT tree_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT
they_PRP give_VBP the_DT name_NN of_IN Marena_NNP [_NNP Winter_NNP or_CC Death_NNP ],_, the_DT straw_NN figure_NN is_VBZ
placed_VBN ,_, together_RB with_IN a_DT table_NN ,_, on_IN which_WDT stand_NN spirits_NNS and_CC viands_NNS ._.
Afterwards_RB a_DT bonfire_NN is_VBZ lit_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT young_JJ men_NNS and_CC maidens_NNS jump_NN over_IN
it_PRP in_IN couples_NNS ,_, carrying_VBG the_DT figure_NN with_IN them_PRP ._. On_IN the_DT next_JJ day_NN they_PRP
strip_VB the_DT tree_NN and_CC the_DT figure_NN of_IN their_PRP$ ornaments_NNS ,_, and_CC throw_VB them_PRP
both_DT into_IN a_DT stream_NN ."_NN On_IN St_NNP ._. Peter_NNP '_POS s_PRP Day_NNP ,_, the_DT twenty-ninth_JJ of_IN June_NNP ,_,
or_CC on_IN the_DT following_VBG Sunday_NNP ,_, "_'' the_DT Funeral_NNP of_IN Kostroma_NNP "_'' or_CC of_IN Lada_NNP or_CC
of_IN Yarilo_NNP is_VBZ celebrated_VBN in_IN Russia_NNP ._. In_IN the_DT Governments_NNS of_IN Penza_NNP and_CC
Simbirsk_NNP the_DT funeral_NN used_VBN to_TO be_VB represented_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ ._. A_DT bonfire_NN
was_VBD kindled_VBN on_IN the_DT twenty-eighth_NN of_IN June_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT next_JJ day_NN the_DT
maidens_NNS chose_VBD one_CD of_IN their_PRP$ number_NN to_TO play_VB the_DT part_NN of_IN Kostroma_NNP ._. Her_PRP$
companions_NNS saluted_VBD her_PRP with_IN deep_JJ obeisances_NNS ,_, placed_VBD her_PRP on_IN a_DT board_NN ,_,
and_CC carried_VBD her_PRP to_TO the_DT bank_NN of_IN a_DT stream_NN ._. There_EX they_PRP bathed_VBN her_PRP in_IN
the_DT water_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT oldest_JJS girl_NN made_VBD a_DT basket_NN of_IN lime-tree_JJ bark_NN and_CC
beat_VB it_PRP like_IN a_DT drum_NN ._. Then_RB they_PRP returned_VBD to_TO the_DT village_NN and_CC ended_VBD the_DT
day_NN with_IN processions_NNS ,_, games_NNS ,_, and_CC dances_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT Murom_NNP district_NN
Kostroma_NNP was_VBD represented_VBN by_IN a_DT straw_NN figure_NN dressed_VBN in_IN woman_NN '_'' s_PRP
clothes_NNS and_CC flowers_NNS ._. This_DT was_VBD laid_VBN in_IN a_DT trough_NN and_CC carried_VBD with_IN
songs_NNS to_TO the_DT bank_NN of_IN a_DT lake_NN or_CC river_NN ._. Here_RB the_DT crowd_NN divided_VBN into_IN
two_CD sides_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT the_DT one_CD attacked_VBN and_CC the_DT other_JJ defended_VBD the_DT
figure_NN ._. At_IN last_JJ the_DT assailants_NNS gained_VBD the_DT day_NN ,_, stripped_VBD the_DT figure_NN
of_IN its_PRP$ dress_NN and_CC ornaments_NNS ,_, tore_VBD it_PRP in_IN pieces_NNS ,_, trod_VBD the_DT straw_NN of_IN
which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD made_VBN under_IN foot_NN ,_, and_CC flung_VBD it_PRP into_IN the_DT stream_NN ;_: while_IN
the_DT defenders_NNS of_IN the_DT figure_NN hid_VBD their_PRP$ faces_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS and_CC
pretended_VBN to_TO bewail_VB the_DT death_NN of_IN Kostroma_NNP ._. In_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN
Kostroma_NNP the_DT burial_NN of_IN Yarilo_NNP was_VBD celebrated_VBN on_IN the_DT twenty-ninth_JJ or_CC
thirtieth_IN of_IN June_NNP ._. The_DT people_NNS chose_VBD an_DT old_JJ man_NN and_CC gave_VBD him_PRP a_DT small_JJ
coffin_NN containing_VBG a_DT Priapus-like_JJ figure_NN representing_VBG Yarilo_NNP ._. This_DT he_PRP
carried_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, followed_VBD by_IN women_NNS chanting_VBG dirges_NNS and_CC
expressing_VBG by_IN their_PRP$ gestures_NNS grief_NN and_CC despair_NN ._. In_IN the_DT open_JJ fields_NNS a_DT
grave_NN was_VBD dug_VBN ,_, and_CC into_IN it_PRP the_DT figure_NN was_VBD lowered_VBN amid_IN weeping_VBG and_CC
wailing_VBG ,_, after_IN which_WDT games_NNS and_CC dances_NNS were_VBD begun_VBN ,_, "_`` calling_VBG to_TO mind_VB
the_DT funeral_NN games_NNS celebrated_VBN in_IN old_JJ times_NNS by_IN the_DT pagan_NN Slavonians_NNS ."_.
In_IN Little_NNP Russia_NNP the_DT figure_NN of_IN Yarilo_NNP was_VBD laid_VBN in_IN a_DT coffin_NN and_CC
carried_VBN through_IN the_DT streets_NNS after_IN sunset_NN surrounded_VBN by_IN drunken_JJ
women_NNS ,_, who_WP kept_VBD repeating_VBG mournfully_RB ,_, "_`` He_PRP is_VBZ dead_JJ !_. he_PRP is_VBZ dead_JJ !"_NNS The_DT
men_NNS lifted_VBD and_CC shook_VBD the_DT figure_NN as_IN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD trying_VBG to_TO recall_VB the_DT
dead_JJ man_NN to_TO life_NN ._. Then_RB they_PRP said_VBD to_TO the_DT women_NNS ,_, "_`` Women_NNS ,_, weep_NN not_RB ._. I_PRP
know_VB what_WP is_VBZ sweeter_JJR than_IN honey_NN ."_NNS But_CC the_DT women_NNS continued_VBD to_TO lament_VB
and_CC chant_NN ,_, as_IN they_PRP do_VBP at_IN funerals_NNS ._. "_`` Of_IN what_WP was_VBD he_PRP guilty_JJ ?_. He_PRP was_VBD so_RB
good_JJ ._. He_PRP will_MD arise_VB no_DT more_JJR ._. O_UH how_WRB shall_MD we_PRP part_NN from_IN thee_PRP ?_. What_WP is_VBZ
life_NN without_IN thee_PRP ?_. Arise_NNP ,_, if_IN only_RB for_IN a_DT brief_JJ hour_NN ._. But_CC he_PRP rises_VBZ
not_RB ,_, he_PRP not_RB ."_RB At_IN last_JJ the_DT Yarilo_NNP was_VBD buried_VBN in_IN a_DT grave_NN ._.



7._NNP Death_NNP and_CC Revival_NNP of_IN Vegetation_NNP

THESE_DT Russian_JJ customs_NNS are_VBP plainly_RB of_IN the_DT same_JJ nature_NN as_IN those_DT which_WDT
in_IN Austria_NNP and_CC Germany_NNP are_VBP known_VBN as_IN "_`` Carrying_VBG out_IN Death_NNP ."_NNP Therefore_CC
if_IN the_DT interpretation_NN here_RB adopted_VBN of_IN the_DT latter_NN is_VBZ right_RB ,_, the_DT
Russian_JJ Kostrubonko_NNP ,_, Yarilo_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT rest_NN must_MD also_RB have_VB been_VBN
originally_RB embodiments_NNS of_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ death_NN
must_MD have_VB been_VBN regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT necessary_JJ preliminary_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ revival_NN ._.

decline_NN of_IN summer_NN is_VBZ dated_VBN from_IN Midsummer_NNP Day_NNP ,_, after_IN which_WDT the_DT days_NNS
begin_VB to_TO shorten_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT sun_NN sets_VBZ out_RP on_IN his_PRP$ downward_JJ journey_NN :_:


"_`` To_TO the_DT darksome_JJ hollows_NNS
Where_WRB the_DT frosts_NNS of_IN winter_NN lie_NN ."_.


Such_JJ a_DT turning-point_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, when_WRB vegetation_NN might_MD be_VB thought_VBN

But_CC while_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN vegetation_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN represented_VBN

8._DT Analogous_JJ Rites_NNS in_IN India_NNP

IN_IN THE_DT KANAGRA_NNP district_NN of_IN India_NNP there_EX is_VBZ a_DT custom_NN observed_VBN by_IN young_JJ
girls_NNS in_IN spring_NN which_WDT closely_RB resembles_VBZ some_DT of_IN the_DT European_JJ spring_NN
ceremonies_NNS just_RB described_VBN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Ral_NNP �_NNP Ka_NNP mel_NN �,_, or_CC fair_JJ
of_IN Ral_NNP �,_, the_DT Ral_NNP �_NNP being_VBG a_DT small_JJ painted_JJ earthen_NN image_NN of_IN Siva_NNP or_CC
P_NNP �_NNP rvat_NNP �._NNP The_DT custom_NN is_VBZ in_IN vogue_NN all_DT over_IN the_DT Kanagra_NNP district_NN ,_, and_CC
its_PRP$ celebration_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ entirely_RB confined_VBN to_TO young_JJ girls_NNS ,_, lasts_VBZ
through_IN most_JJS of_IN Chet_NNP (_-LRB- March-April_NNP )_-RRB- up_RP to_TO the_DT Sankr_NNP �_NNP nt_NN of_IN Bais_NNP �_NNP kh_.
(_-LRB- April_NNP )._NNP On_IN a_DT morning_NN in_IN March_NNP all_DT the_DT young_JJ girls_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN
take_VB small_JJ baskets_NNS of_IN d_JJ �_NN b_NN grass_NN and_CC flowers_NNS to_TO an_DT appointed_JJ place_NN ,_,
where_WRB they_PRP throw_VBP them_PRP in_IN a_DT heap_NN ._. Round_IN this_DT heap_NN they_PRP stand_VBP in_IN a_DT
circle_NN and_CC sing_VB ._. This_DT goes_VBZ on_IN every_DT day_NN for_IN ten_CD days_NNS ,_, till_IN the_DT heap_NN
of_IN grass_NN and_CC flowers_NNS has_VBZ reached_VBN a_DT fair_JJ height_NN ._. Then_RB they_PRP cut_VBD in_IN the_DT
jungle_NN two_CD branches_NNS ,_, each_DT with_IN three_CD prongs_NNS at_IN one_CD end_NN ,_, and_CC place_NN

defrayed_VBN by_IN contributions_NNS solicited_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ parents_NNS ._. Then_RB at_IN the_DT
next_JJ Sankr_NNP �_NN nt_NN (_-LRB- Bais_NNP �_NN kh_NN )_-RRB- they_PRP all_DT go_VBP together_RB to_TO the_DT river-side_NN ,_,

The_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT fair_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO be_VB to_TO secure_VB a_DT good_JJ husband_NN ._.

That_DT in_IN this_DT Indian_JJ ceremony_NN the_DT deities_NNS Siva_NNP and_CC P_NNP �_NNP rvat_NN �_NNS are_VBP

9._CD The_DT Magic_NNP Spring_NNP

THE_DT GENERAL_NNP explanation_NN which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP been_VBN led_VBN to_TO adopt_VB of_IN these_DT and_CC

picturesque_JJ ceremonies_NNS ,_, which_WDT have_VBP preserved_VBN to_TO an_DT age_NN often_RB deemed_VBN

The_DT interpretation_NN which_WDT ,_, following_VBG in_IN the_DT footsteps_NNS of_IN W_NNP ._.
Mannhardt_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP attempted_VBN to_TO give_VB of_IN these_DT ceremonies_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN not_RB
a_DT little_JJ confirmed_JJ by_IN the_DT discovery_NN ,_, made_VBN since_IN this_DT book_NN was_VBD first_RB
written_VBN ,_, that_IN the_DT natives_NNS of_IN Central_NNP Australia_NNP regularly_RB practise_NN

regard_NN it_PRP as_IN such_JJ in_IN very_JJ deed_NN ._. Now_RB it_PRP is_VBZ just_RB when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ promise_NN

XXIX_NNP ._. The_DT Myth_NNP of_IN Adonis_NNP

THE_DT SPECTACLE_NNP of_IN the_DT great_JJ changes_NNS which_WDT annually_RB pass_VBP over_IN the_DT face_NN
of_IN the_DT earth_NN has_VBZ powerfully_RB impressed_VBN the_DT minds_NNS of_IN men_NNS in_IN all_DT ages_NNS ,_,
and_CC stirred_VBD them_PRP to_TO meditate_VB on_IN the_DT causes_NNS of_IN transformations_NNS so_RB
vast_JJ and_CC wonderful_JJ ._. Their_PRP$ curiosity_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN purely_RB
disinterested_JJ ;_: for_IN even_RB the_DT savage_JJ cannot_NN fail_VBP to_TO perceive_VB how_WRB
intimately_RB his_PRP$ own_JJ life_NN is_VBZ bound_VBN up_RP with_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN nature_NN ,_, and_CC how_WRB
the_DT same_JJ processes_NNS which_WDT freeze_NN the_DT stream_NN and_CC strip_NN the_DT earth_NN of_IN
vegetation_NN menace_NN him_PRP with_IN extinction_NN ._. At_IN a_DT certain_JJ stage_NN of_IN
development_NN men_NNS seem_VBP to_TO have_VB imagined_VBN that_IN the_DT means_NNS of_IN averting_VBG the_DT
threatened_VBN calamity_NN were_VBD in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ hands_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP could_MD
hasten_VB or_CC retard_VB the_DT flight_NN of_IN the_DT seasons_NNS by_IN magic_JJ art_NN ._. Accordingly_RB
they_PRP performed_VBD ceremonies_NNS and_CC recited_VBD spells_NNS to_TO make_VB the_DT rain_NN to_TO
fall_NN ,_, the_DT sun_NN to_TO shine_VB ,_, animals_NNS to_TO multiply_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT
earth_NN to_TO grow_VB ._. In_IN course_NN of_IN time_NN the_DT slow_JJ advance_NN of_IN knowledge_NN ,_,
which_WDT has_VBZ dispelled_VBN so_RB many_JJ cherished_JJ illusions_NNS ,_, convinced_VBN at_IN least_JJS
the_DT more_RBR thoughtful_JJ portion_NN of_IN mankind_NN that_IN the_DT alternations_NNS of_IN
summer_NN and_CC winter_NN ,_, of_IN spring_NN and_CC autumn_NN ,_, were_VBD not_RB merely_RB the_DT result_NN
of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ magical_JJ rites_NNS ,_, but_CC that_IN some_DT deeper_JJR cause_NN ,_, some_DT
mightier_JJR power_NN ,_, was_VBD at_IN work_NN behind_IN the_DT shifting_VBG scenes_NNS of_IN nature_NN ._.
They_PRP now_RB pictured_VBD to_TO themselves_PRP the_DT growth_NN and_CC decay_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ,_,
the_DT birth_NN and_CC death_NN of_IN living_VBG creatures_NNS ,_, as_IN effects_NNS of_IN the_DT waxing_NN or_CC
waning_VBG strength_NN of_IN divine_JJ beings_NNS ,_, of_IN gods_NNS and_CC goddesses_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD
born_VBN and_CC died_VBN ,_, who_WP married_VBD and_CC begot_VBD children_NNS ,_, on_IN the_DT pattern_NN of_IN
human_JJ life_NN ._.

Thus_RB the_DT old_JJ magical_JJ theory_NN of_IN the_DT seasons_NNS was_VBD displaced_VBN ,_, or_CC rather_RB
supplemented_VBN ,_, by_IN a_DT religious_JJ theory_NN ._. For_IN although_IN men_NNS now_RB attributed_VBN
the_DT annual_JJ cycle_NN of_IN change_NN primarily_RB to_TO corresponding_JJ changes_NNS in_IN
their_PRP$ deities_NNS ,_, they_PRP still_RB thought_VBD that_IN by_IN performing_VBG certain_JJ magical_JJ
rites_NNS they_PRP could_MD aid_VB the_DT god_NN who_WP was_VBD the_DT principle_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, in_IN his_PRP$
struggle_NN with_IN the_DT opposing_VBG principle_NN of_IN death_NN ._. They_PRP imagined_VBD that_IN
they_PRP could_MD recruit_VB his_PRP$ failing_VBG energies_NNS and_CC even_RB raise_VB him_PRP from_IN the_DT
dead_JJ ._. The_DT ceremonies_NNS which_WDT they_PRP observed_VBD for_IN this_DT purpose_NN were_VBD in_IN
substance_NN a_DT dramatic_JJ representation_NN of_IN the_DT natural_JJ processes_NNS which_WDT
they_PRP wished_VBD to_TO facilitate_VB ;_: for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT familiar_JJ tenet_NN of_IN magic_NN that_WDT
you_PRP can_MD produce_VB any_DT desired_VBN effect_NN by_IN merely_RB imitating_VBG it_PRP ._. And_CC as_IN
they_PRP now_RB explained_VBD the_DT fluctuations_NNS of_IN growth_NN and_CC decay_NN ,_, of_IN
reproduction_NN and_CC dissolution_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT marriage_NN ,_, the_DT death_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
rebirth_NN or_CC revival_NN of_IN the_DT gods_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ religious_JJ or_CC rather_RB magical_JJ

fruitful_JJ union_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS of_IN fertility_NN ,_, the_DT sad_JJ death_NN of_IN one_CD at_IN
least_JJS of_IN the_DT divine_JJ partners_NNS ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ joyful_JJ resurrection_NN ._. Thus_RB a_DT
religious_JJ theory_NN was_VBD blended_VBN with_IN a_DT magical_JJ practice_NN ._. The_DT
combination_NN is_VBZ familiar_JJ in_IN history_NN ._. Indeed_RB ,_, few_JJ religions_NNS have_VBP ever_RB
succeeded_VBN in_IN wholly_RB extricating_VBG themselves_PRP from_IN the_DT old_JJ trammels_NNS of_IN
magic_NN ._. The_DT inconsistency_NN of_IN acting_VBG on_IN two_CD opposite_JJ principles_NNS ,_,
however_RB it_PRP may_MD vex_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT philosopher_NN ,_, rarely_RB troubles_NNS the_DT
common_JJ man_NN ;_: indeed_RB he_PRP is_VBZ seldom_RB even_RB aware_JJ of_IN it_PRP ._. His_PRP$ affair_NN is_VBZ to_TO
act_NN ,_, not_RB to_TO analyse_VB the_DT motives_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ action_NN ._. If_IN mankind_NN had_VBD always_RB
been_VBN logical_JJ and_CC wise_JJ ,_, history_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB a_DT long_JJ chronicle_NN of_IN
folly_NN and_CC crime_NN ._.

Of_IN the_DT changes_NNS which_WDT the_DT seasons_NNS bring_VBP with_IN them_PRP ,_, the_DT most_RBS striking_JJ
within_IN the_DT temperate_JJ zone_NN are_VBP those_DT which_WDT affect_VBP vegetation_NN ._. The_DT
influence_NN of_IN the_DT seasons_NNS on_IN animals_NNS ,_, though_IN great_JJ ,_, is_VBZ not_RB nearly_RB so_RB
manifest_JJ ._. Hence_RB it_PRP is_VBZ natural_JJ that_IN in_IN the_DT magical_JJ dramas_NN designed_VBN to_TO
dispel_VB winter_NN and_CC bring_VB back_RB spring_VB the_DT emphasis_NN should_MD be_VB laid_VBN on_IN
vegetation_NN ,_, and_CC that_DT trees_NNS and_CC plants_NNS should_MD figure_VB in_IN them_PRP more_RBR
prominently_RB than_IN beasts_NNS and_CC birds_NNS ._. Yet_RB the_DT two_CD sides_NNS of_IN life_NN ,_, the_DT
vegetable_NN and_CC the_DT animal_NN ,_, were_VBD not_RB dissociated_VBN in_IN the_DT minds_NNS of_IN those_DT
who_WP observed_VBD the_DT ceremonies_NNS ._. Indeed_RB they_PRP commonly_RB believed_VBD that_IN the_DT
tie_VB between_IN the_DT animal_NN and_CC the_DT vegetable_NN world_NN was_VBD even_RB closer_RBR than_IN
it_PRP really_RB is_VBZ ;_: hence_RB they_PRP often_RB combined_VBD the_DT dramatic_JJ representation_NN
of_IN reviving_VBG plants_NNS with_IN a_DT real_JJ or_CC a_DT dramatic_JJ union_NN of_IN the_DT sexes_NNS for_IN
the_DT purpose_NN of_IN furthering_VBG at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN and_CC by_IN the_DT same_JJ act_NN the_DT
multiplication_NN of_IN fruits_NNS ,_, of_IN animals_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN men_NNS ._. To_TO them_PRP the_DT
principle_NN of_IN life_NN and_CC fertility_NN ,_, whether_IN animal_NN or_CC vegetable_NN ,_, was_VBD
one_CD and_CC indivisible_JJ ._. To_TO live_VB and_CC to_TO cause_VB to_TO live_VB ,_, to_TO eat_VB food_NN and_CC
to_TO beget_VB children_NNS ,_, these_DT were_VBD the_DT primary_JJ wants_NNS of_IN men_NNS in_IN the_DT past_NN ,_,
and_CC they_PRP will_MD be_VB the_DT primary_JJ wants_NNS of_IN men_NNS in_IN the_DT future_NN so_RB long_RB as_IN
the_DT world_NN lasts_VBZ ._. Other_JJ things_NNS may_MD be_VB added_VBN to_TO enrich_JJ and_CC beautify_VB
human_JJ life_NN ,_, but_CC unless_IN these_DT wants_NNS are_VBP first_JJ satisfied_JJ ,_, humanity_NN
itself_PRP must_MD cease_VB to_TO exist_VB ._. These_DT two_CD things_NNS ,_, therefore_RB ,_, food_NN and_CC
children_NNS ,_, were_VBD what_WP men_NNS chiefly_RB sought_VBD to_TO procure_VB by_IN the_DT performance_NN
of_IN magical_JJ rites_NNS for_IN the_DT regulation_NN of_IN the_DT seasons_NNS ._.

Nowhere_RB ,_, apparently_RB ,_, have_VBP these_DT rites_NNS been_VBN more_RBR widely_RB and_CC solemnly_RB
celebrated_JJ than_IN in_IN the_DT lands_NNS which_WDT border_NN the_DT Eastern_NNP Mediterranean_NNP ._.
Under_IN the_DT names_NNS of_IN Osiris_NNP ,_, Tammuz_NNP ,_, Adonis_NNP ,_, and_CC Attis_NNP ,_, the_DT peoples_NNS of_IN
Egypt_NNP and_CC Western_NNP Asia_NNP represented_VBD the_DT yearly_JJ decay_NN and_CC revival_NN of_IN
life_NN ,_, especially_RB of_IN vegetable_NN life_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP personified_VBD as_IN a_DT god_NN
who_WP annually_RB died_VBD and_CC rose_VBD again_RB from_IN the_DT dead_NN ._. In_IN name_NN and_CC detail_NN
the_DT rites_NNS varied_VBN from_IN place_NN to_TO place_NN :_: in_IN substance_NN they_PRP were_VBD the_DT
same_JJ ._. The_DT supposed_VBN death_NN and_CC resurrection_NN of_IN this_DT oriental_JJ deity_NN ,_, a_DT
god_NN of_IN many_JJ names_NNS but_CC of_IN essentially_RB one_CD nature_NN ,_, is_VBZ now_RB to_TO be_VB
examined_VBN ._. We_PRP begin_VBP with_IN Tammuz_NNP or_CC Adonis_NNP ._.

The_DT worship_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP was_VBD practised_VBN by_IN the_DT Semitic_JJ peoples_NNS of_IN
Babylonia_NNP and_CC Syria_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Greeks_NNP borrowed_VBD it_PRP from_IN them_PRP as_IN early_RB
as_IN the_DT seventh_JJ century_NN before_IN Christ_NNP ._. The_DT true_JJ name_NN of_IN the_DT deity_NN was_VBD
Tammuz_NNP :_: the_DT appellation_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP is_VBZ merely_RB the_DT Semitic_NN Adon_NNP ,_,
"_`` lord_NN ,"_VBZ a_DT title_NN of_IN honour_NN by_IN which_WDT his_PRP$ worshippers_NNS addressed_VBD him_PRP ._.
But_CC the_DT Greeks_NNP through_IN a_DT misunderstanding_NN converted_VBD the_DT title_NN of_IN
honour_NN into_IN a_DT proper_JJ name_NN ._. In_IN the_DT religious_JJ literature_NN of_IN Babylonia_NNP
Tammuz_NNP appears_VBZ as_IN the_DT youthful_JJ spouse_NN or_CC lover_NN of_IN Ishtar_NNP ,_, the_DT great_JJ
mother_NN goddess_JJ ,_, the_DT embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT reproductive_JJ energies_NNS of_IN
nature_NN ._. The_DT references_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ connexion_NN with_IN each_DT other_JJ in_IN myth_NN
and_CC ritual_NN are_VBP both_DT fragmentary_JJ and_CC obscure_JJ ,_, but_CC we_PRP gather_VBP from_IN them_PRP
that_IN every_DT year_NN Tammuz_NNP was_VBD believed_VBN to_TO die_VB ,_, passing_VBG away_RB from_IN the_DT
cheerful_JJ earth_NN to_TO the_DT gloomy_JJ subterranean_JJ world_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN every_DT year_NN
his_PRP$ divine_JJ mistress_NN journeyed_VBD in_IN quest_NN of_IN him_PRP "_'' to_TO the_DT land_NN from_IN
which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ no_DT returning_VBG ,_, to_TO the_DT house_NN of_IN darkness_NN ,_, where_WRB dust_NN
lies_VBZ on_IN door_NN and_CC bolt_VB ."_RB During_IN her_PRP absence_NN the_DT passion_NN of_IN love_NN
ceased_VBD to_TO operate_VB :_: men_NNS and_CC beasts_NNS alike_RB forgot_VBD to_TO reproduce_VB their_PRP$
kinds_NNS :_: all_DT life_NN was_VBD threatened_VBN with_IN extinction_NN ._. So_RB intimately_RB bound_VBN
up_RB with_IN the_DT goddess_NN were_VBD the_DT sexual_JJ functions_NNS of_IN the_DT whole_JJ animal_NN
kingdom_NN that_IN without_IN her_PRP$ presence_NN they_PRP could_MD not_RB be_VB discharged_VBN ._. A_DT
messenger_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ god_NN Ea_NNP was_VBD accordingly_RB despatched_VBN to_TO rescue_VB
the_DT goddess_NN on_IN whom_WP so_RB much_RB depended_VBD ._. The_DT stern_JJ queen_NN of_IN the_DT
infernal_JJ regions_NNS ,_, Allatu_NNP or_CC Eresh-Kigal_NNP by_IN name_NN ,_, reluctantly_RB allowed_VBN
Ishtar_NNP to_TO be_VB sprinkled_VBN with_IN the_DT Water_NNP of_IN Life_NNP and_CC to_TO depart_VB ,_, in_IN
company_NN probably_RB with_IN her_PRP$ lover_NN Tammuz_NNP ,_, that_IN the_DT two_CD might_MD return_VB
together_RB to_TO the_DT upper_JJ world_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN with_IN their_PRP$ return_NN all_DT nature_NN
might_MD revive_VB ._.

Laments_NNS for_IN the_DT departed_VBN Tammuz_NNP are_VBP contained_VBN in_IN several_JJ Babylonian_NNP
hymns_NNS ,_, which_WDT liken_JJ him_PRP to_TO plants_NNS that_WDT quickly_RB fade_VBD ._. He_PRP is_VBZ


"_`` A_DT tamarisk_NN that_IN in_IN the_DT garden_NN has_VBZ drunk_JJ no_DT water_NN ,_,
Whose_DT crown_NN in_IN the_DT field_NN has_VBZ brought_VBN forth_RB no_DT blossom_NN ._.
A_DT willow_NN that_WDT rejoiced_VBD not_RB by_IN the_DT watercourse_NN ,_,
A_DT willow_NN whose_WP$ roots_NNS were_VBD torn_VBN up_RB ._.
A_DT herb_NN that_IN in_IN the_DT garden_NN had_VBD drunk_JJ no_DT water_NN ."_.


His_PRP$ death_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN annually_RB mourned_VBN ,_, to_TO the_DT shrill_JJ music_NN
of_IN flutes_NNS ,_, by_IN men_NNS and_CC women_NNS about_IN midsummer_NN in_IN the_DT month_NN named_VBD after_IN
him_PRP ,_, the_DT month_NN of_IN Tammuz_NNP ._. The_DT dirges_NNS were_VBD seemingly_RB chanted_VBN over_IN an_DT
effigy_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ god_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD washed_VBN with_IN pure_JJ water_NN ,_, anointed_CC
with_IN oil_NN ,_, and_CC clad_VBN in_IN a_DT red_JJ robe_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT fumes_NNS of_IN incense_NN rose_NN
into_IN the_DT air_NN ,_, as_IN if_IN to_TO stir_VB his_PRP$ dormant_JJ senses_NNS by_IN their_PRP$ pungent_JJ
fragrance_NN and_CC wake_VB him_PRP from_IN the_DT sleep_NN of_IN death_NN ._. In_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT
dirges_NNS ,_, inscribed_JJ Lament_NNP of_IN the_DT Flutes_NNS for_IN Tammuz_NNP ,_, we_PRP seem_VBP still_RB
to_TO hear_VB the_DT voices_NNS of_IN the_DT singers_NNS chanting_VBG the_DT sad_JJ refrain_NN and_CC to_TO
catch_NN ,_, like_IN far-away_JJ music_NN ,_, the_DT wailing_VBG notes_NNS of_IN the_DT flutes_NNS :_:


"_`` At_IN his_PRP$ vanishing_VBG away_RB she_PRP lifts_VBZ up_RP a_DT lament_NN ,_,
'_POS Oh_UH my_PRP$ child_NN !'_RB at_IN his_PRP$ vanishing_VBG away_RB she_PRP lifts_VBZ up_RP a_DT lament_NN ;_:
'_POS My_PRP$ Damu_NNP !'_, at_IN his_PRP$ vanishing_VBG away_RB she_PRP lifts_VBZ up_RP a_DT lament_NN ._.
'_POS My_PRP$ enchanter_NN and_CC priest_NN !'_NNS at_IN his_PRP$ vanishing_NN away_RB
she_PRP lifts_VBZ up_RP a_DT lament_NN ,_,
At_IN the_DT shining_VBG cedar_NN ,_, rooted_VBN in_IN a_DT spacious_JJ place_NN ,_,
In_IN Eanna_NNP ,_, above_IN and_CC below_IN ,_, she_PRP lifts_VBZ up_RP a_DT lament_NN ._.
Like_IN the_DT lament_NN that_IN a_DT house_NN lifts_VBZ up_RP for_IN its_PRP$ master_NN ,_,
lifts_VBZ she_PRP up_RP a_DT lament_NN ,_,

lifts_VBZ she_PRP up_RP a_DT lament_NN ._.

frowning_VBG precipices_NNS of_IN Sinai_NNP ._.

the_DT effect_NN of_IN wine_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT direct_JJ inspiration_NN of_IN a_DT deity_NN ._. Certainly_RB

their_PRP$ lairs_NNS among_IN the_DT rocks_NNS saw_VBD the_DT red_JJ sun_NN of_IN the_DT desert_NN reflected_VBN

Again_RB ,_, just_RB as_IN the_DT cloud_NN of_IN melancholy_NN which_WDT from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN

XXXII_NNP ._. The_DT Ritual_NNP of_IN Adonis_NNP

AT_WDT THE_DT FESTIVALS_NNS of_IN Adonis_NNP ,_, which_WDT were_VBD held_VBN in_IN Western_NNP Asia_NNP and_CC in_IN
Greek_JJ lands_NNS ,_, the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN was_VBD annually_RB mourned_VBN ,_, with_IN a_DT
bitter_JJ wailing_VBG ,_, chiefly_RB by_IN women_NNS ;_: images_NNS of_IN him_PRP ,_, dressed_VBN to_TO resemble_VB
corpses_NNS ,_, were_VBD carried_VBN out_RP as_IN to_TO burial_NN and_CC then_RB thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT sea_NN
or_CC into_IN springs_NNS ;_: and_CC in_IN some_DT places_NNS his_PRP$ revival_NN was_VBD celebrated_VBN on_IN
the_DT following_VBG day_NN ._. But_CC at_IN different_JJ places_NNS the_DT ceremonies_NNS varied_VBN
somewhat_RB in_IN the_DT manner_NN and_CC apparently_RB also_RB in_IN the_DT season_NN of_IN their_PRP$

displayed_VBN on_IN two_CD couches_NNS ;_: beside_IN them_PRP were_VBD set_VBN ripe_JJ fruits_NNS of_IN all_PDT
kinds_NNS ,_, cakes_NNS ,_, plants_NNS growing_VBG in_IN flower-pots_NNS ,_, and_CC green_JJ bowers_NNS twined_.
with_IN anise_NN ._. The_DT marriage_NN of_IN the_DT lovers_NNS was_VBD celebrated_VBN one_CD day_NN ,_, and_CC
on_IN the_DT morrow_NN women_NNS attired_VBN as_IN mourners_NNS ,_, with_IN streaming_VBG hair_NN and_CC
bared_VBN breasts_NNS ,_, bore_VBD the_DT image_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ Adonis_NNP to_TO the_DT sea-shore_NN
and_CC committed_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT waves_NNS ._. Yet_CC they_PRP sorrowed_VBD not_RB without_IN hope_NN ,_,
for_IN they_PRP sang_VBD that_IN the_DT lost_VBN one_CD would_MD come_VB back_RB again_RB ._. The_DT date_NN at_IN
which_WDT this_DT Alexandrian_NNP ceremony_NN was_VBD observed_VBN is_VBZ not_RB expressly_RB
stated_VBN ;_: but_CC from_IN the_DT mention_NN of_IN the_DT ripe_JJ fruits_NNS it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN inferred_VBN
that_IN it_PRP took_VBD place_NN in_IN late_JJ summer_NN ._. In_IN the_DT great_JJ Phoenician_NN sanctuary_NN

the_DT shrill_JJ wailing_NN notes_NNS of_IN the_DT flute_NN ,_, with_IN weeping_VBG ,_, lamentation_NN ,_,
and_CC beating_NN of_IN the_DT breast_NN ;_: but_CC next_JJ day_NN he_PRP was_VBD believed_VBN to_TO come_VB to_TO
life_NN again_RB and_CC ascend_VB up_RP to_TO heaven_NN in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN his_PRP$
worshippers_NNS ._. The_DT disconsolate_JJ believers_NNS ,_, left_VBD behind_RP on_IN earth_NN ,_,
shaved_VBN their_PRP$ heads_NNS as_IN the_DT Egyptians_NNS did_VBD on_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ
bull_NN Apis_WP ;_: women_NNS who_WP could_MD not_RB bring_VB themselves_PRP to_TO sacrifice_VB their_PRP$
beautiful_JJ tresses_NNS had_VBD to_TO give_VB themselves_PRP up_RP to_TO strangers_NNS on_IN a_DT
certain_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT festival_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO dedicate_VB to_TO Astarte_NNP the_DT wages_NNS of_IN
their_PRP$ shame_NN ._.

This_DT Phoenician_JJ festival_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN a_DT vernal_JJ one_CD ,_, for_IN its_PRP$
date_NN was_VBD determined_VBN by_IN the_DT discoloration_NN of_IN the_DT river_NN Adonis_NNP ,_, and_CC
this_DT has_VBZ been_VBN observed_VBN by_IN modern_JJ travellers_NNS to_TO occur_VB in_IN spring_NN ._. At_IN
that_DT season_NN the_DT red_JJ earth_NN washed_VBD down_RB from_IN the_DT mountains_NNS by_IN the_DT rain_NN
tinges_NNS the_DT water_NN of_IN the_DT river_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB the_DT sea_NN ,_, for_IN a_DT great_JJ way_NN
with_IN a_DT blood-red_JJ hue_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT crimson_JJ stain_NN was_VBD believed_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT
blood_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP ,_, annually_RB wounded_VBN to_TO death_NN by_IN the_DT boar_NN on_IN Mount_NNP
Lebanon_NNP ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT scarlet_JJ anemone_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO have_VB sprung_VBN from_IN the_DT
blood_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP ,_, or_CC to_TO have_VB been_VBN stained_VBN by_IN it_PRP ;_: and_CC as_IN the_DT anemone_NN

festival_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ festivals_NNS ,_, was_VBD held_VBN in_IN
spring_NN ._. The_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT flower_NN is_VBZ probably_RB derived_VBN from_IN Naaman_NNP
("_NN darling_NN "),_, which_WDT seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN an_DT epithet_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP ._. The_DT
Arabs_NNPS still_RB call_VB the_DT anemone_NN "_`` wounds_NNS of_IN the_DT Naaman_NNP ."_NNP The_DT red_JJ rose_NN
also_RB was_VBD said_VBN to_TO owe_VB its_PRP$ hue_NN to_TO the_DT same_JJ sad_JJ occasion_NN ;_: for_IN
Aphrodite_NNP ,_, hastening_VBG to_TO her_PRP$ wounded_JJ lover_NN ,_, trod_NN on_IN a_DT bush_NN of_IN white_JJ
roses_NNS ;_: the_DT cruel_JJ thorns_NNS tore_VBD her_PRP$ tender_NN flesh_NN ,_, and_CC her_PRP$ sacred_JJ blood_NN
dyed_VBN the_DT white_JJ roses_NNS for_IN ever_RB red_JJ ._. It_PRP would_MD be_VB idle_JJ ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, to_TO lay_VB

Yet_RB so_RB far_RB as_IN it_PRP counts_VBZ at_IN all_DT ,_, the_DT tale_NN which_WDT links_VBZ the_DT damask_NN rose_NN

at_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN summer_NN ._. For_IN the_DT fleet_NN which_WDT Athens_NNP fitted_VBD out_IN
against_IN Syracuse_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN which_WDT her_PRP$ power_NN was_VBD

very_RB time_NN ._. As_IN the_DT troops_NNS marched_VBD down_IN to_TO the_DT harbour_NN to_TO embark_VB ,_, the_DT

corpse-like_JJ effigies_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT air_NN was_VBD rent_NN with_IN the_DT noise_NN of_IN women_NNS

sailing_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS splendid_JJ armament_NN that_IN Athens_NNP ever_RB sent_VBD to_TO sea_NN ._.
Many_JJ ages_NNS afterwards_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT Emperor_NNP Julian_NNP made_VBD his_PRP$ first_JJ entry_NN
into_IN Antioch_NNP ,_, he_PRP found_VBD in_IN like_IN manner_NN the_DT gay_JJ ,_, the_DT luxurious_JJ capital_NN
of_IN the_DT East_NNP plunged_VBD in_IN mimic_JJ grief_NN for_IN the_DT annual_JJ death_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP ;_:
and_CC if_IN he_PRP had_VBD any_DT presentiment_NN of_IN coming_VBG evil_JJ ,_, the_DT voices_NNS of_IN
lamentation_NN which_WDT struck_VBD upon_IN his_PRP$ ear_NN must_MD have_VB seemed_VBD to_TO sound_VB his_PRP$
knell_NN ._.

The_DT resemblance_NN of_IN these_DT ceremonies_NNS to_TO the_DT Indian_JJ and_CC European_JJ
ceremonies_NNS which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP described_VBN elsewhere_RB is_VBZ obvious_JJ ._. In_IN
particular_JJ ,_, apart_RB from_IN the_DT somewhat_RB doubtful_JJ date_NN of_IN its_PRP$
celebration_NN ,_, the_DT Alexandrian_NNP ceremony_NN is_VBZ almost_RB identical_JJ with_IN the_DT
Indian_NNP ._. In_IN both_DT of_IN them_PRP the_DT marriage_NN of_IN two_CD divine_JJ beings_NNS ,_, whose_WP$
affinity_NN with_IN vegetation_NN seems_VBZ indicated_VBN by_IN the_DT fresh_JJ plants_NNS with_IN
which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP surrounded_VBN ,_, is_VBZ celebrated_VBN in_IN effigy_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT effigies_NNS
are_VBP afterwards_RB mourned_VBN over_IN and_CC thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT water_NN ._. From_IN the_DT
similarity_NN of_IN these_DT customs_NNS to_TO each_DT other_JJ and_CC to_TO the_DT spring_NN and_CC
midsummer_NN customs_NNS of_IN modern_JJ Europe_NNP we_PRP should_MD naturally_RB expect_VB that_IN
they_PRP all_DT admit_VBP of_IN a_DT common_JJ explanation_NN ._. Hence_RB ,_, if_IN the_DT explanation_NN
which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP adopted_VBN of_IN the_DT latter_NN is_VBZ correct_JJ ,_, the_DT ceremony_NN of_IN the_DT
death_NN and_CC resurrection_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP must_MD also_RB have_VB been_VBN a_DT dramatic_JJ
representation_NN of_IN the_DT decay_NN and_CC revival_NN of_IN plant_NN life_NN ._. The_DT inference_NN
thus_RB based_VBN on_IN the_DT resemblance_NN of_IN the_DT customs_NNS is_VBZ confirmed_VBN by_IN the_DT
following_VBG features_NNS in_IN the_DT legend_NN and_CC ritual_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP ._. His_PRP$ affinity_NN
with_IN vegetation_NN comes_VBZ out_RP at_IN once_RB in_IN the_DT common_JJ story_NN of_IN his_PRP$ birth_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD said_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN born_VBN from_IN a_DT myrrh-tree_NN ,_, the_DT bark_NN of_IN which_WDT
bursting_VBG ,_, after_IN a_DT ten_CD months_NNS '_POS gestation_NN ,_, allowed_VBD the_DT lovely_JJ infant_NN
to_TO come_VB forth_RB ._. According_VBG to_TO some_DT ,_, a_DT boar_NN rent_NN the_DT bark_NN with_IN his_PRP$ tusk_NN
and_CC so_RB opened_VBD a_DT passage_NN for_IN the_DT babe_NN ._. A_DT faint_JJ rationalistic_NN colour_NN
was_VBD given_VBN to_TO the_DT legend_NN by_IN saying_VBG that_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN was_VBD a_DT woman_NN named_VBN
Myrrh_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN turned_VBN into_IN a_DT myrrh-tree_NN soon_RB after_IN she_PRP had_VBD
conceived_VBD the_DT child_NN ._. The_DT use_NN of_IN myrrh_NN as_IN incense_NN at_IN the_DT festival_NN of_IN
Adonis_NNP may_MD have_VB given_VBN rise_NN to_TO the_DT fable_JJ ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN incense_NN
was_VBD burnt_NN at_IN the_DT corresponding_JJ Babylonian_NNP rites_NNS ,_, just_RB as_IN it_PRP was_VBD
burnt_NN by_IN the_DT idolatrous_JJ Hebrews_NNP in_IN honour_NN of_IN the_DT Queen_NNP of_IN Heaven_NNP ,_,
who_WP was_VBD no_DT other_JJ than_IN Astarte_NNP ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT story_NN that_IN Adonis_NNP spent_VBD
half_NN ,_, or_CC according_VBG to_TO others_NNS a_DT third_JJ ,_, of_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN the_DT lower_JJR world_NN
and_CC the_DT rest_NN of_IN it_PRP in_IN the_DT upper_JJ world_NN ,_, is_VBZ explained_VBN most_RBS simply_RB and_CC
naturally_RB by_IN supposing_VBG that_IN he_PRP represented_VBD vegetation_NN ,_, especially_RB
the_DT corn_NN ,_, which_WDT lies_VBZ buried_VBN in_IN the_DT earth_NN half_NN the_DT year_NN and_CC reappears_NNS
above_IN ground_NN the_DT other_JJ half_NN ._. Certainly_RB of_IN the_DT annual_JJ phenomena_NNS of_IN
nature_NN there_EX is_VBZ none_NN which_WDT suggests_VBZ so_RB obviously_RB the_DT idea_NN of_IN death_NN
and_CC resurrection_NN as_IN the_DT disappearance_NN and_CC reappearance_NN of_IN vegetation_NN
in_IN autumn_NN and_CC spring_NN ._. Adonis_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN taken_VBN for_IN the_DT sun_NN ;_: but_CC there_EX
is_VBZ nothing_NN in_IN the_DT sun_NN '_POS s_PRP annual_JJ course_NN within_IN the_DT temperate_NN and_CC

year_NN and_CC alive_JJ for_IN the_DT other_JJ half_NN or_CC two-thirds_NNS ._. He_PRP might_MD ,_, indeed_RB ,_,
be_VB conceived_VBN as_IN weakened_VBN in_IN winter_NN ,_, but_CC dead_JJ he_PRP could_MD not_RB be_VB thought_VBN
to_TO be_VB ;_: his_PRP$ daily_JJ reappearance_NN contradicts_VBZ the_DT supposition_NN ._. Within_IN
the_DT Arctic_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT sun_NN annually_RB disappears_VBZ for_IN a_DT
continuous_JJ period_NN which_WDT varies_VBZ from_IN twenty-four_CD hours_NNS to_TO six_CD months_NNS
according_VBG to_TO the_DT latitude_NN ,_, his_PRP$ yearly_JJ death_NN and_CC resurrection_NN would_MD
certainly_RB be_VB an_DT obvious_JJ idea_NN ;_: but_CC no_DT one_NN except_IN the_DT unfortunate_JJ
astronomer_NN Bailly_NNP has_VBZ maintained_VBN that_IN the_DT Adonis_NNP worship_NN came_VBD from_IN
the_DT Arctic_NNP regions_NNS ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT annual_JJ death_NN and_CC revival_NN
of_IN vegetation_NN is_VBZ a_DT conception_NN which_WDT readily_RB presents_VBZ itself_PRP to_TO men_NNS

scale_NN on_IN which_WDT this_DT ever-recurring_NN decay_NN and_CC regeneration_NN takes_VBZ
place_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN man_NN '_'' s_PRP intimate_JJ dependence_NN on_IN it_PRP for_IN
subsistence_NN ,_, combine_VB to_TO render_VB it_PRP the_DT most_RBS impressive_JJ annual_JJ
occurrence_NN in_IN nature_NN ,_, at_IN least_JJS within_IN the_DT temperate_JJ zones_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ no_RB
wonder_NN that_IN a_DT phenomenon_NN so_RB important_JJ ,_, so_RB striking_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB universal_JJ
should_MD ,_, by_IN suggesting_VBG similar_JJ ideas_NNS ,_, have_VBP given_VBN rise_NN to_TO similar_JJ
rites_NNS in_IN many_JJ lands_NNS ._. We_PRP may_MD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, accept_VBP as_IN probable_JJ an_CC
explanation_NN of_IN the_DT Adonis_NNP worship_NN which_WDT accords_VBZ so_RB well_RB with_IN the_DT
facts_NNS of_IN nature_NN and_CC with_IN the_DT analogy_NN of_IN similar_JJ rites_NNS in_IN other_JJ
lands_NNS ._. Moreover_RB ,_, the_DT explanation_NN is_VBZ countenanced_VBN by_IN a_DT considerable_JJ
body_NN of_IN opinion_NN amongst_IN the_DT ancients_NNS themselves_PRP ,_, who_WP again_RB and_CC again_RB
interpreted_VBN the_DT dying_VBG and_CC reviving_VBG god_NN as_IN the_DT reaped_VBN and_CC sprouting_VBG
grain_NN ._.

The_DT character_NN of_IN Tammuz_NNP or_CC Adonis_NNP as_IN a_DT corn-spirit_NN comes_VBZ out_RP plainly_RB
in_IN an_DT account_NN of_IN his_PRP$ festival_NN given_VBN by_IN an_DT Arabic_JJ writer_NN of_IN the_DT tenth_NN
century_NN ._. In_IN describing_VBG the_DT rites_NNS and_CC sacrifices_NNS observed_VBD at_IN the_DT
different_JJ seasons_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN by_IN the_DT heathen_NN Syrians_NNS of_IN Harran_NNP ,_, he_PRP
says_VBZ :_: "_`` Tammuz_NNP (_-LRB- July_NNP )._, In_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN this_DT month_NN is_VBZ the_DT festival_NN of_IN

festival_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ celebrated_VBN in_IN honour_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN T_NNP �-_NNP uz_NNP ._. The_DT women_NNS
bewail_VB him_PRP ,_, because_IN his_PRP$ lord_JJ slew_NN him_PRP so_RB cruelly_RB ,_, ground_VBD his_PRP$ bones_NNS

"_`` They_PRP wasted_VBD o_IN '_'' er_NN a_DT scorching_NN flame_NN

This_DT concentration_NN ,_, so_RB to_TO say_VB ,_, of_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP upon_IN the_DT
cereal_NN crops_NNS is_VBZ characteristic_JJ of_IN the_DT stage_NN of_IN culture_NN reached_VBN by_IN

It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN suggested_VBN by_IN Father_NNP Lagrange_NNP that_IN the_DT mourning_VBG for_IN

Thus_RB interpreted_VBD the_DT death_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP is_VBZ not_RB the_DT natural_JJ decay_NN of_IN

There_EX is_VBZ some_DT reason_NN to_TO think_VB that_IN in_IN early_JJ times_NNS Adonis_NNP was_VBD

Now_RB the_DT ghosts_NNS of_IN those_DT who_WP have_VBP perished_VBN by_IN violence_NN are_VBP surly_RB and_CC

In_IN the_DT summer_NN after_IN the_DT battle_NN of_IN Landen_NNP ,_, the_DT most_RBS sanguinary_JJ battle_NN
of_IN the_DT seventeenth_JJ century_NN in_IN Europe_NNP ,_, the_DT earth_NN ,_, saturated_VBD with_IN the_DT

never_RB again_RB to_TO wake_VB with_IN the_DT anemones_NNS and_CC the_DT roses_NNS ._.



XXXIII_NNP ._. The_DT Gardens_NNPS of_IN Adonis_NNP

PERHAPS_NNP the_DT best_JJS proof_NN that_IN Adonis_NNP was_VBD a_DT deity_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ,_, and_CC
especially_RB of_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, is_VBZ furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT gardens_NNS of_IN Adonis_NNP ,_, as_IN
they_PRP were_VBD called_VBN ._. These_DT were_VBD baskets_NNS or_CC pots_NNS filled_VBN with_IN earth_NN ,_, in_IN
which_WDT wheat_NN ,_, barley_NN ,_, lettuces_VBZ ,_, fennel_NN ,_, and_CC various_JJ kinds_NNS of_IN flowers_NNS
were_VBD sown_JJ and_CC tended_VBD for_IN eight_CD days_NNS ,_, chiefly_RB or_CC exclusively_RB by_IN
women_NNS ._. Fostered_VBN by_IN the_DT sun_NN '_POS s_PRP heat_NN ,_, the_DT plants_NNS shot_VBD up_RB rapidly_RB ,_, but_CC
having_VBG no_DT root_NN they_PRP withered_VBD as_IN rapidly_RB away_RB ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN
eight_CD days_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN out_RP with_IN the_DT images_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ Adonis_NNP ,_, and_CC
flung_VBN with_IN them_PRP into_IN the_DT sea_NN or_CC into_IN springs_NNS ._.

These_DT gardens_NNS of_IN Adonis_NNP are_VBP most_RBS naturally_RB interpreted_VBN as_IN
representatives_NNS of_IN Adonis_NNP or_CC manifestations_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ power_NN ;_: they_PRP
represented_VBD him_PRP ,_, true_JJ to_TO his_PRP$ original_JJ nature_NN ,_, in_IN vegetable_NN form_NN ,_,
while_IN the_DT images_NNS of_IN him_PRP ,_, with_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD carried_VBN out_RB and_CC cast_VB
into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, portrayed_VBD him_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ later_JJ human_JJ shape_NN ._. All_PDT these_DT
Adonis_NNP ceremonies_NNS ,_, if_IN I_PRP am_VBP right_JJ ,_, were_VBD originally_RB intended_VBN as_IN charms_NNS
to_TO promote_VB the_DT growth_NN or_CC revival_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT principle_NN by_IN
which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO produce_VB this_DT effect_NN was_VBD homoeopathic_JJ or_CC
imitative_JJ magic_NN ._. For_IN ignorant_JJ people_NNS suppose_VBP that_IN by_IN mimicking_VBG the_DT
effect_NN which_WDT they_PRP desire_VBP to_TO produce_VB they_PRP actually_RB help_VBP to_TO produce_VB
it_PRP ;_: thus_RB by_IN sprinkling_NN water_NN they_PRP make_VBP rain_NN ,_, by_IN lighting_VBG a_DT fire_NN they_PRP
make_VB sunshine_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ._. Similarly_RB ,_, by_IN mimicking_VBG the_DT growth_NN of_IN
crops_NNS they_PRP hope_VBP to_TO ensure_VB a_DT good_JJ harvest_NN ._. The_DT rapid_JJ growth_NN of_IN the_DT
wheat_NN and_CC barley_NN in_IN the_DT gardens_NNS of_IN Adonis_NNP was_VBD intended_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT
corn_NN shoot_VB up_RP ;_: and_CC the_DT throwing_NN of_IN the_DT gardens_NNS and_CC of_IN the_DT images_NNS
into_IN the_DT water_NN was_VBD a_DT charm_NN to_TO secure_VB a_DT due_JJ supply_NN of_IN fertilising_VBG
rain_NN ._. The_DT same_JJ ,_, I_PRP take_VBP it_PRP ,_, was_VBD the_DT object_NN of_IN throwing_VBG the_DT effigies_NNS
of_IN Death_NNP and_CC the_DT Carnival_NN into_IN water_NN in_IN the_DT corresponding_JJ ceremonies_NNS
of_IN modern_JJ Europe_NNP ._. Certainly_RB the_DT custom_NN of_IN drenching_NN with_IN water_NN a_DT
leaf-clad_JJ person_NN ,_, who_WP undoubtedly_RB personifies_VBZ vegetation_NN ,_, is_VBZ still_RB
resorted_VBN to_TO in_IN Europe_NNP for_IN the_DT express_JJ purpose_NN of_IN producing_VBG rain_NN ._.
Similarly_RB the_DT custom_NN of_IN throwing_VBG water_NN on_IN the_DT last_JJ corn_NN cut_NN at_IN
harvest_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP brings_VBZ it_PRP home_NN (_-LRB- a_DT custom_NN observed_VBN in_IN
Germany_NNP and_CC France_NNP ,_, and_CC till_IN lately_RB in_IN England_NNP and_CC Scotland_NNP ),_NNP is_VBZ in_IN
some_DT places_NNS practised_VBN with_IN the_DT avowed_VBN intent_NN to_TO procure_VB rain_NN for_IN the_DT
next_JJ year_NN '_POS s_VBZ crops_NNS ._. Thus_RB in_IN Wallachia_NNP and_CC amongst_IN the_DT Roumanians_NNPS in_IN
Transylvania_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT girl_NN is_VBZ bringing_VBG home_NN a_DT crown_NN made_VBN of_IN the_DT last_JJ
ears_NNS of_IN corn_NN cut_VBN at_IN harvest_NN ,_, all_DT who_WP meet_VBP her_PRP hasten_VB to_TO throw_VB water_NN
on_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC two_CD farm-servants_NNS are_VBP placed_VBN at_IN the_DT door_NN for_IN the_DT
purpose_NN ;_: for_IN they_PRP believe_VBP that_IN if_IN this_DT were_VBD not_RB done_VBN ,_, the_DT crops_NNS next_IN
year_NN would_MD perish_VB from_IN drought_NN ._. At_IN the_DT spring_NN ploughing_NN in_IN Prussia_NNP ,_,
when_WRB the_DT ploughmen_NNS and_CC sowers_NNS returned_VBD in_IN the_DT evening_NN from_IN their_PRP$
work_NN in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, the_DT farmer_NN '_'' s_PRP wife_NN and_CC the_DT servants_NNS used_VBD to_TO

water_NN ._. The_DT farmer_NN '_'' s_PRP wife_NN might_MD claim_VB exemption_NN on_IN payment_NN of_IN a_DT
forfeit_JJ ,_, but_CC every_DT one_NN else_RB had_VBD to_TO be_VB ducked_VBN ._. By_IN observing_VBG this_DT
custom_NN they_PRP hoped_VBD to_TO ensure_VB a_DT due_JJ supply_NN of_IN rain_NN for_IN the_DT seed_NN ._.

The_DT opinion_NN that_IN the_DT gardens_NNS of_IN Adonis_NNP are_VBP essentially_RB charms_NNS to_TO

In_IN Sardinia_NNP the_DT gardens_NNS of_IN Adonis_NNP are_VBP still_RB planted_VBN in_IN connexion_NN

Customs_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN are_VBP observed_VBN at_IN the_DT same_JJ season_NN in_IN Sicily_NNP ._.

In_IN these_DT midsummer_JJ customs_NNS of_IN Sardinia_NNP and_CC Sicily_RB it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ
that_DT ,_, as_IN Mr_NNP ._. R_NN ._. W_NNP �_VBD nsch_JJ supposes_NNS ,_, St_NNP ._. John_NNP has_VBZ replaced_VBN Adonis_NNP ._. We_PRP

In_IN Sicily_NNP gardens_NNS of_IN Adonis_NNP are_VBP still_RB sown_VBN in_IN spring_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN
summer_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT we_PRP may_MD perhaps_RB infer_VB that_DT Sicily_RB as_RB well_RB as_IN Syria_NNP

of_IN Adonis_NNP were_VBD placed_VBN on_IN the_DT grave_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ Adonis_NNP ._. The_DT practice_NN

continuation_NN ,_, under_IN a_DT different_JJ name_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT worship_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP ._.

Nor_CC are_VBP these_DT Sicilian_JJ and_CC Calabrian_JJ customs_NNS the_DT only_RB Easter_NNP
ceremonies_NNS which_WDT resemble_VBP the_DT rites_NNS of_IN Adonis_NNP ._. "_'' During_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN
Good_JJ Friday_NNP a_DT waxen_JJ effigy_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ Christ_NNP is_VBZ exposed_VBN to_TO view_VB in_IN
the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT Greek_JJ churches_NNS and_CC is_VBZ covered_VBN with_IN fervent_NN kisses_NNS

the_DT street_NN on_IN a_DT bier_NN adorned_VBN with_IN lemons_NNS ,_, roses_NNS ,_, jessamine_NN ,_, and_CC
other_JJ flowers_NNS ,_, and_CC there_EX begins_VBZ a_DT grand_JJ procession_NN of_IN the_DT multitude_NN ,_,
who_WP move_VBP in_IN serried_JJ ranks_NNS ,_, with_IN slow_JJ and_CC solemn_JJ step_NN ,_, through_IN the_DT
whole_JJ town_NN ._. Every_DT man_NN carries_VBZ his_PRP$ taper_NN and_CC breaks_VBZ out_RB into_IN doleful_JJ
lamentation_NN ._. At_IN all_PDT the_DT houses_NNS which_WDT the_DT procession_NN passes_VBZ there_EX are_VBP

community_NN solemnly_RB buries_VBZ its_PRP$ Christ_NNP as_IN if_IN he_PRP had_VBD just_RB died_VBN ._. At_IN last_JJ
the_DT waxen_JJ image_NN is_VBZ again_RB deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT church_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT same_JJ
lugubrious_JJ chants_NNS echo_VBP anew_RB ._. These_DT lamentations_NNS ,_, accompanied_VBN by_IN a_DT
strict_JJ fast_RB ,_, continue_VBP till_IN midnight_NN on_IN Saturday_NNP ._. As_IN the_DT clock_NN
strikes_NNS twelve_CD ,_, the_DT bishop_NN appears_VBZ and_CC announces_VBZ the_DT glad_JJ tidings_NNS
that_WDT '_'' Christ_NNP is_VBZ risen_VBN ,'_, to_TO which_WDT the_DT crowd_NN replies_VBZ ,_, '_'' He_PRP is_VBZ risen_VBN
indeed_RB ,'_, and_CC at_IN once_RB the_DT whole_JJ city_NN bursts_NNS into_IN an_DT uproar_NN of_IN joy_NN ,_,
which_WDT finds_VBZ vent_NN in_IN shrieks_NNS and_CC shouts_VBZ ,_, in_IN the_DT endless_JJ discharge_NN of_IN
carronades_NNS and_CC muskets_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT explosion_NN of_IN fire-works_NNS of_IN every_DT
sort_NN ._. In_IN the_DT very_JJ same_JJ hour_NN people_NNS plunge_VBP from_IN the_DT extremity_NN of_IN the_DT
fast_RB into_IN the_DT enjoyment_NN of_IN the_DT Easter_NNP lamb_NN and_CC neat_JJ wine_NN ."_.

In_IN like_JJ manner_NN the_DT Catholic_NNP Church_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN accustomed_VBN to_TO bring_VB
before_IN its_PRP$ followers_NNS in_IN a_DT visible_JJ form_NN the_DT death_NN and_CC resurrection_NN of_IN
the_DT Redeemer_NNP ._. Such_JJ sacred_JJ dramas_NN are_VBP well_RB fitted_VBN to_TO impress_VB the_DT

southern_JJ race_NN ,_, to_TO whom_WP the_DT pomp_NN and_CC pageantry_NN of_IN Catholicism_NNP are_VBP
more_RBR congenial_JJ than_IN to_TO the_DT colder_NN temperament_NN of_IN the_DT Teutonic_NNP
peoples_NNS ._.

When_WRB we_PRP reflect_VBP how_WRB often_RB the_DT Church_NNP has_VBZ skilfully_RB contrived_VBN to_TO

with_IN the_DT dead_JJ body_NN of_IN her_PRP$ divine_JJ Son_NN in_IN her_PRP$ lap_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT the_DT most_JJS

In_IN this_DT connexion_NN a_DT well-known_JJ statement_NN of_IN Jerome_NNP may_MD not_RB be_VB
without_IN significance_NN ._. He_PRP tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN Bethlehem_NNP ,_, the_DT traditionary_NN

Bethlehem_NNP ,_, "_'' the_DT House_NNP of_IN Bread_NNP ,"_, and_CC he_PRP may_MD well_RB have_VB been_VBN

Him_PRP who_WP said_VBD ,_, "_`` I_PRP am_VBP the_DT bread_NN of_IN life_NN ."_NNS Even_RB on_IN the_DT hypothesis_NN that_WDT

Hence_RB we_PRP may_MD conjecture_VB that_IN the_DT festival_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP was_VBD regularly_RB

Astarte_NNP herself_PRP ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ flight_NN through_IN the_DT air_NN might_MD naturally_RB be_VB

XXXIV_NNP ._. The_DT Myth_NNP and_CC Ritual_NNP of_IN Attis_NNP

ANOTHER_NN of_IN those_DT gods_NNS whose_WP$ supposed_VBN death_NN and_CC resurrection_NN struck_VBN
such_JJ deep_JJ roots_NNS into_IN the_DT faith_NN and_CC ritual_NN of_IN Western_NNP Asia_NNP is_VBZ Attis_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD to_TO Phrygia_NNP what_WP Adonis_NNP was_VBD to_TO Syria_NNP ._. Like_IN Adonis_NNP ,_, he_PRP appears_VBZ
to_TO have_VB been_VBN a_DT god_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ death_NN and_CC resurrection_NN
were_VBD annually_RB mourned_VBN and_CC rejoiced_VBN over_IN at_IN a_DT festival_NN in_IN spring_NN ._. The_DT
legends_NNS and_CC rites_NNS of_IN the_DT two_CD gods_NNS were_VBD so_RB much_RB alike_RB that_IN the_DT
ancients_NNS themselves_PRP sometimes_RB identified_VBD them_PRP ._. Attis_NNP was_VBD said_VBN to_TO
have_VBP been_VBN a_DT fair_JJ young_JJ shepherd_NN or_CC herdsman_NN beloved_NN by_IN Cybele_NNP ,_, the_DT
Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Gods_NNP ,_, a_DT great_JJ Asiatic_JJ goddess_NN of_IN fertility_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD
her_PRP$ chief_JJ home_NN in_IN Phrygia_NNP ._. Some_DT held_VBD that_DT Attis_NNP was_VBD her_PRP$ son_NN ._. His_PRP$
birth_NN ,_, like_IN that_DT of_IN many_JJ other_JJ heroes_NNS ,_, is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN
miraculous_JJ ._. His_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, Nana_NNP ,_, was_VBD a_DT virgin_NN ,_, who_WP conceived_VBD by_IN putting_VBG
a_DT ripe_JJ almond_NN or_CC a_DT pomegranate_NN in_IN her_PRP$ bosom_NN ._. Indeed_RB in_IN the_DT Phrygian_JJ
cosmogony_NN an_DT almond_RB figured_VBN as_IN the_DT father_NN of_IN all_DT things_NNS ,_, perhaps_RB
because_IN its_PRP$ delicate_JJ lilac_NN blossom_NN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT first_JJ heralds_NNS of_IN
the_DT spring_NN ,_, appearing_VBG on_IN the_DT bare_JJ boughs_NNS before_IN the_DT leaves_NNS have_VBP
opened_VBN ._. Such_JJ tales_NNS of_IN virgin_JJ mothers_NNS are_VBP relics_NNS of_IN an_DT age_NN of_IN
childish_JJ ignorance_NN when_WRB men_NNS had_VBD not_RB yet_RB recognized_VBN the_DT intercourse_NN
of_IN the_DT sexes_NNS as_IN the_DT true_JJ cause_NN of_IN offspring_NN ._. Two_CD different_JJ accounts_NNS
of_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN Attis_NNP were_VBD current_JJ ._. According_VBG to_TO the_DT one_CD he_PRP was_VBD
killed_VBN by_IN a_DT boar_NN ,_, like_IN Adonis_NNP ._. According_VBG to_TO the_DT other_JJ he_PRP unmanned_VBN
himself_PRP under_IN a_DT pine-tree_NN ,_, and_CC bled_VBD to_TO death_NN on_IN the_DT spot_NN ._. The_DT latter_NN
is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN the_DT local_JJ story_NN told_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN Pessinus_NNP ,_,
a_DT great_JJ seat_NN of_IN the_DT worship_NN of_IN Cybele_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT whole_JJ legend_NN of_IN which_WDT
the_DT story_NN forms_VBZ a_DT part_NN is_VBZ stamped_VBN with_IN a_DT character_NN of_IN rudeness_NN and_CC
savagery_NN that_WDT speaks_VBZ strongly_RB for_IN its_PRP$ antiquity_NN ._. Both_DT tales_NNS might_MD
claim_VBP the_DT support_NN of_IN custom_NN ,_, or_CC rather_RB both_DT were_VBD probably_RB invented_VBN
to_TO explain_VB certain_JJ customs_NNS observed_VBN by_IN the_DT worshippers_NNS ._. The_DT story_NN of_IN
the_DT self-mutilation_NN of_IN Attis_NNP is_VBZ clearly_RB an_DT attempt_NN to_TO account_VB for_IN
the_DT self-mutilation_NN of_IN his_PRP$ priests_NNS ,_, who_WP regularly_RB castrated_VBN
themselves_PRP on_IN entering_VBG the_DT service_NN of_IN the_DT goddess_NN ._. The_DT story_NN of_IN his_PRP$
death_NN by_IN the_DT boar_NN may_MD have_VB been_VBN told_VBN to_TO explain_VB why_WRB his_PRP$ worshippers_NNS ,_,
especially_RB the_DT people_NNS of_IN Pessinus_NNP ,_, abstained_VBD from_IN eating_VBG swine_NN ._. In_IN
like_IN manner_NN the_DT worshippers_NNS of_IN Adonis_NNP abstained_VBD from_IN pork_NN ,_, because_IN a_DT
boar_NN had_VBD killed_VBN their_PRP$ god_NN ._. After_IN his_PRP$ death_NN Attis_NNP is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO have_VB
been_VBN changed_VBN into_IN a_DT pine-tree_NN ._.

The_DT worship_NN of_IN the_DT Phrygian_JJ Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Gods_NNP was_VBD adopted_VBN by_IN the_DT
Romans_NNS in_IN 204_CD B_NNP ._. C_NNP ._. towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN their_PRP$ long_JJ struggle_NN with_IN
Hannibal_NNP ._. For_IN their_PRP$ drooping_NN spirits_NNS had_VBD been_VBN opportunely_RB cheered_VBN by_IN
a_DT prophecy_NN ,_, alleged_VBN to_TO be_VB drawn_VBN from_IN that_DT convenient_JJ farrago_NN of_IN
nonsense_NN ,_, the_DT Sibylline_NNP Books_NNPS ,_, that_IN the_DT foreign_JJ invader_NN would_MD be_VB
driven_VBN from_IN Italy_NNP if_IN the_DT great_JJ Oriental_JJ goddess_NN were_VBD brought_VBN to_TO
Rome_NNP ._. Accordingly_RB ambassadors_NNS were_VBD despatched_VBN to_TO her_PRP$ sacred_JJ city_NN
Pessinus_NNP in_IN Phrygia_NNP ._. The_DT small_JJ black_JJ stone_NN which_WDT embodied_VBD the_DT mighty_JJ
divinity_NN was_VBD entrusted_VBN to_TO them_PRP and_CC conveyed_VBD to_TO Rome_NNP ,_, where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD
received_VBN with_IN great_JJ respect_NN and_CC installed_VBN in_IN the_DT temple_NN of_IN Victory_NNP
on_IN the_DT Palatine_NNP Hill_NNP ._. It_PRP was_VBD the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP when_WRB the_DT goddess_NN
arrived_VBN ,_, and_CC she_PRP went_VBD to_TO work_VB at_IN once_RB ._. For_IN the_DT harvest_NN that_IN year_NN was_VBD
such_JJ as_IN had_VBD not_RB been_VBN seen_VBN for_IN many_JJ a_DT long_JJ day_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT very_RB next_JJ
year_NN Hannibal_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ veterans_NNS embarked_VBD for_IN Africa_NNP ._. As_IN he_PRP looked_VBD his_PRP$
last_JJ on_IN the_DT coast_NN of_IN Italy_NNP ,_, fading_NN behind_IN him_PRP in_IN the_DT distance_NN ,_, he_PRP
could_MD not_RB foresee_VB that_IN Europe_NNP ,_, which_WDT had_VBD repelled_VBN the_DT arms_NNS ,_, would_MD
yet_RB yield_VBP to_TO the_DT gods_NNS ,_, of_IN the_DT Orient_NNP ._. The_DT vanguard_NN of_IN the_DT conquerors_NNS
had_VBD already_RB encamped_VBN in_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN Italy_NNP before_IN the_DT rearguard_NN of_IN
the_DT beaten_JJ army_NN fell_VBD sullenly_RB back_RB from_IN its_PRP$ shores_NNS ._.

We_PRP may_MD conjecture_VB ,_, though_IN we_PRP are_VBP not_RB told_VBN ,_, that_IN the_DT Mother_NN of_IN the_DT
Gods_NNP brought_VBD with_IN her_PRP$ the_DT worship_NN of_IN her_PRP$ youthful_JJ lover_NN or_CC son_NN to_TO
her_PRP$ new_JJ home_NN in_IN the_DT West_NNP ._. Certainly_RB the_DT Romans_NNPS were_VBD familiar_JJ with_IN
the_DT Galli_NNP ,_, the_DT emasculated_JJ priests_NNS of_IN Attis_NNP ,_, before_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT
Republic_NNP ._. These_DT unsexed_JJ beings_NNS ,_, in_IN their_PRP$ Oriental_JJ costume_NN ,_, with_IN
little_JJ images_NNS suspended_VBN on_IN their_PRP$ breasts_NNS ,_, appear_VBP to_TO have_VB been_VBN a_DT
familiar_JJ sight_NN in_IN the_DT streets_NNS of_IN Rome_NNP ,_, which_WDT they_PRP traversed_VBD in_IN
procession_NN ,_, carrying_VBG the_DT image_NN of_IN the_DT goddess_NN and_CC chanting_VBG their_PRP$
hymns_NNS to_TO the_DT music_NN of_IN cymbals_NNS and_CC tambourines_NNS ,_, flutes_NNS and_CC horns_NNS ,_,
while_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, impressed_VBN by_IN the_DT fantastic_JJ show_NN and_CC moved_VBD by_IN the_DT
wild_JJ strains_NNS ,_, flung_VBN alms_RB to_TO them_PRP in_IN abundance_NN ,_, and_CC buried_VBD the_DT image_NN
and_CC its_PRP$ bearers_NNS under_IN showers_NNS of_IN roses_NNS ._. A_DT further_JJ step_NN was_VBD taken_VBN by_IN
the_DT Emperor_NNP Claudius_NNP when_WRB he_PRP incorporated_JJ the_DT Phrygian_JJ worship_NN of_IN
the_DT sacred_JJ tree_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN it_PRP probably_RB the_DT orgiastic_JJ rites_NNS of_IN Attis_NNP ,_,
in_IN the_DT established_JJ religion_NN of_IN Rome_NNP ._. The_DT great_JJ spring_NN festival_NN of_IN
Cybele_NNP and_CC Attis_NNP is_VBZ best_RB known_VBN to_TO us_PRP in_IN the_DT form_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD
celebrated_VBN at_IN Rome_NNP ;_: but_CC as_IN we_PRP are_VBP informed_VBN that_IN the_DT Roman_NNP ceremonies_NNS
were_VBD also_RB Phrygian_JJ ,_, we_PRP may_MD assume_VB that_IN they_PRP differed_VBD hardly_RB ,_, if_IN at_IN
all_DT ,_, from_IN their_PRP$ Asiatic_JJ original_JJ ._. The_DT order_NN of_IN the_DT festival_NN seems_VBZ to_TO
have_VBP been_VBN as_RB follows_VBZ ._.

On_IN the_DT twenty-second_JJ day_NN of_IN March_NNP ,_, a_DT pine-tree_NN was_VBD cut_VBN in_IN the_DT woods_NNS
and_CC brought_VBD into_IN the_DT sanctuary_NN of_IN Cybele_NNP ,_, where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD treated_VBN as_IN a_DT
great_JJ divinity_NN ._. The_DT duty_NN of_IN carrying_VBG the_DT sacred_JJ tree_NN was_VBD entrusted_VBN
to_TO a_DT guild_NN of_IN Tree-bearers_NNP ._. The_DT trunk_NN was_VBD swathed_VBN like_IN a_DT corpse_NN with_IN
woollen_JJ bands_NNS and_CC decked_VBN with_IN wreaths_NNS of_IN violets_NNS ,_, for_IN violets_NNS were_VBD
said_VBD to_TO have_VB sprung_VBN from_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN Attis_NNP ,_, as_IN roses_NNS and_CC anemones_NNS
from_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT effigy_NN of_IN a_DT young_JJ man_NN ,_, doubtless_RB
Attis_NNP himself_PRP ,_, was_VBD tied_VBN to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT stem_NN ._. On_IN the_DT second_JJ day_NN
of_IN the_DT festival_NN ,_, the_DT twenty-third_JJ of_IN March_NNP ,_, the_DT chief_NN ceremony_NN seems_VBZ
to_TO have_VB been_VBN a_DT blowing_VBG of_IN trumpets_NNS ._. The_DT third_JJ day_NN ,_, the_DT twenty-fourth_JJ
of_IN March_NNP ,_, was_VBD known_VBN as_IN the_DT Day_NN of_IN Blood_NN :_: the_DT Archigallus_NNP or_CC
highpriest_JJS drew_VBD blood_NN from_IN his_PRP$ arms_NNS and_CC presented_VBD it_PRP as_IN an_DT offering_NN ._.
Nor_CC was_VBD he_PRP alone_RB in_IN making_VBG this_DT bloody_JJ sacrifice_NN ._. Stirred_VBN by_IN the_DT
wild_JJ barbaric_JJ music_NN of_IN clashing_NN cymbals_NNS ,_, rumbling_VBG drums_NNS ,_, droning_VBG
horns_NNS ,_, and_CC screaming_VBG flutes_NNS ,_, the_DT inferior_JJ clergy_NN whirled_VBD about_RB in_IN
the_DT dance_NN with_IN waggling_VBG heads_NNS and_CC streaming_VBG hair_NN ,_, until_IN ,_, rapt_RB into_IN a_DT
frenzy_NN of_IN excitement_NN and_CC insensible_JJ to_TO pain_NN ,_, they_PRP gashed_VBD their_PRP$
bodies_NNS with_IN potsherds_NNS or_CC slashed_VBD them_PRP with_IN knives_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO
bespatter_IN the_DT altar_NN and_CC the_DT sacred_JJ tree_NN with_IN their_PRP$ flowing_VBG blood_NN ._.
The_DT ghastly_JJ rite_NN probably_RB formed_VBD part_NN of_IN the_DT mourning_VBG for_IN Attis_NNP and_CC
may_MD have_VB been_VBN intended_VBN to_TO strengthen_VB him_PRP for_IN the_DT resurrection_NN ._. The_DT
Australian_JJ aborigines_NNS cut_VBD themselves_PRP in_IN like_IN manner_NN over_IN the_DT graves_NNS
of_IN their_PRP$ friends_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, of_IN enabling_VBG them_PRP to_TO be_VB

If_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT truth_NN in_IN this_DT conjectural_JJ explanation_NN of_IN the_DT custom_NN ,_,

Such_JJ ,_, then_RB ,_, appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN the_DT annual_JJ solemnisation_NN of_IN the_DT

regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT powerful_JJ charm_NN to_TO promote_VB fertility_NN and_CC hasten_VB the_DT new_JJ

XXXV_NNP ._. Attis_NNP as_IN a_DT God_NNP of_IN Vegetation_NNP

THE_DT ORIGINAL_JJ character_NN of_IN Attis_NNP as_IN a_DT tree-spirit_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN out_IN
plainly_RB by_IN the_DT part_NN which_WDT the_DT pine-tree_NN plays_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ legend_NN ,_, his_PRP$
ritual_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ monuments_NNS ._. The_DT story_NN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD a_DT human_JJ being_NN
transformed_VBN into_IN a_DT pine-tree_NN is_VBZ only_RB one_CD of_IN those_DT transparent_JJ
attempts_NNS at_IN rationalising_VBG old_JJ beliefs_NNS which_WDT meet_VBP us_PRP so_RB frequently_RB in_IN
mythology_NN ._. The_DT bringing_VBG in_IN of_IN the_DT pine-tree_NN from_IN the_DT woods_NNS ,_, decked_VBN
with_IN violets_NNS and_CC woollen_JJ bands_NNS ,_, is_VBZ like_IN bringing_VBG in_IN the_DT May-tree_NNP or_CC
Summer-tree_NNP in_IN modern_JJ folk-custom_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT effigy_NN which_WDT was_VBD attached_VBN
to_TO the_DT pine-tree_NN was_VBD only_RB a_DT duplicate_NN representative_NN of_IN the_DT
tree-spirit_NN Attis_NNP ._. After_IN being_VBG fastened_VBN to_TO the_DT tree_NN ,_, the_DT effigy_NN was_VBD
kept_VBN for_IN a_DT year_NN and_CC then_RB burned_VBN ._. The_DT same_JJ thing_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN
sometimes_RB done_VBN with_IN the_DT May-pole_NNP ;_: and_CC in_IN like_IN manner_NN the_DT effigy_NN of_IN
the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, made_VBN at_IN harvest_NN ,_, is_VBZ often_RB preserved_VBN till_IN it_PRP is_VBZ
replaced_VBN by_IN a_DT new_JJ effigy_NN at_IN next_JJ year_NN '_POS s_PRP harvest_NN ._. The_DT original_JJ
intention_NN of_IN such_JJ customs_NNS was_VBD no_DT doubt_NN to_TO maintain_VB the_DT spirit_NN of_IN
vegetation_NN in_IN life_NN throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ._. Why_WRB the_DT Phrygians_NNPS should_MD
have_VBP worshipped_VBN the_DT pine_NN above_IN other_JJ trees_NNS we_PRP can_MD only_RB guess_VB ._.
Perhaps_RB the_DT sight_NN of_IN its_PRP$ changeless_JJ ,_, though_IN sombre_JJ ,_, green_JJ cresting_NN
the_DT ridges_NNS of_IN the_DT high_JJ hills_NNS above_IN the_DT fading_NN splendour_NN of_IN the_DT
autumn_NN woods_NNS in_IN the_DT valleys_NNS may_MD have_VB seemed_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ eyes_NNS to_TO mark_VB it_PRP
out_RB as_IN the_DT seat_NN of_IN a_DT diviner_NN life_NN ,_, of_IN something_NN exempt_JJ from_IN the_DT sad_JJ
vicissitudes_NNS of_IN the_DT seasons_NNS ,_, constant_JJ and_CC eternal_JJ as_IN the_DT sky_NN which_WDT
stooped_VBD to_TO meet_VB it_PRP ._. For_IN the_DT same_JJ reason_NN ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, ivy_NN was_VBD sacred_JJ to_TO
Attis_NNP ;_: at_IN all_DT events_NNS ,_, we_PRP read_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ eunuch_JJ priests_NNS were_VBD tattooed_VBN
with_IN a_DT pattern_NN of_IN ivy_NN leaves_NNS ._. Another_DT reason_NN for_IN the_DT sanctity_NN of_IN the_DT
pine_NN may_MD have_VB been_VBN its_PRP$ usefulness_NN ._. The_DT cones_NNS of_IN the_DT stone-pine_NN
contain_VBP edible_JJ nut-like_JJ seeds_NNS ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN used_VBN as_IN food_NN since_IN
antiquity_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP still_RB eaten_VBN ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT poorer_JJR classes_NNS
in_IN Rome_NNP ._. Moreover_RB ,_, a_DT wine_NN was_VBD brewed_VBN from_IN these_DT seeds_NNS ,_, and_CC this_DT may_MD
partly_RB account_NN for_IN the_DT orgiastic_JJ nature_NN of_IN the_DT rites_NNS of_IN Cybele_NNP ,_,
which_WDT the_DT ancients_NNS compared_VBN to_TO those_DT of_IN Dionysus_NNP ._. Further_RB ,_,
pine-cones_NNS were_VBD regarded_VBN as_IN symbols_NNS or_CC rather_RB instruments_NNS of_IN
fertility_NN ._. Hence_RB at_IN the_DT festival_NN of_IN the_DT Thesmophoria_NNP they_PRP were_VBD
thrown_VBN ,_, along_IN with_IN pigs_NNS and_CC other_JJ agents_NNS or_CC emblems_NNS of_IN fecundity_NN ,_,
into_IN the_DT sacred_JJ vaults_NNS of_IN Demeter_NNP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN quickening_VBG the_DT
ground_NN and_CC the_DT wombs_NNS of_IN women_NNS ._.

Like_IN tree-spirits_NNS in_IN general_JJ ,_, Attis_NNP was_VBD apparently_RB thought_VBN to_TO wield_VB
power_NN over_IN the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN or_CC even_RB to_TO be_VB identical_JJ with_IN the_DT
corn_NN ._. One_CD of_IN his_PRP$ epithets_NNS was_VBD "_`` very_RB fruitful_JJ ":_IN he_PRP was_VBD addressed_VBN as_IN
the_DT "_`` reaped_JJ green_JJ (_-LRB- or_CC yellow_JJ )_-RRB- ear_NN of_IN corn_NN ";_NN and_CC the_DT story_NN of_IN his_PRP$

XXXVI_NNP ._. Human_NNP Representatives_NNPS of_IN Attis_NNP

FROM_NNP INSCRIPTIONS_VBZ it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN both_DT at_IN Pessinus_NNP and_CC Rome_NNP the_DT

A_DT reminiscence_NN of_IN the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT these_DT old_JJ representatives_NNS of_IN

"_`` I_PRP know_VBP that_IN I_PRP hung_VBD on_IN the_DT windy_NN tree_NN
