ploughman_NN ;_: but_CC he_PRP had_VBD to_TO be_VB very_RB careful_JJ not_RB to_TO be_VB observed_VBN by_IN his_PRP$
neighbours_NNS ,_, for_IN if_IN they_PRP saw_VBD him_PRP coming_VBG and_CC had_VBD the_DT least_JJS suspicion_NN
of_IN his_PRP$ errand_NN they_PRP would_MD soon_RB make_VB him_PRP retrace_VB his_PRP$ steps_NNS ._. Creeping_NN
stealthily_RB up_RB behind_IN a_DT fence_NN he_PRP waited_VBD till_IN the_DT foreman_NN of_IN his_PRP$
neighbour_NN '_'' s_PRP reapers_NNS was_VBD just_RB opposite_JJ him_PRP and_CC within_IN easy_JJ reach_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP suddenly_RB threw_VBD the_DT Hag_NNP over_IN the_DT fence_NN and_CC ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, upon_IN
the_DT foreman_NN '_'' s_PRP sickle_VBP ._. On_IN that_IN he_PRP took_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ heels_NNS and_CC made_VBD off_RP as_IN
fast_RB as_IN he_PRP could_MD run_VB ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD a_DT lucky_JJ man_NN if_IN he_PRP escaped_VBD without_IN
being_VBG caught_VBN or_CC cut_VBN by_IN the_DT flying_VBG sickles_NNS which_WDT the_DT infuriated_VBN
reapers_NNS hurled_VBD after_IN him_PRP ._. In_IN other_JJ cases_NNS the_DT Hag_NNP was_VBD brought_VBN home_NN to_TO
the_DT farmhouse_NN by_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT reapers_NNS ._. He_PRP did_VBD his_PRP$ best_JJS to_TO bring_VB it_PRP
home_NN dry_JJ and_CC without_IN being_VBG observed_VBN ;_: but_CC he_PRP was_VBD apt_JJ to_TO be_VB roughly_RB
handled_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, if_IN they_PRP suspected_VBD his_PRP$ errand_NN ._.
Sometimes_RB they_PRP stripped_VBD him_PRP of_IN most_JJS of_IN his_PRP$ clothes_NNS ,_, sometimes_RB they_PRP

a_DT nail_NN in_IN the_DT hall_NN or_CC elsewhere_RB and_CC kept_VBD there_RB all_PDT the_DT year_NN ._. The_DT

In_IN County_NNP Antrim_NNP ,_, down_RB to_TO some_DT years_NNS ago_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT sickle_NN was_VBD

door_NN ._. This_DT bunch_NN of_IN corn_NN was_VBD called_VBN the_DT Carley_NNP --_: probably_RB the_DT same_JJ

Similar_JJ customs_NNS are_VBP observed_VBN by_IN Slavonic_JJ peoples_NNS ._. Thus_RB in_IN Poland_NNP the_DT

also_RB called_VBD the_DT Baba_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ sometimes_RB composed_VBN of_IN twelve_CD smaller_JJR

the_DT Baba_NNP ."_NNP In_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Cracow_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT man_NN binds_VBZ the_DT last_JJ

In_IN Lithuania_NNP the_DT name_NN for_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ Boba_FW (_-LRB- Old_NNP Woman_NNP ),_.
answering_VBG to_TO the_DT Polish_JJ name_NN Baba_NNP ._. The_DT Boba_NNP is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO sit_VB in_IN the_DT
corn_NN which_WDT is_VBZ left_VBN standing_VBG last_JJ ._. The_DT person_NN who_WP binds_VBZ the_DT last_JJ
sheaf_NN or_CC digs_VBZ the_DT last_JJ potato_NN is_VBZ the_DT subject_NN of_IN much_JJ banter_NN ,_, and_CC
receives_VBZ and_CC long_RB retains_VBZ the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT Old_NNP Rye-woman_NNP or_CC the_DT Old_NNP

woman_NN ,_, carried_VBD solemnly_RB through_IN the_DT village_NN on_IN the_DT last_JJ
harvest-waggon_NN ,_, and_CC drenched_VBD with_IN water_NN at_IN the_DT farmer_NN '_POS s_VBZ house_NN ;_: then_RB
every_DT one_CD dances_NNS with_IN it_PRP ._.

In_IN Russia_NNP also_RB the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ often_RB shaped_VBN and_CC dressed_VBN as_IN a_DT
woman_NN ,_, and_CC carried_VBD with_IN dance_NN and_CC song_NN to_TO the_DT farmhouse_NN ._. Out_IN of_IN the_DT
last_JJ sheaf_NN the_DT Bulgarians_NNPS make_VBP a_DT doll_NN which_WDT they_PRP call_VBP the_DT Corn-queen_NN
or_CC Corn-mother_JJ ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ dressed_VBN in_IN a_DT woman_NN '_POS s_PRP shirt_NN ,_, carried_VBD round_RB the_DT

strew_NN on_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, doubtless_RB to_TO fertilise_VB them_PRP ._. The_DT name_NN Queen_NNP ,_, as_IN
applied_VBN to_TO the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ,_, has_VBZ its_PRP$ analogies_NNS in_IN Central_NNP and_CC Northern_NNP
Europe_NNP ._. Thus_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT Salzburg_NNP district_NN of_IN Austria_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT
harvest_NN a_DT great_JJ procession_NN takes_VBZ place_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT a_DT Queen_NNP of_IN the_DT
Corn-ears_NNS (_-LRB- �_NN hrenk_NN �_JJ nigin_NN )_-RRB- is_VBZ drawn_VBN along_IN in_IN a_DT little_JJ carriage_NN by_IN
young_JJ fellows_NNS ._. The_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT Harvest_NNP Queen_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN
common_JJ in_IN England_NNP ._. Milton_NNP must_MD have_VB been_VBN familiar_JJ with_IN it_PRP ,_, for_IN in_IN
Paradise_NNP Lost_NNP he_PRP says_VBZ :_:


"_`` Adam_NNP the_DT while_NN
Waiting_NNP desirous_VBD her_PRP$ return_NN ,_, had_VBD wove_NN
Of_IN choicest_NN flow_NN '_'' rs_NNS a_DT garland_NN to_TO adorn_VB
Her_PRP$ tresses_NNS ,_, and_CC her_PRP$ rural_JJ labours_NNS crown_NN ,_,
As_IN reapers_NNS oft_RB are_VBP wont_VBG their_PRP$ harvest-queen_NN ."_.


Often_RB customs_NNS of_IN this_DT sort_NN are_VBP practised_VBN ,_, not_RB on_IN the_DT harvest-field_NN
but_CC on_IN the_DT threshing-floor_NN ._. The_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, fleeing_VBG before_IN
the_DT reapers_NNS as_IN they_PRP cut_VBD down_RP the_DT ripe_JJ grain_NN ,_, quits_VBZ the_DT reaped_VBN corn_NN
and_CC takes_VBZ refuge_NN in_IN the_DT barn_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP appears_VBZ in_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN
threshed_VBN ,_, either_CC to_TO perish_VB under_IN the_DT blows_NNS of_IN the_DT flail_NN or_CC to_TO flee_VB
thence_NN to_TO the_DT still_RB unthreshed_JJ corn_NN of_IN a_DT neighbouring_NN farm_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT
last_JJ corn_NN to_TO be_VB threshed_VBN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Mother-Corn_NNP or_CC the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NNP ._.
Sometimes_RB the_DT person_NN who_WP gives_VBZ the_DT last_JJ stroke_NN with_IN the_DT flail_NN is_VBZ
called_VBN the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ wrapt_VBN in_IN the_DT straw_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ,_,
or_CC has_VBZ a_DT bundle_NN of_IN straw_NN fastened_VBN on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN ._. Whether_IN wrapt_JJ in_IN the_DT
straw_NN or_CC carrying_VBG it_PRP on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ carted_VBN through_IN the_DT village_NN
amid_IN general_JJ laughter_NN ._. In_IN some_DT districts_NNS of_IN Bavaria_NNP ,_, Th_NNP �_NNP ringen_NN ,_, and_CC
elsewhere_RB ,_, the_DT man_NN who_WP threshes_VBZ the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO have_VB the_DT
Old_NNP Woman_NNP or_CC the_DT Old_NNP Corn-woman_NNP ;_: he_PRP is_VBZ tied_VBN up_RP in_IN straw_NN ,_, carried_VBD or_CC
carted_VBN about_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC set_VBD down_RP at_IN last_JJ on_IN the_DT dunghill_NN ,_, or_CC
taken_VBN to_TO the_DT threshing-floor_NN of_IN a_DT neighbouring_NN farmer_NN who_WP has_VBZ not_RB
finished_VBD his_PRP$ threshing_NN ._. In_IN Poland_NNP the_DT man_NN who_WP gives_VBZ the_DT last_JJ stroke_NN
at_IN threshing_NN is_VBZ called_VBN Baba_NNP (_-LRB- Old_NNP Woman_NNP );_, he_PRP is_VBZ wrapt_VBN in_IN corn_NN and_CC
wheeled_VBN through_IN the_DT village_NN ._. Sometimes_RB in_IN Lithuania_NNP the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN
is_VBZ not_RB threshed_VBN ,_, but_CC is_VBZ fashioned_VBN into_IN female_JJ shape_NN and_CC carried_VBD to_TO
the_DT barn_NN of_IN a_DT neighbour_NN who_WP has_VBZ not_RB finished_VBN his_PRP$ threshing_NN ._.

In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Sweden_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT stranger_NN woman_NN appears_VBZ on_IN the_DT
threshing-floor_NN ,_, a_DT flail_NN is_VBZ put_VBN round_JJ her_PRP$ body_NN ,_, stalks_NNS of_IN corn_NN are_VBP
wound_NN round_IN her_PRP$ neck_NN ,_, a_DT crown_NN of_IN ears_NNS is_VBZ placed_VBN on_IN her_PRP$ head_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
threshers_NNS call_VBP out_RP ,_, "_`` Behold_VB the_DT Corn-woman_NN ."_NN Here_RB the_DT stranger_NN
woman_NN ,_, thus_RB suddenly_RB appearing_VBG ,_, is_VBZ taken_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT corn-spirit_NN who_WP
has_VBZ just_RB been_VBN expelled_VBN by_IN the_DT flails_NNS from_IN the_DT corn-stalks_NNS ._. In_IN other_JJ
cases_NNS the_DT farmer_NN '_'' s_PRP wife_NN represents_VBZ the_DT corn-spirit_NN ._. Thus_RB in_IN the_DT
Commune_NNP of_IN Salign_NNP �_NNP (_-LRB- Vend_NNP �_, e_NN ),_, the_DT farmer_NN '_POS s_VBZ wife_NN ,_, along_IN with_IN the_DT last_JJ

threshing_NN machine_NN ,_, under_IN which_WDT she_PRP is_VBZ shoved_VBD ._. Then_RB the_DT woman_NN is_VBZ

impossible_JJ to_TO express_VB more_RBR clearly_RB the_DT identification_NN of_IN the_DT woman_NN
with_IN the_DT corn_NN than_IN by_IN this_DT graphic_JJ imitation_NN of_IN threshing_NN and_CC

In_IN these_DT customs_NNS the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT ripe_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN old_JJ ,_, or_CC
at_IN least_JJS as_IN of_IN mature_JJ age_NN ._. Hence_RB the_DT names_NNS of_IN Mother_NNP ,_, Grandmother_NNP ,_,
Old_NNP Woman_NNP ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ._. But_CC in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ
conceived_VBN as_IN young_JJ ._. Thus_RB at_IN Saldern_NNP ,_, near_IN Wolfenbuttel_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT rye_NN
has_VBZ been_VBN reaped_VBN ,_, three_CD sheaves_NNS are_VBP tied_VBN together_RB with_IN a_DT rope_NN so_RB as_IN
to_TO make_VB a_DT puppet_NN with_IN the_DT corn_NN ears_NNS for_IN a_DT head_NN ._. This_DT puppet_NN is_VBZ

of_IN the_DT sickle_JJ ._. This_DT last_JJ view_NN appears_VBZ in_IN the_DT Polish_JJ custom_NN of_IN
calling_VBG out_RP to_TO the_DT man_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ handful_NN of_IN corn_NN ,_, "_`` You_PRP have_VBP
cut_VB the_DT navel-string_NN ."_NN In_IN some_DT districts_NNS of_IN West_NNP Prussia_NNP the_DT figure_NN

up_RB in_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT woman_NN who_WP binds_VBZ the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN and_CC represents_VBZ the_DT

of_IN swaddling_VBG bands_NNS ,_, round_VBP the_DT pretended_VBN baby_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ carried_VBN

child_NN ."_NN

In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Scotland_NNP ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN the_DT north_NN of_IN England_NNP ,_, the_DT
last_JJ handful_NN of_IN corn_NN cut_NN on_IN the_DT harvest-field_NN was_VBD called_VBN the_DT kirn_NN ,_,
and_CC the_DT person_NN who_WP carried_VBD it_PRP off_RP was_VBD said_VBD "_'' to_TO win_VB the_DT kirn_NN ."_NN It_PRP was_VBD
then_RB dressed_VBD up_RP like_IN a_DT child_NN '_POS s_VBZ doll_NN and_CC went_VBD by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT
kirn-baby_NN ,_, the_DT kirn-doll_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT Maiden_NNP ._. In_IN Berwickshire_NNP down_RB to_TO

farmhouse_NN and_CC hung_VBD up_RB there_RB till_IN the_DT next_JJ harvest_NN ,_, when_WRB its_PRP$ place_NN
was_VBD taken_VBN by_IN the_DT new_JJ kirn-dolly_NN ._. At_IN Spottiswoode_NNP in_IN Berwickshire_NNP the_DT

almost_RB as_RB often_RB as_IN "_`` cutting_VBG the_DT kirn_NN ."_IN The_DT mode_NN of_IN cutting_VBG it_PRP was_VBD

in_IN the_DT air_NN with_IN three_CD cheers_NNS by_IN his_PRP$ brother_NN harvesters_NNS ._. To_TO decorate_VB

In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Highlands_NNP of_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT last_JJ handful_NN of_IN corn_NN

Maiden_NNP ,_, or_CC in_IN Gaelic_NNP Maidhdeanbuain_NNP ,_, literally_RB ,_, "_`` the_DT shorn_NN
Maiden_NNP ."_NNP Superstitions_NNPS attach_VBP to_TO the_DT winning_NN of_IN the_DT Maiden_NNP ._. If_IN it_PRP is_VBZ

longest_JJS obtains_NNS the_DT coveted_JJ distinction_NN ._. When_WRB it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN cut_VBN ,_, the_DT

wall_NN of_IN the_DT farmhouse_NN ._. In_IN the_DT north_NN of_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT Maiden_NNP is_VBZ

cattle_NNS "_'' to_TO make_VB them_PRP thrive_VB all_DT the_DT year_NN round_NN ."_VBZ In_IN the_DT
neighbourhood_NN of_IN Balquhidder_NNP ,_, Perthshire_NNP ,_, the_DT last_JJ handful_NN of_IN corn_NN
is_VBZ cut_VBN by_IN the_DT youngest_JJS girl_NN on_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ made_VBN into_IN the_DT rude_JJ

Maiden_NNP of_IN the_DT next_JJ year_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN in_IN ._. The_DT writer_NN of_IN this_DT book_NN
witnessed_VBD the_DT ceremony_NN of_IN cutting_VBG the_DT Maiden_NNP at_IN Balquhidder_NNP in_IN
September_NNP 1888._CD A_DT lady_NN friend_NN informed_VBD me_PRP that_IN as_IN a_DT young_JJ girl_NN she_PRP
cut_VB the_DT Maiden_NNP several_JJ times_NNS at_IN the_DT request_NN of_IN the_DT reapers_NNS in_IN the_DT
neighbourhood_NN of_IN Perth_NNP ._. The_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT Maiden_NNP was_VBD given_VBN to_TO the_DT last_JJ
handful_NN of_IN standing_VBG corn_NN ;_: a_DT reaper_NN held_VBD the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT bunch_NN while_IN
she_PRP cut_VBD it_PRP ._. Afterwards_IN the_DT bunch_NN was_VBD plaited_VBN ,_, decked_VBN with_IN ribbons_NNS ,_,
and_CC hung_VBD up_RP in_IN a_DT conspicuous_JJ place_NN on_IN the_DT wall_NN of_IN the_DT kitchen_NN till_IN
the_DT next_JJ Maiden_NNP was_VBD brought_VBN in_IN ._. The_DT harvest-supper_NN in_IN this_DT
neighbourhood_NN was_VBD also_RB called_VBN the_DT Maiden_NNP ;_: the_DT reapers_NNS danced_VBD at_IN it_PRP ._.

On_IN some_DT farms_NNS on_IN the_DT Gareloch_NNP ,_, in_IN Dumbartonshire_NNP ,_, about_IN the_DT year_NN
1830,_IN the_DT last_JJ handful_NN of_IN standing_VBG corn_NN was_VBD called_VBN the_DT Maiden_NNP ._. It_PRP
was_VBD divided_VBN in_IN two_CD ,_, plaited_VBD ,_, and_CC then_RB cut_VB with_IN the_DT sickle_JJ by_IN a_DT girl_NN ,_,
who_WP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN ,_, would_MD be_VB lucky_JJ and_CC would_MD soon_RB be_VB married_VBN ._. When_WRB
it_PRP was_VBD cut_VBN the_DT reapers_NNS gathered_VBD together_RB and_CC threw_VBD their_PRP$ sickles_NNS in_IN
the_DT air_NN ._. The_DT Maiden_NNP was_VBD dressed_VBN with_IN ribbons_NNS and_CC hung_VBD in_IN the_DT kitchen_NN

In_IN Aberdeenshire_NNP "_'' the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN cut_NN ,_, or_CC '_POS Maiden_NNP ,'_NNP is_VBZ carried_VBN home_NN
in_IN merry_NN procession_NN by_IN the_DT harvesters_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ then_RB presented_VBN to_TO the_DT

first_JJ mare_NN foals_NNS ._. The_DT Maiden_NNP is_VBZ then_RB taken_VBN down_RP and_CC presented_VBN to_TO the_DT
mare_NN as_IN its_PRP$ first_JJ food_NN ._. The_DT neglect_NN of_IN this_DT would_MD have_VB untoward_JJ
effects_NNS upon_IN the_DT foal_NN ,_, and_CC disastrous_JJ consequences_NNS upon_IN farm_NN
operations_NNS generally_RB for_IN the_DT season_NN ."_NN In_IN the_DT north-east_NN of_IN
Aberdeenshire_NNP the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ commonly_RB called_VBN the_DT clyack_NN sheaf_NN ._.
It_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB cut_VBN by_IN the_DT youngest_JJS girl_NN present_NN and_CC was_VBD dressed_VBN as_IN a_DT
woman_NN ._. Being_VBG brought_VBN home_NN in_IN triumph_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD kept_VBN till_IN Christmas_NNP

farm_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN there_EX was_VBD not_RB ,_, to_TO the_DT oldest_JJS cow_NN in_IN calf_NN ._. Elsewhere_RB the_DT
sheaf_NN was_VBD divided_VBN between_IN all_PDT the_DT cows_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ calves_NNS or_CC between_IN
all_PDT the_DT horses_NNS and_CC the_DT cattle_NNS of_IN the_DT farm_NN ._. In_IN Fifeshire_NNP the_DT last_JJ

is_VBZ hung_VBN on_IN the_DT wall_NN of_IN the_DT farm-kitchen_NN till_IN the_DT next_JJ spring_NN ._. The_DT
custom_NN of_IN cutting_VBG the_DT Maiden_NNP at_IN harvest_NN was_VBD also_RB observed_VBN in_IN

A_DT somewhat_RB maturer_JJR but_CC still_RB youthful_JJ age_NN is_VBZ assigned_VBN to_TO the_DT
corn-spirit_NN by_IN the_DT appellations_NNS of_IN Bride_NNP ,_, Oats-bride_NNP ,_, and_CC

last_JJ sheaf_NN and_CC on_IN the_DT woman_NN who_WP binds_VBZ it_PRP ._. At_IN wheat-harvest_NN near_IN
M_NNP �_NNP glitz_NN ,_, in_IN Moravia_NNP ,_, a_DT small_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT wheat_NN is_VBZ left_VBN standing_VBG
after_IN all_PDT the_DT rest_NN has_VBZ been_VBN reaped_VBN ._. This_DT remnant_NN is_VBZ then_RB cut_VBN ,_, amid_IN
the_DT rejoicing_NN of_IN the_DT reapers_NNS ,_, by_IN a_DT young_JJ girl_NN who_WP wears_VBZ a_DT wreath_NN of_IN
wheaten_IN ears_NNS on_IN her_PRP$ head_NN and_CC goes_VBZ by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT Wheat-bride_JJ ._. It_PRP
is_VBZ supposed_VBN that_IN she_PRP will_MD be_VB a_DT real_JJ bride_NN that_IN same_JJ year_NN ._. Near_''
Roslin_NNP and_CC Stonehaven_NNP ,_, in_IN Scotland_NNP ,_, the_DT last_JJ handful_NN of_IN corn_NN cut_NN
"_`` got_VBD the_DT name_NN of_IN '_POS the_DT bride_NN ,'_RB and_CC she_PRP was_VBD placed_VBN over_IN the_DT bress_NN or_CC
chimney-piece_NN ;_: she_PRP had_VBD a_DT ribbon_NN tied_VBN below_IN her_PRP$ numerous_JJ ears_NNS ,_, and_CC
another_DT round_NN her_PRP waist_NN ."_.

Sometimes_RB the_DT idea_NN implied_VBN by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Bride_NNP is_VBZ worked_VBN out_RP more_RBR
fully_RB by_IN representing_VBG the_DT productive_JJ powers_NNS of_IN vegetation_NN as_IN bride_NN
and_CC bridegroom_NN ._. Thus_RB in_IN the_DT Vorharz_NNP an_DT Oats-man_NN and_CC an_DT Oats-woman_NN ,_,
swathed_VBN in_IN straw_NN ,_, dance_NN at_IN the_DT harvest_NN feast_NN ._. In_IN South_NNP Saxony_NNP an_CC
Oats-bridegroom_NN and_CC an_DT Oats-bride_NN figure_NN together_RB at_IN the_DT harvest_NN
celebration_NN ._. The_DT Oats-bridegroom_NN is_VBZ a_DT man_NN completely_RB wrapt_VBN in_IN
oats-straw_NN ;_: the_DT Oats-bride_NN is_VBZ a_DT man_NN dressed_VBN in_IN woman_NN '_'' s_PRP clothes_NNS ,_, but_CC
not_RB wrapt_VBN in_IN straw_NN ._. They_PRP are_VBP drawn_VBN in_IN a_DT waggon_NN to_TO the_DT ale-house_NN ,_,
where_WRB the_DT dance_NN takes_VBZ place_NN ._. At_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT dance_NN the_DT
dancers_NNS pluck_VBD the_DT bunches_NNS of_IN oats_NN one_CD by_IN one_CD from_IN the_DT

Wheat-bride_JJ "_`` is_VBZ celebrated_VBN by_IN the_DT young_JJ people_NNS at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT
harvest_NN ._. The_DT woman_NN who_WP bound_VBD the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN plays_VBZ the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT

the_DT Oats-bride_NN is_VBZ celebrated_VBN with_IN the_DT like_JJ rustic_JJ pomp_NN ._. About_IN

In_IN these_DT last_JJ instances_NNS the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ personified_VBN in_IN double_JJ

The_DT harvest_NN customs_NNS just_RB described_VBN are_VBP strikingly_RB analogous_JJ to_TO the_DT
spring_NN customs_NNS which_WDT we_PRP reviewed_VBN in_IN an_DT earlier_JJR part_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN ._.
(1)_JJ As_IN in_IN the_DT spring_NN customs_NNS the_DT tree-spirit_NN is_VBZ represented_VBN both_DT by_IN
a_DT tree_NN and_CC by_IN a_DT person_NN ,_, so_RB in_IN the_DT harvest_NN customs_NNS the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ

binds_NNS or_CC threshes_NNS it_PRP ._. The_DT equivalence_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN to_TO the_DT sheaf_NN is_VBZ

the_DT sheaf_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Mother_NNP ,_, it_PRP must_MD be_VB made_VBN up_RP into_IN human_JJ shape_NN

age_NN of_IN the_DT maize_NN ._. For_IN in_IN the_DT Mexican_NNP ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT European_JJ ,_, custom_NN the_DT
human_JJ beings_NNS were_VBD probably_RB representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN rather_RB
than_IN victims_NNS offered_VBD to_TO it_PRP ._. (2)_'' Again_RB the_DT same_JJ fertilising_NN influence_NN
which_WDT the_DT tree-spirit_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO exert_VB over_IN vegetation_NN ,_, cattle_NNS ,_,

and_CC to_TO horses_NNS at_IN the_DT first_JJ ploughing_NN ._. Lastly_RB ,_, its_PRP$ influence_NN on_IN women_NNS
is_VBZ indicated_VBN by_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN delivering_VBG the_DT Mother-sheaf_NNP ,_, made_VBD into_IN
the_DT likeness_NN of_IN a_DT pregnant_JJ woman_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT farmer_NN '_'' s_PRP wife_NN ;_: by_IN the_DT
belief_NN that_IN the_DT woman_NN who_WP binds_VBZ the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN will_MD have_VB a_DT child_NN
next_JJ year_NN ;_: perhaps_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, by_IN the_DT idea_NN that_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP gets_VBZ it_PRP
will_MD soon_RB be_VB married_VBN ._.

Plainly_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, these_DT spring_NN and_CC harvest_NN customs_NNS are_VBP based_VBN on_IN
the_DT same_JJ ancient_JJ modes_NNS of_IN thought_NN ,_, and_CC form_NN parts_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ
primitive_JJ heathendom_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD doubtless_RB practised_VBN by_IN our_PRP$
forefathers_NNS long_RB before_IN the_DT dawn_NN of_IN history_NN ._. Amongst_IN the_DT marks_NNS of_IN a_DT
primitive_JJ ritual_NN we_PRP may_MD note_VB the_DT following_VBG :_:

1._VBG No_DT special_JJ class_NN of_IN persons_NNS is_VBZ set_VBN apart_RB for_IN the_DT performance_NN of_IN
the_DT rites_NNS ;_: in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, there_EX are_VBP no_DT priests_NNS ._. The_DT rites_NNS may_MD be_VB
performed_VBN by_IN any_DT one_CD ,_, as_IN occasion_NN demands_NNS ._.

2._VBG No_DT special_JJ places_NNS are_VBP set_VBN apart_RP for_IN the_DT performance_NN of_IN the_DT rites_NNS ;_:
in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, there_EX are_VBP no_DT temples_NNS ._. The_DT rites_NNS may_MD be_VB performed_VBN
anywhere_RB ,_, as_IN occasion_NN demands_NNS ._.

3._CD Spirits_NNS ,_, not_RB gods_NNS ,_, are_VBP recognised_VBN ._. (_-LRB- a_DT )_-RRB- As_IN distinguished_VBN from_IN
gods_NNS ,_, spirits_NNS are_VBP restricted_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ operations_NNS to_TO definite_JJ
departments_NNS of_IN nature_NN ._. Their_PRP$ names_NNS are_VBP general_JJ ,_, not_RB proper_JJ ._. Their_PRP$
attributes_NNS are_VBP generic_JJ ,_, rather_RB than_IN individual_JJ ;_: in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_,
there_EX is_VBZ an_DT indefinite_JJ number_NN of_IN spirits_NNS of_IN each_DT class_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
individuals_NNS of_IN a_DT class_NN are_VBP all_PDT much_RB alike_RB ;_: they_PRP have_VBP no_DT definitely_RB
marked_VBN individuality_NN ;_: no_DT accepted_JJ traditions_NNS are_VBP current_JJ as_IN to_TO their_PRP$
origin_NN ,_, life_NN ,_, adventures_NNS ,_, and_CC character_NN ._. (_-LRB- b_NN )_-RRB- On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN
gods_NNS ,_, as_IN distinguished_VBN from_IN spirits_NNS ,_, are_VBP not_RB restricted_VBN to_TO definite_JJ
departments_NNS of_IN nature_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ that_IN there_EX is_VBZ generally_RB some_DT one_CD
department_NN over_IN which_WDT they_PRP preside_VBP as_IN their_PRP$ special_JJ province_NN ;_: but_CC
they_PRP are_VBP not_RB rigorously_RB confined_VBN to_TO it_PRP ;_: they_PRP can_MD exert_VB their_PRP$ power_NN
for_IN good_JJ or_CC evil_JJ in_IN many_JJ other_JJ spheres_NNS of_IN nature_NN and_CC life_NN ._. Again_RB ,_,
they_PRP bear_VBP individual_JJ or_CC proper_JJ names_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN Demeter_NNP ,_, Persephone_NNP ,_,
Dionysus_NNP ;_: and_CC their_PRP$ individual_JJ characters_NNS and_CC histories_NNS are_VBP fixed_VBN by_IN
current_JJ myths_NNS and_CC the_DT representations_NNS of_IN art_NN ._.

4._DT The_DT rites_NNS are_VBP magical_JJ rather_RB than_IN propitiatory_NN ._. In_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_,
the_DT desired_VBN objects_NNS are_VBP attained_VBN ,_, not_RB by_IN propitiating_VBG the_DT favour_NN of_IN
divine_JJ beings_NNS through_IN sacrifice_NN ,_, prayer_NN ,_, and_CC praise_NN ,_, but_CC by_IN
ceremonies_NNS which_WDT ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP already_RB explained_VBN ,_, are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO
influence_NN the_DT course_NN of_IN nature_NN directly_RB through_IN a_DT physical_JJ sympathy_NN
or_CC resemblance_NN between_IN the_DT rite_NN and_CC the_DT effect_NN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT
intention_NN of_IN the_DT rite_NN to_TO produce_VB ._.

Judged_VBN by_IN these_DT tests_NNS ,_, the_DT spring_NN and_CC harvest_NN customs_NNS of_IN our_PRP$
European_JJ peasantry_NN deserve_VBP to_TO rank_VB as_IN primitive_JJ ._. For_IN no_DT special_JJ
class_NN of_IN persons_NNS and_CC no_DT special_JJ places_NNS are_VBP set_VBN exclusively_RB apart_RB for_IN
their_PRP$ performance_NN ;_: they_PRP may_MD be_VB performed_VBN by_IN any_DT one_CD ,_, master_NN or_CC man_NN ,_,
mistress_NN or_CC maid_NN ,_, boy_NN or_CC girl_NN ;_: they_PRP are_VBP practised_VBN ,_, not_RB in_IN temples_NNS or_CC
churches_NNS ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT woods_NNS and_CC meadows_NNS ,_, beside_IN brooks_NNS ,_, in_IN barns_NNS ,_, on_IN
harvest_NN fields_NNS and_CC cottage_NN floors_NNS ._. The_DT supernatural_JJ beings_NNS whose_WP$
existence_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN for_IN granted_VBN in_IN them_PRP are_VBP spirits_NNS rather_RB than_IN
deities_NNS :_: their_PRP$ functions_NNS are_VBP limited_VBN to_TO certain_JJ well-defined_JJ
departments_NNS of_IN nature_NN :_: their_PRP$ names_NNS are_VBP general_JJ like_IN the_DT
Barley-mother_NNP ,_, the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NNP ,_, the_DT Maiden_NNP ,_, not_RB proper_JJ names_NNS like_IN
Demeter_NNP ,_, Persephone_NNP ,_, Dionysus_NNP ._. Their_PRP$ generic_JJ attributes_NNS are_VBP known_VBN ,_,
but_CC their_PRP$ individual_JJ histories_NNS and_CC characters_NNS are_VBP not_RB the_DT subject_NN of_IN
myths_NNS ._. For_IN they_PRP exist_VBP in_IN classes_NNS rather_RB than_IN as_IN individuals_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT
members_NNS of_IN each_DT class_NN are_VBP indistinguishable_JJ ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, every_DT farm_NN
has_VBZ its_PRP$ Corn-mother_JJ ,_, or_CC its_PRP$ Old_NNP Woman_NNP ,_, or_CC its_PRP$ Maiden_NNP ;_: but_CC every_DT
Corn-mother_NN is_VBZ much_RB like_IN every_DT other_JJ Corn-mother_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB with_IN the_DT
Old_NNP Women_NNP and_CC Maidens_NNP ._. Lastly_RB ,_, in_IN these_DT harvests_NNS ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT spring_NN
customs_NNS ,_, the_DT ritual_NN is_VBZ magical_JJ rather_RB than_IN propitiatory_JJ ._. This_DT is_VBZ
shown_VBN by_IN throwing_VBG the_DT Corn-mother_NN into_IN the_DT river_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO secure_VB
rain_NN and_CC dew_NN for_IN the_DT crops_NNS ;_: by_IN making_VBG the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NNP heavy_NN in_IN order_NN
to_TO get_VB a_DT heavy_JJ crop_NN next_JJ year_NN ;_: by_IN strewing_VBG grain_NN from_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN
amongst_IN the_DT young_JJ crops_NNS in_IN spring_NN ;_: and_CC by_IN giving_VBG the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN to_TO
the_DT cattle_NNS to_TO make_VB them_PRP thrive_VB ._.



XLVI_NNP ._. The_DT Corn-Mother_NNP in_IN Many_JJ Lands_NNS



1._DT The_DT Corn-mother_NNP in_IN America_NNP

EUROPEAN_JJ peoples_NNS ,_, ancient_JJ and_CC modern_JJ ,_, have_VBP not_RB been_VBN singular_JJ in_IN
personifying_VBG the_DT corn_NN as_IN a_DT mother_NN goddess_JJ ._. The_DT same_JJ simple_JJ idea_NN has_VBZ
suggested_VBD itself_PRP to_TO other_JJ agricultural_JJ races_NNS in_IN distant_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT
world_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN applied_VBN by_IN them_PRP to_TO other_JJ indigenous_JJ cereals_NNS than_IN
barley_NN and_CC wheat_NN ._. If_IN Europe_NNP has_VBZ its_PRP$ Wheat-mother_JJ and_CC its_PRP$
Barley-mother_NNP ,_, America_NNP has_VBZ its_PRP$ Maize-mother_JJ and_CC the_DT East_NNP Indies_NNPS
their_PRP$ Rice-mother_JJ ._. These_DT personifications_NNS I_PRP will_MD now_RB illustrate_VB ,_,
beginning_VBG with_IN the_DT American_JJ personification_NN of_IN the_DT maize_NN ._.

We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN among_IN European_JJ peoples_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT common_JJ custom_NN to_TO
keep_VB the_DT plaited_JJ corn-stalks_NNS of_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT puppet_NN which_WDT
is_VBZ formed_VBN out_IN of_IN them_PRP ,_, in_IN the_DT farm-house_NN from_IN harvest_NN to_TO harvest_NN ._.
The_DT intention_NN no_DT doubt_NN is_VBZ ,_, or_CC rather_RB originally_RB was_VBD ,_, by_IN preserving_VBG
the_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN to_TO maintain_VB the_DT spirit_NN itself_PRP
in_IN life_NN and_CC activity_NN throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT corn_NN may_MD
grow_VB and_CC the_DT crops_NNS be_VB good_JJ ._. This_DT interpretation_NN of_IN the_DT custom_NN is_VBZ at_IN
all_DT events_NNS rendered_VBD highly_RB probable_JJ by_IN a_DT similar_JJ custom_NN observed_VBN by_IN
the_DT ancient_JJ Peruvians_NNS ,_, and_CC thus_RB described_VBN by_IN the_DT old_JJ Spanish_NNP
historian_NN Acosta_NNP :_: "_`` They_PRP take_VBP a_DT certain_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS fruitful_JJ
of_IN the_DT maize_NN that_WDT grows_VBZ in_IN their_PRP$ farms_NNS ,_, the_DT which_WDT they_PRP put_VBD in_IN a_DT
certain_JJ granary_NN which_WDT they_PRP do_VBP call_VB Pirua_NNP ,_, with_IN certain_JJ ceremonies_NNS ,_,
watching_VBG three_CD nights_NNS ;_: they_PRP put_VBD this_DT maize_NN in_IN the_DT richest_JJS garments_NNS
they_PRP have_VBP ,_, and_CC being_VBG thus_RB wrapped_VBN and_CC dressed_VBN ,_, they_PRP worship_VB this_DT
Pirua_NNP ,_, and_CC hold_VB it_PRP in_IN great_JJ veneration_NN ,_, saying_VBG it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT mother_NN of_IN
the_DT maize_NN of_IN their_PRP$ inheritances_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN by_IN this_DT means_VBZ the_DT maize_NN
augments_NNS and_CC is_VBZ preserved_VBN ._. In_IN this_DT month_NN [_RB the_DT sixth_JJ month_NN ,_, answering_VBG
to_TO May_MD ]_SYM they_PRP make_VBP a_DT particular_JJ sacrifice_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT witches_NNS demand_NN of_IN
this_DT Pirua_NNP if_IN it_PRP hath_VBZ strength_NN sufficient_JJ to_TO continue_VB until_IN the_DT
next_JJ year_NN ;_: and_CC if_IN it_PRP answers_VBZ no_RB ,_, then_RB they_PRP carry_VBP this_DT maize_NN to_TO the_DT
farm_NN to_TO burn_VB ,_, whence_IN they_PRP brought_VBD it_PRP ,_, according_VBG to_TO every_DT man_NN '_'' s_PRP
power_NN ;_: then_RB they_PRP make_VBP another_DT Pirua_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT same_JJ ceremonies_NNS ,_,
saying_VBG that_IN they_PRP renew_VBP it_PRP ,_, to_TO the_DT end_NN the_DT seed_NN of_IN maize_NN may_MD not_RB
perish_JJ ,_, and_CC if_IN it_PRP answers_VBZ that_IN it_PRP hath_VBZ force_NN sufficient_JJ to_TO last_VB
longer_RB ,_, they_PRP leave_VBP it_PRP until_IN the_DT next_JJ year_NN ._. This_DT foolish_JJ vanity_NN
continueth_NN to_TO this_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB common_JJ amongst_IN the_DT Indians_NNPS to_TO
have_VBP these_DT Piruas_NNP ._. "_''

In_IN this_DT description_NN of_IN the_DT custom_NN there_RB seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB some_DT error_NN ._.
Probably_RB it_PRP was_VBD the_DT dressed-up_JJ bunch_NN of_IN maize_NN ,_, not_RB the_DT granary_JJ
(_-LRB- Pirua_NNP ),_, which_WDT was_VBD worshipped_VBN by_IN the_DT Peruvians_NNPS and_CC regarded_VBD as_IN the_DT
Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Maize_NNP ._. This_DT is_VBZ confirmed_VBN by_IN what_WP we_PRP know_VBP of_IN the_DT
Peruvian_JJ custom_NN from_IN another_DT source_NN ._. The_DT Peruvians_NNPS ,_, we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN ,_,
believed_VBD all_DT useful_JJ plants_NNS to_TO be_VB animated_VBN by_IN a_DT divine_JJ being_NN who_WP
causes_VBZ their_PRP$ growth_NN ._. According_VBG to_TO the_DT particular_JJ plant_NN ,_, these_DT divine_JJ
beings_NNS were_VBD called_VBN the_DT Maize-mother_NNP (_-LRB- Zara-mama_NNP ),_, the_DT Quinoa-mother_NNP
(_-LRB- Quinoa-mama_NNP ),_, the_DT Coca-mother_JJ (_-LRB- Coca-mama_NNP ),_, and_CC the_DT

plants_NNS ;_: they_PRP were_VBD dressed_VBN in_IN women_NNS '_'' s_VBZ clothes_NNS and_CC worshipped_VBD ._. Thus_RB
the_DT Maize-mother_NNP was_VBD represented_VBN by_IN a_DT puppet_NN made_VBN of_IN stalks_NNS of_IN maize_NN
dressed_VBN in_IN full_JJ female_NN attire_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT Indians_NNPS believed_VBD that_DT "_'' as_IN
mother_NN ,_, it_PRP had_VBD the_DT power_NN of_IN producing_VBG and_CC giving_VBG birth_NN to_TO much_JJ
maize_NN ."_NN Probably_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, Acosta_NNP misunderstood_VBD his_PRP$ informant_NN ,_, and_CC
the_DT Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Maize_NNP which_WDT he_PRP describes_VBZ was_VBD not_RB the_DT granary_JJ
(_-LRB- Pirua_NNP ),_, but_CC the_DT bunch_NN of_IN maize_NN dressed_VBN in_IN rich_JJ vestments_NNS ._. The_DT
Peruvian_JJ Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Maize_NNP ,_, like_IN the_DT harvest-Maiden_NN at_IN
Balquhidder_NNP ,_, was_VBD kept_VBN for_IN a_DT year_NN in_IN order_NN that_IN by_IN her_PRP means_VBZ the_DT corn_NN
might_MD grow_VB and_CC multiply_VB ._. But_CC lest_IN her_PRP$ strength_NN might_MD not_RB suffice_VB to_TO
last_JJ till_IN the_DT next_JJ harvest_NN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD asked_VBN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN
how_WRB she_PRP felt_VBD ,_, and_CC if_IN she_PRP answered_VBD that_IN she_PRP felt_VBD weak_JJ ,_, she_PRP was_VBD burned_VBN
and_CC a_DT fresh_JJ Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Maize_NNP made_VBD ,_, "_'' to_TO the_DT end_NN the_DT seed_NN of_IN maize_NN
may_MD not_RB perish_VB ."_JJ Here_RB ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB observed_VBN ,_, we_PRP have_VBP a_DT strong_JJ
confirmation_NN of_IN the_DT explanation_NN already_RB given_VBN of_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN
killing_VBG the_DT god_NN ,_, both_DT periodically_RB and_CC occasionally_RB ._. The_DT Mother_NNP of_IN
the_DT maize_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, to_TO live_VB through_IN a_DT year_NN ,_, that_IN being_VBG
the_DT period_NN during_IN which_WDT her_PRP$ strength_NN might_MD reasonably_RB be_VB supposed_VBN to_TO
last_JJ unimpaired_JJ ;_: but_CC on_IN any_DT symptom_NN of_IN her_PRP$ strength_NN failing_VBG she_PRP was_VBD
put_VBN to_TO death_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT fresh_JJ and_CC vigorous_JJ Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Maize_NNP took_VBD her_PRP$
place_NN ,_, lest_IN the_DT maize_NN which_WDT depended_VBD on_IN her_PRP for_IN its_PRP$ existence_NN should_MD
languish_NN and_CC decay_NN ._.



2._DT The_DT Rice-mother_NNP in_IN the_DT East_NNP Indies_NNPS

IF_IN THE_DT READER_NNP still_RB feels_VBZ any_DT doubts_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT meaning_NN of_IN the_DT
harvest_NN customs_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN practised_VBN within_IN living_VBG memory_NN by_IN
European_JJ peasants_NNS ,_, these_DT doubts_NNS may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB dispelled_VBN by_IN
comparing_VBG the_DT customs_NNS observed_VBD at_IN the_DT rice-harvest_NN by_IN the_DT Malays_NNP and_CC
Dyaks_NNS of_IN the_DT East_NNP Indies_NNP ._. For_IN these_DT Eastern_JJ peoples_NNS have_VBP not_RB ,_, like_IN
our_PRP$ peasantry_NN ,_, advanced_VBD beyond_IN the_DT intellectual_JJ stage_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT
customs_NNS originated_VBD ;_: their_PRP$ theory_NN and_CC their_PRP$ practice_NN are_VBP still_RB in_IN
unison_NN ;_: for_IN them_PRP the_DT quaint_JJ rites_NNS which_WDT in_IN Europe_NNP have_VBP long_RB dwindled_VBN
into_IN mere_JJ fossils_NNS ,_, the_DT pastime_NN of_IN clowns_NNS and_CC the_DT puzzle_NN of_IN the_DT
learned_VBN ,_, are_VBP still_RB living_VBG realities_NNS of_IN which_WDT they_PRP can_MD render_VB an_DT
intelligible_JJ and_CC truthful_JJ account_NN ._. Hence_RB a_DT study_NN of_IN their_PRP$ beliefs_NNS
and_CC usages_NNS concerning_VBG the_DT rice_NN may_MD throw_VB some_DT light_NN on_IN the_DT true_JJ
meaning_NN of_IN the_DT ritual_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN in_IN ancient_JJ Greece_NNP and_CC modern_JJ
Europe_NNP ._.

Now_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT ritual_NN which_WDT the_DT Malays_NNP and_CC Dyaks_NNP observe_VBP in_IN
connexion_NN with_IN the_DT rice_NN is_VBZ founded_VBN on_IN the_DT simple_JJ conception_NN of_IN the_DT
rice_NN as_IN animated_VBN by_IN a_DT soul_NN like_IN that_WDT which_WDT these_DT people_NNS attribute_VBP to_TO
mankind_NN ._. They_PRP explain_VBP the_DT phenomena_NNS of_IN reproduction_NN ,_, growth_NN ,_, decay_NN ,_,
and_CC death_NN in_IN the_DT rice_NN on_IN the_DT same_JJ principles_NNS on_IN which_WDT they_PRP explain_VBP
the_DT corresponding_JJ phenomena_NNS in_IN human_JJ beings_NNS ._. They_PRP imagine_VBP that_IN in_IN
the_DT fibres_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT certain_JJ
vital_JJ element_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ so_RB far_RB independent_JJ of_IN the_DT plant_NN that_IN it_PRP may_MD
for_IN a_DT time_NN be_VB completely_RB separated_VBN from_IN it_PRP without_IN fatal_JJ effects_NNS ,_,
though_IN if_IN its_PRP$ absence_NN be_VB prolonged_VBN beyond_IN certain_JJ limits_NNS the_DT plant_NN
will_MD wither_VB and_CC die_VB ._. This_DT vital_JJ yet_RB separable_JJ element_NN is_VBZ what_WP ,_, for_IN
the_DT want_NN of_IN a_DT better_JJR word_NN ,_, we_PRP must_MD call_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN a_DT plant_NN ,_, just_RB as_IN
a_DT similar_JJ vital_JJ and_CC separable_JJ element_NN is_VBZ commonly_RB supposed_VBN to_TO
constitute_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN man_NN ;_: and_CC on_IN this_DT theory_NN or_CC myth_NN of_IN the_DT
plant-soul_NN is_VBZ built_VBN the_DT whole_JJ worship_NN of_IN the_DT cereals_NNS ,_, just_RB as_IN on_IN the_DT
theory_NN or_CC myth_NN of_IN the_DT human_JJ soul_NN is_VBZ built_VBN the_DT whole_JJ worship_NN of_IN the_DT
dead_JJ ,--_, a_DT towering_VBG superstructure_NN reared_VBD on_IN a_DT slender_JJ and_CC precarious_JJ
foundation_NN ._.

Believing_VBG the_DT rice_NN to_TO be_VB animated_VBN by_IN a_DT soul_NN like_IN that_DT of_IN a_DT man_NN ,_, the_DT
Indonesians_NNS naturally_RB treat_VBP it_PRP with_IN the_DT deference_NN and_CC the_DT
consideration_NN which_WDT they_PRP show_VBP to_TO their_PRP$ fellows_NNS ._. Thus_RB they_PRP behave_VBP
towards_IN the_DT rice_NN in_IN bloom_NN as_IN they_PRP behave_VBP towards_IN a_DT pregnant_JJ woman_NN ;_:
they_PRP abstain_VBP from_IN firing_VBG guns_NNS or_CC making_VBG loud_JJ noises_NNS in_IN the_DT field_NN ,_,
lest_IN they_PRP should_MD so_RB frighten_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN that_IN it_PRP would_MD
miscarry_NN and_CC bear_NN no_DT grain_NN ;_: and_CC for_IN the_DT same_JJ reason_NN they_PRP will_MD not_RB
talk_NN of_IN corpses_NNS or_CC demons_NNS in_IN the_DT rice-fields_NNS ._. Moreover_RB ,_, they_PRP feed_VB
the_DT blooming_VBG rice_NN with_IN foods_NNS of_IN various_JJ kinds_NNS which_WDT are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO
be_VB wholesome_JJ for_IN women_NNS with_IN child_NN ;_: but_CC when_WRB the_DT rice-ears_NNS are_VBP just_RB
beginning_VBG to_TO form_VB ,_, they_PRP are_VBP looked_VBN upon_IN as_IN infants_NNS ,_, and_CC women_NNS go_VBP
through_IN the_DT fields_NNS feeding_VBG them_PRP with_IN rice-pap_NN as_IN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD human_JJ
babes_NNS ._. In_IN such_JJ natural_JJ and_CC obvious_JJ comparisons_NNS of_IN the_DT breeding_NN plant_NN
to_TO a_DT breeding_VBG woman_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT young_JJ grain_NN to_TO a_DT young_JJ child_NN ,_, is_VBZ to_TO
be_VB sought_VBN the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT kindred_JJ Greek_NNP conception_NN of_IN the_DT
Corn-mother_NN and_CC the_DT Corn-daughter_NNP ,_, Demeter_NNP and_CC Persephone_NNP ._. But_CC if_IN
the_DT timorous_JJ feminine_JJ soul_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN can_MD be_VB frightened_VBN into_IN a_DT
miscarriage_NN even_RB by_IN loud_JJ noises_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ easy_JJ to_TO imagine_VB what_WP her_PRP$
feelings_NNS must_MD be_VB at_IN harvest_NN ,_, when_WRB people_NNS are_VBP under_IN the_DT sad_JJ necessity_NN
of_IN cutting_VBG down_RP the_DT rice_NN with_IN the_DT knife_NN ._. At_IN so_RB critical_JJ a_DT season_NN
every_DT precaution_NN must_MD be_VB used_VBN to_TO render_VB the_DT necessary_JJ surgical_JJ
operation_NN of_IN reaping_VBG as_IN inconspicuous_JJ and_CC as_RB painless_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ._.
For_IN that_DT reason_NN the_DT reaping_NN of_IN the_DT seed-rice_NN is_VBZ done_VBN with_IN knives_NNS of_IN
a_DT peculiar_JJ pattern_NN ,_, such_JJ that_IN the_DT blades_NNS are_VBP hidden_VBN in_IN the_DT reapers_NNS '_POS
hands_NNS and_CC do_VBP not_RB frighten_VB the_DT rice-spirit_NN till_IN the_DT very_RB last_JJ moment_NN ,_,
when_WRB her_PRP$ head_NN is_VBZ swept_VBN off_IN almost_RB before_IN she_PRP is_VBZ aware_JJ ;_: and_CC from_IN a_DT
like_IN delicate_JJ motive_NN the_DT reapers_NNS at_IN work_NN in_IN the_DT fields_NNS employ_VBP a_DT
special_JJ form_NN of_IN speech_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT rice-spirit_NN cannot_MD be_VB expected_VBN to_TO
understand_VB ,_, so_RB that_IN she_PRP has_VBZ no_DT warning_NN or_CC inkling_NN of_IN what_WP is_VBZ going_VBG
forward_RB till_IN the_DT heads_NNS of_IN rice_NN are_VBP safely_RB deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT basket_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT Indonesian_JJ peoples_NNS who_WP thus_RB personify_VBP the_DT rice_NN we_PRP may_MD take_VB
the_DT Kayans_NNP or_CC Bahaus_NNP of_IN Central_NNP Borneo_NNP as_IN typical_JJ ._. In_IN order_NN to_TO
secure_JJ and_CC detain_IN the_DT volatile_JJ soul_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN the_DT Kayans_NNP resort_NN to_TO
a_DT number_NN of_IN devices_NNS ._. Among_IN the_DT instruments_NNS employed_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN
are_VBP a_DT miniature_JJ ladder_NN ,_, a_DT spatula_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT basket_NN containing_VBG hooks_NNS ,_,
thorns_NNS ,_, and_CC cords_NNS ._. With_IN the_DT spatula_NN the_DT priestess_NN strokes_VBZ the_DT soul_NN
of_IN the_DT rice_NN down_IN the_DT little_JJ ladder_NN into_IN the_DT basket_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ
naturally_RB held_VBN fast_RB by_IN the_DT hooks_NNS ,_, the_DT thorn_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT cord_NN ;_: and_CC
having_VBG thus_RB captured_VBN and_CC imprisoned_VBN the_DT soul_NN she_PRP conveys_VBZ it_PRP into_IN the_DT
rice-granary_JJ ._. Sometimes_RB a_DT bamboo_NN box_NN and_CC a_DT net_NN are_VBP used_VBN for_IN the_DT same_JJ
purpose_NN ._. And_CC in_IN order_NN to_TO ensure_VB a_DT good_JJ harvest_NN for_IN the_DT following_VBG
year_NN it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ not_RB only_RB to_TO detain_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN all_DT the_DT grains_NNS
of_IN rice_NN which_WDT are_VBP safely_RB stored_VBN in_IN the_DT granary_JJ ,_, but_CC also_RB to_TO attract_VB
and_CC recover_VB the_DT soul_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT rice_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN lost_VBN through_IN
falling_VBG to_TO the_DT earth_NN or_CC being_VBG eaten_VBN by_IN deer_NNS ,_, apes_NNS ,_, and_CC pigs_NNS ._. For_IN
this_DT purpose_NN instruments_NNS of_IN various_JJ sorts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN invented_VBN by_IN the_DT
priests_NNS ._. One_CD ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT bamboo_NN vessel_NN provided_VBN with_IN four_CD
hooks_NNS made_VBD from_IN the_DT wood_NN of_IN a_DT fruit-tree_NN ,_, by_IN means_NNS of_IN which_WDT the_DT
absent_JJ rice-soul_NN may_MD be_VB hooked_JJ and_CC drawn_VBN back_RB into_IN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, which_WDT
is_VBZ then_RB hung_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT house_NN ._. Sometimes_RB two_CD hands_NNS carved_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT
wood_NN of_IN a_DT fruit-tree_NN are_VBP used_VBN for_IN the_DT same_JJ purpose_NN ._. And_CC every_DT time_NN
that_IN a_DT Kayan_NNP housewife_NN fetches_NNS rice_NN from_IN the_DT granary_JJ for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN
her_PRP$ household_NN ,_, she_PRP must_MD propitiate_VB the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT rice_NN in_IN the_DT
granary_JJ ,_, lest_IN they_PRP should_MD be_VB angry_JJ at_IN being_VBG robbed_VBN of_IN their_PRP$
substance_NN ._.

The_DT same_JJ need_NN of_IN securing_VBG the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT crop_NN is_VBZ to_TO
thrive_VBP ,_, is_VBZ keenly_RB felt_VBN by_IN the_DT Karens_NNP of_IN Burma_NNP ._. When_WRB a_DT rice-field_NN
does_VBZ not_RB flourish_VB ,_, they_PRP suppose_VBP that_IN the_DT soul_NN (_-LRB- kelah_NN )_-RRB- of_IN the_DT rice_NN
is_VBZ in_IN some_DT way_NN detained_VBN from_IN the_DT rice_NN ._. If_IN the_DT soul_NN cannot_MD be_VB called_VBN
back_RB ,_, the_DT crop_NN will_MD fail_VB ._. The_DT following_VBG formula_NN is_VBZ used_VBN in_IN recalling_VBG
the_DT kelah_FW (_-LRB- soul_NN )_-RRB- of_IN the_DT rice_NN :_: "_`` O_UH come_VB ,_, rice_NN -_: kelah_NN ,_, come_VB !_. Come_VB to_TO
the_DT field_NN ._. Come_VB to_TO the_DT rice_NN ._. With_IN seed_NN of_IN each_DT gender_NN ,_, come_VBN ._. Come_VB
from_IN the_DT river_NN Kho_NNP ,_, come_VBN from_IN the_DT river_NN Kaw_NNP ;_: from_IN the_DT place_NN where_WRB
they_PRP meet_VBP ,_, come_VBN ._. Come_VB from_IN the_DT West_NNP ,_, come_VBN from_IN the_DT East_NNP ._. From_IN the_DT
throat_NN of_IN the_DT bird_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT maw_NN of_IN the_DT ape_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT throat_NN of_IN the_DT
elephant_NN ._. Come_VB from_IN the_DT sources_NNS of_IN rivers_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ mouths_NNS ._. Come_VB
from_IN the_DT country_NN of_IN the_DT Shan_NNP and_CC Burman_NNP ._. From_IN the_DT distant_JJ kingdoms_NNS
come_VBN ._. From_IN all_DT granaries_NNS come_VBP ._. O_UH rice_NN -_: kelah_NN ,_, come_VBN to_TO the_DT rice_NN ."_.

The_DT Corn-mother_NN of_IN our_PRP$ European_JJ peasants_NNS has_VBZ her_PRP$ match_NN in_IN the_DT
Rice-mother_NNP of_IN the_DT Minangkabauers_NNP of_IN Sumatra_NNP ._. The_DT Minangkabauers_NNPS
definitely_RB attribute_VBP a_DT soul_NN to_TO rice_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD sometimes_RB assert_VB that_IN
rice_NN pounded_VBN in_IN the_DT usual_JJ way_NN tastes_VBZ better_JJR than_IN rice_NN ground_NN in_IN a_DT
mill_NN ,_, because_IN in_IN the_DT mill_NN the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN was_VBD so_RB bruised_VBN and_CC
battered_VBN that_IN the_DT soul_NN has_VBZ fled_VBN from_IN it_PRP ._. Like_IN the_DT Javanese_NNP they_PRP
think_VB that_IN the_DT rice_NN is_VBZ under_IN the_DT special_JJ guardianship_NN of_IN a_DT female_NN
spirit_NN called_VBD Saning_NNP Sari_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ conceived_VBN as_IN so_RB closely_RB knit_VBN up_IN
with_IN the_DT plant_NN that_IN the_DT rice_NN often_RB goes_VBZ by_IN her_PRP$ name_NN ,_, as_IN with_IN the_DT
Romans_NNS the_DT corn_NN might_MD be_VB called_VBN Ceres_NNP ._. In_IN particular_JJ Saning_NNP Sari_NNP is_VBZ
represented_VBN by_IN certain_JJ stalks_NNS or_CC grains_NNS called_VBN indoea_NN padi_NN ,_, that_WDT
is_VBZ ,_, literally_RB ,_, "_`` Mother_NNP of_IN Rice_NNP ,"_, a_DT name_NN that_WDT is_VBZ often_RB given_VBN to_TO the_DT
guardian_NN spirit_NN herself_PRP ._. This_DT so-called_JJ Mother_NNP of_IN Rice_NNP is_VBZ the_DT
occasion_NN of_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN ceremonies_NNS observed_VBN at_IN the_DT planting_NN and_CC
harvesting_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN during_IN its_PRP$ preservation_NN in_IN the_DT
barn_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT seed_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN is_VBZ about_IN to_TO be_VB sown_VBN in_IN the_DT nursery_NN
or_CC bedding-out_NN ground_NN ,_, where_WRB under_IN the_DT wet_JJ system_NN of_IN cultivation_NN it_PRP
is_VBZ regularly_RB allowed_VBN to_TO sprout_VB before_IN being_VBG transplanted_VBN to_TO the_DT
fields_NNS ,_, the_DT best_JJS grains_NNS are_VBP picked_VBN out_RP to_TO form_VB the_DT Rice-mother_NNP ._.
These_DT are_VBP then_RB sown_VBN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT bed_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT common_JJ seed_NN is_VBZ
planted_VBN round_NN about_IN them_PRP ._. The_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT Rice-mother_NNP is_VBZ supposed_VBN
to_TO exert_VB the_DT greatest_JJS influence_NN on_IN the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN ;_: if_IN she_PRP
droops_NNS or_CC pines_NNS away_RB ,_, the_DT harvest_NN will_MD be_VB bad_JJ in_IN consequence_NN ._. The_DT
woman_NN who_WP sows_VBZ the_DT Rice-mother_NNP in_IN the_DT nursery_NN lets_VBZ her_PRP$ hair_NN hang_VB
loose_JJ and_CC afterwards_RB bathes_NNS ,_, as_IN a_DT means_NN of_IN ensuring_VBG an_DT abundant_JJ
harvest_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT time_NN comes_VBZ to_TO transplant_VB the_DT rice_NN from_IN the_DT nursery_NN
to_TO the_DT field_NN ,_, the_DT Rice-mother_NNP receives_VBZ a_DT special_JJ place_NN either_CC in_IN the_DT
middle_NN or_CC in_IN a_DT corner_NN of_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT prayer_NN or_CC charm_NN is_VBZ uttered_VBN
as_IN follows_VBZ :_: "_`` Saning_NNP Sari_NNP ,_, may_MD a_DT measure_NN of_IN rice_NN come_VBN from_IN a_DT stalk_NN of_IN
rice_NN and_CC a_DT basketful_JJ from_IN a_DT root_NN ;_: may_MD you_PRP be_VB frightened_VBN neither_RB by_IN
lightning_NN nor_CC by_IN passers-by_NNS !_. Sunshine_NNP make_VBP you_PRP glad_JJ ;_: with_IN the_DT storm_NN
may_MD you_PRP be_VB at_IN peace_NN ;_: and_CC may_MD rain_VB serve_VB to_TO wash_VB your_PRP$ face_NN !"_NN While_IN
the_DT rice_NN is_VBZ growing_VBG ,_, the_DT particular_JJ plant_NN which_WDT was_VBD thus_RB treated_VBN as_IN
the_DT Rice-mother_NNP is_VBZ lost_VBN sight_NN of_IN ;_: but_CC before_IN harvest_NN another_DT
Rice-mother_NNP is_VBZ found_VBN ._. When_WRB the_DT crop_NN is_VBZ ripe_JJ for_IN cutting_VBG ,_, the_DT oldest_JJS
woman_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN or_CC a_DT sorcerer_NN goes_VBZ out_RB to_TO look_VB for_IN her_PRP ._. The_DT
first_JJ stalks_NNS seen_VBN to_TO bend_VB under_IN a_DT passing_NN breeze_NN are_VBP the_DT
Rice-mother_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP are_VBP tied_VBN together_RB but_CC not_RB cut_VB until_IN the_DT
first-fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT field_NN have_VBP been_VBN carried_VBN home_NN to_TO serve_VB as_IN a_DT
festal_JJ meal_NN for_IN the_DT family_NN and_CC their_PRP$ friends_NNS ,_, nay_RB even_RB for_IN the_DT
domestic_JJ animals_NNS ;_: since_IN it_PRP is_VBZ Saning_VBG Sari_NNP '_POS s_PRP pleasure_NN that_IN the_DT beasts_NNS
also_RB should_MD partake_VB of_IN her_PRP$ good_JJ gifts_NNS ._. After_IN the_DT meal_NN has_VBZ been_VBN
eaten_VBN ,_, the_DT Rice-mother_NNP is_VBZ fetched_VBN home_NN by_IN persons_NNS in_IN gay_JJ attire_NN ,_, who_WP
carry_VB her_PRP$ very_RB carefully_RB under_IN an_DT umbrella_NN in_IN a_DT neatly_RB worked_VBN bag_NN to_TO
the_DT barn_NN ,_, where_WRB a_DT place_NN in_IN the_DT middle_NN is_VBZ assigned_VBN to_TO her_PRP ._. Every_DT one_CD
believes_VBZ that_IN she_PRP takes_VBZ care_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN in_IN the_DT barn_NN and_CC even_RB
multiplies_NNS it_PRP not_RB uncommonly_RB ._.

When_WRB the_DT Tomori_NNP of_IN Central_NNP Celebes_NNP are_VBP about_IN to_TO plant_VB the_DT rice_NN ,_, they_PRP
bury_VB in_IN the_DT field_NN some_DT betel_NN as_IN an_DT offering_NN to_TO the_DT spirits_NNS who_WP cause_VBP
the_DT rice_NN to_TO grow_VB ._. The_DT rice_NN that_WDT is_VBZ planted_VBN round_RB this_DT spot_NN is_VBZ the_DT
last_JJ to_TO be_VB reaped_VBN at_IN harvest_NN ._. At_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT reaping_VBG the_DT
stalks_NNS of_IN this_DT patch_NN of_IN rice_NN are_VBP tied_VBN together_RB into_IN a_DT sheaf_NN ,_, which_WDT
is_VBZ called_VBN "_`` the_DT Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Rice_NN "_`` (_-LRB- ineno_JJ pae_NN ),_NN and_CC offerings_NNS in_IN
the_DT shape_NN of_IN rice_NN ,_, fowl_NN '_'' s_PRP liver_NN ,_, eggs_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ things_NNS are_VBP laid_VBN
down_RB before_IN it_PRP ._. When_WRB all_PDT the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN in_IN the_DT field_NN has_VBZ been_VBN
reaped_VBN ,_, "_'' the_DT Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Rice_NNP "_'' is_VBZ cut_VBN down_RB and_CC carried_VBD with_IN due_JJ
honour_NN to_TO the_DT rice-barn_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ laid_VBN on_IN the_DT floor_NN ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT
other_JJ sheaves_NNS are_VBP piled_VBN upon_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT Tomori_NNP ,_, we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN ,_, regard_VB the_DT
Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Rice_NNP as_IN a_DT special_JJ offering_NN made_VBN to_TO the_DT rice-spirit_NN
Omonga_NNP ,_, who_WP dwells_VBZ in_IN the_DT moon_NN ._. If_IN that_DT spirit_NN is_VBZ not_RB treated_VBN with_IN
proper_JJ respect_NN ,_, for_IN example_NN if_IN the_DT people_NNS who_WP fetch_VBP rice_NN from_IN the_DT
barn_NN are_VBP not_RB decently_RB clad_VBN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ angry_JJ and_CC punishes_VBZ the_DT offenders_NNS

keep_VB her_PRP carefully_RB ,_, lest_IN in_IN her_PRP$ absence_NN the_DT garnered_JJ store_NN of_IN rice_NN
should_MD all_DT melt_VBN away_RB and_CC disappear_VBP ._.

Again_RB ,_, just_RB as_IN in_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT old_JJ and_CC the_DT young_JJ spirit_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN
are_VBP represented_VBN as_IN an_DT Old_NNP Wife_NNP (_-LRB- Cailleach_NNP )_-RRB- and_CC a_DT Maiden_NNP
respectively_RB ,_, so_RB in_IN the_DT Malay_NNP Peninsula_NNP we_PRP find_VBP both_DT the_DT Rice-mother_NN
and_CC her_PRP$ child_NN represented_VBN by_IN different_JJ sheaves_NNS or_CC bundles_NNS of_IN ears_NNS on_IN
the_DT harvest-field_NN ._. The_DT ceremony_NN of_IN cutting_NN and_CC bringing_VBG home_NN the_DT
Soul_NNP of_IN the_DT Rice_NNP was_VBD witnessed_VBN by_IN Mr_NNP ._. W_NNP ._. W_NNP ._. Skeat_NNP at_IN Chodoi_NNP in_IN
Selangor_NNP on_IN the_DT twenty-eighth_NN of_IN January_NNP 1897._CD The_DT particular_JJ bunch_NN
or_CC sheaf_NN which_WDT was_VBD to_TO serve_VB as_IN the_DT Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Rice-soul_NNP had_VBD

also_RB to_TO its_PRP$ parent_NN ,_, the_DT sheaf_NN from_IN whose_WP$ body_NN it_PRP was_VBD taken_VBN ._. This_DT

been_VBN carried_VBN home_NN and_CC put_VBD to_TO bed_NN ,_, is_VBZ treated_VBN as_IN a_DT newly-made_JJ mother_NN ;_:
that_DT is_VBZ to_TO say_VB ,_, young_JJ shoots_NNS of_IN trees_NNS are_VBP pounded_VBN together_RB and_CC

Some_DT grains_NNS from_IN the_DT Rice-soul_NNP are_VBP mixed_VBN with_IN the_DT seed_NN which_WDT is_VBZ to_TO
be_VB sown_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ year_NN ._. In_IN this_DT Rice-mother_JJ and_CC Rice-child_NNP of_IN

Once_RB more_RBR ,_, the_DT European_JJ custom_NN of_IN representing_VBG the_DT corn-spirit_NN in_IN

padi-peengant_JJ �_VBD n_RB ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, the_DT Rice-bride_NNP and_CC the_DT Rice-bridegroom_NNP ;_:

rice_NN ,_, to_TO represent_VB the_DT wedding_NN guests_NNS ,_, are_VBP placed_VBN beside_IN the_DT
Rice-bride_NNP and_CC the_DT Rice-bridegroom_NNP ._. Not_RB till_IN this_DT has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN may_MD

In_IN the_DT islands_NNS of_IN Bali_NNP and_CC Lombok_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT time_NN of_IN harvest_NN has_VBZ
come_VBN ,_, the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT field_NN himself_PRP makes_VBZ a_DT beginning_NN by_IN cutting_VBG
"_`` the_DT principal_JJ rice_NN "_'' with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ hands_NNS and_CC binding_NN it_PRP into_IN two_CD
sheaves_NNS ,_, each_DT composed_VBN of_IN one_CD hundred_CD and_CC eight_CD stalks_NNS with_IN their_PRP$
leaves_NNS attached_VBN to_TO them_PRP ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT sheaves_NNS represents_VBZ a_DT man_NN and_CC the_DT
other_JJ a_DT woman_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP are_VBP called_VBN "_`` husband_NN and_CC wife_NN ."_IN The_DT male_NN

sheaf_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT rice_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN home_NN from_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, the_DT two_CD sheaves_NNS
representing_VBG the_DT husband_NN and_CC wife_NN are_VBP carried_VBN by_IN a_DT woman_NN on_IN her_PRP$

rice-straw_NN ._. The_DT whole_JJ arrangement_NN ,_, we_PRP are_VBP informed_VBN ,_, has_VBZ for_IN its_PRP$
object_NN to_TO induce_VB the_DT rice_NN to_TO increase_VB and_CC multiply_VB in_IN the_DT granary_JJ ,_,
so_RB that_IN the_DT owner_NN may_MD get_VB more_JJR out_IN of_IN it_PRP than_IN he_PRP put_VBD in_RP ._. Hence_RB when_WRB
the_DT people_NNS of_IN Bali_NNP bring_VBP the_DT two_CD sheaves_NNS ,_, the_DT husband_NN and_CC wife_NN ,_, into_IN
the_DT barn_NN ,_, they_PRP say_VBP ,_, "_`` Increase_VB ye_PRP and_CC multiply_VB without_IN ceasing_VBG ."_. When_WRB
all_PDT the_DT rice_NN in_IN the_DT barn_NN has_VBZ been_VBN used_VBN up_RB ,_, the_DT two_CD sheaves_NNS
representing_VBG the_DT husband_NN and_CC wife_NN remain_VBP in_IN the_DT empty_JJ building_NN till_IN
they_PRP have_VBP gradually_RB disappeared_VBN or_CC been_VBN devoured_VBN by_IN mice_NNS ._. The_DT pinch_NN
of_IN hunger_NN sometimes_RB drives_VBZ individuals_NNS to_TO eat_VB up_RP the_DT rice_NN of_IN these_DT
two_CD sheaves_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT wretches_NNS who_WP do_VBP so_RB are_VBP viewed_VBN with_IN disgust_NN by_IN
their_PRP$ fellows_NNS and_CC branded_JJ as_IN pigs_NNS and_CC dogs_NNS ._. Nobody_NN would_MD ever_RB sell_VB
these_DT holy_JJ sheaves_NNS with_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN their_PRP$ profane_JJ brethren_NNS ._.

The_DT same_JJ notion_NN of_IN the_DT propagation_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN by_IN a_DT male_JJ and_CC female_JJ
power_NN finds_VBZ expression_NN amongst_IN the_DT Szis_NNP of_IN Upper_NNP Burma_NNP ._. When_WRB the_DT
paddy_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, the_DT rice_NN with_IN the_DT husks_NNS still_RB on_IN it_PRP ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN dried_VBN
and_CC piled_VBD in_IN a_DT heap_NN for_IN threshing_NN ,_, all_DT the_DT friends_NNS of_IN the_DT household_NN
are_VBP invited_VBN to_TO the_DT threshing-floor_NN ,_, and_CC food_NN and_CC drink_NN are_VBP brought_VBN
out_RB ._. The_DT heap_NN of_IN paddy_NN is_VBZ divided_VBN and_CC one_CD half_NN spread_VBD out_RP for_IN

and_CC spirits_NNS are_VBP set_VBN ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN the_DT elders_NNS ,_, addressing_VBG "_`` the_DT father_NN
and_CC mother_NN of_IN the_DT paddy-plant_NN ,"_NN prays_NNS for_IN plenteous_JJ harvests_NNS in_IN
future_NN ,_, and_CC begs_VBZ that_IN the_DT seed_NN may_MD bear_VB many_JJ fold_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT whole_NN
party_NN eat_VB ,_, drink_VB ,_, and_CC make_VB merry_JJ ._. This_DT ceremony_NN at_IN the_DT
threshing-floor_NN is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ occasion_NN when_WRB these_DT people_NNS invoke_VB "_'' the_DT
father_NN and_CC mother_NN of_IN the_DT paddy_NN ."_.



3._DT The_DT Spirit_NNP of_IN the_DT Corn_NNP embodied_VBD in_IN Human_NNP Beings_NNP

THUS_PRP the_DT theory_NN which_WDT recognises_VBZ in_IN the_DT European_JJ Corn-mother_NN ,_,
Corn-maiden_NNP ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ,_, the_DT embodiment_NN in_IN vegetable_NN form_NN of_IN the_DT
animating_NN spirit_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS is_VBZ amply_RB confirmed_VBN by_IN the_DT evidence_NN of_IN
peoples_NNS in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, because_IN they_PRP have_VBP lagged_VBN
behind_IN the_DT European_JJ races_NNS in_IN mental_JJ development_NN ,_, retain_VB for_IN that_WDT
very_RB reason_NN a_DT keener_NN sense_NN of_IN the_DT original_JJ motives_NNS for_IN observing_VBG
those_DT rustic_JJ rites_NNS which_WDT among_IN ourselves_PRP have_VBP sunk_VBN to_TO the_DT level_NN of_IN
meaningless_JJ survivals_NNS ._. The_DT reader_NN may_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, remember_VBP that_IN
according_VBG to_TO Mannhardt_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ theory_NN I_PRP am_VBP expounding_VBG ,_, the_DT spirit_NN of_IN
the_DT corn_NN manifests_NNS itself_PRP not_RB merely_RB in_IN vegetable_NN but_CC also_RB in_IN human_NN
form_NN ;_: the_DT person_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN or_CC gives_VBZ the_DT last_JJ stroke_NN at_IN
threshing_NN passes_VBZ for_IN a_DT temporary_JJ embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, just_RB
as_RB much_RB as_IN the_DT bunch_NN of_IN corn_NN which_WDT he_PRP reaps_VBD or_CC threshes_NNS ._. Now_RB in_IN the_DT
parallels_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN hitherto_VBN adduced_VBN from_IN the_DT customs_NNS of_IN
peoples_NNS outside_IN Europe_NNP the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS appears_VBZ only_RB in_IN
vegetable_NN form_NN ._. It_PRP remains_VBZ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, to_TO prove_VB that_IN other_JJ races_NNS
besides_IN our_PRP$ European_JJ peasantry_NN have_VBP conceived_VBN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT
crops_NNS as_IN incorporate_NN in_IN or_CC represented_VBN by_IN living_VBG men_NNS and_CC women_NNS ._. Such_PDT
a_DT proof_NN ,_, I_PRP may_MD remind_VB the_DT reader_NN ,_, is_VBZ germane_NN to_TO the_DT theme_NN of_IN this_DT
book_NN ;_: for_IN the_DT more_JJR instances_NNS we_PRP discover_VBP of_IN human_JJ beings_NNS
representing_VBG in_IN themselves_PRP the_DT life_NN or_CC animating_NN spirit_NN of_IN plants_NNS ,_,
the_DT less_JJR difficulty_NN will_MD be_VB felt_VBN at_IN classing_VBG amongst_IN them_PRP the_DT King_NNP
of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP at_IN Nemi_NNP ._.

The_DT Mandans_NNP and_CC Minnitarees_NNP of_IN North_NNP America_NNP used_VBD to_TO hold_VB a_DT festival_NN
in_IN spring_NN which_WDT they_PRP called_VBD the_DT corn-medicine_JJ festival_NN of_IN the_DT women_NNS ._.
They_PRP thought_VBD that_IN a_DT certain_JJ Old_NNP Woman_NN who_WP Never_RB Dies_NNP made_VBD the_DT crops_NNS
to_TO grow_VB ,_, and_CC that_IN ,_, living_VBG somewhere_RB in_IN the_DT south_NN ,_, she_PRP sent_VBD the_DT
migratory_JJ waterfowl_NN in_IN spring_NN as_IN her_PRP$ tokens_NNS and_CC representatives_NNS ._.
Each_DT sort_NN of_IN bird_NN represented_VBN a_DT special_JJ kind_NN of_IN crop_NN cultivated_VBN by_IN
the_DT Indians_NNPS :_: the_DT wild_JJ goose_NN stood_VBD for_IN the_DT maize_NN ,_, the_DT wild_JJ swan_NN for_IN
the_DT gourds_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT wild_JJ duck_NN for_IN the_DT beans_NNS ._. So_RB when_WRB the_DT feathered_VBN
messengers_NNS of_IN the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NNP began_VBD to_TO arrive_VB in_IN spring_NN the_DT Indians_NNPS
celebrated_VBN the_DT corn-medicine_JJ festival_NN of_IN the_DT women_NNS ._. Scaffolds_NNP were_VBD
set_VBN up_RP ,_, on_IN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS hung_VBD dried_JJ meat_NN and_CC other_JJ things_NNS by_IN way_NN
of_IN offerings_NNS to_TO the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN a_DT certain_JJ day_NN the_DT old_JJ women_NNS of_IN
the_DT tribe_NN ,_, as_IN representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NN who_WP Never_RB Dies_NNP ,_,
assembled_VBN at_IN the_DT scaffolds_NNS each_DT bearing_NN in_IN her_PRP$ hand_NN an_DT ear_NN of_IN maize_NN
fastened_VBN to_TO a_DT stick_NN ._. They_PRP first_RB planted_VBD these_DT sticks_NNS in_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_,
then_RB danced_VBD round_RB the_DT scaffolds_NNS ,_, and_CC finally_RB took_VBD up_RP the_DT sticks_NNS
again_RB in_IN their_PRP$ arms_NNS ._. Meanwhile_RB old_JJ men_NNS beat_VBD drums_NNS and_CC shook_VBD rattles_NNS
as_IN a_DT musical_JJ accompaniment_NN to_TO the_DT performance_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ women_NNS ._.
Further_RB ,_, young_JJ women_NNS came_VBD and_CC put_VBD dried_VBN flesh_NN into_IN the_DT mouths_NNS of_IN the_DT
old_JJ women_NNS ,_, for_IN which_WDT they_PRP received_VBD in_IN return_NN a_DT grain_NN of_IN the_DT
consecrated_VBN maize_NN to_TO eat_VB ._. Three_CD or_CC four_CD grains_NNS of_IN the_DT holy_JJ corn_NN were_VBD
also_RB placed_VBD in_IN the_DT dishes_NNS of_IN the_DT young_JJ women_NNS ,_, to_TO be_VB afterwards_RB
carefully_RB mixed_VBN with_IN the_DT seed-corn_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO
fertilise_NN ._. The_DT dried_VBN flesh_NN hung_VBN on_IN the_DT scaffold_NN belonged_VBD to_TO the_DT old_JJ
women_NNS ,_, because_IN they_PRP represented_VBD the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NN who_WP Never_RB Dies_NNP ._. A_DT
similar_JJ corn-medicine_JJ festival_NN was_VBD held_VBN in_IN autumn_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN
attracting_VBG the_DT herds_NNS of_IN buffaloes_NNS and_CC securing_VBG a_DT supply_NN of_IN meat_NN ._. At_IN
that_DT time_NN every_DT woman_NN carried_VBN in_IN her_PRP$ arms_NNS an_DT uprooted_JJ plant_NN of_IN
maize_NN ._. They_PRP gave_VBD the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NN who_WP Never_RB Dies_NNP both_DT to_TO
the_DT maize_NN and_CC to_TO those_DT birds_NNS which_WDT they_PRP regarded_VBD as_IN symbols_NNS of_IN the_DT
fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP prayed_VBD to_TO them_PRP in_IN autumn_NN saying_VBG ,_,
"_`` Mother_NNP ,_, have_VBP pity_NN on_IN us_PRP !_. send_VB us_PRP not_RB the_DT bitter_JJ cold_NN too_RB soon_RB ,_, lest_IN
we_PRP have_VBP not_RB meat_NN enough_RB !_. let_VB not_RB all_PDT the_DT game_NN depart_NN ,_, that_IN we_PRP may_MD
have_VB something_NN for_IN the_DT winter_NN !"_NN In_IN autumn_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT birds_NNS were_VBD
flying_VBG south_RB ,_, the_DT Indians_NNPS thought_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD going_VBG home_NN to_TO the_DT
Old_NNP Woman_NNP and_CC taking_VBG to_TO her_PRP$ the_DT offerings_NNS that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN hung_VBN up_RP on_IN
the_DT scaffolds_NNS ,_, especially_RB the_DT dried_JJ meat_NN ,_, which_WDT she_PRP ate_VBD ._. Here_RB then_RB
we_PRP have_VBP the_DT spirit_NN or_CC divinity_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN conceived_VBD as_IN an_DT Old_NNP Woman_NN
and_CC represented_VBD in_IN bodily_JJ form_NN by_IN old_JJ women_NNS ,_, who_WP in_IN their_PRP$ capacity_NN
of_IN representatives_NNS receive_VBP some_DT at_IN least_JJS of_IN the_DT offerings_NNS which_WDT are_VBP
intended_VBN for_IN her_PRP ._.

In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP the_DT harvest-goddess_NN Gauri_NNP is_VBZ represented_VBN at_IN
once_RB by_IN an_DT unmarried_JJ girl_NN and_CC by_IN a_DT bundle_NN of_IN wild_JJ balsam_NN plants_NNS ,_,
which_WDT is_VBZ made_VBN up_RP into_IN the_DT figure_NN of_IN a_DT woman_NN and_CC dressed_VBN as_IN such_JJ with_IN
mask_NN ,_, garments_NNS ,_, and_CC ornaments_NNS ._. Both_DT the_DT human_NN and_CC the_DT vegetable_NN
representative_NN of_IN the_DT goddess_NN are_VBP worshipped_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT intention_NN of_IN
the_DT whole_JJ ceremony_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB to_TO ensure_VB a_DT good_JJ crop_NN of_IN rice_NN ._.



4._DT The_DT Double_NNP Personification_NNP of_IN the_DT Corn_NNP as_IN Mother_NNP and_CC Daughter_NNP

COMPARED_VBN with_IN the_DT Corn-mother_NN of_IN Germany_NNP and_CC the_DT Harvest-maiden_NNP of_IN
Scotland_NNP ,_, the_DT Demeter_NNP and_CC Persephone_NNP of_IN Greece_NNP are_VBP late_JJ products_NNS of_IN
religious_JJ growth_NN ._. Yet_RB as_IN members_NNS of_IN the_DT Aryan_NNP family_NN the_DT Greeks_NNP must_MD
at_IN one_CD time_NN or_CC another_DT have_VBP observed_VBN harvest_NN customs_NNS like_IN those_DT
which_WDT are_VBP still_RB practised_VBN by_IN Celts_NNP ,_, Teutons_NNP ,_, and_CC Slavs_NNP ,_, and_CC which_WDT ,_,
far_RB beyond_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT Aryan_JJ world_NN ,_, have_VBP been_VBN practised_VBN by_IN the_DT
Indians_NNPS of_IN Peru_NNP and_CC many_JJ peoples_NNS of_IN the_DT East_NNP Indies_NNP --_: a_DT sufficient_JJ

any_DT one_CD race_NN ,_, but_CC naturally_RB suggest_VBP themselves_PRP to_TO all_DT untutored_JJ
peoples_NNS engaged_VBN in_IN agriculture_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, that_IN

still_RB prevail_VBP among_IN our_PRP$ modern_JJ peasantry_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP were_VBD

(_-LRB- Kore_NNP )_-RRB- by_IN which_WDT Persephone_NNP was_VBD commonly_RB known_VBN ._. Thus_RB if_IN the_DT

unfortunately_RB the_DT Demeter_NNP and_CC Persephone_NNP whom_WP we_PRP know_VBP were_VBD the_DT

were_VBD beneath_IN their_PRP$ notice_NN ._. Even_RB if_IN they_PRP noticed_VBD them_PRP ,_, they_PRP probably_RB
never_RB dreamed_VBD of_IN any_DT connexion_NN between_IN the_DT puppet_NN of_IN corn-stalks_NNS on_IN

In_IN this_DT Prussian_NNP custom_NN the_DT pretended_VBN mother_NN represents_VBZ the_DT

life_NN into_IN the_DT languid_NN or_CC decaying_VBG energies_NNS of_IN nature_NN ._. Another_DT

farther_RB on_IN ,_, when_WRB we_PRP come_VBP to_TO deal_VB with_IN another_DT aspect_NN of_IN those_DT

The_DT reader_NN may_MD have_VB observed_VBN that_IN in_IN modern_JJ folk-customs_NNS the_DT
corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ generally_RB represented_VBN either_CC by_IN a_DT Corn-mother_JJ (_-LRB- Old_NNP
Woman_NN ,_, etc_FW .)_, or_CC by_IN a_DT Maiden_NNP (_-LRB- Harvest-child_NNP ,_, etc_FW .),_. not_RB both_DT by_IN a_DT
Corn-mother_JJ and_CC by_IN a_DT Maiden_NNP ._. Why_WRB then_RB did_VBD the_DT Greeks_NNS represent_VBP the_DT
corn_NN both_DT as_IN a_DT mother_NN and_CC a_DT daughter_NN ?_.

In_IN the_DT Breton_NNP custom_NN the_DT mother-sheaf_NN --_: a_DT large_JJ figure_NN made_VBD out_IN of_IN
the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN with_IN a_DT small_JJ corn-doll_NN inside_IN of_IN it_PRP --_: clearly_RB
represents_VBZ both_DT the_DT Corn-mother_NN and_CC the_DT Corn-daughter_NNP ,_, the_DT latter_NN
still_RB unborn_JJ ._. Again_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT Prussian_NNP custom_NN just_RB referred_VBD to_TO ,_, the_DT
woman_NN who_WP plays_VBZ the_DT part_NN of_IN Corn-mother_NNP represents_VBZ the_DT ripe_JJ grain_NN ;_:
the_DT child_NN appears_VBZ to_TO represent_VB next_JJ year_NN '_POS s_VBZ corn_NN ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB
regarded_VBN ,_, naturally_RB enough_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT child_NN of_IN this_DT year_NN '_POS s_PRP corn_NN ,_, since_IN
it_PRP is_VBZ from_IN the_DT seed_NN of_IN this_DT year_NN '_'' s_PRP harvest_VBP that_DT next_JJ year_NN '_POS s_PRP crop_NN
will_MD spring_VB ._. Further_RB ,_, we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN among_IN the_DT Malays_NNS of_IN the_DT

of_IN the_DT grain_NN is_VBZ represented_VBN in_IN double_JJ female_JJ form_NN ,_, both_DT as_IN old_JJ and_CC
young_JJ ,_, by_IN means_NNS of_IN ears_NNS taken_VBN alike_RB from_IN the_DT ripe_JJ crop_NN :_: in_IN Scotland_NNP
the_DT old_JJ spirit_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN appears_VBZ as_IN the_DT Carline_NNP or_CC Cailleach_NNP ,_,
the_DT young_JJ spirit_NN as_IN the_DT Maiden_NNP ;_: while_IN among_IN the_DT Malays_NNS of_IN the_DT

other_JJ as_IN mother_NN and_CC child_NN ._. Judged_'' by_IN these_DT analogies_NNS Demeter_NN would_MD
be_VB the_DT ripe_JJ crop_NN of_IN this_DT year_NN ;_: Persephone_NNP would_MD be_VB the_DT seed-corn_NN
taken_VBN from_IN it_PRP and_CC sown_VBN in_IN autumn_NN ,_, to_TO reappear_VB in_IN spring_NN ._. The_DT descent_NN
of_IN Persephone_NNP into_IN the_DT lower_JJR world_NN would_MD thus_RB be_VB a_DT mythical_JJ

would_MD signify_VB the_DT sprouting_NN of_IN the_DT young_JJ corn_NN ._. In_IN this_DT way_NN the_DT
Persephone_NNP of_IN one_CD year_NN becomes_VBZ the_DT Demeter_NNP of_IN the_DT next_JJ ,_, and_CC this_DT may_MD
very_RB well_RB have_VB been_VBN the_DT original_JJ form_NN of_IN the_DT myth_NN ._. But_CC when_WRB with_IN the_DT
advance_NN of_IN religious_JJ thought_NN the_DT corn_NN came_VBD to_TO be_VB personified_VBN no_RB
longer_RB as_IN a_DT being_NN that_WDT went_VBD through_IN the_DT whole_JJ cycle_NN of_IN birth_NN ,_,

the_DT mother_NN or_CC the_DT daughter_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB sacrificed_VBN ._. However_RB ,_, the_DT
double_JJ conception_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN as_IN mother_NN and_CC daughter_NN may_MD have_VB been_VBN
too_RB old_JJ and_CC too_RB deeply_RB rooted_VBN in_IN the_DT popular_JJ mind_NN to_TO be_VB eradicated_VBN
by_IN logic_NN ,_, and_CC so_IN room_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT reformed_JJ myth_NN both_DT for_IN
mother_NN and_CC daughter_NN ._. This_DT was_VBD done_VBN by_IN assigning_VBG to_TO Persephone_VB the_DT
character_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN sown_NN in_IN autumn_NN and_CC sprouting_VBG in_IN spring_NN ,_, while_IN
Demeter_NNP was_VBD left_VBN to_TO play_VB the_DT somewhat_RB vague_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT heavy_JJ mother_NN
of_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, who_WP laments_VBZ its_PRP$ annual_JJ disappearance_NN underground_RB ,_, and_CC
rejoices_NNS over_IN its_PRP$ reappearance_NN in_IN spring_NN ._. Thus_RB instead_RB of_IN a_DT regular_JJ
succession_NN of_IN divine_JJ beings_NNS ,_, each_DT living_VBG a_DT year_NN and_CC then_RB giving_VBG
birth_NN to_TO her_PRP$ successor_NN ,_, the_DT reformed_JJ myth_NN exhibits_VBZ the_DT conception_NN of_IN
two_CD divine_JJ and_CC immortal_JJ beings_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN whom_WP annually_RB disappears_VBZ into_IN
and_CC reappears_NNS from_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT other_JJ has_VBZ little_RB to_TO do_VB but_CC
to_TO weep_VB and_CC rejoice_VB at_IN the_DT appropriate_JJ seasons_NNS ._.

This_DT theory_NN of_IN the_DT double_JJ personification_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN in_IN Greek_NNP myth_NN
assumes_VBZ that_IN both_DT personifications_NNS (_-LRB- Demeter_NNP and_CC Persephone_NNP )_-RRB- are_VBP
original_JJ ._. But_CC if_IN we_PRP suppose_VBP that_IN the_DT Greek_NNP myth_NN started_VBN with_IN a_DT
single_JJ personification_NN ,_, the_DT aftergrowth_NN of_IN a_DT second_JJ personification_NN
may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB explained_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ ._. On_IN looking_VBG over_IN the_DT harvest_NN
customs_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN passed_VBN under_IN review_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB noticed_VBN that_IN
they_PRP involve_VBP two_CD distinct_JJ conceptions_NNS of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ._. For_IN
whereas_IN in_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT customs_NNS the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ treated_VBN as_IN
immanent_JJ in_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, in_IN others_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN external_JJ to_TO it_PRP ._.
Thus_RB when_WRB a_DT particular_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ called_VBN by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT

spirit_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT crops_NNS grow_VBP by_IN passing_VBG through_IN them_PRP ,_, or_CC to_TO
blight_NN the_DT grain_NN of_IN those_DT against_IN whom_WP she_PRP has_VBZ a_DT grudge_NN ,_, she_PRP is_VBZ
apparently_RB conceived_VBD as_IN distinct_JJ from_IN ,_, though_IN exercising_VBG power_NN over_RB ,_,
the_DT corn_NN ._. Conceived_VBN in_IN the_DT latter_JJ mode_NN the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ in_IN a_DT fair_JJ
way_NN to_TO become_VB a_DT deity_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, if_IN she_PRP has_VBZ not_RB become_VBN so_RB already_RB ._.
Of_IN these_DT two_CD conceptions_NNS ,_, that_IN of_IN the_DT cornspirit_NN as_IN immanent_JJ in_IN the_DT
corn_NN is_VBZ doubtless_RB the_DT older_JJR ,_, since_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN nature_NN as_IN animated_VBN by_IN
indwelling_VBG spirits_NNS appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB generally_RB preceded_VBN the_DT view_NN of_IN it_PRP
as_IN controlled_VBN by_IN external_JJ deities_NNS ;_: to_TO put_VB it_PRP shortly_RB ,_, animism_NN
precedes_NNS deism_NN ._. In_IN the_DT harvest_NN customs_NNS of_IN our_PRP$ European_JJ peasantry_NN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB conceived_VBN now_RB as_IN immanent_JJ in_IN the_DT corn_NN and_CC
now_RB as_IN external_JJ to_TO it_PRP ._. In_IN Greek_NNP mythology_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_,
Demeter_NNP is_VBZ viewed_VBN rather_RB as_IN the_DT deity_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN than_IN as_IN the_DT spirit_NN
immanent_JJ in_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT process_NN of_IN thought_NN which_WDT leads_VBZ to_TO the_DT change_NN
from_IN the_DT one_CD mode_NN of_IN conception_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ is_VBZ anthropomorphism_NN ,_, or_CC
the_DT gradual_JJ investment_NN of_IN the_DT immanent_JJ spirits_NNS with_IN more_JJR and_CC more_JJR of_IN
the_DT attributes_NNS of_IN humanity_NN ._. As_IN men_NNS emerge_VBP from_IN savagery_RB the_DT tendency_NN
to_TO humanise_VB their_PRP$ divinities_NNS gains_NNS strength_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT more_RBR human_JJ
these_DT become_VBP the_DT wider_JJR is_VBZ the_DT breach_NN which_WDT severs_VBZ them_PRP from_IN the_DT
natural_JJ objects_NNS of_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD at_IN first_JJ merely_RB the_DT animating_NN

the_DT same_JJ generation_NN do_VB not_RB march_VB abreast_RB ;_: and_CC though_IN the_DT new_JJ
anthropomorphic_JJ gods_NNS may_MD satisfy_VB the_DT religious_JJ wants_NNS of_IN the_DT more_RBR

spirit_NN of_IN any_DT natural_JJ object_NN such_JJ as_IN the_DT corn_NN has_VBZ been_VBN invested_VBN with_IN

deity_NN controlling_VBG it_PRP ,_, the_DT object_NN itself_PRP is_VBZ ,_, by_IN the_DT withdrawal_NN of_IN its_PRP$
spirit_NN ,_, left_VBD inanimate_NN ;_: it_PRP becomes_VBZ ,_, so_RB to_TO say_VB ,_, a_DT spiritual_JJ vacuum_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT popular_JJ fancy_JJ ,_, intolerant_JJ of_IN such_JJ a_DT vacuum_NN ,_, in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_,

the_DT same_JJ natural_JJ object_NN comes_VBZ to_TO be_VB represented_VBN in_IN mythology_NN by_IN two_CD
