created_VBN by_IN the_DT popular_JJ fancy_NN to_TO supply_VB the_DT place_NN vacated_VBN by_IN the_DT old_JJ
spirit_NN on_IN its_PRP$ elevation_NN to_TO a_DT higher_JJR sphere_NN ._. In_IN such_JJ cases_NNS the_DT
problem_NN for_IN mythology_NN is_VBZ ,_, having_VBG got_VBD two_CD distinct_JJ personifications_NNS
of_IN the_DT same_JJ object_NN ,_, what_WP to_TO do_VB with_IN them_PRP ?_. How_WRB are_VBP their_PRP$ relations_NNS to_TO
each_DT other_JJ to_TO be_VB adjusted_VBN ,_, and_CC room_NN found_VBD for_IN both_DT in_IN the_DT
mythological_JJ system_NN ?_. When_WRB the_DT old_JJ spirit_NN or_CC new_JJ deity_NN is_VBZ conceived_VBN
as_IN creating_VBG or_CC producing_VBG the_DT object_NN in_IN question_NN ,_, the_DT problem_NN is_VBZ
easily_RB solved_VBN ._. Since_IN the_DT object_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO be_VB produced_VBN by_IN the_DT
old_JJ spirit_NN ,_, and_CC animated_VBN by_IN the_DT new_JJ one_CD ,_, the_DT latter_JJ ,_, as_IN the_DT soul_NN of_IN
the_DT object_NN ,_, must_MD also_RB owe_VB its_PRP$ existence_NN to_TO the_DT former_JJ ;_: thus_RB the_DT old_JJ
spirit_NN will_MD stand_VB to_TO the_DT new_JJ one_CD as_IN producer_NN to_TO produced_VBN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_,
in_IN mythology_NN ,_, as_IN parent_NN to_TO child_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN both_DT spirits_NNS are_VBP conceived_VBN
as_IN female_NN ,_, their_PRP$ relation_NN will_MD be_VB that_DT of_IN mother_NN and_CC daughter_NN ._. In_IN
this_DT way_NN ,_, starting_VBG from_IN a_DT single_JJ personification_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN as_IN
female_NN ,_, mythic_JJ fancy_JJ might_NN in_IN time_NN reach_VBP a_DT double_JJ personification_NN of_IN
it_PRP as_IN mother_NN and_CC daughter_NN ._. It_PRP would_MD be_VB very_RB rash_JJ to_TO affirm_VB that_IN this_DT
was_VBD the_DT way_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT myth_NN of_IN Demeter_NNP and_CC Persephone_NNP actually_RB
took_VBD shape_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ a_DT legitimate_JJ conjecture_NN that_IN the_DT
reduplication_NN of_IN deities_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT Demeter_NNP and_CC Persephone_NNP furnish_VBP an_DT
example_NN ,_, may_MD sometimes_RB have_VB arisen_VBN in_IN the_DT way_NN indicated_VBN ._. For_IN
example_NN ,_, among_IN the_DT pairs_NNS of_IN deities_NNS dealt_VBN with_IN in_IN a_DT former_JJ part_NN of_IN
this_DT work_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN shown_VBN that_IN there_EX are_VBP grounds_NNS for_IN regarding_VBG
both_DT Isis_NNP and_CC her_PRP$ companion_NN god_NN Osiris_NNP as_IN personifications_NNS of_IN the_DT
corn_NN ._. On_IN the_DT hypothesis_NN just_RB suggested_VBD ,_, Isis_NNP would_MD be_VB the_DT old_JJ
corn-spirit_NN ,_, and_CC Osiris_NNP would_MD be_VB the_DT newer_JJR one_NN ,_, whose_WP$ relationship_NN
to_TO the_DT old_JJ spirit_NN was_VBD variously_RB explained_VBN as_IN that_DT of_IN brother_NN ,_,
husband_NN ,_, and_CC son_NN ;_: for_IN of_IN course_NN mythology_NN would_MD always_RB be_VB free_JJ to_TO
account_NN for_IN the_DT coexistence_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD divinities_NNS in_IN more_JJR ways_NNS than_IN
one_CD ._. It_PRP must_MD not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB forgotten_VBN that_IN this_DT proposed_VBN
explanation_NN of_IN such_JJ pairs_NNS of_IN deities_NNS as_IN Demeter_NNP and_CC Persephone_NNP or_CC
Isis_NNP and_CC Osiris_NNP is_VBZ purely_RB conjectural_JJ ,_, and_CC is_VBZ only_RB given_VBN for_IN what_WP it_PRP
is_VBZ worth_JJ ._.




XLVII_NNP ._. Lityerses_NNS



1._DT Songs_NNP of_IN the_DT Corn_NNP Reapers_NNS

IN_IN THE_DT PRECEDING_NN pages_NNS an_DT attempt_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN to_TO show_VB that_IN in_IN the_DT
Corn-mother_JJ and_CC Harvest-maiden_NNP of_IN Northern_NNP Europe_NNP we_PRP have_VBP the_DT
prototypes_NNS of_IN Demeter_NNP and_CC Persephone_NNP ._. But_CC an_DT essential_JJ feature_NN is_VBZ
still_RB wanting_VBG to_TO complete_VB the_DT resemblance_NN ._. A_DT leading_VBG incident_NN in_IN the_DT
Greek_NNP myth_NN is_VBZ the_DT death_NN and_CC resurrection_NN of_IN Persephone_NNP ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ this_DT
incident_NN which_WDT ,_, coupled_VBN with_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT goddess_NN as_IN a_DT deity_NN of_IN
vegetation_NN ,_, links_VBZ the_DT myth_NN with_IN the_DT cults_NNS of_IN Adonis_NNP ,_, Attis_NNP ,_, Osiris_NNP ,_,
and_CC Dionysus_NNP ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN virtue_NN of_IN this_DT incident_NN that_IN the_DT myth_NN
finds_VBZ a_DT place_NN in_IN our_PRP$ discussion_NN of_IN the_DT Dying_NNP God_NNP ._. It_PRP remains_VBZ ,_,
therefore_RB ,_, to_TO see_VB whether_IN the_DT conception_NN of_IN the_DT annual_JJ death_NN and_CC
resurrection_NN of_IN a_DT god_NN ,_, which_WDT figures_VBZ so_RB prominently_RB in_IN these_DT great_JJ
Greek_NNP and_CC Oriental_NNP worships_NNS ,_, has_VBZ not_RB also_RB its_PRP$ origin_NN or_CC its_PRP$ analogy_NN
in_IN the_DT rustic_JJ rites_NNS observed_VBN by_IN reapers_NNS and_CC vine-dressers_NNS amongst_IN
the_DT corn-shocks_NNS and_CC the_DT vines_NNS ._.

Our_PRP$ general_JJ ignorance_NN of_IN the_DT popular_JJ superstitions_NNS and_CC customs_NNS of_IN
the_DT ancients_NNS has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN confessed_VBN ._. But_CC the_DT obscurity_NN which_WDT
thus_RB hangs_VBZ over_IN the_DT first_JJ beginnings_NNS of_IN ancient_JJ religion_NN is_VBZ
fortunately_RB dissipated_VBN to_TO some_DT extent_NN in_IN the_DT present_JJ case_NN ._. The_DT
worships_NNS of_IN Osiris_NNP ,_, Adonis_NNP ,_, and_CC Attis_NNP had_VBD their_PRP$ respective_JJ seats_NNS ,_, as_IN
we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, in_IN Egypt_NNP ,_, Syria_NNP ,_, and_CC Phrygia_NNP ;_: and_CC in_IN each_DT of_IN these_DT
countries_NNS certain_JJ harvest_NN and_CC vintage_JJ customs_NNS are_VBP known_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN
observed_VBN ,_, the_DT resemblance_NN of_IN which_WDT to_TO each_DT other_JJ and_CC to_TO the_DT national_JJ
rites_NNS struck_VBD the_DT ancients_NNS themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC ,_, compared_VBN with_IN the_DT harvest_NN
customs_NNS of_IN modern_JJ peasants_NNS and_CC barbarians_NNS ,_, seems_VBZ to_TO throw_VB some_DT light_NN
on_IN the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT rites_NNS in_IN question_NN ._.

It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN already_RB mentioned_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT authority_NN of_IN Diodorus_NNP ,_, that_IN in_IN
ancient_JJ Egypt_NNP the_DT reapers_NNS were_VBD wont_JJ to_TO lament_VB over_IN the_DT first_JJ sheaf_NN
cut_NN ,_, invoking_VBG Isis_NNP as_IN the_DT goddess_NN to_TO whom_WP they_PRP owed_VBD the_DT discovery_NN of_IN
corn_NN ._. To_TO the_DT plaintive_JJ song_NN or_CC cry_NN sung_VBN or_CC uttered_VBN by_IN Egyptian_JJ
reapers_NNS the_DT Greeks_NNP gave_VBD the_DT name_NN of_IN Maneros_NNP ,_, and_CC explained_VBD the_DT name_NN
by_IN a_DT story_NN that_IN Maneros_NNP ,_, the_DT only_JJ son_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ Egyptian_JJ king_NN ,_,
invented_VBN agriculture_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, dying_VBG an_DT untimely_RB death_NN ,_, was_VBD thus_RB
lamented_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS ._. It_PRP appears_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT name_NN Maneros_NNS
is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO a_DT misunderstanding_NN of_IN the_DT formula_NN maa-ne_NN -_: hra_NN ,_, "_`` Come_VB to_TO
the_DT house_NN ,"_, which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN discovered_VBN in_IN various_JJ Egyptian_JJ writings_NNS ,_,
for_IN example_NN in_IN the_DT dirge_NN of_IN Isis_NNP in_IN the_DT Book_NNP of_IN the_DT Dead_NNP ._. Hence_RB we_PRP
may_MD suppose_VB that_IN the_DT cry_NN maa-ne_NN -_: hra_NN was_VBD chanted_VBN by_IN the_DT reapers_NNS
over_IN the_DT cut_NN corn_NN as_IN a_DT dirge_NN for_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN (_-LRB- Isis_.
or_CC Osiris_NNP )_-RRB- and_CC a_DT prayer_NN for_IN its_PRP$ return_NN ._. As_IN the_DT cry_NN was_VBD raised_VBN over_IN
the_DT first_JJ ears_NNS reaped_VBD ,_, it_PRP would_MD seem_VB that_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN was_VBD
believed_VBN by_IN the_DT Egyptians_NNS to_TO be_VB present_JJ in_IN the_DT first_JJ corn_NN cut_NN and_CC to_TO
die_VB under_IN the_DT sickle_JJ ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN in_IN the_DT Malay_NNP Peninsula_NNP and_CC
Java_NNP the_DT first_JJ ears_NNS of_IN rice_NN are_VBP taken_VBN to_TO represent_VB either_CC the_DT Soul_NN
of_IN the_DT Rice_NNP or_CC the_DT Rice-bride_NNP and_CC the_DT Rice-bridegroom_NN ._. In_IN parts_NNS of_IN
Russia_NNP the_DT first_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ treated_VBN much_RB in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN that_IN the_DT last_JJ
sheaf_NN is_VBZ treated_VBN elsewhere_RB ._. It_PRP is_VBZ reaped_VBN by_IN the_DT mistress_NN herself_PRP ,_,
taken_VBN home_NN and_CC set_NN in_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN honour_NN near_IN the_DT holy_JJ pictures_NNS ;_:
afterwards_RB it_PRP is_VBZ threshed_VBN separately_RB ,_, and_CC some_DT of_IN its_PRP$ grain_NN is_VBZ mixed_VBN
with_IN the_DT next_JJ year_NN '_'' s_PRP seed-corn_NN ._. In_IN Aberdeenshire_NNP ,_, while_IN the_DT last_JJ
corn_NN cut_NN was_VBD generally_RB used_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT clyack_NN sheaf_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD
sometimes_RB ,_, though_IN rarely_RB ,_, the_DT first_JJ corn_NN cut_NN that_WDT was_VBD dressed_VBN up_RP as_IN
a_DT woman_NN and_CC carried_VBD home_NN with_IN ceremony_NN ._.

In_IN Phoenicia_NNP and_CC Western_NNP Asia_NNP a_DT plaintive_JJ song_NN ,_, like_IN that_DT chanted_VBN by_IN
the_DT Egyptian_JJ corn-reapers_NNS ,_, was_VBD sung_VBN at_IN the_DT vintage_NN and_CC probably_RB (_-LRB- to_TO
judge_NN by_IN analogy_NN )_-RRB- also_RB at_IN harvest_NN ._. This_DT Phoenician_NN song_NN was_VBD called_VBN
by_IN the_DT Greeks_NNP Linus_NNP or_CC Ailinus_NNP and_CC explained_VBD ,_, like_IN Maneros_NNP ,_, as_IN a_DT
lament_NN for_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT youth_NN named_VBN Linus_NNP ._. According_VBG to_TO one_CD story_NN
Linus_NNP was_VBD brought_VBN up_RP by_IN a_DT shepherd_NN ,_, but_CC torn_VBN to_TO pieces_NNS by_IN his_PRP$ dogs_NNS ._.
But_CC ,_, like_IN Maneros_NNP ,_, the_DT name_NN Linus_NNP or_CC Ailinus_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB
originated_VBN in_IN a_DT verbal_JJ misunderstanding_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO be_VB nothing_NN more_JJR than_IN
the_DT cry_NN ai_VBP lanu_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ "_`` Woe_NNP to_TO us_PRP ,"_, which_WDT the_DT Phoenicians_NNPS
probably_RB uttered_VBD in_IN mourning_VBG for_IN Adonis_NNP ;_: at_IN least_JJS Sappho_NNP seems_VBZ to_TO
have_VBP regarded_VBN Adonis_NNP and_CC Linus_NNP as_IN equivalent_JJ ._.

In_IN Bithynia_NNP a_DT like_JJ mournful_NN ditty_NN ,_, called_VBN Bormus_NNP or_CC Borimus_NNP ,_, was_VBD
chanted_VBN by_IN Mariandynian_NNP reapers_NNS ._. Bormus_NNP was_VBD said_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN a_DT
handsome_JJ youth_NN ,_, the_DT son_NN of_IN King_NNP Upias_NNP or_CC of_IN a_DT wealthy_JJ and_CC
distinguished_JJ man_NN ._. One_CD summer_NN day_NN ,_, watching_VBG the_DT reapers_NNS at_IN work_NN in_IN
his_PRP$ fields_NNS ,_, he_PRP went_VBD to_TO fetch_VB them_PRP a_DT drink_NN of_IN water_NN and_CC was_VBD never_RB
heard_VBN of_IN more_JJR ._. So_IN the_DT reapers_NNS sought_VBD for_IN him_PRP ,_, calling_VBG him_PRP in_IN
plaintive_JJ strains_NNS ,_, which_WDT they_PRP continued_VBD to_TO chant_VB at_IN harvest_NN ever_RB
afterwards_RB ._.



2._CD Killing_NNP the_DT Corn-spirit_NN

IN_IN PHRYGIA_NNP the_DT corresponding_JJ song_NN ,_, sung_VBN by_IN harvesters_NNS both_DT at_IN
reaping_NN and_CC at_IN threshing_NN ,_, was_VBD called_VBN Lityerses_NNP ._. According_VBG to_TO one_CD
story_NN ,_, Lityerses_NNP was_VBD a_DT bastard_NN son_NN of_IN Midas_NNP ,_, King_NNP of_IN Phrygia_NNP ,_, and_CC
dwelt_NN at_IN Celaenae_NNP ._. He_PRP used_VBD to_TO reap_VB the_DT corn_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD an_DT enormous_JJ
appetite_NN ._. When_WRB a_DT stranger_NN happened_VBD to_TO enter_VB the_DT corn-field_NN or_CC to_TO
pass_NN by_IN it_PRP ,_, Lityerses_NNP gave_VBD him_PRP plenty_NN to_TO eat_VB and_CC drink_VB ,_, then_RB took_VBD
him_PRP to_TO the_DT corn-fields_NNS on_IN the_DT banks_NNS of_IN the_DT Maeander_NNP and_CC compelled_VBN
him_PRP to_TO reap_VB along_IN with_IN him_PRP ._. Lastly_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD his_PRP$ custom_NN to_TO wrap_VB the_DT
stranger_NN in_IN a_DT sheaf_NN ,_, cut_VBD off_RP his_PRP$ head_NN with_IN a_DT sickle_JJ ,_, and_CC carry_VB away_RB
his_PRP$ body_NN ,_, swathed_VBN in_IN the_DT corn-stalks_NNS ._. But_CC at_IN last_JJ Hercules_NNP undertook_NN
to_TO reap_VB with_IN him_PRP ,_, cut_VB off_RP his_PRP$ head_NN with_IN the_DT sickle_JJ ,_, and_CC threw_VBD his_PRP$
body_NN into_IN the_DT river_NN ._. As_IN Hercules_NNP is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO have_VB slain_NN Lityerses_NNS
in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN that_IN Lityerses_NNP slew_NN others_NNS ,_, we_PRP may_MD infer_VB that_IN
Lityerses_NNS used_VBD to_TO throw_VB the_DT bodies_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ victims_NNS into_IN the_DT river_NN ._.
According_VBG to_TO another_DT version_NN of_IN the_DT story_NN ,_, Lityerses_NNP ,_, a_DT son_NN of_IN
Midas_NNP ,_, was_VBD wont_JJ to_TO challenge_VB people_NNS to_TO a_DT reaping_NN match_NN with_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC
if_IN he_PRP vanquished_VBD them_PRP he_PRP used_VBD to_TO thrash_VB them_PRP ;_: but_CC one_CD day_NN he_PRP met_VBD
with_IN a_DT stronger_JJR reaper_NN ,_, who_WP slew_NN him_PRP ._.

There_EX are_VBP some_DT grounds_NNS for_IN supposing_VBG that_IN in_IN these_DT stories_NNS of_IN
Lityerses_NNS we_PRP have_VBP the_DT description_NN of_IN a_DT Phrygian_JJ harvest_NN custom_NN in_IN
accordance_NN with_IN which_WDT certain_JJ persons_NNS ,_, especially_RB strangers_NNS passing_VBG
the_DT harvest_NN field_NN ,_, were_VBD regularly_RB regarded_VBN as_IN embodiments_NNS of_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN such_JJ were_VBD seized_VBN by_IN the_DT reapers_NNS ,_, wrapt_NN in_IN
sheaves_NNS ,_, and_CC beheaded_VBD ,_, their_PRP$ bodies_NNS ,_, bound_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT corn-stalks_NNS ,_,
being_VBG after-wards_RB thrown_VBN into_IN water_NN as_IN a_DT rain-charm_NN ._. The_DT grounds_NNS for_IN
this_DT supposition_NN are_VBP ,_, first_RB ,_, the_DT resemblance_NN of_IN the_DT Lityerses_NNP story_NN
to_TO the_DT harvest_NN customs_NNS of_IN European_JJ peasantry_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, second_JJ ,_, the_DT
frequency_NN of_IN human_JJ sacrifices_NNS offered_VBN by_IN savage_JJ races_NNS to_TO promote_VB the_DT
fertility_NN of_IN the_DT fields_NNS ._. We_PRP will_MD examine_VB these_DT grounds_NNS successively_RB ,_,
beginning_VBG with_IN the_DT former_JJ ._.

In_IN comparing_VBG the_DT story_NN with_IN the_DT harvest_NN customs_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ,_, three_CD
points_NNS deserve_VBP special_JJ attention_NN ,_, namely_RB :_: I_PRP ._. the_DT reaping_NN match_NN and_CC
the_DT binding_NN of_IN persons_NNS in_IN the_DT sheaves_NNS ;_: II_NNP ._. the_DT killing_NN of_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN or_CC his_PRP$ representatives_NNS ;_: III_NNP ._. the_DT treatment_NN of_IN visitors_NNS
to_TO the_DT harvest_NN field_NN or_CC of_IN strangers_NNS passing_VBG it_PRP ._.

I_PRP ._. In_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT first_JJ head_NN ,_, we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN in_IN modern_JJ Europe_NNP
the_DT person_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ or_CC binds_VBZ or_CC threshes_VBZ the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ often_RB
exposed_VBN to_TO rough_JJ treatment_NN at_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ fellow-labourers_NNS ._. For_IN
example_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ bound_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, thus_RB encased_VBN ,_, is_VBZ
carried_VBN or_CC carted_VBN about_IN ,_, beaten_VBN ,_, drenched_VBN with_IN water_NN ,_, thrown_VBN on_IN a_DT
dunghill_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ._. Or_CC ,_, if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ spared_VBN this_DT horse-play_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ
at_IN least_JJS the_DT subject_NN of_IN ridicule_NN or_CC is_VBZ thought_VBN to_TO be_VB destined_VBN to_TO
suffer_VB some_DT misfortune_NN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._. Hence_RB the_DT
harvesters_NNS are_VBP naturally_RB reluctant_JJ to_TO give_VB the_DT last_JJ cut_NN at_IN reaping_VBG
or_CC the_DT last_JJ stroke_NN at_IN threshing_NN or_CC to_TO bind_NN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ,_, and_CC
towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN this_DT reluctance_NN produces_VBZ an_DT emulation_NN
among_IN the_DT labourers_NNS ,_, each_DT striving_NN to_TO finish_VB his_PRP$ task_NN as_RB fast_RB as_IN
possible_JJ ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN he_PRP may_MD escape_VB the_DT invidious_JJ distinction_NN of_IN
being_VBG last_JJ ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT Mittelmark_NNP district_NN of_IN Prussia_NNP ,_, when_WRB
the_DT rye_NN has_VBZ been_VBN reaped_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT last_JJ sheaves_NNS are_VBP about_IN to_TO be_VB tied_VBN
up_RB ,_, the_DT binders_NNS stand_VBP in_IN two_CD rows_NNS facing_VBG each_DT other_JJ ,_, every_DT woman_NN
with_IN her_PRP$ sheaf_NN and_CC her_PRP$ straw_NN rope_NN before_IN her_PRP ._. At_IN a_DT given_VBN signal_NN they_PRP
all_DT tie_VB up_IN their_PRP$ sheaves_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT one_NN who_WP is_VBZ the_DT last_JJ to_TO finish_VB is_VBZ
ridiculed_VBN by_IN the_DT rest_NN ._. Not_RB only_RB so_RB ,_, but_CC her_PRP$ sheaf_NN is_VBZ made_VBN up_RP into_IN
human_JJ shape_NN and_CC called_VBD the_DT Old_NNP Man_NNP ,_, and_CC she_PRP must_MD carry_VB it_PRP home_NN to_TO
the_DT farmyard_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT harvesters_NNS dance_VBP in_IN a_DT circle_NN round_IN her_PRP and_CC
it_PRP ._. Then_RB they_PRP take_VBP the_DT Old_NNP Man_NN to_TO the_DT farmer_NN and_CC deliver_VB it_PRP to_TO him_PRP
with_IN the_DT words_NNS ,_, "_`` We_PRP bring_VBP the_DT Old_NNP Man_NN to_TO the_DT Master_NN ._. He_PRP may_MD keep_VB him_PRP
till_IN he_PRP gets_VBZ a_DT new_JJ one_CD ."_NN After_IN that_IN the_DT Old_NNP Man_NN is_VBZ set_VBN up_RP against_IN a_DT
tree_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP remains_VBZ for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, the_DT butt_NN of_IN many_JJ jests_NNS ._. At_IN
Aschbach_NNP in_IN Bavaria_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT reaping_NN is_VBZ nearly_RB finished_VBN ,_, the_DT
reapers_NNS say_VBP ,_, "_`` Now_RB ,_, we_PRP will_MD drive_VB out_RP the_DT Old_NNP Man_NNP ."_NNP Each_DT of_IN them_PRP sets_NNS
himself_PRP to_TO reap_VB a_DT patch_NN of_IN corn_NN as_RB fast_RB as_IN he_PRP can_MD ;_: he_PRP who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT
last_JJ handful_NN or_CC the_DT last_JJ stalk_NN is_VBZ greeted_VBN by_IN the_DT rest_NN with_IN an_DT
exulting_VBG cry_NN ,_, "_`` You_PRP have_VBP the_DT Old_NNP Man_NNP ."_NNP Sometimes_RB a_DT black_JJ mask_NN is_VBZ
fastened_VBN on_IN the_DT reaper_NN '_POS s_VBZ face_NN and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ dressed_VBN in_IN woman_NN '_POS s_PRP clothes_NNS ;_:
or_CC if_IN the_DT reaper_NN is_VBZ a_DT woman_NN ,_, she_PRP is_VBZ dressed_VBN in_IN man_NN '_'' s_PRP clothes_NNS ._. A_NN
dance_NN follows_VBZ ._. At_IN the_DT supper_NN the_DT Old_NNP Man_NN gets_VBZ twice_RB as_IN large_JJ a_DT
portion_NN of_IN the_DT food_NN as_IN the_DT others_NNS ._. The_DT proceedings_NNS are_VBP similar_JJ at_IN
threshing_NN ;_: the_DT person_NN who_WP gives_VBZ the_DT last_JJ stroke_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO have_VB the_DT
Old_NNP Man_NNP ._. At_IN the_DT supper_NN given_VBN to_TO the_DT threshers_NNS he_PRP has_VBZ to_TO eat_VB out_RB of_IN
the_DT cream-ladle_NN and_CC to_TO drink_VB a_DT great_JJ deal_NN ._. Moreover_RB ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ quizzed_VBN
and_CC teased_VBN in_IN all_DT sorts_NNS of_IN ways_NNS till_IN he_PRP frees_VBZ himself_PRP from_IN further_RB
annoyance_NN by_IN treating_VBG the_DT others_NNS to_TO brandy_VB or_CC beer_NN ._.

These_DT examples_NNS illustrate_VBP the_DT contests_NNS in_IN reaping_NN ,_, threshing_NN ,_, and_CC
binding_NN which_WDT take_VBP place_NN amongst_IN the_DT harvesters_NNS ,_, from_IN their_PRP$
unwillingness_NN to_TO suffer_VB the_DT ridicule_NN and_CC discomfort_NN incurred_VBN by_IN the_DT
one_NN who_WP happens_VBZ to_TO finish_VB his_PRP$ work_NN last_JJ ._. It_PRP will_MD be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN
the_DT person_NN who_WP is_VBZ last_JJ at_IN reaping_NN ,_, binding_NN ,_, or_CC threshing_NN ,_, is_VBZ
regarded_VBN as_IN the_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT idea_NN is_VBZ
more_RBR fully_RB expressed_VBN by_IN binding_VBG him_PRP or_CC her_PRP$ in_IN corn-stalks_NNS ._. The_DT
latter_JJ custom_NN has_VBZ been_VBN already_RB illustrated_VBN ,_, but_CC a_DT few_JJ more_JJR instances_NNS
may_MD be_VB added_VBN ._. At_IN Kloxin_NNP ,_, near_IN Stettin_NNP ,_, the_DT harvesters_NNS call_VBP out_RP to_TO
the_DT woman_NN who_WP binds_VBZ the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ,_, "_`` You_PRP have_VBP the_DT Old_NNP Man_NNP ,_, and_CC must_MD
keep_VB him_PRP ."_. As_IN late_JJ as_IN the_DT first_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN the_DT
custom_NN was_VBD to_TO tie_VB up_RP the_DT woman_NN herself_PRP in_IN pease-straw_NN ,_, and_CC bring_VB her_PRP$
with_IN music_NN to_TO the_DT farmhouse_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT harvesters_NNS danced_VBD with_IN her_PRP$
till_IN the_DT pease-straw_NN fell_VBD off_RP ._. In_IN other_JJ villages_NNS round_VBP Stettin_NNP ,_, when_WRB
the_DT last_JJ harvest-waggon_NN is_VBZ being_VBG loaded_VBN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT regular_JJ race_NN
amongst_IN the_DT women_NNS ,_, each_DT striving_NN not_RB to_TO be_VB last_JJ ._. For_IN she_PRP who_WP places_NNS
the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN on_IN the_DT waggon_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Old_NNP Man_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ
completely_RB swathed_VBN in_IN corn-stalks_NNS ;_: she_PRP is_VBZ also_RB decked_VBN with_IN flowers_NNS ,_,
and_CC flowers_NNS and_CC a_DT helmet_NN of_IN straw_NN are_VBP placed_VBN on_IN her_PRP$ head_NN ._. In_IN solemn_JJ
procession_NN she_PRP carries_VBZ the_DT harvest-crown_NN to_TO the_DT squire_JJ ,_, over_IN whose_WP$
head_NN she_PRP holds_VBZ it_PRP while_IN she_PRP utters_VBD a_DT string_NN of_IN good_JJ wishes_NNS ._. At_IN the_DT
dance_NN which_WDT follows_VBZ ,_, the_DT Old_NNP Man_NN has_VBZ the_DT right_JJ to_TO choose_VB his_PRP$ ,_, or_CC
rather_RB her_PRP ,_, partner_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ an_DT honour_NN to_TO dance_VB with_IN him_PRP ._. At_IN Gommern_NNP ,_,
near_IN Magdeburg_NNP ,_, the_DT reaper_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ ears_NNS of_IN corn_NN is_VBZ often_RB
wrapt_VB up_RP in_IN corn-stalks_NNS so_RB completely_RB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ hard_JJ to_TO see_VB whether_IN
there_EX is_VBZ a_DT man_NN in_IN the_DT bundle_NN or_CC not_RB ._. Thus_RB wrapt_VBN up_IN he_PRP is_VBZ taken_VBN by_IN
another_DT stalwart_NN reaper_NN on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN ,_, and_CC carried_VBD round_JJ the_DT field_NN

first_JJ sheaf_NN ._. At_IN Dingelstedt_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Erfurt_NNP ,_, down_RB to_TO

N_NNP �_NN rdlingen_NN in_IN Bavaria_NNP the_DT man_NN who_WP gives_VBZ the_DT last_JJ stroke_NN at_IN threshing_VBG

(_-LRB- Kornpopel_NNP )._.

"_`` In_IN all_PDT these_DT cases_NNS the_DT idea_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN --_: the_DT Old_NNP
Man_NN of_IN vegetation_NN --_: is_VBZ driven_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT corn_NN last_JJ cut_NN or_CC last_JJ
threshed_VBN ,_, and_CC lives_NNS in_IN the_DT barn_NN during_IN the_DT winter_NN ._. At_IN sowing-time_NN he_PRP
goes_VBZ out_RB again_RB to_TO the_DT fields_NNS to_TO resume_VB his_PRP$ activity_NN as_IN animating_NN
force_NN among_IN the_DT sprouting_VBG corn_NN ."_.

II_NNP ._. Passing_NNP to_TO the_DT second_JJ point_NN of_IN comparison_NN between_IN the_DT Lityerses_NNS
story_NN and_CC European_JJ harvest_NN customs_NNS ,_, we_PRP have_VBP now_RB to_TO see_VB that_IN in_IN the_DT

We_PRP are_VBP killing_VBG the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NNP !"_VBD If_IN there_EX is_VBZ an_DT old_JJ woman_NN in_IN the_DT house_NN
she_PRP is_VBZ warned_VBN to_TO save_VB herself_PRP ,_, or_CC she_PRP will_MD be_VB struck_VBN dead_JJ ._. Near_IN

another_DT account_NN ,_, every_DT Lithuanian_JJ reaper_NN makes_VBZ haste_NN to_TO finish_VB his_PRP$

Tilsit_NNP ,_, the_DT man_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ corn_NN goes_VBZ by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN "_'' the_DT
killer_NN of_IN the_DT Rye-woman_NNP ."_NNP In_IN Lithuania_NNP ,_, again_RB ,_, the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ

leader_NN ._. The_DT man_NN whose_WP$ flail_NN is_VBZ the_DT last_JJ to_TO fall_VB after_IN the_DT command_NN to_TO

cuts_NNS the_DT last_JJ corn_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ known_VBN as_IN "_`` the_DT killer_NN of_IN the_DT Old_NNP
Rye-woman_NNP ."_NNP Sometimes_RB in_IN Lithuania_NNP the_DT slain_NN corn-spirit_NN was_VBD

dead_JJ ."_NNS We_PRP have_VBP already_RB met_VBN with_IN examples_NNS of_IN burning_VBG the_DT figure_NN which_WDT
represents_VBZ the_DT corn-spirit_NN ._. In_IN the_DT East_NNP Riding_NNP of_IN Yorkshire_NNP a_DT custom_NN

"_`` the_DT Old_NNP Man_NN is_VBZ being_VBG beaten_VBN to_TO death_NN ."_NNS We_PRP saw_VBD that_IN sometimes_RB the_DT
farmer_NN '_POS s_VBZ wife_NN is_VBZ thrust_VBN ,_, together_RB with_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ,_, under_IN the_DT

III_NNP ._. Thus_RB far_RB the_DT representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN have_VBP generally_RB
been_VBN the_DT man_NN or_CC woman_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ ,_, binds_NNS ,_, or_CC threshes_VBZ the_DT last_JJ corn_NN ._. We_PRP
now_RB come_VBP to_TO the_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ represented_VBN either_CC
by_IN a_DT stranger_NN passing_VBG the_DT harvest-field_NN (_-LRB- as_IN in_IN the_DT Lityerses_NNP tale_NN ),_.
or_CC by_IN a_DT visitor_NN entering_VBG it_PRP for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN ._. All_DT over_IN Germany_NNP it_PRP
is_VBZ customary_JJ for_IN the_DT reapers_NNS or_CC threshers_NNS to_TO lay_VB hold_NN of_IN passing_VBG

pay_VB a_DT forfeit_JJ ;_: and_CC when_WRB the_DT farmer_NN himself_PRP or_CC one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ guests_NNS
enters_VBZ the_DT field_NN or_CC the_DT threshing-floor_NN for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ

in_IN corn_NN ._. Thus_RB at_IN Sol_NNP �_NNP r_NN in_IN Norway_NNP ,_, whoever_WP enters_VBZ the_DT field_NN ,_, be_VB he_PRP
the_DT master_NN or_CC a_DT stranger_NN ,_, is_VBZ tied_VBN up_RP in_IN a_DT sheaf_NN and_CC must_MD pay_VB a_DT
ransom_NN ._. In_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Soest_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT farmer_NN visits_VBZ the_DT

compelled_VBN to_TO stand_VB brandy_NN ._. At_IN N_NNP �_NN rdlingen_JJ strangers_NNS are_VBP caught_VBN with_IN
straw_NN ropes_NNS and_CC tied_VBN up_RP in_IN a_DT sheaf_NN till_IN they_PRP pay_VBP a_DT forfeit_JJ ._. Among_IN
the_DT Germans_NNPS of_IN Haselberg_NNP ,_, in_IN West_NNP Bohemia_NNP ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN a_DT farmer_NN had_VBN
given_VBN the_DT last_JJ corn_NN to_TO be_VB threshed_VBN on_IN the_DT threshing-floor_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD

the_DT canton_NN of_IN Putanges_NNS ,_, in_IN Normandy_NNP ,_, a_DT pretence_NN of_IN tying_VBG up_RP the_DT

falls_VBZ to_TO the_DT women_NNS alone_RB ._. They_PRP throw_VBP themselves_PRP on_IN the_DT proprietor_NN ,_,
seize_VB him_PRP by_IN the_DT arms_NNS ,_, the_DT legs_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT body_NN ,_, throw_VBP him_PRP to_TO the_DT
ground_NN ,_, and_CC stretch_VB him_PRP on_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ._. Then_RB a_DT show_NN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN
binding_JJ him_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT conditions_NNS to_TO be_VB observed_VBN at_IN the_DT harvest-supper_NN
are_VBP dictated_VBN to_TO him_PRP ._. When_WRB he_PRP has_VBZ accepted_VBN them_PRP ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ released_VBN and_CC
allowed_VBN to_TO get_VB up_RP ._. At_IN Brie_NNP ,_, Isle_NNP de_NNP France_NNP ,_, when_WRB any_DT one_NN who_WP does_VBZ
not_RB belong_VB to_TO the_DT farm_NN passes_NNS by_IN the_DT harvest-field_NN ,_, the_DT reapers_NNS give_VBP
chase_VB ._. If_IN they_PRP catch_VBP him_PRP ,_, they_PRP bind_VBP him_PRP in_IN a_DT sheaf_NN an_DT dbite_JJ him_PRP ,_, one_CD
after_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, in_IN the_DT forehead_NN ,_, crying_VBG ,_, "_`` You_PRP shall_MD carry_VB the_DT key_NN
of_IN the_DT field_NN ."_. "_`` To_TO have_VB the_DT key_JJ "_`` is_VBZ an_DT expression_NN used_VBN by_IN harvesters_NNS
elsewhere_RB in_IN the_DT sense_NN of_IN to_TO cut_VB or_CC bind_NN or_CC thresh_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ;_:
hence_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ equivalent_JJ to_TO the_DT phrases_NNS "_`` You_PRP have_VBP the_DT Old_NNP Man_NNP ,"_, "_'' You_PRP
are_VBP the_DT Old_NNP Man_NNP ,"_, which_WDT are_VBP addressed_VBN to_TO the_DT cutter_NN ,_, binder_NN ,_, or_CC

field_NN ,"_VBP it_PRP is_VBZ as_RB much_JJ as_IN to_TO say_VB that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ the_DT Old_NNP Man_NNP ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, an_DT
embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ._. In_IN hop-picking_NN ,_, if_IN a_DT well-dressed_JJ

into_IN the_DT bin_NN ,_, covered_VBN with_IN leaves_NNS ,_, and_CC not_RB released_VBN till_IN he_PRP has_VBZ paid_VBN
a_DT fine_JJ ._.

Thus_RB ,_, like_IN the_DT ancient_JJ Lityerses_NNS ,_, modern_JJ European_JJ reapers_NNS have_VBP been_VBN
wont_NN to_TO lay_VB hold_NN of_IN a_DT passing_VBG stranger_NN and_CC tie_VB him_PRP up_RP in_IN a_DT sheaf_NN ._. It_PRP
is_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB expected_VBN that_IN they_PRP should_MD complete_VB the_DT parallel_NN by_IN
cutting_VBG off_RP his_PRP$ head_NN ;_: but_CC if_IN they_PRP do_VBP not_RB take_VB such_JJ a_DT strong_JJ step_NN ,_,
their_PRP$ language_NN and_CC gestures_NNS are_VBP at_IN least_JJS indicative_NN of_IN a_DT desire_NN to_TO
do_VB so_RB ._. For_IN instance_NN ,_, in_IN Mecklenburg_NNP on_IN the_DT first_JJ day_NN of_IN reaping_NN ,_, if_IN
the_DT master_NN or_CC mistress_NN or_CC a_DT stranger_NN enters_VBZ the_DT field_NN ,_, or_CC merely_RB
passes_NNS by_IN it_PRP ,_, all_PDT the_DT mowers_NNS face_NN towards_IN him_PRP and_CC sharpen_VB their_PRP$
scythes_NNS ,_, clashing_VBG their_PRP$ whet-stones_NNS against_IN them_PRP in_IN unison_NN ,_, as_IN if_IN
they_PRP were_VBD making_VBG ready_JJ to_TO mow_VB ._. Then_RB the_DT woman_NN who_WP leads_VBZ the_DT mowers_NNS
steps_NNS up_RB to_TO him_PRP and_CC ties_NNS a_DT band_NN round_IN his_PRP$ left_JJ arm_NN ._. He_PRP must_MD ransom_VB
himself_PRP by_IN payment_NN of_IN a_DT forfeit_JJ ._. Near_NNP Ratzeburg_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT master_NN or_CC
other_JJ person_NN of_IN mark_NN enters_VBZ the_DT field_NN or_CC passes_NNS by_IN it_PRP ,_, all_PDT the_DT
harvesters_NNS stop_NN work_NN and_CC march_NN towards_IN him_PRP in_IN a_DT body_NN ,_, the_DT men_NNS with_IN
their_PRP$ scythes_NNS in_IN front_NN ._. On_IN meeting_VBG him_PRP they_PRP form_VBP up_RP in_IN line_NN ,_, men_NNS and_CC
women_NNS ._. The_DT men_NNS stick_VBP the_DT poles_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ scythes_NNS in_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, as_IN
they_PRP do_VBP in_IN whetting_DT them_PRP ;_: then_RB they_PRP take_VBP off_RP their_PRP$ caps_NNS and_CC hang_VB
them_PRP on_IN the_DT scythes_NNS ,_, while_IN their_PRP$ leader_NN stands_VBZ forward_JJ and_CC makes_VBZ a_DT
speech_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP has_VBZ done_VBN ,_, they_PRP all_DT whet_IN their_PRP$ scythes_NNS in_IN measured_VBN
time_NN very_RB loudly_RB ,_, after_IN which_WDT they_PRP put_VBP on_IN their_PRP$ caps_NNS ._. Two_CD of_IN the_DT
women_NNS binders_NNS then_RB come_VBP forward_RB ;_: one_CD of_IN them_PRP ties_VBZ the_DT master_NN or_CC
stranger_NN (_-LRB- as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB )_-RRB- with_IN corn-ears_NNS or_CC with_IN a_DT silken_JJ band_NN ;_:
the_DT other_JJ delivers_VBZ a_DT rhyming_NN address_NN ._. The_DT following_VBG are_VBP specimens_NNS of_IN
the_DT speeches_NNS made_VBN by_IN the_DT reaper_NN on_IN these_DT occasions_NNS ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN
Pomerania_NNP every_DT passer-by_NN is_VBZ stopped_VBN ,_, his_PRP$ way_NN being_VBG barred_VBN with_IN a_DT
corn-rope_NN ._. The_DT reapers_NNS form_VBP a_DT circle_NN round_IN him_PRP and_CC sharpen_VB their_PRP$
scythes_NNS ,_, while_IN their_PRP$ leader_NN says_VBZ :_:


"_`` The_DT men_NNS are_VBP ready_JJ ,_,
The_DT scythes_NNS are_VBP bent_VBN ,_,
The_DT corn_NN is_VBZ great_JJ and_CC small_JJ ,_,
The_DT gentleman_NN must_MD be_VB mowed_VBN ."_.


Then_RB the_DT process_NN of_IN whetting_VBG the_DT scythes_NNS is_VBZ repeated_VBN ._. At_IN Ramin_NNP ,_, in_IN
the_DT district_NN of_IN Stettin_NNP ,_, the_DT stranger_NN ,_, standing_VBG encircled_VBN by_IN the_DT
reapers_NNS ,_, is_VBZ thus_RB addressed_VBN :_:


"_`` We_PRP '_POS ll_JJ stroke_NN the_DT gentleman_NN
With_IN our_PRP$ naked_JJ sword_NN ,_,
Wherewith_IN we_PRP shear_VBP meadows_NNS and_CC fields_NNS ._.
We_PRP shear_VBP princes_NNS and_CC lords_NNS ._.
Labourers_NNS are_VBP often_RB athirst_JJ ;_:
If_IN the_DT gentleman_NN will_MD stand_VB beer_NN and_CC brandy_NN
The_DT joke_NN will_MD soon_RB be_VB over_RB ._.
But_CC ,_, if_IN our_PRP$ prayer_NN he_PRP does_VBZ not_RB like_VB ,_,
The_DT sword_NN has_VBZ a_DT right_NN to_TO strike_VB ."_RB


On_IN the_DT threshing-floor_JJ strangers_NNS are_VBP also_RB regarded_VBN as_IN embodiments_NNS of_IN
the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP treated_VBN accordingly_RB ._. At_IN Wiedingharde_NNP in_IN
Schleswig_NNP when_WRB a_DT stranger_NN comes_VBZ to_TO the_DT threshing-floor_NN he_PRP is_VBZ asked_VBN ,_,
"_`` Shall_MD I_PRP teach_VB you_PRP the_DT flail-dance_NN ?"_NN If_IN he_PRP says_VBZ yes_RB ,_, they_PRP put_VBD the_DT
arms_NNS of_IN the_DT threshing-flail_JJ round_NN his_PRP$ neck_NN as_IN if_IN he_PRP were_VBD a_DT sheaf_NN of_IN
corn_NN ,_, and_CC press_NN them_PRP together_RB so_RB tight_JJ that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ nearly_RB choked_VBN ._. In_IN
some_DT parishes_NNS of_IN Wermland_NNP (_-LRB- Sweden_NNP ),_, when_WRB a_DT stranger_NN enters_VBZ the_DT
threshing-floor_NN where_WRB the_DT threshers_NNS are_VBP at_IN work_NN ,_, they_PRP say_VBP that_IN "_'' they_PRP
will_MD teach_VB him_PRP the_DT threshing-song_JJ ."_NN Then_RB they_PRP put_VBD a_DT flail_NN round_RB his_PRP$
neck_NN and_CC a_DT straw_NN rope_NN about_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ._. Also_RB ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, if_IN a_DT
stranger_NN woman_NN enters_VBZ the_DT threshing-floor_NN ,_, the_DT threshers_NNS put_VBD a_DT flail_NN
round_IN her_PRP$ body_NN and_CC a_DT wreath_NN of_IN corn-stalks_NNS round_IN her_PRP$ neck_NN ,_, and_CC call_NN
out_RB ,_, "_`` See_VB the_DT Corn-woman_NNP !_. See_VB !_. that_WDT is_VBZ how_WRB the_DT Corn-maiden_NNP looks_VBZ !"_.

Thus_RB in_IN these_DT harvest-customs_NNS of_IN modern_JJ Europe_NNP the_DT person_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ ,_,
binds_NNS ,_, or_CC threshes_VBZ the_DT last_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ treated_VBN as_IN an_DT embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN by_IN being_VBG wrapt_VBN up_RP in_IN sheaves_NNS ,_, killed_VBN in_IN mimicry_NN by_IN
agricultural_JJ implements_NNS ,_, and_CC thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT water_NN ._. These_DT
coincidences_NNS with_IN the_DT Lityerses_NNS story_NN seem_VB to_TO prove_VB that_IN the_DT latter_NN
is_VBZ a_DT genuine_JJ description_NN of_IN an_DT old_JJ Phrygian_JJ harvest-custom_NN ._. But_CC
since_IN in_IN the_DT modern_JJ parallels_NNS the_DT killing_NN of_IN the_DT personal_JJ
representative_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ necessarily_RB omitted_VBN or_CC at_IN most_JJS
enacted_VBN only_RB in_IN mimicry_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ desirable_JJ to_TO show_VB that_IN in_IN rude_JJ
society_NN human_JJ beings_NNS have_VBP been_VBN commonly_RB killed_VBN as_IN an_DT agricultural_JJ
ceremony_NN to_TO promote_VB the_DT fertility_NN of_IN the_DT fields_NNS ._. The_DT following_VBG
examples_NNS will_MD make_VB this_DT plain_NN ._.



3._. Human_NNP Sacrifices_NNP for_IN the_DT Crops_NNS

THE_DT INDIANS_NNS of_IN Guayaquil_NNP ,_, in_IN Ecuador_NNP ,_, used_VBD to_TO sacrifice_VB human_JJ blood_NN
and_CC the_DT hearts_NNS of_IN men_NNS when_WRB they_PRP sowed_VBD their_PRP$ fields_NNS ._. The_DT people_NNS of_IN
Ca_MD �_RB ar_NN (_-LRB- now_RB Cuenca_NNP in_IN Ecuador_NNP )_-RRB- used_VBD to_TO sacrifice_VB a_DT hundred_CD children_NNS
annually_RB at_IN harvest_NN ._. The_DT kings_NNS of_IN Quito_NNP ,_, the_DT Incas_NNP of_IN Peru_NNP ,_, and_CC for_IN
a_DT long_JJ time_NN the_DT Spaniards_NNS were_VBD unable_JJ to_TO suppress_VB the_DT bloody_JJ rite_NN ._.
At_IN a_DT Mexican_JJ harvest-festival_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT first-fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT season_NN
were_VBD offered_VBN to_TO the_DT sun_NN ,_, a_DT criminal_NN was_VBD placed_VBN between_IN two_CD immense_NN
stones_NNS ,_, balanced_VBN opposite_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_, and_CC was_VBD crushed_VBN by_IN them_PRP as_IN
they_PRP fell_VBD together_RB ._. His_PRP$ remains_NNS were_VBD buried_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT feast_NN and_CC dance_NN
followed_VBD ._. This_DT sacrifice_NN was_VBD known_VBN as_IN "_`` the_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT stones_NNS ."_.
We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN the_DT ancient_JJ Mexicans_NNS also_RB sacrificed_VBD human_JJ beings_NNS
at_IN all_DT the_DT various_JJ stages_NNS in_IN the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT maize_NN ,_, the_DT age_NN of_IN the_DT
victims_NNS corresponding_JJ to_TO the_DT age_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN ;_: for_IN they_PRP sacrificed_:
new-born_JJ babes_NNS at_IN sowing_NN ,_, older_JJR children_NNS when_WRB the_DT grain_NN had_VBD
sprouted_VBN ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN till_IN it_PRP was_VBD fully_RB ripe_JJ ,_, when_WRB they_PRP sacrificed_VBD old_JJ
men_NNS ._. No_DT doubt_NN the_DT correspondence_NN between_IN the_DT ages_NNS of_IN the_DT victims_NNS and_CC
the_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO enhance_VB the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN the_DT
sacrifice_NN ._.

The_DT Pawnees_NNS annually_RB sacrificed_VBD a_DT human_JJ victim_NN in_IN spring_NN when_WRB they_PRP
sowed_VBN their_PRP$ fields_NNS ._. The_DT sacrifice_NN was_VBD believed_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN enjoined_VBN
on_IN them_PRP by_IN the_DT Morning_NNP Star_NNP ,_, or_CC by_IN a_DT certain_JJ bird_NN which_WDT the_DT Morning_VBG
Star_NNP had_VBD sent_VBN to_TO them_PRP as_IN its_PRP$ messenger_NN ._. The_DT bird_NN was_VBD stuffed_VBN and_CC
preserved_VBN as_IN a_DT powerful_JJ talisman_NN ._. They_PRP thought_VBD that_IN an_DT omission_NN of_IN
this_DT sacrifice_NN would_MD be_VB followed_VBN by_IN the_DT total_JJ failure_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS
of_IN maize_NN ,_, beans_NNS ,_, and_CC pumpkins_NNS ._. The_DT victim_NN was_VBD a_DT captive_NN of_IN either_CC
sex_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD clad_VBN in_IN the_DT gayest_NN and_CC most_RBS costly_JJ attire_NN ,_, was_VBD fattened_VBN
on_IN the_DT choicest_NN food_NN ,_, and_CC carefully_RB kept_VBD in_IN ignorance_NN of_IN his_PRP$ doom_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP was_VBD fat_JJ enough_RB ,_, they_PRP bound_VBD him_PRP to_TO a_DT cross_NN in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN
the_DT multitude_NN ,_, danced_VBD a_DT solemn_JJ dance_NN ,_, then_RB cleft_VBD his_PRP$ head_NN with_IN a_DT
tomahawk_NN and_CC shot_VBD him_PRP with_IN arrows_NNS ._. According_VBG to_TO one_CD trader_NN ,_, the_DT
squaws_NNS then_RB cut_VBD pieces_NNS of_IN flesh_NN from_IN the_DT victim_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT
they_PRP greased_VBD their_PRP$ hoes_NNS ;_: but_CC this_DT was_VBD denied_VBN by_IN another_DT trader_NN who_WP
had_VBD been_VBN present_JJ at_IN the_DT ceremony_NN ._. Immediately_RB after_IN the_DT sacrifice_NN
the_DT people_NNS proceeded_VBD to_TO plant_VB their_PRP$ fields_NNS ._. A_DT particular_JJ account_NN has_VBZ
been_VBN preserved_VBN of_IN the_DT sacrifice_NN of_IN a_DT Sioux_NNP girl_NN by_IN the_DT Pawnees_NNS in_IN
April_NNP 1837_CD or_CC 1838._CD The_DT girl_NN was_VBD fourteen_CD or_CC fifteen_CD years_NNS old_JJ and_CC
had_VBD been_VBN kept_VBN for_IN six_CD months_NNS and_CC well_RB treated_VBN ._. Two_CD days_NNS before_IN the_DT
sacrifice_NN she_PRP was_VBD led_VBN from_IN wigwam_NN to_TO wigwam_NN ,_, accompanied_VBN by_IN the_DT
whole_JJ council_NN of_IN chiefs_NNS and_CC warriors_NNS ._. At_IN each_DT lodge_NN she_PRP received_VBD a_DT
small_JJ billet_NN of_IN wood_NN and_CC a_DT little_JJ paint_NN ,_, which_WDT she_PRP handed_VBD to_TO the_DT
warrior_NN next_JJ to_TO her_PRP ._. In_IN this_DT way_NN she_PRP called_VBD at_IN every_DT wigwam_NN ,_,
receiving_VBG at_IN each_DT the_DT same_JJ present_NN of_IN wood_NN and_CC paint_NN ._. On_IN the_DT
twenty-second_JJ of_IN April_NNP she_PRP was_VBD taken_VBN out_RP to_TO be_VB sacrificed_VBN ,_, attended_VBN
by_IN the_DT warriors_NNS ,_, each_DT of_IN whom_WP carried_VBD two_CD pieces_NNS of_IN wood_NN which_WDT he_PRP
had_VBD received_VBN from_IN her_PRP$ hands_NNS ._. Her_PRP$ body_NN having_VBG been_VBN painted_VBN half_DT red_JJ
and_CC half_DT black_JJ ,_, she_PRP was_VBD attached_VBN to_TO a_DT sort_NN of_IN gibbet_NN and_CC roasted_VBD for_IN
some_DT time_NN over_IN a_DT slow_JJ fire_NN ,_, then_RB shot_VBD to_TO death_NN with_IN arrows_NNS ._. The_DT
chief_NN sacrificer_NN next_IN tore_VBD out_RP her_PRP$ heart_NN and_CC devoured_VBD it_PRP ._. While_IN her_PRP$
flesh_NN was_VBD still_RB warm_JJ it_PRP was_VBD cut_VBN in_IN small_JJ pieces_NNS from_IN the_DT bones_NNS ,_, put_VBN
in_IN little_JJ baskets_NNS ,_, and_CC taken_VBN to_TO a_DT neighbouring_NN corn-field_NN ._. There_EX the_DT
head_NN chief_NN took_VBD a_DT piece_NN of_IN the_DT flesh_NN from_IN a_DT basket_NN and_CC squeezed_VBD a_DT
drop_NN of_IN blood_NN upon_IN the_DT newly-deposited_JJ grains_NNS of_IN corn_NN ._. His_PRP$ example_NN
was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN the_DT rest_NN ,_, till_IN all_PDT the_DT seed_NN had_VBD been_VBN sprinkled_VBN with_IN
the_DT blood_NN ;_: it_PRP was_VBD then_RB covered_VBN up_RP with_IN earth_NN ._. According_VBG to_TO one_CD
account_NN the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT victim_NN was_VBD reduced_VBN to_TO a_DT kind_NN of_IN paste_NN ,_, which_WDT
was_VBD rubbed_VBN or_CC sprinkled_VBN not_RB only_RB on_IN the_DT maize_NN but_CC also_RB on_IN the_DT
potatoes_NNS ,_, the_DT beans_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ seeds_NNS to_TO fertilise_VB them_PRP ._. By_IN this_DT
sacrifice_VB they_PRP hoped_VBD to_TO obtain_VB plentiful_JJ crops_NNS ._.

A_DT West_JJ African_JJ queen_NN used_VBD to_TO sacrifice_VB a_DT man_NN and_CC woman_NN in_IN the_DT month_NN
of_IN March_NNP ._. They_PRP were_VBD killed_VBN with_IN spades_NNS and_CC hoes_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ bodies_NNS
buried_VBN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN a_DT field_NN which_WDT had_VBD just_RB been_VBN tilled_VBN ._. At_IN Lagos_NNP
in_IN Guinea_NNP it_PRP was_VBD the_DT custom_NN annually_RB to_TO impale_VB a_DT young_JJ girl_NN alive_JJ
soon_RB after_IN the_DT spring_NN equinox_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO secure_VB good_JJ crops_NNS ._. Along_IN
with_IN her_PRP were_VBD sacrificed_JJ sheep_NN and_CC goats_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, with_IN yams_NNS ,_, heads_NNS of_IN
maize_NN ,_, and_CC plantains_NNS ,_, were_VBD hung_VBN on_IN stakes_NNS on_IN each_DT side_NN of_IN her_PRP ._. The_DT
victims_NNS were_VBD bred_VBN up_RP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN in_IN the_DT king_NN '_POS s_PRP seraglio_NN ,_, and_CC
their_PRP$ minds_NNS had_VBD been_VBN so_RB powerfully_RB wrought_VBD upon_IN by_IN the_DT fetish_JJ men_NNS
that_IN they_PRP went_VBD cheerfully_RB to_TO their_PRP$ fate_NN ._. A_DT similar_JJ sacrifice_NN used_VBN to_TO
be_VB annually_RB offered_VBN at_IN Benin_NNP ,_, in_IN Guinea_NNP ._. The_DT Marimos_NNPS ,_, a_DT Bechuana_NNP
tribe_NN ,_, sacrifice_VB a_DT human_JJ being_NN for_IN the_DT crops_NNS ._. The_DT victim_NN chosen_VBN is_VBZ
generally_RB a_DT short_JJ ,_, stout_JJ man_NN ._. He_PRP is_VBZ seized_VBN by_IN violence_NN or_CC
intoxicated_JJ and_CC taken_VBN to_TO the_DT fields_NNS ,_, where_WRB he_PRP is_VBZ killed_VBN amongst_IN the_DT
wheat_NN to_TO serve_VB as_IN "_`` seed_NN "_'' (_-LRB- so_RB they_PRP phrase_NN it_PRP )._VBD After_IN his_PRP$ blood_NN has_VBZ
coagulated_VBN in_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ burned_VBN along_IN with_IN the_DT frontal_JJ bone_NN ,_, the_DT
flesh_NN attached_VBN to_TO it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT brain_NN ;_: the_DT ashes_NNS are_VBP then_RB scattered_VBN
over_IN the_DT ground_NN to_TO fertilise_VB it_PRP ._. The_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN is_VBZ eaten_VBN ._.

The_DT Bagobos_NNP of_IN Mindanao_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT Philippine_NNP Islands_NNP ,_, offer_VBP a_DT
human_JJ sacrifice_NN before_IN they_PRP sow_VBP their_PRP$ rice_NN ._. The_DT victim_NN is_VBZ a_DT slave_NN ,_,
who_WP is_VBZ hewn_VBN to_TO pieces_NNS in_IN the_DT forest_NN ._. The_DT natives_NNS of_IN Bontoc_NNP in_IN the_DT
interior_NN of_IN Luzon_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT Philippine_NNP Islands_NNP ,_, are_VBP passionate_JJ
head-hunters_NNS ._. Their_PRP$ principal_JJ seasons_NNS for_IN head-hunting_NN are_VBP the_DT times_NNS
of_IN planting_NN and_CC reaping_VBG the_DT rice_NN ._. In_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT crop_NN may_MD turn_VB
out_RB well_RB ,_, every_DT farm_NN must_MD get_VB at_IN least_JJS one_CD human_JJ head_NN at_IN planting_VBG
and_CC one_CD at_IN sowing_NN ._. The_DT head-hunters_NNS go_VBP out_RP in_IN twos_NNS or_CC threes_NNS ,_, lie_VBP in_IN
wait_VB for_IN the_DT victim_NN ,_, whether_IN man_NN or_CC woman_NN ,_, cut_VBD off_RP his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ head_NN ,_,
hands_NNS ,_, and_CC feet_NNS ,_, and_CC bring_VB them_PRP back_RB in_IN haste_NN to_TO the_DT village_NN ,_, where_WRB
they_PRP are_VBP received_VBN with_IN great_JJ rejoicings_NNS ._. The_DT skulls_NNS are_VBP at_IN first_RB
exposed_VBN on_IN the_DT branches_NNS of_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD dead_JJ trees_NNS which_WDT stand_VBP in_IN an_DT
open_JJ space_NN of_IN every_DT village_NN surrounded_VBN by_IN large_JJ stones_NNS which_WDT serve_VBP
as_IN seats_NNS ._. The_DT people_NNS then_RB dance_VBP round_NN them_PRP and_CC feast_NN and_CC get_VB drunk_JJ ._.
When_WRB the_DT flesh_NN has_VBZ decayed_VBN from_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, the_DT man_NN who_WP cut_VBD it_PRP off_IN
takes_VBZ it_PRP home_NN and_CC preserves_VBZ it_PRP as_IN a_DT relic_NN ,_, while_IN his_PRP$ companions_NNS do_VBP
the_DT same_JJ with_IN the_DT hands_NNS and_CC the_DT feet_NNS ._. Similar_JJ customs_NNS are_VBP observed_VBN
by_IN the_DT Apoyaos_NNP ,_, another_DT tribe_NN in_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN Luzon_NNP ._.

Among_IN the_DT Lhota_NNP Naga_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT many_JJ savage_JJ tribes_NNS who_WP inhabit_VBP the_DT
deep_JJ rugged_JJ labyrinthine_NN glens_NNS which_WDT wind_VBP into_IN the_DT mountains_NNS from_IN
the_DT rich_JJ valley_NN of_IN Brahmapootra_NNP ,_, it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB a_DT common_JJ custom_NN to_TO
chop_VB off_RP the_DT heads_NNS ,_, hands_NNS ,_, and_CC feet_NNS of_IN people_NNS they_PRP met_VBD with_IN ,_, and_CC
then_RB to_TO stick_VB up_RP the_DT severed_VBN extremities_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ fields_NNS to_TO ensure_VB a_DT
good_JJ crop_NN of_IN grain_NN ._. They_PRP bore_VBD no_DT ill-will_NN whatever_WDT to_TO the_DT persons_NNS
upon_IN whom_WP they_PRP operated_VBD in_IN this_DT unceremonious_JJ fashion_NN ._. Once_RB they_PRP
flayed_VBD a_DT boy_NN alive_JJ ,_, carved_JJ him_PRP in_IN pieces_NNS ,_, and_CC distributed_VBD the_DT flesh_NN
among_IN all_PDT the_DT villagers_NNS ,_, who_WP put_VBD it_PRP into_IN their_PRP$ corn-bins_NNS to_TO avert_VB
bad_JJ luck_NN and_CC ensure_VB plentiful_JJ crops_NNS of_IN grain_NN ._. The_DT Gonds_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, a_DT
Dravidian_NN race_NN ,_, kidnapped_VBN Brahman_NNP boys_NNS ,_, and_CC kept_VBD them_PRP as_IN victims_NNS to_TO
be_VB sacrificed_VBN on_IN various_JJ occasions_NNS ._. At_IN sowing_NN and_CC reaping_NN ,_, after_IN a_DT
triumphal_JJ procession_NN ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT lads_NNS was_VBD slain_VBN by_IN being_VBG punctured_VBN
with_IN a_DT poisoned_JJ arrow_NN ._. His_PRP$ blood_NN was_VBD then_RB sprinkled_VBN over_IN the_DT
ploughed_VBD field_NN or_CC the_DT ripe_JJ crop_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ flesh_NN was_VBD devoured_VBN ._. The_DT
Oraons_NNS or_CC Uraons_NNS of_IN Chota_NNP Nagpur_NNP worship_NN a_DT goddess_NN called_VBN Anna_NNP
Kuari_NNP ,_, who_WP can_MD give_VB good_JJ crops_NNS and_CC make_VB a_DT man_NN rich_JJ ,_, but_CC to_TO induce_VB
her_PRP to_TO do_VB so_RB it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO offer_VB human_JJ sacrifices_NNS ._. In_IN spite_NN of_IN
the_DT vigilance_NN of_IN the_DT British_JJ Government_NN these_DT sacrifices_NNS are_VBP said_VBN to_TO
be_VB still_RB secretly_RB perpetrated_VBN ._. The_DT victims_NNS are_VBP poor_JJ waifs_NNS and_CC strays_NNS
whose_WP$ disappearance_NN attracts_VBZ no_DT notice_NN ._. April_NNP and_CC May_NNP are_VBP the_DT months_NNS
when_WRB the_DT catchpoles_NNS are_VBP out_RB on_IN the_DT prowl_NN ._. At_IN that_DT time_NN strangers_NNS
will_MD not_RB go_VB about_IN the_DT country_NN alone_RB ,_, and_CC parents_NNS will_MD not_RB let_VB their_PRP$
children_NNS enter_VBP the_DT jungle_NN or_CC herd_NN the_DT cattle_NNS ._. When_WRB a_DT catchpole_NN has_VBZ
found_VBD a_DT victim_NN ,_, he_PRP cuts_VBZ his_PRP$ throat_NN and_CC carries_VBZ away_RB the_DT upper_JJ part_NN
of_IN the_DT ring_NN finger_NN and_CC the_DT nose_NN ._. The_DT goddess_NN takes_VBZ up_RP her_PRP$ abode_NN in_IN
the_DT house_NN of_IN any_DT man_NN who_WP has_VBZ offered_VBN her_PRP a_DT sacrifice_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN that_WDT
time_NN his_PRP$ fields_NNS yield_VBP a_DT double_JJ harvest_NN ._. The_DT form_NN she_PRP assumes_VBZ in_IN the_DT
house_NN is_VBZ that_IN of_IN a_DT small_JJ child_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT householder_NN brings_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$
unhusked_VBN rice_NN ,_, he_PRP takes_VBZ the_DT goddess_JJ and_CC rolls_VBZ her_PRP over_IN the_DT heap_NN to_TO
double_JJ its_PRP$ size_NN ._. But_CC she_PRP soon_RB grows_VBZ restless_JJ and_CC can_MD only_RB be_VB
pacified_VBN with_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN fresh_JJ human_JJ victims_NNS ._.

But_CC the_DT best_RBS known_VBN case_NN of_IN human_JJ sacrifices_NNS ,_, systematically_RB offered_VBN
to_TO ensure_VB good_JJ crops_NNS ,_, is_VBZ supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Khonds_NNP or_CC Kandhs_NNP ,_, another_DT
Dravidian_NN race_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP ._. Our_PRP$ knowledge_NN of_IN them_PRP is_VBZ derived_VBN from_IN the_DT
accounts_NNS written_VBN by_IN British_JJ officers_NNS who_WP ,_, about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT
nineteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, were_VBD engaged_VBN in_IN putting_VBG them_PRP down_RP ._. The_DT
sacrifices_NNS were_VBD offered_VBN to_TO the_DT Earth_NNP Goddess_NNP ._. Tari_NNP Pennu_NNP or_CC Bera_NNP
Pennu_NNP ,_, and_CC were_VBD believed_VBN to_TO ensure_VB good_JJ crops_NNS and_CC immunity_NN from_IN all_PDT
disease_NN and_CC accidents_NNS ._. In_IN particular_JJ ,_, they_PRP were_VBD considered_VBN necessary_JJ
in_IN the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN turmeric_NN ,_, the_DT Khonds_NNS arguing_VBG that_IN the_DT turmeric_NN
could_MD not_RB have_VB a_DT deep_JJ red_JJ colour_NN without_IN the_DT shedding_NN of_IN blood_NN ._. The_DT
victim_NN or_CC Meriah_NNP ,_, as_IN he_PRP was_VBD called_VBN ,_, was_VBD acceptable_JJ to_TO the_DT goddess_NN
only_RB if_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN purchased_VBN ,_, or_CC had_VBD been_VBN born_VBN a_DT victim_NN --_: that_DT is_VBZ ,_,
the_DT son_NN of_IN a_DT victim_NN father_NN ,_, or_CC had_VBD been_VBN devoted_VBN as_IN a_DT child_NN by_IN his_PRP$
father_NN or_CC guardian_NN ._. Khonds_'' in_IN distress_NN often_RB sold_VBD their_PRP$ children_NNS for_IN
victims_NNS ,_, "_'' considering_VBG the_DT beatification_NN of_IN their_PRP$ souls_NNS certain_JJ ,_, and_CC
their_PRP$ death_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN mankind_NN ,_, the_DT most_RBS honourable_JJ
possible_JJ ."_IN A_DT man_NN of_IN the_DT Panua_NNP tribe_NN was_VBD once_RB seen_VBN to_TO load_VB a_DT Khond_NNP
with_IN curses_NNS ,_, and_CC finally_RB to_TO spit_VB in_IN his_PRP$ face_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT Khond_NNP had_VBD
sold_VBN for_IN a_DT victim_NN his_PRP$ own_JJ child_NN ,_, whom_WP the_DT Panua_NNP had_VBD wished_VBN to_TO marry_VB ._.
A_DT party_NN of_IN Khonds_NNP ,_, who_WP saw_VBD this_DT ,_, immediately_RB pressed_VBD forward_RB to_TO
comfort_NN the_DT seller_NN of_IN his_PRP$ child_NN ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_`` Your_PRP$ child_NN has_VBZ died_VBN that_IN
all_PDT the_DT world_NN may_MD live_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT Earth_NNP Goddess_NNP herself_PRP will_MD wipe_VB that_IN
spittle_NN from_IN your_PRP$ face_NN ."_JJ The_DT victims_NNS were_VBD often_RB kept_VBN for_IN years_NNS
before_IN they_PRP were_VBD sacrificed_VBN ._. Being_VBG regarded_VBN as_IN consecrated_VBN beings_NNS ,_,
they_PRP were_VBD treated_VBN with_IN extreme_JJ affection_NN ,_, mingled_VBD with_IN deference_NN ,_,
and_CC were_VBD welcomed_VBN wherever_WRB they_PRP went_VBD ._. A_DT Meriah_NNP youth_NN ,_, on_IN attaining_VBG
maturity_NN ,_, was_VBD generally_RB given_VBN a_DT wife_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD herself_PRP usually_RB a_DT
Meriah_NNP or_CC victim_NN ;_: and_CC with_IN her_PRP$ he_PRP received_VBD a_DT portion_NN of_IN land_NN and_CC
farm-stock_NN ._. Their_PRP$ offspring_NN were_VBD also_RB victims_NNS ._. Human_NN sacrifices_NNS were_VBD
offered_VBN to_TO the_DT Earth_NNP Goddess_NNP by_IN tribes_NNS ,_, branches_NNS of_IN tribes_NNS ,_, or_CC
villages_NNS ,_, both_DT at_IN periodical_JJ festivals_NNS and_CC on_IN extraordinary_JJ
occasions_NNS ._. The_DT periodical_JJ sacrifices_NNS were_VBD generally_RB so_RB arranged_VBN by_IN
tribes_NNS and_CC divisions_NNS of_IN tribes_NNS that_IN each_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT family_NN was_VBD
enabled_VBD ,_, at_IN least_JJS once_RB a_DT year_NN ,_, to_TO procure_VB a_DT shred_JJ of_IN flesh_NN for_IN his_PRP$
fields_NNS ,_, generally_RB about_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB his_PRP$ chief_NN crop_NN was_VBD laid_VBN down_RP ._.

The_DT mode_NN of_IN performing_VBG these_DT tribal_JJ sacrifices_NNS was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ ._. Ten_CD
or_CC twelve_CD days_NNS before_IN the_DT sacrifice_NN ,_, the_DT victim_NN was_VBD devoted_VBN by_IN
cutting_VBG off_RP his_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, until_IN then_RB ,_, had_VBD been_VBN kept_VBN unshorn_JJ ._.
Crowds_NNS of_IN men_NNS and_CC women_NNS assembled_VBN to_TO witness_VB the_DT sacrifice_NN ;_: none_NN
might_MD be_VB excluded_VBN ,_, since_IN the_DT sacrifice_NN was_VBD declared_VBN to_TO be_VB for_IN all_DT
mankind_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD preceded_VBN by_IN several_JJ days_NNS of_IN wild_JJ revelry_NN and_CC gross_JJ
debauchery_NN ._. On_IN the_DT day_NN before_IN the_DT sacrifice_NN the_DT victim_NN ,_, dressed_VBN in_IN a_DT
new_JJ garment_NN ,_, was_VBD led_VBN forth_RB from_IN the_DT village_NN in_IN solemn_JJ procession_NN ,_,
with_IN music_NN and_CC dancing_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT Meriah_NNP grove_NN ,_, a_DT clump_NN of_IN high_JJ forest_NN
trees_NNS standing_VBG a_DT little_JJ way_NN from_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC untouched_JJ by_IN the_DT
axe_NN ._. There_EX they_PRP tied_VBD him_PRP to_TO a_DT post_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD sometimes_RB placed_VBN
between_IN two_CD plants_NNS of_IN the_DT sankissar_NN shrub_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD then_RB anointed_VBN with_IN
oil_NN ,_, ghee_NN ,_, and_CC turmeric_JJ ,_, and_CC adorned_VBD with_IN flowers_NNS ;_: and_CC "_`` a_DT species_NN of_IN
reverence_NN ,_, which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB easy_JJ to_TO distinguish_VB from_IN adoration_NN ,"_NN was_VBD
paid_VBN to_TO him_PRP throughout_IN the_DT day_NN ._. A_DT great_JJ struggle_NN now_RB arose_VBD to_TO obtain_VB
the_DT smallest_JJS relic_NN from_IN his_PRP$ person_NN ;_: a_DT particle_NN of_IN the_DT turmeric_JJ paste_NN
with_IN which_WDT he_PRP was_VBD smeared_VBN ,_, or_CC a_DT drop_NN of_IN his_PRP$ spittle_NN ,_, was_VBD esteemed_VBN of_IN
sovereign_JJ virtue_NN ,_, especially_RB by_IN the_DT women_NNS ._. The_DT crowd_NN danced_VBD round_RB
the_DT post_NN to_TO music_NN ,_, and_CC addressing_VBG the_DT earth_NN ,_, said_VBD ,_, "_`` O_UH God_NNP ,_, we_PRP offer_VBP
this_DT sacrifice_NN to_TO you_PRP ;_: give_VB us_PRP good_JJ crops_NNS ,_, seasons_NNS ,_, and_CC health_NN ";_NN
then_RB speaking_VBG to_TO the_DT victim_NN they_PRP said_VBD ,_, "_`` We_PRP bought_VBD you_PRP with_IN a_DT price_NN ,_,
and_CC did_VBD not_RB seize_VB you_PRP ;_: now_RB we_PRP sacrifice_VB you_PRP according_VBG to_TO custom_NN ,_, and_CC
no_DT sin_NN rests_VBZ with_IN us_PRP ."_.

On_IN the_DT last_JJ morning_NN the_DT orgies_NNS ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN scarcely_RB interrupted_VBN
during_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, were_VBD resumed_VBN ,_, and_CC continued_VBD till_IN noon_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP
ceased_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT assembly_NN proceeded_VBD to_TO consummate_VB the_DT sacrifice_NN ._. The_DT
victim_NN was_VBD again_RB anointed_VBN with_IN oil_NN ,_, and_CC each_DT person_NN touched_VBD the_DT
anointed_DT part_NN ,_, and_CC wiped_VBD the_DT oil_NN on_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ head_NN ._. In_IN some_DT places_NNS
they_PRP took_VBD the_DT victim_NN in_IN procession_NN round_VBP the_DT village_NN ,_, from_IN door_NN to_TO
door_NN ,_, where_WRB some_DT plucked_VBD hair_NN from_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, and_CC others_NNS begged_VBD for_IN a_DT
drop_NN of_IN his_PRP$ spittle_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT they_PRP anointed_VBD their_PRP$ heads_NNS ._. As_IN the_DT
victim_NN might_MD not_RB be_VB bound_VBN nor_CC make_VBP any_DT show_NN of_IN resistance_NN ,_, the_DT bones_NNS
of_IN his_PRP$ arms_NNS and_CC ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, his_PRP$ legs_NNS were_VBD broken_VBN ;_: but_CC often_RB this_DT
precaution_NN was_VBD rendered_VBN unnecessary_JJ by_IN stupefying_VBG him_PRP with_IN opium_NN ._.
The_DT mode_NN of_IN putting_VBG him_PRP to_TO death_NN varied_VBN in_IN different_JJ places_NNS ._. One_CD of_IN
the_DT commonest_NN modes_NNS seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN strangulation_NN ,_, or_CC squeezing_VBG
to_TO death_NN ._. The_DT branch_NN of_IN a_DT green_JJ tree_NN was_VBD cleft_VBN several_JJ feet_NNS down_IN the_DT
middle_NN ;_: the_DT victim_NN '_POS s_PRP neck_NN (_-LRB- in_IN other_JJ places_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ chest_NN )_-RRB- was_VBD inserted_VBN
in_IN the_DT cleft_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT priest_NN ,_, aided_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ assistants_NNS ,_, strove_VBD with_IN
all_DT his_PRP$ force_NN to_TO close_VB ._. Then_RB he_PRP wounded_VBN the_DT victim_NN slightly_RB with_IN his_PRP$
axe_NN ,_, whereupon_IN the_DT crowd_NN rushed_VBD at_IN the_DT wretch_NN and_CC hewed_VBD the_DT flesh_NN
from_IN the_DT bones_NNS ,_, leaving_VBG the_DT head_NN and_CC bowels_NNS untouched_JJ ._. Sometimes_RB he_PRP
was_VBD cut_VBN up_RP alive_JJ ._. In_IN Chinna_NNP Kimedy_NNP he_PRP was_VBD dragged_VBN along_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_,
surrounded_VBN by_IN the_DT crowd_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, avoiding_VBG his_PRP$ head_NN and_CC intestines_NNS ,_,
hacked_VBD the_DT flesh_NN from_IN his_PRP$ body_NN with_IN their_PRP$ knives_NNS till_IN he_PRP died_VBD ._.
Another_DT very_RB common_JJ mode_NN of_IN sacrifice_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ district_NN was_VBD to_TO
fasten_RB the_DT victim_NN to_TO the_DT proboscis_NN of_IN a_DT wooden_JJ elephant_NN ,_, which_WDT
revolved_VBN on_IN a_DT stout_NN post_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, as_IN it_PRP whirled_VBD round_RB ,_, the_DT crowd_NN cut_NN
the_DT flesh_NN from_IN the_DT victim_NN while_IN life_NN remained_VBD ._. In_IN some_DT villages_NNS
Major_NNP Campbell_NNP found_VBD as_RB many_JJ as_IN fourteen_CD of_IN these_DT wooden_JJ elephants_NNS ,_,
which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN used_VBN at_IN sacrifices_NNS ._. In_IN one_CD district_NN the_DT victim_NN was_VBD
put_VBN to_TO death_NN slowly_RB by_IN fire_NN ._. A_DT low_JJ stage_NN was_VBD formed_VBN ,_, sloping_VBG on_IN
either_DT side_NN like_IN a_DT roof_NN ;_: upon_IN it_PRP they_PRP laid_VBD the_DT victim_NN ,_, his_PRP$ limbs_NNS
wound_NN round_RB with_IN cords_NNS to_TO confine_VB his_PRP$ struggles_NNS ._. Fires_NNPS were_VBD then_RB
lighted_VBN and_CC hot_JJ brands_NNS applied_VBD ,_, to_TO make_VB him_PRP roll_VB up_RB and_CC down_RB the_DT
slopes_NNS of_IN the_DT stage_NN as_RB long_RB as_IN possible_JJ ;_: for_IN the_DT more_JJR tears_NNS he_PRP shed_VBD
the_DT more_RBR abundant_JJ would_MD be_VB the_DT supply_NN of_IN rain_NN ._. Next_JJ day_NN the_DT body_NN was_VBD
cut_NN to_TO pieces_NNS ._.

The_DT flesh_NN cut_NN from_IN the_DT victim_NN was_VBD instantly_RB taken_VBN home_NN by_IN the_DT
persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN deputed_VBN by_IN each_DT village_NN to_TO bring_VB it_PRP ._. To_TO secure_VB
its_PRP$ rapid_JJ arrival_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD sometimes_RB forwarded_VBN by_IN relays_NNS of_IN men_NNS ,_, and_CC
conveyed_VBN with_IN postal_JJ fleetness_NN fifty_CD or_CC sixty_CD miles_NNS ._. In_IN each_DT village_NN
all_DT who_WP stayed_VBD at_IN home_NN fasted_JJ rigidly_RB until_IN the_DT flesh_NN arrived_VBD ._. The_DT
bearer_NN deposited_VBD it_PRP in_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN public_JJ assembly_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD
received_VBN by_IN the_DT priest_NN and_CC the_DT heads_NNS of_IN families_NNS ._. The_DT priest_NN divided_VBN
it_PRP into_IN two_CD portions_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN which_WDT he_PRP offered_VBD to_TO the_DT Earth_NNP Goddess_NNP
by_IN burying_VBG it_PRP in_IN a_DT hole_NN in_IN the_DT ground_NN with_IN his_PRP$ back_NN turned_VBD ,_, and_CC
without_IN looking_VBG ._. Then_RB each_DT man_NN added_VBD a_DT little_JJ earth_NN to_TO bury_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC
the_DT priest_NN poured_VBD water_NN on_IN the_DT spot_NN from_IN a_DT hill_NN gourd_NN ._. The_DT other_JJ
portion_NN of_IN flesh_NN he_PRP divided_VBD into_IN as_IN many_JJ shares_NNS as_IN there_EX were_VBD heads_NNS
of_IN houses_NNS present_JJ ._. Each_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN rolled_VBD his_PRP$ shred_JJ of_IN flesh_NN in_IN
leaves_NNS ,_, and_CC buried_VBD it_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ favourite_JJ field_NN ,_, placing_VBG it_PRP in_IN the_DT
earth_NN behind_IN his_PRP$ back_NN without_IN looking_VBG ._. In_IN some_DT places_NNS each_DT man_NN
carried_VBD his_PRP$ portion_NN of_IN flesh_NN to_TO the_DT stream_NN which_WDT watered_VBD his_PRP$ fields_NNS ,_,
and_CC there_EX hung_VBD it_PRP on_IN a_DT pole_NN ._. For_IN three_CD days_NNS thereafter_RB no_DT house_NN was_VBD
swept_VBN ;_: and_CC ,_, in_IN one_CD district_NN ,_, strict_JJ silence_NN was_VBD observed_VBN ,_, no_DT fire_NN
might_MD be_VB given_VBN out_RP ,_, no_DT wood_NN cut_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT strangers_NNS received_VBD ._. The_DT
remains_VBZ of_IN the_DT human_JJ victim_NN (_-LRB- namely_RB ,_, the_DT head_NN ,_, bowels_NNS ,_, and_CC bones_NNS )_-RRB-
were_VBD watched_VBN by_IN strong_JJ parties_NNS the_DT night_NN after_IN the_DT sacrifice_NN ;_: and_CC
next_JJ morning_NN they_PRP were_VBD burned_VBN ,_, along_IN with_IN a_DT whole_JJ sheep_NN ,_, on_IN a_DT
funeral_NN pile_NN ._. The_DT ashes_NNS were_VBD scattered_VBN over_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, laid_VBN as_IN
paste_NN over_IN the_DT houses_NNS and_CC granaries_NNS ,_, or_CC mixed_JJ with_IN the_DT new_JJ corn_NN to_TO
preserve_VB it_PRP from_IN insects_NNS ._. Sometimes_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT head_NN and_CC bones_NNS
were_VBD buried_VBN ,_, not_RB burnt_JJ ._. After_IN the_DT suppression_NN of_IN the_DT human_NN
sacrifices_NNS ,_, inferior_JJ victims_NNS were_VBD substituted_VBN in_IN some_DT places_NNS ;_: for_IN
instance_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT capital_NN of_IN Chinna_NNP Kimedy_NNP a_DT goat_NN took_VBD the_DT place_NN of_IN
the_DT human_JJ victim_NN ._. Others_NNS sacrifice_VB a_DT buffalo_NN ._. They_PRP tie_VB it_PRP to_TO a_DT
wooden_JJ post_NN in_IN a_DT sacred_JJ grove_NN ,_, dance_VB wildly_RB round_JJ it_PRP with_IN brandished_NN
knives_NNS ,_, then_RB ,_, falling_VBG on_IN the_DT living_VBG animal_NN ,_, hack_VB it_PRP to_TO shreds_NNS and_CC
tatters_NNS in_IN a_DT few_JJ minutes_NNS ,_, fighting_VBG and_CC struggling_VBG with_IN each_DT other_JJ
for_IN every_DT particle_NN of_IN flesh_NN ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN a_DT man_NN has_VBZ secured_VBN a_DT piece_NN he_PRP
makes_VBZ off_RP with_IN it_PRP at_IN full_JJ speed_NN to_TO bury_VB it_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ fields_NNS ,_, according_VBG
to_TO ancient_JJ custom_NN ,_, before_IN the_DT sun_NN has_VBZ set_VBN ,_, and_CC as_IN some_DT of_IN them_PRP have_VBP
far_RB to_TO go_VB they_PRP must_MD run_VB very_RB fast_RB ._. All_PDT the_DT women_NNS throw_VBP clods_NNS of_IN
earth_NN at_IN the_DT rapidly_RB retreating_VBG figures_NNS of_IN the_DT men_NNS ,_, some_DT of_IN them_PRP
taking_VBG very_RB good_JJ aim_NN ._. Soon_RB the_DT sacred_JJ grove_NN ,_, so_RB lately_RB a_DT scene_NN of_IN
tumult_NN ,_, is_VBZ silent_JJ and_CC deserted_JJ except_IN for_IN a_DT few_JJ people_NNS who_WP remain_VBP to_TO
guard_NN all_DT that_DT is_VBZ left_VBN of_IN the_DT buffalo_NN ,_, to_TO wit_NN ,_, the_DT head_NN ,_, the_DT bones_NNS ,_,
and_CC the_DT stomach_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP burned_VBN with_IN ceremony_NN at_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN the_DT
stake_NN ._.

In_IN these_DT Khond_JJ sacrifices_NNS the_DT Meriahs_NNS are_VBP represented_VBN by_IN our_PRP$
authorities_NNS as_IN victims_NNS offered_VBD to_TO propitiate_VB the_DT Earth_NNP Goddess_NNP ._. But_CC
from_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN the_DT victims_NNS both_DT before_IN and_CC after_IN death_NN it_PRP
appears_VBZ that_IN the_DT custom_NN cannot_MD be_VB explained_VBN as_IN merely_RB a_DT propitiatory_NN
sacrifice_NN ._. A_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT flesh_NN certainly_RB was_VBD offered_VBN to_TO the_DT Earth_NN
Goddess_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT rest_NN was_VBD buried_VBN by_IN each_DT householder_NN in_IN his_PRP$ fields_NNS ,_,
and_CC the_DT ashes_NNS of_IN the_DT other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT body_NN were_VBD scattered_VBN over_IN the_DT
fields_NNS ,_, laid_VBN as_IN paste_NN on_IN the_DT granaries_NNS ,_, or_CC mixed_JJ with_IN the_DT new_JJ corn_NN ._.
These_DT latter_JJ customs_NNS imply_VBP that_IN to_TO the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT Meriah_NNP there_RB was_VBD
ascribed_VBN a_DT direct_JJ or_CC intrinsic_JJ power_NN of_IN making_VBG the_DT crops_NNS to_TO grow_VB ,_,
quite_RB independent_JJ of_IN the_DT indirect_JJ efficacy_NN which_WDT it_PRP might_MD have_VB as_IN an_DT
offering_VBG to_TO secure_VB the_DT good-will_NN of_IN the_DT deity_NN ._. In_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, the_DT
flesh_NN and_CC ashes_NNS of_IN the_DT victim_NN were_VBD believed_VBN to_TO be_VB endowed_VBN with_IN a_DT
magical_JJ or_CC physical_JJ power_NN of_IN fertilising_VBG the_DT land_NN ._. The_DT same_JJ
intrinsic_JJ power_NN was_VBD ascribed_VBN to_TO the_DT blood_NN and_CC tears_NNS of_IN the_DT Meriah_NNP ,_,
his_PRP$ blood_NN causing_VBG the_DT redness_NN of_IN the_DT turmeric_NN and_CC his_PRP$ tears_NNS
producing_VBG rain_NN ;_: for_IN it_PRP can_MD hardly_RB be_VB doubted_VBD that_IN ,_, originally_RB at_IN
least_JJS ,_, the_DT tears_NNS were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO bring_VB down_RP the_DT rain_NN ,_, not_RB merely_RB to_TO
prognosticate_VB it_PRP ._. Similarly_RB the_DT custom_NN of_IN pouring_VBG water_NN on_IN the_DT
buried_VBN flesh_NN of_IN the_DT Meriah_NNP was_VBD no_DT doubt_NN a_DT rain-charm_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, magical_JJ
power_NN as_IN an_DT attribute_NN of_IN the_DT Meriah_NNP appears_VBZ in_IN the_DT sovereign_JJ virtue_NN
believed_VBN to_TO reside_VB in_IN anything_NN that_WDT came_VBD from_IN his_PRP$ person_NN ,_, as_IN his_PRP$
hair_NN or_CC spittle_NN ._. The_DT ascription_NN of_IN such_JJ power_NN to_TO the_DT Meriah_NNP
indicates_VBZ that_IN he_PRP was_VBD much_RB more_JJR than_IN a_DT mere_JJ man_NN sacrificed_VBD to_TO
propitiate_VB a_DT deity_NN ._. Once_RB more_RBR ,_, the_DT extreme_JJ reverence_NN paid_VBD him_PRP points_NNS
to_TO the_DT same_JJ conclusion_NN ._. Major_NNP Campbell_NNP speaks_VBZ of_IN the_DT Meriah_NNP as_IN
"_`` being_VBG regarded_VBN as_IN something_NN more_JJR than_IN mortal_JJ ,"_NN and_CC Major_NNP Macpherson_NNP
says_VBZ ,_, "_`` A_DT species_NN of_IN reverence_NN ,_, which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB easy_JJ to_TO distinguish_VB
from_IN adoration_NN ,_, is_VBZ paid_VBN to_TO him_PRP ."_IN In_IN short_JJ ,_, the_DT Meriah_NNP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB
been_VBN regarded_VBN as_IN divine_JJ ._. As_IN such_JJ ,_, he_PRP may_MD originally_RB have_VB represented_VBN
the_DT Earth_NNP Goddess_NNP or_CC ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, a_DT deity_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ;_: though_RB in_IN
later_RB times_NNS he_PRP came_VBD to_TO be_VB regarded_VBN rather_RB as_IN a_DT victim_NN offered_VBN to_TO a_DT
deity_NN than_IN as_IN himself_PRP an_DT incarnate_JJ god_NN ._. This_DT later_RB view_NN of_IN the_DT
Meriah_NNP as_IN a_DT victim_NN rather_RB than_IN a_DT divinity_NN may_MD perhaps_RB have_VB received_VBN
undue_VBP emphasis_NN from_IN the_DT European_JJ writers_NNS who_WP have_VBP described_VBN the_DT
Khond_NNP religion_NN ._. Habituated_VBD to_TO the_DT later_JJ idea_NN of_IN sacrifice_NN as_IN an_DT
offering_NN made_VBD to_TO a_DT god_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN conciliating_VBG his_PRP$ favour_NN ,_,
European_JJ observers_NNS are_VBP apt_JJ to_TO interpret_VB all_DT religious_JJ slaughter_NN in_IN
this_DT sense_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO suppose_VB that_IN wherever_WRB such_JJ slaughter_NN takes_VBZ place_NN ,_,
there_EX must_MD necessarily_RB be_VB a_DT deity_NN to_TO whom_WP the_DT carnage_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN by_IN
the_DT slayers_NNS to_TO be_VB acceptable_JJ ._. Thus_RB their_PRP$ preconceived_JJ ideas_NNS may_MD
unconsciously_RB colour_NN and_CC warp_VBD their_PRP$ descriptions_NNS of_IN savage_JJ rites_NNS ._.

The_DT same_JJ custom_NN of_IN killing_VBG the_DT representative_NN of_IN a_DT god_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT
strong_JJ traces_NNS appear_VBP in_IN the_DT Khond_NNP sacrifices_NNS ,_, may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB
detected_VBN in_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT other_JJ human_JJ sacrifices_NNS described_VBN above_IN ._. Thus_RB
the_DT ashes_NNS of_IN the_DT slaughtered_VBN Marimo_NNP were_VBD scattered_VBN over_IN the_DT fields_NNS ;_:
the_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT Brahman_NNP lad_NN was_VBD put_VBN on_IN the_DT crop_NN and_CC field_NN ;_: the_DT
flesh_NN of_IN the_DT slain_NN Naga_NNP was_VBD stowed_VBN in_IN the_DT corn-bin_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT blood_NN of_IN
the_DT Sioux_NNP girl_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO trickle_VB on_IN the_DT seed_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT
identification_NN of_IN the_DT victim_NN with_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, the_DT view_NN
that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ an_DT embodiment_NN or_CC spirit_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, is_VBZ brought_VBN out_RP in_IN
the_DT pains_NNS which_WDT seem_VBP to_TO be_VB taken_VBN to_TO secure_VB a_DT physical_JJ correspondence_NN
between_IN him_PRP and_CC the_DT natural_JJ object_NN which_WDT he_PRP embodies_VBZ or_CC represents_VBZ ._.
Thus_RB the_DT Mexicans_NNPS killed_VBD young_JJ victims_NNS for_IN the_DT young_JJ corn_NN and_CC old_JJ
ones_NNS for_IN the_DT ripe_JJ corn_NN ;_: the_DT Marimos_NNP sacrifice_NN ,_, as_IN "_`` seed_NN ,"_, a_DT short_JJ ,_,
fat_JJ man_NN ,_, the_DT shortness_NN of_IN his_PRP$ stature_NN corresponding_JJ to_TO that_DT of_IN the_DT
young_JJ corn_NN ,_, his_PRP$ fatness_NN to_TO the_DT condition_NN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ desired_VBN that_IN
the_DT crops_NNS may_MD attain_VB ;_: and_CC the_DT Pawnees_NNS fattened_VBD their_PRP$ victims_NNS
probably_RB with_IN the_DT same_JJ view_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT identification_NN of_IN the_DT victim_NN
with_IN the_DT corn_NN comes_VBZ out_RP in_IN the_DT African_JJ custom_NN of_IN killing_VBG him_PRP with_IN
spades_NNS and_CC hoes_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT Mexican_JJ custom_NN of_IN grinding_VBG him_PRP ,_, like_IN corn_NN ,_,
between_IN two_CD stones_NNS ._.

One_CD more_JJR point_NN in_IN these_DT savage_JJ customs_NNS deserves_VBZ to_TO be_VB noted_VBN ._. The_DT
Pawnee_NNP chief_NN devoured_VBD the_DT heart_NN of_IN the_DT Sioux_NNP girl_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Marimos_NNPS
and_CC Gonds_NNP ate_VBD the_DT victim_NN '_POS s_VBZ flesh_NN ._. If_IN ,_, as_IN we_PRP suppose_VBP ,_, the_DT victim_NN was_VBD
regarded_VBN as_IN divine_JJ ,_, it_PRP follows_VBZ that_IN in_IN eating_VBG his_PRP$ flesh_NN his_PRP$
worshippers_NNS believed_VBD themselves_PRP to_TO be_VB partaking_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN their_PRP$
god_NN ._.



4._DT The_DT Corn-spirit_NNP slain_NN in_IN his_PRP$ Human_NNP Representatives_NNPS

THE_DT BARBAROUS_NNP rites_VBZ just_RB described_VBN offer_NN analogies_NNS to_TO the_DT harvest_NN
customs_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ._. Thus_RB the_DT fertilising_JJ virtue_NN ascribed_VBN to_TO the_DT
corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ shown_VBN equally_RB in_IN the_DT savage_JJ custom_NN of_IN mixing_VBG the_DT
victim_NN '_POS s_VBZ blood_NN or_CC ashes_NNS with_IN the_DT seed-corn_NN and_CC the_DT European_JJ custom_NN
of_IN mixing_VBG the_DT grain_NN from_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN with_IN the_DT young_JJ corn_NN in_IN
spring_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT identification_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN with_IN the_DT corn_NN
appears_VBZ alike_RB in_IN the_DT savage_JJ custom_NN of_IN adapting_VBG the_DT age_NN and_CC stature_NN
of_IN the_DT victim_NN to_TO the_DT age_NN and_CC stature_NN ,_, whether_IN actual_JJ or_CC expected_VBN ,_, of_IN
the_DT crop_NN ;_: in_IN the_DT Scotch_NN and_CC Styrian_JJ rules_NNS that_WDT when_WRB the_DT corn-spirit_NN
is_VBZ conceived_VBN as_IN the_DT Maiden_NNP the_DT last_JJ corn_NN shall_MD be_VB cut_VBN by_IN a_DT young_JJ
maiden_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ conceived_VBN as_IN the_DT Corn-mother_NN it_PRP shall_MD be_VB cut_VBN
by_IN an_DT old_JJ woman_NN ;_: in_IN the_DT warning_NN given_VBN to_TO old_JJ women_NNS in_IN Lorraine_NNP to_TO
save_VB themselves_PRP when_WRB the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NNP is_VBZ being_VBG killed_VBN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, when_WRB
the_DT last_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ being_VBG threshed_VBN ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT Tyrolese_JJ expectation_NN
that_IN if_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP gives_VBZ the_DT last_JJ stroke_NN at_IN threshing_NN is_VBZ tall_JJ ,_, the_DT
next_JJ year_NN '_POS s_VBZ corn_NN will_MD be_VB tall_JJ also_RB ._. Further_RB ,_, the_DT same_JJ identification_NN
is_VBZ implied_VBN in_IN the_DT savage_JJ custom_NN of_IN killing_VBG the_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN with_IN hoes_NNS or_CC spades_NNS or_CC by_IN grinding_VBG him_PRP between_IN stones_NNS ,_,
and_CC in_IN the_DT European_JJ custom_NN of_IN pretending_VBG to_TO kill_VB him_PRP with_IN the_DT scythe_NN
or_CC the_DT flail_NN ._. Once_RB more_RBR the_DT Khond_NNP custom_NN of_IN pouring_VBG water_NN on_IN the_DT
buried_VBN flesh_NN of_IN the_DT victim_NN is_VBZ parallel_RB to_TO the_DT European_JJ customs_NNS of_IN
pouring_VBG water_NN on_IN the_DT personal_JJ representative_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN or_CC
plunging_VBG him_PRP into_IN a_DT stream_NN ._. Both_DT the_DT Khond_NNP and_CC the_DT European_JJ customs_NNS
are_VBP rain-charms_NNS ._.

To_TO return_VB now_RB to_TO the_DT Lityerses_NNP story_NN ._. It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN shown_VBN that_IN in_IN rude_JJ
society_NN human_JJ beings_NNS have_VBP been_VBN commonly_RB killed_VBN to_TO promote_VB the_DT growth_NN
of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ._. There_EX is_VBZ therefore_RB no_DT improbability_NN in_IN the_DT supposition_NN
that_IN they_PRP may_MD once_RB have_VB been_VBN killed_VBN for_IN a_DT like_JJ purpose_NN in_IN Phrygia_NNP
and_CC Europe_NNP ;_: and_CC when_WRB Phrygian_JJ legend_NN and_CC European_JJ folk-custom_NN ,_,
closely_RB agreeing_VBG with_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_, point_NN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN men_NNS
were_VBD so_RB slain_JJ ,_, we_PRP are_VBP bound_VBN ,_, provisionally_RB at_IN least_JJS ,_, to_TO accept_VB the_DT
conclusion_NN ._. Further_RB ,_, both_CC the_DT Lityerses_NNS story_NN and_CC European_JJ

victim_NN slain_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT crops_NNS flourish_VBP ._. On_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, we_PRP may_MD
fairly_RB suppose_VB that_IN both_DT in_IN Phrygia_NNP and_CC in_IN Europe_NNP the_DT representative_NN
of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN was_VBD annually_RB killed_VBN upon_IN the_DT harvest-field_NN ._.
Grounds_NNS have_VBP been_VBN already_RB shown_VBN for_IN believing_VBG that_IN similarly_RB in_IN
Europe_NNP the_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT tree-spirit_NN was_VBD annually_RB slain_VB ._. The_DT
proofs_NNS of_IN these_DT two_CD remarkable_JJ and_CC closely_RB analogous_JJ customs_NNS are_VBP
entirely_RB independent_JJ of_IN each_DT other_JJ ._. Their_PRP$ coincidence_NN seems_VBZ to_TO
furnish_JJ fresh_JJ presumption_NN in_IN favour_NN of_IN both_DT ._.

To_TO the_DT question_NN ,_, How_WRB was_VBD the_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN
chosen_VBN ?_. one_CD answer_NN has_VBZ been_VBN already_RB given_VBN ._. Both_PDT the_DT Lityerses_NNS story_NN
and_CC European_JJ folk-custom_JJ show_NN that_IN passing_JJ strangers_NNS were_VBD regarded_VBN
as_IN manifestations_NNS of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN escaping_VBG from_IN the_DT cut_NN or_CC
threshed_JJ corn_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN such_JJ were_VBD seized_VBN and_CC slain_VBN ._. But_CC this_DT is_VBZ not_RB
the_DT only_JJ answer_NN which_WDT the_DT evidence_NN suggests_VBZ ._. According_VBG to_TO the_DT
Phrygian_JJ legend_NN the_DT victims_NNS of_IN Lityerses_NNS were_VBD not_RB simply_RB passing_VBG
strangers_NNS ,_, but_CC persons_NNS whom_WP he_PRP had_VBD vanquished_VBN in_IN a_DT reaping_NN contest_NN
and_CC afterwards_RB wrapt_VBD up_RP in_IN corn-sheaves_NNS and_CC beheaded_VBD ._. This_DT suggests_VBZ
that_IN the_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN may_MD have_VB been_VBN selected_VBN by_IN
means_NNS of_IN a_DT competition_NN on_IN the_DT harvest-field_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT vanquished_VBN
competitor_NN was_VBD compelled_VBN to_TO accept_VB the_DT fatal_JJ honour_NN ._. The_DT supposition_NN
is_VBZ countenanced_VBN by_IN European_JJ harvest-customs_NNS ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN in_IN

being_VBG last_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP is_VBZ vanquished_VBN in_IN this_DT

handled_VBN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ we_PRP have_VBP not_RB found_VBN that_IN a_DT pretence_NN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN
killing_VBG him_PRP ;_: but_CC on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN we_PRP have_VBP found_VBN that_IN a_DT pretence_NN is_VBZ
made_VBN of_IN killing_VBG the_DT man_NN who_WP gives_VBZ the_DT last_JJ stroke_NN at_IN threshing_NN ,_, that_WDT
is_VBZ ,_, who_WP is_VBZ vanquished_VBN in_IN the_DT threshing_NN contest_NN ._. Now_RB ,_, since_IN it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN
the_DT character_NN of_IN representative_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN that_IN the_DT thresher_NN
of_IN the_DT last_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ slain_VBN in_IN mimicry_NN ,_, and_CC since_IN the_DT same_JJ
representative_JJ character_NN attaches_NNS (_-LRB- as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN )_-RRB- to_TO the_DT cutter_NN
and_CC binder_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN to_TO the_DT thresher_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ corn_NN ,_, and_CC since_IN
the_DT same_JJ repugnance_NN is_VBZ evinced_VBN by_IN harvesters_NNS to_TO be_VB last_JJ in_IN any_DT one_CD
of_IN these_DT labours_NNS ,_, we_PRP may_MD conjecture_VB that_IN a_DT pretence_NN has_VBZ been_VBN

thresher_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ corn_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN ancient_JJ times_NNS this_DT killing_NN
was_VBD actually_RB carried_VBN out_RP ._. This_DT conjecture_NN is_VBZ corroborated_VBN by_IN the_DT
common_JJ superstition_NN that_IN whoever_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ corn_NN must_MD die_VB soon_RB ._.
Sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN that_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP binds_VBZ the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN on_IN
the_DT field_NN will_MD die_VB in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN next_JJ year_NN ._. The_DT reason_NN for_IN fixing_VBG

been_VBN his_PRP$ garment_NN or_CC body_NN ._. And_CC what_WP form_NN can_MD the_DT expelled_VBN corn-spirit_NN

the_DT corn_NN from_IN which_WDT he_PRP (_-LRB- the_DT corn-spirit_NN )_-RRB- has_VBZ just_RB been_VBN expelled_VBN ?_. But_CC
the_DT person_NN in_IN question_NN is_VBZ necessarily_RB the_DT reaper_NN ,_, binder_NN ,_, or_CC

treated_VBN as_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN himself_PRP ._.

Thus_RB the_DT person_NN who_WP was_VBD killed_VBN on_IN the_DT harvest-field_NN as_IN the_DT
representative_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN may_MD have_VB been_VBN either_RB a_DT passing_NN

threshing_NN ._. But_CC there_EX is_VBZ a_DT third_JJ possibility_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT ancient_JJ legend_NN
and_CC modern_JJ folk-custom_NN alike_RB point_VBP ._. Lityerses_NNP not_RB only_RB put_JJ strangers_NNS
to_TO death_NN ;_: he_PRP was_VBD himself_PRP slain_VB ,_, and_CC apparently_RB in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN as_IN he_PRP
had_VBD slain_JJ others_NNS ,_, namely_RB ,_, by_IN being_VBG wrapt_VBN in_IN a_DT corn-sheaf_NN ,_, beheaded_VBD ,_,

Lityerses_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ land_NN ._. Similarly_RB in_IN modern_JJ harvest-customs_NNS the_DT

when_WRB we_PRP remember_VBP that_IN Lityerses_NNP was_VBD said_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN a_DT son_NN of_IN the_DT

death_NN ,_, apparently_RB as_IN a_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, we_PRP are_VBP led_VBN

to_TO have_VB held_VBN ghostly_JJ sway_NN in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Western_NNP Asia_NNP and_CC

have_VBP been_VBN so_RB far_RB modified_VBN in_IN places_NNS that_IN the_DT king_NN '_'' s_PRP son_NN was_VBD slain_VBN in_IN
the_DT king_NN '_POS s_PRP stead_RB ._. Of_IN the_DT custom_NN thus_RB modified_VBN the_DT story_NN of_IN Lityerses_NNS
would_MD be_VB ,_, in_IN one_CD version_NN at_IN least_JJS ,_, a_DT reminiscence_NN ._.

Turning_VBG now_RB to_TO the_DT relation_NN of_IN the_DT Phrygian_JJ Lityerses_NNS to_TO the_DT
