was_VBD described_VBN by_IN an_DT ancient_JJ authority_NN as_IN "_`` a_DT reaped_JJ ear_NN of_IN corn_NN ."_NN
Thus_RB Attis_NNP ,_, as_IN an_DT embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, annually_RB slain_VB in_IN
the_DT person_NN of_IN his_PRP$ representative_NN ,_, might_MD be_VB thought_VBN to_TO be_VB ultimately_RB

prototype_NN out_IN of_IN which_WDT the_DT state_NN religion_NN of_IN Attis_NNP was_VBD developed_VBN ._. It_PRP
may_MD have_VB been_VBN so_RB ;_: but_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT analogy_NN of_IN European_JJ

different_JJ times_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ._. For_IN in_IN Europe_NNP ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, it_PRP

the_DT rites_NNS of_IN Lityerses_NNS seem_VBP never_RB to_TO have_VB passed_VBN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN their_PRP$

play_VB off_RP on_IN a_DT passing_VBG stranger_NN ,_, a_DT comrade_NN ,_, or_CC even_RB on_IN their_PRP$ master_NN

I_PRP have_VBP dwelt_VBN on_IN the_DT Lityerses_NNP song_NN at_IN length_NN because_IN it_PRP affords_VBZ so_RB
many_JJ points_NNS of_IN comparison_NN with_IN European_JJ and_CC savage_JJ folk-custom_NN ._. The_DT
other_JJ harvest_NN songs_NNS of_IN Western_NNP Asia_NNP and_CC Egypt_NNP ,_, to_TO which_WDT attention_NN
has_VBZ been_VBN called_VBN above_IN ,_, may_MD now_RB be_VB dismissed_VBN much_RB more_RBR briefly_RB ._. The_DT
similarity_NN of_IN the_DT Bithynian_JJ Bormus_NNP to_TO the_DT Phrygian_JJ Lityerses_NNS helps_VBZ
to_TO bear_VB out_RP the_DT interpretation_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN of_IN the_DT latter_NN ._.
Bormus_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ death_NN or_CC rather_RB disappearance_NN was_VBD annually_RB mourned_VBN by_IN
the_DT reapers_NNS in_IN a_DT plaintive_JJ song_NN ,_, was_VBD ,_, like_IN Lityerses_NNP ,_, a_DT king_NN '_'' s_PRP son_NN
or_CC at_IN least_JJS the_DT son_NN of_IN a_DT wealthy_JJ and_CC distinguished_JJ man_NN ._. The_DT reapers_NNS
whom_WP he_PRP watched_VBD were_VBD at_IN work_NN on_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ fields_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP disappeared_VBD
in_IN going_VBG to_TO fetch_VB water_NN for_IN them_PRP ;_: according_VBG to_TO one_CD version_NN of_IN the_DT

and_CC perhaps_RB kissing_VBG the_DT girls_NNS ._. One_CD of_IN them_PRP then_RB gets_VBZ '_'' the_DT neck_NN '_'' and_CC

Another_DT account_NN of_IN this_DT old_JJ custom_NN ,_, written_VBN at_IN Truro_NNP in_IN 1839,_CD runs_NNS

'_POS ee_NN .'_IN It_PRP was_VBD hung_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT hall_NN ."_IN Another_DT account_NN relates_VBZ that_IN one_CD

In_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ customs_NNS a_DT particular_JJ bunch_NN of_IN ears_NNS ,_, generally_RB the_DT

XLVIII_NNP ._. The_DT Corn-Spirit_NNP as_IN an_DT Animal_JJ



1._DT Animal_JJ Embodiments_NNS of_IN the_DT Corn-spirit_NN

IN_IN SOME_NNP of_IN the_DT examples_NNS which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP cited_VBN to_TO establish_VB the_DT meaning_NN
of_IN the_DT term_NN "_`` neck_VB "_'' as_IN applied_VBN to_TO the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ,_, the_DT corn-spirit_NN
appears_VBZ in_IN animal_JJ form_NN as_IN a_DT gander_NN ,_, a_DT goat_NN ,_, a_DT hare_NN ,_, a_DT cat_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT
fox_NN ._. This_DT introduces_VBZ us_PRP to_TO a_DT new_JJ aspect_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, which_WDT we_PRP
must_MD now_RB examine_VB ._. By_IN doing_VBG so_RB we_PRP shall_MD not_RB only_RB have_VB fresh_JJ examples_NNS
of_IN killing_VBG the_DT god_NN ,_, but_CC may_MD hope_VB also_RB to_TO clear_VB up_RP some_DT points_NNS which_WDT
remain_VBP obscure_JJ in_IN the_DT myths_NNS and_CC worship_NN of_IN Adonis_NNP ,_, Attis_NNP ,_, Osiris_NNP ,_,
Dionysus_NNP ,_, Demeter_NNP ,_, and_CC Virbius_NNP ._.

Amongst_IN the_DT many_JJ animals_NNS whose_WP$ forms_NNS the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO
take_VB are_VBP the_DT wolf_NN ,_, dog_NN ,_, hare_NN ,_, fox_NN ,_, cock_NN ,_, goose_NN ,_, quail_NN ,_, cat_NN ,_, goat_NN ,_,
cow_NN (_-LRB- ox_NN ,_, bull_NN ),_NN pig_NN ,_, and_CC horse_NN ._. In_IN one_CD or_CC other_JJ of_IN these_DT shapes_NNS the_DT
corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ often_RB believed_VBN to_TO be_VB present_JJ in_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO be_VB
caught_VBN or_CC killed_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ._. As_IN the_DT corn_NN is_VBZ being_VBG cut_VBN the_DT
animal_NN flees_NNS before_IN the_DT reapers_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN a_DT reaper_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN ill_RB on_IN the_DT
field_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB stumbled_VBN unwittingly_RB on_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN ,_, who_WP has_VBZ thus_RB punished_VBN the_DT profane_NN intruder_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBN
"_`` the_DT Rye-wolf_NNP has_VBZ got_VBN hold_NN of_IN him_PRP ,"_, "_`` the_DT Harvest-goat_NNP has_VBZ given_VBN him_PRP
a_DT push_NN ."_IN The_DT person_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ corn_NN or_CC binds_NNS the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN
gets_VBZ the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT Rye-wolf_NNP ,_, the_DT Rye-sow_NNP ,_, the_DT
Oats-goat_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ,_, and_CC retains_VBZ the_DT name_NN sometimes_RB for_IN a_DT year_NN ._.
Also_RB the_DT animal_NN is_VBZ frequently_RB represented_VBN by_IN a_DT puppet_NN made_VBN out_IN of_IN
the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN or_CC of_IN wood_NN ,_, flowers_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ carried_VBN home_NN
amid_IN rejoicings_NNS on_IN the_DT last_JJ harvest-waggon_NN ._. Even_RB where_WRB the_DT last_JJ
sheaf_NN is_VBZ not_RB made_VBN up_RP in_IN animal_JJ shape_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ often_RB called_VBN the_DT
Rye-wolf_NNP ,_, the_DT Hare_NNP ,_, Goat_NNP ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ._. Generally_RB each_DT kind_NN of_IN crop_NN
is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB its_PRP$ special_JJ animal_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ caught_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ
sheaf_NN ,_, and_CC called_VBD the_DT Rye-wolf_NNP ,_, the_DT Barley-wolf_NNP ,_, the_DT Oats-wolf_NNP ,_, the_DT
Pea-wolf_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT Potato-wolf_NNP ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT crop_NN ;_: but_CC sometimes_RB
the_DT figure_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN is_VBZ only_RB made_VBN up_RP once_RB for_IN all_DT at_IN getting_VBG in_IN
the_DT last_JJ crop_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ harvest_NN ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT creature_NN is_VBZ
believed_VBN to_TO be_VB killed_VBN by_IN the_DT last_JJ stroke_NN of_IN the_DT sickle_JJ or_CC scythe_RB ._.
But_CC oftener_NN it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN to_TO live_VB so_RB long_RB as_IN there_EX is_VBZ corn_NN still_RB
unthreshed_JJ ,_, and_CC to_TO be_VB caught_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN threshed_VBD ._. Hence_RB the_DT
man_NN who_WP gives_VBZ the_DT last_JJ stroke_NN with_IN the_DT flail_NN is_VBZ told_VBN that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ got_VBN
the_DT Corn-sow_NNP ,_, the_DT Threshing-dog_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT like_JJ ._. When_WRB the_DT threshing_NN is_VBZ
finished_VBN ,_, a_DT puppet_NN is_VBZ made_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ
carried_VBN by_IN the_DT thresher_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN to_TO a_DT neighbouring_NN farm_NN ,_,
where_WRB the_DT threshing_NN is_VBZ still_RB going_VBG on_IN ._. This_DT again_RB shows_VBZ that_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO live_VB wherever_WRB the_DT corn_NN is_VBZ still_RB being_VBG
threshed_VBN ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT thresher_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN himself_PRP
represents_VBZ the_DT animal_NN ;_: and_CC if_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT next_JJ farm_NN ,_, who_WP are_VBP
still_RB threshing_VBG ,_, catch_VB him_PRP ,_, they_PRP treat_VBP him_PRP like_IN the_DT animal_NN he_PRP
represents_VBZ ,_, by_IN shutting_VBG him_PRP up_RP in_IN the_DT pig-sty_NN ,_, calling_VBG him_PRP with_IN the_DT
cries_NNS commonly_RB addressed_VBD to_TO pigs_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ._. These_DT general_JJ
statements_NNS will_MD now_RB be_VB illustrated_VBN by_IN examples_NNS ._.



2._CD The_DT Corn-spirit_NN as_IN a_DT Wolf_NNP or_CC a_DT Dog_NNP

WE_NNP begin_VBP with_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN conceived_VBD as_IN a_DT wolf_NN or_CC a_DT dog_NN ._. This_DT
conception_NN is_VBZ common_JJ in_IN France_NNP ,_, Germany_NNP ,_, and_CC Slavonic_NNP countries_NNS ._.
Thus_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT wind_NN sets_VBZ the_DT corn_NN in_IN wave-like_JJ motion_NN the_DT peasants_NNS
often_RB say_VBP ,_, "_`` The_DT Wolf_NNP is_VBZ going_VBG over_RP ,_, or_CC through_IN ,_, the_DT corn_NN ,"_, "_'' the_DT
Rye-wolf_NNP is_VBZ rushing_VBG over_IN the_DT field_NN ,"_, "_'' the_DT Wolf_NNP is_VBZ in_IN the_DT corn_NN ,"_, "_'' the_DT
mad_JJ Dog_NNP is_VBZ in_IN the_DT corn_NN ,"_, "_`` the_DT big_JJ Dog_NNP is_VBZ there_RB ."_. When_WRB children_NNS wish_VBP
to_TO go_VB into_IN the_DT corn-fields_NNS to_TO pluck_VB ears_NNS or_CC gather_VB the_DT blue_JJ
corn-flowers_NNS ,_, they_PRP are_VBP warned_VBN not_RB to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, for_IN "_`` the_DT big_JJ Dog_NNP sits_VBZ in_IN
the_DT corn_NN ,"_NN or_CC "_`` the_DT Wolf_NNP sits_VBZ in_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD tear_VB you_PRP in_IN
pieces_NNS ,"_VBP "_`` the_DT Wolf_NNP will_MD eat_VB you_PRP ."_RB The_DT wolf_NN against_IN whom_WP the_DT children_NNS
are_VBP warned_VBN is_VBZ not_RB a_DT common_JJ wolf_NN ,_, for_IN he_PRP is_VBZ often_RB spoken_VBN of_IN as_IN the_DT
Corn-wolf_NNP ,_, Rye-wolf_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT like_JJ ;_: thus_RB they_PRP say_VBP ,_, "_`` The_DT Rye-wolf_NNP will_MD
come_VB and_CC eat_VB you_PRP up_RP ,_, children_NNS ,"_, "_'' the_DT Rye-wolf_NNP will_MD carry_VB you_PRP off_RP ,"_.
and_CC so_RB forth_RB ._. Still_RB he_PRP has_VBZ all_PDT the_DT outward_JJ appearance_NN of_IN a_DT wolf_NN ._. For_IN
in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Feilenhof_NNP (_-LRB- East_NNP Prussia_NNP ),_, when_WRB a_DT wolf_NN was_VBD
seen_VBN running_VBG through_IN a_DT field_NN ,_, the_DT peasants_NNS used_VBN to_TO watch_VB whether_IN he_PRP
carried_VBD his_PRP$ tail_NN in_IN the_DT air_NN or_CC dragged_VBD it_PRP on_IN the_DT ground_NN ._. If_IN he_PRP
dragged_VBD it_PRP on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, they_PRP went_VBD after_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC thanked_VBD him_PRP for_IN
bringing_VBG them_PRP a_DT blessing_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB set_VBN tit-bits_NNS before_IN him_PRP ._. But_CC if_IN
he_PRP carried_VBD his_PRP$ tail_NN high_JJ ,_, they_PRP cursed_VBD him_PRP and_CC tried_VBD to_TO kill_VB him_PRP ._.
Here_RB the_DT wolf_NN is_VBZ the_DT corn-spirit_NN whose_WP$ fertilising_JJ power_NN is_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$
tail_NN ._.

Both_DT dog_NN and_CC wolf_NN appear_VBP as_IN embodiments_NNS of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN in_IN
harvest-customs_NNS ._. Thus_RB in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Silesia_NNP the_DT person_NN who_WP cuts_NNS
or_CC binds_NNS the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Wheat-dog_NNP or_CC the_DT Peas-pug_NNP ._. But_CC
it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN the_DT harvest-customs_NNS of_IN the_DT north-east_JJ of_IN France_NNP that_IN the_DT
idea_NN of_IN the_DT Corn-dog_NN comes_VBZ out_RP most_JJS clearly_RB ._. Thus_RB when_WRB a_DT harvester_NN ,_,
through_IN sickness_NN ,_, weariness_NN ,_, or_CC laziness_NN ,_, cannot_NN or_CC will_MD not_RB keep_VB up_RB
with_IN the_DT reaper_NN in_IN front_NN of_IN him_PRP ,_, they_PRP say_VBP ,_, "_`` The_DT White_NNP Dog_NNP passed_VBD
near_IN him_PRP ,"_RB "_'' he_PRP has_VBZ the_DT White_NNP Bitch_NNP ,"_, or_CC "_`` the_DT White_NNP Bitch_NNP has_VBZ bitten_VBN
him_PRP ."_RB In_IN the_DT Vosges_NNP the_DT Harvest-May_NNP is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT "_`` Dog_NNP of_IN the_DT
harvest_NN ,"_NN and_CC the_DT person_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ handful_NN of_IN hay_NN or_CC wheat_NN
is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO "_`` kill_VB the_DT Dog_NNP ."_NNP About_IN Lons-le_NNP -_: Saulnier_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Jura_NNP ,_, the_DT
last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Bitch_NN ._. In_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Verdun_NNP the_DT
regular_JJ expression_NN for_IN finishing_VBG the_DT reaping_NN is_VBZ ,_, "_`` They_PRP are_VBP going_VBG to_TO
kill_VB the_DT Dog_NNP ";_NNP and_CC at_IN Epinal_NNP they_PRP say_VBP ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT crop_NN ,_, "_'' We_PRP
will_MD kill_VB the_DT Wheat-dog_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT Rye-dog_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT Potato-dog_NNP ."_NNP In_IN

3._CD The_DT Corn-spirit_NN as_IN a_DT Cock_NN

cutting_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN ._. By_IN keeping_VBG its_PRP$ feathers_NNS till_IN spring_NN ,_, then_RB
mixing_VBG them_PRP with_IN the_DT seed-corn_NN taken_VBN from_IN the_DT very_JJ sheaf_NN in_IN which_WDT
the_DT bird_NN had_VBD been_VBN bound_VBN ,_, and_CC scattering_VBG the_DT feathers_NNS together_RB with_IN
the_DT seed_NN over_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, the_DT identity_NN of_IN the_DT bird_NN with_IN the_DT corn_NN is_VBZ
again_RB emphasised_VBD ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ quickening_NN and_CC fertilising_VBG power_NN ,_, as_IN an_DT
embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, is_VBZ intimated_VBN in_IN the_DT plainest_JJ manner_NN ._.
Thus_RB the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT cock_NN ,_, is_VBZ killed_VBN at_IN harvest_NN ,_,
but_CC rises_VBZ to_TO fresh_JJ life_NN and_CC activity_NN in_IN spring_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT
equivalence_NN of_IN the_DT cock_NN to_TO the_DT corn_NN is_VBZ expressed_VBN ,_, hardly_RB less_RBR
plainly_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN burying_VBG the_DT bird_NN in_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC
cutting_VBG off_RP its_PRP$ head_NN (_-LRB- like_IN the_DT ears_NNS of_IN corn_NN )_-RRB- with_IN the_DT scythe_NN ._.



4._CD The_DT Corn-spirit_NN as_IN a_DT Hare_NNP

ANOTHER_NNP common_JJ embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ the_DT hare_NN ._. In_IN
Galloway_NNP the_DT reaping_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ standing_NN corn_NN is_VBZ called_VBN "_'' cutting_VBG
the_DT Hare_NNP ."_NNP The_DT mode_NN of_IN cutting_VBG it_PRP is_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ ._. When_WRB the_DT rest_NN of_IN
the_DT corn_NN has_VBZ been_VBN reaped_VBN ,_, a_DT handful_NN is_VBZ left_VBN standing_VBG to_TO form_VB the_DT
Hare_NNP ._. It_PRP is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN three_CD parts_NNS and_CC plaited_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT ears_NNS are_VBP
tied_VBN in_IN a_DT knot_NN ._. The_DT reapers_NNS then_RB retire_VB a_DT few_JJ yards_NNS and_CC each_DT throws_VBZ
his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ sickle_JJ in_IN turn_NN at_IN the_DT Hare_NNP to_TO cut_VB it_PRP down_IN ._. It_PRP must_MD be_VB cut_VBN
below_IN the_DT knot_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT reapers_NNS continue_VBP to_TO throw_VB their_PRP$ sickles_NNS at_IN
it_PRP ,_, one_CD after_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, until_IN one_CD of_IN them_PRP succeeds_VBZ in_IN severing_VBG the_DT
stalks_NNS below_IN the_DT knot_NN ._. The_DT Hare_NNP is_VBZ then_RB carried_VBN home_NN and_CC given_VBN to_TO a_DT
maidservant_NN in_IN the_DT kitchen_NN ,_, who_WP places_VBZ it_PRP over_IN the_DT kitchen-door_NN on_IN
the_DT inside_NN ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT Hare_NNP used_VBD to_TO be_VB thus_RB kept_VBN till_IN the_DT next_JJ
harvest_NN ._. In_IN the_DT parish_NN of_IN Minnigaff_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT Hare_NNP was_VBD cut_VBN ,_, the_DT
unmarried_JJ reapers_NNS ran_VBD home_NN with_IN all_DT speed_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT one_NN who_WP arrived_VBD
first_RB was_VBD the_DT first_JJ to_TO be_VB married_VBN ._. In_IN Germany_NNP also_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT names_NNS
for_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ the_DT Hare_NNP ._. Thus_RB in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Anhalt_NNP ,_, when_WRB
the_DT corn_NN has_VBZ been_VBN reaped_VBN and_CC only_RB a_DT few_JJ stalks_NNS are_VBP left_VBN standing_NN ,_,
they_PRP say_VBP ,_, "_`` The_DT Hare_NNP will_MD soon_RB come_VB ,"_RB or_CC the_DT reapers_NNS cry_NN to_TO each_DT
other_JJ ,_, "_'' Look_VB how_WRB the_DT Hare_NNP comes_VBZ jumping_VBG out_RP ."_RB In_IN East_NNP Prussia_NNP they_PRP
say_VB that_IN the_DT Hare_NNP sits_VBZ in_IN the_DT last_JJ patch_NN of_IN standing_VBG corn_NN ,_, and_CC must_MD
be_VB chased_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT last_JJ reaper_NN ._. The_DT reapers_VBZ hurry_NN with_IN their_PRP$ work_NN ,_,
each_DT being_VBG anxious_JJ not_RB to_TO have_VB "_`` to_TO chase_VB out_RP the_DT Hare_NNP ";_NN for_IN the_DT man_NN
who_WP does_VBZ so_RB ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ corn_NN ,_, is_VBZ much_RB laughed_VBN at_IN ._. At_IN
Aurich_NNP ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, an_DT expression_NN for_IN cutting_VBG the_DT last_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ
"_`` to_TO cut_VB off_RP the_DT Hare_NNP '_POS s_PRP tail_NN ."_CC "_`` He_PRP is_VBZ killing_VBG the_DT Hare_NNP "_'' is_VBZ commonly_RB
said_VBD of_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ corn_NN in_IN Germany_NNP ,_, Sweden_NNP ,_, Holland_NNP ,_,
France_NNP ,_, and_CC Italy_NNP ._. In_IN Norway_NNP the_DT man_NN who_WP is_VBZ thus_RB said_VBN to_TO "_`` kill_VB the_DT
Hare_NNP "_`` must_MD give_VB "_`` hare_NN '_'' s_PRP blood_NN ,"_CC in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN brandy_NN ,_, to_TO his_PRP$
fellows_NNS to_TO drink_VB ._. In_IN Lesbos_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT reapers_NNS are_VBP at_IN work_NN in_IN two_CD
neighbouring_VBG fields_NNS ,_, each_DT party_NN tries_VBZ to_TO finish_VB first_RB in_IN order_NN to_TO
drive_VB the_DT Hare_NNP into_IN their_PRP$ neighbour_NN '_'' s_PRP field_NN ;_: the_DT reapers_NNS who_WP succeed_VBP
in_IN doing_VBG so_RB believe_VB that_IN next_JJ year_NN the_DT crop_NN will_MD be_VB better_JJR ._. A_DT small_JJ
sheaf_NN of_IN corn_NN is_VBZ made_VBN up_RP and_CC kept_VBD beside_IN the_DT holy_JJ picture_NN till_IN next_JJ
harvest_NN ._.



5._CD The_DT Corn-spirit_NN as_IN a_DT Cat_NNP

AGAIN_NNP ,_, the_DT corn-spirit_NN sometimes_RB takes_VBZ the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT cat_NN ._. Near_'' Kiel_NNP
children_NNS are_VBP warned_VBN not_RB to_TO go_VB into_IN the_DT corn-fields_NNS because_IN "_`` the_DT Cat_NNP
sits_VBZ there_EX ."_RP In_IN the_DT Eisenach_NNP Oberland_NNP they_PRP are_VBP told_VBN "_`` the_DT Corn-cat_NN
will_MD come_VB and_CC fetch_VB you_PRP ,"_, "_'' the_DT Corn-cat_NNP goes_VBZ in_IN the_DT corn_NN ."_NN In_IN some_DT
parts_NNS of_IN Silesia_NNP at_IN mowing_VBG the_DT last_JJ corn_NN they_PRP say_VBP ,_, "_`` The_DT Cat_NNP is_VBZ
caught_VBN ";_NN and_CC at_IN threshing_NN ,_, the_DT man_NN who_WP gives_VBZ the_DT last_JJ stroke_NN is_VBZ
called_VBN the_DT Cat_NNP ._. In_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Lyons_NNP the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN and_CC the_DT

the_DT last_JJ corn_NN they_PRP say_VBP ,_, "_`` We_PRP have_VBP the_DT Cat_NNP by_IN the_DT tail_NN ."_IN At_IN Brian_NNP �_NNP on_IN ,_,
in_IN Dauphin_NNP �,_, at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN reaping_NN ,_, a_DT cat_NN is_VBZ decked_VBN out_RP with_IN
ribbons_NNS ,_, flowers_NNS ,_, and_CC ears_NNS of_IN corn_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Cat_NNP of_IN the_DT
ball-skin_NN (_-LRB- le_FW chat_IN de_FW peau_FW de_FW balle_FW )._, If_IN a_DT reaper_NN is_VBZ wounded_VBN at_IN
his_PRP$ work_NN ,_, they_PRP make_VBP the_DT cat_NN lick_VB the_DT wound_NN ._. At_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT
reaping_VBG the_DT cat_NN is_VBZ again_RB decked_VBN out_RP with_IN ribbons_NNS and_CC ears_NNS of_IN corn_NN ;_:
then_RB they_PRP dance_VBP and_CC make_VBP merry_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT dance_NN is_VBZ over_IN the_DT girls_NNS
solemnly_RB strip_VBP the_DT cat_NN of_IN its_PRP$ finery_NN ._. At_IN Gr_NNP �_NNP neberg_RB ,_, in_IN Silesia_NNP ,_, the_DT
reaper_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ corn_NN goes_VBZ by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT Tom-cat_JJ ._. He_PRP is_VBZ
enveloped_VBN in_IN rye-stalks_NNS and_CC green_JJ withes_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ furnished_VBN with_IN a_DT
long_JJ plaited_JJ tail_NN ._. Sometimes_RB as_IN a_DT companion_NN he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT man_NN similarly_RB
dressed_VBN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT (_-LRB- female_NN )_-RRB- Cat_NNP ._. Their_PRP$ duty_NN is_VBZ to_TO run_VB after_IN
people_NNS whom_WP they_PRP see_VBP and_CC to_TO beat_VB them_PRP with_IN a_DT long_JJ stick_NN ._. Near_IN Amiens_NNPS
the_DT expression_NN for_IN finishing_VBG the_DT harvest_NN is_VBZ ,_, "_`` They_PRP are_VBP going_VBG to_TO kill_VB
the_DT Cat_NNP ";_NNP and_CC when_WRB the_DT last_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ cut_VBN they_PRP kill_VB a_DT cat_NN in_IN the_DT
farmyard_NN ._. At_IN threshing_NN ,_, in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN France_NNP ,_, a_DT live_JJ cat_NN is_VBZ
placed_VBN under_IN the_DT last_JJ bundle_NN of_IN corn_NN to_TO be_VB threshed_VBN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ struck_VBN
dead_JJ with_IN the_DT flails_NNS ._. Then_RB on_IN Sunday_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ roasted_VBN and_CC eaten_VBN as_IN a_DT
holiday_NN dish_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Vosges_NNP Mountains_NNPS the_DT close_NN of_IN haymaking_NN or_CC
harvest_NN is_VBZ called_VBN "_`` catching_VBG the_DT cat_NN ,"_, "_'' killing_VBG the_DT dog_NN ,"_NN or_CC more_RBR
rarely_RB "_`` catching_VBG the_DT hare_NN ."_VBD The_DT cat_NN ,_, the_DT dog_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT hare_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO
be_VB fat_JJ or_CC lean_JJ according_VBG as_IN the_DT crop_NN is_VBZ good_JJ or_CC bad_JJ ._. The_DT man_NN who_WP
cuts_NNS the_DT last_JJ handful_NN of_IN hay_NN or_CC of_IN wheat_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO catch_VB the_DT cat_NN or_CC
the_DT hare_NN or_CC to_TO kill_VB the_DT dog_NN ._.



6._CD The_DT Corn-spirit_NN as_IN a_DT Goat_NN

FURTHER_NNP ,_, the_DT corn-spirit_NN often_RB appears_VBZ in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT goat_NN ._. In_IN
some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Prussia_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT corn_NN bends_NNS before_IN the_DT wind_NN ,_, they_PRP
say_VB ,_, "_`` The_DT Goats_NNP are_VBP chasing_VBG each_DT other_JJ ,"_, "_`` the_DT wind_NN is_VBZ driving_VBG the_DT
Goats_NNS through_IN the_DT corn_NN ,"_, "_'' the_DT Goats_NNP are_VBP browsing_VBG there_RB ,"_, and_CC they_PRP
expect_VBP a_DT very_RB good_JJ harvest_NN ._. Again_RB they_PRP say_VBP ,_, "_`` The_DT Oats-goat_NN is_VBZ
sitting_VBG in_IN the_DT oats-field_NN ,"_, "_'' the_DT Corn-goat_NN is_VBZ sitting_VBG in_IN the_DT
rye-field_JJ ."_NN Children_NNS are_VBP warned_VBN not_RB to_TO go_VB into_IN the_DT corn-fields_NNS to_TO
pluck_NN the_DT blue_JJ corn-flowers_NNS ,_, or_CC amongst_IN the_DT beans_NNS to_TO pluck_VB pods_NNS ,_,
because_IN the_DT Rye-goat_NN ,_, the_DT Corn-goat_NNP ,_, the_DT Oats-goat_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT Bean-goat_NN
is_VBZ sitting_VBG or_CC lying_VBG there_RB ,_, and_CC will_MD carry_VB them_PRP away_RB or_CC kill_VB them_PRP ._.
When_WRB a_DT harvester_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN sick_JJ or_CC lags_VBZ behind_IN his_PRP$ fellows_NNS at_IN their_PRP$
work_NN ,_, they_PRP call_VBP out_RP ,_, "_`` The_DT Harvest-goat_NNP has_VBZ pushed_VBN him_PRP ,"_RB "_'' he_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN
pushed_VBN by_IN the_DT Corn-goat_NN ."_NN In_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Braunsberg_NNP (_-LRB- East_NNP
Prussia_NNP )_-RRB- at_IN binding_NN the_DT oats_NNS every_DT harvester_NN makes_VBZ haste_NN "_'' lest_IN the_DT
Corn-goat_NNP push_VB him_PRP ."_IN At_IN Oefoten_NNP ,_, in_IN Norway_NNP ,_, each_DT reaper_NN has_VBZ his_PRP$
allotted_VBN patch_NN to_TO reap_VB ._. When_WRB a_DT reaper_NN in_IN the_DT middle_NN has_VBZ not_RB finished_VBN
reaping_VBG his_PRP$ piece_NN after_IN his_PRP$ neighbours_NNS have_VBP finished_VBN theirs_PRP ,_, they_PRP
say_VB of_IN him_PRP ,_, "_`` He_PRP remains_VBZ on_IN the_DT island_NN ."_IN And_CC if_IN the_DT laggard_NN is_VBZ a_DT man_NN ,_,
they_PRP imitate_VBP the_DT cry_NN with_IN which_WDT they_PRP call_VBP a_DT he-goat_NN ;_: if_IN a_DT woman_NN ,_, the_DT
cry_NN with_IN which_WDT they_PRP call_VBP a_DT she-goat_NN ._. Near_IN Straubing_VBG ,_, in_IN Lower_NNP
Bavaria_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBN of_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ corn_NN that_IN "_`` he_PRP has_VBZ
the_DT Corn-goat_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT Wheat-goat_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT Oats-goat_NN ,"_, according_VBG to_TO
the_DT crop_NN ._. Moreover_RB ,_, two_CD horns_NNS are_VBP set_VBN up_RP on_IN the_DT last_JJ heap_NN of_IN corn_NN ,_,
and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN "_`` the_DT horned_JJ Goat_NNP ."_NNP At_IN Kreutzburg_NNP ,_, East_NNP Prussia_NNP ,_,
they_PRP call_VBP out_RP to_TO the_DT woman_NN who_WP is_VBZ binding_VBG the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ,_, "_`` The_DT Goat_.
is_VBZ sitting_VBG in_IN the_DT sheaf_NN ."_NN At_IN Gablingen_NNP ,_, in_IN Swabia_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT last_JJ
field_NN of_IN oats_NNS upon_IN a_DT farm_NN is_VBZ being_VBG reaped_VBN ,_, the_DT reapers_NNS carve_VBP a_DT goat_NN
out_IN of_IN wood_NN ._. Ears_NNS of_IN oats_NNS are_VBP inserted_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ nostrils_NNS and_CC mouth_NN ,_,
and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ adorned_VBN with_IN garlands_NNS of_IN flowers_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ set_VBN up_RP on_IN the_DT
field_NN and_CC called_VBD the_DT Oats-goat_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT reaping_NN approaches_VBZ an_DT end_NN ,_,
each_DT reaper_NN hastens_VBZ to_TO finish_VB his_PRP$ piece_NN first_JJ ;_: he_PRP who_WP is_VBZ the_DT last_JJ to_TO
finish_NN gets_VBZ the_DT Oats-goat_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ itself_PRP called_VBN
the_DT Goat_NNP ._. Thus_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT valley_NN of_IN the_DT Wiesent_NNP ,_, Bavaria_NNP ,_, the_DT last_JJ

proverb_NN ,_, "_`` The_DT field_NN must_MD bear_VB a_DT goat_NN ."_NN At_IN Spachbr_NNP �_NNP cken_NN ,_, in_IN Hesse_NNP ,_,
the_DT last_JJ handful_NN of_IN corn_NN which_WDT is_VBZ cut_VBN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Goat_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT
man_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ it_PRP is_VBZ much_JJ ridiculed_JJ ._. At_IN D_NNP �_NNP rrenb_NNP �_NNP chig_NN and_CC about_IN Mosbach_NNP
in_IN Baden_NNP the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ also_RB called_VBN the_DT Goat_NNP ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT last_JJ
sheaf_NN is_VBZ made_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT goat_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP say_VBP ,_, "_`` The_DT Goat_NNP is_VBZ
sitting_VBG in_IN it_PRP ."_VBD Again_RB ,_, the_DT person_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ or_CC binds_VBZ the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN
is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Goat_NNP ._. Thus_RB ,_, in_IN parts_NNS of_IN Mecklenburg_NNP they_PRP call_VBP out_RP to_TO
the_DT woman_NN who_WP binds_VBZ the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ,_, "_`` You_PRP are_VBP the_DT Harvest-goat_NNP ."_NNP Near_IN
Uelzen_NNP ,_, in_IN Hanover_NNP ,_, the_DT harvest_NN festival_NN begins_VBZ with_IN "_`` the_DT bringing_VBG
of_IN the_DT Harvest-goat_NNP ";_NN that_WDT is_VBZ ,_, the_DT woman_NN who_WP bound_VBD the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ
wrapt_NN in_IN straw_NN ,_, crowned_VBN with_IN a_DT harvest-wreath_NN ,_, and_CC brought_VBD in_IN a_DT
wheel-barrow_JJ to_TO the_DT village_NN ,_, where_WRB a_DT round_JJ dance_NN takes_VBZ place_NN ._. About_IN
Luneburg_NNP ,_, also_RB ,_, the_DT woman_NN who_WP binds_VBZ the_DT last_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ decked_VBN with_IN a_DT
crown_NN of_IN corn-ears_NNS and_CC is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Corn-goat_NNP ._. At_IN M_NNP �_NNP nzesheim_NN in_IN
Baden_NNP the_DT reaper_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ handful_NN of_IN corn_NN or_CC oats_NNS is_VBZ called_VBN
the_DT Corn-goat_NN or_CC the_DT Oats-goat_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Canton_NNP St_NNP ._. Gall_NNP ,_, Switzerland_NNP ,_,
the_DT person_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ handful_NN of_IN corn_NN on_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, or_CC drives_NNS
the_DT last_JJ harvest-waggon_NN to_TO the_DT barn_NN ,_, is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Corn-goat_NN or_CC the_DT
Rye-goat_NN ,_, or_CC simply_RB the_DT Goat_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Canton_NNP Thurgau_NNP he_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN
Corn-goat_NN ;_: like_IN a_DT goat_NN he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT bell_NN hung_VBD round_IN his_PRP$ neck_NN ,_, is_VBZ led_VBN in_IN
triumph_NN ,_, and_CC drenched_VBD with_IN liquor_NN ._. In_IN parts_NNS of_IN Styria_NNP ,_, also_RB ,_, the_DT man_NN
who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ called_VBN Corn-goat_NNP ,_, Oats-goat_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT like_JJ ._.
As_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, the_DT man_NN who_WP thus_RB gets_VBZ the_DT name_NN of_IN Corn-goat_NNP has_VBZ to_TO bear_VB
it_PRP a_DT whole_JJ year_NN till_IN the_DT next_JJ harvest_NN ._.

According_VBG to_TO one_CD view_NN ,_, the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, who_WP has_VBZ been_VBN caught_VBN in_IN the_DT
form_NN of_IN a_DT goat_NN or_CC otherwise_RB ,_, lives_NNS in_IN the_DT farmhouse_NN or_CC barn_NN over_IN
winter_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, each_DT farm_NN has_VBZ its_PRP$ own_JJ embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ._.
But_CC ,_, according_VBG to_TO another_DT view_NN ,_, the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ the_DT genius_NN or_CC
deity_NN ,_, not_RB of_IN the_DT corn_NN of_IN one_CD farm_NN only_RB ,_, but_CC of_IN all_PDT the_DT corn_NN ._. Hence_RB
when_WRB the_DT corn_NN on_IN one_CD farm_NN is_VBZ all_DT cut_NN ,_, he_PRP flees_VBZ to_TO another_DT where_WRB
there_EX is_VBZ still_RB corn_NN left_VBD standing_VBG ._. This_DT idea_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN out_RP in_IN a_DT
harvest-custom_NN which_WDT was_VBD formerly_RB observed_VBN in_IN Skye_NNP ._. The_DT farmer_NN who_WP
first_JJ finished_VBD reaping_VBG sent_VBD a_DT man_NN or_CC woman_NN with_IN a_DT sheaf_NN to_TO a_DT
neighbouring_VBG farmer_NN who_WP had_VBD not_RB finished_VBN ;_: the_DT latter_NN in_IN his_PRP$ turn_NN ,_,
when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD finished_VBN ,_, sent_VBN on_IN the_DT sheaf_NN to_TO his_PRP$ neighbour_NN who_WP was_VBD
still_RB reaping_VBG ;_: and_CC so_RB the_DT sheaf_NN made_VBD the_DT round_NN of_IN the_DT farms_NNS till_IN all_RB
the_DT corn_NN was_VBD cut_VBN ._. The_DT sheaf_NN was_VBD called_VBN the_DT goabbir_NN bhacagh_NN ,_, that_WDT
is_VBZ ,_, the_DT Cripple_NNP Goat_NNP ._. The_DT custom_NN appears_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB extinct_JJ at_IN the_DT
present_JJ day_NN ,_, for_IN it_PRP was_VBD reported_VBN from_IN Skye_NNP not_RB very_RB many_JJ years_NNS ago_RB ._.
The_DT corn-spirit_NN was_VBD probably_RB thus_RB represented_VBN as_IN lame_JJ because_IN he_PRP had_VBD
been_VBN crippled_VBN by_IN the_DT cutting_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT old_JJ woman_NN
who_WP brings_VBZ home_NN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN must_MD limp_JJ on_IN one_CD foot_NN ._.

But_CC sometimes_RB the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT goat_NN ,_, is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO
be_VB slain_VBN on_IN the_DT harvest-field_NN by_IN the_DT sickle_JJ or_CC scythe_RB ._. Thus_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT
neighbourhood_NN of_IN Bernkastel_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT Moselle_NNP ,_, the_DT reapers_NNS determine_VBP
by_IN lot_NN the_DT order_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP shall_MD follow_VB each_DT other_JJ ._. The_DT first_JJ is_VBZ
called_VBN the_DT fore-reaper_NN ,_, the_DT last_JJ the_DT tail-bearer_NN ._. If_IN a_DT reaper_NN
overtakes_VBZ the_DT man_NN in_IN front_NN he_PRP reaps_VBD past_IN him_PRP ,_, bending_VBG round_RB so_RB as_RB to_TO
leave_VB the_DT slower_JJR reaper_NN in_IN a_DT patch_NN by_IN himself_PRP ._. This_DT patch_NN is_VBZ called_VBN
the_DT Goat_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT man_NN for_IN whom_WP "_'' the_DT Goat_NNP is_VBZ cut_VBN "_`` in_IN this_DT way_NN ,_, is_VBZ
laughed_VBD and_CC jeered_VBD at_IN by_IN his_PRP$ fellows_NNS for_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN ._. When_WRB
the_DT tail-bearer_NN cuts_VBZ the_DT last_JJ ears_NNS of_IN corn_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBN ,_, "_`` He_PRP is_VBZ
cutting_VBG the_DT Goat_NNP '_POS s_PRP neck_VB off_RP ."_NN In_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Grenoble_NNP ,_,

lick_VB the_DT wound_NN ._. Esthonian_JJ reapers_NNS of_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Mon_NNP think_VBP that_IN

Further_RB ,_, the_DT corn-spirit_NN under_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT goat_NN is_VBZ sometimes_RB

At_IN Oberinntal_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Tyrol_NNP ,_, the_DT last_JJ thresher_NN is_VBZ called_VBN Goat_NNP ._. So_RB at_IN

head_NN ._. The_DT children_NNS are_VBP then_RB told_VBN to_TO kill_VB the_DT Oats-goat_NN ._.



7._CD The_DT Corn-spirit_NN as_IN a_DT Bull_NNP ,_, Cow_NNP ,_, or_CC Ox_NNP

ANOTHER_NNP form_NN which_WDT the_DT corn-spirit_NN often_RB assumes_VBZ is_VBZ that_IN of_IN a_DT bull_NN ,_,
cow_NN ,_, or_CC ox_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT wind_NN sweeps_NNS over_IN the_DT corn_NN they_PRP say_VBP at_IN Conitz_NNP ,_,
in_IN West_NNP Prussia_NNP ,_, "_`` The_DT Steer_NNP is_VBZ running_VBG in_IN the_DT corn_NN ";_NN when_WRB the_DT corn_NN
is_VBZ thick_JJ and_CC strong_JJ in_IN one_CD spot_NN ,_, they_PRP say_VBP in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN East_NNP
Prussia_NNP ,_, "_`` The_DT Bull_NNP is_VBZ lying_VBG in_IN the_DT corn_NN ."_NN When_WRB a_DT harvester_NN has_VBZ
overstrained_JJ and_CC lamed_VBD himself_PRP ,_, they_PRP say_VBP in_IN the_DT Graudenz_NNP district_NN of_IN
West_NNP Prussia_NNP ,_, "_`` The_DT Bull_NNP pushed_VBD him_PRP ";_RB in_IN Lorraine_NNP they_PRP say_VBP ,_, "_`` He_PRP has_VBZ
the_DT Bull_NNP ."_NNP The_DT meaning_NN of_IN both_DT expressions_NNS is_VBZ that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ
unwittingly_RB lighted_VBN upon_IN the_DT divine_JJ corn-spirit_NN ,_, who_WP has_VBZ punished_VBN
the_DT profane_NN intruder_NN with_IN lameness_NN ._. So_RB near_IN Chamb_NNP �_NNP ry_NN when_WRB a_DT reaper_NN
wounds_NNS himself_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ sickle_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ "_`` the_DT wound_NN of_IN
the_DT Ox_NNP ."_NNP In_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Bunzlau_NNP (_-LRB- Silesia_NN )_-RRB- the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ
sometimes_RB made_VBD into_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT horned_JJ ox_NN ,_, stuffed_VBN with_IN tow_NN and_CC
wrapt_NN in_IN corn-ears_NNS ._. This_DT figure_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Old_NNP Man_NN ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS
of_IN Bohemia_NNP the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ made_VBN up_RP in_IN human_JJ form_NN and_CC called_VBD the_DT
Buffalo-bull_NNP ._. These_DT cases_NNS show_VBP a_DT confusion_NN of_IN the_DT human_NN with_IN the_DT
animal_JJ shape_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ._. The_DT confusion_NN is_VBZ like_IN that_DT of_IN
killing_VBG a_DT wether_NN under_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN a_DT wolf_NN ._. All_DT over_IN Swabia_NNP the_DT last_JJ
bundle_NN of_IN corn_NN on_IN the_DT field_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Cow_NNP ;_: the_DT man_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT
last_JJ ears_NNS "_`` has_VBZ the_DT Cow_NNP ,"_NNP and_CC is_VBZ himself_PRP called_VBN Cow_NNP or_CC Barley-cow_NNP or_CC

likes_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT Cow_NNP ._. The_DT Cow_NNP was_VBD sometimes_RB represented_VBN by_IN the_DT figure_NN
of_IN a_DT woman_NN made_VBN out_IN of_IN ears_NNS of_IN corn_NN and_CC corn-flowers_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD carried_VBN
to_TO the_DT farmhouse_NN by_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD cut_VBN the_DT last_JJ handful_NN of_IN corn_NN ._.

him_PRP ,_, till_IN the_DT farmer_NN took_VBD the_DT Cow_NNP from_IN him_PRP ._. Here_RB again_RB the_DT confusion_NN
between_IN the_DT human_NN and_CC the_DT animal_JJ form_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ
apparent_JJ ._. In_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Switzerland_NNP the_DT reaper_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ the_DT
last_JJ ears_NNS of_IN corn_NN is_VBZ called_VBN Wheat-cow_NNP ,_, Corn-cow_NNP ,_, Oats-cow_NNP ,_, or_CC
Corn-steer_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ the_DT butt_NN of_IN many_JJ a_DT joke_NN ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, in_IN

Again_RB ,_, the_DT corn-spirit_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT bull_NN or_CC ox_NN is_VBZ killed_VBN on_IN the_DT

first_RB on_IN the_DT farm_NN in_IN the_DT spring_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ followed_VBN by_IN all_PDT
the_DT reapers_NNS with_IN their_PRP$ tools_NNS ._. Then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO run_VB free_JJ ;_: the_DT
reapers_NNS chase_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC whoever_WP catches_VBZ it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN King_NNP of_IN the_DT Calf_NNP ._.
Lastly_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ solemnly_RB killed_VBN ;_: at_IN Lun_NNP �_NNP ville_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP acts_VBZ as_IN
butcher_NN is_VBZ the_DT Jewish_JJ merchant_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ._.

Sometimes_RB again_RB the_DT corn-spirit_NN hides_VBZ himself_PRP amongst_IN the_DT cut_NN corn_NN
in_IN the_DT barn_NN to_TO reappear_VB in_IN bull_NN or_CC cow_NN form_NN at_IN threshing_NN ._. Thus_RB at_IN

enveloped_VBN in_IN straw_NN ;_: his_PRP$ head_NN is_VBZ surmounted_VBN by_IN sticks_NNS in_IN imitation_NN of_IN

way_NN thither_IN he_PRP must_MD low_RB like_VB a_DT cow_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN afterwards_RB
he_PRP goes_VBZ by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT Cow_NNP ._. At_IN Obermedlingen_NNP ,_, in_IN Swabia_NNP ,_, when_WRB

noted_VBN in_IN other_JJ customs_NNS ._. In_IN Canton_NNP Schaffhausen_NNP the_DT man_NN who_WP threshes_NNPS

he_PRP is_VBZ wrapt_VBN in_IN straw_NN and_CC bound_VBD to_TO one_CD of_IN the_DT trees_NNS in_IN the_DT orchard_NN ._.

it_PRP ._. At_IN Pessnitz_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Dresden_NNP ,_, the_DT man_NN who_WP gives_VBZ the_DT

so_RB many_JJ cases_NNS ,_, the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ passed_VBN on_IN to_TO a_DT neighbour_NN who_WP has_VBZ
not_RB finished_VBN threshing_NN ._. So_RB at_IN Herbrechtingen_NNP ,_, in_IN Th_DT �_NN ringen_NN ,_, the_DT
effigy_NN of_IN a_DT ragged_JJ old_JJ woman_NN is_VBZ flung_VBN into_IN the_DT barn_NN of_IN the_DT farmer_NN
who_WP is_VBZ last_JJ with_IN his_PRP$ threshing_NN ._. The_DT man_NN who_WP throws_VBZ it_PRP in_IN cries_NNS ,_,
"_`` There_EX is_VBZ the_DT Cow_NNP for_IN you_PRP ."_VBP If_IN the_DT threshers_NNS catch_VBP him_PRP they_PRP detain_VBP
him_PRP over_IN night_NN and_CC punish_VB him_PRP by_IN keeping_VBG him_PRP from_IN the_DT
harvest-supper_NN ._. In_IN these_DT latter_JJ customs_NNS the_DT confusion_NN between_IN the_DT
human_NN and_CC the_DT animal_JJ shape_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN meets_VBZ us_PRP again_RB ._.

Further_RB ,_, the_DT corn-spirit_NN in_IN bull_NN form_NN is_VBZ sometimes_RB believed_VBN to_TO be_VB

8._CD The_DT Corn-spirit_NN as_IN a_DT Horse_NNP or_CC Mare_NNP

SOMETIMES_NNS the_DT corn-spirit_NN appears_VBZ in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT horse_NN or_CC mare_NN ._.

a_DT Mare_NNP !"--"_NNP Whose_NNP is_VBZ she_PRP ?"_RB is_VBZ next_JJ asked_JJ thrice_NN ._. "_'' A_DT ._. B_NNP .'_NNP s_VBZ ,"_RB naming_VBG

9._CD The_DT Corn-spirit_NN as_IN a_DT Pig_NNP (_-LRB- Boar_NNP or_CC Sow_NNP )_-RRB-

his_PRP$ cattle_NNS to_TO eat_VB ._. Similarly_RB we_PRP saw_VBD that_IN the_DT Corn-wolf_NNP makes_VBZ his_PRP$
appearance_NN at_IN mid-winter_NN ,_, the_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT year_NN begins_VBZ to_TO verge_NN
towards_IN spring_NN ._. Formerly_RB a_DT real_JJ boar_NN was_VBD sacrificed_VBN at_IN Christmas_NNP ,_,
and_CC apparently_RB also_RB a_DT man_NN in_IN the_DT character_NN of_IN the_DT Yule_NNP Boar_NNP ._. This_DT ,_,
at_IN least_JJS ,_, may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB inferred_VBN from_IN a_DT Christmas_NNP custom_NN still_RB
observed_VBN in_IN Sweden_NNP ._. A_DT man_NN is_VBZ wrapt_VBN up_RP in_IN a_DT skin_NN ,_, and_CC carries_VBZ a_DT wisp_NN
of_IN straw_NN in_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN ,_, so_RB that_IN the_DT projecting_VBG straws_NNS look_VBP like_IN the_DT
bristles_NNS of_IN a_DT boar_NN ._. A_DT knife_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN ,_, and_CC an_DT old_JJ woman_NN ,_, with_IN her_PRP$
face_NN blackened_VBN ,_, pretends_NNS to_TO sacrifice_VB him_PRP ._.

On_IN Christmas_NNP Eve_NNP in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Esthonian_JJ island_NN of_IN Oesel_NNP they_PRP
bake_NN a_DT long_JJ cake_NN with_IN the_DT two_CD ends_NNS turned_VBD up_RP ._. It_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT
Christmas_NNP Boar_NNP ,_, and_CC stands_VBZ on_IN the_DT table_NN till_IN the_DT morning_NN of_IN New_NNP
Year_NN '_POS s_PRP Day_NNP ,_, when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ distributed_VBN among_IN the_DT cattle_NNS ._. In_IN other_JJ parts_NNS
of_IN the_DT island_NN the_DT Christmas_NNP Boar_NNP is_VBZ not_RB a_DT cake_NN but_CC a_DT little_JJ pig_NN born_VBN
in_IN March_NNP ,_, which_WDT the_DT housewife_NN fattens_VBZ secretly_RB ,_, often_RB without_IN the_DT
knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN ._. On_IN Christmas_NNP Eve_NNP the_DT
little_JJ pig_NN is_VBZ secretly_RB killed_VBN ,_, then_RB roasted_VBN in_IN the_DT oven_NN ,_, and_CC set_VBD on_IN
the_DT table_NN standing_VBG on_IN all_DT fours_NNS ,_, where_WRB it_PRP remains_VBZ in_IN this_DT posture_NN
for_IN several_JJ days_NNS ._. In_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT island_NN ,_, again_RB ,_, though_IN the_DT
Christmas_NNP cake_NN has_VBZ neither_RB the_DT name_NN nor_CC the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT boar_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ
kept_VBD till_IN the_DT New_NNP Year_NN ,_, when_WRB half_NN of_IN it_PRP is_VBZ divided_VBN among_IN all_PDT the_DT
members_NNS and_CC all_PDT the_DT quadrupeds_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN ._. The_DT other_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT
cake_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN till_IN sowing-time_JJ comes_VBZ round_RB ,_, when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ similarly_RB
distributed_VBN in_IN the_DT morning_NN among_IN human_JJ beings_NNS and_CC beasts_NNS ._. In_IN other_JJ
parts_NNS of_IN Esthonia_NNP ,_, again_RB ,_, the_DT Christmas_NNP Boar_NNP ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN ,_, is_VBZ
baked_VBN of_IN the_DT first_JJ rye_NN cut_VBN at_IN harvest_NN ;_: it_PRP has_VBZ a_DT conical_JJ shape_NN and_CC a_DT
cross_NN is_VBZ impressed_VBN on_IN it_PRP with_IN a_DT pig_NN '_'' s_PRP bone_NN or_CC a_DT key_NN ,_, or_CC three_CD dints_NNS
are_VBP made_VBN in_IN it_PRP with_IN a_DT buckle_NN or_CC a_DT piece_NN of_IN charcoal_NN ._. It_PRP stands_VBZ with_IN
a_DT light_NN beside_IN it_PRP on_IN the_DT table_NN all_DT through_IN the_DT festal_JJ season_NN ._. On_IN New_NNP
Year_NN '_POS s_VBZ Day_NNP and_CC Epiphany_NNP ,_, before_IN sunrise_NN ,_, a_DT little_JJ of_IN the_DT cake_NN is_VBZ
crumbled_VBN with_IN salt_NN and_CC given_VBN to_TO the_DT cattle_NNS ._. The_DT rest_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN till_IN
the_DT day_NN when_WRB the_DT cattle_NNS are_VBP driven_VBN out_RP to_TO pasture_NN for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN
in_IN spring_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ then_RB put_VBN in_IN the_DT herdsman_NN '_'' s_PRP bag_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN evening_NN is_VBZ
divided_VBN among_IN the_DT cattle_NNS to_TO guard_VB them_PRP from_IN magic_NN and_CC harm_NN ._. In_IN some_DT
places_NNS the_DT Christmas_NNP Boar_NNP is_VBZ partaken_VBN of_IN by_IN farm-servants_NNS and_CC cattle_NNS
at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT barley_NN sowing_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN thereby_RB
producing_VBG a_DT heavier_JJR crop_NN ._.



10._CD On_IN the_DT Animal_JJ Embodiments_NNS of_IN the_DT Corn-spirit_NN

SO_JJ much_JJ for_IN the_DT animal_NN embodiments_NNS of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN as_IN they_PRP are_VBP
presented_VBN to_TO us_PRP in_IN the_DT folk-customs_NNS of_IN Northern_NNP Europe_NNP ._. These_DT
customs_NNS bring_VBP out_RP clearly_RB the_DT sacramental_JJ character_NN of_IN the_DT
harvest-supper_NN ._. The_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ conceived_VBN as_IN embodied_VBN in_IN an_DT
animal_NN ;_: this_DT divine_JJ animal_NN is_VBZ slain_VBN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ flesh_NN and_CC blood_NN are_VBP
partaken_NN of_IN by_IN the_DT harvesters_NNS ._. Thus_RB the_DT cock_NN ,_, the_DT hare_NN ,_, the_DT cat_NN ,_, the_DT
goat_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT OX_NNP are_VBP eaten_VBN sacramentally_RB by_IN the_DT harvester_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
pig_NN is_VBZ eaten_VBN sacramentally_RB by_IN ploughmen_NNS in_IN spring_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, as_IN a_DT
substitute_NN for_IN the_DT real_JJ flesh_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ being_NN ,_, bread_NN or_CC
dumplings_NNS are_VBP made_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ image_NN and_CC eaten_VBN sacramentally_RB ;_: thus_RB ,_,
pig-shaped_JJ dumplings_NNS are_VBP eaten_VBN by_IN the_DT harvesters_NNS ,_, and_CC loaves_NNS made_VBN in_IN
boar-shape_NN (_-LRB- the_DT Yule_NN Boar_NNP )_-RRB- are_VBP eaten_VBN in_IN spring_NN by_IN the_DT ploughman_NN and_CC
his_PRP$ cattle_NNS ._.

The_DT reader_NN has_VBZ probably_RB remarked_VBD the_DT complete_JJ parallelism_NN between_IN
the_DT conceptions_NNS of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN in_IN human_JJ and_CC in_IN animal_JJ form_NN ._. The_DT
parallel_RB may_MD be_VB here_RB briefly_NN resumed_VBD ._. When_WRB the_DT corn_NN waves_NNS in_IN the_DT
wind_NN it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBN either_RB that_IN the_DT Corn-mother_JJ or_CC that_IN the_DT Corn-wolf_NNP ,_,
etc_FW .,_, is_VBZ passing_VBG through_IN the_DT corn_NN ._. Children_NNS are_VBP warned_VBN against_IN
straying_VBG in_IN corn-fields_NNS either_CC because_IN the_DT Corn-mother_JJ or_CC because_IN
the_DT Corn-wolf_NNP ,_, etc_NN .,_NN is_VBZ there_RB ._. In_IN the_DT last_JJ corn_NN cut_NN or_CC the_DT last_JJ
sheaf_NN threshed_VBD either_CC the_DT Corn-mother_NN or_CC the_DT Corn-wolf_NNP ,_, etc_NN .,_NN is_VBZ
supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB present_JJ ._. The_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ itself_PRP called_VBN either_RB the_DT
Corn-mother_NN or_CC the_DT Corn-wolf_NNP ,_, etc_FW .,_, and_CC is_VBZ made_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT shape_NN
either_DT of_IN a_DT woman_NN or_CC of_IN a_DT wolf_NN ,_, etc_FW ._. The_DT person_NN who_WP cuts_VBZ ,_, binds_NNS ,_, or_CC
threshes_NNS the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ called_VBN either_CC the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NNP or_CC the_DT Wolf_NNP ,_,
etc_FW .,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT name_NN bestowed_VBD on_IN the_DT sheaf_NN itself_PRP ._. As_IN in_IN some_DT
places_NNS a_DT sheaf_NN made_VBN in_IN human_JJ form_NN and_CC called_VBD the_DT Maiden_NNP ,_, the_DT Mother_NN
of_IN the_DT Maize_NNP ,_, etc_NN .,_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN from_IN one_CD harvest_NN to_TO the_DT next_JJ in_IN order_NN to_TO
secure_VBP a_DT continuance_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN '_POS s_PRP blessing_NN ,_, so_RB in_IN some_DT
places_NNS the_DT Harvest-cock_NNP and_CC in_IN others_NNS the_DT flesh_NN of_IN the_DT goat_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN
for_IN a_DT similar_JJ purpose_NN from_IN one_CD harvest_NN to_TO the_DT next_JJ ._. As_IN in_IN some_DT
places_NNS the_DT grain_NN taken_VBN from_IN the_DT Corn-mother_NN is_VBZ mixed_VBN with_IN the_DT
seed-corn_NN in_IN spring_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT crop_NN abundant_JJ ,_, so_RB in_IN some_DT places_NNS the_DT
feathers_NNS of_IN the_DT cock_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN Sweden_NNP the_DT Yule_NNP Boar_NNP ,_, are_VBP kept_VBN till_IN
spring_NN and_CC mixed_JJ with_IN the_DT seed-corn_NN for_IN a_DT like_JJ purpose_NN ._. As_IN part_NN of_IN
the_DT Corn-mother_JJ or_CC Maiden_NNP is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO the_DT cattle_NNS at_IN Christmas_NNP or_CC to_TO
the_DT horses_NNS at_IN the_DT first_JJ ploughing_NN ,_, so_IN part_NN of_IN the_DT Yule_NNP Boar_NNP is_VBZ given_VBN
to_TO the_DT ploughing_NN horses_NNS or_CC oxen_NNS in_IN spring_NN ._. Lastly_RB ,_, the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ represented_VBN by_IN killing_VBG or_CC pretending_VBG to_TO kill_VB either_CC
his_PRP$ human_NN or_CC his_PRP$ animal_NN representative_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT worshippers_NNS partake_NN
sacramentally_VBG either_DT of_IN the_DT actual_JJ body_NN and_CC blood_NN of_IN the_DT
representative_NN of_IN the_DT divinity_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN bread_NN made_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ likeness_NN ._.

Other_JJ animal_NN forms_NNS assumed_VBN by_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN are_VBP the_DT fox_NN ,_, stag_NN ,_,
roe_NN ,_, sheep_NN ,_, bear_NN ,_, ass_NN ,_, mouse_NN ,_, quail_NN ,_, stork_NN ,_, swan_NN ,_, and_CC kite_NN ._. If_IN it_PRP is_VBZ
asked_VBD why_WRB the_DT corn-spirit_NN should_MD be_VB thought_VBN to_TO appear_VB in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN
an_DT animal_NN and_CC of_IN so_RB many_JJ different_JJ animals_NNS ,_, we_PRP may_MD reply_VB that_IN to_TO
primitive_JJ man_NN the_DT simple_JJ appearance_NN of_IN an_DT animal_NN or_CC bird_NN among_IN the_DT
corn_NN is_VBZ probably_RB enough_RB to_TO suggest_VB a_DT mysterious_JJ link_NN between_IN the_DT
creature_NN and_CC the_DT corn_NN ;_: and_CC when_WRB we_PRP remember_VBP that_IN in_IN the_DT old_JJ days_NNS ,_,
before_IN fields_NNS were_VBD fenced_VBN in_IN ,_, all_DT kinds_NNS of_IN animals_NNS must_MD have_VB been_VBN
free_JJ to_TO roam_VB over_IN them_PRP ,_, we_PRP need_VBP not_RB wonder_VB that_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN
should_MD have_VB been_VBN identified_VBN even_RB with_IN large_JJ animals_NNS like_IN the_DT horse_NN
and_CC cow_NN ,_, which_WDT nowadays_RB could_MD not_RB ,_, except_IN by_IN a_DT rare_JJ accident_NN ,_, be_VB
found_VBN straying_NN in_IN an_DT English_NNP corn-field_NN ._. This_DT explanation_NN applies_VBZ
with_IN peculiar_JJ force_NN to_TO the_DT very_RB common_JJ case_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT animal_NN
embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO lurk_VB in_IN the_DT last_JJ
standing_VBG corn_NN ._. For_IN at_IN harvest_NN a_DT number_NN of_IN wild_JJ animals_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN
hares_NNS ,_, rabbits_NNS ,_, and_CC partridges_NNS ,_, are_VBP commonly_RB driven_VBN by_IN the_DT progress_NN
of_IN the_DT reaping_NN into_IN the_DT last_JJ patch_NN of_IN standing_VBG corn_NN ,_, and_CC make_VB their_PRP$
escape_NN from_IN it_PRP as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ being_VBG cut_VBN down_RP ._. So_RB regularly_RB does_VBZ this_DT
happen_VB that_IN reapers_NNS and_CC others_NNS often_RB stand_VBP round_RB the_DT last_JJ patch_NN of_IN
corn_NN armed_VBN with_IN sticks_NNS or_CC guns_NNS ,_, with_IN which_WDT they_PRP kill_VBP the_DT animals_NNS as_IN
they_PRP dart_VB out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ last_JJ refuge_NN among_IN the_DT stalks_NNS ._. Now_RB ,_, primitive_JJ
man_NN ,_, to_TO whom_WP magical_JJ changes_NNS of_IN shape_NN seem_VBP perfectly_RB credible_JJ ,_, finds_NNS
it_PRP most_RBS natural_JJ that_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, driven_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ home_NN in_IN
the_DT ripe_JJ grain_NN ,_, should_MD make_VB his_PRP$ escape_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN
which_WDT is_VBZ seen_VBN to_TO rush_VB out_IN of_IN the_DT last_JJ patch_NN of_IN corn_NN as_IN it_PRP falls_VBZ
under_IN the_DT scythe_NN of_IN the_DT reaper_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT identification_NN of_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN with_IN an_DT animal_NN is_VBZ analogous_JJ to_TO the_DT identification_NN of_IN him_PRP
with_IN a_DT passing_VBG stranger_NN ._. As_IN the_DT sudden_JJ appearance_NN of_IN a_DT stranger_NN near_IN
the_DT harvest-field_NN or_CC threshing-floor_NN is_VBZ ,_, to_TO the_DT primitive_JJ mind_NN ,_,
enough_RB to_TO identify_VB him_PRP as_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN escaping_VBG from_IN the_DT
cut_NN or_CC threshed_JJ corn_NN ,_, so_IN the_DT sudden_JJ appearance_NN of_IN an_DT animal_NN issuing_VBG
from_IN the_DT cut_NN corn_NN is_VBZ enough_RB to_TO identify_VB it_PRP with_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN
escaping_VBG from_IN his_PRP$ ruined_JJ home_NN ._. The_DT two_CD identifications_NNS are_VBP so_RB
analogous_JJ that_IN they_PRP can_MD hardly_RB be_VB dissociated_VBN in_IN any_DT attempt_NN to_TO
explain_VB them_PRP ._. Those_DT who_WP look_VBP to_TO some_DT other_JJ principle_NN than_IN the_DT one_CD
here_RB suggested_VBD for_IN the_DT explanation_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ identification_NN are_VBP
bound_VBN to_TO show_VB that_IN their_PRP$ theory_NN covers_VBZ the_DT former_JJ identification_NN
also_RB ._.




XLIX_NNP ._. Ancient_NNP Deities_NNP of_IN Vegetation_NNP as_IN Animals_NNPS



1._DT Dionysus_NNP ,_, the_DT Goat_NNP and_CC the_DT Bull_NNP

HOWEVER_NN we_PRP may_MD explain_VB it_PRP ,_, the_DT fact_NN remains_VBZ that_IN in_IN peasant_NN
folk-lore_NN the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ very_RB commonly_RB conceived_VBN and_CC represented_VBN
in_IN animal_JJ form_NN ._. May_MD not_RB this_DT fact_NN explain_VB the_DT relation_NN in_IN which_WDT
certain_JJ animals_NNS stood_VBD to_TO the_DT ancient_JJ deities_NNS of_IN vegetation_NN ,_,
Dionysus_NNP ,_, Demeter_NNP ,_, Adonis_NNP ,_, Attis_NNP ,_, and_CC Osiris_NNP ?_.

To_TO begin_VB with_IN Dionysus_NNP ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD represented_VBN
sometimes_RB as_IN a_DT goat_NN and_CC sometimes_RB as_IN a_DT bull_NN ._. As_IN a_DT goat_NN he_PRP can_MD hardly_RB
be_VB separated_VBN from_IN the_DT minor_JJ divinities_NNS ,_, the_DT Pans_NNP ,_, Satyrs_NNP ,_, and_CC
Silenuses_NNS ,_, all_DT of_IN whom_WP are_VBP closely_RB associated_VBN with_IN him_PRP and_CC are_VBP
represented_VBN more_RBR or_CC less_RBR completely_RB in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN goats_NNS ._. Thus_RB ,_, Pan_NNP
was_VBD regularly_RB portrayed_VBN in_IN sculpture_NN and_CC painting_NN with_IN the_DT face_NN and_CC
legs_NNS of_IN a_DT goat_NN ._. The_DT Satyrs_NNPS were_VBD depicted_VBN with_IN pointed_JJ goat-ears_NNS ,_, and_CC
sometimes_RB with_IN sprouting_VBG horns_NNS and_CC short_JJ tails_NNS ._. They_PRP were_VBD sometimes_RB
spoken_VBN of_IN simply_RB as_IN goats_NNS ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT drama_NN their_PRP$ parts_NNS were_VBD played_VBN
by_IN men_NNS dressed_VBN in_IN goatskins_NNS ._. Silenus_NN is_VBZ represented_VBN in_IN art_NN clad_VBN in_IN a_DT
goatskin_NN ._. Further_RB ,_, the_DT Fauns_NNS ,_, the_DT Italian_JJ counterpart_NN of_IN the_DT Greek_NNP
Pans_NNP and_CC Satyrs_NNP ,_, are_VBP described_VBN as_IN being_VBG half_DT goats_NNS ,_, with_IN goat-feet_NN
and_CC goat-horns_NNS ._. Again_RB ,_, all_DT these_DT minor_JJ goat-formed_JJ divinities_NNS
partake_NN more_RBR or_CC less_RBR clearly_RB of_IN the_DT character_NN of_IN woodland_NN deities_NNS ._.
Thus_RB ,_, Pan_NNP was_VBD called_VBN by_IN the_DT Arcadians_NNPS the_DT Lord_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP ._. The_DT
Silenuses_NNS kept_VBD company_NN with_IN the_DT tree-nymphs_NNS ._. The_DT Fauns_NNPS are_VBP expressly_RB
designated_VBN as_IN woodland_NN deities_NNS ;_: and_CC their_PRP$ character_NN as_IN such_JJ is_VBZ still_RB
further_RB brought_VBD out_RP by_IN their_PRP$ association_NN ,_, or_CC even_RB identification_NN ,_,
with_IN Silvanus_NNP and_CC the_DT Silvanuses_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, as_IN their_PRP$ name_NN of_IN itself_PRP
indicates_VBZ ,_, are_VBP spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT woods_NNS ._. Lastly_RB ,_, the_DT association_NN of_IN the_DT
Satyrs_NNS with_IN the_DT Silenuses_NNS ,_, Fauns_NNS ,_, and_CC Silvanuses_NNP ,_, proves_VBZ that_IN the_DT
Satyrs_NNS also_RB were_VBD woodland_JJ deities_NNS ._. These_DT goat-formed_JJ spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT
woods_NNS have_VBP their_PRP$ counterparts_NNS in_IN the_DT folk-lore_NN of_IN Northern_NNP Europe_NNP ._.
Thus_RB ,_, the_DT Russian_NNP wood-spirits_NNS ,_, called_VBN Ljeschie_NNP (_-LRB- from_IN ljes_NNS ,_,
"_`` wood_NN "),_NN are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO appear_VB partly_RB in_IN human_JJ shape_NN ,_, but_CC with_IN the_DT
horns_NNS ,_, ears_NNS ,_, and_CC legs_NNS of_IN goats_NNS ._. The_DT Ljeschi_NNP can_MD alter_VB his_PRP$ stature_NN
at_IN pleasure_NN ;_: when_WRB he_PRP walks_VBZ in_IN the_DT wood_NN he_PRP is_VBZ as_RB tall_JJ as_IN the_DT trees_NNS ;_:
when_WRB he_PRP walks_VBZ in_IN the_DT meadows_NNS he_PRP is_VBZ no_RB higher_JJR than_IN the_DT grass_NN ._. Some_DT of_IN
the_DT Ljeschie_NNP are_VBP spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT corn_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN of_IN the_DT wood_NN ;_:
before_IN harvest_NN they_PRP are_VBP as_RB tall_JJ as_IN the_DT corn-stalks_NNS ,_, but_CC after_IN it_PRP
they_PRP shrink_VB to_TO the_DT height_NN of_IN the_DT stubble_NN ._. This_DT brings_VBZ out_RP --_: what_WP we_PRP
have_VBP remarked_VBD before_RB --_: the_DT close_JJ connexion_NN between_IN tree-spirits_NNS and_CC
corn-spirits_NNS ,_, and_CC shows_VBZ how_WRB easily_RB the_DT former_JJ may_MD melt_VB into_IN the_DT
latter_JJ ._. Similarly_RB the_DT Fauns_NNS ,_, though_IN wood-spirits_NNS ,_, were_VBD believed_VBN to_TO
foster_VB the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ._. We_PRP have_VBP already_RB seen_VBN how_WRB often_RB the_DT
corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ represented_VBN in_IN folk-custom_NN as_IN a_DT goat_NN ._. On_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_,
then_RB ,_, as_IN Mannhardt_NNP argues_VBZ ,_, the_DT Pans_NNP ,_, Satyrs_NNP ,_, and_CC Fauns_NNS perhaps_RB
belong_VB to_TO a_DT widely_RB diffused_JJ class_NN of_IN wood-spirits_NNS conceived_VBN in_IN
goat-form_NN ._. The_DT fondness_NN of_IN goats_NNS for_IN straying_VBG in_IN woods_NNS and_CC nibbling_VBG
the_DT bark_NN of_IN trees_NNS ,_, to_TO which_WDT indeed_RB they_PRP are_VBP most_RBS destructive_JJ ,_, is_VBZ an_DT
obvious_JJ and_CC perhaps_RB sufficient_JJ reason_NN why_WRB wood-spirits_NNS should_MD so_RB
often_RB be_VB supposed_VBN to_TO take_VB the_DT form_NN of_IN goats_NNS ._. The_DT inconsistency_NN of_IN a_DT
god_NN of_IN vegetation_NN subsisting_NN upon_IN the_DT vegetation_NN which_WDT he_PRP
personifies_NNS is_VBZ not_RB one_CD to_TO strike_VB the_DT primitive_JJ mind_NN ._. Such_PDT
inconsistencies_NNS arise_VBP when_WRB the_DT deity_NN ,_, ceasing_VBG to_TO be_VB immanent_JJ in_IN the_DT
vegetation_NN ,_, comes_VBZ to_TO be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN its_PRP$ owner_NN or_CC lord_NN ;_: for_IN the_DT idea_NN
of_IN owning_VBG the_DT vegetation_NN naturally_RB leads_VBZ to_TO that_DT of_IN subsisting_NN on_IN
it_PRP ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT corn-spirit_NN ,_, originally_RB conceived_VBN as_IN immanent_JJ in_IN
the_DT corn_NN ,_, afterwards_RB comes_VBZ to_TO be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN its_PRP$ owner_NN ,_, who_WP lives_VBZ on_IN
it_PRP and_CC is_VBZ reduced_VBN to_TO poverty_NN and_CC want_VBP by_IN being_VBG deprived_VBN of_IN it_PRP ._. Hence_RB
he_PRP is_VBZ often_RB known_VBN as_IN "_`` the_DT Poor_JJ Man_NN "_'' or_CC "_`` the_DT Poor_NNP Woman_NNP ."_NN
Occasionally_RB the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ left_VBN standing_VBG on_IN the_DT field_NN for_IN "_'' the_DT
Poor_NNP Old_NNP Woman_NN "_'' or_CC for_IN "_`` the_DT Old_NNP Rye-woman_NNP ."_.

Thus_RB the_DT representation_NN of_IN wood-spirits_NNS in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN goats_NNS appears_NNS
to_TO be_VB both_DT widespread_JJ and_CC ,_, to_TO the_DT primitive_JJ mind_NN ,_, natural_JJ ._. Therefore_CC
when_WRB we_PRP find_VBP ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP done_VBN ,_, that_IN Dionysus_NNP --_: a_DT tree-god_NN --_: is_VBZ
sometimes_RB represented_VBN in_IN goat-form_NN ,_, we_PRP can_MD hardly_RB avoid_VB concluding_VBG
that_IN this_DT representation_NN is_VBZ simply_RB a_DT part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ proper_JJ character_NN as_IN
a_DT tree-god_NN and_CC is_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB explained_VBN by_IN the_DT fusion_NN of_IN two_CD distinct_JJ
and_CC independent_JJ worships_NNS ,_, in_IN one_CD of_IN which_WDT he_PRP originally_RB appeared_VBD as_IN
a_DT tree-god_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT other_JJ as_IN a_DT goat_NN ._.

Dionysus_NNP was_VBD also_RB figured_VBN ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT bull_NN ._.
After_IN what_WP has_VBZ gone_VBN before_IN we_PRP are_VBP naturally_RB led_VBN to_TO expect_VB that_IN his_PRP$
bull_NN form_NN must_MD have_VB been_VBN only_RB another_DT expression_NN for_IN his_PRP$ character_NN
as_IN a_DT deity_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ,_, especially_RB as_IN the_DT bull_NN is_VBZ a_DT common_JJ
embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN in_IN Northern_NNP Europe_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT close_NN
association_NN of_IN Dionysus_NNP with_IN Demeter_NNP and_CC Persephone_NNP in_IN the_DT mysteries_NNS
of_IN Eleusis_NNP shows_VBZ that_IN he_PRP had_VBD at_IN least_JJS strong_JJ agricultural_JJ
affinities_NNS ._.

The_DT probability_NN of_IN this_DT view_NN will_MD be_VB somewhat_RB increased_VBN if_IN it_PRP can_MD be_VB

of_IN the_DT OX_JJ "_`` (_-LRB- bouphonia_NN )._, It_PRP took_VBD place_NN about_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN June_NNP or_CC

nearly_RB over_IN in_IN Attica_NNP ._. According_VBG to_TO tradition_NN the_DT sacrifice_NN was_VBD

afflicted_VBN the_DT land_NN ._. The_DT ritual_NN was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ ._. Barley_NNP mixed_JJ with_IN

The_DT name_NN of_IN this_DT sacrifice_NN ,--_, "_'' the_DT murder_NN of_IN the_DT OX_NNP ,"--_, the_DT pains_NNS

The_DT OX_NNP appears_VBZ as_IN a_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS

women_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN sit_VB in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT beasts_NNS ,_, chanting_NN ,_, "_`` The_DT OX_.
will_MD weep_VB ;_: yes_UH ,_, he_PRP will_MD weep_VB !"_NN From_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN one_CD of_IN the_DT women_NNS
walks_VBZ round_RB the_DT beasts_NNS ,_, throwing_VBG manioc_NN meal_NN or_CC palm_NN wine_NN upon_IN them_PRP ,_,

Then_RB two_CD men_NNS seize_VBP the_DT tails_NNS of_IN the_DT beasts_NNS and_CC cut_VB them_PRP off_RP at_IN one_CD

Here_RB the_DT tears_NNS of_IN the_DT oxen_NNS ,_, like_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT human_JJ victims_NNS amongst_IN

Still_RB more_RBR clearly_RB does_VBZ the_DT ox_NN appear_VBP as_IN a_DT personification_NN of_IN the_DT

The_DT mandarins_NNS walk_VBP slowly_RB round_VB the_DT ox_NN ,_, beating_VBG it_PRP severely_RB at_IN each_DT

the_DT mandarins_NNS ._. According_VBG to_TO one_CD account_NN ,_, the_DT effigy_NN of_IN the_DT ox_NN is_VBZ

abundant_JJ year_NN ."_, Here_RB the_DT corn-spirit_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB plainly_RB

supposed_VBN to_TO bring_VB fertility_NN with_IN them_PRP ._.

On_IN the_DT whole_NN we_PRP may_MD perhaps_RB conclude_VB that_IN both_DT as_IN a_DT goat_NN and_CC as_IN a_DT
bull_NN Dionysus_NNP was_VBD essentially_RB a_DT god_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ._. The_DT Chinese_NNPS and_CC

custom_NN of_IN rending_VBG a_DT live_JJ bull_NN or_CC goat_NN at_IN the_DT rites_NNS of_IN Dionysus_NNP ._. The_DT
animal_NN was_VBD torn_VBN in_IN fragments_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT Khond_NNP victim_NN was_VBD cut_VBN in_IN pieces_NNS ,_,
in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT worshippers_NNS might_MD each_DT secure_VB a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT
life-giving_NN and_CC fertilising_VBG influence_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ._. The_DT flesh_NN was_VBD

to_TO convey_VB to_TO the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN the_DT quickening_VBG influence_NN of_IN the_DT
god_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ._. The_DT resurrection_NN of_IN Dionysus_NNP ,_, related_VBN in_IN his_PRP$

the_DT slain_NN ox_NN ,_, as_RB was_VBD done_VBN at_IN the_DT Athenian_JJ bouphonia_NN ._.



2._DT Demeter_NNP ,_, the_DT Pig_NNP and_CC the_DT Horse_NN

PASSING_VBG next_JJ to_TO the_DT corn-goddess_NN Demeter_NNP ,_, and_CC remembering_VBG that_IN in_IN
European_JJ folk-lore_NN the_DT pig_NN is_VBZ a_DT common_JJ embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN ,_, we_PRP may_MD now_RB ask_VB whether_IN the_DT pig_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD so_RB closely_RB
associated_VBN with_IN Demeter_NNP ,_, may_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN originally_RB the_DT goddess_NN
herself_PRP in_IN animal_JJ form_NN ._. The_DT pig_NN was_VBD sacred_JJ to_TO her_PRP ;_: in_IN art_NN she_PRP was_VBD
portrayed_VBN carrying_VBG or_CC accompanied_VBN by_IN a_DT pig_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT pig_NN was_VBD
regularly_RB sacrificed_VBD in_IN her_PRP$ mysteries_NNS ,_, the_DT reason_NN assigned_VBN being_VBG
that_IN the_DT pig_NN injures_NNS the_DT corn_NN and_CC is_VBZ therefore_RB an_DT enemy_NN of_IN the_DT
goddess_JJ ._. But_CC after_IN an_DT animal_NN has_VBZ been_VBN conceived_VBN as_IN a_DT god_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT god_NN
as_IN an_DT animal_NN ,_, it_PRP sometimes_RB happens_VBZ ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, that_IN the_DT god_NN
sloughs_NNS off_IN his_PRP$ animal_NN form_NN and_CC becomes_VBZ purely_RB anthropomorphic_JJ ;_: and_CC
that_IN then_RB the_DT animal_NN ,_, which_WDT at_IN first_RB had_VBD been_VBN slain_VBN in_IN the_DT character_NN
of_IN the_DT god_NN ,_, comes_VBZ to_TO be_VB viewed_VBN as_IN a_DT victim_NN offered_VBN to_TO the_DT god_NN on_IN the_DT
ground_NN of_IN its_PRP$ hostility_NN to_TO the_DT deity_NN ;_: in_IN short_JJ ,_, the_DT god_NN is_VBZ
sacrificed_VBN to_TO himself_PRP on_IN the_DT ground_NN that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ his_PRP$ own_JJ enemy_NN ._. This_DT
happened_VBN to_TO Dionysus_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP may_MD have_VB happened_VBN to_TO Demeter_NNP also_RB ._. And_CC
in_IN fact_NN the_DT rites_NNS of_IN one_CD of_IN her_PRP$ festivals_NNS ,_, the_DT Thesmophoria_NNP ,_, bear_NN
out_IN the_DT view_NN that_WDT originally_RB the_DT pig_NN was_VBD an_DT embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT
corn-goddess_NN herself_PRP ,_, either_CC Demeter_NNP or_CC her_PRP$ daughter_NN and_CC double_JJ
Persephone_NNP ._. The_DT Attic_NNP Thesmophoria_NNP was_VBD an_DT autumn_NN festival_NN ,_,
celebrated_VBN by_IN women_NNS alone_RB in_IN October_NNP ,_, and_CC appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB
represented_VBN with_IN mourning_VBG rites_NNS the_DT descent_NN of_IN Persephone_NNP (_-LRB- or_CC
Demeter_NN )_-RRB- into_IN the_DT lower_JJR world_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN joy_NN her_PRP return_NN from_IN the_DT
dead_JJ ._. Hence_RB the_DT name_NN Descent_NNP or_CC Ascent_NNP variously_RB applied_VBD to_TO the_DT
first_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT name_NN Kalligeneia_NNP (_-LRB- fair-born_JJ )_-RRB- applied_VBD to_TO the_DT third_JJ
day_NN of_IN the_DT festival_NN ._. Now_RB it_PRP was_VBD customary_JJ at_IN the_DT Thesmophoria_NNP to_TO
throw_VBP pigs_NNS ,_, cakes_NNS of_IN dough_NN ,_, and_CC branches_NNS of_IN pine-trees_NNS into_IN "_'' the_DT
chasms_NNS of_IN Demeter_NNP and_CC Persephone_NNP ,"_, which_WDT appear_VBP to_TO have_VB been_VBN sacred_JJ
caverns_NNS or_CC vaults_NNS ._. In_IN these_DT caverns_NNS or_CC vaults_NNS there_EX were_VBD said_VBD to_TO be_VB
serpents_NNS ,_, which_WDT guarded_VBN the_DT caverns_NNS and_CC consumed_VBD most_JJS of_IN the_DT flesh_NN
of_IN the_DT pigs_NNS and_CC dough-cakes_NNS which_WDT were_VBD thrown_VBN in_IN ._.
Afterwards_RB --_: apparently_RB at_IN the_DT next_JJ annual_JJ festival_NN --_: the_DT decayed_NN
remains_VBZ of_IN the_DT pigs_NNS ,_, the_DT cakes_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT pine-branches_NNS were_VBD fetched_VBN
by_IN women_NNS called_VBN "_`` drawers_NNS ,"_, who_WP ,_, after_IN observing_VBG rules_NNS of_IN ceremonial_NN
purity_NN for_IN three_CD days_NNS ,_, descended_VBD into_IN the_DT caverns_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, frightening_VBG
away_RB the_DT serpents_NNS by_IN clapping_VBG their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, brought_VBD up_RP the_DT remains_NNS
and_CC placed_VBD them_PRP on_IN the_DT altar_NN ._. Whoever_NNP got_VBD a_DT piece_NN of_IN the_DT decayed_NN
flesh_NN and_CC cakes_NNS ,_, and_CC sowed_VBD it_PRP with_IN the_DT seed-corn_NN in_IN his_PRP$ field_NN ,_, was_VBD
believed_VBN to_TO be_VB sure_JJ of_IN a_DT good_JJ crop_NN ._.

To_TO explain_VB the_DT rude_JJ and_CC ancient_JJ ritual_NN of_IN the_DT Thesmophoria_NNP the_DT
following_VBG legend_NN was_VBD told_VBN ._. At_IN the_DT moment_NN when_WRB Pluto_NNP carried_VBD off_RB
Persephone_NNP ,_, a_DT swineherd_NN called_VBN Eubuleus_NNP chanced_VBD to_TO be_VB herding_VBG his_PRP$

Pluto_NNP vanished_VBD with_IN Persephone_NNP ._. Accordingly_RB at_IN the_DT Thesmophoria_NNP pigs_NNS
were_VBD annually_RB thrown_VBN into_IN caverns_NNS to_TO commemorate_VB the_DT disappearance_NN
of_IN the_DT swine_NN of_IN Eubuleus_NNP ._. It_PRP follows_VBZ from_IN this_DT that_IN the_DT casting_NN of_IN

the_DT pigs_NNS were_VBD Persephone_RB ._. Afterwards_RB when_WRB Persephone_NNP or_CC Demeter_NNP (_-LRB- for_IN
the_DT two_CD are_VBP equivalent_JJ )_-RRB- took_VBD on_RP human_JJ form_NN ,_, a_DT reason_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB found_VBN
for_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN throwing_VBG pigs_NNS into_IN caverns_NNS at_IN her_PRP$ festival_NN ;_: and_CC

Demeter_NNP herself_PRP ._. A_DT consciousness_NN of_IN the_DT intimate_JJ connexion_NN of_IN the_DT

was_VBD a_DT brother_NN of_IN Triptolemus_NNP ,_, to_TO whom_WP Demeter_NNP first_RB imparted_VBD the_DT
secret_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN ._. Indeed_RB ,_, according_VBG to_TO one_CD version_NN of_IN the_DT story_NN ,_,

Thesmophoria_NNP the_DT women_NNS appear_VBP to_TO have_VB eaten_VBN swine_NN '_'' s_PRP flesh_NN ._. The_DT meal_NN ,_,

worshippers_NNS partaking_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ._.

As_IN thus_RB explained_VBN ,_, the_DT Thesmophoria_NNP has_VBZ its_PRP$ analogies_NNS in_IN the_DT
folk-customs_NNS of_IN Northern_NNP Europe_NNP which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN already_RB described_VBN ._.
Just_RB as_IN at_IN the_DT Thesmophoria_NNP --_: an_DT autumn_NN festival_NN in_IN honour_NN of_IN the_DT
corn-goddess_NN --_: swine_NN '_'' s_PRP flesh_NN was_VBD partly_RB eaten_VBN ,_, partly_RB kept_VBN in_IN caverns_NNS

and_CC kept_VBD till_IN the_DT next_JJ harvest_NN ;_: so_RB at_IN Pouilly_NNP the_DT ox_NN killed_VBD on_IN the_DT

mixed_JJ with_IN the_DT seed_NN ,_, or_CC eaten_VBN by_IN the_DT ploughmen_NNS ,_, or_CC both_DT ;_: so_RB at_IN
Udvarhely_RB the_DT feathers_NNS of_IN the_DT cock_NN which_WDT is_VBZ killed_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN
at_IN harvest_NN are_VBP kept_VBN till_IN spring_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB sown_VBN with_IN the_DT seed_NN on_IN the_DT
field_NN ;_: so_RB in_IN Hesse_NNP and_CC Meiningen_NNP the_DT flesh_NN of_IN pigs_NNS is_VBZ eaten_VBN on_IN Ash_NNP

the_DT continuance_NN or_CC renewal_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN '_'' s_PRP energies_NNS ._.

If_IN persons_NNS of_IN fastidious_JJ taste_NN should_MD object_VB that_IN the_DT Greeks_NNP never_RB

is_VBZ little_JJ to_TO choose_VB in_IN respect_NN of_IN barbarism_NN ._. The_DT legend_NN told_VBD of_IN the_DT

were_VBD perishing_NN ,_, and_CC mankind_NN would_MD have_VB died_VBN of_IN famine_NN if_IN Pan_NNP had_VBD not_RB

3._DT Attis_NNP ,_, Adonis_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Pig_NNP

PASSING_VBG now_RB to_TO Attis_NNP and_CC Adonis_NNP ,_, we_PRP may_MD note_VB a_DT few_JJ facts_NNS which_WDT seem_VBP
to_TO show_VB that_IN these_DT deities_NNS of_IN vegetation_NN had_VBD also_RB ,_, like_IN other_JJ
deities_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ class_NN ,_, their_PRP$ animal_NN embodiments_NNS ._. The_DT worshippers_NNS
of_IN Attis_NNP abstained_VBD from_IN eating_VBG the_DT flesh_NN of_IN swine_NN ._. This_DT appears_VBZ to_TO
indicate_VBP that_IN the_DT pig_NN was_VBD regarded_VBN as_IN an_DT embodiment_NN of_IN Attis_NNP ._. And_CC
the_DT legend_NN that_IN Attis_NNP was_VBD killed_VBN by_IN a_DT boar_NN points_NNS in_IN the_DT same_JJ
direction_NN ._. For_IN after_IN the_DT examples_NNS of_IN the_DT goat_NN Dionysus_NNP and_CC the_DT pig_NN
Demeter_NN it_PRP may_MD almost_RB be_VB laid_VBN down_RP as_IN a_DT rule_NN that_IN an_DT animal_NN which_WDT is_VBZ
said_VBD to_TO have_VB injured_VBN a_DT god_NN was_VBD originally_RB the_DT god_NN himself_PRP ._. Perhaps_RB
the_DT cry_NN of_IN "_`` Hyes_NNP Attes_NNPS !_. Hyes_NNPS Attes_NNPS !"_, which_WDT was_VBD raised_VBN by_IN the_DT
worshippers_NNS of_IN Attis_NNP ,_, may_MD be_VB neither_DT more_RBR nor_CC less_RBR than_IN "_'' Pig_NNP Attis_NNP !_.
Pig_NNP Attis_NNP !"--_. hyes_NNS being_VBG possibly_RB a_DT Phrygian_JJ form_NN of_IN the_DT Greek_NNP
hy_NN �_NN s_VBZ ,_, "_`` a_DT pig_NN ."_NN

In_IN regard_NN to_TO Adonis_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ connexion_NN with_IN the_DT boar_NN was_VBD not_RB always_RB
explained_VBN by_IN the_DT story_NN that_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN killed_VBN by_IN the_DT animal_NN ._.
According_VBG to_TO another_DT story_NN ,_, a_DT boar_NN rent_NN with_IN his_PRP$ tusk_NN the_DT bark_NN of_IN
the_DT tree_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT infant_NN Adonis_NNP was_VBD born_VBN ._. According_VBG to_TO yet_RB
another_DT story_NN ,_, he_PRP perished_VBD at_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN Hephaestus_NNP on_IN Mount_NNP
Lebanon_NNP while_IN he_PRP was_VBD hunting_VBG wild_JJ boars_NNS ._. These_DT variations_NNS in_IN the_DT
legend_NN serve_VBP to_TO show_VB that_IN ,_, while_IN the_DT connexion_NN of_IN the_DT boar_NN with_IN
Adonis_NNP was_VBD certain_JJ ,_, the_DT reason_NN of_IN the_DT connexion_NN was_VBD not_RB understood_VBN ,_,
and_CC that_DT consequently_RB different_JJ stories_NNS were_VBD devised_VBN to_TO explain_VB it_PRP ._.
Certainly_RB the_DT pig_NN ranked_VBD as_IN a_DT sacred_JJ animal_NN among_IN the_DT Syrians_NNS ._. At_IN
the_DT great_JJ religious_JJ metropolis_NNS of_IN Hierapolis_NNP on_IN the_DT Euphrates_NNS pigs_NNS
were_VBD neither_DT sacrificed_JJ nor_CC eaten_VBN ,_, and_CC if_IN a_DT man_NN touched_VBD a_DT pig_NN he_PRP was_VBD
unclean_JJ for_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN ._. Some_DT people_NNS said_VBD this_DT was_VBD because_IN
the_DT pigs_NNS were_VBD unclean_JJ ;_: others_NNS said_VBD it_PRP was_VBD because_IN the_DT pigs_NNS were_VBD
sacred_JJ ._. This_DT difference_NN of_IN opinion_NN points_NNS to_TO a_DT hazy_JJ state_NN of_IN
religious_JJ thought_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT ideas_NNS of_IN sanctity_NN and_CC uncleanness_NN are_VBP
not_RB yet_RB sharply_RB distinguished_VBN ,_, both_DT being_VBG blent_JJ in_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN
vaporous_JJ solution_NN to_TO which_WDT we_PRP give_VBP the_DT name_NN of_IN taboo_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB
consistent_JJ with_IN this_DT that_IN the_DT pig_NN should_MD have_VB been_VBN held_VBN to_TO be_VB an_DT
embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ Adonis_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT analogies_NNS of_IN Dionysus_NNP and_CC
Demeter_NNP make_VBP it_PRP probable_JJ that_IN the_DT story_NN of_IN the_DT hostility_NN of_IN the_DT
animal_NN to_TO the_DT god_NN was_VBD only_RB a_DT late_JJ misapprehension_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ view_NN of_IN
the_DT god_NN as_IN embodied_VBN in_IN a_DT pig_NN ._. The_DT rule_NN that_IN pigs_NNS were_VBD not_RB sacrificed_VBN
or_CC eaten_VBN by_IN worshippers_NNS of_IN Attis_NNP and_CC presumably_RB of_IN Adonis_NNP ,_, does_VBZ not_RB
exclude_VB the_DT possibility_NN that_IN in_IN these_DT rituals_NNS the_DT pig_NN was_VBD slain_VBN on_IN
solemn_JJ occasions_NNS as_IN a_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN and_CC consumed_VBN
sacramentally_RB by_IN the_DT worshippers_NNS ._. Indeed_RB ,_, the_DT sacramental_JJ killing_NN
and_CC eating_NN of_IN an_DT animal_NN implies_VBZ that_IN the_DT animal_NN is_VBZ sacred_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN ,_,
as_IN a_DT general_JJ rule_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ spared_VBN ._.

The_DT attitude_NN of_IN the_DT Jews_NNPS to_TO the_DT pig_NN was_VBD as_RB ambiguous_JJ as_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT
heathen_RB Syrians_NNS towards_IN the_DT same_JJ animal_NN ._. The_DT Greeks_NNP could_MD not_RB decide_VB
whether_IN the_DT Jews_NNPS worshipped_VBD swine_VB or_CC abominated_VBD them_PRP ._. On_IN the_DT one_CD
hand_NN they_PRP might_MD not_RB eat_VB swine_NN ;_: but_CC on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN they_PRP might_MD not_RB
kill_VB them_PRP ._. And_CC if_IN the_DT former_JJ rule_NN speaks_VBZ for_IN the_DT uncleanness_NN ,_, the_DT
latter_NN speaks_VBZ still_RB more_RBR strongly_RB for_IN the_DT sanctity_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN ._.
For_IN whereas_IN both_DT rules_NNS may_MD ,_, and_CC one_CD rule_NN must_MD ,_, be_VB explained_VBN on_IN the_DT
supposition_NN that_IN the_DT pig_NN was_VBD sacred_JJ ;_: neither_DT rule_NN must_MD ,_, and_CC one_CD rule_NN
cannot_NN ,_, be_VB explained_VBN on_IN the_DT supposition_NN that_IN the_DT pig_NN was_VBD unclean_JJ ._.
If_IN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, we_PRP prefer_VBP the_DT former_JJ supposition_NN ,_, we_PRP must_MD conclude_VB
that_IN ,_, originally_RB at_IN least_JJS ,_, the_DT pig_NN was_VBD revered_VBN rather_RB than_IN abhorred_VBN
by_IN the_DT Israelites_NNPS ._. We_PRP are_VBP confirmed_VBN in_IN this_DT opinion_NN by_IN observing_VBG
that_WDT down_RP to_TO the_DT time_NN of_IN Isaiah_NNP some_DT of_IN the_DT Jews_NNPS used_VBD to_TO meet_VB
secretly_RB in_IN gardens_NNS to_TO eat_VB the_DT flesh_NN of_IN swine_NN and_CC mice_NNS as_IN a_DT
religious_JJ rite_NN ._. Doubtless_RB this_DT was_VBD a_DT very_RB ancient_JJ ceremony_NN ,_, dating_VBG
from_IN a_DT time_NN when_WRB both_DT the_DT pig_NN and_CC the_DT mouse_NN were_VBD venerated_VBN as_IN
divine_JJ ,_, and_CC when_WRB their_PRP$ flesh_NN was_VBD partaken_RB of_IN sacramentally_VBG on_IN rare_JJ
and_CC solemn_JJ occasions_NNS as_IN the_DT body_NN and_CC blood_NN of_IN gods_NNS ._. And_CC in_IN general_JJ
it_PRP may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB said_VBN that_IN all_DT so-called_JJ unclean_JJ animals_NNS were_VBD
originally_RB sacred_JJ ;_: the_DT reason_NN for_IN not_RB eating_VBG them_PRP was_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD
divine_JJ ._.



4._DT Osiris_NNP ,_, the_DT Pig_NNP and_CC the_DT Bull_NNP

IN_IN ANCIENT_NNP Egypt_NNP ,_, within_IN historical_JJ times_NNS ,_, the_DT pig_NN occupied_VBD the_DT same_JJ
dubious_JJ position_NN as_IN in_IN Syria_NNP and_CC Palestine_NNP ,_, though_IN at_IN first_JJ sight_NN
its_PRP$ uncleanness_NN is_VBZ more_RBR prominent_JJ than_IN its_PRP$ sanctity_NN ._. The_DT Egyptians_NNPS
are_VBP generally_RB said_VBN by_IN Greek_NNP writers_NNS to_TO have_VB abhorred_VBN the_DT pig_NN as_IN a_DT
foul_JJ and_CC loathsome_JJ animal_NN ._. If_IN a_DT man_NN so_RB much_RB as_IN touched_VBN a_DT pig_NN in_IN
passing_VBG ,_, he_PRP stepped_VBD into_IN the_DT river_NN with_IN all_DT his_PRP$ clothes_NNS on_IN ,_, to_TO wash_VB
off_IN the_DT taint_NN ._. To_TO drink_VB pig_NN '_'' s_PRP milk_NN was_VBD believed_VBN to_TO cause_VB leprosy_JJ to_TO
the_DT drinker_NN ._. Swineherds_NNS ,_, though_IN natives_NNS of_IN Egypt_NNP ,_, were_VBD forbidden_VBN to_TO
enter_VB any_DT temple_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD the_DT only_JJ men_NNS who_WP were_VBD thus_RB excluded_VBN ._.
No_DT one_NN would_MD give_VB his_PRP$ daughter_NN in_IN marriage_NN to_TO a_DT swineherd_NN ,_, or_CC marry_VB
a_DT swineherd_NN '_'' s_PRP daughter_NN ;_: the_DT swineherds_NNS married_VBN among_IN themselves_PRP ._. Yet_CC
once_RB a_DT year_NN the_DT Egyptians_NNPS sacrificed_VBD pigs_NNS to_TO the_DT moon_NN and_CC to_TO Osiris_NNP ,_,
and_CC not_RB only_RB sacrificed_JJ them_PRP ,_, but_CC ate_VBD of_IN their_PRP$ flesh_NN ,_, though_IN on_IN any_DT
other_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN they_PRP would_MD neither_RB sacrifice_VB them_PRP nor_CC taste_VB of_IN
their_PRP$ flesh_NN ._. Those_DT who_WP were_VBD too_RB poor_JJ to_TO offer_VB a_DT pig_NN on_IN this_DT day_NN
baked_JJ cakes_NNS of_IN dough_NN ,_, and_CC offered_VBD them_PRP instead_RB ._. This_DT can_MD hardly_RB be_VB
explained_VBD except_IN by_IN the_DT supposition_NN that_IN the_DT pig_NN was_VBD a_DT sacred_JJ animal_NN
which_WDT was_VBD eaten_VBN sacramentally_RB by_IN his_PRP$ worshippers_NNS once_RB a_DT year_NN ._.

The_DT view_NN that_IN in_IN Egypt_NNP the_DT pig_NN was_VBD sacred_JJ is_VBZ borne_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT very_RB
facts_NNS which_WDT ,_, to_TO moderns_NNS ,_, might_MD seem_VB to_TO prove_VB the_DT contrary_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT
Egyptians_NNS thought_VBD ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, that_IN to_TO drink_VB pig_NN '_'' s_PRP milk_NN
produced_VBN leprosy_JJ ._. But_CC exactly_RB analogous_JJ views_NNS are_VBP held_VBN by_IN savages_NNS
about_IN the_DT animals_NNS and_CC plants_NNS which_WDT they_PRP deem_VBP most_RBS sacred_JJ ._. Thus_RB in_IN
the_DT island_NN of_IN Wetar_NNP (_-LRB- between_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP and_CC Celebes_NNP )_-RRB- people_NNS believe_VBP
themselves_PRP to_TO be_VB variously_RB descended_VBN from_IN wild_JJ pigs_NNS ,_, serpents_NNS ,_,

Apis_NNP to_TO Osiris_NNP may_MD have_VB been_VBN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ one_CD fact_NN about_IN the_DT former_JJ
which_WDT ought_MD not_RB to_TO be_VB passed_VBN over_RP in_IN a_DT disquisition_NN on_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN
