a_DT certain_JJ length_NN of_IN time_NN which_WDT was_VBD prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT sacred_JJ books_NNS ,_,
and_CC on_IN the_DT expiry_NN of_IN which_WDT he_PRP was_VBD drowned_VBN in_IN a_DT holy_JJ spring_NN ._. The_DT
limit_NN ,_, according_VBG to_TO Plutarch_NNP ,_, was_VBD twenty-five_CD years_NNS ;_: but_CC it_PRP cannot_MD
always_RB have_VBP been_VBN enforced_VBN ,_, for_IN the_DT tombs_NNS of_IN the_DT Apis_NNP bulls_NNS have_VBP been_VBN
discovered_VBN in_IN modern_JJ times_NNS ,_, and_CC from_IN the_DT inscriptions_NNS on_IN them_PRP it_PRP
appears_VBZ that_IN in_IN the_DT twenty-second_JJ dynasty_JJ two_CD of_IN the_DT holy_JJ steers_NNS
lived_VBD more_JJR than_IN twenty-six_CD years_NNS ._.



5._DT Virbius_NNP and_CC the_DT Horse_NN

WE_NNP are_VBP now_RB in_IN a_DT position_NN to_TO hazard_VB a_DT conjecture_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT meaning_NN of_IN
the_DT tradition_NN that_IN Virbius_NNP ,_, the_DT first_JJ of_IN the_DT divine_JJ Kings_NNP of_IN the_DT
Wood_NNP at_IN Aricia_NNP ,_, had_VBD been_VBN killed_VBN in_IN the_DT character_NN of_IN Hippolytus_NNP by_IN
horses_NNS ._. Having_VBG found_VBN ,_, first_JJ ,_, that_IN spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT corn_NN are_VBP not_RB
infrequently_RB represented_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN horses_NNS ;_: and_CC ,_, second_JJ ,_, that_IN
the_DT animal_NN which_WDT in_RP later_RB legends_NNS is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO have_VB injured_VBN the_DT god_NN
was_VBD sometimes_RB originally_RB the_DT god_NN himself_PRP ,_, we_PRP may_MD conjecture_VB that_IN the_DT
horses_NNS by_IN which_WDT Virbius_NNP or_CC Hippolytus_NNP was_VBD said_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN slain_VBN
were_VBD really_RB embodiments_NNS of_IN him_PRP as_IN a_DT deity_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ._. The_DT myth_NN
that_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN killed_VBN by_IN horses_NNS was_VBD probably_RB invented_VBN to_TO explain_VB
certain_JJ features_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ worship_NN ,_, amongst_IN others_NNS the_DT custom_NN of_IN
excluding_VBG horses_NNS from_IN his_PRP$ sacred_JJ grove_NN ._. For_IN myth_NN changes_NNS while_IN
custom_NN remains_VBZ constant_JJ ;_: men_NNS continue_VBP to_TO do_VB what_WP their_PRP$ fathers_NNS did_VBD
before_IN them_PRP ,_, though_IN the_DT reasons_NNS on_IN which_WDT their_PRP$ fathers_NNS acted_VBN have_VBP
been_VBN long_RB forgotten_VBN ._. The_DT history_NN of_IN religion_NN is_VBZ a_DT long_JJ attempt_NN to_TO
reconcile_VB old_JJ custom_NN with_IN new_JJ reason_NN ,_, to_TO find_VB a_DT sound_JJ theory_NN for_IN an_DT
absurd_JJ practice_NN ._. In_IN the_DT case_NN before_IN us_PRP we_PRP may_MD be_VB sure_JJ that_IN the_DT myth_NN
is_VBZ more_RBR modern_JJ than_IN the_DT custom_NN and_CC by_IN no_DT means_NN represents_VBZ the_DT
original_JJ reason_NN for_IN excluding_VBG horses_NNS from_IN the_DT grove_NN ._. From_IN their_PRP$
exclusion_NN it_PRP might_MD be_VB inferred_VBN that_IN horses_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB the_DT sacred_JJ
animals_NNS or_CC embodiments_NNS of_IN the_DT god_NN of_IN the_DT grove_NN ._. But_CC the_DT inference_NN
would_MD be_VB rash_JJ ._. The_DT goat_NN was_VBD at_IN one_CD time_NN a_DT sacred_JJ animal_NN or_CC
embodiment_NN of_IN Athena_NNP ,_, as_RB may_MD be_VB inferred_VBN from_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN
representing_VBG the_DT goddess_NN clad_VBN in_IN a_DT goat-skin_NN (_-LRB- aegis_NN )._, Yet_CC the_DT goat_NN
was_VBD neither_DT sacrificed_JJ to_TO her_PRP as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, nor_CC allowed_VBD to_TO enter_VB her_PRP$
great_JJ sanctuary_NN ,_, the_DT Acropolis_NNP at_IN Athens_NNP ._. The_DT reason_NN alleged_VBD for_IN
this_DT was_VBD that_IN the_DT goat_NN injured_VBD the_DT olive_JJ ,_, the_DT sacred_JJ tree_NN of_IN Athena_NNP ._.
So_RB far_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, the_DT relation_NN of_IN the_DT goat_NN to_TO Athena_NNP is_VBZ parallel_RB to_TO
the_DT relation_NN of_IN the_DT horse_NN to_TO Virbius_NNP ,_, both_DT animals_NNS being_VBG excluded_VBN
from_IN the_DT sanctuary_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN of_IN injury_NN done_VBN by_IN them_PRP to_TO the_DT god_NN ._.
But_CC from_IN Varro_NNP we_PRP learn_VBP that_IN there_EX was_VBD an_DT exception_NN to_TO the_DT rule_NN
which_WDT excluded_VBN the_DT goat_NN from_IN the_DT Acropolis_NNP ._. Once_RB a_DT year_NN ,_, he_PRP says_VBZ ,_,
the_DT goat_NN was_VBD driven_VBN on_IN to_TO the_DT Acropolis_NNP for_IN a_DT necessary_JJ sacrifice_NN ._.
Now_RB ,_, as_RB has_VBZ been_VBN remarked_VBN before_RB ,_, when_WRB an_DT animal_NN is_VBZ sacrificed_VBN once_RB
and_CC once_RB only_RB in_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ probably_RB slain_VB ,_, not_RB as_IN a_DT victim_NN
offered_VBN to_TO the_DT god_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN a_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN himself_PRP ._.
Therefore_RB we_PRP may_MD infer_VB that_IN if_IN a_DT goat_NN was_VBD sacrificed_VBN on_IN the_DT
Acropolis_NNP once_RB a_DT year_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD sacrificed_VBN in_IN the_DT character_NN of_IN Athena_NNP
herself_PRP ;_: and_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB conjectured_VBN that_IN the_DT skin_NN of_IN the_DT sacrificed_JJS
animal_NN was_VBD placed_VBN on_IN the_DT statue_NN of_IN the_DT goddess_NN and_CC formed_VBD the_DT
aegis_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD thus_RB be_VB renewed_VBN annually_RB ._. Similarly_RB at_IN Thebes_NNP
in_IN Egypt_NNP rams_NNS were_VBD sacred_JJ and_CC were_VBD not_RB sacrificed_VBN ._. But_CC on_IN one_CD day_NN in_IN
the_DT year_NN a_DT ram_NN was_VBD killed_VBN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ skin_NN was_VBD placed_VBN on_IN the_DT statue_NN of_IN
the_DT god_NN Ammon_NNP ._. Now_RB ,_, if_IN we_PRP knew_VBD the_DT ritual_NN of_IN the_DT Arician_NN grove_NN
better_RB ,_, we_PRP might_MD find_VB that_IN the_DT rule_NN of_IN excluding_VBG horses_NNS from_IN it_PRP ,_,
like_IN the_DT rule_NN of_IN excluding_VBG goats_NNS from_IN the_DT Acropolis_NNP at_IN Athens_NNP ,_, was_VBD
subject_NN to_TO an_DT annual_JJ exception_NN ,_, a_DT horse_NN being_VBG once_RB a_DT year_NN taken_VBN into_IN
the_DT grove_NN and_CC sacrificed_JJ as_IN an_DT embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN Virbius_NNP ._. By_IN the_DT
usual_JJ misunderstanding_NN the_DT horse_NN thus_RB killed_VBN would_MD come_VB in_IN time_NN to_TO
be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN an_DT enemy_NN offered_VBN up_RP in_IN sacrifice_NN to_TO the_DT god_NN whom_WP he_PRP
had_VBD injured_VBN ,_, like_IN the_DT pig_NN which_WDT was_VBD sacrificed_VBN to_TO Demeter_NNP and_CC Osiris_NNP
or_CC the_DT goat_NN which_WDT was_VBD sacrificed_VBN to_TO Dionysus_NNP ,_, and_CC possibly_RB to_TO
Athena_NNP ._. It_PRP is_VBZ so_RB easy_JJ for_IN a_DT writer_NN to_TO record_VB a_DT rule_NN without_IN noticing_VBG
an_DT exception_NN that_IN we_PRP need_VBP not_RB wonder_VB at_IN finding_VBG the_DT rule_NN of_IN the_DT
Arician_NN grove_NN recorded_VBN without_IN any_DT mention_NN of_IN an_DT exception_NN such_JJ as_IN I_PRP
suppose_VB ._. If_IN we_PRP had_VBD had_VBN only_RB the_DT statements_NNS of_IN Athenaeus_NNP and_CC Pliny_NNP ,_,
we_PRP should_MD have_VB known_VBN only_RB the_DT rule_NN which_WDT forbade_VBD the_DT sacrifice_NN of_IN
goats_NNS to_TO Athena_NNP and_CC excluded_VBN them_PRP from_IN the_DT Acropolis_NNP ,_, without_IN being_VBG
aware_JJ of_IN the_DT important_JJ exception_NN which_WDT the_DT fortunate_JJ preservation_NN of_IN
Varro_NNP '_POS s_PRP work_NN has_VBZ revealed_VBN to_TO us_PRP ._.

The_DT conjecture_NN that_IN once_RB a_DT year_NN a_DT horse_NN may_MD have_VB been_VBN sacrificed_VBN in_IN
the_DT Arician_NN grove_NN as_IN a_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT deity_NN of_IN the_DT grove_NN
derives_VBZ some_DT support_NN from_IN the_DT similar_JJ sacrifice_NN of_IN a_DT horse_NN which_WDT
took_VBD place_NN once_RB a_DT year_NN at_IN Rome_NNP ._. On_IN the_DT fifteenth_JJ of_IN October_NNP in_IN each_DT
year_NN a_DT chariot-race_NN was_VBD run_VBN on_IN the_DT Field_NN of_IN Mars_NNP ._. Stabbed_NNP with_IN a_DT
spear_NN ,_, the_DT right-hand_JJ horse_NN of_IN the_DT victorious_JJ team_NN was_VBD then_RB
sacrificed_VBN to_TO Mars_NNP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN ensuring_VBG good_JJ crops_NNS ,_, and_CC its_PRP$
head_NN was_VBD cut_VBN off_RP and_CC adorned_VBN with_IN a_DT string_NN of_IN loaves_NNS ._. Thereupon_'' the_DT
inhabitants_NNS of_IN two_CD wards_NNS --_: the_DT Sacred_NNP Way_NN and_CC the_DT Subura_NNP --_: contended_VBN
with_IN each_DT other_JJ who_WP should_MD get_VB the_DT head_NN ._. If_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT Sacred_NNP
Way_NN got_VBD it_PRP ,_, they_PRP fastened_VBD it_PRP to_TO a_DT wall_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN '_'' s_PRP house_NN ;_: if_IN the_DT
people_NNS of_IN the_DT Subura_NNP got_VBD it_PRP ,_, they_PRP fastened_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT Mamilian_NNP tower_NN ._.
The_DT horse_NN '_POS s_PRP tail_NN was_VBD cut_VBN off_RP and_CC carried_VBD to_TO the_DT king_NN '_POS s_PRP house_NN with_IN
such_JJ speed_NN that_IN the_DT blood_NN dripped_VBD on_IN the_DT hearth_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
Further_RB ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT horse_NN was_VBD caught_VBN and_CC
preserved_VBN till_IN the_DT twenty-first_JJ of_IN April_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT Vestal_NNP Virgins_NNP
mixed_JJ it_PRP with_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT unborn_JJ calves_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN
sacrificed_JJ six_CD days_NNS before_RB ._. The_DT mixture_NN was_VBD then_RB distributed_VBN to_TO
shepherds_NNS ,_, and_CC used_VBN by_IN them_PRP for_IN fumigating_VBG their_PRP$ flocks_NNS ._.

In_IN this_DT ceremony_NN the_DT decoration_NN of_IN the_DT horse_NN '_'' s_PRP head_NN with_IN a_DT string_NN of_IN
loaves_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT alleged_JJ object_NN of_IN the_DT sacrifice_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, to_TO procure_VB
a_DT good_JJ harvest_NN ,_, seem_VBP to_TO indicate_VB that_IN the_DT horse_NN was_VBD killed_VBN as_IN one_CD of_IN
those_DT animal_JJ representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN of_IN which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP
found_VBN so_RB many_JJ examples_NNS ._. The_DT custom_NN of_IN cutting_VBG off_RP the_DT horse_NN '_POS s_PRP tail_NN
is_VBZ like_IN the_DT African_JJ custom_NN of_IN cutting_VBG off_RP the_DT tails_NNS of_IN the_DT oxen_NNS and_CC
sacrificing_VBG them_PRP to_TO obtain_VB a_DT good_JJ crop_NN ._. In_IN both_DT the_DT Roman_NNP and_CC the_DT

its_PRP$ fructifying_JJ power_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO reside_VB especially_RB in_IN its_PRP$ tail_NN ._.
The_DT latter_JJ idea_NN occurs_VBZ ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, in_IN European_JJ folk-lore_NN ._.
Again_RB ,_, the_DT practice_NN of_IN fumigating_VBG the_DT cattle_NNS in_IN spring_NN with_IN the_DT
blood_NN of_IN the_DT horse_NN may_MD be_VB compared_VBN with_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN giving_VBG the_DT
Old_NNP Wife_NNP ,_, the_DT Maiden_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT clyack_NN sheaf_NN as_IN fodder_NN to_TO the_DT horses_NNS
in_IN spring_NN or_CC the_DT cattle_NNS at_IN Christmas_NNP ,_, and_CC giving_VBG the_DT Yule_NNP Boar_NNP to_TO
the_DT ploughing_NN oxen_NNS or_CC horses_NNS to_TO eat_VB in_IN spring_NN ._. All_PDT these_DT usages_NNS aim_VBP
at_IN ensuring_VBG the_DT blessing_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN on_IN the_DT homestead_NN and_CC its_PRP$
inmates_NNS and_CC storing_VBG it_PRP up_RP for_IN another_DT year_NN ._.

The_DT Roman_NNP sacrifice_NN of_IN the_DT October_NNP horse_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP was_VBD called_VBN ,_, carries_VBZ
us_PRP back_RB to_TO the_DT early_JJ days_NNS when_WRB the_DT Subura_NNP ,_, afterwards_RB a_DT low_JJ and_CC
squalid_JJ quarter_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ metropolis_NN ,_, was_VBD still_RB a_DT separate_JJ
village_NN ,_, whose_WP$ inhabitants_NNS engaged_VBD in_IN a_DT friendly_JJ contest_NN on_IN the_DT
harvest-field_NN with_IN their_PRP$ neighbours_NNS of_IN Rome_NNP ,_, then_RB a_DT little_JJ rural_JJ
town_NN ._. The_DT Field_NNP of_IN Mars_NNP on_IN which_WDT the_DT ceremony_NN took_VBD place_NN lay_VBD beside_IN
the_DT Tiber_NNP ,_, and_CC formed_VBD part_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN '_POS s_PRP domain_NN down_RB to_TO the_DT
abolition_NN of_IN the_DT monarchy_NN ._. For_IN tradition_NN ran_VBD that_IN at_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB
the_DT last_JJ of_IN the_DT kings_NNS was_VBD driven_VBN from_IN Rome_NNP ,_, the_DT corn_NN stood_VBD ripe_JJ for_IN
the_DT sickle_JJ on_IN the_DT crown_NN lands_NNS beside_IN the_DT river_NN ;_: but_CC no_DT one_NN would_MD eat_VB
the_DT accursed_JJ grain_NN and_CC it_PRP was_VBD flung_VBN into_IN the_DT river_NN in_IN such_JJ heaps_NNS
that_IN ,_, the_DT water_NN being_VBG low_JJ with_IN the_DT summer_NN heat_NN ,_, it_PRP formed_VBD the_DT
nucleus_NN of_IN an_DT island_NN ._. The_DT horse_NN sacrifice_NN was_VBD thus_RB an_DT old_JJ autumn_NN
custom_NN observed_VBD upon_IN the_DT king_NN '_'' s_PRP corn-fields_NNS at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT
harvest_NN ._. The_DT tail_NN and_CC blood_NN of_IN the_DT horse_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT chief_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN '_POS s_PRP representative_JJ ,_, were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT king_NN '_POS s_PRP house_NN and_CC
kept_VBN there_RB ;_: just_RB as_IN in_IN Germany_NNP the_DT harvest-cock_NN is_VBZ nailed_VBN on_IN the_DT
gable_JJ or_CC over_IN the_DT door_NN of_IN the_DT farmhouse_NN ;_: and_CC as_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ,_, in_IN
the_DT form_NN of_IN the_DT Maiden_NNP ,_, is_VBZ carried_VBN home_NN and_CC kept_VBD over_IN the_DT fireplace_NN
in_IN the_DT Highlands_NNP of_IN Scotland_NNP ._. Thus_RB the_DT blessing_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN
was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO the_DT king_NN '_'' s_PRP house_NN and_CC hearth_NN and_CC ,_, through_IN them_PRP ,_, to_TO the_DT
community_NN of_IN which_WDT he_PRP was_VBD the_DT head_NN ._. Similarly_RB in_IN the_DT spring_NN and_CC
autumn_NN customs_NNS of_IN Northern_NNP Europe_NNP the_DT May-pole_NNP is_VBZ sometimes_RB set_VBN up_IN
in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT mayor_NN or_CC burgomaster_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT last_JJ
sheaf_NN at_IN harvest_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN to_TO him_PRP as_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ._. But_CC
while_IN the_DT tail_NN and_CC blood_NN fell_VBD to_TO the_DT king_NN ,_, the_DT neighbouring_NN village_NN
of_IN the_DT Subura_NNP ,_, which_WDT no_DT doubt_NN once_RB had_VBD a_DT similar_JJ ceremony_NN of_IN its_PRP$
own_JJ ,_, was_VBD gratified_VBN by_IN being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO compete_VB for_IN the_DT prize_NN of_IN the_DT
horse_NN '_POS s_PRP head_NN ._. The_DT Mamilian_NNP tower_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT the_DT Suburans_NNP nailed_VBD the_DT
horse_NN '_POS s_PRP head_NN when_WRB they_PRP succeeded_VBD in_IN carrying_VBG it_PRP off_RP ,_, appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB
been_VBN a_DT peel-tower_NN or_CC keep_VB of_IN the_DT old_JJ Mamilian_NNP family_NN ,_, the_DT magnates_NNS
of_IN the_DT village_NN ._. The_DT ceremony_NN thus_RB performed_VBN on_IN the_DT king_NN '_POS s_VBZ fields_NNS and_CC
at_IN his_PRP$ house_NN on_IN behalf_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ town_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT neighbouring_NN

ceremony_NN on_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ fields_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT rural_JJ districts_NNS of_IN Latium_NNP the_DT
villages_NNS may_MD have_VB continued_VBN to_TO observe_VB the_DT custom_NN ,_, each_DT on_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ

is_VBZ no_DT intrinsic_JJ improbability_NN in_IN the_DT supposition_NN that_IN the_DT sacred_JJ

scene_NN of_IN a_DT common_JJ harvest_NN celebration_NN ,_, at_IN which_WDT a_DT horse_NN was_VBD

the_DT tree_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT two_CD ideas_NNS melt_VBN into_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_, as_IN
we_PRP see_VBP in_IN customs_NNS like_IN the_DT Harvest-May_NNP ._.




L_NNP ._. Eating_VBG the_DT God_NNP



1._DT The_DT Sacrament_NNP of_IN First-Fruits_PRP$

WE_NNP have_VBP now_RB seen_VBN that_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ represented_VBN sometimes_RB in_IN
human_NN ,_, sometimes_RB in_IN animal_JJ form_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN both_DT cases_NNS he_PRP is_VBZ killed_VBN
in_IN the_DT person_NN of_IN his_PRP$ representative_NN and_CC eaten_VBN sacramentally_RB ._. To_TO find_VB
examples_NNS of_IN actually_RB killing_VBG the_DT human_JJ representative_NN of_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN we_PRP had_VBD naturally_RB to_TO go_VB to_TO savage_JJ races_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT
harvest-suppers_NNS of_IN our_PRP$ European_JJ peasants_NNS have_VBP furnished_VBN unmistakable_JJ
examples_NNS of_IN the_DT sacramental_JJ eating_NN of_IN animals_NNS as_IN representatives_NNS of_IN
the_DT corn-spirit_NN ._. But_CC further_JJ ,_, as_IN might_MD have_VB been_VBN anticipated_VBN ,_, the_DT
new_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ itself_PRP eaten_VBN sacramentally_RB ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, as_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN ._. In_IN Wermland_NNP ,_, Sweden_NNP ,_, the_DT farmer_NN '_'' s_PRP wife_NN uses_VBZ the_DT grain_NN
of_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN to_TO bake_VB a_DT loaf_NN in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT little_JJ girl_NN ;_: this_DT
loaf_NN is_VBZ divided_VBN amongst_IN the_DT whole_JJ household_NN and_CC eaten_VBN by_IN them_PRP ._. Here_RB
the_DT loaf_NN represents_VBZ the_DT corn-spirit_NN conceived_VBD as_IN a_DT maiden_NN ;_: just_RB as_IN
in_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ similarly_RB conceived_VBN and_CC represented_VBN
by_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN made_VBD up_RP in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT woman_NN and_CC bearing_VBG the_DT
name_NN of_IN the_DT Maiden_NNP ._. As_IN usual_JJ ,_, the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO reside_VB
in_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN ;_: and_CC to_TO eat_VB a_DT loaf_NN made_VBN from_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN is_VBZ ,_,
therefore_RB ,_, to_TO eat_VB the_DT corn-spirit_NN itself_PRP ._. Similarly_RB at_IN La_NNP Palisse_NNP ,_,
in_IN France_NNP ,_, a_DT man_NN made_VBN of_IN dough_NN is_VBZ hung_VBN upon_IN the_DT fir-tree_NN which_WDT is_VBZ
carried_VBN on_IN the_DT last_JJ harvest-waggon_NN ._. The_DT tree_NN and_CC the_DT dough-man_NN are_VBP
taken_VBN to_TO the_DT mayor_NN '_POS s_VBZ house_NN and_CC kept_VBD there_RB till_IN the_DT vintage_NN is_VBZ over_RB ._.
Then_RB the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT harvest_NN is_VBZ celebrated_VBN by_IN a_DT feast_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT
mayor_NN breaks_VBZ the_DT dough-man_NN in_IN pieces_NNS and_CC gives_VBZ the_DT pieces_NNS to_TO the_DT
people_NNS to_TO eat_VB ._.

In_IN these_DT examples_NNS the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ represented_VBN and_CC eaten_VBN in_IN human_NN
shape_NN ._. In_IN other_JJ cases_NNS ,_, though_IN the_DT new_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ not_RB baked_VBN in_IN loaves_NNS of_IN
human_JJ shape_NN ,_, still_RB the_DT solemn_JJ ceremonies_NNS with_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ eaten_VBN
suffice_NN to_TO indicate_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ partaken_VBN of_IN sacramentally_RB ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_,
as_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT following_VBG
ceremonies_NNS used_VBD to_TO be_VB observed_VBN by_IN Lithuanian_JJ peasants_NNS at_IN eating_VBG the_DT
new_JJ corn_NN ._. About_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT autumn_NN sowing_NN ,_, when_WRB all_PDT the_DT corn_NN had_VBD
been_VBN got_VBD in_IN and_CC the_DT threshing_NN had_VBD begun_VBN ,_, each_DT farmer_NN held_VBD a_DT festival_NN
called_VBN Sabarios_NNS ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, "_`` the_DT mixing_NN or_CC throwing_VBG together_RB ."_IN He_PRP took_VBD
nine_CD good_JJ handfuls_NNS of_IN each_DT kind_NN of_IN crop_NN --_: wheat_NN ,_, barley_NN ,_, oats_NNS ,_, flax_NN ,_,
beans_NNS ,_, lentils_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT rest_NN ;_: and_CC each_DT handful_NN he_PRP divided_VBD into_IN three_CD
parts_NNS ._. The_DT twentyseven_CD portions_NNS of_IN each_DT grain_NN were_VBD then_RB thrown_VBN on_IN a_DT
heap_NN and_CC all_DT mixed_VBN up_RP together_RB ._. The_DT grain_NN used_VBD had_VBN to_TO be_VB that_IN which_WDT
was_VBD first_JJ threshed_JJ and_CC winnowed_JJ and_CC which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN set_VBN aside_RB and_CC
kept_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ._. A_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT grain_NN thus_RB mixed_VBN was_VBD employed_VBN
to_TO bake_VB little_JJ loaves_NNS ,_, one_CD for_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT household_NN ;_: the_DT rest_NN was_VBD
mixed_JJ with_IN more_JJR barley_NN or_CC oats_NN and_CC made_VBD into_IN beer_NN ._. The_DT first_JJ beer_NN
brewed_VBN from_IN this_DT mixture_NN was_VBD for_IN the_DT drinking_NN of_IN the_DT farmer_NN ,_, his_PRP$
wife_NN ,_, and_CC children_NNS ;_: the_DT second_JJ brew_NN was_VBD for_IN the_DT servants_NNS ._. The_DT beer_NN
being_VBG ready_JJ ,_, the_DT farmer_NN chose_VBD an_DT evening_NN when_WRB no_DT stranger_NN was_VBD
expected_VBN ._. Then_RB he_PRP knelt_VBD down_RP before_IN the_DT barrel_NN of_IN beer_NN ,_, drew_VBD a_DT

saying_VBG ,_, "_`` O_UH fruitful_JJ earth_NN ,_, make_VBP rye_NN and_CC barley_NN and_CC all_DT kinds_NNS of_IN corn_NN
to_TO flourish_VB ."_RB Next_JJ he_PRP took_VBD the_DT jug_NN to_TO the_DT parlour_NN ,_, where_WRB his_PRP$ wife_NN
and_CC children_NNS awaited_VBD him_PRP ._. On_IN the_DT floor_NN of_IN the_DT parlour_NN lay_VBD bound_VBN a_DT
black_JJ or_CC white_JJ or_CC speckled_JJ (_-LRB- not_RB a_DT red_JJ )_-RRB- cock_NN and_CC a_DT hen_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ
colour_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT same_JJ brood_NN ,_, which_WDT must_MD have_VB been_VBN hatched_VBN within_IN
the_DT year_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT farmer_NN knelt_VBD down_RP ,_, with_IN the_DT jug_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, and_CC
thanked_VBD God_NNP for_IN the_DT harvest_NN and_CC prayed_VBD for_IN a_DT good_JJ crop_NN next_JJ year_NN ._.
Next_RB all_DT lifted_VBN up_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS and_CC said_VBD ,_, "_`` O_UH God_NNP ,_, and_CC thou_VBD ,_, O_UH earth_NN ,_,
we_PRP give_VBP you_PRP this_DT cock_NN and_CC hen_NN as_IN a_DT free-will_JJ offering_NN ."_NN With_IN that_WDT

might_MD not_RB cut_VB their_PRP$ heads_NNS off_RP ._. After_IN the_DT first_JJ prayer_NN and_CC after_IN

eat_VB them_PRP all_DT up_RP ,_, the_DT remains_NNS were_VBD buried_VBN under_IN the_DT dung_NN in_IN the_DT

December_NNP ._. On_IN the_DT day_NN on_IN which_WDT it_PRP took_VBD place_NN no_DT bad_JJ word_NN might_MD be_VB
spoken_VBN ._.

Such_JJ was_VBD the_DT custom_NN about_IN two_CD hundred_CD years_NNS or_CC more_JJR ago_RB ._. At_IN the_DT
present_JJ day_NN in_IN Lithuania_NNP ,_, when_WRB new_JJ potatoes_NNS or_CC loaves_NNS made_VBN from_IN the_DT

all_PDT the_DT family_NN must_MD taste_VB them_PRP ,_, otherwise_RB "_'' the_DT spirits_NNS in_IN them_PRP [_IN the_DT

first_JJ corn_NN ;_: and_CC my_PRP$ informant_NN believes_VBZ that_IN the_DT corn_NN so_IN cut_NN is_VBZ used_VBN
to_TO make_VB the_DT communion_NN bread_NN ._. If_IN the_DT latter_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT custom_NN is_VBZ
correctly_RB reported_VBD (_-LRB- and_CC analogy_NN is_VBZ all_DT in_IN its_PRP$ favour_NN ),_IN it_PRP shows_VBZ how_WRB
the_DT Christian_NNP communion_NN has_VBZ absorbed_VBN within_IN itself_PRP a_DT sacrament_NN which_WDT
is_VBZ doubtless_RB far_RB older_JJR than_IN Christianity_NNP ._.

The_DT Aino_NNP or_CC Ainu_NNP of_IN Japan_NNP are_VBP said_VBN to_TO distinguish_VB various_JJ kinds_NNS of_IN

earnestly_RB and_CC say_VB :_: '_POS O_NNP thou_IN cereal_NN deity_NN ,_, we_PRP worship_NN thee_PRP ._. Thou_NNP hast_.
grown_VBN very_RB well_RB this_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC thy_JJ flavour_NN will_MD be_VB sweet_JJ ._. Thou_'' art_NN
good_JJ ._. The_DT goddess_NN of_IN fire_NN will_MD be_VB glad_JJ ,_, and_CC we_PRP also_RB shall_MD rejoice_VB
greatly_RB ._. O_UH thou_VBD god_NN ,_, O_UH thou_VBD divine_JJ cereal_NN ,_, do_VBP thou_VBN nourish_JJ the_DT
people_NNS ._. I_PRP now_RB partake_NN of_IN thee_PRP ._. I_PRP worship_NN thee_PRP and_CC give_VB thee_PRP thanks_NNS .'_.
After_IN having_VBG thus_RB prayed_VBN ,_, they_PRP ,_, the_DT worshippers_NNS ,_, take_VB a_DT cake_NN and_CC eat_VB
it_PRP ,_, and_CC from_IN this_DT time_NN the_DT people_NNS may_MD all_DT partake_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ millet_NN ._.
And_CC so_RB with_IN many_JJ gestures_NNS of_IN homage_NN and_CC words_NNS of_IN prayer_NN this_DT kind_NN of_IN
food_NN is_VBZ dedicated_VBN to_TO the_DT well-being_NN of_IN the_DT Ainu_NNP ._. No_DT doubt_NN the_DT cereal_NN

other_JJ than_IN the_DT seed_NN itself_PRP ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB a_DT god_NN in_IN so_RB far_RB as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ
beneficial_JJ to_TO the_DT human_JJ body_NN ."_.

At_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT rice_NN harvest_NN in_IN the_DT East_NNP Indian_NNP island_NN of_IN Buru_NNP ,_,

indicates_VBZ the_DT sacramental_JJ character_NN of_IN the_DT repast_NN ._. Some_DT of_IN the_DT rice_NN
is_VBZ also_RB set_VBN apart_RB and_CC offered_VBD to_TO the_DT spirits_NNS ._. Amongst_NN the_DT Alfoors_NNP of_IN

Shortly_RB before_IN the_DT rice-harvest_NN in_IN Boland_NNP Mongondo_NNP ,_, another_DT district_NN
of_IN Celebes_NNP ,_, an_DT offering_NN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN a_DT small_JJ pig_NN or_CC a_DT fowl_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT
priest_NN plucks_VBZ a_DT little_JJ rice_NN ,_, first_RB on_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ field_NN and_CC next_JJ on_IN

along_IN with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB gives_VBZ it_PRP back_RB to_TO the_DT respective_JJ owners_NNS ,_,
who_WP have_VBP it_PRP ground_NN and_CC boiled_VBN ._. When_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ boiled_VBN the_DT women_NNS take_VBP it_PRP
back_RB ,_, with_IN an_DT egg_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT priest_NN ,_, who_WP offers_VBZ the_DT egg_NN in_IN sacrifice_NN

family_NN ,_, down_IN to_TO the_DT youngest_JJS child_NN ,_, must_MD partake_VB ._. After_IN this_DT
ceremony_NN every_DT one_NN is_VBZ free_JJ to_TO get_VB in_IN his_PRP$ rice_NN ._.

Amongst_IN the_DT Burghers_NNPS or_CC Badagas_NNP ,_, a_DT tribe_NN of_IN the_DT Neilgherry_NNP Hills_NNP in_IN

the_DT first_JJ sheaf_NN "_'' is_VBZ that_DT day_NN reduced_VBD to_TO meal_NN ,_, made_VBD into_IN cakes_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_,

sacrifice_VB ."_RB Among_IN the_DT Hindoos_NNP of_IN Southern_NNP India_NNP the_DT eating_NN of_IN the_DT

the_DT day_NN when_WRB ,_, according_VBG to_TO Hindoo_NNP astrologers_NNS ,_, the_DT sun_NN enters_VBZ the_DT
tropic_NN of_IN Capricorn_NNP ._. The_DT boiling_NN of_IN the_DT pot_NN is_VBZ watched_VBN with_IN great_JJ
anxiety_NN by_IN the_DT whole_JJ family_NN ,_, for_IN as_IN the_DT milk_NN boils_VBZ ,_, so_RB will_MD the_DT
coming_VBG year_NN be_VB ._. If_IN the_DT milk_NN boils_VBZ rapidly_RB ,_, the_DT year_NN will_MD be_VB
prosperous_JJ ;_: but_CC it_PRP will_MD be_VB the_DT reverse_NN if_IN the_DT milk_NN boils_VBZ slowly_RB ._.
Some_DT of_IN the_DT new_JJ boiled_VBN rice_NN is_VBZ offered_VBN to_TO the_DT image_NN of_IN Ganesa_NNP ;_: then_RB
every_DT one_CD partakes_NNS of_IN it_PRP ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Northern_NNP India_NNP the_DT
festival_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ crop_NN is_VBZ known_VBN as_IN Navan_NNP ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, "_`` new_JJ grain_NN ."_.
When_WRB the_DT crop_NN is_VBZ ripe_JJ ,_, the_DT owner_NN takes_VBZ the_DT omens_NNS ,_, goes_VBZ to_TO the_DT field_NN ,_,
plucks_VBZ five_CD or_CC six_CD ears_NNS of_IN barley_NN in_IN the_DT spring_NN crop_NN and_CC one_CD of_IN the_DT

mixed_JJ with_IN coarse_JJ sugar_NN ,_, butter_NN ,_, and_CC curds_NNS ._. Some_DT of_IN it_PRP is_VBZ thrown_VBN on_IN
the_DT fire_NN in_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN gods_NNS and_CC deceased_JJ ancestors_NNS ;_: the_DT
rest_NN is_VBZ eaten_VBN by_IN the_DT family_NN ._.

The_DT ceremony_NN of_IN eating_NN the_DT new_JJ yams_NNS at_IN Onitsha_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT Niger_NNP ,_, is_VBZ
thus_RB described_VBD :_: "_`` Each_DT headman_NN brought_VBD out_RP six_CD yams_NNS ,_, and_CC cut_VBD down_RB
young_JJ branches_NNS of_IN palm-leaves_NNS and_CC placed_VBD them_PRP before_IN his_PRP$ gate_NN ,_,

the_DT yam_NN is_VBZ roasted_VBN ,_, the_DT Libia_NNP ,_, or_CC country_NN doctor_NN ,_, takes_VBZ the_DT yam_NN ,_,
scrapes_NNS it_PRP into_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN meal_NN ,_, and_CC divides_NNS it_PRP into_IN halves_NNS ;_: he_PRP then_RB
takes_VBZ one_CD piece_NN ,_, and_CC places_NNS it_PRP on_IN the_DT lips_NNS of_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP is_VBZ
going_VBG to_TO eat_VB the_DT new_JJ yam_NN ._. The_DT eater_NN then_RB blows_VBZ up_RP the_DT steam_NN from_IN the_DT
hot_JJ yam_NN ,_, and_CC afterwards_RB pokes_VBZ the_DT whole_NN into_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN ,_, and_CC says_VBZ ,_, '_'' I_PRP
thank_VB God_NNP for_IN being_VBG permitted_VBN to_TO eat_VB the_DT new_JJ yam_NN ';_, he_PRP then_RB begins_VBZ to_TO
chew_VBP it_PRP heartily_RB ,_, with_IN fish_NN likewise_RB ."_.

Among_IN the_DT Nandi_NNP of_IN British_NNP East_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT eleusine_NN grain_NN is_VBZ
ripening_VBG in_IN autumn_NN ,_, every_DT woman_NN who_WP owns_VBZ a_DT corn-field_NN goes_VBZ out_RB into_IN
it_PRP with_IN her_PRP$ daughters_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP all_DT pluck_VBD some_DT of_IN the_DT ripe_JJ grain_NN ._.
Each_DT of_IN the_DT women_NNS then_RB fixes_VBZ one_CD grain_NN in_IN her_PRP$ necklace_NN and_CC chews_NNS
another_DT ,_, which_WDT she_PRP rubs_VBZ on_IN her_PRP$ forehead_NN ,_, throat_NN ,_, and_CC breast_NN ._. No_DT mark_NN
of_IN joy_NN escapes_NNS them_PRP ;_: sorrowfully_RB they_PRP cut_VBD a_DT basketful_JJ of_IN the_DT new_JJ
corn_NN ,_, and_CC carrying_VBG it_PRP home_NN place_NN it_PRP in_IN the_DT loft_JJ to_TO dry_JJ ._. As_IN the_DT
ceiling_NN is_VBZ of_IN wickerwork_NN ,_, a_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN the_DT grain_NN drops_NNS through_IN the_DT
crevices_NNS and_CC falls_VBZ into_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP explodes_VBZ with_IN a_DT crackling_NN
noise_NN ._. The_DT people_NNS make_VBP no_DT attempt_NN to_TO prevent_VB this_DT waste_NN ;_: for_IN they_PRP
regard_NN the_DT crackling_NN of_IN the_DT grain_NN in_IN the_DT fire_NN as_IN a_DT sign_NN that_IN the_DT
souls_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ are_VBP partaking_VBG of_IN it_PRP ._. A_DT few_JJ days_NNS later_RB porridge_NN is_VBZ
made_VBN from_IN the_DT new_JJ grain_NN and_CC served_VBD up_RP with_IN milk_NN at_IN the_DT evening_NN meal_NN ._.
All_PDT the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN take_VBP some_DT of_IN the_DT porridge_NN and_CC dab_VB it_PRP
on_IN the_DT walls_NNS and_CC roofs_NNS of_IN the_DT huts_NNS ;_: also_RB they_PRP put_VBD a_DT little_JJ in_IN their_PRP$
mouths_NNS and_CC spit_VB it_PRP out_RP towards_IN the_DT east_JJ and_CC on_IN the_DT outside_NN of_IN the_DT
huts_NNS ._. Then_RB ,_, holding_VBG up_RP some_DT of_IN the_DT grain_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, the_DT head_NN of_IN
the_DT family_NN prays_NNS to_TO God_NNP for_IN health_NN and_CC strength_NN ,_, and_CC likewise_RB for_IN
milk_NN ,_, and_CC everybody_NN present_JJ repeats_NNS the_DT words_NNS of_IN the_DT prayer_NN after_IN
him_PRP ._.

Amongst_IN the_DT Caffres_NNP of_IN Natal_NNP and_CC Zululand_NNP ,_, no_DT one_NN may_MD eat_VB of_IN the_DT new_JJ
fruits_NNS till_IN after_IN a_DT festival_NN which_WDT marks_VBZ the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT Caffre_NN

All_PDT the_DT people_NNS assemble_VBP at_IN the_DT king_NN '_POS s_PRP kraal_JJ ,_, where_WRB they_PRP feast_VBP and_CC
dance_NN ._. Before_IN they_PRP separate_VBP the_DT "_`` dedication_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS "_'' takes_VBZ
place_NN ._. Various_JJ fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, as_IN corn_NN ,_, mealies_NNS ,_, and_CC pumpkins_NNS ,_,
mixed_JJ with_IN the_DT flesh_NN of_IN a_DT sacrificed_JJ animal_NN and_CC with_IN "_`` medicine_NN ,"_NN are_VBP
boiled_VBN in_IN great_JJ pots_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT little_JJ of_IN this_DT food_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN in_IN each_DT
man_NN '_POS s_VBZ mouth_NN by_IN the_DT king_NN himself_PRP ._. After_IN thus_RB partaking_NN of_IN the_DT
sanctified_VBN fruits_NNS ,_, a_DT man_NN is_VBZ himself_PRP sanctified_VBN for_IN the_DT whole_JJ year_NN ,_,
and_CC may_MD immediately_RB get_VB in_IN his_PRP$ crops_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN if_IN any_DT man_NN
were_VBD to_TO partake_VB of_IN the_DT new_JJ fruits_NNS before_IN the_DT festival_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD die_VB ;_:
if_IN he_PRP were_VBD detected_VBN ,_, he_PRP would_MD be_VB put_VBN to_TO death_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS all_PDT his_PRP$
cattle_NNS would_MD be_VB taken_VBN from_IN him_PRP ._. The_DT holiness_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ fruits_NNS is_VBZ
well_RB marked_VBN by_IN the_DT rule_NN that_IN they_PRP must_MD be_VB cooked_VBN in_IN a_DT special_JJ pot_NN
which_WDT is_VBZ used_VBN only_RB for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN a_DT new_JJ fire_NN kindled_VBN by_IN a_DT
magician_NN through_IN the_DT friction_NN of_IN two_CD sticks_NNS which_WDT are_VBP called_VBN
"_`` husband_NN and_CC wife_NN ."_.

Among_IN the_DT Bechuanas_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT rule_NN that_IN before_IN they_PRP partake_VBP of_IN the_DT new_JJ
crops_NNS they_PRP must_MD purify_VB themselves_PRP ._. The_DT purification_NN takes_VBZ place_NN at_IN
the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ year_NN on_IN a_DT day_NN in_IN January_NNP which_WDT is_VBZ fixed_VBN
by_IN the_DT chief_NN ._. It_PRP begins_VBZ in_IN the_DT great_JJ kraal_NN of_IN the_DT tribe_NN ,_, where_WRB all_PDT
the_DT adult_NN males_NNS assemble_VBP ._. Each_DT of_IN them_PRP takes_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN leaves_NNS of_IN a_DT
gourd_NN called_VBN by_IN the_DT natives_NNS lerotse_VBD (_-LRB- described_VBN as_IN something_NN
between_IN a_DT pumpkin_NN and_CC a_DT vegetable_NN marrow_NN );_, and_CC having_VBG crushed_VBN the_DT
leaves_NNS he_PRP anoints_VBZ with_IN the_DT expressed_VBN juice_NN his_PRP$ big_JJ toes_NNS and_CC his_PRP$
navel_NN ;_: many_JJ people_NNS indeed_RB apply_VBP the_DT juice_NN to_TO all_DT the_DT joints_NNS of_IN their_PRP$
body_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT better-informed_JJ say_NN that_IN this_DT is_VBZ a_DT vulgar_JJ departure_NN
from_IN ancient_JJ custom_NN ._. After_IN this_DT ceremony_NN in_IN the_DT great_JJ kraal_NN every_DT
man_NN goes_VBZ home_NN to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ kraal_NN ,_, assembles_NNS all_RB the_DT members_NNS of_IN his_PRP$
family_NN ,_, men_NNS ,_, women_NNS ,_, and_CC children_NNS ,_, and_CC smears_VBZ them_PRP all_DT with_IN the_DT juice_NN
of_IN the_DT lerotse_NN leaves_VBZ ._. Some_DT of_IN the_DT leaves_NNS are_VBP also_RB pounded_VBN ,_, mixed_VBN
with_IN milk_NN in_IN a_DT large_JJ wooden_JJ dish_NN ,_, and_CC given_VBN to_TO the_DT dogs_NNS to_TO lap_NN up_RP ._.
Then_RB the_DT porridge_NN plate_NN of_IN each_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN is_VBZ rubbed_VBN with_IN
the_DT lerotse_NN leaves_VBZ ._. When_WRB this_DT purification_NN has_VBZ been_VBN completed_VBN ,_, but_CC
not_RB before_RB ,_, the_DT people_NNS are_VBP free_JJ to_TO eat_VB of_IN the_DT new_JJ crops_NNS ._.

The_DT Bororo_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN Brazil_NNP think_VBP that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB certain_JJ death_NN to_TO
eat_VB the_DT new_JJ maize_NN before_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN blessed_VBN by_IN the_DT medicine-man_NN ._.
The_DT ceremony_NN of_IN blessing_NN it_PRP is_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ ._. The_DT half-ripe_NN husk_NN is_VBZ
washed_VBN and_CC placed_VBN before_IN the_DT medicine-man_JJ ,_, who_WP by_IN dancing_NN and_CC
singing_VBG for_IN several_JJ hours_NNS ,_, and_CC by_IN incessant_JJ smoking_NN ,_, works_VBZ himself_PRP
up_RB into_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN ecstasy_NN ,_, whereupon_IN he_PRP bites_VBZ into_IN the_DT husk_NN ,_,
trembling_VBG in_IN every_DT limb_NN and_CC uttering_VBG shrieks_NNS from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ._. A_DT
similar_JJ ceremony_NN is_VBZ performed_VBN whenever_WRB a_DT large_JJ animal_NN or_CC a_DT large_JJ
fish_NN is_VBZ killed_VBN ._. The_DT Bororo_NNP are_VBP firmly_RB persuaded_VBN that_DT were_VBD any_DT man_NN to_TO
touch_NN unconsecrated_JJ maize_NN or_CC meat_NN ,_, before_IN the_DT ceremony_NN had_VBD been_VBN
completed_VBN ,_, he_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ whole_JJ tribe_NN would_MD perish_VB ._.

Amongst_IN the_DT Creek_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN North_NNP America_NNP ,_, the_DT busk_NN or_CC festival_NN
of_IN first-fruits_NNS was_VBD the_DT chief_JJ ceremony_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD held_VBN in_IN
July_NNP or_CC August_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT corn_NN was_VBD ripe_JJ ,_, and_CC marked_VBD the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT
old_JJ year_NN and_CC the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ one_CD ._. Before_IN it_PRP took_VBD place_NN ,_,
none_NN of_IN the_DT Indians_NNPS would_MD eat_VB or_CC even_RB handle_VB any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ
harvest_NN ._. Sometimes_RB each_DT town_NN had_VBD its_PRP$ own_JJ busk_NN ;_: sometimes_RB several_JJ
towns_NNS united_VBN to_TO hold_VB one_CD in_IN common_JJ ._. Before_IN celebrating_VBG the_DT busk_NN ,_, the_DT

with_IN fire_NN ._. As_IN a_DT preparation_NN for_IN the_DT ceremony_NN ,_, all_DT the_DT fires_NNS in_IN the_DT
village_NN were_VBD extinguished_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT ashes_NNS swept_VBN clean_JJ away_RB ._. In_IN
particular_JJ ,_, the_DT hearth_NN or_CC altar_NN of_IN the_DT temple_NN was_VBD dug_VBN up_RB and_CC the_DT
ashes_NNS carried_VBD out_RP ._. Then_RB the_DT chief_NN priest_NN put_VBD some_DT roots_NNS of_IN the_DT
button-snake_NN plant_NN ,_, with_IN some_DT green_JJ tobacco_NN leaves_NNS and_CC a_DT little_JJ of_IN
the_DT new_JJ fruits_NNS ,_, at_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN the_DT fireplace_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP afterwards_RB
commanded_VBN to_TO be_VB covered_VBN up_RP with_IN white_JJ clay_NN ,_, and_CC wetted_VBD over_RP with_IN
clean_JJ water_NN ._. A_DT thick_JJ arbour_NN of_IN green_JJ branches_NNS of_IN young_JJ trees_NNS was_VBD
then_RB made_VBD over_IN the_DT altar_NN ._. Meanwhile_RB the_DT women_NNS at_IN home_NN were_VBD cleaning_VBG
out_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, renewing_VBG the_DT old_JJ hearths_NNS ,_, and_CC scouring_VBG all_PDT the_DT
cooking_NN vessels_NNS that_IN they_PRP might_MD be_VB ready_JJ to_TO receive_VB the_DT new_JJ fire_NN and_CC
the_DT new_JJ fruits_NNS ._. The_DT public_NN or_CC sacred_JJ square_NN was_VBD carefully_RB swept_VBN of_IN
even_RB the_DT smallest_JJS crumbs_NNS of_IN previous_JJ feasts_NNS ,_, "_'' for_IN fear_NN of_IN polluting_VBG
the_DT first-fruit_JJ offerings_NNS ."_VBP Also_RB every_DT vessel_NN that_WDT had_VBD contained_VBN or_CC
had_VBD been_VBN used_VBN about_IN any_DT food_NN during_IN the_DT expiring_NN year_NN was_VBD removed_VBN
from_IN the_DT temple_NN before_IN sunset_NN ._. Then_RB all_PDT the_DT men_NNS who_WP were_VBD not_RB known_VBN
to_TO have_VB violated_VBN the_DT law_NN of_IN the_DT first-fruit_JJ offering_NN and_CC that_IN of_IN
marriage_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN were_VBD summoned_VBN by_IN a_DT crier_NN to_TO enter_VB the_DT holy_JJ
square_NN and_CC observe_VB a_DT solemn_JJ fast_JJ ._. But_CC the_DT women_NNS (_-LRB- except_IN six_CD old_JJ

warriors_NNS were_VBD forbidden_VBN to_TO enter_VB the_DT square_NN ._. Sentinels_NNS were_VBD also_RB
posted_VBN at_IN the_DT corners_NNS of_IN the_DT square_NN to_TO keep_VB out_RP all_DT persons_NNS deemed_VBN
impure_NN and_CC all_DT animals_NNS ._. A_DT strict_JJ fast_NN was_VBD then_RB observed_VBN for_IN two_CD
nights_NNS and_CC a_DT day_NN ,_, the_DT devotees_NNS drinking_VBG a_DT bitter_JJ decoction_NN of_IN
button-snake_NN root_NN "_'' in_IN order_NN to_TO vomit_VB and_CC purge_VB their_PRP$ sinful_JJ bodies_NNS ."_.
That_IN the_DT people_NNS outside_IN the_DT square_NN might_MD also_RB be_VB purified_VBN ,_, one_CD of_IN
the_DT old_JJ men_NNS laid_VBD down_RP a_DT quantity_NN of_IN green_JJ tobacco_NN at_IN a_DT corner_NN of_IN the_DT
square_NN ;_: this_DT was_VBD carried_VBN off_RP by_IN an_DT old_JJ woman_NN and_CC distributed_VBN to_TO the_DT
people_NNS without_IN ,_, who_WP chewed_VBD and_CC swallowed_VBD it_PRP "_'' in_IN order_NN to_TO afflict_VB
their_PRP$ souls_NNS ."_VBP During_IN this_DT general_JJ fast_RB ,_, the_DT women_NNS ,_, children_NNS ,_, and_CC men_NNS
of_IN weak_JJ constitution_NN were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO eat_VB after_IN mid-day_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB
before_RB ._. On_IN the_DT morning_NN when_WRB the_DT fast_JJ ended_VBN ,_, the_DT women_NNS brought_VBD a_DT
quantity_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ year_NN '_'' s_PRP food_NN to_TO the_DT outside_NN of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ square_NN ._.
These_DT provisions_NNS were_VBD then_RB fetched_VBN in_IN and_CC set_VBD before_IN the_DT famished_NN
multitude_NN ,_, but_CC all_DT traces_NNS of_IN them_PRP had_VBD to_TO be_VB removed_VBN before_IN noon_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT sun_NN was_VBD declining_VBG from_IN the_DT meridian_NN ,_, all_PDT the_DT people_NNS were_VBD
commanded_VBN by_IN the_DT voice_NN of_IN a_DT crier_NN to_TO stay_VB within_IN doors_NNS ,_, to_TO do_VB no_DT bad_JJ
act_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO be_VB sure_JJ to_TO extinguish_VB and_CC throw_VB away_RP every_DT spark_NN of_IN the_DT
old_JJ fire_NN ._. Universal_NNP silence_NN now_RB reigned_VBN ._. Then_RB the_DT high_JJ priest_NN made_VBN
the_DT new_JJ fire_NN by_IN the_DT friction_NN of_IN two_CD pieces_NNS of_IN wood_NN ,_, and_CC placed_VBD it_PRP on_IN
the_DT altar_NN under_IN the_DT green_JJ arbour_NN ._. This_DT new_JJ fire_NN was_VBD believed_VBN to_TO
atone_NN for_IN all_DT past_JJ crimes_NNS except_IN murder_NN ._. Next_IN a_DT basket_NN of_IN new_JJ fruits_NNS
was_VBD brought_VBN ;_: the_DT high_JJ priest_NN took_VBD out_RP a_DT little_JJ of_IN each_DT sort_NN of_IN
fruit_NN ,_, rubbed_VBD it_PRP with_IN bear_NN '_'' s_PRP oil_NN ,_, and_CC offered_VBD it_PRP ,_, together_RB with_IN some_DT
flesh_NN ,_, "_'' to_TO the_DT bountiful_JJ holy_JJ spirit_NN of_IN fire_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT first-fruit_NN
offering_NN ,_, and_CC an_DT annual_JJ oblation_NN for_IN sin_NN ."_. He_PRP also_RB consecrated_VBD the_DT
sacred_JJ emetics_NNS (_-LRB- the_DT button-snake_NN root_NN and_CC the_DT cassina_NN or_CC
black-drink_NN )_-RRB- by_IN pouring_VBG a_DT little_JJ of_IN them_PRP into_IN the_DT fire_NN ._. The_DT persons_NNS

sacred_JJ square_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT chief_JJ priest_NN thereupon_NN made_VBD a_DT speech_NN ,_,
exhorting_VBG the_DT people_NNS to_TO observe_VB their_PRP$ old_JJ rites_NNS and_CC customs_NNS ,_,

past_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC earnestly_RB warning_VBG the_DT women_NNS that_IN ,_, if_IN any_DT of_IN them_PRP had_VBD

must_MD forthwith_IN depart_NN ,_, "_'' lest_IN the_DT divine_JJ fire_NN should_MD spoil_VB both_DT them_PRP
and_CC the_DT people_NNS ."_VBP Some_DT of_IN the_DT new_JJ fire_NN was_VBD then_RB set_VBN down_RP outside_IN the_DT
holy_JJ square_NN ;_: the_DT women_NNS carried_VBD it_PRP home_NN joyfully_RB ,_, and_CC laid_VBD it_PRP on_IN
their_PRP$ unpolluted_JJ hearths_NNS ._. When_WRB several_JJ towns_NNS had_VBD united_VBN to_TO celebrate_VB
the_DT festival_NN ,_, the_DT new_JJ fire_NN might_MD thus_RB be_VB carried_VBN for_IN several_JJ miles_NNS ._.
The_DT new_JJ fruits_NNS were_VBD then_RB dressed_VBN on_IN the_DT new_JJ fires_NNS and_CC eaten_VBN with_IN
bear_NN '_POS s_PRP oil_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD deemed_VBN indispensable_JJ ._. At_IN one_CD point_NN of_IN the_DT
festival_NN the_DT men_NNS rubbed_VBD the_DT new_JJ corn_NN between_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, then_RB on_IN
their_PRP$ faces_NNS and_CC breasts_NNS ._. During_IN the_DT festival_NN which_WDT followed_VBD ,_, the_DT
warriors_NNS ,_, dressed_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ wild_JJ martial_JJ array_NN ,_, their_PRP$ heads_NNS covered_VBN
with_IN white_JJ down_RB and_CC carrying_VBG white_JJ feathers_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, danced_VBD
round_RB the_DT sacred_JJ arbour_NN ,_, under_IN which_WDT burned_VBD the_DT new_JJ fire_NN ._. The_DT
ceremonies_NNS lasted_VBD eight_CD days_NNS ,_, during_IN which_WDT the_DT strictest_NN continence_NN
was_VBD practised_JJ ._. Towards_IN the_DT conclusion_NN of_IN the_DT festival_NN the_DT warriors_NNS
fought_VBD a_DT mock_JJ battle_NN ;_: then_RB the_DT men_NNS and_CC women_NNS together_RB ,_, in_IN three_CD
circles_NNS ,_, danced_VBD round_IN the_DT sacred_JJ fire_NN ._. Lastly_RB ,_, all_PDT the_DT people_NNS
smeared_VBN themselves_PRP with_IN white_JJ clay_NN and_CC bathed_VBN in_IN running_VBG water_NN ._. They_PRP
came_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT water_NN believing_VBG that_IN no_DT evil_NN could_MD now_RB befall_VB them_PRP
for_IN what_WP they_PRP had_VBD done_VBN amiss_JJ in_IN the_DT past_JJ ._. So_IN they_PRP departed_VBD in_IN joy_NN
and_CC peace_NN ._.

To_TO this_DT day_NN ,_, also_RB ,_, the_DT remnant_NN of_IN the_DT Seminole_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN Florida_NNP ,_, a_DT
people_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ stock_NN as_IN the_DT Creeks_NNPS ,_, hold_VB an_DT annual_JJ purification_NN
and_CC festival_NN called_VBD the_DT Green_NNP Corn_NNP Dance_NNP ,_, at_IN which_WDT the_DT new_JJ corn_NN is_VBZ
eaten_VBN ._. On_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT festival_NN they_PRP quaff_VBD a_DT
nauseous_JJ "_`` Black_NNP Drink_NNP ,"_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN ,_, which_WDT acts_VBZ both_DT as_IN an_DT
emetic_JJ and_CC a_DT purgative_NN ;_: they_PRP believe_VBP that_IN he_PRP who_WP does_VBZ not_RB drink_VB of_IN
this_DT liquor_NN cannot_VBD safely_RB eat_VB the_DT new_JJ green_JJ corn_NN ,_, and_CC besides_IN that_WDT
he_PRP will_MD be_VB sick_JJ at_IN some_DT time_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN ._. While_IN the_DT liquor_NN is_VBZ being_VBG
drunk_NN ,_, the_DT dancing_NN begins_VBZ ,_, and_CC the_DT medicine-men_NNS join_VBP in_IN it_PRP ._. Next_NNP day_NN
they_PRP eat_VBP of_IN the_DT green_JJ corn_NN ;_: the_DT following_VBG day_NN they_PRP fast_RB ,_, probably_RB
from_IN fear_NN of_IN polluting_VBG the_DT sacred_JJ food_NN in_IN their_PRP$ stomachs_NNS by_IN contact_NN
with_IN common_JJ food_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT third_JJ day_NN they_PRP hold_VBP a_DT great_JJ feast_NN ._.

Even_RB tribes_NNS which_WDT do_VBP not_RB till_IN the_DT ground_NN sometimes_RB observe_VBP analogous_JJ
ceremonies_NNS when_WRB they_PRP gather_VBP the_DT first_JJ wild_JJ fruits_NNS or_CC dig_VB the_DT first_JJ
roots_NNS of_IN the_DT season_NN ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT Salish_NNP and_CC Tinneh_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN
North-West_NNP America_NNP ,_, "_'' before_IN the_DT young_JJ people_NNS eat_VBP the_DT first_JJ berries_NNS
or_CC roots_NNS of_IN the_DT season_NN ,_, they_PRP always_RB addressed_VBD the_DT fruit_NN or_CC plant_NN ,_,
and_CC begged_VBD for_IN its_PRP$ favour_NN and_CC aid_NN ._. In_IN some_DT tribes_NNS regular_JJ
First-fruit_NNP ceremonies_NNS were_VBD annually_RB held_VBN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN picking_VBG the_DT
wild_JJ fruit_NN or_CC gathering_VBG the_DT roots_NNS ,_, and_CC also_RB among_IN the_DT salmon-eating_NN
tribes_NNS when_WRB the_DT run_NN of_IN the_DT '_'' sockeye_NN '_'' salmon_NN began_VBD ._. These_DT ceremonies_NNS
were_VBD not_RB so_RB much_JJ thanksgivings_NNS ,_, as_IN performances_NNS to_TO ensure_VB a_DT
plentiful_JJ crop_NN or_CC supply_NN of_IN the_DT particular_JJ object_NN desired_VBN ,_, for_IN if_IN
they_PRP were_VBD not_RB properly_RB and_CC reverently_RB carried_VBD out_RP there_EX was_VBD danger_NN
of_IN giving_VBG offence_NN to_TO the_DT '_'' spirits_NNS '_'' of_IN the_DT objects_NNS ,_, and_CC being_VBG
deprived_VBN of_IN them_PRP ."_. For_IN example_NN ,_, these_DT Indians_NNPS are_VBP fond_JJ of_IN the_DT young_JJ
shoots_NNS or_CC suckers_NNS of_IN the_DT wild_JJ raspberry_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP observe_VBP a_DT solemn_JJ
ceremony_NN at_IN eating_NN the_DT first_JJ of_IN them_PRP in_IN season_NN ._. The_DT shoots_NNS are_VBP
cooked_VBN in_IN a_DT new_JJ pot_NN :_: the_DT people_NNS assemble_NN and_CC stand_NN in_IN a_DT great_JJ circle_NN
with_IN closed_JJ eyes_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT presiding_VBG chief_NN or_CC medicine-man_NN invokes_NNS
the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN ,_, begging_VBG that_IN it_PRP will_MD be_VB propitious_JJ to_TO them_PRP
and_CC grant_NN them_PRP a_DT good_JJ supply_NN of_IN suckers_NNS ._. After_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT
ceremony_NN is_VBZ over_IN the_DT cooked_JJ suckers_NNS are_VBP handed_VBN to_TO the_DT presiding_VBG
officer_NN in_IN a_DT newly_RB carved_VBN dish_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT small_JJ portion_NN is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO each_DT
person_NN present_JJ ,_, who_WP reverently_RB and_CC decorously_RB eats_VBZ it_PRP ._.

The_DT Thompson_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN British_NNP Columbia_NNP cook_NN and_CC eat_VB the_DT sunflower_NN
root_NN (_-LRB- Balsamorrhiza_NNP sagittata_NN ,_, Nutt_NNP .),_, but_CC they_PRP used_VBD to_TO regard_VB it_PRP
as_IN a_DT mysterious_JJ being_NN ,_, and_CC observed_VBD a_DT number_NN of_IN taboos_NNS in_IN connexion_NN
with_IN it_PRP ;_: for_IN example_NN ,_, women_NNS who_WP were_VBD engaged_VBN in_IN digging_VBG or_CC cooking_VBG
the_DT root_NN must_MD practice_VB continence_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT man_NN might_MD come_VB near_IN the_DT
oven_NN where_WRB the_DT women_NNS were_VBD baking_VBG the_DT root_NN ._. When_WRB young_JJ people_NNS ate_VBD the_DT
first_JJ berries_NNS ,_, roots_NNS ,_, or_CC other_JJ products_NNS of_IN the_DT season_NN ,_, they_PRP
addressed_VBD a_DT prayer_NN to_TO the_DT Sunflower-Root_NNP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: "_`` I_PRP inform_VB thee_NN
that_IN I_PRP intend_VBP to_TO eat_VB thee_PRP ._. Mayest_NNP thou_VBD always_RB help_VB me_PRP to_TO ascend_VB ,_, so_RB
that_IN I_PRP may_MD always_RB be_VB able_JJ to_TO reach_VB the_DT tops_NNS of_IN mountains_NNS ,_, and_CC may_MD I_PRP
never_RB be_VB clumsy_JJ !_. I_PRP ask_VBP this_DT from_IN thee_PRP ,_, Sunflower-Root_NNP ._. Thou_NNP art_NN the_DT
greatest_JJS of_IN all_DT in_IN mystery_NN ."_. To_TO omit_VB this_DT prayer_NN would_MD make_VB the_DT
eater_NN lazy_JJ and_CC cause_VB him_PRP to_TO sleep_VB long_RB in_IN the_DT morning_NN ._.

These_DT customs_NNS of_IN the_DT Thompson_NNP and_CC other_JJ Indian_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN North-West_NNP
America_NNP are_VBP instructive_JJ ,_, because_IN they_PRP clearly_RB indicate_VBP the_DT motive_NN ,_,
or_CC at_IN least_JJS one_CD of_IN the_DT motives_NNS ,_, which_WDT underlies_VBZ the_DT ceremonies_NNS
observed_VBN at_IN eating_VBG the_DT first_JJ fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT season_NN ._. That_DT motive_NN in_IN
the_DT case_NN of_IN these_DT Indians_NNPS is_VBZ simply_RB a_DT belief_NN that_IN the_DT plant_NN itself_PRP
is_VBZ animated_VBN by_IN a_DT conscious_JJ and_CC more_RBR or_CC less_RBR powerful_JJ spirit_NN ,_, who_WP
must_MD be_VB propitiated_VBN before_IN the_DT people_NNS can_MD safely_RB partake_VB of_IN the_DT
fruits_NNS or_CC roots_NNS which_WDT are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ._. Now_RB if_IN
this_DT is_VBZ true_JJ of_IN wild_JJ fruits_NNS and_CC roots_NNS ,_, we_PRP may_MD infer_VB with_IN some_DT
probability_NN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ also_RB true_JJ of_IN cultivated_JJ fruits_NNS and_CC roots_NNS ,_,
such_JJ as_IN yams_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN particular_JJ that_IN it_PRP holds_VBZ good_JJ of_IN the_DT cereals_NNS ,_,
such_JJ as_IN wheat_NN ,_, barley_NN ,_, oats_NNS ,_, rice_NN ,_, and_CC maize_NN ._. In_IN all_DT cases_NNS it_PRP seems_VBZ
reasonable_JJ to_TO infer_VB that_IN the_DT scruples_NNS which_WDT savages_VBZ manifest_JJ at_IN
eating_VBG the_DT first_JJ fruits_NNS of_IN any_DT crop_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT ceremonies_NNS which_WDT they_PRP
observe_VB before_IN they_PRP overcome_VBP their_PRP$ scruples_NNS ,_, are_VBP due_JJ at_IN least_JJS in_IN
large_JJ measure_NN to_TO a_DT notion_NN that_IN the_DT plant_NN or_CC tree_NN is_VBZ animated_VBN by_IN a_DT
spirit_NN or_CC even_RB a_DT deity_NN ,_, whose_WP$ leave_VB must_MD be_VB obtained_VBN ,_, or_CC whose_WP$
favour_NN must_MD be_VB sought_VBN ,_, before_IN it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ to_TO partake_VB with_IN safety_NN
of_IN the_DT new_JJ crop_NN ._. This_DT indeed_RB is_VBZ plainly_RB affirmed_VBN of_IN the_DT Aino_NNP :_: they_PRP
call_VB the_DT millet_NN "_'' the_DT divine_JJ cereal_NN ,"_IN "_`` the_DT cereal_NN deity_NN ,"_, and_CC they_PRP
pray_NN to_TO and_CC worship_VB him_PRP before_IN they_PRP will_MD eat_VB of_IN the_DT cakes_NNS made_VBD from_IN

fruits_NNS is_VBZ not_RB expressly_RB affirmed_VBN ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB implied_VBN both_DT by_IN

with_IN a_DT powerful_JJ spirit_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT usages_NNS which_WDT point_VBP to_TO this_DT conclusion_NN are_VBP the_DT custom_NN of_IN

virtue_NN of_IN the_DT rite_NN so_RB clearly_RB as_IN the_DT Creek_NNP and_CC Seminole_NNP practice_NN of_IN
taking_VBG a_DT purgative_NN before_IN swallowing_VBG the_DT new_JJ corn_NN ._. The_DT intention_NN is_VBZ
thereby_RB to_TO prevent_VB the_DT sacred_JJ food_NN from_IN being_VBG polluted_VBN by_IN contact_NN
with_IN common_JJ food_NN in_IN the_DT stomach_NN of_IN the_DT eater_NN ._. For_IN the_DT same_JJ reason_NN
Catholics_NNPS partake_NN of_IN the_DT Eucharist_NNP fasting_NN ;_: and_CC among_IN the_DT pastoral_JJ
Masai_NNP of_IN Eastern_NNP Africa_NNP the_DT young_JJ warriors_NNS ,_, who_WP live_VBP on_IN meat_NN and_CC
milk_NN exclusively_RB ,_, are_VBP obliged_VBN to_TO eat_VB nothing_NN but_CC milk_NN for_IN so_RB many_JJ
days_NNS and_CC then_RB nothing_NN but_CC meat_NN for_IN so_RB many_JJ more_JJR ,_, and_CC before_IN they_PRP
pass_NN from_IN the_DT one_CD food_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ they_PRP must_MD make_VB sure_JJ that_IN none_NN of_IN
the_DT old_JJ food_NN remains_VBZ in_IN their_PRP$ stomachs_NNS ;_: this_DT they_PRP do_VBP by_IN swallowing_VBG a_DT
very_RB powerful_JJ purgative_NN and_CC emetic_JJ ._.

In_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT festivals_NNS which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP examined_VBN ,_, the_DT sacrament_NN of_IN
first-fruits_NNS is_VBZ combined_VBN with_IN a_DT sacrifice_NN or_CC presentation_NN of_IN them_PRP to_TO
gods_NNS or_CC spirits_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN course_NN of_IN time_NN the_DT sacrifice_NN of_IN first-fruits_PRP$
tends_VBZ to_TO throw_VB the_DT sacrament_NN into_IN the_DT shade_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB to_TO supersede_VB it_PRP ._.
The_DT mere_JJ fact_NN of_IN offering_VBG the_DT first-fruits_NNS to_TO the_DT gods_NNS or_CC spirits_NNS
comes_VBZ now_RB to_TO be_VB thought_VBN a_DT sufficient_JJ preparation_NN for_IN eating_VBG the_DT new_JJ

enjoy_VB the_DT rest_NN ._. This_DT mode_NN of_IN viewing_VBG the_DT new_JJ fruits_NNS implies_VBZ that_IN
they_PRP are_VBP regarded_VBN no_RB longer_RB as_IN themselves_PRP instinct_NN with_IN divine_JJ life_NN ,_,

returning_VBG to_TO them_PRP a_DT portion_NN of_IN their_PRP$ bounty_NN ._.



2._PRP Eating_VBG the_DT God_NNP among_IN the_DT Aztecs_NNS

THE_DT CUSTOM_NNP of_IN eating_VBG bread_NN sacramentally_RB as_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN a_DT god_NN was_VBD
practised_VBN by_IN the_DT Aztecs_NNP before_IN the_DT discovery_NN and_CC conquest_NN of_IN Mexico_NNP
by_IN the_DT Spaniards_NNS ._. Twice_NN a_DT year_NN ,_, in_IN May_NNP and_CC December_NNP ,_, an_DT image_NN of_IN the_DT
great_JJ Mexican_JJ god_NN Huitzilopochtli_NNP or_CC Vitzilipuztli_NNP was_VBD made_VBN of_IN
dough_NN ,_, then_RB broken_VBN in_IN pieces_NNS ,_, and_CC solemnly_RB eaten_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ worshippers_NNS ._.
The_DT May_NNP ceremony_NN is_VBZ thus_RB described_VBN by_IN the_DT historian_NN Acosta_NNP :_: "_`` The_DT
Mexicans_NNS in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP made_VBD their_PRP$ principal_JJ feast_NN to_TO their_PRP$ god_NN
Vitzilipuztli_NNP ,_, and_CC two_CD days_NNS before_IN this_DT feast_NN ,_, the_DT virgins_NNS whereof_IN I_PRP
have_VBP spoken_VBN (_-LRB- the_DT which_WDT were_VBD shut_VBN up_RB and_CC secluded_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ temple_NN
and_CC were_VBD as_IN it_PRP were_VBD religious_JJ women_NNS )_-RRB- did_VBD mingle_VB a_DT quantity_NN of_IN the_DT
seed_NN of_IN beets_NNS with_IN roasted_JJ maize_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB they_PRP did_VBD mould_VB it_PRP with_IN
honey_NN ,_, making_VBG an_DT idol_NN of_IN that_DT paste_NN in_IN bigness_NN like_IN to_TO that_DT of_IN wood_NN ,_,
putting_VBG instead_RB of_IN eyes_NNS grains_NNS of_IN green_JJ glass_NN ,_, of_IN blue_JJ or_CC white_JJ ;_: and_CC
for_IN teeth_NNS grains_NNS of_IN maize_NN set_VBD forth_RB with_IN all_PDT the_DT ornament_NN and_CC
furniture_NN that_IN I_PRP have_VBP said_VBD ._. This_DT being_VBG finished_VBN ,_, all_DT the_DT noblemen_NNS
came_VBD and_CC brought_VBD it_PRP an_DT exquisite_JJ and_CC rich_JJ garment_NN ,_, like_IN unto_IN that_DT of_IN
the_DT idol_NN ,_, wherewith_IN they_PRP did_VBD attire_VB it_PRP ._. Being_VBG thus_RB clad_VBN and_CC deckt_VBN ,_,
they_PRP did_VBD set_VB it_PRP in_IN an_DT azured_JJ chair_NN and_CC in_IN a_DT litter_JJ to_TO carry_VB it_PRP on_IN
their_PRP$ shoulders_NNS ._. The_DT morning_NN of_IN this_DT feast_NN being_VBG come_VBN ,_, an_DT hour_NN
before_IN day_NN all_DT the_DT maidens_NNS came_VBD forth_RB attired_VBN in_IN white_JJ ,_, with_IN new_JJ

Vitzilipuztli_NNP ,_, they_PRP came_VBD crowned_VBN with_IN garlands_NNS of_IN maize_NN roasted_VBN and_CC

their_PRP$ necks_NNS they_PRP had_VBD great_JJ chains_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ ,_, which_WDT went_VBD

stood_VBD in_IN the_DT court_NN with_IN much_JJ reverence_NN and_CC fear_NN ._. Being_VBG mounted_VBN to_TO
the_DT top_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP had_VBD placed_VBN it_PRP in_IN a_DT little_JJ lodge_NN of_IN roses_NNS
which_WDT they_PRP held_VBD ready_JJ ,_, presently_RB came_VBD the_DT young_JJ men_NNS ,_, which_WDT strewed_VBD
many_JJ flowers_NNS of_IN sundry_JJ kinds_NNS ,_, wherewith_IN they_PRP filled_VBD the_DT temple_NN both_CC
within_IN and_CC without_IN ._. This_DT done_VBN ,_, all_DT the_DT virgins_NNS came_VBD out_IN of_IN their_PRP$

at_IN the_DT idol_NN '_'' s_PRP feet_NNS ,_, wherewith_IN they_PRP filled_VBD the_DT whole_JJ place_NN that_IN it_PRP
could_MD receive_VB no_DT more_JJR ._. They_PRP called_VBD these_DT morsels_NNS of_IN paste_NN the_DT flesh_NN
and_CC bones_NNS of_IN Vitzilipuztli_NNP ._. Having_VBG laid_VBN abroad_RB these_DT bones_NNS ,_,

in_IN the_DT same_JJ livery_NN ;_: then_RB putting_VBG themselves_PRP in_IN order_NN about_IN those_DT

blessing_NN (_-LRB- whereby_WRB they_PRP were_VBD taken_VBN for_IN the_DT flesh_NN and_CC bones_NNS of_IN the_DT
idol_NN )_-RRB- being_VBG ended_VBN ,_, they_PRP honoured_VBD those_DT pieces_NNS in_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN as_IN
their_PRP$ god_NN ._. ._. ._. ._. All_PDT the_DT city_NN came_VBD to_TO this_DT goodly_JJ spectacle_NN ,_, and_CC
there_EX was_VBD a_DT commandment_NN very_RB strictly_RB observed_VBN throughout_IN all_PDT the_DT

should_MD eat_VB no_DT other_JJ meat_NN but_CC this_DT paste_NN ,_, with_IN honey_NN ,_, whereof_IN the_DT
idol_NN was_VBD made_VBN ._. And_CC this_DT should_MD be_VB eaten_VBN at_IN the_DT point_NN of_IN day_NN ,_, and_CC
they_PRP should_MD drink_VB no_DT water_NN nor_CC any_DT other_JJ thing_NN till_IN after_IN noon_NN :_: they_PRP
held_VBN it_PRP for_IN an_DT ill_JJ sign_NN ,_, yea_NN ,_, for_IN sacrilege_NN to_TO do_VB the_DT contrary_NN :_: but_CC
after_IN the_DT ceremonies_NNS ended_VBD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD lawful_JJ for_IN them_PRP to_TO eat_VB anything_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN this_DT ceremony_NN they_PRP hid_VBD the_DT water_NN from_IN their_PRP$
little_JJ children_NNS ,_, admonishing_VBG all_DT such_JJ as_IN had_VBD the_DT use_NN of_IN reason_NN not_RB
to_TO drink_VB any_DT water_NN ;_: which_WDT ,_, if_IN they_PRP did_VBD ,_, the_DT anger_NN of_IN God_NNP would_MD come_VB
upon_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC they_PRP should_MD die_VB ,_, which_WDT they_PRP did_VBD observe_VB very_RB
carefully_RB and_CC strictly_RB ._. The_DT ceremonies_NNS ,_, dancing_NN ,_, and_CC sacrifice_VB
ended_VBN ,_, the_DT went_VBD to_TO unclothe_VB themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT priests_NNS and_CC
superiors_NNS of_IN the_DT temple_NN took_VBD the_DT idol_NN of_IN paste_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP spoiled_VBD

with_IN the_DT greater_JJR ,_, and_CC continuing_VBG unto_IN the_DT rest_NN ,_, both_DT men_NNS ,_, women_NNS ,_, and_CC
little_JJ children_NNS ,_, who_WP received_VBD it_PRP with_IN such_JJ tears_NNS ,_, fear_NN ,_, and_CC

flesh_NN and_CC bones_NNS of_IN God_NNP ,_, where-with_WP they_PRP were_VBD grieved_VBN ._. Such_JJ as_RB had_VBN
any_DT sick_JJ folks_NNS demanded_VBD thereof_RB for_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC carried_VBD it_PRP with_IN great_JJ
reverence_NN and_CC veneration_NN ."_.

From_IN this_DT interesting_JJ passage_NN we_PRP learn_VBP that_IN the_DT ancient_JJ Mexicans_NNS ,_,
even_RB before_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN Christian_NNP missionaries_NNS ,_, were_VBD fully_RB
acquainted_VBN with_IN the_DT doctrine_NN of_IN transubstantiation_NN and_CC acted_VBD upon_IN it_PRP
in_IN the_DT solemn_JJ rites_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ religion_NN ._. They_PRP believed_VBD that_IN by_IN
consecrating_VBG bread_NN their_PRP$ priests_NNS could_MD turn_VB it_PRP into_IN the_DT very_JJ body_NN of_IN
their_PRP$ god_NN ,_, so_RB that_IN all_DT who_WP thereupon_DT partook_NN of_IN the_DT consecrated_VBN
bread_NN entered_VBD into_IN a_DT mystic_JJ communion_NN with_IN the_DT deity_NN by_IN receiving_VBG a_DT
portion_NN of_IN his_PRP$ divine_JJ substance_NN into_IN themselves_PRP ._. The_DT doctrine_NN of_IN
transubstantiation_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT magical_JJ conversion_NN of_IN bread_NN into_IN flesh_NN ,_,
was_VBD also_RB familiar_JJ to_TO the_DT Aryans_NNP of_IN ancient_JJ India_NNP long_JJ before_IN the_DT
spread_NN and_CC even_RB the_DT rise_NN of_IN Christianity_NNP ._. The_DT Brahmans_NNPS taught_VBD that_IN
the_DT rice-cakes_NNS offered_VBD in_IN sacrifice_NN were_VBD substitutes_NNS for_IN human_NN
beings_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP were_VBD actually_RB converted_VBN into_IN the_DT real_JJ bodies_NNS
of_IN men_NNS by_IN the_DT manipulation_NN of_IN the_DT priest_NN ._. We_PRP read_VBD that_IN "_`` when_WRB it_PRP (_-LRB- the_DT
rice-cake_NN )_-RRB- still_RB consists_VBZ of_IN rice-meal_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT hair_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP
pours_NNS water_NN on_IN it_PRP ,_, it_PRP becomes_VBZ skin_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP mixes_VBZ it_PRP ,_, it_PRP becomes_VBZ
flesh_NN :_: for_IN then_RB it_PRP becomes_VBZ consistent_JJ ;_: and_CC consistent_JJ also_RB is_VBZ the_DT
flesh_NN ._. When_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ baked_VBN ,_, it_PRP becomes_VBZ bone_NN :_: for_IN then_RB it_PRP becomes_VBZ
somewhat_RB hard_JJ ;_: and_CC hard_RB is_VBZ the_DT bone_NN ._. And_CC when_WRB he_PRP is_VBZ about_IN to_TO take_VB it_PRP
off_IN (_-LRB- the_DT fire_NN )_-RRB- and_CC sprinkles_VBZ it_PRP with_IN butter_NN ,_, he_PRP changes_VBZ it_PRP into_IN
marrow_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ the_DT completeness_NN which_WDT they_PRP call_VBP the_DT fivefold_JJ animal_NN
sacrifice_NN ."_RB

Now_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, we_PRP can_MD perfectly_RB understand_VB why_WRB on_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN their_PRP$ solemn_JJ
communion_NN with_IN the_DT deity_NN the_DT Mexicans_NNPS refused_VBD to_TO eat_VB any_DT other_JJ food_NN
than_IN the_DT consecrated_JJ bread_NN which_WDT they_PRP revered_VBD as_IN the_DT very_JJ flesh_NN and_CC
bones_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ God_NNP ,_, and_CC why_WRB up_RB till_IN noon_NN they_PRP might_MD drink_VB nothing_NN at_IN
all_DT ,_, not_RB even_RB water_NN ._. They_PRP feared_VBD no_DT doubt_NN to_TO defile_VB the_DT portion_NN of_IN
God_NNP in_IN their_PRP$ stomachs_NNS by_IN contact_NN with_IN common_JJ things_NNS ._. A_DT similar_JJ pious_JJ
fear_NN led_VBD the_DT Creek_NNP and_CC Seminole_NNP Indians_NNPS ,_, as_IN we_PRP saw_VBD ,_, to_TO adopt_VB the_DT
more_RBR thoroughgoing_JJ expedient_NN of_IN rinsing_VBG out_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS by_IN a_DT strong_JJ
purgative_NN before_IN they_PRP dared_VBD to_TO partake_VB of_IN the_DT sacrament_NN of_IN
first-fruits_NNS ._.

At_IN the_DT festival_NN of_IN the_DT winter_NN solstice_NN in_IN December_NNP the_DT Aztecs_NNP killed_VBN
their_PRP$ god_NN Huitzilopochtli_NNP in_IN effigy_NN first_RB and_CC ate_VBD him_PRP afterwards_RB ._. As_IN
a_DT preparation_NN for_IN this_DT solemn_JJ ceremony_NN an_DT image_NN of_IN the_DT deity_NN in_IN the_DT
likeness_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN was_VBD fashioned_VBN out_IN of_IN seeds_NNS of_IN various_JJ sorts_NNS ,_, which_WDT
were_VBD kneaded_VBN into_IN a_DT dough_NN with_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN children_NNS ._. The_DT bones_NNS of_IN
the_DT god_NN were_VBD represented_VBN by_IN pieces_NNS of_IN acacia_NN wood_NN ._. This_DT image_NN was_VBD
placed_VBN on_IN the_DT chief_JJ altar_NN of_IN the_DT temple_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN the_DT
festival_NN the_DT king_NN offered_VBD incense_NN to_TO it_PRP ._. Early_RB next_JJ day_NN it_PRP was_VBD taken_VBN
down_RB and_CC set_VB on_IN its_PRP$ feet_NNS in_IN a_DT great_JJ hall_NN ._. Then_RB a_DT priest_NN ,_, who_WP bore_VBD
the_DT name_NN and_CC acted_VBD the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN Quetzalcoatl_NNP ,_, took_VBD a_DT
flint-tipped_JJ dart_NN and_CC hurled_VBD it_PRP into_IN the_DT breast_NN of_IN the_DT dough-image_NN ,_,
piercing_VBG it_PRP through_IN and_CC through_IN ._. This_DT was_VBD called_VBN "_`` killing_VBG the_DT god_NN
Huitzilopochtli_NNP so_RB that_IN his_PRP$ body_NN might_MD be_VB eaten_VBN ."_JJ One_CD of_IN the_DT priests_NNS
cut_VBN out_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN the_DT image_NN and_CC gave_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT king_NN to_TO eat_VB ._. The_DT
rest_NN of_IN the_DT image_NN was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN minute_NN pieces_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT every_DT man_NN
great_JJ and_CC small_JJ ,_, down_RB to_TO the_DT male_JJ children_NNS in_IN the_DT cradle_NN ,_, receive_VB
one_CD to_TO eat_VB ._. But_CC no_DT woman_NN might_MD taste_VB a_DT morsel_NN ._. The_DT ceremony_NN was_VBD
called_VBN teoqualo_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, "_`` god_NN is_VBZ eaten_VBN ."_.

At_IN another_DT festival_NN the_DT Mexicans_NNPS made_VBD little_JJ images_NNS like_IN men_NNS ,_, which_WDT
stood_VBD for_IN the_DT cloud-capped_JJ mountains_NNS ._. These_DT images_NNS were_VBD moulded_VBN of_IN a_DT
paste_NN of_IN various_JJ seeds_NNS and_CC were_VBD dressed_VBN in_IN paper_NN ornaments_NNS ._. Some_DT
people_NNS fashioned_VBN five_CD ,_, others_NNS ten_CD ,_, others_NNS as_RB many_JJ as_IN fifteen_CD of_IN
them_PRP ._. Having_VBG been_VBN made_VBN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD placed_VBN in_IN the_DT oratory_NN of_IN each_DT
house_NN and_CC worshipped_VBD ._. Four_CD times_NNS in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT night_NN
offerings_NNS of_IN food_NN were_VBD brought_VBN to_TO them_PRP in_IN tiny_JJ vessels_NNS ;_: and_CC people_NNS
sang_VBD and_CC played_VBD the_DT flute_NN before_IN them_PRP through_IN all_DT the_DT hours_NNS of_IN
darkness_NN ._. At_IN break_NN of_IN day_NN the_DT priests_NNS stabbed_VBD the_DT images_NNS with_IN a_DT
weaver_NN '_POS s_PRP instrument_NN ,_, cut_VBD off_RP their_PRP$ heads_NNS ,_, and_CC tore_VBD out_RP their_PRP$ hearts_NNS ,_,
which_WDT they_PRP presented_VBD to_TO the_DT master_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN on_IN a_DT green_JJ saucer_NN ._.
The_DT bodies_NNS of_IN the_DT images_NNS were_VBD then_RB eaten_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT family_NN ,_,
especially_RB by_IN the_DT servants_NNS ,_, "_'' in_IN order_NN that_IN by_IN eating_VBG them_PRP they_PRP might_MD
be_VB preserved_VBN from_IN certain_JJ distempers_NNS ,_, to_TO which_WDT those_DT persons_NNS who_WP
were_VBD negligent_JJ of_IN worship_NN to_TO those_DT deities_NNS conceived_VBD themselves_PRP to_TO
be_VB subject_JJ ."_.



3._`` Many_JJ Manii_NNS at_IN Aricia_NNP

WE_NNP are_VBP now_RB able_JJ to_TO suggest_VB an_DT explanation_NN of_IN the_DT proverb_NN "_`` There_EX are_VBP
many_JJ Manii_NNP at_IN Aricia_NNP ."_NNP Certain_NNP loaves_NNS made_VBD in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN men_NNS were_VBD
called_VBN by_IN the_DT Romans_NNPS maniae_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN this_DT kind_NN of_IN loaf_NN
was_VBD especially_RB made_VBN at_IN Aricia_NNP ._. Now_RB ,_, Mania_NNP ,_, the_DT name_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT
loaves_NNS ,_, was_VBD also_RB the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT Mother_NNP or_CC Grandmother_NNP of_IN Ghosts_NNP ,_, to_TO
whom_WP woollen_JJ effigies_NNS of_IN men_NNS and_CC women_NNS were_VBD dedicated_VBN at_IN the_DT
festival_NN of_IN the_DT Compitalia_NNP ._. These_DT effigies_NNS were_VBD hung_VBN at_IN the_DT doors_NNS of_IN
all_PDT the_DT houses_NNS in_IN Rome_NNP ;_: one_CD effigy_NN was_VBD hung_VBN up_RP for_IN every_DT free_JJ person_NN
in_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD effigy_NN ,_, of_IN a_DT different_JJ kind_NN ,_, for_IN every_DT slave_NN ._.
The_DT reason_NN was_VBD that_IN on_IN this_DT day_NN the_DT ghosts_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ were_VBD believed_VBN
to_TO be_VB going_VBG about_RB ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD hoped_VBN that_IN ,_, either_CC out_IN of_IN good_JJ nature_NN
or_CC through_IN simple_JJ inadvertence_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD carry_VB off_RP the_DT effigies_NNS at_IN
the_DT door_NN instead_RB of_IN the_DT living_VBG people_NNS in_IN the_DT house_NN ._. According_VBG to_TO
tradition_NN ,_, these_DT woollen_JJ figures_NNS were_VBD substitutes_NNS for_IN a_DT former_JJ
custom_NN of_IN sacrificing_VBG human_JJ beings_NNS ._. Upon_IN data_NNS so_IN fragmentary_JJ and_CC
uncertain_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO build_VB with_IN confidence_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ
worth_JJ suggesting_VBG that_IN the_DT loaves_NNS in_IN human_JJ form_NN ,_, which_WDT appear_VBP to_TO have_VB
been_VBN baked_VBN at_IN Aricia_NNP ,_, were_VBD sacramental_JJ bread_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN the_DT old_JJ
days_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT divine_JJ King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP was_VBD annually_RB slain_JJ ,_, loaves_NNS
were_VBD made_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ image_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT paste_NN figures_NNS of_IN the_DT gods_NNS in_IN
Mexico_NNP ,_, and_CC were_VBD eaten_VBN sacramentally_RB by_IN his_PRP$ worshippers_NNS ._. The_DT Mexican_NNP
sacraments_NNS in_IN honour_NN of_IN Huitzilopochtli_NNP were_VBD also_RB accompanied_VBN by_IN the_DT
sacrifice_NN of_IN human_JJ victims_NNS ._. The_DT tradition_NN that_IN the_DT founder_NN of_IN the_DT
sacred_JJ grove_NN at_IN Aricia_NNP was_VBD a_DT man_NN named_VBN Manius_NNP ,_, from_IN whom_WP many_JJ Manii_NNP
were_VBD descended_VBN ,_, would_MD thus_RB be_VB an_DT etymological_JJ myth_NN invented_VBD to_TO
explain_VB the_DT name_NN maniae_NN as_IN applied_VBN to_TO these_DT sacramental_JJ loaves_NNS ._. A_NN
dim_JJ recollection_NN of_IN the_DT original_JJ connexion_NN of_IN the_DT loaves_NNS with_IN human_NN
sacrifices_NNS may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB traced_VBN in_IN the_DT story_NN that_IN the_DT effigies_NNS
dedicated_VBN to_TO Mania_NNP at_IN the_DT Compitalia_NNP were_VBD substitutes_NNS for_IN human_NN
victims_NNS ._. The_DT story_NN itself_PRP ,_, however_RB ,_, is_VBZ probably_RB devoid_JJ of_IN
foundation_NN ,_, since_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN putting_VBG up_RP dummies_NNS to_TO divert_VB the_DT
attention_NN of_IN ghosts_NNS or_CC demons_NNS from_IN living_VBG people_NNS is_VBZ not_RB uncommon_JJ ._.

For_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT Tibetans_NNP stand_NN in_IN fear_NN of_IN innumerable_JJ earth-demons_NNS ,_,
all_DT of_IN whom_WP are_VBP under_IN the_DT authority_NN of_IN Old_NNP Mother_NNP Kh_NNP �_NNP n-ma_, ._. This_DT
goddess_JJ ,_, who_WP may_MD be_VB compared_VBN to_TO the_DT Roman_NNP Mania_NNP ,_, the_DT Mother_NN or_CC

golden_JJ noose_NN in_IN her_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, and_CC rides_NNS on_IN a_DT ram_NN ._. In_IN order_NN to_TO bar_VB the_DT
dwelling-house_NN against_IN the_DT foul_JJ fiends_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP Old_NNP Mother_NNP Kh_NNP �_NNP n-ma_.
is_VBZ mistress_NN ,_, an_DT elaborate_JJ structure_NN somewhat_RB resembling_VBG a_DT chandelier_NN

and_CC injure_NN the_DT household_NN ._.

Again_RB ,_, effigies_NNS are_VBP often_RB employed_VBN as_IN a_DT means_NN of_IN preventing_VBG or_CC

the_DT sick_JJ man_NN ,_, who_WP consequently_RB recovers_VBZ ._. Cure_NNP or_CC prevention_NN of_IN this_DT

sickness_NN ,_, pass_VB over_RB into_IN the_DT image_NN ."_NN Then_RB ,_, with_IN some_DT rice_NN ,_, salt_NN ,_, and_CC

plague_NN the_DT image_NN ,_, for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ indeed_RB prettier_JJR and_CC better_JJR than_IN he_PRP ."_MD
Batak_NNP magicians_NNS can_MD conjure_VB the_DT demon_NN of_IN disease_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT

With_IN these_DT examples_NNS before_IN us_PRP we_PRP may_MD surmise_VB that_IN the_DT woollen_NN

the_DT puppets_NNS made_VBD of_IN rushes_NNS ,_, which_WDT in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP the_DT pontiffs_NNS
and_CC Vestal_NNP Virgins_NNP annually_RB threw_VBD into_IN the_DT Tiber_NNP from_IN the_DT old_JJ
Sublician_JJ bridge_NN at_IN Rome_NNP ,_, had_VBD originally_RB the_DT same_JJ significance_NN ;_: that_IN

LI_VBZ ._. Homeopathic_NNP Magic_NNP of_IN a_DT Flesh_NNP Diet_NNP

THE_DT PRACTICE_NNP of_IN killing_VBG a_DT god_NN has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN traced_VBN amongst_IN peoples_NNS
who_WP have_VBP reached_VBN the_DT agricultural_JJ stage_NN of_IN society_NN ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN
that_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN other_JJ cultivated_JJ plants_NNS ,_, is_VBZ
commonly_RB represented_VBN either_CC in_IN human_JJ or_CC in_IN animal_JJ form_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN
some_DT places_NNS a_DT custom_NN has_VBZ prevailed_VBN of_IN killing_VBG annually_RB either_CC the_DT
human_NN or_CC the_DT animal_NN representative_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ._. One_CD reason_NN for_IN thus_RB
killing_VBG the_DT corn-spirit_NN in_IN the_DT person_NN of_IN his_PRP$ representative_NN has_VBZ been_VBN
given_VBN implicitly_RB in_IN an_DT earlier_JJR part_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN :_: we_PRP may_MD suppose_VB
that_IN the_DT intention_NN was_VBD to_TO guard_VB him_PRP or_CC her_PRP$ (_-LRB- for_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN is_VBZ
often_RB feminine_JJ )_-RRB- from_IN the_DT enfeeblement_NN of_IN old_JJ age_NN by_IN transferring_VBG the_DT
spirit_NN ,_, while_IN still_RB hale_JJ and_CC hearty_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT person_NN of_IN a_DT youthful_JJ and_CC
vigorous_JJ successor_NN ._. Apart_RB from_IN the_DT desirability_NN of_IN renewing_VBG his_PRP$
divine_JJ energies_NNS ,_, the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN may_MD have_VB been_VBN deemed_VBN
inevitable_JJ under_IN the_DT sickles_NNS or_CC the_DT knives_NNS of_IN the_DT reapers_NNS ,_, and_CC his_PRP$
worshippers_NNS may_MD accordingly_RB have_VB felt_VBN bound_VBN to_TO acquiesce_VB in_IN the_DT sad_JJ
necessity_NN ._. But_CC ,_, further_RB ,_, we_PRP have_VBP found_VBN a_DT widespread_JJ custom_NN of_IN eating_VBG
the_DT god_NN sacramentally_RB ,_, either_CC in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN or_CC animal_NN who_WP
represents_VBZ the_DT god_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN bread_NN made_VBN in_IN human_NN or_CC animal_NN
form_NN ._. The_DT reasons_NNS for_IN thus_RB partaking_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN are_VBP ,_,
from_IN the_DT primitive_JJ standpoint_NN ,_, simple_JJ enough_RB ._. The_DT savage_JJ commonly_RB
believes_VBZ that_IN by_IN eating_VBG the_DT flesh_NN of_IN an_DT animal_NN or_CC man_NN he_PRP acquires_VBZ
not_RB only_RB the_DT physical_JJ ,_, but_CC even_RB the_DT moral_JJ and_CC intellectual_JJ qualities_NNS
which_WDT were_VBD characteristic_JJ of_IN that_DT animal_NN or_CC man_NN ;_: so_RB when_WRB the_DT
creature_NN is_VBZ deemed_VBN divine_JJ ,_, our_PRP$ simple_JJ savage_JJ naturally_RB expects_VBZ to_TO
absorb_VB a_DT portion_NN of_IN its_PRP$ divinity_NN along_IN with_IN its_PRP$ material_NN substance_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB well_RB to_TO illustrate_VB by_IN instances_NNS this_DT common_JJ faith_NN in_IN the_DT
acquisition_NN of_IN virtues_NNS or_CC vices_NNS of_IN many_JJ kinds_NNS through_IN the_DT medium_NN of_IN
animal_NN food_NN ,_, even_RB when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ no_DT pretence_NN that_IN the_DT viands_NNS consist_VBP
of_IN the_DT body_NN or_CC blood_NN of_IN a_DT god_NN ._. The_DT doctrine_NN forms_VBZ part_NN of_IN the_DT widely_RB
ramified_JJ system_NN of_IN sympathetic_JJ or_CC homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN ._.

Thus_RB ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT Creeks_NNP ,_, Cherokee_NNP ,_, and_CC kindred_VBD tribes_NNS of_IN North_NNP
American_JJ Indians_NNPS "_`` believe_VB that_DT nature_NN is_VBZ possest_JJ of_IN such_JJ a_DT property_NN
as_IN to_TO transfuse_VB into_IN men_NNS and_CC animals_NNS the_DT qualities_NNS ,_, either_CC of_IN the_DT
food_NN they_PRP use_VBP ,_, or_CC of_IN those_DT objects_NNS that_WDT are_VBP presented_VBN to_TO their_PRP$
senses_NNS ;_: he_PRP who_WP feeds_VBZ on_IN venison_NN is_VBZ ,_, according_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ physical_JJ
system_NN ,_, swifter_RB and_CC more_RBR sagacious_JJ than_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP lives_VBZ on_IN the_DT
flesh_NN of_IN the_DT clumsy_JJ bear_NN ,_, or_CC helpless_JJ dunghill_NN fowls_VBZ ,_, the_DT
slow-footed_JJ tame_JJ cattle_NNS ,_, or_CC the_DT heavy_JJ wallowing_NN swine_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ the_DT
reason_NN that_IN several_JJ of_IN their_PRP$ old_JJ men_NNS recommend_VBP ,_, and_CC say_VB ,_, that_IN
formerly_RB their_PRP$ greatest_JJS chieftains_NNS observed_VBN a_DT constant_JJ rule_NN in_IN their_PRP$
diet_NN ,_, and_CC seldom_RB ate_VBD of_IN any_DT animal_NN of_IN a_DT gross_JJ quality_NN ,_, or_CC heavy_JJ
motion_NN of_IN body_NN ,_, fancying_VBG it_PRP conveyed_VBD a_DT dullness_NN through_IN the_DT whole_NN
system_NN ,_, and_CC disabled_JJ them_PRP from_IN exerting_VBG themselves_PRP with_IN proper_JJ
vigour_NN in_IN their_PRP$ martial_JJ ,_, civil_JJ ,_, and_CC religious_JJ duties_NNS ."_IN The_DT Zaparo_NN

animals_NNS who_WP supply_VBP the_DT flesh_NN ,_, impeding_VBG their_PRP$ agility_NN ,_, and_CC unfitting_VBG

While_IN many_JJ savages_NNS thus_RB fear_VBP to_TO eat_VB the_DT flesh_NN of_IN slow-footed_JJ animals_NNS
