of_IN an_DT enemy_NN they_PRP acquire_VB the_DT power_NN of_IN looking_VBG steadfastly_RB at_IN a_DT foe_NN ._.
Before_IN every_DT warlike_NN expedition_NN the_DT people_NNS of_IN Minahassa_NNP in_IN Celebes_NNP
used_VBN to_TO take_VB the_DT locks_NNS of_IN hair_NN of_IN a_DT slain_NN foe_NN and_CC dabble_VB them_PRP in_IN
boiling_VBG water_NN to_TO extract_VB the_DT courage_NN ;_: this_DT infusion_NN of_IN bravery_NN was_VBD
then_RB drunk_JJ by_IN the_DT warriors_NNS ._. In_IN New_NNP Zealand_NNP "_'' the_DT chief_NN was_VBD an_DT atua_NN
[_JJ god_NN ],_, but_CC there_EX were_VBD powerful_JJ and_CC powerless_JJ gods_NNS ;_: each_DT naturally_RB
sought_VBN to_TO make_VB himself_PRP one_CD of_IN the_DT former_JJ ;_: the_DT plan_NN therefore_RB adopted_VBN
was_VBD to_TO incorporate_VB the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN others_NNS with_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ;_: thus_RB ,_, when_WRB
a_DT warrior_NN slew_NN a_DT chief_NN ,_, he_PRP immediately_RB gouged_VBD out_RP his_PRP$ eyes_NNS and_CC
swallowed_VBD them_PRP ,_, the_DT atua_NN tonga_NN ,_, or_CC divinity_NN ,_, being_VBG supposed_VBN to_TO
reside_NN in_IN that_DT organ_NN ;_: thus_RB he_PRP not_RB only_RB killed_VBD the_DT body_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB
possessed_VBD himself_PRP of_IN the_DT soul_NN of_IN his_PRP$ enemy_NN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB the_DT
more_RBR chiefs_NNS he_PRP slew_NN the_DT greater_JJR did_VBD his_PRP$ divinity_NN become_VBN ."_.

It_PRP is_VBZ now_RB easy_JJ to_TO understand_VB why_WRB a_DT savage_JJ should_MD desire_VB to_TO partake_VB
of_IN the_DT flesh_NN of_IN an_DT animal_NN or_CC man_NN whom_WP he_PRP regards_VBZ as_RB divine_JJ ._. By_IN
eating_VBG the_DT body_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN he_PRP shares_VBZ in_IN the_DT god_NN '_'' s_PRP attributes_VBZ and_CC
powers_NNS ._. And_CC when_WRB the_DT god_NN is_VBZ a_DT corn-god_NN ,_, the_DT corn_NN is_VBZ his_PRP$ proper_JJ body_NN ;_:
when_WRB he_PRP is_VBZ a_DT vine-god_NN ,_, the_DT juice_NN of_IN the_DT grape_NN is_VBZ his_PRP$ blood_NN ;_: and_CC so_RB
by_IN eating_VBG the_DT bread_NN and_CC drinking_VBG the_DT wine_NN the_DT worshipper_JJR partakes_NNS of_IN
the_DT real_JJ body_NN and_CC blood_NN of_IN his_PRP$ god_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT drinking_NN of_IN wine_NN in_IN the_DT
rites_NNS of_IN a_DT vine-god_NN like_IN Dionysus_NNP is_VBZ not_RB an_DT act_NN of_IN revelry_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT
solemn_JJ sacrament_NN ._. Yet_RB a_DT time_NN comes_VBZ when_WRB reasonable_JJ men_NNS find_VBP it_PRP hard_RB
to_TO understand_VB how_WRB any_DT one_NN in_IN his_PRP$ senses_NNS can_MD suppose_VB that_IN by_IN eating_VBG
bread_NN or_CC drinking_NN wine_NN he_PRP consumes_VBZ the_DT body_NN or_CC blood_NN of_IN a_DT deity_NN ._.
"_`` When_WRB we_PRP call_VBP corn_NN Ceres_NNS and_CC wine_NN Bacchus_NN ,"_, says_VBZ Cicero_NNP ,_, "_`` we_PRP use_VBP a_DT
common_JJ figure_NN of_IN speech_NN ;_: but_CC do_VBP you_PRP imagine_VB that_IN anybody_NN is_VBZ so_RB
insane_JJ as_IN to_TO believe_VB that_IN the_DT thing_NN he_PRP feeds_VBZ upon_IN is_VBZ a_DT god_NN ?"_.



LII_NNP ._. Killing_NNP the_DT Divine_NNP Animal_NNP



1._CD Killing_NNP the_DT Sacred_NNP Buzzard_NNP

IN_IN THE_DT PRECEDING_NN chapters_NNS we_PRP saw_VBD that_IN many_JJ communities_NNS which_WDT have_VBP
progressed_VBD so_RB far_RB as_IN to_TO subsist_VB mainly_RB by_IN agriculture_NN have_VBP been_VBN in_IN
the_DT habit_NN of_IN killing_VBG and_CC eating_VBG their_PRP$ farinaceous_JJ deities_NNS either_RB in_IN
their_PRP$ proper_JJ form_NN of_IN corn_NN ,_, rice_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT borrowed_VBN
shapes_NNS of_IN animals_NNS and_CC men_NNS ._. It_PRP remains_VBZ to_TO show_VB that_IN hunting_NN and_CC
pastoral_JJ tribes_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN agricultural_JJ peoples_NNS ,_, have_VBP been_VBN in_IN the_DT
habit_NN of_IN killing_VBG the_DT beings_NNS whom_WP they_PRP worship_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT worshipful_JJ
beings_NNS or_CC gods_NNS ,_, if_IN indeed_RB they_PRP deserve_VBP to_TO be_VB dignified_VBN by_IN that_DT name_NN ,_,
whom_WP hunters_NNS and_CC shepherds_NNS adore_VB and_CC kill_VB are_VBP animals_NNS pure_JJ and_CC
simple_NN ,_, not_RB animals_NNS regarded_VBN as_IN embodiments_NNS of_IN other_JJ supernatural_JJ
beings_NNS ._. Our_PRP$ first_JJ example_NN is_VBZ drawn_VBN from_IN the_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN California_NNP ,_,
who_WP living_VBG in_IN a_DT fertile_JJ country_NN under_IN a_DT serene_JJ and_CC temperate_JJ sky_NN ,_,
nevertheless_RB rank_NN near_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN the_DT savage_JJ scale_NN ._. The_DT
Acagchemem_NNP tribe_NN adored_VBD the_DT great_JJ buzzard_NN ,_, and_CC once_RB a_DT year_NN they_PRP
celebrated_VBN a_DT great_JJ festival_NN called_VBN Panes_NNP or_CC bird-feast_NN in_IN its_PRP$
honour_NN ._. The_DT day_NN selected_VBD for_IN the_DT festival_NN was_VBD made_VBN known_VBN to_TO the_DT
public_NN on_IN the_DT evening_NN before_IN its_PRP$ celebration_NN and_CC preparations_NNS were_VBD
at_IN once_RB made_VBN for_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN a_DT special_JJ temple_NN (_-LRB- vanquech_NN ),_NN
which_WDT seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN a_DT circular_JJ or_CC oval_JJ enclosure_NN of_IN stakes_NNS with_IN
the_DT stuffed_JJ skin_NN of_IN a_DT coyote_NN or_CC prairie-wolf_NN set_VBN up_RP on_IN a_DT hurdle_NN to_TO
represent_VB the_DT god_NN Chinigchinich_NNP ._. When_WRB the_DT temple_NN was_VBD ready_JJ ,_, the_DT bird_NN
was_VBD carried_VBN into_IN it_PRP in_IN solemn_JJ procession_NN and_CC laid_VBD on_IN an_DT altar_NN
erected_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._. Then_RB all_PDT the_DT young_JJ women_NNS ,_, whether_IN married_VBN
or_CC single_JJ ,_, began_VBD to_TO run_VB to_TO and_CC fro_RB ,_, as_IN if_IN distracted_VBN ,_, some_DT in_IN one_CD
direction_NN and_CC some_DT in_IN another_DT ,_, while_IN the_DT elders_NNS of_IN both_DT sexes_NNS
remained_VBD silent_JJ spectators_NNS of_IN the_DT scene_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT captains_NNS ,_, tricked_VBN
out_IN in_IN paint_NN and_CC feathers_NNS ,_, danced_VBD round_IN their_PRP$ adored_JJ bird_NN ._. These_DT
ceremonies_NNS being_VBG concluded_VBN ,_, they_PRP seized_VBD upon_IN the_DT bird_NN and_CC carried_VBD it_PRP
to_TO the_DT principal_JJ temple_NN ,_, all_DT the_DT assembly_NN uniting_NN in_IN the_DT grand_JJ
display_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT captains_NNS dancing_VBG and_CC singing_VBG at_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT
procession_NN ._. Arrived_VBN at_IN the_DT temple_NN ,_, they_PRP killed_VBD the_DT bird_NN without_IN
losing_VBG a_DT drop_NN of_IN its_PRP$ blood_NN ._. The_DT skin_NN was_VBD removed_JJ entire_NN and_CC
preserved_VBN with_IN the_DT feathers_NNS as_IN a_DT relic_NN or_CC for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN making_VBG
the_DT festal_JJ garment_NN or_CC paelt_NN ._. The_DT carcase_NN was_VBD buried_VBN in_IN a_DT hole_NN in_IN
the_DT temple_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT old_JJ women_NNS gathered_VBD round_IN the_DT grave_JJ weeping_NN and_CC
moaning_VBG bitterly_RB ,_, while_IN they_PRP threw_VBD various_JJ kinds_NNS of_IN seeds_NNS or_CC pieces_NNS
of_IN food_NN on_IN it_PRP ,_, crying_VBG out_RP ,_, "_`` Why_WRB did_VBD you_PRP run_VB away_RB ?_. Would_MD you_PRP not_RB have_VB
been_VBN better_JJR with_IN us_PRP ?_. you_PRP would_MD have_VB made_VBN pinole_NN (_-LRB- a_DT kind_NN of_IN gruel_JJ )_-RRB-
as_IN we_PRP do_VBP ,_, and_CC if_IN you_PRP had_VBD not_RB run_VBN away_RB ,_, you_PRP would_MD not_RB have_VB become_VBN a_DT
Panes_NNS ,_, "_'' and_CC so_RB on_IN ._. When_WRB this_DT ceremony_NN was_VBD concluded_VBN ,_, the_DT dancing_NN
was_VBD resumed_VBN and_CC kept_VBN up_RP for_IN three_CD days_NNS and_CC nights_NNS ._. They_PRP said_VBD that_IN
the_DT Panes_NNP was_VBD a_DT woman_NN who_WP had_VBD run_VBN off_RP to_TO the_DT mountains_NNS and_CC there_EX
been_VBN changed_VBN into_IN a_DT bird_NN by_IN the_DT god_NN Chinigchinich_NNP ._. They_PRP believed_VBD
that_IN though_IN they_PRP sacrificed_VBD the_DT bird_NN annually_RB ,_, she_PRP came_VBD to_TO life_NN
again_RB and_CC returned_VBD to_TO her_PRP$ home_NN in_IN the_DT mountains_NNS ._. Moreover_RB ,_, they_PRP
thought_VBD that_DT "_`` as_RB often_RB as_IN the_DT bird_NN was_VBD killed_VBN ,_, it_PRP became_VBD multiplied_JJ ;_:
because_IN every_DT year_NN all_DT the_DT different_JJ Capitanes_NNS celebrated_VBD the_DT same_JJ
feast_NN of_IN Panes_NNP ,_, and_CC were_VBD firm_JJ in_IN the_DT opinion_NN that_IN the_DT birds_NNS
sacrificed_VBN were_VBD but_CC one_CD and_CC the_DT same_JJ female_NN ."_.

The_DT unity_NN in_IN multiplicity_NN thus_RB postulated_VBN by_IN the_DT Californians_NNPS is_VBZ
very_RB noticeable_JJ and_CC helps_VBZ to_TO explain_VB their_PRP$ motive_NN for_IN killing_VBG the_DT
divine_JJ bird_NN ._. The_DT notion_NN of_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN a_DT species_NN as_IN distinct_JJ from_IN
that_IN of_IN an_DT individual_JJ ,_, easy_JJ and_CC obvious_JJ as_IN it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO us_PRP ,_, appears_NNS
to_TO be_VB one_CD which_WDT the_DT Californian_JJ savage_JJ cannot_NN grasp_VBP ._. He_PRP is_VBZ unable_JJ to_TO
conceive_VB the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT species_NNS otherwise_RB than_IN as_IN an_DT individual_NN
life_NN ,_, and_CC therefore_RB as_IN exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT same_JJ dangers_NNS and_CC calamities_NNS
which_WDT menace_NN and_CC finally_RB destroy_VB the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT individual_NN ._.
Apparently_RB he_PRP imagines_VBZ that_IN a_DT species_NN left_VBD to_TO itself_PRP will_MD grow_VB old_JJ
and_CC die_VBP like_IN an_DT individual_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN therefore_RB some_DT step_NN must_MD be_VB
taken_VBN to_TO save_VB from_IN extinction_NN the_DT particular_JJ species_NNS which_WDT he_PRP
regards_NNS as_RB divine_JJ ._. The_DT only_RB means_VBZ he_PRP can_MD think_VB of_IN to_TO avert_VB the_DT
catastrophe_NN is_VBZ to_TO kill_VB a_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT species_NNS in_IN whose_WP$ veins_NNS the_DT
tide_NN of_IN life_NN is_VBZ still_RB running_VBG strong_JJ and_CC has_VBZ not_RB yet_RB stagnated_VBN among_IN
the_DT fens_NNS of_IN old_JJ age_NN ._. The_DT life_NN thus_RB diverted_VBN from_IN one_CD channel_NN will_MD
flow_NN ,_, he_PRP fancies_VBZ ,_, more_RBR freshly_RB and_CC freely_RB in_IN a_DT new_JJ one_CD ;_: in_IN other_JJ
words_NNS ,_, the_DT slain_JJ animal_NN will_MD revive_VB and_CC enter_VB on_IN a_DT new_JJ term_NN of_IN life_NN
with_IN all_PDT the_DT spring_NN and_CC energy_NN of_IN youth_NN ._. To_TO us_PRP this_DT reasoning_NN is_VBZ
transparently_RB absurd_JJ ,_, but_CC so_RB too_RB is_VBZ the_DT custom_NN ._. A_DT similar_JJ confusion_NN ,_,
it_PRP may_MD be_VB noted_VBN ,_, between_IN the_DT individual_JJ life_NN and_CC the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT
species_NNS was_VBD made_VBN by_IN the_DT Samoans_NNS ._. Each_DT family_NN had_VBD for_IN its_PRP$ god_NN a_DT
particular_JJ species_NNS of_IN animal_NN ;_: yet_CC the_DT death_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT animals_NNS ,_,
for_IN example_NN an_DT owl_NN ,_, was_VBD not_RB the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ,_, "_'' he_PRP was_VBD supposed_VBN
to_TO be_VB yet_RB alive_JJ ,_, and_CC incarnate_JJ in_IN all_PDT the_DT owls_NNS in_IN existence_NN ."_.



2._CD Killing_NNP the_DT Sacred_NNP Ram_NNP

THE_DT RUDE_NNP Californian_NNP rite_NN which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP just_RB considered_VBN has_VBZ a_DT close_NN
parallel_RB in_IN the_DT religion_NN of_IN ancient_JJ Egypt_NNP ._. The_DT Thebans_NNPS and_CC all_DT other_JJ
Egyptians_NNS who_WP worshipped_VBD the_DT Theban_NNP god_NN Ammon_NNP held_VBD rams_NNS to_TO be_VB
sacred_JJ ,_, and_CC would_MD not_RB sacrifice_VB them_PRP ._. But_CC once_RB a_DT year_NN at_IN the_DT
festival_NN of_IN Ammon_JJ they_PRP killed_VBD a_DT ram_NN ,_, skinned_VBD it_PRP ,_, and_CC clothed_VBD the_DT
image_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN in_IN the_DT skin_NN ._. Then_RB they_PRP mourned_VBD over_IN the_DT ram_NN and_CC
buried_VBN it_PRP in_IN a_DT sacred_JJ tomb_NN ._. The_DT custom_NN was_VBD explained_VBN by_IN a_DT story_NN that_WDT
Zeus_NNP had_VBD once_RB exhibited_VBN himself_PRP to_TO Hercules_NNP clad_VBN in_IN the_DT fleece_NN and_CC
wearing_VBG the_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT ram_NN ._. Of_IN course_NN the_DT ram_NN in_IN this_DT case_NN was_VBD simply_RB
the_DT beast-god_NN of_IN Thebes_NNP ,_, as_IN the_DT wolf_NN was_VBD the_DT beast-god_NN of_IN Lycopolis_NNP ,_,
and_CC the_DT goat_NN was_VBD the_DT beast-god_NN of_IN Mendes_NNP ._. In_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, the_DT ram_NN
was_VBD Ammon_NNP himself_PRP ._. On_IN the_DT monuments_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ ,_, Ammon_JJ appears_NNS in_IN
semi-human_JJ form_NN with_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN and_CC the_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT ram_NN ._. But_CC
this_DT only_RB shows_VBZ that_IN he_PRP was_VBD in_IN the_DT usual_JJ chrysalis_NN state_NN through_IN
which_WDT beast-gods_NNS regularly_RB pass_VBP before_IN they_PRP emerge_VBP as_IN full-blown_JJ
anthropomorphic_JJ gods_NNS ._. The_DT ram_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, was_VBD killed_VBN ,_, not_RB as_IN a_DT
sacrifice_NN to_TO Ammon_NNP ,_, but_CC as_IN the_DT god_NN himself_PRP ,_, whose_WP$ identity_NN with_IN the_DT
beast_NN is_VBZ plainly_RB shown_VBN by_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN clothing_NN his_PRP$ image_NN in_IN the_DT
skin_NN of_IN the_DT slain_NN ram_NN ._. The_DT reason_NN for_IN thus_RB killing_VBG the_DT ram-god_NN
annually_RB may_MD have_VB been_VBN that_IN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP assigned_VBN for_IN the_DT general_JJ
custom_NN of_IN killing_VBG a_DT god_NN and_CC for_IN the_DT special_JJ Californian_JJ custom_NN of_IN
killing_VBG the_DT divine_JJ buzzard_NN ._. As_IN applied_VBN to_TO Egypt_NNP ,_, this_DT explanation_NN is_VBZ
supported_VBN by_IN the_DT analogy_NN of_IN the_DT bull-god_NN Apis_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD not_RB suffered_VBN
to_TO outlive_VB a_DT certain_JJ term_NN of_IN years_NNS ._. The_DT intention_NN of_IN thus_RB putting_VBG a_DT
limit_NN to_TO the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT human_JJ god_NN was_VBD ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP argued_VBN ,_, to_TO secure_VB
him_PRP from_IN the_DT weakness_NN and_CC frailty_JJ of_IN age_NN ._. The_DT same_JJ reasoning_NN would_MD
explain_VB the_DT custom_NN --_: probably_RB an_DT older_JJR one_CD --_: of_IN putting_VBG the_DT beast-god_NN
to_TO death_NN annually_RB ,_, as_RB was_VBD done_VBN with_IN the_DT ram_NN of_IN Thebes_NNP ._.

One_CD point_NN in_IN the_DT Theban_NNP ritual_NN --_: the_DT application_NN of_IN the_DT skin_NN to_TO the_DT
image_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN --_: deserves_VBZ particular_JJ attention_NN ._. If_IN the_DT god_NN was_VBD at_IN
first_RB the_DT living_NN ram_NN ,_, his_PRP$ representation_NN by_IN an_DT image_NN must_MD have_VB
originated_VBN later_RB ._. But_CC how_WRB did_VBD it_PRP originate_VB ?_. One_CD answer_NN to_TO this_DT
question_NN is_VBZ perhaps_RB furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN preserving_VBG the_DT skin_NN
of_IN the_DT animal_NN which_WDT is_VBZ slain_JJ as_IN divine_JJ ._. The_DT Californians_NNPS ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP
seen_VBN ,_, preserved_VBD the_DT skin_NN of_IN the_DT buzzard_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT skin_NN of_IN the_DT goat_NN ,_,
which_WDT is_VBZ killed_VBN on_IN the_DT harvest-field_NN as_IN a_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT
corn-spirit_NN ,_, is_VBZ kept_VBN for_IN various_JJ superstitious_JJ purposes_NNS ._. The_DT skin_NN in_IN
fact_NN was_VBD kept_VBN as_IN a_DT token_JJ or_CC memorial_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ,_, or_CC rather_RB as_IN
containing_VBG in_IN it_PRP a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ life_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP had_VBD only_RB to_TO be_VB
stuffed_VBN or_CC stretched_VBN upon_IN a_DT frame_NN to_TO become_VB a_DT regular_JJ image_NN of_IN him_PRP ._.
At_IN first_RB an_DT image_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN would_MD be_VB renewed_VBN annually_RB ,_, the_DT new_JJ
image_NN being_VBG provided_VBN by_IN the_DT skin_NN of_IN the_DT slain_JJ animal_NN ._. But_CC from_IN
annual_JJ images_NNS to_TO permanent_JJ images_NNS the_DT transition_NN is_VBZ easy_JJ ._. We_PRP have_VBP
seen_VBN that_IN the_DT older_JJR custom_NN of_IN cutting_VBG a_DT new_JJ May-tree_NNP every_DT year_NN was_VBD
superseded_VBN by_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN maintaining_VBG a_DT permanent_JJ May-pole_NNP ,_,
which_WDT was_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, annually_RB decked_VBN with_IN fresh_JJ leaves_NNS and_CC flowers_NNS ,_,
and_CC even_RB surmounted_VBN each_DT year_NN by_IN a_DT fresh_JJ young_JJ tree_NN ._. Similarly_RB when_WRB
the_DT stuffed_JJ skin_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ,_, was_VBD replaced_VBN by_IN a_DT
permanent_JJ image_NN of_IN him_PRP in_IN wood_NN ,_, stone_NN ,_, or_CC metal_NN ,_, the_DT permanent_JJ image_NN
was_VBD annually_RB clad_VBN in_IN the_DT fresh_JJ skin_NN of_IN the_DT slain_JJ animal_NN ._. When_WRB this_DT
stage_NN had_VBD been_VBN reached_VBN ,_, the_DT custom_NN of_IN killing_VBG the_DT ram_NN came_VBD naturally_RB
to_TO be_VB interpreted_VBN as_IN a_DT sacrifice_NN offered_VBN to_TO the_DT image_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD
explained_VBN by_IN a_DT story_NN like_IN that_DT of_IN Ammon_NNP and_CC Hercules_NNP ._.



3._CD Killing_NNP the_DT Sacred_NNP Serpent_NNP

WEST_NNP AFRICA_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO furnish_VB another_DT example_NN of_IN the_DT annual_JJ killing_NN
of_IN a_DT sacred_JJ animal_NN and_CC the_DT preservation_NN of_IN its_PRP$ skin_NN ._. The_DT negroes_NNS of_IN
Issapoo_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Fernando_NNP Po_NNP ,_, regard_NN the_DT cobra-capella_NN as_IN
their_PRP$ guardian_NN deity_NN ,_, who_WP can_MD do_VB them_PRP good_JJ or_CC ill_JJ ,_, bestow_RB riches_NNS or_CC
inflict_VB disease_NN and_CC death_NN ._. The_DT skin_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT reptiles_NNS is_VBZ hung_VBN
tail_NN downwards_RB from_IN a_DT branch_NN of_IN the_DT highest_JJS tree_NN in_IN the_DT public_NN
square_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT placing_NN of_IN it_PRP on_IN the_DT tree_NN is_VBZ an_DT annual_JJ ceremony_NN ._. As_IN
soon_RB as_IN the_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ over_RB ,_, all_DT children_NNS born_VBN within_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN
are_VBP carried_VBN out_RP and_CC their_PRP$ hands_NNS made_VBD to_TO touch_VB the_DT tail_NN of_IN the_DT
serpent_NN '_POS s_PRP skin_NN ._. The_DT latter_JJ custom_NN is_VBZ clearly_RB a_DT way_NN of_IN placing_VBG the_DT
infants_NNS under_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN the_DT tribal_JJ god_NN ._. Similarly_RB in_IN
Senegambia_NNP a_DT python_NN is_VBZ expected_VBN to_TO visit_VB every_DT child_NN of_IN the_DT Python_NN
clan_NN within_IN eight_CD days_NNS after_IN birth_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT Psylli_NNP ,_, a_DT Snake_NNP clan_NN of_IN
ancient_JJ Africa_NNP ,_, used_VBN to_TO expose_VB their_PRP$ infants_NNS to_TO snakes_NNS in_IN the_DT belief_NN
that_IN the_DT snakes_NNS would_MD not_RB harm_VB true-born_JJ children_NNS of_IN the_DT clan_NN ._.



4._CD Killing_NNP the_DT Sacred_NNP Turtles_NNPS

IN_IN THE_DT CALIFORNIAN_NNP ,_, Egyptian_NNP ,_, and_CC Fernando_NNP Po_NNP customs_NNS the_DT worship_NN of_IN
the_DT animal_NN seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB no_DT relation_NN to_TO agriculture_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD
therefore_RB be_VB presumed_VBN to_TO date_NN from_IN the_DT hunting_NN or_CC pastoral_JJ stage_NN of_IN
society_NN ._. The_DT same_JJ may_MD be_VB said_VBN of_IN the_DT following_VBG custom_NN ,_, though_IN the_DT
Zuni_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN New_NNP Mexico_NNP ,_, who_WP practise_VBP it_PRP ,_, are_VBP now_RB settled_VBN in_IN
walled_VBN villages_NNS or_CC towns_NNS of_IN a_DT peculiar_JJ type_NN ,_, and_CC practise_NN
agriculture_NN and_CC the_DT arts_NNS of_IN pottery_NN and_CC weaving_NN ._. But_CC the_DT Zuni_NNP custom_NN
is_VBZ marked_VBN by_IN certain_JJ features_NNS which_WDT appear_VBP to_TO place_VB it_PRP in_IN a_DT somewhat_RB
different_JJ class_NN from_IN the_DT preceding_VBG cases_NNS ._. It_PRP may_MD be_VB well_RB therefore_RB

"_`` With_IN midsummer_NN the_DT heat_NN became_VBD intense_JJ ._. My_PRP$ brother_NN [_RB i_VBZ ._. e_NN ._. adopted_VBN
Indian_JJ brother_NN ]_, and_CC I_PRP sat_VBD ,_, day_NN after_IN day_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT cool_JJ under-rooms_NNS of_IN

"_`` Four_CD days_NNS after_IN ,_, towards_IN sunset_NN ,_, costumed_VBN and_CC masked_VBN in_IN the_DT

"_`` our_PRP$ lost_VBN others_NNS ."'"_.

In_IN this_DT custom_NN we_PRP find_VBP expressed_VBN in_IN the_DT clearest_NN way_NN a_DT belief_NN in_IN the_DT
transmigration_NN of_IN human_JJ souls_NNS into_IN the_DT bodies_NNS of_IN turtles_NNS ._. The_DT theory_NN

same_JJ race_NN as_IN the_DT Zunis_NNP ._. The_DT Moquis_NNP are_VBP divided_VBN into_IN totem_NN clans_NNS --_: the_DT

that_IN the_DT ancestors_NNS of_IN the_DT clans_NNS were_VBD bears_NNS ,_, deer_NNS ,_, wolves_NNS ,_, hares_NNS ,_, and_CC

probably_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT regular_JJ articles_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ totem_NN faith_NN ._. What_WDT then_RB
is_VBZ the_DT meaning_NN of_IN killing_VBG a_DT turtle_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT soul_NN of_IN a_DT kinsman_NN is_VBZ
believed_VBN to_TO be_VB present_JJ ?_. Apparently_RB the_DT object_NN is_VBZ to_TO keep_VB up_RP a_DT

departed_VBN are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO be_VB assembled_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN turtles_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ

spirit-land_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT general_JJ explanation_NN given_VBN above_IN of_IN the_DT custom_NN

ceremony_NN forms_NNS part_NN of_IN the_DT elaborate_JJ ritual_NN which_WDT these_DT Indians_NNPS
observe_VB at_IN the_DT midsummer_NN solstice_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN ensuring_VBG an_DT

Kothluwalawa_NNP ,_, to_TO which_WDT the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_NN are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO repair_VB ._.

"_`` otherselves_NNS "_'' of_IN the_DT Zuni_NNP ;_: indeed_RB ,_, what_WP else_RB should_MD they_PRP be_VB than_IN the_DT

5._CD Killing_NNP the_DT Sacred_NNP Bear_NNP

DOUBT_VB also_RB hangs_VBZ at_IN first_JJ sight_NN over_IN the_DT meaning_NN of_IN the_DT

are_VBP found_VBN in_IN the_DT Japanese_JJ island_NN of_IN Yezo_NNP or_CC Yesso_RB ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN

chief_NN divinity_NN ";_, "_'' in_IN the_DT religion_NN of_IN the_DT Aino_NNP the_DT bear_NN plays_VBZ a_DT chief_NN

"_`` there_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN this_DT wild_JJ beast_NN inspires_VBZ more_JJR of_IN the_DT feeling_NN

a_DT person_NN could_MD possibly_RB spend_VB his_PRP$ time_NN ";_, "_`` the_DT men_NNS spend_VBP the_DT autumn_NN ,_,

bear_NN '_POS s_VBZ flesh_NN is_VBZ indeed_RB one_CD of_IN their_PRP$ staple_NN foods_NNS ;_: they_PRP eat_VBP it_PRP both_CC
fresh_JJ and_CC salted_JJ ;_: and_CC the_DT skins_NNS of_IN bears_NNS furnish_VBP them_PRP with_IN clothing_NN ._.

bear_NN whenever_WRB they_PRP can_MD ,_, "_'' in_IN the_DT process_NN of_IN dissecting_VBG the_DT carcass_NN
they_PRP endeavor_VBP to_TO conciliate_VB the_DT deity_NN ,_, whose_WP$ representative_NN they_PRP
have_VBP slain_NN ,_, by_IN making_VBG elaborate_JJ obeisances_NNS and_CC deprecatory_NN
salutations_NNS ";_, "_'' when_WRB a_DT bear_NN has_VBZ been_VBN killed_VBN the_DT Ainu_NNP sit_VB down_RB and_CC
admire_NN it_PRP ,_, make_VB their_PRP$ salaams_NNS to_TO it_PRP ,_, worship_NN it_PRP ,_, and_CC offer_NN presents_NNS
of_IN inao_JJ ";_NN "_'' when_WRB a_DT bear_NN is_VBZ trapped_VBN or_CC wounded_VBN by_IN an_DT arrow_NN ,_, the_DT
hunters_NNS go_VBP through_IN an_DT apologetic_JJ or_CC propitiatory_JJ ceremony_NN ."_IN The_DT
skulls_NNS of_IN slain_NN bears_NNS receive_VBP a_DT place_NN of_IN honour_NN in_IN their_PRP$ huts_NNS ,_, or_CC

intoxicating_VBG liquor_NN ,_, are_VBP offered_VBN to_TO them_PRP ;_: and_CC they_PRP are_VBP addressed_VBN as_IN
"_`` divine_JJ preservers_NNS "_'' or_CC "_`` precious_JJ divinities_NNS ."_IN The_DT skulls_NNS of_IN foxes_NNS
are_VBP also_RB fastened_VBN to_TO the_DT sacred_JJ posts_NNS outside_IN the_DT huts_NNS ;_: they_PRP are_VBP

oracles_NNS ._. Yet_CC it_PRP is_VBZ expressly_RB said_VBD ,_, "_`` The_DT live_JJ fox_NN is_VBZ revered_VBN just_RB as_IN
little_JJ as_IN the_DT bear_NN ;_: rather_RB they_PRP avoid_VBP it_PRP as_RB much_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_,
considering_VBG it_PRP a_DT wily_JJ animal_NN ."_NNS The_DT bear_NN can_MD hardly_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, be_VB
described_VBN as_IN a_DT sacred_JJ animal_NN of_IN the_DT Aino_NNP ,_, nor_CC yet_RB as_IN a_DT totem_NN ;_: for_IN
they_PRP do_VBP not_RB call_VB themselves_PRP bears_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP kill_VBP and_CC eat_VBP the_DT animal_NN
freely_RB ._. However_RB ,_, they_PRP have_VBP a_DT legend_NN of_IN a_DT woman_NN who_WP had_VBD a_DT son_NN by_IN a_DT
bear_NN ;_: and_CC many_JJ of_IN them_PRP who_WP dwell_VBP in_IN the_DT mountains_NNS pride_NN themselves_PRP
on_IN being_VBG descended_VBN from_IN a_DT bear_NN ._. Such_JJ people_NNS are_VBP called_VBN "_'' Descendants_NNS
of_IN the_DT bear_NN "_'' (_-LRB- Kimun_NNP Kamui_NNP sanikiri_NN ),_, and_CC in_IN the_DT pride_NN of_IN their_PRP$
heart_NN they_PRP will_MD say_VB ,_, "_`` As_IN for_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP am_VBP a_DT child_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN of_IN the_DT

bear_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ therefore_RB possible_JJ that_IN ,_, as_IN our_PRP$ principal_JJ authority_NN ,_, the_DT
Rev_NNP ._. J_NNP ._. Batchelor_NNP ,_, believes_VBZ ,_, the_DT bear_NN may_MD have_VB been_VBN the_DT totem_NN of_IN an_DT
Aino_NNP clan_NN ;_: but_CC even_RB if_IN that_WDT were_VBD so_IN it_PRP would_MD not_RB explain_VB the_DT respect_NN
shown_VBN for_IN the_DT animal_NN by_IN the_DT whole_JJ Aino_NNP people_NNS ._.

But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT bear-festival_NN of_IN the_DT Aino_NNP which_WDT concerns_VBZ us_PRP here_RB ._.
Towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN winter_NN a_DT bear_NN cub_NN is_VBZ caught_VBN and_CC brought_VBN into_IN the_DT
village_NN ._. If_IN it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB small_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ suckled_VBN by_IN an_DT Aino_NNP woman_NN ,_, but_CC
should_MD there_EX be_VB no_DT woman_NN able_JJ to_TO suckle_VB it_PRP ,_, the_DT little_JJ animal_NN is_VBZ fed_VBN

with_IN the_DT children_NNS and_CC is_VBZ treated_VBN with_IN great_JJ affection_NN ._. But_CC when_WRB the_DT
cub_NN grows_VBZ big_JJ enough_RB to_TO pain_NN people_NNS by_IN hugging_VBG or_CC scratching_VBG them_PRP ,_,
he_PRP is_VBZ shut_VBN up_RP in_IN a_DT strong_JJ wooden_JJ cage_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP stays_VBZ generally_RB for_IN

higher_JJR being_VBG ."_RP In_IN Yezo_NNP the_DT festival_NN is_VBZ generally_RB celebrated_VBN in_IN

Come_VB ."_RB When_WRB all_PDT the_DT people_NNS are_VBP assembled_VBN in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT cage_NN ,_, an_DT

"_`` divine_JJ preservers_NNS "_'' and_CC "_`` precious_JJ divinities_NNS ."_.

The_DT ceremony_NN of_IN killing_VBG the_DT bear_NN was_VBD witnessed_VBN by_IN Dr_NNP ._. B_NNP ._. Scheube_NNP on_IN
the_DT tenth_NN of_IN August_NNP at_IN Kunnui_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT village_NN on_IN Volcano_NNP Bay_NNP in_IN
the_DT island_NN of_IN Yezo_NNP or_CC Yesso_NNP ._. As_IN his_PRP$ description_NN of_IN the_DT rite_NN contains_VBZ
some_DT interesting_JJ particulars_NNS not_RB mentioned_VBN in_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ account_NN ,_,
it_PRP may_MD be_VB worth_JJ while_IN to_TO summarize_VB it_PRP ._.

On_IN entering_VBG the_DT hut_NN he_PRP found_VBD about_IN thirty_CD Aino_NNP present_NN ,_, men_NNS ,_, women_NNS ,_,
and_CC children_NNS ,_, all_DT dressed_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ best_JJS ._. The_DT master_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN

and_CC the_DT guests_NNS followed_VBD his_PRP$ example_NN ._. Then_RB a_DT libation_NN was_VBD offered_VBN to_TO
the_DT house-god_NN in_IN his_PRP$ sacred_JJ corner_NN of_IN the_DT hut_NN ._. Meanwhile_RB the_DT

bursting_VBG now_RB and_CC then_RB into_IN tears_NNS ._. Her_PRP$ grief_NN was_VBD obviously_RB

bear_NN began_VBD to_TO rush_VB about_IN his_PRP$ cage_NN and_CC howl_NN lamentably_RB ._. Next_JJ
libations_NNS were_VBD offered_VBN at_IN the_DT inao_FW (_-LRB- inabos_NN )_-RRB- or_CC sacred_JJ wands_NNS
which_WDT stand_VBP outside_IN of_IN an_DT Aino_NNP hut_NN ._. These_DT wands_NNS are_VBP about_IN a_DT couple_NN

leaves_NNS mean_VBP that_IN the_DT animal_NN may_MD come_VB to_TO life_NN again_RB ._. Then_RB the_DT bear_NN
was_VBD let_VB out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ cage_NN ,_, a_DT rope_NN was_VBD thrown_VBN round_IN his_PRP$ neck_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP
was_VBD led_VBN about_IN in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN the_DT hut_NN ._. While_IN this_DT was_VBD being_VBG

five_CD minutes_NNS the_DT animal_NN had_VBD expired_VBN without_IN uttering_VBG a_DT sound_NN ._.

they_PRP danced_VBD ,_, lamenting_VBG ,_, and_CC beating_VBG the_DT men_NNS who_WP were_VBD killing_VBG the_DT

The_DT men_NNS now_RB sat_VBD down_RP on_IN mats_NNS before_IN the_DT dead_JJ bear_NN ,_, offered_VBN libations_NNS

disembowelled_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT trunk_NN severed_VBN from_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT the_DT

vitals_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN into_IN the_DT house_NN to_TO be_VB kept_VBN till_IN the_DT next_JJ day_NN but_CC
one_CD ,_, and_CC then_RB to_TO be_VB divided_VBN among_IN the_DT persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN present_JJ

bear_NN was_VBD being_VBG disembowelled_VBD ,_, the_DT women_NNS and_CC girls_NNS danced_VBD the_DT same_JJ

the_DT cage_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ wands_NNS ._. At_IN this_DT dance_NN the_DT old_JJ
women_NNS ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN merry_JJ a_DT moment_NN before_RB ,_, again_RB shed_VBD tears_NNS freely_RB ._.

been_VBN gagged_VBN was_VBD also_RB fastened_VBN to_TO the_DT pole_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB were_VBD the_DT sword_NN and_CC
quiver_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN hung_VBN on_IN the_DT carcase_NN ._. The_DT latter_NN were_VBD removed_VBN
in_IN about_IN an_DT hour_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT rest_NN remained_VBD standing_VBG ._. The_DT whole_JJ company_NN ,_,
men_NNS and_CC women_NNS ,_, danced_VBD noisily_RB before_IN the_DT pole_NN ;_: and_CC another_DT
drinking-bout_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT women_NNS joined_VBD ,_, closed_VBD the_DT festival_NN ._.

Perhaps_RB the_DT first_JJ published_JJ account_NN of_IN the_DT bear-feast_NN of_IN the_DT Aino_NNP is_VBZ
one_CD which_WDT was_VBD given_VBN to_TO the_DT world_NN by_IN a_DT Japanese_JJ writer_NN in_IN 1652._DT It_PRP
has_VBZ been_VBN translated_VBN into_IN French_JJ and_CC runs_VBZ thus_RB :_: "_`` When_WRB they_PRP find_VBP a_DT
young_JJ bear_NN ,_, they_PRP bring_VBP it_PRP home_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT wife_NN suckles_VBZ it_PRP ._. When_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ
grown_VBN they_PRP feed_VB it_PRP with_IN fish_NN and_CC fowl_NN and_CC kill_VB it_PRP in_IN winter_NN for_IN the_DT
sake_NN of_IN the_DT liver_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP esteem_VBP an_DT antidote_NN to_TO poison_NN ,_, the_DT
worms_NNS ,_, colic_JJ ,_, and_CC disorders_NNS of_IN the_DT stomach_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ of_IN a_DT very_RB bitter_JJ
taste_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ good_JJ for_IN nothing_NN if_IN the_DT bear_NN has_VBZ been_VBN killed_VBN in_IN
summer_NN ._. This_DT butchery_NN begins_VBZ in_IN the_DT first_JJ Japanese_JJ month_NN ._. For_IN this_DT
purpose_NN they_PRP put_VBD the_DT animal_NN '_POS s_PRP head_NN between_IN two_CD long_JJ poles_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP
squeezed_VBN together_RB by_IN fifty_CD or_CC sixty_CD people_NNS ,_, both_DT men_NNS and_CC women_NNS ._. When_WRB
the_DT bear_NN is_VBZ dead_JJ they_PRP eat_VB his_PRP$ flesh_NN ,_, keep_VB the_DT liver_NN as_IN a_DT medicine_NN ,_,

make_VB little_JJ cakes_NNS to_TO regale_VB those_DT who_WP helped_VBD them_PRP ."_.

The_DT Aino_NNP of_IN Saghalien_NNP rear_JJ bear_NN cubs_NNS and_CC kill_VB them_PRP with_IN similar_JJ
ceremonies_NNS ._. We_PRP are_VBP told_VBN that_IN they_PRP do_VBP not_RB look_VB upon_IN the_DT bear_NN as_IN a_DT god_NN
but_CC only_RB as_IN a_DT messenger_NN whom_WP they_PRP despatch_VBP with_IN various_JJ commissions_NNS
to_TO the_DT god_NN of_IN the_DT forest_NN ._. The_DT animal_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN for_IN about_IN two_CD years_NNS in_IN
a_DT cage_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB killed_VBD at_IN a_DT festival_NN ,_, which_WDT always_RB takes_VBZ place_NN in_IN

comfortable_JJ ._. "_'' Now_RB ,"_, he_PRP proceeds_VBZ ,_, "_`` we_PRP are_VBP holding_VBG a_DT great_JJ festival_NN in_IN
your_PRP$ honour_NN ._. Be_VB not_RB afraid_JJ ._. We_PRP will_MD not_RB hurt_VB you_PRP ._. We_PRP will_MD only_RB kill_VB

forget_VB you_PRP ."_VB When_WRB the_DT bear_NN has_VBZ partaken_VBN of_IN his_PRP$ last_JJ meal_NN amid_IN the_DT

The_DT Gilyaks_NNP ,_, a_DT Tunguzian_JJ people_NNS of_IN Eastern_NNP Siberia_NNP ,_, hold_VBP a_DT
bear-festival_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN once_RB a_DT year_NN in_IN January_NNP ._. "_'' The_DT bear_NN is_VBZ
the_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS refined_JJ solicitude_NN of_IN an_DT entire_JJ village_NN and_CC
plays_VBZ the_DT chief_JJ part_NN in_IN their_PRP$ religious_JJ ceremonies_NNS ."_VB An_DT old_JJ she-bear_NN
is_VBZ shot_NN and_CC her_PRP cub_NN is_VBZ reared_VBN ,_, but_CC not_RB suckled_JJ ,_, in_IN the_DT village_NN ._. When_WRB
the_DT bear_NN is_VBZ big_JJ enough_RB he_PRP is_VBZ taken_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ cage_NN and_CC dragged_VBD through_IN
the_DT village_NN ._. But_CC first_JJ they_PRP lead_VBP him_PRP to_TO the_DT bank_NN of_IN the_DT river_NN ,_, for_IN
this_DT is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO ensure_VB abundance_NN of_IN fish_NN to_TO each_DT family_NN ._. He_PRP is_VBZ
then_RB taken_VBN into_IN every_DT house_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, where_WRB fish_NN ,_, brandy_NN ,_, and_CC
so_RB forth_RB are_VBP offered_VBN to_TO him_PRP ._. Some_DT people_NNS prostrate_VBP themselves_PRP before_IN
the_DT beast_NN ._. His_PRP$ entrance_NN into_IN a_DT house_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO bring_VB a_DT
blessing_NN ;_: and_CC if_IN he_PRP snuffs_VBZ at_IN the_DT food_NN offered_VBD to_TO him_PRP ,_, this_DT also_RB is_VBZ
a_DT blessing_NN ._. Nevertheless_RB they_PRP tease_VB and_CC worry_VB ,_, poke_VBD and_CC tickle_VB the_DT
animal_NN continually_RB ,_, so_RB that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ surly_JJ and_CC snappish_JJ ._. After_IN being_VBG
thus_RB taken_VBN to_TO every_DT house_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ tied_VBN to_TO a_DT peg_NN and_CC shot_VBD dead_JJ with_IN
arrows_NNS ._. His_PRP$ head_NN is_VBZ then_RB cut_VB off_RP ,_, decked_VBN with_IN shavings_NNS ,_, and_CC placed_VBN

beast_NN and_CC worship_VB him_PRP ._. Then_RB his_PRP$ flesh_NN is_VBZ roasted_VBN and_CC eaten_VBN in_IN
special_JJ vessels_NNS of_IN wood_NN finely_RB carved_VBN ._. They_PRP do_VBP not_RB eat_VB the_DT flesh_NN raw_JJ
nor_CC drink_VBP the_DT blood_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT Aino_NNP do_VBP ._. The_DT brain_NN and_CC entrails_NNS are_VBP
eaten_VBN last_JJ ;_: and_CC the_DT skull_NN ,_, still_RB decked_VBN with_IN shavings_NNS ,_, is_VBZ placed_VBN on_IN
a_DT tree_NN near_IN the_DT house_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT people_NNS sing_VBP and_CC both_DT sexes_NNS dance_VBP in_IN
ranks_NNS ,_, as_IN bears_NNS ._.

One_CD of_IN these_DT bear-festivals_NNS was_VBD witnessed_VBN by_IN the_DT Russian_NNP traveller_NN
L_NNP ._. von_NNP Schrenck_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ companions_NNS at_IN the_DT Gilyak_NNP village_NN of_IN Tebach_NNP
in_IN January_NNP 1856._VBD From_IN his_PRP$ detailed_JJ report_NN of_IN the_DT ceremony_NN we_PRP may_MD
gather_VB some_DT particulars_NNS which_WDT are_VBP not_RB noticed_VBN in_IN the_DT briefer_NN
accounts_NNS which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP just_RB summarised_VBN ._. The_DT bear_NN ,_, he_PRP tells_VBZ us_PRP ,_, plays_NNS
a_DT great_JJ part_NN in_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN all_DT the_DT peoples_NNS inhabiting_VBG the_DT region_NN of_IN
the_DT Amoor_NNP and_CC Siberia_NNP as_RB far_RB as_IN Kamtchatka_NNP ,_, but_CC among_IN none_NN of_IN them_PRP
is_VBZ his_PRP$ importance_NN greater_JJR than_IN among_IN the_DT Gilyaks_NNP ._. The_DT immense_NN size_NN
which_WDT the_DT animal_NN attains_NNS in_IN the_DT valley_NN of_IN the_DT Amoor_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ ferocity_NN
whetted_VBN by_IN hunger_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT frequency_NN of_IN his_PRP$ appearance_NN ,_, all_DT combine_NN

wonder_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT fancy_NN of_IN the_DT Gilyaks_NNP is_VBZ busied_VBN with_IN him_PRP
and_CC surrounds_NNS him_PRP ,_, both_DT in_IN life_NN and_CC in_IN death_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN halo_NN of_IN
superstitious_JJ fear_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN that_IN if_IN a_DT
Gilyak_NNP falls_VBZ in_IN combat_NN with_IN a_DT bear_NN ,_, his_PRP$ soul_NN transmigrates_NNS into_IN the_DT
body_NN of_IN the_DT beast_NN ._. Nevertheless_RB his_PRP$ flesh_NN has_VBZ an_DT irresistible_JJ

cage_NN ,_, where_WRB all_PDT the_DT villagers_NNS take_VBP it_PRP in_IN turns_NNS to_TO feed_VB him_PRP ._. For_IN
although_IN he_PRP may_MD have_VB been_VBN captured_VBN or_CC purchased_VBN by_IN one_CD man_NN ,_, he_PRP

common_JJ feast_NN ,_, and_CC hence_RB all_DT must_MD contribute_VB to_TO support_VB him_PRP in_IN his_PRP$
life_NN ._. The_DT length_NN of_IN time_NN he_PRP is_VBZ kept_VBN in_IN captivity_NN depends_VBZ on_IN his_PRP$ age_NN ._.
Old_NNP bears_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN only_RB a_DT few_JJ months_NNS ;_: cubs_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN till_IN they_PRP are_VBP
full-grown_JJ ._. A_DT thick_JJ layer_NN of_IN fat_JJ on_IN the_DT captive_NN bear_NN gives_VBZ the_DT

the_DT animals_NNS ._. The_DT night_NN before_IN they_PRP were_VBD killed_VBN ,_, the_DT three_CD bears_NNS were_VBD

had_VBD been_VBN again_RB led_VBN down_IN the_DT steep_JJ bank_NN to_TO the_DT river_NN ,_, and_CC conducted_VBN

drew_VBD their_PRP$ water_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO an_DT appointed_VBN place_NN not_RB far_RB from_IN
the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC shot_VBD to_TO death_NN with_IN arrows_NNS ._. The_DT place_NN of_IN sacrifice_NN
or_CC execution_NN was_VBD marked_VBN as_IN holy_JJ by_IN being_VBG surrounded_VBN with_IN whittled_PRP$

accompany_VB all_DT religious_JJ ceremonies_NNS ._.

When_WRB the_DT house_NN has_VBZ been_VBN arranged_VBN and_CC decorated_VBN for_IN their_PRP$ reception_NN ,_,

and_CC then_RB hung_VBD on_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN scaffold_NN opposite_IN the_DT hearth_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT
flesh_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB cooked_VBN ._. The_DT boiling_NN of_IN the_DT bears_NNS '_POS flesh_NN among_IN the_DT
Gilyaks_NNP is_VBZ done_VBN only_RB by_IN the_DT oldest_JJS men_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ high_JJ privilege_NN it_PRP is_VBZ ;_:
women_NNS and_CC children_NNS ,_, young_JJ men_NNS and_CC boys_NNS have_VBP no_DT part_NN in_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT task_NN
is_VBZ performed_VBN slowly_RB and_CC deliberately_RB ,_, with_IN a_DT certain_JJ solemnity_NN ._. On_IN
the_DT occasion_NN described_VBN by_IN the_DT Russian_NNP travellers_NNS the_DT kettle_NN was_VBD
first_JJ of_IN all_DT surrounded_VBN with_IN a_DT thick_JJ wreath_NN of_IN shavings_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB
filled_VBN with_IN snow_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN water_NN to_TO cook_VB bear_NN '_'' s_VBZ flesh_NN is_VBZ
forbidden_VBN ._. Meanwhile_RB a_DT large_JJ wooden_JJ trough_NN ,_, richly_RB adorned_VBN with_IN
arabesques_NNS and_CC carvings_NNS of_IN all_DT sorts_NNS ,_, was_VBD hung_VBN immediately_RB under_IN the_DT
snouts_NNS of_IN the_DT bears_NNS ;_: on_IN one_CD side_NN of_IN the_DT trough_NN was_VBD carved_VBN in_IN relief_NN
a_DT bear_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN a_DT toad_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT carcases_NNS were_VBD being_VBG cut_VBN
up_RB ,_, each_DT leg_NN was_VBD laid_VBN on_IN the_DT ground_NN in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT bears_NNS ,_, as_IN if_IN to_TO
ask_VB their_PRP$ leave_VBP ,_, before_IN being_VBG placed_VBN in_IN the_DT kettle_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT boiled_VBN
flesh_NN was_VBD fished_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT kettle_NN with_IN an_DT iron_NN hook_NN ,_, and_CC set_VBN in_IN the_DT
trough_NN before_IN the_DT bears_NNS ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN they_PRP might_MD be_VB the_DT first_JJ to_TO
taste_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ flesh_NN ._. As_IN fast_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT fat_NN was_VBD cut_VBN in_IN strips_NNS
it_PRP was_VBD hung_VBN up_RP in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT bears_NNS ,_, and_CC afterwards_RB laid_VBN in_IN a_DT small_JJ
wooden_JJ trough_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN before_IN them_PRP ._. Last_NNP of_IN all_DT the_DT inner_JJ
organs_NNS of_IN the_DT beasts_NNS were_VBD cut_VBN up_RB and_CC placed_VBD in_IN small_JJ vessels_NNS ._. At_IN the_DT
same_JJ time_NN the_DT women_NNS made_VBD bandages_NNS out_IN of_IN parti-coloured_JJ rags_NNS ,_, and_CC
after_IN sunset_NN these_DT bandages_NNS were_VBD tied_VBN round_RB the_DT bears_NNS '_POS snouts_NNS just_RB
below_IN the_DT eyes_NNS "_'' in_IN order_NN to_TO dry_VB the_DT tears_NNS that_IN flowed_VBN from_IN them_PRP ."_.

As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT ceremony_NN of_IN wiping_VBG away_RB poor_JJ bruin_NN '_'' s_PRP tears_NNS had_VBD been_VBN
performed_VBN ,_, the_DT assembled_VBN Gilyaks_NNP set_VBD to_TO work_VB in_IN earnest_NN to_TO devour_PRP$
his_PRP$ flesh_NN ._. The_DT broth_NN obtained_VBN by_IN boiling_VBG the_DT meat_NN had_VBD already_RB been_VBN
partaken_NN of_IN ._. The_DT wooden_JJ bowls_NNS ,_, platters_NNS ,_, and_CC spoons_NNS out_IN of_IN which_WDT the_DT

they_PRP are_VBP elaborately_RB ornamented_VBN with_IN carved_JJ figures_NNS of_IN bears_NNS and_CC

flesh_NN or_CC fat_JJ ,_, perhaps_RB as_IN a_DT punishment_NN for_IN their_PRP$ treatment_NN of_IN the_DT
worshipful_JJ animal_NN ._. In_IN the_DT afternoon_NN the_DT women_NNS performed_VBD a_DT strange_JJ

a_DT young_JJ tree_NN is_VBZ felled_VBN a_DT few_JJ inches_NNS above_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, its_PRP$ stump_NN

over_IN the_DT spot_NN ,_, the_DT skull_NN disappears_VBZ from_IN view_NN ,_, and_CC that_DT is_VBZ the_DT end_NN
of_IN the_DT bear_NN ._.

Another_DT description_NN of_IN the_DT bear-festivals_NNS of_IN the_DT Gilyaks_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN

According_VBG to_TO Mr_NNP ._. Sternberg_NNP ,_, the_DT festival_NN is_VBZ usually_RB held_VBN in_IN honour_NN
of_IN a_DT deceased_JJ relation_NN :_: the_DT next_JJ of_IN kin_NN either_CC buys_VBZ or_CC catches_VBZ a_DT

"_`` feeding_VBG the_DT head_NN ."_IN After_IN the_DT bear_NN has_VBZ been_VBN killed_VBN ,_, dogs_NNS are_VBP

The_DT Goldi_NNP ,_, neighbours_NNS of_IN the_DT Gilyaks_NNP ,_, treat_VB the_DT bear_NN in_IN much_RB the_DT
same_JJ way_NN ._. They_PRP hunt_NN and_CC kill_VB it_PRP ;_: but_CC sometimes_RB they_PRP capture_VB a_DT live_JJ

son_NN and_CC brother_NN ._. Then_RB at_IN a_DT great_JJ festival_NN he_PRP is_VBZ taken_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ cage_NN ,_,

eaten_VBN ._. "_'' The_DT skull_NN ,_, jaw-bones_NNS ,_, and_CC ears_NNS are_VBP then_RB suspended_VBN on_IN a_DT tree_NN ,_,

for_IN the_DT chase_NN ,_, and_CC become_VB courageous_JJ ."_.

The_DT Orotchis_NNP ,_, another_DT Tunguzian_JJ people_NNS of_IN the_DT region_NN of_IN the_DT Amoor_NNP ,_,
hold_VB bear-festivals_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ general_JJ character_NN ._. Any_DT one_NN who_WP

it_PRP publicly_RB and_CC eat_VB the_DT flesh_NN with_IN his_PRP$ friends_NNS ._. The_DT feasts_NNS being_VBG

and_CC drink_NN ._. This_DT goes_VBZ on_RP for_IN several_JJ days_NNS until_IN all_PDT the_DT huts_NNS ,_, not_RB

to_TO a_DT tree_NN or_CC wooden_JJ pillar_NN and_CC shot_NN to_TO death_NN by_IN the_DT arrows_NNS of_IN the_DT

In_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN the_DT captive_NN bear_NN by_IN these_DT tribes_NNS there_RB are_VBP

that_IN from_IN its_PRP$ application_NN to_TO the_DT bear_NN we_PRP cannot_MD safely_RB argue_VB that_IN
the_DT animal_NN is_VBZ actually_RB regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT deity_NN ._. Indeed_RB we_PRP are_VBP expressly_RB
told_VBD that_IN the_DT Aino_NNP of_IN Saghalien_NNP do_VBP not_RB consider_VB the_DT bear_NN to_TO be_VB a_DT god_NN
but_CC only_RB a_DT messenger_NN to_TO the_DT gods_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT message_NN with_IN which_WDT they_PRP
charge_NN the_DT animal_NN at_IN its_PRP$ death_NN bears_NNS out_IN the_DT statement_NN ._. Apparently_RB
the_DT Gilyaks_NNP also_RB look_VBP on_IN the_DT bear_NN in_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN an_DT envoy_NN

welfare_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS depends_VBZ ._. At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN they_PRP treat_VBP the_DT

deity_NN ,_, whose_WP$ presence_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, so_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP is_VBZ kept_VBN and_CC fed_VBN ,_,
diffuses_NNS blessings_NNS ,_, especially_RB by_IN keeping_VBG at_IN bay_NN the_DT swarms_NNS of_IN evil_NN

the_DT Aino_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Goldi_NNP are_VBP all_DT of_IN opinion_NN that_IN they_PRP acquire_VB some_DT

benefactor_NN with_IN marks_NNS of_IN the_DT highest_JJS respect_NN and_CC affection_NN ._.

Some_DT light_NN may_MD be_VB thrown_VBN on_IN the_DT ambiguous_JJ attitude_NN of_IN the_DT Aino_NNP to_TO
bears_NNS by_IN comparing_VBG the_DT similar_JJ treatment_NN which_WDT they_PRP accord_VBP to_TO other_JJ

against_IN it_PRP ;_: hence_RB he_PRP is_VBZ loved_VBN ,_, trusted_VBN ,_, and_CC devoutly_RB worshipped_VBN as_IN a_DT
divine_JJ mediator_NN between_IN men_NNS and_CC the_DT Creator_NNP ._. The_DT various_JJ names_NNS
applied_VBN to_TO him_PRP are_VBP significant_JJ both_DT of_IN his_PRP$ divinity_NN and_CC of_IN his_PRP$

endearing_VBG titles_NNS of_IN "_`` Beloved_JJ god_NN "_'' and_CC "_`` Dear_UH little_JJ divinity_NN ."_.
Nevertheless_RB the_DT time_NN comes_VBZ when_WRB the_DT dear_JJ little_JJ divinity_NN is_VBZ

following_VBG is_VBZ the_DT form_NN of_IN prayer_NN addressed_VBD to_TO the_DT eagle-owl_NN when_WRB it_PRP
is_VBZ about_IN to_TO be_VB sacrificed_JJ :_: "_`` Beloved_VBN deity_NN ,_, we_PRP have_VBP brought_VBN you_PRP up_RB
because_IN we_PRP loved_VBD you_PRP ,_, and_CC now_RB we_PRP are_VBP about_IN to_TO send_VB you_PRP to_TO your_PRP$
father_NN ._. We_PRP herewith_RB offer_VBP you_PRP food_NN ,_, inao_NN ,_, wine_NN ,_, and_CC cakes_NNS ;_: take_VB
them_PRP to_TO your_PRP$ parent_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP will_MD be_VB very_RB pleased_JJ ._. When_WRB you_PRP come_VBP to_TO
him_PRP say_VB ,_, '_'' I_PRP have_VBP lived_VBN a_DT long_JJ time_NN among_IN the_DT Ainu_NNP ,_, where_WRB an_DT Ainu_NN
father_NN and_CC an_DT Ainu_NNP mother_NN reared_VBD me_PRP ._. I_PRP now_RB come_VBP to_TO thee_PRP ._. I_PRP have_VBP
brought_VBD a_DT variety_NN of_IN good_JJ things_NNS ._. I_PRP saw_VBD while_IN living_VBG in_IN Ainuland_NNP a_DT
great_JJ deal_NN of_IN distress_NN ._. I_PRP observed_VBD that_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT people_NNS were_VBD
possessed_VBN by_IN demons_NNS ,_, some_DT were_VBD wounded_VBN by_IN wild_JJ animals_NNS ,_, some_DT were_VBD
hurt_VBN by_IN landslides_NNS ,_, others_NNS suffered_VBD shipwreck_NN ,_, and_CC many_JJ were_VBD
attacked_VBN by_IN disease_NN ._. The_DT people_NNS are_VBP in_IN great_JJ straits_NNS ._. My_PRP$ father_NN ,_,
hear_VB me_PRP ,_, and_CC hasten_VB to_TO look_VB upon_IN the_DT Ainu_NNP and_CC help_VB them_PRP .'_VB If_IN you_PRP do_VBP
this_DT ,_, your_PRP$ father_NN will_MD help_VB us_PRP ."_.

Again_RB ,_, the_DT Aino_NNP keep_VBP eagles_NNS in_IN cages_NNS ,_, worship_NN them_PRP as_IN divinities_NNS ,_,
and_CC ask_VB them_PRP to_TO defend_VB the_DT people_NNS from_IN evil_JJ ._. Yet_CC they_PRP offer_VBP the_DT bird_NN
in_IN sacrifice_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP about_IN to_TO do_VB so_RB they_PRP pray_VBP to_TO him_PRP ,_,
saying_VBG :_: "_`` O_UH precious_JJ divinity_NN ,_, O_UH thou_IN divine_JJ bird_NN ,_, pray_NN listen_VB to_TO my_PRP$
words_NNS ._. Thou_NNP dost_VBD not_RB belong_VB to_TO this_DT world_NN ,_, for_IN thy_JJ home_NN is_VBZ with_IN the_DT
Creator_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ golden_JJ eagles_NNS ._. This_DT being_VBG so_RB ,_, I_PRP present_VBP thee_PRP with_IN
these_DT inao_JJ and_CC cakes_NNS and_CC other_JJ precious_JJ things_NNS ._. Do_VB thou_RB ride_VB upon_IN
the_DT inao_NN and_CC ascend_VB to_TO thy_JJ home_NN in_IN the_DT glorious_JJ heavens_NNS ._. When_WRB thou_NNS
arrivest_NN ,_, assemble_IN the_DT deities_NNS of_IN thy_JJ own_JJ kind_NN together_RB and_CC thank_VB
them_PRP for_IN us_PRP for_IN having_VBG governed_VBN the_DT world_NN ._. Do_VB thou_RB come_VB again_RB ,_, I_PRP
beseech_IN thee_PRP ,_, and_CC rule_NN over_IN us_PRP ._. O_UH my_PRP$ precious_JJ one_NN ,_, go_VB thou_RB quietly_RB ."_.
Once_RB more_RBR ,_, the_DT Aino_NNP revere_NN hawks_NNS ,_, keep_VB them_PRP in_IN cages_NNS ,_, and_CC offer_VB them_PRP
in_IN sacrifice_NN ._. At_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN killing_VBG one_CD of_IN them_PRP the_DT following_VBG
prayer_NN should_MD be_VB addressed_VBN to_TO the_DT bird_NN :_: "_`` O_UH divine_JJ hawk_NN ,_, thou_VBD art_NN an_CC
expert_NN hunter_NN ,_, please_VBP cause_VB thy_JJ cleverness_NN to_TO descend_VB on_IN me_PRP ."_IN If_IN a_DT
hawk_NN is_VBZ well_RB treated_VBN in_IN captivity_NN and_CC prayed_VBD to_TO after_IN this_DT fashion_NN
when_WRB he_PRP is_VBZ about_IN to_TO be_VB killed_VBN ,_, he_PRP will_MD surely_RB send_VB help_NN to_TO the_DT
hunter_NN ._.

Thus_RB the_DT Aino_NNP hopes_VBZ to_TO profit_VB in_IN various_JJ ways_NNS by_IN slaughtering_VBG the_DT
creatures_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, nevertheless_RB ,_, he_PRP treats_VBZ as_IN divine_JJ ._. He_PRP expects_VBZ them_PRP
to_TO carry_VB messages_NNS for_IN him_PRP to_TO their_PRP$ kindred_NN or_CC to_TO the_DT gods_NNS in_IN the_DT
upper_JJ world_NN ;_: he_PRP hopes_VBZ to_TO partake_VB of_IN their_PRP$ virtues_NNS by_IN swallowing_VBG
parts_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS or_CC in_IN other_JJ ways_NNS ;_: and_CC apparently_RB he_PRP looks_VBZ
forward_RB to_TO their_PRP$ bodily_JJ resurrection_NN in_IN this_DT world_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD
enable_VB him_PRP again_RB to_TO catch_VB and_CC kill_VB them_PRP ,_, and_CC again_RB to_TO reap_VB all_PDT the_DT
benefits_NNS which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ already_RB derived_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ slaughter_NN ._. For_IN in_IN
the_DT prayers_NNS addressed_VBD to_TO the_DT worshipful_JJ bear_NN and_CC the_DT worshipful_JJ
eagle_NN before_IN they_PRP are_VBP knocked_VBN on_IN the_DT head_NN the_DT creatures_NNS are_VBP invited_VBN
to_TO come_VB again_RB ,_, which_WDT seems_VBZ clearly_RB to_TO point_VB to_TO a_DT faith_NN in_IN their_PRP$
future_JJ resurrection_NN ._. If_IN any_DT doubt_NN could_MD exist_VB on_IN this_DT head_NN ,_, it_PRP would_MD
be_VB dispelled_VBN by_IN the_DT evidence_NN of_IN Mr_NNP ._. Batchelor_NNP ,_, who_WP tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN the_DT
Aino_NNP "_`` are_VBP firmly_RB convinced_VBN that_IN the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN birds_NNS and_CC animals_NNS
killed_VBN in_IN hunting_NN or_CC offered_VBD in_IN sacrifice_NN come_VBN and_CC live_VBP again_RB upon_IN
the_DT earth_NN clothed_VBD with_IN a_DT body_NN ;_: and_CC they_PRP believe_VBP ,_, further_JJ ,_, that_IN they_PRP
appear_VB here_RB for_IN the_DT special_JJ benefit_NN of_IN men_NNS ,_, particularly_RB Ainu_NNP
hunters_NNS ."_VBD The_DT Aino_NNP ,_, Mr_NNP ._. Batchelor_NNP tells_VBZ us_PRP ,_, "_`` confessedly_VB slays_NNS and_CC
eats_VBZ the_DT beast_NN that_IN another_DT may_MD come_VB in_IN its_PRP$ place_NN and_CC be_VB treated_VBN in_IN
like_IN manner_NN ";_NN and_CC at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN sacrificing_VBG the_DT creatures_NNS "_'' prayers_NNS
are_VBP said_VBD to_TO them_PRP which_WDT form_VBP a_DT request_NN that_IN they_PRP will_MD come_VB again_RB and_CC
furnish_JJ viands_NNS for_IN another_DT feast_NN ,_, as_IN if_IN it_PRP were_VBD an_DT honour_NN to_TO them_PRP to_TO
be_VB thus_RB killed_VBN and_CC eaten_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT pleasure_NN as_RB well_RB ._. Indeed_RB such_JJ is_VBZ the_DT
people_NNS '_POS s_PRP idea_NN ."_CC These_DT last_JJ observations_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT context_NN shows_VBZ ,_, refer_VBP
especially_RB to_TO the_DT sacrifice_NN of_IN bears_NNS ._.

Thus_RB among_IN the_DT benefits_NNS which_WDT the_DT Aino_NNP anticipates_VBZ from_IN the_DT
slaughter_NN of_IN the_DT worshipful_JJ animals_NNS not_RB the_DT least_JJS substantial_JJ is_VBZ
that_IN of_IN gorging_VBG himself_PRP on_IN their_PRP$ flesh_NN and_CC blood_NN ,_, both_DT on_IN the_DT
present_JJ and_CC on_IN many_JJ a_DT similar_JJ occasion_NN hereafter_RB ;_: and_CC that_DT pleasing_NN
prospect_NN again_RB is_VBZ derived_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ firm_NN faith_NN in_IN the_DT spiritual_JJ
immortality_NN and_CC bodily_JJ resurrection_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ animals_NNS ._. A_DT like_IN
faith_NN is_VBZ shared_VBN by_IN many_JJ savage_JJ hunters_NNS in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN
and_CC has_VBZ given_VBN rise_NN to_TO a_DT variety_NN of_IN quaint_JJ customs_NNS ,_, some_DT of_IN which_WDT
will_MD be_VB described_VBN presently_RB ._. Meantime_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB unimportant_JJ to_TO
observe_VBP that_IN the_DT solemn_JJ festivals_NNS at_IN which_WDT the_DT Aino_NNP ,_, the_DT Gilyaks_NNP ,_,
and_CC other_JJ tribes_NNS slaughter_NN the_DT tame_JJ caged_JJ bears_NNS with_IN demonstrations_NNS
of_IN respect_NN and_CC sorrow_NN ,_, are_VBP probably_RB nothing_NN but_CC an_DT extension_NN or_CC
glorification_NN of_IN similar_JJ rites_NNS which_WDT the_DT hunter_NN performs_NNS over_IN any_DT
wild_JJ bear_NN which_WDT he_PRP chances_NNS to_TO kill_VB in_IN the_DT forest_NN ._. Indeed_RB with_IN regard_NN
to_TO the_DT Gilyaks_NNPS we_PRP are_VBP expressly_RB informed_VBN that_IN this_DT is_VBZ the_DT case_NN ._. If_IN
we_PRP would_MD understand_VB the_DT meaning_NN of_IN the_DT Gilyak_NNP ritual_NN ,_, says_VBZ Mr_NNP ._.
Sternberg_NNP ,_, "_`` we_PRP must_MD above_IN all_DT remember_VBP that_IN the_DT bear-festivals_NNS are_VBP
not_RB ,_, as_IN is_VBZ usually_RB but_CC falsely_RB assumed_VBD ,_, celebrated_VBD only_RB at_IN the_DT
killing_NN of_IN a_DT house-bear_NN but_CC are_VBP held_VBN on_IN every_DT occasion_NN when_WRB a_DT Gilyak_NNP
succeeds_VBZ in_IN slaughtering_VBG a_DT bear_NN in_IN the_DT chase_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ that_IN in_IN
such_JJ cases_NNS the_DT festival_NN assumes_VBZ less_JJR imposing_VBG dimensions_NNS ,_, but_CC in_IN its_PRP$
essence_NN it_PRP remains_VBZ the_DT same_JJ ._. When_WRB the_DT head_NN and_CC skin_NN of_IN a_DT bear_NN killed_VBN
in_IN the_DT forest_NN are_VBP brought_VBN into_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP accorded_VBN a_DT
triumphal_JJ reception_NN with_IN music_NN and_CC solemn_JJ ceremonial_NN ._. The_DT head_NN is_VBZ
laid_VBN on_IN a_DT consecrated_JJ scaffold_NN ,_, fed_VBN ,_, and_CC treated_VBN with_IN offerings_NNS ,_,
just_RB as_IN at_IN the_DT killing_NN of_IN a_DT house-bear_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT guests_NNS of_IN honour_PRP$
(_-LRB- Narch-en_JJ )_-RRB- are_VBP also_RB assembled_VBN ._. So_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, dogs_NNS are_VBP sacrificed_JJ ,_, and_CC
the_DT bones_NNS of_IN the_DT bear_NN are_VBP preserved_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ place_NN and_CC with_IN the_DT
same_JJ marks_NNS of_IN respect_NN as_IN the_DT bones_NNS of_IN a_DT house-bear_NN ._. Hence_RB the_DT great_JJ
winter_NN festival_NN is_VBZ only_RB an_DT extension_NN of_IN the_DT rite_NN which_WDT is_VBZ observed_VBN
at_IN the_DT slaughter_NN of_IN every_DT bear_NN ."_.

Thus_RB the_DT apparent_JJ contradiction_NN in_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN these_DT tribes_NNS ,_, who_WP
venerate_NN and_CC almost_RB deify_VB the_DT animals_NNS which_WDT they_PRP habitually_RB hunt_VBP ,_,
kill_VB ,_, and_CC eat_VB ,_, is_VBZ not_RB so_RB flagrant_JJ as_IN at_IN first_JJ sight_NN it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO
us_PRP :_: the_DT people_NNS have_VBP reasons_NNS ,_, and_CC some_DT very_RB practical_JJ reasons_NNS ,_, for_IN
acting_VBG as_IN they_PRP do_VBP ._. For_IN the_DT savage_JJ is_VBZ by_IN no_DT means_NNS so_IN illogical_JJ and_CC
unpractical_JJ as_IN to_TO superficial_JJ observers_NNS he_PRP is_VBZ apt_JJ to_TO seem_VB ;_: he_PRP has_VBZ
thought_VBD deeply_RB on_IN the_DT questions_NNS which_WDT immediately_RB concern_VB him_PRP ,_, he_PRP
reasons_NNS about_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC though_IN his_PRP$ conclusions_NNS often_RB diverge_VBP very_RB
widely_RB from_IN ours_JJ ,_, we_PRP ought_MD not_RB to_TO deny_VB him_PRP the_DT credit_NN of_IN patient_NN and_CC
prolonged_VBN meditation_NN on_IN some_DT fundamental_JJ problems_NNS of_IN human_NN
existence_NN ._. In_IN the_DT present_JJ case_NN ,_, if_IN he_PRP treats_VBZ bears_NNS in_IN general_JJ as_IN
creatures_NNS wholly_RB subservient_JJ to_TO human_JJ needs_NNS and_CC yet_RB singles_VBZ out_IN
certain_JJ individuals_NNS of_IN the_DT species_NNS for_IN homage_NN which_WDT almost_RB amounts_NNS
to_TO deification_NN ,_, we_PRP must_MD not_RB hastily_RB set_VBD him_PRP down_RP as_IN irrational_JJ and_CC
inconsistent_NN ,_, but_CC must_MD endeavour_VB to_TO place_VB ourselves_PRP at_IN his_PRP$ point_NN of_IN
view_NN ,_, to_TO see_VB things_NNS as_IN he_PRP sees_VBZ them_PRP ,_, and_CC to_TO divest_VB ourselves_PRP of_IN the_DT
prepossessions_NNS which_WDT tinge_VBG so_RB deeply_RB our_PRP$ own_JJ views_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ._. If_IN
we_PRP do_VBP so_RB ,_, we_PRP shall_MD probably_RB discover_VB that_IN ,_, however_RB absurd_JJ his_PRP$
conduct_NN may_MD appear_VB to_TO us_PRP ,_, the_DT savage_JJ nevertheless_RB generally_RB acts_VBZ on_IN
a_DT train_NN of_IN reasoning_NN which_WDT seems_VBZ to_TO him_PRP in_IN harmony_NN with_IN the_DT facts_NNS of_IN
his_PRP$ limited_JJ experience_NN ._. This_DT I_PRP propose_VBP to_TO illustrate_VB in_IN the_DT
following_VBG chapter_NN ,_, where_WRB I_PRP shall_MD attempt_VB to_TO show_VB that_IN the_DT solemn_JJ
ceremonial_NN of_IN the_DT bear-festival_NN among_IN the_DT Ainos_NNS and_CC other_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN
North-eastern_NNP Asia_NNP is_VBZ only_RB a_DT particularly_RB striking_JJ example_NN of_IN the_DT
respect_NN which_WDT on_IN the_DT principles_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ rude_JJ philosophy_NN the_DT savage_JJ
habitually_RB pays_VBZ to_TO the_DT animals_NNS which_WDT he_PRP kills_VBZ and_CC eats_VBZ ._.




LIII_NNP ._. The_DT Propitiation_NNP of_IN Wild_NNP Animals_NNS By_IN Hunters_NNP

THE_DT EXPLANATION_NN of_IN life_NN by_IN the_DT theory_NN of_IN an_DT indwelling_NN and_CC
practically_RB immortal_JJ soul_NN is_VBZ one_CD which_WDT the_DT savage_JJ does_VBZ not_RB confine_VB
to_TO human_JJ beings_NNS but_CC extends_VBZ to_TO the_DT animate_NN creation_NN in_IN general_NN ._. In_IN
so_RB doing_VBG he_PRP is_VBZ more_RBR liberal_JJ and_CC perhaps_RB more_RBR logical_JJ than_IN the_DT
civilised_JJ man_NN ,_, who_WP commonly_RB denies_VBZ to_TO animals_NNS that_IN privilege_NN of_IN
immortality_NN which_WDT he_PRP claims_VBZ for_IN himself_PRP ._. The_DT savage_JJ is_VBZ not_RB so_RB proud_JJ ;_:
he_PRP commonly_RB believes_VBZ that_IN animals_NNS are_VBP endowed_VBN with_IN feelings_NNS and_CC
intelligence_NN like_IN those_DT of_IN men_NNS ,_, and_CC that_DT ,_, like_IN men_NNS ,_, they_PRP possess_VBP
souls_NNS which_WDT survive_VBP the_DT death_NN of_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS either_CC to_TO wander_VB about_IN
as_IN disembodied_JJ spirits_NNS or_CC to_TO be_VB born_VBN again_RB in_IN animal_JJ form_NN ._.

Thus_RB to_TO the_DT savage_JJ ,_, who_WP regards_VBZ all_DT living_VBG creatures_NNS as_IN practically_RB
on_IN a_DT footing_NN of_IN equality_NN with_IN man_NN ,_, the_DT act_NN of_IN killing_VBG and_CC eating_VBG an_DT
animal_NN must_MD wear_VB a_DT very_RB different_JJ aspect_NN from_IN that_WDT which_WDT the_DT same_JJ
act_NN presents_VBZ to_TO us_PRP ,_, who_WP regard_VBP the_DT intelligence_NN of_IN animals_NNS as_IN far_RB
inferior_JJ to_TO our_PRP$ own_JJ and_CC deny_VB them_PRP the_DT possession_NN of_IN immortal_JJ souls_NNS ._.
Hence_RB on_IN the_DT principles_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ rude_JJ philosophy_NN the_DT primitive_JJ hunter_NN
who_WP slays_VBZ an_DT animal_NN believes_VBZ himself_PRP exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT vengeance_NN either_CC
of_IN its_PRP$ disembodied_JJ spirit_NN or_CC of_IN all_PDT the_DT other_JJ animals_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ
species_NNS ,_, whom_WP he_PRP considers_VBZ as_IN knit_VBN together_RB ,_, like_IN men_NNS ,_, by_IN the_DT ties_NNS
of_IN kin_NN and_CC the_DT obligations_NNS of_IN the_DT blood_NN feud_NN ,_, and_CC therefore_RB as_RB bound_VBN
to_TO resent_VB the_DT injury_NN done_VBN to_TO one_CD of_IN their_PRP$ number_NN ._. Accordingly_RB the_DT
savage_JJ makes_VBZ it_PRP a_DT rule_NN to_TO spare_VB the_DT life_NN of_IN those_DT animals_NNS which_WDT he_PRP
has_VBZ no_DT pressing_VBG motive_NN for_IN killing_VBG ,_, at_IN least_JJS such_JJ fierce_JJ and_CC
dangerous_JJ animals_NNS as_RB are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO exact_JJ a_DT bloody_JJ vengeance_NN for_IN the_DT
slaughter_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN their_PRP$ kind_NN ._. Crocodiles_NNPS are_VBP animals_NNS of_IN this_DT sort_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP only_RB found_VBN in_IN hot_JJ countries_NNS ,_, where_WRB ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, food_NN is_VBZ
abundant_JJ and_CC primitive_JJ man_NN has_VBZ therefore_RB little_JJ reason_NN to_TO kill_VB them_PRP
for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN their_PRP$ tough_JJ and_CC unpalatable_JJ flesh_NN ._. Hence_RB it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT
custom_NN with_IN some_DT savages_NNS to_TO spare_VB crocodiles_NNS ,_, or_CC rather_RB only_RB to_TO kill_VB
them_PRP in_IN obedience_NN to_TO the_DT law_NN of_IN blood_NN feud_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, as_IN a_DT
retaliation_NN for_IN the_DT slaughter_NN of_IN men_NNS by_IN crocodiles_NNS ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT
Dyaks_NNP of_IN Borneo_NNP will_MD not_RB kill_VB a_DT crocodile_NN unless_IN a_DT crocodile_NN has_VBZ
first_RB killed_VBD a_DT man_NN ._. "_'' For_IN why_WRB ,_, say_VB they_PRP ,_, should_MD they_PRP commit_VB an_DT act_NN of_IN
aggression_NN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ kindred_NN can_MD so_RB easily_RB repay_VB them_PRP ?_. But_CC
should_MD the_DT alligator_NN take_VB a_DT human_JJ life_NN ,_, revenge_NN becomes_VBZ a_DT sacred_JJ
duty_NN of_IN the_DT living_NN relatives_NNS ,_, who_WP will_MD trap_NN the_DT man-eater_NN in_IN the_DT
spirit_NN of_IN an_DT officer_NN of_IN justice_NN pursuing_VBG a_DT criminal_JJ ._. Others_NNS ,_, even_RB
then_RB ,_, hang_VB back_RB ,_, reluctant_JJ to_TO embroil_VB themselves_PRP in_IN a_DT quarrel_NN which_WDT
does_VBZ not_RB concern_VB them_PRP ._. The_DT man-eating_JJ alligator_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB
pursued_VBN by_IN a_DT righteous_JJ Nemesis_NN ;_: and_CC whenever_WRB one_PRP is_VBZ caught_VBN they_PRP have_VBP
a_DT profound_JJ conviction_NN that_IN it_PRP must_MD be_VB the_DT guilty_JJ one_CD ,_, or_CC his_PRP$
accomplice_NN ."_NN

Like_IN the_DT Dyaks_NNP ,_, the_DT natives_NNS of_IN Madagascar_NNP never_RB kill_VB a_DT crocodile_NN
"_`` except_IN in_IN retaliation_NN for_IN one_CD of_IN their_PRP$ friends_NNS who_WP has_VBZ been_VBN
destroyed_VBN by_IN a_DT crocodile_NN ._. They_PRP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT wanton_NN destruction_NN
of_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT reptiles_NNS will_MD be_VB followed_VBN by_IN the_DT loss_NN of_IN human_JJ life_NN ,_,
in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT principle_NN of_IN lex_JJ talionis_NNS ._. "_`` The_DT people_NNS who_WP
live_VB near_IN the_DT lake_NN Itasy_NNP in_IN Madagascar_NNP make_VBP a_DT yearly_JJ proclamation_NN to_TO
the_DT crocodiles_NNS ,_, announcing_VBG that_IN they_PRP will_MD revenge_VB the_DT death_NN of_IN some_DT
of_IN their_PRP$ friends_NNS by_IN killing_VBG as_IN many_JJ crocodiles_NNS in_IN return_NN ,_, and_CC
warning_VBG all_DT well-disposed_JJ crocodiles_NNS to_TO keep_VB out_IN of_IN the_DT way_NN ,_, as_IN they_PRP
have_VBP no_DT quarrel_NN with_IN them_PRP ,_, but_CC only_RB with_IN their_PRP$ evil-minded_JJ relations_NNS
who_WP have_VBP taken_VBN human_JJ life_NN ._. Various_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN Madagascar_NNP believe_VBP
themselves_PRP to_TO be_VB descended_VBN from_IN crocodiles_NNS ,_, and_CC accordingly_RB they_PRP
view_VB the_DT scaly_NN reptile_NN as_IN ,_, to_TO all_DT intents_NNS and_CC purposes_NNS ,_, a_DT man_NN and_CC a_DT
brother_NN ._. If_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT animals_NNS should_MD so_RB far_RB forget_VB himself_PRP as_IN to_TO
devour_JJ one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ human_JJ kinsfolk_NN ,_, the_DT chief_NN of_IN the_DT tribe_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN his_PRP$
absence_NN an_DT old_JJ man_NN familiar_JJ with_IN the_DT tribal_JJ customs_NNS ,_, repairs_NNS at_IN the_DT
head_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS to_TO the_DT edge_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, and_CC summons_NNS the_DT family_NN
of_IN the_DT culprit_NN to_TO deliver_VB him_PRP up_RP to_TO the_DT arm_NN of_IN justice_NN ._. A_DT hook_NN is_VBZ
then_RB baited_VBD and_CC cast_VBD into_IN the_DT river_NN or_CC lake_NN ._. Next_JJ day_NN the_DT guilty_JJ
brother_NN ,_, or_CC one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ family_NN ,_, is_VBZ dragged_VBN ashore_RB ,_, and_CC after_IN his_PRP$
crime_NN has_VBZ been_VBN clearly_RB brought_VBN home_NN to_TO him_PRP by_IN a_DT strict_JJ
interrogation_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ sentenced_VBN to_TO death_NN and_CC executed_VBN ._. The_DT claims_NNS of_IN
justice_NN being_VBG thus_RB satisfied_VBN and_CC the_DT majesty_NN of_IN the_DT law_NN fully_RB
vindicated_VBN ,_, the_DT deceased_JJ crocodile_NN is_VBZ lamented_JJ and_CC buried_VBN like_IN a_DT
kinsman_NN ;_: a_DT mound_NN is_VBZ raised_VBN over_IN his_PRP$ relics_NNS and_CC a_DT stone_NN marks_VBZ the_DT
place_NN of_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._.

Again_RB ,_, the_DT tiger_NN is_VBZ another_DT of_IN those_DT dangerous_JJ beasts_NNS whom_WP the_DT
savage_JJ prefers_VBZ to_TO leave_VB alone_RB ,_, lest_IN by_IN killing_VBG one_CD of_IN the_DT species_NNS he_PRP
should_MD excite_VB the_DT hostility_NN of_IN the_DT rest_NN ._. No_DT consideration_NN will_MD
induce_VB a_DT Sumatran_NNP to_TO catch_VB or_CC wound_VB a_DT tiger_NN except_IN in_IN self-defence_NN
or_CC immediately_RB after_IN a_DT tiger_NN has_VBZ destroyed_VBN a_DT friend_NN or_CC relation_NN ._.
When_WRB a_DT European_NNP has_VBZ set_VBN traps_NNS for_IN tigers_NNS ,_, the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT
neighbourhood_NN have_VBP been_VBN known_VBN to_TO go_VB by_IN night_NN to_TO the_DT place_NN and_CC
explain_VB to_TO the_DT animals_NNS that_IN the_DT traps_NNS are_VBP not_RB set_VBN by_IN them_PRP nor_CC with_IN
their_PRP$ consent_NN ._. The_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT hills_NNS near_IN Rajamahall_NNP ,_, in_IN
Bengal_NNP ,_, are_VBP very_RB averse_JJ to_TO killing_VBG a_DT tiger_NN ,_, unless_IN one_CD of_IN their_PRP$
kinsfolk_NN has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN off_RP by_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT beasts_NNS ._. In_IN that_DT case_NN
they_PRP go_VBP out_RP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN hunting_VBG and_CC slaying_VBG a_DT tiger_NN ;_: and_CC when_WRB
they_PRP have_VBP succeeded_VBN they_PRP lay_VBD their_PRP$ bows_NNS and_CC arrows_NNS on_IN the_DT carcase_NN
and_CC invoke_VB God_NNP ,_, declaring_VBG that_IN they_PRP slew_NN the_DT animal_NN in_IN retaliation_NN
for_IN the_DT loss_NN of_IN a_DT kinsman_NN ._. Vengeance_VB having_VBG been_VBN thus_RB taken_VBN ,_, they_PRP
swear_VBP not_RB to_TO attack_VB another_DT tiger_NN except_IN under_IN similar_JJ provocation_NN ._.

The_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN Carolina_NNP would_MD not_RB molest_VB snakes_NNS when_WRB they_PRP came_VBD upon_IN
them_PRP ,_, but_CC would_MD pass_VB by_IN on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT path_NN ,_, believing_VBG
that_IN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD to_TO kill_VB a_DT serpent_NN ,_, the_DT reptile_NN '_'' s_PRP kindred_VBD would_MD
destroy_VB some_DT of_IN their_PRP$ brethren_NNS ,_, friends_NNS ,_, or_CC relations_NNS in_IN return_NN ._. So_RB
the_DT Seminole_NNP Indians_NNPS spared_VBD the_DT rattlesnake_NN ,_, because_IN they_PRP feared_VBD
that_IN the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ rattlesnake_NN would_MD incite_VB its_PRP$ kinsfolk_NN to_TO
take_VB vengeance_NN ._. The_DT Cherokee_NNP regard_NN the_DT rattlesnake_NN as_IN the_DT chief_NN of_IN
the_DT snake_NN tribe_NN and_CC fear_NN and_CC respect_VB him_PRP accordingly_RB ._. Few_JJ Cherokee_NNP
will_MD venture_VB to_TO kill_VB a_DT rattlesnake_NN ,_, unless_IN they_PRP cannot_MD help_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC

beast_NN would_MD surely_RB avenge_VB its_PRP$ death_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT weapon_NN with_IN which_WDT

causing_VBG a_DT stormy_JJ wind_NN to_TO blow_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD destroy_VB the_DT harvest_NN ._.

But_CC the_DT savage_JJ clearly_RB cannot_MD afford_VB to_TO spare_VB all_DT animals_NNS ._. He_PRP must_MD

The_DT reverence_NN of_IN hunters_NNS for_IN the_DT bear_NN whom_WP they_PRP regularly_RB kill_VBP and_CC

A_DT like_JJ respect_NN is_VBZ testified_VBD for_IN other_JJ dangerous_JJ creatures_NNS by_IN the_DT

the_DT ivory_NN ,_, thus_RB hoping_VBG to_TO avert_VB some_DT mishap_NN that_WDT would_MD otherwise_RB
befall_NN them_PRP ._. Amongst_IN some_DT tribes_NNS of_IN Eastern_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT lion_NN is_VBZ

where_WRB nightly_JJ dances_NNS are_VBP held_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ honour_NN ._. The_DT Baganda_NNP greatly_RB

head_NN of_IN a_DT slain_NN buffalo_NN into_IN a_DT village_NN or_CC into_IN a_DT garden_NN of_IN

the_DT purpose_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP pour_VBP out_RP beer_NN as_IN an_DT offering_NN and_CC pray_NN to_TO the_DT
ghost_NN to_TO stay_VB where_WRB he_PRP is_VBZ and_CC not_RB to_TO harm_VB them_PRP ._.

Another_DT formidable_JJ beast_NN whose_WP$ life_NN the_DT savage_JJ hunter_NN takes_VBZ with_IN
joy_NN ,_, yet_RB with_IN fear_NN and_CC trembling_VBG ,_, is_VBZ the_DT whale_NN ._. After_IN the_DT slaughter_NN
of_IN a_DT whale_NN the_DT maritime_NN Koryak_NNP of_IN North-eastern_NNP Siberia_NNP hold_VBP a_DT
communal_JJ festival_NN ,_, the_DT essential_JJ part_NN of_IN which_WDT "_'' is_VBZ based_VBN on_IN the_DT
conception_NN that_IN the_DT whale_NN killed_VBN has_VBZ come_VBN on_IN a_DT visit_NN to_TO the_DT village_NN ;_:
that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ staying_VBG for_IN some_DT time_NN ,_, during_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ treated_VBN with_IN
great_JJ respect_NN ;_: that_IN it_PRP then_RB returns_VBZ to_TO the_DT sea_NN to_TO repeat_VB its_PRP$ visit_NN
the_DT following_JJ year_NN ;_: that_IN it_PRP will_MD induce_VB its_PRP$ relatives_NNS to_TO come_VB along_RB ,_,
telling_VBG them_PRP of_IN the_DT hospitable_JJ reception_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN accorded_VBN to_TO
it_PRP ._. According_VBG to_TO the_DT Koryak_NNP ideas_NNS ,_, the_DT whales_NNS ,_, like_IN all_DT other_JJ
animals_NNS ,_, constitute_VBP one_CD tribe_NN ,_, or_CC rather_RB family_NN ,_, of_IN related_VBN
individuals_NNS ,_, who_WP live_VBP in_IN villages_NNS like_IN the_DT Koryak_NNP ._. They_PRP avenge_VBP the_DT

The_DT ounce_NN ,_, a_DT leopard-like_JJ creature_NN ,_, is_VBZ dreaded_VBN for_IN its_PRP$ depredations_NNS

But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB merely_RB dangerous_JJ creatures_NNS with_IN whom_WP the_DT savage_JJ

beaver_NN are_VBP manidos_NNS [_IN divinities_NNS ]_SYM which_WDT furnish_JJ food_NN ._. The_DT bear_NN is_VBZ

for_IN it_PRP ._. We_PRP kill_VBP you_PRP ,_, but_CC you_PRP are_VBP not_RB annihilated_VBN ._. His_PRP$ head_NN and_CC paws_NNS
are_VBP objects_NNS of_IN homage_NN ._. ._. ._. ._. Other_JJ animals_NNS are_VBP treated_VBN similarly_RB

weasel_NN ,_, polecat_NN ,_, etc_FW ."_FW The_DT distinction_NN is_VBZ instructive_JJ ._. Animals_NNPS which_WDT

When_WRB Siberian_NNP sable-hunters_NNS have_VBP caught_VBN a_DT sable_NN ,_, no_DT one_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN

not_RB let_VB themselves_PRP be_VB caught_VBN ._. Whereas_NNP ,_, if_IN their_PRP$ bones_NNS are_VBP thrown_VBN

The_DT elan_JJ ,_, deer_JJ ,_, and_CC elk_NN were_VBD treated_VBN by_IN the_DT American_NNP Indians_NNPS with_IN
the_DT same_JJ punctilious_JJ respect_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT same_JJ reason_NN ._. Their_PRP$ bones_NNS
might_MD not_RB be_VB given_VBN to_TO the_DT dogs_NNS nor_CC thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, nor_CC might_MD
their_PRP$ fat_NN be_VB dropped_VBN upon_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ
animals_NNS were_VBD believed_VBN to_TO see_VB what_WP was_VBD done_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ bodies_NNS and_CC to_TO
tell_VB it_PRP to_TO the_DT other_JJ beasts_NNS ,_, living_NN and_CC dead_JJ ._. Hence_RB ,_, if_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS
were_VBD illused_VBN ,_, the_DT animals_NNS of_IN that_DT species_NNS would_MD not_RB allow_VB themselves_PRP
to_TO be_VB taken_VBN ,_, neither_CC in_IN this_DT world_NN nor_CC in_IN the_DT world_NN to_TO come_VB ._. Among_IN

entered_VBN into_IN your_PRP$ body_NN to_TO avenge_VB the_DT wrong_JJ you_PRP did_VBD it_PRP ."_RP The_DT Canadian_JJ

the_DT hunting_NN season_NN ;_: otherwise_RB the_DT mother-elks_NNS would_MD be_VB shy_JJ and_CC

In_IN the_DT Timor-laut_NNP islands_NNS of_IN the_DT Indian_NNP Archipelago_NNP the_DT skulls_NNS of_IN
all_PDT the_DT turtles_NNS which_WDT a_DT fisherman_NN has_VBZ caught_VBN are_VBP hung_VBN up_RP under_IN his_PRP$

wily_RB savage_JJ employs_VBZ dead_JJ animals_NNS as_IN decoys_NNS to_TO lure_VB living_VBG animals_NNS to_TO

The_DT Lengua_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN the_DT Gran_NNP Chaco_NNP love_VBP to_TO hunt_VB the_DT ostrich_JJ ,_, but_CC

ghost_NN of_IN their_PRP$ victim_NN ._. They_PRP think_VBP that_IN when_WRB the_DT first_JJ natural_JJ shock_NN
of_IN death_NN is_VBZ passed_VBN ,_, the_DT ghost_NN of_IN the_DT ostrich_JJ pulls_VBZ himself_PRP together_RB
and_CC makes_VBZ after_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ._. Acting_NN on_IN this_DT sage_NN calculation_NN ,_, the_DT
Indians_NNPS pluck_NN feathers_NNS from_IN the_DT breast_NN of_IN the_DT bird_NN and_CC strew_VBD them_PRP at_IN
intervals_NNS along_IN the_DT track_NN ._. At_IN every_DT bunch_NN of_IN feathers_NNS the_DT ghost_NN
stops_NNS to_TO consider_VB ,_, "_`` Is_VBZ this_DT the_DT whole_NN of_IN my_PRP$ body_NN or_CC only_RB a_DT part_NN of_IN
it_PRP ?"_VBZ The_DT doubt_NN gives_VBZ him_PRP pause_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB at_IN last_JJ he_PRP has_VBZ made_VBN up_RP his_PRP$
mind_NN fully_RB at_IN all_DT the_DT bunches_NNS ,_, and_CC has_VBZ further_RB wasted_VBN valuable_JJ time_NN
by_IN the_DT zigzag_NN course_NN which_WDT he_PRP invariably_RB pursues_VBZ in_IN going_VBG from_IN one_CD
to_TO another_DT ,_, the_DT hunters_NNS are_VBP safe_JJ at_IN home_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT bilked_JJ ghost_NN may_MD
stalk_NN in_IN vain_JJ round_NN about_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ too_RB timid_JJ to_TO
enter_VB ._.

The_DT Esquimaux_NNP about_IN Bering_VBG Strait_PRP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT souls_NNS of_IN dead_JJ
sea-beasts_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN seals_NNS ,_, walrus_NN ,_, and_CC whales_NNS ,_, remain_VBP attached_VBN to_TO
their_PRP$ bladders_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN by_IN returning_VBG the_DT bladders_NNS to_TO the_DT sea_NN they_PRP
can_MD cause_VB the_DT souls_NNS to_TO be_VB reincarnated_VBN in_IN fresh_JJ bodies_NNS and_CC so_RB
multiply_VB the_DT game_NN which_WDT the_DT hunters_NNS pursue_VB and_CC kill_VB ._. Acting_NNP on_IN this_DT
belief_NN every_DT hunter_NN carefully_RB removes_VBZ and_CC preserves_VBZ the_DT bladders_NNS of_IN
all_PDT the_DT sea-beasts_NNS that_IN he_PRP kills_VBZ ;_: and_CC at_IN a_DT solemn_JJ festival_NN held_VBD once_RB
a_DT year_NN in_IN winter_NN these_DT bladders_NNS ,_, containing_VBG the_DT souls_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT
sea-beasts_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN killed_VBN throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, are_VBP honoured_VBN
with_IN dances_NNS and_CC offerings_NNS of_IN food_NN in_IN the_DT public_JJ assembly-room_NN ,_, after_IN
which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP taken_VBN out_RP on_IN the_DT ice_NN and_CC thrust_VBD through_IN holes_NNS into_IN
the_DT water_NN ;_: for_IN the_DT simple_JJ Esquimaux_NNP imagine_VB that_IN the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT
animals_NNS ,_, in_IN high_JJ good_JJ humour_NN at_IN the_DT kind_NN treatment_NN they_PRP have_VBP
experienced_VBN ,_, will_MD thereafter_RB be_VB born_VBN again_RB as_IN seals_NNS ,_, walrus_NN ,_, and_CC

harpooned_VBN ,_, or_CC otherwise_RB done_VBN to_TO death_NN by_IN the_DT hunters_NNS ._.

For_IN like_IN reasons_NNS ,_, a_DT tribe_NN which_WDT depends_VBZ for_IN its_PRP$ subsistence_NN ,_, chiefly_RB
or_CC in_IN part_NN ,_, upon_IN fishing_NN is_VBZ careful_JJ to_TO treat_VB the_DT fish_NN with_IN every_DT
mark_NN of_IN honour_NN and_CC respect_NN ._. The_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN Peru_NNP "_'' adored_VBZ the_DT fish_NN
that_IN they_PRP caught_VBD in_IN greatest_JJS abundance_NN ;_: for_IN they_PRP said_VBD that_IN the_DT first_JJ
fish_NN that_WDT was_VBD made_VBN in_IN the_DT world_NN above_IN (_-LRB- for_IN so_IN they_PRP named_VBD Heaven_NN )_-RRB-
gave_VBD birth_NN to_TO all_DT other_JJ fish_NN of_IN that_DT species_NNS ,_, and_CC took_VBD care_NN to_TO send_VB
them_PRP plenty_NN of_IN its_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO sustain_VB their_PRP$ tribe_NN ._. For_IN this_DT reason_NN
they_PRP worshipped_VBD sardines_NNS in_IN one_CD region_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP killed_VBD more_JJR of_IN
them_PRP than_IN of_IN any_DT other_JJ fish_NN ;_: in_IN others_NNS ,_, the_DT skate_NN ;_: in_IN others_NNS ,_, the_DT

had_VBD no_DT other_JJ fish_NN ,_, or_CC where_WRB they_PRP knew_VBD not_RB how_WRB to_TO catch_VB and_CC kill_VB
them_PRP ._. In_IN short_JJ ,_, they_PRP had_VBD whatever_WDT fish_NN was_VBD most_RBS serviceable_JJ to_TO them_PRP
as_IN their_PRP$ gods_NNS ."_IN The_DT Kwakiutl_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN British_NNP Columbia_NNP think_VBP that_IN
when_WRB a_DT salmon_NN is_VBZ killed_VBN its_PRP$ soul_NN returns_NNS to_TO the_DT salmon_NN country_NN ._.
Hence_RB they_PRP take_VBP care_VB to_TO throw_VB the_DT bones_NNS and_CC offal_NN into_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, in_IN

so_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB quite_RB impossible_JJ for_IN that_DT salmon_NN to_TO rise_VB from_IN the_DT

Still_RB more_RBR stringent_JJ are_VBP the_DT precautions_NNS taken_VBN when_WRB the_DT fish_NN are_VBP the_DT

"_`` They_PRP paid_VBD court_NN to_TO them_PRP ,_, and_CC would_MD address_VB them_PRP thus_RB :_: '_POS You_PRP fish_RB ,_,

eats_VBZ some_DT of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT rest_NN kindles_VBZ the_DT sacred_JJ fire_NN in_IN the_DT
sweating_VBG house_NN ._. "_'' No_DT Indian_NNP may_MD take_VB a_DT salmon_NN before_IN this_DT dance_NN is_VBZ

ones_NNS about_IN them_PRP ."_, There_EX is_VBZ a_DT favourite_JJ fish_NN of_IN the_DT Aino_NNP which_WDT appears_VBZ

the_DT smoke-hole_NN ,_, or_CC by_IN a_DT special_JJ opening_NN at_IN the_DT back_NN of_IN the_DT hut_NN ._.

With_IN some_DT savages_NNS a_DT special_JJ reason_NN for_IN respecting_VBG the_DT bones_NNS of_IN game_NN ,_,
and_CC generally_RB of_IN the_DT animals_NNS which_WDT they_PRP eat_VBP ,_, is_VBZ a_DT belief_NN that_IN ,_, if_IN
the_DT bones_NNS are_VBP preserved_VBN ,_, they_PRP will_MD in_IN course_NN of_IN time_NN be_VB reclothed_VBN

therefore_RB ,_, clearly_RB for_IN the_DT interest_NN of_IN the_DT hunter_NN to_TO leave_VB the_DT bones_NNS
intact_JJ since_IN to_TO destroy_VB them_PRP would_MD be_VB to_TO diminish_VB the_DT future_NN supply_NN
of_IN game_NN ._. Many_JJ of_IN the_DT Minnetaree_NNP Indians_NNPS "_`` believe_VB that_IN the_DT bones_NNS of_IN

and_CC fit_NN for_IN slaughter_NN the_DT succeeding_VBG June_NNP ."_NN Hence_RB on_IN the_DT western_JJ
prairies_NNS of_IN America_NNP ,_, the_DT skulls_NNS of_IN buffaloes_NNS may_MD be_VB seen_VBN arranged_VBN in_IN

to_TO have_VB contented_VBN themselves_PRP with_IN thus_RB burying_VBG the_DT bones_NNS ._. Thus_RB the_DT
Lapps_NNP expected_VBD the_DT resurrection_NN of_IN the_DT slain_JJ animal_NN to_TO take_VB place_NN in_IN
another_DT world_NN ,_, resembling_VBG in_IN this_DT respect_NN the_DT Kamtchatkans_NNP ,_, who_WP
believed_VBD that_IN every_DT creature_NN ,_, down_IN to_TO the_DT smallest_JJS fly_NN ,_, would_MD rise_VB
from_IN the_DT dead_JJ and_CC live_VB underground_RB ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT North_NNP

present_JJ world_NN ._. The_DT habit_NN ,_, observed_VBD especially_RB by_IN Mongolian_JJ peoples_NNS ,_,
of_IN stuffing_VBG the_DT skin_NN of_IN a_DT sacrificed_JJ animal_NN ,_, or_CC stretching_VBG it_PRP on_IN a_DT
framework_NN ,_, points_NNS rather_RB to_TO a_DT belief_NN in_IN a_DT resurrection_NN of_IN the_DT latter_NN

is_VBZ perhaps_RB only_RB a_DT precaution_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT bones_NNS from_IN being_VBG broken_VBN ._.

But_CC after_IN all_PDT the_DT resurrection_NN of_IN dead_JJ game_NN may_MD have_VB its_PRP$
inconveniences_NNS ,_, and_CC accordingly_RB some_DT hunters_NNS take_VBP steps_NNS to_TO prevent_VB

getting_VBG up_RB and_CC running_VBG away_RB ._. This_DT is_VBZ the_DT motive_NN alleged_VBN for_IN the_DT
practice_NN by_IN Koui_NNP hunters_NNS in_IN Laos_NNP ;_: they_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT spells_NNS which_WDT
they_PRP utter_JJ in_IN the_DT chase_NN may_MD lose_VB their_PRP$ magical_JJ virtue_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT
slaughtered_VBN animal_NN may_MD consequently_RB come_VB to_TO life_NN again_RB and_CC escape_VB ._.
To_TO prevent_VB that_DT catastrophe_NN they_PRP therefore_RB hamstring_VBG the_DT beast_NN as_IN

killed_VBN a_DT fox_NN ,_, he_PRP carefully_RB cuts_VBZ the_DT tendons_NNS of_IN all_DT the_DT animal_NN '_POS s_PRP legs_NNS
in_IN order_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT ghost_NN from_IN reanimating_VBG the_DT body_NN and_CC walking_VBG
about_IN ._. But_CC hamstringing_VBG the_DT carcase_NN is_VBZ not_RB the_DT only_JJ measure_NN which_WDT
