first_RB ,_, they_PRP took_VBD care_NN to_TO tie_VB its_PRP$ mouth_NN up_IN tightly_RB in_IN order_NN to_TO
prevent_VB the_DT ghost_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN from_IN sallying_VBG forth_RB and_CC warning_VBG its_PRP$

ghosts_NNS of_IN the_DT slain_NN animals_NNS should_MD know_VB their_PRP$ slayers_NNS and_CC avenge_NN
their_PRP$ death_NN by_IN spoiling_VBG the_DT seal-hunt_NN ._.

Besides_IN the_DT animals_NNS which_WDT primitive_JJ man_NN dreads_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ strength_NN
and_CC ferocity_NN ,_, and_CC those_DT which_WDT he_PRP reveres_VBZ on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT benefits_NNS
which_WDT he_PRP expects_VBZ from_IN them_PRP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ another_DT class_NN of_IN creatures_NNS
which_WDT he_PRP sometimes_RB deems_VBZ it_PRP necessary_JJ to_TO conciliate_VB by_IN worship_NN and_CC
sacrifice_NN ._. These_DT are_VBP the_DT vermin_NN that_IN infest_JJ his_PRP$ crops_NNS and_CC his_PRP$
cattle_NNS ._. To_TO rid_VB himself_PRP of_IN these_DT deadly_JJ foes_NNS the_DT farmer_NN has_VBZ recourse_NN
to_TO many_JJ superstitious_JJ devices_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT ,_, though_IN some_DT are_VBP meant_VBN to_TO
destroy_VB or_CC intimidate_VB the_DT vermin_NN ,_, others_NNS aim_VBP at_IN propitiating_VBG them_PRP
and_CC persuading_VBG them_PRP by_IN fair_JJ means_NN to_TO spare_VB the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN
and_CC the_DT herds_NNS ._. Thus_RB Esthonian_JJ peasants_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Oesel_NNP ,_,
stand_NN in_IN great_JJ awe_NN of_IN the_DT weevil_NN ,_, an_DT insect_NN which_WDT is_VBZ exceedingly_RB
destructive_JJ to_TO the_DT grain_NN ._. They_PRP give_VBP it_PRP a_DT fine_JJ name_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN a_DT child_NN
is_VBZ about_IN to_TO kill_VB a_DT weevil_NN they_PRP say_VBP ,_, "_'' Don_NNP '_POS t_NN do_VBP it_PRP ;_: the_DT more_RBR we_PRP hurt_VBP
him_PRP ,_, the_DT more_RBR he_PRP hurts_VBZ us_PRP ."_RB If_IN they_PRP find_VBP a_DT weevil_NN they_PRP bury_VBP it_PRP in_IN
the_DT earth_NN instead_RB of_IN killing_VBG it_PRP ._. Some_DT even_RB put_VBN the_DT weevil_NN under_IN a_DT
stone_NN in_IN the_DT field_NN and_CC offer_NN corn_NN to_TO it_PRP ._. They_PRP think_VBP that_IN thus_RB it_PRP is_VBZ
appeased_VBN and_CC does_VBZ less_JJR harm_NN ._. Amongst_IN the_DT Saxons_NNS of_IN Transylvania_NNP ,_, in_IN
order_NN to_TO keep_VB sparrows_NNS from_IN the_DT corn_NN ,_, the_DT sower_NN begins_VBZ by_IN throwing_VBG
the_DT first_JJ handful_NN of_IN seed_NN backwards_NNS over_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_`` That_DT is_VBZ
for_IN you_PRP ,_, sparrows_VBZ ."_NNP To_TO guard_VB the_DT corn_NN against_IN the_DT attacks_NNS of_IN
leaf-flies_NNS he_PRP shuts_VBZ his_PRP$ eyes_NNS and_CC scatters_NNS three_CD handfuls_NNS of_IN oats_NNS in_IN
different_JJ directions_NNS ._. Having_VBG made_VBN this_DT offering_NN to_TO the_DT leaf-flies_NNS he_PRP
feels_VBZ sure_JJ that_IN they_PRP will_MD spare_VB the_DT corn_NN ._. A_DT Transylvanian_JJ way_NN of_IN
securing_VBG the_DT crops_NNS against_IN all_DT birds_NNS ,_, beasts_NNS ,_, and_CC insects_NNS ,_, is_VBZ this_DT :_:
after_IN he_PRP has_VBZ finished_VBN sowing_NN ,_, the_DT sower_NN goes_VBZ once_RB more_RBR from_IN end_NN to_TO
end_NN of_IN the_DT field_NN imitating_VBG the_DT gesture_NN of_IN sowing_NN ,_, but_CC with_IN an_DT empty_JJ
hand_NN ._. As_IN he_PRP does_VBZ so_RB he_PRP says_VBZ ,_, "_`` I_PRP sow_VBP this_DT for_IN the_DT animals_NNS ;_: I_PRP sow_VBP it_PRP
for_IN every_DT thing_NN that_IN flies_NNS and_CC creeps_NNS ,_, that_IN walks_NNS and_CC stands_NNS ,_, that_WDT
sings_NNS and_CC springs_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN God_NNP the_DT Father_NNP ,_, etc_FW ."_. The_DT
following_VBG is_VBZ a_DT German_JJ way_NN of_IN freeing_VBG a_DT garden_NN from_IN caterpillars_NNS ._.
After_IN sunset_NN or_CC at_IN midnight_NN the_DT mistress_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, or_CC another_DT
female_JJ member_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN ,_, walks_VBZ all_DT round_IN the_DT garden_NN dragging_VBG a_DT
broom_NN after_IN her_PRP ._. She_PRP may_MD not_RB look_VB behind_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC must_MD keep_VB
murmuring_VBG ,_, "_`` Good_JJ evening_NN ,_, Mother_NNP Caterpillar_NNP ,_, you_PRP shall_MD come_VB with_IN
your_PRP$ husband_NN to_TO church_NN ."_IN The_DT garden_NN gate_NN is_VBZ left_VBN open_JJ till_IN the_DT
following_VBG morning_NN ._.

Sometimes_RB in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN vermin_RB the_DT farmer_NN aims_VBZ at_IN hitting_VBG a_DT happy_JJ
mean_VB between_IN excessive_JJ rigour_NN on_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN and_CC weak_JJ indulgence_NN on_IN
the_DT other_JJ ;_: kind_NN but_CC firm_NN ,_, he_PRP tempers_VBZ severity_NN with_IN mercy_NN ._. An_DT ancient_JJ
Greek_NNP treatise_NN on_IN farming_NN advises_VBZ the_DT husbandman_NN who_WP would_MD rid_VB his_PRP$
lands_NNS of_IN mice_NNS to_TO act_VB thus_RB :_: "_`` Take_VB a_DT sheet_NN of_IN paper_NN and_CC write_VB on_IN it_PRP as_IN
follows_VBZ :_: '_POS I_PRP adjure_VBP you_PRP ,_, ye_PRP mice_NNS here_RB present_RB ,_, that_IN ye_PRP neither_DT injure_NN
me_PRP nor_CC suffer_VB another_DT mouse_NN to_TO do_VB so_RB ._. I_PRP give_VBP you_PRP yonder_VB field_NN '_'' (_-LRB- here_RB
you_PRP specify_VB the_DT field_NN );_NN '_'' but_CC if_IN ever_RB I_PRP catch_VBP you_PRP here_RB again_RB ,_, by_IN the_DT
Mother_NN of_IN the_DT Gods_NNP I_PRP will_MD rend_VB you_PRP in_IN seven_CD pieces_NNS .'_IN Write_NNP this_DT ,_, and_CC
stick_VB the_DT paper_NN on_IN an_DT unhewn_JJ stone_NN in_IN the_DT field_NN before_IN sunrise_NN ,_,
taking_VBG care_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT written_VBN side_NN up_IN ."_NN In_IN the_DT Ardennes_NNS they_PRP say_VBP
that_IN to_TO get_VB rid_JJ of_IN rats_NNS you_PRP should_MD repeat_VB the_DT following_JJ words_NNS :_:
"_`` Erat_NNP verbum_JJ ,_, apud_JJ Deum_NNP vestrum_NN ._. Male_NN rats_NNS and_CC female_JJ rats_NNS ,_, I_PRP
conjure_NN you_PRP ,_, by_IN the_DT great_JJ God_NNP ,_, to_TO go_VB out_IN of_IN my_PRP$ house_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN all_DT my_PRP$
habitations_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO betake_VB yourselves_PRP to_TO such_JJ and_CC such_JJ a_DT place_NN ,_,
there_RB to_TO end_VB your_PRP$ days_NNS ._. Decretis_NNP ,_, reversis_NN et_CC desembarassis_NN virgo_NN
potens_NNS ,_, clemens_NNS ,_, justitiae_RB ._. "_'' Then_RB write_VB the_DT same_JJ words_NNS on_IN pieces_NNS of_IN
paper_NN ,_, fold_NN them_PRP up_RB ,_, and_CC place_NN one_CD of_IN them_PRP under_IN the_DT door_NN by_IN which_WDT
the_DT rats_NNS are_VBP to_TO go_VB forth_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ on_IN the_DT road_NN which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP
to_TO take_VB ._. This_DT exorcism_NN should_MD be_VB performed_VBN at_IN sunrise_NN ._. Some_DT years_NNS
ago_IN an_DT American_JJ farmer_NN was_VBD reported_VBN to_TO have_VB written_VBN a_DT civil_JJ letter_NN
to_TO the_DT rats_NNS ,_, telling_VBG them_PRP that_IN his_PRP$ crops_NNS were_VBD short_JJ ,_, that_IN he_PRP could_MD
not_RB afford_VB to_TO keep_VB them_PRP through_IN the_DT winter_NN ,_, that_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN very_RB
kind_NN to_TO them_PRP ,_, and_CC that_IN for_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ good_JJ he_PRP thought_VBD they_PRP had_VBD better_RBR
leave_VB him_PRP and_CC go_VB to_TO some_DT of_IN his_PRP$ neighbours_NNS who_WP had_VBD more_RBR grain_NN ._. This_DT
document_NN he_PRP pinned_VBD to_TO a_DT post_NN in_IN his_PRP$ barn_NN for_IN the_DT rats_NNS to_TO read_VB ._.

Sometimes_RB the_DT desired_VBN object_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB attained_VBN by_IN treating_VBG
with_IN high_JJ distinction_NN one_CD or_CC two_CD chosen_VBN individuals_NNS of_IN the_DT obnoxious_JJ
species_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT rest_NN are_VBP pursued_VBN with_IN relentless_JJ rigour_NN ._. In_IN the_DT
East_NNP Indian_NNP island_NN of_IN Bali_NNP ,_, the_DT mice_NNS which_WDT ravage_VBP the_DT rice-fields_NNS
are_VBP caught_VBN in_IN great_JJ numbers_NNS ,_, and_CC burned_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN that_IN corpses_NNS
are_VBP burned_VBN ._. But_CC two_CD of_IN the_DT captured_VBN mice_NNS are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO live_VB ,_, and_CC
receive_VB a_DT little_JJ packet_NN of_IN white_JJ linen_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT people_NNS bow_VBP down_RB
before_IN them_PRP ,_, as_IN before_IN gods_NNS ,_, and_CC let_VB them_PRP go_VB ._. When_WRB the_DT farms_NNS of_IN the_DT
Sea_NNP Dyaks_NNP or_CC Ibans_NNP of_IN Sarawak_NNP are_VBP much_JJ pestered_JJ by_IN birds_NNS and_CC
insects_NNS ,_, they_PRP catch_VBP a_DT specimen_NN of_IN each_DT kind_NN of_IN vermin_NN (_-LRB- one_CD sparrow_NN ,_,
one_CD grasshopper_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ),_NNP put_VBD them_PRP in_IN a_DT tiny_JJ boat_NN of_IN bark_NN
well-stocked_JJ with_IN provisions_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB allow_VB the_DT little_JJ vessel_NN with_IN
its_PRP$ obnoxious_JJ passengers_NNS to_TO float_VB down_IN the_DT river_NN ._. If_IN that_WDT does_VBZ not_RB
drive_VB the_DT pests_NNS away_RB ,_, the_DT Dyaks_NNP resort_NN to_TO what_WP they_PRP deem_VBP a_DT more_RBR
effectual_JJ mode_NN of_IN accomplishing_VBG the_DT same_JJ purpose_NN ._. They_PRP make_VBP a_DT clay_NN
crocodile_NN as_RB large_JJ as_IN life_NN and_CC set_VBD it_PRP up_RP in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, where_WRB they_PRP
offer_NN it_PRP food_NN ,_, rice-spirit_NN ,_, and_CC cloth_NN ,_, and_CC sacrifice_VB a_DT fowl_NN and_CC a_DT
pig_NN before_IN it_PRP ._. Mollified_NNP by_IN these_DT attentions_NNS ,_, the_DT ferocious_JJ animal_NN
very_RB soon_RB gobbles_VBZ up_RP all_DT the_DT creatures_NNS that_WDT devour_VBP the_DT crops_NNS ._. In_IN
Albania_NNP ,_, if_IN the_DT fields_NNS or_CC vineyards_NNS are_VBP ravaged_VBN by_IN locusts_NNS or_CC
beetles_NNS ,_, some_DT of_IN the_DT women_NNS will_MD assemble_VB with_IN dishevelled_JJ hair_NN ,_,

Then_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT women_NNS sings_NNS ,_, "_`` O_UH locusts_. and_CC beetles_NNS who_WP have_VBP left_VBN us_PRP
bereaved_JJ ,"_NN and_CC the_DT dirge_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN up_RB and_CC repeated_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT women_NNS
in_IN chorus_NN ._. Thus_RB by_IN celebrating_VBG the_DT obsequies_NNS of_IN a_DT few_JJ locusts_NNS and_CC
beetles_NNS ,_, they_PRP hope_VBP to_TO bring_VB about_RP the_DT death_NN of_IN them_PRP all_DT ._. When_WRB
caterpillars_NNS invaded_VBD a_DT vineyard_NN or_CC field_NN in_IN Syria_NNP ,_, the_DT virgins_NNS were_VBD
gathered_VBN ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN the_DT caterpillars_NNS was_VBD taken_VBN and_CC a_DT girl_NN made_VBD its_PRP$
mother_NN ._. Then_RB they_PRP bewailed_VBD and_CC buried_VBD it_PRP ._. Thereafter_RB they_PRP conducted_VBN
the_DT "_`` mother_NN "_'' to_TO the_DT place_NN where_WRB the_DT caterpillars_NNS were_VBD ,_, consoling_VBG
her_PRP ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN all_PDT the_DT caterpillars_NNS might_MD leave_VB the_DT garden_NN ._.



LIV_NNP ._. Types_NNS of_IN Animal_NNP Sacrament_NNP



1._`` The_DT Egyptian_JJ and_CC the_DT Aino_NNP Types_NNP of_IN Sacrament_NNP

WE_NNP are_VBP now_RB perhaps_RB in_IN a_DT position_NN to_TO understand_VB the_DT ambiguous_JJ
behaviour_NN of_IN the_DT Aino_NNP and_CC Gilyaks_NNP towards_IN the_DT bear_NN ._. It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN
shown_VBN that_IN the_DT sharp_JJ line_NN of_IN demarcation_NN which_WDT we_PRP draw_VBP between_IN
mankind_NN and_CC the_DT lower_JJR animals_NNS does_VBZ not_RB exist_VB for_IN the_DT savage_JJ ._. To_TO him_PRP
many_JJ of_IN the_DT other_JJ animals_NNS appear_VBP as_IN his_PRP$ equals_NNS or_CC even_RB his_PRP$
superiors_NNS ,_, not_RB merely_RB in_IN brute_JJ force_NN but_CC in_IN intelligence_NN ;_: and_CC if_IN
choice_NN or_CC necessity_NN leads_VBZ him_PRP to_TO take_VB their_PRP$ lives_NNS ,_, he_PRP feels_VBZ bound_VBN ,_,
out_IN of_IN regard_NN to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ safety_NN ,_, to_TO do_VB it_PRP in_IN a_DT way_NN which_WDT will_MD be_VB as_IN
inoffensive_JJ as_IN possible_JJ not_RB merely_RB to_TO the_DT living_NN animal_NN ,_, but_CC to_TO its_PRP$
departed_VBN spirit_NN and_CC to_TO all_PDT the_DT other_JJ animals_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ species_NNS ,_,
which_WDT would_MD resent_VB an_DT affront_NN put_VBN upon_IN one_CD of_IN their_PRP$ kind_NN much_RB as_IN a_DT
tribe_NN of_IN savages_NNS would_MD revenge_VB an_DT injury_NN or_CC insult_NN offered_VBN to_TO a_DT
tribesman_NN ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN among_IN the_DT many_JJ devices_NNS by_IN which_WDT the_DT
savage_JJ seeks_VBZ to_TO atone_VB for_IN the_DT wrong_JJ done_VBN by_IN him_PRP to_TO his_PRP$ animal_NN
victims_NNS one_CD is_VBZ to_TO show_VB marked_JJ deference_NN to_TO a_DT few_JJ chosen_VBN individuals_NNS
of_IN the_DT species_NNS ,_, for_IN such_JJ behaviour_NN is_VBZ apparently_RB regarded_VBN as_IN
entitling_VBG him_PRP to_TO exterminate_VB with_IN impunity_NN all_DT the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT
species_NNS upon_IN which_WDT he_PRP can_MD lay_VB hands_NNS ._. This_DT principle_NN perhaps_RB explains_VBZ
the_DT attitude_NN ,_, at_IN first_JJ sight_NN puzzling_JJ and_CC contradictory_JJ ,_, of_IN the_DT Aino_NNP
towards_IN the_DT bear_NN ._. The_DT flesh_NN and_CC skin_NN of_IN the_DT bear_NN regularly_RB afford_VB
them_PRP food_NN and_CC clothing_NN ;_: but_CC since_IN the_DT bear_NN is_VBZ an_DT intelligent_JJ and_CC
powerful_JJ animal_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO offer_VB some_DT satisfaction_NN or_CC
atonement_NN to_TO the_DT bear_NN species_NN for_IN the_DT loss_NN which_WDT it_PRP sustains_VBZ in_IN the_DT
death_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ of_IN its_PRP$ members_NNS ._. This_DT satisfaction_NN or_CC atonement_NN is_VBZ
made_VBN by_IN rearing_VBG young_JJ bears_NNS ,_, treating_VBG them_PRP ,_, so_RB long_RB as_IN they_PRP live_VBP ,_,
with_IN respect_NN ,_, and_CC killing_VBG them_PRP with_IN extraordinary_JJ marks_NNS of_IN sorrow_NN
and_CC devotion_NN ._. So_IN the_DT other_JJ bears_NNS are_VBP appeased_VBN ,_, and_CC do_VBP not_RB resent_VB the_DT
slaughter_NN of_IN their_PRP$ kind_NN by_IN attacking_VBG the_DT slayers_NNS or_CC deserting_VBG the_DT
country_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD deprive_VB the_DT Aino_NNP of_IN one_CD of_IN their_PRP$ means_NNS of_IN
subsistence_NN ._.

Thus_RB the_DT primitive_JJ worship_NN of_IN animals_NNS conforms_NNS to_TO two_CD types_NNS ,_, which_WDT
are_VBP in_IN some_DT respects_NNS the_DT converse_NN of_IN each_DT other_JJ ._. On_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN ,_,
animals_NNS are_VBP worshipped_VBN ,_, and_CC are_VBP therefore_RB neither_RB killed_VBN nor_CC eaten_VBN ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, animals_NNS are_VBP worshipped_VBN because_IN they_PRP are_VBP
habitually_RB killed_VBD and_CC eaten_VBN ._. In_IN both_DT types_NNS of_IN worship_NN the_DT animal_NN is_VBZ
revered_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN some_DT benefit_NN ,_, positive_JJ or_CC negative_JJ ,_, which_WDT the_DT
savage_JJ hopes_NNS to_TO receive_VB from_IN it_PRP ._. In_IN the_DT former_JJ worship_NN the_DT benefit_NN
comes_VBZ either_RB in_IN the_DT positive_JJ shape_NN of_IN protection_NN ,_, advice_NN ,_, and_CC help_NN
which_WDT the_DT animal_NN affords_NNS the_DT man_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT negative_JJ shape_NN of_IN
abstinence_NN from_IN injuries_NNS which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN to_TO
inflict_VB ._. In_IN the_DT latter_JJ worship_NN the_DT benefit_NN takes_VBZ the_DT material_NN form_NN
of_IN the_DT animal_NN '_POS s_PRP flesh_NN and_CC skin_NN ._. The_DT two_CD types_NNS of_IN worship_NN are_VBP in_IN some_DT
measure_NN antithetical_JJ :_: in_IN the_DT one_CD ,_, the_DT animal_NN is_VBZ not_RB eaten_VBN because_IN it_PRP
is_VBZ revered_VBN ;_: in_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ revered_VBN because_IN it_PRP is_VBZ eaten_VBN ._. But_CC
both_DT may_MD be_VB practised_VBN by_IN the_DT same_JJ people_NNS ,_, as_IN we_PRP see_VBP in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN
the_DT North_NNP American_NNP Indians_NNPS ,_, who_WP ,_, while_IN they_PRP apparently_RB revere_VBD and_CC
spare_VB their_PRP$ totem_NN animals_NNS ,_, also_RB revere_VBD the_DT animals_NNS and_CC fish_NN upon_IN
which_WDT they_PRP subsist_VBP ._. The_DT aborigines_NNS of_IN Australia_NNP have_VBP totemism_NN in_IN the_DT
most_RBS primitive_JJ form_NN known_VBN to_TO us_PRP ;_: but_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT clear_JJ evidence_NN that_WDT
they_PRP attempt_VBP ,_, like_IN the_DT North_NNP American_NNP Indians_NNPS ,_, to_TO conciliate_VB the_DT
animals_NNS which_WDT they_PRP kill_VB and_CC eat_VB ._. The_DT means_NN which_WDT the_DT Australians_NNPS
adopt_VB to_TO secure_VB a_DT plentiful_JJ supply_NN of_IN game_NN appear_VBP to_TO be_VB primarily_RB
based_VBN ,_, not_RB on_IN conciliation_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN ,_, a_DT principle_NN to_TO
which_WDT the_DT North_NNP American_NNP Indians_NNPS also_RB resort_VBP for_IN the_DT same_JJ purpose_NN ._.
Hence_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT Australians_NNPS undoubtedly_RB represent_VBP a_DT ruder_NN and_CC earlier_RBR
stage_NN of_IN human_JJ progress_NN than_IN the_DT American_NNP Indians_NNPS ,_, it_PRP would_MD seem_VB
that_WDT before_IN hunters_NNS think_VBP of_IN worshipping_VBG the_DT game_NN as_IN a_DT means_NN of_IN
ensuring_VBG an_DT abundant_JJ supply_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, they_PRP seek_VBP to_TO attain_VB the_DT same_JJ end_NN
by_IN sympathetic_JJ magic_NN ._. This_DT ,_, again_RB ,_, would_MD show_VB --_: what_WP there_EX is_VBZ good_JJ
reason_NN for_IN believing_VBG --_: that_DT sympathetic_JJ magic_NN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT earliest_JJS
means_NNS by_IN which_WDT man_NN endeavours_VBZ to_TO adapt_VB the_DT agencies_NNS of_IN nature_NN to_TO his_PRP$
needs_NNS ._.

Corresponding_VBG to_TO the_DT two_CD distinct_JJ types_NNS of_IN animal_NN worship_NN ,_, there_EX are_VBP
two_CD distinct_JJ types_NNS of_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN killing_VBG the_DT animal_JJ god_NN ._. On_IN the_DT
one_CD hand_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT revered_VBN animal_NN is_VBZ habitually_RB spared_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ
nevertheless_RB killed_VBD --_: and_CC sometimes_RB eaten_VBN --_: on_IN rare_JJ and_CC solemn_JJ
occasions_NNS ._. Examples_NNS of_IN this_DT custom_NN have_VBP been_VBN already_RB given_VBN and_CC an_DT
explanation_NN of_IN them_PRP offered_VBD ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT revered_VBN
animal_NN is_VBZ habitually_RB killed_VBN ,_, the_DT slaughter_NN of_IN any_DT one_CD of_IN the_DT species_NNS
involves_VBZ the_DT killing_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ atoned_VBN for_IN on_IN the_DT spot_NN by_IN
apologies_NNS and_CC sacrifices_NNS ,_, especially_RB when_WRB the_DT animal_NN is_VBZ a_DT powerful_JJ
and_CC dangerous_JJ one_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, in_IN addition_NN to_TO this_DT ordinary_JJ and_CC everyday_JJ
atonement_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT special_JJ annual_JJ atonement_NN ,_, at_IN which_WDT a_DT select_JJ
individual_NN of_IN the_DT species_NNS is_VBZ slain_VBN with_IN extraordinary_JJ marks_NNS of_IN
respect_NN and_CC devotion_NN ._. Clearly_RB the_DT two_CD types_NNS of_IN sacramental_JJ
killing_NN --_: the_DT Egyptian_JJ and_CC the_DT Aino_NNP types_NNS ,_, as_IN we_PRP may_MD call_VB them_PRP for_IN
distinction_NN --_: are_VBP liable_JJ to_TO be_VB confounded_VBN by_IN an_DT observer_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, before_IN
we_PRP can_MD say_VB to_TO which_WDT type_NN any_DT particular_JJ example_NN belongs_VBZ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ
necessary_JJ to_TO ascertain_VB whether_IN the_DT animal_NN sacramentally_RB slain_VBP
belongs_VBZ to_TO a_DT species_NN which_WDT is_VBZ habitually_RB spared_VBN ,_, or_CC to_TO one_CD which_WDT is_VBZ
habitually_RB killed_VBN by_IN the_DT tribe_NN ._. In_IN the_DT former_JJ case_NN the_DT example_NN
belongs_VBZ to_TO the_DT Egyptian_JJ type_NN of_IN sacrament_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT latter_NN to_TO the_DT Aino_NN
type_NN ._.

The_DT practice_NN of_IN pastoral_JJ tribes_NNS appears_VBZ to_TO furnish_VB examples_NNS of_IN both_DT
types_NNS of_IN sacrament_NN ._. "_'' Pastoral_NNP tribes_NNS ,"_, says_VBZ Adolf_NNP Bastian_NNP ,_, "_'' being_VBG
sometimes_RB obliged_VBN to_TO sell_VB their_PRP$ herds_NNS to_TO strangers_NNS who_WP may_MD handle_VB
the_DT bones_NNS disrespectfully_RB ,_, seek_VB to_TO avert_VB the_DT danger_NN which_WDT such_PDT a_DT
sacrilege_NN would_MD entail_VB by_IN consecrating_VBG one_CD of_IN the_DT herd_NN as_IN an_DT object_NN
of_IN worship_NN ,_, eating_VBG it_PRP sacramentally_RB in_IN the_DT family_NN circle_NN with_IN closed_VBN
doors_NNS ,_, and_CC afterwards_RB treating_VBG the_DT bones_NNS with_IN all_PDT the_DT ceremonious_JJ
respect_NN which_WDT ,_, strictly_RB speaking_VBG ,_, should_MD be_VB accorded_VBN to_TO every_DT head_NN
of_IN cattle_NNS ,_, but_CC which_WDT ,_, being_VBG punctually_RB paid_VBN to_TO the_DT representative_NN
animal_NN ,_, is_VBZ deemed_VBN to_TO be_VB paid_VBN to_TO all_DT ._. Such_JJ family_NN meals_NNS are_VBP found_VBN
among_IN various_JJ peoples_NNS ,_, especially_RB those_DT of_IN the_DT Caucasus_NNP ._. When_WRB
amongst_IN the_DT Abchases_NNS the_DT shepherds_NNS in_IN spring_NN eat_VBP their_PRP$ common_JJ meal_NN
with_IN their_PRP$ loins_NNS girt_NN and_CC their_PRP$ staves_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, this_DT may_MD be_VB
looked_VBD upon_IN both_DT as_IN a_DT sacrament_NN and_CC as_IN an_DT oath_NN of_IN mutual_JJ help_NN and_CC
support_NN ._. For_IN the_DT strongest_JJS of_IN all_DT oaths_NNS is_VBZ that_IN which_WDT is_VBZ accompanied_VBN
with_IN the_DT eating_NN of_IN a_DT sacred_JJ substance_NN ,_, since_IN the_DT perjured_JJ person_NN
cannot_NN possibly_RB escape_VB the_DT avenging_VBG god_NN whom_WP he_PRP has_VBZ taken_VBN into_IN his_PRP$
body_NN and_CC assimilated_VBN ."_'' This_DT kind_NN of_IN sacrament_NN is_VBZ of_IN the_DT Aino_NNP or_CC
expiatory_JJ type_NN ,_, since_IN it_PRP is_VBZ meant_VBN to_TO atone_VB to_TO the_DT species_NNS for_IN the_DT
possible_JJ ill-usage_NN of_IN individuals_NNS ._. An_DT expiation_NN ,_, similar_JJ in_IN
principle_NN but_CC different_JJ in_IN details_NNS ,_, is_VBZ offered_VBN by_IN the_DT Kalmucks_NNP to_TO
the_DT sheep_NN ,_, whose_WP$ flesh_NN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN their_PRP$ staple_NN foods_NNS ._. Rich_NNP Kalmucks_.
are_VBP in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN consecrating_VBG a_DT white_JJ ram_NN under_IN the_DT title_NN of_IN "_`` the_DT
ram_NN of_IN heaven_NN "_'' or_CC "_`` the_DT ram_NN of_IN the_DT spirit_NN ."_RB The_DT animal_NN is_VBZ never_RB shorn_VBN
and_CC never_RB sold_VBN ;_: but_CC when_WRB it_PRP grows_VBZ old_JJ and_CC its_PRP$ owner_NN wishes_VBZ to_TO
consecrate_VB a_DT new_JJ one_CD ,_, the_DT old_JJ ram_NN must_MD be_VB killed_VBN and_CC eaten_VBN at_IN a_DT
feast_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT neighbours_NNS are_VBP invited_VBN ._. On_IN a_DT lucky_JJ day_NN ,_, generally_RB
in_IN autumn_NN when_WRB the_DT sheep_NN are_VBP fat_JJ ,_, a_DT sorcerer_NN kills_VBZ the_DT old_JJ ram_NN ,_,
after_IN sprinkling_VBG it_PRP with_IN milk_NN ._. Its_PRP$ flesh_NN is_VBZ eaten_VBN ;_: the_DT skeleton_NN ,_,
with_IN a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT fat_JJ ,_, is_VBZ burned_VBN on_IN a_DT turf_NN altar_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT skin_NN ,_,
with_IN the_DT head_NN and_CC feet_NNS ,_, is_VBZ hung_VBN up_RB ._.

An_DT example_NN of_IN a_DT sacrament_NN of_IN the_DT Egyptian_JJ type_NN is_VBZ furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT
Todas_NNP ,_, a_DT pastoral_JJ people_NNS of_IN Southern_JJ India_NNP ,_, who_WP subsist_VBP largely_RB upon_IN
the_DT milk_NN of_IN their_PRP$ buffaloes_NNS ._. Amongst_NN them_PRP "_'' the_DT buffalo_NN is_VBZ to_TO a_DT

even_RB with_IN a_DT degree_NN of_IN adoration_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT people_NNS ."_VBP They_PRP never_RB eat_VBP the_DT

the_DT male_NN ._. But_CC to_TO the_DT latter_JJ rule_NN there_RB is_VBZ a_DT single_JJ exception_NN ._. Once_RB a_DT

the_DT Todas_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT Millingtonia_NNP )._NNP A_DT sacred_JJ fire_NN having_VBG been_VBN made_VBN by_IN

excluded_VBN from_IN the_DT assembly_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ occasion_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT
Todas_NNP eat_VB buffalo_NN flesh_NN ._. The_DT Madi_NNP or_CC Moru_NNP tribe_NN of_IN Central_NNP Africa_NNP ,_,

custom_NN is_VBZ observed_VBN at_IN stated_JJ times_NNS --_: once_RB a_DT year_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP led_VBN to_TO

attached_VBN to_TO it_PRP ._. It_PRP appears_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO relieve_VB the_DT people_NNS '_POS s_PRP minds_NNS ,_,

boy_NN ,_, who_WP leads_VBZ it_PRP four_CD times_NNS round_VBP the_DT assembled_VBN people_NNS ._. As_IN it_PRP

then_RB they_PRP depart_VBP with_IN signs_NNS of_IN great_JJ joy_NN ._. The_DT lamb_NN '_'' s_PRP skull_NN is_VBZ hung_VBN

2._DT Processions_NNS with_IN Sacred_NNP Animals_NNPS

THE_DT FORM_NN of_IN communion_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT sacred_JJ animal_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN from_IN house_NN
to_TO house_NN ,_, that_IN all_DT may_MD enjoy_VB a_DT share_NN of_IN its_PRP$ divine_JJ influence_NN ,_, has_VBZ
been_VBN exemplified_VBN by_IN the_DT Gilyak_NNP custom_NN of_IN promenading_VBG the_DT bear_NN
through_IN the_DT village_NN before_IN it_PRP is_VBZ slain_VBN ._. A_DT similar_JJ form_NN of_IN communion_NN
with_IN the_DT sacred_JJ snake_NN is_VBZ observed_VBN by_IN a_DT Snake_NN tribe_NN in_IN the_DT Punjaub_NNP ._.
Once_RB a_DT year_NN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN September_NNP the_DT snake_NN is_VBZ worshipped_VBN by_IN all_PDT
castes_NNS and_CC religions_NNS for_IN nine_CD days_NNS only_RB ._. At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN August_NNP the_DT
Mirasans_NNP ,_, especially_RB those_DT of_IN the_DT Snake_NNP tribe_NN ,_, make_VB a_DT snake_NN of_IN dough_NN
which_WDT they_PRP paint_VBP black_JJ and_CC red_JJ ,_, and_CC place_NN on_IN a_DT winnowing_NN basket_NN ._.
This_DT basket_NN they_PRP carry_VBP round_RB the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN entering_VBG any_DT house_NN
they_PRP say_VBP :_: "_`` God_NNP be_VB with_IN you_PRP all_DT !_. May_NNP every_DT ill_JJ be_VB far_RB !_. May_NNP our_PRP$
patron_NN '_POS s_PRP (_-LRB- Gugga_CC '_POS s_PRP )_-RRB- word_NN thrive_VBP !"_IN Then_RB they_PRP present_VBP the_DT basket_NN with_IN
the_DT snake_NN ,_, saying_VBG :_: "_`` A_DT small_JJ cake_NN of_IN flour_NN :_: a_DT little_JJ bit_NN of_IN butter_NN :_:
if_IN you_PRP obey_VB the_DT snake_NN ,_, you_PRP and_CC yours_PRP shall_MD thrive_VB !"_VBN Strictly_RB
speaking_VBG ,_, a_DT cake_NN and_CC butter_NN should_MD be_VB given_VBN ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ seldom_RB done_VBN ._.
Every_DT one_CD ,_, however_RB ,_, gives_VBZ something_NN ,_, generally_RB a_DT handful_NN of_IN dough_NN or_CC
some_DT corn_NN ._. In_IN houses_NNS where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT new_JJ bride_NN or_CC whence_IN a_DT bride_NN
has_VBZ gone_VBN ,_, or_CC where_WRB a_DT son_NN has_VBZ been_VBN born_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ usual_JJ to_TO give_VB a_DT rupee_NN
and_CC a_DT quarter_NN ,_, or_CC some_DT cloth_NN ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT bearers_NNS of_IN the_DT snake_NN
also_RB sing_VBP :_:


"_`` Give_VB the_DT snake_NN a_DT piece_NN of_IN cloth_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP will_MD send_VB a_DT lively_JJ bride_NN !"_.


When_WRB every_DT house_NN has_VBZ been_VBN thus_RB visited_VBN ,_, the_DT dough_NN snake_NN is_VBZ buried_VBN
and_CC a_DT small_JJ grave_NN is_VBZ erected_VBN over_IN it_PRP ._. Thither_NNP during_IN the_DT nine_CD days_NNS
of_IN September_NNP the_DT women_NNS come_VBP to_TO worship_VB ._. They_PRP bring_VBP a_DT basin_NN of_IN curds_NNS ,_,
a_DT small_JJ portion_NN of_IN which_WDT they_PRP offer_VBP at_IN the_DT snake_NN '_'' s_PRP grave_JJ ,_, kneeling_VBG
on_IN the_DT ground_NN and_CC touching_VBG the_DT earth_NN with_IN their_PRP$ foreheads_NNS ._. Then_RB they_PRP
go_VB home_NN and_CC divide_VB the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT curds_NNS among_IN the_DT children_NNS ._. Here_RB
the_DT dough_NN snake_NN is_VBZ clearly_RB a_DT substitute_NN for_IN a_DT real_JJ snake_NN ._. Indeed_RB ,_, in_IN
districts_NNS where_WRB snakes_NNS abound_IN the_DT worship_NN is_VBZ offered_VBN ,_, not_RB at_IN the_DT
grave_NN of_IN the_DT dough_NN snake_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT jungles_NNS where_WRB snakes_NNS are_VBP known_VBN
to_TO be_VB ._. Besides_IN this_DT yearly_JJ worship_NN ,_, performed_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT people_NNS ,_, the_DT
members_NNS of_IN the_DT Snake_NNP tribe_NN worship_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN every_DT morning_NN
after_IN a_DT new_JJ moon_NN ._. The_DT Snake_NNP tribe_NN is_VBZ not_RB uncommon_JJ in_IN the_DT Punjaub_NNP ._.
Members_NNS of_IN it_PRP will_MD not_RB kill_VB a_DT snake_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP say_VBP that_IN its_PRP$ bite_NN does_VBZ
not_RB hurt_VB them_PRP ._. If_IN they_PRP find_VBP a_DT dead_JJ snake_NN ,_, they_PRP put_VBD clothes_NNS on_IN it_PRP and_CC
give_VB it_PRP a_DT regular_JJ funeral_NN ._.

Ceremonies_NNS closely_RB analogous_JJ to_TO this_DT Indian_JJ worship_NN of_IN the_DT snake_NN
have_VBP survived_VBN in_IN Europe_NNP into_IN recent_JJ times_NNS ,_, and_CC doubtless_RB date_NN from_IN a_DT
very_RB primitive_JJ paganism_NN ._. The_DT best-known_JJ example_NN is_VBZ the_DT "_`` hunting_NN of_IN
the_DT wren_JJ ."_NN By_IN many_JJ European_JJ peoples_NNS --_: the_DT ancient_JJ Greeks_NNS and_CC Romans_NNS ,_,
the_DT modern_JJ Italians_NNPS ,_, Spaniards_NNPS ,_, French_JJ ,_, Germans_NNPS ,_, Dutch_NNPS ,_, Danes_NNPS ,_,
Swedes_NNP ,_, English_NNP ,_, and_CC Welsh_NNP --_: the_DT wren_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN designated_VBN the_DT king_NN ,_,
the_DT little_JJ king_NN ,_, the_DT king_NN of_IN birds_NNS ,_, the_DT hedge_NN king_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ,_,
and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN reckoned_VBN amongst_IN those_DT birds_NNS which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ extremely_RB
unlucky_JJ to_TO kill_VB ._. In_IN England_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN that_IN if_IN any_DT one_NN kills_VBZ a_DT
wren_VBN or_CC harries_VBG its_PRP$ nest_NN ,_, he_PRP will_MD infallibly_RB break_VB a_DT bone_NN or_CC meet_VB
with_IN some_DT dreadful_JJ misfortune_NN within_IN the_DT year_NN ;_: sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ
thought_VBD that_IN the_DT cows_NNS will_MD give_VB bloody_JJ milk_NN ._. In_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT wren_NN is_VBZ
called_VBN "_`` the_DT Lady_NNP of_IN Heaven_NNP '_POS s_PRP hen_NN ,"_, and_CC boys_NNS say_VBP :_:


"_`` Malisons_NNS ,_, malisons_NNS ,_, mair_NN than_IN ten_CD ,_,
That_DT harry_NN the_DT Ladye_NNP of_IN Heaven_NNP '_POS s_PRP hen_NN !"_CC


At_IN Saint_NNP Donan_NNP ,_, in_IN Brittany_NNP ,_, people_NNS believe_VBP that_IN if_IN children_NNS touch_NN
the_DT young_JJ wrens_NNS in_IN the_DT nest_NN ,_, they_PRP will_MD suffer_VB from_IN the_DT fire_NN of_IN St_NNP ._.
Lawrence_NNP ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, from_IN pimples_NNS on_IN the_DT face_NN ,_, legs_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ._. In_IN
other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN France_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN that_IN if_IN a_DT person_NN kills_VBZ a_DT wren_NN or_CC
harries_VBG its_PRP$ nest_NN ,_, his_PRP$ house_NN will_MD be_VB struck_VBN by_IN lightning_NN ,_, or_CC that_IN the_DT
fingers_NNS with_IN which_WDT he_PRP did_VBD the_DT deed_NN will_MD shrivel_VB up_RP and_CC drop_VB off_RP ,_, or_CC
at_IN least_JJS be_VB maimed_VBN ,_, or_CC that_IN his_PRP$ cattle_NNS will_MD suffer_VB in_IN their_PRP$ feet_NNS ._.

Notwithstanding_VBG such_JJ beliefs_NNS ,_, the_DT custom_NN of_IN annually_RB killing_VBG the_DT
wren_NNS has_VBZ prevailed_VBN widely_RB both_DT in_IN this_DT country_NN and_CC in_IN France_NNP ._. In_IN the_DT
Isle_NNP of_IN Man_NNP down_IN to_TO the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN the_DT custom_NN was_VBD observed_VBN
on_IN Christmas_NNP Eve_NNP ,_, or_CC rather_RB Christmas_NNP morning_NN ._. On_IN the_DT twenty-fourth_JJ
of_IN December_NNP ,_, towards_IN evening_NN ,_, all_PDT the_DT servants_NNS got_VBD a_DT holiday_NN ;_: they_PRP
did_VBD not_RB go_VB to_TO bed_NN all_DT night_NN ,_, but_CC rambled_VBD about_IN till_IN the_DT bells_NNS rang_VBD
in_IN all_DT the_DT churches_NNS at_IN midnight_NN ._. When_WRB prayers_NNS were_VBD over_RB ,_, they_PRP went_VBD
to_TO hunt_VB the_DT wren_NNS ,_, and_CC having_VBG found_VBD one_CD of_IN these_DT birds_NNS they_PRP killed_VBD it_PRP
and_CC fastened_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT top_NN of_IN a_DT long_JJ pole_NN with_IN its_PRP$ wings_NNS extended_VBN ._.
Thus_RB they_PRP carried_VBD it_PRP in_IN procession_NN to_TO every_DT house_NN chanting_VBG the_DT
following_VBG rhyme_NN :_:


"_`` We_PRP hunted_VBD the_DT wren_VBN for_IN Robin_NNP the_DT Bobbin_NNP ,_,
We_PRP hunted_VBD the_DT wren_VBN for_IN Jack_NNP of_IN the_DT Can_MD ,_,
We_PRP hunted_VBD the_DT wren_VBN for_IN Robin_NNP the_DT Bobbin_NNP ,_,
We_PRP hunted_VBD the_DT wren_VBN for_IN every_DT one_CD ."_NN


When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD gone_VBN from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN and_CC collected_VBD all_PDT the_DT money_NN
they_PRP could_MD ,_, they_PRP laid_VBD the_DT wren_NNS on_IN a_DT bier_NN and_CC carried_VBD it_PRP in_IN

buried_VBN it_PRP "_'' with_IN the_DT utmost_JJ solemnity_NN ,_, singing_VBG dirges_NNS over_IN her_PRP in_IN the_DT
Manks_NNP language_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP call_VBP her_PRP knell_NN ;_: after_IN which_WDT Christmas_NNP
begins_VBZ ."_IN The_DT burial_NN over_IN ,_, the_DT company_NN outside_IN the_DT churchyard_NN formed_VBN
a_DT circle_NN and_CC danced_VBD to_TO music_NN ._.

A_DT writer_NN of_IN the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN says_VBZ that_IN in_IN Ireland_NNP the_DT wren_VBN "_'' is_VBZ
still_RB hunted_VBN and_CC killed_VBN by_IN the_DT peasants_NNS on_IN Christmas_NNP Day_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT
following_VBG (_-LRB- St_NNP ._. Stephen_NNP '_POS s_PRP Day_NN )_-RRB- he_PRP is_VBZ carried_VBN about_RB ,_, hung_VBN by_IN the_DT leg_NN ,_,
in_IN the_DT centre_NN of_IN two_CD hoops_NNS ,_, crossing_VBG each_DT other_JJ at_IN right_JJ angles_NNS ,_, and_CC
a_DT procession_NN made_VBN in_IN every_DT village_NN ,_, of_IN men_NNS ,_, women_NNS ,_, and_CC children_NNS ,_,
singing_VBG an_DT Irish_NNP catch_NN ,_, importing_VBG him_PRP to_TO be_VB the_DT king_NN of_IN all_DT birds_NNS ."_WP
Down_IN to_TO the_DT present_JJ time_NN the_DT "_`` hunting_NN of_IN the_DT wren_JJ "_`` still_RB takes_VBZ place_NN
in_IN parts_NNS of_IN Leinster_NNP and_CC Connaught_NNP ._. On_IN Christmas_NNP Day_NNP or_CC St_NNP ._.
Stephen_NNP '_'' s_VBZ Day_NNP the_DT boys_NNS hunt_NN and_CC kill_VB the_DT wren_NNS ,_, fasten_RB it_PRP in_IN the_DT
middle_NN of_IN a_DT mass_NN of_IN holly_NN and_CC ivy_NN on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN a_DT broomstick_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN
St_NNP ._. Stephen_NNP '_'' s_VBZ Day_NNP go_VB about_RB with_IN it_PRP from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN ,_, singing_VBG :_:


"_`` The_DT wren_JJ ,_, the_DT wren_NNS ,_, the_DT king_NN of_IN all_DT birds_NNS ,_,
St_NNP ._. Stephen_NNP '_POS s_PRP Day_NNP was_VBD caught_VBN in_IN the_DT furze_NN ;_:
Although_IN he_PRP is_VBZ little_RB ,_, his_PRP$ family_NN '_POS s_VBZ great_JJ ,_,
I_PRP pray_VBP you_PRP ,_, good_JJ landlady_NN ,_, give_VB us_PRP a_DT treat_NN ."_.


Money_NN or_CC food_NN (_-LRB- bread_NN ,_, butter_NN ,_, eggs_NNS ,_, etc_FW .)_. were_VBD given_VBN them_PRP ,_, upon_IN
which_WDT they_PRP feasted_VBD in_IN the_DT evening_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT first_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN similar_JJ customs_NNS were_VBD
still_RB observed_VBD in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT south_NN of_IN France_NNP ._. Thus_RB at_IN
Carcassone_NNP ,_, every_DT year_NN on_IN the_DT first_JJ Sunday_NNP of_IN December_NNP the_DT young_JJ
people_NNS of_IN the_DT street_NN Saint_NNP Jean_NNP used_VBD to_TO go_VB out_IN of_IN the_DT town_NN armed_VBN
with_IN sticks_NNS ,_, with_IN which_WDT they_PRP beat_VBP the_DT bushes_NNS ,_, looking_VBG for_IN wrens_NNS ._. The_DT
first_JJ to_TO strike_VB down_RP one_CD of_IN these_DT birds_NNS was_VBD proclaimed_VBN King_NNP ._. Then_RB
they_PRP returned_VBD to_TO the_DT town_NN in_IN procession_NN ,_, headed_VBN by_IN the_DT King_NNP ,_, who_WP
carried_VBD the_DT wren_VBN on_IN a_DT pole_NN ._. On_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT
year_NN the_DT King_NNP and_CC all_DT who_WP had_VBD hunted_VBN the_DT wren_NNS marched_VBD through_IN the_DT
streets_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN to_TO the_DT light_NN of_IN torches_NNS ,_, with_IN drums_NNS beating_VBG and_CC
fifes_NNS playing_VBG in_IN front_NN of_IN them_PRP ._. At_IN the_DT door_NN of_IN every_DT house_NN they_PRP
stopped_VBD ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN them_PRP wrote_VBD with_IN chalk_NN on_IN the_DT door_NN vive_JJ le_NN roi_NN !_.
with_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN which_WDT was_VBD about_IN to_TO begin_VB ._. On_IN the_DT morning_NN
of_IN Twelfth_NNP Day_NNP the_DT King_NNP again_RB marched_VBD in_IN procession_NN with_IN great_JJ pomp_NN ,_,
wearing_VBG a_DT crown_NN and_CC a_DT blue_JJ mantle_NN and_CC carrying_VBG a_DT sceptre_NN ._. In_IN front_NN
of_IN him_PRP was_VBD borne_VBN the_DT wren_NNS fastened_VBN to_TO the_DT top_NN of_IN a_DT pole_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD
adorned_VBN with_IN a_DT verdant_JJ wreath_NN of_IN olive_JJ ,_, of_IN oak_NN ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB of_IN
mistletoe_NN grown_VBN on_IN an_DT oak_NN ._. After_IN hearing_VBG high_JJ mass_NN in_IN the_DT parish_NN
church_NN of_IN St_NNP ._. Vincent_NNP ,_, surrounded_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ officers_NNS and_CC guards_NNS ,_, the_DT
King_NNP visited_VBD the_DT bishop_NN ,_, the_DT mayor_NN ,_, the_DT magistrates_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT chief_NN
inhabitants_NNS ,_, collecting_VBG money_NN to_TO defray_VB the_DT expenses_NNS of_IN the_DT royal_NN
banquet_NN which_WDT took_VBD place_NN in_IN the_DT evening_NN and_CC wound_VBD up_RP with_IN a_DT dance_NN ._.

The_DT parallelism_NN between_IN this_DT custom_NN of_IN "_`` hunting_VBG the_DT wren_NN "_'' and_CC some_DT
of_IN those_DT which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP considered_VBN ,_, especially_RB the_DT Gilyak_NNP procession_NN
with_IN the_DT bear_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Indian_JJ one_NN with_IN the_DT snake_NN ,_, seems_VBZ too_RB close_JJ to_TO
allow_VB us_PRP to_TO doubt_VB that_IN they_PRP all_DT belong_VBP to_TO the_DT same_JJ circle_NN of_IN ideas_NNS ._.
The_DT worshipful_JJ animal_NN is_VBZ killed_VBN with_IN special_JJ solemnity_NN once_IN a_DT year_NN ;_:
and_CC before_RB or_CC immediately_RB after_IN death_NN he_PRP is_VBZ promenaded_VBN from_IN door_NN to_TO
door_NN ,_, that_IN each_DT of_IN his_PRP$ worshippers_NNS may_MD receive_VB a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT
divine_JJ virtues_NNS that_WDT are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO emanate_VB from_IN the_DT dead_JJ or_CC dying_VBG
god_NN ._. Religious_JJ processions_NNS of_IN this_DT sort_NN must_MD have_VB had_VBD a_DT great_JJ place_NN
in_IN the_DT ritual_NN of_IN European_JJ peoples_NNS in_IN prehistoric_JJ times_NNS ,_, if_IN we_PRP may_MD
judge_NN from_IN the_DT numerous_JJ traces_NNS of_IN them_PRP which_WDT have_VBP survived_VBN in_IN
folk-custom_NN ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, or_CC Hogmanay_NNP
as_IN it_PRP was_VBD called_VBN ,_, it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB customary_JJ in_IN the_DT Highlands_NNP of_IN
Scotland_NNP for_IN a_DT man_NN to_TO dress_VB himself_PRP up_RP in_IN a_DT cow_NN '_'' s_PRP hide_VBP and_CC thus_RB
attired_VBN to_TO go_VB from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN ,_, attended_VBN by_IN young_JJ fellows_NNS ,_, each_DT
of_IN them_PRP armed_VBN with_IN a_DT staff_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT a_DT bit_NN of_IN raw_JJ hide_NN was_VBD tied_VBN ._.
Round_NNP every_DT house_NN the_DT hide-clad_JJ man_NN used_VBD to_TO run_VB thrice_NN deiseal_NN ,_,
that_DT is_VBZ ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO keep_VB the_DT house_NN
on_IN his_PRP$ right_JJ hand_NN ;_: while_IN the_DT others_NNS pursued_VBD him_PRP ,_, beating_VBG the_DT hide_NN
with_IN their_PRP$ staves_NNS and_CC thereby_RB making_VBG a_DT loud_JJ noise_NN like_IN the_DT beating_VBG
of_IN a_DT drum_NN ._. In_IN this_DT disorderly_JJ procession_NN they_PRP also_RB struck_VBD the_DT walls_NNS
of_IN the_DT house_NN ._. On_IN being_VBG admitted_VBN ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT party_NN ,_, standing_VBG within_IN
the_DT threshold_NN ,_, pronounced_VBD a_DT blessing_NN on_IN the_DT family_NN in_IN these_DT words_NNS :_:
"_`` May_NNP God_NNP bless_VB the_DT house_NN and_CC all_PDT that_DT belongs_VBZ to_TO it_PRP ,_, cattle_NNS ,_, stones_NNS ,_,
and_CC timber_NN !_. In_IN plenty_NN of_IN meat_NN ,_, of_IN bed_NN and_CC body_NN clothes_NNS ,_, and_CC health_NN
of_IN men_NNS may_MD it_PRP ever_RB abound_IN !"_NNS Then_RB each_DT of_IN the_DT party_NN singed_JJ in_IN the_DT
fire_NN a_DT little_JJ bit_NN of_IN the_DT hide_NN which_WDT was_VBD tied_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ staff_NN ;_: and_CC
having_VBG done_VBN so_IN he_PRP applied_VBD the_DT singed_JJ hide_NN to_TO the_DT nose_NN of_IN every_DT
person_NN and_CC of_IN every_DT domestic_JJ animal_NN belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT house_NN ._. This_DT was_VBD
imagined_VBN to_TO secure_VB them_PRP from_IN diseases_NNS and_CC other_JJ misfortunes_NNS ,_,
particularly_RB from_IN witchcraft_NN ,_, throughout_IN the_DT ensuing_VBG year_NN ._. The_DT whole_NN
ceremony_NN was_VBD called_VBN calluinn_NN because_IN of_IN the_DT great_JJ noise_NN made_VBN in_IN
beating_VBG the_DT hide_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD observed_VBN in_IN the_DT Hebrides_NNP ,_, including_VBG St_NNP ._.
Kilda_NNP ,_, down_RB to_TO the_DT second_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN at_IN least_JJS ,_,
and_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB survived_VBN well_RB into_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN ._.




LV_NNP ._. The_DT Transference_NNP of_IN Evil_NNP



1._DT The_DT Transference_NNP to_TO Inanimate_NNP Objects_NNS

WE_NNP have_VBP now_RB traced_VBN the_DT practice_NN of_IN killing_VBG a_DT god_NN among_IN peoples_NNS in_IN
the_DT hunting_NN ,_, pastoral_JJ ,_, and_CC agricultural_JJ stages_NNS of_IN society_NN ;_: and_CC I_PRP
have_VBP attempted_VBN to_TO explain_VB the_DT motives_NNS which_WDT led_VBD men_NNS to_TO adopt_VB so_RB
curious_JJ a_DT custom_NN ._. One_CD aspect_NN of_IN the_DT custom_NN still_RB remains_VBZ to_TO be_VB
noticed_VBN ._. The_DT accumulated_VBN misfortunes_NNS and_CC sins_NNS of_IN the_DT whole_JJ people_NNS
are_VBP sometimes_RB laid_VBN upon_IN the_DT dying_VBG god_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO bear_VB them_PRP
away_RB for_IN ever_RB ,_, leaving_VBG the_DT people_NNS innocent_JJ and_CC happy_JJ ._. The_DT notion_NN
that_IN we_PRP can_MD transfer_VB our_PRP$ guilt_NN and_CC sufferings_NNS to_TO some_DT other_JJ being_VBG
who_WP will_MD bear_VB them_PRP for_IN us_PRP is_VBZ familiar_JJ to_TO the_DT savage_JJ mind_NN ._. It_PRP arises_VBZ
from_IN a_DT very_RB obvious_JJ confusion_NN between_IN the_DT physical_JJ and_CC the_DT mental_JJ ,_,
between_IN the_DT material_NN and_CC the_DT immaterial_JJ ._. Because_IN it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ to_TO
shift_VB a_DT load_NN of_IN wood_NN ,_, stones_NNS ,_, or_CC what_WP not_RB ,_, from_IN our_PRP$ own_JJ back_NN to_TO the_DT
back_RB of_IN another_DT ,_, the_DT savage_JJ fancies_NNS that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ equally_RB possible_JJ to_TO
shift_VB the_DT burden_NN of_IN his_PRP$ pains_NNS and_CC sorrows_NNS to_TO another_DT ,_, who_WP will_MD
suffer_VB them_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ stead_NN ._. Upon_IN this_DT idea_NN he_PRP acts_VBZ ,_, and_CC the_DT result_NN is_VBZ
an_DT endless_JJ number_NN of_IN very_RB unamiable_JJ devices_NNS for_IN palming_VBG off_RP upon_IN
some_DT one_CD else_RB the_DT trouble_NN which_WDT a_DT man_NN shrinks_VBZ from_IN bearing_VBG himself_PRP ._.
In_IN short_JJ ,_, the_DT principle_NN of_IN vicarious_JJ suffering_NN is_VBZ commonly_RB
understood_VBN and_CC practised_VBN by_IN races_NNS who_WP stand_VBP on_IN a_DT low_JJ level_NN of_IN social_JJ
and_CC intellectual_JJ culture_NN ._. In_IN the_DT following_JJ pages_NNS I_PRP shall_MD illustrate_VB
the_DT theory_NN and_CC the_DT practice_NN as_IN they_PRP are_VBP found_VBN among_IN savages_NNS in_IN all_PDT
their_PRP$ naked_JJ simplicity_NN ,_, undisguised_JJ by_IN the_DT refinements_NNS of_IN
metaphysics_NNS and_CC the_DT subtleties_NNS of_IN theology_NN ._.

The_DT devices_NNS to_TO which_WDT the_DT cunning_JJ and_CC selfish_JJ savage_JJ resorts_NNS for_IN the_DT
sake_NN of_IN easing_VBG himself_PRP at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN his_PRP$ neighbour_NN are_VBP manifold_RB ;_:
only_RB a_DT few_JJ typical_JJ examples_NNS out_IN of_IN a_DT multitude_NN can_MD be_VB cited_VBN ._. At_IN the_DT
outset_NN it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB observed_VBN that_IN the_DT evil_NN of_IN which_WDT a_DT man_NN seeks_VBZ to_TO
rid_VB himself_PRP need_VBP not_RB be_VB transferred_VBN to_TO a_DT person_NN ;_: it_PRP may_MD equally_RB well_RB
be_VB transferred_VBN to_TO an_DT animal_NN or_CC a_DT thing_NN ,_, though_IN in_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN the_DT
thing_NN is_VBZ often_RB only_RB a_DT vehicle_NN to_TO convey_VB the_DT trouble_NN to_TO the_DT first_JJ
person_NN who_WP touches_VBZ it_PRP ._. In_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT East_NNP Indian_NNP islands_NNS they_PRP think_VBP
that_IN epilepsy_NN can_MD be_VB cured_VBN by_IN striking_VBG the_DT patient_NN on_IN the_DT face_NN with_IN
the_DT leaves_NNS of_IN certain_JJ trees_NNS and_CC then_RB throwing_VBG them_PRP away_RB ._. The_DT disease_NN
is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO have_VB passed_VBN into_IN the_DT leaves_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO have_VB been_VBN thrown_VBN
away_RB with_IN them_PRP ._. To_TO cure_VB toothache_VBN some_DT of_IN the_DT Australian_JJ blacks_NNS
apply_VB a_DT heated_VBN spear-thrower_NN to_TO the_DT cheek_NN ._. The_DT spear-thrower_NN is_VBZ then_RB
cast_NN away_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT toothache_NN goes_VBZ with_IN it_PRP in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT black_JJ
stone_NN called_VBN karriitch_NN ._. Stones_NNS of_IN this_DT kind_NN are_VBP found_VBN in_IN old_JJ
mounds_NNS and_CC sandhills_NNS ._. They_PRP are_VBP carefully_RB collected_VBN and_CC thrown_VBN in_IN the_DT
direction_NN of_IN enemies_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO give_VB them_PRP toothache_VBN ._. The_DT Bahima_NNP ,_, a_DT
pastoral_JJ people_NNS of_IN Uganda_NNP ,_, often_RB suffer_VBP from_IN deep-seated_JJ abscesses_NNS :_:
"_`` their_PRP$ cure_NN for_IN this_DT is_VBZ to_TO transfer_VB the_DT disease_NN to_TO some_DT other_JJ person_NN
by_IN obtaining_VBG herbs_NNS from_IN the_DT medicine-man_NN ,_, rubbing_VBG them_PRP over_IN the_DT
place_NN where_WRB the_DT swelling_VBG is_VBZ ,_, and_CC burying_VBG them_PRP in_IN the_DT road_NN where_WRB
people_NNS continually_RB pass_VBP ;_: the_DT first_JJ person_NN who_WP steps_VBZ over_IN these_DT
buried_VBN herbs_NNS contracts_NNS the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT original_JJ patient_NN
recovers_NNS ."_CC

Sometimes_RB in_IN case_NN of_IN sickness_VBG the_DT malady_NN is_VBZ transferred_VBN to_TO an_DT effigy_NN
as_IN a_DT preliminary_JJ to_TO passing_VBG it_PRP on_IN to_TO a_DT human_JJ being_NN ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT
Baganda_NNP the_DT medicine-man_NN would_MD sometimes_RB make_VB a_DT model_NN of_IN his_PRP$ patient_NN
in_IN clay_NN ;_: then_RB a_DT relative_JJ of_IN the_DT sick_JJ man_NN would_MD rub_VB the_DT image_NN over_IN
the_DT sufferer_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN and_CC either_DT bury_VBP it_PRP in_IN the_DT road_NN \??\_IN it_PRP in_IN the_DT
grass_NN by_IN the_DT wayside_NN ._. The_DT first_JJ person_NN who_WP stepped_VBD over_IN the_DT image_NN or_CC
passed_VBN by_IN it_PRP would_MD catch_VB the_DT disease_NN ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT effigy_NN was_VBD made_VBN
out_IN of_IN a_DT plantain-flower_NN tied_VBN up_RP so_RB as_IN to_TO look_VB like_IN a_DT person_NN ;_: it_PRP was_VBD
used_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN as_IN the_DT clay_NN figure_NN ._. But_CC the_DT use_NN of_IN images_NNS for_IN
this_DT maleficent_JJ purpose_NN was_VBD a_DT capital_NN crime_NN ;_: any_DT person_NN caught_VBN in_IN
the_DT act_NN of_IN burying_VBG one_CD of_IN them_PRP in_IN the_DT public_JJ road_NN would_MD surely_RB have_VB
been_VBN put_VBN to_TO death_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT western_JJ district_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Timor_NNP ,_, when_WRB men_NNS or_CC women_NNS
are_VBP making_VBG long_RB and_CC tiring_VBG journeys_NNS ,_, they_PRP fan_VB themselves_PRP with_IN leafy_VBG
branches_NNS ,_, which_WDT they_PRP afterwards_RB throw_VBP away_RB on_IN particular_JJ spots_NNS where_WRB
their_PRP$ forefathers_NNS did_VBD the_DT same_JJ before_IN them_PRP ._. The_DT fatigue_NN which_WDT they_PRP
felt_VBN is_VBZ thus_RB supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB passed_VBN into_IN the_DT leaves_NNS and_CC to_TO be_VB left_VBN
behind_IN ._. Others_NNS use_VBP stones_NNS instead_RB of_IN leaves_NNS ._. Similarly_RB in_IN the_DT Babar_NNP
Archipelago_NNP tired_JJ people_NNS will_MD strike_VB themselves_PRP with_IN stones_NNS ,_,
believing_VBG that_IN they_PRP thus_RB transfer_VB to_TO the_DT stones_NNS the_DT weariness_NN which_WDT
they_PRP felt_VBD in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ bodies_NNS ._. They_PRP then_RB throw_VBP away_RB the_DT stones_NNS in_IN
places_NNS which_WDT are_VBP specially_RB set_VBN apart_RP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._. A_DT like_JJ belief_NN
and_CC practice_NN in_IN many_JJ distant_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN have_VBP given_VBN rise_NN to_TO
those_DT cairns_NNS or_CC heaps_NNS of_IN sticks_NNS and_CC leaves_NNS which_WDT travellers_NNS often_RB
observe_VB beside_IN the_DT path_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO which_WDT every_DT passing_NN native_NN adds_VBZ his_PRP$
contribution_NN in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT stone_NN ,_, or_CC stick_NN ,_, or_CC leaf_NN ._. Thus_RB in_IN the_DT
Solomon_NNP and_CC Banks_NNP '_POS Islands_NNP the_DT natives_NNS are_VBP wont_JJ to_TO throw_VB sticks_NNS ,_,
stones_NNS ,_, or_CC leaves_VBZ upon_IN a_DT heap_NN at_IN a_DT place_NN of_IN steep_JJ descent_NN ,_, or_CC where_WRB
a_DT difficult_JJ path_NN begins_VBZ ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_`` There_EX goes_VBZ my_PRP$ fatigue_NN ."_RB The_DT act_NN is_VBZ
not_RB a_DT religious_JJ rite_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT thing_NN thrown_VBN on_IN the_DT heap_NN is_VBZ not_RB an_DT
offering_VBG to_TO spiritual_JJ powers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT words_NNS which_WDT accompany_VB the_DT act_NN
are_VBP not_RB a_DT prayer_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ nothing_NN but_CC a_DT magical_JJ ceremony_NN for_IN getting_VBG
rid_VB of_IN fatigue_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT simple_JJ savage_JJ fancies_NNS he_PRP can_MD embody_VB in_IN a_DT
stick_NN ,_, leaf_NN ,_, or_CC stone_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB cast_VBD it_PRP from_IN him_PRP ._.



2._CD The_DT Transference_NN to_TO Animals_NNS

ANIMALS_NNS are_VBP often_RB employed_VBN as_IN a_DT vehicle_NN for_IN carrying_VBG away_RB or_CC
transferring_VBG the_DT evil_JJ ._. When_WRB a_DT Moor_NNP has_VBZ a_DT headache_NN he_PRP will_MD sometimes_RB
take_VB a_DT lamb_NN or_CC a_DT goat_NN and_CC beat_VB it_PRP till_IN it_PRP falls_VBZ down_RB ,_, believing_VBG that_IN
the_DT headache_NN will_MD thus_RB be_VB transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT animal_NN ._. In_IN Morocco_NNP most_JJS
wealthy_JJ Moors_NNP keep_VB a_DT wild_JJ boar_NN in_IN their_PRP$ stables_NNS ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT
jinn_NN and_CC evil_JJ spirits_NNS may_MD be_VB diverted_VBN from_IN the_DT horses_NNS and_CC enter_VB into_IN
the_DT boar_NN ._. Amongst_IN the_DT Caffres_NNP of_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, when_WRB other_JJ remedies_NNS
have_VBP failed_VBN ,_, "_`` natives_NNS sometimes_RB adopt_VBP the_DT custom_NN of_IN taking_VBG a_DT goat_NN
into_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC confess_VB the_DT sins_NNS of_IN the_DT kraal_NN
over_IN the_DT animal_NN ._. Sometimes_RB a_DT few_JJ drops_NNS of_IN blood_NN from_IN the_DT sick_JJ man_NN
are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO fall_VB on_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT goat_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ turned_VBN out_RB
into_IN an_DT uninhabited_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT veldt_NN ._. The_DT sickness_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO
be_VB transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT animal_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO become_VB lost_VBN in_IN the_DT desert_NN ."_NN In_IN
Arabia_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT plague_NN is_VBZ raging_VBG ,_, the_DT people_NNS will_MD sometimes_RB lead_VB a_DT
camel_NN through_IN all_PDT the_DT quarters_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT animal_NN
may_MD take_VB the_DT pestilence_NN on_IN itself_PRP ._. Then_RB they_PRP strangle_VBP it_PRP in_IN a_DT sacred_JJ
place_NN and_CC imagine_VB that_IN they_PRP have_VBP rid_VBN themselves_PRP of_IN the_DT camel_NN and_CC of_IN
the_DT plague_NN at_IN one_CD blow_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN when_WRB smallpox_NN is_VBZ raging_VBG the_DT
savages_NNS of_IN Formosa_NNP will_MD drive_VB the_DT demon_NN of_IN disease_NN into_IN a_DT sow_NN ,_, then_RB
cut_VBN off_RP the_DT animal_NN '_POS s_VBZ ears_NNS and_CC burn_VBP them_PRP or_CC it_PRP ,_, believing_VBG that_IN in_IN
this_DT way_NN they_PRP rid_VBD themselves_PRP of_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.

Amongst_IN the_DT Malagasy_NNP the_DT vehicle_NN for_IN carrying_VBG away_RB evils_NNS is_VBZ called_VBN a_DT
faditra_NN ._. "_'' The_DT faditra_NN is_VBZ anything_NN selected_VBN by_IN the_DT sikidy_JJ [_NN divining_NN
board_NN ]_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN taking_VBG away_RP any_DT hurtful_JJ evils_NNS or_CC diseases_NNS
that_WDT might_MD prove_VB injurious_JJ to_TO an_DT individual_NN '_POS s_VBZ happiness_NN ,_, peace_NN ,_, or_CC
prosperity_NN ._. The_DT faditra_NN may_MD be_VB either_DT ashes_NNS ,_, cut_VBD money_NN ,_, a_DT sheep_NN ,_, a_DT
pumpkin_NN ,_, or_CC anything_NN else_RB the_DT sikidy_NN may_MD choose_VB to_TO direct_VB ._. After_IN the_DT
particular_JJ article_NN is_VBZ appointed_VBN ,_, the_DT priest_NN counts_VBZ upon_IN it_PRP all_PDT the_DT
evils_NNS that_WDT may_MD prove_VB injurious_JJ to_TO the_DT person_NN for_IN whom_WP it_PRP is_VBZ made_VBN ,_,
and_CC which_WDT he_PRP then_RB charges_VBZ the_DT faditra_NN to_TO take_VB away_RP for_IN ever_RB ._. If_IN the_DT
faditra_NN be_VB ashes_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ blown_VBN ,_, to_TO be_VB carried_VBN away_RB by_IN the_DT wind_NN ._. If_IN it_PRP
be_VB cut_VBN money_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ thrown_VBN to_TO the_DT bottom_NN of_IN deep_JJ water_NN ,_, or_CC where_WRB it_PRP
can_MD never_RB be_VB found_VBN ._. If_IN it_PRP be_VB a_DT sheep_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ carried_VBN away_RB to_TO a_DT
distance_NN on_IN the_DT shoulders_NNS of_IN a_DT man_NN ,_, who_WP runs_VBZ with_IN all_DT his_PRP$ might_NN ,_,
mumbling_NN as_IN he_PRP goes_VBZ ,_, as_IN if_IN in_IN the_DT greatest_JJS rage_NN against_IN the_DT faditra_NN ,_,
for_IN the_DT evils_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ bearing_VBG away_RB ._. If_IN it_PRP be_VB a_DT pumpkin_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ carried_VBN
on_IN the_DT shoulders_NNS to_TO a_DT little_JJ distance_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX dashed_VBD upon_IN the_DT
ground_NN with_IN every_DT appearance_NN of_IN fury_NN and_CC indignation_NN ."_IN A_DT Malagasy_JJ
was_VBD informed_VBN by_IN a_DT diviner_NN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD doomed_VBN to_TO a_DT bloody_JJ death_NN ,_, but_CC
that_IN possibly_RB he_PRP might_MD avert_VB his_PRP$ fate_NN by_IN performing_VBG a_DT certain_JJ rite_NN ._.
Carrying_VBG a_DT small_JJ vessel_NN full_JJ of_IN blood_NN upon_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD to_TO mount_VB
upon_IN the_DT back_NN of_IN a_DT bullock_NN ;_: while_IN thus_RB mounted_VBN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD to_TO spill_VB the_DT
blood_NN upon_IN the_DT bullock_NN '_'' s_PRP head_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB send_VB the_DT animal_NN away_RB into_IN
the_DT wilderness_NN ,_, whence_IN it_PRP might_MD never_RB return_VB ._.

The_DT Bataks_NNP of_IN Sumatra_NNP have_VBP a_DT ceremony_NN which_WDT they_PRP call_VBP "_`` making_VBG the_DT
curse_NN to_TO fly_VB away_RB ."_VBN When_WRB a_DT woman_NN is_VBZ childless_JJ ,_, a_DT sacrifice_NN is_VBZ
offered_VBN to_TO the_DT gods_NNS of_IN three_CD grasshoppers_NNS ,_, representing_VBG a_DT head_NN of_IN
cattle_NNS ,_, a_DT buffalo_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT horse_NN ._. Then_RB a_DT swallow_NN is_VBZ set_VBN free_JJ ,_, with_IN a_DT
prayer_NN that_IN the_DT curse_NN may_MD fall_VB upon_IN the_DT bird_NN and_CC fly_VB away_RB with_IN it_PRP ._.
"_`` The_DT entrance_NN into_IN a_DT house_NN of_IN an_DT animal_NN which_WDT does_VBZ not_RB generally_RB
seek_VB to_TO share_VB the_DT abode_NN of_IN man_NN is_VBZ regarded_VBN by_IN the_DT Malays_NNP as_IN ominous_JJ

away_RB with_IN all_PDT the_DT ill-luck_JJ and_CC misfortunes_NNS of_IN the_DT occupier_NN ."_NN In_IN

freckles_NNS ,_, and_CC give_VB me_PRP rosy_JJ cheeks_NNS ."_VBP

Among_IN the_DT Badagas_NNP of_IN the_DT Neilgherry_NNP Hills_NNPS in_IN Southern_NNP India_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT

3._DT The_DT Transference_NNP to_TO Men_NNS

AGAIN_NNP ,_, men_NNS sometimes_RB play_VBP the_DT part_NN of_IN scapegoat_NN by_IN diverting_VBG to_TO
themselves_PRP the_DT evils_NNS that_WDT threaten_VBP others_NNS ._. When_WRB a_DT Cingalese_NNP is_VBZ
dangerously_RB ill_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT physicians_NNS can_MD do_VB nothing_NN ,_, a_DT devil-dancer_NN
is_VBZ called_VBN in_IN ,_, who_WP by_IN making_VBG offerings_NNS to_TO the_DT devils_NNS ,_, and_CC dancing_NN in_IN
the_DT masks_NNS appropriate_JJ to_TO them_PRP ,_, conjures_VBZ these_DT demons_NNS of_IN disease_NN ,_, one_CD
after_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, out_IN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ man_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN and_CC into_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ._. Having_VBG
thus_RB successfully_RB extracted_VBD the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT malady_NN ,_, the_DT artful_JJ
dancer_NN lies_VBZ down_RB on_IN a_DT bier_NN ,_, and_CC shamming_VBG death_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN to_TO an_DT open_JJ
place_NN outside_IN the_DT village_NN ._. Here_RB ,_, being_VBG left_VBN to_TO himself_PRP ,_, he_PRP soon_RB
comes_VBZ to_TO life_NN again_RB ,_, and_CC hastens_VBZ back_RB to_TO claim_VB his_PRP$ reward_NN ._. In_IN 1590_CD a_DT
Scotch_NN which_WDT of_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Agnes_NNP Sampson_NNP was_VBD convicted_VBN of_IN curing_VBG a_DT
certain_JJ Robert_NNP Kers_NNP of_IN a_DT disease_NN "_`` laid_VBD upon_IN him_PRP by_IN a_DT westland_NN

noise_NN was_VBD made_VBN by_IN the_DT witch_NN in_IN her_PRP$ efforts_NNS to_TO shift_VB the_DT disease_NN ,_, by_IN

Alexander_NNP Douglas_NNP of_IN Dalkeith_NNP ,_, who_WP dwined_VBD and_CC died_VBD of_IN it_PRP ,_, while_IN the_DT
original_JJ patient_NN ,_, Robert_NNP Kers_NNP ,_, was_VBD made_VBN whole_JJ ._.

"_`` In_IN one_CD part_NN of_IN New_NNP Zealand_NNP an_DT expiation_NN for_IN sin_NN was_VBD felt_VBN to_TO be_VB
necessary_JJ ;_: a_DT service_NN was_VBD performed_VBN over_IN an_DT individual_JJ ,_, by_IN which_WDT all_PDT

the_DT river_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB unbinding_VBG ,_, allowed_VBD it_PRP to_TO float_VB away_RB to_TO the_DT sea_NN ,_,
bearing_VBG their_PRP$ sins_NNS with_IN it_PRP ."_VBZ In_IN great_JJ emergencies_NNS the_DT sins_NNS of_IN the_DT
Rajah_NNP of_IN Manipur_NNP used_VBD to_TO be_VB transferred_VBN to_TO somebody_NN else_JJ ,_, usually_RB to_TO

their_PRP$ sins_NNS also_RB were_VBD washed_VBN away_RB and_CC fell_VBD on_IN the_DT human_JJ scapegoat_NN ._. To_TO
complete_VB the_DT transference_NN the_DT Rajah_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN made_VBD over_IN their_PRP$
fine_JJ robes_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ substitute_NN ,_, while_IN they_PRP themselves_PRP ,_, clad_VBN in_IN new_JJ

and_CC closely_RB embraces_VBZ the_DT dying_VBG Rajah_NNP ,_, saying_VBG to_TO him_PRP ,_, "_`` O_UH King_NNP ,_, I_PRP
undertake_VB to_TO bear_VB all_DT your_PRP$ sins_NNS and_CC diseases_NNS ._. May_NNP your_PRP$ Highness_NNP live_VB
long_JJ and_CC reign_JJ happily_RB ."_RB Having_VBG thus_RB taken_VBN to_TO himself_PRP the_DT sins_NNS of_IN
the_DT sufferer_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ sent_VBN away_RB from_IN the_DT country_NN and_CC never_RB more_RBR
allowed_VBN to_TO return_VB ._. At_IN Utch_NNP Kurgan_NNP in_IN Turkestan_NNP Mr_NNP ._. Schuyler_NNP saw_VBD an_DT
old_JJ man_NN who_WP was_VBD said_VBN to_TO get_VB his_PRP$ living_NN by_IN taking_VBG on_RP himself_PRP the_DT sins_NNS
of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ,_, and_CC thenceforth_RB devoting_VBG his_PRP$ life_NN to_TO prayer_NN for_IN their_PRP$

In_IN Uganda_NNP ,_, when_WRB an_DT army_NN had_VBD returned_VBN from_IN war_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT gods_NNS warned_VBN

booty_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO send_VB them_PRP back_RB under_IN a_DT strong_JJ guard_NN to_TO the_DT borders_NNS of_IN
the_DT country_NN from_IN which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD come_VBN ._. There_EX their_PRP$ limbs_NNS were_VBD broken_VBN
and_CC they_PRP were_VBD left_JJ to_TO die_VB ;_: for_IN they_PRP were_VBD too_RB crippled_VBN to_TO crawl_VB back_RB
to_TO Uganda_NNP ._. In_IN order_NN to_TO ensure_VB the_DT transference_NN of_IN the_DT evil_JJ to_TO these_DT
substitutes_NNS ,_, bunches_NNS of_IN grass_NN were_VBD rubbed_VBN over_IN the_DT people_NNS and_CC cattle_NNS
and_CC then_RB tied_VBN to_TO the_DT victims_NNS ._. After_IN that_IN the_DT army_NN was_VBD pronounced_VBN
clean_JJ and_CC was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO return_VB to_TO the_DT capital_NN ._. So_RB on_IN his_PRP$ accession_NN
a_DT new_JJ king_NN of_IN Uganda_NNP used_VBD to_TO wound_VB a_DT man_NN and_CC send_VB him_PRP away_RB as_IN a_DT
scapegoat_NN to_TO Bunyoro_NNP to_TO carry_VB away_RP any_DT uncleanliness_NN that_WDT might_MD
attach_VB to_TO the_DT king_NN or_CC queen_NN ._.



4._DT The_DT Transference_NNP of_IN Evil_NNP in_IN Europe_NNP

THE_DT EXAMPLES_NNS of_IN the_DT transference_NN of_IN evil_JJ hitherto_NN adduced_VBN have_VBP been_VBN
mostly_RB drawn_VBN from_IN the_DT customs_NNS of_IN savage_JJ or_CC barbarous_JJ peoples_NNS ._. But_CC
similar_JJ attempts_NNS to_TO shift_VB the_DT burden_NN of_IN disease_NN ,_, misfortune_NN ,_, and_CC sin_NN
from_IN one_CD '_POS s_PRP self_NN to_TO another_DT person_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO an_DT animal_NN or_CC thing_NN ,_, have_VBP
been_VBN common_JJ also_RB among_IN the_DT civilised_JJ nations_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ,_, both_DT in_IN
ancient_JJ and_CC modern_JJ times_NNS ._. A_DT Roman_NNP cure_NN for_IN fever_NN was_VBD to_TO pare_VB the_DT
patient_NN '_POS s_VBZ nails_NNS ,_, and_CC stick_VB the_DT parings_NNS with_IN wax_NN on_IN a_DT neighbour_NN '_'' s_PRP
door_NN before_IN sunrise_NN ;_: the_DT fever_NN then_RB passed_VBN from_IN the_DT sick_JJ man_NN to_TO his_PRP$
neighbour_NN ._. Similar_JJ devices_NNS must_MD have_VB been_VBN resorted_VBN to_TO by_IN the_DT Greeks_NNP ;_:
for_IN in_IN laying_VBG down_RP laws_NNS for_IN his_PRP$ ideal_JJ state_NN ,_, Plato_NNP thinks_VBZ it_PRP too_RB
much_JJ to_TO expect_VB that_DT men_NNS should_MD not_RB be_VB alarmed_VBN at_IN finding_VBG certain_JJ wax_NN
figures_NNS adhering_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ doors_NNS or_CC to_TO the_DT tombstones_NNS of_IN their_PRP$
parents_NNS ,_, or_CC lying_VBG at_IN cross-roads_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT fourth_JJ century_NN of_IN our_PRP$ era_NN
Marcellus_NNP of_IN Bordeaux_NNP prescribed_VBD a_DT cure_NN for_IN warts_NNS ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ still_RB a_DT
great_JJ vogue_NN among_IN the_DT superstitious_JJ in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ._. You_PRP
are_VBP to_TO touch_VB your_PRP$ warts_NNS with_IN as_IN many_JJ little_JJ stones_NNS as_IN you_PRP have_VBP
warts_NNS ;_: then_RB wrap_VB the_DT stones_NNS in_IN an_DT ivy_JJ leaf_NN ,_, and_CC throw_VB them_PRP away_RB in_IN a_DT
thoroughfare_NN ._. Whoever_WP picks_VBZ them_PRP up_RP will_MD get_VB the_DT warts_NNS ,_, and_CC you_PRP will_MD
be_VB rid_JJ of_IN them_PRP ._. People_NNS in_IN the_DT Orkney_NNP Islands_NNP will_MD sometimes_RB wash_VB a_DT
sick_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB throw_VB the_DT water_NN down_IN at_IN a_DT gateway_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT belief_NN
that_IN the_DT sickness_NN will_MD leave_VB the_DT patient_NN and_CC be_VB transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT
first_JJ person_NN who_WP passes_VBZ through_IN the_DT gate_NN ._. A_DT Bavarian_NNP cure_NN for_IN fever_NN
is_VBZ to_TO write_VB upon_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN paper_NN ,_, "_`` Fever_RB ,_, stay_VB away_RB ,_, I_PRP am_VBP not_RB at_IN
home_NN ,"_NN and_CC to_TO put_VB the_DT paper_NN in_IN somebody_NN '_POS s_PRP pocket_NN ._. The_DT latter_NN then_RB
catches_NNS the_DT fever_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ rid_JJ of_IN it_PRP ._. A_DT Bohemian_NN
prescription_NN for_IN the_DT same_JJ malady_NN is_VBZ this_DT ._. Take_VB an_DT empty_JJ pot_NN ,_, go_VB with_IN
it_PRP to_TO a_DT cross-road_JJ ,_, throw_VB it_PRP down_RB ,_, and_CC run_VB away_RB ._. The_DT first_JJ person_NN
who_WP kicks_VBZ against_IN the_DT pot_NN will_MD catch_VB your_PRP$ fever_NN ,_, and_CC you_PRP will_MD be_VB
cured_VBN ._.

Often_RB in_IN Europe_NNP ,_, as_IN among_IN savages_NNS ,_, an_DT attempt_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO transfer_VB a_DT
pain_NN or_CC malady_NN from_IN a_DT man_NN to_TO an_DT animal_NN ._. Grave_VB writers_NNS of_IN antiquity_NN
recommended_VBN that_IN ,_, if_IN a_DT man_NN be_VB stung_VBN by_IN a_DT scorpion_NN ,_, he_PRP should_MD sit_VB
upon_IN an_DT ass_NN with_IN his_PRP$ face_NN to_TO the_DT tail_NN ,_, or_CC whisper_VB in_IN the_DT animal_NN '_POS s_PRP
ear_NN ,_, "_'' A_DT scorpion_NN has_VBZ stung_VBN me_PRP ";_RB in_IN either_DT case_NN ,_, they_PRP thought_VBD ,_, the_DT
pain_NN would_MD be_VB transferred_VBN from_IN the_DT man_NN to_TO the_DT ass_NN ._. Many_JJ cures_NNS of_IN
this_DT sort_NN are_VBP recorded_VBN by_IN Marcellus_NNP ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, he_PRP tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN
the_DT following_VBG is_VBZ a_DT remedy_NN for_IN toothache_NN ._. Standing_VBG booted_VBN under_IN the_DT
open_JJ sky_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, you_PRP catch_VBP a_DT frog_NN by_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, spit_VBD into_IN its_PRP$
mouth_NN ,_, ask_VB it_PRP to_TO carry_VB away_RP the_DT ache_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB let_VB it_PRP go_VB ._. But_CC the_DT
ceremony_NN must_MD be_VB performed_VBN on_IN a_DT lucky_JJ day_NN and_CC at_IN a_DT lucky_JJ hour_NN ._. In_IN
Cheshire_NNP the_DT ailment_NN known_VBN as_IN aphtha_NN or_CC thrush_NN ,_, which_WDT affects_VBZ the_DT
mouth_NN or_CC throat_NN of_IN infants_NNS ,_, is_VBZ not_RB uncommonly_RB treated_VBN in_IN much_RB the_DT
same_JJ manner_NN ._. A_DT young_JJ frog_NN is_VBZ held_VBN for_IN a_DT few_JJ moments_NNS with_IN its_PRP$ head_NN
inside_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT sufferer_NN ,_, whom_WP it_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO relieve_VB by_IN
taking_VBG the_DT malady_NN to_TO itself_PRP ._. "_'' I_PRP assure_VBP you_PRP ,"_, said_VBD an_DT old_JJ woman_NN who_WP
had_VBD often_RB superintended_VBN such_JJ a_DT cure_NN ,_, "_'' we_PRP used_VBD to_TO hear_VB the_DT poor_JJ frog_NN
whooping_VBG and_CC coughing_VBG ,_, mortal_JJ bad_JJ ,_, for_IN days_NNS after_IN ;_: it_PRP would_MD have_VB
made_VBN your_PRP$ heart_NN ache_VB to_TO hear_VB the_DT poor_JJ creature_NN coughing_NN as_IN it_PRP did_VBD
about_IN the_DT garden_NN ."_IN A_DT Northamptonshire_NNP ,_, Devonshire_NNP ,_, and_CC Welsh_NNP cure_NN
for_IN a_DT cough_NN is_VBZ to_TO put_VB a_DT hair_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN '_'' s_PRP head_NN between_IN two_CD
slices_NNS of_IN buttered_JJ bread_NN and_CC give_VB the_DT sandwich_NN to_TO a_DT dog_NN ._. The_DT animal_NN
will_MD thereupon_RB catch_VB the_DT cough_NN and_CC the_DT patient_NN will_MD lose_VB it_PRP ._.
Sometimes_RB an_DT ailment_NN is_VBZ transferred_VBN to_TO an_DT animal_NN by_IN sharing_VBG food_NN
with_IN it_PRP ._. Thus_RB in_IN Oldenburg_NNP ,_, if_IN you_PRP are_VBP sick_JJ of_IN a_DT fever_NN you_PRP set_VBD a_DT
bowl_NN of_IN sweet_JJ milk_NN before_IN a_DT dog_NN and_CC say_VB ,_, "_`` Good_JJ luck_NN ,_, you_PRP hound_NN !_. may_MD
you_PRP be_VB sick_JJ and_CC I_PRP be_VB sound_JJ !"_IN Then_RB when_WRB the_DT dog_NN has_VBZ lapped_VBN some_DT of_IN
the_DT milk_NN ,_, you_PRP take_VBP a_DT swig_NN at_IN the_DT bowl_NN ;_: and_CC then_RB the_DT dog_NN must_MD lap_NN
again_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB you_PRP must_MD swig_VB again_RB ;_: and_CC when_WRB you_PRP and_CC the_DT dog_NN have_VBP
done_VBN it_PRP the_DT third_JJ time_NN ,_, he_PRP will_MD have_VB the_DT fever_NN and_CC you_PRP will_MD be_VB quit_VBN
of_IN it_PRP ._.

A_DT Bohemian_NNP cure_NN for_IN fever_NN is_VBZ to_TO go_VB out_RP into_IN the_DT forest_NN before_IN the_DT
sun_NN is_VBZ up_RB and_CC look_VB for_IN a_DT snipe_NN '_'' s_PRP nest_NN ._. When_WRB you_PRP have_VBP found_VBN it_PRP ,_, take_VB
out_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT young_JJ birds_NNS and_CC keep_VB it_PRP beside_IN you_PRP for_IN three_CD days_NNS ._.
Then_RB go_VB back_RB into_IN the_DT wood_NN and_CC set_VB the_DT snipe_JJ free_JJ ._. The_DT fever_NN will_MD
leave_VB you_PRP at_IN once_RB ._. The_DT snipe_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN it_PRP away_RB ._. So_RB in_IN Vedic_NNP times_NNS
the_DT Hindoos_NNP of_IN old_JJ sent_VBN consumption_NN away_RB with_IN a_DT blue_JJ jay_NN ._. They_PRP said_VBD ,_,
"_`` O_UH consumption_NN ,_, fly_VBP away_RB ,_, fly_VBP away_RB with_IN the_DT blue_JJ jay_NN !_. With_IN the_DT wild_JJ
rush_NN of_IN the_DT storm_NN and_CC the_DT whirlwind_NN ,_, oh_UH ,_, vanish_VBP away_RB !"_RB In_IN the_DT
village_NN of_IN Llandegla_NNP in_IN Wales_NNP there_EX is_VBZ a_DT church_NN dedicated_VBN to_TO the_DT
virgin_NN martyr_NN St_NNP ._. Tecla_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT falling_VBG sickness_NN is_VBZ ,_, or_CC used_VBN to_TO
be_VB ,_, cured_VBN by_IN being_VBG transferred_VBN to_TO a_DT fowl_NN ._. The_DT patient_NN first_RB washed_VBN
his_PRP$ limbs_NNS in_IN a_DT sacred_JJ well_RB hard_JJ by_IN ,_, dropped_VBD fourpence_CD into_IN it_PRP as_IN an_DT

Lord_NNP '_POS s_PRP prayer_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT fowl_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD a_DT cock_NN or_CC a_DT hen_NN according_VBG as_IN

of_IN day_NN ._. After_IN that_WDT he_PRP offered_VBD sixpence_NN and_CC departed_VBD ,_, leaving_VBG the_DT

have_VBP been_VBN transferred_VBN to_TO it_PRP from_IN the_DT man_NN or_CC woman_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD now_RB rid_VB
of_IN the_DT disorder_NN ._. As_IN late_JJ as_IN 1855_CD the_DT old_JJ parish_NN clerk_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN
remembered_VBN quite_RB well_RB to_TO have_VB seen_VBN the_DT birds_NNS staggering_VBG about_RB from_IN
the_DT effects_NNS of_IN the_DT fits_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN transferred_VBN to_TO them_PRP ._.

Often_RB the_DT sufferer_NN seeks_VBZ to_TO shift_VB his_PRP$ burden_NN of_IN sickness_NN or_CC ill-luck_NN
to_TO some_DT inanimate_JJ object_NN ._. In_IN Athens_NNP there_RB is_VBZ a_DT little_JJ chapel_NN of_IN St_NNP ._.
John_NNP the_DT Baptist_NNP built_VBD against_IN an_DT ancient_JJ column_NN ._. Fever_'' patients_NNS
resort_NN thither_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN attaching_VBG a_DT waxed_JJ thread_NN to_TO the_DT inner_JJ side_NN of_IN
the_DT column_NN believe_VBP that_IN they_PRP transfer_VB the_DT fever_NN from_IN themselves_PRP to_TO
the_DT pillar_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Mark_NNP of_IN Brandenburg_NNP they_PRP say_VBP that_IN if_IN you_PRP suffer_VBP
from_IN giddiness_NN you_PRP should_MD strip_VB yourself_PRP naked_JJ and_CC run_VB thrice_NN round_NN

giddiness_NN and_CC you_PRP will_MD be_VB rid_JJ of_IN it_PRP ._.

But_CC perhaps_RB the_DT thing_NN most_RBS commonly_RB employed_VBN in_IN Europe_NNP as_IN a_DT
receptacle_NN for_IN sickness_NN and_CC trouble_NN of_IN all_DT sorts_NNS is_VBZ a_DT tree_NN or_CC bush_NN ._.
A_DT Bulgarian_JJ cure_NN for_IN fever_NN is_VBZ to_TO run_VB thrice_NN around_IN a_DT willow-tree_NN at_IN
sunrise_NN ,_, crying_VBG ,_, "_`` The_DT fever_NN shall_MD shake_VB thee_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT sun_NN shall_MD warm_VB
me_PRP ."_VBP In_IN the_DT Greek_NNP island_NN of_IN Karpathos_NNP the_DT priest_NN ties_NNS a_DT red_JJ thread_NN
round_IN the_DT neck_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ person_NN ._. Next_JJ morning_NN the_DT friends_NNS of_IN the_DT

to_TO the_DT tree_NN ._. Italians_NNPS attempt_NN to_TO cure_VB fever_NN in_IN like_JJ manner_NN by_IN

fever_NN is_VBZ thus_RB believed_VBN to_TO be_VB tied_VBN up_RP to_TO the_DT tree_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT patient_NN to_TO

otherwise_RB the_DT fever_NN would_MD break_VB loose_JJ from_IN its_PRP$ bonds_NNS and_CC attack_VB him_PRP
afresh_JJ ._. A_DT Flemish_NNP cure_NN for_IN the_DT ague_NN is_VBZ to_TO go_VB early_RB in_IN the_DT morning_NN to_TO
an_DT old_JJ willow_NN ,_, tie_VB three_CD knots_NNS in_IN one_CD of_IN its_PRP$ branches_NNS ,_, say_VBP ,_,
"_`` Good-morrow_NNP ,_, Old_NNP One_CD ,_, I_PRP give_VBP thee_PRP the_DT cold_JJ ;_: good-morrow_JJ ,_, Old_NNP One_CD ,"_NN
then_RB turn_VB and_CC run_VB away_RB without_IN looking_VBG round_RB ._. In_IN Sonnenberg_NNP ,_, if_IN you_PRP
would_MD rid_VB yourself_PRP of_IN gout_NN you_PRP should_MD go_VB to_TO a_DT young_JJ fir-tree_NN and_CC tie_VB
a_DT knot_NN in_IN one_CD of_IN its_PRP$ twigs_NNS ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_`` God_NNP greet_JJS thee_PRP ,_, noble_JJ fir_NN ._. I_PRP
bring_VB thee_PRP my_PRP$ gout_NN ._. Here_RB will_MD I_PRP tie_VB a_DT knot_NN and_CC bind_NN my_PRP$ gout_NN into_IN it_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT name_NN ,"_NN etc_NN ._.

Another_DT way_NN of_IN transferring_VBG gout_NN from_IN a_DT man_NN to_TO a_DT tree_NN is_VBZ this_DT ._. Pare_NNP
the_DT nails_NNS of_IN the_DT sufferer_NN '_'' s_PRP fingers_NNS and_CC clip_VB some_DT hairs_NNS from_IN his_PRP$
legs_NNS ._. Bore_NN a_DT hole_NN in_IN an_DT oak_NN ,_, stuff_NN the_DT nails_NNS and_CC hair_NN in_IN the_DT hole_NN ,_,
stop_VB up_RP the_DT hole_NN again_RB ,_, and_CC smear_VB it_PRP with_IN cow_NN '_'' s_PRP dung_JJ ._. If_IN ,_, for_IN three_CD
months_NNS thereafter_RB ,_, the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ free_JJ of_IN gout_NN ,_, you_PRP may_MD be_VB sure_JJ the_DT
oak_NN has_VBZ it_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ stead_NN ._. In_IN Cheshire_NNP if_IN you_PRP would_MD be_VB rid_JJ of_IN warts_NNS ,_,
you_PRP have_VBP only_RB to_TO rub_VB them_PRP with_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN bacon_NN ,_, cut_VBD a_DT slit_NN in_IN the_DT
bark_NN of_IN an_DT ash-tree_JJ ,_, and_CC slip_VB the_DT bacon_NN under_IN the_DT bark_NN ._. Soon_RB the_DT
