Berkhampstead_RB ,_, in_IN Hertfordshire_NNP ,_, there_RB used_VBD to_TO be_VB certain_JJ oak-trees_NNS
which_WDT were_VBD long_RB celebrated_VBN for_IN the_DT cure_NN of_IN ague_NN ._. The_DT transference_NN of_IN
the_DT malady_NN to_TO the_DT tree_NN was_VBD simple_JJ but_CC painful_JJ ._. A_DT lock_NN of_IN the_DT
sufferer_NN '_POS s_PRP hair_NN was_VBD pegged_VBN into_IN an_DT oak_NN ;_: then_RB by_IN a_DT sudden_JJ wrench_NN he_PRP
left_VBN his_PRP$ hair_NN and_CC his_PRP$ ague_NN behind_IN him_PRP in_IN the_DT tree_NN ._.




LVI_NNP ._. The_DT Public_NNP Expulsion_NNP of_IN Evils_NNS



1._DT The_DT Omnipresence_NNP of_IN Demons_NNPS

IN_IN THE_DT FOREGOING_NN chapter_NN the_DT primitive_JJ principle_NN of_IN the_DT transference_NN
of_IN ills_NNS to_TO another_DT person_NN ,_, animal_NN ,_, or_CC thing_NN was_VBD explained_VBN and_CC
illustrated_VBN ._. But_CC similar_JJ means_NNS have_VBP been_VBN adopted_VBN to_TO free_VB a_DT whole_NN
community_NN from_IN diverse_JJ evils_NNS that_IN afflict_NN it_PRP ._. Such_JJ attempts_NNS to_TO
dismiss_VB at_IN once_RB the_DT accumulated_VBN sorrows_NNS of_IN a_DT people_NNS are_VBP by_IN no_DT means_NNS
rare_JJ or_CC exceptional_JJ ;_: on_IN the_DT contrary_NN they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN in_IN many_JJ
lands_NNS ,_, and_CC from_IN being_VBG occasional_JJ they_PRP tend_VBP to_TO become_VB periodic_JJ and_CC
annual_JJ ._.

It_PRP needs_VBZ some_DT effort_NN on_IN our_PRP$ part_NN to_TO realise_VB the_DT frame_NN of_IN mind_NN which_WDT
prompts_NNS these_DT attempts_NNS ._. Bred_NNP in_IN a_DT philosophy_NN which_WDT strips_VBZ nature_NN of_IN
personality_NN and_CC reduces_VBZ it_PRP to_TO the_DT unknown_JJ cause_NN of_IN an_DT orderly_JJ series_NN
of_IN impressions_NNS on_IN our_PRP$ senses_NNS ,_, we_PRP find_VBP it_PRP hard_JJ to_TO put_VB ourselves_PRP in_IN
the_DT place_NN of_IN the_DT savage_JJ ,_, to_TO whom_WP the_DT same_JJ impressions_NNS appear_VBP in_IN the_DT
guise_NN of_IN spirits_NNS or_CC the_DT handiwork_NN of_IN spirits_NNS ._. For_IN ages_NNS the_DT army_NN of_IN
spirits_NNS ,_, once_RB so_RB near_JJ ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN receding_VBG farther_RBR and_CC farther_RBR from_IN
us_PRP ,_, banished_VBN by_IN the_DT magic_JJ wand_NN of_IN science_NN from_IN hearth_NN and_CC home_NN ,_, from_IN
ruined_VBN cell_NN and_CC ivied_VBD tower_NN ,_, from_IN haunted_VBN glade_NN and_CC lonely_JJ mere_JJ ,_,
from_IN the_DT riven_JJ murky_JJ cloud_NN that_WDT belches_VBZ forth_RB the_DT lightning_NN ,_, and_CC
from_IN those_DT fairer_JJR clouds_NNS that_WDT pillow_VBP the_DT silvery_NN moon_NN or_CC fret_VB with_IN
flakes_NNS of_IN burning_VBG red_JJ the_DT golden_JJ eve_NN ._. The_DT spirits_NNS are_VBP gone_VBN even_RB from_IN
their_PRP$ last_JJ stronghold_NN in_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, whose_WP$ blue_JJ arch_NN no_DT longer_JJR passes_NNS ,_,
except_IN with_IN children_NNS ,_, for_IN the_DT screen_NN that_WDT hides_VBZ from_IN mortal_JJ eyes_NNS the_DT
glories_NNS of_IN the_DT celestial_JJ world_NN ._. Only_RB in_IN poets_NNS '_POS dreams_NNS or_CC impassioned_VBN
flights_NNS of_IN oratory_NN is_VBZ it_PRP given_VBN to_TO catch_VB a_DT glimpse_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ
flutter_NN of_IN the_DT standards_NNS of_IN the_DT retreating_VBG host_NN ,_, to_TO hear_VB the_DT beat_NN of_IN
their_PRP$ invisible_JJ wings_NNS ,_, the_DT sound_NN of_IN their_PRP$ mocking_VBG laughter_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT
swell_NN of_IN angel_NN music_NN dying_VBG away_RB in_IN the_DT distance_NN ._. Far_RB otherwise_RB is_VBZ it_PRP
with_IN the_DT savage_JJ ._. To_TO his_PRP$ imagination_NN the_DT world_NN still_RB teems_VBZ with_IN those_DT
motley_NN beings_NNS whom_WP a_DT more_RBR sober_JJ philosophy_NN has_VBZ discarded_VBN ._. Fairies_''
and_CC goblins_NNS ,_, ghosts_NNS and_CC demons_NNS ,_, still_RB hover_VBP about_IN him_PRP both_DT waking_VBG
and_CC sleeping_NN ._. They_PRP dog_NN his_PRP$ footsteps_NNS ,_, dazzle_VB his_PRP$ senses_NNS ,_, enter_VBP into_IN
him_PRP ,_, harass_NN and_CC deceive_JJ and_CC torment_JJ him_PRP in_IN a_DT thousand_CD freakish_JJ and_CC
mischievous_JJ ways_NNS ._. The_DT mishaps_VBG that_IN befall_JJ him_PRP ,_, the_DT losses_NNS he_PRP
sustains_NNS ,_, the_DT pains_NNS he_PRP has_VBZ to_TO endure_VB ,_, he_PRP commonly_RB sets_VBZ down_RP ,_, if_IN not_RB
to_TO the_DT magic_NN of_IN his_PRP$ enemies_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT spite_NN or_CC anger_NN or_CC caprice_NN of_IN the_DT
spirits_NNS ._. Their_PRP$ constant_JJ presence_NN wearies_NNS him_PRP ,_, their_PRP$ sleepless_JJ
malignity_NN exasperates_VBZ him_PRP ;_: he_PRP longs_VBZ with_IN an_DT unspeakable_JJ longing_NN to_TO
be_VB rid_JJ of_IN them_PRP altogether_RB ,_, and_CC from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ,_, driven_VBN to_TO bay_NN ,_, his_PRP$
patience_NN utterly_RB exhausted_VBD ,_, he_PRP turns_VBZ fiercely_RB on_IN his_PRP$ persecutors_NNS and_CC
makes_VBZ a_DT desperate_JJ effort_NN to_TO chase_VB the_DT whole_JJ pack_NN of_IN them_PRP from_IN the_DT
land_NN ,_, to_TO clear_VB the_DT air_NN of_IN their_PRP$ swarming_JJ multitudes_NNS ,_, that_IN he_PRP may_MD
breathe_VB more_RBR freely_RB and_CC go_VB on_IN his_PRP$ way_NN unmolested_JJ ,_, at_IN least_JJS for_IN a_DT
time_NN ._. Thus_RB it_PRP comes_VBZ about_IN that_IN the_DT endeavour_NN of_IN primitive_JJ people_NNS to_TO
make_VB a_DT clean_JJ sweep_NN of_IN all_DT their_PRP$ troubles_NNS generally_RB takes_VBZ the_DT form_NN of_IN
a_DT grand_JJ hunting_NN out_IN and_CC expulsion_NN of_IN devils_NNS or_CC ghosts_NNS ._. They_PRP think_VBP
that_IN if_IN they_PRP can_MD only_RB shake_VB off_RP these_DT their_PRP$ accursed_JJ tormentors_NNS ,_,
they_PRP will_MD make_VB a_DT fresh_JJ start_NN in_IN life_NN ,_, happy_JJ and_CC innocent_JJ ;_: the_DT tales_NNS
of_IN Eden_NNP and_CC the_DT old_JJ poetic_JJ golden_JJ age_NN will_MD come_VB true_JJ again_RB ._.



2._`` The_DT Occasional_JJ Expulsion_NN of_IN Evils_NNS

WE_NNP can_MD therefore_RB understand_VB why_WRB those_DT general_JJ clearances_NNS of_IN evil_JJ ,_, to_TO
which_WDT from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN the_DT savage_JJ resorts_NNS ,_, should_MD commonly_RB take_VB the_DT
form_NN of_IN a_DT forcible_JJ expulsion_NN of_IN devils_NNS ._. In_IN these_DT evil_JJ spirits_NNS
primitive_JJ man_NN sees_VBZ the_DT cause_NN of_IN many_JJ if_IN not_RB of_IN most_JJS of_IN his_PRP$ troubles_NNS ,_,
and_CC he_PRP fancies_VBZ that_IN if_IN he_PRP can_MD only_RB deliver_VB himself_PRP from_IN them_PRP ,_, things_NNS
will_MD go_VB better_RB with_IN him_PRP ._. The_DT public_NN attempts_VBZ to_TO expel_VB the_DT
accumulated_VBN ills_NNS of_IN a_DT whole_JJ community_NN may_MD be_VB divided_VBN into_IN two_CD
classes_NNS ,_, according_VBG as_IN the_DT expelled_VBN evils_NNS are_VBP immaterial_JJ and_CC
invisible_JJ or_CC are_VBP embodied_VBN in_IN a_DT material_NN vehicle_NN or_CC scape-goat_NN ._. The_DT
former_JJ may_MD be_VB called_VBN the_DT direct_JJ or_CC immediate_JJ expulsion_NN of_IN evils_NNS ;_: the_DT
latter_NN the_DT indirect_JJ or_CC mediate_JJ expulsion_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT expulsion_NN by_IN
scapegoat_NN ._. We_PRP begin_VBP with_IN examples_NNS of_IN the_DT former_JJ ._.

In_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Rook_NNP ,_, between_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP and_CC New_NNP Britain_NNP ,_, when_WRB any_DT
misfortune_NN has_VBZ happened_VBN ,_, all_PDT the_DT people_NNS run_VBP together_RB ,_, scream_NN ,_, curse_NN ,_,
howl_NN ,_, and_CC beat_VB the_DT air_NN with_IN sticks_NNS to_TO drive_VB away_RB the_DT devil_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ
supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT author_NN of_IN the_DT mishap_NN ._. From_IN the_DT spot_NN where_WRB the_DT
mishap_NN took_VBD place_NN they_PRP drive_VB him_PRP step_VB by_IN step_NN to_TO the_DT sea_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN
reaching_VBG the_DT shore_NN they_PRP redouble_VBP their_PRP$ shouts_NNS and_CC blows_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO
expel_VB him_PRP from_IN the_DT island_NN ._. He_PRP generally_RB retires_VBZ to_TO the_DT sea_NN or_CC to_TO the_DT
island_NN of_IN Lottin_NNP ._. The_DT natives_NNS of_IN New_NNP Britain_NNP ascribe_NN sickness_NN ,_,
drought_NN ,_, the_DT failure_NN of_IN crops_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN short_JJ all_DT misfortunes_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT
influence_NN of_IN wicked_JJ spirits_NNS ._. So_RB at_IN times_NNS when_WRB many_JJ people_NNS sicken_JJ and_CC
die_VB ,_, as_IN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT rainy_NN season_NN ,_, all_DT the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN
a_DT district_NN ,_, armed_VBN with_IN branches_NNS and_CC clubs_NNS ,_, go_VB out_RP by_IN moonlight_NN to_TO
the_DT fields_NNS ,_, where_WRB they_PRP beat_VBD and_CC stamp_VB on_IN the_DT ground_NN with_IN wild_JJ howls_NNS
till_IN morning_NN ,_, believing_VBG that_IN this_DT drives_NNS away_RB the_DT devils_NNS ;_: and_CC for_IN
the_DT same_JJ purpose_NN they_PRP rush_VBP through_IN the_DT village_NN with_IN burning_VBG torches_NNS ._.
The_DT natives_NNS of_IN New_NNP Caledonia_NNP are_VBP said_VBN to_TO believe_VB that_IN all_DT evils_NNS are_VBP
caused_VBN by_IN a_DT powerful_JJ and_CC malignant_JJ spirit_NN ;_: hence_RB in_IN order_NN to_TO rid_VB
themselves_PRP of_IN him_PRP they_PRP will_MD from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN dig_VB a_DT great_JJ pit_NN ,_, round_NN
which_WDT the_DT whole_JJ tribe_NN gathers_NNS ._. After_IN cursing_VBG the_DT demon_NN ,_, they_PRP fill_VBP up_RB
the_DT pit_NN with_IN earth_NN ,_, and_CC trample_NN on_IN the_DT top_NN with_IN loud_JJ shouts_NNS ._. This_DT
they_PRP call_VBP burying_VBG the_DT evil_JJ spirit_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Dieri_FW tribe_NN of_IN Central_NNP
Australia_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT serious_JJ illness_NN occurs_VBZ ,_, the_DT medicine-men_NNS expel_VBP
Cootchie_NNP or_CC the_DT devil_NN by_IN beating_VBG the_DT ground_NN in_IN and_CC outside_IN of_IN the_DT
camp_NN with_IN the_DT stuffed_JJ tail_NN of_IN a_DT kangaroo_NN ,_, until_IN they_PRP have_VBP chased_VBN the_DT
demon_NN away_RB to_TO some_DT distance_NN from_IN the_DT camp_NN ._.

When_WRB a_DT village_NN has_VBZ been_VBN visited_VBN by_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN disasters_NNS or_CC a_DT severe_JJ
epidemic_JJ ,_, the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN Minahassa_NNP in_IN Celebes_NNP lay_VBD the_DT blame_NN upon_IN
the_DT devils_NNS who_WP are_VBP infesting_VBG the_DT village_NN and_CC who_WP must_MD be_VB expelled_VBN
from_IN it_PRP ._. Accordingly_RB ,_, early_RB one_CD morning_NN all_DT the_DT people_NNS ,_, men_NNS ,_, women_NNS ,_,
and_CC children_NNS ,_, quit_VBD their_PRP$ homes_NNS ,_, carrying_VBG their_PRP$ household_NN goods_NNS with_IN
them_PRP ,_, and_CC take_VB up_RP their_PRP$ quarters_NNS in_IN temporary_JJ huts_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN
erected_IN outside_IN the_DT village_NN ._. Here_RB they_PRP spend_VBP several_JJ days_NNS ,_, offering_VBG
sacrifices_NNS and_CC preparing_VBG for_IN the_DT final_JJ ceremony_NN ._. At_IN last_JJ the_DT men_NNS ,_,
some_DT wearing_VBG masks_NNS ,_, others_NNS with_IN their_PRP$ faces_NNS blackened_VBN ,_, and_CC so_RB on_RB ,_,
but_CC all_DT armed_VBN with_IN swords_NNS ,_, guns_NNS ,_, pikes_NNS ,_, or_CC brooms_NNS ,_, steal_VBP cautiously_RB
and_CC silently_RB back_RB to_TO the_DT deserted_VBN village_NN ._. Then_RB ,_, at_IN a_DT signal_NN from_IN
the_DT priest_NN ,_, they_PRP rush_VBP furiously_RB up_RB and_CC down_RB the_DT streets_NNS and_CC into_IN and_CC
under_IN the_DT houses_NNS (_-LRB- which_WDT are_VBP raised_VBN on_IN piles_NNS above_IN the_DT ground_NN ),_.
yelling_VBG and_CC striking_VBG on_IN walls_NNS ,_, doors_NNS ,_, and_CC windows_NNS ,_, to_TO drive_VB away_RB the_DT
devils_NNS ._. Next_NNP ,_, the_DT priests_NNS and_CC the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS come_VBP with_IN the_DT
holy_JJ fire_NN and_CC march_NN nine_CD times_NNS round_RB each_DT house_NN and_CC thrice_NN round_VBP the_DT
ladder_NN that_IN leads_VBZ up_RB to_TO it_PRP ,_, carrying_VBG the_DT fire_NN with_IN them_PRP ._. Then_RB they_PRP
take_VB the_DT fire_NN into_IN the_DT kitchen_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP must_MD burn_VB for_IN three_CD days_NNS
continuously_RB ._. The_DT devils_NNS are_VBP now_RB driven_VBN away_RB ,_, and_CC great_JJ and_CC general_JJ
is_VBZ the_DT joy_NN ._.

The_DT Alfoors_NNP of_IN Halmahera_NNP attribute_VBP epidemics_NNS to_TO the_DT devil_NN who_WP comes_VBZ
from_IN other_JJ villages_NNS to_TO carry_VB them_PRP off_RP ._. So_RB ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO rid_VB the_DT
village_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, the_DT sorcerer_NN drives_NNS away_RB the_DT devil_NN ._. From_IN all_PDT
the_DT villagers_NNS he_PRP receives_VBZ a_DT costly_JJ garment_NN and_CC places_NNS it_PRP on_IN four_CD
vessels_NNS ,_, which_WDT he_PRP takes_VBZ to_TO the_DT forest_NN and_CC leaves_NNS at_IN the_DT spot_NN where_WRB
the_DT devil_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB ._. Then_RB with_IN mocking_VBG words_NNS he_PRP bids_VBZ the_DT
demon_NN abandon_VBP the_DT place_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Kei_NNP Islands_NNP to_TO the_DT south-west_NN of_IN New_NNP

Hence_RB in_IN times_NNS of_IN public_JJ misfortune_NN ,_, as_IN when_WRB an_DT epidemic_NN is_VBZ raging_VBG ,_,

dwell_VB in_IN the_DT trees_NNS ,_, ye_PRP evil_JJ spirits_NNS who_WP live_VBP in_IN the_DT grottoes_NNS ,_, ye_PRP

of_IN it_PRP ."_VBD Then_RB everybody_NN runs_VBZ home_NN as_RB fast_RB as_IN their_PRP$ legs_NNS can_MD carry_VB

In_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Nias_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT man_NN is_VBZ seriously_RB ill_JJ and_CC other_JJ

thereafter_RB the_DT village_NN is_VBZ in_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN siege_NN ,_, no_DT one_NN being_VBG allowed_VBN
to_TO enter_VB it_PRP ._.

When_WRB cholera_NN has_VBZ broken_VBN out_RP in_IN a_DT Burmese_NNP village_NN the_DT able-bodied_JJ men_NNS

When_WRB an_DT epidemic_NN is_VBZ raging_VBG on_IN the_DT Gold_NNP Coast_NNP of_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, the_DT

Accordingly_RB ,_, one_CD evening_NN the_DT men_NNS would_MD begin_VB to_TO rush_VB like_IN madmen_NNS

to_TO wigwam_VB asking_VBG for_IN presents_NNS ._. These_DT they_PRP received_VBD silently_RB ,_, till_IN

receiving_VBG it_PRP they_PRP uttered_VBD a_DT cry_NN of_IN joy_NN and_CC rushed_VBD from_IN the_DT hut_NN ,_, amid_IN

fate_NN as_IN sealed_VBN ._.

Sometimes_RB ,_, instead_RB of_IN chasing_VBG the_DT demon_NN of_IN disease_NN from_IN their_PRP$ homes_NNS ,_,

themselves_PRP take_VBP to_TO flight_NN and_CC attempt_NN to_TO prevent_VB him_PRP from_IN following_VBG
in_IN their_PRP$ tracks_NNS ._. Thus_RB when_WRB the_DT Patagonians_NNPS were_VBD attacked_VBN by_IN

with_IN their_PRP$ weapons_NNS and_CC throwing_VBG water_NN about_IN in_IN order_NN to_TO keep_VB off_RP the_DT

place_NN where_WRB they_PRP hoped_VBD to_TO be_VB beyond_IN his_PRP$ reach_NN ,_, they_PRP used_VBD by_IN way_NN of_IN

always_RB followed_VBD a_DT sinuous_JJ ,_, not_RB a_DT straight_JJ ,_, course_NN ;_: because_IN they_PRP said_VBD

to_TO come_VB up_RP with_IN them_PRP ._. When_WRB the_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN New_NNP Mexico_NNP were_VBD decimated_VBN

so_RB that_IN he_PRP might_MD not_RB be_VB able_JJ to_TO find_VB them_PRP ._.



3._`` The_DT Periodic_JJ Expulsion_NN of_IN Evils_NNS

THE_DT EXPULSION_NN of_IN evils_NNS ,_, from_IN being_VBG occasional_JJ ,_, tends_VBZ to_TO become_VB
periodic_JJ ._. It_PRP comes_VBZ to_TO be_VB thought_VBN desirable_JJ to_TO have_VB a_DT general_JJ
riddance_NN of_IN evil_JJ spirits_NNS at_IN fixed_JJ times_NNS ,_, usually_RB once_IN a_DT year_NN ,_, in_IN
order_NN that_IN the_DT people_NNS may_MD make_VB a_DT fresh_JJ start_NN in_IN life_NN ,_, freed_VBN from_IN all_PDT
the_DT malignant_JJ influences_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN long_RB accumulating_VBG about_IN
them_PRP ._. Some_DT of_IN the_DT Australian_JJ blacks_NNS annually_RB expelled_VBN the_DT ghosts_NNS of_IN
the_DT dead_JJ from_IN their_PRP$ territory_NN ._. The_DT ceremony_NN was_VBD witnessed_VBN by_IN the_DT
Rev_NNP ._. W_NNP ._. Ridley_NNP on_IN the_DT banks_NNS of_IN the_DT River_NNP Barwan_NNP ._. "_'' A_DT chorus_NN of_IN
twenty_CD ,_, old_JJ and_CC young_JJ ,_, were_VBD singing_VBG and_CC beating_VBG time_NN with_IN
boomerangs_NNS ._. ._. ._. ._. Suddenly_RB ,_, from_IN under_IN a_DT sheet_NN of_IN bark_NN darted_VBD a_DT man_NN
with_IN his_PRP$ body_NN whitened_VBN by_IN pipeclay_NN ,_, his_PRP$ head_NN and_CC face_NN coloured_VBN with_IN
lines_NNS of_IN red_JJ and_CC yellow_JJ ,_, and_CC a_DT tuft_NN of_IN feathers_NNS fixed_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT
stick_VBP two_CD feet_NNS above_IN the_DT crown_NN of_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._. He_PRP stood_VBD twenty_CD minutes_NNS
perfectly_RB still_RB ,_, gazing_VBG upwards_RB ._. An_DT aboriginal_NN who_WP stood_VBD by_IN told_VBD me_PRP
he_PRP was_VBD looking_VBG for_IN the_DT ghosts_NNS of_IN dead_JJ men_NNS ._. At_IN last_JJ he_PRP began_VBD to_TO move_VB
very_RB slowly_RB ,_, and_CC soon_RB rushed_VBD to_TO and_CC fro_IN at_IN full_JJ speed_NN ,_, flourishing_VBG a_DT
branch_NN as_IN if_IN to_TO drive_VB away_RB some_DT foes_NNS invisible_JJ to_TO us_PRP ._. When_WRB I_PRP thought_VBD
this_DT pantomime_NN must_MD be_VB almost_RB over_RB ,_, ten_CD more_JJR ,_, similarly_RB adorned_VBN ,_,
suddenly_RB appeared_VBD from_IN behind_IN the_DT trees_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT whole_JJ party_NN joined_VBN
in_IN a_DT brisk_JJ conflict_NN with_IN their_PRP$ mysterious_JJ assailants_NNS ._. ._. ._. ._. At_IN last_JJ ,_,
after_IN some_DT rapid_JJ evolutions_NNS in_IN which_WDT they_PRP put_VBD forth_RB all_DT their_PRP$
strength_NN ,_, they_PRP rested_VBD from_IN the_DT exciting_JJ toil_NN which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD kept_VBN up_RB
all_DT night_NN and_CC for_IN some_DT hours_NNS after_IN sunrise_NN ;_: they_PRP seemed_VBD satisfied_VBN
that_IN the_DT ghosts_NNS were_VBD driven_VBN away_RB for_IN twelve_CD months_NNS ._. They_PRP were_VBD
performing_VBG the_DT same_JJ ceremony_NN at_IN every_DT station_NN along_IN the_DT river_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP
am_VBP told_VBD it_PRP is_VBZ an_DT annual_JJ custom_NN ."_NN

Certain_JJ seasons_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN mark_NN themselves_PRP naturally_RB out_RP as_IN
appropriate_JJ moments_NNS for_IN a_DT general_JJ expulsion_NN of_IN devils_NNS ._. Such_PDT a_DT moment_NN
occurs_VBZ towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN an_DT Arctic_NNP winter_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT sun_NN reappears_NNS
on_IN the_DT horizon_NN after_IN an_DT absence_NN of_IN weeks_NNS or_CC months_NNS ._. Accordingly_RB ,_, at_IN
Point_NNP Barrow_NNP ,_, the_DT most_RBS northerly_RB extremity_NN of_IN Alaska_NNP ,_, and_CC nearly_RB of_IN
America_NNP ,_, the_DT Esquimaux_NNP choose_VBP the_DT moment_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN '_POS s_PRP reappearance_NN
to_TO hunt_VB the_DT mischievous_JJ spirit_NN Tu_NNP �_VBD a_DT from_IN every_DT house_NN ._. The_DT ceremony_NN
was_VBD witnessed_VBN by_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT United_NNP States_NNPS Polar_NNP Expedition_NNP ,_,
who_WP wintered_VBD at_IN Point_NNP Barrow_NNP ._. A_DT fire_NN was_VBD built_VBN in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT
council-house_NN ,_, and_CC an_DT old_JJ woman_NN was_VBD posted_VBN at_IN the_DT entrance_NN to_TO every_DT
house_NN ._. The_DT men_NNS gathered_VBD round_IN the_DT council-house_NN while_IN the_DT young_JJ
women_NNS and_CC girls_NNS drove_VBD the_DT spirit_NN out_IN of_IN every_DT house_NN with_IN their_PRP$
knives_NNS ,_, stabbing_VBG viciously_RB under_IN the_DT bunk_NN and_CC deer-skins_NNS ,_, and_CC
calling_VBG upon_IN Tu_NNP �_VBD a_DT to_TO be_VB gone_VBN ._. When_WRB they_PRP thought_VBD he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN driven_VBN
out_IN of_IN every_DT hole_NN and_CC corner_NN ,_, they_PRP thrust_VBD him_PRP down_RB through_IN the_DT hole_NN
in_IN the_DT floor_NN and_CC chased_VBD him_PRP into_IN the_DT open_JJ air_NN with_IN loud_JJ cries_NNS and_CC
frantic_JJ gestures_NNS ._. Meanwhile_RB the_DT old_JJ woman_NN at_IN the_DT entrance_NN of_IN the_DT
house_NN made_VBD passes_NNS with_IN a_DT long_JJ knife_NN in_IN the_DT air_NN to_TO keep_VB him_PRP from_IN
returning_VBG ._. Each_DT party_NN drove_VBD the_DT spirit_NN towards_IN the_DT fire_NN and_CC invited_VBN
him_PRP to_TO go_VB into_IN it_PRP ._. All_DT were_VBD by_IN this_DT time_NN drawn_VBN up_RB in_IN a_DT semicircle_NN
round_VB the_DT fire_NN ,_, when_WRB several_JJ of_IN the_DT leading_JJ men_NNS made_VBN specific_JJ
charges_NNS against_IN the_DT spirit_NN ;_: and_CC each_DT after_IN his_PRP$ speech_NN brushed_VBD his_PRP$
clothes_NNS violently_RB ,_, calling_VBG on_IN the_DT spirit_NN to_TO leave_VB him_PRP and_CC go_VB into_IN
the_DT fire_NN ._. Two_CD men_NNS now_RB stepped_VBD forward_RB with_IN rifles_NNS loaded_VBN with_IN blank_NN
cartridges_NNS ,_, while_IN a_DT third_JJ brought_VBD a_DT vessel_NN of_IN urine_NN and_CC flung_VBD it_PRP on_IN
the_DT flames_NNS ._. At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN one_CD of_IN the_DT men_NNS fired_VBD a_DT shot_NN into_IN the_DT
fire_NN ;_: and_CC as_IN the_DT cloud_NN of_IN steam_NN rose_VBD it_PRP received_VBD the_DT other_JJ shot_NN ,_,
which_WDT was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO finish_VB Tun_NNP �_IN a_DT for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG ._.

In_IN late_JJ autumn_NN ,_, when_WRB storms_NNS rage_NN over_IN the_DT land_NN and_CC break_VB the_DT icy_JJ
fetters_NNS by_IN which_WDT the_DT frozen_JJ sea_NN is_VBZ as_IN yet_RB but_CC slightly_RB bound_VBN ,_, when_WRB
the_DT loosened_VBN floes_NN are_VBP driven_VBN against_IN each_DT other_JJ and_CC break_NN with_IN loud_JJ
crashes_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT cakes_NNS of_IN ice_NN are_VBP piled_VBN in_IN wild_JJ disorder_NN one_CD
upon_IN another_DT ,_, the_DT Esquimaux_NNP of_IN Baffin_NNP Land_NNP fancy_NN they_PRP hear_VBP the_DT
voices_NNS of_IN the_DT spirits_NNS who_WP people_NNS the_DT mischief-laden_JJ air_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT
ghosts_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ knock_NN wildly_RB at_IN the_DT huts_NNS ,_, which_WDT they_PRP cannot_MD
enter_VB ,_, and_CC woe_NN to_TO the_DT hapless_JJ wight_NN whom_WP they_PRP catch_VBP ;_: he_PRP soon_RB sickens_.
and_CC dies_VBZ ._. Then_RB the_DT phantom_NN of_IN a_DT huge_JJ hairless_JJ dog_NN pursues_VBZ the_DT real_JJ
dogs_NNS ,_, which_WDT expire_VBP in_IN convulsions_NNS and_CC cramps_NNS at_IN sight_NN of_IN him_PRP ._. All_PDT
the_DT countless_JJ spirits_NNS of_IN evil_NN are_VBP abroad_RB striving_VBG to_TO bring_VB sickness_NN
and_CC death_NN ,_, foul_JJ weather_NN and_CC failure_NN in_IN hunting_NN on_IN the_DT Esquimaux_NNP ._.
Most_JJS dreaded_VBN of_IN all_PDT these_DT spectral_JJ visitants_NNS are_VBP Sedna_NNP ,_, mistress_NN of_IN
the_DT nether_JJ world_NN ,_, and_CC her_PRP$ father_NN ,_, to_TO whose_WP$ share_NN dead_JJ Esquimaux_NN
fall_NN ._. While_IN the_DT other_JJ spirits_NNS fill_VBP the_DT air_NN and_CC the_DT water_NN ,_, she_PRP rises_VBZ
from_IN under_IN ground_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ then_RB a_DT busy_JJ season_NN for_IN the_DT wizards_NNS ._. In_IN
every_DT house_NN you_PRP may_MD hear_VB them_PRP singing_VBG and_CC praying_VBG ,_, while_IN they_PRP
conjure_NN the_DT spirits_NNS ,_, seated_VBN in_IN a_DT mystic_JJ gloom_NN at_IN the_DT back_NN of_IN the_DT
hut_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ dimly_RB lit_VBN by_IN a_DT lamp_NN burning_VBG low_JJ ._. The_DT hardest_JJS task_NN of_IN
all_DT is_VBZ to_TO drive_VB away_RB Sedna_NNP ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ reserved_VBN for_IN the_DT most_JJS
powerful_JJ enchanter_NN ._. A_DT rope_NN is_VBZ coiled_VBN on_IN the_DT floor_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ hut_NN in_IN
such_PDT a_DT way_NN as_IN to_TO leave_VB a_DT small_JJ opening_NN at_IN the_DT top_NN ,_, which_WDT represents_VBZ
the_DT breathing_NN hole_NN of_IN a_DT seal_NN ._. Two_CD enchanters_NNS stand_VBP beside_IN it_PRP ,_, one_CD of_IN
them_PRP grasping_VBG a_DT spear_NN as_IN if_IN he_PRP were_VBD watching_VBG a_DT seal-hole_NN in_IN winter_NN ,_,

back_RB of_IN the_DT hut_NN chanting_VBG a_DT magic_JJ song_NN to_TO lure_VB Sedna_NNP to_TO the_DT spot_NN ._. Now_RB
she_PRP is_VBZ heard_VBN approaching_VBG under_IN the_DT floor_NN of_IN the_DT hut_NN ,_, breathing_VBG
heavily_RB ;_: now_RB she_PRP emerges_VBZ at_IN the_DT hole_NN ;_: now_RB she_PRP is_VBZ harpooned_VBN and_CC sinks_NNS
away_RB in_IN angry_JJ haste_NN ,_, dragging_VBG the_DT harpoon_NN with_IN her_PRP ,_, while_IN the_DT two_CD
men_NNS hold_VBP on_RP to_TO the_DT line_NN with_IN all_DT their_PRP$ might_NN ._. The_DT struggle_NN is_VBZ

enchanters_NNS proudly_RB exhibit_VBP as_IN a_DT proof_NN of_IN their_PRP$ prowess_NN ._. Thus_RB Sedna_.
and_CC the_DT other_JJ evil_JJ spirits_NNS are_VBP at_IN last_JJ driven_JJ away_RB ,_, and_CC next_JJ day_NN a_DT
great_JJ festival_NN is_VBZ celebrated_VBN by_IN old_JJ and_CC young_JJ in_IN honour_NN of_IN the_DT
event_NN ._. But_CC they_PRP must_MD still_RB be_VB cautious_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT wounded_JJ Sedna_NNP is_VBZ

they_PRP all_DT wear_VBP amulets_NNS on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN their_PRP$ hoods_NNS to_TO protect_VB

The_DT Iroquois_NNP inaugurated_VBD the_DT new_JJ year_NN in_IN January_NNP ,_, February_NNP ,_, or_CC March_NNP
(_-LRB- the_DT time_NN varied_VBN )_-RRB- with_IN a_DT "_`` festival_NN of_IN dreams_NNS "_'' like_IN that_WDT which_WDT the_DT
Hurons_NNP observed_VBD on_IN special_JJ occasions_NNS ._. The_DT whole_JJ ceremonies_NNS lasted_VBN
several_JJ days_NNS ,_, or_CC even_RB weeks_NNS ,_, and_CC formed_VBD a_DT kind_NN of_IN saturnalia_NNS ._. Men_NN
and_CC women_NNS ,_, variously_RB disguised_VBN ,_, went_VBD from_IN wigwam_NN to_TO wigwam_VB smashing_VBG
and_CC throwing_VBG down_RP whatever_WDT they_PRP came_VBD across_IN ._. It_PRP was_VBD a_DT time_NN of_IN
general_JJ license_NN ;_: the_DT people_NNS were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ senses_NNS ,_,
and_CC therefore_RB not_RB to_TO be_VB responsible_JJ for_IN what_WP they_PRP did_VBD ._. Accordingly_RB ,_,
many_JJ seized_VBD the_DT opportunity_NN of_IN paying_VBG off_RP old_JJ scores_NNS by_IN belabouring_VBG
obnoxious_JJ persons_NNS ,_, drenching_VBG them_PRP with_IN ice-cold_JJ water_NN ,_, and_CC covering_VBG
them_PRP with_IN filth_NN or_CC hot_JJ ashes_NNS ._. Others_NNS seized_VBD burning_VBG brands_NNS or_CC coals_NNS
and_CC flung_VBD them_PRP at_IN the_DT heads_NNS of_IN the_DT first_JJ persons_NNS they_PRP met_VBD ._. The_DT only_RB
way_NN of_IN escaping_VBG from_IN these_DT persecutors_NNS was_VBD to_TO guess_VB what_WP they_PRP had_VBD
dreamed_VBN of_IN ._. On_IN one_CD day_NN of_IN the_DT festival_NN the_DT ceremony_NN of_IN driving_NN away_RB
evil_JJ spirits_NNS from_IN the_DT village_NN took_VBD place_NN ._. Men_NNPS clothed_VBD in_IN the_DT skins_NNS
of_IN wild_JJ beasts_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ faces_NNS covered_VBN with_IN hideous_JJ masks_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$
hands_NNS with_IN the_DT shell_NN of_IN the_DT tortoise_NN ,_, went_VBD from_IN hut_NN to_TO hut_NN making_VBG
frightful_JJ noises_NNS ;_: in_IN every_DT hut_NN they_PRP took_VBD the_DT fuel_NN from_IN the_DT fire_NN and_CC
scattered_VBN the_DT embers_NNS and_CC ashes_NNS about_IN the_DT floor_NN with_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ._. The_DT
general_JJ confession_NN of_IN sins_NNS which_WDT preceded_VBD the_DT festival_NN was_VBD probably_RB
a_DT preparation_NN for_IN the_DT public_JJ expulsion_NN of_IN evil_JJ influences_NNS ;_: it_PRP was_VBD a_DT
way_NN of_IN stripping_VBG the_DT people_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ moral_JJ burdens_NNS ,_, that_IN these_DT might_MD
be_VB collected_VBN and_CC cast_VBN out_RP ._.

In_IN September_NNP the_DT Incas_NNP of_IN Peru_NNP celebrated_VBD a_DT festival_NN called_JJ Situa_NNP ,_,
the_DT object_NN of_IN which_WDT was_VBD to_TO banish_VB from_IN the_DT capital_NN and_CC its_PRP$ vicinity_NN
all_DT disease_NN and_CC trouble_NN ._. The_DT festival_NN fell_VBD in_IN September_NNP because_IN the_DT
rains_NNS begin_VBP about_IN this_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT first_JJ rains_NNS there_RB was_VBD
generally_RB much_JJ sickness_NN ._. As_IN a_DT preparation_NN for_IN the_DT festival_NN the_DT
people_NNS fasted_VBD on_IN the_DT first_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT moon_NN after_IN the_DT autumnal_NN
equinox_NN ._. Having_VBG fasted_VBN during_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT night_NN being_VBG come_VBN ,_,
they_PRP baked_VBN a_DT coarse_JJ paste_NN of_IN maize_NN ._. This_DT paste_NN was_VBD made_VBN of_IN two_CD
sorts_NNS ._. One_CD was_VBD kneaded_VBN with_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN children_NNS aged_VBN from_IN five_CD to_TO
ten_CD years_NNS ,_, the_DT blood_NN being_VBG obtained_VBN by_IN bleeding_VBG the_DT children_NNS between_IN
the_DT eyebrows_NNS ._. These_DT two_CD kinds_NNS of_IN paste_NN were_VBD baked_VBN separately_RB ,_,
because_IN they_PRP were_VBD for_IN different_JJ uses_NNS ._. Each_DT family_NN assembled_VBD at_IN the_DT
house_NN of_IN the_DT eldest_JJS brother_NN to_TO celebrate_VB the_DT feast_NN ;_: and_CC those_DT who_WP
had_VBD no_DT elder_JJR brother_NN went_VBD to_TO the_DT house_NN of_IN their_PRP$ next_JJ relation_NN of_IN
greater_JJR age_NN ._. On_IN the_DT same_JJ night_NN all_DT who_WP had_VBD fasted_VBN during_IN the_DT day_NN
washed_VBN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS ,_, and_CC taking_VBG a_DT little_JJ of_IN the_DT blood-kneaded_JJ paste_NN ,_,
rubbed_VBD it_PRP over_IN their_PRP$ head_NN ,_, face_NN ,_, breast_NN ,_, shoulders_NNS ,_, arms_NNS and_CC legs_NNS ._.
They_PRP did_VBD this_DT in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT paste_NN might_MD take_VB away_RP all_DT their_PRP$
infirmities_NNS ._. After_IN this_DT the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN anointed_VBD the_DT
threshold_NN with_IN the_DT same_JJ paste_NN ,_, and_CC left_VBD it_PRP there_RB as_IN a_DT token_NN that_IN the_DT
inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN had_VBD performed_VBN their_PRP$ ablutions_NNS and_CC cleansed_JJ
their_PRP$ bodies_NNS ._. Meantime_RB the_DT High_NNP Priest_NNP performed_VBD the_DT same_JJ ceremonies_NNS
in_IN the_DT temple_NN of_IN the_DT Sun_NNP ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT Sun_NNP rose_VBD ,_, all_PDT the_DT people_NNS
worshipped_VBN and_CC besought_VBN him_PRP to_TO drive_VB all_DT evils_NNS out_IN of_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, and_CC
then_RB they_PRP broke_VBD their_PRP$ fast_JJ with_IN the_DT paste_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN kneaded_VBN
without_IN blood_NN ._. When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD paid_VBN their_PRP$ worship_NN and_CC broken_VBN their_PRP$
fast_RB ,_, which_WDT they_PRP did_VBD at_IN a_DT stated_JJ hour_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN all_DT might_MD adore_VB
the_DT Sun_NNP as_IN one_CD man_NN ,_, an_DT Inca_NNP of_IN the_DT blood_NN royal_NN came_VBD forth_RB from_IN the_DT
fortress_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT messenger_NN of_IN the_DT Sun_NNP ,_, richly_RB dressed_VBN ,_, with_IN his_PRP$ mantle_NN

their_PRP$ four_CD lances_NNS with_IN his_PRP$ lance_NN ,_, and_CC told_VBD them_PRP that_IN the_DT Sun_NNP bade_NN
them_PRP ,_, as_IN his_PRP$ messengers_NNS ,_, drive_VB the_DT evils_NNS out_IN of_IN the_DT city_NN ._. The_DT four_CD
Incas_NNP then_RB separated_VBD and_CC ran_VBD down_IN the_DT four_CD royal_JJ roads_NNS which_WDT led_VBD out_IN
of_IN the_DT city_NN to_TO the_DT four_CD quarters_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ._. While_IN they_PRP ran_VBD ,_, all_RB
the_DT people_NNS ,_, great_JJ and_CC small_JJ ,_, came_VBD to_TO the_DT doors_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, and_CC

they_PRP were_VBD shaking_VBG off_RP dust_NN ,_, while_IN they_PRP cried_VBD ,_, "_`` Let_VB the_DT evils_NNS be_VB
gone_VBN ._. How_WRB greatly_RB desired_VBN has_VBZ this_DT festival_NN been_VBN by_IN us_PRP ._. O_NNP Creator_NNP of_IN
all_DT things_NNS ,_, permit_VBP us_PRP to_TO reach_VB another_DT year_NN ,_, that_IN we_PRP may_MD see_VB another_DT

Incas_NNP ran_VBD ,_, but_CC generally_RB in_IN all_DT quarters_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN ._. Moreover_RB ,_, they_PRP
all_DT danced_VBD ,_, the_DT Inca_NNP himself_PRP amongst_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC bathed_VBN in_IN the_DT rivers_NNS
and_CC fountains_NNS ,_, saying_VBG that_IN their_PRP$ maladies_NNS would_MD come_VB out_RB of_IN them_PRP ._.

they_PRP lighted_VBD ,_, and_CC passed_VBD from_IN one_CD to_TO the_DT other_JJ ,_, striking_VBG each_DT other_JJ
with_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC saying_VBG ,_, "_`` Let_VB all_DT harm_VB go_VB away_RB ."_RB Meanwhile_RB the_DT runners_NNS
ran_VBD with_IN their_PRP$ lances_NNS for_IN a_DT quarter_NN of_IN a_DT league_NN outside_IN the_DT city_NN ,_,
where_WRB they_PRP found_VBD four_CD other_JJ Incas_NNP ready_JJ ,_, who_WP received_VBD the_DT lances_NNS
from_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS and_CC ran_VBD with_IN them_PRP ._. Thus_RB the_DT lances_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN by_IN

of_IN which_WDT the_DT runners_NNS washed_VBD themselves_PRP and_CC their_PRP$ weapons_NNS in_IN rivers_NNS ,_,
and_CC set_VBD up_RP the_DT lances_NNS ,_, in_IN sign_NN of_IN a_DT boundary_NN within_IN which_WDT the_DT
banished_VBN evils_NNS might_MD not_RB return_VB ._.

The_DT negroes_NNS of_IN Guinea_NNP annually_RB banish_VB the_DT devil_NN from_IN all_DT their_PRP$ towns_NNS
with_IN much_JJ ceremony_NN at_IN a_DT time_NN set_VBN apart_RB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._. At_IN Axim_NNP ,_, on_IN
the_DT Gold_NNP Coast_NNP ,_, this_DT annual_JJ expulsion_NN is_VBZ preceded_VBN by_IN a_DT feast_NN of_IN
eight_CD days_NNS ,_, during_IN which_WDT mirth_NN and_CC jollity_NN ,_, skipping_VBG ,_, dancing_VBG ,_, and_CC
singing_NN prevail_VBP ,_, and_CC "_`` a_DT perfect_JJ lampooning_NN liberty_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN ,_, and_CC
scandal_NN so_RB highly_RB exalted_JJ ,_, that_IN they_PRP may_MD freely_RB sing_VB of_IN all_PDT the_DT
faults_NNS ,_, villanies_NNS ,_, and_CC frauds_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ superiors_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN

interruption_NN ."_NN On_IN the_DT eighth_JJ day_NN they_PRP hunt_VBP out_IN the_DT devil_NN with_IN a_DT
dismal_JJ cry_NN ,_, running_VBG after_IN him_PRP and_CC pelting_VBG him_PRP with_IN sticks_NNS ,_, stones_NNS ,_,
and_CC whatever_WDT comes_VBZ to_TO hand_VB ._. When_WRB they_PRP have_VBP driven_VBN him_PRP far_RB enough_RB out_IN
of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, they_PRP all_DT return_NN ._. In_IN this_DT way_NN he_PRP is_VBZ expelled_VBN from_IN more_RBR
than_IN a_DT hundred_CD towns_NNS at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ._. To_TO make_VB sure_JJ that_IN he_PRP does_VBZ not_RB
return_NN to_TO their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, the_DT women_NNS wash_VBP and_CC scour_VBP all_DT their_PRP$ wooden_JJ
and_CC earthen_NN vessels_NNS ,_, "_'' to_TO free_JJ them_PRP from_IN all_DT uncleanness_NN and_CC the_DT
devil_NN ."_NNS

At_IN Cape_NNP Coast_NNP Castle_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT Gold_NNP Coast_NNP ,_, the_DT ceremony_NN was_VBD witnessed_VBN
on_IN the_DT ninth_NN of_IN October_NNP ,_, 1844,_CD by_IN an_DT Englishman_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ described_VBN
it_PRP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: "_`` To-night_VB the_DT annual_JJ custom_NN of_IN driving_VBG the_DT evil_NN
spirit_NN ,_, Abonsam_NNP ,_, out_IN of_IN the_DT town_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN place_NN ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT
eight_CD o_IN '_'' clock_NN gun_NN fired_VBD in_IN the_DT fort_NN the_DT people_NNS began_VBD firing_VBG muskets_NNS
in_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, turning_VBG all_PDT their_PRP$ furniture_NN out_IN of_IN doors_NNS ,_, beating_VBG
about_IN in_IN every_DT corner_NN of_IN the_DT rooms_NNS with_IN sticks_NNS ,_, etc_FW .,_. and_CC screaming_VBG
as_RB loudly_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO frighten_VB the_DT devil_NN ._. Being_VBG driven_VBN
out_IN of_IN the_DT houses_NNS ,_, as_IN they_PRP imagine_VBP ,_, they_PRP sallied_VBD forth_RB into_IN the_DT
streets_NNS ,_, throwing_VBG lighted_VBN torches_NNS about_RB ,_, shouting_VBG ,_, screaming_VBG ,_,
beating_VBG sticks_NNS together_RB ,_, rattling_VBG old_JJ pans_NNS ,_, making_VBG the_DT most_JJS horrid_NN
noise_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO drive_VB him_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT town_NN into_IN the_DT sea_NN ._. The_DT
custom_NN is_VBZ preceded_VBN by_IN four_CD weeks_NNS '_POS dead_JJ silence_NN ;_: no_DT gun_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO
be_VB fired_VBN ,_, no_DT drum_NN to_TO be_VB beaten_VBN ,_, no_DT palaver_NN to_TO be_VB made_VBN between_IN man_NN
and_CC man_NN ._. If_IN ,_, during_IN these_DT weeks_NNS ,_, two_CD natives_NNS should_MD disagree_VB and_CC
make_VB a_DT noise_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP immediately_RB taken_VBN before_IN the_DT king_NN
and_CC fined_VBD heavily_RB ._. If_IN a_DT dog_NN or_CC pig_NN ,_, sheep_NN or_CC goat_NN be_VB found_VBN at_IN large_JJ
in_IN the_DT street_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB killed_VBN ,_, or_CC taken_VBN by_IN anyone_NN ,_, the_DT former_JJ
owner_NN not_RB being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO demand_VB any_DT compensation_NN ._. This_DT silence_NN is_VBZ
designed_VBN to_TO deceive_VB Abonsam_NNP ,_, that_IN ,_, being_VBG off_RP his_PRP$ guard_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD be_VB
taken_VBN by_IN surprise_NN ,_, and_CC frightened_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT place_NN ._. If_IN anyone_NN die_VBP
during_IN the_DT silence_NN ,_, his_PRP$ relatives_NNS are_VBP not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO weep_VB until_IN the_DT
four_CD weeks_NNS have_VBP been_VBN completed_VBN ."_.

Sometimes_RB the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT annual_JJ expulsion_NN of_IN devils_NNS is_VBZ fixed_VBN with_IN
reference_NN to_TO the_DT agricultural_JJ seasons_NNS ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT Hos_NNS of_IN
Togoland_NNP ,_, in_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, the_DT expulsion_NN is_VBZ performed_VBN annually_RB before_IN
the_DT people_NNS partake_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ yams_NNS ._. The_DT chiefs_NNS summon_IN the_DT priests_NNS
and_CC magicians_NNS and_CC tell_VB them_PRP that_IN the_DT people_NNS are_VBP now_RB to_TO eat_VB the_DT new_JJ
yams_NNS and_CC be_VB merry_JJ ,_, therefore_RB they_PRP must_MD cleanse_VB the_DT town_NN and_CC remove_VB
the_DT evils_NNS ._. Accordingly_RB the_DT evil_JJ spirits_NNS ,_, witches_NNS ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT ills_NNS
that_IN infest_NN the_DT people_NNS are_VBP conjured_VBN into_IN bundles_NNS of_IN leaves_NNS and_CC
creepers_NNS ,_, fastened_VBN to_TO poles_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP carried_VBN away_RB and_CC set_VBD up_RP in_IN
the_DT earth_NN on_IN various_JJ roads_NNS outside_IN the_DT town_NN ._. During_IN the_DT following_VBG
night_NN no_DT fire_NN may_MD be_VB lit_VBN and_CC no_DT food_NN eaten_VBN ._. Next_NNP morning_NN the_DT women_NNS
sweep_NN out_IN their_PRP$ hearths_NNS and_CC houses_NNS ,_, and_CC deposit_NN the_DT sweepings_NNS on_IN
broken_JJ wooden_JJ plates_NNS ._. Then_RB the_DT people_NNS pray_NN ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_`` All_DT ye_PRP
sicknesses_NNS that_WDT are_VBP in_IN our_PRP$ body_NN and_CC plague_NN us_PRP ,_, we_PRP are_VBP come_VBN to-day_JJ to_TO
throw_VB you_PRP out_RB ."_RB Thereupon_IN they_PRP run_VBP as_RB fast_RB as_IN they_PRP can_MD in_IN the_DT
direction_NN of_IN Mount_NNP Adaklu_NNP ,_, smiting_VBG their_PRP$ mouths_NNS and_CC screaming_VBG ,_, "_'' Out_IN
to-day_NN !_. Out_IN to-day_JJ !_. That_IN which_WDT kills_VBZ anybody_NN ,_, out_IN to-day_NN !_. Ye_. evil_NN
spirits_NNS ,_, out_RB to-day_JJ !_. and_CC all_PDT that_DT causes_VBZ our_PRP$ heads_NNS to_TO ache_VB ,_, out_IN
to-day_JJ !_. Anlo_NNP and_CC Adaklu_NNP are_VBP the_DT places_NNS whither_IN all_DT ill_JJ shall_MD betake_VB
itself_PRP !"_. When_WRB they_PRP have_VBP come_VBN to_TO a_DT certain_JJ tree_NN on_IN Mount_NNP Adaklu_NNP ,_, they_PRP
throw_VB everything_NN away_RB and_CC return_VB home_NN ._.

At_IN Kiriwina_NNP ,_, in_IN South-Eastern_JJ New_NNP Guinea_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT new_JJ yams_NNS had_VBD been_VBN
harvested_VBN ,_, the_DT people_NNS feasted_VBD and_CC danced_VBD for_IN many_JJ days_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT great_JJ
deal_NN of_IN property_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN armlets_NNS ,_, native_JJ money_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ,_, was_VBD
displayed_VBD conspicuously_RB on_IN a_DT platform_NN erected_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._. When_WRB
the_DT festivities_NNS were_VBD over_RB ,_, all_PDT the_DT people_NNS gathered_VBD together_RB and_CC
expelled_VBN the_DT spirits_NNS from_IN the_DT village_NN by_IN shouting_VBG ,_, beating_VBG the_DT posts_NNS
of_IN the_DT houses_NNS ,_, and_CC overturning_VBG everything_NN under_IN which_WDT a_DT wily_NN spirit_NN
might_MD be_VB supposed_VBN to_TO lurk_VB ._. The_DT explanation_NN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS gave_VBD to_TO

their_PRP$ departure_NN ._. Had_VBD they_PRP not_RB seen_VBN the_DT dances_NNS ,_, and_CC heard_VBD the_DT songs_NNS ,_,
and_CC gorged_VBD themselves_PRP on_IN the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT yams_NNS ,_, and_CC appropriated_VBD the_DT
souls_NNS of_IN the_DT money_NN and_CC all_PDT the_DT other_JJ fine_JJ things_NNS set_VBN out_RP on_IN the_DT
platform_NN ?_. What_WP more_RBR could_MD the_DT spirits_NNS want_VBP ?_. So_CC out_IN they_PRP must_MD go_VB ._.

Among_IN the_DT Hos_NNP of_IN North-Eastern_NNP India_NNP the_DT great_JJ festival_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN
is_VBZ the_DT harvest_NN home_NN ,_, held_VBN in_IN January_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT granaries_NNS are_VBP full_JJ of_IN
grain_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS ,_, to_TO use_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ expression_NN ,_, are_VBP full_JJ of_IN

women_NNS are_VBP so_RB overcharged_VBN with_IN vicious_JJ propensities_NNS ,_, that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ

village_NN priest_NN ,_, who_WP prays_VBD that_IN during_IN the_DT year_NN about_IN to_TO begin_VB they_PRP

sickness_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP may_MD have_VB seasonable_JJ rain_NN and_CC good_JJ crops_NNS ._.
Prayer_NNP is_VBZ also_RB made_VBN in_IN some_DT places_NNS for_IN the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT dead_JJ ._. At_IN

they_PRP give_VBP themselves_PRP up_RP to_TO feasting_NN and_CC drinking_NN rice-beer_NN ,_, till_IN
they_PRP are_VBP in_IN a_DT fit_JJ state_NN for_IN the_DT wild_JJ debauch_NN which_WDT follows_VBZ ._. The_DT
festival_NN now_RB "_'' becomes_VBZ a_DT saturnale_NN ,_, during_IN which_WDT servants_NNS forget_VBP
their_PRP$ duty_NN to_TO their_PRP$ masters_NNS ,_, children_NNS their_PRP$ reverence_NN for_IN parents_NNS ,_,

delicacy_NN ,_, and_CC gentleness_NN ;_: they_PRP become_VBP raging_VBG bacchantes_NNS ."_. Usually_RB
the_DT Hos_NNS are_VBP quiet_JJ and_CC reserved_JJ in_IN manner_NN ,_, decorous_JJ and_CC gentle_JJ to_TO
women_NNS ._. But_CC during_IN this_DT festival_NN "_'' their_PRP$ natures_NNS appear_VBP to_TO undergo_VB a_DT
temporary_JJ change_NN ._. Sons_NNPS and_CC daughters_NNS revile_VB their_PRP$ parents_NNS in_IN gross_JJ
language_NN ,_, and_CC parents_NNS their_PRP$ children_NNS ;_: men_NNS and_CC women_NNS become_VBP almost_RB
like_IN animals_NNS in_IN the_DT indulgence_NN of_IN their_PRP$ amorous_JJ propensities_NNS ."_VBD The_DT

much_RB the_DT same_JJ manner_NN ._. "_'' The_DT resemblance_NN to_TO a_DT Saturnale_NNP is_VBZ very_RB

their_PRP$ masters_NNS ,_, and_CC allowed_VBD the_DT utmost_JJ freedom_NN of_IN speech_NN in_IN

Amongst_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Hindoo_NNP Koosh_NNP tribes_NNS ,_, as_IN among_IN the_DT Hos_NNS and_CC
Mundaris_NNP ,_, the_DT expulsion_NN of_IN devils_NNS takes_VBZ place_NN after_IN harvest_NN ._. When_WRB
the_DT last_JJ crop_NN of_IN autumn_NN has_VBZ been_VBN got_VBN in_IN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO
drive_NN away_RB evil_JJ spirits_NNS from_IN the_DT granaries_NNS ._. A_DT kind_NN of_IN porridge_NN is_VBZ
eaten_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN takes_VBZ his_PRP$ matchlock_NN and_CC fires_VBZ it_PRP
into_IN the_DT floor_NN ._. Then_RB ,_, going_VBG outside_RB ,_, he_PRP sets_VBZ to_TO work_VB loading_NN and_CC
firing_VBG till_IN his_PRP$ powder-horn_NN is_VBZ exhausted_VBN ,_, while_IN all_DT his_PRP$ neighbours_NNS
are_VBP similarly_RB employed_VBN ._. The_DT next_JJ day_NN is_VBZ spent_VBN in_IN rejoicings_NNS ._. In_IN
Chitral_NNP this_DT festival_NN is_VBZ called_VBN "_`` devil-driving_JJ ."_NN On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN
the_DT Khonds_NNP of_IN India_NNP expel_VBP the_DT devils_NNS at_IN seed-time_NN instead_RB of_IN at_IN

increase_NN and_CC of_IN gain_NN in_IN every_DT shape_NN ._. On_IN the_DT first_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT
festival_NN a_DT rude_JJ car_NN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN a_DT basket_NN set_VBN upon_IN a_DT few_JJ sticks_NNS ,_, tied_VBN
upon_IN the_DT bamboo_NN rollers_NNS for_IN wheels_NNS ._. The_DT priest_NN takes_VBZ this_DT car_NN first_RB
to_TO the_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT lineal_JJ head_NN of_IN the_DT tribe_NN ,_, to_TO whom_WP precedence_NN is_VBZ
given_VBN in_IN all_DT ceremonies_NNS connected_VBN with_IN agriculture_NN ._. Here_RB he_PRP receives_VBZ

car_NN to_TO all_PDT the_DT other_JJ houses_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, each_DT of_IN which_WDT
contributes_VBZ the_DT same_JJ things_NNS ._. Lastly_RB ,_, the_DT car_NN is_VBZ conducted_VBN to_TO a_DT field_NN
without_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, attended_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT young_JJ men_NNS ,_, who_WP beat_VBD each_DT
other_JJ and_CC strike_VB the_DT air_NN violently_RB with_IN long_JJ sticks_NNS ._. The_DT seed_NN thus_RB
carried_VBN out_RP is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT share_NN of_IN the_DT "_`` evil_JJ spirits_NNS ,_, spoilers_NNS of_IN
the_DT seed_NN ."_. "_`` These_DT are_VBP considered_VBN to_TO be_VB driven_VBN out_RP with_IN the_DT car_NN ;_: and_CC
when_WRB it_PRP and_CC its_PRP$ contents_NNS are_VBP abandoned_VBN to_TO them_PRP ,_, they_PRP are_VBP held_VBN to_TO
have_VBP no_DT excuse_NN for_IN interfering_VBG with_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT seed-corn_NN ."_.

The_DT people_NNS of_IN Bali_NNP ,_, an_DT island_NN to_TO the_DT east_JJ of_IN Java_NNP ,_, have_VBP periodical_JJ
expulsions_NNS of_IN devils_NNS upon_IN a_DT great_JJ scale_NN ._. Generally_RB the_DT time_NN chosen_VBN
for_IN the_DT expulsion_NN is_VBZ the_DT day_NN of_IN the_DT "_`` dark_JJ moon_NN "_'' in_IN the_DT ninth_JJ month_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT demons_NNS have_VBP been_VBN long_RB unmolested_VBN the_DT country_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO be_VB
"_`` warm_JJ ,"_NN and_CC the_DT priest_NN issues_NNS orders_NNS to_TO expel_VB them_PRP by_IN force_NN ,_, lest_IN
the_DT whole_NN of_IN Bali_NNP should_MD be_VB rendered_VBN uninhabitable_JJ ._. On_IN the_DT day_NN
appointed_VBN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN or_CC district_NN assemble_NN at_IN the_DT
principal_JJ temple_NN ._. Here_RB at_IN a_DT cross-road_JJ offerings_NNS are_VBP set_VBN out_RP for_IN the_DT
devils_NNS ._. After_IN prayers_NNS have_VBP been_VBN recited_VBN by_IN the_DT priests_NNS ,_, the_DT blast_NN of_IN
a_DT horn_NN summons_IN the_DT devils_NNS to_TO partake_VB of_IN the_DT meal_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN
prepared_VBN for_IN them_PRP ._. At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN a_DT number_NN of_IN men_NNS step_VBP forward_RB and_CC
light_NN their_PRP$ torches_NNS at_IN the_DT holy_JJ lamp_NN which_WDT burns_VBZ before_IN the_DT chief_NN
priest_NN ._. Immediately_RB afterwards_RB ,_, followed_VBN by_IN the_DT bystanders_NNS ,_, they_PRP
spread_NN in_IN all_DT directions_NNS and_CC march_VB through_IN the_DT streets_NNS and_CC lanes_NNS
crying_VBG ,_, "_'' Depart_NNP !_. go_VB away_RB !"_RB Wherever_IN they_PRP pass_VBP ,_, the_DT people_NNS who_WP have_VBP
stayed_VBD at_IN home_NN hasten_VBN ,_, by_IN a_DT deafening_NN clatter_NN on_IN doors_NNS ,_, beams_NNS ,_,
rice-blocks_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ,_, to_TO take_VB their_PRP$ share_NN in_IN the_DT expulsion_NN of_IN
devils_NNS ._. Thus_RB chased_VBN from_IN the_DT houses_NNS ,_, the_DT fiends_NNS flee_NN to_TO the_DT banquet_NN
which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN set_VBN out_RP for_IN them_PRP ;_: but_CC here_RB the_DT priest_NN receives_VBZ them_PRP
with_IN curses_NNS which_WDT finally_RB drive_VBP them_PRP from_IN the_DT district_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT
last_JJ devil_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN his_PRP$ departure_NN ,_, the_DT uproar_NN is_VBZ succeeded_VBN by_IN a_DT
dead_JJ silence_NN ,_, which_WDT lasts_VBZ during_IN the_DT next_JJ day_NN also_RB ._. The_DT devils_NNS ,_, it_PRP
is_VBZ thought_VBN ,_, are_VBP anxious_JJ to_TO return_VB to_TO their_PRP$ old_JJ homes_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN order_NN
to_TO make_VB them_PRP think_VB that_IN Bali_NNP is_VBZ not_RB Bali_JJ but_CC some_DT desert_NN island_NN ,_, no_UH
one_CD may_MD stir_VB from_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ abode_NN for_IN twenty-four_CD hours_NNS ._. Even_RB ordinary_JJ
household_NN work_NN ,_, including_VBG cooking_NN ,_, is_VBZ discontinued_VBN ._. Only_RB the_DT
watchmen_NNS may_MD show_VB themselves_PRP in_IN the_DT streets_NNS ._. Wreaths_NNS of_IN thorns_NNS and_CC
leaves_NNS are_VBP hung_VBN at_IN all_DT the_DT entrances_NNS to_TO warn_VB strangers_NNS from_IN
entering_VBG ._. Not_RB till_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN is_VBZ this_DT state_NN of_IN siege_NN raised_VBN ,_, and_CC
even_RB then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ forbidden_VBN to_TO work_VB at_IN the_DT rice-fields_NNS or_CC to_TO buy_VB and_CC
sell_VB in_IN the_DT market_NN ._. Most_JJS people_NNS still_RB stay_VB at_IN home_NN ,_, whiling_VBG away_RB the_DT
time_NN with_IN cards_NNS and_CC dice_NNS ._.

In_IN Tonquin_NNP a_DT theckydaw_NN or_CC general_JJ expulsion_NN of_IN maleyolent_JJ spirits_NNS
commonly_RB took_VBD place_NN once_RB a_DT year_NN ,_, especially_RB if_IN there_EX was_VBD a_DT great_JJ
mortality_NN amongst_IN men_NNS ,_, the_DT elephants_NNS or_CC horses_NNS of_IN the_DT general_JJ '_'' s_PRP
stable_JJ ,_, or_CC the_DT cattle_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, "_'' the_DT cause_NN of_IN which_WDT they_PRP
attribute_NN to_TO the_DT malicious_JJ spirits_NNS of_IN such_JJ men_NNS as_IN have_VBP been_VBN put_VBN to_TO
death_NN for_IN treason_NN ,_, rebellion_NN ,_, and_CC conspiring_VBG the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN ,_,
general_JJ ,_, or_CC princes_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN revenge_NN of_IN the_DT punishment_NN they_PRP have_VBP
suffered_VBN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP bent_JJ to_TO destroy_VB everything_NN and_CC commit_VB horrible_JJ
violence_NN ._. To_TO prevent_VB which_WDT their_PRP$ superstition_NN has_VBZ suggested_VBN to_TO them_PRP
the_DT institution_NN of_IN this_DT theckydaw_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT proper_JJ means_NN to_TO drive_VB the_DT
devil_NN away_RB ,_, and_CC purge_NN the_DT country_NN of_IN evil_JJ spirits_NNS ."_VBP The_DT day_NN
appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT ceremony_NN was_VBD generally_RB the_DT twenty-fifth_JJ of_IN
February_NNP ,_, one_CD month_NN after_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ year_NN ,_, which_WDT fell_VBD
on_IN the_DT twenty-fifth_NN of_IN January_NNP ._. The_DT intermediate_JJ month_NN was_VBD a_DT season_NN
of_IN feasting_NN ,_, merry-making_NN of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS ,_, and_CC general_JJ licence_NN ._. During_IN
the_DT whole_JJ month_NN the_DT great_JJ seal_NN was_VBD kept_VBN shut_VBN up_RP in_IN a_DT box_NN ,_, face_NN
downwards_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT law_NN was_VBD ,_, as_IN it_PRP were_VBD ,_, laid_VBN asleep_RB ._. All_DT courts_NNS of_IN
justice_NN were_VBD closed_VBN ;_: debtors_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB seized_VBN ;_: small_JJ crimes_NNS ,_, such_JJ
as_IN petty_JJ larceny_NN ,_, fighting_VBG ,_, and_CC assault_NN ,_, escaped_VBD with_IN impunity_NN ;_: only_RB
treason_NN and_CC murder_NN were_VBD taken_VBN account_NN of_IN and_CC the_DT malefactors_NNS
detained_VBN till_IN the_DT great_JJ seal_NN should_MD come_VB into_IN operation_NN again_RB ._. At_IN
the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT saturnalia_NNS the_DT wicked_JJ spirits_NNS were_VBD driven_VBN away_RB ._.
Great_JJ masses_NNS of_IN troops_NNS and_CC artillery_NN having_VBG been_VBN drawn_VBN up_RP with_IN
flying_VBG colours_NNS and_CC all_PDT the_DT pomp_NN of_IN war_NN ,_, "_'' the_DT general_JJ beginneth_NN then_RB
to_TO offer_VB meat_NN offerings_NNS to_TO the_DT criminal_JJ devils_NNS and_CC malevolent_JJ
spirits_NNS (_-LRB- for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ usual_JJ and_CC customary_JJ likewise_RB amongst_IN them_PRP to_TO
feast_NN the_DT condemned_VBN before_IN their_PRP$ execution_NN ),_IN inviting_VBG them_PRP to_TO eat_VB
and_CC drink_NN ,_, when_WRB presently_RB he_PRP accuses_VBZ them_PRP in_IN a_DT strange_JJ language_NN ,_, by_IN
characters_NNS and_CC figures_NNS ,_, etc_FW .,_. of_IN many_JJ offences_NNS and_CC crimes_NNS committed_VBN
by_IN them_PRP ,_, as_IN to_TO their_PRP$ having_VBG disquieted_VBN the_DT land_NN ,_, killed_VBD his_PRP$
elephants_NNS and_CC horses_NNS ,_, etc_FW .,_. for_IN all_DT which_WDT they_PRP justly_RB deserve_VBP to_TO be_VB
chastised_NN and_CC banished_VBN the_DT country_NN ._. Whereupon_IN three_CD great_JJ guns_NNS are_VBP
fired_VBN as_IN the_DT last_JJ signal_NN ;_: upon_IN which_WDT all_PDT the_DT artillery_NN and_CC musquets_NNS
are_VBP discharged_VBN ,_, that_IN ,_, by_IN their_PRP$ most_JJS terrible_JJ noise_NN the_DT devils_NNS may_MD be_VB
driven_VBN away_RB ;_: and_CC they_PRP are_VBP so_RB blind_JJ as_IN to_TO believe_VB for_IN certain_JJ ,_, that_IN
they_PRP really_RB and_CC effectually_RB put_VBD them_PRP to_TO flight_NN ."_.

In_IN Cambodia_NNP the_DT expulsion_NN of_IN evil_JJ spirits_NNS took_VBD place_NN in_IN March_NNP ._. Bits_NNS
of_IN broken_JJ statues_NNS and_CC stones_NNS ,_, considered_VBN as_IN the_DT abode_NN of_IN the_DT demons_NNS ,_,
were_VBD collected_VBN and_CC brought_VBN to_TO the_DT capital_NN ._. Here_RB as_IN many_JJ elephants_NNS
were_VBD collected_VBN as_RB could_MD be_VB got_VBN together_RB ._. On_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT full_JJ
moon_NN volleys_NNS of_IN musketry_NN were_VBD fired_VBN and_CC the_DT elephants_NNS charged_VBN
furiously_RB to_TO put_VB the_DT devils_NNS to_TO flight_NN ._. The_DT ceremony_NN was_VBD performed_VBN on_IN
three_CD successive_JJ days_NNS ._. In_IN Siam_NNP the_DT banishment_NN of_IN demons_NNS is_VBZ annually_RB
carried_VBD into_IN effect_NN on_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ year_NN ._. A_DT signal_NN gun_NN is_VBZ
fired_VBN from_IN the_DT palace_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ answered_VBN from_IN the_DT next_JJ station_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB
on_IN from_IN station_NN to_TO station_NN ,_, till_IN the_DT firing_NN has_VBZ reached_VBN the_DT outer_JJ
gate_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT demons_NNS are_VBP driven_VBN out_IN step_NN by_IN step_NN ._. As_IN
soon_RB as_IN this_DT is_VBZ done_VBN a_DT consecrated_JJ rope_NN is_VBZ fastened_VBN round_RB the_DT
circuit_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN walls_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT banished_VBN demons_NNS from_IN
returning_VBG ._. The_DT rope_NN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN tough_JJ couch-grass_NN and_CC is_VBZ painted_VBN in_IN
alternate_JJ stripes_NNS of_IN red_JJ ,_, yellow_JJ ,_, and_CC blue_JJ ._.

Annual_JJ expulsions_NNS of_IN demons_NNS ,_, witches_NNS ,_, or_CC evil_JJ influences_NNS appear_VBP to_TO
have_VBP been_VBN common_JJ among_IN the_DT heathen_NN of_IN Europe_NNP ,_, if_IN we_PRP may_MD judge_VB from_IN
the_DT relics_NNS of_IN such_JJ customs_NNS among_IN their_PRP$ descendants_NNS at_IN the_DT present_NN
day_NN ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT heathen_NN Wotyaks_NNP ,_, a_DT Finnish_JJ people_NNS of_IN Eastern_NNP
Russia_NNP ,_, all_DT the_DT young_JJ girls_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN assemble_NN on_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN
of_IN the_DT year_NN or_CC on_IN New_NNP Year_NN '_POS s_PRP Day_NNP ,_, armed_VBN with_IN sticks_NNS ,_, the_DT ends_NNS of_IN
which_WDT are_VBP split_VBN in_IN nine_CD places_NNS ._. With_IN these_DT they_PRP beat_VBD every_DT corner_NN of_IN
the_DT house_NN and_CC yard_NN ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_`` We_PRP are_VBP driving_VBG Satan_NNP out_IN of_IN the_DT
village_NN ."_VBN Afterwards_IN the_DT sticks_NNS are_VBP thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT river_NN below_IN the_DT
village_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN they_PRP float_VBP down_RB stream_VB Satan_NNP goes_VBZ with_IN them_PRP to_TO the_DT
next_JJ village_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT he_PRP must_MD be_VB driven_VBN out_RP in_IN turn_NN ._. In_IN some_DT
villages_NNS the_DT expulsion_NN is_VBZ managed_VBN otherwise_RB ._. The_DT unmarried_JJ men_NNS
receive_VB from_IN every_DT house_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN groats_VBZ ,_, flesh_NN ,_, and_CC brandy_NN ._.
These_DT they_PRP take_VBP to_TO the_DT fields_NNS ,_, light_NN a_DT fire_NN under_IN a_DT fir-tree_NN ,_, boil_NN
the_DT groats_NNS ,_, and_CC eat_VB of_IN the_DT food_NN they_PRP have_VBP brought_VBN with_IN them_PRP ,_, after_IN

the_DT house_NN ."_IN Then_RB they_PRP return_VBP to_TO the_DT village_NN and_CC enter_VB every_DT house_NN
where_WRB there_EX are_VBP young_JJ women_NNS ._. They_PRP take_VBP hold_VB of_IN the_DT young_JJ women_NNS and_CC

each_DT contributed_VBD ,_, and_CC each_DT family_NN consumes_VBZ its_PRP$ share_NN ._. According_VBG to_TO a_DT

Satan_NNP ";_NNP moreover_RB ,_, some_DT of_IN the_DT boiled_VBN groats_NNS are_VBP cast_VBN into_IN the_DT fire_NN

Kasan_NNP Government_NNP ._. First_NNP of_IN all_DT a_DT sacrifice_NN is_VBZ offered_VBN to_TO the_DT Devil_NN

at_IN the_DT Devil_NNP ._. The_DT Cheremiss_NNP ,_, another_DT Finnish_JJ people_NNS of_IN Eastern_NNP

In_IN Christian_NNP Europe_NNP the_DT old_JJ heathen_NN custom_NN of_IN expelling_VBG the_DT powers_NNS

In_IN Central_NNP Europe_NNP the_DT favourite_JJ time_NN for_IN expelling_VBG the_DT witches_NNS is_VBZ ,_,

Witches_NNS ."_VBP It_PRP takes_VBZ place_NN on_IN May_NNP Day_NNP ,_, but_CC people_NNS have_VBP been_VBN busy_JJ with_IN

"_`` Witch_UH flee_VB ,_, flee_VB from_IN here_RB ,_, or_CC it_PRP will_MD go_VB ill_RB with_IN thee_PRP ._. "_''


Then_RB they_PRP run_VBP seven_CD times_NNS round_RB the_DT houses_NNS ,_, the_DT yards_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT
village_NN ._. So_RB the_DT witches_NNS are_VBP smoked_VBN out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ lurking-places_NNS and_CC

Another_DT witching_NN time_NN is_VBZ the_DT period_NN of_IN twelve_CD days_NNS between_IN Christmas_NNP
and_CC Epiphany_NNP ._. Hence_RB in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Silesia_NNP the_DT people_NNS burn_VBP

and_CC wrap_VB straw_NN round_NN the_DT fruit-trees_NNS ,_, to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spirits_NNS from_IN
doing_VBG them_PRP harm_VBP ._. On_IN New_NNP Year_NN '_POS s_PRP Eve_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ Saint_NNP Sylvester_NNP '_'' s_VBZ Day_NNP ,_,
