LVII_NNP ._. Public_NNP Scapegoats_NNPS



1._`` The_DT Expulsion_NN of_IN Embodied_NNP Evils_.

THUS_RB far_RB we_PRP have_VBP dealt_VBN with_IN that_DT class_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ expulsion_NN of_IN
evils_NNS which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP called_VBN direct_JJ or_CC immediate_JJ ._. In_IN this_DT class_NN the_DT
evils_NNS are_VBP invisible_JJ ,_, at_IN least_JJS to_TO common_JJ eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT mode_NN of_IN
deliverance_NN consists_VBZ for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN in_IN beating_VBG the_DT empty_JJ air_NN and_CC
raising_VBG such_JJ a_DT hubbub_NN as_RB may_MD scare_VB the_DT mischievous_JJ spirits_NNS and_CC put_VB
them_PRP to_TO flight_NN ._. It_PRP remains_VBZ to_TO illustrate_VB the_DT second_JJ class_NN of_IN
expulsions_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT evil_JJ influences_NNS are_VBP embodied_VBN in_IN a_DT visible_JJ
form_NN or_CC are_VBP at_IN least_JJS supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB loaded_VBN upon_IN a_DT material_NN medium_NN ,_,
which_WDT acts_VBZ as_IN a_DT vehicle_NN to_TO draw_VB them_PRP off_RP from_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, village_NN ,_,
or_CC town_NN ._.

The_DT Pomos_NNP of_IN California_NNP celebrate_VBP an_DT expulsion_NN of_IN devils_NNS every_DT seven_CD
years_NNS ,_, at_IN which_WDT the_DT devils_NNS are_VBP represented_VBN by_IN disguised_JJ men_NNS ._. "_'' Twenty_CD
or_CC thirty_CD men_NNS array_NN themselves_PRP in_IN harlequin_NN rig_NN and_CC barbaric_JJ paint_NN ,_,
and_CC put_VBD vessels_NNS of_IN pitch_NN on_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS ;_: then_RB they_PRP secretly_RB go_VBP out_IN
into_IN the_DT surrounding_VBG mountains_NNS ._. These_DT are_VBP to_TO personify_VB the_DT devils_NNS ._. A_NN
herald_PRP goes_VBZ up_RB to_TO the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT assembly-house_NN ,_, and_CC makes_VBZ a_DT speech_NN
to_TO the_DT multitude_NN ._. At_IN a_DT signal_NN agreed_VBD upon_RP in_IN the_DT evening_NN the_DT
masqueraders_NNS come_VBP in_IN from_IN the_DT mountains_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT vessels_NNS of_IN pitch_NN
flaming_VBG on_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS ,_, and_CC with_IN all_PDT the_DT frightful_JJ accessories_NNS of_IN
noise_NN ,_, motion_NN ,_, and_CC costume_NN which_WDT the_DT savage_JJ mind_NN can_MD devise_VB in_IN
representation_NN of_IN demons_NNS ._. The_DT terrified_JJ women_NNS and_CC children_NNS flee_NN for_IN
life_NN ,_, the_DT men_NNS huddle_NN them_PRP inside_RB a_DT circle_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT principle_NN of_IN
fighting_VBG the_DT devil_NN with_IN fire_NN ,_, they_PRP swing_VBP blazing_VBG firebrands_NNS in_IN the_DT
air_NN ,_, yell_NN ,_, whoop_NN ,_, and_CC make_VB frantic_JJ dashes_NNS at_IN the_DT marauding_NN and_CC
bloodthirsty_NN devils_NNS ,_, so_RB creating_VBG a_DT terrific_JJ spectacle_NN ,_, and_CC striking_VBG
great_JJ fear_NN into_IN the_DT hearts_NNS of_IN the_DT assembled_VBN hundreds_NNS of_IN women_NNS ,_, who_WP
are_VBP screaming_VBG and_CC fainting_VBG and_CC clinging_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ valorous_JJ
protectors_NNS ._. Finally_RB the_DT devils_NNS succeed_VBP in_IN getting_VBG into_IN the_DT
assembly-house_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT bravest_JJS of_IN the_DT men_NNS enter_VBP and_CC hold_VBP a_DT parley_NN
with_IN them_PRP ._. As_IN a_DT conclusion_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ farce_NN ,_, the_DT men_NNS summon_.
courage_NN ,_, the_DT devils_NNS are_VBP expelled_VBN from_IN the_DT assembly-house_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN a_DT
prodigious_JJ row_NN and_CC racket_NN of_IN sham_NN fighting_NN are_VBP chased_VBN away_RB into_IN the_DT
mountains_NNS ."_IN In_IN spring_NN ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT willow-leaves_NNS were_VBD full_JJ grown_VBN
on_IN the_DT banks_NNS of_IN the_DT river_NN ,_, the_DT Mandan_NNP Indians_NNPS celebrated_VBD their_PRP$ great_JJ
annual_JJ festival_NN ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT features_NNS of_IN which_WDT was_VBD the_DT expulsion_NN of_IN
the_DT devil_NN ._. A_DT man_NN ,_, painted_VBD black_JJ to_TO represent_VB the_DT devil_NN ,_, entered_VBD the_DT
village_NN from_IN the_DT prairie_NN ,_, chased_JJ and_CC frightened_VBD the_DT women_NNS ,_, and_CC acted_VBN
the_DT part_NN of_IN a_DT buffalo_NN bull_NN in_IN the_DT buffalo_NN dance_NN ,_, the_DT object_NN of_IN which_WDT
was_VBD to_TO ensure_VB a_DT plentiful_JJ supply_NN of_IN buffaloes_NNS during_IN the_DT ensuing_VBG
year_NN ._. Finally_RB he_PRP was_VBD chased_VBN from_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, the_DT women_NNS pursuing_VBG him_PRP
with_IN hisses_NNS and_CC gibes_NNS ,_, beating_VBG him_PRP with_IN sticks_NNS ,_, and_CC pelting_VBG him_PRP with_IN
dirt_NN ._.

Some_DT of_IN the_DT native_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN Central_NNP Queensland_NNP believe_VBP in_IN a_DT noxious_JJ
being_VBG called_VBN Molonga_NNP ,_, who_WP prowls_VBZ unseen_JJ and_CC would_MD kill_VB men_NNS and_CC
violate_VB women_NNS if_IN certain_JJ ceremonies_NNS were_VBD not_RB performed_VBN ._. These_DT
ceremonies_NNS last_JJ for_IN five_CD nights_NNS and_CC consist_VB of_IN dances_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT only_RB
men_NNS ,_, fantastically_RB painted_VBN and_CC adorned_VBN ,_, take_VB part_NN ._. On_IN the_DT fifth_JJ
night_NN Molonga_NNP himself_PRP ,_, personified_VBN by_IN a_DT man_NN tricked_VBD out_RP with_IN red_JJ
ochre_NN and_CC feathers_NNS and_CC carrying_VBG a_DT long_JJ feather-tipped_JJ spear_NN ,_, rushes_VBG
forth_RB from_IN the_DT darkness_NN at_IN the_DT spectators_NNS and_CC makes_VBZ as_IN if_IN he_PRP would_MD
run_VB them_PRP through_IN ._. Great_NNP is_VBZ the_DT excitement_NN ,_, loud_RB are_VBP the_DT shrieks_NNS and_CC
shouts_NNS ,_, but_CC after_IN another_DT feigned_JJ attack_NN the_DT demon_NN vanishes_VBZ in_IN the_DT
gloom_NN ._. On_IN the_DT last_JJ night_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN the_DT palace_NN of_IN the_DT Kings_NNP of_IN
Cambodia_NNP is_VBZ purged_VBN of_IN devils_NNS ._. Men_NN painted_VBD as_IN fiends_NNS are_VBP chased_VBN by_IN
elephants_NNS about_IN the_DT palace_NN courts_NNS ._. When_WRB they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN expelled_VBN ,_, a_DT
consecrated_VBN thread_NN of_IN cotton_NN is_VBZ stretched_VBN round_RB the_DT palace_NN to_TO keep_VB
them_PRP out_RP ._. In_IN Munzerabad_NNP ,_, a_DT district_NN of_IN Mysore_NNP in_IN Southern_NNP India_NNP ,_,
when_WRB cholera_NN or_CC smallpox_NN has_VBZ broken_VBN out_RP in_IN a_DT parish_NN ,_, the_DT inhabitants_NNS
assemble_NN and_CC conjure_NN the_DT demon_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN into_IN a_DT wooden_JJ image_NN ,_,
which_WDT they_PRP carry_VBP ,_, generally_RB at_IN midnight_NN ,_, into_IN the_DT next_JJ parish_NN ._. The_DT
inhabitants_NNS of_IN that_DT parish_NN in_IN like_IN manner_NN pass_VBP the_DT image_NN on_IN to_TO their_PRP$
neighbours_NNS ,_, and_CC thus_RB the_DT demon_NN is_VBZ expelled_VBN from_IN one_CD village_NN after_IN
another_DT ,_, until_IN he_PRP comes_VBZ to_TO the_DT bank_NN of_IN a_DT river_NN into_IN which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ
finally_RB thrown_VBN ._.

Oftener_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT expelled_VBN demons_NNS are_VBP not_RB represented_VBN at_IN all_DT ,_,
but_CC are_VBP understood_VBN to_TO be_VB present_JJ invisibly_RB in_IN the_DT material_NN and_CC
visible_JJ vehicle_NN which_WDT conveys_VBZ them_PRP away_RB ._. Here_RB ,_, again_RB ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB
convenient_JJ to_TO distinguish_VB between_IN occasional_JJ and_CC periodical_JJ
expulsions_NNS ._. We_PRP begin_VBP with_IN the_DT former_JJ ._.



2._`` The_DT Occasional_JJ Expulsion_NN of_IN Evils_NNP in_IN a_DT Material_NNP Vehicle_NNP

THE_DT VEHICLE_NNP which_WDT conveys_VBZ away_RB the_DT demons_NNS may_MD be_VB of_IN various_JJ kinds_NNS ._. A_NN
common_JJ one_CD is_VBZ a_DT little_JJ ship_NN or_CC boat_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT southern_JJ district_NN
of_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Ceram_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT whole_JJ village_NN suffers_NNS from_IN sickness_NN ,_,
a_DT small_JJ ship_NN is_VBZ made_VBN and_CC filled_VBN with_IN rice_NN ,_, tobacco_NN ,_, eggs_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB
forth_RB ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN contributed_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT people_NNS ._. A_DT little_JJ sail_NN
is_VBZ hoisted_VBN on_IN the_DT ship_NN ._. When_WRB all_DT is_VBZ ready_JJ ,_, a_DT man_NN calls_VBZ out_RP in_IN a_DT very_RB
loud_JJ voice_NN ,_, "_`` O_UH all_DT ye_PRP sicknesses_NNS ,_, ye_PRP smallpoxes_VBZ ,_, agues_NNS ,_, measles_NNS ,_,
etc_FW .,_, who_WP have_VBP visited_VBN us_PRP so_RB long_RB and_CC wasted_VBD us_PRP so_RB sorely_RB ,_, but_CC who_WP
now_RB cease_VB to_TO plague_VB us_PRP ,_, we_PRP have_VBP made_VBN ready_JJ this_DT ship_NN for_IN you_PRP ,_, and_CC we_PRP
have_VBP furnished_VBN you_PRP with_IN provender_NN sufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT voyage_NN ._. Ye_''
shall_MD have_VB no_DT lack_NN of_IN food_NN nor_CC of_IN betel-leaves_NNS nor_CC of_IN areca_DT nuts_NNS nor_CC
of_IN tobacco_NN ._. Depart_NN ,_, and_CC sail_VB away_RB from_IN us_PRP directly_RB ;_: never_RB come_VBN near_IN
us_PRP again_RB ;_: but_CC go_VB to_TO a_DT land_NN which_WDT is_VBZ far_RB from_IN here_RB ._. Let_VB all_PDT the_DT tides_NNS
and_CC winds_NNS waft_VBN you_PRP speedily_RB thither_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB convey_VB you_PRP thither_JJ that_IN
for_IN the_DT time_NN to_TO come_VB we_PRP may_MD live_VB sound_NN and_CC well_RB ,_, and_CC that_IN we_PRP may_MD
never_RB see_VBP the_DT sun_NN rise_NN on_IN you_PRP again_RB ."_VBD Then_RB ten_CD or_CC twelve_CD men_NNS carry_VB
the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT shore_NN ,_, and_CC let_VB it_PRP drift_VB away_RB with_IN the_DT land-breeze_NN ,_,
feeling_NN convinced_VBD that_IN they_PRP are_VBP free_JJ from_IN sickness_NN for_IN ever_RB ,_, or_CC at_IN
least_JJS till_IN the_DT next_JJ time_NN ._. If_IN sickness_JJ attacks_NNS them_PRP again_RB ,_, they_PRP are_VBP
sure_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB the_DT same_JJ sickness_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT different_JJ one_CD ,_, which_WDT in_IN due_JJ
time_NN they_PRP dismiss_VBP in_IN the_DT same_JJ manner_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT demon-laden_JJ bark_NN is_VBZ
lost_VBN to_TO sight_NN ,_, the_DT bearers_NNS return_NN to_TO the_DT village_NN ,_, whereupon_IN a_DT man_NN
cries_NNS out_RP ,_, "_`` The_DT sicknesses_NNS are_VBP now_RB gone_VBN ,_, vanished_VBN ,_, expelled_VBN ,_, and_CC
sailed_VBD away_RB ."_IN At_IN this_DT all_PDT the_DT people_NNS come_VBP running_VBG out_IN of_IN their_PRP$
houses_NNS ,_, passing_VBG the_DT word_NN from_IN one_CD to_TO the_DT other_JJ with_IN great_JJ joy_NN ,_,
beating_VBG on_IN gongs_NNS and_CC on_IN tinkling_VBG instruments_NNS ._.

Similar_JJ ceremonies_NNS are_VBP commonly_RB resorted_VBN to_TO in_IN other_JJ East_NNP Indian_NNP
islands_NNS ._. Thus_RB in_IN Timor-laut_NNP ,_, to_TO mislead_VB the_DT demons_NNS who_WP are_VBP causing_VBG
sickness_NN ,_, a_DT small_JJ proa_NN ,_, containing_VBG the_DT image_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN and_CC
provisioned_VBN for_IN a_DT long_JJ voyage_NN ,_, is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO drift_VB away_RB with_IN wind_NN
and_CC tide_NN ._. As_IN it_PRP is_VBZ being_VBG launched_VBN ,_, the_DT people_NNS cry_VBP ,_, "_`` O_UH sickness_JJR ,_, go_VB
from_IN here_RB ;_: turn_VB back_RB ;_: what_WP do_VBP you_PRP here_RB in_IN this_DT poor_JJ land_NN ?"_NN Three_CD
days_NNS after_IN this_DT ceremony_NN a_DT pig_NN is_VBZ killed_VBN ,_, and_CC part_NN of_IN the_DT flesh_NN is_VBZ
offered_VBN to_TO Dudilaa_NNP ,_, who_WP lives_VBZ in_IN the_DT sun_NN ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT oldest_JJS men_NNS
says_VBZ ,_, "_`` Old_NNP sir_NN ,_, I_PRP beseech_VBP you_PRP make_VB well_RB the_DT grand-children_NNS ,_,
children_NNS ,_, women_NNS ,_, and_CC men_NNS ,_, that_IN we_PRP may_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO eat_VB pork_NN and_CC rice_NN
and_CC to_TO drink_VB palmwine_NN ._. I_PRP will_MD keep_VB my_PRP$ promise_NN ._. Eat_NNS your_PRP$ share_NN ,_, and_CC
make_VB all_PDT the_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN well_RB ."_RB If_IN the_DT proa_NN is_VBZ stranded_VBN at_IN
any_DT inhabited_JJ spot_NN ,_, the_DT sickness_NN will_MD break_VB out_RP there_RB ._. Hence_RB a_DT
stranded_VBN proa_NN excites_VBZ much_JJ alarm_NN amongst_IN the_DT coast_NN population_NN ,_, and_CC
they_PRP immediately_RB burn_VBP it_PRP ,_, because_IN demons_NNS fly_VBP from_IN fire_NN ._. In_IN the_DT
island_NN of_IN Buru_NNP the_DT proa_NN which_WDT carries_VBZ away_RB the_DT demons_NNS of_IN disease_NN is_VBZ
about_IN twenty_CD feet_NNS long_RB ,_, rigged_VBN out_RP with_IN sails_NNS ,_, oars_NNS ,_, anchor_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB
on_IN ,_, and_CC well_RB stocked_JJ with_IN provisions_NNS ._. For_IN a_DT day_NN and_CC a_DT night_NN the_DT
people_NNS beat_VBD gongs_NNS and_CC drums_NNS ,_, and_CC rush_NN about_IN to_TO frighten_VB the_DT demons_NNS ._.
Next_JJ morning_NN ten_CD stalwart_JJ young_JJ men_NNS strike_VBP the_DT people_NNS with_IN branches_NNS ,_,
which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN previously_RB dipped_VBN in_IN an_DT earthen_NN pot_NN of_IN water_NN ._. As_IN
soon_RB as_IN they_PRP have_VBP done_VBN so_RB ,_, they_PRP run_VBP down_RB to_TO the_DT beach_NN ,_, put_VBD the_DT
branches_NNS on_IN board_NN the_DT proa_NN ,_, launch_VB another_DT boat_NN in_IN great_JJ haste_NN ,_, and_CC
tow_IN the_DT disease-burdened_JJ bark_NN far_RB out_IN to_TO sea_NN ._. There_EX they_PRP cast_VBD it_PRP
off_RB ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN them_PRP calls_VBZ out_RP ,_, "_'' Grandfather_NNP Smallpox_NNP ,_, go_VB away_RB --_: go_VB
willingly_RB away_RB --_: go_VB visit_VB another_DT land_NN ;_: we_PRP have_VBP made_VBN you_PRP food_NN ready_JJ
for_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, we_PRP have_VBP now_RB nothing_NN more_RBR to_TO give_VB ."_. When_WRB they_PRP have_VBP
landed_VBD ,_, all_PDT the_DT people_NNS bathe_VB together_RB in_IN the_DT sea_NN ._. In_IN this_DT ceremony_NN
the_DT reason_NN for_IN striking_VBG the_DT people_NNS with_IN the_DT branches_NNS is_VBZ clearly_RB to_TO
rid_VB them_PRP of_IN the_DT disease-demons_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP then_RB supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB
transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT branches_NNS ._. Hence_RB the_DT haste_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT branches_NNS
are_VBP deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT proa_NN and_CC towed_VBD away_RB to_TO sea_NN ._. So_RB in_IN the_DT inland_NN
districts_NNS of_IN Ceram_NNP ,_, when_WRB smallpox_JJ or_CC other_JJ sickness_NN is_VBZ raging_VBG ,_, the_DT
priest_NN strikes_VBZ all_RB the_DT houses_NNS with_IN consecrated_VBN branches_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP
then_RB thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT river_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB carried_VBN down_RP to_TO the_DT sea_NN ;_: exactly_RB
as_IN amongst_IN the_DT Wotyaks_NNP of_IN Russia_NNP the_DT sticks_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN used_VBN for_IN
expelling_VBG the_DT devils_NNS from_IN the_DT village_NN are_VBP thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT river_NN ,_,
that_IN the_DT current_NN may_MD sweep_VB the_DT baleful_JJ burden_NN away_RB ._. The_DT plan_NN of_IN
putting_VBG puppets_NNS in_IN the_DT boat_NN to_TO represent_VB sick_JJ persons_NNS ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO
lure_VB the_DT demons_NNS after_IN them_PRP ,_, is_VBZ not_RB uncommon_JJ ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, most_JJS of_IN
the_DT pagan_NN tribes_NNS on_IN the_DT coast_NN of_IN Borneo_NNP seek_VBP to_TO drive_VB away_RB epidemic_JJ
disease_NN as_IN follows_VBZ ._. They_PRP carve_VBP one_CD or_CC more_JJR rough_JJ human_JJ images_NNS from_IN
the_DT pith_NN of_IN the_DT sago_JJ palm_NN and_CC place_NN them_PRP on_IN a_DT small_JJ raft_NN or_CC boat_NN or_CC
full-rigged_JJ Malay_NNP ship_NN together_RB with_IN rice_NN and_CC other_JJ food_NN ._. The_DT boat_NN
is_VBZ decked_VBN with_IN blossoms_NNS of_IN the_DT areca_NN palm_NN and_CC with_IN ribbons_NNS made_VBN from_IN
its_PRP$ leaves_NNS ,_, and_CC thus_RB adorned_VBD the_DT little_JJ craft_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO float_VB
out_IN to_TO sea_VB with_IN the_DT ebb-tide_NN ,_, bearing_VBG ,_, as_IN the_DT people_NNS fondly_RB think_VBP or_CC
hope_NN ,_, the_DT sickness_NN away_RB with_IN it_PRP ._.

Often_RB the_DT vehicle_NN which_WDT carries_VBZ away_RB the_DT collected_VBN demons_NNS or_CC ills_NNS of_IN
a_DT whole_JJ community_NN is_VBZ an_DT animal_NN or_CC scapegoat_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Central_NN
Provinces_NNS of_IN India_NNP ,_, when_WRB cholera_NN breaks_VBZ out_RP in_IN a_DT village_NN ,_, every_DT one_CD
retires_NNS after_IN sunset_NN to_TO his_PRP$ house_NN ._. The_DT priests_NNS then_RB parade_VBP the_DT
streets_NNS ,_, taking_VBG from_IN the_DT roof_NN of_IN each_DT house_NN a_DT straw_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ burnt_NN
with_IN an_DT offering_NN of_IN rice_NN ,_, ghee_NN ,_, and_CC turmeric_JJ ,_, at_IN some_DT shrine_NN to_TO the_DT
east_RB of_IN the_DT village_NN ._. Chickens_NNP daubed_VBD with_IN vermilion_CD are_VBP driven_VBN away_RB
in_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN the_DT smoke_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO carry_VB the_DT disease_NN
with_IN them_PRP ._. If_IN they_PRP fail_VBP ,_, goats_NNS are_VBP tried_VBN ,_, and_CC last_JJ of_IN all_DT pigs_NNS ._. When_WRB
cholera_NN rages_NNS among_IN the_DT Bhars_NNS ,_, Mallans_NNP ,_, and_CC Kurmis_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, they_PRP
take_VB a_DT goat_NN or_CC a_DT buffalo_NN --_: in_IN either_DT case_NN the_DT animal_NN must_MD be_VB a_DT
female_NN ,_, and_CC as_RB black_JJ as_IN possible_JJ --_: then_RB having_VBG tied_VBN some_DT grain_NN ,_,
cloves_NNS ,_, and_CC red_JJ lead_NN in_IN a_DT yellow_JJ cloth_NN on_IN its_PRP$ back_NN they_PRP turn_VBP it_PRP out_IN
of_IN the_DT village_NN ._. The_DT animal_NN is_VBZ conducted_VBN beyond_IN the_DT boundary_NN and_CC not_RB
allowed_VBN to_TO return_VB ._. Sometimes_RB the_DT buffalo_NN is_VBZ marked_VBN with_IN a_DT red_JJ
pigment_NN and_CC driven_VBN to_TO the_DT next_JJ village_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP carries_VBZ the_DT plague_NN
with_IN him_PRP ._.

Amongst_IN the_DT Dinkas_NNP ,_, a_DT pastoral_JJ people_NNS of_IN the_DT White_NNP Nile_NNP ,_, each_DT family_NN
possesses_NNS a_DT sacred_JJ cow_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT country_NN is_VBZ threatened_VBN with_IN war_NN ,_,
famine_NN ,_, or_CC any_DT other_JJ public_JJ calamity_NN ,_, the_DT chiefs_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN
require_VBP a_DT particular_JJ family_NN to_TO surrender_VB their_PRP$ sacred_JJ cow_NN to_TO serve_VB
as_IN a_DT scapegoat_NN ._. The_DT animal_NN is_VBZ driven_VBN by_IN the_DT women_NNS to_TO the_DT brink_NN of_IN
the_DT river_NN and_CC across_IN it_PRP to_TO the_DT other_JJ bank_NN ,_, there_RB to_TO wander_VB in_IN the_DT
wilderness_NN and_CC fall_VB a_DT prey_NN to_TO ravening_NN beasts_NNS ._. Then_RB the_DT women_NNS return_NN
in_IN silence_NN and_CC without_IN looking_VBG behind_IN them_PRP ;_: were_VBD they_PRP to_TO cast_VB a_DT
backward_JJ glance_NN ,_, they_PRP imagine_VBP that_IN the_DT ceremony_NN would_MD have_VB no_RB
effect_NN ._. In_IN 1857,_CD when_WRB the_DT Aymara_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN Bolivia_NNP and_CC Peru_NNP were_VBD
suffering_VBG from_IN a_DT plague_NN ,_, they_PRP loaded_VBD a_DT black_JJ llama_NN with_IN the_DT clothes_NNS
of_IN the_DT plague-stricken_JJ people_NNS ,_, sprinkled_VBD brandy_NN on_IN the_DT clothes_NNS ,_, and_CC
then_RB turned_VBD the_DT animal_NN loose_RB on_IN the_DT mountains_NNS ,_, hoping_VBG that_IN it_PRP would_MD
carry_VB the_DT pest_JJ away_RB with_IN it_PRP ._.

Occasionally_RB the_DT scapegoat_NN is_VBZ a_DT man_NN ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN
the_DT gods_NNS used_VBN to_TO warn_VB the_DT King_NNP of_IN Uganda_NNP that_IN his_PRP$ foes_NNS the_DT Banyoro_NNP
were_VBD working_VBG magic_NN against_IN him_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ people_NNS to_TO make_VB them_PRP die_VB of_IN
disease_NN ._. To_TO avert_VB such_PDT a_DT catastrophe_NN the_DT king_NN would_MD send_VB a_DT scapegoat_NN
to_TO the_DT frontier_NN of_IN Bunyoro_NNP ,_, the_DT land_NN of_IN the_DT enemy_NN ._. The_DT scapegoat_NN
consisted_VBD of_IN either_RB a_DT man_NN and_CC a_DT boy_NN or_CC a_DT woman_NN and_CC her_PRP$ child_NN ,_, chosen_VBN
because_IN of_IN some_DT mark_NN or_CC bodily_JJ defect_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT gods_NNS had_VBD noted_VBN and_CC
by_IN which_WDT the_DT victims_NNS were_VBD to_TO be_VB recognised_VBN ._. With_IN the_DT human_JJ victims_NNS
were_VBD sent_VBN a_DT cow_NN ,_, a_DT goat_NN ,_, a_DT fowl_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT dog_NN ;_: and_CC a_DT strong_JJ guard_NN
escorted_VBD them_PRP to_TO the_DT land_NN which_WDT the_DT god_NN had_VBD indicated_VBN ._. There_EX the_DT
limbs_NNS of_IN the_DT victims_NNS were_VBD broken_VBN and_CC they_PRP were_VBD left_JJ to_TO die_VB a_DT
lingering_VBG death_NN in_IN the_DT enemy_NN '_POS s_PRP country_NN ,_, being_VBG too_RB crippled_VBN to_TO crawl_VB
back_RB to_TO Uganda_NNP ._. The_DT disease_NN or_CC plague_NN was_VBD thought_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN thus_RB
transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT victims_NNS and_CC to_TO have_VB been_VBN conveyed_VBN back_RB in_IN their_PRP$
persons_NNS to_TO the_DT land_NN from_IN which_WDT it_PRP came_VBD ._.

Some_DT of_IN the_DT aboriginal_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN China_NNP ,_, as_IN a_DT protection_NN against_IN
pestilence_NN ,_, select_VB a_DT man_NN of_IN great_JJ muscular_JJ strength_NN to_TO act_VB the_DT part_NN
of_IN scapegoat_NN ._. Having_VBG besmeared_VBN his_PRP$ face_NN with_IN paint_NN ,_, he_PRP performs_VBZ many_JJ
antics_NNS with_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN enticing_VBG all_DT pestilential_JJ and_CC noxious_JJ
influences_VBZ to_TO attach_VB themselves_PRP to_TO him_PRP only_RB ._. He_PRP is_VBZ assisted_VBN by_IN a_DT
priest_NN ._. Finally_RB the_DT scapegoat_NN ,_, hotly_RB pursued_VBN by_IN men_NNS and_CC women_NNS
beating_VBG gongs_NNS and_CC tom-toms_NNS ,_, is_VBZ driven_VBN with_IN great_JJ haste_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT
town_NN or_CC village_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Punjaub_NNP a_DT cure_NN for_IN the_DT murrain_NN is_VBZ to_TO hire_VB a_DT
man_NN of_IN the_DT Chamar_NNP caste_NN ,_, turn_VB his_PRP$ face_NN away_RB from_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, brand_NN
him_PRP with_IN a_DT red-hot_JJ sickle_JJ ,_, and_CC let_VB him_PRP go_VB out_RB into_IN the_DT jungle_NN taking_VBG
the_DT murrain_NN with_IN him_PRP ._. He_PRP must_MD not_RB look_VB back_RB ._.



3._`` The_DT Periodic_JJ Expulsion_NN of_IN Evils_NNP in_IN a_DT Material_NNP Vehicle_NNP

THE_DT MEDIATE_NNP expulsion_NN of_IN evils_NNS by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT scapegoat_NN or_CC other_JJ
material_NN vehicle_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT immediate_JJ expulsion_NN of_IN them_PRP in_IN invisible_JJ
form_NN ,_, tends_VBZ to_TO become_VB periodic_JJ ,_, and_CC for_IN a_DT like_JJ reason_NN ._. Thus_RB every_DT
year_NN ,_, generally_RB in_IN March_NNP ,_, the_DT people_NNS of_IN Leti_NNP ,_, Moa_NNP ,_, and_CC Lakor_NNP ,_,
islands_NNS of_IN the_DT Indian_NNP Archipelago_NNP ,_, send_VBP away_RB all_DT their_PRP$ diseases_NNS to_TO
sea_NN ._. They_PRP make_VBP a_DT proa_NN about_IN six_CD feet_NNS long_RB ,_, rig_NN it_PRP with_IN sails_NNS ,_, oars_NNS ,_,
rudder_NN ,_, and_CC other_JJ gear_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT family_NN deposits_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ some_DT rice_NN ,_,
fruit_NN ,_, a_DT fowl_NN ,_, two_CD eggs_NNS ,_, insects_NNS that_IN ravage_NN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ._.
Then_RB they_PRP let_VB it_PRP drift_VB away_RB to_TO sea_NN ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_'' Take_VB away_RB from_IN here_RB all_PDT
kinds_NNS of_IN sickness_NN ,_, take_VB them_PRP to_TO other_JJ islands_NNS ,_, to_TO other_JJ lands_NNS ,_,
distribute_VB them_PRP in_IN places_NNS that_WDT lie_VBP eastward_RB ,_, where_WRB the_DT sun_NN rises_VBZ ."_RB
The_DT Biajas_NNP of_IN Borneo_NNP annually_RB send_VBP to_TO sea_VB a_DT little_JJ bark_NN laden_JJ with_IN
the_DT sins_NNS and_CC misfortunes_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._. The_DT crew_NN of_IN any_DT ship_NN that_WDT
falls_VBZ in_IN with_IN the_DT ill-omened_JJ bark_NN at_IN sea_NN will_MD suffer_VB all_DT the_DT sorrows_NNS
with_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ laden_JJ ._. A_DT like_JJ custom_NN is_VBZ annually_RB observed_VBN by_IN the_DT
Dusuns_NNS of_IN the_DT Tuaran_NNP district_NN in_IN British_JJ North_NNP Borneo_NNP ._. The_DT ceremony_NN
is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS important_JJ of_IN the_DT whole_JJ year_NN ._. Its_PRP$ aim_NN is_VBZ to_TO bring_VB good_JJ
luck_NN to_TO the_DT village_NN during_IN the_DT ensuing_VBG year_NN by_IN solemnly_RB expelling_VBG
all_DT the_DT evil_JJ spirits_NNS that_WDT may_MD have_VB collected_VBN in_IN or_CC about_IN the_DT houses_NNS
throughout_IN the_DT last_JJ twelve_CD months_NNS ._. The_DT task_NN of_IN routing_VBG out_IN the_DT
demons_NNS and_CC banishing_VBG them_PRP devolves_VBZ chiefly_RB on_IN women_NNS ._. Dressed_NNP in_IN
their_PRP$ finest_JJS array_NN ,_, they_PRP go_VBP in_IN procession_NN through_IN the_DT village_NN ._. One_CD
of_IN them_PRP carries_VBZ a_DT small_JJ sucking_NN pig_NN in_IN a_DT basket_NN on_IN her_PRP$ back_NN ;_: and_CC all_PDT
of_IN them_PRP bear_VBP wands_NNS ,_, with_IN which_WDT they_PRP belabour_VBP the_DT little_JJ pig_NN at_IN the_DT
appropriate_JJ moment_NN ;_: its_PRP$ squeals_NNS help_VBP to_TO attract_VB the_DT vagrant_JJ spirits_NNS ._.
At_IN every_DT house_NN the_DT women_NNS dance_VB and_CC sing_VB ,_, clashing_NN castanets_NNS or_CC
cymbals_NNS of_IN brass_NN and_CC jingling_VBG bunches_NNS of_IN little_JJ brass_NN bells_NNS in_IN both_DT
hands_NNS ._. When_WRB the_DT performance_NN has_VBZ been_VBN repeated_VBN at_IN every_DT house_NN in_IN the_DT
village_NN ,_, the_DT procession_NN defiles_VBZ down_RB to_TO the_DT river_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT the_DT evil_NN
spirits_NNS ,_, which_WDT the_DT performers_NNS have_VBP chased_VBN from_IN the_DT houses_NNS ,_, follow_VBP

invisible_JJ passengers_NNS should_MD seize_VB the_DT opportunity_NN of_IN landing_NN and_CC

Every_DT year_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT dry_JJ season_NN ,_, the_DT Nicobar_NNP

Amongst_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT aboriginal_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN China_NNP ,_, a_DT great_JJ festival_NN is_VBZ

At_IN Old_NNP Calabar_NNP on_IN the_DT coast_NN of_IN Guinea_NNP ,_, the_DT devils_NNS and_CC ghosts_NNS are_VBP ,_, or_CC

the_DT town_NN is_VBZ swept_VBN clean_JJ of_IN ghosts_NNS and_CC devils_NNS for_IN another_DT two_CD years_NNS ._.

Again_RB ,_, on_IN one_CD day_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN the_DT Bhotiyas_NNP of_IN Juhar_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Western_JJ

about_IN and_CC paraded_VBD through_IN the_DT streets_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN or_CC city_NN of_IN the_DT

government_NN and_CC of_IN every_DT family_NN and_CC individual_NN under_IN it_PRP ,_, in_IN order_NN
that_IN he_PRP might_MD carry_VB off_RP the_DT sin_NN ,_, guilt_NN ,_, misfortune_NN and_CC death_NN of_IN all_PDT
without_IN exception_NN ._. Ashes_'' and_CC chalk_NN would_MD be_VB employed_VBN to_TO hide_VB his_PRP$

In_IN Siam_NNP it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT custom_NN on_IN one_CD day_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN to_TO single_VB

Sometimes_RB the_DT scapegoat_NN is_VBZ a_DT divine_JJ animal_NN ._. The_DT people_NNS of_IN Malabar_NNP

In_IN Tibet_NNP the_DT ceremony_NN of_IN the_DT scapegoat_NN presents_VBZ some_DT remarkable_JJ

In_IN such_JJ multitudes_NNS do_VBP they_PRP come_VB that_IN the_DT streets_NNS and_CC squares_NNS of_IN the_DT

All_DT day_NN long_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, from_IN before_IN the_DT peep_NN of_IN dawn_NN till_IN after_IN darkness_NN
has_VBZ fallen_VBN ,_, these_DT red-cloaked_JJ monks_NNS hold_VBP services_NNS in_IN the_DT dim_JJ

at_IN the_DT cathedral_NN ,_, pray_NN to_TO the_DT gods_NNS to_TO prevent_VB sickness_NN and_CC other_JJ

the_DT part_NN of_IN scapegoat_NN over_IN again_RB the_DT following_JJ year_NN ._.

This_DT quaint_JJ ceremonial_NN ,_, still_RB annually_RB observed_VBN in_IN the_DT secluded_VBN
capital_NN of_IN Buddhism_NNP --_: the_DT Rome_NNP of_IN Asia_NNP --_: is_VBZ interesting_JJ because_IN it_PRP
exhibits_NNS ,_, in_IN a_DT clearly_RB marked_VBN religious_JJ stratification_NN ,_, a_DT series_NN of_IN
divine_JJ redeemers_NNS themselves_PRP redeemed_VBN ,_, of_IN vicarious_JJ sacrifices_NNS

fossilisation_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, while_IN they_PRP retain_VBP the_DT privileges_NNS ,_, have_VBP
disburdened_VBN themselves_PRP of_IN the_DT pains_NNS and_CC penalties_NNS of_IN divinity_NN ._. In_IN
the_DT Jalno_NNP we_PRP may_MD without_IN undue_JJ straining_VBG discern_NN a_DT successor_NN of_IN
those_DT temporary_JJ kings_NNS ,_, those_DT mortal_JJ gods_NNS ,_, who_WP purchase_VBP a_DT short_JJ lease_NN

4._. On_IN Scapegoats_NNP in_IN General_NNP

THE_DT FOREGOING_NN survey_NN of_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN publicly_RB expelling_VBG the_DT
accumulated_VBN evils_NNS of_IN a_DT village_NN or_CC town_NN or_CC country_NN suggests_VBZ a_DT few_JJ
general_JJ observations_NNS ._.

In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB disputed_VBN that_IN what_WP I_PRP have_VBP called_VBN
the_DT immediate_JJ and_CC the_DT mediate_JJ expulsions_NNS of_IN evil_NN are_VBP identical_JJ in_IN
intention_NN ;_: in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, that_IN whether_IN the_DT evils_NNS are_VBP conceived_VBN of_IN
as_IN invisible_JJ or_CC as_RB embodied_VBN in_IN a_DT material_NN form_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT circumstance_NN
entirely_RB subordinate_JJ to_TO the_DT main_JJ object_NN of_IN the_DT ceremony_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ
simply_RB to_TO effect_VB a_DT total_JJ clearance_NN of_IN all_DT the_DT ills_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN
infesting_VBG a_DT people_NNS ._. If_IN any_DT link_NN were_VBD wanting_VBG to_TO connect_VB the_DT two_CD
kinds_NNS of_IN expulsion_NN ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB furnished_VBN by_IN such_JJ a_DT practice_NN as_IN that_IN
of_IN sending_VBG the_DT evils_NNS away_RB in_IN a_DT litter_JJ or_CC a_DT boat_NN ._. For_IN here_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT
one_CD hand_NN ,_, the_DT evils_NNS are_VBP invisible_JJ and_CC intangible_JJ ;_: and_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ
hand_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT visible_JJ and_CC tangible_JJ vehicle_NN to_TO convey_VB them_PRP away_RB ._.
And_CC a_DT scapegoat_NN is_VBZ nothing_NN more_JJR than_IN such_JJ a_DT vehicle_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT second_JJ place_NN ,_, when_WRB a_DT general_JJ clearance_NN of_IN evils_NNS is_VBZ resorted_VBN
to_TO periodically_RB ,_, the_DT interval_NN between_IN the_DT celebrations_NNS of_IN the_DT
ceremony_NN is_VBZ commonly_RB a_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT time_NN of_IN year_NN when_WRB the_DT ceremony_NN
takes_VBZ place_NN usually_RB coincides_VBZ with_IN some_DT well-marked_JJ change_NN of_IN
season_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT beginning_NN or_CC end_NN of_IN winter_NN in_IN the_DT arctic_NN and_CC
temperate_JJ zones_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT beginning_NN or_CC end_NN of_IN the_DT rainy_NN season_NN in_IN the_DT
tropics_NNS ._. The_DT increased_VBN mortality_NN which_WDT such_JJ climatic_JJ changes_NNS are_VBP apt_JJ
to_TO produce_VB ,_, especially_RB amongst_IN ill-fed_JJ ,_, ill-clothed_JJ ,_, and_CC ill-housed_JJ
savages_NNS ,_, is_VBZ set_VBN down_RP by_IN primitive_JJ man_NN to_TO the_DT agency_NN of_IN demons_NNS ,_, who_WP
must_MD accordingly_RB be_VB expelled_VBN ._. Hence_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT tropical_JJ regions_NNS of_IN New_NNP

of_IN the_DT rainy_NN season_NN ;_: hence_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT dreary_JJ coasts_NNS of_IN Baffin_NNP Land_NNP ,_,
they_PRP are_VBP banished_VBN at_IN the_DT approach_NN of_IN the_DT bitter_JJ Arctic_NNP winter_NN ._. When_WRB
a_DT tribe_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN to_TO husbandry_NN ,_, the_DT time_NN for_IN the_DT general_JJ expulsion_NN
of_IN devils_NNS is_VBZ naturally_RB made_VBN to_TO agree_VB with_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT great_JJ epochs_NNS of_IN
the_DT agricultural_JJ year_NN ,_, as_IN sowing_NN ,_, or_CC harvest_NN ;_: but_CC ,_, as_IN these_DT epochs_NNS
themselves_PRP naturally_RB coincide_VBP with_IN changes_NNS of_IN season_NN ,_, it_PRP does_VBZ not_RB
follow_VB that_IN the_DT transition_NN from_IN the_DT hunting_NN or_CC pastoral_JJ to_TO the_DT

this_DT great_JJ annual_JJ rite_NN ._. Some_DT of_IN the_DT agricultural_JJ communities_NNS of_IN

whatever_WDT season_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN it_PRP is_VBZ held_VBN ,_, the_DT general_JJ expulsion_NN of_IN

In_IN the_DT third_JJ place_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB observed_VBN that_IN this_DT public_NN and_CC

case_NN ,_, the_DT extraordinary_JJ relaxation_NN of_IN all_DT ordinary_JJ rules_NNS of_IN conduct_NN
on_IN such_JJ occasions_NNS is_VBZ doubtless_RB to_TO be_VB explained_VBN by_IN the_DT general_JJ

when_WRB a_DT general_JJ riddance_NN of_IN evil_JJ and_CC absolution_NN from_IN all_DT sin_NN is_VBZ in_IN
immediate_JJ prospect_NN ,_, men_NNS are_VBP encouraged_VBN to_TO give_VB the_DT rein_NN to_TO their_PRP$

which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP running_VBG up_RP so_RB fast_RB ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT

oppressive_JJ sense_NN ,_, under_IN which_WDT they_PRP generally_RB labour_VBP ,_, of_IN an_DT

they_PRP overleap_VBP the_DT limits_NNS commonly_RB imposed_VBN by_IN custom_NN and_CC morality_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT ceremony_NN takes_VBZ place_NN at_IN harvest-time_NN ,_, the_DT elation_NN of_IN

Fourthly_RB ,_, the_DT employment_NN of_IN a_DT divine_JJ man_NN or_CC animal_NN as_IN a_DT scapegoat_NN is_VBZ
especially_RB to_TO be_VB noted_VBN ;_: indeed_RB ,_, we_PRP are_VBP here_RB directly_RB concerned_VBN with_IN
the_DT custom_NN of_IN banishing_VBG evils_NNS only_RB in_IN so_RB far_RB as_IN these_DT evils_NNS are_VBP

be_VB suspected_VBN that_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN employing_VBG a_DT divine_JJ man_NN or_CC animal_NN as_IN
a_DT public_JJ scapegoat_NN is_VBZ much_RB more_RBR widely_RB diffused_JJ than_IN appears_VBZ from_IN

victim_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ especially_RB likely_JJ to_TO be_VB the_DT case_NN when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT divine_JJ

killing_NN of_IN a_DT god_NN may_MD sometimes_RB come_VB to_TO be_VB confounded_VBN with_IN the_DT

If_IN we_PRP ask_VBP why_WRB a_DT dying_VBG god_NN should_MD be_VB chosen_VBN to_TO take_VB upon_IN himself_PRP and_CC

The_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT divinity_NN as_IN a_DT scapegoat_NN clears_VBZ up_IN the_DT ambiguity_NN

"_`` carrying_VBG out_RP Death_NNP ."_NNP Grounds_NNP have_VBP been_VBN shown_VBN for_IN believing_VBG that_IN in_IN

appropriate_JJ ;_: and_CC if_IN the_DT dying_VBG god_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT object_NN of_IN that_WDT

Similarly_RB we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN disease-laden_JJ and_CC sin-laden_JJ boats_NNS are_VBP
dreaded_VBN and_CC shunned_VBN by_IN East_NNP Indian_NNP peoples_NNS ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT view_NN that_IN in_IN
these_DT popular_JJ customs_NNS the_DT Death_NN is_VBZ a_DT scapegoat_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN a_DT
representative_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN derives_VBZ some_DT

Slavonic_NNP year_NN began_VBD in_IN spring_NN ;_: and_CC thus_RB ,_, in_IN one_CD of_IN its_PRP$ aspects_NNS ,_, the_DT
ceremony_NN of_IN "_`` carrying_VBG out_RP Death_NNP "_'' would_MD be_VB an_DT example_NN of_IN the_DT
widespread_JJ custom_NN of_IN expelling_VBG the_DT accumulated_VBN evils_NNS of_IN the_DT old_JJ year_NN
before_IN entering_VBG on_IN a_DT new_JJ one_CD ._.




LVIII_NNP ._. Human_NNP Scapegoats_NNP in_IN Classical_NNP Antiquity_NNP



1._DT The_DT Human_NNP Scapegoat_NNP in_IN Ancient_NNP Rome_NNP

WE_NNP are_VBP now_RB prepared_VBN to_TO notice_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT human_JJ scapegoat_NN in_IN
classical_JJ antiquity_NN ._. Every_DT year_NN on_IN the_DT fourteenth_JJ of_IN March_NNP a_DT man_NN
clad_VBN in_IN skins_NNS was_VBD led_VBN in_IN procession_NN through_IN the_DT streets_NNS of_IN Rome_NNP ,_,
beaten_VBN with_IN long_JJ white_JJ rods_NNS ,_, and_CC driven_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT city_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD
called_VBN Mamurius_NNP Veturius_NNP ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, "_`` the_DT old_JJ Mars_NNP ,"_, and_CC as_IN the_DT
ceremony_NN took_VBD place_NN on_IN the_DT day_NN preceding_VBG the_DT first_JJ full_JJ moon_NN of_IN the_DT
old_JJ Roman_NNP year_NN (_-LRB- which_WDT began_VBD on_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN March_NNP ),_, the_DT skin-clad_NN
man_NN must_MD have_VB represented_VBN the_DT Mars_NNP of_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD driven_VBN
out_IN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN a_DT new_JJ one_CD ._. Now_RB Mars_NNP was_VBD originally_RB not_RB a_DT god_NN
of_IN war_NN but_CC of_IN vegetation_NN ._. For_IN it_PRP was_VBD to_TO Mars_NNP that_IN the_DT Roman_NNP
husbandman_NN prayed_VBD for_IN the_DT prosperity_NN of_IN his_PRP$ corn_NN and_CC his_PRP$ vines_NNS ,_, his_PRP$
fruit-trees_NNS and_CC his_PRP$ copses_NNS ;_: it_PRP was_VBD to_TO Mars_NNP that_IN the_DT priestly_JJ college_NN
of_IN the_DT Arval_NNP Brothers_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ business_NN it_PRP was_VBD to_TO sacrifice_VB for_IN the_DT
growth_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ,_, addressed_VBD their_PRP$ petitions_NNS almost_RB exclusively_RB ;_:
and_CC it_PRP was_VBD to_TO Mars_NNP ,_, as_IN we_PRP saw_VBD ,_, that_IN a_DT horse_NN was_VBD sacrificed_VBN in_IN
October_NNP to_TO secure_VB an_DT abundant_JJ harvest_NN ._. Moreover_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD to_TO Mars_NNP ,_,
under_IN his_PRP$ title_NN of_IN "_`` Mars_NNP of_IN the_DT woods_NNS "_`` (_-LRB- Mars_NNP Silvanus_NNP ),_NNP that_WDT
farmers_NNS offered_VBD sacrifice_NN for_IN the_DT welfare_NN of_IN their_PRP$ cattle_NNS ._. We_PRP have_VBP
already_RB seen_VBN that_IN cattle_NNS are_VBP commonly_RB supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB under_IN the_DT
special_JJ patronage_NN of_IN tree-gods_NNS ._. Once_RB more_RBR ,_, the_DT consecration_NN of_IN the_DT
vernal_JJ month_NN of_IN March_NNP to_TO Mars_NNP seems_VBZ to_TO point_VB him_PRP out_RP as_IN the_DT deity_NN of_IN
the_DT sprouting_VBG vegetation_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT Roman_JJ custom_NN of_IN expelling_VBG the_DT old_JJ
Mars_NNP at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ year_NN in_IN spring_NN is_VBZ identical_JJ with_IN
the_DT Slavonic_JJ custom_NN of_IN "_`` carrying_VBG out_RP Death_NNP ,"_, if_IN the_DT view_NN here_RB taken_VBN
of_IN the_DT latter_JJ custom_NN is_VBZ correct_JJ ._. The_DT similarity_NN of_IN the_DT Roman_NNP and_CC
Slavonic_JJ customs_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN already_RB remarked_VBN by_IN scholars_NNS ,_, who_WP appear_VBP ,_,
however_RB ,_, to_TO have_VB taken_VBN Mamurius_NNP Veturius_NNP and_CC the_DT corresponding_JJ
figures_NNS in_IN the_DT Slavonic_NNP ceremonies_NNS to_TO be_VB representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT old_JJ
year_NN rather_RB than_IN of_IN the_DT old_JJ god_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ that_IN
ceremonies_NNS of_IN this_DT kind_NN may_MD have_VB come_VBN to_TO be_VB thus_RB interpreted_VBN in_IN
later_RBR times_NNS even_RB by_IN the_DT people_NNS who_WP practised_VBD them_PRP ._. But_CC the_DT
personification_NN of_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN time_NN is_VBZ too_RB abstract_JJ an_DT idea_NN to_TO be_VB
primitive_JJ ._. However_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT Roman_NNP ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT Slavonic_NNP ,_, ceremony_NN ,_, the_DT
representative_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN treated_VBN not_RB only_RB as_IN a_DT
deity_NN of_IN vegetation_NN but_CC also_RB as_IN a_DT scapegoat_NN ._. His_PRP$ expulsion_NN implies_VBZ
this_DT ;_: for_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN why_WRB the_DT god_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ,_, as_IN such_JJ ,_,
should_MD be_VB expelled_VBN the_DT city_NN ._. But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ otherwise_RB if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ also_RB a_DT
scapegoat_NN ;_: it_PRP then_RB becomes_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO drive_VB him_PRP beyond_IN the_DT
boundaries_NNS ,_, that_IN he_PRP may_MD carry_VB his_PRP$ sorrowful_JJ burden_NN away_RB to_TO other_JJ
lands_NNS ._. And_CC ,_, in_IN fact_NN ,_, Mamurius_NNP Veturius_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN driven_VBN
away_RB to_TO the_DT land_NN of_IN the_DT Oscans_NNP ,_, the_DT enemies_NNS of_IN Rome_NNP ._.



2._DT The_DT Human_NNP Scapegoat_NNP in_IN Ancient_NNP Greece_NNP

THE_DT ANCIENT_NNP Greeks_NNP were_VBD also_RB familiar_JJ with_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN a_DT human_NN
scapegoat_NN ._. In_IN Plutarch_NNP '_POS s_PRP native_JJ town_NN of_IN Chaeronea_NNP a_DT ceremony_NN of_IN this_DT
kind_NN was_VBD performed_VBN by_IN the_DT chief_NN magistrate_NN at_IN the_DT Town_NNP Hall_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN
each_DT householder_NN at_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ home_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD called_VBN the_DT "_`` expulsion_NN of_IN
hunger_NN ."_IN A_DT slave_NN was_VBD beaten_VBN with_IN rods_NNS of_IN the_DT agnus_NN castus_NN ,_, and_CC
turned_VBD out_IN of_IN doors_NNS with_IN the_DT words_NNS ,_, "_`` Out_IN with_IN hunger_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN with_IN
wealth_NN and_CC health_NN ."_. When_WRB Plutarch_NNP held_VBD the_DT office_NN of_IN chief_NN
magistrate_NN of_IN his_PRP$ native_JJ town_NN he_PRP performed_VBD this_DT ceremony_NN at_IN the_DT Town_NNP
Hall_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP has_VBZ recorded_VBN the_DT discussion_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT custom_NN
afterwards_RB gave_VBD rise_NN ._.

But_CC in_IN civilised_JJ Greece_NNP the_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT scapegoat_NN took_VBD darker_NN
forms_NNS than_IN the_DT innocent_JJ rite_NN over_IN which_WDT the_DT amiable_JJ and_CC pious_JJ
Plutarch_NNP presided_VBD ._. Whenever_WRB Marseilles_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT busiest_JJS and_CC most_RBS
brilliant_JJ of_IN Greek_NNP colonies_NNS ,_, was_VBD ravaged_VBN by_IN a_DT plague_NN ,_, a_DT man_NN of_IN the_DT
poorer_JJR classes_NNS used_VBN to_TO offer_VB himself_PRP as_IN a_DT scapegoat_NN ._. For_IN a_DT whole_NN
year_NN he_PRP was_VBD maintained_VBN at_IN the_DT public_JJ expense_NN ,_, being_VBG fed_VBN on_IN choice_NN
and_CC pure_JJ food_NN ._. At_IN the_DT expiry_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN he_PRP was_VBD dressed_VBN in_IN sacred_JJ
garments_NNS ,_, decked_VBN with_IN holy_JJ branches_NNS ,_, and_CC led_VBD through_IN the_DT whole_JJ city_NN ,_,
while_IN prayers_NNS were_VBD uttered_VBN that_IN all_PDT the_DT evils_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS might_MD
fall_NN on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD then_RB cast_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT city_NN or_CC stoned_VBN to_TO
death_NN by_IN the_DT people_NNS outside_IN of_IN the_DT walls_NNS ._. The_DT Athenians_NNPS regularly_RB
maintained_VBN a_DT number_NN of_IN degraded_JJ and_CC useless_JJ beings_NNS at_IN the_DT public_NN
expense_NN ;_: and_CC when_WRB any_DT calamity_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN plague_NN ,_, drought_NN ,_, or_CC famine_NN ,_,
befell_VB the_DT city_NN ,_, they_PRP sacrificed_VBD two_CD of_IN these_DT outcast_NN scapegoats_NNS ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT victims_NNS was_VBD sacrificed_VBN for_IN the_DT men_NNS and_CC the_DT other_JJ for_IN the_DT
women_NNS ._. The_DT former_JJ wore_VBD round_RB his_PRP$ neck_NN a_DT string_NN of_IN black_JJ ,_, the_DT latter_NN
a_DT string_NN of_IN white_JJ figs_NNS ._. Sometimes_RB ,_, it_PRP seems_VBZ ,_, the_DT victim_NN slain_NN on_IN
behalf_NN of_IN the_DT women_NNS was_VBD a_DT woman_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD led_VBN about_IN the_DT city_NN and_CC
then_RB sacrificed_VBD ,_, apparently_RB by_IN being_VBG stoned_VBN to_TO death_NN outside_IN the_DT
city_NN ._. But_CC such_JJ sacrifices_NNS were_VBD not_RB confined_VBN to_TO extraordinary_JJ
occasions_NNS of_IN public_JJ calamity_NN ;_: it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN every_DT year_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT
festival_NN of_IN the_DT Thargelia_NNP in_IN May_NNP ,_, two_CD victims_NNS ,_, one_CD for_IN the_DT men_NNS and_CC
one_CD for_IN the_DT women_NNS ,_, were_VBD led_VBN out_IN of_IN Athens_NNP and_CC stoned_VBD to_TO death_NN ._. The_DT
city_NN of_IN Abdera_NNP in_IN Thrace_NNP was_VBD publicly_RB purified_VBN once_IN a_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD
of_IN the_DT burghers_NNS ,_, set_VBD apart_RB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, was_VBD stoned_VBN to_TO death_NN as_IN a_DT
scapegoat_NN or_CC vicarious_JJ sacrifice_NN for_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT others_NNS ;_: six_CD
days_NNS before_IN his_PRP$ execution_NN he_PRP was_VBD excommunicated_VBN ,_, "_'' in_IN order_NN that_IN he_PRP
alone_RB might_MD bear_VB the_DT sins_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT people_NNS ."_.

From_IN the_DT Lover_NN '_'' s_PRP Leap_VB ,_, a_DT white_JJ bluff_NN at_IN the_DT southern_JJ end_NN of_IN their_PRP$
island_NN ,_, the_DT Leucadians_NNPS used_VBD annually_RB to_TO hurl_VB a_DT criminal_JJ into_IN the_DT sea_NN
as_IN a_DT scapegoat_NN ._. But_CC to_TO lighten_VB his_PRP$ fall_NN they_PRP fastened_VBD live_JJ birds_NNS and_CC
feathers_NNS to_TO him_PRP ,_, and_CC a_DT flotilla_NN of_IN small_JJ boats_NNS waited_VBD below_IN to_TO catch_VB
him_PRP and_CC convey_VB him_PRP beyond_IN the_DT boundary_NN ._. Probably_RB these_DT humane_NN
precautions_NNS were_VBD a_DT mitigation_NN of_IN an_DT earlier_JJR custom_NN of_IN flinging_VBG the_DT
scapegoat_NN into_IN the_DT sea_NN to_TO drown_VB ._. The_DT Leucadian_NNP ceremony_NN took_VBD place_NN
at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN a_DT sacrifice_NN to_TO Apollo_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD a_DT temple_NN or_CC sanctuary_NN
on_IN the_DT spot_NN ._. Elsewhere_RB it_PRP was_VBD customary_JJ to_TO cast_VB a_DT young_JJ man_NN every_DT
year_NN into_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT prayer_NN ,_, "_`` Be_VB thou_DT our_PRP$ offscouring_VBG ."_'' This_DT
ceremony_NN was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO rid_VB the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT evils_NNS by_IN which_WDT they_PRP
were_VBD beset_JJ ,_, or_CC according_VBG to_TO a_DT somewhat_RB different_JJ interpretation_NN it_PRP
redeemed_VBN them_PRP by_IN paying_VBG the_DT debt_NN they_PRP owed_VBD to_TO the_DT sea-god_NN ._. As_IN
practised_VBN by_IN the_DT Greeks_NNP of_IN Asia_NNP Minor_NNP in_IN the_DT sixth_JJ century_NN before_IN
our_PRP$ era_NN ,_, the_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT scapegoat_NN was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ ._. When_WRB a_DT city_NN
suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN ,_, famine_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ public_JJ calamity_NN ,_, an_DT ugly_JJ or_CC
deformed_VBN person_NN was_VBD chosen_VBN to_TO take_VB upon_IN himself_PRP all_DT the_DT evils_NNS which_WDT
afflicted_VBN the_DT community_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO a_DT suitable_JJ place_NN ,_, where_WRB
dried_VBN figs_NNS ,_, a_DT barley_NN loaf_NN ,_, and_CC cheese_NN were_VBD put_VBN into_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ._. These_DT
he_PRP ate_VBD ._. Then_RB he_PRP was_VBD beaten_VBN seven_CD times_NNS upon_IN his_PRP$ genital_JJ organs_NNS with_IN
squills_NNS and_CC branches_NNS of_IN the_DT wild_JJ fig_NN and_CC other_JJ wild_JJ trees_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT
flutes_NNS played_VBD a_DT particular_JJ tune_NN ._. Afterwards_IN he_PRP was_VBD burned_VBN on_IN a_DT pyre_NN
built_VBN of_IN the_DT wood_NN of_IN forest_NN trees_NNS ;_: and_CC his_PRP$ ashes_NNS were_VBD cast_VBN into_IN the_DT
sea_NN ._. A_DT similar_JJ custom_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN annually_RB celebrated_VBN by_IN
the_DT Asiatic_JJ Greeks_NNS at_IN the_DT harvest_NN festival_NN of_IN the_DT Thargelia_NNP ._.

In_IN the_DT ritual_NN just_RB described_VBD the_DT scourging_NN of_IN the_DT victim_NN with_IN
squills_NNS ,_, branches_NNS of_IN the_DT wild_JJ fig_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ,_, cannot_MD have_VB been_VBN
intended_VBN to_TO aggravate_VB his_PRP$ sufferings_NNS ,_, otherwise_RB any_DT stick_NN would_MD have_VB
been_VBN good_JJ enough_RB to_TO beat_VB him_PRP with_IN ._. The_DT true_JJ meaning_NN of_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN
the_DT ceremony_NN has_VBZ been_VBN explained_VBN by_IN W_NNP ._. Mannhardt_NNP ._. He_PRP points_VBZ out_RP that_IN
the_DT ancients_NNS attributed_VBD to_TO squills_NNS a_DT magical_JJ power_NN of_IN averting_JJ evil_NN
influences_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN accordingly_RB they_PRP hung_VBD them_PRP up_RP at_IN the_DT doors_NNS of_IN
their_PRP$ houses_NNS and_CC made_VBD use_NN of_IN them_PRP in_IN purificatory_NN rites_NNS ._. Hence_RB the_DT
Arcadian_JJ custom_NN of_IN whipping_VBG the_DT image_NN of_IN Pan_NNP with_IN squills_NNS at_IN a_DT
festival_NN ,_, or_CC whenever_WRB the_DT hunters_NNS returned_VBD empty-handed_JJ ,_, must_MD have_VB
been_VBN meant_VBN ,_, not_RB to_TO punish_VB the_DT god_NN ,_, but_CC to_TO purify_VB him_PRP from_IN the_DT
harmful_JJ influences_NNS which_WDT were_VBD impeding_VBG him_PRP in_IN the_DT exercise_NN of_IN his_PRP$
divine_JJ functions_NNS as_IN a_DT god_NN who_WP should_MD supply_VB the_DT hunter_NN with_IN game_NN ._.
Similarly_RB the_DT object_NN of_IN beating_VBG the_DT human_JJ scapegoat_NN on_IN the_DT genital_NN
organs_NNS with_IN squills_NNS and_CC so_RB on_IN ,_, must_MD have_VB been_VBN to_TO release_VB his_PRP$
reproductive_JJ energies_NNS from_IN any_DT restraint_NN or_CC spell_NN under_IN which_WDT they_PRP
might_MD be_VB laid_VBN by_IN demoniacal_JJ or_CC other_JJ malignant_JJ agency_NN ;_: and_CC as_IN the_DT
Thargelia_NNP at_IN which_WDT he_PRP was_VBD annually_RB sacrificed_VBN was_VBD an_DT early_JJ harvest_NN
festival_NN celebrated_JJ in_IN May_NNP ,_, we_PRP must_MD recognise_VB in_IN him_PRP a_DT
representative_NN of_IN the_DT creative_JJ and_CC fertilising_JJ god_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ._.
The_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN was_VBD annually_RB slain_VB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN I_PRP
have_VBP indicated_VBN ,_, that_IN of_IN maintaining_VBG the_DT divine_JJ life_NN in_IN perpetual_JJ
vigour_NN ,_, untainted_JJ by_IN the_DT weakness_NN of_IN age_NN ;_: and_CC before_IN he_PRP was_VBD put_VBN to_TO
death_NN it_PRP was_VBD not_RB unnatural_JJ to_TO stimulate_VB his_PRP$ reproductive_JJ powers_NNS in_IN
order_NN that_IN these_DT might_MD be_VB transmitted_VBN in_IN full_JJ activity_NN to_TO his_PRP$
successor_NN ,_, the_DT new_JJ god_NN or_CC new_JJ embodiment_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ god_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD
doubtless_RB supposed_VBN immediately_RB to_TO take_VB the_DT place_NN of_IN the_DT one_CD slain_NN ._.
Similar_JJ reasoning_NN would_MD lead_VB to_TO a_DT similar_JJ treatment_NN of_IN the_DT scapegoat_NN
on_IN special_JJ occasions_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN drought_NN or_CC famine_NN ._. If_IN the_DT crops_NNS did_VBD
not_RB answer_NN to_TO the_DT expectation_NN of_IN the_DT husbandman_NN ,_, this_DT would_MD be_VB
attributed_VBN to_TO some_DT failure_NN in_IN the_DT generative_JJ powers_NNS of_IN the_DT god_NN whose_WP$
function_NN it_PRP was_VBD to_TO produce_VB the_DT fruits_NNS of_IN the_DT earth_NN ._. It_PRP might_MD be_VB
thought_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD under_IN a_DT spell_NN or_CC was_VBD growing_VBG old_JJ and_CC feeble_JJ ._.
Accordingly_RB he_PRP was_VBD slain_VBN in_IN the_DT person_NN of_IN his_PRP$ representative_NN ,_, with_IN
all_PDT the_DT ceremonies_NNS already_RB described_VBN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN ,_, born_VBN young_JJ
again_RB ,_, he_PRP might_MD infuse_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ youthful_JJ vigour_NN into_IN the_DT stagnant_JJ
energies_NNS of_IN nature_NN ._. On_IN the_DT same_JJ principle_NN we_PRP can_MD understand_VB why_WRB
Mamurius_NNP Veturius_NNP was_VBD beaten_VBN with_IN rods_NNS ,_, why_WRB the_DT slave_NN at_IN the_DT
Chaeronean_NNP ceremony_NN was_VBD beaten_VBN with_IN the_DT agnus_NN castus_NN (_-LRB- a_DT tree_NN to_TO
which_WDT magical_JJ properties_NNS were_VBD ascribed_VBN ),_RB why_WRB the_DT effigy_NN of_IN Death_NNP in_IN
some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP is_VBZ assailed_VBN with_IN sticks_NNS and_CC stones_NNS ,_, and_CC why_WRB at_IN
Babylon_NNP the_DT criminal_NN who_WP played_VBD the_DT god_NN scourged_VBD before_IN he_PRP was_VBD
crucified_VBN ._. The_DT purpose_NN of_IN the_DT scourging_NN was_VBD not_RB to_TO intensify_VB the_DT
agony_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ sufferer_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN the_DT contrary_NN to_TO dispel_VB any_DT
malignant_JJ influences_NNS by_IN which_WDT at_IN the_DT supreme_JJ moment_NN he_PRP might_MD
conceivably_RB be_VB beset_VBN ._.

Thus_RB far_RB I_PRP have_VBP assumed_VBN that_IN the_DT human_JJ victims_NNS at_IN the_DT Thargelia_NNP
represented_VBD the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN vegetation_NN in_IN general_JJ ,_, but_CC it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN
well_RB remarked_VBN by_IN Mr_NNP ._. W_NNP ._. R_NN ._. Paton_NNP that_IN these_DT poor_JJ wretches_NNS seem_VBP to_TO
have_VBP masqueraded_VBN as_IN the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN fig-trees_NNS in_IN particular_JJ ._. He_PRP
points_NNS out_IN that_IN the_DT process_NN of_IN caprification_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN ,_, that_IN
is_VBZ ,_, the_DT artificial_JJ fertilisation_NN of_IN the_DT cultivated_JJ fig-trees_NNS by_IN
hanging_VBG strings_NNS of_IN wild_JJ figs_NNS among_IN the_DT boughs_NNS ,_, takes_VBZ place_NN in_IN Greece_NNP
and_CC Asia_NNP Minor_NNP in_IN June_NNP about_IN a_DT month_NN after_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT
Thargelia_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP suggests_VBZ that_IN the_DT hanging_NN of_IN the_DT black_JJ and_CC white_JJ
figs_NNS round_VBP the_DT necks_NNS of_IN the_DT two_CD human_JJ victims_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN whom_WP
represented_VBN the_DT men_NNS and_CC the_DT other_JJ the_DT women_NNS ,_, may_MD have_VB been_VBN a_DT direct_JJ
imitation_NN of_IN the_DT process_NN of_IN caprification_NN designed_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT principle_NN
of_IN imitative_JJ magic_NN ,_, to_TO assist_VB the_DT fertilisation_NN of_IN the_DT fig-trees_NNS ._.
And_CC since_IN caprification_NN is_VBZ in_IN fact_NN a_DT marriage_NN of_IN the_DT male_NN fig-tree_NN
with_IN the_DT female_JJ fig-tree_NN ,_, Mr_NNP ._. Paton_NNP further_RB supposes_VBZ that_IN the_DT loves_NNS
of_IN the_DT trees_NNS may_MD ,_, on_IN the_DT same_JJ principle_NN of_IN imitative_JJ magic_NN ,_, have_VBP
been_VBN simulated_VBN by_IN a_DT mock_JJ or_CC even_RB a_DT real_JJ marriage_NN between_IN the_DT two_CD
human_JJ victims_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN whom_WP appears_VBZ sometimes_RB to_TO have_VB been_VBN a_DT woman_NN ._.
On_IN this_DT view_NN the_DT practice_NN of_IN beating_VBG the_DT human_JJ victims_NNS on_IN their_PRP$
genitals_NNS with_IN branches_NNS of_IN wild_JJ fig-trees_NNS and_CC with_IN squills_NNS was_VBD a_DT
charm_NN intended_VBD to_TO stimulate_VB the_DT generative_JJ powers_NNS of_IN the_DT man_NN and_CC
woman_NN who_WP for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG personated_VBN the_DT male_NN and_CC the_DT female_NN
fig-trees_NNS respectively_RB ,_, and_CC who_WP by_IN their_PRP$ union_NN in_IN marriage_NN ,_, whether_IN
real_JJ or_CC pretended_VBN ,_, were_VBD believed_VBN to_TO help_VB the_DT trees_NNS to_TO bear_VB fruit_NN ._.

The_DT interpretation_NN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP adopted_VBN of_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN beating_VBG the_DT
human_JJ scapegoat_NN with_IN certain_JJ plants_NNS is_VBZ supported_VBN by_IN many_JJ analogies_NNS ._.
Thus_RB among_IN the_DT Kai_NNP of_IN German_NNP New_NNP Guinea_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT man_NN wishes_VBZ to_TO make_VB
his_PRP$ banana_NN shoots_NNS bear_VBP fruit_NN quickly_RB ,_, he_PRP beats_VBZ them_PRP with_IN a_DT stick_NN cut_NN
from_IN a_DT banana-tree_NN which_WDT has_VBZ already_RB borne_VBN fruit_NN ._. Here_RB it_PRP is_VBZ obvious_JJ
that_DT fruitfulness_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO inhere_EX in_RP a_DT stick_NN cut_NN from_IN a_DT
fruitful_IN tree_NN and_CC to_TO be_VB imparted_VBN by_IN contact_NN to_TO the_DT young_JJ banana_NN
plants_NNS ._. Similarly_RB in_IN New_NNP Caledonia_NNP a_DT man_NN will_MD beat_VB his_PRP$ taro_NN plants_NNS
lightly_RB with_IN a_DT branch_NN ,_, saying_VBG as_IN he_PRP does_VBZ so_RB ,_, "_`` I_PRP beat_VBD this_DT taro_NN that_WDT
it_PRP may_MD grow_VB ,"_NN after_IN which_WDT he_PRP plants_NNS the_DT branch_NN in_IN the_DT ground_NN at_IN the_DT
end_NN of_IN the_DT field_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN Brazil_NNP at_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT
Amazon_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT man_NN wishes_VBZ to_TO increase_VB the_DT size_NN of_IN his_PRP$ generative_NN
organ_NN ,_, he_PRP strikes_VBZ it_PRP with_IN the_DT fruit_NN of_IN a_DT white_JJ aquatic_JJ plant_NN called_VBN
aninga_NN ,_, which_WDT grows_VBZ luxuriantly_RB on_IN the_DT banks_NNS of_IN the_DT river_NN ._. The_DT
fruit_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ inedible_JJ ,_, resembles_VBZ a_DT banana_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ clearly_RB chosen_VBN
for_IN this_DT purpose_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN its_PRP$ shape_NN ._. The_DT ceremony_NN should_MD be_VB
performed_VBN three_CD days_NNS before_IN or_CC after_IN the_DT new_JJ moon_NN ._. In_IN the_DT county_NN of_IN
Bekes_NNP ,_, in_IN Hungary_NNP ,_, barren_JJ women_NNS are_VBP fertilised_VBN by_IN being_VBG struck_VBN with_IN
a_DT stick_NN which_WDT has_VBZ first_RB been_VBN used_VBN to_TO separate_JJ pairing_NN dogs_NNS ._. Here_RB a_DT
fertilising_VBG virtue_NN is_VBZ clearly_RB supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB inherent_JJ in_IN the_DT stick_NN
and_CC to_TO be_VB conveyed_VBN by_IN contact_NN to_TO the_DT women_NNS ._. The_DT Toradjas_NNP of_IN Central_NNP
Celebes_NNS think_VBP that_IN the_DT plant_NN Dracaena_NNP terminalis_NN has_VBZ a_DT strong_JJ
soul_NN ,_, because_IN when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ lopped_VBN ,_, it_PRP soon_RB grows_VBZ up_RP again_RB ._. Hence_RB when_WRB
a_DT man_NN is_VBZ ill_JJ ,_, his_PRP$ friends_NNS will_MD sometimes_RB beat_VB him_PRP on_IN the_DT crown_NN of_IN
the_DT head_NN with_IN Dracaena_NNP leaves_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO strengthen_VB his_PRP$ weak_JJ soul_NN
with_IN the_DT strong_JJ soul_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN ._.

These_DT analogies_NNS ,_, accordingly_RB ,_, support_VB the_DT interpretation_NN which_WDT ,_,
following_VBG my_PRP$ predecessors_NNS W_NNP ._. Mannhardt_NNP and_CC Mr_NNP ._. W_NNP ._. R_NN ._. Paton_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP
given_VBN of_IN the_DT beating_VBG inflicted_VBN on_IN the_DT human_JJ victims_NNS at_IN the_DT Greek_NNP
harvest_NN festival_NN of_IN the_DT Thargelia_NNP ._. That_DT beating_NN ,_, being_VBG administered_VBN
to_TO the_DT generative_JJ organs_NNS of_IN the_DT victims_NNS by_IN fresh_JJ green_JJ plants_NNS and_CC
branches_NNS ,_, is_VBZ most_RBS naturally_RB explained_VBN as_IN a_DT charm_NN to_TO increase_VB the_DT
reproductive_JJ energies_NNS of_IN the_DT men_NNS or_CC women_NNS either_CC by_IN communicating_VBG to_TO
them_PRP the_DT fruitfulness_NN of_IN the_DT plants_NNS and_CC branches_NNS ,_, or_CC by_IN ridding_VBG them_PRP
of_IN the_DT maleficent_JJ influences_NNS ;_: and_CC this_DT interpretation_NN is_VBZ confirmed_VBN
by_IN the_DT observation_NN that_IN the_DT two_CD victims_NNS represented_VBD the_DT two_CD sexes_NNS ,_,
one_CD of_IN them_PRP standing_VBG for_IN the_DT men_NNS in_IN general_JJ and_CC the_DT other_JJ for_IN the_DT
women_NNS ._. The_DT season_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN when_WRB the_DT ceremony_NN was_VBD performed_VBN ,_,
namely_RB the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT corn_NN harvest_NN ,_, tallies_NNS well_RB with_IN the_DT theory_NN
that_IN the_DT rite_NN had_VBD an_DT agricultural_JJ significance_NN ._. Further_RB ,_, that_IN it_PRP was_VBD
above_IN all_DT intended_VBN to_TO fertilise_VB the_DT fig-trees_NNS is_VBZ strongly_RB suggested_VBN
by_IN the_DT strings_NNS of_IN black_JJ and_CC white_JJ figs_NNS which_WDT were_VBD hung_VBN round_RB the_DT
necks_NNS of_IN the_DT victims_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN by_IN the_DT blows_NNS which_WDT were_VBD given_VBN their_PRP$
genital_JJ organs_NNS with_IN the_DT branches_NNS of_IN a_DT wild_JJ fig-tree_NN ;_: since_IN this_DT
procedure_NN closely_RB resembles_VBZ the_DT procedure_NN which_WDT ancient_JJ and_CC modern_JJ
husbandmen_NNS in_IN Greek_NNP lands_NNS have_VBP regularly_RB resorted_VBN to_TO for_IN the_DT purpose_NN
of_IN actually_RB fertilising_VBG their_PRP$ fig-trees_NNS ._. When_WRB we_PRP remember_VBP what_WP an_DT
important_JJ part_NN the_DT artificial_JJ fertilisation_NN of_IN the_DT date_NN palm-tree_NN
appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB played_VBN of_IN old_JJ not_RB only_RB in_IN the_DT husbandry_NN but_CC in_IN the_DT
religion_NN of_IN Mesopotamia_NNP ,_, there_EX seems_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO doubt_VB that_IN the_DT
artificial_JJ fertilisation_NN of_IN the_DT fig-tree_NN may_MD in_RP like_IN manner_NN have_VBP
vindicated_VBN for_IN itself_PRP a_DT place_NN in_IN the_DT solemn_JJ ritual_NN of_IN Greek_NNP
religion_NN ._.

If_IN these_DT considerations_NNS are_VBP just_RB ,_, we_PRP must_MD apparently_RB conclude_VB that_IN
while_IN the_DT human_JJ victims_NNS at_IN the_DT Thargelia_NNP certainly_RB appear_VBP in_IN later_RB
classical_JJ times_NNS to_TO have_VB figured_VBN chiefly_RB as_IN public_JJ scapegoats_NNS ,_, who_WP
carried_VBD away_RB with_IN them_PRP the_DT sins_NNS ,_, misfortunes_NNS ,_, and_CC sorrows_NNS of_IN the_DT
whole_JJ people_NNS ,_, at_IN an_DT earlier_JJR time_NN they_PRP may_MD have_VB been_VBN looked_VBN on_IN as_IN
embodiments_NNS of_IN vegetation_NN ,_, perhaps_RB of_IN the_DT corn_NN but_CC particularly_RB of_IN
the_DT fig-trees_NNS ;_: and_CC that_IN the_DT beating_NN which_WDT they_PRP received_VBD and_CC the_DT
death_NN which_WDT they_PRP died_VBD were_VBD intended_VBN primarily_RB to_TO brace_VB and_CC refresh_VB
the_DT powers_NNS of_IN vegetation_NN then_RB beginning_VBG to_TO droop_VB and_CC languish_VB under_IN
the_DT torrid_JJ heat_NN of_IN the_DT Greek_NNP summer_NN ._.

The_DT view_NN here_RB taken_VBN of_IN the_DT Greek_NNP scapegoat_NN ,_, if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ correct_JJ ,_,
obviates_VBZ an_DT objection_NN which_WDT might_MD otherwise_RB be_VB brought_VBN against_IN the_DT
main_JJ argument_NN of_IN this_DT book_NN ._. To_TO the_DT theory_NN that_IN the_DT priest_NN of_IN Aricia_NNP
was_VBD slain_NN as_IN a_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT grove_NN ,_, it_PRP might_MD
have_VBP been_VBN objected_VBN that_IN such_JJ a_DT custom_NN has_VBZ no_DT analogy_NN in_IN classical_JJ
antiquity_NN ._. But_CC reasons_NNS have_VBP now_RB been_VBN given_VBN for_IN believing_VBG that_IN the_DT
human_JJ being_NN periodically_RB and_CC occasionally_RB slain_VB by_IN the_DT Asiatic_JJ
Greeks_NNS was_VBD regularly_RB treated_VBN as_IN an_DT embodiment_NN of_IN a_DT divinity_NN of_IN
vegetation_NN ._. Probably_RB the_DT persons_NNS whom_WP the_DT Athenians_NNPS kept_VBD to_TO be_VB
sacrificed_PRP were_VBD similarly_RB treated_VBN as_IN divine_JJ ._. That_IN they_PRP were_VBD social_JJ
outcasts_NNS did_VBD not_RB matter_NN ._. On_IN the_DT primitive_JJ view_NN a_DT man_NN is_VBZ not_RB chosen_VBN
to_TO be_VB the_DT mouth-piece_NN or_CC embodiment_NN of_IN a_DT god_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN his_PRP$ high_JJ
moral_JJ qualities_NNS or_CC social_JJ rank_NN ._. The_DT divine_JJ afflatus_NN descends_VBZ equally_RB
on_IN the_DT good_JJ and_CC the_DT bad_JJ ,_, the_DT lofty_JJ and_CC the_DT lowly_NN ._. If_IN then_RB the_DT
civilised_JJ Greeks_NNP of_IN Asia_NNP and_CC Athens_NNP habitually_RB sacrificed_VBD men_NNS whom_WP
they_PRP regarded_VBD as_IN incarnate_JJ gods_NNS ,_, there_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT inherent_JJ
improbability_NN in_IN the_DT supposition_NN that_IN at_IN the_DT dawn_NN of_IN history_NN a_DT
similar_JJ custom_NN was_VBD observed_VBN by_IN the_DT semibarbarous_JJ Latins_NNP in_IN the_DT
Arician_DT Grove_NNP ._.

But_CC to_TO clinch_VB the_DT argument_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ clearly_RB desirable_JJ to_TO prove_VB that_IN
the_DT custom_NN of_IN putting_VBG to_TO death_NN a_DT human_JJ representative_NN of_IN a_DT god_NN was_VBD
known_VBN and_CC practised_VBD in_IN ancient_JJ Italy_NNP elsewhere_RB than_IN in_IN the_DT Arician_NN
Grove_NNP ._. This_DT proof_NN I_PRP now_RB propose_VBP to_TO adduce_VB ._.



3._DT The_DT Roman_NNP Saturnalia_NNP

WE_NNP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN many_JJ peoples_NNS have_VBP been_VBN used_VBN to_TO observe_VB an_DT annual_JJ
period_NN of_IN license_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT customary_JJ restraints_NNS of_IN law_NN and_CC morality_NN
are_VBP thrown_VBN aside_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT whole_JJ population_NN give_VBP themselves_PRP up_RP to_TO
extravagant_JJ mirth_NN and_CC jollity_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT darker_NN passions_NNS find_VBP a_DT
vent_NN which_WDT would_MD never_RB be_VB allowed_VBN them_PRP in_IN the_DT more_JJR staid_JJ and_CC sober_JJ
course_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ life_NN ._. Such_JJ outbursts_NNS of_IN the_DT pent-up_JJ forces_NNS of_IN
human_JJ nature_NN ,_, too_RB often_RB degenerating_VBG into_IN wild_JJ orgies_NNS of_IN lust_NN and_CC
crime_NN ,_, occur_VBP most_RBS commonly_RB at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP
frequently_RB associated_VBN ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN occasion_NN to_TO point_VB out_RP ,_, with_IN one_CD
or_CC other_JJ of_IN the_DT agricultural_JJ seasons_NNS ,_, especially_RB with_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN
sowing_NN or_CC of_IN harvest_NN ._. Now_RB ,_, of_IN all_PDT these_DT periods_NNS of_IN license_NN the_DT one_CD
which_WDT is_VBZ best_RB known_VBN and_CC which_WDT in_IN modern_JJ language_NN has_VBZ given_VBN its_PRP$ name_NN
to_TO the_DT rest_NN ,_, is_VBZ the_DT Saturnalia_NNP ._. This_DT famous_JJ festival_NN fell_VBD in_IN
December_NNP ,_, the_DT last_JJ month_NN of_IN the_DT Roman_NNP year_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD popularly_RB
supposed_VBN to_TO commemorate_VB the_DT merry_NN reign_NN of_IN Saturn_NNP ,_, the_DT god_NN of_IN sowing_NN
and_CC of_IN husbandry_NN ,_, who_WP lived_VBD on_IN earth_NN long_RB ago_RB as_IN a_DT righteous_JJ and_CC
beneficent_JJ king_NN of_IN Italy_NNP ,_, drew_VBD the_DT rude_JJ and_CC scattered_JJ dwellers_NNS on_IN
the_DT mountains_NNS together_RB ,_, taught_VBD them_PRP to_TO till_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, gave_VBD them_PRP
laws_NNS ,_, and_CC ruled_VBD in_IN peace_NN ._. His_PRP$ reign_NN was_VBD the_DT fabled_JJ Golden_NNP Age_NNP :_: the_DT
earth_NN brought_VBD forth_RB abundantly_RB :_: no_DT sound_NN of_IN war_NN or_CC discord_NN troubled_VBN
the_DT happy_JJ world_NN :_: no_DT baleful_JJ love_NN of_IN lucre_NN worked_VBD like_IN poison_NN in_IN the_DT
blood_NN of_IN the_DT industrious_JJ and_CC contented_JJ peasantry_NN ._. Slavery_NNP and_CC
private_JJ property_NN were_VBD alike_RB unknown_JJ :_: all_DT men_NNS had_VBD all_DT things_NNS in_IN
common_JJ ._. At_IN last_JJ the_DT good_JJ god_NN ,_, the_DT kindly_JJ king_NN ,_, vanished_VBD suddenly_RB ;_:
but_CC his_PRP$ memory_NN was_VBD cherished_VBN to_TO distant_JJ ages_NNS ,_, shrines_NNS were_VBD reared_VBN in_IN
his_PRP$ honour_NN ,_, and_CC many_JJ hills_NNS and_CC high_JJ places_NNS in_IN Italy_NNP bore_VBD his_PRP$ name_NN ._.
Yet_CC the_DT bright_JJ tradition_NN of_IN his_PRP$ reign_NN was_VBD crossed_VBN by_IN a_DT dark_JJ shadow_NN :_:
his_PRP$ altars_NNS are_VBP said_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN stained_VBN with_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN human_JJ
victims_NNS ,_, for_IN whom_WP a_DT more_RBR merciful_JJ age_NN afterwards_RB substituted_VBN
effigies_NNS ._. Of_IN this_DT gloomy_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN '_'' s_PRP religion_NN there_EX is_VBZ little_RB
or_CC no_DT trace_NN in_IN the_DT descriptions_NNS which_WDT ancient_JJ writers_NNS have_VBP left_VBN us_PRP
of_IN the_DT Saturnalia_NNP ._. Feasting_NNP and_CC revelry_NN and_CC all_PDT the_DT mad_JJ pursuit_NN of_IN
pleasure_NN are_VBP the_DT features_NNS that_WDT seem_VBP to_TO have_VB especially_RB marked_VBN this_DT
carnival_NN of_IN antiquity_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP went_VBD on_RP for_IN seven_CD days_NNS in_IN the_DT streets_NNS
and_CC public_JJ squares_NNS and_CC houses_NNS of_IN ancient_JJ Rome_NNP from_IN the_DT seventeenth_JJ
to_TO the_DT twenty-third_NN of_IN December_NNP ._.

But_CC no_DT feature_NN of_IN the_DT festival_NN is_VBZ more_RBR remarkable_JJ ,_, nothing_NN in_IN it_PRP
seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB struck_VBN the_DT ancients_NNS themselves_PRP more_JJR than_IN the_DT license_NN
granted_VBN to_TO slaves_NNS at_IN this_DT time_NN ._. The_DT distinction_NN between_IN the_DT free_JJ and_CC
the_DT servile_JJ classes_NNS was_VBD temporarily_RB abolished_VBN ._. The_DT slave_NN might_NN rail_NN
at_IN his_PRP$ master_NN ,_, intoxicate_IN himself_PRP like_IN his_PRP$ betters_NNS ,_, sit_VB down_RB at_IN
table_NN with_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC not_RB even_RB a_DT word_NN of_IN reproof_NN would_MD be_VB
administered_VBN to_TO him_PRP for_IN conduct_NN which_WDT at_IN any_DT other_JJ season_NN might_MD have_VB
been_VBN punished_VBN with_IN stripes_NNS ,_, imprisonment_NN ,_, or_CC death_NN ._. Nay_NNP ,_, more_RBR ,_,
masters_NNS actually_RB changed_VBD places_NNS with_IN their_PRP$ slaves_NNS and_CC waited_VBD on_IN them_PRP
at_IN table_NN ;_: and_CC not_RB till_IN the_DT serf_NN had_VBD done_VBN eating_NN and_CC drinking_NN was_VBD the_DT
board_NN cleared_VBD and_CC dinner_NN set_VBN for_IN his_PRP$ master_NN ._. So_RB far_RB was_VBD this_DT
inversion_NN of_IN ranks_NNS carried_VBD ,_, that_IN each_DT household_NN became_VBD for_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT
mimic_JJ republic_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT high_JJ offices_NNS of_IN state_NN were_VBD discharged_VBN by_IN
the_DT slaves_NNS ,_, who_WP gave_VBD their_PRP$ orders_NNS and_CC laid_VBD down_RP the_DT law_NN as_IN if_IN they_PRP
were_VBD indeed_RB invested_VBN with_IN all_PDT the_DT dignity_NN of_IN the_DT consulship_NN ,_, the_DT
praetorship_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT bench_NN ._. Like_IN the_DT pale_JJ reflection_NN of_IN power_NN thus_RB
accorded_VBN to_TO bondsmen_NNS at_IN the_DT Saturnalia_NNP was_VBD the_DT mock_JJ kingship_NN for_IN
which_WDT freemen_NNS cast_VBD lots_NNS at_IN the_DT same_JJ season_NN ._. The_DT person_NN on_IN whom_WP the_DT
lot_NN fell_VBD enjoyed_VBN the_DT title_NN of_IN king_NN ,_, and_CC issued_VBD commands_NNS of_IN a_DT playful_NN
and_CC ludicrous_JJ nature_NN to_TO his_PRP$ temporary_JJ subjects_NNS ._. One_CD of_IN them_PRP he_PRP might_MD
order_NN to_TO mix_VB the_DT wine_NN ,_, another_DT to_TO drink_VB ,_, another_DT to_TO sing_VB ,_, another_DT to_TO
dance_NN ,_, another_DT to_TO speak_VB in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ dispraise_NN ,_, another_DT to_TO carry_VB a_DT
flute-girl_NN on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN round_RB the_DT house_NN ._.

Now_RB ,_, when_WRB we_PRP remember_VBP that_IN the_DT liberty_NN allowed_VBN to_TO slaves_NNS at_IN this_DT
festive_JJ season_NN was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB an_DT imitation_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN of_IN
society_NN in_IN Saturn_NNP '_'' s_VBZ time_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN general_JJ the_DT Saturnalia_NNP passed_VBN
for_IN nothing_NN more_RBR or_CC less_RBR than_IN a_DT temporary_JJ revival_NN or_CC restoration_NN of_IN
the_DT reign_NN of_IN that_DT merry_NN monarch_NN ,_, we_PRP are_VBP tempted_VBN to_TO surmise_VB that_IN the_DT
mock_JJ king_NN who_WP presided_VBD over_IN the_DT revels_NNS may_MD have_VB originally_RB
represented_VBN Saturn_NNP himself_PRP ._. The_DT conjecture_NN is_VBZ strongly_RB confirmed_VBN ,_, if_IN
not_RB established_VBN ,_, by_IN a_DT very_RB curious_JJ and_CC interesting_JJ account_NN of_IN the_DT
way_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT Saturnalia_NNP was_VBD celebrated_VBN by_IN the_DT Roman_NNP soldiers_NNS
stationed_VBN on_IN the_DT Danube_NNP in_IN the_DT reign_NN of_IN Maximian_NNP and_CC Diocletian_NNP ._. The_DT
account_NN is_VBZ preserved_VBN in_IN a_DT narrative_NN of_IN the_DT martyrdom_NN of_IN St_NNP ._. Dasius_NNP ,_,
which_WDT was_VBD unearthed_VBN from_IN a_DT Greek_NNP manuscript_NN in_IN the_DT Paris_NNP library_NN ,_,
and_CC published_VBN by_IN Professor_NNP Franz_NNP Cumont_NNP of_IN Ghent_NNP ._. Two_CD briefer_NN
descriptions_NNS of_IN the_DT event_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT custom_NN are_VBP contained_VBN in_IN
manuscripts_NNS at_IN Milan_NNP and_CC Berlin_NNP ;_: one_CD of_IN them_PRP had_VBD already_RB seen_VBN the_DT
light_NN in_IN an_DT obscure_JJ volume_NN printed_VBN at_IN Urbino_NNP in_IN 1727,_CD but_CC its_PRP$
importance_NN for_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT Roman_NNP religion_NN ,_, both_DT ancient_JJ and_CC
modern_JJ ,_, appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN overlooked_VBN until_IN Professor_NNP Cumont_NNP drew_VBD
the_DT attention_NN of_IN scholars_NNS to_TO all_DT three_CD narratives_NNS by_IN publishing_VBG them_PRP
together_RB some_DT years_NNS ago_RB ._. According_VBG to_TO these_DT narratives_NNS ,_, which_WDT have_VBP
all_PDT the_DT appearance_NN of_IN being_VBG authentic_JJ ,_, and_CC of_IN which_WDT the_DT longest_JJS is_VBZ
probably_RB based_VBN on_IN official_JJ documents_NNS ,_, the_DT Roman_JJ soldiers_NNS at_IN
Durostorum_NNP in_IN Lower_NNP Moesia_NNP celebrated_VBD the_DT Saturnalia_NNP year_NN by_IN year_NN in_IN
the_DT following_VBG manner_NN ._. Thirty_CD days_NNS before_IN the_DT festival_NN they_PRP chose_VBD by_IN
lot_NN from_IN amongst_NN themselves_PRP a_DT young_JJ and_CC handsome_JJ man_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD then_RB
clothed_VBN in_IN royal_JJ attire_NN to_TO resemble_VB Saturn_NNP ._. Thus_RB arrayed_VBN and_CC
attended_VBN by_IN a_DT multitude_NN of_IN soldiers_NNS he_PRP went_VBD about_IN in_IN public_NN with_IN
full_JJ license_NN to_TO indulge_VB his_PRP$ passions_NNS and_CC to_TO taste_VB of_IN every_DT pleasure_NN ,_,
however_RB base_NN and_CC shameful_JJ ._. But_CC if_IN his_PRP$ reign_NN was_VBD merry_JJ ,_, it_PRP was_VBD short_JJ
and_CC ended_VBD tragically_RB ;_: for_IN when_WRB the_DT thirty_CD days_NNS were_VBD up_RB and_CC the_DT
festival_NN of_IN Saturn_NNP had_VBD come_VBN ,_, he_PRP cut_VBD his_PRP$ own_JJ throat_NN on_IN the_DT altar_NN of_IN
the_DT god_NN whom_WP he_PRP personated_VBD ._. In_IN the_DT year_NN A_DT ._. D_NNP ._. 303_CD the_DT lot_NN fell_VBD upon_IN
the_DT Christian_NNP soldier_NN Dasius_NNP ,_, but_CC he_PRP refused_VBD to_TO play_VB the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT
heathen_RB god_NN and_CC soil_NN his_PRP$ last_JJ days_NNS by_IN debauchery_NN ._. The_DT threats_NNS and_CC
arguments_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ commanding_JJ officer_NN Bassus_NNP failed_VBD to_TO shake_VB his_PRP$
constancy_NN ,_, and_CC accordingly_RB he_PRP was_VBD beheaded_VBN ,_, as_IN the_DT Christian_NNP
martyrologist_NN records_NNS with_IN minute_NN accuracy_NN ,_, at_IN Durostorum_NNP by_IN the_DT
soldier_NN John_NNP on_IN Friday_NNP the_DT twentieth_JJ day_NN of_IN November_NNP ,_, being_VBG the_DT
twenty-fourth_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT moon_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT fourth_JJ hour_NN ._.

Since_IN this_DT narrative_NN was_VBD published_VBN by_IN Professor_NNP Cumont_NNP ,_, its_PRP$
historical_JJ character_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN doubted_VBD or_CC denied_VBD ,_, has_VBZ received_VBN
strong_JJ confirmation_NN from_IN an_DT interesting_JJ discovery_NN ._. In_IN the_DT crypt_NN of_IN
the_DT cathedral_NN which_WDT crowns_VBZ the_DT promontory_NN of_IN Ancona_NNP there_EX is_VBZ
preserved_VBN ,_, among_IN other_JJ remarkable_JJ antiquities_NNS ,_, a_DT white_JJ marble_NN
sarcophagus_JJ bearing_VBG a_DT Greek_NNP inscription_NN ,_, in_IN characters_NNS of_IN the_DT age_NN of_IN
Justinian_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT following_VBG effect_NN :_: "_`` Here_RB lies_VBZ the_DT holy_JJ martyr_NN
Dasius_NNP ,_, brought_VBD from_IN Durostorum_NNP ."_NNP The_DT sarcophagus_NN was_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO
the_DT crypt_NN of_IN the_DT cathedral_NN in_IN 1848_CD from_IN the_DT church_NN of_IN San_NNP
Pellegrino_NNP ,_, under_IN the_DT high_JJ altar_NN of_IN which_WDT ,_, as_IN we_PRP learn_VBP from_IN a_DT Latin_NNP

This_DT account_NN sets_VBZ in_IN a_DT new_JJ and_CC lurid_JJ light_NN the_DT office_NN of_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN

The_DT resemblance_NN between_IN the_DT Saturnalia_NNP of_IN ancient_JJ and_CC the_DT Carnival_NN

LIX_NNP ._. Killing_NNP the_DT God_NNP in_IN Mexico_NNP

BY_NNP NO_DT PEOPLE_NN does_VBZ the_DT custom_NN of_IN sacrificing_VBG the_DT human_JJ representative_NN
of_IN a_DT god_NN appear_VBP to_TO have_VB been_VBN observed_VBN so_RB commonly_RB and_CC with_IN so_RB much_JJ
solemnity_NN as_IN by_IN the_DT Aztecs_NNP of_IN ancient_JJ Mexico_NNP ._. With_IN the_DT ritual_NN of_IN
these_DT remarkable_JJ sacrifices_NNS we_PRP are_VBP well_RB acquainted_VBN ,_, for_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN
fully_RB described_VBN by_IN the_DT Spaniards_NNS who_WP conquered_VBD Mexico_NNP in_IN the_DT
sixteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ curiosity_NN was_VBD naturally_RB excited_VBN by_IN the_DT
discovery_NN in_IN this_DT distant_JJ region_NN of_IN a_DT barbarous_JJ and_CC cruel_JJ religion_NN
which_WDT presented_VBD many_JJ curious_JJ points_NNS of_IN analogy_NN to_TO the_DT doctrine_NN and_CC
ritual_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ church_NN ._. "_'' They_PRP took_VBD a_DT captive_NN ,"_NN says_VBZ the_DT Jesuit_NNP
Acosta_NNP ,_, "_'' such_JJ as_IN they_PRP thought_VBD good_JJ ;_: and_CC afore_IN they_PRP did_VBD sacrifice_VB him_PRP
unto_IN their_PRP$ idols_NNS ,_, they_PRP gave_VBD him_PRP the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT idol_NN ,_, to_TO whom_WP he_PRP
should_MD be_VB sacrificed_VBN ,_, and_CC apparelled_VBD him_PRP with_IN the_DT same_JJ ornaments_NNS
like_IN their_PRP$ idol_NN ,_, saying_VBG ,_, that_IN he_PRP did_VBD represent_VB the_DT same_JJ idol_NN ._. And_CC
during_IN the_DT time_NN that_IN this_DT representation_NN lasted_VBD ,_, which_WDT was_VBD for_IN a_DT
year_NN in_IN some_DT feasts_NNS ,_, in_IN others_NNS six_CD months_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN others_NNS less_RBR ,_, they_PRP
reverenced_VBN and_CC worshipped_VBN him_PRP in_IN the_DT same_JJ manner_NN as_IN the_DT proper_JJ idol_NN ;_:
and_CC in_IN the_DT meantime_NN he_PRP did_VBD eat_VB ,_, drink_VB ,_, and_CC was_VBD merry_JJ ._. When_WRB he_PRP went_VBD
through_IN the_DT streets_NNS ,_, the_DT people_NNS came_VBD forth_RB to_TO worship_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC every_DT
one_CD brought_VBD him_PRP an_DT alms_RB ,_, with_IN children_NNS and_CC sick_JJ folks_NNS ,_, that_IN he_PRP might_MD
cure_NN them_PRP ,_, and_CC bless_VB them_PRP ,_, suffering_VBG him_PRP to_TO do_VB all_DT things_NNS at_IN his_PRP$
pleasure_NN ,_, only_RB he_PRP was_VBD accompanied_VBN with_IN ten_CD or_CC twelve_CD men_NNS lest_IN he_PRP
should_MD fly_VB ._. And_CC he_PRP (_-LRB- to_TO the_DT end_NN he_PRP might_MD be_VB reverenced_VBN as_IN he_PRP passed_VBD )_-RRB-
sometimes_RB sounded_VBD upon_IN a_DT small_JJ flute_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT people_NNS might_MD prepare_VB
to_TO worship_VB him_PRP ._. The_DT feast_NN being_VBG come_VBN ,_, and_CC he_PRP grown_VBN fat_JJ ,_, they_PRP killed_VBD
him_PRP ,_, opened_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC ate_VBD him_PRP ,_, making_VBG a_DT solemn_JJ sacrifice_NN of_IN him_PRP ."_.

This_DT general_JJ description_NN of_IN the_DT custom_NN may_MD now_RB be_VB illustrated_VBN by_IN
particular_JJ examples_NNS ._. Thus_RB at_IN the_DT festival_NN called_JJ Toxcatl_NNP ,_, the_DT
greatest_JJS festival_NN of_IN the_DT Mexican_JJ year_NN ,_, a_DT young_JJ man_NN was_VBD annually_RB
sacrificed_VBN in_IN the_DT character_NN of_IN Tezcatlipoca_NNP ,_, "_'' the_DT god_NN of_IN gods_NNS ,"_IN
after_IN having_VBG been_VBN maintained_VBN and_CC worshipped_VBN as_IN that_DT great_JJ deity_NN in_IN
person_NN for_IN a_DT whole_JJ year_NN ._. According_VBG to_TO the_DT old_JJ Franciscan_NNP monk_NN
Sahagun_NNP ,_, our_PRP$ best_JJS authority_NN on_IN the_DT Aztec_JJ religion_NN ,_, the_DT sacrifice_NN of_IN
the_DT human_JJ god_NN fell_VBD at_IN Easter_NNP or_CC a_DT few_JJ days_NNS later_RB ,_, so_RB that_IN ,_, if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ
right_NN ,_, it_PRP would_MD correspond_VB in_IN date_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN character_NN to_TO the_DT
Christian_JJ festival_NN of_IN the_DT death_NN and_CC resurrection_NN of_IN the_DT Redeemer_NNP ._.
More_RBR exactly_RB he_PRP tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN the_DT sacrifice_NN took_VBD place_NN on_IN the_DT first_JJ
day_NN of_IN the_DT fifth_JJ Aztec_JJ month_NN ,_, which_WDT according_VBG to_TO him_PRP began_VBD on_IN the_DT
twenty-third_JJ or_CC twenty-seventh_JJ day_NN of_IN April_NNP ._.

At_IN this_DT festival_NN the_DT great_JJ god_NN died_VBD in_IN the_DT person_NN of_IN one_CD human_NN
representative_NN and_CC came_VBD to_TO life_NN again_RB in_IN the_DT person_NN of_IN another_DT ,_, who_WP
was_VBD destined_VBN to_TO enjoy_VB the_DT fatal_JJ honour_NN of_IN divinity_NN for_IN a_DT year_NN and_CC to_TO
perish_JJ ,_, like_IN all_DT his_PRP$ predecessors_NNS ,_, at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT young_JJ man_NN
singled_VBN out_RP for_IN this_DT high_JJ dignity_NN was_VBD carefully_RB chosen_VBN from_IN among_IN
the_DT captives_NNS on_IN the_DT ground_NN of_IN his_PRP$ personal_JJ beauty_NN ._. He_PRP had_VBD to_TO be_VB of_IN
unblemished_JJ body_NN ,_, slim_JJ as_IN a_DT reed_NN and_CC straight_RB as_IN a_DT pillar_NN ,_, neither_CC
too_RB tall_JJ nor_CC too_RB short_JJ ._. If_IN through_IN high_JJ living_NN he_PRP grew_VBD too_RB fat_JJ ,_, he_PRP
was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO reduce_VB himself_PRP by_IN drinking_VBG salt_NN water_NN ._. And_CC in_IN order_NN
that_IN he_PRP might_MD behave_VB in_IN his_PRP$ lofty_JJ station_NN with_IN becoming_VBG grace_NN and_CC

flute_NN ,_, to_TO smoke_VB cigars_NNS and_CC to_TO snuff_VB at_IN flowers_NNS with_IN a_DT dandified_JJ air_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD honourably_RB lodged_VBN in_IN the_DT temple_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT nobles_NNS waited_VBD on_IN
him_PRP and_CC paid_VBD him_PRP homage_NN ,_, bringing_VBG him_PRP meat_NN and_CC serving_VBG him_PRP like_IN a_DT
prince_NN ._. The_DT king_NN himself_PRP saw_VBD to_TO it_PRP that_IN he_PRP was_VBD apparelled_VBN in_IN
gorgeous_JJ attire_NN ,_, "_'' for_IN already_RB he_PRP esteemed_VBD him_PRP as_IN a_DT god_NN ."_VBD Eagle_NNP down_IN
was_VBD gummed_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ head_NN and_CC white_JJ cock_NN '_'' s_PRP feathers_NNS were_VBD stuck_VBN in_IN his_PRP$
