shells_NNS encircled_VBD his_PRP$ neck_NN and_CC depended_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ breast_NN ;_: he_PRP wore_VBD a_DT
mantle_NN of_IN network_NN ,_, and_CC round_RB his_PRP$ middle_NN a_DT rich_JJ waistcloth_NN ._. When_WRB this_DT
bejewelled_VBN exquisite_JJ lounged_VBD through_IN the_DT streets_NNS playing_VBG on_IN his_PRP$
flute_NN ,_, puffing_VBG at_IN a_DT cigar_NN ,_, and_CC smelling_VBG at_IN a_DT nosegay_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS
whom_WP he_PRP met_VBD threw_VBD themselves_PRP on_IN the_DT earth_NN before_IN him_PRP and_CC prayed_VBD to_TO
him_PRP with_IN sighs_NNS and_CC tears_NNS ,_, taking_VBG up_RP the_DT dust_NN in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS and_CC
putting_VBG it_PRP in_IN their_PRP$ mouths_NNS in_IN token_NN of_IN the_DT deepest_JJS humiliation_NN and_CC

presented_VBN them_PRP to_TO him_PRP ,_, saluting_VBG him_PRP as_IN a_DT god_NN ._. For_IN "_'' he_PRP passed_VBD for_IN our_PRP$
Lord_NNP God_NNP ;_: the_DT people_NNS acknowledged_VBD him_PRP as_IN the_DT Lord_NNP ."_NNP All_DT who_WP thus_RB
worshipped_VBD him_PRP on_IN his_PRP$ passage_NN he_PRP saluted_VBD gravely_RB and_CC courteously_RB ._.
Lest_NNP he_PRP should_MD flee_VB ,_, he_PRP was_VBD everywhere_RB attended_VBN by_IN a_DT guard_NN of_IN eight_CD
pages_NNS in_IN the_DT royal_JJ livery_NN ,_, four_CD of_IN them_PRP with_IN shaven_NN crowns_NNS like_IN the_DT
palace-slaves_NNS ,_, and_CC four_CD of_IN them_PRP with_IN the_DT flowing_VBG locks_NNS of_IN warriors_NNS ;_:
and_CC if_IN he_PRP contrived_VBD to_TO escape_VB ,_, the_DT captain_NN of_IN the_DT guard_NN had_VBD to_TO take_VB
his_PRP$ place_NN as_IN the_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN and_CC to_TO die_VB in_IN his_PRP$ stead_NN ._.
Twenty_CD days_NNS before_IN he_PRP was_VBD to_TO die_VB ,_, his_PRP$ costume_NN was_VBD changed_VBN ,_, and_CC four_CD
damsels_NNS delicately_RB nurtured_VBD and_CC bearing_VBG the_DT names_NNS of_IN four_CD
goddesses_NNS --_: the_DT Goddess_NNP of_IN Flowers_NNS ,_, the_DT Goddess_NNP of_IN the_DT Young_NNP Maize_NNP ,_,
the_DT Goddess_NNP "_`` Our_PRP$ Mother_NN among_IN the_DT Water_NNP ,"_, and_CC the_DT Goddess_NNP of_IN
Salt_NNP --_: were_VBD given_VBN him_PRP to_TO be_VB his_PRP$ brides_NNS ,_, and_CC with_IN them_PRP he_PRP consorted_VBD ._.
During_IN the_DT last_JJ five_CD days_NNS divine_JJ honours_NNS were_VBD showered_VBN on_IN the_DT
destined_VBN victim_NN ._. The_DT king_NN remained_VBD in_IN his_PRP$ palace_NN while_IN the_DT whole_NN
court_NN went_VBD after_IN the_DT human_JJ god_NN ._. Solemn_JJ banquets_NNS and_CC dances_NNS followed_VBN
each_DT other_JJ in_IN regular_JJ succession_NN and_CC at_IN appointed_JJ places_NNS ._. On_IN the_DT
last_JJ day_NN the_DT young_JJ man_NN ,_, attended_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ wives_NNS and_CC pages_NNS ,_, embarked_VBN in_IN
a_DT canoe_NN covered_VBN with_IN a_DT royal_JJ canopy_NN and_CC was_VBD ferried_VBN across_IN the_DT lake_NN
to_TO a_DT spot_NN where_WRB a_DT little_JJ hill_NN rose_VBD from_IN the_DT edge_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN ._. It_PRP
was_VBD called_VBN the_DT Mountain_NNP of_IN Parting_NNP ,_, because_IN there_EX his_PRP$ wives_NNS bade_VB him_PRP
a_DT last_JJ farewell_NN ._. Then_RB ,_, accompanied_VBD only_RB by_IN his_PRP$ pages_NNS ,_, he_PRP repaired_VBD to_TO
a_DT small_JJ and_CC lonely_JJ temple_NN by_IN the_DT wayside_NN ._. Like_IN the_DT Mexican_NNP temples_NNS
in_IN general_JJ ,_, it_PRP was_VBD built_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT pyramid_NN ;_: and_CC as_IN the_DT young_JJ

which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD played_VBN in_IN the_DT days_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ glory_NN ._. On_IN reaching_VBG the_DT summit_NN

common_JJ victims_NNS ,_, sent_VBD rolling_VBG down_IN the_DT steps_NNS of_IN the_DT temple_NN ,_, but_CC was_VBD

a_DT pike_NN ._. Such_DT was_VBD the_DT regular_JJ end_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP personated_VBD the_DT
greatest_JJS god_NN of_IN the_DT Mexican_JJ pantheon_NN ._.

The_DT honour_NN of_IN living_VBG for_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN in_IN the_DT character_NN of_IN a_DT god_NN and_CC
dying_VBG a_DT violent_JJ death_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ capacity_NN was_VBD not_RB restricted_VBN to_TO men_NNS
in_IN Mexico_NNP ;_: women_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN ,_, or_CC rather_RB compelled_VBN ,_, to_TO enjoy_VB the_DT
glory_NN and_CC to_TO share_VB the_DT doom_NN as_IN representatives_NNS of_IN goddesses_NNS ._. Thus_RB at_IN
a_DT great_JJ festival_NN in_IN September_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD preceded_VBN by_IN a_DT strict_JJ fast_NN
of_IN seven_CD days_NNS ,_, they_PRP sanctified_VBD a_DT young_JJ slave_NN girl_NN of_IN twelve_CD or_CC

of_IN the_DT festival_NN ,_, but_CC because_IN it_PRP was_VBD still_RB tender_NN they_PRP chose_VBD a_DT girl_NN
of_IN tender_NN years_NNS to_TO play_VB the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Maize_NNP Goddess_NNP ._. The_DT whole_NN

cheer_NN people_NNS after_IN the_DT dulness_NN and_CC privations_NNS of_IN the_DT fast_JJ ._.

this_DT ._. The_DT multitude_NN being_VBG assembled_VBN ,_, the_DT priests_NNS solemnly_RB incensed_VBN

her_PRP$ clothes_NNS ,_, which_WDT must_MD have_VB been_VBN much_RB too_RB small_JJ for_IN a_DT grown_JJ man_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ custom_NN the_DT identification_NN of_IN the_DT young_JJ girl_NN with_IN
the_DT Maize_NNP Goddess_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB complete_JJ ._. The_DT golden_JJ maize-cobs_NN
which_WDT she_PRP wore_VBD round_RB her_PRP$ neck_NN ,_, the_DT artificial_JJ maize-cobs_NNS which_WDT she_PRP

forth_RB as_IN a_DT personification_NN of_IN the_DT corn-spirit_NN ;_: and_CC we_PRP are_VBP expressly_RB

beings_NNS whom_WP other_JJ races_NNS have_VBP slaughtered_VBN for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN promoting_VBG
the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ._.

Lastly_RB ,_, the_DT concluding_VBG act_NN of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ drama_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT body_NN of_IN
the_DT dead_JJ Maize_NNP Goddess_NNP was_VBD flayed_VBN and_CC her_PRP$ skin_NN worn_VBN ,_, together_RB with_IN

may_MD infer_VB with_IN some_DT degree_NN of_IN probability_NN that_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN
killing_VBG a_DT human_JJ representative_NN of_IN a_DT deity_NN has_VBZ commonly_RB ,_, perhaps_RB

weakness_NN and_CC frailty_JJ of_IN age_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT they_PRP must_MD have_VB suffered_VBN if_IN
the_DT deity_NN had_VBD been_VBN allowed_VBN to_TO die_VB a_DT natural_JJ death_NN ._.

These_DT Mexican_NNP rites_NNS suffice_NN to_TO prove_VB that_IN human_JJ sacrifices_NNS of_IN the_DT
sort_NN I_PRP suppose_VBP to_TO have_VB prevailed_VBN at_IN Aricia_NNP were_VBD ,_, as_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN
fact_NN ,_, regularly_RB offered_VBN by_IN a_DT people_NNS whose_WP$ level_NN of_IN culture_NN was_VBD
probably_RB not_RB inferior_JJ ,_, if_IN indeed_RB it_PRP was_VBD not_RB distinctly_RB superior_JJ ,_, to_TO
that_DT occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT Italian_JJ races_NNS at_IN the_DT early_JJ period_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT
origin_NN of_IN the_DT Arician_NN priesthood_NN must_MD be_VB referred_VBN ._. The_DT positive_JJ and_CC
indubitable_JJ evidence_NN of_IN the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN such_JJ sacrifices_NNS in_IN one_CD
part_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN may_MD reasonably_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO strengthen_VB the_DT
probability_NN of_IN their_PRP$ prevalence_NN in_IN places_NNS for_IN which_WDT the_DT evidence_NN is_VBZ
less_RBR full_JJ and_CC trustworthy_JJ ._. Taken_VBN all_DT together_RB ,_, the_DT facts_NNS which_WDT we_PRP
have_VBP passed_VBN in_IN review_NN seem_VBP to_TO show_VB that_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN killing_VBG men_NNS
whom_WP their_PRP$ worshippers_NNS regard_VBP as_IN divine_JJ has_VBZ prevailed_VBN in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS
of_IN the_DT world_NN ._.



LX_NNP ._. Between_IN Heaven_NN and_CC Earth_NN



1._DT Not_RB to_TO touch_VB the_DT Earth_NN

AT_WDT THE_DT OUTSET_NNP of_IN this_DT book_NN two_CD questions_NNS were_VBD proposed_VBN for_IN answer_NN :_:
Why_WRB had_VBD the_DT priest_NN of_IN Aricia_NNP to_TO slay_VB his_PRP$ predecessor_NN ?_. And_CC why_WRB ,_,
before_IN doing_VBG so_RB ,_, had_VBD he_PRP to_TO pluck_VB the_DT Golden_NNP Bough_NNP ?_. Of_IN these_DT two_CD
questions_NNS the_DT first_JJ has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN answered_VBN ._. The_DT priest_NN of_IN Aricia_NNP ,_, if_IN
I_PRP am_VBP right_JJ ,_, was_VBD one_CD of_IN those_DT sacred_JJ kings_NNS or_CC human_JJ divinities_NNS on_IN
whose_WP$ life_NN the_DT welfare_NN of_IN the_DT community_NN and_CC even_RB the_DT course_NN of_IN
nature_NN in_IN general_JJ are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO be_VB intimately_RB dependent_JJ ._. It_PRP does_VBZ
not_RB appear_VB that_IN the_DT subjects_NNS or_CC worshippers_NNS of_IN such_JJ a_DT spiritual_JJ
potentate_NN form_NN to_TO themselves_PRP any_DT very_RB clear_JJ notion_NN of_IN the_DT exact_JJ
relationship_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP stand_VBP to_TO him_PRP ;_: probably_RB their_PRP$ ideas_NNS on_IN the_DT
point_NN are_VBP vague_JJ and_CC fluctuating_JJ ,_, and_CC we_PRP should_MD err_VB if_IN we_PRP attempted_VBD
to_TO define_VB the_DT relationship_NN with_IN logical_JJ precision_NN ._. All_DT that_IN the_DT
people_NNS know_VBP ,_, or_CC rather_RB imagine_VB ,_, is_VBZ that_IN somehow_RB they_PRP themselves_PRP ,_,
their_PRP$ cattle_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ crops_NNS are_VBP mysteriously_RB bound_VBN up_RP with_IN their_PRP$
divine_JJ king_NN ,_, so_RB that_IN according_VBG as_IN he_PRP is_VBZ well_RB or_CC ill_RB the_DT community_NN is_VBZ
healthy_JJ or_CC sickly_RB ,_, the_DT flocks_NNS and_CC herds_NNS thrive_VBP or_CC languish_VB with_IN
disease_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT fields_NNS yield_VBP an_DT abundant_JJ or_CC a_DT scanty_NN harvest_NN ._. The_DT
worst_JJS evil_NN which_WDT they_PRP can_MD conceive_VB of_IN is_VBZ the_DT natural_JJ death_NN of_IN their_PRP$
ruler_NN ,_, whether_IN he_PRP succumb_VBZ to_TO sickness_VB or_CC old_JJ age_NN ,_, for_IN in_IN the_DT opinion_NN
of_IN his_PRP$ followers_NNS such_JJ a_DT death_NN would_MD entail_VB the_DT most_RBS disastrous_JJ
consequences_NNS on_IN themselves_PRP and_CC their_PRP$ possessions_NNS ;_: fatal_JJ epidemics_NNS
would_MD sweep_VB away_RP man_NN and_CC beast_NN ,_, the_DT earth_NN would_MD refuse_VB her_PRP$ increase_NN ,_,
nay_RB ,_, the_DT very_JJ frame_NN of_IN nature_NN itself_PRP might_MD be_VB dissolved_VBN ._. To_TO guard_VB
against_IN these_DT catastrophes_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO put_VB the_DT king_NN to_TO death_NN
while_IN he_PRP is_VBZ still_RB in_IN the_DT full_JJ bloom_NN of_IN his_PRP$ divine_JJ manhood_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN
that_IN his_PRP$ sacred_JJ life_NN ,_, transmitted_VBN in_IN unabated_JJ force_NN to_TO his_PRP$
successor_NN ,_, may_MD renew_VB its_PRP$ youth_NN ,_, and_CC thus_RB by_IN successive_JJ transmissions_NNS
through_IN a_DT perpetual_JJ line_NN of_IN vigorous_JJ incarnations_NNS may_MD remain_VB
eternally_RB fresh_JJ and_CC young_JJ ,_, a_DT pledge_NN and_CC security_NN that_IN men_NNS and_CC
animals_NNS shall_MD in_RP like_IN manner_NN renew_VBP their_PRP$ youth_NN by_IN a_DT perpetual_JJ
succession_NN of_IN generations_NNS ,_, and_CC that_DT seedtime_NN and_CC harvest_NN ,_, and_CC summer_NN
and_CC winter_NN ,_, and_CC rain_NN and_CC sunshine_NN shall_MD never_RB fail_VB ._. That_DT ,_, if_IN my_PRP$
conjecture_NN is_VBZ right_JJ ,_, was_VBD why_WRB the_DT priest_NN of_IN Aricia_NNP ,_, the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT
Wood_NNP at_IN Nemi_NNP ,_, had_VBD regularly_RB to_TO perish_VB by_IN the_DT sword_NN of_IN his_PRP$ successor_NN ._.

But_CC we_PRP have_VBP still_RB to_TO ask_VB ,_, What_WP was_VBD the_DT Golden_NNP Bough_NNP ?_. and_CC why_WRB had_VBD
each_DT candidate_NN for_IN the_DT Arician_NN priesthood_NN to_TO pluck_VB it_PRP before_IN he_PRP
could_MD slay_VB the_DT priest_NN ?_. These_DT questions_NNS I_PRP will_MD now_RB try_VB to_TO answer_VB ._.

It_PRP will_MD be_VB well_RB to_TO begin_VB by_IN noticing_VBG two_CD of_IN those_DT rules_NNS or_CC taboos_NNS by_IN
which_WDT ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, the_DT life_NN of_IN divine_JJ kings_NNS or_CC priests_NNS is_VBZ
regulated_VBN ._. The_DT first_JJ of_IN the_DT rules_NNS to_TO which_WDT I_PRP would_MD call_VB the_DT reader_NN '_POS s_PRP
attention_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT divine_JJ personage_NN may_MD not_RB touch_VB the_DT ground_NN with_IN
his_PRP$ foot_NN ._. This_DT rule_NN was_VBD observed_VBN by_IN the_DT supreme_JJ pontiff_NN of_IN the_DT
Zapotecs_NNP in_IN Mexico_NNP ;_: he_PRP profaned_VBD his_PRP$ sanctity_NN if_IN he_PRP so_RB much_RB as_IN
touched_VBD the_DT ground_NN with_IN his_PRP$ foot_NN ._. Montezuma_NNP ,_, emperor_NN of_IN Mexico_NNP ,_,
never_RB set_VBD foot_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ;_: he_PRP was_VBD always_RB carried_VBN on_IN the_DT shoulders_NNS
of_IN noblemen_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP lighted_VBD anywhere_RB they_PRP laid_VBD rich_JJ tapestry_NN for_IN
him_PRP to_TO walk_VB upon_IN ._. For_IN the_DT Mikado_NNP of_IN Japan_NNP to_TO touch_VB the_DT ground_NN with_IN
his_PRP$ foot_NN was_VBD a_DT shameful_JJ degradation_NN ;_: indeed_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ
century_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD enough_RB to_TO deprive_VB him_PRP of_IN his_PRP$ office_NN ._. Outside_IN his_PRP$
palace_NN he_PRP was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN men_NNS '_POS s_PRP shoulders_NNS ;_: within_IN it_PRP he_PRP walked_VBD on_IN
exquisitely_RB wrought_VBD mats_NNS ._. The_DT king_NN and_CC queen_NN of_IN Tahiti_NNP might_MD not_RB
touch_VB the_DT ground_NN anywhere_RB but_CC within_IN their_PRP$ hereditary_JJ domains_NNS ;_: for_IN
the_DT ground_NN on_IN which_WDT they_PRP trod_VBD became_VBD sacred_JJ ._. In_IN travelling_VBG from_IN
place_NN to_TO place_VB they_PRP were_VBD carried_VBN on_IN the_DT shoulders_NNS of_IN sacred_JJ men_NNS ._.
They_PRP were_VBD always_RB accompanied_VBN by_IN several_JJ pairs_NNS of_IN these_DT sanctified_VBN
attendants_NNS ;_: and_CC when_WRB it_PRP became_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO change_VB their_PRP$ bearers_NNS ,_,
the_DT king_NN and_CC queen_NN vaulted_VBD on_IN to_TO the_DT shoulders_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ new_JJ bearers_NNS
without_IN letting_VBG their_PRP$ feet_NNS touch_VB the_DT ground_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD an_DT evil_JJ omen_NN if_IN
the_DT king_NN of_IN Dosuma_NNP touched_VBD the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP had_VBD to_TO perform_VB an_DT
expiatory_NN ceremony_NN ._. Within_IN his_PRP$ palace_NN the_DT king_NN of_IN Persia_NNP walked_VBD on_IN
carpets_NNS on_IN which_WDT no_DT one_NN else_RB might_MD tread_VB ;_: outside_IN of_IN it_PRP he_PRP was_VBD never_RB
seen_VBN on_IN foot_NN but_CC only_RB in_IN a_DT chariot_NN or_CC on_IN horseback_NN ._. In_IN old_JJ days_NNS the_DT
king_NN of_IN Siam_NNP never_RB set_VBD foot_NN upon_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, but_CC was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN a_DT
throne_NN of_IN gold_NN from_IN place_NN to_TO place_NN ._. Formerly_RB neither_CC the_DT kings_NNS of_IN
Uganda_NNP ,_, nor_CC their_PRP$ mothers_NNS ,_, nor_CC their_PRP$ queens_NNS might_MD walk_VB on_IN foot_NN
outside_IN of_IN the_DT spacious_JJ enclosures_NNS in_IN which_WDT they_PRP lived_VBD ._. Whenever_WRB
they_PRP went_VBD forth_RB they_PRP were_VBD carried_VBN on_IN the_DT shoulders_NNS of_IN men_NNS of_IN the_DT
Buffalo_NNP clan_NN ,_, several_JJ of_IN whom_WP accompanied_VBD any_DT of_IN these_DT royal_JJ
personages_NNS on_IN a_DT journey_NN and_CC took_VBD it_PRP in_IN turn_NN to_TO bear_VB the_DT burden_NN ._. The_DT
king_NN sat_VBD astride_IN the_DT bearer_NN '_'' s_PRP neck_NN with_IN a_DT leg_NN over_IN each_DT shoulder_NN and_CC
his_PRP$ feet_NNS tucked_VBN under_IN the_DT bearer_NN '_'' s_PRP arms_NNS ._. When_WRB one_CD of_IN these_DT royal_JJ
carriers_NNS grew_VBD tired_VBN he_PRP shot_VBD the_DT king_NN onto_IN the_DT shoulders_NNS of_IN a_DT second_JJ
man_NN without_IN allowing_VBG the_DT royal_JJ feet_NNS to_TO touch_VB the_DT ground_NN ._. In_IN this_DT way_NN
they_PRP went_VBD at_IN a_DT great_JJ pace_NN and_CC travelled_VBD long_JJ distances_NNS in_IN a_DT day_NN ,_,
when_WRB the_DT king_NN was_VBD on_IN a_DT journey_NN ._. The_DT bearers_NNS had_VBD a_DT special_JJ hut_NN in_IN the_DT
king_NN '_POS s_VBZ enclosure_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO be_VB at_IN hand_NN the_DT moment_NN they_PRP were_VBD wanted_VBN ._.
Among_IN the_DT Bakuba_NNP ,_, or_CC rather_RB Bushongo_NNP ,_, a_DT nation_NN in_IN the_DT southern_JJ
region_NN of_IN the_DT Congo_NNP ,_, down_RB to_TO a_DT few_JJ years_NNS ago_IN persons_NNS of_IN the_DT royal_NN
blood_NN were_VBD forbidden_VBN to_TO touch_VB the_DT ground_NN ;_: they_PRP must_MD sit_VB on_IN a_DT hide_NN ,_, a_DT
chair_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT back_NN of_IN a_DT slave_NN ,_, who_WP crouched_VBD on_IN hands_NNS and_CC feet_NNS ;_: their_PRP$
feet_NNS rested_VBD on_IN the_DT feet_NNS of_IN others_NNS ._. When_WRB they_PRP travelled_VBD they_PRP were_VBD
carried_VBN on_IN the_DT backs_NNS of_IN men_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT king_NN journeyed_VBD in_IN a_DT litter_JJ
supported_VBN on_IN shafts_NNS ._. Among_IN the_DT Ibo_NNP people_NNS about_IN Awka_NNP ,_, in_IN Southern_NNP
Nigeria_NNP ,_, the_DT priest_NN of_IN the_DT Earth_NNP has_VBZ to_TO observe_VB many_JJ taboos_NNS ;_: for_IN
example_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD not_RB see_VB a_DT corpse_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP meets_VBZ one_CD on_IN the_DT road_NN he_PRP
must_MD hide_VB his_PRP$ eyes_NNS with_IN his_PRP$ wristlet_NN ._. He_PRP must_MD abstain_VB from_IN many_JJ
foods_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN eggs_NNS ,_, birds_NNS of_IN all_DT sorts_NNS ,_, mutton_NN ,_, dog_NN ,_, bush-buck_NN ,_, and_CC
so_RB forth_RB ._. He_PRP may_MD neither_RB wear_VB nor_CC touch_VB a_DT mask_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT masked_JJ man_NN
may_MD enter_VB his_PRP$ house_NN ._. If_IN a_DT dog_NN enters_VBZ his_PRP$ house_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ killed_VBN and_CC
thrown_VBN out_RP ._. As_IN priest_NN of_IN the_DT Earth_NNP he_PRP may_MD not_RB sit_VB on_IN the_DT bare_JJ
ground_NN ,_, nor_CC eat_VB things_NNS that_WDT have_VBP fallen_VBN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, nor_CC may_MD earth_NN
be_VB thrown_VBN at_IN him_PRP ._. According_VBG to_TO ancient_JJ Brahmanic_JJ ritual_NN a_DT king_NN at_IN
his_PRP$ inauguration_NN trod_NN on_IN a_DT tiger_NN '_'' s_PRP skin_NN and_CC a_DT golden_JJ plate_NN ;_: he_PRP was_VBD
shod_JJ with_IN shoes_NNS of_IN boar_NN '_'' s_PRP skin_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP lived_VBD thereafter_RB
he_PRP might_MD not_RB stand_VB on_IN the_DT earth_NN with_IN his_PRP$ bare_JJ feet_NNS ._.

But_CC besides_IN persons_NNS who_WP are_VBP permanently_RB sacred_JJ or_CC tabooed_JJ and_CC are_VBP
therefore_RB permanently_RB forbidden_VBN to_TO touch_VB the_DT ground_NN with_IN their_PRP$ feet_NNS ,_,
there_EX are_VBP others_NNS who_WP enjoy_VBP the_DT character_NN of_IN sanctity_NN or_CC taboo_NN only_RB
on_IN certain_JJ occasions_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO whom_WP accordingly_VBG the_DT prohibition_NN in_IN
question_NN only_RB applies_VBZ at_IN the_DT definite_JJ seasons_NNS during_IN which_WDT they_PRP
exhale_NN the_DT odour_NN of_IN sanctity_NN ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT Kayans_NNP or_CC Bahaus_NNP of_IN
Central_NNP Borneo_NNP ,_, while_IN the_DT priestesses_NNS are_VBP engaged_VBN in_IN the_DT performance_NN
of_IN certain_JJ rites_NNS they_PRP may_MD not_RB step_VB on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC boards_NNS are_VBP
laid_VBN for_IN them_PRP to_TO tread_VB on_IN ._. Warriors_NNP ,_, again_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT war-path_NN are_VBP
surrounded_VBN ,_, so_RB to_TO say_VB ,_, by_IN an_DT atmosphere_NN of_IN taboo_NN ;_: hence_RB some_DT Indians_NNPS
of_IN North_NNP America_NNP might_MD not_RB sit_VB on_IN the_DT bare_JJ ground_NN the_DT whole_JJ time_NN
they_PRP were_VBD out_RB on_IN a_DT warlike_JJ expedition_NN ._. In_IN Laos_NNP the_DT hunting_NN of_IN
elephants_NNS gives_VBZ rise_NN to_TO many_JJ taboos_NNS ;_: one_CD of_IN them_PRP is_VBZ that_IN the_DT chief_NN
hunter_NN may_MD not_RB touch_VB the_DT earth_NN with_IN his_PRP$ foot_NN ._. Accordingly_RB ,_, when_WRB he_PRP
alights_NNS from_IN his_PRP$ elephant_NN ,_, the_DT others_NNS spread_VBD a_DT carpet_NN of_IN leaves_NNS for_IN
him_PRP to_TO step_VB upon_IN ._.

Apparently_RB holiness_NN ,_, magical_JJ virtue_NN ,_, taboo_NN ,_, or_CC whatever_WDT we_PRP may_MD call_VB
that_DT mysterious_JJ quality_NN which_WDT is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO pervade_VB sacred_JJ or_CC
tabooed_JJ persons_NNS ,_, is_VBZ conceived_VBN by_IN the_DT primitive_JJ philosopher_NN as_IN a_DT
physical_JJ substance_NN or_CC fluid_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT the_DT sacred_JJ man_NN is_VBZ charged_VBN
just_RB as_IN a_DT Leyden_NNP jar_NN is_VBZ charged_VBN with_IN electricity_NN ;_: and_CC exactly_RB as_IN the_DT
electricity_NN in_IN the_DT jar_NN can_MD be_VB discharged_VBN by_IN contact_NN with_IN a_DT good_JJ
conductor_NN ,_, so_IN the_DT holiness_NN or_CC magical_JJ virtue_NN in_IN the_DT man_NN can_MD be_VB
discharged_VBN and_CC drained_VBN away_RB by_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, which_WDT on_IN this_DT
theory_NN serves_VBZ as_IN an_DT excellent_JJ conductor_NN for_IN the_DT magical_JJ fluid_NN ._. Hence_RB
in_IN order_NN to_TO preserve_VB the_DT charge_NN from_IN running_VBG to_TO waste_VB ,_, the_DT sacred_JJ or_CC
tabooed_JJ personage_NN must_MD be_VB carefully_RB prevented_VBN from_IN touching_VBG the_DT
ground_NN ;_: in_IN electrical_JJ language_NN he_PRP must_MD be_VB insulated_VBN ,_, if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ not_RB to_TO
be_VB emptied_VBN of_IN the_DT precious_JJ substance_NN or_CC fluid_NN with_IN which_WDT he_PRP ,_, as_IN a_DT
vial_JJ ,_, is_VBZ filled_VBN to_TO the_DT brim_NN ._. And_CC in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS apparently_RB the_DT
insulation_NN of_IN the_DT tabooed_JJ person_NN is_VBZ recommended_VBN as_IN a_DT precaution_NN not_RB
merely_RB for_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ sake_NN but_CC for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN others_NNS ;_: for_IN since_IN the_DT
virtue_NN of_IN holiness_NN or_CC taboo_NN is_VBZ ,_, so_RB to_TO say_VB ,_, a_DT powerful_JJ explosive_NN
which_WDT the_DT smallest_JJS touch_NN may_MD detonate_VB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ in_IN the_DT
interest_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ safety_NN to_TO keep_VB it_PRP within_IN narrow_JJ bounds_NNS ,_, lest_IN
breaking_VBG out_IN it_PRP should_MD blast_VB ,_, blight_NN ,_, and_CC destroy_VB whatever_WDT it_PRP comes_VBZ
into_IN contact_NN with_IN ._.



2._DT Not_RB to_TO see_VB the_DT Sun_NNP

THE_DT SECOND_NNP rule_NN to_TO be_VB here_RB noted_VBN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT sun_NN may_MD not_RB shine_VB upon_IN
the_DT divine_JJ person_NN ._. This_DT rule_NN was_VBD observed_VBN both_CC by_IN the_DT Mikado_NNP and_CC by_IN
the_DT pontiff_NN of_IN the_DT Zapotecs_NNP ._. The_DT latter_JJ "_`` was_VBD looked_VBN upon_IN as_IN a_DT god_NN
whom_WP the_DT earth_NN was_VBD not_RB worthy_JJ to_TO hold_VB ,_, nor_CC the_DT sun_NN to_TO shine_VB upon_IN ."_CD
The_DT Japanese_NNPS would_MD not_RB allow_VB that_IN the_DT Mikado_NNP should_MD expose_VB his_PRP$
sacred_JJ person_NN to_TO the_DT open_JJ air_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT sun_NN was_VBD not_RB thought_VBN worthy_JJ to_TO
shine_VB on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._. The_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN Granada_NNP ,_, in_IN South_NNP America_NNP ,_, "_'' kept_VBN
those_DT who_WP were_VBD to_TO be_VB rulers_NNS or_CC commanders_NNS ,_, whether_IN men_NNS or_CC women_NNS ,_,
locked_VBN up_RP for_IN several_JJ years_NNS when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD children_NNS ,_, some_DT of_IN them_PRP
seven_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC this_DT so_RB close_JJ that_IN they_PRP were_VBD not_RB to_TO see_VB the_DT sun_NN ,_,
for_IN if_IN they_PRP should_MD happen_VB to_TO see_VB it_PRP they_PRP forfeited_VBD their_PRP$ lordship_NN ,_,
eating_VBG certain_JJ sorts_NNS of_IN food_NN appointed_VBN ;_: and_CC those_DT who_WP were_VBD their_PRP$
keepers_NNS at_IN certain_JJ times_NNS went_VBD into_IN their_PRP$ retreat_NN or_CC prison_NN and_CC
scourged_VB them_PRP severely_RB ."_JJ Thus_RB ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT heir_NN to_TO the_DT throne_NN
of_IN Bogota_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD not_RB the_DT son_NN but_CC the_DT sister_NN '_'' s_PRP son_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, had_VBN
to_TO undergo_VB a_DT rigorous_JJ training_NN from_IN his_PRP$ infancy_NN ;_: he_PRP lived_VBD in_IN
complete_JJ retirement_NN in_IN a_DT temple_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP might_MD not_RB see_VB the_DT sun_NN nor_CC
eat_VB salt_NN nor_CC converse_NN with_IN a_DT woman_NN ;_: he_PRP was_VBD surrounded_VBN by_IN guards_NNS who_WP
observed_VBD his_PRP$ conduct_NN and_CC noted_VBD all_DT his_PRP$ actions_NNS ;_: if_IN he_PRP broke_VBD a_DT single_JJ
one_CD of_IN the_DT rules_NNS laid_VBD down_RP for_IN him_PRP ,_, he_PRP was_VBD deemed_VBN infamous_JJ and_CC
forfeited_VBN all_DT his_PRP$ rights_NNS to_TO the_DT throne_NN ._. So_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, the_DT heir_NN to_TO the_DT
kingdom_NN of_IN Sogamoso_NNP ,_, before_IN succeeding_VBG to_TO the_DT crown_NN ,_, had_VBD to_TO fast_RB for_IN
seven_CD years_NNS in_IN the_DT temple_NN ,_, being_VBG shut_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT dark_JJ and_CC not_RB allowed_VBN
to_TO see_VB the_DT sun_NN or_CC light_NN ._. The_DT prince_NN who_WP was_VBD to_TO become_VB Inca_NNP of_IN Peru_NNP
had_VBD to_TO fast_RB for_IN a_DT month_NN without_IN seeing_VBG light_NN ._.



3._CD The_DT Seclusion_NN of_IN Girls_NNS at_IN Puberty_NN

NOW_RB it_PRP is_VBZ remarkable_JJ that_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ two_CD rules_NNS --_: not_RB to_TO touch_VB the_DT
ground_NN and_CC not_RB to_TO see_VB the_DT sun_NN --_: are_VBP observed_VBN either_CC separately_RB or_CC
conjointly_RB by_IN girls_NNS at_IN puberty_NN in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ._. Thus_RB
amongst_IN the_DT negroes_NNS of_IN Loango_NNP girls_NNS at_IN puberty_NN are_VBP confined_VBN in_IN
separate_JJ huts_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP may_MD not_RB touch_VB the_DT ground_NN with_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN
their_PRP$ bare_JJ body_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Zulus_NNP and_CC kindred_VBD tribes_NNS of_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP ,_,
when_WRB the_DT first_JJ signs_NNS of_IN puberty_NN show_VBP themselves_PRP "_`` while_IN a_DT girl_NN is_VBZ
walking_VBG ,_, gathering_VBG wood_NN ,_, or_CC working_VBG in_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, she_PRP runs_VBZ to_TO the_DT
river_NN and_CC hides_NNS herself_PRP among_IN the_DT reeds_NNS for_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, so_RB as_IN not_RB to_TO be_VB
seen_VBN by_IN men_NNS ._. She_PRP covers_VBZ her_PRP$ head_NN carefully_RB with_IN her_PRP$ blanket_NN that_IN the_DT
sun_NN may_MD not_RB shine_VB on_IN it_PRP and_CC shrivel_VB her_PRP$ up_RB into_IN a_DT withered_VBN skeleton_NN ,_,
as_IN would_MD result_VB from_IN exposure_NN to_TO the_DT sun_NN '_POS s_PRP beams_VBZ ._. After_IN dark_JJ she_PRP
returns_NNS to_TO her_PRP$ home_NN and_CC is_VBZ secluded_VBN "_'' in_IN a_DT hut_NN for_IN some_DT time_NN ._. With_IN
the_DT Awa-nkonde_NNP ,_, a_DT tribe_NN at_IN the_DT northern_JJ end_NN of_IN Lake_NNP Nyassa_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT
rule_NN that_IN after_IN her_PRP$ first_JJ menstruation_NN a_DT girl_NN must_MD be_VB kept_VBN apart_RB ,_,
with_IN a_DT few_JJ companions_NNS of_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ sex_NN ,_, in_IN a_DT darkened_JJ house_NN ._. The_DT floor_NN
is_VBZ covered_VBN with_IN dry_JJ banana_NN leaves_NNS ,_, but_CC no_DT fire_NN may_MD be_VB lit_VBN in_IN the_DT
house_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ called_VBN "_`` the_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT Awasungu_NNP ,"_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, "_'' of_IN
maidens_NNS who_WP have_VBP no_DT hearts_NNS ."_.

In_IN New_NNP Ireland_NNP girls_NNS are_VBP confined_VBN for_IN four_CD or_CC five_CD years_NNS in_IN small_JJ
cages_NNS ,_, being_VBG kept_VBN in_IN the_DT dark_JJ and_CC not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO set_VB foot_NN on_IN the_DT
ground_NN ._. The_DT custom_NN has_VBZ been_VBN thus_RB described_VBN by_IN an_DT eye-witness_NN ._. "_'' I_PRP
heard_VBN from_IN a_DT teacher_NN about_IN some_DT strange_JJ custom_NN connected_VBN with_IN some_DT
of_IN the_DT young_JJ girls_NNS here_RB ,_, so_RB I_PRP asked_VBD the_DT chief_NN to_TO take_VB me_PRP to_TO the_DT
house_NN where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD ._. The_DT house_NN was_VBD about_IN twenty-five_CD feet_NNS in_IN
length_NN ,_, and_CC stood_VBD in_IN a_DT reed_NN and_CC bamboo_NN enclosure_NN ,_, across_IN the_DT
entrance_NN to_TO which_WDT a_DT bundle_NN of_IN dried_JJ grass_NN was_VBD suspended_VBN to_TO show_VB that_IN
it_PRP was_VBD strictly_RB '_'' tabu_FW ._. '_'' Inside_RB the_DT house_NN were_VBD three_CD conical_JJ
structures_NNS about_IN seven_CD or_CC eight_CD feet_NNS in_IN height_NN ,_, and_CC about_IN ten_CD or_CC
twelve_CD feet_NNS in_IN circumference_NN at_IN the_DT bottom_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN about_IN four_CD feet_NNS
from_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, at_IN which_WDT point_NN they_PRP tapered_VBD off_RP to_TO a_DT point_NN at_IN the_DT
top_NN ._. These_DT cages_NNS were_VBD made_VBN of_IN the_DT broad_JJ leaves_NNS of_IN the_DT pandanus-tree_NN ,_,
sewn_VBN quite_RB close_RB together_RB so_IN that_IN no_DT light_NN and_CC little_JJ or_CC no_DT air_NN
could_MD enter_VB ._. On_IN one_CD side_NN of_IN each_DT is_VBZ an_DT opening_NN which_WDT is_VBZ closed_VBN by_IN a_DT
double_JJ door_NN of_IN plaited_JJ cocoa-nut_NN tree_NN and_CC pandanus-tree_NN leaves_NNS ._.
About_IN three_CD feet_NNS from_IN the_DT ground_NN there_RB is_VBZ a_DT stage_NN of_IN bamboos_NNS which_WDT
forms_NNS the_DT floor_NN ._. In_IN each_DT of_IN these_DT cages_NNS we_PRP were_VBD told_VBN there_EX was_VBD a_DT
young_JJ woman_NN confined_VBN ,_, each_DT of_IN whom_WP had_VBD to_TO remain_VB for_IN at_IN least_JJS four_CD
or_CC five_CD years_NNS ,_, without_IN ever_RB being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB outside_IN the_DT house_NN ._. I_PRP
could_MD scarcely_RB credit_VB the_DT story_NN when_WRB I_PRP heard_VBD it_PRP ;_: the_DT whole_JJ thing_NN
seemed_VBD too_RB horrible_JJ to_TO be_VB true_JJ ._. I_PRP spoke_VBD to_TO the_DT chief_NN ,_, and_CC told_VBD him_PRP
that_IN I_PRP wished_VBD to_TO see_VB the_DT inside_NN of_IN the_DT cages_NNS ,_, and_CC also_RB to_TO see_VB the_DT
girls_NNS that_IN I_PRP might_MD make_VB them_PRP a_DT present_NN of_IN a_DT few_JJ beads_NNS ._. He_PRP told_VBD me_PRP
that_IN it_PRP was_VBD '_'' tabu_NN ,_, '_'' forbidden_VBN for_IN any_DT men_NNS but_CC their_PRP$ own_JJ relations_NNS
to_TO look_VB at_IN them_PRP ;_: but_CC I_PRP suppose_VBP the_DT promised_VBN beads_NNS acted_VBD as_IN an_DT
inducement_NN ,_, and_CC so_IN he_PRP sent_VBD away_RB for_IN some_DT old_JJ lady_NN who_WP had_VBD charge_NN ,_,
and_CC who_WP alone_RB is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO open_VB the_DT doors_NNS ._. While_IN we_PRP were_VBD waiting_VBG we_PRP
could_MD hear_VB the_DT girls_NNS talking_VBG to_TO the_DT chief_NN in_IN a_DT querulous_JJ way_NN as_IN if_IN
objecting_VBG to_TO something_NN or_CC expressing_VBG their_PRP$ fears_NNS ._. The_DT old_JJ woman_NN came_VBD
at_IN length_NN and_CC certainly_RB she_PRP did_VBD not_RB seem_VB a_DT very_RB pleasant_JJ jailor_NN or_CC
guardian_NN ;_: nor_CC did_VBD she_PRP seem_VB to_TO favour_VB the_DT request_NN of_IN the_DT chief_NN to_TO
allow_VB us_PRP to_TO see_VB the_DT girls_NNS ,_, as_IN she_PRP regarded_VBD us_PRP with_IN anything_NN but_CC
pleasant_JJ looks_NNS ._. However_RB ,_, she_PRP had_VBD to_TO undo_VB the_DT door_NN when_WRB the_DT chief_NN
told_VBD her_PRP to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT girls_NNS peeped_VBD out_RP at_IN us_PRP ,_, and_CC ,_, when_WRB
told_VBD to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, they_PRP held_VBD out_RP their_PRP$ hands_NNS for_IN the_DT beads_NNS ._. I_PRP ,_, however_RB ,_,
purposely_RB sat_VBD at_IN some_DT distance_NN away_RB and_CC merely_RB held_VBD out_RP the_DT beads_NNS to_TO
them_PRP ,_, as_IN I_PRP wished_VBD to_TO draw_VB them_PRP quite_RB outside_JJ ,_, that_IN I_PRP might_MD inspect_VB
the_DT inside_NN of_IN the_DT cages_NNS ._. This_DT desire_NN of_IN mine_NN gave_VBD rise_NN to_TO another_DT
difficulty_NN ,_, as_IN these_DT girls_NNS were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO put_VB their_PRP$ feet_NNS to_TO the_DT
ground_NN all_DT the_DT time_NN they_PRP were_VBD confined_VBN in_IN these_DT places_NNS ._. However_RB ,_,
they_PRP wished_VBD to_TO get_VB the_DT beads_NNS ,_, and_CC so_IN the_DT old_JJ lady_NN had_VBD to_TO go_VB outside_IN
and_CC collect_VB a_DT lot_NN of_IN pieces_NNS of_IN wood_NN and_CC bamboo_NN ,_, which_WDT she_PRP placed_VBD on_IN
the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB going_VBG to_TO one_CD of_IN the_DT girls_NNS ,_, she_PRP helped_VBD her_PRP down_RB
and_CC held_VBD her_PRP$ hand_NN as_IN she_PRP stepped_VBD from_IN one_CD piece_NN of_IN wood_NN to_TO another_DT
until_IN she_PRP came_VBD near_IN enough_RB to_TO get_VB the_DT beads_NNS I_PRP held_VBD out_RP to_TO her_PRP ._. I_PRP
then_RB went_VBD to_TO inspect_VB the_DT inside_NN of_IN the_DT cage_NN out_IN of_IN which_WDT she_PRP had_VBD
come_VBN ,_, but_CC could_MD scarely_RB put_VB my_PRP$ head_NN inside_IN of_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT atmosphere_NN was_VBD
so_RB hot_JJ and_CC stifling_JJ ._. It_PRP was_VBD clean_JJ and_CC contained_VBD nothing_NN but_CC a_DT few_JJ
short_JJ lengths_NNS of_IN bamboo_NN for_IN holding_VBG water_NN ._. There_EX was_VBD only_JJ room_NN for_IN
the_DT girl_NN to_TO sit_VB or_CC lie_VB down_RP in_IN a_DT crouched_VBN position_NN on_IN the_DT bamboo_NN
platform_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT doors_NNS are_VBP shut_VBN it_PRP must_MD be_VB nearly_RB or_CC quite_RB
dark_JJ inside_NN ._. The_DT girls_NNS are_VBP never_RB allowed_VBN to_TO come_VB out_RP except_IN once_RB a_DT
day_NN to_TO bathe_VB in_IN a_DT dish_NN or_CC wooden_JJ bowl_NN placed_VBD close_RB to_TO each_DT cage_NN ._.
They_PRP say_VBP that_IN they_PRP perspire_VBP profusely_RB ._. They_PRP are_VBP placed_VBN in_IN these_DT
stifling_VBG cages_NNS when_WRB quite_RB young_JJ ,_, and_CC must_MD remain_VB there_RB until_IN they_PRP
are_VBP young_JJ women_NNS ,_, when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP taken_VBN out_RP and_CC have_VB each_DT a_DT great_JJ
marriage_NN feast_NN provided_VBN for_IN them_PRP ._. One_CD of_IN them_PRP was_VBD about_IN fourteen_CD or_CC
fifteen_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT chief_NN told_VBD us_PRP that_IN she_PRP had_VBD been_VBN there_RB for_IN
five_CD years_NNS ,_, but_CC would_MD soon_RB be_VB taken_VBN out_RP now_RB ._. The_DT other_JJ two_CD were_VBD
about_IN eight_CD and_CC ten_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP have_VBP to_TO stay_VB there_RB for_IN
several_JJ years_NNS longer_RB ."_.

In_IN Kabadi_NNP ,_, a_DT district_NN of_IN British_JJ New_NNP Guinea_NNP ,_, "_`` daughters_NNS of_IN chiefs_NNS ,_,
when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP about_IN twelve_CD or_CC thirteen_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, are_VBP kept_VBN
indoors_NNS for_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD years_NNS ,_, never_RB being_VBG allowed_VBN ,_, under_IN any_DT
pretence_NN ,_, to_TO descend_VB from_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT house_NN is_VBZ so_RB shaded_VBN that_IN
the_DT sun_NN cannot_MD shine_VB on_IN them_PRP ."_IN Among_IN the_DT Yabim_NNP and_CC Bukaua_NNP ,_, two_CD
neighbouring_NN and_CC kindred_VBD tribes_NNS on_IN the_DT coast_NN of_IN Northern_NNP New_NNP Guinea_NNP ,_,
a_DT girl_NN at_IN puberty_NN is_VBZ secluded_VBN for_IN some_DT five_CD or_CC six_CD weeks_NNS in_IN an_DT inner_JJ
part_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ;_: but_CC she_PRP may_MD not_RB sit_VB on_IN the_DT floor_NN ,_, lest_IN her_PRP$
uncleanliness_NN should_MD cleave_VB to_TO it_PRP ,_, so_IN a_DT log_NN of_IN wood_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN for_IN
her_PRP$ to_TO squat_VB on_IN ._. Moreover_RB ,_, she_PRP may_MD not_RB touch_VB the_DT ground_NN with_IN her_PRP$
feet_NNS ;_: hence_RB if_IN she_PRP is_VBZ obliged_VBN to_TO quit_VB the_DT house_NN for_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN ,_,
she_PRP is_VBZ muffled_VBN up_RP in_IN mats_NNS and_CC walks_NNS on_IN two_CD halves_NNS of_IN a_DT coco-nut_NN
shell_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP fastened_VBN like_IN sandals_NNS to_TO her_PRP$ feet_NNS by_IN creeping_VBG
plants_NNS ._. Among_IN the_DT Ot_JJ Danoms_NNP of_IN Borneo_NNP girls_NNS at_IN the_DT age_NN of_IN eight_CD or_CC
ten_CD years_NNS are_VBP shut_VBN up_RP in_IN a_DT little_JJ room_NN or_CC cell_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, and_CC cut_NN
off_RB from_IN all_DT intercourse_NN with_IN the_DT world_NN for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN ._. The_DT cell_NN ,_,
like_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, is_VBZ raised_VBN on_IN piles_NNS above_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC
is_VBZ lit_VBN by_IN a_DT single_JJ small_JJ window_NN opening_NN on_IN a_DT lonely_JJ place_NN ,_, so_RB that_IN
the_DT girl_NN is_VBZ in_IN almost_RB total_JJ darkness_NN ._. She_PRP may_MD not_RB leave_VB the_DT room_NN on_IN
any_DT pretext_NN whatever_WDT ,_, not_RB even_RB for_IN the_DT most_JJS necessary_JJ purposes_NNS ._. None_NN
of_IN her_PRP$ family_NN may_MD see_VB her_PRP all_PDT the_DT time_NN she_PRP is_VBZ shut_VBN up_RP ,_, but_CC a_DT single_JJ
slave_NN woman_NN is_VBZ appointed_VBN to_TO wait_VB on_IN her_PRP ._. During_IN her_PRP$ lonely_JJ
confinement_NN ,_, which_WDT often_RB lasts_VBZ seven_CD years_NNS ,_, the_DT girl_NN occupies_NNS
herself_PRP in_IN weaving_VBG mats_NNS or_CC with_IN other_JJ handiwork_NN ._. Her_PRP$ bodily_JJ growth_NN
is_VBZ stunted_VBN by_IN the_DT long_JJ want_NN of_IN exercise_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB ,_, on_IN attaining_VBG
womanhood_NN ,_, she_PRP is_VBZ brought_VBN out_RP ,_, her_PRP$ complexion_NN is_VBZ pale_JJ and_CC wax-like_JJ ._.
She_PRP is_VBZ now_RB shown_VBN the_DT sun_NN ,_, the_DT earth_NN ,_, the_DT water_NN ,_, the_DT trees_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT
flowers_NNS ,_, as_IN if_IN she_PRP were_VBD newly_RB born_VBN ._. Then_RB a_DT great_JJ feast_NN is_VBZ made_VBN ,_, a_DT
slave_NN is_VBZ killed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT girl_NN is_VBZ smeared_VBN with_IN his_PRP$ blood_NN ._. In_IN Ceram_NN
girls_NNS at_IN puberty_NN were_VBD formerly_RB shut_VBN up_RP by_IN themselves_PRP in_IN a_DT hut_NN which_WDT
was_VBD kept_VBN dark_JJ ._. In_IN Yap_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT Caroline_NNP Islands_NNP ,_, should_MD a_DT girl_NN be_VB
overtaken_VBN by_IN her_PRP$ first_JJ menstruation_NN on_IN the_DT public_JJ road_NN ,_, she_PRP may_MD not_RB
sit_VB down_RB on_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, but_CC must_MD beg_VB for_IN a_DT coco-nut_NN shell_NN to_TO put_VB
under_IN her_PRP ._. She_PRP is_VBZ shut_VBN up_RP for_IN several_JJ days_NNS in_IN a_DT small_JJ hut_NN at_IN a_DT
distance_NN from_IN her_PRP$ parents_NNS '_POS house_NN ,_, and_CC afterwards_RB she_PRP is_VBZ bound_VBN to_TO
sleep_NN for_IN a_DT hundred_CD days_NNS in_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT special_JJ houses_NNS which_WDT are_VBP
provided_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN menstruous_JJ women_NNS ._.

In_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Mabuiag_NNP ,_, Torres_NNP Straits_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT signs_NNS of_IN puberty_NN
appear_VB on_IN a_DT girl_NN ,_, a_DT circle_NN of_IN bushes_NNS is_VBZ made_VBN in_IN a_DT dark_JJ corner_NN of_IN the_DT
house_NN ._. Here_RB ,_, decked_VBN with_IN shoulder-belts_NNS ,_, armlets_NNS ,_, leglets_NNS just_RB below_IN
the_DT knees_NNS ,_, and_CC anklets_NNS ,_, wearing_VBG a_DT chaplet_NN on_IN her_PRP$ head_NN ,_, and_CC shell_NN
ornaments_NNS in_IN her_PRP$ ears_NNS ,_, on_IN her_PRP$ chest_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN her_PRP back_RB ,_, she_PRP squats_VBZ in_IN
the_DT midst_NN of_IN the_DT bushes_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP piled_VBN so_RB high_JJ round_NN about_IN her_PRP$
that_IN only_RB her_PRP$ head_NN is_VBZ visible_JJ ._. In_IN this_DT state_NN of_IN seclusion_NN she_PRP must_MD
remain_VB for_IN three_CD months_NNS ._. All_PDT this_DT time_NN the_DT sun_NN may_MD not_RB shine_VB upon_IN
her_PRP ,_, but_CC at_IN night_NN she_PRP is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO slip_VB out_IN of_IN the_DT hut_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
bushes_NNS that_IN hedge_NN her_PRP in_RB are_VBP then_RB changed_VBN ._. She_PRP may_MD not_RB feed_VB herself_PRP
or_CC handle_VB food_NN ,_, but_CC is_VBZ fed_VBN by_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD old_JJ women_NNS ,_, her_PRP$ maternal_JJ
aunts_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP especially_RB appointed_VBN to_TO look_VB after_IN her_PRP ._. One_CD of_IN these_DT
women_NNS cooks_NNS food_NN for_IN her_PRP at_IN a_DT special_JJ fire_NN in_IN the_DT forest_NN ._. The_DT girl_NN
is_VBZ forbidden_VBN to_TO eat_VB turtle_NN or_CC turtle_NN eggs_NNS during_IN the_DT season_NN when_WRB the_DT
turtles_NNS are_VBP breeding_VBG ;_: but_CC no_DT vegetable_NN food_NN is_VBZ refused_VBN her_PRP ._. No_DT man_NN ,_,
not_RB even_RB her_PRP$ own_JJ father_NN ,_, may_MD come_VB into_IN the_DT house_NN while_IN her_PRP$ seclusion_NN
lasts_VBZ ;_: for_IN if_IN her_PRP$ father_NN saw_VBD her_PRP at_IN this_DT time_NN he_PRP would_MD certainly_RB
have_VB bad_JJ luck_NN in_IN his_PRP$ fishing_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD probably_RB smash_VB his_PRP$ canoe_NN the_DT
very_RB next_JJ time_NN he_PRP went_VBD out_RP in_IN it_PRP ._. At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT three_CD months_NNS she_PRP
is_VBZ carried_VBN down_RP to_TO a_DT freshwater_NN creek_NN by_IN her_PRP$ attendants_NNS ,_, hanging_VBG on_IN
to_TO their_PRP$ shoulders_NNS in_IN such_JJ a_DT way_NN that_IN her_PRP$ feet_NNS do_VBP not_RB touch_VB the_DT
ground_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT women_NNS of_IN the_DT tribe_NN form_NN a_DT ring_NN round_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC thus_RB
escort_VB her_PRP to_TO the_DT beach_NN ._. Arrived_VBN at_IN the_DT shore_NN ,_, she_PRP is_VBZ stripped_VBN of_IN
her_PRP$ ornaments_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT bearers_NNS stagger_NN with_IN her_PRP into_IN the_DT creek_NN ,_,
where_WRB they_PRP immerse_VBD her_PRP ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT other_JJ women_NNS join_VBP in_IN splashing_VBG
water_NN over_IN both_DT the_DT girl_NN and_CC her_PRP$ bearers_NNS ._. When_WRB they_PRP come_VBP out_IN of_IN the_DT
water_NN one_CD of_IN the_DT two_CD attendants_NNS makes_VBZ a_DT heap_NN of_IN grass_NN for_IN her_PRP charge_NN
to_TO squat_VB upon_IN ._. The_DT other_JJ runs_NNS to_TO the_DT reef_NN ,_, catches_VBZ a_DT small_JJ crab_NN ,_,
tears_NNS off_IN its_PRP$ claws_NNS ,_, and_CC hastens_VBZ back_RB with_IN them_PRP to_TO the_DT creek_NN ._. Here_RB
in_IN the_DT meantime_NN a_DT fire_NN has_VBZ been_VBN kindled_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT claws_NNS are_VBP roasted_VBN
at_IN it_PRP ._. The_DT girl_NN is_VBZ then_RB fed_VBN by_IN her_PRP$ attendants_NNS with_IN the_DT roasted_VBN
claws_NNS ._. After_IN that_IN she_PRP is_VBZ freshly_RB decorated_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT whole_JJ party_NN
marches_NNS back_RB to_TO the_DT village_NN in_IN a_DT single_JJ rank_NN ,_, the_DT girl_NN walking_VBG in_IN
the_DT centre_NN between_IN her_PRP$ two_CD old_JJ aunts_NNS ,_, who_WP hold_VBP her_PRP by_IN the_DT wrists_NNS ._.
The_DT husbands_NNS of_IN her_PRP$ aunts_NNS now_RB receive_VBP her_PRP and_CC lead_VB her_PRP into_IN the_DT
house_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN them_PRP ,_, where_WRB all_DT partake_NN of_IN food_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT girl_NN is_VBZ
allowed_VBN once_RB more_JJR to_TO feed_VB herself_PRP in_IN the_DT usual_JJ manner_NN ._. A_DT dance_NN
follows_VBZ ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT girl_NN takes_VBZ a_DT prominent_JJ part_NN ,_, dancing_VBG between_IN
the_DT husbands_NNS of_IN the_DT two_CD aunts_NNS who_WP had_VBD charge_NN of_IN her_PRP$ in_IN her_PRP$
retirement_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT Yaraikanna_NNP tribe_NN of_IN Cape_NNP York_NNP Peninsula_NNP ,_, in_IN Northern_NNP
Queensland_NNP ,_, a_DT girl_NN at_IN puberty_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO live_VB by_IN herself_PRP for_IN a_DT month_NN
or_CC six_CD weeks_NNS ;_: no_DT man_NN may_MD see_VB her_PRP ,_, though_IN any_DT woman_NN may_MD ._. She_PRP stays_VBZ in_IN
a_DT hut_NN or_CC shelter_NN specially_RB made_VBN for_IN her_PRP ,_, on_IN the_DT floor_NN of_IN which_WDT she_PRP
lies_VBZ supine_NN ._. She_PRP may_MD not_RB see_VB the_DT sun_NN ,_, and_CC towards_IN sunset_NN she_PRP must_MD
keep_VB her_PRP$ eyes_NNS shut_VBN until_IN the_DT sun_NN has_VBZ gone_VBN down_RB ,_, otherwise_RB it_PRP is_VBZ
thought_VBD that_IN her_PRP$ nose_NN will_MD be_VB diseased_JJ ._. During_IN her_PRP seclusion_NN she_PRP may_MD
eat_VB nothing_NN that_WDT lives_VBZ in_IN salt_NN water_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT snake_NN would_MD kill_VB her_PRP ._. An_CC
old_JJ woman_NN waits_VBZ upon_IN her_PRP and_CC supplies_VBZ her_PRP$ with_IN roots_NNS ,_, yams_NNS ,_, and_CC
water_NN ._. Some_DT Australian_JJ tribes_NNS are_VBP wont_VBN to_TO bury_VB their_PRP$ girls_NNS at_IN such_JJ
seasons_NNS more_RBR or_CC less_RBR deeply_RB in_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, perhaps_RB in_IN order_NN to_TO hide_VB
them_PRP from_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.

Among_IN the_DT Indians_NNPS of_IN California_NNP a_DT girl_NN at_IN her_PRP$ first_JJ menstruation_NN
"_`` was_VBD thought_VBN to_TO be_VB possessed_VBN of_IN a_DT particular_JJ degree_NN of_IN supernatural_JJ
power_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT was_VBD not_RB always_RB regarded_VBN as_IN entirely_RB defiling_JJ or_CC
malevolent_JJ ._. Often_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT strong_JJ feeling_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN
of_IN evil_JJ inherent_JJ in_IN her_PRP$ condition_NN ._. Not_RB only_RB was_VBD she_PRP secluded_VBD from_IN
her_PRP$ family_NN and_CC the_DT community_NN ,_, but_CC an_DT attempt_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO seclude_VB the_DT
world_NN from_IN her_PRP ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT injunctions_NNS most_RBS strongly_RB laid_VBN upon_IN her_PRP$
was_VBD not_RB to_TO look_VB about_IN her_PRP ._. She_PRP kept_VBD her_PRP$ head_NN bowed_VBD and_CC was_VBD forbidden_VBN
to_TO see_VB the_DT world_NN and_CC the_DT sun_NN ._. Some_DT tribes_NNS covered_VBD her_PRP with_IN a_DT
blanket_NN ._. Many_JJ of_IN the_DT customs_NNS in_IN this_DT connection_NN resembled_VBD those_DT of_IN
the_DT North_NNP Pacific_NNP Coast_NNP most_JJS strongly_RB ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT prohibition_NN to_TO
the_DT girl_NN to_TO touch_VB or_CC scratch_VB her_PRP$ head_NN with_IN her_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, a_DT special_JJ
implement_VB being_VBG furnished_VBN her_PRP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._. Sometimes_RB she_PRP could_MD
eat_VB only_RB when_WRB fed_VBN and_CC in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS fasted_VBD altogether_RB ."_.

Among_IN the_DT Chinook_NNP Indians_NNPS who_WP inhabited_VBN the_DT coast_NN of_IN Washington_NNP
State_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT chief_NN '_POS s_VBZ daughter_NN attained_VBN to_TO puberty_NN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD hidden_VBN
for_IN five_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ;_: she_PRP might_MD not_RB look_VB at_IN
them_PRP nor_CC at_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, nor_CC might_MD she_PRP pick_VB berries_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD believed_VBN
that_IN if_IN she_PRP were_VBD to_TO look_VB at_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, the_DT weather_NN would_MD be_VB bad_JJ ;_: that_IN
if_IN she_PRP picked_VBD berries_NNS ,_, it_PRP would_MD rain_VB ;_: and_CC that_IN when_WRB she_PRP hung_VBD her_PRP$
towel_NN of_IN cedar-bark_NN on_IN a_DT spruce-tree_NN ,_, the_DT tree_NN withered_VBD up_RP at_IN once_RB ._.
She_PRP went_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT house_NN by_IN a_DT separate_JJ door_NN and_CC bathed_VBN in_IN a_DT creek_NN
far_RB from_IN the_DT village_NN ._. She_PRP fasted_VBD for_IN some_DT days_NNS ,_, and_CC for_IN many_JJ days_NNS
more_RBR she_PRP might_MD not_RB eat_VB fresh_JJ food_NN ._.

Amongst_IN the_DT Aht_NNP or_CC Nootka_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN Vancouver_NNP Island_NNP ,_, when_WRB girls_NNS
reach_NN puberty_NN they_PRP are_VBP placed_VBN in_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN gallery_NN in_IN the_DT house_NN "_'' and_CC
are_VBP there_RB surrounded_VBN completely_RB with_IN mats_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN neither_RB the_DT sun_NN
nor_CC any_DT fire_NN can_MD be_VB seen_VBN ._. In_IN this_DT cage_NN they_PRP remain_VBP for_IN several_JJ days_NNS ._.
Water_NNP is_VBZ given_VBN them_PRP ,_, but_CC no_DT food_NN ._. The_DT longer_RBR a_DT girl_NN remains_VBZ in_IN this_DT
retirement_NN the_DT greater_JJR honour_NN is_VBZ it_PRP to_TO the_DT parents_NNS ;_: but_CC she_PRP is_VBZ
disgraced_VBN for_IN life_NN if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ known_VBN that_IN she_PRP has_VBZ seen_VBN fire_NN or_CC the_DT sun_NN
during_IN this_DT initiatory_NN ordeal_NN ."_IN Pictures_NNS of_IN the_DT mythical_JJ
thunder-bird_NN are_VBP painted_VBN on_IN the_DT screens_NNS behind_IN which_WDT she_PRP hides_NNS ._.
During_IN her_PRP seclusion_NN she_PRP may_MD neither_RB move_VB nor_CC lie_VB down_RB ,_, but_CC must_MD

forbidden_VBN ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN every_DT scratch_NN would_MD leave_VB a_DT scar_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT Tsetsaut_NNP tribe_NN of_IN British_NNP Columbia_NNP a_DT girl_NN at_IN puberty_NN wears_VBZ a_DT

end_NN of_IN two_CD years_NNS a_DT man_NN takes_VBZ the_DT hat_NN from_IN her_PRP$ head_NN and_CC throws_VBZ it_PRP
away_RB ._. In_IN the_DT Bilqula_NNP or_CC Bella_NNP Coola_NNP tribe_NN of_IN British_NNP Columbia_NNP ,_, when_WRB

Amongst_IN the_DT Tlingit_NN (_-LRB- Thlinkeet_NNP )_-RRB- or_CC Kolosh_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN Alaska_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT

keep_VB the_DT aperture_NN open_JJ ._. Among_IN the_DT Koniags_NNP ,_, an_DT Esquimau_NNP people_NNS of_IN

When_WRB symptoms_NNS of_IN puberty_NN appeared_VBD on_IN a_DT girl_NN for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN ,_, the_DT

Amongst_IN the_DT Macusis_NNP of_IN British_NNP Guiana_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT girl_NN shows_VBZ the_DT first_JJ

"_`` clean_JJ ,"_NN and_CC can_MD mix_VB again_RB with_IN people_NNS ._. Other_JJ Indians_NNPS of_IN Guiana_NNP ,_,

When_WRB a_DT Hindoo_NNP maiden_NN reaches_VBZ maturity_NN she_PRP is_VBZ kept_VBN in_IN a_DT dark_JJ room_NN for_IN
four_CD days_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ forbidden_VBN to_TO see_VB the_DT sun_NN ._. She_PRP is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN

of_IN the_DT fifth_JJ day_NN she_PRP goes_VBZ to_TO a_DT neighbouring_NN tank_NN ,_, accompanied_VBN by_IN

may_MD not_RB touch_VB any_DT other_JJ person_NN ,_, tree_NN or_CC plant_NN ._. Further_RB ,_, she_PRP may_MD not_RB

In_IN Cambodia_NNP a_DT girl_NN at_IN puberty_NN is_VBZ put_VBN to_TO bed_NN under_IN a_DT mosquito_NN

sufficiently_RB trying_VBG ._. According_VBG to_TO another_DT account_NN ,_, a_DT Cambodian_JJ

not_RB to_TO eat_VB flesh_NN or_CC fish_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB on_RB ._. She_PRP goes_VBZ nowhere_RB ,_, not_RB even_RB to_TO
the_DT pagoda_NN ._. But_CC this_DT state_NN of_IN seclusion_NN is_VBZ discontinued_VBN during_IN

monster_NN who_WP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO cause_VB eclipses_NNS by_IN catching_VBG the_DT heavenly_NN
