literally_RB the_DT injunction_NN is_VBZ interpreted_VBN which_WDT forbids_VBZ maidens_NNS
entering_VBG on_IN womanhood_NN to_TO look_VB upon_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.

A_DT superstition_NN so_RB widely_RB diffused_JJ as_IN this_DT might_MD be_VB expected_VBN to_TO leave_VB
traces_NNS in_IN legends_NNS and_CC folk-tales_NNS ._. And_CC it_PRP has_VBZ done_VBN so_RB ._. The_DT old_JJ Greek_NNP
story_NN of_IN Danae_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD confined_VBN by_IN her_PRP$ father_NN in_IN a_DT subterranean_JJ
chamber_NN or_CC a_DT brazen_JJ tower_NN ,_, but_CC impregnated_VBN by_IN Zeus_NNP ,_, who_WP reached_VBD her_PRP$
in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT shower_NN of_IN gold_NN ,_, perhaps_RB belongs_VBZ to_TO this_DT class_NN of_IN
tales_NNS ._. It_PRP has_VBZ its_PRP$ counterpart_NN in_IN the_DT legend_NN which_WDT the_DT Kirghiz_NNP of_IN
Siberia_NNP tell_VBP of_IN their_PRP$ ancestry_NN ._. A_DT certain_JJ Khan_NNP had_VBD a_DT fair_JJ daughter_NN ,_,
whom_WP he_PRP kept_VBD in_IN a_DT dark_JJ iron_NN house_NN ,_, that_IN no_DT man_NN might_MD see_VB her_PRP ._. An_DT old_JJ
woman_NN tended_VBD her_PRP$ ;_: and_CC when_WRB the_DT girl_NN was_VBD grown_VBN to_TO maidenhood_NN she_PRP
asked_VBD the_DT old_JJ woman_NN ,_, "_`` Where_WRB do_VBP you_PRP go_VB so_RB often_RB ?"_JJ "_'' My_PRP$ child_NN ,"_RB said_VBD
the_DT old_JJ dame_NN ,_, "_`` there_EX is_VBZ a_DT bright_JJ world_NN ._. In_IN that_DT bright_JJ world_NN your_PRP$
father_NN and_CC mother_NN live_JJ ,_, and_CC all_DT sorts_NNS of_IN people_NNS live_VBP there_RB ._. That_DT is_VBZ
where_WRB I_PRP go_VBP ."_RB The_DT maiden_NN said_VBD ,_, "_`` Good_JJ mother_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD tell_VB nobody_NN ,_, but_CC
show_VB me_PRP that_IN bright_JJ world_NN ."_NN So_IN the_DT old_JJ woman_NN took_VBD the_DT girl_NN out_IN of_IN
the_DT iron_NN house_NN ._. But_CC when_WRB she_PRP saw_VBD the_DT bright_JJ world_NN ,_, the_DT girl_NN tottered_.
and_CC fainted_JJ ;_: and_CC the_DT eye_NN of_IN God_NNP fell_VBD upon_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC she_PRP conceived_VBD ._.
Her_PRP$ angry_JJ father_NN put_VBD her_PRP in_IN a_DT golden_JJ chest_NN and_CC sent_VBD her_PRP floating_VBG
away_RB (_-LRB- fairy_JJ gold_NN can_MD float_VB in_IN fairyland_NN )_-RRB- over_IN the_DT wide_JJ sea_NN ._. The_DT
shower_NN of_IN gold_NN in_IN the_DT Greek_NNP story_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT eye_NN of_IN God_NNP in_IN the_DT Kirghiz_NNP
legend_NN ,_, probably_RB stand_VB for_IN sunlight_NN and_CC the_DT sun_NN ._. The_DT idea_NN that_IN women_NNS
may_MD be_VB impregnated_VBN by_IN the_DT sun_NN is_VBZ not_RB uncommon_JJ in_IN legends_NNS ,_, and_CC there_EX
are_VBP even_RB traces_NNS of_IN it_PRP in_IN marriage_NN customs_NNS ._.



4._DT Reasons_NNS for_IN the_DT Seclusion_NN of_IN Girls_NNS at_IN Puberty_NN

THE_DT MOTIVE_CD for_IN the_DT restraints_NNS so_RB commonly_RB imposed_VBN on_IN girls_NNS at_IN
puberty_NN is_VBZ the_DT deeply_RB engrained_JJ dread_NN which_WDT primitive_JJ man_NN
universally_RB entertains_NNS of_IN menstruous_JJ blood_NN ._. He_PRP fears_VBZ it_PRP at_IN all_DT times_NNS
but_CC especially_RB on_IN its_PRP$ first_JJ appearance_NN ;_: hence_RB the_DT restrictions_NNS under_IN
which_WDT women_NNS lie_VBP at_IN their_PRP$ first_JJ menstruation_NN are_VBP usually_RB more_RBR
stringent_JJ than_IN those_DT which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP to_TO observe_VB at_IN any_DT subsequent_JJ
recurrence_NN of_IN the_DT mysterious_JJ flow_NN ._. Some_DT evidence_NN of_IN the_DT fear_NN and_CC of_IN
the_DT customs_NNS based_VBN on_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN cited_VBN in_IN an_DT earlier_JJR part_NN of_IN this_DT
work_NN ;_: but_CC as_IN the_DT terror_NN ,_, for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ nothing_NN less_JJR ,_, which_WDT the_DT
phenomenon_NN periodically_RB strikes_VBZ into_IN the_DT mind_NN of_IN the_DT savage_JJ has_VBZ
deeply_RB influenced_VBD his_PRP$ life_NN and_CC institutions_NNS ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB well_RB to_TO
illustrate_VBP the_DT subject_NN with_IN some_DT further_JJ examples_NNS ._.

Thus_RB in_IN the_DT Encounter_NNP Bay_NNP tribe_NN of_IN South_NNP Australia_NNP there_RB is_VBZ ,_, or_CC used_VBN
to_TO be_VB ,_, a_DT "_`` superstition_NN which_WDT obliges_VBZ a_DT woman_NN to_TO separate_VB herself_PRP
from_IN the_DT camp_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN her_PRP$ monthly_JJ illness_NN ,_, when_WRB if_IN a_DT young_JJ
man_NN or_CC boy_NN should_MD approach_VB ,_, she_PRP calls_VBZ out_RP ,_, and_CC he_PRP immediately_RB makes_VBZ
a_DT circuit_NN to_TO avoid_VB her_PRP ._. If_IN she_PRP is_VBZ neglectful_JJ upon_IN this_DT point_NN ,_, she_PRP
exposes_NNS herself_PRP to_TO scolding_VBG ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB to_TO severe_JJ beating_NN by_IN her_PRP$
husband_NN or_CC nearest_JJS relation_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT boys_NNS are_VBP told_VBN from_IN their_PRP$
infancy_NN ,_, that_IN if_IN they_PRP see_VBP the_DT blood_NN they_PRP will_MD early_RB become_VB
grey-headed_JJ ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ strength_NN will_MD fail_VB prematurely_RB ."_IN The_DT Dieri_NNP of_IN
Central_NNP Australia_NNP believe_VBP that_IN if_IN women_NNS at_IN these_DT times_NNS were_VBD to_TO eat_VB
fish_NN or_CC bathe_VB in_IN a_DT river_NN ,_, the_DT fish_NN would_MD all_DT die_VB and_CC the_DT water_NN would_MD
dry_JJ up_RB ._. The_DT Arunta_NNP of_IN the_DT same_JJ region_NN forbid_VBD menstruous_JJ women_NNS to_TO
gather_VB the_DT irriakura_NN bulbs_NNS ,_, which_WDT form_VBP a_DT staple_NN article_NN of_IN diet_NN
for_IN both_DT men_NNS and_CC women_NNS ._. They_PRP think_VBP that_DT were_VBD a_DT woman_NN to_TO break_VB this_DT
rule_NN ,_, the_DT supply_NN of_IN bulbs_NNS would_MD fail_VB ._.

In_IN some_DT Australian_JJ tribes_NNS the_DT seclusion_NN of_IN menstruous_JJ women_NNS was_VBD even_RB
more_RBR rigid_JJ ,_, and_CC was_VBD enforced_VBN by_IN severer_JJ penalties_NNS than_IN a_DT scolding_NN or_CC
a_DT beating_NN ._. Thus_RB "_`` there_EX is_VBZ a_DT regulation_NN relating_VBG to_TO camps_NNS in_IN the_DT
Wakelbura_NNP tribe_NN which_WDT forbids_VBZ the_DT women_NNS coming_VBG into_IN the_DT encampment_NN
by_IN the_DT same_JJ path_NN as_IN the_DT men_NNS ._. Any_DT violation_NN of_IN this_DT rule_NN would_MD in_RP a_DT
large_JJ camp_NN be_VB punished_VBN with_IN death_NN ._. The_DT reason_NN for_IN this_DT is_VBZ the_DT dread_NN
with_IN which_WDT they_PRP regard_VBP the_DT menstrual_JJ period_NN of_IN women_NNS ._. During_IN such_PDT a_DT
time_NN ,_, a_DT woman_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN entirely_RB away_RB from_IN the_DT camp_NN ,_, half_DT a_DT mile_NN at_IN
least_JJS ._. A_DT woman_NN in_IN such_JJ a_DT condition_NN has_VBZ boughs_NNS of_IN some_DT tree_NN of_IN her_PRP$
totem_NN tied_VBD round_RB her_PRP$ loins_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ constantly_RB watched_VBN and_CC guarded_VBN ,_,
for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN that_IN should_MD any_DT male_NN be_VB so_RB unfortunate_JJ as_IN to_TO see_VB a_DT
woman_NN in_IN such_JJ a_DT condition_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD die_VB ._. If_IN such_JJ a_DT woman_NN were_VBD to_TO let_VB
herself_PRP be_VB seen_VBN by_IN a_DT man_NN ,_, she_PRP would_MD probably_RB be_VB put_VBN to_TO death_NN ._. When_WRB
the_DT woman_NN has_VBZ recovered_VBN ,_, she_PRP is_VBZ painted_VBN red_JJ and_CC white_JJ ,_, her_PRP head_NN
covered_VBN with_IN feathers_NNS ,_, and_CC returns_NNS to_TO the_DT camp_NN ."_.

In_IN Muralug_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT Torres_NNP Straits_NNP Islands_NNP ,_, a_DT menstruous_JJ woman_NN
may_MD not_RB eat_VB anything_NN that_WDT lives_VBZ in_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, else_RB the_DT natives_NNS believe_VBP
that_IN the_DT fisheries_NNS would_MD fail_VB ._. In_IN Galela_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT west_NN of_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP ,_,
women_NNS at_IN their_PRP$ monthly_JJ periods_NNS may_MD not_RB enter_VB a_DT tobacco-field_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT
plants_NNS would_MD be_VB attacked_VBN by_IN disease_NN ._. The_DT Minangkabauers_NNP of_IN Sumatra_NNP
are_VBP persuaded_VBN that_IN if_IN a_DT woman_NN in_IN her_PRP$ unclean_JJ state_NN were_VBD to_TO go_VB near_IN a_DT
rice-field_NN ,_, the_DT crop_NN would_MD be_VB spoiled_VBN ._.

The_DT Bushmen_NNP of_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP think_VBP that_IN ,_, by_IN a_DT glance_NN of_IN a_DT girl_NN '_POS s_PRP eye_NN
at_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB she_PRP ought_MD to_TO be_VB kept_VBN in_IN strict_JJ retirement_NN ,_, men_NNS
become_VBN fixed_VBN in_IN whatever_WDT positions_NNS they_PRP happen_VBP to_TO occupy_VB ,_, with_IN
whatever_WDT they_PRP were_VBD holding_VBG in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, and_CC are_VBP changed_VBN into_IN
trees_NNS that_IN talk_NN ._. Cattle-rearing_DT tribes_NNS of_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP hold_VBP that_IN
their_PRP$ cattle_NNS would_MD die_VB if_IN the_DT milk_NN were_VBD drunk_JJ by_IN a_DT menstruous_JJ woman_NN ;_:
and_CC they_PRP fear_VBP the_DT same_JJ disaster_NN if_IN a_DT drop_NN of_IN her_PRP$ blood_NN were_VBD to_TO fall_VB
on_IN the_DT ground_NN and_CC the_DT oxen_NNS were_VBD to_TO pass_VB over_IN it_PRP ._. To_TO prevent_VB such_JJ a_DT
calamity_NN women_NNS in_IN general_JJ ,_, not_RB menstruous_JJ women_NNS only_RB ,_, are_VBP forbidden_VBN
to_TO enter_VB the_DT cattle_NNS enclosure_NN ;_: and_CC more_JJR than_IN that_DT ,_, they_PRP may_MD not_RB use_VB
the_DT ordinary_JJ paths_NNS in_IN entering_VBG the_DT village_NN or_CC in_IN passing_VBG from_IN one_CD
hut_NN to_TO another_DT ._. They_PRP are_VBP obliged_VBN to_TO make_VB circuitous_JJ tracks_NNS at_IN the_DT
back_RB of_IN the_DT huts_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO avoid_VB the_DT ground_NN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT
village_NN where_WRB the_DT cattle_NNS stand_VBP or_CC lie_VBP down_RP ._. These_DT women_NNS '_POS s_PRP tracks_NNS may_MD
be_VB seen_VBN at_IN every_DT Caffre_NNP village_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT Baganda_NNP ,_, in_IN like_IN manner_NN ,_,
no_DT menstruous_JJ woman_NN might_MD drink_VB milk_NN or_CC come_VB into_IN contact_NN with_IN any_DT
milk-vessel_NN ;_: and_CC she_PRP might_MD not_RB touch_VB anything_NN that_WDT belonged_VBD to_TO her_PRP$
husband_NN ,_, nor_CC sit_VB on_IN his_PRP$ mat_NN ,_, nor_CC cook_VB his_PRP$ food_NN ._. If_IN she_PRP touched_VBD
anything_NN of_IN his_PRP$ at_IN such_JJ a_DT time_NN it_PRP was_VBD deemed_VBN equivalent_JJ to_TO wishing_VBG
him_PRP dead_JJ or_CC to_TO actually_RB working_VBG magic_NN for_IN his_PRP$ destruction_NN ._. Were_VBD she_PRP
to_TO handle_VB any_DT article_NN of_IN his_PRP$ ,_, he_PRP would_MD surely_RB fall_VB ill_JJ ;_: were_VBD she_PRP to_TO
touch_VB his_PRP$ weapons_NNS ,_, he_PRP would_MD certainly_RB be_VB killed_VBN in_IN the_DT next_JJ battle_NN ._.
Further_RB ,_, the_DT Baganda_NNP would_MD not_RB suffer_VB a_DT menstruous_JJ woman_NN to_TO visit_VB a_DT
well_RB ;_: if_IN she_PRP did_VBD so_RB ,_, they_PRP feared_VBD that_IN the_DT water_NN would_MD dry_VB up_RB ,_, and_CC
that_IN she_PRP herself_PRP would_MD fall_VB sick_JJ and_CC die_VB ,_, unless_IN she_PRP confessed_VBD her_PRP$
fault_NN and_CC the_DT medicine-man_NN made_VBD atonement_NN for_IN her_PRP ._. Among_IN the_DT Akikuyu_NNP
of_IN British_NNP East_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, if_IN a_DT new_JJ hut_NN is_VBZ built_VBN in_IN a_DT village_NN and_CC the_DT
wife_NN chances_NNS to_TO menstruate_JJ in_IN it_PRP on_IN the_DT day_NN she_PRP lights_VBZ the_DT first_JJ
fire_NN there_RB ,_, the_DT hut_NN must_MD be_VB broken_VBN down_IN and_CC demolished_VBD the_DT very_RB next_JJ
day_NN ._. The_DT woman_NN may_MD on_RP no_DT account_NN sleep_VB a_DT second_JJ night_NN in_IN it_PRP ;_: there_EX
is_VBZ a_DT curse_NN both_CC on_IN her_PRP and_CC on_IN it_PRP ._.

According_VBG to_TO the_DT Talmud_NNP ,_, if_IN a_DT woman_NN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN her_PRP period_NN
passes_NNS between_IN two_CD men_NNS ,_, she_PRP thereby_RB kills_VBZ one_CD of_IN them_PRP ._. Peasants_NNPS of_IN
the_DT Lebanon_NNP think_VBP that_IN menstruous_JJ women_NNS are_VBP the_DT cause_NN or_CC many_JJ
misfortunes_NNS ;_: their_PRP$ shadow_NN causes_VBZ flowers_NNS to_TO wither_JJ and_CC trees_NNS to_TO
perish_JJ ,_, it_PRP even_RB arrests_NNS the_DT movements_NNS of_IN serpents_NNS ;_: if_IN one_CD of_IN them_PRP
mounts_NNS a_DT horse_NN ,_, the_DT animal_NN might_MD die_VB or_CC at_IN least_JJS be_VB disabled_VBN for_IN a_DT
long_JJ time_NN ._.

The_DT Guayquiries_NNP of_IN the_DT Orinoco_NNP believe_VBP that_IN when_WRB a_DT woman_NN has_VBZ her_PRP$
courses_NNS ,_, everything_NN upon_IN which_WDT she_PRP steps_NNS will_MD die_VB ,_, and_CC that_IN if_IN a_DT man_NN
treads_NNS on_IN the_DT place_NN where_WRB she_PRP has_VBZ passed_VBN ,_, his_PRP$ legs_NNS will_MD immediately_RB
swell_VB up_RP ._. Among_IN the_DT Bri-bri_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN Costa_NNP Rica_NNP a_DT married_VBN woman_NN at_IN
her_PRP$ periods_NNS uses_VBZ for_IN plates_NNS only_JJ banana_NN leaves_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, when_WRB she_PRP has_VBZ
done_VBN with_IN them_PRP ,_, she_PRP throws_VBZ away_RB in_IN a_DT sequestered_JJ spot_NN ;_: for_IN should_MD a_DT
cow_NN find_NN and_CC eat_VB them_PRP ,_, the_DT animal_NN would_MD waste_VB away_RB and_CC perish_JJ ._. Also_RB
she_PRP drinks_VBZ only_RB out_IN of_IN a_DT special_JJ vessel_NN ,_, because_IN any_DT person_NN who_WP
should_MD afterwards_RB drink_VB out_IN of_IN the_DT same_JJ vessel_NN would_MD infallibly_VB pine_NN
away_RB and_CC die_VBP ._.

Among_IN most_JJS tribes_NNS of_IN North_NNP American_NNP Indians_NNPS the_DT custom_NN was_VBD that_IN
women_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ courses_NNS retired_VBN from_IN the_DT camp_NN or_CC the_DT village_NN and_CC
lived_VBN during_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN their_PRP$ uncleanness_NN in_IN special_JJ huts_NNS or_CC
shelters_NNS which_WDT were_VBD appropriated_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ use_NN ._. There_EX they_PRP dwelt_VBP
apart_RB ,_, eating_VBG and_CC sleeping_VBG by_IN themselves_PRP ,_, warming_VBG themselves_PRP at_IN
their_PRP$ own_JJ fires_NNS ,_, and_CC strictly_RB abstaining_VBG from_IN all_DT communications_NNS
with_IN men_NNS ,_, who_WP shunned_VBD them_PRP just_RB as_IN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD stricken_VBN with_IN the_DT
plague_NN ._.

Thus_RB ,_, to_TO take_VB examples_NNS ,_, the_DT Creek_NNP and_CC kindred_VBD Indians_NNPS of_IN the_DT United_NNP
States_NNS compelled_VBN women_NNS at_IN menstruation_NN to_TO live_VB in_IN separate_JJ huts_NNS at_IN
some_DT distance_NN from_IN the_DT village_NN ._. There_EX the_DT women_NNS had_VBD to_TO stay_VB ,_, at_IN the_DT
risk_NN of_IN being_VBG surprised_VBN and_CC cut_VBN off_RP by_IN enemies_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN "_'' a_DT
most_RBS horrid_JJ and_CC dangerous_JJ pollution_NN "_'' to_TO go_VB near_IN the_DT women_NNS at_IN such_JJ
times_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT danger_NN extended_VBD to_TO enemies_NNS who_WP ,_, if_IN they_PRP slew_NN the_DT
women_NNS ,_, had_VBD to_TO cleanse_VB themselves_PRP from_IN the_DT pollution_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN
certain_JJ sacred_JJ herbs_NNS and_CC roots_NNS ._. The_DT Stseelis_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN British_NNPS
Columbia_NNP imagined_VBD that_IN if_IN a_DT menstruous_JJ woman_NN were_VBD to_TO step_VB over_IN a_DT
bundle_NN of_IN arrows_NNS ,_, the_DT arrows_NNS would_MD thereby_RB be_VB rendered_VBN useless_JJ and_CC
might_MD even_RB cause_VB the_DT death_NN of_IN their_PRP$ owner_NN ;_: and_CC similarly_RB that_IN if_IN she_PRP
passed_VBN in_IN front_NN of_IN a_DT hunter_NN who_WP carried_VBD a_DT gun_NN ,_, the_DT weapon_NN would_MD
never_RB shoot_VB straight_RB again_RB ._. Among_IN the_DT Chippeways_NNP and_CC other_JJ Indians_NNPS
of_IN the_DT Hudson_NNP Bay_NNP Territory_NNP ,_, menstruous_JJ women_NNS are_VBP excluded_VBN from_IN the_DT
camp_NN ,_, and_CC take_VB up_RP their_PRP$ abode_NN in_IN huts_NNS of_IN branches_NNS ._. They_PRP wear_VBP long_RB
hoods_NNS ,_, which_WDT effectually_RB conceal_VB the_DT head_NN and_CC breast_NN ._. They_PRP may_MD not_RB
touch_VB the_DT household_NN furniture_NN nor_CC any_DT objects_NNS used_VBN by_IN men_NNS ;_: for_IN their_PRP$
touch_NN "_`` is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO defile_VB them_PRP ,_, so_RB that_IN their_PRP$ subsequent_JJ use_NN
would_MD be_VB followed_VBN by_IN certain_JJ mischief_NN or_CC misfortune_NN ,"_, such_JJ as_IN
disease_NN or_CC death_NN ._. They_PRP must_MD drink_VB out_IN of_IN a_DT swan_NN '_'' s_PRP bone_NN ._. They_PRP may_MD not_RB
walk_NN on_IN the_DT common_JJ paths_NNS nor_CC cross_VB the_DT tracks_NNS of_IN animals_NNS ._. They_PRP "_'' are_VBP
never_RB permitted_VBD to_TO walk_VB on_IN the_DT ice_NN of_IN rivers_NNS or_CC lakes_NNS ,_, or_CC near_IN the_DT
part_NN where_WRB the_DT men_NNS are_VBP hunting_VBG beaver_NN ,_, or_CC where_WRB a_DT fishing-net_NN is_VBZ
set_VBN ,_, for_IN fear_NN of_IN averting_VBG their_PRP$ success_NN ._. They_PRP are_VBP also_RB prohibited_VBN at_IN
those_DT times_NNS from_IN partaking_NN of_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN any_DT animal_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB from_IN
walking_VBG in_IN or_CC crossing_VBG the_DT track_NN where_WRB the_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT deer_JJ ,_, moose_JJ ,_,
beaver_NN ,_, and_CC many_JJ other_JJ animals_NNS have_VBP lately_RB been_VBN carried_VBN ,_, either_RB on_IN a_DT
sledge_NN or_CC on_IN the_DT back_NN ._. To_TO be_VB guilty_JJ of_IN a_DT violation_NN of_IN this_DT custom_NN is_VBZ
considered_VBN as_IN of_IN the_DT greatest_JJS importance_NN ;_: because_IN they_PRP firmly_RB
believe_VB that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB a_DT means_NN of_IN preventing_VBG the_DT hunter_NN from_IN
having_VBG an_DT equal_JJ success_NN in_IN his_PRP$ future_JJ excursions_NNS ."_IN So_IN the_DT Lapps_NNP
forbid_VBD women_NNS at_IN menstruation_NN to_TO walk_VB on_IN that_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT shore_NN where_WRB
the_DT fishers_NNS are_VBP in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN setting_VBG out_RP their_PRP$ fish_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT
Esquimaux_NNP of_IN Bering_NNP Strait_NNP believe_VBP that_IN if_IN hunters_NNS were_VBD to_TO come_VB near_IN
women_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ courses_NNS they_PRP would_MD catch_VB no_DT game_NN ._. For_IN a_DT like_JJ reason_NN
the_DT Carrier_NNP Indians_NNPS will_MD not_RB suffer_VB a_DT menstruous_JJ woman_NN to_TO cross_VB the_DT
tracks_NNS of_IN animals_NNS ;_: if_IN need_NN be_VB ,_, she_PRP is_VBZ carried_VBN over_IN them_PRP ._. They_PRP think_VBP
that_IN if_IN she_PRP waded_VBD in_IN a_DT stream_NN or_CC a_DT lake_NN ,_, the_DT fish_NN would_MD die_VB ._.

Amongst_IN the_DT civilised_JJ nations_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP the_DT superstitions_NNS which_WDT
cluster_NN round_RB this_DT mysterious_JJ aspect_NN of_IN woman_NN '_POS s_PRP nature_NN are_VBP not_RB less_RBR
extravagant_JJ than_IN those_DT which_WDT prevail_VBP among_IN savages_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT oldest_JJS
existing_VBG cyclopaedia_NNS --_: the_DT Natural_JJ History_NN of_IN Pliny_NNP --_: the_DT list_NN of_IN
dangers_NNS apprehended_VBD from_IN menstruation_NN is_VBZ longer_RB than_IN any_DT furnished_VBN
by_IN mere_JJ barbarians_NNS ._. According_VBG to_TO Pliny_NNP ,_, the_DT touch_NN of_IN a_DT menstruous_JJ
woman_NN turned_VBD wine_NN to_TO vinegar_NN ,_, blighted_JJ crops_NNS ,_, killed_VBN seedlings_NNS ,_,
blasted_VBD gardens_NNS ,_, brought_VBD down_RP the_DT fruit_NN from_IN trees_NNS ,_, dimmed_VBD mirrors_NNS ,_,
blunted_VBN razors_NNS ,_, rusted_VBN iron_NN and_CC brass_NN (_-LRB- especially_RB at_IN the_DT waning_NN of_IN
the_DT moon_NN ),_VBN killed_VBN bees_NNS ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS drove_VBD them_PRP from_IN their_PRP$ hives_NNS ,_,
caused_VBN mares_NNS to_TO miscarry_VB ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ._. Similarly_RB ,_, in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS
of_IN Europe_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ still_RB believed_VBN that_IN if_IN a_DT woman_NN in_IN her_PRP$ courses_NNS
enters_VBZ a_DT brewery_NN the_DT beer_NN will_MD turn_VB sour_JJ ;_: if_IN she_PRP touches_VBZ beer_NN ,_, wine_NN ,_,
vinegar_NN ,_, or_CC milk_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD go_VB bad_JJ ;_: if_IN she_PRP makes_VBZ jam_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD not_RB
keep_VB ;_: if_IN she_PRP mounts_VBZ a_DT mare_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD miscarry_VB ;_: if_IN she_PRP touches_VBZ buds_NNS ,_,
they_PRP will_MD wither_VB ;_: if_IN she_PRP climbs_VBZ a_DT cherry_NN tree_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD die_VB ._. In_IN
Brunswick_NNP people_NNS think_VBP that_IN if_IN a_DT menstruous_JJ woman_NN assists_NNS at_IN the_DT
killing_NN of_IN a_DT pig_NN ,_, the_DT pork_NN will_MD putrefy_VB ._. In_IN the_DT Greek_NNP island_NN of_IN
Calymnos_NNS a_DT woman_NN at_IN such_JJ times_NNS may_MD not_RB go_VB to_TO the_DT well_NN to_TO draw_VB water_NN ,_,
nor_CC cross_VB a_DT running_VBG stream_NN ,_, nor_CC enter_VBP the_DT sea_NN ._. Her_PRP$ presence_NN in_IN a_DT
boat_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO raise_VB storms_NNS ._.

Thus_RB the_DT object_NN of_IN secluding_NN women_NNS at_IN menstruation_NN is_VBZ to_TO neutralise_VB
the_DT dangerous_JJ influences_NNS which_WDT are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO emanate_VB from_IN them_PRP at_IN
such_JJ times_NNS ._. That_IN the_DT danger_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO be_VB especially_RB great_JJ at_IN
the_DT first_JJ menstruation_NN appears_VBZ from_IN the_DT unusual_JJ precautions_NNS taken_VBN to_TO
isolate_JJ girls_NNS at_IN this_DT crisis_NN ._. Two_CD of_IN these_DT precautions_NNS have_VBP been_VBN
illustrated_VBN above_IN ,_, namely_RB ,_, the_DT rules_NNS that_IN the_DT girls_NNS may_MD not_RB touch_VB
the_DT ground_NN nor_CC see_VBP the_DT sun_NN ._. The_DT general_JJ effect_NN of_IN these_DT rules_NNS is_VBZ to_TO
keep_VB her_PRP suspended_VBN ,_, so_RB to_TO say_VB ,_, between_IN heaven_NN and_CC earth_NN ._. Whether_IN
enveloped_VBN in_IN her_PRP$ hammock_NN and_CC slung_VBD up_RP to_TO the_DT roof_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN South_NNP
America_NNP ,_, or_CC raised_VBN above_IN the_DT ground_NN in_IN a_DT dark_JJ and_CC narrow_JJ cage_NN ,_, as_RB in_IN
New_NNP Ireland_NNP ,_, she_PRP may_MD be_VB considered_VBN to_TO be_VB out_IN of_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN doing_VBG
mischief_NN ,_, since_IN ,_, being_VBG shut_VBN off_RP both_DT from_IN the_DT earth_NN and_CC from_IN the_DT
sun_NN ,_, she_PRP can_MD poison_NN neither_DT of_IN these_DT great_JJ sources_NNS of_IN life_NN by_IN her_PRP$
deadly_JJ contagion_NN ._. In_IN short_JJ ,_, she_PRP is_VBZ rendered_VBN harmless_JJ by_IN being_VBG ,_, in_IN
electrical_JJ language_NN ,_, insulated_VBN ._. But_CC the_DT precautions_NNS thus_RB taken_VBN to_TO
isolate_VBP or_CC insulate_VBP the_DT girl_NN are_VBP dictated_VBN by_IN a_DT regard_NN for_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ
safety_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN for_IN the_DT safety_NN of_IN others_NNS ._. For_IN it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN that_IN
she_PRP herself_PRP would_MD suffer_VB if_IN she_PRP were_VBD to_TO neglect_VB the_DT prescribed_VBN
regimen_NNS ._. Thus_RB Zulu_NNP girls_NNS ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, believe_VB that_IN they_PRP would_MD
shrivel_VB to_TO skeletons_NNS if_IN the_DT sun_NN were_VBD to_TO shine_VB on_IN them_PRP at_IN puberty_NN ,_,
and_CC the_DT Macusis_NNP imagine_VBP that_IN ,_, if_IN a_DT young_JJ woman_NN were_VBD to_TO transgress_VB
the_DT rules_NNS ,_, she_PRP would_MD suffer_VB from_IN sores_NNS on_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN her_PRP$ body_NN ._.
In_IN short_JJ ,_, the_DT girl_NN is_VBZ viewed_VBN as_IN charged_VBN with_IN a_DT powerful_JJ force_NN which_WDT ,_,
if_IN not_RB kept_VBN within_IN bounds_NNS ,_, may_MD prove_VB destructive_JJ both_DT to_TO herself_PRP and_CC
to_TO all_DT with_IN whom_WP she_PRP comes_VBZ in_IN contact_NN ._. To_TO repress_VB this_DT force_NN within_IN
the_DT limits_NNS necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT safety_NN of_IN all_DT concerned_VBN is_VBZ the_DT object_NN
of_IN the_DT taboos_NN in_IN question_NN ._.

The_DT same_JJ explanation_NN applies_VBZ to_TO the_DT observance_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ rules_NNS by_IN
divine_JJ kings_NNS and_CC priests_NNS ._. The_DT uncleanness_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN ,_, of_IN girls_NNS
at_IN puberty_NN and_CC the_DT sanctity_NN of_IN holy_JJ men_NNS do_VBP not_RB ,_, to_TO the_DT primitive_JJ
mind_NN ,_, differ_VBP materially_RB from_IN each_DT other_JJ ._. They_PRP are_VBP only_RB different_JJ
manifestations_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ mysterious_JJ energy_NN which_WDT ,_, like_IN energy_NN in_IN
general_JJ ,_, is_VBZ in_IN itself_PRP neither_RB good_JJ nor_CC bad_JJ ,_, but_CC becomes_VBZ beneficent_JJ
or_CC maleficent_JJ according_VBG to_TO its_PRP$ application_NN ._. Accordingly_RB ,_, if_IN ,_, like_IN
girls_NNS at_IN puberty_NN ,_, divine_JJ personages_NNS may_MD neither_RB touch_VB the_DT ground_NN nor_CC
see_VB the_DT sun_NN ,_, the_DT reason_NN is_VBZ ,_, on_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN ,_, a_DT fear_NN lest_IN their_PRP$
divinity_NN might_MD ,_, at_IN contact_NN with_IN earth_NN or_CC heaven_NN ,_, discharge_NN itself_PRP
with_IN fatal_JJ violence_NN on_IN either_CC ;_: and_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, an_DT
apprehension_NN that_IN the_DT divine_JJ being_NN ,_, thus_RB drained_VBN of_IN his_PRP$ ethereal_NN
virtue_NN ,_, might_MD thereby_RB be_VB incapacitated_VBN for_IN the_DT future_JJ performance_NN of_IN
those_DT magical_JJ functions_NNS ,_, upon_IN the_DT proper_JJ discharge_NN of_IN which_WDT the_DT
safety_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS and_CC even_RB of_IN the_DT world_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO hang_VB ._. Thus_RB
the_DT rules_NNS in_IN question_NN fall_NN under_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT taboos_NN which_WDT we_PRP
examined_VBN in_IN an_DT earlier_JJR part_NN of_IN this_DT book_NN ;_: they_PRP are_VBP intended_VBN to_TO
preserve_VB the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT divine_JJ person_NN and_CC with_IN it_PRP the_DT life_NN of_IN his_PRP$
subjects_NNS and_CC worshippers_NNS ._. Nowhere_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN ,_, can_MD his_PRP$ precious_JJ
yet_RB dangerous_JJ life_NN be_VB at_IN once_RB so_RB safe_JJ and_CC so_RB harmless_JJ as_IN when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ
neither_RB in_IN heaven_NN nor_CC in_IN earth_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, suspended_VBN
between_IN the_DT two_CD ._.




LXI_NNP ._. The_DT Myth_NNP of_IN Balder_NN

A_DT DEITY_NN whose_WP$ life_NN might_MD in_RP a_DT sense_NN be_VB said_VBN to_TO be_VB neither_RB in_IN heaven_NN
nor_CC on_IN earth_NN but_CC between_IN the_DT two_CD ,_, was_VBD the_DT Norse_NNP Balder_NNP ,_, the_DT good_JJ and_CC
beautiful_JJ god_NN ,_, the_DT son_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ god_NN Odin_NNP ,_, and_CC himself_PRP the_DT
wisest_JJS ,_, mildest_JJS ,_, best_JJS beloved_NN of_IN all_DT the_DT immortals_NNS ._. The_DT story_NN of_IN his_PRP$
death_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ told_VBN in_IN the_DT younger_JJR or_CC prose_NN Edda_NNP ,_, runs_VBZ thus_RB ._. Once_RB
on_IN a_DT time_NN Balder_NN dreamed_VBD heavy_JJ dreams_NNS which_WDT seemed_VBD to_TO forebode_VB his_PRP$
death_NN ._. Thereupon_IN the_DT gods_NNS held_VBD a_DT council_NN and_CC resolved_VBD to_TO make_VB him_PRP
secure_VB against_IN every_DT danger_NN ._. So_RB the_DT goddess_JJ Frigg_NNP took_VBD an_DT oath_NN from_IN
fire_NN and_CC water_NN ,_, iron_NN and_CC all_DT metals_NNS ,_, stones_NNS and_CC earth_NN ,_, from_IN trees_NNS ,_,
sicknesses_NNS and_CC poisons_NNS ,_, and_CC from_IN all_DT four-footed_JJ beasts_NNS ,_, birds_NNS ,_, and_CC
creeping_VBG things_NNS ,_, that_IN they_PRP would_MD not_RB hurt_VB Balder_NNP ._. When_WRB this_DT was_VBD done_VBN
Balder_NN was_VBD deemed_VBN invulnerable_JJ ;_: so_IN the_DT gods_NNS amused_VBD themselves_PRP by_IN
setting_VBG him_PRP in_IN their_PRP$ midst_NN ,_, while_IN some_DT shot_NN at_IN him_PRP ,_, others_NNS hewed_VBD at_IN
him_PRP ,_, and_CC others_NNS threw_VBD stones_NNS at_IN him_PRP ._. But_CC whatever_WDT they_PRP did_VBD ,_, nothing_NN
could_MD hurt_VB him_PRP ;_: and_CC at_IN this_DT they_PRP were_VBD all_DT glad_JJ ._. Only_RB Loki_NNP ,_, the_DT
mischief-maker_NN ,_, was_VBD displeased_VBN ,_, and_CC he_PRP went_VBD in_IN the_DT guise_NN of_IN an_DT old_JJ
woman_NN to_TO Frigg_NNP ,_, who_WP told_VBD him_PRP that_IN the_DT weapons_NNS of_IN the_DT gods_NNS could_MD not_RB
wound_NN Balder_NNP ,_, since_IN she_PRP had_VBD made_VBN them_PRP all_DT swear_VBP not_RB to_TO hurt_VB him_PRP ._.
Then_RB Loki_NNP asked_VBD ,_, "_`` Have_VB all_DT things_NNS sworn_VBN to_TO spare_VB Balder_NNP ?"_. She_PRP
answered_VBN ,_, "_`` East_NNP of_IN Walhalla_NNP grows_VBZ a_DT plant_NN called_VBN mistletoe_NN ;_: it_PRP
seemed_VBD to_TO me_PRP too_RB young_JJ to_TO swear_VB ."_RP So_RB Loki_NNP went_VBD and_CC pulled_VBD the_DT
mistletoe_NN and_CC took_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT assembly_NN of_IN the_DT gods_NNS ._. There_EX he_PRP found_VBD
the_DT blind_JJ god_NN Hother_NN standing_VBG at_IN the_DT outside_NN of_IN the_DT circle_NN ._. Loki_''
asked_VBD him_PRP ,_, "_`` Why_WRB do_VBP you_PRP not_RB shoot_VB at_IN Balder_NNP ?"_NNP Hother_NNP answered_VBD ,_,
"_`` Because_IN I_PRP do_VBP not_RB see_VB where_WRB he_PRP stands_VBZ ;_: besides_IN I_PRP have_VBP no_DT weapon_NN ."_.
Then_RB said_VBD Loki_NNP ,_, "_`` Do_VB like_VBP the_DT rest_NN and_CC show_NN Balder_NN honour_NN ,_, as_IN they_PRP
all_DT do_VBP ._. I_PRP will_MD show_VB you_PRP where_WRB he_PRP stands_VBZ ,_, and_CC do_VBP you_PRP shoot_VB at_IN him_PRP
with_IN this_DT twig_JJ ."_NN Hother_RB took_VBD the_DT mistletoe_NN and_CC threw_VBD it_PRP at_IN Balder_NNP ,_,
as_IN Loki_NNP directed_VBD him_PRP ._. The_DT mistletoe_NN struck_VBD Balder_NNP and_CC pierced_VBD him_PRP
through_IN and_CC through_IN ,_, and_CC he_PRP fell_VBD down_RB dead_JJ ._. And_CC that_WDT was_VBD the_DT
greatest_JJS misfortune_NN that_IN ever_RB befell_VB gods_NNS and_CC men_NNS ._. For_IN a_DT while_NN the_DT
gods_NNS stood_VBD speechless_JJ ,_, then_RB they_PRP lifted_VBD up_RP their_PRP$ voices_NNS and_CC wept_VBN
bitterly_RB ._. They_PRP took_VBD Balder_NNP '_POS s_PRP body_NN and_CC brought_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT sea-shore_NN ._.
There_EX stood_VBD Balder_NN '_'' s_PRP ship_NN ;_: it_PRP was_VBD called_VBN Ringhorn_NNP ,_, and_CC was_VBD the_DT
hugest_JJS of_IN all_DT ships_NNS ._. The_DT gods_NNS wished_VBD to_TO launch_VB the_DT ship_NN and_CC to_TO burn_VB
Balder_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN on_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC the_DT ship_NN would_MD not_RB stir_VB ._. So_IN they_PRP sent_VBD for_IN a_DT
giantess_NN called_VBD Hyrrockin_RB ._. She_PRP came_VBD riding_VBG on_IN a_DT wolf_NN and_CC gave_VBD the_DT
ship_NN such_JJ a_DT push_NN that_IN fire_NN flashed_VBD from_IN the_DT rollers_NNS and_CC all_PDT the_DT
earth_NN shook_VBD ._. Then_RB Balder_NNP '_POS s_PRP body_NN was_VBD taken_VBN and_CC placed_VBN on_IN the_DT funeral_NN
pile_NN upon_IN his_PRP$ ship_NN ._. When_WRB his_PRP$ wife_NN Nanna_NNP saw_VBD that_IN ,_, her_PRP$ heart_NN burst_NN
for_IN sorrow_NN and_CC she_PRP died_VBD ._. So_IN she_PRP was_VBD laid_VBN on_IN the_DT funeral_NN pile_NN with_IN
her_PRP$ husband_NN ,_, and_CC fire_NN was_VBD put_VBN to_TO it_PRP ._. Balder_NN '_'' s_PRP horse_NN ,_, too_RB ,_, with_IN all_PDT
its_PRP$ trappings_NNS ,_, was_VBD burned_VBN on_IN the_DT pile_NN ._.

Whether_IN he_PRP was_VBD a_DT real_JJ or_CC merely_RB a_DT mythical_JJ personage_NN ,_, Balder_NNP was_VBD
worshipped_VBN in_IN Norway_NNP ._. On_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT bays_NNS of_IN the_DT beautiful_JJ Sogne_NN
Fiord_NNP ,_, which_WDT penetrates_VBZ far_RB into_IN the_DT depths_NNS of_IN the_DT solemn_JJ Norwegian_JJ
mountains_NNS ,_, with_IN their_PRP$ sombre_JJ pine-forests_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ lofty_JJ cascades_NNS
dissolving_VBG into_IN spray_NN before_IN they_PRP reach_VBP the_DT dark_JJ water_NN of_IN the_DT fiord_NN
far_RB below_RB ,_, Balder_NNP had_VBD a_DT great_JJ sanctuary_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD called_VBN Balder_NNP '_POS s_PRP
Grove_NNP ._. A_DT palisade_NN enclosed_VBD the_DT hallowed_JJ ground_NN ,_, and_CC within_IN it_PRP stood_VBD
a_DT spacious_JJ temple_NN with_IN the_DT images_NNS of_IN many_JJ gods_NNS ,_, but_CC none_NN of_IN them_PRP was_VBD
worshipped_VBN with_IN such_JJ devotion_NN as_IN Balder_NNP ._. So_RB great_JJ was_VBD the_DT awe_NN with_IN
which_WDT the_DT heathen_NN regarded_VBD the_DT place_NN that_IN no_DT man_NN might_MD harm_VB another_DT
there_RB ,_, nor_CC steal_VBP his_PRP$ cattle_NNS ,_, nor_CC defile_VB himself_PRP with_IN women_NNS ._. But_CC
women_NNS cared_VBD for_IN the_DT images_NNS of_IN the_DT gods_NNS in_IN the_DT temple_NN ;_: they_PRP warmed_VBD
them_PRP at_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, anointed_VBD them_PRP with_IN oil_NN ,_, and_CC dried_VBD them_PRP with_IN
cloths_NNS ._.

Whatever_WDT may_MD be_VB thought_VBN of_IN an_DT historical_JJ kernel_NN underlying_VBG a_DT
mythical_JJ husk_NN in_IN the_DT legend_NN of_IN Balder_NNP ,_, the_DT details_NNS of_IN the_DT story_NN
suggest_VB that_IN it_PRP belongs_VBZ to_TO that_DT class_NN of_IN myths_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN
dramatised_VBN an_DT ritual_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, to_TO put_VB it_PRP otherwise_RB ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN
performed_VBN as_IN magical_JJ ceremonies_NNS for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN producing_VBG those_DT
natural_JJ effects_NNS which_WDT they_PRP describe_VBP in_IN figurative_JJ language_NN ._. A_DT myth_NN
is_VBZ never_RB so_RB graphic_JJ and_CC precise_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ details_NNS as_IN when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ ,_, so_RB to_TO
speak_VB ,_, the_DT book_NN of_IN the_DT words_NNS which_WDT are_VBP spoken_VBN and_CC acted_VBN by_IN the_DT
performers_NNS of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ rite_NN ._. That_IN the_DT Norse_NNP story_NN of_IN Balder_NNP was_VBD a_DT
myth_NN of_IN this_DT sort_NN will_MD become_VB probable_JJ if_IN we_PRP can_MD prove_VB that_IN
ceremonies_NNS resembling_VBG the_DT incidents_NNS in_IN the_DT tale_NN have_VBP been_VBN performed_VBN
by_IN Norsemen_NNP and_CC other_JJ European_JJ peoples_NNS ._. Now_RB the_DT main_JJ incidents_NNS in_IN
the_DT tale_NN are_VBP two_CD --_: first_RB ,_, the_DT pulling_VBG of_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN ,_, and_CC second_JJ ,_,
the_DT death_NN and_CC burning_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN ;_: and_CC both_DT of_IN them_PRP may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB
found_VBN to_TO have_VB had_VBD their_PRP$ counterparts_NNS in_IN yearly_JJ rites_NNS observed_VBD ,_,
whether_IN separately_RB or_CC conjointly_RB ,_, by_IN people_NNS in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN
Europe_NNP ._. These_DT rites_NNS will_MD be_VB described_VBN and_CC discussed_VBN in_IN the_DT following_VBG
chapters_NNS ._. We_PRP shall_MD begin_VB with_IN the_DT annual_JJ festivals_NNS of_IN fire_NN and_CC shall_MD
reserve_NN the_DT pulling_VBG of_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN for_IN consideration_NN later_RB on_RB ._.



LXII_NNP ._. The_DT Fire-Festivals_NNP of_IN Europe_NNP



1._`` The_DT Fire-festivals_NNS in_IN general_JJ

ALL_NNP over_IN Europe_NNP the_DT peasants_NNS have_VBP been_VBN accustomed_VBN from_IN time_NN
immemorial_JJ to_TO kindle_VB bonfires_NNS on_IN certain_JJ days_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO
dance_NN round_NN or_CC leap_VB over_IN them_PRP ._. Customs_NNP of_IN this_DT kind_NN can_MD be_VB traced_VBN
back_RB on_IN historical_JJ evidence_NN to_TO the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ analogy_NN to_TO
similar_JJ customs_NNS observed_VBD in_IN antiquity_NN goes_VBZ with_IN strong_JJ internal_JJ
evidence_NN to_TO prove_VB that_IN their_PRP$ origin_NN must_MD be_VB sought_VBN in_IN a_DT period_NN long_RB
prior_RB to_TO the_DT spread_NN of_IN Christianity_NNP ._. Indeed_RB the_DT earliest_JJS proof_NN of_IN
their_PRP$ observance_NN in_IN Northern_NNP Europe_NNP is_VBZ furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT attempts_NNS
made_VBN by_IN Christian_NNP synods_NNS in_IN the_DT eighth_JJ century_NN to_TO put_VB them_PRP down_RP as_IN
heathenish_JJ rites_NNS ._. Not_RB uncommonly_JJ effigies_NNS are_VBP burned_VBN in_IN these_DT fires_NNS ,_,
or_CC a_DT pretence_NN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN burning_VBG a_DT living_VBG person_NN in_IN them_PRP ;_: and_CC there_EX
are_VBP grounds_NNS for_IN believing_VBG that_IN anciently_RB human_JJ beings_NNS were_VBD actually_RB
burned_VBN on_IN these_DT occasions_NNS ._. A_DT brief_JJ view_NN of_IN the_DT customs_NNS in_IN question_NN
will_MD bring_VB out_RP the_DT traces_NNS of_IN human_JJ sacrifice_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD serve_VB at_IN the_DT
same_JJ time_NN to_TO throw_VB light_NN on_IN their_PRP$ meaning_NN ._.

The_DT seasons_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN when_WRB these_DT bonfires_NNS are_VBP most_RBS commonly_RB lit_VBN
are_VBP spring_NN and_CC midsummer_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN some_DT places_NNS they_PRP are_VBP kindled_VBN also_RB
at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN autumn_NN or_CC during_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT winter_NN ,_,
particularly_RB on_IN Hallow_NNP E_NNP '_POS en_FW (_-LRB- the_DT thirty-first_NN of_IN October_NNP ),_NNP Christmas_NNP
Day_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Eve_NNP of_IN Twelfth_NNP Day_NNP ._. Space_NNP forbids_VBZ me_PRP to_TO describe_VB all_PDT
these_DT festivals_NNS at_IN length_NN ;_: a_DT few_JJ specimens_NNS must_MD serve_VB to_TO illustrate_VB
their_PRP$ general_JJ character_NN ._. We_PRP shall_MD begin_VB with_IN the_DT fire-festivals_NNS of_IN
spring_NN ,_, which_WDT usually_RB fall_VBP on_IN the_DT first_JJ Sunday_NNP of_IN Lent_NNP
(_-LRB- Quadragesima_NNP or_CC Invocavit_NNP ),_, Easter_NNP Eve_NNP ,_, and_CC May_NNP Day_NNP ._.



2._DT The_DT Lenten_NNP Fires_NNPS

THE_DT CUSTOM_NNP of_IN kindling_VBG bonfires_NNS on_IN the_DT first_JJ Sunday_NNP in_IN Lent_NNP has_VBZ
prevailed_VBD in_IN Belgium_NNP ,_, the_DT north_NN of_IN France_NNP ,_, and_CC many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN
Germany_NNP ._. Thus_RB in_IN the_DT Belgian_JJ Ardennes_NNP for_IN a_DT week_NN or_CC a_DT fortnight_NN
before_IN the_DT "_`` day_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ fire_NN ,"_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN ,_, children_NNS go_VBP
about_IN from_IN farm_NN to_TO farm_VB collecting_VBG fuel_NN ._. At_IN Grand_NNP Halleux_NNP any_DT one_CD
who_WP refuses_VBZ their_PRP$ request_NN is_VBZ pursued_VBN next_JJ day_NN by_IN the_DT children_NNS ,_, who_WP
try_VB to_TO blacken_VB his_PRP$ face_NN with_IN the_DT ashes_NNS of_IN the_DT extinct_JJ fire_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT
day_NN has_VBZ come_VBN ,_, they_PRP cut_VBD down_RP bushes_NNS ,_, especially_RB juniper_NN and_CC broom_NN ,_,
and_CC in_IN the_DT evening_NN great_JJ bonfires_NNS blaze_VBP on_IN all_PDT the_DT heights_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT
common_JJ saying_VBG that_IN seven_CD bonfires_NNS should_MD be_VB seen_VBN if_IN the_DT village_NN is_VBZ
to_TO be_VB safe_JJ from_IN conflagrations_NNS ._. If_IN the_DT Meuse_NNP happens_VBZ to_TO be_VB frozen_VBN
hard_RB at_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, bonfires_NNS are_VBP lit_NN also_RB on_IN the_DT ice_NN ._. At_IN Grand_NNP Halleux_NNP
they_PRP set_VBD up_RP a_DT pole_NN called_VBN makral_NN ,_, or_CC "_`` the_DT witch_NN ,"_NN in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN
the_DT pile_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT fire_NN is_VBZ kindled_VBN by_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP was_VBD last_JJ married_VBN in_IN
the_DT village_NN ._. In_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Morlanwelz_NNP a_DT straw_NN man_NN is_VBZ burnt_VBG
in_IN the_DT fire_NN ._. Young_JJ people_NNS and_CC children_NNS dance_VBP and_CC sing_VBP round_RB the_DT
bonfires_NNS ,_, and_CC leap_VB over_IN the_DT embers_NNS to_TO secure_VB good_JJ crops_NNS or_CC a_DT happy_JJ
marriage_NN within_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, or_CC as_IN a_DT means_NN of_IN guarding_VBG themselves_PRP
against_IN colic_NN ._. In_IN Brabant_NNP on_IN the_DT same_JJ Sunday_NNP ,_, down_RB to_TO the_DT beginning_VBG
of_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, women_NNS and_CC men_NNS disguised_VBN in_IN female_NN attire_NN
used_VBN to_TO go_VB with_IN burning_VBG torches_NNS to_TO the_DT fields_NNS ,_, where_WRB they_PRP danced_VBD and_CC
sang_VBD comic_JJ songs_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, as_IN they_PRP alleged_VBD ,_, of_IN driving_VBG away_RB
"_`` the_DT wicked_JJ sower_NN ,"_NN who_WP is_VBZ mentioned_VBN in_IN the_DT Gospel_NNP for_IN the_DT day_NN ._. At_IN
P_NNP �_NNP turages_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT province_NN of_IN Hainaut_NNP ,_, down_RB to_TO about_IN 1840_CD the_DT custom_NN
was_VBD observed_VBN under_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Escouvion_NNP or_CC Scouvion_NNP ._. Every_DT year_NN
on_IN the_DT first_JJ Sunday_NNP of_IN Lent_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD called_VBN the_DT Day_NNP of_IN the_DT Little_NNP
Scouvion_NN ,_, young_JJ folks_NNS and_CC children_NNS used_VBD to_TO run_VB with_IN lighted_JJ torches_NNS
through_IN the_DT gardens_NNS and_CC orchards_NNS ._. As_IN they_PRP ran_VBD they_PRP cried_VBD at_IN the_DT
pitch_NN of_IN their_PRP$ voices_NNS :_:


"_`` Bear_NNP apples_NNS ,_, bear_NN pears_NNS ,_, and_CC cherries_NNS all_DT black_JJ
To_TO Scouvion_NNP !"_.


At_IN these_DT words_NNS the_DT torch-bearer_NN whirled_VBD his_PRP$ blazing_VBG brand_NN and_CC hurled_VBD
it_PRP among_IN the_DT branches_NNS of_IN the_DT apple-trees_NNS ,_, the_DT pear-trees_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT
cherry-trees_NNS ._. The_DT next_JJ Sunday_NNP was_VBD called_VBN the_DT Day_NNP of_IN the_DT Great_NNP

In_IN the_DT French_JJ department_NN of_IN the_DT Ardennes_NNP the_DT whole_JJ village_NN used_VBN to_TO

"_`` Brando_NNP ,_, brandounci_NNS tsaque_JJ brantso_NN ,_, in_IN plan_NN panei_NN !_. "_''


that_DT is_VBZ ,_, "_`` Firebrand_NNP burn_VBP ;_: every_DT branch_NN a_DT basketful_JJ !"_NN In_IN some_DT

The_DT custom_NN of_IN carrying_VBG lighted_VBN torches_NNS of_IN straw_NN (_-LRB- brandons_NNS )_-RRB- about_IN

In_IN Germany_NNP ,_, Austria_NNP ,_, and_CC Switzerland_NNP at_IN the_DT same_JJ season_NN similar_JJ

It_PRP seems_VBZ hardly_RB possible_JJ to_TO separate_VB from_IN these_DT bonfires_NNS ,_, kindled_VBD on_IN
the_DT first_JJ Sunday_NNP in_IN Lent_NNP ,_, the_DT fires_NNS in_IN which_WDT ,_, about_IN the_DT same_JJ season_NN ,_,
the_DT effigy_NN called_VBD Death_NNP is_VBZ burned_VBN as_IN part_NN of_IN the_DT ceremony_NN of_IN
"_`` carrying_VBG out_RP Death_NNP ."_NNP We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN at_IN Spachendorf_NNP ,_, in_IN Austrian_NNP

straw-man_NN ,_, dressed_VBN in_IN a_DT fur_NN coat_NN and_CC a_DT fur_NN cap_NN ,_, is_VBZ laid_VBN in_IN a_DT hole_NN
outside_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC there_RB burned_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN while_IN it_PRP is_VBZ blazing_VBG
every_DT one_CD seeks_VBZ to_TO snatch_VB a_DT fragment_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, which_WDT he_PRP fastens_VBZ to_TO a_DT
branch_NN of_IN the_DT highest_JJS tree_NN in_IN his_PRP$ garden_NN or_CC buries_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ field_NN ,_,
believing_VBG that_IN this_DT will_MD make_VB the_DT crops_NNS to_TO grow_VB better_RBR ._. The_DT ceremony_NN
is_VBZ known_VBN as_IN the_DT "_`` burying_NN of_IN Death_NNP ."_. Even_RB when_WRB the_DT straw-man_NN is_VBZ not_RB
designated_VBN as_IN Death_NNP ,_, the_DT meaning_NN of_IN the_DT observance_NN is_VBZ probably_RB the_DT
same_JJ ;_: for_IN the_DT name_NN Death_NNP ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP tried_VBN to_TO show_VB ,_, does_VBZ not_RB express_VB
the_DT original_JJ intention_NN of_IN the_DT ceremony_NN ._. At_IN Cobern_NNP in_IN the_DT Eifel_NNP
Mountains_NNPS the_DT lads_NNS make_VBP up_RP a_DT straw-man_NN on_IN Shrove_NNP Tuesday_NNP ._. The_DT effigy_NN
is_VBZ formally_RB tried_VBN and_CC accused_VBN of_IN having_VBG perpetrated_VBN all_PDT the_DT thefts_NNS
that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN committed_VBN in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Being_VBG condemned_VBN to_TO death_NN ,_, the_DT straw-man_NN is_VBZ led_VBN through_IN the_DT village_NN ,_,
shot_NN ,_, and_CC burned_VBN upon_IN a_DT pyre_NN ._. They_PRP dance_VBP round_IN the_DT blazing_VBG pile_NN ,_, and_CC
the_DT last_JJ bride_NN must_MD leap_VB over_IN it_PRP ._. In_IN Oldenburg_NNP on_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN
Shrove_NNP Tuesday_NNP people_NNS used_VBD to_TO make_VB long_JJ bundles_NNS of_IN straw_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP
set_VB on_IN fire_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB ran_VBD about_IN the_DT fields_NNS waving_VBG them_PRP ,_, shrieking_VBG ,_,
and_CC singing_VBG wild_JJ songs_NNS ._. Finally_RB they_PRP burned_VBD a_DT straw-man_NN on_IN the_DT
field_NN ._. In_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN D_NNP �_NNP sseldorf_VBD the_DT straw-man_JJ burned_VBN on_IN Shrove_NNP
Tuesday_NNP was_VBD made_VBN of_IN an_DT unthreshed_JJ sheaf_NN of_IN corn_NN ._. On_IN the_DT first_JJ Monday_NNP
after_IN the_DT spring_NN equinox_NN the_DT urchins_NNS of_IN Zurich_NNP drag_VBP a_DT straw-man_NN on_IN a_DT

carry_VB about_IN a_DT May-tree_NNP ._. When_WRB vespers_NNS ring_NN ,_, the_DT straw-man_NN is_VBZ burned_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Aachen_NNP on_IN Ash_NNP Wednesday_NNP ,_, a_DT man_NN used_VBN to_TO be_VB encased_VBN
in_IN peas-straw_NN and_CC taken_VBN to_TO an_DT appointed_JJ place_NN ._. Here_RB he_PRP slipped_VBD
quietly_RB out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ straw_NN casing_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD then_RB burned_VBN ,_, the_DT children_NNS
thinking_VBG that_IN it_PRP was_VBD the_DT man_NN who_WP was_VBD being_VBG burned_VBN ._. In_IN the_DT Val_NNP di_FW
Ledro_NNP (_-LRB- Tyrol_NN )_-RRB- on_IN the_DT last_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT Carnival_NNP a_DT figure_NN is_VBZ made_VBN up_IN of_IN
straw_NN and_CC brushwood_NN and_CC then_RB burned_VBN ._. The_DT figure_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Old_NNP
Woman_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT ceremony_NN "_`` burning_VBG the_DT Old_NNP Woman_NNP ."_.



3._DT The_DT Easter_NNP Fires_NNPS

ANOTHER_NNP occasion_NN on_IN which_WDT these_DT fire-festivals_NNS are_VBP held_VBN is_VBZ Easter_NNP
Eve_NNP ,_, the_DT Saturday_NNP before_IN Easter_NNP Sunday_NNP ._. On_IN that_DT day_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN
customary_JJ in_IN Catholic_NNP countries_NNS to_TO extinguish_VB all_DT the_DT lights_NNS in_IN the_DT
churches_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB to_TO make_VB a_DT new_JJ fire_NN ,_, sometimes_RB with_IN flint_NN and_CC
steel_NN ,_, sometimes_RB with_IN a_DT burning-glass_NN ._. At_IN this_DT fire_NN is_VBZ lit_VBN the_DT great_JJ
Paschal_NNP or_CC Easter_NNP candle_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ then_RB used_VBN to_TO rekindle_VB all_PDT the_DT
extinguished_JJ lights_NNS in_IN the_DT church_NN ._. In_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Germany_NNP a_DT
bonfire_NN is_VBZ also_RB kindled_VBN ,_, by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT new_JJ fire_NN ,_, on_IN some_DT open_JJ
space_NN near_IN the_DT church_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ consecrated_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS bring_VBP
sticks_NNS of_IN oak_NN ,_, walnut_NN ,_, and_CC beech_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP char_VBP in_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC
then_RB take_VB home_NN with_IN them_PRP ._. Some_DT of_IN these_DT charred_JJ sticks_NNS are_VBP thereupon_RB
burned_VBN at_IN home_NN in_IN a_DT newly-kindled_JJ fire_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT prayer_NN that_IN God_NNP will_MD
preserve_VB the_DT homestead_NN from_IN fire_NN ,_, lightning_NN ,_, and_CC hail_NN ._. Thus_RB every_DT
house_NN receives_VBZ "_`` new_JJ fire_NN ."_IN Some_DT of_IN the_DT sticks_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN throughout_IN
the_DT year_NN and_CC laid_VBD on_IN the_DT hearth-fire_NN during_IN heavy_JJ thunder-storms_NNS to_TO
prevent_VB the_DT house_NN from_IN being_VBG struck_VBN by_IN lightning_NN ,_, or_CC they_PRP are_VBP
inserted_VBN in_IN the_DT roof_NN with_IN the_DT like_JJ intention_NN ._. Others_NNS are_VBP placed_VBN in_IN
the_DT fields_NNS ,_, gardens_NNS ,_, and_CC meadows_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT prayer_NN that_IN God_NNP will_MD keep_VB
them_PRP from_IN blight_NN and_CC hail_NN ._. Such_JJ fields_NNS and_CC gardens_NNS are_VBP thought_VBN to_TO
thrive_VBP more_RBR than_IN others_NNS ;_: the_DT corn_NN and_CC the_DT plants_NNS that_WDT grow_VBP in_IN them_PRP
are_VBP not_RB beaten_VBN down_RP by_IN hail_NN ,_, nor_CC devoured_VBN by_IN mice_NNS ,_, vermin_RB ,_, and_CC
beetles_NNS ;_: no_DT witch_NN harms_VBZ them_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT ears_NNS of_IN corn_NN stand_NN close_RB and_CC
full_JJ ._. The_DT charred_JJ sticks_NNS are_VBP also_RB applied_VBN to_TO the_DT plough_NN ._. The_DT ashes_NNS
of_IN the_DT Easter_NNP bonfire_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN the_DT ashes_NNS of_IN the_DT consecrated_VBN
palm-branches_NNS ,_, are_VBP mixed_VBN with_IN the_DT seed_NN at_IN sowing_NN ._. A_DT wooden_JJ figure_NN
called_VBN Judas_NNP is_VBZ sometimes_RB burned_VBN in_IN the_DT consecrated_JJ bonfire_NN ,_, and_CC
even_RB where_WRB this_DT custom_NN has_VBZ been_VBN abolished_VBN the_DT bonfire_NN itself_PRP in_IN some_DT
places_NNS goes_VBZ by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN "_`` the_DT burning_NN of_IN Judas_NNP ."_.

The_DT essentially_RB pagan_JJ character_NN of_IN the_DT Easter_NNP fire_NN festival_NN appears_NNS
plainly_RB both_DT from_IN the_DT mode_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ celebrated_VBN by_IN the_DT peasants_NNS
and_CC from_IN the_DT superstitious_JJ beliefs_NNS which_WDT they_PRP associate_VBP with_IN it_PRP ._. All_PDT

east_RB ,_, through_IN Brunswick_NNP ,_, Hanover_NNP ,_, Oldenburg_NNP ,_, the_DT Harz_NNP district_NN ,_, and_CC
Hesse_NNP to_TO Westphalia_NNP the_DT Easter_NNP bonfires_NNS still_RB blaze_VBP simultaneously_RB
on_IN the_DT hill-tops_NNS ._. As_IN many_JJ as_IN forty_CD may_MD sometimes_RB be_VB counted_VBN within_IN
sight_NN at_IN once_RB ._. Long_JJ before_IN Easter_NNP the_DT young_JJ people_NNS have_VBP been_VBN busy_JJ
collecting_VBG firewood_NN ;_: every_DT farmer_NN contributes_VBZ ,_, and_CC tar-barrels_NNS ,_,
petroleum_NN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB go_VB to_TO swell_VB the_DT pile_NN ._. Neighbouring_''
villages_NNS vie_NN with_IN each_DT other_JJ as_IN to_TO which_WDT shall_MD send_VB up_RP the_DT greatest_JJS
blaze_NN ._. The_DT fires_NNS are_VBP always_RB kindled_VBN ,_, year_NN after_IN year_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT same_JJ
hill_NN ,_, which_WDT accordingly_RB often_RB takes_VBZ the_DT name_NN of_IN Easter_NNP Mountain_NNP ._. It_PRP
is_VBZ a_DT fine_JJ spectacle_NN to_TO watch_VB from_IN some_DT eminence_NN the_DT bonfires_NNS flaring_VBG
up_IN one_CD after_IN another_DT on_IN the_DT neighbouring_VBG heights_NNS ._. As_IN far_RB as_IN their_PRP$
light_JJ reaches_NNS ,_, so_RB far_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT belief_NN of_IN the_DT peasants_NNS ,_, the_DT fields_NNS
will_MD be_VB fruitful_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT houses_NNS on_IN which_WDT they_PRP shine_VBP will_MD be_VB safe_JJ
from_IN conflagration_NN or_CC sickness_NN ._. At_IN Volkmarsen_NNP and_CC other_JJ places_NNS in_IN

and_CC then_RB they_PRP sowed_VBD flax_JJ seed_NN in_IN that_DT direction_NN ,_, confident_JJ that_IN it_PRP
would_MD grow_VB well_RB ._. Brands_NNPS taken_VBN from_IN the_DT bonfires_NNS preserve_VBP houses_NNS from_IN
being_VBG struck_VBN by_IN lightning_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT ashes_NNS increase_VBP the_DT fertility_NN of_IN
the_DT fields_NNS ,_, protect_VBP them_PRP from_IN mice_NNS ,_, and_CC mixed_JJ with_IN the_DT
drinking-water_NN of_IN cattle_NNS make_VBP the_DT animals_NNS thrive_VBP and_CC ensure_VB them_PRP
against_IN plague_NN ._. As_IN the_DT flames_NNS die_VBP down_RP ,_, young_JJ and_CC old_JJ leap_NN over_IN
them_PRP ,_, and_CC cattle_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB driven_VBN through_IN the_DT smouldering_VBG
embers_NNS ._. In_IN some_DT places_NNS tar-barrels_NNS or_CC wheels_NNS wrapt_VBN in_IN straw_NN used_VBN to_TO
be_VB set_VBN on_IN fire_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB sent_VBD rolling_VBG down_IN the_DT hillside_NN ._. In_IN others_NNS
the_DT boys_NNS light_JJ torches_NNS and_CC wisps_NNS of_IN straw_NN at_IN the_DT bonfires_NNS and_CC rush_NN
about_IN brandishing_NN them_PRP in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ._.

In_IN M_NNP �_NNP nsterland_CC these_DT Easter_NNP fires_NNS are_VBP always_RB kindled_VBN upon_IN certain_JJ
definite_JJ hills_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP hence_RB known_VBN as_IN Easter_NNP or_CC Paschal_NNP
Mountains_NNPS ._. The_DT whole_JJ community_NN assembles_NNS about_IN the_DT fire_NN ._. The_DT young_JJ
men_NNS and_CC maidens_NNS ,_, singing_VBG Easter_NNP hymns_NNS ,_, march_NN round_RB and_CC round_RB the_DT
fire_NN ,_, till_IN the_DT blaze_NN dies_VBZ down_RP ._. Then_RB the_DT girls_NNS jump_VBP over_IN the_DT fire_NN in_IN
a_DT line_NN ,_, one_CD after_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, each_DT supported_VBN by_IN two_CD young_JJ men_NNS who_WP
hold_VB her_PRP$ hands_NNS and_CC run_VB beside_IN her_PRP ._. In_IN the_DT twilight_NN boys_NNS with_IN blazing_VBG
bundles_NNS of_IN straw_NN run_NN over_IN the_DT fields_NNS to_TO make_VB them_PRP fruitful_JJ ._. At_IN
Delmenhorst_NNP ,_, in_IN Oldenburg_NNP ,_, it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT custom_NN to_TO cut_VB down_RP two_CD
trees_NNS ,_, plant_NN them_PRP in_IN the_DT ground_NN side_NN by_IN side_NN ,_, and_CC pile_VB twelve_CD
tar-barrels_NNS against_IN each_DT ._. Brush-wood_NNP was_VBD then_RB heaped_VBN about_IN the_DT
trees_NNS ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN Easter_NNP Saturday_NNP the_DT boys_NNS ,_, after_IN rushing_VBG
about_IN with_IN blazing_VBG bean-poles_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, set_VBN fire_NN to_TO the_DT whole_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT ceremony_NN the_DT urchins_NNPS tried_VBD to_TO blacken_VB each_DT other_JJ
and_CC the_DT clothes_NNS of_IN grown-up_JJ people_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT Altmark_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN
that_IN as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT blaze_NN of_IN the_DT Easter_NNP bonfire_NN is_VBZ visible_JJ ,_, the_DT corn_NN
will_MD grow_VB well_RB throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT conflagration_NN will_MD break_VB
out_RB ._. At_IN Braunr_NNP �_NNP de_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Harz_NNP Mountains_NNPS ,_, it_PRP was_VBD the_DT custom_NN to_TO burn_VB
squirrels_NNS in_IN the_DT Easter_NNP bonfire_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Altmark_NNP ,_, bones_NNS were_VBD burned_VBN
in_IN it_PRP ._.

Near_IN Forchheim_NNP ,_, in_IN Upper_NNP Franken_NNP ,_, a_DT straw-man_JJ called_VBN the_DT Judas_NNP used_VBN
to_TO be_VB burned_VBN in_IN the_DT churchyards_NNS on_IN Easter_NNP Saturday_NNP ._. The_DT whole_NN
village_NN contributed_VBD wood_NN to_TO the_DT pyre_NN on_IN which_WDT he_PRP perished_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT
charred_JJ sticks_NNS were_VBD afterwards_RB kept_VBN and_CC planted_VBN in_IN the_DT fields_NNS on_IN
Walpurgis_NNP Day_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT first_JJ of_IN May_NNP )_-RRB- to_TO preserve_VB the_DT wheat_NN from_IN blight_NN
and_CC mildew_NN ._. About_IN a_DT hundred_CD years_NNS ago_RB or_CC more_RBR the_DT custom_NN at_IN
Althenneberg_NNP ,_, in_IN Upper_NNP Bavaria_NNP ,_, used_VBN to_TO be_VB as_IN follows_VBZ ._. On_IN the_DT
afternoon_NN of_IN Easter_NNP Saturday_NNP the_DT lads_NNS collected_VBD wood_NN ,_, which_WDT they_PRP
piled_VBN in_IN a_DT cornfield_NN ,_, while_IN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT pile_NN they_PRP set_VBD up_RP a_DT
tall_JJ wooden_JJ cross_NN all_DT swathed_VBN in_IN straw_NN ._. After_IN the_DT evening_NN service_NN
they_PRP lighted_VBD their_PRP$ lanterns_NNS at_IN the_DT consecrated_JJ candle_NN in_IN the_DT church_NN ,_,
and_CC ran_VBD with_IN them_PRP at_IN full_JJ speed_NN to_TO the_DT pyre_NN ,_, each_DT striving_VBG to_TO get_VB
there_RB first_RB ._. The_DT first_JJ to_TO arrive_VB set_VBN fire_NN to_TO the_DT heap_NN ._. No_DT woman_NN or_CC
girl_NN might_MD come_VB near_IN the_DT bonfire_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO watch_VB it_PRP
from_IN a_DT distance_NN ._. As_IN the_DT flames_NNS rose_VBD the_DT men_NNS and_CC lads_NNS rejoiced_VBD and_CC
made_VBN merry_NN ,_, shouting_VBG ,_, "_`` We_PRP are_VBP burning_VBG the_DT Judas_NNP !"_NNP The_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD
been_VBN the_DT first_JJ to_TO reach_VB the_DT pyre_NN and_CC to_TO kindle_VB it_PRP was_VBD rewarded_VBN on_IN

"_`` burning_VBG the_DT Easter_NNP Man_NNP ."_NNP On_IN a_DT height_NN about_IN a_DT mile_NN from_IN the_DT village_NN
the_DT young_JJ fellows_NNS set_VBN up_RP a_DT tall_JJ cross_NN enveloped_VBN in_IN straw_NN ,_, so_RB that_IN it_PRP

Man_NN ._. No_DT lad_NN under_IN eighteen_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN might_MD take_VB part_NN in_IN the_DT
ceremony_NN ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT young_JJ men_NNS stationed_VBN himself_PRP beside_IN the_DT Easter_NNP
Man_NN ,_, holding_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN a_DT consecrated_JJ taper_NN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD brought_VBN

great_JJ circle_NN round_RB the_DT cross_NN ._. At_IN a_DT given_VBN signal_NN they_PRP raced_VBD thrice_NN
round_RB the_DT circle_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB at_IN a_DT second_JJ signal_NN ran_VBD straight_RB at_IN the_DT
cross_NN and_CC at_IN the_DT lad_NN with_IN the_DT lighted_JJ taper_NN beside_IN it_PRP ;_: the_DT one_NN who_WP
reached_VBD the_DT goal_NN first_RB had_VBD the_DT right_NN of_IN setting_VBG fire_NN to_TO the_DT Easter_NNP
Man_NN ._. Great_NNP was_VBD the_DT jubilation_NN while_IN he_PRP was_VBD burning_VBG ._. When_WRB he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN
consumed_VBN in_IN the_DT flames_NNS ,_, three_CD lads_NNS were_VBD chosen_VBN from_IN among_IN the_DT rest_NN ,_,
and_CC each_DT of_IN the_DT three_CD drew_VBD a_DT circle_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN with_IN a_DT stick_NN
thrice_NN round_VBP the_DT ashes_NNS ._. Then_RB they_PRP all_DT left_VBD the_DT spot_NN ._. On_IN Easter_NNP
Monday_NNP the_DT villagers_NNS gathered_VBD the_DT ashes_NNS and_CC strewed_VBD them_PRP on_IN their_PRP$
fields_NNS ;_: also_RB they_PRP planted_VBD in_IN the_DT fields_NNS palmbranches_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN

hallowed_VBD on_IN Good_JJ Friday_NNP ,_, all_DT for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN protecting_VBG their_PRP$
fields_NNS against_IN showers_NNS of_IN hail_NN ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Swabia_NNP the_DT Easter_NNP
fires_NNS might_MD not_RB be_VB kindled_VBN with_IN iron_NN or_CC steel_NN or_CC flint_NN ,_, but_CC only_RB by_IN
the_DT friction_NN of_IN wood_NN ._.

The_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT Easter_NNP fires_NNS appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB prevailed_VBN all_DT over_IN
Central_NNP and_CC Western_NNP Germany_NNP from_IN north_RB to_TO south_RB ._. We_PRP find_VBP it_PRP also_RB in_IN
Holland_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT fires_NNS were_VBD kindled_VBN on_IN the_DT highest_JJS eminences_NNS ,_, and_CC
the_DT people_NNS danced_VBD round_JJ them_PRP and_CC leaped_VBD through_IN the_DT flames_NNS or_CC over_IN
the_DT glowing_VBG embers_NNS ._. Here_RB too_RB ,_, as_RB often_RB in_IN Germany_NNP ,_, the_DT materials_NNS for_IN
the_DT bonfire_NN were_VBD collected_VBN by_IN the_DT young_JJ folk_NN from_IN door_NN to_TO door_NN ._. In_IN
many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Sweden_NNP firearms_NNS are_VBP discharged_VBN in_IN all_DT directions_NNS on_IN
Easter_NNP Eve_NNP ,_, and_CC huge_JJ bonfires_NNS are_VBP lighted_VBN on_IN hills_NNS and_CC eminences_NNS ._.
Some_DT people_NNS think_VBP that_IN the_DT intention_NN is_VBZ to_TO keep_VB off_RP the_DT Troll_NNP and_CC
other_JJ evil_JJ spirits_NNS who_WP are_VBP especially_RB active_JJ at_IN this_DT season_NN ._.



4._CD The_DT Beltane_NN Fires_NNS

IN_IN THE_DT CENTRAL_NNP Highlands_NNP of_IN Scotland_NNP bonfires_NNS ,_, known_VBN as_IN the_DT Beltane_NN
fires_NNS ,_, were_VBD formerly_RB kindled_VBN with_IN great_JJ ceremony_NN on_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN
May_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT traces_NNS of_IN human_JJ sacrifices_NNS at_IN them_PRP were_VBD particularly_RB
clear_JJ and_CC unequivocal_JJ ._. The_DT custom_NN of_IN lighting_VBG the_DT bonfires_NNS lasted_VBD in_IN
various_JJ places_NNS far_RB into_IN the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT descriptions_NNS
of_IN the_DT ceremony_NN by_IN writers_NNS of_IN that_DT period_NN present_VB such_JJ a_DT curious_JJ and_CC
interesting_JJ picture_NN of_IN ancient_JJ heathendom_NN surviving_VBG in_IN our_PRP$ own_JJ
country_NN that_IN I_PRP will_MD reproduce_VB them_PRP in_IN the_DT words_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ authors_NNS ._.
The_DT fullest_JJS of_IN the_DT descriptions_NNS is_VBZ the_DT one_CD bequeathed_VBN to_TO us_PRP by_IN John_NNP
Ramsay_NNP ,_, laird_NN of_IN Ochtertyre_NNP ,_, near_IN Crieff_NNP ,_, the_DT patron_NN of_IN Burns_NNP and_CC
the_DT friend_NN of_IN Sir_NNP Walter_NNP Scott_NNP ._. He_PRP says_VBZ :_: "_`` But_CC the_DT most_RBS considerable_JJ
of_IN the_DT Druidical_NNP festivals_NNS is_VBZ that_IN of_IN Beltane_NN ,_, or_CC May-day_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD
lately_RB observed_VBD in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Highlands_NNP with_IN extraordinary_JJ
ceremonies_NNS ._. ._. ._. ._. Like_IN the_DT other_JJ public_JJ worship_NN of_IN the_DT Druids_NNP ,_, the_DT
Beltane_NN feast_NN seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN performed_VBN on_IN hills_NNS or_CC eminences_NNS ._.
They_PRP thought_VBD it_PRP degrading_VBG to_TO him_PRP whose_WP$ temple_NN is_VBZ the_DT universe_NN ,_, to_TO
suppose_VB that_IN he_PRP would_MD dwell_VB in_IN any_DT house_NN made_VBN with_IN hands_NNS ._. Their_PRP$
sacrifices_NNS were_VBD therefore_RB offered_VBN in_IN the_DT open_JJ air_NN ,_, frequently_RB upon_IN
the_DT tops_NNS of_IN hills_NNS ,_, where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD presented_VBN with_IN the_DT grandest_NN views_NNS
of_IN nature_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD nearest_JJS the_DT seat_NN of_IN warmth_NN and_CC order_NN ._. And_CC ,_,
according_VBG to_TO tradition_NN ,_, such_JJ was_VBD the_DT manner_NN of_IN celebrating_VBG this_DT
festival_NN in_IN the_DT Highlands_NNP within_IN the_DT last_JJ hundred_CD years_NNS ._. But_CC since_IN
the_DT decline_NN of_IN superstition_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN celebrated_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN
each_DT hamlet_NN on_IN some_DT hill_NN or_CC rising_VBG ground_NN around_IN which_WDT their_PRP$ cattle_NNS
were_VBD pasturing_VBG ._. Thither_'' the_DT young_JJ folks_NNS repaired_VBN in_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_, and_CC
cut_VB a_DT trench_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT summit_NN of_IN which_WDT a_DT seat_NN of_IN turf_NN was_VBD formed_VBN for_IN
the_DT company_NN ._. And_CC in_IN the_DT middle_NN a_DT pile_NN of_IN wood_NN or_CC other_JJ fuel_NN was_VBD
placed_VBN ,_, which_WDT of_IN old_JJ they_PRP kindled_VBD with_IN tein-eigin_NN --_: i_FW ._. e_NN .,_.
forced-fire_NN or_CC need-fire_NN ._. Although_IN ,_, for_IN many_JJ years_NNS past_JJ ,_, they_PRP have_VBP
been_VBN contented_VBN with_IN common_JJ fire_NN ,_, yet_RB we_PRP shall_MD now_RB describe_VB the_DT
process_NN ,_, because_IN it_PRP will_MD hereafter_RB appear_VB that_IN recourse_NN is_VBZ still_RB had_VBN
to_TO the_DT tein-eigin_NN upon_IN extraordinary_JJ emergencies_NNS ._.

"_`` The_DT night_NN before_RB ,_, all_PDT the_DT fires_NNS in_IN the_DT country_NN were_VBD carefully_RB
extinguished_JJ ,_, and_CC next_JJ morning_NN the_DT materials_NNS for_IN exciting_JJ this_DT
sacred_JJ fire_NN were_VBD prepared_VBN ._. The_DT most_RBS primitive_JJ method_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB
that_IN which_WDT was_VBD used_VBN in_IN the_DT islands_NNS of_IN Skye_NNP ,_, Mull_NNP ,_, and_CC Tiree_NNP ._. A_DT
well-seasoned_JJ plank_NN of_IN oak_NN was_VBD procured_VBN ,_, in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN which_WDT a_DT
hole_NN was_VBD bored_VBN ._. A_DT wimble_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ timber_NN was_VBD then_RB applied_VBN ,_, the_DT
end_NN of_IN which_WDT they_PRP fitted_VBD to_TO the_DT hole_NN ._. But_CC in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT
mainland_NN the_DT machinery_NN was_VBD different_JJ ._. They_PRP used_VBD a_DT frame_NN of_IN green_JJ

some_DT places_NNS three_CD times_NNS three_CD persons_NNS ,_, in_IN others_NNS three_CD times_NNS nine_CD ,_,
were_VBD required_VBN for_IN turning_VBG round_NN by_IN turns_VBZ the_DT axle-tree_NN or_CC wimble_NN ._. If_IN
any_DT of_IN them_PRP had_VBD been_VBN guilty_JJ of_IN murder_NN ,_, adultery_NN ,_, theft_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ
atrocious_JJ crime_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD imagined_VBN either_CC that_IN the_DT fire_NN would_MD not_RB
kindle_NN ,_, or_CC that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB devoid_JJ of_IN its_PRP$ usual_JJ virtue_NN ._. So_RB soon_RB as_IN
any_DT sparks_NNS were_VBD emitted_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT violent_JJ friction_NN ,_, they_PRP
applied_VBD a_DT species_NN of_IN agaric_NN which_WDT grows_VBZ on_IN old_JJ birch-trees_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ
very_RB combustible_JJ ._. This_DT fire_NN had_VBD the_DT appearance_NN of_IN being_VBG immediately_RB
derived_VBN from_IN heaven_NN ,_, and_CC manifold_NN were_VBD the_DT virtues_NNS ascribed_VBN to_TO it_PRP ._.
They_PRP esteemed_VBD it_PRP a_DT preservative_NN against_IN witch-craft_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT sovereign_NN

cattle_NNS ;_: and_CC by_IN it_PRP the_DT strongest_JJS poisons_NNS were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB their_PRP$
nature_NN changed_VBD ._.

"_`` After_IN kindling_VBG the_DT bonfire_NN with_IN the_DT tein-eigin_NN the_DT company_NN

particular_JJ piece_NN which_WDT whoever_WP got_VBD was_VBD called_VBN cailleach_NN
beal-tine_JJ --_: i_FW ._. e_NN .,_VBD the_DT Beltane_NN carline_NN ,_, a_DT term_NN of_IN great_JJ reproach_NN ._.

affected_VBN to_TO speak_VB of_IN the_DT cailleach_NN beal-tine_JJ as_IN dead_JJ ."_NN

In_IN the_DT parish_NN of_IN Callander_NNP ,_, a_DT beautiful_JJ district_NN of_IN Western_JJ

the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN ._. It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN described_VBN as_RB follows_VBZ by_IN the_DT
parish_JJ minister_NN of_IN the_DT time_NN :_: "_`` Upon_IN the_DT first_JJ day_NN of_IN May_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ
called_VBN Beltan_NNP ,_, or_CC Baltein_NNP day_NN ,_, all_RB the_DT boys_NNS in_IN a_DT township_NN or_CC

round_JJ figure_NN ,_, by_IN casting_VBG a_DT trench_NN in_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, of_IN such_JJ
circumference_NN as_IN to_TO hold_VB the_DT whole_JJ company_NN ._. They_PRP kindle_VBP a_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC

many_JJ portions_NNS ,_, as_RB similar_JJ as_IN possible_JJ to_TO one_CD another_DT in_IN size_NN and_CC
shape_NN ,_, as_IN there_EX are_VBP persons_NNS in_IN the_DT company_NN ._. They_PRP daub_VBD one_CD of_IN these_DT
portions_NNS all_DT over_IN with_IN charcoal_NN ,_, until_IN it_PRP be_VB perfectly_RB black_JJ ._. They_PRP
put_VBN all_PDT the_DT bits_NNS of_IN the_DT cake_NN into_IN a_DT bonnet_NN ._. Every_DT one_CD ,_, blindfold_RB ,_,
draws_VBZ out_IN a_DT portion_NN ._. He_PRP who_WP holds_VBZ the_DT bonnet_NN ,_, is_VBZ entitled_VBN to_TO the_DT
last_JJ bit_NN ._. Whoever_WP draws_VBZ the_DT black_JJ bit_NN ,_, is_VBZ the_DT devoted_JJ person_NN who_WP
is_VBZ to_TO be_VB sacrificed_VBN to_TO Baal_JJ ,_, whose_WP$ favour_NN they_PRP mean_VBP to_TO implore_VB ,_, in_IN

pass_NN from_IN the_DT act_NN of_IN sacrificing_VBG ,_, and_CC only_RB compel_VB the_DT devoted_VBN
person_NN to_TO leap_VB three_CD times_NNS through_IN the_DT flames_NNS ;_: with_IN which_WDT the_DT
ceremonies_NNS of_IN this_DT festival_NN are_VBP closed_VBN ."_.

Thomas_NNP Pennant_NNP ,_, who_WP travelled_VBD in_IN Perthshire_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 1769,_CD tells_VBZ
us_PRP that_IN "_`` on_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN May_NNP ,_, the_DT herdsmen_NNS of_IN every_DT village_NN hold_NN
their_PRP$ Bel-tien_NNP ,_, a_DT rural_JJ sacrifice_NN ._. They_PRP cut_VBD a_DT square_JJ trench_NN on_IN the_DT
ground_NN ,_, leaving_VBG the_DT turf_NN in_IN the_DT middle_NN ;_: on_IN that_IN they_PRP make_VBP a_DT fire_NN of_IN
wood_NN ,_, on_IN which_WDT they_PRP dress_VBP a_DT large_JJ caudle_NN of_IN eggs_NNS ,_, butter_NN ,_, oatmeal_NN
and_CC milk_NN ;_: and_CC bring_VB besides_IN the_DT ingredients_NNS of_IN the_DT caudle_NN ,_, plenty_NN of_IN
beer_NN and_CC whisky_NN ;_: for_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT company_NN must_MD contribute_VB something_NN ._.
The_DT rites_NNS begin_VBP with_IN spilling_VBG some_DT of_IN the_DT caudle_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, by_IN
way_NN of_IN libation_NN :_: on_IN that_IN every_DT one_CD takes_VBZ a_DT cake_NN of_IN oatmeal_NN ,_, upon_IN
which_WDT are_VBP raised_VBN nine_CD square_JJ knobs_NNS ,_, each_DT dedicated_VBN to_TO some_DT
particular_JJ being_NN ,_, the_DT supposed_VBN preserver_NN of_IN their_PRP$ flocks_NNS and_CC herds_NNS ,_,
or_CC to_TO some_DT particular_JJ animal_NN ,_, the_DT real_JJ destroyer_NN of_IN them_PRP :_: each_DT
person_NN then_RB turns_VBZ his_PRP$ face_NN to_TO the_DT fire_NN ,_, breaks_VBZ off_RP a_DT knob_NN ,_, and_CC
flinging_VBG it_PRP over_IN his_PRP$ shoulders_NNS ,_, says_VBZ ,_, '_'' This_DT I_PRP give_VBP to_TO thee_PRP ,_, preserve_VB
thou_IN my_PRP$ horses_NNS ;_: this_DT to_TO thee_PRP ,_, preserve_VBP thou_IN my_PRP$ sheep_NN ;_: and_CC so_RB on_IN .'_NNS
After_IN that_DT ,_, they_PRP use_VBP the_DT same_JJ ceremony_NN to_TO the_DT noxious_JJ animals_NNS :_: '_'' This_DT
I_PRP give_VBP to_TO thee_PRP ,_, O_UH fox_NN !_. spare_VB thou_IN my_PRP$ lambs_NNS ;_: this_DT to_TO thee_PRP ,_, O_UH hooded_VBN
crow_NN !_. this_DT to_TO thee_PRP ,_, O_UH eagle_JJ !'_NNP When_WRB the_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ over_RB ,_, they_PRP dine_VBP
on_IN the_DT caudle_NN ;_: and_CC after_IN the_DT feast_NN is_VBZ finished_VBN ,_, what_WP is_VBZ left_VBN is_VBZ hid_VBN

reassemble_NN ,_, and_CC finish_VB the_DT reliques_NNS of_IN the_DT first_JJ entertainment_NN ."_.

Another_DT writer_NN of_IN the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN has_VBZ described_VBN the_DT Beltane_NN
festival_NN as_IN it_PRP was_VBD held_VBN in_IN the_DT parish_NN of_IN Logierait_NN in_IN Perthshire_NNP ._. He_PRP

annually_RB held_VBD here_RB ._. It_PRP is_VBZ chiefly_RB celebrated_VBN by_IN the_DT cow-herds_NNS ,_, who_WP

custom_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB prevailed_VBN at_IN or_CC near_IN Kingussie_NNP in_IN
Inverness-shire_NNP ._.

In_IN the_DT north-east_JJ of_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT Beltane_NN fires_NNS were_VBD still_RB kindled_VBN

as_IN they_PRP could_MD ._. Meantime_RB the_DT young_JJ people_NNS danced_VBD round_RB the_DT fire_NN or_CC

fire_NN !_. fire_NN !_. burn_VBP the_DT witches_NNS ."_VBP In_IN some_DT districts_NNS a_DT large_JJ round_JJ cake_NN
of_IN oat_NN or_CC barley_NN meal_NN was_VBD rolled_VBN through_IN the_DT ashes_NNS ._. When_WRB all_PDT the_DT

In_IN the_DT Hebrides_JJ "_`` the_DT Beltane_NN bannock_NN is_VBZ smaller_JJR than_IN that_WDT made_VBD at_IN

it_PRP sunwards_VBZ (_-LRB- dessil_NN ),_NN to_TO keep_VB off_RP murrain_RB all_PDT the_DT year_NN ._. Each_DT man_NN
would_MD take_VB home_NN fire_NN wherewith_IN to_TO kindle_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ ."_NN

In_IN Wales_NNP also_RB the_DT custom_NN of_IN lighting_VBG Beltane_NN fires_NNS at_IN the_DT beginning_VBG
of_IN May_NNP used_VBD to_TO be_VB observed_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT day_NN on_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD kindled_VBN
varied_VBN from_IN the_DT eve_NN of_IN May_NNP Day_NNP to_TO the_DT third_JJ of_IN May_NNP ._. The_DT flame_NN was_VBD
sometimes_RB elicited_VBN by_IN the_DT friction_NN of_IN two_CD pieces_NNS of_IN oak_NN ,_, as_IN appears_NNS
from_IN the_DT following_JJ description_NN ._. "_'' The_DT fire_NN was_VBD done_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN ._. Nine_CD
men_NNS would_MD turn_VB their_PRP$ pockets_NNS inside_IN out_RB ,_, and_CC see_VB that_IN every_DT piece_NN of_IN
money_NN and_CC all_DT metals_NNS were_VBD off_IN their_PRP$ persons_NNS ._. Then_RB the_DT men_NNS went_VBD into_IN
the_DT nearest_JJS woods_NNS ,_, and_CC collected_VBD sticks_NNS of_IN nine_CD different_JJ kinds_NNS of_IN
trees_NNS ._. These_DT were_VBD carried_VBN to_TO the_DT spot_NN where_WRB the_DT fire_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB
built_VBN ._. There_EX a_DT circle_NN was_VBD cut_VBN in_IN the_DT sod_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT sticks_NNS were_VBD set_VBN
crosswise_NN ._. All_DT around_IN the_DT circle_NN the_DT people_NNS stood_VBD and_CC watched_VBD the_DT
proceedings_NNS ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT men_NNS would_MD then_RB take_VB two_CD bits_NNS of_IN oak_NN ,_, and_CC rub_NN
them_PRP together_RB until_IN a_DT flame_NN was_VBD kindled_VBN ._. This_DT was_VBD applied_VBN to_TO the_DT
sticks_NNS ,_, and_CC soon_RB a_DT large_JJ fire_NN was_VBD made_VBN ._. Sometimes_RB two_CD fires_NNS were_VBD set_VBN
up_IN side_NN by_IN side_NN ._. These_DT fires_NNS ,_, whether_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD ,_, were_VBD called_VBN
coelcerth_NN or_CC bonfire_NN ._. Round_DT cakes_NNS of_IN oatmeal_NN and_CC brown_JJ meal_NN were_VBD
split_NN in_IN four_CD ,_, and_CC placed_VBD in_IN a_DT small_JJ flour-bag_NN ,_, and_CC everybody_NN
present_NN had_VBD to_TO pick_VB out_RP a_DT portion_NN ._. The_DT last_JJ bit_NN in_IN the_DT bag_NN fell_VBD to_TO
the_DT lot_NN of_IN the_DT bag-holder_NN ._. Each_DT person_NN who_WP chanced_VBD to_TO pick_VB up_RP a_DT
piece_NN of_IN brown-meal_JJ cake_NN was_VBD compelled_VBN to_TO leap_VB three_CD times_NNS over_IN the_DT
flames_NNS ,_, or_CC to_TO run_VB thrice_NN between_IN the_DT two_CD fires_NNS ,_, by_IN which_WDT means_VBZ the_DT
people_NNS thought_VBD they_PRP were_VBD sure_JJ of_IN a_DT plentiful_JJ harvest_NN ._. Shouts_NNS and_CC
screams_NNS of_IN those_DT who_WP had_VBD to_TO face_VB the_DT ordeal_NN could_MD be_VB heard_VBN ever_RB so_RB
far_RB ,_, and_CC those_DT who_WP chanced_VBD to_TO pick_VB the_DT oatmeal_NN portions_NNS sang_VBD and_CC
danced_VBD and_CC clapped_VBD their_PRP$ hands_NNS in_IN approval_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT holders_NNS of_IN the_DT
brown_JJ bits_NNS leaped_VBD three_CD times_NNS over_IN the_DT flames_NNS ,_, or_CC ran_VBD three_CD times_NNS
between_IN the_DT two_CD fires_NNS ."_.

The_DT belief_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS that_IN by_IN leaping_VBG thrice_NN over_IN the_DT bonfires_NNS or_CC
running_VBG thrice_NN between_IN them_PRP they_PRP ensured_VBD a_DT plentiful_JJ harvest_NN is_VBZ
worthy_JJ of_IN note_NN ._. The_DT mode_NN in_IN which_WDT this_DT result_NN was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB

Cormac_NNP ,_, "_'' or_CC somebody_NN in_IN his_PRP$ name_NN ,_, says_VBZ that_IN belltaine_NN ,_, May-day_NNP ,_,

between_IN them_PRP ,_, as_IN a_DT safeguard_NN against_IN the_DT diseases_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ."_IN The_DT

The_DT first_JJ of_IN May_NNP is_VBZ a_DT great_JJ popular_JJ festival_NN in_IN the_DT more_JJR midland_NN and_CC

all_PDT the_DT hills_NNS and_CC knolls_NNS ._. Every_DT large_JJ hamlet_NN has_VBZ its_PRP$ own_JJ fire_NN ,_, round_RB
which_WDT the_DT young_JJ people_NNS dance_VBP in_IN a_DT ring_NN ._. The_DT old_JJ folk_NN notice_NN whether_IN

the_DT spring_NN will_MD be_VB cold_JJ and_CC backward_JJ ;_: in_IN the_DT latter_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB mild_JJ

5._DT The_DT Midsummer_NNP Fires_NNPS

BUT_NNP THE_DT SEASON_NNP at_IN which_WDT these_DT firefestivals_NNS have_VBP been_VBN most_JJS generally_RB
held_VBN all_DT over_IN Europe_NNP is_VBZ the_DT summer_NN solstice_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ Midsummer_NNP Eve_NNP
(_-LRB- the_DT twenty-third_JJ of_IN June_NNP )_-RRB- or_CC Midsummer_NNP day_NN (_-LRB- the_DT twenty-fourth_JJ of_IN
June_NNP )._VBD A_DT faint_JJ tinge_NN of_IN Christianity_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN to_TO them_PRP by_IN
naming_VBG Midsummer_NNP Day_NNP after_IN St_NNP ._. John_NNP the_DT Baptist_NNP ,_, but_CC we_PRP cannot_VBD doubt_NN
that_IN the_DT celebration_NN dates_NNS from_IN a_DT time_NN long_RB before_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN
our_PRP$ era_NN ._. The_DT summer_NN solstice_NN ,_, or_CC Midsummer_NNP Day_NNP ,_, is_VBZ the_DT great_JJ
turning-point_NN in_IN the_DT sun_NN '_POS s_PRP career_NN ,_, when_WRB ,_, after_IN climbing_VBG higher_JJR and_CC
higher_JJR day_NN by_IN day_NN in_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, the_DT luminary_JJ stops_NNS and_CC thenceforth_RB
retraces_VBG his_PRP$ steps_NNS down_IN the_DT heavenly_JJ road_NN ._. Such_PDT a_DT moment_NN could_MD not_RB
but_CC be_VB regarded_VBN with_IN anxiety_NN by_IN primitive_JJ man_NN so_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP began_VBD to_TO
observe_VB and_CC ponder_VB the_DT courses_NNS of_IN the_DT great_JJ lights_NNS across_IN the_DT

he_PRP could_MD help_VB the_DT sun_NN in_IN his_PRP$ seeming_JJ decline_NN --_: could_MD prop_VB his_PRP$ failing_VBG
steps_NNS and_CC rekindle_VB the_DT sinking_NN flame_NN of_IN the_DT red_JJ lamp_NN in_IN his_PRP$ feeble_JJ
hand_NN ._. In_IN some_DT such_JJ thoughts_NNS as_IN these_DT the_DT midsummer_NN festivals_NNS of_IN our_PRP$

mediaeval_JJ writer_NN ,_, the_DT three_CD great_JJ features_NNS of_IN the_DT midsummer_NN

thenceforward_JJ to_TO descend_VB ._.

The_DT main_JJ features_NNS of_IN the_DT midsummer_NN fire-festival_NN resemble_VBP those_DT
which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP found_VBN to_TO characterise_VB the_DT vernal_JJ festivals_NNS of_IN fire_NN ._.
The_DT similarity_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD sets_NNS of_IN ceremonies_NNS will_MD plainly_RB appear_VB
from_IN the_DT following_VBG examples_NNS ._.

A_DT writer_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ century_NN informs_NNS us_PRP that_IN
in_IN almost_RB every_DT village_NN and_CC town_NN of_IN Germany_NNP public_JJ bonfires_NNS were_VBD

in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, believing_VBG that_IN this_DT would_MD preserve_VB their_PRP$ eyes_NNS in_IN a_DT

depart_NN and_CC be_VB burnt_VBN up_RP with_IN these_DT ."_JJ At_IN Lower_NNP Konz_NNP ,_, a_DT village_NN

in_IN its_PRP$ descent_NN ._. The_DT mayor_NN of_IN the_DT neighbouring_NN town_NN of_IN Sierck_NNP ,_, who_WP

and_CC took_VBD care_NN to_TO keep_VB it_PRP alight_RB so_RB long_JJ as_IN the_DT wheel_NN was_VBD trundling_VBG

Down_IN at_IN least_JJS to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN the_DT midsummer_NN

Similarly_RB in_IN Swabia_NNP ,_, lads_NNS and_CC lasses_NNS ,_, hand_NN in_IN hand_NN ,_, leap_VB over_IN the_DT

high_JJ !"_NN At_IN Rottenburg_NNP a_DT rude_JJ effigy_NN in_IN human_JJ form_NN ,_, called_VBD the_DT

So_RB in_IN Baden_NNP the_DT children_NNS collected_VBD fuel_NN from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN for_IN the_DT
midsummer_NN bonfire_NN on_IN St_NNP ._. John_NNP '_POS s_PRP Day_NNP ;_: and_CC lads_NNS and_CC lasses_NNS leaped_VBD over_RB

backache_NN at_IN reaping_NN ._. Sometimes_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT young_JJ folk_NN sprang_VBD over_IN the_DT
flames_NNS ,_, they_PRP cried_VBD ,_, "_`` Grow_NNP ,_, that_IN the_DT hemp_NN may_MD be_VB three_CD ells_NNS high_JJ !"_.
This_DT notion_NN that_IN the_DT hemp_NN or_CC the_DT corn_NN would_MD grow_VB as_RB high_JJ as_IN the_DT
flames_NNS blazed_VBD or_CC as_IN the_DT people_NNS jumped_VBD over_IN them_PRP ,_, seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN

abundant_JJ harvest_NN ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, if_IN a_DT man_NN contributed_VBN
nothing_NN to_TO the_DT bonfire_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD imagined_VBN that_IN there_EX would_MD be_VB no_RB
blessing_NN on_IN his_PRP$ crops_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN his_PRP$ hemp_NN in_IN particular_NN would_MD never_RB
grow_VB ._. At_IN Edersleben_NNP ,_, near_IN Sangerhausen_NNP ,_, a_DT high_JJ pole_NN was_VBD planted_VBN in_IN
the_DT ground_NN and_CC a_DT tarbarrel_NN was_VBD hung_VBN from_IN it_PRP by_IN a_DT chain_NN which_WDT reached_VBD
to_TO the_DT ground_NN ._. The_DT barrel_NN was_VBD then_RB set_VB on_IN fire_NN and_CC swung_VBD round_RB the_DT
pole_NN amid_IN shouts_NNS of_IN joy_NN ._.

In_IN Denmark_NNP and_CC Norway_NNP also_RB midsummer_JJ fires_NNS were_VBD kindled_VBN on_IN St_NNP ._.

St_NNP ._. John_NNP '_POS s_PRP Eve_NNP is_VBZ a_DT festival_NN of_IN water_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN of_IN fire_NN ;_: for_IN

In_IN Austria_NNP the_DT midsummer_NN customs_NNS and_CC superstitions_NNS resemble_VBP those_DT of_IN

At_IN Gratz_NNP on_IN St_NNP ._. John_NNP '_POS s_PRP Eve_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT twenty-third_JJ of_IN June_NNP )_-RRB- the_DT common_JJ

All_DT over_IN Bohemia_NNP bonfires_NNS still_RB burn_VBP on_IN Midsummer_NNP Eve_NNP ._. In_IN the_DT

Sometimes_RB an_DT old_JJ cart-wheel_NN is_VBZ smeared_VBN with_IN resin_NN ,_, ignited_VBN ,_, and_CC sent_VBN

In_IN Slavonic_NNP countries_NNS ,_, also_RB ,_, the_DT midsummer_NN festival_NN is_VBZ celebrated_VBN

John_NNP '_POS s_PRP Night_NNP ._. Again_RB ,_, in_IN some_DT districts_NNS of_IN Russia_NNP the_DT young_JJ folk_NN wear_NN

In_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Prussia_NNP and_CC Lithuania_NNP great_JJ fires_NNS are_VBP kindled_VBN on_IN
Midsummer_NNP Eve_NNP ._. All_PDT the_DT heights_NNS are_VBP ablaze_RB with_IN them_PRP ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT

lit_VBD the_DT bonfire_NN going_VBG from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN and_CC receiving_VBG jugfuls_NNS of_IN

is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT preservative_NN against_IN witchcraft_NN ._. In_IN Masuren_NNP ,_, a_DT

family_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT custom_NN on_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN Midsummer_NNP Day_NNP to_TO put_VB out_RB
all_PDT the_DT fires_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN ._. Then_RB an_DT oaken_JJ stake_NN is_VBZ driven_VBN into_IN the_DT

villagers_NNS ,_, working_VBG by_IN relays_NNS ,_, cause_NN to_TO revolve_VB with_IN great_JJ rapidity_NN
till_IN fire_NN is_VBZ produced_VBN by_IN friction_NN ._. Every_DT one_CD takes_VBZ home_NN a_DT lighted_VBN
brand_NN from_IN the_DT new_JJ fire_NN and_CC with_IN it_PRP rekindles_VBZ the_DT fire_NN on_IN the_DT

Among_IN the_DT Magyars_NNP in_IN Hungary_NNP the_DT midsummer_NN fire-festival_NN is_VBZ marked_VBN

young_JJ people_NNS leap_VB the_DT bystanders_NNS predict_VBP whether_IN they_PRP will_MD marry_VB
