fire_NN thus_RB made_VBD they_PRP drive_VB their_PRP$ pigs_NNS to_TO preserve_VB them_PRP from_IN sickness_NN ._.

The_DT Esthonians_NNS of_IN Russia_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, like_IN the_DT Magyars_NNS ,_, belong_VBP to_TO the_DT great_JJ
Turanian_JJ family_NN of_IN mankind_NN ,_, also_RB celebrate_VBP the_DT summer_NN solstice_NN in_IN
the_DT usual_JJ way_NN ._. They_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT St_NNP ._. John_NNP '_POS s_PRP fire_NN keeps_VBZ witches_NNS
from_IN the_DT cattle_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP say_VBP that_IN he_PRP who_WP does_VBZ not_RB come_VB to_TO it_PRP will_MD
have_VB his_PRP$ barley_NN full_JJ of_IN thistles_NNS and_CC his_PRP$ oats_NNS full_JJ of_IN weeds_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT
Esthonian_JJ island_NN of_IN Oesel_NNP ,_, while_IN they_PRP throw_VBP fuel_NN into_IN the_DT midsummer_NN
fire_NN ,_, they_PRP call_VBP out_RP ,_, "_`` Weeds_NNS to_TO the_DT fire_NN ,_, flax_NN to_TO the_DT field_NN ,"_, or_CC they_PRP
fling_VBG three_CD billets_NNS into_IN the_DT flames_NNS ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_'' Flax_NNP grow_VBP long_RB !"_RB And_CC
they_PRP take_VBP charred_VBN sticks_NNS from_IN the_DT bonfire_NN home_NN with_IN them_PRP and_CC keep_VB

bonfire_NN is_VBZ formed_VBN by_IN piling_VBG brushwood_NN and_CC other_JJ combustibles_NNS round_VBP a_DT
tree_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN which_WDT a_DT flag_NN flies_VBZ ._. Whoever_NNP succeeds_VBZ in_IN knocking_VBG
down_IN the_DT flag_NN with_IN a_DT pole_NN before_IN it_PRP begins_VBZ to_TO burn_VB will_MD have_VB good_JJ
luck_NN ._. Formerly_RB the_DT festivities_NNS lasted_VBD till_IN daybreak_NN ,_, and_CC ended_VBD in_IN
scenes_NNS of_IN debauchery_NN which_WDT looked_VBD doubly_RB hideous_JJ by_IN the_DT growing_VBG
light_NN of_IN a_DT summer_NN morning_NN ._.

When_WRB we_PRP pass_VBP from_IN the_DT east_JJ to_TO the_DT west_NN of_IN Europe_NNP we_PRP still_RB find_VBP the_DT
summer_NN solstice_NN celebrated_VBN with_IN rites_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ general_JJ character_NN ._.
Down_IN to_TO about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN the_DT custom_NN of_IN
lighting_VBG bonfires_NNS at_IN midsummer_NN prevailed_VBD so_RB commonly_RB in_IN France_NNP that_WDT
there_EX was_VBD hardly_RB a_DT town_NN or_CC a_DT village_NN ,_, we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD
not_RB kindled_VBD ._. People_NNS danced_VBD round_RB and_CC leaped_VBD over_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC took_VBD
charred_JJ sticks_NNS from_IN the_DT bonfire_NN home_NN with_IN them_PRP to_TO protect_VB the_DT houses_NNS
against_IN lightning_NN ,_, conflagrations_NNS ,_, and_CC spells_NNS ._.

In_IN Brittany_NNP ,_, apparently_RB ,_, the_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT midsummer_NN bonfires_NNS is_VBZ
kept_VBD up_RP to_TO this_DT day_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT flames_NNS have_VBP died_VBN down_RP ,_, the_DT whole_NN
assembly_NN kneels_VBZ round_RB about_IN the_DT bonfire_NN and_CC an_DT old_JJ man_NN prays_RB aloud_RB ._.
Then_RB they_PRP all_DT rise_NN and_CC march_NN thrice_NN round_NN the_DT fire_NN ;_: at_IN the_DT third_JJ
turn_NN they_PRP stop_VBP and_CC every_DT one_NN picks_VBZ up_RP a_DT pebble_NN and_CC throws_VBZ it_PRP on_IN the_DT
burning_VBG pile_NN ._. After_IN that_IN they_PRP disperse_VBP ._. In_IN Brittany_NNP and_CC Berry_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ
believed_VBD that_IN a_DT girl_NN who_WP dances_VBZ round_JJ nine_CD midsummer_NN bonfires_NNS will_MD
marry_VB within_IN the_DT year_NN ._. In_IN the_DT valley_NN of_IN the_DT Orne_NNP the_DT custom_NN was_VBD to_TO

below_IN the_DT horizon_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT peasants_NNS drove_VBD their_PRP$ cattle_NNS through_IN the_DT

spells_NNS of_IN witches_NNS and_CC wizards_NNS who_WP attempted_VBD to_TO steal_VB the_DT milk_NN and_CC
butter_NN ._. At_IN Jumi_NNP �_NNP ges_NNS in_IN Normandy_NNP ,_, down_RB to_TO the_DT first_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT
nineteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, the_DT midsummer_NN festival_NN was_VBD marked_VBN by_IN certain_JJ
singular_JJ features_NNS which_WDT bore_VBD the_DT stamp_NN of_IN a_DT very_RB high_JJ antiquity_NN ._.
Every_DT year_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT twenty-third_JJ of_IN June_NNP ,_, the_DT Eve_NNP of_IN St_NNP ._. John_NNP ,_, the_DT
Brotherhood_NNP of_IN the_DT Green_NNP Wolf_NNP chose_VBD a_DT new_JJ chief_NN or_CC master_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD

the_DT new_JJ head_NN of_IN the_DT brotherhood_NN assumed_VBD the_DT title_NN of_IN the_DT Green_NNP Wolf_NNP ,_,
and_CC donned_VBD a_DT peculiar_JJ costume_NN consisting_VBG of_IN a_DT long_JJ green_JJ mantle_NN and_CC

at_IN the_DT stroke_NN of_IN twelve_CD all_PDT this_DT was_VBD changed_VBN ._. Constraint_NNP gave_VBD way_NN to_TO
license_NN ;_: pious_JJ hymns_NNS were_VBD replaced_VBN by_IN Bacchanalian_NNP ditties_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT

At_IN Ch_NNP �_NNP teau-Thierry_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT department_NN of_IN Aisne_NNP ,_, the_DT custom_NN of_IN

Bonfires_NNS were_VBD lit_VBN in_IN almost_RB all_DT the_DT hamlets_NNS of_IN Poitou_NNP on_IN the_DT Eve_NNP of_IN

In_IN the_DT mountainous_JJ part_NN of_IN Comminges_NNP ,_, a_DT province_NN of_IN Southern_NNP France_NNP ,_,

In_IN Provence_NNP the_DT midsummer_NN fires_NNS are_VBP still_RB popular_JJ ._. Children_NNS go_VBP from_IN

The_DT custom_NN of_IN lighting_VBG bonfires_NNS at_IN midsummer_NN has_VBZ been_VBN observed_VBN in_IN

The_DT practice_NN of_IN lighting_VBG bonfires_NNS on_IN Midsummer_NNP Eve_NNP and_CC dancing_NN or_CC
leaping_VBG over_IN them_PRP is_VBZ ,_, or_CC was_VBD till_IN recently_RB ,_, common_JJ all_DT over_IN Spain_NNP

Order_NNP of_IN St_NNP ._. John_NNP used_VBD on_IN that_DT evening_NN to_TO set_VB fire_NN to_TO a_DT heap_NN of_IN
pitch_NN barrels_NNS placed_VBN in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ Hospital_NN ._. In_IN Greece_NNP ,_,
too_RB ,_, the_DT custom_NN of_IN kindling_VBG fires_NNS on_IN St_NNP ._. John_NNP '_POS s_PRP Eve_NNP and_CC jumping_VBG over_RB
them_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO be_VB still_RB universal_JJ ._. One_CD reason_NN assigned_VBN for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT
wish_VB to_TO escape_VB from_IN the_DT fleas_NNS ._. According_VBG to_TO another_DT account_NN ,_, the_DT
women_NNS cry_VB out_RB ,_, as_IN they_PRP leap_VB over_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, "_'' I_PRP leave_VBP my_PRP$ sins_NNS behind_IN
me_PRP ."_VBP In_IN Lesbos_NNP the_DT fires_NNS on_IN St_NNP ._. John_NNP '_POS s_PRP Eve_NNP are_VBP usually_RB lighted_VBN by_IN

his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_`` I_PRP jump_VBP the_DT hare_NN '_POS s_PRP fire_NN ,_, my_PRP$ head_NN a_DT stone_NN !"_NN In_IN

they_PRP throw_VBP the_DT stones_NNS into_IN it_PRP ;_: and_CC when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ nearly_RB out_RB ,_, they_PRP make_VBP
crosses_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ legs_NNS and_CC then_RB go_VB straightway_RB and_CC bathe_VB in_IN the_DT sea_NN ._.

The_DT custom_NN of_IN kindling_VBG bonfires_NNS on_IN Midsummer_NNP Day_NNP or_CC on_IN Midsummer_NNP Eve_NNP
is_VBZ widely_RB spread_VBN among_IN the_DT Mohammedan_NNP peoples_NNS of_IN North_NNP Africa_NNP ,_,
particularly_RB in_IN Morocco_NNP and_CC Algeria_NNP ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ common_JJ both_CC to_TO the_DT
Berbers_NNP and_CC to_TO many_JJ of_IN the_DT Arabs_NNPS or_CC Arabic-speaking_JJ tribes_NNS ._. In_IN these_DT
countries_NNS Midsummer_NNP Day_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT twenty-fourth_JJ of_IN June_NNP ,_, Old_JJ Style_NN )_-RRB- is_VBZ
called_VBN l_JJ '�_JJ nsara_NN ._. The_DT fires_NNS are_VBP lit_VBN in_IN the_DT courtyards_NNS ,_, at_IN
cross-roads_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB on_IN the_DT threshing-floors_NNS ._.
Plants_NNS which_WDT in_RP burning_VBG give_VB out_RP a_DT thick_JJ smoke_NN and_CC an_DT aromatic_JJ smell_NN
are_VBP much_RB sought_VBN after_IN for_IN fuel_NN on_IN these_DT occasions_NNS ;_: among_IN the_DT plants_NNS
used_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN are_VBP giant-fennel_JJ ,_, thyme_JJ ,_, rue_JJ ,_, chervil-seed_JJ ,_,
camomile_NN ,_, geranium_NN ,_, and_CC penny-royal_JJ ._. People_NNS expose_VBP themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC
especially_RB their_PRP$ children_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT smoke_NN ,_, and_CC drive_VB it_PRP towards_IN the_DT
orchards_NNS and_CC the_DT crops_NNS ._. Also_RB they_PRP leap_VB across_IN the_DT fires_NNS ;_: in_IN some_DT
places_NNS everybody_NN ought_MD to_TO repeat_VB the_DT leap_NN seven_CD times_NNS ._. Moreover_RB they_PRP
take_VB burning_VBG brands_NNS from_IN the_DT fires_NNS and_CC carry_VB them_PRP through_IN the_DT houses_NNS
in_IN order_NN to_TO fumigate_VB them_PRP ._. They_PRP pass_VBP things_NNS through_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC
bring_VB the_DT sick_JJ into_IN contact_NN with_IN it_PRP ,_, while_IN they_PRP utter_JJ prayers_NNS for_IN
their_PRP$ recovery_NN ._. The_DT ashes_NNS of_IN the_DT bonfires_NNS are_VBP also_RB reputed_VBN to_TO
possess_VBP beneficial_JJ properties_NNS ;_: hence_RB in_IN some_DT places_NNS people_NNS rub_VBP their_PRP$
hair_NN or_CC their_PRP$ bodies_NNS with_IN them_PRP ._. In_IN some_DT places_NNS they_PRP think_VBP that_IN by_IN
leaping_VBG over_IN the_DT fires_NNS they_PRP rid_VBD themselves_PRP of_IN all_DT misfortune_NN ,_, and_CC
that_IN childless_JJ couples_NNS thereby_RB obtain_VB offspring_NN ._. Berbers_NNP of_IN the_DT Rif_NNP
province_NN ,_, in_IN Northern_NNP Morocco_NNP ,_, make_VBP great_JJ use_NN of_IN fires_NNS at_IN midsummer_NN
for_IN the_DT good_JJ of_IN themselves_PRP ,_, their_PRP$ cattle_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ fruit-trees_NNS ._.
They_PRP jump_VBP over_IN the_DT bonfires_NNS in_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN this_DT will_MD preserve_VB
them_PRP in_IN good_JJ health_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP light_RB fires_VBZ under_IN fruit-trees_NNS to_TO keep_VB
the_DT fruit_NN from_IN falling_VBG untimely_RB ._. And_CC they_PRP imagine_VBP that_IN by_IN rubbing_VBG a_DT
paste_NN of_IN the_DT ashes_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ hair_NN they_PRP prevent_VBP the_DT hair_NN from_IN falling_VBG
off_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS ._. In_IN all_PDT these_DT Moroccan_JJ customs_NNS ,_, we_PRP are_VBP told_VBN ,_, the_DT
beneficial_JJ effect_NN is_VBZ attributed_VBN wholly_RB to_TO the_DT smoke_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ
supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB endued_VBN with_IN a_DT magical_JJ quality_NN that_WDT removes_VBZ misfortune_NN
from_IN men_NNS ,_, animals_NNS ,_, fruit-trees_NNS and_CC crops_NNS ._.

The_DT celebration_NN of_IN a_DT midsummer_NN festival_NN by_IN Mohammedan_NNP peoples_NNS is_VBZ
particularly_RB remarkable_JJ ,_, because_IN the_DT Mohammedan_NNP calendar_NN ,_, being_VBG
purely_RB lunar_JJ and_CC uncorrected_JJ by_IN intercalation_NN ,_, necessarily_RB takes_VBZ no_RB
note_NN of_IN festivals_NNS which_WDT occupy_VBP fixed_VBN points_NNS in_IN the_DT solar_JJ year_NN ;_: all_PDT
strictly_RB Mohammedan_NNP feasts_NNS ,_, being_VBG pinned_VBN to_TO the_DT moon_NN ,_, slide_NN
gradually_RB with_IN that_DT luminary_JJ through_IN the_DT whole_JJ period_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN '_POS s_PRP
revolution_NN about_IN the_DT sun_NN ._. This_DT fact_NN of_IN itself_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO prove_VB that_IN
among_IN the_DT Mohammedan_NNP peoples_NNS of_IN Northern_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, as_RB among_IN the_DT
Christian_JJ peoples_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ,_, the_DT midsummer_NN festival_NN is_VBZ quite_RB
independent_JJ of_IN the_DT religion_NN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS publicly_RB profess_VBP ,_, and_CC
is_VBZ a_DT relic_NN of_IN a_DT far_RB older_JJR paganism_NN ._.



6._DT The_DT Hallowe_NNP '_POS en_FW Fires_NNPS

FROM_NNP THE_DT FOREGOING_NN survey_NN we_PRP may_MD infer_VB that_IN among_IN the_DT heathen_NN

or_CC Midsummer_NNP Day_NNP ._. The_DT coincidence_NN of_IN the_DT festival_NN with_IN the_DT summer_NN

pagan_NN ancestors_NNS purposely_RB timed_VBD the_DT ceremony_NN of_IN fire_NN on_IN earth_NN to_TO
coincide_NN with_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN at_IN the_DT highest_JJS point_NN of_IN his_PRP$
course_NN in_IN the_DT sky_NN ._. If_IN that_WDT was_VBD so_RB ,_, it_PRP follows_VBZ that_IN the_DT old_JJ founders_NNS
of_IN the_DT midsummer_NN rites_NNS had_VBD observed_VBN the_DT solstices_NNS or_CC turning-points_NNS
of_IN the_DT sun_NN '_POS s_PRP apparent_JJ path_NN in_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP accordingly_RB
regulated_VBN their_PRP$ festal_JJ calendar_NN to_TO some_DT extent_NN by_IN astronomical_JJ
considerations_NNS ._.

But_CC while_IN this_DT may_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN fairly_RB certain_JJ for_IN what_WP we_PRP may_MD

wit_NN ,_, the_DT solstices_NNS and_CC the_DT equinoxes_NNS ._. Nor_CC do_VBP they_PRP agree_VB with_IN the_DT

(_-LRB- Walpurgis_NNP Night_NNP ),_NNP and_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT Feast_NN of_IN All_DT Souls_NNS

Of_IN the_DT two_CD feasts_NNS Hallowe_NNP '_POS en_FW was_VBD perhaps_RB of_IN old_JJ the_DT more_RBR important_JJ ,_,

singing_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT Manx_NNP language_NN ,_, a_DT sort_NN of_IN Hogmanay_NNP song_NN which_WDT began_VBD
"_`` To-night_NNP is_VBZ New_NNP Year_NN '_POS s_PRP Night_NNP ,_, Hogunnaa_NNP !_. "_'' In_IN ancient_JJ Ireland_NNP ,_, a_DT

custom_NN was_VBD chiefly_RB observed_VBN by_IN children_NNS ._. The_DT fires_NNS were_VBD lighted_VBN on_IN
any_DT high_JJ knoll_NN near_IN the_DT house_NN ;_: there_EX was_VBD no_DT dancing_NN round_NN them_PRP ._.

enough_RB peats_NNS ,_, they_PRP piled_VBD them_PRP in_IN a_DT heap_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN straw_NN ,_, furze_NN ,_,

each_DT of_IN the_DT youths_NNS ,_, one_CD after_IN another_DT ,_, laid_VBD himself_PRP down_RP on_IN the_DT

thus_RB lying_VBG allowed_VBN the_DT smoke_NN to_TO roll_VB over_IN him_PRP ._. The_DT others_NNS ran_VBD
through_IN the_DT smoke_NN and_CC jumped_VBD over_IN their_PRP$ prostrate_JJ comrade_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT
heap_NN was_VBD burned_VBN down_RB ,_, they_PRP scattered_VBD the_DT ashes_NNS ,_, vying_VBG with_IN each_DT
other_JJ who_WP should_MD scatter_VB them_PRP most_JJS ._.

In_IN the_DT northern_JJ part_NN of_IN Wales_NNP it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB customary_JJ for_IN every_DT
family_NN to_TO make_VB a_DT great_JJ bonfire_NN called_VBN Coel_NNP Coeth_NNP on_IN Hallowe_NNP '_POS en_FW ._.
The_DT fire_NN was_VBD kindled_VBN on_IN the_DT most_RBS conspicuous_JJ spot_NN near_IN the_DT house_NN ;_:
and_CC when_WRB it_PRP had_VBD nearly_RB gone_VBN out_IN every_DT one_CD threw_VBD into_IN the_DT ashes_NNS a_DT
white_JJ stone_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD first_RB marked_VBN ._. Then_RB having_VBG said_VBD their_PRP$
prayers_NNS round_VBP the_DT fire_NN ,_, they_PRP went_VBD to_TO bed_NN ._. Next_JJ morning_NN ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN
they_PRP were_VBD up_RB ,_, they_PRP came_VBD to_TO search_VB out_IN the_DT stones_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN any_DT one_NN of_IN
them_PRP was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB missing_VBG ,_, they_PRP had_VBD a_DT notion_NN that_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP
threw_VBD it_PRP would_MD die_VB before_IN he_PRP saw_VBD another_DT Hallowe_NNP '_POS en_FW ._. According_VBG to_TO
Sir_NNP John_NNP Rhys_NNP ,_, the_DT habit_NN of_IN celebrating_VBG Hallowe_NNP '_POS en_FW by_IN lighting_VBG
bonfires_NNS on_IN the_DT hills_NNS is_VBZ perhaps_RB not_RB yet_RB extinct_JJ in_IN Wales_NNP ,_, and_CC men_NNS
still_RB living_VBG can_MD remember_VB how_WRB the_DT people_NNS who_WP assisted_VBD at_IN the_DT
bonfires_NNS would_MD wait_VB till_IN the_DT last_JJ spark_NN was_VBD out_RB and_CC then_RB would_MD
suddenly_RB take_VB to_TO their_PRP$ heels_NNS ,_, shouting_VBG at_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN their_PRP$ voices_NNS ,_,
"_`` The_DT cropped_VBD black_JJ sow_NN seize_VBP the_DT hindmost_JJ !"_NNP The_DT saying_VBG ,_, as_IN Sir_NNP John_NNP
Rhys_NNP justly_RB remarks_VBZ ,_, implies_VBZ that_IN originally_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT company_NN
became_VBD a_DT victim_NN in_IN dead_JJ earnest_NN ._. Down_IN to_TO the_DT present_JJ time_NN the_DT saying_VBG
is_VBZ current_JJ in_IN Carnarvonshire_NNP ,_, where_WRB allusions_NNS to_TO the_DT cutty_JJ black_JJ sow_NN
are_VBP still_RB occasionally_RB made_VBN to_TO frighten_VB children_NNS ._. We_PRP can_MD now_RB
understand_VB why_WRB in_IN Lower_JJR Brittany_NNP every_DT person_NN throws_VBZ a_DT pebble_NN into_IN
the_DT midsummer_NN bonfire_NN ._. Doubtless_RB there_RB ,_, as_IN in_IN Wales_NNP and_CC the_DT
Highlands_NNP of_IN Scotland_NNP ,_, omens_NNS of_IN life_NN and_CC death_NN have_VBP at_IN one_CD time_NN or_CC
other_JJ been_VBN drawn_VBN from_IN the_DT position_NN and_CC state_NN of_IN the_DT pebbles_NNS on_IN the_DT
morning_NN of_IN All_DT Saints_NNS '_POS Day_NN ._. The_DT custom_NN ,_, thus_RB found_VBD among_IN three_CD
separate_JJ branches_NNS of_IN the_DT Celtic_NNP stock_NN ,_, probably_RB dates_NNS from_IN a_DT period_NN
before_IN their_PRP$ dispersion_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS from_IN a_DT time_NN when_WRB alien_JJ races_NNS
had_VBD not_RB yet_RB driven_VBN home_NN the_DT wedges_NNS of_IN separation_NN between_IN them_PRP ._.

In_IN the_DT Isle_NNP of_IN Man_NNP also_RB ,_, another_DT Celtic_JJ country_NN ,_, Hallowe_NNP '_POS en_FW was_VBD
celebrated_VBN down_RB to_TO modern_JJ times_NNS by_IN the_DT kindling_NN of_IN fires_NNS ,_,
accompanied_VBN with_IN all_PDT the_DT usual_JJ ceremonies_NNS designed_VBN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT
baneful_JJ influence_NN of_IN fairies_NNS and_CC witches_NNS ._.



7._DT The_DT Midwinter_NNP Fires_NNPS

IF_IN THE_DT HEATHEN_NN of_IN ancient_JJ Europe_NNP celebrated_VBD ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP good_JJ reason_NN
to_TO believe_VB ,_, the_DT season_NN of_IN Midsummer_NNP with_IN a_DT great_JJ festival_NN of_IN fire_NN ,_,
of_IN which_WDT the_DT traces_NNS have_VBP survived_VBN in_IN many_JJ places_NNS down_IN to_TO our_PRP$ own_JJ
time_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ natural_JJ to_TO suppose_VB that_IN they_PRP should_MD have_VB observed_VBN with_IN
similar_JJ rites_NNS the_DT corresponding_JJ season_NN of_IN Midwinter_NNP ;_: for_IN Midsummer_NN
and_CC Midwinter_NNP ,_, or_CC ,_, in_IN more_RBR technical_JJ language_NN ,_, the_DT summer_NN solstice_NN
and_CC the_DT winter_NN solstice_NN ,_, are_VBP the_DT two_CD great_JJ turningpoints_NNS in_IN the_DT
sun_NN '_POS s_PRP apparent_JJ course_NN through_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN the_DT standpoint_NN of_IN
primitive_JJ man_NN nothing_NN might_MD seem_VB more_RBR appropriate_JJ than_IN to_TO kindle_VB
fires_NNS on_IN earth_NN at_IN the_DT two_CD moments_NNS when_WRB the_DT fire_NN and_CC heat_NN of_IN the_DT
great_JJ luminary_JJ in_IN heaven_NN begin_VBP to_TO wane_VB or_CC to_TO wax_NN ._.

In_IN modern_JJ Christendom_NNP the_DT ancient_JJ fire-festival_NN of_IN the_DT winter_NN
solstice_NN appears_VBZ to_TO survive_VB ,_, or_CC to_TO have_VB survived_VBN down_RP to_TO recent_JJ
years_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT old_JJ custom_NN of_IN the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN ,_, clog_NN ,_, or_CC block_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP was_VBD
variously_RB called_VBD in_IN England_NNP ._. The_DT custom_NN was_VBD widespread_JJ in_IN Europe_NNP ,_,
but_CC seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB flourished_VBN especially_RB in_IN England_NNP ,_, France_NNP ,_, and_CC
among_IN the_DT South_NNP Slavs_NNP ;_: at_IN least_JJS the_DT fullest_JJS accounts_NNS of_IN the_DT custom_NN
come_VBN from_IN these_DT quarters_NNS ._. That_IN the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN was_VBD only_RB the_DT winter_NN
counterpart_NN of_IN the_DT midsummer_NN bonfire_NN ,_, kindled_VBD within_IN doors_NNS instead_RB
of_IN in_IN the_DT open_JJ air_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT cold_JJ and_CC inclement_JJ weather_NN of_IN
the_DT season_NN ,_, was_VBD pointed_VBN out_RP long_RB ago_RB by_IN our_PRP$ English_NNP antiquary_NN John_NNP
Brand_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT view_NN is_VBZ supported_VBN by_IN the_DT many_JJ quaint_JJ superstitions_NNS
attaching_NN to_TO the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN ,_, superstitions_NNS which_WDT have_VBP no_DT apparent_JJ
connexion_NN with_IN Christianity_NNP but_CC carry_VB their_PRP$ heathen_NN origin_NN plainly_RB
stamped_VBD upon_IN them_PRP ._. But_CC while_IN the_DT two_CD solstitial_JJ celebrations_NNS were_VBD
both_DT festivals_NNS of_IN fire_NN ,_, the_DT necessity_NN or_CC desirability_NN of_IN holding_VBG the_DT
winter_NN celebration_NN within_IN doors_NNS lent_VBD it_PRP the_DT character_NN of_IN a_DT private_JJ
or_CC domestic_JJ festivity_NN ,_, which_WDT contrasts_VBZ strongly_RB with_IN the_DT publicity_NN
of_IN the_DT summer_NN celebration_NN ,_, at_IN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS gathered_VBD on_IN some_DT open_JJ
space_NN or_CC conspicuous_JJ height_NN ,_, kindled_VBD a_DT huge_JJ bonfire_NN in_IN common_JJ ,_, and_CC
danced_VBD and_CC made_VBD merry_JJ round_NN it_PRP together_RB ._.

Down_IN to_TO about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN the_DT old_JJ rite_NN of_IN
the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN was_VBD kept_VBN up_RP in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Central_NNP Germany_NNP ._. Thus_RB in_IN
the_DT valleys_NNS of_IN the_DT Sieg_NNP and_CC Lahn_NNP the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN ,_, a_DT heavy_JJ block_NN of_IN oak_NN ,_,
was_VBD fitted_VBN into_IN the_DT floor_NN of_IN the_DT hearth_NN ,_, where_WRB ,_, though_IN it_PRP glowed_VBD
under_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD hardly_RB reduced_VBN to_TO ashes_NNS within_IN a_DT year_NN ._. When_WRB
the_DT new_JJ log_NN was_VBD laid_VBN next_JJ year_NN ,_, the_DT remains_NNS of_IN the_DT old_JJ one_CD were_VBD
ground_NN to_TO powder_NN and_CC strewed_VBD over_IN the_DT fields_NNS during_IN the_DT Twelve_CD
Nights_NNPS ,_, which_WDT was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO promote_VB the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ._. In_IN
some_DT villages_NNS of_IN Westphalia_NNP ,_, the_DT practice_NN was_VBD to_TO withdraw_VB the_DT Yule_NN
log_NN (_-LRB- Christbrand_NNP )_-RRB- from_IN the_DT fire_NN so_RB soon_RB as_IN it_PRP was_VBD slightly_RB
charred_VBN ;_: it_PRP was_VBD then_RB kept_VBN carefully_RB to_TO be_VB replaced_VBN on_IN the_DT fire_NN
whenever_WRB a_DT thunderstorm_NN broke_VBD ,_, because_IN the_DT people_NNS believed_VBD that_IN
lightning_NN would_MD not_RB strike_VB a_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN was_VBD
smouldering_NN ._. In_IN other_JJ villages_NNS of_IN Westphalia_NNP the_DT old_JJ custom_NN was_VBD to_TO
tie_VB up_IN the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN in_IN the_DT last_JJ sheaf_NN cut_VBN at_IN harvest_NN ._.

In_IN several_JJ provinces_NNS of_IN France_NNP ,_, and_CC particularly_RB in_IN Provence_NNP ,_, the_DT
custom_NN of_IN the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN or_CC tr_NN �_NN foir_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP was_VBD called_VBN in_IN many_JJ
places_NNS ,_, was_VBD long_RB observed_VBN ._. A_DT French_JJ writer_NN of_IN the_DT seventeenth_JJ
century_NN denounces_NNS as_IN superstitious_JJ "_`` the_DT belief_NN that_IN a_DT log_NN called_VBD the_DT
tr_NN �_NN foir_NN or_CC Christmas_NNP brand_NN ,_, which_WDT you_PRP put_VBD on_IN the_DT fire_NN for_IN the_DT
first_JJ time_NN on_IN Christmas_NNP Eve_NNP and_CC continue_VB to_TO put_VB on_IN the_DT fire_NN for_IN a_DT
little_JJ while_IN every_DT day_NN till_IN Twelfth_NNP Night_NNP ,_, can_MD ,_, if_IN kept_VBN under_IN the_DT
bed_NN ,_, protect_VBP the_DT house_NN for_IN a_DT whole_JJ year_NN from_IN fire_NN and_CC thunder_NN ;_: that_IN
it_PRP can_MD prevent_VB the_DT inmates_NNS from_IN having_VBG chilblains_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ heels_NNS in_IN
winter_NN ;_: that_IN it_PRP can_MD cure_VB the_DT cattle_NNS of_IN many_JJ maladies_NNS ;_: that_IN if_IN a_DT
piece_NN of_IN it_PRP be_VB steeped_VBN in_IN the_DT water_NN which_WDT cows_NNS drink_VB it_PRP helps_VBZ them_PRP
to_TO calve_VB ;_: and_CC lastly_RB that_IN if_IN the_DT ashes_NNS of_IN the_DT log_NN be_VB strewn_VBN on_IN the_DT
fields_NNS it_PRP can_MD save_VB the_DT wheat_NN from_IN mildew_NN ."_.

In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Flanders_NNP and_CC France_NNP the_DT remains_NNS of_IN the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN
were_VBD regularly_RB kept_VBN in_IN the_DT house_NN under_IN a_DT bed_NN as_IN a_DT protection_NN against_IN
thunder_NN and_CC lightning_NN ;_: in_IN Berry_NNP ,_, when_WRB thunder_NN was_VBD heard_VBN ,_, a_DT member_NN of_IN
the_DT family_NN used_VBD to_TO take_VB a_DT piece_NN of_IN the_DT log_NN and_CC throw_VB it_PRP on_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_,
which_WDT was_VBD believed_VBN to_TO avert_VB the_DT lightning_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, in_IN Perigord_NNP ,_, the_DT
charcoal_NN and_CC ashes_NNS are_VBP carefully_RB collected_VBN and_CC kept_VBN for_IN healing_VBG
swollen_JJ glands_NNS ;_: the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT trunk_NN which_WDT has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN burnt_VBN in_IN
the_DT fire_NN is_VBZ used_VBN by_IN ploughmen_NNS to_TO make_VB the_DT wedge_NN for_IN their_PRP$ plough_NN ,_,
because_IN they_PRP allege_VBP that_IN it_PRP causes_VBZ the_DT seeds_NNS to_TO thrive_VB better_RB ;_: and_CC
the_DT women_NNS keep_VB pieces_NNS of_IN it_PRP till_IN Twelfth_NNP Night_NNP for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN their_PRP$
chickens_NNS ._. Some_DT people_NNS imagine_VBP that_IN they_PRP will_MD have_VB as_RB many_JJ chickens_NNS
as_IN there_EX are_VBP sparks_NNS that_WDT fly_VBP out_IN of_IN the_DT brands_NNS of_IN the_DT log_NN when_WRB they_PRP
shake_NN them_PRP ;_: and_CC others_NNS place_VBP the_DT extinct_JJ brands_NNS under_IN the_DT bed_NN to_TO
drive_NN away_RB vermin_RB ._. In_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN France_NNP the_DT charred_JJ log_NN is_VBZ
thought_VBD to_TO guard_VB the_DT house_NN against_IN sorcery_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN against_IN
lightning_NN ._.

In_IN England_NNP the_DT customs_NNS and_CC beliefs_NNS concerning_VBG the_DT Yule_JJ log_NN used_VBN to_TO
be_VB similar_JJ ._. On_IN the_DT night_NN of_IN Christmas_NNP Eve_NNP ,_, says_VBZ the_DT antiquary_JJ John_NNP
Brand_NNP ,_, "_`` our_PRP$ ancestors_NNS were_VBD wont_JJ to_TO light_VB up_RP candles_NNS of_IN an_DT uncommon_JJ
size_NN ,_, called_VBD Christmas_NNP Candles_NNP ,_, and_CC lay_VBD a_DT log_NN of_IN wood_NN upon_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_,
called_VBN a_DT Yule-clog_NNP or_CC Christmas-block_NNP ,_, to_TO illuminate_VB the_DT house_NN ,_, and_CC ,_,
as_IN it_PRP were_VBD ,_, to_TO turn_VB night_NN into_IN day_NN ."_IN The_DT old_JJ custom_NN was_VBD to_TO light_VB the_DT
Yule_NNP log_VBP with_IN a_DT fragment_NN of_IN its_PRP$ predecessor_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN kept_VBN
throughout_IN the_DT year_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ;_: where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD so_RB kept_VBN ,_, the_DT fiend_NN
could_MD do_VB no_DT mischief_NN ._. The_DT remains_VBZ of_IN the_DT log_NN were_VBD also_RB supposed_VBN to_TO
guard_VB the_DT house_NN against_IN fire_NN and_CC lightning_NN ._.

To_TO this_DT day_NN the_DT ritual_NN of_IN bringing_VBG in_IN the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN is_VBZ observed_VBN with_IN
much_JJ solemnity_NN among_IN the_DT Southern_JJ Slavs_NNP ,_, especially_RB the_DT Serbians_NNPS ._.
The_DT log_NN is_VBZ usually_RB a_DT block_NN of_IN oak_NN ,_, but_CC sometimes_RB of_IN olive_JJ or_CC beech_NN ._.
They_PRP seem_VBP to_TO think_VB that_IN they_PRP will_MD have_VB as_RB many_JJ calves_NNS ,_, lambs_NNS ,_, pigs_NNS ,_,
and_CC kids_NNS as_IN they_PRP strike_VBP sparks_NNS out_IN of_IN the_DT burning_JJ log_NN ._. Some_DT people_NNS
carry_VB a_DT piece_NN of_IN the_DT log_NN out_IN to_TO the_DT fields_NNS to_TO protect_VB them_PRP against_IN
hail_NN ._. In_IN Albania_NNP down_IN to_TO recent_JJ years_NNS it_PRP was_VBD a_DT common_JJ custom_NN to_TO burn_VB
a_DT Yule_NNP log_NN at_IN Christmas_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT ashes_NNS of_IN the_DT fire_NN were_VBD scattered_VBN on_IN
the_DT fields_NNS to_TO make_VB them_PRP fertile_JJ ._. The_DT Huzuls_NNP ,_, a_DT Slavonic_JJ people_NNS of_IN
the_DT Carpathians_NNS ,_, kindle_JJ fire_NN by_IN the_DT friction_NN of_IN wood_NN on_IN Christmas_NNP
Eve_NNP (_-LRB- Old_NNP Style_NNP ,_, the_DT fifth_NN of_IN January_NNP )_-RRB- and_CC keep_VB it_PRP burning_VBG till_IN
Twelfth_NNP Night_NNP ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ remarkable_JJ how_WRB common_JJ the_DT belief_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN that_IN the_DT
remains_VBZ of_IN the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN ,_, if_IN kept_VBN throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, had_VBD power_NN to_TO
protect_VB the_DT house_NN against_IN fire_NN and_CC especially_RB against_IN lightning_NN ._. As_IN
the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN was_VBD frequently_RB of_IN oak_NN ,_, it_PRP seems_VBZ possible_JJ that_IN this_DT
belief_NN may_MD be_VB a_DT relic_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ Aryan_NNP creed_NN which_WDT associated_VBN the_DT
oak-tree_JJ with_IN the_DT god_NN of_IN thunder_NN ._. Whether_IN the_DT curative_NN and_CC
fertilising_VBG virtues_NNS ascribed_VBN to_TO the_DT ashes_NNS of_IN the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP
supposed_VBN to_TO heal_VB cattle_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN men_NNS ,_, to_TO enable_VB cows_NNS to_TO calve_VB ,_, and_CC
to_TO promote_VB the_DT fruitfulness_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, may_MD not_RB be_VB derived_VBN from_IN
the_DT same_JJ ancient_JJ source_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT question_NN which_WDT deserves_VBZ to_TO be_VB
considered_VBN ._.



8._CD The_DT Need-fire_NN

THE_DT FIRE-FESTIVALS_NNS hitherto_VBD described_VBN are_VBP all_DT celebrated_VBN
periodically_RB at_IN certain_JJ stated_JJ times_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ._. But_CC besides_IN these_DT
regularly_RB recurring_VBG celebrations_NNS the_DT peasants_NNS in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN
Europe_NNP have_VBP been_VBN wont_VBN from_IN time_NN immemorial_JJ to_TO resort_VB to_TO a_DT ritual_NN of_IN
fire_NN at_IN irregular_JJ intervals_NNS in_IN seasons_NNS of_IN distress_NN and_CC calamity_NN ,_,
above_IN all_PDT when_WRB their_PRP$ cattle_NNS were_VBD attacked_VBN by_IN epidemic_JJ disease_NN ._. No_UH
account_NN of_IN the_DT popular_JJ European_JJ fire-festivals_NNS would_MD be_VB complete_JJ
without_IN some_DT notice_NN of_IN these_DT remarkable_JJ rites_NNS ,_, which_WDT have_VBP all_PDT the_DT
greater_JJR claim_NN on_IN our_PRP$ attention_NN because_IN they_PRP may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB regarded_VBN
as_IN the_DT source_NN and_CC origin_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT other_JJ fire-festivals_NNS ;_: certainly_RB
they_PRP must_MD date_VB from_IN a_DT very_RB remote_JJ antiquity_NN ._. The_DT general_JJ name_NN by_IN
which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP known_VBN among_IN the_DT Teutonic_JJ peoples_NNS is_VBZ need-fire_JJ ._.
Sometimes_RB the_DT need-fire_NN was_VBD known_VBN as_IN "_`` wild_JJ fire_NN ,"_NN to_TO distinguish_VB it_PRP
no_DT doubt_NN from_IN the_DT tame_JJ fire_NN produced_VBN by_IN more_JJR ordinary_JJ methods_NNS ._. Among_IN
Slavonic_JJ peoples_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN "_`` living_VBG fire_NN ."_.

The_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT custom_NN can_MD be_VB traced_VBN from_IN the_DT early_JJ Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS ,_,
when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD denounced_VBN by_IN the_DT Church_NNP as_IN a_DT heathen_NN superstition_NN ,_, down_IN
to_TO the_DT first_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD still_RB
occasionally_RB practised_VBD in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Germany_NNP ,_, England_NNP ,_,
Scotland_NNP ,_, and_CC Ireland_NNP ._. Among_IN Slavonic_JJ peoples_NNS it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB
lingered_VBD even_RB longer_RBR ._. The_DT usual_JJ occasion_NN for_IN performing_VBG the_DT rite_NN was_VBD
an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN or_CC cattle-disease_VB ,_, for_IN which_WDT the_DT need-fire_NN was_VBD
believed_VBN to_TO be_VB an_DT infallible_JJ remedy_NN ._. The_DT animals_NNS which_WDT were_VBD
subjected_VBN to_TO it_PRP included_VBD cows_NNS ,_, pigs_NNS ,_, horses_NNS ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB geese_JJ ._. As_IN
a_DT necessary_JJ preliminary_JJ to_TO the_DT kindling_NN of_IN the_DT need-fire_NN all_DT other_JJ
fires_NNS and_CC lights_NNS in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN were_VBD extinguished_VBN ,_, so_RB that_IN not_RB
so_RB much_RB as_IN a_DT spark_NN remained_VBD alight_JJ ;_: for_IN so_RB long_JJ as_IN even_RB a_DT
night-light_NN burned_VBN in_IN a_DT house_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD imagined_VBN that_IN the_DT need-fire_NN
could_MD not_RB kindle_VB ._. Sometimes_RB it_PRP was_VBD deemed_VBN enough_JJ to_TO put_VB out_RP all_PDT the_DT
fires_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN ;_: but_CC sometimes_RB the_DT extinction_NN extended_VBN to_TO
neighbouring_VBG villages_NNS or_CC to_TO a_DT whole_JJ parish_NN ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT
Highlands_NNP of_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT rule_NN was_VBD that_IN all_DT householders_NNS who_WP dwelt_VBP
within_IN the_DT two_CD nearest_JJS running_VBG streams_NNS should_MD put_VB out_RP their_PRP$ lights_NNS
and_CC fires_NNS on_IN the_DT day_NN appointed_VBD ._. Usually_RB the_DT need-fire_NN was_VBD made_VBN in_IN
the_DT open_JJ air_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Serbia_NNP it_PRP was_VBD kindled_VBN in_IN a_DT dark_NN
room_NN ;_: sometimes_RB the_DT place_NN was_VBD a_DT cross-way_JJ or_CC a_DT hollow_NN in_IN a_DT road_NN ._. In_IN
the_DT Highlands_NNP of_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT proper_JJ places_NNS for_IN performing_VBG the_DT rite_NN
seem_VB to_TO have_VB been_VBN knolls_NNS or_CC small_JJ islands_NNS in_IN rivers_NNS ._.

The_DT regular_JJ method_NN of_IN producing_VBG the_DT need-fire_NN was_VBD by_IN the_DT friction_NN of_IN
two_CD pieces_NNS of_IN wood_NN ;_: it_PRP might_MD not_RB be_VB struck_VBN by_IN flint_NN and_CC steel_NN ._. Very_RB
exceptionally_RB among_IN some_DT South_JJ Slavs_NNP we_PRP read_VBD of_IN a_DT practice_NN of_IN
kindling_VBG a_DT need-fire_NN by_IN striking_VBG a_DT piece_NN of_IN iron_NN on_IN an_DT anvil_NN ._. Where_WRB
the_DT wood_NN to_TO be_VB employed_VBN is_VBZ specified_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ generally_RB said_VBN to_TO be_VB
oak_NN ;_: but_CC on_IN the_DT Lower_NNP Rhine_NNP the_DT fire_NN was_VBD kindled_VBN by_IN the_DT friction_NN of_IN
oak-wood_NN or_CC fir-wood_NN ._. In_IN Slavonic_JJ countries_NNS we_PRP hear_VBP of_IN poplar_NN ,_, pear_NN ,_,
and_CC cornel_NN wood_NN being_VBG used_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._. Often_RB the_DT material_NN is_VBZ
simply_RB described_VBD as_IN two_CD pieces_NNS of_IN dry_JJ wood_NN ._. Sometimes_RB nine_CD different_JJ
kinds_NNS of_IN wood_NN were_VBD deemed_VBN necessary_JJ ,_, but_CC rather_RB perhaps_RB to_TO be_VB burned_VBN
in_IN the_DT bonfire_NN than_IN to_TO be_VB rubbed_VBN together_RB for_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN the_DT
need-fire_NN ._. The_DT particular_JJ mode_NN of_IN kindling_VBG the_DT need-fire_NN varied_VBN in_IN
different_JJ districts_NNS ;_: a_DT very_RB common_JJ one_NN was_VBD this_DT ._. Two_CD poles_NNS were_VBD
driven_VBN into_IN the_DT ground_NN about_IN a_DT foot_NN and_CC a_DT half_NN from_IN each_DT other_JJ ._. Each_DT
pole_NN had_VBD in_IN the_DT side_NN facing_VBG the_DT other_JJ a_DT socket_NN into_IN which_WDT a_DT smooth_JJ
cross-piece_NN or_CC roller_NN was_VBD fitted_VBN ._. The_DT sockets_NNS were_VBD stuffed_VBN with_IN
linen_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT two_CD ends_NNS of_IN the_DT roller_NN were_VBD rammed_VBN tightly_RB into_IN the_DT
sockets_NNS ._. To_TO make_VB it_PRP more_RBR inflammable_JJ the_DT roller_NN was_VBD often_RB coated_VBN
with_IN tar_NN ._. A_DT rope_NN was_VBD then_RB wound_VBN round_RB the_DT roller_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT free_JJ ends_NNS
at_IN both_DT sides_NNS were_VBD gripped_VBN by_IN two_CD or_CC more_JJR persons_NNS ,_, who_WP by_IN pulling_VBG
the_DT rope_NN to_TO and_CC fro_IN caused_VBN the_DT roller_NN to_TO revolve_VB rapidly_RB ,_, till_IN
through_IN the_DT friction_NN the_DT linen_NN in_IN the_DT sockets_NNS took_VBD fire_NN ._. The_DT sparks_NNPS
were_VBD immediately_RB caught_VBN in_IN tow_NN or_CC oakum_NN and_CC waved_VBD about_IN in_IN a_DT circle_NN
until_IN they_PRP burst_VBD into_IN a_DT bright_JJ glow_NN ,_, when_WRB straw_NN was_VBD applied_VBN to_TO it_PRP ,_,
and_CC the_DT blazing_VBG straw_NN used_VBN to_TO kindle_VB the_DT fuel_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN stacked_VBN
to_TO make_VB the_DT bonfire_NN ._. Often_RB a_DT wheel_NN ,_, sometimes_RB a_DT cart-wheel_NN or_CC even_RB a_DT
spinning-wheel_NN ,_, formed_VBD part_NN of_IN the_DT mechanism_NN ;_: in_IN Aberdeenshire_NNP it_PRP
was_VBD called_VBN "_`` the_DT muckle_NN wheel_NN ";_RB in_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Mull_NNP the_DT wheel_NN was_VBD
turned_VBD from_IN east_JJ to_TO west_JJ over_IN nine_CD spindles_NNS of_IN oak-wood_NN ._. Sometimes_RB
we_PRP are_VBP merely_RB told_VBN that_DT two_CD wooden_JJ planks_NNS were_VBD rubbed_VBN together_RB ._.
Sometimes_RB it_PRP was_VBD prescribed_VBN that_IN the_DT cart-wheel_NN used_VBN for_IN fire-making_NN
and_CC the_DT axle_NN on_IN which_WDT it_PRP turned_VBD should_MD both_DT be_VB new_JJ ._. Similarly_RB it_PRP was_VBD
said_VBD that_IN the_DT rope_NN which_WDT turned_VBD the_DT roller_NN should_MD be_VB new_JJ ;_: if_IN
possible_JJ it_PRP should_MD be_VB woven_VBN of_IN strands_NNS taken_VBN from_IN a_DT gallows_NNS rope_NN
with_IN which_WDT people_NNS had_VBD been_VBN hanged_VBN ,_, but_CC this_DT was_VBD a_DT counsel_NN of_IN
perfection_NN rather_RB than_IN a_DT strict_JJ necessity_NN ._.

Various_JJ rules_NNS were_VBD also_RB laid_VBN down_RP as_IN to_TO the_DT kind_NN of_IN persons_NNS who_WP
might_MD or_CC should_MD make_VB the_DT need-fire_NN ._. Sometimes_RB it_PRP was_VBD said_VBN that_IN the_DT
two_CD persons_NNS who_WP pulled_VBD the_DT rope_NN which_WDT twirled_VBD the_DT roller_NN should_MD
always_RB be_VB brothers_NNS or_CC at_IN least_JJS bear_VB the_DT same_JJ baptismal_JJ name_NN ;_:
sometimes_RB it_PRP was_VBD deemed_VBN sufficient_JJ if_IN they_PRP were_VBD both_DT chaste_JJ young_JJ
men_NNS ._. In_IN some_DT villages_NNS of_IN Brunswick_NNP people_NNS thought_VBD that_IN if_IN everybody_NN
who_WP lent_VBD a_DT hand_NN in_IN kindling_VBG the_DT need-fire_NN did_VBD not_RB bear_VB the_DT same_JJ
Christian_NNP name_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD labour_VB in_IN vain_JJ ._. In_IN Silesia_NNP the_DT tree_NN

twin_JJ brothers_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT western_JJ islands_NNS of_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT fire_NN was_VBD
kindled_VBN by_IN eighty-one_CD married_JJ men_NNS ,_, who_WP rubbed_VBD two_CD great_JJ planks_NNS
against_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_, working_VBG in_IN relays_NNS of_IN nine_CD ;_: in_IN North_NNP Uist_IN the_DT
nine_CD times_NNS nine_CD who_WP made_VBD the_DT fire_NN were_VBD all_RB first-begotten_JJ sons_NNS ,_, but_CC
we_PRP are_VBP not_RB told_VBN whether_IN they_PRP were_VBD married_VBN or_CC single_JJ ._. Among_IN the_DT
Serbians_IN the_DT need-fire_NN is_VBZ sometimes_RB kindled_VBN by_IN a_DT boy_NN and_CC girl_NN
between_IN eleven_CD and_CC fourteen_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, who_WP work_VBP stark_JJ naked_JJ in_IN a_DT
dark_JJ room_NN ;_: sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ made_VBN by_IN an_DT old_JJ man_NN and_CC an_DT old_JJ woman_NN also_RB
in_IN the_DT dark_NN ._. In_IN Bulgaria_NNP ,_, too_RB ,_, the_DT makers_NNS of_IN need-fire_NN strip_NN
themselves_PRP of_IN their_PRP$ clothes_NNS ;_: in_IN Caithness_NN they_PRP divested_VBD themselves_PRP
of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS of_IN metal_NN ._. If_IN after_IN long_JJ rubbing_NN of_IN the_DT wood_NN no_DT fire_NN was_VBD
elicited_VBN they_PRP concluded_VBD that_IN some_DT fire_NN must_MD still_RB be_VB burning_VBG in_IN the_DT
village_NN ;_: so_RB a_DT strict_JJ search_NN was_VBD made_VBN from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN ,_, any_DT fire_NN
that_WDT might_MD be_VB found_VBN was_VBD put_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT negligent_NN householder_NN
punished_VBN or_CC upbraided_VBN ;_: indeed_RB a_DT heavy_JJ fine_NN might_MD be_VB inflicted_VBN on_IN
him_PRP ._.

When_WRB the_DT need-fire_NN was_VBD at_IN last_JJ kindled_JJ ,_, the_DT bonfire_NN was_VBD lit_VBN from_IN it_PRP ,_,
and_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT blaze_NN had_VBD somewhat_RB died_VBN down_RP ,_, the_DT sick_JJ animals_NNS
were_VBD driven_VBN over_IN the_DT glowing_VBG embers_NNS ,_, sometimes_RB in_IN a_DT regular_JJ order_NN of_IN
precedence_NN ,_, first_RB the_DT pigs_NNS ,_, next_IN the_DT cows_NNS ,_, and_CC last_JJ of_IN all_PDT the_DT
horses_NNS ._. Sometimes_RB they_PRP were_VBD driven_VBN twice_RB or_CC thrice_VB through_IN the_DT smoke_NN
and_CC flames_NNS ,_, so_RB that_IN occasionally_RB some_DT of_IN them_PRP were_VBD scorched_VBN to_TO
death_NN ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN all_DT the_DT beasts_NNS were_VBD through_IN ,_, the_DT young_JJ folk_NN would_MD
rush_VB wildly_RB at_IN the_DT ashes_NNS and_CC cinders_NNS ,_, sprinkling_NN and_CC blackening_VBG each_DT
other_JJ with_IN them_PRP ;_: those_DT who_WP were_VBD most_RBS blackened_VBN would_MD march_VB in_IN
triumph_NN behind_IN the_DT cattle_NNS into_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC would_MD not_RB wash_VB
themselves_PRP for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN ._. From_IN the_DT bonfire_NN people_NNS carried_VBD live_JJ
embers_NNS home_NN and_CC used_VBD them_PRP to_TO rekindle_VB the_DT fires_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ._.
These_DT brands_NNS ,_, after_IN being_VBG extinguished_VBN in_IN water_NN ,_, they_PRP sometimes_RB put_VBP
in_IN the_DT managers_NNS at_IN which_WDT the_DT cattle_NNS fed_VBN ,_, and_CC kept_VBD them_PRP there_RB for_IN a_DT
while_IN ._. Ashes_NNP from_IN the_DT need-fire_NN were_VBD also_RB strewed_VBN on_IN the_DT fields_NNS to_TO
protect_VBP the_DT crops_NNS against_IN vermin_NN ;_: sometimes_RB they_PRP were_VBD taken_VBN home_NN to_TO
be_VB employed_VBN as_IN remedies_NNS in_IN sickness_NN ,_, being_VBG sprinkled_VBN on_IN the_DT ailing_VBG
part_NN or_CC mixed_JJ in_IN water_NN and_CC drunk_NN by_IN the_DT patient_NN ._. In_IN the_DT western_JJ
islands_NNS of_IN Scotland_NNP and_CC on_IN the_DT adjoining_VBG mainland_NN ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT
fire_NN on_IN the_DT domestic_JJ hearth_NN had_VBD been_VBN rekindled_VBN from_IN the_DT need-fire_NN a_DT
pot_NN full_JJ of_IN water_NN was_VBD set_VBN on_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT water_NN thus_RB heated_VBN was_VBD
afterwards_RB sprinkled_VBD upon_IN the_DT people_NNS infected_VBN with_IN the_DT plague_NN or_CC
upon_IN the_DT cattle_NNS that_WDT were_VBD tainted_VBN by_IN the_DT murrain_NN ._. Special_JJ virtue_NN was_VBD
attributed_VBN to_TO the_DT smoke_NN of_IN the_DT bonfire_NN ;_: in_IN Sweden_NNP fruit-trees_NNS and_CC
nets_NNS were_VBD fumigated_VBN with_IN it_PRP ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT trees_NNS might_MD bear_VB
fruit_NN and_CC the_DT nets_NNS catch_VBP fish_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Highlands_NNP of_IN Scotland_NNP the_DT
need-fire_NN was_VBD accounted_VBN a_DT sovereign_JJ remedy_NN for_IN witchcraft_NN ._. In_IN the_DT
island_NN of_IN Mull_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT fire_NN was_VBD kindled_VBN as_IN a_DT cure_NN for_IN the_DT murrain_NN ,_,
we_PRP hear_VBP of_IN the_DT rite_NN being_VBG accompanied_VBN by_IN the_DT sacrifice_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ
heifer_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD cut_VBN in_IN pieces_NNS and_CC burnt_NN ._. Slavonian_JJ and_CC Bulgarian_JJ
peasants_NNS conceive_VB cattle-plague_JJ as_IN a_DT foul_JJ fiend_NN or_CC vampyre_NN which_WDT can_MD
be_VB kept_VBN at_IN bay_NN by_IN interposing_VBG a_DT barrier_NN of_IN fire_NN between_IN it_PRP and_CC the_DT
herds_NNS ._. A_DT similar_JJ conception_NN may_MD perhaps_RB have_VB originally_RB everywhere_RB
underlain_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT need-fire_NN as_IN a_DT remedy_NN for_IN the_DT murrain_NN ._. It_PRP
appears_VBZ that_IN in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Germany_NNP the_DT people_NNS did_VBD not_RB wait_VB for_IN an_DT
outbreak_NN of_IN cattleplague_JJ ,_, but_CC ,_, taking_VBG time_NN by_IN the_DT forelock_NN ,_, kindled_CC
a_DT need-fire_NN annually_RB to_TO prevent_VB the_DT calamity_NN ._. Similarly_RB in_IN Poland_NNP
the_DT peasants_NNS are_VBP said_VBN to_TO kindle_VB fires_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN streets_NNS every_DT
year_NN on_IN St_NNP ._. Rochus_NNP '_POS s_PRP day_NN and_CC to_TO drive_VB the_DT cattle_NNS thrice_NN through_IN them_PRP
in_IN order_NN to_TO protect_VB the_DT beasts_NNS against_IN the_DT murrain_NN ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN
that_IN in_IN the_DT Hebrides_NNS the_DT cattle_NNS were_VBD in_IN like_JJ manner_NN driven_VBN annually_RB
round_RB the_DT Beltane_NN fires_NNS for_IN the_DT same_JJ purpose_NN ._. In_IN some_DT cantons_NNS of_IN
Switzerland_NNP children_NNS still_RB kindle_VB a_DT need-fire_NN by_IN the_DT friction_NN of_IN
wood_NN for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN dispelling_VBG a_DT mist_NN ._.




LXIII_NNP ._. The_DT Interpretation_NNP of_IN the_DT Fire-Festivals_NNS



1._PRP On_IN the_DT Fire-festivals_NNS in_IN general_JJ

THE_DT FOREGOING_NN survey_NN of_IN the_DT popular_JJ fire-festivals_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP
suggests_VBZ some_DT general_JJ observations_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN we_PRP can_MD hardly_RB
help_NN being_VBG struck_VBN by_IN the_DT resemblance_NN which_WDT the_DT ceremonies_NNS bear_VBP to_TO
each_DT other_JJ ,_, at_IN whatever_WDT time_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN and_CC in_IN whatever_WDT part_NN of_IN
Europe_NNP they_PRP are_VBP celebrated_VBN ._. The_DT custom_NN of_IN kindling_VBG great_JJ bonfires_NNS ,_,
leaping_VBG over_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC driving_VBG cattle_NNS through_IN or_CC round_VB them_PRP would_MD
seem_VB to_TO have_VB been_VBN practically_RB universal_JJ throughout_IN Europe_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT
same_JJ may_MD be_VB said_VBN of_IN the_DT processions_NNS or_CC races_NNS with_IN blazing_VBG torches_NNS
round_JJ fields_NNS ,_, orchards_NNS ,_, pastures_NNS ,_, or_CC cattle-stalls_NNS ._. Less_RBR widespread_JJ
are_VBP the_DT customs_NNS of_IN hurling_VBG lighted_VBN discs_NNS into_IN the_DT air_NN and_CC trundling_NN
a_DT burning_NN wheel_NN down_IN hill_NN ._. The_DT ceremonial_NN of_IN the_DT Yule_NNP log_NN is_VBZ
distinguished_VBN from_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT other_JJ fire-festivals_NNS by_IN the_DT privacy_NN
and_CC domesticity_NN which_WDT characterise_VBP it_PRP ;_: but_CC this_DT distinction_NN may_MD well_RB
be_VB due_JJ simply_RB to_TO the_DT rough_JJ weather_NN of_IN midwinter_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ apt_JJ not_RB
only_RB to_TO render_VB a_DT public_JJ assembly_NN in_IN the_DT open_JJ air_NN disagreeable_NN ,_, but_CC
also_RB at_IN any_DT moment_NN to_TO defeat_VB the_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT assembly_NN by_IN
extinguishing_VBG the_DT all-important_JJ fire_NN under_IN a_DT downpour_NN of_IN rain_NN or_CC a_DT
fall_NN of_IN snow_NN ._. Apart_RB from_IN these_DT local_JJ or_CC seasonal_JJ differences_NNS ,_, the_DT
general_JJ resemblance_NN between_IN the_DT fire-festivals_NNS at_IN all_DT times_NNS of_IN the_DT
year_NN and_CC in_IN all_DT places_NNS is_VBZ tolerably_RB close_RB ._. And_CC as_IN the_DT ceremonies_NNS
themselves_PRP resemble_VBP each_DT other_JJ ,_, so_RB do_VBP the_DT benefits_NNS which_WDT the_DT people_NNS
expect_VB to_TO reap_VB from_IN them_PRP ._. Whether_IN applied_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN bonfires_NNS
blazing_VBG at_IN fixed_JJ points_NNS ,_, or_CC of_IN torches_NNS carried_VBD about_RB from_IN place_NN to_TO
place_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN embers_NNS and_CC ashes_NNS taken_VBN from_IN the_DT smouldering_NN heap_NN of_IN
fuel_NN ,_, the_DT fire_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO promote_VB the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS and_CC
the_DT welfare_NN of_IN man_NN and_CC beast_NN ,_, either_CC positively_RB by_IN stimulating_VBG them_PRP ,_,
or_CC negatively_RB by_IN averting_VBG the_DT dangers_NNS and_CC calamities_NNS which_WDT threaten_VBP
them_PRP from_IN such_JJ causes_NNS as_IN thunder_NN and_CC lightning_NN ,_, conflagration_NN ,_,
blight_NN ,_, mildew_NN ,_, vermin_RB ,_, sterility_NN ,_, disease_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB least_JJS of_IN all_PDT
witchcraft_NN ._.

But_CC we_PRP naturally_RB ask_VBP ,_, How_WRB did_VBD it_PRP come_VB about_IN that_DT benefits_NNS so_RB great_JJ
and_CC manifold_NN were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB attained_VBN by_IN means_NNS so_RB simple_JJ ?_. In_IN
what_WP way_NN did_VBD people_NNS imagine_VB that_IN they_PRP could_MD procure_VB so_RB many_JJ goods_NNS or_CC
avoid_VB so_RB many_JJ ills_NNS by_IN the_DT application_NN of_IN fire_NN and_CC smoke_NN ,_, of_IN embers_NNS
and_CC ashes_NNS ?_. Two_CD different_JJ explanations_NNS of_IN the_DT fire-festivals_NNS have_VBP
been_VBN given_VBN by_IN modern_JJ enquirers_NNS ._. On_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN held_VBN
that_IN they_PRP are_VBP sun-charms_NNS or_CC magical_JJ ceremonies_NNS intended_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT
principle_NN of_IN imitative_JJ magic_NN ,_, to_TO ensure_VB a_DT needful_JJ supply_NN of_IN sunshine_NN
for_IN men_NNS ,_, animals_NNS ,_, and_CC plants_NNS by_IN kindling_NN fires_NNS which_WDT mimic_VBP on_IN earth_NN
the_DT great_JJ source_NN of_IN light_NN and_CC heat_NN in_IN the_DT sky_NN ._. This_DT was_VBD the_DT view_NN of_IN
Wilhelm_NNP Mannhardt_NNP ._. It_PRP may_MD be_VB called_VBN the_DT solar_JJ theory_NN ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ
hand_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN maintained_VBN that_IN the_DT ceremonial_JJ fires_NNS have_VBP no_UH
necessary_JJ reference_NN to_TO the_DT sun_NN but_CC are_VBP simply_RB purificatory_JJ in_IN
intention_NN ,_, being_VBG designed_VBN to_TO burn_VB up_RP and_CC destroy_VB all_DT harmful_JJ
influences_NNS ,_, whether_IN these_DT are_VBP conceived_VBN in_IN a_DT personal_JJ form_NN as_IN
witches_NNS ,_, demons_NNS ,_, and_CC monsters_NNS ,_, or_CC in_IN an_DT impersonal_JJ form_NN as_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN
pervading_VBG taint_NN or_CC corruption_NN of_IN the_DT air_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ the_DT view_NN of_IN Dr_NNP ._.
Edward_NNP Westermarck_NNP and_CC apparently_RB of_IN Professor_NNP Eugen_NNP Mogk_NNP ._. It_PRP may_MD be_VB
called_VBN the_DT purificatory_NN theory_NN ._. Obviously_RB the_DT two_CD theories_NNS postulate_VBP
two_CD very_RB different_JJ conceptions_NNS of_IN the_DT fire_NN which_WDT plays_VBZ the_DT principal_NN
part_NN in_IN the_DT rites_NNS ._. On_IN the_DT one_CD view_NN ,_, the_DT fire_NN ,_, like_IN sunshine_NN in_IN our_PRP$
latitude_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT genial_JJ creative_JJ power_NN which_WDT fosters_VBZ the_DT growth_NN of_IN
plants_NNS and_CC the_DT development_NN of_IN all_DT that_DT makes_VBZ for_IN health_NN and_CC
happiness_NN ;_: on_IN the_DT other_JJ view_NN ,_, the_DT fire_NN is_VBZ a_DT fierce_JJ destructive_JJ power_NN
which_WDT blasts_NNS and_CC consumes_VBZ all_PDT the_DT noxious_JJ elements_NNS ,_, whether_IN
spiritual_JJ or_CC material_NN ,_, that_IN menace_NN the_DT life_NN of_IN men_NNS ,_, of_IN animals_NNS ,_, and_CC
of_IN plants_NNS ._. According_VBG to_TO the_DT one_CD theory_NN the_DT fire_NN is_VBZ a_DT stimulant_NN ,_,
according_VBG to_TO the_DT other_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT disinfectant_JJ ;_: on_IN the_DT one_CD view_NN its_PRP$
virtue_NN is_VBZ positive_JJ ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ negative_JJ ._.

Yet_RB the_DT two_CD explanations_NNS ,_, different_JJ as_IN they_PRP are_VBP in_IN the_DT character_NN
which_WDT they_PRP attribute_VBP to_TO the_DT fire_NN ,_, are_VBP perhaps_RB not_RB wholly_RB
irreconcilable_JJ ._. If_IN we_PRP assume_VBP that_IN the_DT fires_NNS kindled_VBD at_IN these_DT
festivals_NNS were_VBD primarily_RB intended_VBN to_TO imitate_VB the_DT sun_NN '_'' s_PRP light_NN and_CC
heat_NN ,_, may_MD we_PRP not_RB regard_VB the_DT purificatory_NN and_CC disinfecting_VBG qualities_NNS ,_,
which_WDT popular_JJ opinion_NN certainly_RB appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB ascribed_VBN to_TO them_PRP ,_, as_IN
attributes_NNS derived_VBD directly_RB from_IN the_DT purificatory_NN and_CC disinfecting_VBG
qualities_NNS of_IN sunshine_NN ?_. In_IN this_DT way_NN we_PRP might_MD conclude_VB that_IN ,_, while_IN the_DT
imitation_NN of_IN sunshine_NN in_IN these_DT ceremonies_NNS was_VBD primary_JJ and_CC original_JJ ,_,
the_DT purification_NN attributed_VBD to_TO them_PRP was_VBD secondary_JJ and_CC derivative_JJ ._.
Such_JJ a_DT conclusion_NN ,_, occupying_VBG an_DT intermediate_JJ position_NN between_IN the_DT
two_CD opposing_VBG theories_NNS and_CC recognising_VBG an_DT element_NN of_IN truth_NN in_IN both_DT of_IN
them_PRP ,_, was_VBD adopted_VBN by_IN me_PRP in_IN earlier_JJR editions_NNS of_IN this_DT work_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN the_DT
meantime_NN Dr_NNP ._. Westermarck_NNP has_VBZ argued_VBN powerfully_RB in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT
purificatory_NN theory_NN alone_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP bound_VBN to_TO say_VB that_IN his_PRP$ arguments_NNS
carry_VB great_JJ weight_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN on_IN a_DT fuller_JJR review_NN of_IN the_DT facts_NNS the_DT
balance_NN of_IN evidence_NN seems_VBZ to_TO me_PRP to_TO incline_VB decidedly_RB in_IN his_PRP$ favour_NN ._.
However_RB ,_, the_DT case_NN is_VBZ not_RB so_RB clear_JJ as_IN to_TO justify_VB us_PRP in_IN dismissing_VBG the_DT
solar_JJ theory_NN without_IN discussion_NN ,_, and_CC accordingly_RB I_PRP propose_VBP to_TO adduce_VB
the_DT considerations_NNS which_WDT tell_VBP for_IN it_PRP before_IN proceeding_VBG to_TO notice_VB
those_DT which_WDT tell_VBP against_IN it_PRP ._. A_DT theory_NN which_WDT had_VBD the_DT support_NN of_IN so_RB
learned_VBN and_CC sagacious_VBZ an_DT investigator_NN as_IN W_NNP ._. Mannhardt_NNP is_VBZ entitled_VBN to_TO
a_DT respectful_JJ hearing_NN ._.



2._DT The_DT Solar_NNP Theory_NNP of_IN the_DT Fire-festivals_NNS

IN_IN AN_DT EARLIER_NN part_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN we_PRP saw_VBD that_IN savages_NNS resort_VBP to_TO charms_NNS
for_IN making_VBG sunshine_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD be_VB no_DT wonder_NN if_IN primitive_JJ man_NN in_IN
Europe_NNP did_VBD the_DT same_JJ ._. Indeed_RB ,_, when_WRB we_PRP consider_VBP the_DT cold_JJ and_CC cloudy_NN
climate_NN of_IN Europe_NNP during_IN a_DT great_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, we_PRP shall_MD find_VB it_PRP
natural_JJ that_IN sun-charms_NNS should_MD have_VB played_VBN a_DT much_RB more_RBR prominent_JJ
part_NN among_IN the_DT superstitious_JJ practices_NNS of_IN European_JJ peoples_NNS than_IN
among_IN those_DT of_IN savages_NNS who_WP live_VBP nearer_IN the_DT equator_NN and_CC who_WP
consequently_RB are_VBP apt_JJ to_TO get_VB in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN nature_NN more_RBR sunshine_NN

First_RB ,_, in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT dates_NNS of_IN the_DT festivals_NNS it_PRP can_MD be_VB no_DT mere_JJ

Not_RB only_RB the_DT date_NN of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT festivals_NNS but_CC the_DT manner_NN of_IN their_PRP$

"_`` medicine_NN is_VBZ burned_VBN on_IN a_DT fire_NN placed_VBN to_TO windward_NN of_IN the_DT garden_NN ,_, the_DT

But_CC in_IN popular_JJ belief_NN the_DT quickening_NN and_CC fertilising_VBG influence_NN of_IN

children_NNS ,_, the_DT she-goats_NNS bring_VBP forth_RB kids_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT ewes_NNS drop_NN lambs_NNS ._.
The_DT rule_NN observed_VBD in_IN some_DT places_NNS that_IN the_DT bonfires_NNS should_MD be_VB kindled_VBN
by_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP was_VBD last_JJ married_VBN seems_VBZ to_TO belong_VB to_TO the_DT same_JJ class_NN

from_IN ,_, or_CC to_TO impart_VB to_TO ,_, the_DT fire_NN a_DT generative_JJ and_CC fertilising_VBG

marriage_NN would_MD be_VB blessed_VBN with_IN offspring_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT like_JJ motive_NN would_MD
explain_VB the_DT custom_NN which_WDT obliges_VBZ couples_NNS married_VBN within_IN the_DT year_NN to_TO

life_NN of_IN man_NN to_TO the_DT courses_NNS of_IN the_DT heavens_NNS at_IN this_DT turning-point_NN of_IN
the_DT year_NN ._.

At_IN the_DT festivals_NNS which_WDT we_PRP are_VBP considering_VBG the_DT custom_NN of_IN kindling_VBG
bonfires_NNS is_VBZ commonly_RB associated_VBN with_IN a_DT custom_NN of_IN carrying_VBG lighted_VBN
torches_NNS about_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, the_DT orchards_NNS ,_, the_DT pastures_NNS ,_, the_DT flocks_NNS and_CC
the_DT herds_NNS ;_: and_CC we_PRP can_MD hardly_RB doubt_VB that_IN the_DT two_CD customs_NNS are_VBP only_RB two_CD
different_JJ ways_NNS of_IN attaining_VBG the_DT same_JJ object_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, the_DT benefits_NNS
which_WDT are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO flow_VB from_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, whether_IN it_PRP be_VB stationary_JJ
or_CC portable_JJ ._. Accordingly_RB if_IN we_PRP accept_VBP the_DT solar_JJ theory_NN of_IN the_DT
bonfires_NNS ,_, we_PRP seem_VBP bound_VBN to_TO apply_VB it_PRP also_RB to_TO the_DT torches_NNS ;_: we_PRP must_MD

flames_NNS are_VBP a_DT feeble_JJ imitation_NN ._. In_IN favour_NN of_IN this_DT view_NN it_PRP may_MD be_VB said_VBN

live_JJ coals_NNS from_IN the_DT bonfires_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB placed_VBN in_IN the_DT fields_NNS to_TO
prevent_VB blight_NN ._. On_IN the_DT eve_NN of_IN Twelfth_NNP Day_NNP in_IN Normandy_JJ men_NNS ,_, women_NNS ,_,
and_CC children_NNS run_VBP wildly_RB through_IN the_DT fields_NNS and_CC orchards_NNS with_IN lighted_JJ
torches_NNS ,_, which_WDT they_PRP wave_VB about_IN the_DT branches_NNS and_CC dash_NN against_IN the_DT

driving_VBG away_RB the_DT moles_NNS and_CC field-mice_NN ._. "_'' They_PRP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT
ceremony_NN fulfills_VBZ the_DT double_JJ object_NN of_IN exorcising_VBG the_DT vermin_NN whose_WP$
multiplication_NN would_MD be_VB a_DT real_JJ calamity_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN imparting_NN fecundity_NN
to_TO the_DT trees_NNS ,_, the_DT fields_NNS ,_, and_CC even_RB the_DT cattle_NNS ";_NN and_CC they_PRP imagine_VBP
that_IN the_DT more_JJR the_DT ceremony_NN is_VBZ prolonged_VBN ,_, the_DT greater_JJR will_MD be_VB the_DT
crop_NN of_IN fruit_NN next_JJ autumn_NN ._. In_IN Bohemia_NNP they_PRP say_VBP that_IN the_DT corn_NN will_MD
grow_VB as_RB high_JJ as_IN they_PRP fling_VBG the_DT blazing_VBG besoms_RB into_IN the_DT air_NN ._. Nor_CC are_VBP
such_JJ notions_NNS confined_VBN to_TO Europe_NNP ._. In_IN Corea_NNP ,_, a_DT few_JJ days_NNS before_IN the_DT New_NNP

the_DT mock-sun_JJ itself_PRP ,_, not_RB merely_RB its_PRP$ light_NN and_CC heat_NN represented_VBN by_IN

3._DT The_DT Purificatory_NNP Theory_NNP of_IN the_DT Fire-festivals_NNS

THUS_RB far_RB we_PRP have_VBP considered_VBN what_WP may_MD be_VB said_VBN for_IN the_DT theory_NN that_IN at_IN
the_DT European_JJ fire-festivals_NNS the_DT fire_NN is_VBZ kindled_VBN as_IN a_DT charm_NN to_TO ensure_VB
an_DT abundant_JJ supply_NN of_IN sunshine_NN for_IN man_NN and_CC beast_NN ,_, for_IN corn_NN and_CC
fruits_NNS ._. It_PRP remains_VBZ to_TO consider_VB what_WP may_MD be_VB said_VBN against_IN this_DT theory_NN
and_CC in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT view_NN that_IN in_IN these_DT rites_NNS fire_NN is_VBZ employed_VBN not_RB
as_IN a_DT creative_JJ but_CC as_IN a_DT cleansing_JJ agent_NN ,_, which_WDT purifies_VBZ men_NNS ,_, animals_NNS ,_,
and_CC plants_NNS by_IN burning_VBG up_RB and_CC consuming_VBG the_DT noxious_JJ elements_NNS ,_, whether_IN
material_NN or_CC spiritual_JJ ,_, which_WDT menace_NN all_DT living_VBG things_NNS with_IN disease_NN
and_CC death_NN ._.

First_RB ,_, then_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB observed_VBN that_IN the_DT people_NNS who_WP practise_VBP the_DT
fire-customs_NNS appear_VBP never_RB to_TO allege_VB the_DT solar_JJ theory_NN in_IN explanation_NN
of_IN them_PRP ,_, while_IN on_IN the_DT contrary_NN they_PRP do_VBP frequently_RB and_CC emphatically_RB
put_VBN forward_RB the_DT purificatory_NN theory_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ a_DT strong_JJ argument_NN in_IN
favour_NN of_IN the_DT purificatory_NN and_CC against_IN the_DT solar_JJ theory_NN ;_: for_IN the_DT
popular_JJ explanation_NN of_IN a_DT popular_JJ custom_NN is_VBZ never_RB to_TO be_VB rejected_VBN
except_IN for_IN grave_JJ cause_NN ._. And_CC in_IN the_DT present_JJ case_NN there_EX seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB no_RB
adequate_JJ reason_NN for_IN rejecting_VBG it_PRP ._. The_DT conception_NN of_IN fire_NN as_IN a_DT
destructive_JJ agent_NN ,_, which_WDT can_MD be_VB turned_VBN to_TO account_VB for_IN the_DT
consumption_NN of_IN evil_JJ things_NNS ,_, is_VBZ so_RB simple_JJ and_CC obvious_JJ that_IN it_PRP could_MD
hardly_RB escape_VB the_DT minds_NNS even_RB of_IN the_DT rude_JJ peasantry_NN with_IN whom_WP these_DT
festivals_NNS originated_VBP ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN the_DT conception_NN of_IN fire_NN as_IN an_DT
emanation_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN all_DT events_NNS as_IN linked_VBN to_TO it_PRP by_IN a_DT bond_NN of_IN
physical_JJ sympathy_NN ,_, is_VBZ far_RB less_RBR simple_JJ and_CC obvious_JJ ;_: and_CC though_IN the_DT
use_NN of_IN fire_NN as_IN a_DT charm_NN to_TO produce_VB sunshine_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB undeniable_JJ ,_,
nevertheless_RB in_IN attempting_VBG to_TO explain_VB popular_JJ customs_NNS we_PRP should_MD

to_TO hand_NN and_CC is_VBZ supported_VBN by_IN the_DT explicit_JJ testimony_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS
themselves_PRP ._. Now_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT fire-festivals_NNS the_DT destructive_JJ
aspect_NN of_IN fire_NN is_VBZ one_CD upon_IN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS dwell_VBP again_RB and_CC again_RB ;_:
and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ highly_RB significant_JJ that_IN the_DT great_JJ evil_NN against_IN which_WDT the_DT

these_DT fire-festivals_NNS was_VBD simply_RB to_TO destroy_VB or_CC at_IN all_DT events_NNS get_VBP rid_VB
of_IN the_DT witches_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD regarded_VBN as_IN the_DT causes_NNS of_IN nearly_RB all_PDT the_DT

This_DT suspicion_NN is_VBZ confirmed_VBN when_WRB we_PRP examine_VBP the_DT evils_NNS for_IN which_WDT the_DT
bonfires_NNS and_CC torches_NNS were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO provide_VB a_DT remedy_NN ._. Foremost_'' ,_,

none_NN which_WDT is_VBZ so_RB constantly_RB insisted_VBD on_IN as_IN the_DT harm_NN they_PRP do_VBP to_TO the_DT
herds_NNS ,_, particularly_RB by_IN stealing_VBG the_DT milk_NN from_IN the_DT cows_NNS ._. Now_RB it_PRP is_VBZ

the_DT need-fire_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ probably_RB the_DT original_JJ of_IN all_PDT the_DT ceremonial_NN
fires_NNS now_RB under_IN consideration_NN ,_, is_VBZ not_RB a_DT sun-charm_NN ,_, but_CC clearly_RB and_CC

wild_JJ animals_NNS ._.

Again_RB ,_, the_DT bonfires_NNS are_VBP often_RB supposed_VBN to_TO protect_VB the_DT fields_NNS against_IN

and_CC thunderstorms_NNS are_VBP frequently_RB thought_VBN to_TO be_VB caused_VBN by_IN witches_NNS ;_:
hence_RB the_DT fire_NN which_WDT bans_VBZ the_DT witches_NNS necessarily_RB serves_VBZ at_IN the_DT same_JJ

brands_NNS taken_VBN from_IN the_DT bonfires_NNS are_VBP commonly_RB kept_VBN in_IN the_DT houses_NNS to_TO
guard_NN them_PRP against_IN conflagration_NN ;_: and_CC though_IN this_DT may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB
done_VBN on_IN the_DT principle_NN of_IN homoeopathic_JJ magic_NN ,_, one_CD fire_NN being_VBG thought_VBN

intention_NN may_MD be_VB to_TO keep_VB witch-incendiaries_NNS at_IN bay_NN ._. Again_RB ,_, people_NNS

flames_NNS steadily_RB in_IN order_NN to_TO preserve_VB their_PRP$ eyes_NNS in_IN good_JJ health_NN ;_: and_CC

midsummer_NN fires_NNS or_CC to_TO circumambulate_VB them_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN to_TO prevent_VB a_DT

But_CC if_IN the_DT bonfires_NNS and_CC torches_NNS of_IN the_DT fire-festivals_NNS are_VBP to_TO be_VB

them_PRP so_RB effectually_RB as_IN by_IN hurling_VBG lighted_JJ missiles_NNS ,_, whether_IN discs_NNS ,_,
torches_NNS ,_, or_CC besoms_RB ,_, after_IN them_PRP as_IN they_PRP flit_VBD past_JJ overhead_NN in_IN the_DT
gloom_NN ?_. The_DT South_NNP Slavonian_NNP peasant_NN believes_VBZ that_IN witches_NNS ride_VBP in_IN the_DT
dark_JJ hail-clouds_NNS ;_: so_RB he_PRP shoots_VBZ at_IN the_DT clouds_NNS to_TO bring_VB down_RP the_DT hags_NNS ,_,
while_IN he_PRP curses_VBZ them_PRP ,_, saying_VBG ,_, "_`` Curse_NNP ,_, curse_NN Herodias_NNP ,_, thy_JJ mother_NN is_VBZ
a_DT heathen_NN ,_, damned_VBN of_IN God_NNP and_CC fettered_VBD through_IN the_DT Redeemer_NNP '_POS s_PRP blood_NN ."_CC
Also_RB he_PRP brings_VBZ out_RP a_DT pot_NN of_IN glowing_VBG charcoal_NN on_IN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ thrown_VBN
holy_JJ oil_NN ,_, laurel_NN leaves_NNS ,_, and_CC wormwood_NN to_TO make_VB a_DT smoke_NN ._. The_DT fumes_NNS are_VBP
supposed_VBN to_TO ascend_VB to_TO the_DT clouds_NNS and_CC stupefy_VB the_DT witches_NNS ,_, so_RB that_IN
they_PRP tumble_VB down_RP to_TO earth_NN ._. And_CC in_IN order_NN that_IN they_PRP may_MD not_RB fall_VB soft_JJ ,_,
but_CC may_MD hurt_VB themselves_PRP very_RB much_RB ,_, the_DT yokel_NN hastily_RB brings_VBZ out_RP a_DT
chair_NN and_CC tilts_VBZ it_PRP bottom_JJ up_IN so_RB that_IN the_DT witch_NN in_IN falling_VBG may_MD break_VB
her_PRP$ legs_NNS on_IN the_DT legs_NNS of_IN the_DT chair_NN ._. Worse_JJR than_IN that_DT ,_, he_PRP cruelly_RB lays_.
scythes_NNS ,_, bill-hooks_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ formidable_JJ weapons_NNS edge_NN upwards_RB so_RB as_IN
to_TO cut_VB and_CC mangle_VB the_DT poor_JJ wretches_NNS when_WRB they_PRP drop_VBP plump_NN upon_IN them_PRP

On_IN this_DT view_NN the_DT fertility_NN supposed_VBN to_TO follow_VB the_DT application_NN of_IN

to_TO promote_VB marriage_NN and_CC to_TO procure_VB offspring_NN for_IN childless_JJ couples_NNS ._.

power_NN of_IN the_DT fire_NN to_TO remove_VB those_DT obstacles_NNS which_WDT the_DT spells_NNS of_IN
witches_NNS and_CC wizards_NNS notoriously_RB present_JJ to_TO the_DT union_NN of_IN man_NN and_CC

On_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, the_DT theory_NN of_IN the_DT purificatory_JJ virtue_NN of_IN the_DT
ceremonial_JJ fires_NNS appears_VBZ more_RBR probable_JJ and_CC more_RBR in_IN accordance_NN with_IN
the_DT evidence_NN than_IN the_DT opposing_VBG theory_NN of_IN their_PRP$ connexion_NN with_IN the_DT
sun_NN ._.




LXIV_NNP ._. The_DT Burning_NNP of_IN Human_NNP Beings_NNP in_IN the_DT Fires_NNPS



1._`` The_DT Burning_NN of_IN Effigies_NNS in_IN the_DT Fires_NNPS

WE_NNP have_VBP still_RB to_TO ask_VB ,_, What_WP is_VBZ the_DT meaning_NN of_IN burning_VBG effigies_NNS in_IN the_DT
fire_NN at_IN these_DT festivals_NNS ?_. After_IN the_DT preceding_VBG investigation_NN the_DT
answer_NN to_TO the_DT question_NN seems_VBZ obvious_JJ ._. As_IN the_DT fires_NNS are_VBP often_RB alleged_VBN
to_TO be_VB kindled_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN burning_VBG the_DT witches_NNS ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT
effigy_NN burnt_NN in_IN them_PRP is_VBZ sometimes_RB called_VBN "_`` the_DT Witch_NNP ,"_, we_PRP might_MD
naturally_RB be_VB disposed_VBN to_TO conclude_VB that_IN all_PDT the_DT effigies_NNS consumed_VBN in_IN
the_DT flames_NNS on_IN these_DT occasions_NNS represent_VBP witches_NNS or_CC warlocks_NNS ,_, and_CC
that_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN burning_VBG them_PRP is_VBZ merely_RB a_DT substitute_NN for_IN burning_VBG
the_DT wicked_JJ men_NNS and_CC women_NNS themselves_PRP ,_, since_IN on_IN the_DT principle_NN of_IN
homoeopathic_JJ or_CC imitative_JJ magic_NN you_PRP practically_RB destroy_VBP the_DT witch_NN
herself_PRP in_IN destroying_VBG her_PRP$ effigy_NN ._. On_IN the_DT whole_NN this_DT explanation_NN of_IN
the_DT burning_NN of_IN straw_NN figures_NNS in_IN human_JJ shape_NN at_IN the_DT festivals_NNS is_VBZ
perhaps_RB the_DT most_RBS probable_JJ ._.

Yet_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB that_IN this_DT explanation_NN does_VBZ not_RB apply_VB to_TO all_PDT the_DT cases_NNS ,_,
and_CC that_DT certain_JJ of_IN them_PRP may_MD admit_VB and_CC even_RB require_VB another_DT
interpretation_NN ._. For_IN the_DT effigies_NNS so_RB burned_VBN ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP already_RB
remarked_VBD ,_, can_MD hardly_RB be_VB separated_VBN from_IN the_DT effigies_NNS of_IN Death_NNP which_WDT
are_VBP burned_VBN or_CC otherwise_RB destroyed_VBN in_IN spring_NN ;_: and_CC grounds_NNS have_VBP been_VBN
already_RB given_VBN for_IN regarding_VBG the_DT so-called_JJ effigies_NNS of_IN Death_NNP as_IN
really_RB representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT tree-spirit_NN or_CC spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ._.
Are_VBP the_DT other_JJ effigies_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP burned_VBN in_IN the_DT spring_NN and_CC midsummer_NN
bonfires_NNS ,_, susceptible_JJ of_IN the_DT same_JJ explanation_NN ?_. It_PRP would_MD seem_VB so_RB ._. For_IN

2._DT The_DT Burning_NNP of_IN Men_NNP and_CC Animals_NNS in_IN the_DT Fires_NNPS

IN_IN THE_DT POPULAR_NN customs_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT fire-festivals_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP
there_EX are_VBP certain_JJ features_NNS which_WDT appear_VBP to_TO point_VB to_TO a_DT former_JJ
practice_NN of_IN human_JJ sacrifice_NN ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN reasons_NNS for_IN believing_VBG that_IN
in_IN Europe_NNP living_VBG persons_NNS have_VBP often_RB acted_VBN as_IN representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT
tree-spirit_NN and_CC corn-spirit_NN and_CC have_VBP suffered_VBN death_NN as_IN such_JJ ._. There_EX

any_DT special_JJ advantages_NNS were_VBD likely_JJ to_TO be_VB attained_VBN by_IN putting_VBG them_PRP to_TO

which_WDT enters_VBZ into_IN the_DT calculations_NNS of_IN primitive_JJ man_NN ._. Now_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT

acts_NNS so_RB cleverly_RB that_IN the_DT children_NNS really_RB believe_VBP he_PRP is_VBZ being_VBG

the_DT title_NN of_IN the_DT Green_NNP Wolf_NNP ,_, was_VBD pursued_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ comrades_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB

representative_NN of_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN vegetation_NN ._. At_IN Wolfeck_NNP ,_, in_IN Austria_NNP ,_,

"_`` Forest_NNP trees_NNS I_PRP want_VBP ,_,
No_DT sour_JJ milk_NN for_IN me_PRP ,_,
But_CC beer_NN and_CC wine_NN ,_,
So_RB can_MD the_DT wood-man_NN be_VB jolly_JJ and_CC gay_JJ ."_NN


In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Bavaria_NNP ,_, also_RB ,_, the_DT boys_NNS who_WP go_VBP from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN

on_IN the_DT second_JJ Sunday_NNP after_IN Midsummer_NNP Day_NNP ._. On_IN this_DT last_JJ day_NN the_DT

it_PRP out_RP ._. All_PDT the_DT people_NNS present_JJ fled_VBD at_IN the_DT sight_NN of_IN him_PRP ._.

But_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ possible_JJ to_TO go_VB farther_RB than_IN this_DT ._. Of_IN human_JJ sacrifices_NNS

With_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ notes_NNS Caesar_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB incorporated_VBN the_DT

in_IN Gaul_NNP about_IN fifty_CD years_NNS before_IN Caesar_NNP carried_VBD the_DT Roman_NNP arms_NNS to_TO

other_JJ ,_, and_CC of_IN Caesar_NNP ,_, for_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT three_CD derivative_JJ accounts_NNS

Such_JJ were_VBD the_DT great_JJ festivals_NNS held_VBD once_RB every_DT five_CD years_NNS ._. But_CC

These_DT wicker_NN giants_NNS of_IN the_DT Druids_NNS seem_VBP to_TO have_VB had_VBD till_IN lately_RB ,_, if_IN
not_RB down_RB to_TO the_DT present_JJ time_NN ,_, their_PRP$ representatives_NNS at_IN the_DT spring_NN
and_CC midsummer_NN festivals_NNS of_IN modern_JJ Europe_NNP ._. At_IN Douay_NNP ,_, down_IN at_IN least_JJS to_TO

his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC his_PRP$ three_CD children_NNS ,_, all_DT constructed_VBN of_IN osiers_NNS on_IN the_DT

the_DT giants_NNS took_VBD place_NN on_IN Midsummer_NNP Day_NNP ,_, the_DT twenty-fourth_JJ of_IN June_NNP ._.
The_DT festival_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD known_VBN as_IN the_DT Follies_NNP of_IN Dunkirk_NNP ,_, attracted_VBN
multitudes_NNS of_IN spectators_NNS ._. The_DT giant_NN was_VBD a_DT huge_JJ figure_NN of_IN

in_IN a_DT long_JJ blue_JJ robe_NN with_IN gold_JJ stripes_NNS ,_, which_WDT reached_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ feet_NNS ,_,
concealing_VBG the_DT dozen_NN or_CC more_JJR men_NNS who_WP made_VBD it_PRP dance_VB and_CC bob_VB its_PRP$ head_NN
to_TO the_DT spectators_NNS ._. This_DT colossal_NN effigy_NN went_VBD by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Papa_NNP

We_PRP have_VBP still_RB to_TO ask_VB ,_, What_WP is_VBZ the_DT meaning_NN of_IN such_JJ sacrifices_NNS ?_. Why_WRB

The_DT Druidical_JJ sacrifices_NNS which_WDT we_PRP are_VBP considering_VBG were_VBD explained_VBN in_IN
a_DT different_JJ way_NN by_IN W_NNP ._. Mannhardt_NNP ._. He_PRP supposed_VBD that_IN the_DT men_NNS whom_WP the_DT

cornspirit_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, as_IN we_PRP saw_VBD in_IN an_DT earlier_JJR part_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN ,_, is_VBZ

fires_NNS is_VBZ "_`` burning_VBG the_DT witches_NNS ,"_IN effigies_NNS of_IN witches_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB
consumed_VBN in_IN the_DT flames_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT fires_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ embers_NNS ,_, or_CC their_PRP$ ashes_NNS
are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO furnish_VB protection_NN against_IN witchcraft_NN ._. On_IN the_DT other_JJ

in_IN the_DT fires_NNS are_VBP regarded_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS as_IN representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT

Europe_NNP snakes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN regarded_VBN as_IN embodiments_NNS of_IN the_DT tree-spirit_NN
or_CC corn-spirit_NN ,_, though_IN in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN the_DT conception_NN
appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB not_RB unknown_JJ ._. Whereas_IN the_DT popular_JJ faith_NN in_IN the_DT
transformation_NN of_IN witches_NNS into_IN animals_NNS is_VBZ so_RB general_JJ and_CC deeply_RB
rooted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT fear_NN of_IN these_DT uncanny_JJ beings_NNS is_VBZ so_RB strong_JJ ,_, that_IN it_PRP
seems_VBZ safer_JJR to_TO suppose_VB that_IN the_DT cats_NNS and_CC other_JJ animals_NNS which_WDT were_VBD
burnt_NN in_IN the_DT fire_NN suffered_VBD death_NN as_IN embodiments_NNS of_IN witches_NNS than_IN that_WDT
they_PRP perished_VBD as_IN representatives_NNS of_IN vegetation-spirits_NNS ._.




LXV_NNP ._. Balder_NNP and_CC the_DT Mistletoe_NNP

THE_DT READER_NNP may_MD remember_VB that_IN the_DT preceding_VBG account_NN of_IN the_DT popular_JJ
fire-festivals_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP was_VBD suggested_VBN by_IN the_DT myth_NN of_IN the_DT Norse_NNP god_NN
Balder_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN slain_VBN by_IN a_DT branch_NN of_IN mistletoe_NN and_CC
burnt_NN in_IN a_DT great_JJ fire_NN ._. We_PRP have_VBP now_RB to_TO enquire_VB how_WRB far_RB the_DT customs_NNS
which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN passed_VBN in_IN review_NN help_NN to_TO shed_VB light_NN on_IN the_DT myth_NN ._. In_IN
this_DT enquiry_NN it_PRP may_MD be_VB convenient_JJ to_TO begin_VB with_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN ,_, the_DT
instrument_NN of_IN Balder_NN '_'' s_PRP death_NN ._.

From_IN time_NN immemorial_JJ the_DT mistletoe_NN has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT object_NN of_IN
superstitious_JJ veneration_NN in_IN Europe_NNP ._. It_PRP was_VBD worshipped_VBN by_IN the_DT Druids_NNP ,_,
as_IN we_PRP learn_VBP from_IN a_DT famous_JJ passage_NN of_IN Pliny_NNP ._. After_IN enumerating_VBG the_DT
different_JJ kinds_NNS of_IN mistletoe_NN ,_, he_PRP proceeds_VBZ :_: "_`` In_IN treating_VBG of_IN this_DT
subject_NN ,_, the_DT admiration_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT mistletoe_NN is_VBZ held_VBN throughout_IN
Gaul_NNP ought_MD not_RB to_TO pass_VB unnoticed_VBN ._. The_DT Druids_NNP ,_, for_IN so_RB they_PRP call_VBP their_PRP$
wizards_NNS ,_, esteem_VBP nothing_NN more_JJR sacred_JJ than_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN and_CC the_DT tree_NN
on_IN which_WDT it_PRP grows_VBZ ,_, provided_VBN only_RB that_IN the_DT tree_NN is_VBZ an_DT oak_NN ._. But_CC apart_RB
from_IN this_DT they_PRP choose_VBP oak-woods_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ sacred_JJ groves_NNS and_CC perform_VB
no_DT sacred_JJ rites_NNS without_IN oak-leaves_NNS ;_: so_RB that_IN the_DT very_JJ name_NN of_IN Druids_NNS
may_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT Greek_NNP appellation_NN derived_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ worship_NN of_IN
the_DT oak_NN ._. For_IN they_PRP believe_VBP that_IN whatever_WDT grows_VBZ on_IN these_DT trees_NNS is_VBZ sent_VBN
from_IN heaven_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ a_DT sign_NN that_IN the_DT tree_NN has_VBZ been_VBN chosen_VBN by_IN the_DT god_NN
himself_PRP ._. The_DT mistletoe_NN is_VBZ very_RB rarely_RB to_TO be_VB met_VBN with_IN ;_: but_CC when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ
found_VBN ,_, they_PRP gather_VBP it_PRP with_IN solemn_JJ ceremony_NN ._. This_DT they_PRP do_VBP above_IN all_PDT
on_IN the_DT sixth_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT moon_NN ,_, from_IN whence_IN they_PRP date_VBP the_DT beginnings_NNS
of_IN their_PRP$ months_NNS ,_, of_IN their_PRP$ years_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN their_PRP$ thirty_CD years_NNS '_POS cycle_NN ,_,
because_IN by_IN the_DT sixth_JJ day_NN the_DT moon_NN has_VBZ plenty_RB of_IN vigour_NN and_CC has_VBZ not_RB
run_VB half_PDT its_PRP$ course_NN ._. After_IN due_JJ preparations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN for_IN a_DT
sacrifice_NN and_CC a_DT feast_NN under_IN the_DT tree_NN ,_, they_PRP hail_VBP it_PRP as_IN the_DT universal_JJ
healer_NN and_CC bring_VB to_TO the_DT spot_NN two_CD white_JJ bulls_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ horns_NNS have_VBP never_RB
been_VBN bound_VBN before_IN ._. A_DT priest_NN clad_VBN in_IN a_DT white_JJ robe_NN climbs_VBZ the_DT tree_NN and_CC
with_IN a_DT golden_JJ sickle_JJ cuts_NNS the_DT mistletoe_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ caught_VBN in_IN a_DT white_JJ
cloth_NN ._. Then_RB they_PRP sacrifice_VB the_DT victims_NNS ,_, praying_VBG that_IN God_NNP may_MD make_VB
his_PRP$ own_JJ gift_NN to_TO prosper_VB with_IN those_DT upon_IN whom_WP he_PRP has_VBZ bestowed_VBN it_PRP ._.
They_PRP believe_VBP that_IN a_DT potion_NN prepared_VBN from_IN mistletoe_NN will_MD make_VB barren_JJ
animals_NNS to_TO bring_VB forth_RB ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ a_DT remedy_NN against_IN all_PDT
poison_NN ."_NN

In_IN another_DT passage_NN Pliny_NNP tells_VBZ us_PRP that_IN in_IN medicine_NN the_DT mistletoe_NN
which_WDT grows_VBZ on_IN an_DT oak_NN was_VBD esteemed_VBN the_DT most_RBS efficacious_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN
its_PRP$ efficacy_NN was_VBD by_IN some_DT superstitious_JJ people_NNS supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB

without_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN iron_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN when_WRB gathered_VBD it_PRP was_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO
touch_NN the_DT earth_NN ;_: oak-mistletoe_NN thus_RB obtained_VBD was_VBD deemed_VBN a_DT cure_NN for_IN

he_PRP says_VBZ that_IN mistletoe_NN was_VBD supposed_VBN ,_, like_IN vinegar_NN and_CC an_DT egg_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB
an_DT excellent_JJ means_NN of_IN extinguishing_VBG a_DT fire_NN ._.

If_IN in_IN these_DT latter_JJ passages_NNS Pliny_NNP refers_VBZ ,_, as_IN he_PRP apparently_RB does_VBZ ,_, to_TO

an_DT oak_NN ;_: both_DT of_IN them_PRP deemed_VBD it_PRP an_DT effectual_JJ remedy_NN for_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN
ailments_NNS ,_, and_CC both_DT of_IN them_PRP ascribed_VBN to_TO it_PRP a_DT quickening_JJ virtue_NN ,_, the_DT

preferring_VBG the_DT first_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT Druids_NNS the_DT sixth_JJ ._.

With_IN these_DT beliefs_NNS of_IN the_DT ancient_JJ Gauls_NNP and_CC Italians_NNPS as_IN to_TO the_DT

"_`` like_IN many_JJ nations_NNS of_IN the_DT Northern_JJ origin_NN ,_, hold_VB the_DT mistletoe_NN in_IN
peculiar_JJ veneration_NN ._. They_PRP look_VBP upon_IN it_PRP as_IN a_DT medicine_NN ,_, good_JJ in_IN almost_RB
every_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ sometimes_RB taken_VBN in_IN food_NN and_CC at_IN others_NNS

of_IN making_VBG the_DT gardens_NNS bear_VBP plentifully_RB ._. When_WRB used_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ,_,
the_DT leaves_NNS are_VBP cut_VBN up_RP into_IN fine_JJ pieces_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, after_IN having_VBG been_VBN

being_VBG eaten_VBN with_IN the_DT food_NN ._. Barren_NNP women_NNS have_VBP also_RB been_VBN known_VBN to_TO eat_VB
the_DT mistletoe_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO be_VB made_VBN to_TO bear_VB children_NNS ._. That_DT mistletoe_NN
which_WDT grows_VBZ upon_IN the_DT willow_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB the_DT greatest_JJS

Thus_RB the_DT Aino_NNP agree_VBP with_IN the_DT Druids_NNS in_IN regarding_VBG mistletoe_NN as_IN a_DT cure_NN

doubtless_RB have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, each_DT of_IN them_PRP for_IN themselves_PRP ,_, something_NN

This_DT suggestion_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT superstition_NN is_VBZ strongly_RB
confirmed_VBN by_IN the_DT Druidical_NNP belief_NN ,_, reported_VBN by_IN Pliny_NNP ,_, that_IN whatever_WDT
grew_VBD on_IN an_DT oak_NN was_VBD sent_VBN from_IN heaven_NN and_CC was_VBD a_DT sign_NN that_IN the_DT tree_NN had_VBD
been_VBN chosen_VBN by_IN the_DT god_NN himself_PRP ._. Such_PDT a_DT belief_NN explains_VBZ why_WRB the_DT
Druids_NNS cut_VBD the_DT mistletoe_NN ,_, not_RB with_IN a_DT common_JJ knife_NN ,_, but_CC with_IN a_DT golden_JJ
sickle_JJ ,_, and_CC why_WRB ,_, when_WRB cut_VBN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD not_RB suffered_VBN to_TO touch_VB the_DT earth_NN ;_:
probably_RB they_PRP thought_VBD that_IN the_DT celestial_JJ plant_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN
profaned_VBN and_CC its_PRP$ marvellous_JJ virtue_NN lost_VBN by_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT ground_NN ._.
With_IN the_DT ritual_NN observed_VBN by_IN the_DT Druids_NNS in_IN cutting_VBG the_DT mistletoe_NN we_PRP
may_MD compare_VB the_DT ritual_NN which_WDT in_IN Cambodia_NNP is_VBZ prescribed_VBN in_IN a_DT similar_JJ
case_NN ._. They_PRP say_VBP that_IN when_WRB you_PRP see_VBP an_DT orchid_NN growing_VBG as_IN a_DT parasite_NN on_IN

pot_NN and_CC let_VB the_DT pot_NN fall_NN to_TO the_DT ground_NN ._. After_IN that_WDT you_PRP make_VBP in_IN the_DT
pot_NN a_DT decoction_NN which_WDT confers_VBZ the_DT gift_NN of_IN invulnerability_NN ._. Thus_RB just_RB

the_DT store_NN which_WDT the_DT primitive_JJ mind_NN sets_NNS on_IN such_JJ vantage_NN grounds_NNS ._.

Whatever_WDT may_MD be_VB the_DT origin_NN of_IN these_DT beliefs_NNS and_CC practices_NNS concerning_VBG
the_DT mistletoe_NN ,_, certain_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ that_IN some_DT of_IN them_PRP have_VBP their_PRP$ analogies_NNS

not_RB be_VB cut_VBN in_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ way_NN but_CC must_MD be_VB shot_VBN or_CC knocked_VBN down_RB with_IN
stones_NNS from_IN the_DT tree_NN on_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ growing_VBG ._. Thus_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT Swiss_JJ
canton_NN of_IN Aargau_NNP "_`` all_DT parasitic_JJ plants_NNS are_VBP esteemed_VBN in_IN a_DT certain_JJ
