shrink_VB from_IN cutting_VBG it_PRP off_RP in_IN the_DT usual_JJ manner_NN ._. Instead_RB of_IN that_IN they_PRP
procure_VB it_PRP in_IN the_DT following_VBG manner_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT sun_NN is_VBZ in_IN Sagittarius_NNP
and_CC the_DT moon_NN is_VBZ on_IN the_DT wane_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT first_JJ ,_, third_JJ ,_, or_CC fourth_JJ day_NN
before_IN the_DT new_JJ moon_NN ,_, one_CD ought_MD to_TO shoot_VB down_RP with_IN an_DT arrow_NN the_DT
mistletoe_NN of_IN an_DT oak_NN and_CC to_TO catch_VB it_PRP with_IN the_DT left_JJ hand_NN as_IN it_PRP falls_VBZ ._.
Such_JJ mistletoe_NN is_VBZ a_DT remedy_NN for_IN every_DT ailment_NN of_IN children_NNS ."_. Here_RB
among_IN the_DT Swiss_JJ peasants_NNS ,_, as_IN among_IN the_DT Druids_NNS of_IN old_JJ ,_, special_JJ virtue_NN
is_VBZ ascribed_VBN to_TO mistletoe_VB which_WDT grows_VBZ on_IN an_DT oak_NN :_: it_PRP may_MD not_RB be_VB cut_VBN in_IN
the_DT usual_JJ way_NN :_: it_PRP must_MD be_VB caught_VBN as_IN it_PRP falls_VBZ to_TO the_DT ground_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP

Again_RB ,_, in_IN respect_NN of_IN the_DT healing_JJ virtues_NNS of_IN mistletoe_NN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN

plant_NN ,_, or_CC perhaps_RB the_DT oak_NN on_IN which_WDT it_PRP grew_VBD ,_, the_DT "_`` all-healer_JJ ";_NN and_CC
"_`` all-healer_JJ "_'' is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO be_VB still_RB a_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN in_IN the_DT
modern_JJ Celtic_JJ speech_NN of_IN Brittany_NNP ,_, Wales_NNP ,_, Ireland_NNP ,_, and_CC Scotland_NNP ._. On_IN
St_NNP ._. John_NNP '_POS s_PRP morning_NN (_-LRB- Midsummer_JJ morning_NN )_-RRB- peasants_NNS of_IN Piedmont_NNP and_CC
Lombardy_NNP go_VB out_RP to_TO search_VB the_DT oak-leaves_NNS for_IN the_DT "_`` oil_NN of_IN St_NNP ._. John_NNP ,"_.
which_WDT is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO heal_VB all_DT wounds_NNS made_VBD with_IN cutting_VBG instruments_NNS ._.
Originally_RB ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, the_DT "_`` oil_NN of_IN St_NNP ._. John_NNP "_'' was_VBD simply_RB the_DT mistletoe_NN ,_,
or_CC a_DT decoction_NN made_VBN from_IN it_PRP ._. For_IN in_IN Holstein_NNP the_DT mistletoe_NN ,_,
especially_RB oak-mistletoe_JJ ,_, is_VBZ still_RB regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT panacea_NN for_IN green_JJ
wounds_NNS and_CC as_IN a_DT sure_JJ charm_NN to_TO secure_VB success_NN in_IN hunting_NN ;_: and_CC at_IN
Lacaune_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT south_NN of_IN France_NNP ,_, the_DT old_JJ Druidical_NNP belief_NN in_IN the_DT
mistletoe_NN as_IN an_DT antidote_NN to_TO all_DT poisons_NNS still_RB survives_VBZ among_IN the_DT
peasantry_NN ;_: they_PRP apply_VBP the_DT plant_NN to_TO the_DT stomach_NN of_IN the_DT sufferer_NN or_CC
give_VB him_PRP a_DT decoction_NN of_IN it_PRP to_TO drink_VB ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT ancient_JJ belief_NN that_WDT
mistletoe_NN is_VBZ a_DT cure_NN for_IN epilepsy_NN has_VBZ survived_VBN in_IN modern_JJ times_NNS not_RB
only_RB among_IN the_DT ignorant_JJ but_CC among_IN the_DT learned_VBN ._. Thus_RB in_IN Sweden_NNP
persons_NNS afflicted_VBN with_IN the_DT falling_VBG sickness_JJR think_VBP they_PRP can_MD ward_VB off_RB
attacks_NNS of_IN the_DT malady_NN by_IN carrying_VBG about_RB with_IN them_PRP a_DT knife_NN which_WDT has_VBZ
a_DT handle_NN of_IN oak_NN mistletoe_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN Germany_NNP for_IN a_DT similar_JJ purpose_NN
pieces_NNS of_IN mistletoe_NN used_VBN to_TO be_VB hung_VBN round_RB the_DT necks_NNS of_IN children_NNS ._. In_IN

the_DT custom_NN ,_, said_VBD to_TO be_VB still_RB observed_VBN by_IN peasants_NNS in_IN many_JJ mountain_NN

with_IN a_DT heavy_JJ block_NN of_IN oak-wood_NN ._. The_DT block_NN is_VBZ so_RB arranged_VBN that_IN it_PRP
smoulders_NNS slowly_RB and_CC is_VBZ not_RB finally_RB reduced_VBN to_TO charcoal_NN till_IN the_DT
expiry_NN of_IN a_DT year_NN ._. Then_RB upon_IN next_JJ Midsummer_NNP Day_NNP the_DT charred_JJ embers_NNS of_IN
the_DT old_JJ log_NN are_VBP removed_VBN to_TO make_VB room_NN for_IN the_DT new_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC are_VBP mixed_JJ
with_IN the_DT seed-corn_NN or_CC scattered_VBN about_IN the_DT garden_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ believed_VBN
to_TO guard_VB the_DT food_NN cooked_VBN on_IN the_DT hearth_NN from_IN witchcraft_NN ,_, to_TO preserve_VB
the_DT luck_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, to_TO promote_VB the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO
keep_VB them_PRP from_IN blight_NN and_CC vermin_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT custom_NN is_VBZ almost_RB exactly_RB
parallel_RB to_TO that_DT of_IN the_DT Yule-log_NNP ,_, which_WDT in_IN parts_NNS of_IN Germany_NNP ,_, France_NNP ,_,
England_NNP ,_, Serbia_NNP ,_, and_CC other_JJ Slavonic_JJ lands_NNS was_VBD commonly_RB of_IN oak-wood_NN ._.
The_DT general_JJ conclusion_NN is_VBZ ,_, that_IN at_IN those_DT periodic_JJ or_CC occasional_JJ
ceremonies_NNS the_DT ancient_JJ Aryans_NNS both_DT kindled_VBD and_CC fed_VBD the_DT fire_NN with_IN the_DT
sacred_JJ oak-wood_NN ._.

But_CC if_IN at_IN these_DT solemn_JJ rites_NNS the_DT fire_NN was_VBD regularly_RB made_VBN of_IN oakwood_NN ,_,
it_PRP follows_VBZ that_IN any_DT man_NN who_WP was_VBD burned_VBN in_IN it_PRP as_IN a_DT personification_NN of_IN
the_DT tree-spirit_NN could_MD have_VB represented_VBN no_DT tree_NN but_CC the_DT oak_NN ._. The_DT
sacred_JJ oak_NN was_VBD thus_RB burned_VBN in_IN duplicate_NN ;_: the_DT wood_NN of_IN the_DT tree_NN was_VBD
consumed_VBN in_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC along_IN with_IN it_PRP was_VBD consumed_VBN a_DT living_VBG man_NN as_IN
a_DT personification_NN of_IN the_DT oak-spirit_NN ._. The_DT conclusion_NN thus_RB drawn_VBN for_IN
the_DT European_JJ Aryans_NNP in_IN general_JJ is_VBZ confirmed_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ special_JJ
application_NN to_TO the_DT Scandinavians_NNPS by_IN the_DT relation_NN in_IN which_WDT amongst_NN
them_PRP the_DT mistletoe_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB stood_VBN to_TO the_DT burning_NN of_IN the_DT
victim_NN in_IN the_DT midsummer_NN fire_NN ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN among_IN Scandinavians_NNPS
it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN customary_JJ to_TO gather_VB the_DT mistletoe_NN at_IN midsummer_NN ._. But_CC so_RB
far_RB as_IN appears_VBZ on_IN the_DT face_NN of_IN this_DT custom_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ nothing_NN to_TO
connect_VB it_PRP with_IN the_DT midsummer_NN fires_NNS in_IN which_WDT human_JJ victims_NNS or_CC
effigies_NNS of_IN them_PRP were_VBD burned_VBN ._. Even_RB if_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, as_IN seems_VBZ probable_JJ ,_,
was_VBD originally_RB always_RB made_VBN with_IN oak-wood_NN ,_, why_WRB should_MD it_PRP have_VB been_VBN
necessary_JJ to_TO pull_VB the_DT mistletoe_NN ?_. The_DT last_JJ link_NN between_IN the_DT midsummer_NN
customs_NNS of_IN gathering_VBG the_DT mistletoe_NN and_CC lighting_VBG the_DT bonfires_NNS is_VBZ
supplied_VBN by_IN Balder_NNP '_POS s_PRP myth_NN ,_, which_WDT can_MD hardly_RB be_VB disjoined_VBN from_IN the_DT
customs_NNS in_IN question_NN ._. The_DT myth_NN suggests_VBZ that_IN a_DT vital_JJ connexion_NN may_MD
once_RB have_VBP been_VBN believed_VBN to_TO subsist_VB between_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN and_CC the_DT
human_JJ representative_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN who_WP was_VBD burned_VBN in_IN the_DT fire_NN ._.
According_VBG to_TO the_DT myth_NN ,_, Balder_NNP could_MD be_VB killed_VBN by_IN nothing_NN in_IN heaven_NN
or_CC earth_NN except_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN ;_: and_CC so_RB long_JJ as_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN remained_VBN
on_IN the_DT oak_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD not_RB only_RB immortal_JJ but_CC invulnerable_JJ ._. Now_RB ,_, if_IN we_PRP
suppose_VB that_IN Balder_NNP was_VBD the_DT oak_NN ,_, the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT myth_NN becomes_VBZ
intelligible_JJ ._. The_DT mistletoe_NN was_VBD viewed_VBN as_IN the_DT seat_NN of_IN life_NN of_IN the_DT
oak_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB long_JJ as_IN it_PRP was_VBD uninjured_JJ nothing_NN could_MD kill_VB or_CC even_RB
wound_VBN the_DT oak_NN ._. The_DT conception_NN of_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN as_IN the_DT seat_NN of_IN life_NN
of_IN the_DT oak_NN would_MD naturally_RB be_VB suggested_VBN to_TO primitive_JJ people_NNS by_IN the_DT
observation_NN that_IN while_IN the_DT oak_NN is_VBZ deciduous_JJ ,_, the_DT mistletoe_NN which_WDT
grows_VBZ on_IN it_PRP is_VBZ evergreen_NN ._. In_IN winter_NN the_DT sight_NN of_IN its_PRP$ fresh_JJ foliage_NN
among_IN the_DT bare_JJ branches_NNS must_MD have_VB been_VBN hailed_VBN by_IN the_DT worshippers_NNS of_IN
the_DT tree_NN as_IN a_DT sign_NN that_IN the_DT divine_JJ life_NN which_WDT had_VBD ceased_VBN to_TO animate_NN
the_DT branches_NNS yet_RB survived_VBN in_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN a_DT
sleeper_NN still_RB beats_VBZ when_WRB his_PRP$ body_NN is_VBZ motionless_JJ ._. Hence_RB when_WRB the_DT god_NN
had_VBD to_TO be_VB killed_VBN --_: when_WRB the_DT sacred_JJ tree_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB burnt_JJ --_: it_PRP was_VBD
necessary_JJ to_TO begin_VB by_IN breaking_VBG off_RP the_DT mistletoe_NN ._. For_IN so_RB long_JJ as_IN the_DT
mistletoe_NN remained_VBD intact_JJ ,_, the_DT oak_NN (_-LRB- so_IN people_NNS might_MD think_VB )_-RRB- was_VBD
invulnerable_JJ ;_: all_PDT the_DT blows_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ knives_NNS and_CC axes_NNS would_MD glance_VB
harmless_JJ from_IN its_PRP$ surface_NN ._. But_CC once_RB tear_VB from_IN the_DT oak_NN its_PRP$ sacred_JJ
heart_NN --_: the_DT mistletoe_NN --_: and_CC the_DT tree_NN nodded_VBD to_TO its_PRP$ fall_NN ._. And_CC when_WRB in_IN
later_RBR times_CC the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN came_VBD to_TO be_VB represented_VBN by_IN a_DT living_VBG
man_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD logically_RB necessary_JJ to_TO suppose_VB that_IN ,_, like_IN the_DT tree_NN he_PRP
personated_VBN ,_, he_PRP could_MD neither_RB be_VB killed_VBN nor_CC wounded_VBN so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT
mistletoe_NN remained_VBD uninjured_JJ ._. The_DT pulling_VBG of_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN was_VBD thus_RB
at_IN once_RB the_DT signal_NN and_CC the_DT cause_NN of_IN his_PRP$ death_NN ._.

On_IN this_DT view_NN the_DT invulnerable_JJ Balder_NN is_VBZ neither_RB more_RBR nor_CC less_RBR than_IN a_DT
personification_NN of_IN a_DT mistletoe-bearing_JJ oak_NN ._. The_DT interpretation_NN is_VBZ
confirmed_VBN by_IN what_WP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN an_DT ancient_JJ Italian_JJ belief_NN ,_, that_WDT
the_DT mistletoe_NN can_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN neither_RB by_IN fire_NN nor_CC water_NN ;_: for_IN if_IN the_DT
parasite_NN is_VBZ thus_RB deemed_VBN indestructible_JJ ,_, it_PRP might_MD easily_RB be_VB supposed_VBN
to_TO communicate_VB its_PRP$ own_JJ indestructibility_NN to_TO the_DT tree_NN on_IN which_WDT it_PRP
grows_VBZ ,_, so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT two_CD remain_VBP in_IN conjunction_NN ._. Or_CC ,_, to_TO put_VB the_DT same_JJ
idea_NN in_IN mythical_JJ form_NN ,_, we_PRP might_MD tell_VB how_WRB the_DT kindly_JJ god_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN
had_VBD his_PRP$ life_NN securely_RB deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT imperishable_JJ mistletoe_NN which_WDT
grew_VBD among_IN the_DT branches_NNS ;_: how_WRB accordingly_RB so_RB long_JJ as_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN
kept_VBD its_PRP$ place_NN there_RB ,_, the_DT deity_NN himself_PRP remained_VBD invulnerable_JJ ;_: and_CC
how_WRB at_IN last_JJ a_DT cunning_JJ foe_NN ,_, let_VB into_IN the_DT secret_NN of_IN the_DT god_NN '_'' s_PRP
invulnerability_NN ,_, tore_VBD the_DT mistletoe_NN from_IN the_DT oak_NN ,_, thereby_RB killing_VBG
the_DT oak-god_JJ and_CC afterwards_RB burning_VBG his_PRP$ body_NN in_IN a_DT fire_NN which_WDT could_MD
have_VBP made_VBN no_DT impression_NN on_IN him_PRP so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT incombustible_JJ parasite_NN
retained_VBN its_PRP$ seat_NN among_IN the_DT boughs_NNS ._.

But_CC since_IN the_DT idea_NN of_IN a_DT being_VBG whose_WP$ life_NN is_VBZ thus_RB ,_, in_IN a_DT sense_NN ,_,
outside_IN himself_PRP ,_, must_MD be_VB strange_JJ to_TO many_JJ readers_NNS ,_, and_CC has_VBZ ,_, indeed_RB ,_,
not_RB yet_RB been_VBN recognised_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ full_JJ bearing_NN on_IN primitive_JJ
superstition_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB worth_JJ while_IN to_TO illustrate_VB it_PRP by_IN examples_NNS
drawn_VBN both_DT from_IN story_NN and_CC custom_NN ._. The_DT result_NN will_MD be_VB to_TO show_VB that_IN ,_,
in_IN assuming_VBG this_DT idea_NN as_IN the_DT explanation_NN of_IN Balder_NN '_'' s_PRP relation_NN to_TO the_DT
mistletoe_NN ,_, I_PRP assume_VBP a_DT principle_NN which_WDT is_VBZ deeply_RB engraved_VBN on_IN the_DT mind_NN
of_IN primitive_JJ man_NN ._.



LXVI_NNP ._. The_DT External_NNP Soul_NNP in_IN Folk-Tales_NNS

IN_IN A_DT FORMER_NN part_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN we_PRP saw_VBD that_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN
primitive_JJ people_NNS ,_, the_DT soul_NN may_MD temporarily_RB absent_VB itself_PRP from_IN the_DT
body_NN without_IN causing_VBG death_NN ._. Such_DT temporary_JJ absences_NNS of_IN the_DT soul_NN are_VBP
often_RB believed_VBN to_TO involve_VB considerable_JJ risk_NN ,_, since_IN the_DT wandering_VBG
soul_NN is_VBZ liable_JJ to_TO a_DT variety_NN of_IN mishaps_VBG at_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN enemies_NNS ,_, and_CC
so_RB forth_RB ._. But_CC there_EX is_VBZ another_DT aspect_NN to_TO this_DT power_NN of_IN disengaging_VBG
the_DT soul_NN from_IN the_DT body_NN ._. If_IN only_RB the_DT safety_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN can_MD be_VB
ensured_VBN during_IN its_PRP$ absence_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN why_WRB the_DT soul_NN should_MD
not_RB continue_VB absent_JJ for_IN an_DT indefinite_JJ time_NN ;_: indeed_RB a_DT man_NN may_MD ,_, on_IN a_DT
pure_JJ calculation_NN of_IN personal_JJ safety_NN ,_, desire_NN that_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN should_MD
never_RB return_VB to_TO his_PRP$ body_NN ._. Unable_JJ to_TO conceive_VB of_IN life_NN abstractly_RB as_IN a_DT
"_`` permanent_JJ possibility_NN of_IN sensation_NN "_'' or_CC a_DT "_`` continuous_JJ adjustment_NN of_IN
internal_JJ arrangements_NNS to_TO external_JJ relations_NNS ,"_, the_DT savage_JJ thinks_VBZ of_IN
it_PRP as_IN a_DT concrete_JJ material_JJ thing_NN of_IN a_DT definite_JJ bulk_NN ,_, capable_JJ of_IN being_VBG
seen_VBN and_CC handled_VBN ,_, kept_VBN in_IN a_DT box_NN or_CC jar_NN ,_, and_CC liable_JJ to_TO be_VB bruised_VBN ,_,
fractured_VBN ,_, or_CC smashed_VBD in_IN pieces_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB needful_JJ that_IN the_DT life_NN ,_, so_RB
conceived_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB in_IN the_DT man_NN ;_: it_PRP may_MD be_VB absent_JJ from_IN his_PRP$ body_NN and_CC
still_RB continue_VBP to_TO animate_VB him_PRP by_IN virtue_NN of_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN sympathy_NN or_CC
action_NN at_IN a_DT distance_NN ._. So_RB long_RB as_IN this_DT object_NN which_WDT he_PRP calls_VBZ his_PRP$ life_NN
or_CC soul_NN remains_VBZ unharmed_JJ ,_, the_DT man_NN is_VBZ well_RB ;_: if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ injured_VBN ,_, he_PRP
suffers_NNS ;_: if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ destroyed_VBN ,_, he_PRP dies_VBZ ._. Or_CC ,_, to_TO put_VB it_PRP otherwise_RB ,_, when_WRB
a_DT man_NN is_VBZ ill_JJ or_CC dies_VBZ ,_, the_DT fact_NN is_VBZ explained_VBN by_IN saying_VBG that_IN the_DT
material_NN object_NN called_VBD his_PRP$ life_NN or_CC soul_NN ,_, whether_IN it_PRP be_VB in_IN his_PRP$ body_NN
or_CC out_IN of_IN it_PRP ,_, has_VBZ either_DT sustained_VBN injury_NN or_CC been_VBN destroyed_VBN ._. But_CC
there_EX may_MD be_VB circumstances_NNS in_IN which_WDT ,_, if_IN the_DT life_NN or_CC soul_NN remains_VBZ in_IN
the_DT man_NN ,_, it_PRP stands_VBZ a_DT greater_JJR chance_NN of_IN sustaining_VBG injury_NN than_IN if_IN it_PRP
were_VBD stowed_VBN away_RB in_IN some_DT safe_JJ and_CC secret_JJ place_NN ._. Accordingly_RB ,_, in_IN such_JJ
circumstances_NNS ,_, primitive_JJ man_NN takes_VBZ his_PRP$ soul_NN out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN and_CC
deposits_NNS it_PRP for_IN security_NN in_IN some_DT snug_NN spot_NN ,_, intending_VBG to_TO replace_VB it_PRP
in_IN his_PRP$ body_NN when_WRB the_DT danger_NN is_VBZ past_JJ ._. Or_CC if_IN he_PRP should_MD discover_VB some_DT
place_NN of_IN absolute_JJ security_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD be_VB content_JJ to_TO leave_VB his_PRP$ soul_NN
there_RB permanently_RB ._. The_DT advantage_NN of_IN this_DT is_VBZ that_DT ,_, so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT
soul_NN remains_VBZ unharmed_JJ in_IN the_DT place_NN where_WRB he_PRP has_VBZ deposited_VBN it_PRP ,_, the_DT
man_NN himself_PRP is_VBZ immortal_JJ ;_: nothing_NN can_MD kill_VB his_PRP$ body_NN ,_, since_IN his_PRP$ life_NN
is_VBZ not_RB in_IN it_PRP ._.

Evidence_NN of_IN this_DT primitive_JJ belief_NN is_VBZ furnished_VBN by_IN a_DT class_NN of_IN
folk-tales_NNS of_IN which_WDT the_DT Norse_NNP story_NN of_IN "_`` The_DT giant_NN who_WP had_VBD no_DT heart_NN
in_IN his_PRP$ body_NN "_'' is_VBZ perhaps_RB the_DT best-known_JJ example_NN ._. Stories_NNS of_IN this_DT kind_NN
are_VBP widely_RB diffused_JJ over_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN their_PRP$ number_NN and_CC the_DT
variety_NN of_IN incident_NN and_CC of_IN details_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT leading_VBG idea_NN is_VBZ
embodied_VBN ,_, we_PRP may_MD infer_VB that_IN the_DT conception_NN of_IN an_DT external_JJ soul_NN is_VBZ
one_CD which_WDT has_VBZ had_VBN a_DT powerful_JJ hold_NN on_IN the_DT minds_NNS of_IN men_NNS at_IN an_DT early_JJ
stage_NN of_IN history_NN ._. For_IN folk-tales_NNS are_VBP a_DT faithful_JJ reflection_NN of_IN the_DT
world_NN as_IN it_PRP appeared_VBD to_TO the_DT primitive_JJ mind_NN ;_: and_CC we_PRP may_MD be_VB sure_JJ that_IN
any_DT idea_NN which_WDT commonly_RB occurs_VBZ in_IN them_PRP ,_, however_RB absurd_JJ it_PRP may_MD seem_VB
to_TO us_PRP ,_, must_MD once_RB have_VB been_VBN an_DT ordinary_JJ article_NN of_IN belief_NN ._. This_DT
assurance_NN ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN it_PRP concerns_VBZ the_DT supposed_VBN power_NN of_IN disengaging_VBG
the_DT soul_NN from_IN the_DT body_NN for_IN a_DT longer_JJR or_CC shorter_JJR time_NN ,_, is_VBZ amply_RB
corroborated_VBN by_IN a_DT comparison_NN of_IN the_DT folk-tales_NNS in_IN question_NN with_IN the_DT
actual_JJ beliefs_NNS and_CC practices_NNS of_IN savages_NNS ._. To_TO this_DT we_PRP shall_MD return_VB
after_IN some_DT specimens_NNS of_IN the_DT tales_NNS have_VBP been_VBN given_VBN ._. The_DT specimens_NNS
will_MD be_VB selected_VBN with_IN a_DT view_NN of_IN illustrating_VBG both_DT the_DT characteristic_NN
features_NNS and_CC the_DT wide_JJ diffusion_NN of_IN this_DT class_NN of_IN tales_NNS ._.

In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, the_DT story_NN of_IN the_DT external_JJ soul_NN is_VBZ told_VBN ,_, in_IN
various_JJ forms_NNS ,_, by_IN all_DT Aryan_JJ peoples_NNS from_IN Hindoostan_NNP to_TO the_DT Hebrides_NNP ._.
A_DT very_RB common_JJ form_NN of_IN it_PRP is_VBZ this_DT :_: A_DT warlock_NN ,_, giant_JJ ,_, or_CC other_JJ
fairyland_NN being_VBG is_VBZ invulnerable_JJ and_CC immortal_JJ because_IN he_PRP keeps_VBZ his_PRP$
soul_NN hidden_VBN far_RB away_RB in_IN some_DT secret_JJ place_NN ;_: but_CC a_DT fair_JJ princess_NN ,_, whom_WP
he_PRP holds_VBZ enthralled_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ enchanted_JJ castle_NN ,_, wiles_VBZ his_PRP$ secret_NN from_IN
him_PRP and_CC reveals_VBZ it_PRP to_TO the_DT hero_NN ,_, who_WP seeks_VBZ out_IN the_DT warlock_NN '_'' s_PRP soul_NN ,_,
heart_NN ,_, life_NN ,_, or_CC death_NN (_-LRB- as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ variously_RB called_VBN ),_NN and_CC by_IN destroying_VBG
it_PRP ,_, simultaneously_RB kills_VBZ the_DT warlock_NN ._. Thus_RB a_DT Hindoo_NNP story_NN tells_VBZ how_WRB
a_DT magician_NN called_VBD Punchkin_NNP held_VBD a_DT queen_NN captive_NN for_IN twelve_CD years_NNS ,_,
and_CC would_MD fain_RB marry_VB her_PRP ,_, but_CC she_PRP would_MD not_RB have_VB him_PRP ._. At_IN last_JJ the_DT
queen_NN '_POS s_VBZ son_NN came_VBD to_TO rescue_VB her_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT two_CD plotted_VBD together_RB to_TO kill_VB
Punchkin_NNP ._. So_IN the_DT queen_NN spoke_VBD the_DT magician_NN fair_JJ ,_, and_CC pretended_VBD that_IN
she_PRP had_VBD at_IN last_RB made_VBN up_RP her_PRP$ mind_NN to_TO marry_VB him_PRP ._. "_'' And_CC do_VB tell_VB me_PRP ,"_IN she_PRP
said_VBD ,_, "_`` are_VBP you_PRP quite_RB immortal_JJ ?_. Can_MD death_NN never_RB touch_VB you_PRP ?_. And_CC are_VBP
you_PRP too_RB great_JJ an_DT enchanter_NN ever_RB to_TO feel_VB human_JJ suffering_NN ?"_IN "_`` It_PRP is_VBZ
true_JJ ,"_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, "_`` that_IN I_PRP am_VBP not_RB as_IN others_NNS ._. Far_RB ,_, far_RB away_RB ,_, hundreds_NNS of_IN
thousands_NNS of_IN miles_NNS from_IN this_DT ,_, there_EX lies_VBZ a_DT desolate_JJ country_NN covered_VBN
with_IN thick_JJ jungle_NN ._. In_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN the_DT jungle_NN grows_VBZ a_DT circle_NN of_IN palm_NN
trees_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT centre_NN of_IN the_DT circle_NN stand_NN six_CD chattees_NNS full_JJ of_IN
water_NN ,_, piled_VBD one_CD above_IN another_DT :_: below_IN the_DT sixth_JJ chattee_NN is_VBZ a_DT small_JJ
cage_NN ,_, which_WDT contains_VBZ a_DT little_JJ green_JJ parrot_NN ;--_: on_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT
parrot_NN depends_VBZ my_PRP$ life_NN ;--_: and_CC if_IN the_DT parrot_NN is_VBZ killed_VBN I_PRP must_MD die_VB ._. It_PRP
is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,"_, he_PRP added_VBD ,_, "_`` impossible_JJ that_IN the_DT parrot_NN should_MD sustain_VB
any_DT injury_NN ,_, both_CC on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT inaccessibility_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_,
and_CC because_RB ,_, by_IN my_PRP$ appointment_NN ,_, many_JJ thousand_CD genii_NNS surround_VBD the_DT
palm_NN trees_NNS ,_, and_CC kill_VB all_DT who_WP approach_VBP the_DT place_NN ."_IN But_CC the_DT queen_NN '_POS s_PRP
young_JJ son_NN overcame_IN all_DT difficulties_NNS ,_, and_CC got_VBD possession_NN of_IN the_DT
parrot_NN ._. He_PRP brought_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT door_NN of_IN the_DT magician_NN '_'' s_PRP palace_NN ,_, and_CC
began_VBD playing_VBG with_IN it_PRP ._. Punchkin_NNP ,_, the_DT magician_NN ,_, saw_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC ,_, coming_VBG
out_RB ,_, tried_VBD to_TO persuade_VB the_DT boy_NN to_TO give_VB him_PRP the_DT parrot_NN ._. "_'' Give_VB me_PRP my_PRP$
parrot_NN !"_NN cried_VBD Punchkin_NNP ._. Then_RB the_DT boy_NN took_VBD hold_NN of_IN the_DT parrot_NN and_CC
tore_VBD off_RP one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ wings_NNS ;_: and_CC as_IN he_PRP did_VBD so_RB the_DT magician_NN '_'' s_PRP right_JJ arm_NN
fell_VBD off_RP ._. Punchkin_NNP then_RB stretched_VBD out_IN his_PRP$ left_JJ arm_NN ,_, crying_VBG ,_, "_`` Give_VB me_PRP
my_PRP$ parrot_NN !"_IN The_DT prince_NN pulled_VBD off_RP the_DT parrot_NN '_POS s_PRP second_JJ wing_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
magician_NN '_POS s_PRP left_JJ arm_NN tumbled_VBD off_RP ._. "_'' Give_VB me_PRP my_PRP$ parrot_NN !"_NN cried_VBD he_PRP ,_, and_CC
fell_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ knees_NNS ._. The_DT prince_NN pulled_VBD off_RP the_DT parrot_NN '_'' s_PRP right_JJ leg_NN ,_, the_DT
magician_NN '_POS s_VBZ right_JJ leg_NN fell_VBD off_RB ;_: the_DT prince_NN pulled_VBD off_RP the_DT parrot_NN '_POS s_PRP
left_JJ leg_NN ,_, down_IN fell_VBD the_DT magician_NN '_POS s_PRP left_VBD ._. Nothing_NN remained_VBD of_IN him_PRP

a_DT great_JJ church_NN ._. The_DT church_NN is_VBZ well_RB secured_VBN with_IN iron_NN doors_NNS ,_, and_CC

with_IN fresh_JJ force_NN he_PRP slays_VBZ his_PRP$ enemy_NN ._.

In_IN a_DT Mongolian_NNP story_NN the_DT hero_NN Joro_NNP gets_VBZ the_DT better_JJR of_IN his_PRP$ enemy_NN the_DT
lama_NN Tschoridong_NNP in_IN the_DT following_JJ way_NN ._. The_DT lama_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ an_DT
enchanter_NN ,_, sends_VBZ out_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT wasp_NN to_TO sting_VBG Joro_NNP '_POS s_PRP
eyes_NNS ._. But_CC Joro_NNP catches_VBZ the_DT wasp_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN alternately_RB
shutting_NN and_CC opening_VBG his_PRP$ hand_NN he_PRP causes_VBZ the_DT lama_NN alternately_RB to_TO lose_VB
and_CC recover_VBP consciousness_NN ._. In_IN a_DT Tartar_NNP poem_NN two_CD youths_NNS cut_VBD open_RP the_DT
body_NN of_IN an_DT old_JJ witch_NN and_CC tear_VB out_RP her_PRP$ bowels_NNS ,_, but_CC all_DT to_TO no_DT purpose_NN ,_,
she_PRP still_RB lives_VBZ ._. On_IN being_VBG asked_VBN where_WRB her_PRP$ soul_NN is_VBZ ,_, she_PRP answers_VBZ that_IN
it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN her_PRP$ shoe-sole_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT seven-headed_JJ
speckled_JJ snake_NN ._. So_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT youths_NNS slices_NNS her_PRP shoe-sole_NN with_IN his_PRP$
sword_NN ,_, takes_VBZ out_RP the_DT speckled_JJ snake_NN ,_, and_CC cuts_NNS off_IN its_PRP$ seven_CD heads_NNS ._.
Then_RB the_DT witch_NN dies_VBZ ._. Another_DT Tartar_NNP poem_NN describes_VBZ how_WRB the_DT hero_NN
Kartaga_NNP grappled_VBD with_IN the_DT Swan-woman_NNP ._. Long_NNP they_PRP wrestled_VBD ._. Moons_NNPS
waxed_VBN and_CC waned_VBD and_CC still_RB they_PRP wrestled_VBD ;_: years_NNS came_VBD and_CC went_VBD ,_, and_CC
still_RB the_DT struggle_NN went_VBD on_IN ._. But_CC the_DT piebald_JJ horse_NN and_CC the_DT black_JJ
horse_NN knew_VBD that_IN the_DT Swan-woman_NNP '_POS s_PRP soul_NN was_VBD not_RB in_IN her_PRP ._. Under_IN the_DT
black_JJ earth_NN flow_NN nine_CD seas_NNS ;_: where_WRB the_DT seas_NNS meet_VBP and_CC form_VBP one_CD ,_, the_DT
sea_NN comes_VBZ to_TO the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN ._. At_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT nine_CD seas_NNS
rises_VBZ a_DT rock_NN of_IN copper_NN ;_: it_PRP rises_VBZ to_TO the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, it_PRP
rises_VBZ up_RP between_IN heaven_NN and_CC earth_NN ,_, this_DT rock_NN of_IN copper_NN ._. At_IN the_DT foot_NN
of_IN the_DT copper_NN rock_NN is_VBZ a_DT black_JJ chest_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT black_JJ chest_NN is_VBZ a_DT golden_JJ
casket_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT golden_JJ casket_NN is_VBZ the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT Swan-woman_NNP ._.
Seven_CD little_JJ birds_NNS are_VBP the_DT soul_NN of_IN the_DT Swan-woman_NN ;_: if_IN the_DT birds_NNS are_VBP
killed_VBN the_DT Swan-woman_NNP will_MD die_VB straightway_RB ._. So_IN the_DT horses_NNS ran_VBD to_TO the_DT
foot_NN of_IN the_DT copper_NN rock_NN ,_, opened_VBD the_DT black_JJ chest_NN ,_, and_CC brought_VBD back_RB
the_DT golden_JJ casket_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT piebald_JJ horse_NN turned_VBD himself_PRP into_IN a_DT
bald-headed_JJ man_NN ,_, opened_VBD the_DT golden_JJ casket_NN ,_, and_CC cut_VB off_RP the_DT heads_NNS of_IN
the_DT seven_CD birds_NNS ._. So_IN the_DT Swan-woman_NNP died_VBD ._. In_IN another_DT Tartar_NNP poem_NN the_DT
hero_NN ,_, pursuing_VBG his_PRP$ sister_NN who_WP has_VBZ driven_VBN away_RP his_PRP$ cattle_NNS ,_, is_VBZ warned_VBN
to_TO desist_VB from_IN the_DT pursuit_NN because_IN his_PRP$ sister_NN has_VBZ carried_VBN away_RB his_PRP$
soul_NN in_IN a_DT golden_JJ sword_NN and_CC a_DT golden_JJ arrow_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP pursues_VBZ her_PRP she_PRP
will_MD kill_VB him_PRP by_IN throwing_VBG the_DT golden_JJ sword_NN or_CC shooting_VBG the_DT golden_JJ
arrow_NN at_IN him_PRP ._.

A_DT Malay_NNP poem_NN relates_VBZ how_WRB once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Indrapoora_NNP
there_EX was_VBD a_DT certain_JJ merchant_NN who_WP was_VBD rich_JJ and_CC prosperous_JJ ,_, but_CC he_PRP had_VBD
no_DT children_NNS ._. One_CD day_NN as_IN he_PRP walked_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN by_IN the_DT river_NN they_PRP
found_VBN a_DT baby_NN girl_NN ,_, fair_JJ as_IN an_DT angel_NN ._. So_IN they_PRP adopted_VBD the_DT child_NN and_CC
called_VBN her_PRP Bidasari_NNP ._. The_DT merchant_NN caused_VBD a_DT golden_JJ fish_NN to_TO be_VB made_VBN ,_,
and_CC into_IN this_DT fish_NN he_PRP transferred_VBD the_DT soul_NN of_IN his_PRP$ adopted_VBN daughter_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP put_VBD the_DT golden_JJ fish_NN in_IN a_DT golden_JJ box_NN full_JJ of_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC hid_VBN
it_PRP in_IN a_DT pond_NN in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN his_PRP$ garden_NN ._. In_IN time_NN the_DT girl_NN grew_VBD to_TO be_VB
a_DT lovely_JJ woman_NN ._. Now_RB the_DT King_NNP of_IN Indrapoora_NNP had_VBD a_DT fair_JJ young_JJ queen_NN ,_,
who_WP lived_VBD in_IN fear_NN that_IN the_DT king_NN might_MD take_VB to_TO himself_PRP a_DT second_JJ wife_NN ._.
So_RB ,_, hearing_NN of_IN the_DT charms_NNS of_IN Bidasari_NNP ,_, the_DT queen_NN resolved_VBD to_TO put_VB her_PRP$
out_IN of_IN the_DT way_NN ._. She_PRP lured_VBD the_DT girl_NN to_TO the_DT palace_NN and_CC tortured_VBD her_PRP$
cruelly_RB ;_: but_CC Bidasari_NNP could_MD not_RB die_VB ,_, because_IN her_PRP$ soul_NN was_VBD not_RB in_IN
her_PRP ._. At_IN last_JJ she_PRP could_MD stand_VB the_DT torture_NN no_RB longer_RB and_CC said_VBD to_TO the_DT
queen_NN ,_, "_`` If_IN you_PRP wish_VBP me_PRP to_TO die_VB ,_, you_PRP must_MD bring_VB the_DT box_NN which_WDT is_VBZ in_IN
the_DT pond_NN in_IN my_PRP$ father_NN '_'' s_PRP garden_NN ."_CC So_IN the_DT box_NN was_VBD brought_VBN and_CC opened_VBN ,_,
and_CC there_EX was_VBD the_DT golden_JJ fish_NN in_IN the_DT water_NN ._. The_DT girl_NN said_VBD ,_, "_`` My_PRP$ soul_NN
is_VBZ in_IN that_DT fish_NN ._. In_IN the_DT morning_NN you_PRP must_MD take_VB the_DT fish_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT
water_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT evening_NN you_PRP must_MD put_VB it_PRP back_RB into_IN the_DT water_NN ._. Do_VB
not_RB let_VB the_DT fish_NN lie_VB about_RB ,_, but_CC bind_VBP it_PRP round_VB your_PRP$ neck_NN ._. If_IN you_PRP do_VBP
this_DT ,_, I_PRP shall_MD soon_RB die_VB ."_RB So_IN the_DT queen_NN took_VBD the_DT fish_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT box_NN
and_CC fastened_VBD it_PRP round_IN her_PRP$ neck_NN ;_: and_CC no_RB sooner_RB had_VBD she_PRP done_VBN so_RB than_IN
Bidasari_NNP fell_VBD into_IN a_DT swoon_NN ._. But_CC in_IN the_DT evening_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT fish_NN was_VBD
put_VBN back_RB into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, Bidasari_NNP came_VBD to_TO herself_PRP again_RB ._. Seeing_VBG that_IN
she_PRP thus_RB had_VBD the_DT girl_NN in_IN her_PRP$ power_NN ,_, the_DT queen_NN sent_VBD her_PRP$ home_NN to_TO her_PRP$
adopted_VBN parents_NNS ._. To_TO save_VB her_PRP from_IN further_JJ persecution_NN her_PRP parents_NNS
resolved_VBN to_TO remove_VB their_PRP$ daughter_NN from_IN the_DT city_NN ._. So_RB in_IN a_DT lonely_JJ and_CC
desolate_JJ spot_NN they_PRP built_VBD a_DT house_NN and_CC brought_VBD Bidasari_NNP thither_RB ._. There_EX
she_PRP dwelt_VBD alone_RB ,_, undergoing_VBG vicissitudes_NNS that_WDT corresponded_VBD with_IN the_DT
vicissitudes_NNS of_IN the_DT golden_JJ fish_NN in_IN which_WDT was_VBD her_PRP$ soul_NN ._. All_DT day_NN long_RB ,_,
while_IN the_DT fish_NN was_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, she_PRP remained_VBD unconscious_JJ ;_: but_CC
in_IN the_DT evening_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT fish_NN was_VBD put_VBN into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, she_PRP revived_VBD ._.
One_CD day_NN the_DT king_NN was_VBD out_IN hunting_NN ,_, and_CC coming_VBG to_TO the_DT house_NN where_WRB
Bidasari_NNP lay_VBD unconscious_JJ ,_, was_VBD smitten_VBN with_IN her_PRP$ beauty_NN ._. He_PRP tried_VBD to_TO
waken_VBN her_PRP ,_, but_CC in_IN vain_JJ ._. Next_JJ day_NN ,_, towards_IN evening_NN ,_, he_PRP repeated_VBD his_PRP$
visit_NN ,_, but_CC still_RB found_VBD her_PRP unconscious_JJ ._. However_RB ,_, when_WRB darkness_NN fell_VBD ,_,
she_PRP came_VBD to_TO herself_PRP and_CC told_VBD the_DT king_NN the_DT secret_NN of_IN her_PRP$ life_NN ._. So_IN the_DT
king_NN returned_VBD to_TO the_DT palace_NN ,_, took_VBD the_DT fish_NN from_IN the_DT queen_NN ,_, and_CC put_VB
it_PRP in_IN water_NN ._. Immediately_RB Bidasari_NNP revived_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT king_NN took_VBD her_PRP to_TO
wife_NN ._.

Another_DT story_NN of_IN an_DT external_JJ soul_NN comes_VBZ from_IN Nias_NNP ,_, an_DT island_NN to_TO the_DT
west_NN of_IN Sumatra_NNP ._. Once_RB on_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT chief_NN was_VBD captured_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ enemies_NNS ,_,
who_WP tried_VBD to_TO put_VB him_PRP to_TO death_NN but_CC failed_VBD ._. Water_NNP would_MD not_RB drown_VB him_PRP
nor_CC fire_NN burn_VBP him_PRP nor_CC steel_NN pierce_NN him_PRP ._. At_IN last_JJ his_PRP$ wife_NN revealed_VBN
the_DT secret_NN ._. On_IN his_PRP$ head_NN he_PRP had_VBD a_DT hair_NN as_RB hard_RB as_IN a_DT copper_NN wire_NN ;_: and_CC
with_IN this_DT wire_NN his_PRP$ life_NN was_VBD bound_VBN up_RP ._. So_IN the_DT hair_NN was_VBD plucked_VBN out_RP ,_,
and_CC with_IN it_PRP his_PRP$ spirit_NN fled_VBD ._.

A_DT West_JJ African_JJ story_NN from_IN Southern_JJ Nigeria_NNP relates_VBZ how_WRB a_DT king_NN kept_VBN
his_PRP$ soul_NN in_IN a_DT little_JJ brown_JJ bird_NN ,_, which_WDT perched_VBD on_IN a_DT tall_JJ tree_NN beside_IN
the_DT gate_NN of_IN the_DT palace_NN ._. The_DT king_NN '_POS s_PRP life_NN was_VBD so_RB bound_VBN up_RP with_IN that_DT of_IN
the_DT bird_NN that_IN whoever_WP should_MD kill_VB the_DT bird_NN would_MD simultaneously_RB kill_VB
the_DT king_NN and_CC succeed_VB to_TO the_DT kingdom_NN ._. The_DT secret_NN was_VBD betrayed_VBN by_IN the_DT
queen_NN to_TO her_PRP$ lover_NN ,_, who_WP shot_VBD the_DT bird_NN with_IN an_DT arrow_NN and_CC thereby_RB slew_NN
the_DT king_NN and_CC ascended_VBD the_DT vacant_JJ throne_NN ._. A_DT tale_NN told_VBN by_IN the_DT Ba-Ronga_NNP
of_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP sets_VBZ forth_RB how_WRB the_DT lives_NNS of_IN a_DT whole_JJ family_NN were_VBD
contained_VBN in_IN one_CD cat_NN ._. When_WRB a_DT girl_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN ,_, named_VBN Titishan_NNP ,_,
married_VBN a_DT husband_NN ,_, she_PRP begged_VBD her_PRP$ parents_NNS to_TO let_VB her_PRP take_VB the_DT
precious_JJ cat_NN with_IN her_PRP$ to_TO her_PRP$ new_JJ home_NN ._. But_CC they_PRP refused_VBD ,_, saying_VBG ,_,
"_`` You_PRP know_VBP that_IN our_PRP$ life_NN is_VBZ attached_VBN to_TO it_PRP ";_, and_CC they_PRP offered_VBD to_TO give_VB
her_PRP$ an_DT antelope_NN or_CC even_RB an_DT elephant_NN instead_RB of_IN it_PRP ._. But_CC nothing_NN would_MD
satisfy_VB her_PRP but_CC the_DT cat_NN ._. So_RB at_IN last_JJ she_PRP carried_VBD it_PRP off_RP with_IN her_PRP and_CC
shut_VB it_PRP up_RP in_IN a_DT place_NN where_WRB nobody_NN saw_VBD it_PRP ;_: even_RB her_PRP$ husband_NN knew_VBD
nothing_NN about_IN it_PRP ._. One_CD day_NN ,_, when_WRB she_PRP went_VBD to_TO work_VB in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, the_DT
cat_NN escaped_VBD from_IN its_PRP$ place_NN of_IN concealment_NN ,_, entered_VBN the_DT hut_NN ,_, put_VBD on_IN
the_DT warlike_JJ trappings_NNS of_IN the_DT husband_NN ,_, and_CC danced_VBD and_CC sang_VBD ._. Some_DT
children_NNS ,_, attracted_VBN by_IN the_DT noise_NN ,_, discovered_VBD the_DT cat_NN at_IN its_PRP$ antics_NNS ,_,
and_CC when_WRB they_PRP expressed_VBD their_PRP$ astonishment_NN ,_, the_DT animal_NN only_RB capered_VBN
the_DT more_RBR and_CC insulted_VBD them_PRP besides_IN ._. So_CC they_PRP went_VBD to_TO the_DT owner_NN and_CC
said_VBD ,_, "_`` There_EX is_VBZ somebody_NN dancing_NN in_IN your_PRP$ house_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP insulted_VBD us_PRP ."_.
"_`` Hold_VB your_PRP$ tongues_NNS ,"_, said_VBD he_PRP ,_, "_`` I_PRP '_POS ll_NN soon_RB put_VBD a_DT stop_NN to_TO your_PRP$ lies_NNS ."_.
So_RB he_PRP went_VBD and_CC hid_VBD behind_IN the_DT door_NN and_CC peeped_VBD in_IN ,_, and_CC there_RB sure_JJ
enough_RB was_VBD the_DT cat_NN prancing_VBG about_RB and_CC singing_VBG ._. He_PRP fired_VBD at_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC
the_DT animal_NN dropped_VBD down_RB dead_JJ ._. At_IN the_DT same_JJ moment_NN his_PRP$ wife_NN fell_VBD to_TO
the_DT ground_NN in_IN the_DT field_NN where_WRB she_PRP was_VBD at_IN work_NN ;_: said_VBD she_PRP ,_, "_`` I_PRP have_VBP
been_VBN killed_VBN at_IN home_NN ."_NNS But_CC she_PRP had_VBD strength_NN enough_RB left_VBD to_TO ask_VB her_PRP$
husband_NN to_TO go_VB with_IN her_PRP to_TO her_PRP$ parents_NNS '_POS village_NN ,_, taking_VBG with_IN him_PRP the_DT
dead_JJ cat_NN wrapt_VB up_RP in_IN a_DT mat_NN ._. All_PDT her_PRP$ relatives_NNS assembled_VBN ,_, and_CC
bitterly_RB they_PRP reproached_VBD her_PRP for_IN having_VBG insisted_VBN on_IN taking_VBG the_DT
animal_NN with_IN her_PRP$ to_TO her_PRP$ husband_NN '_'' s_PRP village_NN ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT mat_NN was_VBD
unrolled_JJ and_CC they_PRP saw_VBD the_DT dead_JJ cat_NN ,_, they_PRP all_DT fell_VBD down_RB lifeless_RB one_CD
after_IN the_DT other_JJ ._. So_IN the_DT Clan_NNP of_IN the_DT Cat_NNP was_VBD destroyed_VBN ;_: and_CC the_DT
bereaved_JJ husband_NN closed_VBD the_DT gate_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN with_IN a_DT branch_NN ,_, and_CC
returned_VBN home_NN ,_, and_CC told_VBD his_PRP$ friends_NNS how_WRB in_IN killing_VBG the_DT cat_NN he_PRP had_VBD
killed_VBN the_DT whole_JJ clan_NN ,_, because_IN their_PRP$ lives_NNS depended_VBD on_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN
the_DT cat_NN ._.

Ideas_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ sort_NN meet_VBP us_PRP in_IN stories_NNS told_VBN by_IN the_DT North_NNP American_NNP
Indians_NNPS ._. Thus_RB the_DT Navajoes_NNPS tell_VBP of_IN a_DT certain_JJ mythical_JJ being_NN called_VBN
"_`` the_DT Maiden_NNP that_IN becomes_VBZ a_DT Bear_NNP ,"_, who_WP learned_VBD the_DT art_NN of_IN turning_VBG
herself_PRP into_IN a_DT bear_NN from_IN the_DT prairie_NN wolf_NN ._. She_PRP was_VBD a_DT great_JJ warrior_NN
and_CC quite_RB invulnerable_JJ ;_: for_IN when_WRB she_PRP went_VBD to_TO war_NN she_PRP took_VBD out_RP her_PRP$
vital_JJ organs_NNS and_CC hid_VBN them_PRP ,_, so_RB that_IN no_DT one_NN could_MD kill_VB her_PRP ;_: and_CC when_WRB
the_DT battle_NN was_VBD over_IN she_PRP put_VBD the_DT organs_NNS back_RB in_IN their_PRP$ places_NNS again_RB ._.
The_DT Kwakiutl_NNP Indians_NNPS of_IN British_NNP Columbia_NNP tell_VBP of_IN an_DT ogress_NN ,_, who_WP
could_MD not_RB be_VB killed_VBN because_IN her_PRP$ life_NN was_VBD in_IN a_DT hemlock_NN branch_NN ._. A_DT
brave_JJ boy_NN met_VBD her_PRP in_IN the_DT woods_NNS ,_, smashed_VBD her_PRP$ head_NN with_IN a_DT stone_NN ,_,
scattered_VBN her_PRP$ brains_NNS ,_, broke_VBD her_PRP$ bones_NNS ,_, and_CC threw_VBD them_PRP into_IN the_DT
water_NN ._. Then_RB ,_, thinking_VBG he_PRP had_VBD disposed_VBN of_IN the_DT ogress_NN ,_, he_PRP went_VBD into_IN
her_PRP$ house_NN ._. There_EX he_PRP saw_VBD a_DT woman_NN rooted_VBN to_TO the_DT floor_NN ,_, who_WP warned_VBD him_PRP ,_,
saying_VBG ,_, "_`` Now_RB do_VB not_RB stay_VB long_RB ._. I_PRP know_VBP that_IN you_PRP have_VBP tried_VBN to_TO kill_VB
the_DT ogress_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT fourth_JJ time_NN that_IN somebody_NN has_VBZ tried_VBN to_TO kill_VB
her_PRP ._. She_PRP never_RB dies_VBZ ;_: she_PRP has_VBZ nearly_RB come_VBN to_TO life_NN ._. There_EX in_RP that_WDT
covered_VBN hemlock_NN branch_NN is_VBZ her_PRP$ life_NN ._. Go_VB there_RB ,_, and_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN you_PRP see_VBP
her_PRP enter_VB ,_, shoot_VB her_PRP$ life_NN ._. Then_RB she_PRP will_MD be_VB dead_JJ ."_NN Hardly_RB had_VBD she_PRP
finished_VBN speaking_VBG when_WRB sure_JJ enough_RB in_IN came_VBD the_DT ogress_NN ,_, singing_VBG as_IN
she_PRP walked_VBD ._. But_CC the_DT boy_NN shot_VBD at_IN her_PRP life_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP fell_VBD dead_JJ to_TO the_DT
floor_NN ._.



LXVII_NNP ._. The_DT External_NNP Soul_NNP in_IN Folk-Custom_NN



1._DT The_DT External_NNP Soul_NNP in_IN Inanimate_NNP Things_NNS

THUS_PRP the_DT idea_NN that_IN the_DT soul_NN may_MD be_VB deposited_VBN for_IN a_DT longer_JJR or_CC shorter_JJR
time_NN in_IN some_DT place_NN of_IN security_NN outside_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN all_DT events_NNS in_IN
the_DT hair_NN ,_, is_VBZ found_VBN in_IN the_DT popular_JJ tales_NNS of_IN many_JJ races_NNS ._. It_PRP remains_VBZ to_TO
show_NN that_IN the_DT idea_NN is_VBZ not_RB a_DT mere_JJ figment_NN devised_VBN to_TO adorn_VB a_DT tale_NN ,_,
but_CC is_VBZ a_DT real_JJ article_NN of_IN primitive_JJ faith_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ given_VBN rise_NN to_TO a_DT
corresponding_JJ set_NN of_IN customs_NNS ._.

We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN in_IN the_DT tales_NNS the_DT hero_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT preparation_NN for_IN
battle_NN ,_, sometimes_RB removes_VBZ his_PRP$ soul_NN from_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN his_PRP$
body_NN may_MD be_VB invulnerable_JJ and_CC immortal_JJ in_IN the_DT combat_NN ._. With_IN a_DT like_JJ
intention_NN the_DT savage_JJ removes_VBZ his_PRP$ soul_NN from_IN his_PRP$ body_NN on_IN various_JJ
occasions_NNS of_IN real_JJ or_CC imaginary_NN peril_NN ._. Thus_RB among_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN
Minahassa_NNP in_IN Celebes_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT family_NN moves_VBZ into_IN a_DT new_JJ house_NN ,_, a_DT priest_NN
collects_VBZ the_DT souls_NNS of_IN the_DT whole_JJ family_NN in_IN a_DT bag_NN ,_, and_CC afterwards_RB
restores_NNS them_PRP to_TO their_PRP$ owners_NNS ,_, because_IN the_DT moment_NN of_IN entering_VBG a_DT new_JJ
house_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB fraught_VBN with_IN supernatural_JJ danger_NN ._. In_IN
Southern_JJ Celebes_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT woman_NN is_VBZ brought_VBN to_TO bed_NN ,_, the_DT messenger_NN who_WP
fetches_NNS the_DT doctor_NN or_CC the_DT midwife_NN always_RB carries_VBZ with_IN him_PRP something_NN
made_VBN of_IN iron_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN a_DT chopping-knife_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP delivers_VBZ to_TO the_DT
doctor_NN ._. The_DT doctor_NN must_MD keep_VB the_DT thing_NN in_IN his_PRP$ house_NN till_IN the_DT
confinement_NN is_VBZ over_IN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP gives_VBZ it_PRP back_RB ,_, receiving_VBG a_DT fixed_VBN sum_NN of_IN
money_NN for_IN doing_VBG so_RB ._. The_DT chopping-knife_NN ,_, or_CC whatever_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ ,_,
represents_VBZ the_DT woman_NN '_POS s_PRP soul_NN ,_, which_WDT at_IN this_DT critical_JJ time_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN
to_TO be_VB safer_JJR out_IN of_IN her_PRP$ body_NN than_IN in_IN it_PRP ._. Hence_RB the_DT doctor_NN must_MD take_VB
great_JJ care_NN of_IN the_DT object_NN ;_: for_IN were_VBD it_PRP lost_VBD ,_, the_DT woman_NN '_POS s_PRP soul_NN would_MD
assuredly_RB ,_, they_PRP think_VBP ,_, be_VB lost_VBN with_IN it_PRP ._.

Among_IN the_DT Dyaks_NNP of_IN Pinoeh_NNP ,_, a_DT district_NN of_IN South-eastern_JJ Borneo_NNP ,_, when_WRB
a_DT child_NN is_VBZ born_VBN ,_, a_DT medicine-man_NN is_VBZ sent_VBN for_IN ,_, who_WP conjures_VBZ the_DT soul_NN
of_IN the_DT infant_NN into_IN half_NN a_DT coco-nut_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP thereupon_RB covers_VBZ with_IN a_DT

"_`` sa_VBD lang_NN as_IN their_PRP$ hair_NN wes_NNS on_IN ,_, and_CC sould_NN newir_NN latt_NN ane_RB teir_JJ fall_NN
fra_NN thair_IN ene_NN ."_NN Similarly_RB in_IN Bastar_NNP ,_, a_DT province_NN of_IN India_NNP ,_, "_`` if_IN a_DT man_NN

2._DT The_DT External_NNP Soul_NNP in_IN Plants_NNS

FURTHER_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN shown_VBN that_IN in_IN folk-tales_NNS the_DT life_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN is_VBZ
sometimes_RB so_RB bound_VBN up_RP with_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN a_DT plant_NN that_IN the_DT withering_NN of_IN
the_DT plant_NN will_MD immediately_RB follow_VB or_CC be_VB followed_VBN by_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT
person_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT M_NNP '_POS Bengas_NNP in_IN Western_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, about_IN the_DT Gaboon_NNP ,_, when_WRB
two_CD children_NNS are_VBP born_VBN on_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS plant_NN two_CD trees_NNS of_IN
the_DT same_JJ kind_NN and_CC dance_NN round_NN them_PRP ._. The_DT life_NN of_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT children_NNS
is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO be_VB bound_VBN up_RP with_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT trees_NNS ;_: and_CC if_IN
the_DT tree_NN dies_VBZ or_CC is_VBZ thrown_VBN down_RB ,_, they_PRP are_VBP sure_JJ that_IN the_DT child_NN will_MD
soon_RB die_VBP ._. In_IN the_DT Cameroons_NNS ,_, also_RB ,_, the_DT life_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN
to_TO be_VB sympathetically_RB bound_VBN up_RP with_IN that_DT of_IN a_DT tree_NN ._. The_DT chief_NN of_IN Old_NNP
Town_NNP in_IN Calabar_NNP kept_VBD his_PRP$ soul_NN in_IN a_DT sacred_JJ grove_NN near_IN a_DT spring_NN of_IN
water_NN ._. When_WRB some_DT Europeans_NNS ,_, in_IN frolic_JJ or_CC ignorance_NN ,_, cut_VBN down_IN part_NN of_IN
the_DT grove_NN ,_, the_DT spirit_NN was_VBD most_RBS indignant_JJ and_CC threatened_VBD the_DT
perpetrators_NNS of_IN the_DT deed_NN ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT king_NN ,_, with_IN all_DT manner_NN of_IN
evil_NN ._.

Some_DT of_IN the_DT Papuans_NNP unite_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN a_DT new-born_JJ babe_NN
sympathetically_RB with_IN that_DT of_IN a_DT tree_NN by_IN driving_VBG a_DT pebble_NN into_IN the_DT
bark_NN of_IN the_DT tree_NN ._. This_DT is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO give_VB them_PRP complete_JJ mastery_NN
over_IN the_DT child_NN '_POS s_PRP life_NN ;_: if_IN the_DT tree_NN is_VBZ cut_VBN down_RP ,_, the_DT child_NN will_MD die_VB ._.
After_IN a_DT birth_NN the_DT Maoris_NNP used_VBD to_TO bury_VB the_DT navel-string_NN in_IN a_DT sacred_JJ
place_NN and_CC plant_NN a_DT young_JJ sapling_NN over_IN it_PRP ._. As_IN the_DT tree_NN grew_VBD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD a_DT
tohu_NN oranga_NN or_CC sign_NN of_IN life_NN for_IN the_DT child_NN ;_: if_IN it_PRP flourished_VBD ,_, the_DT
child_NN would_MD prosper_VB ;_: if_IN it_PRP withered_VBD and_CC died_VBD ,_, the_DT parents_NNS augured_VBN
the_DT worst_JJS for_IN the_DT little_JJ one_NN ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Fiji_NNP the_DT navel-string_NN
of_IN a_DT male_NN infant_NN is_VBZ planted_VBN together_RB with_IN a_DT coco-nut_NN or_CC the_DT slip_NN of_IN
a_DT breadfruit-tree_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT child_NN '_POS s_PRP life_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB intimately_RB
connected_VBN with_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT tree_NN ._. Amongst_IN the_DT Dyaks_NNP of_IN Landak_NNP and_CC
Tajan_NNP ,_, districts_NNS of_IN Dutch_NNP Borneo_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ customary_JJ to_TO plant_VB a_DT
fruit-tree_NN for_IN a_DT baby_NN ,_, and_CC henceforth_RB in_IN the_DT popular_JJ belief_NN the_DT fate_NN
of_IN the_DT child_NN is_VBZ bound_VBN up_RP with_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT tree_NN ._. If_IN the_DT tree_NN shoots_NNS
up_RB rapidly_RB ,_, it_PRP will_MD go_VB well_RB with_IN the_DT child_NN ;_: but_CC if_IN the_DT tree_NN is_VBZ
dwarfed_VBN or_CC shrivelled_VBN ,_, nothing_NN but_CC misfortune_NN can_MD be_VB expected_VBN for_IN
its_PRP$ human_JJ counterpart_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN there_EX are_VBP still_RB families_NNS in_IN Russia_NNP ,_, Germany_NNP ,_,

and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ tended_VBN with_IN special_JJ care_NN ._. The_DT custom_NN is_VBZ still_RB pretty_RB
general_JJ in_IN the_DT canton_NN of_IN Aargau_NNP in_IN Switzerland_NNP ;_: an_DT apple-tree_NN is_VBZ

that_IN the_DT child_NN will_MD flourish_VB or_CC dwindle_VB with_IN the_DT tree_NN ._. In_IN

Castle_NNP of_IN Dalhousie_NNP ,_, not_RB far_RB from_IN Edinburgh_NNP ,_, there_RB grows_VBZ an_DT

falls_VBZ from_IN the_DT Edgewell_NNP Tree_NNP ._. Thus_RB ,_, on_IN seeing_VBG a_DT great_JJ bough_JJ drop_NN
from_IN the_DT tree_NN on_IN a_DT quiet_JJ ,_, still_RB day_NN in_IN July_NNP 1874,_CD an_DT old_JJ forester_NN
exclaimed_VBD ,_, "_`` The_DT laird_NN '_POS s_PRP deid_JJ noo_NN !"_NN and_CC soon_RB after_IN news_NN came_VBD that_IN Fox_NNP
Maule_NNP ,_, eleventh_JJ Earl_NNP of_IN Dalhousie_NNP ,_, was_VBD dead_JJ ._.

In_IN England_NNP children_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB passed_VBN through_IN a_DT cleft_NN ash-tree_NN as_IN
a_DT cure_NN for_IN rupture_NN or_CC rickets_NNS ,_, and_CC thenceforward_RB a_DT sympathetic_JJ
connexion_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO exist_VB between_IN them_PRP and_CC the_DT tree_NN ._. An_DT
ash-tree_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN used_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN grew_VBD at_IN the_DT edge_NN of_IN
Shirley_NNP Heath_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT road_NN from_IN Hockly_NNP House_NNP to_TO Birmingham_NNP ._. "_'' Thomas_NNP
Chillingworth_NNP ,_, son_NN of_IN the_DT owner_NN of_IN an_DT adjoining_VBG farm_NN ,_, now_RB about_IN
thirty-four_CD ,_, was_VBD ,_, when_WRB an_DT infant_NN of_IN a_DT year_NN old_JJ ,_, passed_VBD through_IN a_DT
similar_JJ tree_NN ,_, now_RB perfectly_RB sound_JJ ,_, which_WDT he_PRP preserves_VBZ with_IN so_RB much_JJ
care_NN that_IN he_PRP will_MD not_RB suffer_VB a_DT single_JJ branch_NN to_TO be_VB touched_VBN ,_, for_IN it_PRP
is_VBZ believed_VBN the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN depends_VBZ on_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT tree_NN ,_,
and_CC the_DT moment_NN that_WDT is_VBZ cut_VBN down_RP ,_, be_VB the_DT patient_NN ever_RB so_RB distant_JJ ,_, the_DT
rupture_NN returns_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT mortification_NN ensues_VBZ ,_, and_CC terminates_NNS in_IN
death_NN ,_, as_RB was_VBD the_DT case_NN in_IN a_DT man_NN driving_VBG a_DT waggon_NN on_IN the_DT very_JJ road_NN in_IN
question_NN ."_IN "_`` It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB uncommon_JJ ,_, however_RB ,"_, adds_VBZ the_DT writer_NN ,_, "_'' for_IN
persons_NNS to_TO survive_VB for_IN a_DT time_NN the_DT felling_NN of_IN the_DT tree_NN ."_IN The_DT ordinary_JJ
mode_NN of_IN effecting_VBG the_DT cure_NN is_VBZ to_TO split_VB a_DT young_JJ ash-sapling_NN
longitudinally_RB for_IN a_DT few_JJ feet_NNS and_CC pass_VB the_DT child_NN ,_, naked_JJ ,_, either_CC
three_CD times_NNS or_CC three_CD times_NNS three_CD through_IN the_DT fissure_NN at_IN sunrise_NN ._. In_IN
the_DT West_NNP of_IN England_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN the_DT passage_NN should_MD be_VB "_'' against_IN
the_DT sun_NN ."_. As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT ceremony_NN has_VBZ been_VBN performed_VBN ,_, the_DT tree_NN is_VBZ
bound_VBN tightly_RB up_RB and_CC the_DT fissure_NN plastered_VBD over_RB with_IN mud_NN or_CC clay_NN ._.
The_DT belief_NN is_VBZ that_IN just_RB as_IN the_DT cleft_NN in_IN the_DT tree_NN closes_VBZ up_RB ,_, so_IN the_DT
rupture_NN in_IN the_DT child_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN will_MD be_VB healed_VBN ;_: but_CC that_IN if_IN the_DT rift_NN in_IN
the_DT tree_NN remains_VBZ open_JJ ,_, the_DT rupture_NN in_IN the_DT child_NN will_MD remain_VB too_RB ,_, and_CC
if_IN the_DT tree_NN were_VBD to_TO die_VB ,_, the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT child_NN would_MD surely_RB follow_VB ._.

A_DT similar_JJ cure_NN for_IN various_JJ diseases_NNS ,_, but_CC especially_RB for_IN rupture_NN and_CC
rickets_NNS ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN commonly_RB practised_VBN in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ,_, as_IN
Germany_NNP ,_, France_NNP ,_, Denmark_NNP ,_, and_CC Sweden_NNP ;_: but_CC in_IN these_DT countries_NNS the_DT
tree_NN employed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN is_VBZ usually_RB not_RB an_DT ash_NN but_CC an_DT oak_NN ;_:
sometimes_RB a_DT willow-tree_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN or_CC even_RB prescribed_VBN instead_RB ._. In_IN
Mecklenburg_NNP ,_, as_IN in_IN England_NNP ,_, the_DT sympathetic_JJ relation_NN thus_RB
established_VBN between_IN the_DT tree_NN and_CC the_DT child_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO be_VB so_RB
close_RB that_IN if_IN the_DT tree_NN is_VBZ cut_VBN down_IN the_DT child_NN will_MD die_VB ._.



3._DT The_DT External_NNP Soul_NNP in_IN Animals_NNS

BUT_NNP in_IN practice_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN folk-tales_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB merely_RB with_IN inanimate_NN
objects_NNS and_CC plants_NNS that_IN a_DT person_NN is_VBZ occasionally_RB believed_VBN to_TO be_VB
united_VBN by_IN a_DT bond_NN of_IN physical_JJ sympathy_NN ._. The_DT same_JJ bond_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ
supposed_VBN ,_, may_MD exist_VB between_IN a_DT man_NN and_CC an_DT animal_NN ,_, so_RB that_IN the_DT welfare_NN
of_IN the_DT one_CD depends_VBZ on_IN the_DT welfare_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT animal_NN
dies_VBZ the_DT man_NN dies_VBZ also_RB ._. The_DT analogy_NN between_IN the_DT custom_NN and_CC the_DT tales_NNS
is_VBZ all_DT the_DT closer_RBR because_IN in_IN both_DT of_IN them_PRP the_DT power_NN of_IN thus_RB removing_VBG
the_DT soul_NN from_IN the_DT body_NN and_CC stowing_VBG it_PRP away_RB in_IN an_DT animal_NN is_VBZ often_RB a_DT
special_JJ privilege_NN of_IN wizards_NNS and_CC witches_NNS ._. Thus_RB the_DT Yakuts_NNP of_IN Siberia_NNP
believe_VB that_IN every_DT shaman_NN or_CC wizard_NN keeps_VBZ his_PRP$ soul_NN ,_, or_CC one_CD of_IN his_PRP$
souls_NNS ,_, incarnate_JJ in_IN an_DT animal_NN which_WDT is_VBZ carefully_RB concealed_VBN from_IN all_PDT
the_DT world_NN ._. "_'' Nobody_NN can_MD find_VB my_PRP$ external_JJ soul_NN ,"_, said_VBD one_CD famous_JJ
wizard_NN ,_, "_'' it_PRP lies_VBZ hidden_VBN far_RB away_RB in_IN the_DT stony_JJ mountains_NNS of_IN
Edzhigansk_NNP ."_NNP Only_RB once_RB a_DT year_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT last_JJ snows_NNS melt_VBN and_CC the_DT
earth_NN turns_VBZ black_JJ ,_, do_VBP these_DT external_JJ souls_NNS of_IN wizards_NNS appear_VBP in_IN the_DT
shape_NN of_IN animals_NNS among_IN the_DT dwellings_NNS of_IN men_NNS ._. They_PRP wander_VBP everywhere_RB ,_,
yet_RB none_NN but_CC wizards_NNS can_MD see_VB them_PRP ._. The_DT strong_JJ ones_NNS sweep_NN roaring_NN and_CC
noisily_RB along_RB ,_, the_DT weak_JJ steal_VBP about_RB quietly_RB and_CC furtively_RB ._. Often_RB
they_PRP fight_VBP ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT wizard_NN whose_WP$ external_JJ soul_NN is_VBZ beaten_VBN ,_, falls_NNS
ill_JJ or_CC dies_VBZ ._. The_DT weakest_JJS and_CC most_RBS cowardly_JJ wizards_NNS are_VBP they_PRP whose_WP$
souls_NNS are_VBP incarnate_JJ in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN dogs_NNS ,_, for_IN the_DT dog_NN gives_VBZ his_PRP$
human_NN double_RB no_DT peace_NN ,_, but_CC gnaws_VBD his_PRP$ heart_NN and_CC tears_NNS his_PRP$ body_NN ._. The_DT
most_RBS powerful_JJ wizards_NNS are_VBP they_PRP whose_WP$ external_JJ souls_NNS have_VBP the_DT shape_NN
of_IN stallions_NNS ,_, elks_NNS ,_, black_JJ bears_NNS ,_, eagles_NNS ,_, or_CC boars_NNS ._. Again_RB ,_, the_DT
Samoyeds_NNS of_IN the_DT Turukhinsk_NNP region_NN hold_VBP that_IN every_DT shaman_NN has_VBZ a_DT
familiar_JJ spirit_NN in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT boar_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP leads_VBZ about_IN by_IN a_DT
magic_JJ belt_NN ._. On_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT boar_NN the_DT shaman_NN himself_PRP dies_VBZ ;_: and_CC
stories_NNS are_VBP told_VBN of_IN battles_NNS between_IN wizards_NNS ,_, who_WP send_VBP their_PRP$ spirits_NNS
to_TO fight_VB before_IN they_PRP encounter_VBP each_DT other_JJ in_IN person_NN ._. The_DT Malays_NNPS
believe_VBP that_IN "_`` the_DT soul_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN may_MD pass_VB into_IN another_DT person_NN or_CC
into_IN an_DT animal_NN ,_, or_CC rather_RB that_IN such_PDT a_DT mysterious_JJ relation_NN can_MD arise_VB
between_IN the_DT two_CD that_IN the_DT fate_NN of_IN the_DT one_CD is_VBZ wholly_RB dependent_JJ on_IN that_WDT
of_IN the_DT other_JJ ."_NN

Among_IN the_DT Melanesians_NNS of_IN Mota_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT New_NNP Hebrides_NNP islands_NNS ,_, the_DT
conception_NN of_IN an_DT external_JJ soul_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN
daily_JJ life_NN ._. In_IN the_DT Mota_NNP language_NN the_DT word_NN tamaniu_NNS signifies_.
"_`` something_NN animate_JJ or_CC inanimate_NN which_WDT a_DT man_NN has_VBZ come_VBN to_TO believe_VB to_TO
have_VBP an_DT existence_NN intimately_RB connected_VBN with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ._. ._. ._. ._. It_PRP was_VBD
not_RB every_DT one_CD in_IN Mota_NNP who_WP had_VBD his_PRP$ tamaniu_NNS ;_: only_RB some_DT men_NNS fancied_CC
that_IN they_PRP had_VBD this_DT relation_NN to_TO a_DT lizard_NN ,_, a_DT snake_NN ,_, or_CC it_PRP might_MD be_VB a_DT
stone_NN ;_: sometimes_RB the_DT thing_NN was_VBD sought_VBN for_IN and_CC found_VBD by_IN drinking_VBG the_DT
infusion_NN of_IN certain_JJ leaves_NNS and_CC heaping_NN together_RB the_DT dregs_NNS ;_: then_RB
whatever_WDT living_VBG thing_NN was_VBD first_RB seen_VBN in_IN or_CC upon_IN the_DT heap_NN was_VBD the_DT
tamaniu_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD watched_VBN but_CC not_RB fed_VBN or_CC worshipped_VBN ;_: the_DT natives_NNS
believed_VBD that_IN it_PRP came_VBD at_IN call_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN was_VBD
bound_VBN up_RP with_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN his_PRP$ tamaniu_NNS ,_, if_IN a_DT living_VBG thing_NN ,_, or_CC with_IN
its_PRP$ safety_NN ;_: should_MD it_PRP die_VB ,_, or_CC if_IN not_RB living_VBG get_VB broken_VBN or_CC be_VB lost_VBN ,_,
the_DT man_NN would_MD die_VB ._. Hence_RB in_IN case_NN of_IN sickness_NN they_PRP would_MD send_VB to_TO see_VB
if_IN the_DT tamaniu_NN was_VBD safe_JJ and_CC well_RB ."_.

The_DT theory_NN of_IN an_DT external_JJ soul_NN deposited_VBN in_IN an_DT animal_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB
very_RB prevalent_JJ in_IN West_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, particularly_RB in_IN Nigeria_NNP ,_, the_DT
Cameroons_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT Gaboon_NNP ._. Among_IN the_DT Fans_NNS of_IN the_DT Gaboon_NNP every_DT wizard_NN
is_VBZ believed_VBN at_IN initiation_NN to_TO unite_VB his_PRP$ life_NN with_IN that_DT of_IN some_DT
particular_JJ wild_JJ animal_NN by_IN a_DT rite_NN of_IN blood-brotherhood_NN ;_: he_PRP draws_VBZ
blood_NN from_IN the_DT ear_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN and_CC from_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ arm_NN ,_, and_CC
inoculates_VBZ the_DT animal_NN with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ blood_NN ,_, and_CC himself_PRP with_IN the_DT blood_NN
of_IN the_DT beast_NN ._. Henceforth_RB such_JJ an_DT intimate_JJ union_NN is_VBZ established_VBN
between_IN the_DT two_CD that_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT one_CD entails_VBZ the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT
other_JJ ._. The_DT alliance_NN is_VBZ thought_VBN to_TO bring_VB to_TO the_DT wizard_NN or_CC sorcerer_NN a_DT
great_JJ accession_NN of_IN power_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP can_MD turn_VB to_TO his_PRP$ advantage_NN in_IN
various_JJ ways_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT warlock_NN in_IN the_DT fairy_NN
tales_NNS who_WP has_VBZ deposited_VBN his_PRP$ life_NN outside_IN of_IN himself_PRP in_IN some_DT safe_JJ
place_NN ,_, the_DT Fan_NNP wizard_NN now_RB deems_VBZ himself_PRP invulnerable_JJ ._. Moreover_RB ,_, the_DT
animal_NN with_IN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ exchanged_VBN blood_NN has_VBZ become_VBN his_PRP$ familiar_JJ ,_,
and_CC will_MD obey_VB any_DT orders_NNS he_PRP may_MD choose_VB to_TO give_VB it_PRP ;_: so_IN he_PRP makes_VBZ use_NN
of_IN it_PRP to_TO injure_VB and_CC kill_VB his_PRP$ enemies_NNS ._. For_IN that_DT reason_NN the_DT creature_NN
with_IN whom_WP he_PRP establishes_VBZ the_DT relation_NN of_IN blood-brotherhood_NN is_VBZ never_RB
a_DT tame_JJ or_CC domestic_JJ animal_NN ,_, but_CC always_RB a_DT ferocious_JJ and_CC dangerous_JJ wild_JJ
beast_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN a_DT leopard_NN ,_, a_DT black_JJ serpent_NN ,_, a_DT crocodile_NN ,_, a_DT
hippopotamus_NN ,_, a_DT wild_JJ boar_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT vulture_NN ._. Of_IN all_PDT these_DT creatures_NNS the_DT
leopard_NN is_VBZ by_IN far_RB the_DT commonest_JJS familiar_JJ of_IN Fan_NNP wizards_NNS ,_, and_CC next_JJ to_TO
it_PRP comes_VBZ the_DT black_JJ serpent_NN ;_: the_DT vulture_NN is_VBZ the_DT rarest_NN ._. Witches_NNS as_IN
well_RB as_IN wizards_NNS have_VBP their_PRP$ familiars_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT animals_NNS with_IN which_WDT the_DT
lives_NNS of_IN women_NNS are_VBP thus_RB bound_VBN up_RP generally_RB differ_VBP from_IN those_DT to_TO
which_WDT men_NNS commit_VBP their_PRP$ external_JJ souls_NNS ._. A_DT witch_NN never_RB has_VBZ a_DT panther_NN
for_IN her_PRP$ familiar_JJ ,_, but_CC often_RB a_DT venomous_JJ species_NNS of_IN serpent_NN ,_, sometimes_RB
a_DT horned_JJ viper_NN ,_, sometimes_RB a_DT black_JJ serpent_NN ,_, sometimes_RB a_DT green_JJ one_CD
that_IN lives_NNS in_IN banana-trees_NNS ;_: or_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB a_DT vulture_NN ,_, an_DT owl_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ
bird_NN of_IN night_NN ._. In_IN every_DT case_NN the_DT beast_NN or_CC bird_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT witch_NN
or_CC wizard_NN has_VBZ contracted_VBN this_DT mystic_JJ alliance_NN is_VBZ an_DT individual_NN ,_,
never_RB a_DT species_NN ;_: and_CC when_WRB the_DT individual_JJ animal_NN dies_VBZ the_DT alliance_NN is_VBZ
naturally_RB at_IN an_DT end_NN ,_, since_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO
entail_VB the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN ._.

Similar_JJ beliefs_NNS are_VBP held_VBN by_IN the_DT natives_NNS of_IN the_DT Cross_NNP River_NNP valley_NN
within_IN the_DT provinces_NNS of_IN the_DT Cameroons_NNS ._. Groups_NNS of_IN people_NNS ,_, generally_RB
the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN a_DT village_NN ,_, have_VBP chosen_VBN various_JJ animals_NNS ,_, with_IN
which_WDT they_PRP believe_VBP themselves_PRP to_TO stand_VB on_IN a_DT footing_NN of_IN intimate_JJ
friendship_NN or_CC relationship_NN ._. Amongst_IN such_JJ animals_NNS are_VBP hippopotamuses_NNS ,_,
elephants_NNS ,_, leopards_NNS ,_, crocodiles_NNS ,_, gorillas_NNS ,_, fish_NN ,_, and_CC serpents_NNS ,_, all_DT
of_IN them_PRP creatures_NNS which_WDT are_VBP either_RB very_RB strong_JJ or_CC can_MD easily_RB hide_VB
themselves_PRP in_IN the_DT water_NN or_CC a_DT thicket_NN ._. This_DT power_NN of_IN concealing_VBG
themselves_PRP is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO be_VB an_DT indispensable_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT choice_NN of_IN
animal_NN familiars_NNS ,_, since_IN the_DT animal_NN friend_NN or_CC helper_NN is_VBZ expected_VBN to_TO
injure_IN his_PRP$ owner_NN '_POS s_VBZ enemy_NN by_IN stealth_NN ;_: for_IN example_NN ,_, if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ a_DT
hippopotamus_NN ,_, he_PRP will_MD bob_VB up_RP suddenly_RB out_IN of_IN the_DT water_NN and_CC capsize_NN
the_DT enemy_NN '_POS s_PRP canoe_NN ._. Between_IN the_DT animals_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ human_JJ friends_NNS or_CC
kinsfolk_NN such_JJ a_DT sympathetic_JJ relation_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO exist_VB that_IN the_DT
moment_NN the_DT animal_NN dies_VBZ the_DT man_NN dies_VBZ also_RB ,_, and_CC similarly_RB the_DT instant_NN
the_DT man_NN perishes_VBZ so_RB does_VBZ the_DT beast_NN ._. From_IN this_DT it_PRP follows_VBZ that_IN the_DT
animal_NN kinsfolk_NN may_MD never_RB be_VB shot_VBN at_IN or_CC molested_VBD for_IN fear_NN of_IN
injuring_VBG or_CC killing_VBG the_DT persons_NNS whose_WP$ lives_NNS are_VBP knit_VBN up_RP with_IN the_DT
lives_NNS of_IN the_DT brutes_NNS ._. This_DT does_VBZ not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, prevent_VBP the_DT people_NNS of_IN a_DT
village_NN ,_, who_WP have_VBP elephants_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ animal_NN friends_NNS ,_, from_IN hunting_VBG
elephants_NNS ._. For_IN they_PRP do_VBP not_RB respect_VB the_DT whole_JJ species_NNS but_CC merely_RB
certain_JJ individuals_NNS of_IN it_PRP ,_, which_WDT stand_VBP in_IN an_DT intimate_JJ relation_NN to_TO
certain_JJ individual_JJ men_NNS and_CC women_NNS ;_: and_CC they_PRP imagine_VBP that_IN they_PRP can_MD
always_RB distinguish_VB these_DT brother_NN elephants_NNS from_IN the_DT common_JJ herd_NN of_IN
elephants_NNS which_WDT are_VBP mere_JJ elephants_NNS and_CC nothing_NN more_RBR ._. The_DT recognition_NN
indeed_RB is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO be_VB mutual_JJ ._. When_WRB a_DT hunter_NN ,_, who_WP has_VBZ an_DT elephant_NN for_IN
his_PRP$ friend_NN ,_, meets_VBZ a_DT human_JJ elephant_NN ,_, as_IN we_PRP may_MD call_VB it_PRP ,_, the_DT noble_JJ
animal_NN lifts_VBZ up_RP a_DT paw_NN and_CC holds_VBZ it_PRP before_IN his_PRP$ face_NN ,_, as_RB much_RB as_IN to_TO
say_VBP ,_, "_'' Don_NNP '_POS t_NN shoot_NN ."_NNP Were_VBD the_DT hunter_NN so_RB inhuman_JJ as_IN to_TO fire_VB on_IN and_CC
wound_NN such_JJ an_DT elephant_NN ,_, the_DT person_NN whose_WP$ life_NN was_VBD bound_VBN up_RP with_IN the_DT
elephant_NN would_MD fall_VB ill_RB ._.

The_DT Balong_NNP of_IN the_DT Cameroons_NNS think_VBP that_IN every_DT man_NN has_VBZ several_JJ souls_NNS ,_,
of_IN which_WDT one_CD is_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ body_NN and_CC another_DT in_IN an_DT animal_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN an_DT
elephant_NN ,_, a_DT wild_JJ pig_NN ,_, a_DT leopard_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ._. When_WRB a_DT man_NN comes_VBZ
home_NN ,_, feeling_VBG ill_JJ ,_, and_CC says_VBZ ,_, "_`` I_PRP shall_MD soon_RB die_VB ,"_JJ and_CC dies_NNS
accordingly_RB ,_, the_DT people_NNS aver_NN that_IN one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ souls_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN killed_VBN
in_IN a_DT wild_JJ pig_NN or_CC a_DT leopard_NN and_CC that_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT external_JJ soul_NN
has_VBZ caused_VBN the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT soul_NN in_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ._. A_DT similar_JJ belief_NN in_IN
the_DT external_JJ souls_NNS of_IN living_VBG people_NNS is_VBZ entertained_VBN by_IN the_DT Ibos_NNP ,_, an_DT
important_JJ tribe_NN of_IN the_DT Niger_NNP delta_NN ._. They_PRP think_VBP that_IN a_DT man_NN '_'' s_PRP spirit_NN
can_MD quit_VB his_PRP$ body_NN for_IN a_DT time_NN during_IN life_NN and_CC take_VB up_RP its_PRP$ abode_NN in_IN an_DT
animal_NN ._. A_DT man_NN who_WP wishes_VBZ to_TO acquire_VB this_DT power_NN procures_VBZ a_DT certain_JJ
drug_NN from_IN a_DT wise_JJ man_NN and_CC mixes_VBZ it_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ food_NN ._. After_IN that_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN
goes_VBZ out_RB and_CC enters_VBZ into_IN an_DT animal_NN ._. If_IN it_PRP should_MD happen_VB that_IN the_DT
animal_NN is_VBZ killed_VBN while_IN the_DT man_NN '_POS s_VBZ soul_NN is_VBZ lodged_VBN in_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT man_NN dies_VBZ ;_:
and_CC if_IN the_DT animal_NN be_VB wounded_VBN ,_, the_DT man_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN will_MD presently_RB be_VB
covered_VBN with_IN boils_NNS ._. This_DT belief_NN instigates_NNS to_TO many_JJ deeds_NNS of_IN
darkness_NN ;_: for_IN a_DT sly_JJ rogue_NN will_MD sometimes_RB surreptitiously_RB administer_NN
the_DT magical_JJ drug_NN to_TO his_PRP$ enemy_NN in_IN his_PRP$ food_NN ,_, and_CC having_VBG thus_RB smuggled_VBN
the_DT other_JJ '_POS s_PRP soul_NN into_IN an_DT animal_NN will_MD destroy_VB the_DT creature_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN
it_PRP the_DT man_NN whose_WP$ soul_NN is_VBZ lodged_VBN in_IN it_PRP ._.

The_DT negroes_NNS of_IN Calabar_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT Niger_NNP ,_, believe_VBP that_IN
every_DT person_NN has_VBZ four_CD souls_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN which_WDT always_RB lives_VBZ outside_RB of_IN
his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ body_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT wild_JJ beast_NN in_IN the_DT forest_NN ._. This_DT
external_JJ soul_NN ,_, or_CC bush_NN soul_NN ,_, as_IN Miss_NNP Kingsley_NNP calls_VBZ it_PRP ,_, may_MD be_VB
almost_RB any_DT animal_NN ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, a_DT leopard_NN ,_, a_DT fish_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT tortoise_NN ;_:
but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ never_RB a_DT domestic_JJ animal_NN and_CC never_RB a_DT plant_NN ._. Unless_IN he_PRP is_VBZ
gifted_JJ with_IN second_JJ sight_NN ,_, a_DT man_NN cannot_MD see_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ bush_NN soul_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT
diviner_NN will_MD often_RB tell_VB him_PRP what_WP sort_NN of_IN creature_NN his_PRP$ bush_NN soul_NN is_VBZ ,_,
and_CC after_IN that_IN the_DT man_NN will_MD be_VB careful_JJ not_RB to_TO kill_VB any_DT animal_NN of_IN
that_IN species_NNS ,_, and_CC will_MD strongly_RB object_VB to_TO any_DT one_NN else_RB doing_VBG so_RB ._. A_DT
man_NN and_CC his_PRP$ sons_NNS have_VBP usually_RB the_DT same_JJ sort_NN of_IN animals_NNS for_IN their_PRP$
bush_NN souls_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB with_IN a_DT mother_NN and_CC her_PRP$ daughters_NNS ._. But_CC sometimes_RB
all_PDT the_DT children_NNS of_IN a_DT family_NN take_NN after_IN the_DT bush_NN soul_NN of_IN their_PRP$
father_NN ;_: for_IN example_NN ,_, if_IN his_PRP$ external_JJ soul_NN is_VBZ a_DT leopard_NN ,_, all_RB his_PRP$ sons_NNS
and_CC daughters_NNS will_MD have_VB leopards_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ external_JJ souls_NNS ._. And_CC on_IN
the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, sometimes_RB they_PRP all_DT take_VBP after_IN their_PRP$ mother_NN ;_: for_IN
instance_NN ,_, if_IN her_PRP$ external_JJ soul_NN is_VBZ a_DT tortoise_NN ,_, all_DT the_DT external_JJ souls_NNS
of_IN her_PRP$ sons_NNS and_CC daughters_NNS will_MD be_VB tortoises_NNS too_RB ._. So_RB intimately_RB bound_VBN
up_RB is_VBZ the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN with_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT animal_NN which_WDT he_PRP regards_VBZ
as_IN his_PRP$ external_JJ or_CC bush_NN soul_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT death_NN or_CC injury_NN of_IN the_DT animal_NN
necessarily_RB entails_VBZ the_DT death_NN or_CC injury_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN ._. And_CC ,_, conversely_RB ,_,
when_WRB the_DT man_NN dies_VBZ ,_, his_PRP$ bush_NN soul_NN can_MD no_RB longer_RB find_VB a_DT place_NN of_IN rest_NN ,_,
but_CC goes_VBZ mad_JJ and_CC rushes_VBZ into_IN the_DT fire_NN or_CC charges_NNS people_NNS and_CC is_VBZ
knocked_VBN on_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, and_CC that_DT is_VBZ an_DT end_NN of_IN it_PRP ._.

Near_IN Eket_NNP in_IN North_NNP Calabar_NNP there_RB is_VBZ a_DT sacred_JJ lake_NN ,_, the_DT fish_NN of_IN which_WDT
are_VBP carefully_RB preserved_VBN because_IN the_DT people_NNS believe_VBP that_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ
souls_NNS are_VBP lodged_VBN in_IN the_DT fish_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN with_IN every_DT fish_NN killed_VBD a_DT
human_JJ life_NN would_MD be_VB simultaneously_RB extinguished_VBN ._. In_IN the_DT Calabar_NNP
River_NNP not_RB very_RB many_JJ years_NNS ago_IN there_RB used_VBD to_TO be_VB a_DT huge_JJ old_JJ crocodile_NN ,_,
popularly_RB supposed_VBN to_TO contain_VB the_DT external_JJ soul_NN of_IN a_DT chief_NN who_WP
resided_VBN in_IN the_DT flesh_NN at_IN Duke_NNP Town_NNP ._. Sporting_NN vice-consuls_NNS used_VBN from_IN

In_IN many_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN South-Eastern_JJ Australia_NNP each_DT sex_NN used_VBN to_TO regard_VB a_DT

"_`` brother_NN "_'' and_CC that_IN the_DT nightjar_NN was_VBD his_PRP$ "_`` wife_NN ."_, The_DT particular_JJ

children_NNS ,_, and_CC will_MD strike_VB him_PRP with_IN their_PRP$ long_JJ poles_NNS ."_.

The_DT jealous_JJ protection_NN thus_RB afforded_VBN by_IN Australian_JJ men_NNS and_CC women_NNS to_TO

Similarly_RB ,_, if_IN my_PRP$ sister_NN Mary_NNP '_POS s_PRP life_NN is_VBZ in_IN an_DT owl_NN ,_, then_RB the_DT owl_NN is_VBZ my_PRP$

But_CC when_WRB a_DT savage_JJ names_NNS himself_PRP after_IN an_DT animal_NN ,_, calls_VBZ it_PRP his_PRP$
brother_NN ,_, and_CC refuses_VBZ to_TO kill_VB it_PRP ,_, the_DT animal_NN is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO be_VB his_PRP$ totem_NN ._.
Accordingly_RB in_IN the_DT tribes_NNS of_IN South-Eastern_NNP Australia_NNP which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP

hereditary_PRP either_CC in_IN the_DT male_JJ or_CC female_JJ line_NN ._. The_DT relation_NN of_IN an_DT

his_PRP$ brother_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP calls_VBZ himself_PRP by_IN its_PRP$ name_NN ._. Now_RB if_IN the_DT relations_NNS
are_VBP similar_JJ ,_, the_DT explanation_NN which_WDT holds_VBZ good_JJ of_IN the_DT one_CD ought_MD

may_MD be_VB a_DT plant_NN )_-RRB- and_CC call_VB themselves_PRP after_IN it_PRP ,_, would_MD seem_VB to_TO be_VB a_DT

would_MD be_VB the_DT consequence_NN of_IN killing_VBG that_IN particular_JJ animal_NN ,_, or_CC
destroying_VBG that_DT particular_JJ plant_NN ._. This_DT explanation_NN of_IN totemism_NN

kobong_JJ in_IN Western_NNP Australia_NNP ._. He_PRP says_VBZ :_: "_`` A_DT certain_JJ mysterious_JJ

kobong_NN belongs_VBZ ,_, should_MD he_PRP find_VB it_PRP asleep_RB ;_: indeed_RB he_PRP always_RB kills_VBZ
it_PRP reluctantly_RB ,_, and_CC never_RB without_IN affording_VBG it_PRP a_DT chance_NN to_TO escape_VB ._.
This_DT arises_VBZ from_IN the_DT family_NN belief_NN that_IN some_DT one_CD individual_NN of_IN the_DT
species_NNS is_VBZ their_PRP$ nearest_JJS friend_NN ,_, to_TO kill_VB whom_WP would_MD be_VB a_DT great_JJ
crime_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO be_VB carefully_RB avoided_VBN ._. Similarly_RB ,_, a_DT native_NN who_WP has_VBZ a_DT
vegetable_NN for_IN his_PRP$ kobong_NN may_MD not_RB gather_VB it_PRP under_IN certain_JJ
circumstances_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN a_DT particular_JJ period_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ."_, Here_RB it_PRP will_MD
be_VB observed_VBN that_IN though_IN each_DT man_NN spares_VBZ all_PDT the_DT animals_NNS or_CC plants_NNS of_IN
the_DT species_NNS ,_, they_PRP are_VBP not_RB all_DT equally_RB precious_JJ to_TO him_PRP ;_: far_RB from_IN it_PRP ,_,
