to_TO him_PRP ;_: but_CC as_IN he_PRP does_VBZ not_RB know_VB which_WDT the_DT dear_NN one_NN is_VBZ ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ obliged_VBN
to_TO spare_VB them_PRP all_DT from_IN fear_NN of_IN injuring_VBG the_DT one_CD ._. Again_RB ,_, this_DT
explanation_NN of_IN the_DT clan_NN totem_NN harmonises_VBZ with_IN the_DT supposed_VBN effect_NN of_IN
killing_VBG one_CD of_IN the_DT totem_NN species_NNS ._. "_'' One_CD day_NN one_CD of_IN the_DT blacks_NNS killed_VBN
a_DT crow_NN ._. Three_CD or_CC four_CD days_NNS afterwards_RB a_DT Boortwa_NNP (_-LRB- crow_NN )_-RRB- [_NN i_NN ._. e_NN ._. a_DT man_NN
of_IN the_DT Crow_NNP clan_NN ]_SYM named_VBN Larry_NNP died_VBD ._. He_PRP had_VBD been_VBN ailing_VBG for_IN some_DT
days_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT killing_NN of_IN his_PRP$ wingong_NN [_IN totem_NN ]_SYM hastened_VBN his_PRP$ death_NN ."_.
Here_RB the_DT killing_NN of_IN the_DT crow_NN caused_VBD the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN of_IN the_DT Crow_NNP
clan_NN ,_, exactly_RB as_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT sex-totems_NNS ,_, the_DT killing_NN of_IN a_DT
bat_NN causes_VBZ the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT Bat-man_NNP or_CC the_DT killing_NN of_IN an_DT owl_NN causes_NNS
the_DT death_NN of_IN an_DT Owl-woman_NNP ._. Similarly_RB ,_, the_DT killing_NN of_IN his_PRP$ nagual_NN
causes_VBZ the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT Central_NNP American_NNP Indian_NNP ,_, the_DT killing_NN of_IN his_PRP$
bush_NN soul_NN causes_VBZ the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT Calabar_NNP negro_NN ,_, the_DT killing_NN of_IN his_PRP$
tamaniu_NNS causes_VBZ the_DT death_NN of_IN a_DT Banks_NNP Islander_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT killing_NN of_IN
the_DT animal_NN in_IN which_WDT his_PRP$ life_NN is_VBZ stowed_VBN away_RB causes_VBZ the_DT death_NN of_IN the_DT
giant_JJ or_CC warlock_NN in_IN the_DT fairy_JJ tale_NN ._.

Thus_RB it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN the_DT story_NN of_IN "_`` The_DT giant_NN who_WP had_VBD no_DT heart_NN in_IN his_PRP$
body_NN "_`` may_MD perhaps_RB furnish_VB the_DT key_NN to_TO the_DT relation_NN which_WDT is_VBZ supposed_VBN
to_TO subsist_VB between_IN a_DT man_NN and_CC his_PRP$ totem_NN ._. The_DT totem_NN ,_, on_IN this_DT theory_NN ,_,
is_VBZ simply_RB the_DT receptacle_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT man_NN keeps_VBZ his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, as_IN Punchkin_NNP
kept_VBD his_PRP$ life_NN in_IN a_DT parrot_NN ,_, and_CC Bidasari_NNP kept_VBD her_PRP$ soul_NN in_IN a_DT golden_JJ
fish_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ no_DT valid_JJ objection_NN to_TO this_DT view_NN that_IN when_WRB a_DT savage_JJ has_VBZ
both_DT a_DT sex_NN totem_NN and_CC a_DT clan_NN totem_IN his_PRP$ life_NN must_MD be_VB bound_VBN up_RP with_IN two_CD
different_JJ animals_NNS ,_, the_DT death_NN of_IN either_DT of_IN which_WDT would_MD entail_VB his_PRP$
own_JJ ._. If_IN a_DT man_NN has_VBZ more_JJR vital_JJ places_NNS than_IN one_CD in_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ,_, why_WRB ,_, the_DT
savage_JJ may_MD think_VB ,_, should_MD he_PRP not_RB have_VB more_RBR vital_JJ places_NNS than_IN one_CD
outside_IN it_PRP ?_. Why_WRB ,_, since_IN he_PRP can_MD put_VB his_PRP$ life_NN outside_IN himself_PRP ,_, should_MD
he_PRP not_RB transfer_VB one_CD portion_NN of_IN it_PRP to_TO one_CD animal_NN and_CC another_DT to_TO
another_DT ?_. The_DT divisibility_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, to_TO put_VB it_PRP otherwise_RB ,_, the_DT
plurality_NN of_IN souls_NNS ,_, is_VBZ an_DT idea_NN suggested_VBN by_IN many_JJ familiar_JJ facts_NNS ,_, and_CC
has_VBZ commended_VBN itself_PRP to_TO philosophers_NNS like_IN Plato_NNP ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN to_TO
savages_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB when_WRB the_DT notion_NN of_IN a_DT soul_NN ,_, from_IN being_VBG a_DT
quasi-scientific_JJ hypothesis_NN ,_, becomes_VBZ a_DT theological_JJ dogma_NN that_IN its_PRP$
unity_NN and_CC indivisibility_NN are_VBP insisted_VBN upon_IN as_IN essential_JJ ._. The_DT savage_JJ ,_,
unshackled_VBN by_IN dogma_NN ,_, is_VBZ free_JJ to_TO explain_VB the_DT facts_NNS of_IN life_NN by_IN the_DT
assumption_NN of_IN as_IN many_JJ souls_NNS as_IN he_PRP thinks_VBZ necessary_JJ ._. Hence_RB ,_, for_IN
example_NN ,_, the_DT Caribs_NNP supposed_VBD that_IN there_RB was_VBD one_CD soul_NN in_IN the_DT head_NN ,_,
another_DT in_IN the_DT heart_NN ,_, and_CC other_JJ souls_NNS at_IN all_PDT the_DT places_NNS where_WRB an_DT
artery_NN is_VBZ felt_VBN pulsating_VBG ._. Some_DT of_IN the_DT Hidatsa_NNP Indians_NNPS explain_VBP the_DT
phenomena_NNS of_IN gradual_JJ death_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT extremities_NNS appear_VBP dead_JJ first_RB ,_,
by_IN supposing_VBG that_DT man_NN has_VBZ four_CD souls_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP quit_VBD the_DT body_NN ,_,
not_RB simultaneously_RB ,_, but_CC one_CD after_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, dissolution_NN being_VBG only_RB
complete_JJ when_WRB all_DT four_CD have_VBP departed_VBN ._. Some_DT of_IN the_DT Dyaks_NNP of_IN Borneo_NNP
and_CC the_DT Malays_NNP of_IN the_DT Peninsula_NNP believe_VBP that_IN every_DT man_NN has_VBZ seven_CD
souls_NNS ._. The_DT Alfoors_NNP of_IN Poso_NNP in_IN Celebes_NNP are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ
three_CD ._. The_DT natives_NNS of_IN Laos_NNP suppose_VBP that_IN the_DT body_NN is_VBZ the_DT seat_NN of_IN
thirty_CD spirits_NNS ,_, which_WDT reside_VBD in_IN the_DT hands_NNS ,_, the_DT feet_NNS ,_, the_DT mouth_NN ,_, the_DT
eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ._. Hence_RB ,_, from_IN the_DT primitive_JJ point_NN of_IN view_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ
perfectly_RB possible_JJ that_IN a_DT savage_JJ should_MD have_VB one_CD soul_NN in_IN his_PRP$ sex_NN
totem_NN and_CC another_DT in_IN his_PRP$ clan_NN totem_NN ._. However_RB ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP observed_VBN ,_,
sex_NN totems_NNS have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN nowhere_RB but_CC in_IN Australia_NNP ;_: so_RB that_IN as_IN a_DT
rule_VB the_DT savage_JJ who_WP practises_VBZ totemism_NN need_VBP not_RB have_VB more_RBR than_IN one_CD
soul_NN out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN at_IN a_DT time_NN ._.

If_IN this_DT explanation_NN of_IN the_DT totem_NN as_IN a_DT receptacle_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT man_NN
keeps_VBZ his_PRP$ soul_NN or_CC one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ souls_NNS is_VBZ correct_JJ ,_, we_PRP should_MD expect_VB to_TO
find_VB some_DT totemic_JJ people_NNS of_IN whom_WP it_PRP is_VBZ expressly_RB said_VBD that_IN every_DT man_NN
amongst_NN them_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO keep_VB at_IN least_JJS one_CD soul_NN permanently_RB out_RB
of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN this_DT external_JJ soul_NN is_VBZ
supposed_VBN to_TO entail_VB the_DT death_NN of_IN its_PRP$ owner_NN ._. Such_PDT a_DT people_NNS are_VBP the_DT
Bataks_NNP of_IN Sumatra_NNP ._. The_DT Bataks_NNPS are_VBP divided_VBN into_IN exogamous_JJ clans_NNS
(_-LRB- margas_NN )_-RRB- with_IN descent_NN in_IN the_DT male_JJ line_NN ;_: and_CC each_DT clan_NN is_VBZ forbidden_VBN
to_TO eat_VB the_DT flesh_NN of_IN a_DT particular_JJ animal_NN ._. One_CD clan_NN may_MD not_RB eat_VB the_DT
tiger_NN ,_, another_DT the_DT ape_NN ,_, another_DT the_DT crocodile_NN ,_, another_DT the_DT dog_NN ,_,
another_DT the_DT cat_NN ,_, another_DT the_DT dove_NN ,_, another_DT the_DT white_JJ buffalo_NN ,_, and_CC
another_DT the_DT locust_NN ._. The_DT reason_NN given_VBN by_IN members_NNS of_IN a_DT clan_NN for_IN
abstaining_VBG from_IN the_DT flesh_NN of_IN the_DT particular_JJ animal_NN is_VBZ either_RB that_IN
they_PRP are_VBP descended_VBN from_IN animals_NNS of_IN that_DT species_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN their_PRP$
souls_NNS after_IN death_NN may_MD transmigrate_VB into_IN the_DT animals_NNS ,_, or_CC that_IN they_PRP or_CC
their_PRP$ forefathers_NNS have_VBP been_VBN under_IN certain_JJ obligations_NNS to_TO the_DT
creatures_NNS ._. Sometimes_RB ,_, but_CC not_RB always_RB ,_, the_DT clan_NN bears_VBZ the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT
animal_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT Bataks_NNPS have_VBP totemism_NN in_IN full_JJ ._. But_CC ,_, further_RB ,_, each_DT
Batak_NNP believes_VBZ that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ seven_CD or_CC ,_, on_IN a_DT more_RBR moderate_JJ computation_NN ,_,
three_CD souls_NNS ._. One_CD of_IN these_DT souls_NNS is_VBZ always_RB outside_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, but_CC
nevertheless_RB whenever_WRB it_PRP dies_VBZ ,_, however_RB far_RB away_RB it_PRP may_MD be_VB at_IN the_DT
time_NN ,_, that_DT same_JJ moment_NN the_DT man_NN dies_VBZ also_RB ._. The_DT writer_NN who_WP mentions_VBZ
this_DT belief_NN says_VBZ nothing_NN about_IN the_DT Batak_NNP totems_NNS ;_: but_CC on_IN the_DT analogy_NN
of_IN the_DT Australian_NNP ,_, Central_NNP American_NNP ,_, and_CC African_JJ evidence_NN we_PRP may_MD
conjecture_NN that_IN the_DT external_JJ soul_NN ,_, whose_WP$ death_NN entails_VBZ the_DT death_NN of_IN
the_DT man_NN ,_, is_VBZ housed_VBN in_IN the_DT totemic_JJ animal_NN or_CC plant_NN ._.

Against_IN this_DT view_NN it_PRP can_MD hardly_RB be_VB thought_VBN to_TO militate_VB that_IN the_DT
Batak_NNP does_VBZ not_RB in_IN set_VBN terms_NNS affirm_IN his_PRP$ external_JJ soul_NN to_TO be_VB in_IN his_PRP$
totem_NN ,_, but_CC alleges_VBZ other_JJ grounds_NNS for_IN respecting_VBG the_DT sacred_JJ animal_NN or_CC
plant_NN of_IN his_PRP$ clan_NN ._. For_IN if_IN a_DT savage_JJ seriously_RB believes_VBZ that_IN his_PRP$ life_NN
is_VBZ bound_VBN up_RP with_IN an_DT external_JJ object_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN the_DT last_JJ degree_NN
unlikely_JJ that_IN he_PRP will_MD let_VB any_DT stranger_NN into_IN the_DT secret_NN ._. In_IN all_PDT that_WDT
touches_NNS his_PRP$ inmost_JJ life_NN and_CC beliefs_NNS the_DT savage_JJ is_VBZ exceedingly_RB
suspicious_JJ and_CC reserved_VBN ;_: Europeans_NNPS have_VBP resided_VBN among_IN savages_NNS for_IN
years_NNS without_IN discovering_VBG some_DT of_IN their_PRP$ capital_NN articles_NNS of_IN faith_NN ,_,
and_CC in_IN the_DT end_NN the_DT discovery_NN has_VBZ often_RB been_VBN the_DT result_NN of_IN accident_NN ._.
Above_IN all_DT ,_, the_DT savage_JJ lives_NNS in_IN an_DT intense_JJ and_CC perpetual_JJ dread_NN of_IN
assassination_NN by_IN sorcery_NN ;_: the_DT most_RBS trifling_JJ relics_NNS of_IN his_PRP$
person_NN --_: the_DT clippings_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ hair_NN and_CC nails_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ spittle_NN ,_, the_DT
remnants_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ food_NN ,_, his_PRP$ very_JJ name_NN --_: all_DT these_DT may_MD ,_, he_PRP fancies_VBZ ,_, be_VB
turned_VBN by_IN the_DT sorcerer_NN to_TO his_PRP$ destruction_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ therefore_RB
anxiously_RB careful_JJ to_TO conceal_VB or_CC destroy_VB them_PRP ._. But_CC if_IN in_IN matters_NNS such_JJ
as_IN these_DT ,_, which_WDT are_VBP but_CC the_DT outposts_NNS and_CC outworks_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ
so_RB shy_JJ and_CC secretive_JJ ,_, how_WRB close_RB must_MD be_VB the_DT concealment_NN ,_, how_WRB
impenetrable_JJ the_DT reserve_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PRP enshrouds_VBZ the_DT inner_JJ keep_NN and_CC
citadel_NN of_IN his_PRP$ being_VBG !_. When_WRB the_DT princess_NN in_IN the_DT fairy_JJ tale_NN asks_VBZ the_DT
giant_NN where_WRB he_PRP keeps_VBZ his_PRP$ soul_NN ,_, he_PRP often_RB gives_VBZ false_JJ or_CC evasive_JJ
answers_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB after_IN much_JJ coaxing_NN and_CC wheedling_NN that_IN the_DT
secret_NN is_VBZ at_IN last_JJ wrung_NN from_IN him_PRP ._. In_IN his_PRP$ jealous_JJ reticence_NN the_DT giant_NN
resembles_VBZ the_DT timid_JJ and_CC furtive_JJ savage_JJ ;_: but_CC whereas_IN the_DT exigencies_NNS
of_IN the_DT story_NN demand_NN that_IN the_DT giant_NN should_MD at_IN last_JJ reveal_VB his_PRP$ secret_NN ,_,
no_DT such_JJ obligation_NN is_VBZ laid_VBN on_IN the_DT savage_JJ ;_: and_CC no_DT inducement_NN that_DT can_MD
be_VB offered_VBN is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO tempt_VB him_PRP to_TO imperil_VB his_PRP$ soul_NN by_IN revealing_VBG
its_PRP$ hiding-place_NN to_TO a_DT stranger_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ therefore_RB no_DT matter_NN for_IN
surprise_NN that_IN the_DT central_JJ mystery_NN of_IN the_DT savage_JJ '_'' s_PRP life_NN should_MD so_RB
long_RB have_VBP remained_VBN a_DT secret_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN we_PRP should_MD be_VB left_VBN to_TO piece_VB it_PRP
together_RB from_IN scattered_VBN hints_NNS and_CC fragments_NNS and_CC from_IN the_DT
recollections_NNS of_IN it_PRP which_WDT linger_NN in_IN fairy_JJ tales_NNS ._.



4._DT The_DT Ritual_NNP of_IN Death_NNP and_CC Resurrection_NN

THIS_DT view_NN of_IN totemism_NN throws_VBZ light_NN on_IN a_DT class_NN of_IN religious_JJ rites_NNS of_IN
which_WDT no_DT adequate_JJ explanation_NN ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP am_VBP aware_JJ ,_, has_VBZ yet_RB been_VBN
offered_VBN ._. Amongst_IN many_JJ savage_JJ tribes_NNS ,_, especially_RB such_JJ as_IN are_VBP known_VBN to_TO
practice_NN totemism_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ customary_JJ for_IN lads_NNS at_IN puberty_NN to_TO undergo_VB
certain_JJ initiatory_NN rites_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT one_CD of_IN the_DT commonest_NN is_VBZ a_DT
pretence_NN of_IN killing_VBG the_DT lad_NN and_CC bringing_VBG him_PRP to_TO life_NN again_RB ._. Such_PDT
rites_NNS become_VBP intelligible_JJ if_IN we_PRP suppose_VBP that_IN their_PRP$ substance_NN
consists_VBZ in_IN extracting_VBG the_DT youth_NN '_'' s_PRP soul_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO transfer_VB it_PRP to_TO
his_PRP$ totem_NN ._. For_IN the_DT extraction_NN of_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN would_MD naturally_RB be_VB
supposed_VBN to_TO kill_VB the_DT youth_NN or_CC at_IN least_JJS to_TO throw_VB him_PRP into_IN a_DT
death-like_JJ trance_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT savage_JJ hardly_RB distinguishes_NNS from_IN death_NN ._.
His_PRP$ recovery_NN would_MD then_RB be_VB attributed_VBN either_CC to_TO the_DT gradual_JJ recovery_NN
of_IN his_PRP$ system_NN from_IN the_DT violent_JJ shock_NN which_WDT it_PRP had_VBD received_VBN ,_, or_CC ,_, more_RBR
probably_RB ,_, to_TO the_DT infusion_NN into_IN him_PRP of_IN fresh_JJ life_NN drawn_VBN from_IN the_DT
totem_NN ._. Thus_RB the_DT essence_NN of_IN these_DT initiatory_JJ rites_NNS ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP
consist_VB in_IN a_DT simulation_NN of_IN death_NN and_CC resurrection_NN ,_, would_MD be_VB an_DT
exchange_NN of_IN life_NN or_CC souls_NNS between_IN the_DT man_NN and_CC his_PRP$ totem_NN ._. The_DT
primitive_JJ belief_NN in_IN the_DT possibility_NN of_IN such_JJ an_DT exchange_NN of_IN souls_NNS
comes_VBZ clearly_RB out_RP in_IN a_DT story_NN of_IN a_DT Basque_NNP hunter_NN who_WP affirmed_VBD that_IN he_PRP
had_VBD been_VBN killed_VBN by_IN a_DT bear_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN the_DT bear_NN had_VBD ,_, after_IN killing_VBG him_PRP ,_,
breathed_VBD its_PRP$ own_JJ soul_NN into_IN him_PRP ,_, so_RB that_IN the_DT bear_NN '_POS s_VBZ body_NN was_VBD now_RB
dead_JJ ,_, but_CC he_PRP himself_PRP was_VBD a_DT bear_NN ,_, being_VBG animated_VBN by_IN the_DT bear_NN '_'' s_PRP soul_NN ._.
This_DT revival_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ hunter_NN as_IN a_DT bear_NN is_VBZ exactly_RB analogous_JJ to_TO
what_WP ,_, on_IN the_DT theory_NN here_RB suggested_VBD ,_, is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO take_VB place_NN in_IN the_DT
ceremony_NN of_IN killing_NN a_DT lad_NN at_IN puberty_NN and_CC bringing_VBG him_PRP to_TO life_NN again_RB ._.
The_DT lad_NN dies_VBZ as_IN a_DT man_NN and_CC comes_VBZ to_TO life_NN again_RB as_IN an_DT animal_NN ;_: the_DT
animal_NN '_POS s_PRP soul_NN is_VBZ now_RB in_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ human_JJ soul_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT animal_NN ._.
With_IN good_JJ right_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, does_VBZ he_PRP call_VB himself_PRP a_DT Bear_NNP or_CC a_DT Wolf_NNP ,_,
etc_FW .,_, according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ totem_NN ;_: and_CC with_IN good_JJ right_NN does_VBZ he_PRP treat_VB the_DT
bears_NNS or_CC the_DT wolves_NNS ,_, etc_FW .,_, as_IN his_PRP$ brethren_NNS ,_, since_IN in_IN these_DT animals_NNS
are_VBP lodged_VBN the_DT souls_NNS of_IN himself_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ kindred_NN ._.

Examples_NNS of_IN this_DT supposed_VBN death_NN and_CC resurrection_NN at_IN initiation_NN are_VBP
as_IN follows_VBZ ._. In_IN the_DT Wonghi_NNP or_CC Wonghibon_NNP tribe_NN of_IN New_NNP South_NNP Wales_NNP the_DT
youths_NNS on_IN approaching_VBG manhood_NN are_VBP initiated_VBN at_IN a_DT secret_JJ ceremony_NN ,_,
which_WDT none_NN but_CC initiated_VBN men_NNS may_MD witness_VB ._. Part_NNP of_IN the_DT proceedings_NNS
consists_VBZ in_IN knocking_VBG out_RP a_DT tooth_NN and_CC giving_VBG a_DT new_JJ name_NN to_TO the_DT
novice_NN ,_, indicative_NN of_IN the_DT change_NN from_IN youth_NN to_TO manhood_NN ._. While_IN the_DT
teeth_NNS are_VBP being_VBG knocked_VBN out_IN an_DT instrument_NN known_VBN as_IN a_DT bull-roarer_NN ,_,
which_WDT consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT flat_JJ piece_NN of_IN wood_NN with_IN serrated_JJ edges_NNS tied_VBN to_TO
the_DT end_NN of_IN a_DT string_NN ,_, is_VBZ swung_VBN round_RB so_RB as_IN to_TO produce_VB a_DT loud_JJ humming_NN
noise_NN ._. The_DT uninitiated_JJ are_VBP not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO see_VB this_DT instrument_NN ._. Women_NNS
are_VBP forbidden_VBN to_TO witness_VB the_DT ceremonies_NNS under_IN pain_NN of_IN death_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ
given_VBN out_RP that_IN the_DT youths_NNS are_VBP each_DT met_VBN in_IN turn_NN by_IN a_DT mythical_JJ being_NN ,_,
called_VBN Thuremlin_NNP (_-LRB- more_RBR commonly_RB known_VBN as_IN Daramulun_NNP )_-RRB- who_WP takes_VBZ the_DT
youth_NN to_TO a_DT distance_NN ,_, kills_VBZ him_PRP ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT instances_NNS cuts_NNS him_PRP up_RP ,_,
after_IN which_WDT he_PRP restores_VBZ him_PRP to_TO life_NN and_CC knocks_VBZ out_RP a_DT tooth_NN ._. Their_PRP$
belief_NN in_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN Thuremlin_NNP is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO be_VB undoubted_VBN ._.

The_DT Ualaroi_NNP of_IN the_DT Upper_NNP Darling_NNP River_NNP said_VBD that_IN at_IN initiation_NN the_DT
boy_NN met_VBD a_DT ghost_NN ,_, who_WP killed_VBD him_PRP and_CC brought_VBD him_PRP to_TO life_NN again_RB as_IN a_DT
young_JJ man_NN ._. Among_IN the_DT natives_NNS on_IN the_DT Lower_NNP Lachlan_NNP and_CC Murray_NNP Rivers_NNS
it_PRP was_VBD Thrumalun_NNP (_-LRB- Daramulun_NNP )_-RRB- who_WP was_VBD thought_VBN to_TO slay_VB and_CC resuscitate_VB
the_DT novices_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT Unmatjera_NNP tribe_NN of_IN Central_NNP Australia_NNP women_NNS and_CC
children_NNS believe_VBP that_IN a_DT spirit_NN called_VBN Twanyirika_NNP kills_VBZ the_DT youth_NN and_CC
afterwards_RB brings_VBZ him_PRP to_TO life_NN again_RB during_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN initiation_NN ._.
The_DT rites_NNS of_IN initiation_NN in_IN this_DT tribe_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT other_JJ Central_NN
tribes_NNS ,_, comprise_VB the_DT operations_NNS of_IN circumcision_NN and_CC subincision_NN ;_: and_CC
as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT second_JJ of_IN these_DT has_VBZ been_VBN performed_VBN on_IN him_PRP ,_, the_DT young_JJ
man_NN receives_VBZ from_IN his_PRP$ father_NN a_DT sacred_JJ stick_NN (_-LRB- churinga_NN ),_NN with_IN
which_WDT ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ told_VBN ,_, his_PRP$ spirit_NN was_VBD associated_VBN in_IN the_DT remotest_NN past_NN ._.
While_IN he_PRP is_VBZ out_RB in_IN the_DT bush_NN recovering_VBG from_IN his_PRP$ wounds_NNS ,_, he_PRP must_MD
swing_VB the_DT bull-roarer_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT being_NN who_WP lives_VBZ up_RP in_IN the_DT sky_NN will_MD swoop_VB
down_RB and_CC carry_VB him_PRP off_RP ._. In_IN the_DT Binbinga_NNP tribe_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT western_JJ coast_NN
of_IN the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Carpentaria_NNP ,_, the_DT women_NNS and_CC children_NNS believe_VBP that_IN the_DT
noise_NN of_IN the_DT bull-roarer_NN at_IN initiation_NN is_VBZ made_VBN by_IN a_DT spirit_NN named_VBN
Katajalina_NNP ,_, who_WP lives_VBZ in_IN an_DT ant-hill_JJ and_CC comes_VBZ out_RB and_CC eats_VBZ up_RP the_DT
boy_NN ,_, afterwards_RB restoring_VBG him_PRP to_TO life_NN ._. Similarly_RB among_IN their_PRP$
neighbours_NNS the_DT Anula_NNP the_DT women_NNS imagine_VBP that_IN the_DT droning_VBG sound_NN of_IN the_DT
bull-roarer_NN is_VBZ produced_VBN by_IN a_DT spirit_NN called_VBD Gnabaia_NNP ,_, who_WP swallows_VBZ the_DT
lads_NNS at_IN initiation_NN and_CC afterwards_RB disgorges_VBZ them_PRP in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN
initiated_VBN men_NNS ._.

Among_IN the_DT tribes_NNS settled_VBD on_IN the_DT southern_JJ coast_NN of_IN New_NNP South_NNP Wales_NNP ,_,
of_IN which_WDT the_DT Coast_NNP Murring_NNP tribe_NN may_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN typical_JJ ,_, the_DT
drama_NN of_IN resurrection_NN from_IN the_DT dead_NN was_VBD exhibited_VBN in_IN a_DT graphic_JJ form_NN
to_TO the_DT novices_NNS at_IN initiation_NN ._. The_DT ceremony_NN has_VBZ been_VBN described_VBN for_IN us_PRP
by_IN an_DT eye-witness_NN ._. A_DT man_NN ,_, disguised_VBN with_IN stringy_JJ bark_NN fibre_NN ,_, lay_VB
down_RB in_IN a_DT grave_NN and_CC was_VBD lightly_RB covered_VBN up_RP with_IN sticks_NNS and_CC earth_NN ._. In_IN
his_PRP$ hand_NN he_PRP held_VBD a_DT small_JJ bush_NN ,_, which_WDT appeared_VBD to_TO be_VB growing_VBG in_IN the_DT
soil_NN ,_, and_CC other_JJ bushes_NNS were_VBD stuck_VBN in_IN the_DT ground_NN to_TO heighten_VB the_DT
effect_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT novices_NNS were_VBD brought_VBN and_CC placed_VBN beside_IN the_DT grave_NN ._.
Next_NNP ,_, a_DT procession_NN of_IN men_NNS ,_, disguised_VBN in_IN stringy_JJ bark_NN fibre_NN ,_, drew_VBD
near_IN ._. They_PRP represented_VBD a_DT party_NN of_IN medicine-men_NNS ,_, guided_VBN by_IN two_CD
reverend_NN seniors_NNS ,_, who_WP had_VBD come_VBN on_IN pilgrimage_NN to_TO the_DT grave_NN of_IN a_DT
brother_NN medicine-man_JJ ,_, who_WP lay_VBD buried_VBN there_RB ._. When_WRB the_DT little_JJ

he_PRP was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB received_VBN from_IN Daramulun_NNP in_IN person_NN ._.

Some_DT tribes_NNS of_IN Northern_NNP New_NNP Guinea_NNP --_: the_DT Yabim_NNP ,_, Bukaua_NNP ,_, Kai_NNP ,_, and_CC
Tami_NNP --_: like_IN many_JJ Australian_JJ tribes_NNS ,_, require_VB every_DT male_JJ member_NN of_IN the_DT
tribe_NN to_TO be_VB circumcised_VBN before_IN he_PRP ranks_VBZ as_IN a_DT full-grown_JJ man_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT
tribal_JJ initiation_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT circumcision_NN is_VBZ the_DT central_JJ feature_NN ,_, is_VBZ

being_VBG swallowed_VBN and_CC disgorged_VBN by_IN a_DT mythical_JJ monster_NN ,_, whose_WP$ voice_NN is_VBZ

For_IN this_DT purpose_NN a_DT hut_NN about_IN a_DT hundred_CD feet_NNS long_RB is_VBZ erected_VBN either_CC
in_IN the_DT village_NN or_CC in_IN a_DT lonely_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT forest_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ modelled_VBN in_IN
the_DT shape_NN of_IN the_DT mythical_JJ monster_NN ;_: at_IN the_DT end_NN which_WDT represents_VBZ his_PRP$
head_NN it_PRP is_VBZ high_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP tapers_VBZ away_RB at_IN the_DT other_JJ end_NN ._. A_DT betel-palm_NN ,_,

being_VBG and_CC its_PRP$ clustering_NN fibres_NNS for_IN his_PRP$ hair_NN ;_: and_CC to_TO complete_VB the_DT

is_VBZ variously_RB enacted_VBN ._. Among_IN the_DT Tami_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ represented_VBN by_IN causing_VBG

When_WRB ,_, as_IN sometimes_RB happens_VBZ ,_, a_DT lad_NN dies_VBZ from_IN the_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT

crust_NN of_IN white_JJ chalk_NN with_IN which_WDT their_PRP$ bodies_NNS had_VBD been_VBN coated_VBN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ highly_RB significant_JJ that_IN all_PDT these_DT tribes_NNS of_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP apply_VBP
the_DT same_JJ word_NN to_TO the_DT bull-roarer_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT monster_NN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ supposed_VBN

In_IN certain_JJ districts_NNS of_IN Viti_NNP Levu_NNP ,_, the_DT largest_JJS of_IN the_DT Fijian_NNP

to_TO cleanse_VB themselves_PRP from_IN the_DT blood_NN and_CC guts_NNS of_IN pigs_NNS with_IN which_WDT

The_DT people_NNS of_IN Rook_NNP ,_, an_DT island_NN between_IN New_NNP Guinea_NNP and_CC New_NNP Britain_NNP ,_,

villagers_NNS ,_, according_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ means_NNS ,_, contribute_VBP provisions_NNS ,_, which_WDT
are_VBP then_RB consumed_VBN in_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Marsaba_NNP ._.

In_IN the_DT west_NN of_IN Ceram_NN boys_NNS at_IN puberty_NN are_VBP admitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Kakian_NNP
association_NN ._. Modern_JJ writers_NNS have_VBP commonly_RB regarded_VBN this_DT association_NN
as_IN primarily_RB a_DT political_JJ league_NN instituted_VBD to_TO resist_VB foreign_JJ
domination_NN ._. In_IN reality_NN its_PRP$ objects_NNS are_VBP purely_RB religious_JJ and_CC social_JJ ,_,
though_IN it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ that_IN the_DT priests_NNS may_MD have_VB occasionally_RB used_VBN
their_PRP$ powerful_JJ influence_NN for_IN political_JJ ends_NNS ._. The_DT society_NN is_VBZ in_IN fact_NN
merely_RB one_CD of_IN those_DT widely-diffused_JJ primitive_JJ institutions_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT
a_DT chief_JJ object_NN is_VBZ the_DT initiation_NN of_IN young_JJ men_NNS ._. In_IN recent_JJ years_NNS the_DT
true_JJ nature_NN of_IN the_DT association_NN has_VBZ been_VBN duly_RB recognised_VBN by_IN the_DT
distinguished_VBN Dutch_JJ ethnologist_NN ,_, J_NNP ._. G_NNP ._. F_NNP ._. Riedel_NNP ._. The_DT Kakian_NNP house_NN
is_VBZ an_DT oblong_JJ wooden_JJ shed_VBN ,_, situated_VBN under_IN the_DT darkest_NN trees_NNS in_IN the_DT
depth_NN of_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ built_VBN to_TO admit_VB so_RB little_JJ light_NN that_IN it_PRP
is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO see_VB what_WP goes_VBZ on_IN in_IN it_PRP ._. Every_DT village_NN has_VBZ such_JJ a_DT
house_NN ._. Thither_'' the_DT boys_NNS who_WP are_VBP to_TO be_VB initiated_VBN are_VBP conducted_VBN
blindfold_NN ,_, followed_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ parents_NNS and_CC relations_NNS ._. Each_DT boy_NN is_VBZ led_VBN
by_IN the_DT hand_NN of_IN two_CD men_NNS ,_, who_WP act_VBP as_IN his_PRP$ sponsors_NNS or_CC guardians_NNS ,_,
looking_VBG after_IN him_PRP during_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN initiation_NN ._. When_WRB all_DT are_VBP

devils_NNS ._. Immediately_RB a_DT hideous_JJ uproar_NN is_VBZ heard_VBN to_TO proceed_VB from_IN the_DT
shed_VBN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ made_VBN by_IN men_NNS with_IN bamboo_NN trumpets_NNS ,_, who_WP have_VBP been_VBN secretly_RB
introduced_VBN into_IN the_DT building_NN by_IN a_DT back_JJ door_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT women_NNS and_CC
children_NNS think_VBP it_PRP is_VBZ made_VBN by_IN the_DT devils_NNS ,_, and_CC are_VBP much_RB terrified_VBN ._.
Then_RB the_DT priests_NNS enter_VBP the_DT shed_VBN ,_, followed_VBN by_IN the_DT boys_NNS ,_, one_CD at_IN a_DT
time_NN ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN each_DT boy_NN has_VBZ disappeared_VBN within_IN the_DT precincts_NNS ,_, a_DT
dull_JJ chopping_NN sound_NN is_VBZ heard_VBN ,_, a_DT fearful_JJ cry_NN rings_NNS out_IN ,_, and_CC a_DT sword_NN
or_CC spear_NN ,_, dripping_VBG with_IN blood_NN ,_, is_VBZ thrust_VBN through_IN the_DT roof_NN of_IN the_DT
shed_VBN ._. This_DT is_VBZ a_DT token_JJ that_IN the_DT boy_NN '_POS s_PRP head_NN has_VBZ been_VBN cut_VBN off_RP ,_, and_CC that_IN
the_DT devil_NN has_VBZ carried_VBN him_PRP away_RB to_TO the_DT other_JJ world_NN ,_, there_RB to_TO
regenerate_NN and_CC transform_VB him_PRP ._. So_RB at_IN sight_NN of_IN the_DT bloody_JJ sword_NN the_DT
mothers_NNS weep_NN and_CC wail_NN ,_, crying_VBG that_IN the_DT devil_NN has_VBZ murdered_VBN their_PRP$
children_NNS ._. In_IN some_DT places_NNS ,_, it_PRP would_MD seem_VB ,_, the_DT boys_NNS are_VBP pushed_VBN through_IN
an_DT opening_NN made_VBN in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT crocodile_NN '_'' s_PRP jaws_NNS or_CC a_DT cassowary_NN '_'' s_PRP
beak_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ then_RB said_VBD that_IN the_DT devil_NN has_VBZ swallowed_VBN them_PRP ._. The_DT
boys_NNS remain_VBP in_IN the_DT shed_VBN for_IN five_CD or_CC nine_CD days_NNS ._. Sitting_VBG in_IN the_DT dark_NN ,_,
they_PRP hear_VBP the_DT blast_NN of_IN the_DT bamboo_NN trumpets_NNS ,_, and_CC from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN
the_DT sound_NN of_IN musket_NN shots_NNS and_CC the_DT clash_NN of_IN swords_NNS ._. Every_DT day_NN they_PRP
bathe_VB ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ faces_NNS and_CC bodies_NNS are_VBP smeared_VBN with_IN a_DT yellow_JJ dye_NN ,_, to_TO
give_VB them_PRP the_DT appearance_NN of_IN having_VBG been_VBN swallowed_VBN by_IN the_DT devil_NN ._.
During_IN his_PRP$ stay_NN in_IN the_DT Kakian_NNP house_NN each_DT boy_NN has_VBZ one_CD or_CC two_CD crosses_NNS
tattooed_VBN with_IN thorns_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ breast_NN or_CC arm_NN ._. When_WRB they_PRP are_VBP not_RB
sleeping_VBG ,_, the_DT lads_NNS must_MD sit_VB in_IN a_DT crouching_VBG posture_NN without_IN moving_VBG a_DT
muscle_NN ._. As_IN they_PRP sit_VBP in_IN a_DT row_NN cross-legged_JJ ,_, with_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS
stretched_VBN out_RB ,_, the_DT chief_NN takes_VBZ his_PRP$ trumpet_NN ,_, and_CC placing_VBG the_DT mouth_NN of_IN
it_PRP on_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN each_DT lad_NN ,_, speaks_VBZ through_IN it_PRP in_IN strange_JJ tones_NNS ,_,
imitating_VBG the_DT voice_NN of_IN the_DT spirits_NNS ._. He_PRP warns_VBZ the_DT lads_NNS ,_, under_IN pain_NN of_IN
death_NN ,_, to_TO observe_VB the_DT rules_NNS of_IN the_DT Kakian_NNP society_NN ,_, and_CC never_RB to_TO
reveal_VB what_WP has_VBZ passed_VBN in_IN the_DT Kakian_NNP house_NN ._. The_DT novices_NNS are_VBP also_RB
told_VBN by_IN the_DT priests_NNS to_TO behave_VB well_RB to_TO their_PRP$ blood_NN relations_NNS ,_, and_CC are_VBP
taught_VBN the_DT traditions_NNS and_CC secrets_NNS of_IN the_DT tribe_NN ._.

Meantime_RB the_DT mothers_NNS and_CC sisters_NNS of_IN the_DT lads_NNS have_VBP gone_VBN home_RB to_TO weep_VB
and_CC mourn_NN ._. But_CC in_IN a_DT day_NN or_CC two_CD the_DT men_NNS who_WP acted_VBD as_IN guardians_NNS or_CC
sponsors_NNS to_TO the_DT novices_NNS return_NN to_TO the_DT village_NN with_IN the_DT glad_JJ tidings_NNS
that_IN the_DT devil_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT intercession_NN of_IN the_DT priests_NNS ,_, has_VBZ restored_VBN the_DT
lads_NNS to_TO life_NN ._. The_DT men_NNS who_WP bring_VBP this_DT news_NN come_VBN in_IN a_DT fainting_JJ state_NN
and_CC daubed_VBD with_IN mud_NN ,_, like_IN messengers_NNS freshly_RB arrived_VBD from_IN the_DT nether_NN

In_IN the_DT region_NN of_IN the_DT Lower_NNP Congo_NNP a_DT simulation_NN of_IN death_NN and_CC

In_IN other_JJ tribes_NNS ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT Ojebways_NNS ,_, Winnebagoes_NNP ,_, and_CC Dacotas_NNP

A_DT ceremony_NN witnessed_VBN by_IN the_DT castaway_NN John_NNP R_NN ._. Jewitt_NNP during_IN his_PRP$

This_DT conjectural_JJ explanation_NN of_IN the_DT ceremony_NN has_VBZ ,_, since_IN it_PRP was_VBD first_RB

"_`` Among_IN all_PDT the_DT tribes_NNS is_VBZ great_JJ excitement_NN ,_, because_IN I_PRP am_VBP Tlokoala_NNP ."_NN

In_IN these_DT ceremonies_NNS the_DT essence_NN of_IN the_DT rite_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT

part_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC from_IN whom_WP he_PRP receives_VBZ in_IN return_NN a_DT gift_NN of_IN magical_JJ

of_IN so_RB doing_VBG ._. If_IN the_DT question_NN is_VBZ put_VBN ,_, why_WRB do_VBP men_NNS desire_VB to_TO deposit_NN
their_PRP$ life_NN outside_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS ?_. the_DT answer_NN can_MD only_RB be_VB that_IN ,_, like_IN
the_DT giant_NN in_IN the_DT fairy_JJ tale_NN ,_, they_PRP think_VBP it_PRP safer_JJR to_TO do_VB so_RB than_IN to_TO
carry_VB it_PRP about_IN with_IN them_PRP ,_, just_RB as_IN people_NNS deposit_NN their_PRP$ money_NN with_IN a_DT
banker_NN rather_RB than_IN carry_VB it_PRP on_IN their_PRP$ persons_NNS ._. We_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN at_IN
critical_JJ periods_NNS the_DT life_NN or_CC soul_NN is_VBZ sometimes_RB temporarily_RB stowed_VBN

of_IN life_NN at_IN which_WDT initiation_NN takes_VBZ place_NN is_VBZ regularly_RB puberty_NN ;_: and_CC
this_DT fact_NN suggests_VBZ that_IN the_DT special_JJ danger_NN which_WDT totemism_NN and_CC

apprehended_VBN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO attend_VB the_DT relation_NN of_IN the_DT sexes_NNS to_TO each_DT
other_JJ ._. It_PRP would_MD be_VB easy_JJ to_TO prove_VB by_IN a_DT long_JJ array_NN of_IN facts_NNS that_IN the_DT

LXVIII_NNP ._. The_DT Golden_NNP Bough_NNP

THUS_NNS the_DT view_NN that_IN Balder_NNP '_POS s_PRP life_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN is_VBZ entirely_RB in_IN
harmony_NN with_IN primitive_JJ modes_NNS of_IN thought_NN ._. It_PRP may_MD indeed_RB sound_VB like_IN a_DT

nevertheless_RB have_VBP been_VBN killed_VBN by_IN a_DT blow_NN from_IN the_DT plant_NN ._. But_CC when_WRB a_DT
person_NN '_POS s_PRP life_NN is_VBZ conceived_VBN as_IN embodied_VBN in_IN a_DT particular_JJ object_NN ,_, with_IN
the_DT existence_NN of_IN which_WDT his_PRP$ own_JJ existence_NN is_VBZ inseparably_RB bound_VBN up_RP ,_,

his_PRP$ death_NN ,_, as_IN happens_VBZ in_IN the_DT fairy_JJ tales_NNS ._. Hence_RB if_IN a_DT man_NN '_POS s_PRP death_NN is_VBZ
in_IN an_DT object_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ perfectly_RB natural_JJ that_IN he_PRP should_MD be_VB killed_VBN by_IN a_DT
blow_NN from_IN it_PRP ._. In_IN the_DT fairy_JJ tales_NNS Koshchei_IN the_DT Deathless_NNP is_VBZ killed_VBN by_IN
a_DT blow_NN from_IN the_DT egg_NN or_CC the_DT stone_NN in_IN which_WDT his_PRP$ life_NN or_CC death_NN is_VBZ
secreted_VBN ;_: the_DT ogres_NNS burst_VBD when_WRB a_DT certain_JJ grain_NN of_IN sand_NN --_: doubtless_RB
containing_VBG their_PRP$ life_NN or_CC death_NN --_: is_VBZ carried_VBN over_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS ;_: the_DT
magician_NN dies_VBZ when_WRB the_DT stone_NN in_IN which_WDT his_PRP$ life_NN or_CC death_NN is_VBZ contained_VBN
is_VBZ put_VBN under_IN his_PRP$ pillow_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT Tartar_NNP hero_NN is_VBZ warned_VBN that_IN he_PRP may_MD
be_VB killed_VBN by_IN the_DT golden_JJ arrow_NN or_CC golden_JJ sword_NN in_IN which_WDT his_PRP$ soul_NN has_VBZ
been_VBN stowed_VBN away_RB ._.

The_DT idea_NN that_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT oak_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN was_VBD probably_RB
suggested_VBN ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP said_VBD ,_, by_IN the_DT observation_NN that_IN in_IN winter_NN the_DT
mistletoe_NN growing_VBG on_IN the_DT oak_NN remains_VBZ green_JJ while_IN the_DT oak_NN itself_PRP is_VBZ

but_CC from_IN the_DT trunk_NN or_CC branches_NNS of_IN the_DT tree_NN --_: might_MD confirm_VB this_DT idea_NN ._.
Primitive_JJ man_NN might_MD think_VB that_IN ,_, like_IN himself_PRP ,_, the_DT oak-spirit_NN had_VBD
sought_VBN to_TO deposit_VB his_PRP$ life_NN in_IN some_DT safe_JJ place_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN this_DT purpose_NN
had_VBD pitched_VBN on_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, being_VBG in_IN a_DT sense_NN neither_RB on_IN
earth_NN nor_CC in_IN heaven_NN ,_, might_MD be_VB supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB fairly_RB out_IN of_IN harm_NN '_'' s_PRP
way_NN ._. In_IN a_DT former_JJ chapter_NN we_PRP saw_VBD that_IN primitive_JJ man_NN seeks_VBZ to_TO preserve_VB

Again_RB ,_, the_DT view_NN that_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN owes_VBZ its_PRP$ mystic_JJ character_NN partly_RB

have_VB its_PRP$ full_JJ effect_NN it_PRP must_MD be_VB cut_VBN on_IN Ascension_NNP Day_NNP ."_NNP Hence_RB it_PRP is_VBZ

(_-LRB- fl_NN �_NN gr_NN �_IN nn_JJ ),_NN that_WDT is_VBZ to_TO a_DT rowan_NN which_WDT is_VBZ found_VBN growing_VBG not_RB in_IN the_DT

in_IN a_DT cleft_NN of_IN the_DT rock_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP has_VBZ sprouted_VBN from_IN seed_NN scattered_VBN by_IN
birds_NNS ._. They_PRP say_VBP that_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP is_VBZ out_RB in_IN the_DT dark_NN should_MD have_VB a_DT bit_NN
of_IN "_`` flying-rowan_JJ "_'' with_IN him_PRP to_TO chew_VB ;_: else_RB he_PRP runs_VBZ a_DT risk_NN of_IN being_VBG

The_DT view_NN that_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN was_VBD not_RB merely_RB the_DT instrument_NN of_IN
Balder_NN '_POS s_PRP death_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN it_PRP contained_VBD his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, is_VBZ countenanced_VBN by_IN

of_IN the_DT Hays_NNP of_IN Errol_NNP ,_, an_DT estate_NN in_IN Perthshire_NNP ,_, near_IN the_DT Firth_NNP of_IN
Tay_NNP ,_, was_VBD bound_VBN up_RP with_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN that_WDT grew_VBD on_IN a_DT certain_JJ great_JJ

follows_VBZ :_: "_`` Among_IN the_DT low_JJ country_NN families_NNS the_DT badges_NNS are_VBP now_RB almost_RB
generally_RB forgotten_VBN ;_: but_CC it_PRP appears_VBZ by_IN an_DT ancient_JJ MS_NNP .,_, and_CC the_DT

duration_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN of_IN Hay_NN was_VBD said_VBN to_TO be_VB united_VBN with_IN its_PRP$
existence_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD believed_VBN that_IN a_DT sprig_NN of_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN cut_NN by_IN a_DT

two_CD most_JJS unlucky_JJ deeds_NNS which_WDT could_MD be_VB done_VBN by_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Hay_NN

Errol_NNP ._. When_WRB the_DT old_JJ tree_NN was_VBD destroyed_VBN I_PRP could_MD never_RB learn_VB ._. The_DT
estate_NN has_VBZ been_VBN sold_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT family_NN of_IN Hay_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN course_NN it_PRP is_VBZ
said_VBD that_IN the_DT fatal_JJ oak_NN was_VBD cut_VBN down_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN before_IN ."_NNS The_DT old_JJ
superstition_NN is_VBZ recorded_VBN in_IN verses_NNS which_WDT are_VBP traditionally_RB ascribed_VBN
to_TO Thomas_NNP the_DT Rhymer_NNP :_:


While_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN bats_NNS on_IN Errol_NNP '_POS s_PRP aik_VBP ,_,
And_CC that_DT aik_NN stands_VBZ fast_RB ,_,
The_DT Hays_NNP shall_MD flourish_VB ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ good_JJ grey_NN hawk_NN
Shall_MD nocht_RB flinch_VB before_IN the_DT blast_NN ._.

But_CC when_WRB the_DT root_NN of_IN the_DT aik_NN decays_NNS ,_,
And_CC the_DT mistletoe_NN dwines_NNS on_IN its_PRP$ withered_JJ breast_NN ,_,
The_DT grass_NN shall_MD grow_VB on_IN Errol_NNP '_POS s_PRP hearthstane_NN ,_,
And_CC the_DT corbie_NN roup_NN in_IN the_DT falcon_NN '_'' s_PRP nest_NN ._.


It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB a_DT new_JJ opinion_NN that_IN the_DT Golden_NNP Bough_NNP was_VBD the_DT mistletoe_NN ._.
True_JJ ,_, Virgil_NNP does_VBZ not_RB identify_VB but_CC only_RB compares_VBZ it_PRP with_IN mistletoe_NN ._.
But_CC this_DT may_MD be_VB only_RB a_DT poetical_JJ device_NN to_TO cast_VB a_DT mystic_JJ glamour_NN over_IN
the_DT humble_JJ plant_NN ._. Or_CC ,_, more_RBR probably_RB ,_, his_PRP$ description_NN was_VBD based_VBN on_IN a_DT
popular_JJ superstition_NN that_IN at_IN certain_JJ times_NNS the_DT mistletoe_NN blazed_VBD out_IN
into_IN a_DT supernatural_JJ golden_JJ glory_NN ._. The_DT poet_NN tells_VBZ how_WRB two_CD doves_NNS ,_,

gold_NN ._. As_IN in_IN the_DT woods_NNS in_IN winter_NN cold_NN the_DT mistletoe_NN --_: a_DT plant_NN not_RB
native_JJ to_TO its_PRP$ tree_NN --_: is_VBZ green_JJ with_IN fresh_JJ leaves_NNS and_CC twines_VBG its_PRP$ yellow_NN

leafy_JJ gold_NN ,_, so_RB rustled_VBN in_IN the_DT gentle_JJ breeze_NN the_DT golden_JJ leaf_NN ."_VBG Here_RB
Virgil_NNP definitely_RB describes_VBZ the_DT Golden_NNP Bough_NNP as_IN growing_VBG on_IN a_DT

mistletoe_NN seen_VBN through_IN the_DT haze_NN of_IN poetry_NN or_CC of_IN popular_JJ
superstition_NN ._.

Now_RB grounds_NNS have_VBP been_VBN shown_VBN for_IN believing_VBG that_IN the_DT priest_NN of_IN the_DT
Arician_NN grove_NN --_: the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP --_: personified_VBD the_DT tree_NN on_IN which_WDT
grew_VBD the_DT Golden_NNP Bough_NNP ._. Hence_RB if_IN that_IN tree_NN was_VBD the_DT oak_NN ,_, the_DT King_NNP of_IN
the_DT Wood_NNP must_MD have_VB been_VBN a_DT personification_NN of_IN the_DT oakspirit_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ ,_,
therefore_RB ,_, easy_JJ to_TO understand_VB why_WRB ,_, before_IN he_PRP could_MD be_VB slain_VBN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD
necessary_JJ to_TO break_VB the_DT Golden_NNP Bough_NNP ._. As_IN an_DT oak-spirit_NN ,_, his_PRP$ life_NN or_CC

remained_VBD intact_JJ ,_, he_PRP ,_, like_IN Balder_NNP ,_, could_MD not_RB die_VB ._. To_TO slay_VB him_PRP ,_,
therefore_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO break_VB the_DT mistletoe_NN ,_, and_CC probably_RB ,_, as_IN
in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Balder_NNP ,_, to_TO throw_VB it_PRP at_IN him_PRP ._. And_CC to_TO complete_VB the_DT
parallel_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB necessary_JJ to_TO suppose_VB that_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN the_DT Wood_NNP
was_VBD formerly_RB burned_VBN ,_, dead_JJ or_CC alive_JJ ,_, at_IN the_DT midsummer_NN fire_NN festival_NN
which_WDT ,_, as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, was_VBD annually_RB celebrated_VBN in_IN the_DT Arician_NN
grove_NN ._. The_DT perpetual_JJ fire_NN which_WDT burned_VBD in_IN the_DT grove_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT
perpetual_JJ fire_NN which_WDT burned_VBD in_IN the_DT temple_NN of_IN Vesta_NNP at_IN Rome_NNP and_CC under_IN

formerly_RB met_VBD his_PRP$ end_NN ._. At_IN a_DT later_JJ time_NN ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP suggested_VBN ,_, his_PRP$

might_MD be_VB ,_, by_IN the_DT rule_NN which_WDT allowed_VBD him_PRP to_TO live_VB so_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP could_MD

fire_NN to_TO fall_VB by_IN the_DT sword_NN ._.

Thus_RB it_PRP seems_VBZ that_IN at_IN a_DT remote_JJ age_NN in_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN Italy_NNP ,_, beside_IN the_DT
sweet_JJ Lake_NNP of_IN Nemi_NNP ,_, the_DT same_JJ fiery_JJ tragedy_NN was_VBD annually_RB enacted_VBN
which_WDT Italian_JJ merchants_NNS and_CC soldiers_NNS were_VBD afterwards_RB to_TO witness_NN
among_IN their_PRP$ rude_JJ kindred_NN ,_, the_DT Celts_NNS of_IN Gaul_NNP ,_, and_CC which_WDT ,_, if_IN the_DT Roman_NNP
eagles_NNS had_VBD ever_RB swooped_VBD on_IN Norway_NNP ,_, might_MD have_VB been_VBN found_VBN repeated_VBN
with_IN little_JJ difference_NN among_IN the_DT barbarous_JJ Aryans_NNS of_IN the_DT North_NNP ._. The_DT
rite_NN was_VBD probably_RB an_DT essential_JJ feature_NN in_IN the_DT ancient_JJ Aryan_JJ worship_NN
of_IN the_DT oak_NN ._.

It_PRP only_RB remains_VBZ to_TO ask_VB ,_, Why_WRB was_VBD the_DT mistletoe_NN called_VBD the_DT Golden_NNP
Bough_NNP ?_. The_DT whitish-yellow_NN of_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN berries_NNS is_VBZ hardly_RB enough_RB
to_TO account_NN for_IN the_DT name_NN ,_, for_IN Virgil_NNP says_VBZ that_IN the_DT bough_NN was_VBD
altogether_RB golden_JJ ,_, stems_VBZ as_RB well_RB as_IN leaves_NNS ._. Perhaps_RB the_DT name_NN may_MD be_VB
derived_VBN from_IN the_DT rich_JJ golden_JJ yellow_NN which_WDT a_DT bough_NN of_IN mistletoe_NN
assumes_VBZ when_WRB it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN cut_VBN and_CC kept_VBN for_IN some_DT months_NNS ;_: the_DT bright_JJ
tint_NN is_VBZ not_RB confined_VBN to_TO the_DT leaves_NNS ,_, but_CC spreads_VBZ to_TO the_DT stalks_NNS as_IN
well_RB ,_, so_RB that_IN the_DT whole_JJ branch_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB indeed_RB a_DT Golden_NNP Bough_NNP ._.
Breton_NNP peasants_NNS hang_VBP up_RP great_JJ bunches_NNS of_IN mistletoe_NN in_IN front_NN of_IN their_PRP$
cottages_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN June_NNP these_DT bunches_NNS are_VBP conspicuous_JJ for_IN
the_DT bright_JJ golden_JJ tinge_NN of_IN their_PRP$ foliage_NN ._. In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Brittany_NNP ,_,
especially_RB about_IN Morbihan_NNP ,_, branches_NNS of_IN mistletoe_NN are_VBP hung_VBN over_IN the_DT
doors_NNS of_IN stables_NNS and_CC byres_NNS to_TO protect_VB the_DT horses_NNS and_CC cattle_NNS ,_,
probably_RB against_IN witchcraft_NN ._.

The_DT yellow_JJ colour_NN of_IN the_DT withered_VBN bough_NN may_MD partly_RB explain_VB why_WRB the_DT

A_DT tree_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN struck_VBN by_IN lightning_NN is_VBZ naturally_RB regarded_VBN by_IN
the_DT savage_JJ as_IN charged_VBN with_IN a_DT double_JJ or_CC triple_JJ portion_NN of_IN fire_NN ;_: for_IN
has_VBZ he_PRP not_RB seen_VBN the_DT mighty_JJ flash_NN enter_VBP into_IN the_DT trunk_NN with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ

beliefs_NNS concerning_VBG trees_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN struck_VBN by_IN lightning_NN ._. When_WRB

It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT plausible_JJ theory_NN that_IN the_DT reverence_NN which_WDT the_DT ancient_JJ

LXIX_NNP ._. Farewell_NNP to_TO Nemi_NNP

WE_NNP are_VBP at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN our_PRP$ enquiry_NN ,_, but_CC as_RB often_RB happens_VBZ in_IN the_DT search_NN
after_IN truth_NN ,_, if_IN we_PRP have_VBP answered_VBN one_CD question_NN ,_, we_PRP have_VBP raised_VBN many_JJ

passion_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT caprice_NN of_IN spiritual_JJ beings_NNS like_IN man_NN in_IN kind_NN ,_, though_IN
vastly_RB superior_JJ to_TO him_PRP in_IN power_NN ._.

But_CC as_IN time_NN goes_VBZ on_IN this_DT explanation_NN in_IN its_PRP$ turn_NN proves_VBZ to_TO be_VB
unsatisfactory_JJ ._. For_IN it_PRP assumes_VBZ that_IN the_DT succession_NN of_IN natural_JJ events_NNS
is_VBZ not_RB determined_VBN by_IN immutable_JJ laws_NNS ,_, but_CC is_VBZ to_TO some_DT extent_NN variable_JJ
and_CC irregular_JJ ,_, and_CC this_DT assumption_NN is_VBZ not_RB borne_VBN out_RP by_IN closer_RBR
observation_NN ._. On_IN the_DT contrary_NN ,_, the_DT more_RBR we_PRP scrutinise_VBP that_DT succession_NN
the_DT more_JJR we_PRP are_VBP struck_VBN by_IN the_DT rigid_JJ uniformity_NN ,_, the_DT punctual_NN
precision_NN with_IN which_WDT ,_, wherever_WRB we_PRP can_MD follow_VB them_PRP ,_, the_DT operations_NNS of_IN
